40001001	Gyisɛse Kelaese abusua ɛlɔnwɔne ne ɛne. Gyisɛse le Devidi angabɛnzo yɛɛ Devidi le Ebileham alɔnra.
40001002	Ebileham wole Ayezeke, Ayezeke wole Gyekɔbo, Gyekɔbo wole Dwuda nee ɔ mediema ne mɔ.
40001003	Dwuda wole Pɛlɛze nee Zila (bɛfɛlɛ bɛ nli Teemaa), Pɛlɛze wole Hɛzelɔn, Hɛzelɔn wole Relam,
40001004	Relam wole Amenadabe, Amenadabe wole Nahyɔn, Nahyɔn wole Salemɔn,
40001005	Salemɔn wole Bowaze, (bɛfɛlɛ ɔ nli Releehabe); Bowaze wole Obɛde (bɛfɛlɛ ɔ nli Wulutu), Obɛde wole Gyɛsi, yɛɛ
40001006	Gyɛsi wole Belemgbunli Devidi. Devidi wole Sɔlɔmɔn (ɔ nli a le raalɛ ne mɔɔ Yulaya gyale ye bie la),
40001007	Sɔlɔmɔn wole Rilihɔbowam; Rilihɔbowam wole Abaegya, Abaegya wole Esa,
40001008	Esa wole Gyɛhɔhyafate, Gyɛhɔhyafate wole Gyɛholam, Gyɛholam wole Ɛzaya,
40001009	Ɛzaya wole Dwotam, Dwotam wole Ehaze, Ehaze wole Hɛzikaya,
40001010	Hɛzikaya wole Manasɛ, Manasɛ wole Amɔn, Amɔn wole Dwosaya,
40001011	Dwosaya wole Gyɛhɔyakɛn nee ɔ mediema ne mɔ. Mekɛ ɛhye anu yɛɛ Babelɔnoma hyele Dwuda maanlema dɔɔnwo hɔle nlɔnu a.
40001012	Bɛvale bɛ bɛhɔle Babelɔn la nzinlii Gyɛhɔyakɛn wole Hyealeteɛle, Hyealeteɛle wole Zɛlɛbabɛle,
40001013	Zɛlɛbabɛle wole Abayude, Abayude wole Yilayakem, Yilayakem wole Ezɔ,
40001014	Ezɔ wole Zeedɔko, Zeedɔko wole Ekem, Ekem wole Yilayɛde,
40001015	Yilayɛde wole Ɛlieza, Ɛlieza wole Matan, Matan wole Gyekɔbo,
40001016	Gyekɔbo wole Dwosefi, mɔɔ ɔ ye a le Mɛle mɔɔ wole Gyisɛse, mɔɔ le Kelaese ne la.
40001017	Zɔhane ati, ɔvi Ebileham anwo zo toonwo mɔɔ badwu Devidi anwo zo la le awolɛndoazo bulu nee nna, yɛɛ ɔvi Devidi anwo zo toonwo mɔɔ badwu mekɛ mɔɔ bɛhyele Dwuda maanlema bɛhɔle Babelɔn la le awolɛndoazo bulu nee nna, yɛɛ ɔvi mekɛ zɔhane mɔɔ badwu Kelaese ne awolɛ nu la le awolɛndoazo bulu nee nna.
40001018	Kɛ Gyisɛse Kelaese awolɛ ne yɛle la ɛne. Mekɛ mɔɔ Dwosefi yiale Mɛle, mɔɔ le Gyisɛse ɔ nli ne, na ɔtɛnyianle ɔtɛyɛle ɔ nwo debie la bɛnwunle kɛ Mɛle lua Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne anwo zo ɛva ɛkolɛ.
40001019	Kɛmɔ ɛnee Dwosefi le sonla mɔɔ di pɛlepɛle na yeangulo kɛ ɔkɛbɔ ye anyiemgba la, ɔdwenlenle nwolɛ kɛ ɔfa ahane yeahɔye ɔ nloa wɔ ɔ nwo.
40001020	Na mekɛ mɔɔ ɛnee Dwosefi ɛlɛdwenledwenle ɛhye anwo la, Awulae soanvolɛ yele ɔ nwo hilele ye wɔ ɛlalɛ nu na ɔzele ye kɛ, “Dwosefi, Devidi alɔnra, mmasulo kɛ ɛkɛva Mɛle ɛkɛyɛ ɛ ye, ɔluakɛ ɔlua Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne anwo zo a yenrenzɛ a.
40001021	Ɔbawo ralɛ nrenya na wɔado ye duma Gyisɛse, ɔboalekɛ ɔbalie ye menli ne yeavi bɛ ɛtane nu.”
40001022	Ɛhye mɔ amuala zile amaa mɔɔ Awulae luale ye kpɔmanvolɛ ne anwo zo hanle la ayɛ nɔhalɛ kɛ,
40001023	“Bɛlɛra mɔɔ ɛnze nrenya la banrenzɛ awo ralɛ nrenya na bɛbavɛlɛ ye Yemanoɛle.” (Ɔ bo a le “Nyamenle nee yɛ de.”)
40001024	Ɛhye ati mɔɔ Dwosefi vi nla nu dwazole la, ɔyɛle ye kɛmɔ Awulae soanvolɛ ne zele ye la na ɔgyale Mɛle.
40001025	Noko yeanva ɔ nwo yeanga Mɛle toonwo ɔhɔkpulale mekɛ mɔɔ ɔwole ye belamunli ralɛ nrenya ne la. Na Dwosefi donle ye Gyisɛse.
40002001	Bɛwole Gyisɛse wɔ sua ne mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye Bɛtelɛhɛm la azo, wɔ Dwudiya maanzinli nu, wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ ɛnee Hɛlɔdo a di belemgbunli la. Nrɛlɛbɛvolɛma bie vi aduduleɛ rale Gyɛlusalɛm
40002002	rabizale kɛ, “Nienwu a yɛkɛnwu Dwuuma belemgbunli ne mɔɔ bɛwo ye la a? Ɔluakɛ yɛnwunle ye ɛwɔlɔra ne mɔɔ dule la wɔ aduduleɛ nehane, na yɛra kɛ yɛbazonle ye.”
40002003	Belemgbunli Hɛlɔdo dele ɛhye la ye adwenle zɛkyele, na Gyɛlusalɛm amra amuala noko atiakunlu zɛkyele.
40002004	Ɔyieyiale sɛlɛvolɛ mgbanyinli ne nee mɛla kilehilevolɛma ne mɔ amuala na ɔbizale bɛ kɛ, “Nienwu a ɔwɔ kɛ bɛwo Kelaese ne a?”
40002005	Bɛbuale ye kɛ, “Wɔ Bɛtelɛhɛm mɔɔ wɔ Dwudiya la. Zɔhane yɛɛ Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛ ne hɛlɛle a. Ɔse,
40002006	‘Na wɔmɔ Bɛtelɛhɛm, mɔɔ wɔ Dwuda maanle nu, ɛnle ekyi wɔ Dwuda maanle nu azuamgbole avinli; ɔluakɛ wɔ ɛkɛ ne yɛɛ mɔɔ barali Yizilayɛma ati anlea me menli ne anwo zo la vi bara a.’ ”
40002007	Yemɔti Belemgbunli Hɛlɔdo vɛlɛle nrɛlɛbɛvolɛma ne mɔ ahane na ɔbizebizale bɛ mekɛ mɔɔ ɛwɔlɔra ne vindele la.
40002008	Ɔwiele la ɔhilele bɛ kɛ bɛhɔ Bɛtelɛhɛm, na ɔvale ɔzɔle zo kɛ, “Bɛhɔ na bɛhɔdɔ alagye bɛkpondɛ kakula ne, saa bɛnwu ye a bɛrabɔ me amaneɛ, amaa medame noko meahɔzonle ye bie.”
40002009	Bɛdiele belemgbunli ne edwɛkɛ ne bɛwiele la bɛhɔle. Bɛkɔ la bɛnwunle ɛwɔlɔra ne mɔɔ bɛnwunle ye wɔ aduduleɛ la bieko; ɔlile bɛ nyunlu toonwo ɔhɔgyinlanle ɛleka mɔɔ kakula ne wɔ la anwuma.
40002010	Bɛnwunle ɛwɔlɔra ne la bɛlile fɛlɛko kpole.
40002011	Bɛwolole sua ne anu na bɛnwunle kakula ne nee ɔ nli Mɛle, na bɛbutule bɛzonlenle ye. Akee bɛzianyinli bɛ awɔlɛ ne mɔ anu na bɛhyɛle ye ezukoa nvutuke, ɛyɛlɛ, yɛɛ alufuanlɛ.
40002012	Na Nyamenle hanle bɛ ɛlalɛ kɛ bɛmmasia bɛkɔ Belemgbunli Hɛlɔdo anwo lɔ bieko, yemɔti bɛvale adenle gyɛne zo bɛziale bɛhɔle bɛ maanle nu.
40002013	Mɔɔ bɛhɔle la, Awulae soanvolɛ yele ɔ nwo hilele Dwosefi wɔ ɛlalɛ nu na ɔzele ye kɛ, “Belemgbunli Hɛlɔdo barakpondɛ kakula ye ahu ye, yemɔti dwazo na fa ye nee ɔ nli nriandi kɔ Yigyibiti maanle nu kɔdɛnla ɛkɛ ne kɔkpula mekɛ mɔɔ menwɔze wɔ kɛ akee ɛvi ɛkɛ ne la.”
40002014	Dwosefi dunwuele la ɔvale kakula ne nee ɔ nli na nɔe ne ala ɔzile nu ɔhɔle Yigyibiti;
40002015	ɔdɛnlanle ɛkɛ ne toonwo ɔhɔkpulale mekɛ mɔɔ Hɛlɔdo wule la. Ɛhye zile amaa edwɛkɛ ne mɔɔ Awulae luale ye kpɔmanvolɛ ne anwo zo hanle la ayɛ nɔhalɛ kɛ, “Menvɛlɛle me ra ne menvile Yigyibiti.”
40002016	Mɔɔ Belemgbunli Hɛlɔdo nwunle kɛ nrɛlɛbɛvolɛma ne mɔ ɛbɛlɛbɛla ye la, ɔvale ɛya kpole, na ɔvale ye adwenle ɔbubule ɔvile mekɛ mɔɔ nrɛlɛbɛvolɛma ne rahanle edwɛkɛ ne hilele ye la, na ɔmanle bɛhɔhunle ngakula mrenya ngyikyi ngyikyi mɔɔ wɔ Bɛtelɛhɛm nee azua mɔɔ zuozua Bɛtelɛhɛm, na bɛli ɛvolɛ nwiɔ nee mɔɔ ɛtɛdwule ɛvolɛ nwiɔ la amuala, kɛmɔ nrɛlɛbɛvolɛma ne zile hilele mekɛ ne la.
40002017	Ɛhye manle edwɛkɛ ne mɔɔ Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛ Gyɛlɛmaya hanle la yɛle nɔhalɛ kɛ:
40002018	“Bɛdele menli ne wɔ Releema kɛ bɛlɛsu bɛaye awolɛ. Relahyɛle ɛlɛsu ɔ mra, bɛkpɔda ye a ɔndie, ɔluakɛ ɔ mra ne mɔ ɛwie wu.”
40002019	Mɔɔ Belemgbunli Hɛlɔdo wule la, Awulae soanvolɛ hanle Dwosefi ɛlalɛ wɔ Yigyibiti na
40002020	ɔzele ye kɛ, “Dwosefi, fa kakula ne nee ɔ nli sia kɔ Yizilayɛ azɛlɛ zo, ɔluakɛ menli mɔɔ kpondɛ kakula ne ahu ye la ɛwu.”
40002021	Yemɔti Dwosefi dwazole vale kakula ne nee ɔ nli rale Yizilayɛ.
40002022	Na mɔɔ Dwosefi dele kɛ Aakɛleeyɛse a ɛli ɔ ze Hɛlɔdo agya na yemɔ a ɔdi belemgbunli wɔ Dwudiya la, ɔzulole kɛ ɔkɛhɔ ɛkɛ ne. Bɛhakyele ye ɛhye wɔ ɛlalɛ nu, zɔhane ati ɔhɔle Galeli maanzinli nu,
40002023	na ɔhɔdɛnlanle sua ne mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye Nazalɛte la azo. Ɛhye manle mɔɔ Nyamenle luale ye kpɔmanvolɛma ne mɔ anwo zo hanle la yɛle nɔhalɛ kɛ, “Bɛbavɛlɛ ye Nazalɛtenli.”
40003001	Mekɛ ne anu Dwɔn Sɔnevolɛ ne rale Dwudiya fienemgbole ne anu na ɔbɔle nolo kɛ,
40003002	“Bɛnlu bɛ nwo na Anwuma Belemgbunlililɛ ne ɛbikye!”
40003003	Dwɔn ɛhye a Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛ Ayezaya hanle ɔ nwo edwɛkɛ kɛ, “Awie ɛlɛtea nu wɔ fienemgbole ne anu kɛ, ‘Bɛziezie Awulae adenle ne, bɛdenrɛdenrɛ ye ndenle ne mɔ.’ ”
40003004	Dwɔn wula tɛladeɛ mɔɔ bɛva afunlumu enrinli a bɛnwo la, na yeva nwoma akyeso yehye ɔ nze zo, yɛɛ ye aleɛ a le abɛbɛ nee wolɛ.
40003005	Menli dɔɔnwo vi suakpole Gyɛlusalɛm azo, nee Dwudiya maanzinli ne anu amuala, yɛɛ azua mɔɔ gua Azule Dwɔdan ne anloa la amuala azo rale Dwɔn anwo ɛkɛ ne;
40003006	bɛrahanle bɛ ɛtane na ɔzɔnenle bɛ wɔ Azule Dwɔdan ne anu.
40003007	Dwɔn nwunle kɛ menli dɔɔnwo vi Falasiima nee Sadusiima fane ne mɔ anu ɛlɛba bɛamaa bɛazɔne bɛ la, ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Bɛmɛ nwɔlɛ! Nwane a zele bɛ kɛ bɛnriandi bɛvi Nyamenle ndeanlɛ ne mɔɔ bara la anwo ɛ?
40003008	Bɛbɔ ɛbɛla kpalɛ mɔɔ kile kɛ bɛnlu bɛ nwo la.
40003009	Bɛmmadwenle bɛka kɛ, ‘Yɛmɛ yɛ nlenya a le Ebileham.’ Meka meahile bɛ kɛ Nyamenle kola maa awolɛ ɛhye mɔ dwazo yɛ Ebileham nlɔnra.
40003010	Bɛzi akuma mɔɔ bɛfa bɛadudu mbaka wɔ bɛ ndinli bo a. Ɛhye ati baka biala mɔɔ anzo ma kpalɛ la bɛkɛdu ye bɛkɛdo na bɛkɛvuandi ye bɛkɛdo senle nu.
40003011	Mame mefa nzule a mesɔne bɛ a, amaa bɛanwu kɛ bɛnlu bɛ nwo, na awie bie vi me nzi ɛlɛba mɔɔ yemɔ ɔle kpole ɔtɛla me a. Menfɛta kɛ menwɔzoa ye mgbɔlaboa bɔbɔ. Na yemɔ, ɔbava Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne nee ndɛnebualɛ senle ne a yeazɔne a.
40003012	Ɔlɛ ye akegyebɛ ɔ sa nu; ɔbava yeahegye ma ne amuala; ɔbaboɔboa kpalɛ ne anloa yeahɔgua ye bonwolo ne azo na yeayela abonle ne wɔ senle mɔɔ ɛnnu ɛlɛ la anu.”
40003013	Gyisɛse vi Galeli maanzinli nu rale Azule Dwɔdan ne anloa wɔ Dwɔn anwo ɛkɛ ne kɛ ɔzɔne ye.
40003014	Na Dwɔn hanle kɛ, “Menfɛta kɛ menwɔzɔne wɔ. Wɔmɔ a ɔwɔ kɛ ɛsɔne me a, na duzu ati a wɔra kɛ menzɔne wɔ ɛ?”
40003015	Gyisɛse buale kɛ, “Maa ɔyɛ zɔhane kɛkala. Ɔluakɛ ɔle kpalɛ kɛ yɛfa zɛhae adenle zo yɛyɛ mɔɔ Nyamenle kpondɛ kɛ yɛyɛ la.” Zɔhane ati Dwɔn kponlenle zolɛ na ɔzɔnenle ye.
40003016	Mɔɔ bɛzɔnenle Gyisɛse bɛwiele la, ɔvi azule ne anu ɔvole file zo ndɛndɛ ne ala. Anwuma bukele na ɔnwunle kɛ Nyamenle Sunsum ne ɛlɛdwu kɛ abubule la na ɔrazinzele ɔ nwo zo.
40003017	Na ɛnelɛ bie vi anwuma zele kɛ, “Ɛhye a le me Ra mɔɔ mekulo ye la. Me nye die ɔ nwo kpole.”
40004001	Akee Sunsum ne vale Gyisɛse hɔle fienemgbole ne anu kɛ abɔnsam ɛzɔ ye ɛnlea.
40004002	Gyisɛse hyele ɛhɔne alehyenlɛ nee aledwolɛ kenle abulanla na ɛhɔne hunle ye.
40004003	Abɔnsam bikyele ye na ɔzele ye kɛ, “Saa wɔmɔ a ɛle Nyamenle Ara ne a, ɛnee maa awolɛ ɛhye mɔ ɛhakyi kpanwo.”
40004004	Gyisɛse buale kɛ, “Bɛhɛlɛ ye kɛ, ‘Tɛ aleɛ ngome a sonla di a ɔnyia ngoane a, na Nyamenle anloa edwɛkɛ biala maa ngoane.’ ”
40004005	Abɔnsam vale Gyisɛse hɔle suakpole nwuanzanwuanza Gyɛlusalɛm azo, ɔvale ye ɔziele Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne ati zo twɔɔnwo ne azo anwuma,
40004006	na ɔzele ye kɛ, “Saa wɔmɔ a ɛle Nyamenle Ara ne a, ɛnee gyakyi ɛ nwo te aze, ɔluakɛ bɛhɛlɛ ye kɛ, ‘Nyamenle bamaa ye anwuma soanvolɛma arabɔ ayia wɔ, bɛbazɔ wɔ bɛ sa nu gyɛlɛɛnye, amaa ɛ gyakɛ amkpula bolɛ.’ ”
40004007	Gyisɛse buale ye kɛ, “Eza bɛhɛlɛ kɛ, ‘Mmasɔ Awulae wɔ Nyamenle ne ɛnea.’ ”
40004008	Eza abɔnsam vale Gyisɛse hɔle boka tendenle bie azo na ɔvale aleɛabo arelemgbunli maanle maanle ne mɔ amuala nee bɛ anyunlunyia ɔhilele ye,
40004009	na ɔzele ye kɛ, “Saa ɛkoto me, ɛsonle me a, menwɔva ɛhye mɔ amuala menwɔmaa wɔ.”
40004010	Gyisɛse buale kɛ, “Seetan, dwazo ɛkɛ ne kɔ! Ɔluakɛ bɛhɛlɛ kɛ, ‘Yeyɛ Awulae wɔ Nyamenle ne na sonle ɔdaye ɔ ngome ala!’ ”
40004011	Abɔnsam akee gyakyile Gyisɛse hɔle, na nea, Nyamenle soanvolɛma raboale ye.
40004012	Mɔɔ Gyisɛse dele kɛ bɛhye Dwɔn la ɔhwenle ɔ nwo ɔhɔle Galeli.
40004013	Yeandɛnla Nazalɛte na ɔhɔdɛnlanle Kapɛnayɛm mɔɔ wɔ Galeli tandane ne anloa, mɔɔ bikye Zɛbulɛn nee Nafetalae afoa nu la.
40004014	Ɛhye manle mɔɔ Nyamenle luale ye kpɔmanvolɛ Ayezaya anwo zo hanle la yɛle nɔhalɛ kɛ,
40004015	“Zɛbulɛn nee Nafetalae maanlema, mɔɔ wɔ nyiakɛ, wɔ Azule Dwɔdan ne anzi, Galelima mɔɔ ɛmboka Dwuuma awo a!
40004016	Bɛmɛ mɔɔ bɛde awozinli nu la, bɛbanwu wienyi kpole bie! Bɛmɛ mɔɔ bɛde ewule alubo nu la, wienyi bada bɛ nwo zo.”
40004017	Ɔvi mekɛ zɔhane Gyisɛse bɔle ɔ bo kɛ ɔbɔ nolo kɛ, “Bɛnlu bɛ nwo na Anwuma Belemgbunlililɛ ne ɛbikye!”
40004018	Gyisɛse lua Galeli Tandane ne anloa la, ɔnwunle mediema nwiɔ kɛ bɛlɛgua asawu wɔ tandane ne anu. Bɛmɛ a le Saemɔn mɔɔ eza bɛfɛlɛ ye Pita la nee ɔ diema Andelu.
40004019	Gyisɛse zele bɛ kɛ, “Bɛrɛla bɛmaa yɛhɔ na mebahilehile bɛ meamaa bɛahye menli kɛ bɛkye fɛlɛ la.”
40004020	Na ɛkɛ ne ala bɛgyakyile bɛ asawu ne mɔ na bɛdoale ye.
40004021	Ɔhɔle ɔ nyunlu ekyii la ɔnwunle mediema nwiɔ bieko. Bɛmɛ a le Gyemise nee ɔ diema Dwɔn mɔɔ le Zɛbɛdi amra ne mɔ. Ɛnee bɛ nee bɛ ze Zɛbɛdi wɔ ɛlɛne nu bɛlɛsa bɛ avonle. Gyisɛse vɛlɛle bɛ,
40004022	na ɛkɛ ne ala bɛgyakyile ɛlɛne ne nee bɛ ze na bɛdoale ye.
40004023	Gyisɛse hɔkpɔsale Galeli maanzinli ne anu amuala na ɔhilehilele wɔ bɛ nyianu azua ne mɔ anu, ɔhanle Anwuma Belemgbunlililɛ ne anwo Edwɛkpa ne, na ɔmanle menli mɔɔ ewule nee anwondolɛ ngakyile ɛha bɛ la anwo zale.
40004024	Ye nganeɛ dendenle hɔle Selea maanle ne anu amuala, na bɛvale bɛdabɛ mɔɔ ewule ngakyile ɛha bɛ na bɛlɛnwu amaneɛ: mɔɔ ɛbubu, mɔɔ awozonle ɛva bɛ, yɛɛ mɔɔ tɔ mgbutike la amuala bɛrɛlɛle ye, na ɔyɛle bɛ muala ayile.
40004025	Akee menli dɔɔnwo ne ala mɔɔ vi Galeli nee Azuamgbole Bulu ne azo, Gyɛlusalɛm nee Dwudiya maanzinli nu nee Azule Dwɔdan ne anzi lɔ la amuala doale ye.
40005001	Mɔɔ Gyisɛse nwunle menli dɔɔnwo ne la ɔhɔle boka bie azo na ɔdɛnlanle aze. Ye ɛdoavolɛma ne rale ɔ nwo ɛkɛ ne,
40005002	na ɔbɔle ɔ bo ɔhilehilele bɛ kɛ:
40005003	“Nyilalɛ ɛha bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛze kɛ bɛdi Nyamenle Sunsum ne anwo ehyia la, Ɔluakɛ bɛbanwu Anwuma Belemgbunlililɛ ne!
40005004	“Nyilalɛ ɛha bɛdabɛ mɔɔ nyane ɛha bɛ la; Nyamenle bakyekye bɛ rɛle!
40005005	“Nyilalɛ ɛha bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛle bɛlɛvo la; Azɛlɛ ye bayɛ bɛ ɛdeɛ!
40005006	“Nyilalɛ ɛha bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛ kunlu anu a anrɛɛ bɛkola bɛyɛ mɔɔ Nyamenle kpondɛ la; Nyamenle bamaa bɛ kunlu adwo bɛ nwo!
40005007	“Nyilalɛ ɛha bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛse anwunvɔne la; Nyamenle baze bɛdabɛ noko anwunvɔne!
40005008	“Nyilalɛ ɛha bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛ ahonle nu te la; Bɛbanwu Nyamenle!
40005009	“Nyilalɛ ɛha bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛpele bɛkpondɛ anzonudwolɛ la; Nyamenle bavɛlɛ bɛ ɔ mra!
40005010	“Nyilalɛ ɛha bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛyɛ bɛ kpɔdekpɔde kɛ bɛbɔ mɔdenle bɛyɛ mɔɔ Nyamenle kpondɛ la; Anwuma Belemgbunlililɛ ne le bɛ ɛdeɛ!
40005011	“Nyilalɛ ɛha bɛ kɛ bɛle me ɛdoavolɛma la ati bɛbɔ bɛ aholoba, bɛyɛ bɛ kpɔdekpɔde na bɛsoa ɛzonle ngakyile muala bɛgua bɛ nwo zo la.
40005012	Bɛmaa bɛ nye ɛlie na bɛli fɛlɛko, ɔluakɛ bɛlɛ nwolɛ ahatualɛ kpole wɔ anwuma. Zɔhane ala yɛɛ bɛyɛle Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛma ne mɔ mɔɔ lumua la a.
40005013	“Bɛmɛ a bɛle azɛlɛ ye azo ngyenle a. Ngyenle mɔɔ kɛda la bɛyɛ ye menlemenle bieko a ɔnyɛ boɛ. Bɛfa bɛyɛ ɛhwee a ɔnyɛ boɛ. Bɛto bɛgua na menli tietia zolɛ.
40005014	“Bɛmɛ a bɛle ewiade ye kɛnlaneɛ a. Suakpole mɔɔ bɛhye ye boka zo la ɛnvea.
40005015	Awie ɛnzɔ kɛnlaneɛ na ɔnva bondo ɔmbutu zolɛ; ɔsɔ ɔsie ye debie zo anwuma, amaa yeada yeamaa bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛwɔ sua ne anu la amuala.
40005016	Zɔhane ala yɛɛ bɛmaa bɛ ɛbɛla kpalɛ ne ɛyɛ kɛ kɛnlaneɛ na ɔda wɔ menli nu a, amaa bɛanwu bɛ gyima kpalɛ ne mɔɔ bɛyɛ la na bɛaye bɛ Ze mɔɔ wɔ anwuma la ayɛlɛ.
40005017	“Bɛmmadwenle kɛ mera kɛ mebazɛkye Mosisi mɛla ne nee Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛma ngilehilelɛ ne mɔ. Meamba bɛ ɛzɛkyelɛ; mera kɛ meba meamaa bɛali munli.
40005018	Nɔhalɛ, meka meahile bɛ kɛ anwuma nee aze baze ahɔ na mɛla ne anu kpɔkɛ nretee ko bɔbɔ ɛnrɛkpɔkye ɛnrɛdɔ kyesɛ mɔɔ wɔ nu la amuala ɛli munli.
40005019	Awie biala mɔɔ kɛbu ɔ nye kɛgua mɛla ɛhye mɔ biala anu nretee ko azo na ɔkɛhilehile awie mɔ zɔhane la kɛyɛ ekyi wɔ Anwuma Belemgbunlililɛ nu.
40005020	Meka meahile bɛ, kyesɛ bɛ tenleneyɛlɛ tɛla mɛla kilehilevolɛma nee Falasiima ne mɔ, anrɛɛ bɛnrɛnwu Anwuma Belemgbunlililɛ ne ɛlɛ.
40005021	“Bɛde kɛ bɛhanle bɛhilele mɔmoane amra kɛ, ‘Bɛmmayɛ kɔdiawu na awie biala mɔɔ kɛyɛ kɔdiawu la bɛkɛbua ye ewule fɔlɛ.’
40005022	Mame, mese: Awie biala mɔɔ kɛva ɔ diema anwo ɛya la bɛkɛbua ye ewule fɔlɛ. Mɔɔ kɛyɛ ɔ diema aholoba la bɛ nee ye kɛhɔ nyianu sua nu mgbanyima ayia ne anyunlu; na mɔɔ kɛze ɔ diema kɛ, ‘Ɛle koasea!’ la, ɛva ɔ nwo ɛdo ɛbolɔ senle nu.
40005023	Zɔhane ati saa ɛkɔ kɛ ɛkabɔ azu na ɛkakye ye wɔ azu ɛkponle ne anyunlu ɛkɛ ne kɛ ɛ nee ɛ diema bie lɛ edwɛkɛ a,
40005024	gyakyi wɔ azubɔdeɛ ne wɔ azukponle ne anyunlu ɛkɛ ne; dumua kɔ ɛ nee ɛ diema ne bɛbɔ bɛ avinli, na akee sia babɔ wɔ azu ne maa Nyamenle.
40005025	“Saa awie sɛma wɔ a, ɛ nee ye bɛziezie edwɛkɛ ne ndɛndɛ kolaa na bɛadwu ndɛnebualɛ ɛleka ne, amaa yeanye wɔ yeammaa ndɛnebuavolɛ ne na ndɛnebuavolɛ ne ava wɔ amaa sinzavolɛma kɛ bɛdo wɔ efiade.
40005026	Nɔhalɛ, meka meahile bɛ, bɛnrɛgyakyi wɔ ɛlɛ kyesɛ ɛtua kakɛ biala mɔɔ ɛha la.
40005027	“Bɛde kɛ bɛha kɛ, ‘Mmafa awuvolɛ.’
40005028	Noko mame, mese: saa nrenya nea raalɛ maa ɔ nwo dɔ ye a ɛnee yeva ye wɔ ye ahonle nu.
40005029	Zɔhane ati saa ɛ nye fema ne yɛɛ twehwe wɔ ahɔ ɛtane nu a, tu ye to ye lɔ. Ɔle kpalɛ kɛ ɛ nye kɛyɛ ko, kɛdɛla kɛ bɛkɛva wɔ sonlabaka ne amuala bɛkɛhɔdo ɛbolɔ senle nu a.
40005030	Saa ɛ sa fema noko yɛɛ tenda ɛ gyakɛ anu ahwe wɔ ahɔ ɛtane nu a, pɛ ye to. Ɔle kpalɛ kɛ ɛ sa ko kɛminli tɛla kɛ bɛkɛva wɔ sonlabaka ne amuala bɛkɛdo ɛbolɔ senle nu a.
40005031	“Bɛha ye bieko kɛ, ‘Awie mɔɔ bɔ ɔ ye ewole la ɔhɛlɛ ewolebɔlɛ kɛlata ɔmaa ye.’
40005032	Noko mame, mese: Ɔnle kɛ awie biala bɔ ɔ ye ewole kyesɛ raalɛ ne ɛva nrenya fofolɛ. Saa tɛ ye zɔhane a ɛnee nrenya ne bamaa raalɛ ne ado awuvolɛvalɛ mɛla ne, yɛɛ nrenya noko mɔɔ kɛgya raalɛ mɔɔ ɛbɔ ewole la to awuvolɛvalɛ mɛla ne.
40005033	“Bɛde ye bieko kɛ bɛhanle bɛhilele mɔmoane amra kɛ, ‘Mmaka ndandɛla, na di ndane mɔɔ wɔha wɔ Awulae anyunlu la azo.’
40005034	Noko mame, mese: Bɛmmaka ndane fee. Bɛmmaka anwuma, ɔluakɛ ɔle Nyamenle belemgbunli ebia;
40005035	bɛmmaka azɛlɛ ye noko, ɔluakɛ ɔle ɔ gyakɛ abo ebia; anzɛɛ Gyɛlusalɛm, ɔluakɛ ɔle Belemgbunli kpole ne suakpole.
40005036	Mmaka ɛdawɔ mumua ne ɛ ti, ɔluakɛ ɛnrɛhola ɛnrɛhakyi enrinli ko fufule anzɛɛ bile.
40005037	Bɛmaa bɛ edwɛkɛ ɛyɛ ko, ‘ɛhɛe’ a ‘ɛhɛe’; ‘kyɛkyɛ’ a ‘kyɛkyɛ’. Edwɛkɛ ngakyile biala vi abɔnsam ɛkɛ ne a ba a.
40005038	“Bɛde kɛ bɛha kɛ, ‘Bɛva ɛnyelɛ bɛzie ɛnyelɛ bo zo’, yɛɛ ‘bɛva egyele bɛzie egyele bo zo’.
40005039	Noko mame, mese: Saa awie yɛ wɔ ɛtane a, mmasenra ye. Saa awie bɔ ɛ nzo fema ne anu a, kakyi bɛne ne ɔdaye maa ye.
40005040	Saa awie nee wɔ twe manzonle alie wɔ anwuma tɛladeɛ ne a, maa ɔva wɔ bubu ne ɔdaye,
40005041	yɛɛ saa awie dua ye tumi zo ahye wɔ mialera nu kɛ ɛ nee ye ɛhɔ adenle kilomita ko a, ɛ nee ye ɛhɔ nwiɔ.
40005042	Awie sɛlɛ wɔ debie a, maa ye bie, yɛɛ mmakakyi ɛ nzi ɛsi mɔɔ kpondɛ kɛ ɔfɛne debie wɔ wɔ ɛkɛ ne la.
40005043	“Bɛde kɛ bɛhanle kɛ, ‘Kulo ɛ gɔnwo mɔ na kpɔ wɔ kpɔvolɛma.’
40005044	Noko mame, mese: Bɛhulo bɛ kpɔvolɛma na bɛzɛlɛ bɛmaa bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛyɛ bɛ kpɔdekpɔde la,
40005045	amaa bɛayɛ bɛ Ze mɔɔ wɔ anwuma la amra. Ɔluakɛ yemɔ, ɔmaa ye ezule tɔ na ye ewia fi maa ɛtanevolɛma nee kpalɛyɛlɛma amuala.
40005046	Saa bɛkulo menli mɔɔ kulo bɛ la angome a, ɛnee duzu ahatualɛ a bɛnyia ye wɔ Nyamenle ɛkɛ a? Anzɛɛ tɛ mɔɔ adwuledievolɛma yɛ la ala ɛne?
40005047	Na saa bɛbiza bɛ gɔnwo mɔ angome ahye a, ɛnee duzu debie ngakyile a bɛyɛ bɛmaa yebo zo a? Bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnze Nyamenle bɔbɔ la noko yɛ ye zɔhane ala.
40005048	Zɔhane ati, kɛmɔ bɛ Ze mɔɔ wɔ anwuma la anwo te la, bɛmaa bɛdabɛ noko bɛ nwo ɛde bɔkɔɔ.
40006001	“Bɛnlea boɛ na bɛanyɛ bɛ Nyamenle ɛzonlenlɛ gyima ne ɛnyelɛ zo. Saa bɛyɛ ye zɔ a bɛnrɛnyia ahatualɛ wɔ bɛ anwuma Selɛ ne ɛkɛ.
40006002	“Zɔhane ati saa bɛfa debie bɛahyɛ a bɛmmabɔ nwolɛ awuye, kɛmɔ nabalabama ne mɔ yɛ ye wɔ nyianu azua ne mɔ anu nee awɔdenle ne mɔ azo la. Bɛyɛ ye zɔhane amaa bɛanyia bɛ nyunlu wɔ menli nyunlu. Nɔhalɛ, meka meahile bɛ kɛ bɛnyia bɛ ahatualɛ bɛwie.
40006003	Na bɛmɛ, saa bɛfa debie bɛahyɛ a, bɛmmamaa bɛ sa bɛne ne nwu mɔɔ fema ne ɛlɛyɛ la,
40006004	amaa bɛ nyɛleɛ kpalɛ ne ayɛ fealera nu debie na bɛ Ze mɔɔ wɔ anwuma mɔɔ nwu fealera nu debie biala la ayila bɛ.
40006005	“Saa bɛyɛ nzɛlɛlɛ a, bɛmmayɛ ye kɛ nabalabama ne mɔ yɛ ye la. Menli zɔhane mɔ kulo kɛ bɛgyinla nyianu azua ne mɔ anu nee mgbata ne mɔ azo bɛyɛ bɛmaa menli kɔsɔɔti nwu bɛ kɛ bɛlɛyɛ nzɛlɛlɛ. Nɔhalɛ, meka meahile bɛ kɛ bɛnyia bɛ ahatualɛ bɛwie.
40006006	Na bɛmɛ, saa bɛyɛ nzɛlɛlɛ a, bɛhɔvea bɛ sua kunlu ɛkɛ ne, bɛdo anlenkɛ ne anu na bɛyɛ nzɛlɛlɛ bɛvɛlɛ bɛ Ze mɔɔ wɔ anwuma mɔɔ bɛnnwu ye la, na bɛ Ze mɔɔ wɔ anwuma na ɔnwu fealera nu edwɛkɛ la bayila bɛ.
40006007	“Wɔ bɛ nzɛlɛlɛ nu, bɛmmaka edwɛkɛ dɔɔnwo kɛmɔ bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnze Nyamenle la yɛ ye la. Ɔluakɛ bɛmɛ, bɛdwenle kɛ saa bɛka edwɛkɛ dɔɔnwo a yɛɛ Nyamenle kɛdie bɛ a.
40006008	Bɛmmayɛ ye kɛ menli zɔhane mɔ yɛ ye la, ɔluakɛ bɛ Ze mɔɔ wɔ anwuma la ze mɔɔ bɛhyia nwolɛ la amuala kolaa na bɛabiza ye.
40006009	Zɔhane ati, bɛmɛ, bɛyɛ nzɛlɛlɛ a bɛyɛ ye zɛhae: ‘Yɛ Ze mɔɔ wɔ anwuma: Wɔ duma nwo ɛde;
40006010	Wɔ belemgbunlililɛ ɛrɛla; Bɛyɛ Wɔ ɛhulolɛdeɛ wɔ azɛlɛ ye azo, Kɛmɔ bɛyɛ ye wɔ anwuma lɔ la.
40006011	Maa yɛ ɛnɛ yɛ dahuu aleɛ,
40006012	Na fa yɛ ɛtane kyɛ yɛ, Kɛmɔ yɛfa yɛkyɛ bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛfo yɛ la;
40006013	Mmamaa yɛkɔ ngyegyelɛ nu, Ye yɛ fi munzule nu.’
40006014	“Ɔluakɛ saa bɛfa menli mɔɔ ɛvo bɛ la ɛtane bɛkyɛ bɛ a, yɛɛ bɛ anwuma Selɛ ne ɔdaye ɔkɛva bɛ ɛtane ɛdeɛ ne mɔ ɔkɛhyɛ bɛ a.
40006015	Na saa bɛanva menli mɔɔ ɛvo bɛ la ɛtane ne mɔ bɛangyɛ bɛ a, bɛ Ze mɔɔ wɔ anwuma la ɔdaye ɔnrɛva bɛ ɛtane ne mɔ ɔnrɛhyɛ bɛ.
40006016	“Saa bɛkye ɛhɔne a, bɛmmayɛ bɛ nyunlu alɔbɔlɛ alɔbɔlɛ, kɛmɔ nabalabama ne mɔ yɛ la. Bɛsie bɛ nwo evinli bɛfa bɛkile bɛmaa awie biala nwu kɛ bɛlɛkye ɛhɔne. Bɛnwu ye kɛ bɛdua bɛ nwolɛ kakɛ bɛwie.
40006017	Na bɛmɛ, saa bɛkye ɛhɔne a anrɛɛ bɛnrinzi bɛ nwo, na bɛziezie bɛ nwo,
40006018	amaa awie mɔ annwu kɛ bɛlɛkye ɛhɔne. Na bɛ Ze mɔɔ wɔ anwuma na ɔze fealera nu debie biala la bayila bɛ.
40006019	“Bɛmmakpondɛ bɛ anwonyia bɛsie azɛlɛ ye azo, anrɛɛ ɛlɛtɛba nee nrɛnlana kɛzɛkye ye, na nwule noko kola wua.
40006020	Bɛkpondɛ bɛ anwonyia bɛzie anwuma maanle ne anu na ɛlɛtɛba nee nrɛnlana anzɛkye ye, na nwule noko angɔnwua.
40006021	Bɛnwu ye kɛ ɛleka mɔɔ bɛ anwonyia wɔ la, ɛkɛ ne yɛɛ bɛ ahonle noko wɔ a.
40006022	“Ɛnyelɛ a le sonlabaka ne kɛnlaneɛ a. Saa ɛ nye le kpalɛ a, wɔ sonlabaka ne anu le wienyi.
40006023	Na saa ɛ nye ɛnle kpalɛ a, wɔ sonlabaka ne anu le awozinli. Na saa wienyi ne mɔɔ wɔ wɔ nu la le awozinli a, ɛnee noko ye awozinli ne kɛyɛ kabii kpalɛ.
40006024	“Awie biala ɛnrɛhola ɛnrɛzonle menlenlɛ nwiɔ, ɔluakɛ saa ɔyɛ ye zɔhane a ɔbahulo ko na yeakpɔ ko, anzɛɛ ɔbali ko eni na yeakpo ko. Zɔhane ala yɛɛ bɛnrɛhola Nyamenle nee ezukoa sonle a.
40006025	“Ɛhye ati meka meahile bɛ, bɛmmadwenle mɔɔ bɛbali anzɛɛ mɔɔ bɛbanlo bɛanyia ngoane, anzɛɛ ɛdanlɛ mɔɔ bɛbaheda la anwo. Asoo ngoane ɛngyia ɛndɛla aleɛ, anzɛɛ nwonane ye ɛngyia ɛndɛla ɛdanlɛ?
40006026	Bɛnlea nloma mɔɔ luolua anwomanyunlu la. Bɛnlua, bɛmbu, yɛɛ bɛnlɛ bonwolo; Selɛ ne mɔɔ wɔ anwuma la a yɛne bɛ a. Na asoo bɛ nwo ɛngyia ɛndɛla nloma?
40006027	Bɛ nuhua boni yɛɛ kɛhola kɛlua ye adwenleadwenle zo kɛva mekɛ ekyi kɛboka ye mekɛ nwo a, anzɛɛ kɛva waa ko kɛdo ye tendenle zo a?
40006028	“Duzu ati bɔbɔ yɛɛ bɛdwenle ndanlɛ nwo ɛ? Bɛnlea ɛhoayelɛ nu aloa, bɛnyɛ gyima yɛɛ bɛnwo ndanlɛ.
40006029	Noko meka meahile bɛ, Belemgbunli Sɔlɔmɔn bɔbɔ, wɔ ye anwonyia mekɛ ne anu, yeangeda ɛdanlɛ anzɛɛ bɛanziezie ye bɛandɛla aloa ɛhye mɔ anu ko.
40006030	Na saa Nyamenle siezie ndile, mɔɔ nyi ɛnɛ na ɛhyema bɛpɛ bɛwuda la zɛhae a, ɛnee fane nyɛ yɛɛ akee bɛmɛ, Nyamenle ɛnrɛhola bɛ ɛdanlɛ keda ɛ? Bɛ diedi le ekyi somaa!
40006031	“Yemɔti bɛmmadwenle kɛ, ‘Duzu yɛɛ yɛbali a’, anzɛɛ ‘Duzu a yɛbanlo a’, anzɛɛ ‘Duzu a yɛbaheda a’,
40006032	(Ɛhye mɔ le ninyɛne mɔɔ bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnze Nyamenle la a dwenle nwolɛ a.) Bɛ Ze mɔɔ wɔ anwuma la ze kɛ bɛhyia ninyɛne ɛhye mɔ amuala anwo.
40006033	Bɛbɔ mɔdenle bɛdwenle Nyamenle belemgbunlililɛ ne nee mɔɔ Nyamenle kpondɛ kɛ bɛyɛ la anwo kpalɛ, na ɔkɛva mɔɔ bɛhyia nwolɛ la ɔkɛmaa bɛ.
40006034	Ɛhye ati bɛmmadwenle ɛhyema anwo; ɛhyema ɔdaye ɔ nee ɔ ti anwo adwenleadwenle ɛdeɛ lua. Ɔngyia kɛ bɛkɛva kenle ko anwo adwenleadwenle ɛdeɛ bɛkɛboka ko ɛdeɛ nwo.
40007001	“Bɛmmabua awie mɔ ndɛne na Nyamenle ambua bɛ ndɛne,
40007002	ɔboalekɛ ndɛne mɔɔ bɛkɛva bɛkɛbua awie mɔ la yɛɛ Nyamenle bava abua bɛdabɛ noko a, yɛɛ mɔɔ bɛkɛzuzu bɛkɛmaa awie la yɛɛ bɛbanyia ye a.
40007003	Duzu ati a ɛnwu mumunli mɔɔ la ɛ diema anye zo, na ɛndwenle dubinli ne mɔɔ la ɛ nye zo la anwo ɛ?
40007004	Anzɛɛ duzu ati yɛɛ ɛse ɛ diema kɛ, ‘Mebodo wɔ, maa menye ɛ nye zo mumunli ne’, wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ dubinli la ɛdawɔ mumua ne ɛ nye zo la ɛ?
40007005	Wɔmɔ nabalabanli! Dumua ye dubinli ne mɔɔ la ɛ nye zo la na wɔanwu debie kpalɛ, na wɔahola wɔaye mumunli ne mɔɔ la ɛ diema ne anye zo la.
40007006	“Bɛmmafa debie mɔɔ anwo te la bɛmaa ahwea, na bɛkɛpɛ bɛ nwo bɛkɛkeka bɛ; bɛmmafa bɛ anwoneɛ bɛgua agbolike nyunlu, na bɛkɛtietia zolɛ bɛkɛzɛkye bɛ mgbane.
40007007	“Bɛbiza na bɛ sa kɛha ye; bɛkpondɛ na bɛkɛnwu ye; bɛbɔ nu na bɛkɛbuke bɛ.
40007008	Ɔluakɛ awie biala mɔɔ biza la asa ka ye; mɔɔ kpondɛ la nwu ye, yɛɛ mɔɔ bɔ nu la, bɛbuke ye.
40007009	Bɛ nuhua boni yɛɛ saa ɔ ra biza ye kpanwo a ɔkɛva bolɛ ɔkɛmaa ye a?
40007010	Anzɛɛ saa ɔbiza ye fɛlɛ a ɔkɛmaa ye ɛwɔlɛ a?
40007011	Na saa bɛmɛ mɔɔ bɛle ɛtanevolɛma la bɛze kɛ ɔwɔ kɛ bɛfa ninyɛne kpalɛ bɛmaa bɛ mra a, ɛnee fane nyɛ yɛɛ bɛ Ze mɔɔ wɔ anwuma la ɛnrɛva ninyɛne kpalɛ ɛnrɛmaa bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛbiza ye la ɛ?
40007012	“Zɔhane ati mɔɔ bɛkpondɛ kɛ menli yɛ maa bɛ la, bɛdabɛ noko bɛyɛ zɔhane ala bɛmaa bɛ. Mosisi mɛla ne nee Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛma ngilehilelɛ ne kɛ kɔ ye la ɛne.
40007013	“Bɛva anuhɔlɛ ɛdenraa ne anu bɛwolo, ɔluakɛ anuhɔlɛ kpolomgbolo ne kɔ abɔnsam sua zo yɛɛ ye adenle ne anu ɛvalɛ ɛnyɛ se, yemɔti menli dɔɔnwo kpalɛ a fa zɔhane anuhɔlɛ ne anu a.
40007014	Na anuhɔlɛ ne mɔɔ kɔ ngoane mɔɔ ɛnlɛ awieleɛ la anu la le ɛdenraa, ye adenle ne anu ɛvalɛ ɛnla aze, yɛɛ menli ekyi bie a nwu ye a.
40007015	“Bɛnlea bɛ nwo boɛ wɔ Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛma alanema anwo; bɛle menli bie mɔɔ bɛyɛ bɛ nwo kɛ asɛɛ bɛnze nwolɛ bie, noko bɛ kunlu le bile.
40007016	Menli zɔhane mɔ nyɛleɛ yɛɛ bɛbava bɛanwu bɛ a. Kolokolonyɛma ɛnzo ‘vanye’ ma, yɛɛ evileni ɛnzo ‘feege’ ma.
40007017	Baka kpalɛ biala so ma kpalɛ, yɛɛ baka ɛtane so ma ɛtane.
40007018	Baka kpalɛ ɛnzo ma ɛtane, yɛɛ baka ɛtane ɛnzo ma kpalɛ.
40007019	Baka biala mɔɔ ɛnzo ma kpalɛ la bɛpɛ ye bɛto na bɛfa bɛwuda senle.
40007020	Zɔhane ala yɛɛ bɛbalua Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛma alanema nyɛleɛ zo bɛanwu bɛ a.
40007021	“Tɛ awie biala mɔɔ kɛvɛlɛ me kɛ, ‘Awulae, Awulae’ la a banyia Anwuma Belemgbunlililɛ ne a, na bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛyɛ mɔɔ Egya mɔɔ wɔ anwuma la kpondɛ kɛ bɛyɛ la a banyia ye a.
40007022	Saa Ndɛnebualɛ Kenle ne dwu a, dɔɔnwo ne ala baha ahile me kɛ, ‘Awulae, Awulae! Yɛluale wɔ duma nu yɛbɔle Edwɛkpa ne nolo, yɛluale wɔ duma nu yɛdudule mbɔnsam dɔɔnwo na yɛyɛle nwanwane ninyɛne!’
40007023	Na mebaze bɛ kɛ, ‘Menze bɛ. Bɛvi ɛkɛ ne bɛhɔ. Nindavoma!’
40007024	“Zɔhane ati awie biala mɔɔ tie me edwɛkɛ ne na ɔdi zolɛ la le kɛ nrɛlɛbɛvolɛ bie mɔɔ zile ye sua wɔ bodane zo la.
40007025	Ezule kpole dɔle na azule yile bule aze, na ahumu kpole dule bɔle sua ne, noko yeambu, ɔboalekɛ ɔgyi bodane zo.
40007026	“Awie noko mɔɔ tie me edwɛkɛ ne na ɔnli zolɛ la le kɛ kɔnwɔne bie mɔɔ zile ye sua wɔ ɛnwea nu la.
40007027	Ezule dɔle, azule yile bule aze, ahumu dule kpole bɔle sua ne, na ɔbule ɔguale aze. Na ye azedɔlɛ ne yɛle ɛzulolɛ!”
40007028	Mɔɔ Gyisɛse wiele ɛhye mɔ ka la, ye ngilehilelɛ ne zinle menli dɔɔnwo ne anwo,
40007029	ɔluakɛ ɔngilehile kɛ bɛ mɛla kilehilevolɛma ne mɔ la; ɔkilehile kɛ sonla mɔɔ lɛ tumi la.
40008001	Gyisɛse vi boka ne azo dwule la, menli dɔɔnwo doale ye.
40008002	Na nea, kokobɛvolɛ bie rahotole ɔ nyunlu ɛkɛ ne na ɔzele ye kɛ, “Yɛmenle, saa ɔyɛ wɔ ɛhulolɛ a, ɛkola ɛmaa me nwo sa.”
40008003	Gyisɛse denrɛle ɔ sa zɔle ye na ɔbuale ye kɛ, “Mekulo! Ɛ nwo ɛza!” Na ɛkɛ ne ala ye kokobɛ ne hɔle bɔkɔɔ.
40008004	Na Gyisɛse bɔle ɔ nloa kɛ, “Nea, mmabɔ zo ɛkile awie biala. Kɔ na kɔva ɛ nwo kile sɛlɛvolɛ ne maa ɔnleɛnlea ɛ nwo, na bɔ azu ne mɔɔ Mosisi hyehyɛle dole ɛkɛ ne la maa awie biala ɛnwu kɛ ɛ nwo ɛza.”
40008005	Mɔɔ Gyisɛse dwule Kapɛnayɛm la, Wulomu sogya kpanyinli bie rayiale ye na ɔbodole ye kɛ ɔboa ye. Ɔse,
40008006	“Yɛmenle, me sonvolɛ ko la ɛkpa zo mɔɔ ye ewule ne yɛ se kpalɛ a. Yedwidwe na ɔlɛnwu amaneɛ somaa.”
40008007	Gyisɛse zele ye kɛ, “Mebara mearayɛ ye ayile.”
40008008	Sogya kpanyinli ne buale ye kɛ, “Yɛmenle, kyɛkyɛ! Menfɛta kɛ ɛkɛra me sua nu. Wɔmɔ ka ɛ nloa edwɛkɛ ne ala na me sonvolɛ ne kɛde kpɔkɛ.
40008009	Melɛ ɛlɔnema wɔ me bo suzuamgba, meka mekile bie kɛ, ‘kɔ’ a, ɔkɔ; meka mekile bie noko kɛ, ‘bɛla’ a, ɔba; yɛɛ meka mekile me akɛlɛ kɛ, ‘yɛ ɛhye’ a, ɔyɛ. Noko medame mele sonla mɔɔ mewɔ menlenlɛ bo a.”
40008010	Gyisɛse dele ɛhye la ɔzinle ɔ nwo, na ɔzele bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛdoa ye la kɛ, “Nɔhalɛ, metɛnwunle awie mɔɔ lɛ diedi zɛhae bie la ɛlɛ, bɔbɔ wɔ Yizilayɛma avinli.
40008011	Bɛhakye ɛhye: Menli dɔɔnwo vi aduduleɛ nee adɔleɛ bara bɛ nee bɛ nlenya mɔ Ebileham nee Ayezeke nee Gyekɔbo aradɛnla ɛkponle nwo wɔ Anwuma Belemgbunlililɛ nu.
40008012	Na bɛbavuandi bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ bɛ nwo kɛ bɛle Anwuma Belemgbunlililɛ ne anwo nlɔnra la bɛagua awozinli ne anu; na ɛkɛ ne, bɛbazu bɛadedɛ bɛ nwo bonrane nu.”
40008013	Akee Gyisɛse zele sogya kpanyinli ne kɛ, “Kɔ sua nu na wɔ diedi ne mɔɔ ɛlɛ la ɛyɛ zɔhane ɛmaa wɔ.” Na sogya kpanyinli ne sonvolɛ ne dele kpɔkɛ wɔ mekɛ ne anu ala.
40008014	Gyisɛse hɔle Pita sua nu, na ɔhɔdole kɛ Pita aye ne ɔ nli ne anwo ɛdo ye na ɛyɛlɛyɛlɛ gyi ɔ nwo.
40008015	Ɔzɔle ɔ sa, na ɛkɛ ne ala ɔdele kpɔkɛ, na ɔdwazole ɔkpondɛle debie ɔmanle bɛ.
40008016	Ye nɔsolɛ nu, bɛvale menli dɔɔnwo mɔɔ sunsum ɛtane ɛva bɛ la bɛrɛlɛle ye na ɔvale ɔ nloa edwɛkɛ ɔdudule bɛ, na ɔyɛle wuleravolɛma dɔɔnwo noko ayile.
40008017	Ɔyɛle ɛhye amaa mɔɔ Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛ Ayezaya hanle la ayɛ nɔhalɛ kɛ, “Ɔdaye mumua ne ɔzoale yɛ anwondolɛ nee yɛ nwo ewule ɔhɔle.”
40008018	Gyisɛse nwunle kɛ menli dɔɔnwo ɛbɔ ɛyia ye, na ɔzele ye ɛdoavolɛma ne kɛ bɛmaa bɛpɛ bɛhɔ tandane ne anzi lɔ.
40008019	Mɛla kilehilevolɛ bie rale ɔ nwo ɛkɛ ne razele ye kɛ, “Kilehilevolɛ, ɛleka biala mɔɔ ɛkɔ la me nee wɔ kɛhɔ.”
40008020	Gyisɛse zele ye kɛ, “Ɛzonlɛ lɛ bɛ mbɔne, yɛɛ nloma lɛ bɛ sane, na mame, Sonla Ra, menlɛ ɛleka mɔɔ meto me ti a.”
40008021	Ɛdoavolɛma ne mɔ ko zele Gyisɛse kɛ, “Awulae, maa menlumua mengɔnzie egya kolaa na meara.”
40008022	Gyisɛse zele ye kɛ, “Wɔmɔ maa yɛhɔ, na gyakyi bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛwu la maa bɛzie bɛ avunli.”
40008023	Gyisɛse vole ɛlɛne nu, na ye ɛdoavolɛma ne mɔ vole bie na bɛzile nu kɛ bɛkɔ.
40008024	Ahumu kpole bie dule tandane ne anye manle azɛlɛkye ne hedale ɛlɛne ne azo; na ɛnee Gyisɛse ɛlafe.
40008025	Ɛdoavolɛma ne hɔdunwuele ye na bɛzele kɛ, “Awulae, die yɛ na yɛwie wu!”
40008026	Gyisɛse zele bɛ kɛ, “Duzu ati a bɛle avoanvoanle zɛhae ɛ? Bɛ diedi le ekyi somaa!” Akee ɔdwazole na ɔdeanle anwoma ne nee azɛlɛkye ne mɔ nu na bɛguale diinyi.
40008027	Ɛhye zinle menli ne mɔ anwo na bɛzele kɛ, “Duzu sonla a le ɛhye, mɔɔ anwoma nee nyevile bɔbɔ tie ye a?”
40008028	Mɔɔ Gyisɛse dwule tandane ne anzi lɔ wɔ Gadala maanzinli nu la, menli nwiɔ mɔɔ sunsum ɛtane ɛva bɛ la vi azie ne azo rayiale ye. Sunsum ɛtane ne mɔ ɛmaa menli ɛhye mɔ ɛbɔ ɛlane, na awie biala ɛngola ɛmpɛ nu adenle ne anu.
40008029	Na bɛdeanle nu kɛ, “Wɔmɔ Nyamenle Ara, duzu yɛɛ ɛkpondɛ wɔ yɛ ɛkɛ ne a? Wɔra kɛ ɛbadea yɛ kolaa na kenle ne adwu ɔ?”
40008030	Ɛnee agbolike kpolane bie bikye ɛkɛ ne na bɛlɛdidi,
40008031	yemɔti sunsum ɛtane ne mɔ bodole Gyisɛse kɛ, “Saa ɛtu yɛ a, ɛnee maa yɛhɔwolo agbolike ne mɔ.”
40008032	Gyisɛse zele bɛ kɛ, “Bɛhɔ ɛ!” Na sunsum ɛtane ne mɔ vile menli ne mɔ anwo dule na bɛhɔwolole agbolike ne mɔ. Na agbolike kpolane ne amuala dule twi hɔguale tandane ne anu na bɛwule.
40008033	Menli mɔɔ ɛlɛnea agbolike ne mɔ la nriandile hɔle suakpole ne azo hɔhanle mɔɔ ɛzi la amuala, nee mɔɔ ɛzi menli ne mɔɔ sunsum ɛtane ne mɔ vale bɛ la anwo zo la noko.
40008034	Yemɔti suakpole ne azo amra amuala rayiale Gyisɛse; na mɔɔ bɛnwunle ye la bɛzɛlɛle ye kɛ ɔvi bɛ maanle ne anu ɔhɔ.
40009001	Gyisɛse ziale hɔdɛnlanle ɛlɛne ne anu na ɔpɛle tandane ne ɔrale ɔdaye ye sua zo.
40009002	Menli bie vale awie mɔɔ ɛdwidwe na ɔla ɛkpa zo la rɛlɛle ye kɛ ɔyɛ ye ayile. Mɔɔ Gyisɛse nwunle bɛ diedi ne la, ɔzele nrenya ne kɛ, “Me ra nrenya, to ɛ rɛle azule nu! Bɛva wɔ ɛtane ne mɔ bɛhyɛ wɔ.”
40009003	Mɛla kilehilevolɛma bie mɔɔ wɔ ɛkɛ ne la hanle ye bɛ ti anu kɛ, “Nrenya ye ɛdindi Nyamenle anyunlu!”
40009004	Gyisɛse nwunle bɛ adwenle, yemɔti ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Duzu ati a bɛ adwenle le ɛtane zɛhae a?
40009005	Boni a ye ɛhanlɛ ɛnyɛ se a, kɛ ɛse awie kɛ, ‘Bɛva wɔ ɛtane ne mɔ bɛhyɛ wɔ’, anzɛɛ ‘Dwazo na tia?’
40009006	Akee memaa bɛanwu kɛ medame, Sonla Ra, melɛ tumi wɔ azɛlɛ ye azo kɛ mefa ɛtane mekyɛ.” Yemɔti ɔzele nrenya ne mɔɔ ɛdwidwe la kɛ, “Dwazo, nyenya wɔ ɛkpa ne, na kɔ sua nu!”
40009007	Nrenya ne dwazole na ɔhɔle sua nu.
40009008	Menli ne mɔ nwunle ye zɛhae la, ɛzulolɛ hanle bɛ, na bɛyele Nyamenle ayɛlɛ kɛ yeva tumi mɔɔ le zɛhae la yemaa sonla a.
40009009	Gyisɛse vi ɛkɛ ne na ɔkɔ la, ɔnwunle adwuledievolɛ bie mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye Mateyu la kɛ ɔde adwulelielɛ sua ne anu. Gyisɛse zele ye kɛ, “Bɛla maa yɛhɔ.” Mateyu dwazole na ɔdoale ye.
40009010	Mɔɔ Gyisɛse kpula ɔ sa wɔ Mateyu sua nu ɛkɛ ne la, adwuledievolɛma dɔɔnwo nee bɛdabɛ mɔɔ awie ɛmbu bɛ la rabokale Gyisɛse nee ye ɛdoavolɛma ne mɔ na bɛ muala bɛkpulale bɛ sa.
40009011	Falasiima bie mɔ nwunle ye na bɛzele Gyisɛse ɛdoavolɛma ne kɛ, “Duzu ati a bɛ menle nee adwuledievolɛma nee bɛdabɛ mɔɔ awie ɛmbu bɛ la to bɛ sa ɛyɛba ko anu ɛ?”
40009012	Gyisɛse dele na ɔbuale bɛ kɛ, “Menli mɔɔ te kpɔkɛ la ɛngyia ninsinli nwo kɛ wuleravolɛma.
40009013	Bɛhɔ bɛhɔkpondɛ Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ɛhye abo: ‘Mekulo anwunvɔnezelɛ, na tɛ nane azubɔlɛ ɔ.’ Meamba menli mɔɔ ɛkpazi la ɛvɛlɛlɛ; membale bɛdabɛ mɔɔ awie ɛmbu bɛ bie la ɛvɛlɛlɛ!”
40009014	Dwɔn Sɔnevolɛ ne ɛdoavolɛma ne rale Gyisɛse ɛkɛ ne rabizale ye kɛ, “Duzu ati a yɛmɛ yɛɛ Falasiima yɛkye ɛhɔne dahudahu na wɔ ɛdoavolɛma ne ɛngye bie fee ɛ?”
40009015	Gyisɛse buale bɛ kɛ, “Bɛdwenle kɛ saa atɔfolɛ nrenya ne wɔ ɛkɛ a, ɔ gɔnwo mɔ mɔɔ ɛra atɔfolɛlielɛ ne abo la kɛli nyane ɔ? Kyɛkyɛ! Noko saa mekɛ dwu na bɛbaye atɔfolɛ nrenya ne wɔ bɛ avinli bɛkɔ a, ɛnee bɔ zo mɔɔ yedwu mɔɔ bɛkye ɛhɔne a.
40009016	“Awie ɛnva ɛdanlɛ fofolɛ mɔɔ bɛtɛwulale ye nzule nu ɛlɛ la ɛnda ɛdanlɛ dɛba nu; saa ɔyɛ ye zɔhane a, ɛdanlɛ fofolɛ ne kɛde dɛba ne na ɔkɛmaa tokule ne akee kɛyɛ kpole.”
40009017	Ɔvale ɔzɔle zo kɛ, “Awie ɛnva nwanye ndokuma ɛngua nwanye nwoma kodoku dɛba nu. Saa ɔyɛ ye zɔhane na nwanye ne anu yɛ ɛsesebɛ a, nwoma kodoku dɛba ne bakpuke yeamaa nwanye ne agua aze, na nwoma ne noko azɛkye. Mɔɔ bɛyɛ la a le kɛ bɛfa nwanye ndokuma bɛgua nwoma kodoku fofolɛ nu, ɛnee bɛ mu nwiɔ bɛgyinla boɛ.”
40009018	Mɔɔ Gyisɛse anloa wɔ zo ɔlɛtendɛ yeahile bɛ la, nyianu sua ne neavolɛ kpanyinli ne rale na ɔrahotole Gyisɛse anyunlu ɛkɛ na ɔzɛlɛle ye kɛ, “Me ra raalɛ ɛwu kɛkala; noko bɛla bava ɛ sa to ɔ nwo zo maa ɔnyia ngoane.”
40009019	Yemɔti Gyisɛse dwazole na ɔ nee ye ɛdoavolɛma ne nee nrenya ne hɔle.
40009020	Raalɛ bie mɔɔ mogya ɛdudu ye toonwo ɛvolɛ bulu nee nwiɔ la ralile Gyisɛse anzi na ɔvale ɔ sa ɔhanle ye tɛladeɛ ne anloa.
40009021	Ɔhanle ye ɔ ti anu kɛ, “Saa mefa me sa meka ye tɛladeɛ ne bɔbɔ a, me nwo kɛza.”
40009022	Gyisɛse hakyile ɔ nye na ɔnwunle ye la, ɔzele raalɛ ne kɛ, “Ralɛ raalɛ, maa ɛ rɛle ɛdɔ wɔ azule nu. Wɔ diedi ɛmaa ɛ nwo ɛza.” Na ɛkɛ ne ala raalɛ ne anwo zale.
40009023	Gyisɛse dwule nyianu sua ne kpanyinli ne sua nu la, ɔnwunle agolehanlɛma, nee menli dɔɔnwo mɔɔ ɛra bayɛ ɛzɛne ne la.
40009024	Ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Bɛhwe bɛ nwo! Bɛlɛra ne ɛtɛwule; ɔlɛdafe ala!” Na bɛzelele ye bɛzile ye amgbu.
40009025	Mɔɔ bɛyele menli ne mɔ bɛvindele la, Gyisɛse wolole sua ne anu na ɔzɔle bɛlɛra ne asa, na bɛlɛra ne dwazole.
40009026	Gyima ɛhye mɔɔ ɔlile la nganeɛ hɔle maanzinli ne anu ɛleka biala.
40009027	Gyisɛse vi ɛkɛ ne na ɔkɔ la, anyenzinliravolɛma nwiɔ doale ye na bɛdeɛdeanle nu bɛzele kɛ, “Gyisɛse, Devidi ara, nwu yɛ anwunvɔne!”
40009028	Nzinlii mɔɔ Gyisɛse hɔle sua nu la, bɛrale ɔ nwo ɛkɛ ne. Na Gyisɛse bizale bɛ kɛ, “Bɛdie bɛdi kɛ menwɔhola bɛ ayile yɛ ɔ?” Bɛzele ye kɛ, “Ɛhɛe, Yɛmenle!”
40009029	Yemɔti Gyisɛse vale ɔ sa hehanle bɛ nye ne mɔ na ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Ɔyɛ zɔ ɔmaa bɛ, kɛmɔ bɛ diedi ne de la.”
40009030	Na bɛ nye ne mɔ dukuedukuele. Gyisɛse bɔle bɛ nloa kɛ, “Bɛmmabɔ zo bɛmaa awie biala te.”
40009031	Noko bɛvile ɛkɛ ne la, bɛvale Gyisɛse gyima kpalɛ nwo edwɛkɛ bɛhɔle maanzinli ne anu amuala.
40009032	Mɔɔ menli ne mɔ finde ahɔ la, menli bie vale mumule bie mɔɔ sunsum ɛtane ɛva ye la rɛlɛle Gyisɛse.
40009033	Ɔdule sunsum ɛtane ne la, mumule ne dendɛle. Na ɔyɛle menli dɔɔnwo ne nwanwane na bɛzele kɛ, “Yɛtɛnwunle ɛhye bie ɛlɛ wɔ Yizilayɛ!”
40009034	Noko Falasiima ne mɔ zele kɛ, “Ɔdua mbɔnsam kpanyinli ne tumi zo a ɔtu mbɔnsam ne mɔ a.”
40009035	Gyisɛse hɔkpɔsale maanzinli ne anu azua nee namunamu ne mɔ amuala azo, ɔhilehilele wɔ nyianu azua ne mɔ anu, ɔhanle Edwɛkpa ne mɔɔ fane Anwuma Belemgbunlililɛ ne anwo la ɔhilele menli ne. Ɔmanle menli mɔɔ ewule ngakyile ɛha bɛ nee mɔɔ anwonyane ɛbɔ bɛ la amuala anwo zale.
40009036	Ɔnwunle menli somaa ne la, alɔbɔlɛ hunle ye, ɔluakɛ bɛbɔ asande na bɛluolua nu mgbane mgbane kɛ mboane mɔɔ ɛnlɛ neavolɛ la.
40009037	Na ɔzele ye ɛdoavolɛma ne kɛ, “Nɔhalɛ, Nyamenle bɛyɔba ne ɛbolo kpole, na menli mɔɔ bu la le ekyi.
40009038	Zɔhane ati bɛzɛlɛ egyinli menle ne kɛ ɔkɛva gyimayɛvoma dɔɔnwo ɔkɛmaa bɛkɛhɔbu bɛyɔba ne.”
40010001	Gyisɛse vɛlɛle ye ɛdoavolɛma bulu nee nwiɔ ne na ɔmanle bɛ tumi kɛ bɛdu sunsum ɛtane, na bɛyɛ ewule nee anwonyane biala ayile.
40010002	Ɛzoanvolɛma bulu nee nwiɔ ne aluma ɛne: mɔɔ lumua la a le Saemɔn, mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye Pita la nee ɔ diema Andelu; Gyemise nee ɔ diema Dwɔn, mɔɔ bɛ ze a le Zɛbɛdi la;
40010003	Felepe nee Baatɔlomiyu; Tɔmase nee Mateyu mɔɔ le adwuledievolɛ ne; Afeɛse ara Gyemise nee Tadease;
40010004	Saemɔn mɔɔ le Keenanli ne, nee Dwudase Yesekaleɔto mɔɔ yele Gyisɛse manle la.
40010005	Gyisɛse zoanle bɛdabɛ bulu nee nwiɔ ɛhye na ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Bɛmmakɔ bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnle Dwuuma la anu anzɛɛ Samɛlea azua ne mɔ azo;
40010006	bɛhɔ Yizilayɛma mɔɔ ɛminli la ɛkɛ ne.
40010007	Saa bɛkɔ a, bɛhɔbɔ nolo kɛ, ‘Anwuma Belemgbunlililɛ ne ɛbikye.’
40010008	Bɛyɛ wuleravolɛma ayile, bɛdunwue mɔɔ ɛwu la, bɛmaa kokobɛvolɛma ɛde kpɔkɛ, na bɛdu sunsum ɛtane ne mɔ. Bɛnyia tumi ɛhye mgbane mɔɔ bɛandua nwolɛ ɛhwee a, yemɔti bɛva bɛmaa mgbane mɔɔ bɛnlie ɛhwee a.
40010009	Bɛmmafa ezukoa nvutuke anzɛɛ dwɛtɛ fufule anzɛɛ ezukoa kɔbele bɛbɔ bɛ nwo;
40010010	bɛmmafa aleɛ kodoku wɔ bɛ adendulɛ nu. Bɛmmafa anwuma adɛladeɛ nwiɔ, mgbɔlaboa anzɛɛ kpɔma, ɔluakɛ soamɛlɛkɛ didi mgbane.
40010011	“Saa bɛkɔ sua bie anzɛɛ namule bie azo a, bɛbiza bɛnwu sonla mɔɔ kɛlie bɛ la na bɛhɔzokoɛ ye, na bɛdɛnla ɔ nwo ɛkɛ ne ɔhɔdwu mekɛ mɔɔ bɛkɛvi sua ne anzɛɛ namule ne azo la.
40010012	Saa bɛwolo awuke nu a, bɛze ɛkɛ ne amra kɛ, ‘Anzonudwolɛ ɛha bɛ.’
40010013	Saa awuke ne anu amra die bɛ a, bɛmaa bɛ anzonudwolɛ ne ɛha ɛkɛ; saa bɛanlie bɛ noko a, bɛva bɛ anzonudwolɛ ne bɛzia bɛhɔ.
40010014	Eza awuke anzɛɛ sua biala mɔɔ anlie bɛ anzɛɛ andie mɔɔ bɛka la, saa bɛlɛfi ɛkɛ ne a bɛkpɔlɔkpɔla bɛ gyakɛ abo anwea ne bɛgua zolɛ.
40010015	Na nɔhalɛ, mese, wɔ Ndɛnebualɛ Kenle ne, Nyamenle baze Sodɔm nee Gomɔla amra anwunvɔne dɔɔnwo adɛla menli mɔɔ wɔ zɔhane sua ne azo la.
40010016	“Bɛdie! Melɛsoa bɛ kɛ mboane la wɔ bedi avinli. Bɛmaa bɛ nye ɛla bɛ nwo zo kɛ nwɔlɛ, noko bɛyɛ bɛlɛvo kɛ abubule.
40010017	Bɛnlea bɛ nwo boɛ wɔ menli sa nu, ɔluakɛ bɛbahye bɛ bɛ nee bɛ ahɔ kɔɔto; bɛbabila bɛ empele wɔ bɛ nyianu azua ne mɔ anu,
40010018	yɛɛ eza bɛbahwe bɛ bɛahɔ maanle mgbanyima nee arelemgbunli nyunlu wɔ me ti, na bɛabɔ Edwɛkpa ne nolo bɛahile bɛ nee bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnle Dwuuma la.
40010019	Saa bɛfa bɛ bɛkɔ kɛ bɛli bɛ edwɛkɛ a, bɛmmadwenle mɔɔ bɛbaha la anwo anzɛɛ kɛ bɛbazi bɛaha ye la anwo; saa mekɛ ne dwu a, bɛbava mɔɔ bɛbaha la bɛamaa bɛ.
40010020	Ɔluakɛ tɛ bɛmɛ a bɛbadendɛ a; bɛ Ze mɔɔ wɔ anwuma la Sunsum ne balua bɛ nwo zo adendɛ.
40010021	“Adiema baye adiema amaa kɛ bɛhu ye. Selɛ baye ralɛ amaa, mralɛ badwazo bɛ awovolɛma anwo zo na bɛaye bɛ bɛamaa bɛahu bɛ.
40010022	Me ti, menli kɔsɔɔti bakpɔ bɛ. Noko mɔɔ kɛgyinla kpundii kɛhɔ awieleɛ la, Nyamenle kɛlie ye ngoane.
40010023	Saa bɛyɛ bɛ kpɔdekpɔde wɔ sua ko azo a, bɛnriandi bɛhɔ mɔɔ doa ye la azo. Na meka meahile bɛ kɛ bɛnrɛwie Yizilayɛ azua ne mɔ amuala azo kɔ na Sonla Ra ne ara.
40010024	“Ɛdoavolɛ biala ɛndɛla ye kilehilevolɛ, yɛɛ akɛlɛ ɛndɛla ɔ menle.
40010025	Ɔwɔ kɛ ɛdoavolɛ biala yɛ kɛ ɔ menle la, yɛɛ ɔwɔ kɛ akɛlɛ yɛ kɛ ɔ menle la. Saa bɛvɛlɛ sua menle ne Biyɛlezɛbɛle a, ɛnee ye sua nu ɛkɛ ne amra ɛdeɛ bɛkɛvɛlɛ bɛ aluma dɔɔnwo kpalɛ.
40010026	“Yemɔti bɛmmasulo awie biala, ɔluakɛ debie biala ɛnle ɛkɛ mɔɔ bɛheda zolɛ mɔɔ bɛnrɛdukue zolɛ a, yɛɛ debie biala ɛnle fealera nu mɔɔ ɛnrɛla ali a.
40010027	Mɔɔ menwɔha menwɔhile bɛ wɔ awozinli nu la, bɛha ye bagua nu, yɛɛ mɔɔ bɛde ye azukue nu la, bɛbɔ ye nolo wɔ azua ti zo.
40010028	Bɛmmasulo bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛkola bɛku nwonane ne na bɛngola ɛkɛla ne ku la; bɛzulo Nyamenle mɔɔ kola nwonane ne nee ɛkɛla ne amuala ku, na ɔsɛkye bɛ wɔ ɛbolɔ senle nu la.
40010029	Bɛtɔ nyamenleakatiba nwiɔ ɛkpɔsɛba ko, noko akee ko bɔbɔ ɛndɔ aze wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ bɛ Ze mɔɔ wɔ anwuma la ɛnze nu a.
40010030	Na bɛmɛ, bɛ ti zo enrinli bɔbɔ bɛdia.
40010031	Zɔhane ati bɛmmasulo, ɔluakɛ bɛsonle bolɛ kpole bɛtɛla nyamenleakatiba dɔɔnwo.
40010032	“Awie biala mɔɔ kɛha ye baguase kɛ ɔle me ɛdeɛ la, medame menwɔyɛ ye zɔhane ala menwɔmaa ye wɔ Egya mɔɔ wɔ anwuma la anyunlu.
40010033	Na awie biala mɔɔ kɛkpo me wɔ bagua nu la, medame noko menwɔkpo ye wɔ Egya mɔɔ wɔ anwuma la anyunlu.
40010034	“Bɛmmadwenle kɛ me nee anzonudwolɛ a rale ewiade a; kyɛkyɛ, meanva anzonudwolɛ meamba. Me nee konle a rale a.
40010035	Membale kɛ mebamaa mralɛ mrenya adwazo atia bɛ ze mɔ, mralɛ mraalɛ adwazo atia bɛ nli mɔ, nwuvolɛ mraalɛ adwazo atia bɛ hu mɔ bɛ nli mɔ;
40010036	sonla biala kpɔvolɛma kpalɛ vi ɔdaye ye sua nu.
40010037	“Mɔɔ kulo ɔ ze anzɛɛ ɔ nli tɛla me la ɛnfɛta kɛ ɔkɛyɛ me ɛdoavolɛ, yɛɛ mɔɔ kulo ɔ ra nrenya anzɛɛ ɔ ra raalɛ tɛla me la ɛnfɛta kɛ ɔkɛyɛ me ɛdoavolɛ.
40010038	Awie biala mɔɔ anva ye meanubaka ne ando ɔ kɔme zo antietia me gyakɛ abo zo la ɛnfɛta kɛ ɔkɛyɛ me ɛdoavolɛ.
40010039	Mɔɔ kɛpele ye ngoane nwo la kɛminli ye; na mɔɔ kɛminli ye ngoane wɔ me ti la kɛnyia ngoane mɔɔ ɛnlɛ awieleɛ.
40010040	“Awie mɔɔ kɛlie bɛ la ɛlie medame; mɔɔ kɛlie me noko la ɛlie mɔɔ zoanle me la.
40010041	Mɔɔ kɛlie Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛ kɛ ɔle Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛ la, kɛnyia Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛ nwo ahyɛlɛdeɛ, yɛɛ mɔɔ kɛlie sonlakpalɛ wɔ sonlakpalɛ duma nu la, kɛnyia sonlakpalɛ nwo ahatualɛ.
40010042	Na bɛhakye ɛhye: Awie biala mɔɔ kɛmaa ngakula ngyikyi ɛhye mɔ anu ko nzule fɔlɔdɔdɔ kanrɛlɛ ko bɔbɔ kɛnlo, kɛ ɔle me ɛdoavolɛ la, kɛnyia nwolɛ ahatualɛ somaa!”
40011001	Mɔɔ Gyisɛse wiele ye ɛdoavolɛma bulu nee nwiɔ ne folɛ tu la, ɔvi ɛkɛ ne ɔhɔle na ɔhɔhilehilele, ɔhanle Edwɛkpa ne wɔ azua mɔɔ zuozua ɛkɛ ne la azo.
40011002	Gyisɛse gyima mɔɔ ɛnee ɔlɛdi la nganeɛ dwule Dwɔn Sɔnevolɛ ne anzo nu wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ ɛnee ɔla efiade la. Yemɔti ɔzoanle ye ɛdoavolɛma ne bie mɔ wɔ Gyisɛse ɛkɛ ne;
40011003	bɛhɔbizale ye kɛ, “Ɛnee wɔmɔ a ɛle ahenle ne mɔɔ Dwɔn zele kɛ ɔbara la anzɛɛ yɛmaa yɛ nye ɛla sonla fofolɛ ade ɔ?”
40011004	Gyisɛse buale kɛ, “Bɛzia bɛhɔha mɔɔ bɛde nee mɔɔ bɛnwu ye la bɛhile Dwɔn:
40011005	anyenzinliravolɛma nwu debie, abuburama tia, kokobɛvolɛma anwo sa, anzondiliravolɛma te edwɛkɛ, bɛdwazo mɔwuamra bɛba ngoane nu bieko, yɛɛ bɛka Edwɛkpa ne bɛkile ehyianvolɛma.
40011006	Nyilalɛ ɛha bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛ ti anu ɛnyɛ bɛ kesee wɔ me nwo la.”
40011007	Mɔɔ Dwɔn ɛdoavolɛma ne ziale kɛ bɛkɔ la, Gyisɛse bɔle ɔ bo kɛ ɔka Dwɔn anwo edwɛkɛ yeahile menli dɔɔnwo ne. Ɔse, “Mɔɔ bɛhɔle Dwɔn anwo lɔ wɔ fienemgbole ne anu la, duzu a ɛnee bɛ nye la kɛ bɛkɛnwu ye a? Ɛhonle mɔɔ anwoma ɛlɛkpusu ye la ɔ?
40011008	Na duzu a bɛhɔle ye ɛnleanlɛ a? Awie mɔɔ heda ɛdakpa la ɔ? Bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛheda ɛdakpa la dede arelemgbunli azua nu.
40011009	Bɛha bɛhile me ɛ; ɛnee akee duzu a bɛhɔle ye ɛnleanlɛ a? Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛ ɔ? Ɛhɛe, na meka meahile bɛ kɛ bɛnwunle awie mɔɔ tɛla Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛ bɔbɔ la.
40011010	Ɔluakɛ Dwɔn a Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne ka ye ɔ nwo kɛ: ‘Nyamenle se, mebazoa me ɛbɔfoɔ meamaa yealumua ɛ nyunlu na yeahɔziezie adenle ne anu yeamaa wɔ’ la.
40011011	Nɔhalɛ, meka meahile bɛ, wɔ menli mɔɔ bɛwo bɛ bɛgua ɛbɛla azɛlɛ ɛhye azo la anu, awie ɛtɛdwazole mɔɔ le kpole tɛla Dwɔn Sɔnevolɛ ne a. Noko akee awie mɔɔ le ekyi wɔ Anwuma Belemgbunlililɛ nu la le kpole tɛla ye.
40011012	Ɔvi mekɛ mɔɔ Dwɔn Sɔnevolɛ ne bɔle ye nolobɔlɛ bo mɔɔ ɛradwu ɛnɛ la, ngyegyelɛ dɔɔnwo ɛra Anwuma Belemgbunlililɛ ne anwo ɛsesebɛ, na menli mɔɔ di mgbonde la ɛlɛbɔ mɔdenle kɛ bɛkɛpemgbe bɛkɛnyia ye.
40011013	Ɔluakɛ Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛma ne mɔ amuala nee Mosisi mɛla ne hanle Belemgbunlililɛ ne anwo edwɛkɛ dole ɛkɛ kolaa na Dwɔn ara;
40011014	na saa bɛkɛlie bɛkɛli a, anrɛɛ mese, Dwɔn a le Yilaegya ne mɔɔ bɛhanle ye edwɛkɛ kɛ ɔbara la.
40011015	Mɔɔ lɛ ɛnzonlɛ la ɛdie.
40011016	“Ɛnee akee duzu a menva adwuleso amra ɛhye mendo nwo a? Bɛle kɛ ngakula mɔɔ ɛlɛdi nwɔhoa wɔ gua zo la. Bɛdede ye ekpunli ekpunli, na ekpunli ko tea nu se ko ne kɛ,
40011017	‘Yɛbɔle anyelielɛ edwɛne yɛmanle bɛ, noko bɛanzi. Yɛdole ɛzɛne edwɛne la, bɛanzu.’
40011018	Dwɔn Sɔnevolɛ ne rale na ɔhyele ɛhɔne dahuu, ɔhyile nza la, awie biala se, ‘Ɔlɛ ayɛne!’
40011019	Medame, Sonla Ra noko mera, na melɛdi meanlo a, awie biala se, ‘Bɛnlea ɛhye! Adidikpoku, nzanli, adwuledievolɛma nee bɛdabɛ mɔɔ awie ɛmbu bɛ la agɔnwo!’ Noko Nyamenle nrɛlɛbɛ ne amra ne mɔ nyɛleɛ maa bɛnwu kɛ ɔle nɔhalɛ.”
40011020	Akee Gyisɛse bɔle ɔ bo kɛ ɔtea menli mɔɔ wɔ azua mɔɔ yeyɛ nwanwane gyima dɔɔnwo wɔ zo la azo amra, ɔluakɛ bɛannu bɛ nwo.
40011021	“Munzule ɛha bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛwɔ Koleezen la! Munzule ɛha bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛwɔ Bɛteseeyeda la! Nwanwane gyima mgbole mɔɔ bɛyɛle wɔ bɛ azua ne mɔ azo la, saa bɛyɛle bie wɔ Taya nee Saedɛn a, anrɛɛ menli mɔɔ wɔ zo la hedale ɛrele, bɔle nzonle, bɛvale bɛhilele kɛ bɛnlu bɛ nwo wɔ bɛ ɛtane ne mɔ anwo.
40011022	Meka meahile bɛ, Ndɛnebualɛ Kenle ne, Nyamenle baze Tayama nee Saedɛnema anwunvɔne dɔɔnwo adɛla bɛ.
40011023	Na bɛmɛ mɔɔ bɛwɔ Kapɛnayɛm la, bɛkpondɛ kɛ bɛkɔ Nyamenle maanle ne anu ɔ? Kyɛkyɛ! Bɛbavuandi bɛ bɛagua ɛbolɔ senle nu. Nwanwane gyima mɔɔ bɛyɛle wɔ bɛ sua zo la, saa bɛyɛle bie wɔ Sodɔm a, anrɛɛ ɛnɛ nee ɛnɛ ala sua zɔhane tɛbɔ ɛkɛ.
40011024	Bɛnwu ye kɛ, Ndɛnebualɛ Kenle ne, Nyamenle baze Sodɔm amra anwunvɔne dɔɔnwo adɛla bɛ!”
40011025	Mekɛ ne anu Gyisɛse zele kɛ, “Egya, anwuma nee aze Awulae, meyɛ wɔ mo kɛ ninyɛne mɔɔ wɔva wɔvea nrɛlɛbɛvolɛma nee nwomama la wɔye wɔhile menli mɔɔ ɛnze nwolɛ bie la.
40011026	Ɛhɛe, Egya, ɛnee kɛ ɛkpondɛ kɛ ɔba ye la ɛne.
40011027	“Egya ɛva ninyɛne kɔsɔɔti ɛmaa me. Awie biala ɛnze Ralɛ ne sonla holɛ kɛ Selɛ ne ala, yɛɛ awie biala ɛnze Selɛ ne sonla holɛ kɛ Ralɛ ne nee bɛdabɛ mɔɔ Ralɛ ne kulo kɛ ɔye ye ɔkile bɛ la ala.
40011028	“Bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛzo ɛnlomboɛ na bɛvɛ la, bɛ muala bɛrɛla me nwo ɛke, na menwɔmaa bɛ ɛnwomenlelielɛ.
40011029	Bɛva me gyɛnvayile ne bɛdo bɛ kɔme zo na bɛzukoa mɔɔ meyɛ la, ɔluakɛ mele bɛtɛɛ, yɛɛ memmemaa me nwo zo, na bɛ ɛkɛla ne mɔ anwo kɛdɔ bɛ.
40011030	Ɔluakɛ me gyɛnvayile ne le felafela, yɛɛ bɔlɛ mɔɔ mebava meazoa bɛ la ɛnyɛ ɛnlomboɛ.”
40012001	Mekɛ ekyi guale nu la, ɛnee Gyisɛse lua abɛlɛ ɛya bie anu wɔ Ɛnwomenlelielɛ Kenle ne. Ɛhɔne hunle ye ɛdoavolɛma ne, yemɔti bɛbubule bie bɛlile.
40012002	Falasiima bie mɔ nwunle ɛhye la bɛzele Gyisɛse kɛ, “Nea, kɛ wɔ ɛdoavolɛma ne ɛlɛyɛ mɔɔ bɛnyɛ la wɔ Ɛnwomenlelielɛ Kenle ɛ; ɔtia yɛ mɛla ne!”
40012003	Gyisɛse buale bɛ kɛ, “Asoo bɛtɛkengale mɔɔ Devidi yɛle, wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ ɛnee ɛhɔne ɛlɛku ye nee ye menli mɔɔ ɔ nee bɛ lua la?
40012004	Se Devidi hɔle Nyamenle Sua ne anu na ɔhɔvale azu kpanwo ne bie ɔlile, wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ adenle ɛnla ɛkɛ kɛ awie di bie kyesɛ sɛlɛvolɛma ala la.
40012005	Anzɛɛ bɛtɛkengale ye wɔ Mosisi mɛla ne anu kɛ sɛlɛvolɛma mɔɔ wɔ Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne anu la to Ɛnwomenlelielɛ Kenle mɛla ne mekɛ biala, noko akee bɛnli fɔlɛ ɔ?
40012006	Meka meahile bɛ, awie mɔɔ le kpole tɛla Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne la wɔ ɛke.
40012007	Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne se, ‘Mekpondɛ anwunvɔnezelɛ na tɛ nane azubɔlɛ ɔ.’ Saa bɛte ɛhye abo kpalɛ a, anrɛɛ bɛmbu bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnze nwolɛ bie la fɔlɛ.
40012008	Ɔluakɛ medame, Sonla Ra, melɛ tumi wɔ Ɛnwomenlelielɛ Kenle ne azo noko.”
40012009	Gyisɛse vi ɛkɛ ne la, ɔhɔle bɛ nyianu sua ne anu.
40012010	Nrenya bie wɔ ɛkɛ ne mɔɔ ɔ sa ko ɛdwe a. Menli bie noko bɛdabɛ bɛra ɛkɛ ne kɛ bɛtɛ Gyisɛse na bɛahɔdoa ye. Yemɔti bɛbizale ye kɛ, “Asoo ɔtia yɛ mɛla ne kɛ bɛkɛyɛ ayile wɔ Ɛnwomenlelielɛ Kenle?”
40012011	Gyisɛse buale bɛ kɛ, “Bɛ nuhua boni yɛɛ saa ɔlɛ ye boane na ɔtɔ kuma nu Ɛnwomenlelielɛ Kenle a, ɔnrɛye ye a?
40012012	Sonla noko sonle bolɛ tɛla nane! Yemɔti yɛ mɛla ne ɛndua kɛ yɛmmaboa awie wɔ Ɛnwomenlelielɛ Kenle.”
40012013	Akee ɔzele nrenya ne kɛ, “Tenrɛ ɛ sa nu.” Nrenya ne denrɛle ɔ sa ne anu, na ɔyɛle kpalɛ kɛ ɔ sa ɛhendeɛ ne ala la.
40012014	Yemɔti Falasiima ne vindele na bɛhɔbɔle kpɔkɛ kɛ bɛku Gyisɛse.
40012015	Mɔɔ Gyisɛse nwunle kɛ bɛhɔ ɔ ti akpamo la, ɔvi ɛkɛ ne ɔyele ɔ nwo; na menli dɔɔnwo doale ye. Ɔyɛle bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnde kpɔkɛ la ayile
40012016	na ɔbɔle bɛ nloa kɛ bɛmmaka bɛmaa bɛte ye nganeɛ.
40012017	Ɔyɛle ɛhye amaa mɔɔ Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛ Ayezaya hanle la ayɛ nɔhalɛ kɛ:
40012018	“Bɛnlea, me sonvolɛ ne mɔɔ mekpa nu meye ye la ɛne, yemɔ a ɔle sonla mɔɔ mekulo ye na me nye die ɔ nwo a. Mebava me Sunsum meawula ye, na yeabɔ me ndɛnebualɛ ne nolo yeahile maanle maanle muala.
40012019	Ɔnrɛzu kpolera, yɛɛ ɔnrɛdeɛdea nu; awie ɛnrɛde ɔ ne wɔ gua zo.
40012020	Ɔnrɛbu baka mɔɔ bɛkposo ye la, yɛɛ ɔnrɛgua nzule senle mɔɔ asɛɛ ɛnlu la anu, kɔkpula kɛ ɔkɛmaa pɛlepɛlelilɛ kɛli konim,
40012021	na menli muala kɛnyia anyelazo wɔ ye nu.”
40012022	Menli bie vale nrenya bie mɔɔ sunsum ɛtane wɔ ɔ nwo na eza ɔle anyenzinliravolɛ nee mumule la rɛlɛle Gyisɛse. Gyisɛse yɛle ye ayile na nrenya ne dendɛle na ɔnwunle debie.
40012023	Ɛhye zinle menli ne anwo, na bɛbizale kɛ, “Asoo tɛ Devidi Ara ne ɛne?”
40012024	Noko mɔɔ Falasiima ne dele ɛhye la bɛzele kɛ, “Mbɔnsam kpanyinli ne mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye Biyɛlezɛbɛle la ala a maa ye tumi mɔɔ ɔfa ɔtu mbɔnsam a.”
40012025	Gyisɛse nwunle bɛ adwenle la, ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Maanle biala mɔɔ anu kɛhyɛ nwiɔ na bɛko bɛtia bɛ nwo la ɛngyinla, yɛɛ sua anzɛɛ abusua biala mɔɔ anu kɛhyɛ nwiɔ na bɛko bɛtia bɛ nwo la ɛngyɛ na yeabɔ.
40012026	Yemɔti saa Seetan ɔdaye noko ye belemgbunlililɛ ne anu ɛhyɛ nwiɔ, na bɛlɛko bɛatia bɛ nwo a, ɛnee ɔkile kɛ ɔnrɛgyinla.
40012027	Na saa mame, medua Biyɛlezɛbɛle anwo zo a metu mbɔnsam a, ɛnee nwane anwo zo a bɛ ɛdoavolɛma ne dua tu bɛ a? Mɔɔ bɛdabɛ bɛ ɛdoavolɛma ne yɛ la kile kɛ bɛvo.
40012028	Na saa medua Nyamenle Sunsum ne tumi zo a metu mbɔnsam a, ɛnee noko Anwuma Belemgbunlililɛ ne ɛdwu bɛ nwo ɛke dɛbadɛba.
40012029	“Awie biala ɛnrɛhola ɛnrɛwolo sonla mɔɔ anwo yɛ se la sua nu ɛnrɛva ye ninyɛne mɔɔ ɔlɛ la, kyesɛ ɔdumua ɔkyekye ye na yeahola yeawua ye.
40012030	“Awie biala mɔɔ ɛmboka me nwo la tia me, yɛɛ mɔɔ nee me ɛnguohua la sande nu.
40012031	Zɔhane ati meka meahile bɛ, bɛbava ɛtane mɔɔ menli yɛ, nee mgbane mgbane mɔɔ bɛkeha la bɛahyɛ bɛ; na mɔɔ kɛha ɛtane kɛtia Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne la, bɛnrɛva bɛnrɛhyɛ ye.
40012032	Awie biala mɔɔ tendɛ tia medame, Sonla Ra la, bɛbava bɛahyɛ ye, na mɔɔ kɛdendɛ kɛtia Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne la, bɛnrɛva bɛnrɛhyɛ ye wɔ ɛnɛ anzɛɛ kenle bie.
40012033	“Baka kpalɛ biala so ma kpalɛ, yɛɛ baka ɛtane biala so ma ɛtane. Baka ne ma a kile ye baka holɛ a.
40012034	Bɛmɛ ɛkyelebenle mralɛ! Bɛnle kpalɛ la ati bɛngola bɛnga edwɛkɛ kpalɛ. Ɔluakɛ mɔɔ ɛyi ɛbulu zo wɔ bɛ ahonle ne mɔ anu la a finde bɛ nloa a.
40012035	Sonlakpalɛ biala yɛ debie kpalɛ, yɛɛ sonlatane biala yɛ ninyɛndane.
40012036	“Meka meahile bɛ: Edwɛkɛ mgbane mgbane biala mɔɔ awie biala kɛha la ɔbabu nwolɛ mgbonda wɔ Ndɛnebualɛ Kenle ne.
40012037	Ɔluakɛ Nyamenle balua bɛdabɛ bɛ nloa edwɛkɛ zo a yeabua bɛ benle anzɛɛ yeabua bɛ ewule fɔlɛ a.”
40012038	Mɛla kilehilevolɛma bie mɔ nee Falasiima bie zele Gyisɛse kɛ, “Kilehilevolɛ, yɛkulo kɛ ɛyɛ nwanwane sɛkɛlɛneɛ bie ɛmaa yɛnea.”
40012039	Gyisɛse buale bɛ kɛ, “Adwuleso amra ye le munzule menli, bɛnze Nyamenle! Bɛbiza bɛanlea nwanwane sɛkɛlɛneɛ? Bɛnrɛnwu bie, kyesɛ Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛ Dwona ɛdeɛ ne ala.
40012040	Kɛmɔ Dwona lile ewiazo nee nɔɔzo kenle nsa wɔ nyevizonle ne akunlu la, zɔhane ala yɛɛ medame, Sonla Ra, mebali ewiazo nee nɔɔzo kenle nsa wɔ azɛlɛ ti anu a.
40012041	Wɔ Ndɛnebualɛ Kenle ne Nenɛvɛma badwazo adoa bɛmɛ adwuleso amra, ɔboalekɛ Dwona edwɛkɛ ne manle bɛnlunle bɛ nwo; noko meka meahile bɛ, awie mɔɔ le kpole tɛla Dwona la wɔ ɛke!
40012042	Ndɛnebualɛ Kenle ne, Hyiba maanle nu belemgbunli raalɛ ne badwazo adoa bɛmɛ adwuleso amra, ɔboalekɛ ɔvi ye maanle nu wɔ nyiakɛ nehane ɔdiale dedee ɔradiele nrɛlɛbɛ ngilehilelɛ ɔvile Belemgbunli Sɔlɔmɔn ɛkɛ; noko meka meahile bɛ, awie mɔɔ le kpole tɛla Sɔlɔmɔn la wɔ ɛke!
40012043	“Saa sunsum ɛtane fi sonla nwo tu a, ɔkɔduolua ɛleka reresee kɛ ɔkpondɛ ɛleka yeabɔ ye nzeseɛ. Na saa yeannyia bie a,
40012044	ɔka ɔkile ɔ nwo kɛ, ‘Mesia meahɔ me sua dɛba ne mɔɔ mevi nu menvindele la anu.’ Ɔsia ɔba na ɔbanwu kɛ ɛhwee ɛnle nu, bɛkpoɔkpoa nu bɛyɛ nu bɔkɔbɔkɔ a,
40012045	akee ɔfinde na ɔkɔfa sunsum ɛtane nsuu mɔɔ le amumuyɛ tɛla ɔdaye mumua ne la ɔba na bɛbatɛnla ɛkɛ ne. Nzinlii sonla ɛhye akee sɛkye kpalɛ bɔkɔɔ tɛla alumua ne. Zɔhane ala yɛɛ ɔbazi adwuleso amra munzule anwo zo a.”
40012046	Mɔɔ Gyisɛse anloa wɔ zo ɔlɛtendɛ yeahile menli ne mɔ la, ɔ nli nee ɔ mediema mrenya ne mɔ rale alie nwo ɛkɛ ne na bɛhanle kɛ bɛkpondɛ ye bɛ nee ye adendɛ.
40012047	Yemɔti menli ne mɔ ko zele Gyisɛse kɛ, “Nea, ɛ nli nee ɛ mediema mrenya ne mɔ gyi alie nwo lɔ, na bɛkulo kɛ bɛ nee wɔ tendɛ.”
40012048	Gyisɛse buale kɛ, “Me nli a le nwane? Me mediema mrenya a le nwane mɔ?”
40012049	Akee ɔdendenle ɔ sa wɔ ye ɛdoavolɛma ne mɔ anwo na ɔhanle kɛ, “Bɛnlea, me nli nee me mediema ɛne.
40012050	Awie biala mɔɔ yɛ mɔɔ me Ze mɔɔ wɔ anwuma la kpondɛ la le me diema nrenya, me diema raalɛ, nee me nli.”
40013001	Kenle ko ne ala Gyisɛse vile sua nu ɛkɛ hɔle tandane ne anloa na ɔdɛnlanle aze kɛ ɔyɛ ngilehilelɛ.
40013002	Kɛmɔ menli mɔɔ yiale ɔ nwo ɛkɛ ne la zonle la ati ɔhɔdɛnlanle ɛlɛne nu, na menli ne gyinlanle tandane ne anloa diele ye.
40013003	Ɔvale mrɛlɛbulɛ ɔhanle edwɛkɛ dɔɔnwo ɔhilele bɛ. Ɔse, “Ɛyazonlɛnli bie hɔle kɛ ɔkagua ma.
40013004	Mɔɔ ɔgua ma ne la, bie guale adenle nu, na nloma rasusole.
40013005	Bie guale azɛlɛ mɔɔ awolɛ dɔɔnwo wɔ nu la azo, ɛleka mɔɔ ndɛtɛlɛ anzo la, na ma ne fifile ndɛndɛ, ɔluakɛ azɛlɛ ne ɛmpi.
40013006	Na mɔɔ ewia bɔle la, bɛyelale, ɔluakɛ bɛ ndinli ne mɔ andwu azɛlɛ bo kpalɛ.
40013007	Ma ne bie noko guale mbowule nu, na mbowule ne nyinle hedale bɛ nwo zo,
40013008	yɛɛ ma ne bie guale azɛlɛ kpalɛ zo, na bɛfifile bɛzole ma, bie mɔnwo ɛya, bie mɔnwo abulasia, yɛɛ bie mɔnwo abulasa.”
40013009	Gyisɛse dwulale ye edwɛkɛ ne zɛhae, “Mɔɔ lɛ ɛnzonlɛ la ɛdie!”
40013010	Nzinlii ɛdoavolɛma ne rale Gyisɛse anwo ɛkɛ ne rabizale ye kɛ, “Duzu ati a saa ɛtendɛ wɔahile menli ne mɔ a ɛbu ye mrɛlɛ nu ɛ?”
40013011	Gyisɛse buale kɛ, “Anwuma Belemgbunlililɛ ne anwo edwɛkɛ ne mɔɔ vea la, bɛmɛ yɛɛ bɛmaa bɛ nwolɛ adenle kɛ bɛde ɔ bo a, na ɔnle zɔhane ɔmmaa menli mɔɔ ɛha la.
40013012	Ɔluakɛ mɔɔ lɛ bie la bɛkɛmaa ye bie dɔɔnwo bɛkɛboka nwolɛ, na mɔɔ ɛnlɛ bie la bɛkɛlie ekyi ne bɔbɔ mɔɔ ɔlɛ la ɔ sa nu.
40013013	Metendɛ mekile menli ne mɔ wɔ mrɛlɛ nu, ɔboalekɛ bɛnea, noko bɛnnwu debie, bɛtie, noko bɛnde ɔ bo.
40013014	Yemɔti mɔɔ Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛ Ayezaya hanle la ɛmkpa bɛ nwo ɛlɛ kɛ: ‘Bɛbadie, noko bɛnrɛde ɔ bo; bɛbanlea, noko bɛnrɛnwu ɛhwee.
40013015	Ɔluakɛ menli ɛhye mɔ ɛsolo, bɛduodua bɛ nzo yɛɛ bɛmuomua bɛ nye. Saa tɛ ye zɔhane a, anrɛɛ bɛ nye kɛnwu debie, bɛ nzo kɛde edwɛkɛ, bɛ adwenle kɛde edwɛkɛ bo, na bɛkɛzia bɛkɛra bɛkɛmaa menwɔyɛ bɛ ayile.’
40013016	“Na bɛmɛ, bɛ ti ɛyɛ boɛ kpole! Bɛ nye nwu debie, yɛɛ bɛ nzo te edwɛkɛ.
40013017	Meka meahile bɛ: Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛma dɔɔnwo nee Nyamenle menli ne dɔɔnwo hulole kɛ anrɛɛ bɛkɛnwu ninyɛne mɔɔ bɛmɛ bɛnwu bɛ la, noko bɛannwu bɛ; anzɛɛ anrɛɛ bɛkɛde mɔɔ bɛmɛ bɛte la, noko bɛande.
40013018	“Akee bɛdie ma ɛlualɛ nwo ɛrɛlɛ ne abo.
40013019	Saa awie te Belemgbunlililɛ ne anwo edwɛkɛ na yeande ɔ bo a, ɔle kɛ ma ne mɔɔ guale adenle ne anu la. Amumuyɛnli ne ba na ɔbaye mɔɔ bɛlua ye wɔ ye adwenle nu la ɔkɔ.
40013020	Ma ne mɔɔ guale azɛlɛ ne mɔɔ awolɛ wɔ nu la azo la gyi ɛkɛ maa bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛte edwɛkɛ ne a ɛkɛ ne ala bɛfa fɛlɛkolilɛ bɛdie la.
40013021	Noko edwɛkɛ ne ɛnzɔ ndinli wɔ bɛ nu la ati, ɔngyinla ɔngyɛ. Saa ɔlua edwɛkɛ ne ati bɛyɛ bɛ kpɔdekpɔde anzɛɛ bɛnwu amaneɛ a, ɛnee ɛkɛ ne ala bɛkpo aze.
40013022	Ma ne mɔɔ guale mbowule nu la gyi ɛkɛ maa menli mɔɔ tie edwɛkɛ ne noko aleɛabo ɛbɛlabɔlɛ nwo adwenleadwenle nee anwonyia ɛhulolɛ nwo adwenle fo edwɛkɛ ne azo, na bɛnzo ma la.
40013023	Na ma ne mɔɔ guale azɛlɛ kpalɛ zo la a le bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛtie edwɛkɛ ne na bɛte ɔ bo la. Nɔhalɛ, ɛhye mɔ so ma: bie mɔnwo ɛya, bie mɔnwo abulasia yɛɛ bie mɔnwo abulasa.”
40013024	Gyisɛse eza bule bɛ ɛrɛlɛ bieko kɛ, “Anwuma Belemgbunlililɛ ne le kɛ nrenya bie mɔɔ luale ma kpalɛ wɔ ye ɛya nu la.
40013025	Nɔe ne mɔɔ ɛnee menli ɛdeda la, kpɔvolɛ raluale ndile wɔ ɛya ne anu na ɔhɔle.
40013026	Mɔɔ bɛfifile na bɛvieviale mralɛ la, ndile ne yele ɔ nwo.
40013027	Ɛya menle ne gyimayɛvoma ne mɔ ko zele ye kɛ, ‘Yɛmenle, ma kpalɛ a yɛluale bɛ wɔ ɛya ye anu a, na ndile ye noko vi nienwu?’
40013028	Na ɔbuale kɛ, ‘Kpɔvolɛ a ɛrayɛ ɛhye a.’ Ye sonvolɛma ne mɔ zele ye kɛ, ‘Ɛnee maa yɛhɔdudu bɛ yɛgua.’ Ɔbuale bɛ kɛ,
40013029	‘Kyɛkyɛ, ɔluakɛ saa bɛannea ye boɛ a, mɔɔ bɛlɛtudu ndile ne la, bɛbadudu ma kpalɛ ne noko.
40013030	Bɛgyakyi bɛ bɛmaa bɛbɔ nu bɛnyi ɔhɔdwu ɛbuhenle ne, na mebaze menli mɔɔ bu la kɛ: Bɛlumua bɛdudu ndile ne na bɛkyekye bɛ avile bɛyela bɛ, na bɛbu abɛlɛ ne bɛgua me bonwolo ne azo.’ ”
40013031	Gyisɛse bule bɛ ɛrɛlɛ bieko kɛ, “Anwuma Belemgbunlililɛ ne le kɛ ma ekyi bie mɔɔ nrenya bie luale wɔ ye ɛya nu la.
40013032	Mekɛ mɔɔ ɔdua la ɛnee ɔle ma nretee kpalɛ kpalɛ, noko ɔnyinle ɔyɛle baka kpole ɔdɛlale mbaka dɔɔnwo, na nloma rayɛle bɛ sane wɔ ye ngane ne mɔ anu.”
40013033	Gyisɛse bule ɛrɛlɛ bieko kɛ, “Anwuma Belemgbunlililɛ ne le kɛ mgbɔvonle mɔɔ raalɛ fa wula ɛdɔkɛ nu fɔtɔ la. Ɔmaa ɛdɔkɛ ne amuala tu.”
40013034	Gyisɛse hanle ɛhye mɔ amuala wɔ mrɛlɛ nu a hilele menli ne a. Na yeangoati mrɛlɛ nwo yeandendɛ yeangile bɛ ɛlɛ.
40013035	Ɔyɛle ye zɔhane amaa mɔɔ Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛ ne hanle la ayɛ nɔhalɛ kɛ, “Mebadendɛ meahile bɛ wɔ mrɛlɛ nu. Mebaha ninyɛne mɔɔ sumunli kɛ aleɛ ye bɔle ɔ bo la bɛtɛtele bie la anwo edwɛkɛ meahile bɛ.”
40013036	Gyisɛse gyakyile menli dɔɔnwo ne manle bɛhɔle sua nu. Ye ɛdoavolɛma ne rale ɔ nwo ɛkɛ ne razele ye kɛ, “Kile yɛ ɛya ne anu ndile ne ɛrɛlɛ ne abo.”
40013037	Gyisɛse buale bɛ kɛ, “Ma kpalɛ duavolɛ ne a le Sonla Ra ne;
40013038	ɛya ne a le ewiade; ma kpalɛ ne a le Belemgbunlililɛ ne amra; ndile ne a le Amumuyɛnli ne amra.
40013039	Kpɔvolɛ ne mɔɔ luale bɛ la a le Abɔnsam. Ɛbuhenle ne a le ewiade awieleɛ, yɛɛ menli mɔɔ bu bɛyɔba ne la a le Nyamenle soanvolɛma.
40013040	Kɛmɔ bɛdudule ndile ne na bɛyelale bɛ senle nu la, zɔhane ala yɛɛ ewiade awieleɛ bayɛ a.
40013041	Sonla Ra ne bamaa ye soanvolɛma araboɔboa bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛtwehwe menli bɛkɔ ɛtane nu nee bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛyɛ amumuyɛ la kɔsɔɔti anloa,
40013042	na bɛavuandi bɛ bɛagua sendɔlɔra ne anu, ɛkɛ ne yɛɛ menli bazu adedɛ bɛ nwo bonrane nu a.
40013043	Na Nyamenle menli ne bada kɛ sɛnzɛne wɔ bɛ Ze mɔɔ wɔ anwuma la Belemgbunlililɛ ne abo. Mɔɔ lɛ ɛnzonlɛ la ɛdie!
40013044	“Anwuma Belemgbunlililɛ ne le kɛ kpɔba bie mɔɔ vea azɛlɛ bie abo la. Saa awie kɔnwu ye a, ɔkeda zolɛ na ɔfa fɛlɛkolilɛ ɔkɔtɔne ɔ nwo ninyɛne kpokpoti na ɔfa ezukoa ne mɔɔ ɔkɛnyia ye la ɔbatɔ azɛlɛ ne.
40013045	“Bieko, Anwuma Belemgbunlililɛ ne le kɛ gualilɛnli mɔɔ ɛlɛkpondɛ ezukoa awolɛ mɔɔ sonle bolɛ la adɔ la.
40013046	Mekɛ mɔɔ ɔkɛnwu bie mɔɔ sonle bolɛ kpalɛ la, ɔkɔtɔne ɔ nwo ninyɛne kpokpoti na ɔfa ezukoa mɔɔ ɔkɛnyia ye la ɔbatɔ bolɛ ne.
40013047	“Anwuma Belemgbunlililɛ ne le kɛ avonle mɔɔ bɛdo ye wɔ tandane ne anu la. Ɔkye fɛlɛ ngakyile dɔɔnwo.
40013048	Saa avonle ne kye bie a menli ne twehwe ba aze, bɛkpa fɛlɛ mɔɔ bɛhye bɛ la anu, bɛgua kpalɛ ne wɔ bɛ bokiti ne anu, na bɛfuandi mɔɔ anwo ɛngyia bɛ la bɛgua.
40013049	Zɔhane ala yɛɛ ewiade awieleɛ bayɛ a; Nyamenle soanvolɛma barakpa amumuyɛma avi kpalɛma anu,
40013050	na bɛavuandi amumuyɛma ne bɛagua sendɔlɔra ne anu. Ɛkɛ ne yɛɛ menli bazu adedɛ bɛ nwo bonrane nu a.”
40013051	Gyisɛse bizale ye ɛdoavolɛma ne kɛ, “Asoo bɛte ɛhye mɔ amuala abo?” Bɛbuale kɛ, “Ɛhɛe.”
40013052	Na ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Zɔhane ati mɛla kilehilevolɛ biala mɔɔ bɛtete ye wɔ Anwuma Belemgbunlililɛ ne anwo la le kɛ awuke zo neavolɛ mɔɔ ye ninyɛne fofolɛ nee dɛba fi ye gya nu finde la.”
40013053	Mɔɔ Gyisɛse wiele mrɛlɛ ne mɔ bu la ɔvile ɛkɛ ne,
40013054	na ɔrale ɔdaye ye sua zo. Ɔhilehilele wɔ bɛ nyianu sua ne anu, na ɔzinle bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛdiele ye la anwo. Na bɛbizale kɛ, “Nienwu a nrenya ye zukoale ye nrɛlɛbɛ ɛhye nee nwanwane gyima ye ɛyɛlɛ a?
40013055	Tɛ kapentanli ne ara nrenya ne ɛ? Tɛ ɔ nli a le Mɛle, yɛɛ tɛ ɔ mediema mrenya a le Gyemise, Dwosefi, Saemɔn, yɛɛ Dwudase?
40013056	Tɛ ɔ mediema mraalɛ a yɛ nee bɛ wɔ ɛke la? Ɛnee nienwu a ɔzukoale ɛhye mɔ amuala a?”
40013057	Yemɔti bɛkpole ye. Gyisɛse zele bɛ kɛ, “Bɛdi Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛ biala eni wɔ ɛleka biala, kyesɛ ɔdaye ye sua zo nee ye abusua nu ala.”
40013058	Na yeanyɛ nwanwane gyima kpaziwɔkɛ biala wɔ ɛkɛ ne, ɔboalekɛ bɛanlie ye bɛanli.
40014001	Mekɛ ne anu ala Hɛlɔdo mɔɔ ɛnee le amɛnlado mɔɔ sie Galeli maanle ne la dele Gyisɛse nganeɛ,
40014002	na ɔzele ye sonvolɛma ne kɛ, “Dwɔn Sɔnevolɛ ne ala a ɛzia ɛra ngoane nu bieko la, yemɔti a ɔlɛdi tumi gyima mgbole ɛhye mɔ a.”
40014003	Na yemɔ a le kɛ, Hɛlɔdo manle bɛhyele Dwɔn, bɛguale ye nwɔnzɔnwɔnzɔ na bɛdole ye efiade. Ɔ diema Felepe aye Hɛlɔdease ati a ɔyɛle ɛhye a,
40014004	ɔluakɛ Dwɔn hanle hilele ye fane dɔɔnwo kɛ, “Ɔnle amaamuo kpalɛ kɛ ɛkɛgya Hɛlɔdease.”
40014005	Yemɔti Hɛlɔdo dwenlenle nwo kɛ ɔku Dwɔn, noko ɛnee ɔsulo Dwuuma ne, ɔluakɛ ɛnee bɛva Dwɔn kɛ ɔle Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛ.
40014006	Kenle ko Hɛlɔdo awolɛ kenle dwule na ɔdi ye ɛvoyia la, Hɛlɔdease ara raalɛ ne razile agole lieliele menli ne anye. Hɛlɔdo anye liele ye agolezilɛ ne anwo kpole,
40014007	na ɔhanle ndane ɔbɔle ye ɛwɔkɛ kɛ debie biala mɔɔ ɔkɛbiza la ɔkɛva ɔkɛmaa ye.
40014008	Kakula raalɛ ne hɔbizale ɔ nli Hɛlɔdease adwenle la, ɔzele ye kɛ ɔbiza ɔlie Dwɔn Sɔnevolɛ ne ati. Na kakula ne hɔhanle hilele Hɛlɔdo kɛ, “Medie Dwɔn Sɔnevolɛ ne ati wɔ apawa nu ɛke kɛkala.”
40014009	Nyane hanle belemgbunli ne, noko kɛmɔ yeha ndane wɔ ye nyɛvolɛ ne mɔ anyunlu la ati, ɔhanle kɛ bɛyɛ mɔɔ kakula raalɛ ne kpondɛ la bɛmaa ye.
40014010	Yemɔti Hɛlɔdo manle bɛhɔpɛle Dwɔn ati wɔ efiade ne.
40014011	Bɛvale tile ne bɛdole apawa nu bɛrɛlɛle kakula raalɛ ne, na ɔdaye noko ɔvale ɔhɔmanle ɔ nli.
40014012	Dwɔn ɛdoavolɛma ne raliele funli ne hɔziele ye, na bɛhɔbɔle Gyisɛse amaneɛ.
40014013	Mɔɔ Gyisɛse dele Dwɔn Sɔnevolɛ ne ewule amaneɛ la, ɔvole ɛlɛne nu ɔvile ɛkɛ ne, ɔ ngomekye ɔhɔle ɛleka bie mɔɔ ɛkɛ ne le sulokoko la. Menli ne dele la, bɛvi bɛ azua ne mɔ azo bɛvale aze bɛdoale ye.
40014014	Gyisɛse tolole rale azule ne anloa na ɔnwunle menli dɔɔnwo ne la, ɔlile bɛ nwo nyane na ɔyɛle wuleravolɛma mɔɔ wɔ nu la ayile ɔmanle bɛdele kpɔkɛ.
40014015	Ɔdwule nɔsolɛ nu la, ye ɛdoavolɛma ne rahanle hilele ye kɛ, “Aleɛ asɛɛ ɛdwo, yɛɛ ɛke noko ɛmbikye sua zo; yemɔti maa menli ne adenle maa bɛhɔ namunamu ne mɔ azo bɛhɔkpondɛ debie bɛli.”
40014016	Gyisɛse zele bɛ kɛ, “Ɔngyia kɛ bɛkɛhɔ; bɛdabɛ bɛmaa bɛ debie bɛli.”
40014017	Bɛbuale ye kɛ, “Yɛnlɛ debie biala wɔ ɛke kɛ kpanwo mumua nnu yɛɛ fɛlɛ nwiɔ ala.”
40014018	Gyisɛse zele bɛ kɛ, “Bɛva bɛrɛlɛ me.”
40014019	Akee ɔmanle menli ne mɔ dɛnlanle aze wɔ ndile ne azo, ɔvale kpanwo mumua nnu ne nee fɛlɛ nwiɔ ne; ɔnleanle anwuma na ɔyɛle Nyamenle mo. Ɔbubule nuhua na ɔvale ɔmanle ye ɛdoavolɛma ne, na ɛdoavolɛma ne vale manle menli ne.
40014020	Na bɛ muala bɛlile na bɛ ko yile. Nzinlii ɛdoavolɛma ne sesale ɔ bo zo ne ahɛndɛne bulu nee nwiɔ.
40014021	Na bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛlile la, saa ɛye mraalɛ nee ngakula ne mɔ nu a, bɛlua mrenya kɛyɛ apenle nnu.
40014022	Akee Gyisɛse manle ye ɛdoavolɛma ne vole ɛlɛne nu na bɛlumuale ɔ nyunlu wɔ tandane ne anzi lɔ, na yemɔ ɔnleanle ɔmanle menli ne zandele.
40014023	Mɔɔ menli ne hɔle la, ɔdaye ɔ ngome ɔhɔle boka ne azo kɛ ɔkazɛlɛ. Aleɛ muanle nwo la, ɛnee yeha ɔdaye ɔ ngome ala wɔ ɛkɛ ne;
40014024	zɛhae mekɛ ne anu ɛnee ɛlɛne ne ɛhɔ moa na azudulɛ ne bɔ ye mgbaka, ɔluakɛ ɛnee anwoma ne bɔ tia ye.
40014025	Mɔɔ ɔdwule akɔlɛmɔleɛ la, Gyisɛse diale azule ne anye na ɔrale bɛ nwo ɛkɛ ne.
40014026	Mɔɔ ɛdoavolɛma ne nwunle ye kɛ ɔlɛtia azule ne anye yeara la, ɛzulolɛ hanle bɛ na bɛdeɛdeanle nu bɛzele kɛ, “Nwomenle o, nwomenle o!”
40014027	Na ɛkɛ ne ala Gyisɛse zele bɛ kɛ, “Bɛmmasulo, bɛha bɛ ahonle bɛdo azule nu na medame ɔ.”
40014028	Pita hanle kɛ, “Awulae, saa ɛdawɔ amgba a, ɛnee maa adenle maa medame mendia azule ye anye membɛla ɛ nwo ɛkɛ.”
40014029	Gyisɛse zele ye kɛ, “Bɛla!” Yemɔti Pita vi ɛlɛne ne anu dwule na ɔbɔle ɔ bo kɛ ɔtia azule ne anye yeahɔ Gyisɛse anwo lɔ.
40014030	Na mɔɔ ɔnwunle kɛ anwoma ne anloa yɛ se la, ye ahonle dule, na ɔbɔle ɔ bo kɛ ɔnoma. Na ɔdeanle nu kɛ, “Awulae, die me!”
40014031	Ɛkɛ ne ala Gyisɛse denrɛle ɔ sa zɔle ye na ɔzele ye kɛ, “O nrenyakpa, wɔ diedi le ekyi! Duzu ati a ɛ ti anu yɛle wɔ kesee ɛ?”
40014032	Bɛ mu nwiɔ bɛvole ɛlɛne ne anu, na anwoma ne gyinlanle.
40014033	Na ɛdoavolɛma ne mɔɔ wɔ ɛlɛne ne anu la rayeyɛle Gyisɛse zele kɛ, “Nɔhalɛ, wɔmɔ a ɛle Nyamenle Ara ne!”
40014034	Gyisɛse nee ye ɛdoavolɛma ne pɛle tandane ne hɔle Gɛnɛzalɛte,
40014035	na menli mɔɔ wɔ ɛkɛ ne la nwunle ye. Yemɔti bɛmanle bɛhɔvale wuleravolɛma mɔɔ wɔ namunamu nee azua mɔɔ bikye ɛkɛ ne la azo la bɛrale na
40014036	bɛzɛlɛle Gyisɛse kɛ ɔmaa wuleravolɛma ne adenle ɔmaa bɛva bɛ sa bɛha ye tɛladeɛ ne anloa bɔbɔ ala. Na bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛvale bɛ sa bɛhanle ye tɛladeɛ ne la amuala dele kpɔkɛ.
40015001	Falasiima bie nee mɛla kilehilevolɛma mɔɔ vi Gyɛlusalɛm la rayiale Gyisɛse na bɛbizale ye kɛ,
40015002	“Duzu ati a wɔ ɛdoavolɛma ne ɛnli ngilehilelɛ ne mɔɔ yɛ nlenya mɔ ɛva ɛgyakyi yɛ la azo ɛ? Bɛnnrinzi bɛ sa anwo wɔ adenle kpalɛ zo na bɛali debie.”
40015003	Gyisɛse buale bɛ kɛ, “Na bɛdabɛ noko kɛmɔti a bɛnli Nyamenle mɛla ne azo na bɛdi bɛdabɛ bɛ ngilehilelɛ ne anzi ɛ?
40015004	Ɔluakɛ Nyamenle se, ‘Di ɛ ze nee ɛ nli eni’, na ‘awie biala mɔɔ kɛha edwɛkɛ ɛtane kɛhile ɔ ze anzɛɛ ɔ nli la, ɔwɔ kɛ bɛku ye.’
40015005	Noko bɛmɛ bɛse, ‘Saa awie lɛ debie mɔɔ ɔkola ɔfa ɔboa ɔ ze anzɛɛ ɔ nli a ɔyɛ boɛ, na ɔka kɛ: Mɔɔ ɛkɛnyia ye wɔ me ɛkɛ ne la, meva mebɔ azu memaa Nyamenle a,
40015006	ɛnee ɔngyia kɛ ɔkɛli ɔ ze eni.’ Zɔhane ati bɛva bɛ amaamuo zɛhae bɛdu Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne bɛgua.
40015007	Bɛmɛ nabalabama! Ayezaya nwunle ye bɔkɔɔ yɛɛ ɔhanle ye wɔ bɛ nwo a. Ɔse,
40015008	‘Nyamenle se: Menli ɛhye mɔ fa bɛ nloa babonle mgbane kanvo me, na bɛ ahonle ɛdeɛ, ɔmbikye me.
40015009	Bɛ ɛzonlenlɛ ne le mgbane, ɔluakɛ bɛkilehile mɔɔ menli ɛhyehyɛ la kɛ asɛɛ me mɛla ɔ!’ ”
40015010	Akee Gyisɛse vɛlɛle menli dɔɔnwo ne wɔ ɔ nwo ɛkɛ na ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Bɛdie ɛhye boɛ!
40015011	Tɛ mɔɔ kɔ sonla nloa nu la a gua ɔ nwo evinli a, na mɔɔ vi ɔ nloa nu finde la a gua ɔ nwo evinli a.”
40015012	Nzinlii, ɛdoavolɛma ne rale Gyisɛse anwo ɛkɛ rahanle hilele ye kɛ, “Asoo ɛze kɛ mɔɔ ɛhanle la manle Falasiima ne ati zile aze?”
40015013	Gyisɛse buale kɛ, “Baka biala mɔɔ tɛ Egya mɔɔ wɔ anwuma la a luale la bɛbadu ye bɛado aze.
40015014	Bɛgyakyi bɛ! Bɛle mgbanyinli anyenzinliravolɛma mɔɔ kile anyenzinliravolɛma adenle a; anyenzinliravolɛ kile anyenzinliravolɛ adenle a, bɛ mu nwiɔ bɛgua kuma nu!”
40015015	Na Pita hanle kɛ, “Kile yɛ ɛrɛlɛ ne abo.”
40015016	Gyisɛse zele bɛ kɛ, “Na ɛnɛ nee ɛnɛ bɛdabɛ noko bɛnlɛ ndelebɛbo kɛ menli ɛhendeɛ ne mɔ la ɔ?
40015017	Bɛnwu ye kɛ debie biala mɔɔ sonla kɛva kɛwula ɔ nloa anu la kɔ ɔ kunlu na ɔfa ye aze ɔse.
40015018	Na mɔɔ vi bɛ nloa nu finde la vi ahonle nu, na bɛmɛ yɛɛ bɛgua sonla nwo evinli a.
40015019	Ɔluakɛ ahonle nu yɛɛ adwenle ɛtane mɔɔ le kɛ sonla ɛhunlɛ, awuvolɛvalɛ, adwɔmanebɔlɛ, awule ɛyɛlɛ, daselɛ adalɛ ɛlilɛ, yɛɛ nwondomgbɔ ɛpɛlɛ vi ba a.
40015020	Ninyɛne ɛhye mɔ a gua sonla nwo evinli a, na bɛ sa anwo evinli mɔɔ bɛfa bɛali debie la ɛngua bɛ nwo evinli.”
40015021	Gyisɛse vile ɛkɛ ne na ɔhɔle azuamgbole Taya nee Saedɛn afoa nu nehane.
40015022	Raalɛ bie mɔɔ boka maanyɛlɛ fane ne mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye Keena la anwo, na ɔvi maanzinli ne anu la rale Gyisɛse anwo ɛkɛ rahanle hilele ye kɛ, “Yɛmenle, Devidi ara! Nwu me anwunvɔne! Sunsum ɛtane bie ɛlɛgyegye me ra raalɛ, na kɛkala ɔyɛ se kpalɛ kpalɛ.”
40015023	Na Gyisɛse andɛne ye zo. Na ye ɛdoavolɛma ne rale rabodole ye kɛ, “Nea raalɛ ye maa ɔhɔ na ɔdoa yɛ ɔlɛyɛ alɛra!”
40015024	Gyisɛse buale kɛ, “Bɛzoanle me wɔ mboane ne mɔɔ wɔ Yizilayɛ na bɛminli la angome anwo.”
40015025	Raalɛ ne radule dɔle Gyisɛse agyakɛ anu bodole ye kɛ, “Yɛmenle, mesɛlɛ wɔ, boa me!”
40015026	Gyisɛse buale ye kɛ, “Ɔnle kpalɛ kɛ bɛkɛva aleɛ mɔɔ bɛfa bɛamaa ngakula ne mɔ la bɛkɛmaa ahwea.”
40015027	Raalɛ ne zele ye kɛ, “Yɛmenle, ɔle zɔhane, noko akee ahwea ne mɔ bɔbɔ di mgbokpoloka ne mɔɔ vi bɛ menle ɛkponle ne azo gua aze la.”
40015028	Gyisɛse buale ye kɛ, “Ɛle raalɛ mɔɔ wɔ diedi le kpole kpalɛ a. Mɔɔ ɛkpondɛ la ɛyɛ ɛkɛ ɛmaa wɔ.” Na raalɛ ne ara raalɛ ne dele kpɔkɛ ɛkɛ ne ala.
40015029	Gyisɛse vile ɛkɛ, ɔsianenle Galeli Tandane ne, ɔhɔvole boka bie na ɔdɛnlanle aze.
40015030	Menli dɔɔnwo kpalɛ vale abuburama, anyenzinliravolɛma, mumule, yɛɛ bɛdabɛ mɔɔ ewule ngakyile ɛha bɛ la amuala raguale Gyisɛse agyakɛ anu, na ɔyɛle bɛ muala ayile.
40015031	Mɔɔ menli ne nwunle kɛ mumule ɛlɛtendɛ, abubura ɛlɛtia, mɔɔ ɛdwidwe la anwo ɛza, na anyenzinliravolɛ nwu debie la, ɔzinle bɛ nwo, na bɛyele Yizilayɛ Nyamenle ne ayɛlɛ.
40015032	Gyisɛse vɛlɛle ye ɛdoavolɛma ne na ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Menli ye anwo yɛ me alɔbɔlɛ, ɔluakɛ bɛ nee me ɛradɛnla ɛke kenle nsa, yɛɛ bɛtɛdile debie. Mengulo kɛ bɛfa bɛ ko mgbane bɛsia bɛkɔ, anrɛɛ bɛ nye zo kɛbulu bɛ wɔ adenle nu.”
40015033	Ye ɛdoavolɛma ne bizale ye kɛ, “Ɛnee nienwu a yɛkɛnyia aleɛ wɔ fienemgbole ye anu yɛkɛmaa menli ɛwolaa ɛhye kɛli, bɛ ko kɛyi a?”
40015034	Gyisɛse bizale bɛ kɛ, “Kpanwo nyɛ a bɛlɛ a?” Bɛbuale kɛ, “Kpanwo mumua nsuu yɛɛ fɛlɛ ekyi.”
40015035	Gyisɛse manle menli ne dɛnlanle aze.
40015036	Akee ɔvale kpanwo mumua nsuu ne nee fɛlɛ ne, ɔyɛle Nyamenle mo na ɔbubule nuhua ɔvale ɔmanle ɛdoavolɛma ne, na ɛdoavolɛma ne vale manle menli ne lile.
40015037	Bɛ muala bɛlile bɛ ko yile. Na ɛdoavolɛma ne sesale ɔ bo zo mgbokpoloka ne ahɛndɛne nsuu tetɛkɛɛ.
40015038	Menli mɔɔ lile la, saa ɛye mraalɛ nee ngakula mɔɔ wɔ nu la nu a, bɛle mrenya apenle nna.
40015039	Akee Gyisɛse gyakyile bɛ adenle na ɔvole ɛlɛne nu ɔhɔle Magadan maanzinli nu.
40016001	Falasiima nee Sadusiima bie rale Gyisɛse ɛkɛ radole ye agyiba kɛ ɔyɛ nwanwane sɛkɛlɛneɛ ɔmaa bɛnlea, ɔva ɔhile kɛ Nyamenle die mɔɔ ɔlɛyɛ la to nu.
40016002	Gyisɛse buale kɛ, “Saa sɛnzɛne ne ɛlɛkɔ ahɔdɔ a ɛnee bɛse, ‘Maanle nu bayɛ kɛnlɛma, ɔluakɛ anwomanyunlu le yɔɔnwo.’
40016003	Nwonlomɔ mangyee ne noko ɛnee bɛse, ‘Ezule badɔ, ɔluakɛ anwomanyunlu ɛbolo, ɛlu.’ Bɛkola bɛnea anwomanyunlu bɛka maanle nu edwɛkɛ, na bɛngola bɛngile sɛkɛlɛneɛ mɔɔ fane mekɛ ɛhye mɔ anwo la abo!
40016004	Adwuleso amra munzule mɔɔ ɛnze Nyamenle a! Bɛbiza me bɛanlea nwanwane sɛkɛlɛneɛ? Bɛnrɛnwu bie! Mɔɔ bɛkɛnwu ye la ala a le Dwona ɛdeɛ ne.” Na Gyisɛse vile bɛ nwo ɛkɛ ne hɔle.
40016005	Mɔɔ ɛdoavolɛma ne pɛle tandane ne hɔle ɔ nzi lɔ la, bɛhakyele kɛ bɛ rɛle vile na bɛanva kpanwo.
40016006	Gyisɛse zele bɛ kɛ, “Bɛnlea bɛ nwo boɛ wɔ Falasiima nee Sadusiima mgbɔvonle ne anwo.”
40016007	Ɛdoavolɛma ne bɔle ɔ bo kɛ bɛdwenledwenle nwolɛ kɛ, “Ɛnee kpanwo mɔɔ yɛanva yɛamba la ati a ɔlɛka ɛhye a?”
40016008	Gyisɛse nwunle mɔɔ bɛlɛkeha la na ɔbizale bɛ kɛ, “Duzu ati a bɛlɛsu bɛ nwo kpolera wɔ kpanwo mɔɔ bɛanva la anwo ɛ? Bɛ diedi le ekyi!
40016009	Ɛnɛ nee ɛnɛ bɛtɛnyianle ndelebɛbo ɔ? Bɛngakye mekɛ mɔɔ membubule kpanwo mumua nnu ne anu memanle mrenya apenle nnu ne la ɔ?
40016010	Na kpanwo mumua nsuu ne mɔɔ menvale memanle mrenya apenle nna ne la noko ɛ? Ahɛndɛne nyɛ a ɔ bo zo mgbokpoloka ne yɛle a?
40016011	Kɛmɔti a bɛnde ɔ bo kɛ tɛ kpanwo a melɛka nwolɛ edwɛkɛ meahile bɛ a? Bɛnlea bɛ nwo boɛ wɔ Falasiima nee Sadusiima mgbɔvonle ne anwo!”
40016012	Akee ɛdoavolɛma ne dele ɔ bo kɛ tɛ mgbɔvonle mɔɔ bɛfa bɛwula ɛdɔkɛ nu la a ɔlɛka nwolɛ edwɛkɛ a, na ɔlɛka Falasiima nee Sadusiima ngilehilelɛ ɛtane ne anwo edwɛkɛ.
40016013	Gyisɛse hɔle Felepe Sizalia afoa nu la, ɔbizale ye ɛdoavolɛma ne kɛ, “Menli se medame Sonla Ra ne a le nwane?”
40016014	Bɛbuale ye kɛ, “Bie mɔ se Dwɔn Sɔnevolɛ ne ɔ, bie mɔ se Yilaegya ɔ, yɛɛ bie mɔ noko se Gyɛlɛmaya anzɛɛ Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛma ne mɔ ko ɔ.”
40016015	Gyisɛse bizale bɛ kɛ, “Na bɛdabɛ noko kɛ bɛse ɛ?”
40016016	Saemɔn Pita buale kɛ, “Wɔmɔ a ɛle Kelaese ne, mɔɔ le tease Nyamenle ne Ara ne.”
40016017	Gyisɛse buale ye kɛ, “Dwɔn ara Saemɔn, nyilalɛ ɛha wɔ. Ɔluakɛ tɛ sonla yɛɛ ɛye nɔhalɛ ɛhye ɛhile wɔ a, na Egya mɔɔ wɔ anwuma la ɔ.
40016018	Yemɔti meka meahile wɔ, Pita, ɛle bodane, kɛmɔ wɔ duma ne abo kile la; wɔ bodane ɛhye azo yɛɛ mebazi me asɔne ne a, na ewule tumi bɔbɔ ɛnrɛhola ɔ nwo zo fo.
40016019	Mebava Anwuma Belemgbunlililɛ ne azanvɛ ne meawula ɛ sa nu; mɔɔ ɛkɛkyekye ye wɔ aze ɛke la, bɛkɛkyekye ye wɔ anwuma lɔ, mɔɔ ɛkɛtulu ye wɔ aze ɛke noko la, bɛkɛtulu ye wɔ anwuma lɔ.”
40016020	Akee Gyisɛse bɔle ye ɛdoavolɛma ne mɔ anloa kɛ bɛmmaka bɛkile awie biala kɛ yemɔ a ɔle Kelaese ne.
40016021	Ɔvi mekɛ ne anu Gyisɛse bɔle ɔ bo kɛ ɔka ye wienyi yeahile ye ɛdoavolɛma ne kɛ, “Ɔwɔ kɛ mekɔ Gyɛlusalɛm mekɔnwu amaneɛ dɔɔnwo wɔ mgbanyima ne, sɛlɛvolɛ mgbanyinli ne, yɛɛ mɛla kilehilevolɛma ne mɔ asa anu. Bɛbahu me, na ye kenle nsa ne azo Nyamenle badwazo me ara ngoane nu bieko.”
40016022	Pita vale Gyisɛse hɔle ahane na ɔbɔle ɔ bo kɛ ɔtwi ɔ nyunlu. Ɔse, “Awulae, kosoɛ! Nyamenle ɛkpa ɛgua! Ɛhye ɛnrɛzi ɛ nwo zo ɛlɛ!”
40016023	Gyisɛse hakyile ɔ nye na ɔzele Pita kɛ, “Seetan, se di me nzi nehae! Ɛndu folɛ kpalɛ. Wɔ adwenle ne le sonla adwenle. Ɔnvi Nyamenle ɛkɛ.”
40016024	Akee Gyisɛse zele ye ɛdoavolɛma ne kɛ, “Saa awie biala kpondɛ kɛ ɔ nee me dua a, ɛnee ɔkpo ɔ nwo, ɔva ye (amaneɛnwunlɛ) meanubaka ne ɔdo ɔ kɔme zo na ɔdoa me.
40016025	Ɔluakɛ awie biala mɔɔ kɛpele ye ngoane nwo la kɛminli ye, na mɔɔ kɛminli ye ngoane wɔ me ti la kɛlie ye ɛkɛla ngoane.
40016026	Saa sonla nyia ewiade ninyɛne ne amuala na ɔminli ye ɛkɛla a, duzu nvasoɛ a ɔnyia a? Ɔnnyia ɛhwee! Debie biala ɛnle ɛkɛ mɔɔ sonla kɛhola kɛva kɛzenza ye ngoane a.
40016027	Ɔluakɛ ɔnrɛhyɛ biala na medame Sonla Ra me nee me anwuma soanvolɛma yɛara, wɔ Egya anyunlunyia nu, na yɛaradua awie biala kakɛ kɛmɔ ye gyima de la.
40016028	Bɛhakye ɛhye, menli bie gyigyi bɛ avinli ɛke mɔɔ bɛnrɛwu na bɛanwu Sonla Ra ne kɛ yera kɛ Belemgbunli la.”
40017001	Kenle nsia pɛle nu la Gyisɛse vale Pita, Gyemise, yɛɛ ɔ diema Dwɔn hɔle boka kpole bie azo, bɛ ngome ala a bɛwɔ ɛkɛ a.
40017002	Na Gyisɛse hakyile wɔ bɛ nye zo; ɔ nyunlu dale kɛ sɛnzɛne na ye tɛladeɛ ne yɛle fufule nwohyee na ɔdale kɛ neanleɛ.
40017003	Na bɛnwunle Mosisi nee Yilaegya kɛ bɛ nee Gyisɛse ɛlɛtendɛ.
40017004	Yemɔti Pita hanle hilele Gyisɛse kɛ, “Awulae, ɔle kpalɛ kɛ yɛwɔ ɛke a; saa ɛkulo a mebabɔ nzeseɛ nsa wɔ ɛke; wɔ ɛdeɛ ko, Mosisi ɛdeɛ ko, yɛɛ Yilaegya ɛdeɛ ko.”
40017005	Mɔɔ ɔ nloa wɔ zo ɔlɛtendɛ la, amungu nwohyee bie rahedale bɛ nwo zo, na ɛnelɛ bie vi amungu ne anu zele kɛ, “Me Ra mɔɔ mekulo ye na me nye die ɔ nwo kpalɛ la ɛne, bɛdie ye!”
40017006	Mɔɔ ɛdoavolɛma ne dele ɛnelɛ ɛhye la, ɛzulolɛ kpole hanle bɛ na bɛdule bɛguale, bɛbutubutule bɛ nye aze.
40017007	Gyisɛse rale bɛ nwo ɛkɛ ne na ɔvale ɔ sa ɔhanle bɛ, na ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Bɛdwazo, bɛmmasulo!”
40017008	Bɛmanle bɛ ti zo la, bɛannwu awie biala kɛ Gyisɛse angomekye ala.
40017009	Mɔɔ bɛvi boka ne azo bɛlɛtolo bɛara la, Gyisɛse bɔle bɛ nloa kɛ, “Bɛmmaka mɔɔ bɛnwu ye la anwo bie bɛkile awie biala kɔkpula mekɛ mɔɔ bɛkɛdwazo Sonla Ra ne bɛkɛvi ewule nu la.”
40017010	Na ɛdoavolɛma ne bizale Gyisɛse kɛ, “Duzu ati a mɛla kilehilevolɛma ne se ɔwɔ kɛ Yilaegya dumua ba ɛ?”
40017011	Gyisɛse buale kɛ, “Ɔle zɔhane kɛ Yilaegya a balumua ara a, na yearatoto debie biala boɛ.
40017012	Noko meka meahile bɛ kɛ, Yilaegya ɛra dɛbadɛba, noko menli annwu ye, bɛyɛle ye kɛmɔ bɛdabɛ bɛkulo la. Zɔhane ala noko yɛɛ bɛbayɛ medame, Sonla Ra a.”
40017013	Na ɛdoavolɛma ne dele ɔ bo kɛ Dwɔn Sɔnevolɛ ne a ɔlɛka ɔ nwo edwɛkɛ yeahile bɛ la.
40017014	Mɔɔ bɛziale bɛrale menli dɔɔnwo ne anu la, nrenya bie rahotole Gyisɛse anyunlu ɛkɛ ne
40017015	na ɔzɛlɛle ye kɛ, “Yɛmenle, nwu me ra nrenya ye anwunvɔne! Mgbutike wɔ ɔ nwo, na saa ɔto ye a ɔpɛ ye ɔto senle anzɛɛ nzule nu.
40017016	Menvale ye membɛlɛle wɔ ɛdoavolɛma ye, na bɛangola ye ayile yɛ.”
40017017	Gyisɛse buale kɛ, “Bɛmɛ mɔɔ bɛnlɛ diedi na bɛfo a! Me nee bɛ ɛdɛnla, menyia bɛ nwo abotane ɔhɔdwu kenlenzu? Fa kakula nrenya ne bɛla ɛke.”
40017018	Gyisɛse deanle sunsum ɛtane ne mɔɔ wɔ kakula ne anwo la nu, na ɔvi ɔ nwo ɔdule, na kakula ne dele kpɔkɛ ɛkɛ ne ala.
40017019	Nzinlii ɛdoavolɛma ne rale Gyisɛse anwo ɛkɛ na bɛbizale ye kɛ, “Duzu ati a yɛangola sunsum ɛtane ne tu a?”
40017020	Gyisɛse buale bɛ kɛ, “Ɔluakɛ bɛ diedi le ekyi la ati ɔ. Nɔhalɛ, meka meahile bɛ kɛ, saa bɛ diedi ne kpole le kɛ ‘mɛsetade’ ma kunlu ma ekyi bie bɔbɔ a, anrɛɛ bɛbahola bɛaze boka ɛhye kɛ, ‘Tudu kɔ nehane!’ na ɔkɛhɔ; eza debie biala ɛyɛlɛ ɛnrɛyɛ se ɛnrɛmaa bɛ. [
40017021	Noko akee kyesɛ nzɛlɛlɛ nee ɛhɔnehyelɛ ala na ahola deɛ ɛhye tu.”]
40017022	Mɔɔ ɛdoavolɛma ne amuala anloa yiale Galeli la, Gyisɛse zele bɛ kɛ, “Bɛbaye medame Sonla Ra bɛamaa menli
40017023	bɛamaa bɛahu me; na ye kenle nsa ne azo Nyamenle badwazo me ara ngoane nu.” Na alɔbɔlɛ hanle ɛdoavolɛma ne.
40017024	Mɔɔ Gyisɛse nee ye ɛdoavolɛma ne rale Kapɛnayɛm la, menli mɔɔ dielie Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne adwule ne la rabizale Pita kɛ, “Asoo wɔ kilehilevolɛ ne tua Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua adwule ne?”
40017025	Pita buale kɛ, “Kɛmɔti ɛ, ɔtua!” Na mɔɔ Pita dwule sua nu la Gyisɛse a lumuale dendɛle a, na ɔbizale ye kɛ, “Saemɔn, kɛ wɔ adwenle se wɔ ɛ? Nwane mɔ a tua adwule anzɛɛ tua ninyɛne nwo adwule maa aleɛabo arelemgbunli a, ezuavolɛ anzɛɛ nyɛvolɛ?”
40017026	Pita buale kɛ, “Nyɛvolɛ ɔ.” Gyisɛse zele kɛ, “Saa nyɛvolɛ a tua a, se ɛnee ɔkile kɛ ezuavolɛ ne ɛndua bie.
40017027	Na amaa yɛanvo menli ɛhye mɔ la, kɔ tandane ne anu kɔdo koba, na fɛlɛ mɔɔ ɛkɛlumua ɛkɛhye ye la ɛkɛnwu kɛ ezukoa zia ɔ nloa anu mɔɔ sa me nee wɔ adwule ne tua a; fa kɔdua me nee wɔ yɛ ɛdeɛ ne.”
40018001	Mekɛ ne anu ɛdoavolɛma ne rale Gyisɛse ɛkɛ rabizale ye kɛ, “Nwane a le kpole kpalɛ wɔ Anwuma Belemgbunlililɛ nu a?”
40018002	Gyisɛse vɛlɛle kakula ko na ɔmanle ɔragyinlanle bɛ nyunlu ɛkɛ ne,
40018003	na ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Bɛhakye ɛhye! Kyesɛ bɛkakyi bɛ nyɛleɛ na bɛyɛ kɛ ngakula la, anrɛɛ bɛnrɛnwu Anwuma Belemgbunlililɛ ne ɛlɛ.
40018004	Mɔɔ le kpole kpalɛ wɔ Anwuma Belemgbunlililɛ nu la a le sonla ne mɔɔ bɛlɛ ɔ nwo aze na ɔyɛ kɛ kakula ɛhye la.
40018005	Awie biala mɔɔ kɛlie kakula zɛhae ko wɔ me duma nu la, ɛlie medame noko.
40018006	“Awie ko biala mɔɔ kɛmaa ngakula ɛhye mɔ anu ko kɛgyakyi ye diedi mɔɔ ɔlɛ ye wɔ me nu la anu na ɔkɛkpo aze la, ɛnee noko ɔle kpalɛ kɛ anrɛɛ bɛdwele ɛdibolɛ ɛlomboɛ kpalɛ bɛhendanle ɔ kɔme na bɛhɔdole ye nyevile kɔme zo lɔ.
40018007	Munzule ɛha aleɛabo amra kɛ ninyɛne mɔɔ maa sonla diedi kakyi la dɔɔnwo wɔ ewiade ye anu a! Kɛ ɔkɛyɛ biala la, zɛhae ngyegyelɛ ne mɔ bara, noko sonla ne mɔɔ ɔkɛlua ɔ nwo zo ɔkɛra la, ye gyakɔ!
40018008	“Saa ɛ sa anzɛɛ ɛ gyakɛ gyegye wɔ yeamaa wɔaminli wɔ diedi a, pɛ ye to! Ɔle kpalɛ kɛ ɛ sa anzɛɛ ɛ gyakɛ kɛyɛ sinli na ɛkɛnyia ngoane mɔɔ ɛnlɛ awieleɛ tɛla kɛ ɛ sa nwiɔ anzɛɛ ɛ gyakɛ nwiɔ na bɛkɛhɔdo wɔ senle ne mɔɔ ɛnnu ɛlɛ la anu a.
40018009	Saa ɛ nye ko a gyegye wɔ yeamaa wɔaminli wɔ diedi a, tu ye to! Ɔle kpalɛ kɛ ɛ nye ko na ɛkɛnyia ngoane mɔɔ ɛnlɛ awieleɛ tɛla kɛ ɛ nye nwiɔ na bɛkɛhɔdo wɔ senle ne mɔɔ ɛnnu ɛlɛ la anu a.
40018010	“Bɛnlea na bɛambu ngakula ɛhye mɔ anu biala, kɛ ɔle mgbane, ɔluakɛ anwuma lɔ, bɛ soanvolɛma nwu Egya mɔɔ wɔ anwuma la anyunlu dahuu. [
40018011	“Ɔluakɛ medame Sonla Ra, membale kɛ mebalie bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛminli la ngoane.]
40018012	“Na duzu a bɛdwenle kɛ awie mɔɔ lɛ mboane ɛya ko na nuhua ko kɛminli la kɛyɛ a? Ɔgyakyi abulahɔnla nee ngɔnla ne wɔ bɛ adidileka ne na ɔkɔkpondɛ ko ne mɔɔ ɛminli la.
40018013	Mese, saa ɔnwu ye a, ɔdi fɛlɛko kpole wɔ nwo ɔtɛla abulahɔnla nee ngɔnla ne mɔɔ bɛamminli la.
40018014	“Zɔhane ala noko yɛɛ bɛ Ze mɔɔ wɔ anwuma la ɛmkpondɛ kɛ ngakula ɛhye mɔ anu ko minli a.
40018015	“Saa ɛ diema bie fo wɔ a, kɔ na ɛ nee ye bɛ mu nwiɔ bɛhɔha na kile ye deɛ mɔɔ yemɔti yevo la. Saa ɔtie wɔ edwɛkɛ a ɛnee ɛ sa ɛha ɛ diema ne.
40018016	Saa yeamkponle a, fa sonla ko anzɛɛ menli nwiɔ boka ɛ nwo, amaa saa edwɛkɛ bie a menli nwiɔ ne anzɛɛ nsa ne ali wɔ daselɛ, kɛmɔ Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne se la.
40018017	Saa yeandie bɛ edwɛkɛ a, ka kile asɔnema amuala. Eza saa ɔnrɛdie asɔnema amuala noko edwɛkɛ a, ɛnee fa ye kɛ ɔnze Nyamenle anzɛɛ ɔle kɛ adwuledievolɛ la.
40018018	“Nɔhalɛ, meka meahile bɛ: Debie biala mɔɔ bɛkɛkyekye ye wɔ azɛlɛ ye azo la bɛkɛkyekye ye wɔ anwuma lɔ, yɛɛ debie biala mɔɔ bɛkɛtulu ye wɔ azɛlɛ ye azo la bɛkɛtulu ye wɔ anwuma lɔ.
40018019	“Eza meka meahile bɛ: Saa bɛ nuhua nwiɔ yɛ ko wɔ azɛlɛ ye azo na bɛbɔ nu bɛsɛlɛ debie ko anwo a, Egya mɔɔ wɔ anwuma la kɛyɛ kɛmaa bɛ.
40018020	Ɔluakɛ ɛleka biala mɔɔ menli nwiɔ anzɛɛ nsa kɛyia nu wɔ me duma nu la, ɛnee mewɔ bɛ avinli ɛkɛ ne bie.”
40018021	Akee Pita hɔle Gyisɛse anwo ɛkɛ hɔbizale ye kɛ, “Awulae, fane nyɛ yɛɛ me diema fo me a menva mengyɛ ye a? Fane nsuu, anzɛɛ...?”
40018022	Gyisɛse buale ye kɛ, “Kyɛkyɛ, tɛ fane nsuu, na abulasuu fane nsuu.
40018023	Zɔhane ati bɛbava Anwuma Belemgbunlililɛ ne bɛado belemgbunli bie mɔɔ yɛle kɛ ɔ nee ye sonvolɛma bu mgbonda la anwo.
