40018024	Mekɛ mɔɔ bɛhɔle mgbondabulɛ ne azo la, bɛvale ko mɔɔ tua ye kakɛ nzunza apenle nsa la bɛrale.
40018025	Sonvolɛ ɛhye ɛnlɛ bie, yemɔti yeannyia bie yeandua kakɛ ne bie. Na ɔ menle ne zele kɛ bɛhɔdɔne ɔdaye sonvolɛ mumua ne nee ɔ ye nee ɔ mra kɛ ahanra, na bɛdɔne ye ninyɛne mɔɔ ɔlɛ la kɔsɔɔti bɛdua ye kakɛ ne.
40018026	Sonvolɛ ne dule dɔle ɔ menle ne agyakɛ anu na ɔzɛlɛle ye kɛ, ‘Yɛmenle, nyia me nwo abotane na mebadua wɔ ezukoa ne amuala!’
40018027	Alɔbɔlɛ hanle belemgbunli ne na ɔgyakyile ye ɔmanle ɔhɔle, ɔvale ye kakɛ ne amuala ɔhyɛle ye.
40018028	“Sonvolɛ ne vindele la, ɔnwunle ɔ gɔnwo sonvolɛ ko noko mɔɔ tua ye kakɛ etaku nna nna ɛya ko la. Ɔhɔzɔle ɔ kɔmenzia na ɔzele ye kɛ, ‘Tua me ezukoa ne maa me!’
40018029	Ɔ gɔnwo sonvolɛ ne ɔdaye ɔdule ɔdɔle ɔ gyakɛ anu ɛkɛ ne na ɔzɛlɛle ye kɛ, ‘Ayi, nyia me nwo abotane na mebadua ɔ muala meamaa wɔ!’
40018030	Noko yeamkponle; ɔhyele ye ɔhɔdole efiade kɔkpula kɛ ɔkɛdua kakɛ ne amuala la.
40018031	Mɔɔ ɔ gɔnwo sonvolɛma ne mɔ nwunle mɔɔ yeyɛ la nyane hanle bɛ, na bɛrale bɛrahanle edwɛkɛ mɔɔ zile la bɛhilele belemgbunli ne.
40018032	Belemgbunli ne vɛlɛle ye na ɔzele ye kɛ, ‘Ɛdawɔ akɛlɛ ɛhye, ɛ ti mɔɔ zo wɔ la yɛ se kpalɛ! Ɛbodole me la, mame menvale wɔ kakɛ ne amuala mengyɛle wɔ.
40018033	Anrɛɛ ɛnee ɔwɔ kɛ ɛdawɔ noko ɛnwu ɛ gɔnwo sonvolɛ ne anwunvɔne, kɛmɔ menzele wɔ anwunvɔne la.’
40018034	Belemgbunli ne vale ɛya kpole na ɔmanle bɛhɔdole ye efiade kɛ bɛdea ye kɔkpula mekɛ mɔɔ ɔkɛdua ye kakɛ ne amuala la.”
40018035	Na Gyisɛse dwulale ye edwɛkɛ ne kɛ, “Zɔhane ala yɛɛ saa bɛdabɛ noko bɛanyeye bɛ ahonle nu bɛanva bɛ gɔnwo mɔ anwo edwɛkɛ bɛangyɛ bɛ a Egya mɔɔ wɔ anwuma la bayɛ bɛ nuhua ko biala a.”
40019001	Gyisɛse wiele ɛhye mɔ ka la, ɔvile Galeli na ɔhɔle Dwudiya maanzinli nu wɔ Azule Dwɔdan anzi nehane.
40019002	Menli dɔɔnwo doale ye wɔ ɛkɛ ne, na ɔyɛle bɛ ayile.
40019003	Falasiima bie rale Gyisɛse anwo ɛkɛ radole ye agyiba bizale ye kɛ, “Asoo yɛ mɛla ne maa adenle kɛ nrenya kola bɔ ɔ ye ewole wɔ edwɛkɛ biala anwo?”
40019004	Gyisɛse buale kɛ, “Bɛtɛkengale Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne mɔɔ se: Mɔlebɛbo ne Nyamenle bɔle bɛ nrenya nee raalɛ
40019005	na ɔhanle kɛ, ‘Ɛhye ati nrenya bagyakyi ɔ ze nee ɔ nli na ɔ nee ɔ ye bɛabɔ nu, na bɛ mu nwiɔ bɛayɛ sonla ko’ la ɔ?
40019006	Yemɔti ɛnee bɛnle nwiɔ bieko na bɛle ko. Zɔhane ati mɔɔ Nyamenle ɛha ɛbɔ nu la, ɔnle kɛ awie biala kpakye nu.”
40019007	Falasiima ne bizale ye kɛ, “Ɛnee duzu ati a Mosisi lile mɛla kɛ nrenya mɔɔ bɔ ɔ ye ewole la ɔwɔ kɛ maa ye ewolebɔlɛ kɛlata na ɔye ye ali ɛ?”
40019008	Gyisɛse buale kɛ, “Mosisi manle bɛ adenle kɛ bɛbɔ bɛ ye mɔ ewole ɔboalekɛ bɛ nzo yɛ se. Mɔlebɛbo ne amuala ɛnee ɔnle zɔ.
40019009	“Zɔhane ati meka meahile bɛ: Nrenya biala mɔɔ kɛbɔ ɔ ye ewole, kɛgya raalɛ fofolɛ la ɛdo awuvolɛvalɛ mɛla ne, kyesɛ raalɛ ne anli nɔhalɛ ammaa ye.”
40019010	Ye ɛdoavolɛma ne zele ye kɛ, “Saa kɛ ɔde wɔ nrenya nee ɔ ye avinli la ɛdeɛ a, ɛnee noko ɔngyia kɛ nrenya kɛgya raalɛ.”
40019011	Gyisɛse buale kɛ, “Tɛ menli kɔsɔɔti a kɛlie ngilehilelɛ ɛhye kɛdo nu a, ɔwɔ ɛkɛ ɔmaa bɛdabɛ mɔɔ Nyamenle ɛhyehyɛ ɛmaa bɛ la.
40019012	Ɔluakɛ ndenle dɔɔnwo wɔ ɛkɛ ne mɔɔ ɔlua zo mrenya dɔɔnwo ɛnrɛgya mraalɛ a: bie mɔ wɔ ɛkɛ a, bɛvale bɛwole bɛ; bie mɔ, ɔlua menli nwo zo yɛɛ ɔrale ye zɔhane a, yɛɛ bie mɔ noko, Anwuma Belemgbunlililɛ ne ati bɛ nye ɛnlie agyalɛ nwo. Bɛmaa mɔɔ kɛhola ye yɛ la ɛlie ngilehilelɛ ɛhye ɛdo nu.”
40019013	Menli bie vale ngakula rɛlɛle Gyisɛse kɛ ɔva ɔ sa ɔgua bɛ nwo zo na ɔzɛlɛ ɔmaa bɛ, na ɛdoavolɛma ne vale ɛya hwile bɛ nyunlu.
40019014	Na Gyisɛse zele ɛdoavolɛma ne kɛ, “Bɛmmasi ngakula ne mɔ aze, bɛmaa bɛ adenle bɛmaa bɛrɛla me nwo, na Anwuma Belemgbunlililɛ ne le bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛle kɛ ɛhye mɔ zɛhae la ɛdeɛ.”
40019015	Gyisɛse vale ɔ sa guale bɛ nwo zo na ɔhɔle.
40019016	Kpavolɛ bie rale Gyisɛse ɛkɛ rabizale ye kɛ, “Kilehilevolɛ, duzu debie kpalɛ a ɔwɔ kɛ meyɛ na meanyia ngoane mɔɔ ɛnlɛ awieleɛ la ɛ?”
40019017	Gyisɛse buale ye kɛ, “Duzu ati a ɛlɛbiza me edwɛkɛ mɔɔ fane debie kpalɛ nwo la ɛ? Sonla kokye ala a le kpalɛ a. Saa ɛkpondɛ ngoane a ɛnee di mɛla ne mɔ azo.”
40019018	Kpavolɛ ne bizale ye kɛ, “Duzu mɛla zɛhae?” Gyisɛse buale ye kɛ, “Mmaku sonla; mmayɛ awuvolɛvalɛ ɛtane ne; mmawua; mmabɔ adalɛ;
40019019	di ɛ ze nee ɛ nli eni, na kulo ɛ gɔnwo kɛ ɛdawɔ ɛ nwo la.”
40019020	Kpavolɛ ne buale kɛ, “Meli mɛla ɛhye mɔ amuala azo, na duzu bieko a ɔwɔ kɛ meyɛ a?”
40019021	Gyisɛse buale ye kɛ, “Saa ɛkpondɛ kɛ ɛdi munli a, ɛnee kɔ na kɔdɔne ninyɛne mɔɔ ɛlɛ la amuala na fa ezukoa ne maa ehyianvolɛma, na ɛkɛnyia anwonyia wɔ anwuma; na akee bɛla bali me nzi.”
40019022	Mɔɔ kpavolɛ ne dele ɛhye la alɔbɔlɛ hunle ye na ɔhɔle, ɔboalekɛ yenyia ɔ nwo kpalɛ.
40019023	Na Gyisɛse zele ye ɛdoavolɛma ne kɛ, “Meka meahile bɛ: Ɔbayɛ se yeamaa sukoavolɛ kɛ ɔkɛnyia Anwuma Belemgbunlililɛ ne.
40019024	Meka meazi zolɛ bieko, ɔnyɛ se ɔmmaa afunlumu kɛ ɔkɛwolo agbuyia nye nu tɛla kɛ sukoavolɛ kɛnyia Nyamenle Belemgbunlililɛ ne a.”
40019025	Mɔɔ ɛdoavolɛma ne dele ɛhye la, ɔzinle bɛ nwo kpole, na bɛbizale ye kɛ, “Ɛnee akee nwane a kɛnyia ngoane a?”
40019026	Gyisɛse nleanle bɛ koonwu na ɔbuale bɛ kɛ, “Ɛhye yɛ se maa sonla, noko Nyamenle ɛdeɛ, debie biala ɛnyɛ se ɛmmaa ye.”
40019027	Pita hanle kɛ, “Nea o, kɛ yɛgyakyi debie biala yɛɛ yɛdoa wɔ ɛ. Duzu a yɛbanyia a?”
40019028	Gyisɛse zele bɛ kɛ, “Meka meahile bɛ, saa medame Sonla Ra, metɛnla me anyunlunyia belemgbunli ebia ne anu wɔ Ewiade fofolɛ ne anu a, bɛdabɛ bulu nee nwiɔ ye mɔɔ bɛle me ɛdoavolɛma la, bɛkɛdɛnlɛdɛnla arelemgbunli mbia zo na bɛkɛbua Yizilayɛ mbusua bulu nee nwiɔ ne ndɛne.
40019029	Awie biala mɔɔ ɛgyakyi ye azua, ɔ mediema mrenya nee mraalɛ, ɔ mra, ɔ ze, ɔ nli anzɛɛ ye egyinli wɔ me ti la, banyia ye mɔnwo mɔnwo na yeanyia ngoane mɔɔ ɛnlɛ awieleɛ.
40019030	Noko akee bɛdabɛ dɔɔnwo mɔɔ kɛkala bɛlumua la bali amozi na bɛdabɛ dɔɔnwo mɔɔ kɛkala bɛli amozi la araze alumua.”
40020001	Gyisɛse vale zɔle zolɛ kɛ, “Kɛ Anwuma Belemgbunlililɛ ne de la a le ɛhye: Kenle ko nwonlomɔ nrenya bie vindele kɛ ɔkabɔ menli ɛkpa yeamaa bɛahɔyɛ gyima wɔ ye vanye egyinli nu.
40020002	Ɔ nee bɛ lile ɔ nloa kɛ kenle ko ɔkɛdua bɛ etaku nna, na ɔmanle bɛhɔle ye egyinli ne anu.
40020003	Ɔvindele bieko kɛyɛ dɔne ngɔnla mekɛ ne anu na ɔhɔnwunle kɛ awie mɔ gyigyi ye mgbovonle nu wɔ gua ne anu.
40020004	Na ɔzele bɛ kɛ, ‘Bɛdabɛ noko bɛhɔ me vanye egyinli ne anu bɛhɔyɛ gyima na menwɔdua bɛ kakɛ mɔɔ fɛta la.’
40020005	Na bɛhɔle. Eza bɛbɔle dɔne bulu nee nwiɔ nee dɔne nsa la ɔvindele na ɔhɔyɛle zɔhane ala.
40020006	Mɔɔ ɔka ekyii bɛbɔ dɔne nnu la ɔvindele bieko ɔhɔle gua ne azo na ɔnwunle awie mɔ kɛ bɛgyigyi ɛkɛ ne. Ɔbizale bɛ kɛ, ‘Duzu ati a aleɛ bedevinli ye mɔɔ ɛhye la bɛgyigyi ye mgbovonle nu zɛhae ɛ?’
40020007	Bɛbuale ye kɛ, ‘Ɔboalekɛ awie biala ɛtɛbɔle yɛ ɛkpa.’ Na ɔzele bɛ kɛ, ‘Ɛnee bɛdabɛ noko bɛhɔyɛ gyima wɔ me vanye egyinli ne anu.’
40020008	“Mɔɔ aleɛ ne yɛle nɔsolɛ la, egyinli menle ne zele ye sonvolɛ kpanyinli ne kɛ, ‘Fɛlɛ gyimayɛvoma ne na tua bɛ kakɛ, bɔ ɔ bo fi amozi amra anwo zo kɔkpula alumuama anwo zo.’
40020009	Yemɔti bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛbɔle gyima ne abo dɔne nnu la biala nyianle ahatualɛ etaku nna.
40020010	Mɔɔ alumuama rale la, bɛdwenlenle kɛ bɛkɛnyia ahatualɛ kpole; na bɛdabɛ bɛnyianle etaku nna nna.
40020011	Bɛduale bɛ kakɛ bɛwiele la, bɛdendɛle bɛ nzo abo bɛtiale egyinli menle ne kɛ,
40020012	‘Amozi amra mɔɔ yɛle gyima dɔnehwele kokye la wɔmaa bɛ nee yɛdayɛ mɔɔ alehyenlɛ ye anu yɛyɛ gyima dɔɔnwo na ewia ɛbɔ yɛ dedee la ɛzɛ ahatualɛ!’
40020013	“Na egyinli menle ne buale bɛ nuhua ko kɛ, ‘Ayi, metɛsisile wɔ; wɔamkponle zolɛ kɛ ɛkɛlie kenle ko etaku nna ɔ?
40020014	Wɔmɔ die wɔ ahatualɛ ne na kɔ sua nu. Mekola metua amozi amra kakɛ ko ne ala, kɛmɔ menduale wɔ la.
40020015	Ɛkpondɛ wɔaze kɛ menlɛ adenle kɛ mefa me ezukoa meyɛ mɔɔ medame mekulo la ɔ? Anzɛɛ ɔyɛ wɔ anyebolo kɛ me ti akunlu le kpalɛ la ɔ?’ ”
40020016	Na Gyisɛse dwulale ye edwɛkɛ ne zɛhae, “Yemɔti amozi amra balumua, na alumuama ali amozi.”
40020017	Gyisɛse kɔ Gyɛlusalɛm la, ɔvɛlɛle ye ɛdoavolɛma ne ahane na mɔɔ ɛnee bɛ gyakɛ wɔ zo la, ɔzele bɛ kɛ,
40020018	“Bɛdie, yɛlɛkɔ Gyɛlusalɛm. Ɛkɛ ne, bɛbaye medame Sonla Ra bɛamaa sɛlɛvolɛ mgbanyinli nee mɛla kilehilevolɛma ne mɔ. Bɛbabua me ewule fɔlɛ,
40020019	na bɛava me bɛawula menli mɔɔ ɛnle Dwuuma la asa anu. Bɛdabɛ noko bɛbazi me amgbu, bɛabila me empele, na bɛabɔ me meanubaka nu bɛahu me; na ye kenle nsa ne azo bɛbadwazo me bɛara ngoane nu.”
40020020	Akee Zɛbɛdi aye ne nee ɔ mra mrenya nwiɔ ne rale Gyisɛse ɛkɛ, na ɔrahotole ɔ nyunlu ɛkɛ ne kɛ ɔsɛlɛ ye debie.
40020021	Gyisɛse bizale ye kɛ, “Duzu a ɛkpondɛ a?” Ɔbuale kɛ, “Bɔ me ɛwɔkɛ kɛ saa ɛdi wɔ belemgbunli ne a me mra mrenya nwiɔ ye, ko kɛdɛnla wɔ fema zo na ko noko adɛnla wɔ bɛne zo.”
40020022	Gyisɛse buale kɛ, “Bɛnze mɔɔ bɛlɛbiza bɛalie la. Asoo amaneɛnwunlɛ dwora ne mɔɔ mebanlo nu la, bɛkɛhola nu no?” Bɛbuale kɛ, “Yɛkɛhola.”
40020023	Gyisɛse zele bɛ kɛ, “Nɔhalɛ, bɛkɛhola bɛkɛnlo amaneɛnwunlɛ dwora ne mɔɔ mebanlo nu la anu, noko tɛ me a meye sonla mɔɔ badɛnla me fema zo anzɛɛ me bɛne zo la a, ɔluakɛ ɛleka zɔhane mɔ le menli mɔɔ Egya ɛziezie ɛmaa bɛ la ɛdeɛ.”
40020024	Mɔɔ ɛdoavolɛma bulu ne mɔɔ ɛha la dele ɛhye la, bɛvale ɛya.
40020025	Yemɔti Gyisɛse vɛlɛle bɛ muala wɔ ɔ nwo ɛkɛ na ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Bɛze kɛ maanle maanle arelemgbunli si yɛ bɛ menli kpɔdekpɔde la, yɛɛ kɛ bɛ mgbanyima si di bɛ nwo zo tumi la.
40020026	Na bɛmɛ, ɛhye ɛmbɔnle bɛ nwo. Saa bɛ nuhua bie kpondɛ kɛ ɔyɛ kpole wɔ bɛ nu a, ɛnee ɔyɛ sonvolɛ ɔmaa mɔɔ ɛha la;
40020027	yɛɛ saa bɛ nuhua bie kpondɛ kɛ ɔdi bɛ ti a ɛnee ɔyɛ bɛ akɛlɛ;
40020028	ɔluakɛ medame Sonla Ra bɔbɔ, meamba kɛ bɛzonle me; membale kɛ mebazonle, na meava me ngoane meayɛ ɛkpɔnedeɛ meamaa menli dɔɔnwo.”
40020029	Mɔɔ bɛvi Gyɛleko bɛkɔ la, menli dɔɔnwo kpalɛ doale Gyisɛse.
40020030	Anyenzinliravolɛma nwiɔ mɔɔ ɛnee dede adehane ne la dele kɛ Gyisɛse ɛlɛpɛ nu, na bɛbɔle ɔ bo kɛ bɛteɛdea nuhua kɛ, “Devidi Ara, nwu yɛ anwunvɔne!”
40020031	Menli ne dendɛle bɛ na bɛzele bɛ kɛ bɛyɛ koonwu. Noko anyenzinliravolɛma ne deɛdeanle nuhua kpalɛ kɛ, “Devidi Ara, nwu yɛ anwunvɔne!”
40020032	Gyisɛse gyinlanle, ɔvɛlɛle bɛ na ɔbizale bɛ kɛ, “Duzu a bɛkulo kɛ meyɛ memaa bɛ a?”
40020033	Bɛbuale kɛ, “Yɛmenle, yɛkulo kɛ ɛbuke yɛ nye ɛmaa yɛnwu debie.”
40020034	Gyisɛse nwunle bɛ anwunvɔne na ɔvale ɔ sa ɔhehanle bɛ nye ne mɔ, na ɛkɛ ne ala bɛ nye ne mɔ bukebukele manle bɛnwunle debie, na bɛdoale ye.
40021001	Mɔɔ Gyisɛse nee ye ɛdoavolɛma ne bikyele Gyɛlusalɛm na bɛradwule Bɛtefagye wɔ Ɔlivi Boka ne azo la, Gyisɛse zoanle ye ɛdoavolɛma nwiɔ,
40021002	na ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Bɛhɔ namule ne mɔɔ wɔ bɛ nyunlu lɔ la azo na bɛkɛnwu asoaso mɔɔ bɛhenda ye na asoaso ralɛ gyi ɔ nwo ɛkɛ ne la. Bɛzianyi bɛ na bɛva bɛ bɛrɛlɛ me.
40021003	Na saa awie biala biza bɛ nwolɛ edwɛkɛ a bɛze ye kɛ, ‘Yɛ Menle ɛhyia bɛ nwo’; na ɔkɛmaa bɛ adenle.”
40021004	Ɛhye zile amaa mɔɔ Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛ ne hanle la ayɛ nɔhalɛ kɛ,
40021005	“Ka kile suakpole Zayɔn kɛ, Nea, wɔ belemgbunli ne ɛlɛba ɛ nwo. Ɔle bɛlɛvo na ɔde asoaso nee asoaso ralɛ zo.”
40021006	Ɛdoavolɛma ne hɔle na bɛhɔyɛle ye kɛmɔ Gyisɛse hanle hilele bɛ la.
40021007	Bɛvale asoaso ne nee ɔ ra ne bɛrale na bɛvale bɛ ndanlɛ bɛguale zolɛ, na Gyisɛse dɛnlanle zolɛ.
40021008	Menli dɔɔnwo kpalɛ noko sesɛle bɛ ndanlɛ wɔ adenle ne anu, yɛɛ bɛ bie mɔ bubule nya guale adenle ne anu.
40021009	Na menli dɔɔnwo ne mɔɔ li ɔ nyunlu nee ɔ nzi la deɛdeanle nuhua kɛ, “Ayɛlɛyelɛ ɛha Devidi Ara ne! Nyamenle ɛyila mɔɔ lua Awulae duma nu ɛlɛba la! Bɛye Nyamenle ayɛlɛ!”
40021010	Mɔɔ Gyisɛse dwule Gyɛlusalɛm la, suakpole ne azo kpudwule na bɛbizale kɛ, “Na nwane ɛne?”
40021011	Na menli dɔɔnwo ne zele kɛ, “Ɛhye a le Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛ ne mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye Gyisɛse, mɔɔ vi Nazalɛte mɔɔ wɔ Galeli la.”
40021012	Gyisɛse hɔle Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne anu na ɔvoanle bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛlɛdi gua wɔ ɛkɛ ne la amuala. Ɔbutubutule menli mɔɔ senza ezukoa la ɛkponle ne mɔ, ɔhanle menli mɔɔ tɔne mɔlɔnoma la mbia ne mɔ ɔguale,
40021013	na ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Bɛhɛlɛ ye wɔ Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne anu kɛ: Nyamenle se, ‘Bɛbavɛlɛ me Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne nzɛlɛlɛ sua.’ Na bɛmɛ, bɛyɛ ye awulema fealeka!”
40021014	Anyenzinliravolɛma nee abuburama rale ɔ nwo ɛkɛ ne wɔ Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne anu, na ɔyɛle bɛ ayile.
40021015	Mɔɔ sɛlɛvolɛ mgbanyinli ne nee mɛla kilehilevolɛma ne nwunle nwanwane gyima mgbole mɔɔ ɔlɛdi, nee ngakula ne mɔ alɛra mɔɔ bɛlɛyɛ, bɛayeyɛ Gyisɛse wɔ Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne anu kɛ, “Ayɛlɛyelɛ ɛha Devidi Ara ne!” la, bɛvale ɛya.
40021016	Yemɔti bɛbizale Gyisɛse kɛ, “Ɛte mɔɔ ɛhye mɔ ɛlɛkeha la ɔ?” Gyisɛse buale bɛ kɛ, “Nɔhalɛ, mete. Na bɛtɛkengale Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne mɔɔ fane ɛhye anwo la ɔ? Ɔse, ‘Bɛtete ngakula ndetendete nee nlɔma kɛ bɛye Nyamenle ayɛlɛ mɔɔ di munli a!’ ”
40021017	Na Gyisɛse gyakyile bɛ ɛkɛ ne na ɔvile Gyɛlusalɛm ɔhɔle Bɛtani ɔhɔlale.
40021018	Aleɛ hyenle nwonlomɔ mangyee ne na Gyisɛse sia ahɔ Gyɛlusalɛm, na ɔlua adenle zo la ɛhɔne hunle ye.
40021019	Ɔnwunle feege baka bie kɛ ɔgyi adehane ne, ɔhɔle ɔ bo la yeannwu ma ko bɔbɔ wɔ zolɛ kɛ nya ngome a yewula a. Yemɔti ɔzele baka ne kɛ, “Ɛnrɛzo ma bieko ɛlɛ!” Na ɛkɛ ne ala feege baka ne nwosonle.
40021020	Ɛhye zinle ɛdoavolɛma ne anwo kpole na bɛbizale Gyisɛse kɛ, “Kɛ ɔyɛle mɔɔ feege baka ne nwosonle ndɛndɛ zɛhae ɛ?”
40021021	Gyisɛse buale kɛ, “Bɛhakye ɛhye! Saa bɛdie bɛdi na bɛanzu kpolera a, bɛkɛhola bɛkɛyɛ mɔɔ meyɛ feege baka ɛhye la bie. Bɔbɔ bɛkɛhola bɛkɛze boka ɛhye kɛ, ‘Tudu kɔdɔ nyevile nu’, na ɔkɛyɛ zɔhane.
40021022	Saa bɛdie bɛdi a, bɛ sa kɛha debie biala mɔɔ bɛkɛbiza wɔ nzɛlɛlɛ nu la.”
40021023	Gyisɛse ziale rale Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne anu, na mɔɔ ɔlɛkilehile la, sɛlɛvolɛ mgbanyinli ne nee mgbanyima ne mɔ rale ɔ nwo ɛkɛ ne rabizale ye kɛ, “Duzu tumi a ɛlɛfa wɔayɛ ninyɛne ɛhye mɔ a? Nwane a manle wɔ tumi ɛhye a?”
40021024	Gyisɛse buale bɛ kɛ, “Medame noko mebiza bɛ kpuyia ko na saa bɛye me ɔ nloa a menwɔhile tumi holɛ ko mɔɔ mefa meyɛ ninyɛne ɛhye mɔ la.
40021025	Tumi ne mɔɔ Dwɔn nyianle ye vale zɔnenle menli la vi nienwu, ɔvi Nyamenle anzɛɛ ɔvi sonla?” Na bɛbɔle ɔ bo kɛ bɛsu bɛ nwo kpolera kɛ, “Duzu edwɛkɛ a yɛha a? Saa yɛbua kɛ, ‘Ɔvi Nyamenle’ a, ɔkɛbiza yɛ kɛ, ‘Ɛnee duzu ati a bɛanlie bɛanli ɛ?’
40021026	Saa yɛka noko kɛ, ‘Ɔvi sonla’ a, yɛsulo menli ye, ɔboalekɛ bɛ muala bɛdie bɛto nu kɛ Dwɔn le Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛ.”
40021027	Yemɔti bɛbuale Gyisɛse kɛ, “Yɛnze.” Na Gyisɛse ɔdaye ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Ɛnee medame noko menrɛha ahenle holɛ ko mɔɔ manle me tumi kɛ menyɛ ninyɛne ɛhye mɔ la menrɛhile bɛ.”
40021028	Akee Gyisɛse bizale bɛ edwɛkɛ ɛhye, ɔse, “Kɛ bɛdwenle ɛhye anwo bɛse ɛ? Nrenya bie lɛ ɔ mra mrenya nwiɔ. Ɔhɔle mɔɔ lumua la anwo ɛkɛ ne ɔhɔzele ye kɛ, ‘Me ra, ɛnɛ kɔyɛ gyima wɔ me vanye egyinli ne anu.’
40021029	Na ɔbuale ye kɛ, ‘Menrɛhɔ,’ Noko nzinlii ɔnlunle ɔ nwo na ɔhɔle.
40021030	Ɔhɔle ko ne noko ɛkɛ ne na ɔhɔhanle edwɛkɛ ko ne ala ɔhilele ye. Na ɔbuale kɛ, ‘Egya, mebahɔ.’ Noko yeangɔ.
40021031	Ɛnee ngakula nwiɔ ɛhye, bɛ nuhua boni a yɛle ɔ ze ɛhulolɛdeɛ a?” Bɛzele ye kɛ, “Mɔɔ lumua la ɔ.” Gyisɛse zele bɛ kɛ, “Nɔhalɛ, meka meahile bɛ: Adwuledievolɛma nee tuutuuma balumua anyia Nyamenle Belemgbunlililɛ ne agyakyi bɛ.
40021032	Ɔluakɛ Dwɔn Sɔnevolɛ ne rale na ɔrahilehilele bɛ nɔhalɛ adenle ne la, bɛanlie ye bɛanli; noko adwuledievolɛma nee tuutuuma liele ye lile; yɛɛ nzinlii bɔbɔ mɔɔ bɛnwunle ɛhye zɔhane la, bɛannu bɛ nwo na bɛalie ye bɛali.”
40021033	Eza Gyisɛse zele bɛ kɛ, “Bɛdie ɛrɛlɛ ɛhye noko. Azɛlɛ menle bie yɛle ye vanye egyinli na ɔhyele nwolɛ ɔyiale. Ɔdule kuma mɔɔ bɛbahwihwi vanye ma ne anu nzule bɛagua nu la, na ɔzile tawa tendenle ko mɔɔ bɛgyinla zo bɛsinza egyinli ne la. Akee ɔvale egyinli ne ɔwulale abunsama asa anu na ɔdule adenle ɔhɔle maanle fofolɛ nu.
40021034	Ɛbuhenle ne dwule la, ɔzoanle ye sonvolɛma bie mɔ kɛ bɛhɔ bɛhɔlie ye ɛkpɔ ɛdeɛ ne bɛrɛlɛ ye.
40021035	Na abunsama ne hyele sonvolɛma ne, bɛbole ko, bɛhunle ko na bɛzile ko awolɛ.
40021036	Egyinli menle ne eza zoanle ye sonvolɛma mɔɔ zonle tɛla mɔɔ ɔlumuale ɔzoanle bɛ la, na bɛyɛle bɛdabɛ noko zɔhane ala.
40021037	Nzinlii ɔzoanle ɔ ra nrenya wɔ bɛ nwo lɔ, na ɔdwenlenle kɛ, ‘Me ra ye ɛdeɛ, bɛbaze ye nyiane.’
40021038	Na mɔɔ abunsama ne nwunle ɔ ra ne la, bɛhanle bɛhilele bɛ nwo ngoko kɛ, ‘Kɔliagya ne ɛne. Bɛrɛla bɛmaa yɛhu ye na yɛva ye agyadeɛ ne!’
40021039	Yemɔti bɛhyele ye na bɛvale ye bɛvindele egyinli ne anzi lɔ bɛhɔhunle ye.
40021040	“Na ɛnee bɛnea a saa vanye egyinli ne amenle ba a, duzu a ɔkɛyɛ abunsama ne a?”
40021041	Bɛbuale ye kɛ, “Ɔkɛhu amumuyɛma ne na ɔkɛva ye egyinli ne ɔkɛwula abunsama fofolɛ mɔɔ ɛbuhenle ne dwu a bɛkɛva ye ɛkpɔ ɛdeɛ ne bɛkɛmaa ye la asa anu.”
40021042	Gyisɛse zele bɛ kɛ, “Asoo bɛtɛkengale Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ɛhye ɛlɛ? Ɔse, ‘Bolɛ ne mɔɔ suasivoma ne kpole la, ɛrayɛ bolɛ mɔɔ anwo hyia kpole kpalɛ kɛ sua mgbɛne zo sika la. Awulae a yɛle ɛhye a; na ɔyɛ nwanwane kpole!’
40021043	“Zɔhane ati meka meahile bɛ, bɛbalie Nyamenle Belemgbunlililɛ ne bɛ sa nu na bɛava bɛamaa menli mɔɔ yɛ tieyɛ la. [
40021044	Na awie biala mɔɔ kɛdɔ bolɛ ɛhye azo la kɛtete nzokanzoka, yɛɛ mɔɔ bolɛ ne kɛdɔ ɔ nwo zo la kɛdi kɛyɛ kɛ sianlɛ.”]
40021045	Sɛlɛvolɛ mgbanyinli ne nee Falasiima ne mɔ dele Gyisɛse ɛrɛlɛ ne abo, na bɛnwunle kɛ bɛmɛ a yebu ɛrɛlɛ ne yetia bɛ a.
40021046	Ɛhye ati bɛyɛle kɛ bɛkye ye; noko akee bɛzulole, ɔluakɛ menli ne mɔ die to nu kɛ Gyisɛse le Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛ.
40022001	Eza Gyisɛse bule bɛ ɛrɛlɛ ɛhye, ɔse,
40022002	“Anwuma Belemgbunlililɛ ne le kɛ belemgbunli bie mɔɔ liele atɔfolɛ manle ɔ ra nrenya la.
40022003	Ɔzoanle ye sonvolɛma kɛ bɛhɔvɛlɛvɛlɛ bɛdabɛ mɔɔ ɔdole ɛsalɛ ɔvɛlɛle bɛ la kɛ bɛrɛla atɔfolɛlielɛ ne abo, na bɛamba.
40022004	Eza ɔzoanle sonvolɛma fofolɛ na ɔzele bɛ kɛ bɛze menli mɔɔ yeyieyia bɛ la kɛ, ‘Medo me aleɛ ne mewie, mehu me nlankɛ nee me nane mɔɔ ɛlɔ la mewie; bɛwie debie biala siezie na bɛrɛla atɔfolɛlielɛ ne abo.’
40022005	Na bɛbule bɛ nye bɛguale zolɛ na bɛhɔle bɛ gyima: bie hɔle ye ɛya nu, yɛɛ bie hɔle ye gualilɛ,
40022006	bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛhale la, bɛhyele sonvolɛma ne mɔ bɛzale bɛ na bɛhunle bɛ.
40022007	Mɔɔ belemgbunli ne dele ɛhye la ɔvale ɛya, ɔzoanle ye ɛlɔnema ɔmanle bɛhɔhunle ahɔdiawu ne mɔ na bɛyelale bɛ suakpole ne.
40022008	Akee ɔzele ye sonvolɛma ne kɛ, ‘Bɛwie atɔfolɛ aleɛ ye siezie, noko bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛyieyiale bɛ la anwo anfɛta.
40022009	Yemɔti bɛhɔ awɔdenle ne mɔ azo na menli dɔɔnwo biala mɔɔ bɛkɛnwu bɛ la bɛvɛlɛ bɛ muala bɛmaa bɛrɛla atɔfolɛlielɛ ye abo.’
40022010	Zɔhane ati sonvolɛma ne hɔle awɔdenle ne mɔ azo hɔsesale bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnwunle bɛ la kɔsɔɔti, menli mɔɔ le kpalɛ nee bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnle kpalɛ la amuala, na bɛvale bɛ bɛrayile atɔfolɛlielɛ sua ne tɛkɛɛ.
40022011	“Akee belemgbunli ne hɔle sua ne anu kɛ ɔkanlea ye nyɛvolɛ ne mɔ, na ɔnwunle kɛ nrenya ko wɔ nu mɔɔ ɔnwula atɔfolɛlielɛ tɛladeɛ ne mɔɔ belemgbunli ne ɛva ɛmaa ye nyɛvolɛ ne mɔ la bie a.
40022012	Na ɔbizale ye kɛ, ‘Ayi, kɛ ɛzile ɛrale ɛke, mɔɔ ɛnwula atɔfolɛlielɛ tɛladeɛ ye bie ɛ?’ Na nrenya ne andɛ ɔ nloa anu.
40022013	Belemgbunli ne zele ye sonvolɛma ne kɛ, ‘Bɛkyekye ɔ sa nee ɔ gyakɛ, na bɛva ye bɛhɔdo alie nwo lɔ awozinli kpole ne anu. Ɛkɛ ne yɛɛ menli bazu na bɛadedɛ bɛ nwo bonrane nu a.’ ”
40022014	Na Gyisɛse dwulale ye edwɛkɛ ne kɛ, “Bɛvɛlɛ dɔɔnwo, na ekyi bie a bɛva bɛ a.”
40022015	Falasiima ne hɔle Gyisɛse ati akpamo kɛ bɛdua kpuyia ɛbizalɛ zo bɛahye ye.
40022016	Yemɔti bɛzoanle bɛ ɛdoavolɛma ne bie mɔ nee belemgbunli Hɛlɔdo asa zo ne mɔ bie wɔ Gyisɛse anwo ɛkɛ na bɛhɔbizale ye kɛ, “Kilehilevolɛ, yɛze kɛ wɔmɔ ɛka nɔhalɛ. Ɛkilehile Nyamenle adenle ne nɔhalɛ nu mɔɔ ɛndwenle mɔɔ menli ka la anwo a, ɔboalekɛ ɛnnea sonla nyunlu.
40022017	Zɔhane ati yɛbiza wɔ, kɛ ɛdwenle ɛhye anwo ɛ? Asoo ɔfa yɛ mɛla ne adenle zo kɛ yɛkɛdua adwule yɛkɛmaa Wulomu Maanle Maanle Belemgbunli ne?”
40022018	Na Gyisɛse nwunle bɛ nwulowula ne, na ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Bɛmɛ nabalabama, duzu ati a bɛsɔ me bɛanlea ɛ?
40022019	Bɛva ezukoa ne mɔɔ bɛfa bɛtua adwule ne la bie bɛmaa menea.” Bɛvale bie bɛmanle ye;
40022020	na ɔbizale bɛ kɛ, “Nwane nvoninli nee ye duma a le ɛhye?”
40022021	Bɛzele kɛ, “Siza ɔ.” Gyisɛse zele bɛ kɛ, “Ɛnee bɛva mɔɔ le Siza ɛdeɛ la bɛmaa ye ɛ, na bɛva mɔɔ le Nyamenle ɛdeɛ noko la bɛmaa ye.”
40022022	Bɛdele ɛhye la ɔzinle bɛ nwo, na bɛgyakyile ye bɛhɔle.
40022023	Kenle ko ne ala Sadusiima bie rale Gyisɛse anwo ɛkɛ ne. (Sadusiima le menli bie mɔɔ ɛnlie ewudwazo ne ɛnli a.)
40022024	Bɛrabizale Gyisɛse kɛ, “Kilehilevolɛ, Mosisi kile kɛ, ‘Saa nrenya wu na ɔgyakyi ɔ ye mɔɔ ɔ nee ye anwo la a, ɔwɔ kɛ ɔ diema nrenya gya kunlanvolɛ ne na ɔwo mralɛ ɔmaa ɔ diema ne mɔɔ ɛwu la.’
40022025	Mediema mrenya nsuu bie woale ɛkɛ. Bɛ nuhua kpanyinli ne gyale raalɛ na ɔ nee ye anwo yɛɛ ɔwule a, yemɔti ɔgyakyile kunlanvolɛ ne ɔmanle ɔ diema.
40022026	Na mɔɔ zile alumua ɛdeɛ ne anwo zo la yɛɛ zile mɔɔ tɔ zo nwiɔ ne nee nsa ne, toonwo ɔhɔdwule nsuu ne anwo zo a. Bɛ muala bɛwule; bɛ biala nee raalɛ ne anwo.
40022027	Nzinlii raalɛ ne ɔdaye ɔwule.
40022028	Ɛnee ewudwazo mekɛ ne, boni a raalɛ ne kɛyɛ ɔ ye a? Bɛdabɛ nsuu ne amuala bɛgyale ye bie.”
40022029	Gyisɛse buale bɛ kɛ, “Bɛvo kpole! Ɔboalekɛ bɛnze Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne anzɛɛ Nyamenle tumi ne kɛ si de la.
40022030	Ɔluakɛ ewudwazo mekɛ ne anu, bɛbayɛ kɛ anwuma soanvolɛma la, agyalɛ ɛnle ɛkɛ.
40022031	Bɛtɛkengale mɔɔ Nyamenle ɛha, mɔɔ fane mɔwuamra ɛdwazolɛ nwo la ɛlɛ ɔ? Ɔse,
40022032	‘Mame a mele Ebileham Nyamenle ne, Ayezeke Nyamenle ne, nee Gyekɔbo Nyamenle ne a.’ Ɛhye kile kɛ ɔle teasema Nyamenle, na ɔnle mɔwuamra Nyamenle.”
40022033	Mɔɔ menli dɔɔnwo ne dele Gyisɛse ngilehilelɛ ɛhye la, ɔyɛle bɛ nwanwane.
40022034	Mɔɔ Falasiima ne dele kɛ Gyisɛse ɛmaa Sadusiima ne ɛha bɛ nloa ɛdo nu la, bɛdabɛ bɛlile bɛ nloa bɛrayiale ye.
40022035	Bɛ nuhua ko mɔɔ le mɛla kilehilevolɛ la zɔle ye nleanle na ɔbizale ye kɛ,
40022036	“Kilehilevolɛ, Mɛla ne boni a le titile kpalɛ kpalɛ a?”
40022037	Gyisɛse buale ye kɛ, “Fa wɔ ahonle muala, wɔ ɛkɛla muala, nee wɔ adwenle muala kulo Awulae wɔ Nyamenle ne.
40022038	Ɛhye a le mɛla titile kpalɛ mɔɔ hyia a.
40022039	Mɔɔ tɔ zo nwiɔ la le kɛ ɛhendeɛ ne la, ɔse: Kulo ɛ gɔnwo kɛ ɛdawɔ ɛ nwo la.
40022040	Mɛla nwiɔ ye azo yɛɛ Mosisi mɛla ne kpokpoti nee Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛma ngilehilelɛ ne mɔ amuala gyi a.”
40022041	Mɔɔ Falasiima ne wiele yia la, Gyisɛse bizale bɛ kɛ,
40022042	“Kɛ bɛsi bɛdwenle Mɛzaya ne anwo ɛ? Nwane dehelɛ ɔ?” Bɛbuale kɛ, “Devidi dehelɛ ɔ.”
40022043	Ɔbizale bɛ kɛ, “Ɛnee akee kɛ ɔyɛle mɔɔ Sunsum ne manle Devidi vɛlɛle ye ‘Awulae’ ɛ? Ɔluakɛ Devidi hanle kɛ,
40022044	‘Awulae zele me Awulae kɛ: Tɛnla me sa fema zo ɛke, kɔkpula kɛ menwɔva wɔ kpɔvolɛma menwɔwula ɛ gyakɛ abo.’
40022045	Na saa Devidi vɛlɛle ye ‘Awulae’ a, ɛnee kɛ Mɛzaya ne si yɛ Devidi dehelɛ ɛ?”
40022046	Awie biala angola ɔ nloa ye, na ɔvi kenle ko ne awie biala angola anzi ye ɛbolɛ ambiza ye edwɛkɛ bieko.
40023001	Akee Gyisɛse dendɛle hilele menli dɔɔnwo ne nee ye ɛdoavolɛma ne mɔ kɛ,
40023002	“Mɛla kilehilevolɛma ne nee Falasiima ne mɔ a lɛ adenle kola kilehile Mosisi mɛla ne anu a.
40023003	Zɔhane ati bɛdie bɛ, yɛɛ debie biala mɔɔ bɛkɛha bɛkɛhile bɛ la bɛyɛ, noko bɛmmanea bɛ nyɛleɛ zo bɛbɔ bɛ ɛbɛla, ɔboalekɛ bɛka na bɛdabɛ mumua ne bɛnyɛ.
40023004	Bɛkyekye bɔlɛ ɛnlomboɛ mɔɔ ye ɛzoalɛ ɛnla aze la bɛsoa menli, noko bɛdabɛ mumua ne bɛnva bɛ sa ɛrɛlɛsɛka ko bɔbɔ bɛnzɔ bɛ nu.
40023005	Bɛyɛ bɛ ninyɛne kɔsɔɔti wɔ menli nye zo. Bɛdabɛ bɛnlea kɛ bɛ abɔtile ne mɔ si de mgbole na bɛhɛlɛhɛlɛ Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ wɔ nu, mɔɔ bɛbɔ a ɛnee ɔgua bɛ nwoma azo a; nee bie noko mɔɔ wɔ tabule nu mɔɔ bɛgua ye bɛ sa zo la mgbole kɛ si de la. Eza bɛnlea bɛ adɛladeɛ ne mɔ anloa, kɛ bɛzi bɛyɛ bɛ sosɔkpɔɔ la.
40023006	Saa bɛkɔ ɛkponledolɛ bo a bɛ nye bolo ɛleka kpalɛ ɛdɛnlanlɛ, yɛɛ nyianu sua nu mbia kpalɛ zo a bɛkpondɛ bɛtɛnla a.
40023007	Bɛkulo menli mɔɔ bɔ bɛ ti aze abiza bɛ ahye wɔ guabile zo nee menli mɔɔ yeyɛ bɛ, avɛlɛ bɛ, ‘Kilehilevolɛ’ la.
40023008	Na bɛmɛ, bɛmmamaa awie fɛlɛ bɛ ‘Kilehilevolɛ’, ɔluakɛ bɛ muala bɛle mediema yɛɛ bɛ Kilehilevolɛ kokye.
40023009	Eza bɛmmafɛlɛ awie biala bɛ ‘ze’ wɔ azɛlɛ ye azo, ɔluakɛ bɛ Ze kokye, na yemɔ ala a wɔ anwuma lɔ la.
40023010	Bɛmmamaa awie fɛlɛ bɛ ‘ɔ menle’, ɔluakɛ bɛ Menle kokye; yemɔ a le Kelaese ne.
40023011	Mɔɔ le kpole kpalɛ wɔ bɛ nu la ɔwɔ kɛ yɛ bɛ sonvolɛ.
40023012	Awie biala mɔɔ kɛmemaa ɔ nwo zo la, bɛkɛha ye aze, na mɔɔ kɛha ɔ nwo aze la, bɛkɛmaa ye zo.
40023013	“Munzule ɛha bɛmɛ mɛla kilehilevolɛma nee Falasiima! Nabalabama! Bɛmɛ, bɛto Anwuma Belemgbunlililɛ anlenkɛ ne anu bɛmaa menli ne ka ɔ nzi; bɛmɛ a, bɛnrɛhɔ nu, yɛɛ akee noko bɛnrɛmaa bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛlɛbɔ mɔdenle bɛahɔ nu la adenle bɛnrɛmaa bɛnrɛhɔ nu. [
40023014	“Munzule ɛha bɛmɛ mɛla kilehilevolɛma nee Falasiima! Nabalabama! Bɛbɛlɛbɛla ahunlanvolɛ mraalɛ bɛbɔ bɛ awuke na akee bɛakpati bɛayɛ nwolɛ nzɛlɛlɛ ndendenle. Ɔlua ɛhye ati bɛ ndeanlɛ bayɛ kpole kpalɛ!]
40023015	“Bɛmɛ mɛla kilehilevolɛma nee Falasiima, munzule ɛha bɛ! Nabalabama! Bɛmɛ, bɛdua nyevile nye, bɛdua aze bɛkɔ maanle maanle zo kɛ bɛkɛnyia sonla ko bɔbɔ bɛkɛhakyi ye bɛkɛmaa ɔkɛzonle Nyamenle; noko saa bɛnyia bie a, bɛyɛ bɛmaa ɔ nwo fɛta abɔnsam senle nu fane nwiɔ kɛ bɛdabɛ la!
40023016	“Munzule ɛha bɛ! Bɛmɛ anyenzinliravolɛma mɔɔ kile adenle a! Bɛkilehile kɛ, ‘Saa sonla fa Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne ka ndane a, ɔndo; na saa ɔfa ezukoa nvutuke ne mɔɔ wɔ Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne anu la ɔka ndane a, ɔto.’
40023017	Anyenzinliravolɛma ahɔnwɔne! Boni a hyia a, ezukoa nvutuke ne anzɛɛ Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne mɔɔ maa ezukoa ne anwo te la?
40023018	Eza bɛkilehile kɛ, ‘Saa sonla fa azukponle ne ka ndane a, ɔndo; na saa ɔfa ahyɛlɛdeɛ ne mɔɔ wɔ azukponle ne azo la ɔka ndane a, ɔto.’
40023019	Bɛle anyenzinliravolɛma amgba! Boni a hyia a, ahyɛlɛdeɛ ne anzɛɛ azukponle ne mɔɔ maa ahyɛlɛdeɛ ne anwo te la?
40023020	Yemɔti bɛnwu ye kɛ saa awie fa azukponle ne ka ndane a, ɛnee yeva ahyɛlɛdeɛ ne mɔɔ wɔ zolɛ la amuala yeha ndane ne;
40023021	eza saa awie fa Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne ka ndane a, ɛnee yeva Sua ne nee Nyamenle ne mɔɔ de nu la yeha ndane ne.
40023022	Saa awie fa anwuma ka ndane a, ɛnee yeva Nyamenle belemgbunli ebia ne nee mɔɔ de zolɛ la amuala yeha ndane ne.
40023023	“Bɛmɛ mɛla kilehilevolɛma nee Falasiima, munzule ɛha bɛ! Nabalabama! Bɛmɛ bɛbu ɛlobɔ nu ɛya evuanlɛ mɔɔ le kɛ aabɛya la anu bulu bɛfa ko bɛmaa Nyamenle, na bɛbu bɛ nye bɛgua ninyɛne mɔɔ hyia kpalɛ wɔ mɛla ne anu, mɔɔ fane pɛlepɛlelilɛ, anwunvɔnezelɛ, yɛɛ nɔhalɛlilɛ nwo ngilehilelɛ la azo. Ɛhye mɔ a ɔwɔ kɛ bɛyɛ a, yɛɛ ɔnle kɛ bɛbu bɛ nye bɛgua mɔɔ ɛha la azo.
40023024	Adekilevolɛma mɔɔ anye ɛzi a! Bɛsonyi kɛkɛba wɔ bɛ nzule nye bɛto, noko bɛme kɛlɛne!
40023025	“Bɛmɛ mɛla kilehilevolɛma nee Falasiima! Munzule ɛha bɛ! Nabalabama! Bɛmɛ, bɛnrinzi bɛ kanrɛlɛ nee bɛ ɛyɛba nwo, noko bɛdabɛ mumua ne bɛ nuhua, amile nee angomedi ɛyi bɛ tɛkɛɛ.
40023026	Falasiima anyenzinliravolɛma! Bɛlumua bɛnrinzi kanrɛlɛ ne anu na nwolɛ noko kɛyɛ bɔkɔbɔkɔ!
40023027	“Bɛmɛ mɛla kilehilevolɛma nee Falasiima! Munzule ɛha bɛ! Nabalabama! Bɛle kɛ azie zo sɛka mɔɔ bɛha ye kalo la, bɛhwi nwolɛ ne fufule nwohyee noko ɔ kunlu le avunli mbowule nee azone ngome.
40023028	Zɔhane ala yɛɛ bɛdabɛ noko bɛde a, awie nwu bɛ a ɔbadwenle kɛ bɛle menli mɔɔ di boɛ a, noko bɛ nuhua le nabalabayɛlɛ nee amumuyɛ ngome.
40023029	“Bɛmɛ mɛla kilehilevolɛma nee Falasiima! Nabalabama! Bɛyɛ Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛma mɔɔ ɛwu la sɛka ngɛnlɛma, na bɛyɛ ngakyelɛ ninyɛne bɛfa bɛkakye menli mɔɔ bɔle ɛbɛla kpalɛ wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ ɛnee bɛde ngoane nu la,
40023030	na bɛka kɛ, ‘Saa yɛ nlenya mɔ mekɛ zo ɛnee yɛde aze a, anrɛɛ yɛanyɛ mɔɔ bɛyɛle la bie, yɛangu Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛma ne mɔ.’
40023031	Ɛhye kile kɛ bɛdie bɛto nu bɔkɔɔ kɛ bɛ nlenya mɔ a hunle Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛma ne mɔ a.
40023032	Ɛnee noko bɛhɔ zo ɛ! Mɔɔ bɛ nlenya mɔ bɔle ɔ bo la yɛɛ bɛlɛfa bɛara awieleɛ a!
40023033	Nwɔlɛ! Ɛkyelebenle mralɛ! Bɛdwenle kɛ bɛnrɛbua bɛ ewule fɔlɛ bɛnrɛmaa bɛnrɛhɔ abɔnsam senle nu ɔ?
40023034	Ɛhye ala ati yɛɛ melɛsoa Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛma, nrɛlɛbɛvolɛma, yɛɛ kilehilevolɛma wɔ bɛ nwo a; noko bɛbahu bie mɔ, bɛbabɔ bie mɔ meanubaka nu, bɛbabo bie mɔ wɔ bɛ nyianu azua ne mɔ anu, na bɛayɛ bie mɔ kpɔdekpɔde wɔ bɛ azua ne mɔ azo.
40023035	Zɔhane ati, menli mɔɔ ɛnze nwolɛ bie mɔɔ bɛhu bɛ, ɛbɔ ye Ebulu anwo zo kɔkpula Bɛlakaya ara Zɛkalaya mɔɔ bɛhunle ye wɔ Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne nee azukponle ne avinli la anwo zo, bɛ kɔsɔɔti bɛ mogya ne anwo ndeanlɛ bagua bɛ ti zo.
40023036	Nɔhalɛ, meka meahile bɛ, ɛhye mɔ amuala anwo ndeanlɛ bara bɛdabɛ adwuleso amra anwo zo.
40023037	“Gyɛlusalɛm, O Gyɛlusalɛm! Mɔɔ ɛku Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛma, ɛsi menli mɔɔ Nyamenle ɛzoa bɛ wɔ ɛ nwo la awolɛ a! Fane dɔɔnwo yɛɛ mehulo kɛ anrɛɛ menwɔva me sa menwɔbɛla wɔ menli ne amuala kɛ akɔlɛ ɛdane butu ɔ mra anwo zo la, noko wɔammaa me adenle.
40023038	Yemɔti bɛbakpo wɔ Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne bɛamaa yeadɔ mgbane.
40023039	Na meka meahile wɔ, ɔvi ɛnɛ mɔɔ kɔ la, ɛnrɛnwu me bieko kɔkpula mekɛ mɔɔ ɛbaha kɛ, ‘Nyamenle ɛyila mɔɔ lua Awulae duma nu ɛlɛba la.’ ”
40024001	Mɔɔ Gyisɛse vi Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne anu ɛlɛkɔ la, ye ɛdoavolɛma ne rale ɔ nwo ɛkɛ kɛ bɛbahilehile ye Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne azua ne mɔ.
40024002	Na ɔbizale bɛ kɛ, “Bɛnwu ninyɛne ɛhye mɔ ɔ? Nɔhalɛ, meka meahile bɛ kɛ bolɛ ko bɔbɔ ɛnrɛla bolɛ zo mɔɔ bɛnrɛdwula ye aze a.”
40024003	Mɔɔ Gyisɛse wɔ Ɔlivi Boka ne azo la, ye ɛdoavolɛma ne rale ɔ nwo ɛkɛ ne ahane rabizale ye kɛ, “Ka mekɛ mɔɔ ɛhye mɔ kɛzi la kile yɛ, na ka debie mɔɔ bazi ahile kɛ wɔ ɛralɛ ne ɛdwu na ewiade ɛhye ɛlɛba awieleɛ la kile yɛ?”
40024004	Gyisɛse buale bɛ kɛ, “Bɛnlea boɛ na awie ambɛlɛbɛla bɛ amminli bɛ.
40024005	Ɔboalekɛ menli dɔɔnwo balua me duma nu ara na bɛaha kɛ, ‘Mame a mele Mɛzaya ne!’ na bɛaminli menli dɔɔnwo diedi.
40024006	Bɛbade kɛ konle ɛzi na ɔbikye bɛ yɛɛ bɛbade kɛ bie noko ɛzi moa moa maanle bie anu, na bɛmmamaa bɛ ahonle tu. Ɔwɔ kɛ ninyɛne ɛhye mɔ sisi, noko ɛnee awieleɛ ne ɛtɛnyianle ɛtɛbale.
40024007	Maanle nee maanle baho atia bɛ nwo, arelemgbunli badwazo arelemgbunli nwo zo, sane bara, yɛɛ azɛlɛ bakpusu ɛleka muala.
40024008	Ɛhye mɔ amuala le kɛ awolɛ nyane ɛdelɛ bo ɛbɔlɛ.
40024009	“Akee bɛbahye bɛ na bɛahɔye bɛ bɛamaa bɛadea bɛ na bɛahu bɛ. Aleɛabo amra amuala bakpɔ bɛ wɔ me ti.
40024010	Mekɛ ne anu menli dɔɔnwo bakpo aze wɔ diedi nu, bɛbaye bɛ nwo ngoko ngoko bɛamaa, na bɛakpɔ bɛ nwo ngoko ngoko.
40024011	Akee Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛma adalɛ bara araminli menli dɔɔnwo diedi.
40024012	Munzule mɔɔ bara ewiade la bayɛ kpole kpalɛ la ati, menli dɔɔnwo baminli bɛ ɛhulolɛ mɔɔ bɛlɛ ye wɔ Nyamenle anwo la.
40024013	Noko sonla mɔɔ kɛgyinla kpundii kɛhɔ awieleɛ la banyia ngoane mɔɔ ɛnlɛ awieleɛ.
40024014	Bɛbabɔ Edwɛkpa ɛhye mɔɔ fane Anwuma Belemgbunlililɛ ne anwo la nolo wɔ aleɛabo amuala, amaa yeayɛ daselɛlilɛ yeamaa aleɛabo amra kolaa na awieleɛ ne ara.
40024015	“Saa bɛnwu ‘Munzudeɛ ne mɔɔ bɔ maanle’, mɔɔ Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛ Daneɛle hanle nwolɛ edwɛkɛ la kɛ ɔgyi ɛleka nwuanzanwuanza ne a, (Kengavolɛ, te ɛhye abo!)
40024016	ɛnee bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛwɔ Dwudiya la ɛnriandi ɛhɔ awoka ne mɔ azo.
40024017	Mɔɔ wɔ ye sua ti zo anwuma la mmaka kɛ ɔdwu aze yearava ye ninyɛne wɔ ye sua ne anu.
40024018	Mɔɔ ɛhɔ ɛbɔ nu la mmasia ba sua zo kɛ ɔbava ye tɛladeɛ.
40024019	Mekɛ ne anu, nrenzɛvolɛma nee mraalɛ mɔɔ via mralɛ la, bɛ gyakɔ!
40024020	Bɛzɛlɛ Nyamenle kɛ ɛhye ɛnrɛzi fɔsɛlɛ nu anzɛɛ Ɛnwomenlelielɛ Kenle ne!
40024021	Ɔluakɛ anwongyelelɛ mɔɔ bara mekɛ zɔhane ne anu la, ye ɛzulolɛ, sumunli kɛ ewiade bɔle ɔ bo dedee mɔɔ yeradwu ɛnɛ la, bie ɛtɛsile ɛlɛ, yɛɛ bie noko ɛnrɛzi ɛlɛ na aloa abɔ.
40024022	Na Awulae ɛnlea ye menli ne mɔɔ yekpa nu yeye bɛ la ati yede mekɛ ne azo, saa tɛ ye zɔhane a anrɛɛ sonla ko bɔbɔ ɛnrɛha.
40024023	“Mekɛ ne anu saa awie se bɛ kɛ, ‘Nea, Mɛzaya ne ɛne!’ anzɛɛ ‘Yemɔ a wɔ lɔ la!’ a, bɛmmadie bɛdi.
40024024	Ɔluakɛ Mɛzayama adalɛ nee Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛma alane dɔɔnwo bara; bɛbayɛ nwanwane ninyɛne mgbole mɔɔ yɛ ɛzulolɛ la dɔɔnwo, na saa bɛyɛ na ɔkɛyɛ boɛ a, bɛava bɛabɛlɛbɛla Nyamenle menli ne mɔɔ di munli bɔbɔ la na bɛaminli menli dɔɔnwo diedi.
40024025	Bɛdie! Kɛ mehakye bɛ ɛhye mɔ kolaa na mekɛ ne adwu ɛ!
40024026	“Yemɔti, saa awie mɔ ka kile bɛ kɛ, ‘Bɛnlea, ɔwɔ fienemgbole nu lɔ!’ a, bɛmmakɔ lɔ; anzɛɛ saa bɛka kɛ, ‘Bɛnlea, ɔvea ɛke!’ a, bɛmmadie bɛdi.
40024027	Ɔluakɛ medame Sonla Ra, mebara kɛ ɛsɛnlɛmanye mɔɔ kpakye anwomanyunlu la, ɔvi aduduleɛ yeahɔzi adɔleɛ.
40024028	“Ɛleka mɔɔ debie funli la la, ɛkɛ ne a mgbɔtɛ kuohua bɛ nloa a.”
40024029	Gyisɛse hɔle zolɛ hilele nu kɛ, “Anwongyelelɛ mekɛ ne anzi, awozinli baheda sɛnzɛne ne azo, siane ne ɛnrɛda, nwɔlɔra badudu agua aze, na bɛbadudu anwumaneamra bɛavi bɛ ndenle ne mɔ azo.
40024030	Na akee medame Sonla Ra, me nwo sɛkɛlɛneɛ bavinde anwomanyunlu; menli muala mɔɔ wɔ aleɛabo la bali nyane wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ bɛkɛnwu medame Sonla Ra kɛ melua amungu nu na melɛ tumi nee anyunlunyia kpole melɛba la.
40024031	Bɛbabɔ aweɛne kpole ne anu, na mebamaa me soanvolɛma ahɔ ewiade muleɛ ne amuala azo, bɛahɔhuohua Nyamenle menli ne mɔɔ yekpa nu yeye bɛ la anloa, ɔvi ewiade ye ati yeahɔdwu ɔ bo.
40024032	“Bɛnlea feege baka ne na bɛzukoa nrɛlɛbɛ wɔ nwo. Mekɛ mɔɔ ye ngane ne mɔ kɛze kɛ bɛwula nya la, ɛnee bɛze kɛ wawaa ɛbikye.
40024033	Zɔhane ala yɛɛ mekɛ mɔɔ bɛkɛnwu kɛ ninyɛne ɛhye mɔ ɛbɔ ɔ bo kɛ bɛsisi la, ɛnee bɛhakye kɛ Kelaese ne ɛralɛ ɛbikye, na yedwu bɔbɔ asɛɛ.
40024034	Na bɛhakye ɛhye, ninyɛne ɛhye mɔ bazi na menli mɔɔ kɛkala de aze la amuala awie wu.
40024035	Anwuma nee aze bapɛ nu aze, na me nloa edwɛkɛ ɛnrɛpɛ nu ɛlɛ.
40024036	“Noko akee awie biala ɛnze kenle ne nee mekɛ ne; anwuma soanvolɛma nee Ralɛ ne bɔbɔ ɛnze. Selɛ ne angomekye a ze a.
40024037	Sonla Ra ne ɛralɛ mekɛ ne bayɛ kɛ mɔɔ zile Nowa mekɛ zo la.
40024038	Kɛmɔ azuyilɛ kpole ne bara na menli lile, nlonle, agyalɛ lielɛ ebia hɔkpulale kenle mɔɔ Nowa vole ye ɛlɛne ne anu,
40024039	na bɛannwu mɔɔ ɛlɛba arazi la toonwo azuyilɛ kpole ne ravale bɛ muala la, zɔhane ala yɛɛ medame Sonla Ra, me ɛralɛ mekɛ ne bayɛ a.
40024040	Mekɛ ne anu bɛbava menli nwiɔ mɔɔ wɔ bɛ ɛya nu la anu ko bɛahɔ na bɛagyakyi ko.
40024041	Bɛbava mraalɛ nwiɔ mɔɔ ɛlɛti abɛlɛ la anu ko bɛahɔ na bɛagyakyi ko.
40024042	“Yemɔti bɛzinza, ɔboalekɛ bɛnze kenle mɔɔ bɛ Awulae ne kɛra la.
40024043	Bɛhakye ɛhye, saa awuke menle ze mekɛ mɔɔ awule ne kɛra la a anrɛɛ ɔbazi epe na awule ne ambanwua ye.
40024044	Zɔhane ati ɔwɔ kɛ bɛdabɛ noko bɛsiezie bɛ nwo, ɔluakɛ medame Sonla Ra, mebara mekɛ mɔɔ bɛ nye ɛnla la.
40024045	-
40024046	“Ɛnee akee, sonvolɛ nɔhavo mɔɔ ze nrɛlɛbɛ la a le boni? Yemɔ a le sonvolɛ ne mɔɔ ɔ menle ɛva ye kɛ ɔnlea sonvolɛma mɔɔ ɛha la anwo zo na ɔmaa bɛ aleɛ wɔ mekɛ ne anloa, na ɔ menle ne bato ye kɛ ɔlɛyɛ ye zɔhane la. Ɛhye le nyilalɛ kpole maa sonvolɛ ne.
40024047	Nɔhalɛ, meka meahile bɛ, ɔ menle ne kɛmaa ɔkɛnlea ye agya ninyɛne ne mɔ amuala azo.
40024048	Na saa sonvolɛ adalɛ ne se ɔ nwo kɛ, ‘Me menle bahyɛ na yeara,’
40024049	na ɔbɔ ɔ bo kɛ ɔbo ɔ gɔnwo mɔ sonvolɛma ne, na ɔ nee nzama ali, anlo a, ɛnee ɔhakye kɛ
40024050	ɔ menle ne bara kenle mɔɔ ɔdaye sonvolɛ ne ɔnze na eza ɔ nye ɛnla la.
40024051	Na ɔ menle ne kɛye ye ali kɛhɔboka nabalabama ne anwo. Ɛkɛ ne yɛɛ menli su dedɛ bɛ nwo bonrane nu a.”
40025001	“Mekɛ ne anu Anwuma Belemgbunlililɛ ne bayɛ kɛ mbɛlɛra bulu bie mɔɔ kenle ko vale bɛ ahɛnlaneɛ kɛ bɛkayia atɔfolɛ nrenya ne ade la.
40025002	Bɛ nuhua nnu le ahɔnwɔne, yɛɛ nnu noko ze nrɛlɛbɛ.
40025003	Ahɔnwɔne ne mɔ vale bɛ ahɛnlaneɛ la bɛanva nwole bɛanzia bɛ nwo,
40025004	na nrɛlɛbɛvolɛma ne, bɛmɛ bɛvale bie.
40025005	Kɛmɔ atɔfolɛ nrenya ne hyɛle la ati, mbɛlɛra ne mɔ bɔle ngɔsɔkɛ na bɛlafele.
40025006	“Arɛlevilɛ nu ala, wɔ alevinli mu nwiɔ avinli, bɛdele ɛnelɛ kɛ, ‘Atɔfolɛ nrenya ne ɛne! Bɛrɛla bɛrayia ye!’
40025007	Mbɛlɛra bulu ne dunwuele na bɛhanle bɛ ahɛnlaneɛ ne mɔ anu.
40025008	Na ahɔnwɔne ne mɔ zele nrɛlɛbɛvolɛma ne kɛ, ‘Bɛmaa yɛ bɛ nwole ne bie na yɛ ahɛnlaneɛ ne mɔ ɛlɛnu.’
40025009	Nrɛlɛbɛvolɛma ne zele bɛ kɛ, ‘Kyɛkyɛ, yɛnlie yɛnli kɛ nwole ne kɛza yɛ nee bɛdabɛ. Bɛhɔ bɛhɔdɔ bie.’
40025010	Yemɔti bɛhɔle kɛ bɛkadɔ nwole ne bie; na mɔɔ bɛhɔle la yɛɛ atɔfolɛ nrenya ne rale a. Na bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛwɔ ɛkɛ ne nee nrɛlɛbɛvolɛma nnu ne mɔɔ ɛnee bɛmɛ bɛnyia nwolɛ la nee ye hɔle atɔfolɛlielɛ ne abo, na bɛdole anlenkɛ ne anu.
40025011	“Nzinlii ahɔnwɔne ne mɔ rale rabɔle nu kɛ, ‘Yɛmenle, yɛmenle, buke yɛ!’
40025012	Na atɔfolɛ nrenya ne zele bɛ kɛ, ‘Kyɛkyɛ! Nɔhalɛ, meka meahile bɛ, menze bɛ.’ ”
40025013	Na Gyisɛse dwulale ye edwɛkɛ ne kɛ, “Yemɔti bɛzinza, ɔboalekɛ bɛnze kenle ko ne anzɛɛ dɔnehwele ko ne mɔɔ Awulae bara la.”
40025014	Gyisɛse vale zɔle zolɛ kɛ, “Mekɛ ne anu Anwuma Belemgbunlililɛ ne bayɛ kɛ nrenya bie mɔɔ ɛlɛtu adenle la; ɔvɛlɛvɛlɛle ye sonvolɛma ne mɔ na ɔvale ye agyadeɛ ne ɔmanle bɛ.
40025015	Ɔmanle biala debie, kɛmɔ bɛ anwosesebɛ si de la. Ɔmanle ko nzunza apenle nnu, ko noko ɔmanle ye apenle nwiɔ, yɛɛ mɔɔ tɔ zo nsa la, ɔmanle ye apenle ko na ɔhɔle.
40025016	Sonvolɛ ne mɔɔ bɛmanle ye nzunza apenle nnu ne la vale ye ɛdeɛ ne hɔlile gua na ɔnyianle nzunza apenle nnu nvasoɛ wɔ nwolɛ.
40025017	Mɔɔ bɛmanle ye apenle nwiɔ ne la yɛle ye zɔhane ala na ɔnyianle nvasoɛ nzunza apenle nwiɔ wɔ nwolɛ.
40025018	Mɔɔ bɛmanle ye nzunza apenle ne la hɔvunle kuma na ɔvale ɔ menle ne ezukoa ne ɔveale nu.
40025019	“Ɔhyɛle kpalɛ na bɛ menle ne ara; na ɔ nee bɛ rayɛle mgbonda.
40025020	Mɔɔ nyianle nzunza apenle nnu la rayele ye ezukoa ne nee nwolɛ nvasoɛ apenle nnu ne na ɔzele kɛ, ‘Yɛmenle, ɛmanle me apenle nnu. Menyia nwolɛ nvasoɛ apenle nnu na yemɔ ɛne!’
40025021	Ɔ menle ne zele ye kɛ, ‘Mo, wɔbɔ mɔdenle bɔkɔɔ; ɛle sonvolɛ kpalɛ mɔɔ di nɔhalɛ a! Wɔbɔ mɔdenle wɔnlea ezukoa ekyi ye azo boɛ, yemɔti mebava wɔ meazie ninyɛne mgbole nloa. Bɛla balie ɛ nye wɔ me nwo ɛke!’
40025022	“Sonvolɛ ne mɔɔ bɛmanle ye nzunza apenle nwiɔ la rale na ɔzele kɛ, ‘Yɛmenle, ɛmanle me nzunza apenle nwiɔ. Menyia nwolɛ nvasoɛ apenle nwiɔ na yemɔ ɛne!’
40025023	Ɔ menle ne zele ye kɛ, ‘Mo, wɔbɔ mɔdenle somaa; ɛle sonvolɛ mɔɔ di nɔhalɛ a! Wɔbɔ mɔdenle wɔnlea ezukoa ekyi ye azo boɛ, yemɔti mebava wɔ meazie ninyɛne dɔɔnwo anloa. Bɛla na balie ɛ nye wɔ me nwo ɛke!’
40025024	“Akee sonvolɛ ne mɔɔ bɛmanle ye nzunza apenle ko ne la rale na ɔrazele ɔ menle ne kɛ, ‘Yɛmenle, meze wɔ kɛ ɛ ti yɛ se, ɛbu bɛyɔba wɔ ɛleka mɔɔ wɔanlua debie la, na ɛkuohua aleɛ wɔ ɛya mɔɔ wɔanlua ma wɔ nu la anu.
40025025	Menzulole la ati, menvunle wɔ ezukoa ne menyɛle. Yemɔti wɔ ezukoa ne ɛne!’
40025026	“Na ɔ menle ne zele ye kɛ, ‘Ɛle sonvolɛ mgbovonle, amumuyɛ kpalɛ! Wɔmɔ ɛze me kɛ mebu bɛyɔba wɔ ɛleka mɔɔ meanlua debie la, na mekuohua aleɛ wɔ ɛya mɔɔ meanlua ma nu la anu?
40025027	Wɔdendɛ boɛ! Na kɛmɔti a wɔanva me ezukoa ne wɔangɔndo bange ɛ? Anrɛɛ mera la, nvasoɛ ɛra zolɛ, na meahɔlie me ezukoa ɔ nli ne nee nvasoɛ ne amuala.
40025028	Bɛza ye bɛlie mɔɔ ɔlɛ la na bɛva bɛmaa sonvolɛ ne mɔɔ lɛ nzunza apenle bulu ne la.
40025029	Ɔluakɛ mɔɔ lɛ bie la, bɛkɛmaa ye bie dɔɔnwo bɛkɛboka nwolɛ, na ɔkɛnyia ye molozo; na mɔɔ ɛnlɛ bie dɔɔnwo la, ekyi ne bɔbɔ mɔɔ ɔlɛ la, bɛkɛlie ye ɔ sa nu.
40025030	Akee sonvolɛ mgbane ɛhye, bɛvuandi ye bɛdo alie nwo lɔ awozinli kpole ne anu; ɛkɛ ne yɛɛ menli bazu adedɛ bɛ nwo bonrane nu a!’
40025031	“Mekɛ mɔɔ medame Sonla Ra, menwɔra kɛ Belemgbunli, mɔɔ ɛnee me soanvolɛma ne amuala wɔ me nwo ɛkɛ ne la, mebadɛnla me anyunlunyia belemgbunli ebia ne anu,
40025032	na meaboɔboa aleɛabo amra amuala anloa wɔ me nyunlu ɛkɛ ne. Na mebahyɛ bɛ nuhua nwiɔ, kɛmɔ mboaneneavolɛ ye mboane fi mbɔnkye avinli la.
40025033	Mebakpa mboane ne mɔ meagua me sa fema zo, na meagua mbɔnkye ne mɔ me sa bɛne zo.
40025034	Na akee meaze menli mɔɔ wɔ me sa fema zo la kɛ, ‘Bɛmɛ mɔɔ Egya ɛyila bɛ a, bɛrɛla! Bɛ nee me ɛrali belemgbunli. Egya hyehyɛle manle bɛ kolaa na bɛabɔ ewiade ye.
40025035	Ɔluakɛ ɛhɔne hunle me na bɛmanle me aleɛ, nzuhɔne hunle me na bɛmanle me nzule, menyɛle ɛyɛvolɛ na bɛliele me wɔ bɛ azua nu,
40025036	me nwo lale zo na bɛmanle me ɛdanlɛ, me nwo dole me na bɛnleanle me, yɛɛ menlale efiade na bɛrakpɔlale me.’
40025037	“Na menli kpalɛ ɛhye mɔ babua kɛ, ‘Awulae, kenlenzu a yɛnwunle wɔ kɛ ɛhɔne ɛlɛku wɔ mɔɔ yɛmanle wɔ aleɛ, anzɛɛ nzuhɔne ɛlɛku wɔ mɔɔ yɛmanle wɔ nzule a?
40025038	Kenlenzu a ɛyɛle ɛyɛvolɛ ɛrazokoɛle yɛ mɔɔ yɛliele wɔ wɔ yɛ azua nu, anzɛɛ ɛ nwo lale zo na yɛmanle wɔ ɛdanlɛ a?
40025039	Kenlenzu a yɛnwunle wɔ kɛ ɛnde kpɔkɛ anzɛɛ ɛlale efiade mɔɔ yɛrakpɔlale wɔ a?’
40025040	Na mebabua bɛ kɛ, ‘Nɔhalɛ, meka meahile bɛ kɛ, suzuamgba ala mɔɔ bɛyɛle ɛhye mɔ bɛmanle me mediema ɛhye mɔ mɔɔ anwo ɛngyia la anu bie la, bɛyɛle bɛmanle me.’
40025041	“Akee mebaze bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛwɔ me sa bɛne zo la kɛ, ‘Bɛvi me nwo ɛke bɛhɔ, munzule menli! Bɛhɔ senle ne mɔɔ ɛnnu ɛlɛ, mɔɔ ɔvi ewiade abobɔlɛ bɛhua bɛmaa Abɔnsam nee ye soanvolɛma la anu!
40025042	Ɔluakɛ ɛhɔne hunle me na bɛammaa me aleɛ, nzuhɔne hunle me na bɛammaa me nzule,
40025043	menyɛle ɛyɛvolɛ na bɛanlie me wɔ bɛ azua nu, me nwo lale zolɛ na bɛammaa me ɛdanlɛ, me nwo dole me yɛɛ menlale efiade na bɛamkpo me bo zo.’
40025044	“Na bɛdabɛ noko bɛbabua kɛ, ‘Awulae, kenlenzu yɛɛ yɛnwunle wɔ kɛ ɛhɔne ɛlɛku wɔ anzɛɛ nzuhɔne ɛlɛku wɔ, ɛyɛle ɛyɛvolɛ anzɛɛ ɛ nwo lale zolɛ, ɛ nwo dole wɔ, ɛlale efiade, mɔɔ yɛamboa wɔ a?’
40025045	Na mebabua bɛ kɛ, ‘Nɔhalɛ, meka meahile bɛ kɛ, suzuamgba ala mɔɔ bɛkpole kɛ bɛnrɛboa menli ɛhye mɔ mɔɔ anwo ɛngyia la anu ko bɔbɔ la, bɛkpole kɛ bɛnrɛboa medame noko.’
40025046	Na bɛkɛdea ɛhye mɔ ndeanlɛ mɔɔ ɛnlɛ awieleɛ a, na bɛava menli kpalɛ ne mɔ bɛahɔ ngoane mɔɔ ɛnlɛ awieleɛ la anu.”
40026001	Mɔɔ Gyisɛse wiele edwɛkɛ ɛhye mɔ amuala ka la, ɔzele ye ɛdoavolɛma ne kɛ,
40026002	“Kɛmɔ bɛdabɛ bɛze la, yeha kenle nwiɔ ɛnee Akpabɛnwo Ɛvoyia ne ɛdwu zo, na bɛbaye medame Sonla Ra bɛamaa bɛabɔ me meanubaka nu.”
40026003	Mekɛ ne anu ala, sɛlɛvolɛ mgbanyinli ne nee Dwuu mgbanyima ne mɔ hɔyiale Sɛlɛvolɛ Kpanyinli ne mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye Kayafase la suakunlu ɛkɛ ne,
40026004	na bɛdwenledwenlenle adenle mɔɔ bɛdua zo a bɛkɛhye Gyisɛse ahane ɛleka bie bɛkɛhu ye la anwo.
40026005	Na bɛzele kɛ, “Ɔnle kɛ yɛyɛ ye zɔhane wɔ ɛvoyialilɛ ne anu, anrɛɛ menli ne kɛdo nzaka.”
40026006	Gyisɛse wɔ Saemɔn mɔɔ anrɛɛ le kokobɛvolɛ la sua nu wɔ Bɛtani
40026007	na mɔɔ ɔlɛdi debie la, raalɛ bie vale anatele mɔɔ sonle bolɛ kpalɛ la wɔ “alabaseta” bolɛ toba nu rawolale guale ɔ ti zo.
40026008	Mɔɔ ɛdoavolɛma ne nwunle ye la bɛvale ɛya na bɛhanle kɛ, “Duzu debie ɛzɛkyelɛ a le ɛhye?
40026009	Anrɛɛ bɛkola bɛtɔne anatele bolɛ ɛsesebɛ ɛhye bɛfa ye ezukoa ne bɛnea ehyianvolɛma.”
40026010	Gyisɛse dele mɔɔ bɛlɛka la, na ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Duzu ati a bɛlɛgyegye raalɛ ye a? Mɔɔ yeyɛ yemaa me la le kɛnlɛma.
40026011	Bɛmɛ, bɛ nee ehyianvolɛma de dahuu na mame, me nee bɛ ɛnde dahuu.
40026012	Nwole ɛhye mɔɔ yewola yegua me nwo la, yeva yeziezie me wɔ me ɛzielɛ nu.
40026013	Na bɛhakye ɛhye, aleɛabo ɛleka biala mɔɔ bɛkɛbɔ Edwɛkpa ɛhye nolo la, bɛkɛha mɔɔ raalɛ ye ɛyɛ la bɛkɛva bɛkɛhakye ye.”
40026014	Ɛdoavolɛma ne anu ko mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye Dwudase Yesekaleɔto la hɔle sɛlɛvolɛ mgbanyinli ne mɔ ɛkɛ
40026015	hɔbizale bɛ kɛ, “Saa meye Gyisɛse memaa bɛ a, duzu a bɛkɛva bɛkɛmaa me a?” Bɛdianle dwɛtɛ fufule abulasa bɛmanle ye.
40026016	Na ɔvi mekɛ ne anu Dwudase bɔle ɔ bo kɛ ɔkpondɛ adenle yealua zo yeaye Gyisɛse yeamaa.
40026017	Angye Ɛvoyia ne kenle ne mɔɔ lumua la anu, Gyisɛse ɛdoavolɛma ne rabizale ye kɛ, “Nienwu a ɛkulo kɛ yɛsiezie Akpabɛnwo Ɛvoyia aleɛ ne yɛmaa wɔ a?”
40026018	Ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Bɛhɔ suakpole ne azo na bɛhɔ asomasi ɛkɛ ne bɛhɔze ye kɛ, ‘Kilehilevolɛ ne se: Me mekɛ ne ɛdwu; me nee me ɛdoavolɛma ne yɛbali Akpabɛnwo Ɛvoyia aleɛ ne wɔ wɔ sua nu ɛkɛ.’ ”
40026019	Na ɛdoavolɛma ne yɛle mɔɔ ɔzele bɛ la na bɛhɔzieziele Akpabɛnwo Ɛvoyia aleɛ ne.
40026020	Ye nɔsolɛ nu, Gyisɛse nee ye ɛdoavolɛma ne dɛnlanle aze,
40026021	na mɔɔ bɛdi debie la Gyisɛse zele bɛ kɛ, “Nɔhalɛ, meka meahile bɛ, bɛ nuhua ko baye me amaa.”
40026022	Ɛdoavolɛma ne mɔ atiakunlu yɛle bɛ naa na bɛbɔle ɔ bo kɛ bɛbiza ye ngoko kɛ, “Awulae, asoo mame ɔ?”
40026023	Gyisɛse buale kɛ, “Ahenle ne mɔɔ me nee ye yɛ sa ɛhɔ ɛyɛba ye anu la a baye me amaa a.
40026024	Na mame Sonla Ra, mebawu, kɛmɔ Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne se la, na ahenle mɔɔ ɔdua ɔ nwo zo bɛaye Sonla Ra ne bɛamaa la, ye gyakɔ! Ɔle kpalɛ kɛ anrɛɛ bɛanwo ye!”
40026025	Na Dwudase mɔɔ yele ye manle la hanle kɛ, “Kilehilevolɛ, ɛnee mame ɔ?” Gyisɛse buale kɛ, “Yemɔ ala a wɔha la.”
40026026	Mɔɔ bɛlɛdi debie la, Gyisɛse vale kpanwo, ɔyilale zolɛ, ɔbubule nuhua ɔmanle ye ɛdoavolɛma ne na ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Bɛlie bɛli, ɛhye a le me nwonane ne a.”
40026027	Akee ɔvale dwora, ɔyɛle Nyamenle mo, ɔvale ɔmanle bɛ na ɔzele kɛ, “Bɛ muala bɛnlo,
40026028	ɛhye a le me mogya ne mɔɔ bɛhwi bɛgua wɔ menli dɔɔnwo bɛ ɛtane fakyɛ ti, na ɔsɔ Nyamenle ngyekyeleɛ ne anloa la.
40026029	Meka meahile bɛ, menrɛnlo vanye ma nu nzule bieko kɔkpula kenle ne mɔɔ me nee bɛ banlo ye bieko wɔ Egya Belemgbunlililɛ nu la.”
40026030	Akee bɛdole edwɛne na bɛhɔle Ɔlivi Boka ne azo.
40026031	Akee Gyisɛse zele bɛ kɛ, “Ɛnɛ nɔe bɛ muala bɛbanriandi bɛagyakyi me, ɔluakɛ Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne se, ‘Nyamenle bahu mboaneneavolɛ ne, na mboane ne babɔ asande.’
40026032	Na saa bɛdwazo me bɛba ngoane nu a, mebalumua bɛ nyunlu wɔ Galeli.”
40026033	Pita zele Gyisɛse kɛ, “Saa bɛ muala bɛnriandi bɛgyakyi wɔ a me ngome ɛdeɛ, menrɛgyakyi wɔ ɛlɛ!”
40026034	Gyisɛse zele ye kɛ, “Kakye ɛhye, ɛnɛ nɔe, toonwo mɔɔ akɔlɛ kabɔ la, ɛnee wɔha ye fane nsa kɛ ɛnze me!”
40026035	Pita buale kɛ, “Saa ewule nu bɔbɔ a, menrɛha ye ɛlɛ kɛ menze wɔ!” Na ɛdoavolɛma ne amuala hanle zɔhane ala.
40026036	Akee Gyisɛse nee ye ɛdoavolɛma ne hɔle ɛleka bie mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye Gɛtesɛmani la, na ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Bɛdɛnla ɛke na mekɔ meahɔzɛlɛ.”
40026037	Na ɔvale Pita nee Zɛbɛdi amra nwiɔ ne ɔbokale ɔ nwo bɛhɔle. Alɔbɔlɛ nee nyane hanle ye kpole
40026038	na ɔzele kɛ, “Nyane ɛha me dedee yeha me ɛkɛla mɔɔ wɔ me nu la. Bɛdɛnla ɛke na bɛ nee me ɛzinza.”
40026039	Akee ɔhɔle ɔ nyunlu ekyii la ɔbutule mutule nu na ɔzele kɛ, “Egya, saa ɛyɛ na ɔkɛyɛ boɛ a, ye amaneɛnwunlɛ dwora ye fi me nloa! Noko tɛ kɛ mɔɔ mame mekulo la ɔ, na maa ɔyɛ kɛ mɔɔ wɔ ɛhulolɛ ne de la.”
40026040	Ɔziale ɔrale ɛdoavolɛma nsa ne anwo ɛkɛ ne la ɛnee bɛlafe; na ɔzele Pita kɛ, “Yemɔti, bɛangola bɛ nee me anzinza dɔnehwele ko bɔbɔ?
40026041	Bɛzinza na bɛzɛlɛ amaa bɛangɔndɔ sɔnea nu. Sunsum ne kulo na nwonane ne anwo ɛnyɛ se.”
40026042	Gyisɛse ziale hɔle na ɔhɔzɛlɛle bieko kɛ, “Egya, saa bɛye amaneɛnwunlɛ dwora ɛhye me nloa a ɔnyɛ boɛ na ɔwɔ kɛ meno nu a, ɛnee wɔ ɛhulolɛdeɛ ɛyɛ ɛkɛ.”
40026043	Ɔziale bieko la ɔradole ɛdoavolɛma ne kɛ bɛlafe na bɛte bɛ nye a ɔnde fee.
40026044	Gyisɛse eza gyakyile bɛ ɛkɛ ne na ɔhɔle ɔhɔzɛlɛle fane nsa ne azo, na ɔhanle edwɛkɛ ko ne ala.
40026045	Akee ɔziale ɔrale ɛdoavolɛma ne mɔ anwo ɛkɛ ne na ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Na bɛtɛda? Bɛnlea! Mekɛ ne ɛdwu, bɛye Sonla Ra ne bɛwula ɛtanevolɛma asa anu.
40026046	Bɛdwazo, bɛmaa yɛhɔ. Bɛnlea, ahenle mɔɔ ɛye me ɛmaa la ɛne!”
40026047	Mɔɔ Gyisɛse anloa wɔ zo ɔlɛtendɛ la yɛɛ Dwudase mɔɔ le bulu nee nwiɔ ne anu ko la rale a. Ɔ nee menli dɔɔnwo kpalɛ mɔɔ bie mɔ dedɛ dadeɛ nee ahoholombaka la a rale a. Sɛlɛvolɛ mgbanyinli ne nee Dwuu mgbanyima ne mɔ a zoanle bɛ a.
40026048	Dwudase hilele ɛlɔne ne sɛkɛlɛneɛ kɛ, “Sonla ne mɔɔ menwɔvo ɔ nloa anwo la ɛnee mɔɔ bɛkpondɛ ye la ɛne. Bɛhye ye.”
40026049	Dwudase dwule ɛkɛ ne ala la, ɔhɔle Gyisɛse anwo ɛkɛ ne na ɔzele kɛ, “Kilehilevolɛ, anzonudwolɛ ɛha wɔ.” Na ɔvole ɔ nloa anwo.
40026050	Gyisɛse zele ye kɛ, “Ayi, ɛbayɛ duzu ɛke?” Ɛlɔne ne rahyele Gyisɛse na bɛzɔle ye kpalɛ.
40026051	Menli mɔɔ ɛnee nee Gyisɛse wɔ ɛkɛ ne la anu ko hwenle ye dadeɛ ne bɔle sɛlɛvolɛ kpanyinli ne akɛlɛ ne na ɔpɛle ɔ nzo ko.
40026052	Gyisɛse zele ye kɛ, “Fa wɔ dadeɛ ne wula ye boa ne anu, ɔluakɛ bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛtwe dadeɛ la, bɛwu dadeɛ nloa.
40026053	Ɛnze kɛ mekola mesɛlɛ Egya moalɛ, na ɛkɛ ne ala ɔmaa anwuma soanvolɛma mɔɔ bo ekpunli bulu nee nwiɔ la ba ɔ?
40026054	Noko saa ɔba ye zɔhane a, ɛnee kɛ ɔkɛyɛ na Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne mɔɔ se ɛhye mɔ bazi la ayɛ nɔhalɛ ɛ?”
40026055	Akee Gyisɛse zele ɛlɔne ne kɛ, “Duzu ati a bɛdedɛ dadeɛ nee ahoholombaka bɛra bɛbahye me kɛ asɛɛ bɛdoa awule la ɛ? Dahuu mekilehile wɔ Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne anu, noko bɛangye me.
40026056	Na ɛhye mɔ amuala ɛzi amaa mɔɔ Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛ ne hɛlɛle wɔ Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne anu la ayɛ nɔhalɛ.” Na ye ɛdoavolɛma ne amuala nriandile gyakyile ye.
40026057	Menli mɔɔ hyele Gyisɛse la vale ye hɔle Sɛlɛvolɛ Kpanyinli Kayafase sua nu. Mekɛ ne anu ɛnee mɛla kilehilevolɛma ne nee mgbanyima ne mɔ ɛwie yia.
40026058	Pita doale Gyisɛse nanamogya toonwo ɔhɔdwule Sɛlɛvolɛ Kpanyinli ne sua nu ɛkɛ. Ɔwolole ɛkɛ ne na ɔhɔdɛnlanle sinzavolɛma ne avinli kɛ ɔnea mɔɔ ɛzi la guabelɛ.
40026059	Sɛlɛvolɛ mgbanyinli ne nee ayiama ne mɔ amuala bɔle mɔdenle kɛ bɛkpondɛ ɛzonle bɛado Gyisɛse anwo zo na bɛahu ye;
40026060	na bɛannyia bie. Ɛhye ati dasevolɛma adalɛ dɔɔnwo rale, noko nuhua nwiɔ bɔbɔ anloa anyɛ ko. Nzinlii menli nwiɔ bie rale ayiama ne anyunlu
40026061	na bɛzele kɛ, “Nrenya ɛhye zele kɛ, ‘Mekola mebubu Nyamenle Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne na mefa kenle nsa mesi ye bieko.’ ”
40026062	Sɛlɛvolɛ Kpanyinli ne dwazole na ɔzele Gyisɛse kɛ, “Ɛnlɛ mualɛ biala wɔ ndoanlɛ ɛhye mɔ anwo ɔ?”
40026063	Na Gyisɛse andɛ ɔ nloa anu. Sɛlɛvolɛ Kpanyinli ne akee zele Gyisɛse kɛ, “Nea tease Nyamenle ne anyunlu na ka kile yɛ saa wɔmɔ a ɛle Mɛzaya ne, mɔɔ le Nyamenle Ara ne a.”
40026064	Gyisɛse buale kɛ, “Yemɔ ala a wɔha la. Na meka meahile bɛ muala kɛ, ɔvi mekɛ ɛhye mɔɔ kɔ la bɛbanwu medame Sonla Ra, kɛ mede Tumivolɛ Nyamenle ne asa fema zo, na melua amungu nu melɛba bieko.”
40026065	Ɛhye manle Sɛlɛvolɛ Kpanyinli ne vale ɛya na ɔsuosuanle ɔdaye mumua ne ye tɛladeɛ mɔɔ ɔwula la anu na ɔzele kɛ, “Yedindi Nyamenle anyunlu! Yɛngyia dasevolɛma bieko. Kɛkala bɛdabɛ bɛde ye munzule edwɛkɛ mɔɔ yeha la!
40026066	Na kɛ bɛdwenle nwo bɛse ɛ?” Bɛbuale kɛ, “Ɔfɛta ewule.”
40026067	Akee bɛtotole nyɛlɛ ɔ nyunlu na bɛbole ye; menli ne bie mɔ pepɛle ɔ nye zo
40026068	na bɛzele ye kɛ, “Mɛzaya, ka kile yɛ, nwane a bɔle wɔ a?”
40026069	Pita de alie ne anwo la, Sɛlɛvolɛ Kpanyinli ne sonvolɛ raalɛ ko rale ɛkɛ ne razele ye kɛ, “Ɛdawɔ noko ɛ nee Gyisɛse mɔɔ vi Galeli la a lua a.”
40026070	Pita zale wɔ bɛ muala bɛ nyunlu ɛkɛ ne kɛ, “Menze mɔɔ ɛlɛka la anwo bie.”
40026071	Na ɔvindele ɔragyinlanle anlenkɛ ne anloa kpɔda bie abo. Bɛlɛra sonvolɛ ko noko nwunle ye na ɔzele menli mɔɔ wɔ ɛkɛ ne la kɛ, “Nrenya ɛhye nee Gyisɛse mɔɔ vi Nazalɛte la a lua a.”
40026072	Pita lile amonle na ɔhanle ɔzɔle zolɛ kɛ, “Menze nrenya ne hweledede.”
40026073	Ɔ nzi angyɛ biala, menli mɔɔ gyigyi ɛkɛ ne la rale Pita anwo ɛkɛ ne razele ye kɛ, “Ɔle nɔhalɛ bɔkɔɔ kɛ ɛboka bɛ, wɔ ɛdendɛlɛ bɔbɔ kile!”
40026074	Pita hanle ndane, wale ɔ nwo amonle na ɔhanle ɔzɔle zolɛ kɛ, “Nɔhalɛ, menze nrenya ne!” Ɛkɛ ne ala akɔlɛ bɔle,
40026075	na Pita hakyele edwɛkɛ ne mɔɔ Gyisɛse hanle hilele ye la kɛ, “Mɔɔ akɔlɛ kabɔ la, ɛnee wɔha ye fane nsa kɛ ɛnze me.” Na ɔvindele ɔhɔzunle alɔbɔlɛ ɛzunlɛ.
40027001	Aleɛ hyenle nwonlomɔ mangyee ne la, sɛlɛvolɛ mgbanyinli ne mɔ amuala nee Dwuu mgbanyima ne mɔ bɔle kpɔkɛ kɛ bɛmaa bɛahu Gyisɛse.
40027002	Bɛguale ye anga na bɛvale ye bɛhɔmanle Paelɛte mɔɔ le Wulomu amɛnlado ne.
40027003	Mɔɔ Dwudase mɔɔ yele ye manle la nwunle kɛ bɛbu Gyisɛse ewule fɔlɛ la, ɔnlunle ɔ nwo na ɔvale dwɛtɛ fufule abulasa ne ɔhɔmanle sɛlɛvolɛ mgbanyinli ne nee mgbanyima ne mɔ
40027004	na ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Meyɛ ɛtane kɛ meye sonla mɔɔ ɛnze nwolɛ bie la memaa kɛ bɛhu ye a!” Bɛbuale ye kɛ, “Na ɛhye fane yɛ nwo ɔ? Ɛdawɔ wɔ edwɛkɛ ɔ!”
40027005	Dwudase vuandinle ezukoa ne guale Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne anu na ɔhɔle ɔhɔzɔle ɔ kɔme nyɛma.
40027006	Sɛlɛvolɛ mgbanyinli ne mɔ sesale ezukoa ne na bɛhanle kɛ, “Ɛhye le mogya ezukoa, yɛɛ ɔtia yɛ mɛla ne kɛ yɛkɛva yɛkɛgua Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne gya ne anu.”
40027007	Yemɔti bɛdwenlenle nwolɛ na bɛvale ezukoa ne bɛhɔdɔle azɛlɛ mɔɔ awie bie nwo ye mbuakɛ nee ɛyɛba wɔ zo la, bɛvale bɛyɛle nyɛvolɛ azie.
40027008	Na ɛnɛ nee ɛnɛ ala, bɛfɛlɛ ye “Mogya Azɛlɛ.”
40027009	Ɛhye manle edwɛkɛ ne mɔɔ Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛ Gyɛlɛmaya hanle la yɛle nɔhalɛ kɛ, “Bɛvale dwɛtɛ fufule abulasa ne, mɔɔ le ɔ ti ezukoa ne, mɔɔ Yizilayɛma bie mɔ ɛkponle zo ɛva ɛdɔ ye la
40027010	bɛdɔle azɛlɛ bɛvile awie bie mɔɔ nwo mbuakɛ nee ɛyɛba wɔ zo la ɛkɛ, kɛmɔ Awulae hanle hilele me ala la.”
40027011	Bɛvale Gyisɛse bɛraziele amɛnlado ne anyunlu na amɛnlado ne bizale ye kɛ, “Wɔmɔ a ɛle Dwuuma belemgbunli ne la ɔ?” Gyisɛse buale ye kɛ, “Yemɔ ne ala a wɔha la.”
40027012	Na mɔɔ sɛlɛvolɛ mgbanyinli ne nee mgbanyima ne mɔ toɔdoa ye la, yeandɛ ɔ nloa anu.
40027013	Yemɔti Paelɛte zele ye kɛ, “Ɛnde mɔɔ bɛlɛkeha bɛatia wɔ la ɔ?”
40027014	Na Gyisɛse ambua ye, yɛɛ yeanye ndoanlɛ ko bɔbɔ anloa, na ɔzinle amɛnlado ne anwo kpole.
40027015	Akpabɛnwo Ɛvoyia ne dwu zo a, amɛnlado ne ta ye pilizanli ko mɔɔ menli ne kɛbiza la maa bɛ.
40027016	Mekɛ ne anu ɛnee pilizanli maamɔvo ko wɔ ɛkɛ ne. Bɛfɛlɛ ye Gyisɛse Balabase.
40027017	Yemɔti mɔɔ menli ne yiale la, Paelɛte bizale bɛ kɛ, “Boni a bɛkulo kɛ meye ye memaa bɛ a, Gyisɛse Balabase anzɛɛ Gyisɛse ne mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye Kelaese ne la?”
40027018	Ɔluakɛ Paelɛte ze ye wienyi kɛ ɛkpɔlɛ ti yɛɛ menli ne ɛva Gyisɛse ɛrɛlɛ ye a.
40027019	Eza mɔɔ ɛnee Paelɛte de ye ndɛnebualɛ ebia ne anu la, ɔ ye dole ye nrɛlaleɛ kɛ, “Mmayɛ nrenya ne ɛhwee na ɔnze nwolɛ bie. Ɔlua yemɔ ɔ ti, menwu ɛzulolɛ kpole ɛnɛ nɔe wɔ ɛlalɛ nu.”
40027020	Sɛlɛvolɛ mgbanyinli ne nee mgbanyima ne mɔ lile wulale menli ne kɛ bɛbiza bɛlie Balabase na bɛmaa bɛhu Gyisɛse.
40027021	Paelɛte bizale bɛ bieko kɛ, “Menli nwiɔ ɛhye, boni a bɛkulo kɛ meye ye memaa bɛ a?” Bɛbuale ye kɛ, “Balabase ɔ!”
40027022	Paelɛte bizale bɛ kɛ, “Na kɛ menyɛ Gyisɛse ne mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye Kelaese ne la ɛ?” Na bɛ muala bɛhanle kɛ, “Bɔ ye meanubaka nu!”
40027023	Paelɛte bizale bɛ kɛ, “Kɛmɔti ɛ, duzu ɛtane a yeyɛ a?” Na bɛdeɛdeanle nuhua kpole kɛ, “Bɔ ye meanubaka nu!”
40027024	Mɔɔ Paelɛte nwunle kɛ ɔyɛ nwolɛ bie ala a ɔnrɛyɛ boɛ, na ɔlua zo nzaka kpondɛ ara la, ɔvale nzule ɔnrinzinle ɔ sa anwo wɔ menli ne amuala anyunlu ɛkɛ ne na ɔzele kɛ, “Menze sonla ɛhye ewule ne anwo bie; menli nwolɛ ɛzonle! Bɛdabɛ bɛ edwɛkɛ ɔ!”
40027025	Na bɛ muala bɛdeanle nu bɛzele kɛ, “Maa ye mogya ɛgua yɛdayɛ nee yɛ mra ati zo!”
40027026	Akee Paelɛte yele Balabase manle bɛ; ɔmanle bɛbilale Gyisɛse empele na ɔyele ye ɔmanle bɛ kɛ bɛhɔbɔ ye meanubaka nu.
40027027	Paelɛte sogyama ne vale Gyisɛse hɔle amɛnlado ne suakunlu ɛkɛ ne, na bɛvɛlɛle bɛ ekpunli ne anu amra bɛmanle bɛrayiale.
40027028	Bɛkpolokpolole ye adɛladeɛ ɛdeɛ ne mɔ na bɛvale tɛladeɛ kɔkɔlɛ bie mɔɔ arelemgbunli ala a wula la bɛwulale ye.
40027029	Bɛvale evileni bɛnwonle abɔtile bɛkpolole ɔ ti, na bɛvale baka bɛwulale ɔ sa fema ne anu; akee bɛhotole ɔ nyunlu ɛkɛ ne na bɛzile ye amgbu bɛhanle kɛ, “Dwuuma Belemgbunli, nyi kyɛ!”
40027030	Bɛtotole nyɛlɛ ɔ nyunlu na bɛliele baka ne ɔ sa nu bɛvale bɛbɔle ɔ ti zo.
40027031	Bɛgolole ɔ nwo bɛwiele la, bɛyele arelemgbunli tɛladeɛ kɔkɔlɛ ne ɔ nwo na bɛvale ye adɛladeɛ ɛdeɛ ne mɔ bɛwulale ye na akee bɛvale ye bɛhɔle kɛ bɛkabɔ ye meanubaka nu.
40027032	Bɛzile nu mɔɔ bɛkɔ la, bɛ nee nrenya bie mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye Saemɔn mɔɔ vi Saelini maanle nu la yiale, na bɛhyele ye mialera nu bɛmanle ɔzoale Gyisɛse meanubaka ne.
40027033	Bɛrale ɛleka bie mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye Hibulu aneɛ nu “Gɔlogɔta” la; (ɔ bo a le Etile Kanrɛlɛ Ɛleka)
40027034	bɛvale nwanye mɔɔ bɛva bɔnyema bɛkpoto nu la bɛmanle ye kɛ ɔnlo; na ɔbɔle zolɛ la, yeanno.
40027035	Bɛbɔle ye meanubaka nu na akee bɛguale nzeleba bɛhyɛle ye adɛladeɛ ne mɔ bɛvale.
40027036	Nzinlii bɛdɛnlanle aze na bɛzinzale ye.
40027037	Bɛhɛlɛle deɛ mɔɔ ɔlua zo mɔɔ yemɔti bɛhunle ye la bɛbɔle ye meanubaka ne azo anwuma kɛ, “Ɛhye a le Gyisɛse, Dwuuma Belemgbunli ne.”
40027038	Bɛbɔle nwule nwiɔ noko meanubaka nu bɛbokale Gyisɛse anwo; ko wɔ ye fema zo yɛɛ ko wɔ ye bɛne zo.
40027039	Bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛpɛle nuhua ɛkɛ ne la zile Gyisɛse amgbu, bɛyɛle ye aholoba kɛ,
40027040	“Wɔmɔ ɛdawɔ ɛse ɛkola ɛbubu Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne na ɛfa kenle nsa ɛsi! Saa wɔmɔ a ɛle Nyamenle Ara ne a, die ɛ nwo ɛ! Ɛvi meanubaka ne azo dwu aze!”
40027041	Sɛlɛvolɛ mgbanyinli ne nee mɛla kilehilevolɛma ne nee mgbanyima ne mɔ noko zile ye amgbu kɛ,
40027042	“Ɔdie awie mɔ ngoane, noko ɔngola ɔnlie ɔ nwo ngoane! Tɛ yemɔ a ɔle Yizilayɛma belemgbunli ne la ɔ? Ɔvi meanubaka ne azo ɔdwu aze kɛkala na yɛkɛlie ye yɛkɛli.
40027043	Ɔfa ɔ rɛle ɔwula Nyamenle nu na ɔka kɛ ɔle Nyamenle Ara. Akee bɛmaa yɛnlea saa Nyamenle kɛlie ye ngoane kɛkala a!”
40027044	Nwule ne mɔ mɔɔ bɛbɔle bɛ nee ye meanubaka nu la, bɛdabɛ bɛyɛle ye aholoba zɔhane ala.
40027045	Mɔɔ ɔdwule sɛnzɛngyinla la awozinli vale azɛlɛ ye kɔsɔɔti azo toonwo dɔnehwele nsa.
40027046	Mɔɔ dɔne nsa asɛɛ ɛbɔ la, Gyisɛse deanle nuhua hanle ye Hibulu aneɛ nu kɛ, “Yilae, Yilae, lɛma sabaketani?” Ɔ bo a le, “Me Nyamenle, me Nyamenle, duzu ati a wɔkpo me ɛ?”
40027047	Menli mɔɔ gyigyi ɛkɛ ne la bie mɔ dele na bɛzele kɛ, “Ɔlɛfɛlɛ Yilaegya!”
40027048	Ɛkɛ ne ala bɛ nuhua ko nriandile hɔvale emiane bɔle nza nvinli nu vale duale baka ti na ɔvale ɔmanle ye kɛ ɔnlo.
40027049	Na bie mɔ zele kɛ, “Bɛgyinla, bɛmaa yɛnlea, saa Yilaegya kɛralie ye a!” [Na ko noko vale atwɛ wɔle ɔ nvenle, na ɔhwinle mogyanzule.]
40027050	Na Gyisɛse deanle nu kpole bieko na ɔwule.
40027051	Ɛkɛ ne ala Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne anu mgbɛnu ɛdanlɛ ne dele ebule nwiɔ, ɔvi anwuma ɔpenle aze. Azɛlɛ kpusule, awolɛ kpukekpukele,
40027052	sɛka zo bukebukele, na bɛdwazole Nyamenle menli ne mɔɔ ɛwu la anu dɔɔnwo bɛrale ngoane nu.
40027053	Mɔɔ Nyamenle dwazole Gyisɛse vile ewule nu la, bɛdabɛ noko bɛvile bɛ nla ne mɔ anu bɛvindele na bɛhɔle Suakpole Nwuanzanwuanza Gyɛlusalɛm azo, na bɛyele bɛ nwo bɛhilele menli dɔɔnwo.
40027054	Mɔɔ sogyama ne nee bɛ kpanyinli ne mɔɔ ɛnee ɛlɛsinza Gyisɛse la nwunle azɛlɛ ɛkpusulɛ ne nee ninyɛne mɔɔ sisile la, bɛzulole kpole na bɛzele kɛ, “Amgba, nrenya ne le Nyamenle Ara!”
40027055	Ɛnee mraalɛ dɔɔnwo bie wɔ ɛkɛ ne, bɛgyinlanle amozi moa moa na bɛnleanle mɔɔ ɛlɛkɔ zolɛ la. Bɛdoale Gyisɛse bɛ nee ye vi Galeli na bɛzonlenle ye.
40027056	Bɛ nuhua bie mɔ a le Mɛle mɔɔ vi Magedala la, Mɛle mɔɔ le Gyemise nee Dwosefi bɛ nli ne, yɛɛ Zɛbɛdi amra ne mɔ bɛ nli ne.
40027057	Mɔɔ aleɛ ne hɔle bie la, sukoavolɛ bie mɔɔ vi Arelematia la rale; bɛfɛlɛ ye Dwosefi, na ɔdaye noko ɔle Gyisɛse ɛdoavolɛ.
40027058	Ɔhɔle Paelɛte anyunlu ɔhɔzɛlɛle Gyisɛse funli ne. Na Paelɛte manle bɛhɔyele funle ne bɛmanle ye.
40027059	Yemɔti Dwosefi vale funli ne, ɔkyekyele ye wɔ kisane nu,
40027060	na ɔziele ye wɔ ɔdaye ye nla fofolɛ mɔɔ yemaa bɛpɛ wɔ bolɛ bie anu la anu. Akee ɔhundole bolɛ kpole bie ɔnyinle nla ne anloa na ɔhɔle.
40027061	Mɛle mɔɔ vi Magedala la nee Mɛle ɛhendeɛ ne wɔ ɛkɛ ne bie, bɛdede aze na bɛ nye gyi sɛka ne anwo.
40027062	Aleɛ hyenle la, kenle ne le Ɛnwomenlelielɛ Kenle, sɛlɛvolɛ mgbanyinli ne nee Falasiima ne mɔ yiale Paelɛte,
40027063	na bɛzele ye kɛ, “Yɛmenle, yɛkakye kɛ mekɛ mɔɔ adalɛ ne de aze la, ɔhanle kɛ, ‘Ye kenle nsa ne azo bɛbadwazo me bɛara ngoane nu.’
40027064	Yemɔti maa adenle maa bɛzinza sɛka ne kpalɛ ɔhɔkpula kenle nsa ne, amaa ye ɛdoavolɛma ne angɔnwua ye, na bɛaraha bɛahile menli kɛ, ‘Bɛdwazo ye bɛvi ewule nu.’ Saa ɛhye si a, adalɛ ɛhye kɛdɛla alumua ɛdeɛ ne bɔkɔɔ.”
40027065	Paelɛte zele bɛ kɛ, “Bɛva sinzavolɛma bɛmaa bɛhɔzinza sɛka ne, kɛmɔ bɛdabɛ bɛkpondɛ la.”
40027066	Yemɔti bɛhɔle bɛhɔzɔle nla ne anloa na bɛmanle sogyama zinzale.
40028001	Ɛnwomenlelielɛ Kenle ne anzi, mɔɔ le Molɛ aleɛbahye ne, Mɛle mɔɔ vi Magedala la nee Mɛle ko ne hɔle sɛka ne azo.
40028002	Kenle ko ne nɔe ne, azɛlɛ kpusule kpole bie, ɔluakɛ Awulae soanvolɛ dwule aze rahundole bolɛ ne wɔ nla ne anloa na ɔdɛnlanle zolɛ.
40028003	Ye ɛralɛ ne yɛle kɛ ɛsɛnlɛmanye mɔɔ ɛkpakye la, na ye tɛladeɛ ne dale nwohyee kɛ ezukɔtweaba.
40028004	Sinzavolɛma ne zulole kpole, bɛ nwo wozole bɛ na bɛyɛle kɛ menli mɔɔ ɛwu la.
40028005	Na Nyamenle soanvolɛ ne zele mraalɛ ne mɔ kɛ, “Bɛmmasulo, meze kɛ bɛkpondɛ Gyisɛse mɔɔ bɛbɔle ye meanubaka nu la.
40028006	Ɔnle ɛke; bɛdwazo ye bɛvi ewule nu, kɛmɔ ɔhanle la. Bɛrɛla bɛranlea ɛleka mɔɔ ɔlale la.
40028007	Bɛmaa ɔyɛ ndɛ bɛhɔze ye ɛdoavolɛma ne kɛ bɛdwazo ye bɛvi ewule nu, na kɛkala, yelumua bɛ nyunlu wɔ Galeli; ɛkɛ ne yɛɛ bɛkɛnwu ye a! Bɛhakye mɔɔ meha mehile bɛ la.”
40028008	Yemɔti ndɛndɛ ne ala bɛvale ɛzulolɛ nee fɛlɛkolilɛ bɛvile sɛka ne azo bɛhɔle, na bɛvale ɛnriandilɛ kɛ bɛkabɔ Gyisɛse ɛdoavolɛma ne amaneɛ.
40028009	Arɛlevilɛ nu ala Gyisɛse nee bɛ yiale adenle ne anu na ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Anzonudwolɛ ɛha bɛ.” Bɛrale ɔ nwo ɛkɛ ne, bɛzɔle ɔ gyakɛ na bɛzonlenle ye.
40028010	Gyisɛse zele bɛ kɛ, “Bɛmmasulo; bɛhɔze me mediema ne mɔ kɛ bɛhɔ Galeli, na ɛkɛ ne yɛɛ bɛkɛnwu me a.”
40028011	Mɔɔ mraalɛ ne mɔ kadwu la ɛnee sogyama ne mɔɔ zinzale sɛka ne la bie mɔ ɛdwu sua zo dɛbadɛba ɛraha mɔɔ ɛzi la amuala ɛhile sɛlɛvolɛ mgbanyinli ne mɔ.
40028012	Sɛlɛvolɛ mgbanyinli ne mɔ noko yiale mgbanyima ne na bɛyɛle ngyehyɛlɛ bɛvale ezukoa kpole bie bɛmanle sogyama ne
40028013	na bɛzele bɛ kɛ; “Bɛha ye kɛ, ‘Nɔe ne mɔɔ ɛnee yɛlafe la yɛɛ Gyisɛse ɛdoavolɛma ne rawuale ye funli ne a.’
40028014	Na saa amɛnlado ne te a yɛkɛhɔnwu ye na awie biala ɛnrɛgyegye bɛ.”
40028015	Sinzavolɛma ne liele ezukoa ne na bɛyɛle mɔɔ bɛhanle bɛhilele bɛ la. Yemɔti toonwo mɔɔ yeradwu ɛnɛ la, edwɛkɛ mɔɔ Dwuuma ɛva ɛkponde la ɛne.
40028016	Ɛdoavolɛma bulu nee ko ne hɔle Galeli wɔ boka bie mɔɔ Gyisɛse ɛhile bɛ la azo.
40028017	Na mɔɔ bɛnwunle ye la bɛzonlenle ye; noko ɛnee bɔbɔ nuhua bie mɔ adwenle ɛngya.
40028018	Gyisɛse bikyele bɛ na ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Bɛva tumi muala mɔɔ wɔ anwuma nee aze la bɛmaa me.
40028019	Yemɔti bɛhɔ maanle ti nee maanle bo, bɛmaa menli ɛrayɛ me ɛdoavolɛma; bɛzɔne bɛ wɔ Selɛ ne, Ralɛ ne nee Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne duma nu,
40028020	na bɛhilehile bɛ bɛmaa bɛli debie biala mɔɔ meha mehile bɛ la azo. Na bɛhakye kɛ me nee bɛ lua dahuu, kɔkpula ewiade awieleɛ.”
41001001	Gyisɛse Kelaese, Nyamenle Ara ne anwo Edwɛkpa ne ɛne.
41001002	Ɔbɔle ɔ bo, kɛmɔ Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛ Ayezaya hɛlɛle la. Ɔse, “Nyamenle se, ‘Mebazoa me ɛbɔfoɔ meamaa yealumua ɛ nyunlu yeahɔziezie wɔ adenle ne anu.’
41001003	Awie ɛlɛtea nu wɔ fienemgbole ne anu kɛ, ‘Bɛziezie Awulae adenle ne; bɛdenrɛdenrɛ ye ndenle ne mɔ!’ ”
41001004	Mekɛ ne anu Dwɔn vindele fienemgbole ne anu, ɔzɔnenle menli na ɔbɔle nolo kɛ, “Bɛnlu bɛ nwo na bɛmaa bɛzɔne bɛ, na Nyamenle kɛva bɛ ɛtane ne mɔ kɛhyɛ bɛ.”
41001005	Menli dɔɔnwo vi Dwudiya maanzinli ne anu nee suakpole Gyɛlusalɛm azo hɔle kɛ bɛkadie Dwɔn. Bɛhanle bɛ ɛtane ne mɔ na ɔzɔnenle bɛ wɔ Azule Dwɔdan ne anu.
41001006	Dwɔn wula tɛladeɛ mgbane bie mɔɔ bɛva afunlumu enrinli a bɛnwo la, na ɔhye nwoma akyeso; ye aleɛ a le abɛbɛ nee wolɛ.
41001007	Ɔbɔle nolo ɔhilele menli ne kɛ, “Sonla ne mɔɔ li me nzi ɛlɛba la lɛ tumi tɛla me. Menfɛta kɛ menwɔbutu kɛ mesianyi ye mgbɔlaboa zo nyɛma bɔbɔ.
41001008	Mame, mefa nzule a mesɔne a; na yemɔ, ɔbava Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne a yeazɔne bɛ a.”
41001009	Mekɛ ne anu Gyisɛse vi Nazalɛte mɔɔ wɔ Galeli maanzinli nu la rale, na ɔmanle Dwɔn zɔnenle ye wɔ Dwɔdan ne anu.
41001010	Mɔɔ Gyisɛse vi azule ne anu vole file zo ala la, ɔnwunle kɛ anwuma ɛbuke na Sunsum ne ɛlɛdwu ɔ nwo zo kɛ abubule la.
41001011	Na ɛnelɛ bie vi anwuma zele kɛ, “Wɔmɔ a ɛle me ra mɔɔ mekulo wɔ kpalɛ a. Me nye die ɛ nwo kpole.”
41001012	Ndɛndɛ ne ala Sunsum ne vale ye hɔle fienemgbole ne anu.
41001013	Ɔlile kenle abulanla wɔ ɛkɛ ne, na Seetan zɔle ye nleanle. Ɔ nee ɛbɔ nu nanemgbole dɛnlanle, na Nyamenle soanvolɛma raboale ye.
41001014	Nzinlii mɔɔ bɛhyele Dwɔn bɛdole efiade la, Gyisɛse hɔle Galeli hɔbɔle Edwɛkpa ne nolo kɛ,
41001015	“Mekɛ ne ɛdwu, Nyamenle Belemgbunlililɛ ne ɛbikye. Bɛnlu bɛ nwo na bɛlie Edwɛkpa ne bɛli.”
41001016	Gyisɛse lua Galeli Tandane ne anloa la, ɔnwunle fɛlɛkyevoma nwiɔ kɛ bɛlɛgua asawu. Bɛmɛ a le Saemɔn nee ɔ diema Andelu.
41001017	Gyisɛse zele bɛ kɛ, “Bɛrɛla bɛmaa yɛhɔ na mebahilehile bɛ meamaa bɛahye menli kɛ bɛkye fɛlɛ la.”
41001018	Na bɛgyakyile bɛ asawu ne mɔ ɛkɛ ne na bɛ nee ye hɔle.
41001019	Ɔhɔle ɔ nyunlu ekyii la, ɔnwunle mediema nwiɔ bieko, Gyemise nee Dwɔn, nrenya Zɛbɛdi amra ne mɔ kɛ bɛwɔ ɛlɛne nu bɛlɛsa bɛ avonle.
41001020	Gyisɛse vɛlɛle bɛ, na bɛgyakyile bɛ ze Zɛbɛdi nee ye ɛkpama ne mɔ wɔ ɛlɛne ne anu na bɛdoale ye.
41001021	Gyisɛse nee ye ɛdoavolɛma ne dwule Kapɛnayɛm sua zo la, bɛhɔle nyianu sua ne anu wɔ Ɛnwomenlelielɛ Kenle ne, na Gyisɛse bɔle ɔ bo kɛ ɔkilehile.
41001022	Ye ngilehilelɛ ne zinle menli mɔɔ diele ye la anwo, ɔboalekɛ ɔngilehile kɛ mɛla kilehilevolɛma ne mɔ la. Ɔkilehile kɛ sonla mɔɔ lɛ tumi la.
41001023	Mekɛ ne anu ala, nrenya bie mɔɔ sunsum ɛtane wɔ ɔ nwo la vindele nyianu sua ne anu na ɔdeanle nu ɔzele kɛ,
41001024	“Gyisɛse mɔɔ vi Nazalɛte, kɛ yɛze wɔ ɛ? Wɔra kɛ ɛbazɛkye yɛ ɔ? Meze wɔ sonlazule: Wɔmɔ a ɛle Nyamenle Sonla ne mɔɔ anwo te la!”
41001025	Gyisɛse deanle sunsum ɛtane ne nu zele kɛ, “Yɛ koonwu na ɛvi ɔ nwo tu!”
41001026	Sunsum ɛtane ne kpusule nrenya ne kpole kpalɛ, na ɔdeanle nu kpole ko, na ɔvi ɔ nwo ɔdule.
41001027	Ɛhye yɛle menli ne amuala azibɛnwo kpole na bɛbizale bɛ nwo ngoko kɛ, “Duzu edwɛkɛ ɛ? Ngilehilelɛ fofolɛ boni ɛ? Nrenya ye lɛ tumi mɔɔ ɔtendɛ ɔkile sunsum ɛtane ne mɔ bɔbɔ a, bɛtie ye!”
41001028	Na Gyisɛse nganeɛ dendenle hɔle Galeli maanzinli ne anu amuala.
41001029	Gyisɛse nee ye ɛdoavolɛma ne yɛɛ Gyemise nee Dwɔn vile nyianu sua ne anu na bɛhɔle Saemɔn nee Andelu sua nu.
41001030	Bɛhɔle la ɛnee ɛyɛlɛyɛlɛ gyi Saemɔn aye ne ɔ nli ne anwo, na ɔla ɛkpa zo. Gyisɛse dwule ɛkɛ ne ala la, bɛbɔle ye amaneɛ
41001031	na ɔhɔle ɔ nwo ɛkɛ. Ɔzɔle raalɛ ne asa ɔboale ye ɔmanle ɔkpogyale ɔ nwo zo ɔdɛnlanle aze. Na ɛkɛ ne ala ye ɛyɛlɛyɛlɛ ne dule, na ɔdwazole ɔkpondɛle debie ɔmanle bɛ.
41001032	Ɔdwule nɔsolɛ nu mɔɔ ɛnee sɛnzɛne ne ɛdɔ la, menli vale bɛ wuleravolɛma nee bɛdabɛ mɔɔ mbɔnsam wɔ bɛ nwo la rɛlɛle Gyisɛse.
41001033	Sua ne azo amra amuala rayile anuhɔlɛ ne.
41001034	Na Gyisɛse yɛle menli ne mɔ ewule ngakyile ne mɔ ayile na ɔdule mbɔnsam dɔɔnwo. Yeammaa adenle yeammaa mbɔnsam ne mɔ andendɛ, ɔluakɛ bɛze ye sonlazule.
41001035	Aleɛbahye ne ala, Gyisɛse dwazole vile sua ne azo na ɔhɔveale ɛleka bie ɔzɛlɛle.
41001036	Saemɔn nee ɔ gɔnwo mɔ hɔle ye ɛkpondɛlɛ;
41001037	bɛnwunle ye la bɛzele kɛ, “Bɛlɛkpondɛ wɔ kpole.”
41001038	Gyisɛse buale kɛ, “Bɛmaa yɛhɔ namunamu mɔɔ bikye ɛke la azo. Ɔwɔ kɛ mebɔ Edwɛkpa ne nolo wɔ ɛkɛ ne mɔ noko, ɔluakɛ ɛhye mɔ ati a membale a.”
41001039	Zɔhane ati ɔhɔkpɔsale Galeli maanzinli ne anu amuala ɔbɔle Edwɛkpa ne nolo wɔ nyianu azua ne mɔ anu na ɔdudule mbɔnsam.
41001040	Kokobɛvolɛ bie rahotole bodole Gyisɛse kɛ, “Saa ɔyɛ wɔ ɛhulolɛ a, ɛkola ɛmaa me nwo sa.”
41001041	Gyisɛse nwunle ye anwunvɔne na ɔvale ɔ sa ɔhanle ye ɔzele kɛ, “Mekulo, ɛ nwo ɛza!”
41001042	Ɛkɛ ne ala nrenya ne kokobɛ ne hɔle na ɔ nwo zale.
41001043	Gyisɛse bɔle ɔ nloa na ɔyele ye ali ndɛndɛ kɛ ɔhɔ,
41001044	na ɔzele ye kɛ, “Nea, mmabɔ mɔɔ ɛzi la azo ɛkile awie biala. Maa ɔyɛ ndɛ kɔva ɛ nwo kile sɛlɛvolɛ ne na bɔ anwonzalɛ azu ne mɔɔ Mosisi hyehyɛle dole ɛkɛ ne la fa kile kɛ ɛ nwo ɛza.”
41001045	Noko nrenya ne hɔbɔle mɔɔ zile la nolo wɔ ɛleka biala ɔmanle ɔlua zo Gyisɛse ɛnee akee ɛngola ɔ nyunlu ye wɔ bagua nu. Ɔhwenle ɔ nwo ɔvile sua zo, noko menli vi ɛleka ɛleka rale ɔ nwo.
41002001	Kenle ekyi guale nu la, Gyisɛse rale Kapɛnayɛm bieko, na menli dele kɛ yera sua nu.
41002002	Yemɔti bɛ dɔɔnwo ne ala rayiale ɛkɛ ne mɔɔ ɛnee bɛnnyia adenle bɔbɔ wɔ anuhɔlɛ ne a. Ɔgua zolɛ ɔlɛka Nyamenle edwɛkɛ ne yeahile bɛ la,
41002003	mrenya nna bie zoale nrenya bie mɔɔ ɛdwidwe la rale.
41002004	Menli ne kɛ si zonle la ati, bɛannyia adenle bɛangɔ Gyisɛse anwo ɛkɛ ne. Zɔhane ati bɛhɔpɛle tokule wɔ sua ne ati zo, ɛleka mɔɔ Gyisɛse de la, na bɛdwulale nrenya ne ɛkpa nu wɔ ɛkɛ.
41002005	Gyisɛse nwunle menli ne mɔ diedi la, ɔzele nrenya ne mɔɔ ɛdwidwe la kɛ, “Me ra, bɛva wɔ ɛtane ne mɔ bɛhyɛ wɔ.”
41002006	Mɛla kilehilevolɛma ne bie mɔ mɔɔ dede ɛkɛ ne la dwenlenle ye bɛ ti anu kɛ,
41002007	“Duzu munzule edwɛkɛ a sonla ye ɛlɛka atia Nyamenle la? Nyamenle ala a fa ɛtane kyɛ a!”
41002008	Ndɛndɛ ne ala Gyisɛse nwunle bɛ ti anu edwɛkɛ, na ɔbizale bɛ kɛ, “Duzu ati a bɛdwenle ninyɛne ɛhye mɔ ɛ?
41002009	Boni a ye ɛhanlɛ ɛnyɛ se kpalɛ a, kɛ ɛka wɔahile nrenya ye mɔɔ ɛdwidwe la kɛ, ‘Bɛva wɔ ɛtane ne mɔ bɛhyɛ wɔ’, anzɛɛ ‘Dwazo, nyenya wɔ ɛkpa ne na kɔ?’
41002010	Akee memaa bɛanwu kɛ medame Sonla Ra, melɛ tumi wɔ azɛlɛ ye azo kɛ mefa ɛtane mekyɛ.” Na ɔhanle ɔhilele nrenya ne mɔɔ ɛdwidwe la kɛ,
41002011	“Mese, dwazo, nyenya wɔ ɛkpa ne na kɔ sua nu!”
41002012	Menli ne mɔ anye zo ɛkɛ ne ala, nrenya ne mɔɔ ɛdwidwe la dwazole, ɔnyenyanle ye ɛkpa ne na ɔhɔle ndɛndɛ. Ɛhye yɛle menli ne amuala nwanwane kpole na bɛyele Nyamenle ayɛlɛ bɛzele kɛ, “Yɛtɛnwunle debie mɔɔ le zɛhae la bie ɛlɛ.”
41002013	Gyisɛse ziale hɔle Galeli Tandane ne anloa bieko. Menli dɔɔnwo rale ɔ nwo ɛkɛ ne na ɔhilehilele bɛ.
41002014	Wɔ ye ɛkpɔsalɛ ne anu, ɔnwunle Alefiyɛse ara Livae, adwuledievolɛ ne kɛ ɔde ɛkponle nwo wɔ ye gyima nu. Gyisɛse zele ye kɛ, “Bɛla maa yɛhɔ” Na Livae dwazole doale ye.
41002015	Nzinlii Livae dole Gyisɛse ɛkponle. Adwuledievolɛma nee menli mɔɔ bɛdabɛ noko awie ɛmbu bɛ bie la dɔɔnwo mɔɔ ɛnee doa Gyisɛse la anu bie mɔ nee ɛdoavolɛma ne wɔ ɛkponledolɛ ne abo bie.
41002016	Mɛla kilehilevolɛma ne bie mɔ mɔɔ le Falasiima la nwunle kɛ ɔ nee menli zɛhae mɔ ɛlɛdi debie la, bɛbizale ye ɛdoavolɛma ne kɛ, “Duzu ati a ɔ nee menli zɛhae mɔ to bɛ sa ɛyɛba ko anu ɛ?”
41002017	Gyisɛse dele mɔɔ bɛhanle la na ɔbuale kɛ, “Menli mɔɔ te kpɔkɛ la ɛngyia ninsinli nwo kɛ wuleravolɛma. Meamba kɛ mebavɛlɛ bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛkpazi la. Membale menli mɔɔ awie ɛmbu bɛ bie la ɛvɛlɛlɛ.”
41002018	Kenle ko bie ɛnee Dwɔn Sɔnevolɛ ne ɛdoavolɛma nee Falasiima ne mɔ ɛlɛkye ɛhɔne. Na menli bie rale rabizale Gyisɛse kɛ, “Duzu ati a Dwɔn Sɔnevolɛ ne ɛdoavolɛma nee Falasiima ɛdoavolɛma ne mɔ kye ɛhɔne, na wɔmɔ wɔ ɛdoavolɛma ne mɔ ɛngye ɛhɔne ne bie ɛ?”
41002019	Gyisɛse buale bɛ kɛ, “Asoo bɛnwu kɛ atɔfolɛ nrenya ne agɔnwo mɔ mɔɔ ɛra ye atɔfolɛlielɛ ne abo la ɛlɛ bɛ ko mgbane ɛlɛ? Bɛyɛ ye zɔhane a ɔnrɛyɛ boɛ!
41002020	Noko saa mekɛ dwu na bɛbaye atɔfolɛ nrenya ne wɔ bɛ nu a, ɛnee bɔ zo mɔɔ yedwu mɔɔ bɛbua bɛda a.”
41002021	Akee ɔhanle ɔzɔle zolɛ kɛ, “Awie ɛnva ɛdanlɛ fofolɛ mɔɔ bɛtɛkpole ye ɛlɛ la ɛnda ɛdanlɛ dɛba nu. Saa ɔyɛ ye zɔhane na ɔwula ye nzule nu a fofolɛ ne nwenwe na ɔtete dɛba ne, na ɔmaa tokule ne yɛ kpole.
41002022	Zɔhane ala yɛɛ awie ɛnva nwanye ndokuma ɛngua nwoma kodoku dɛba nu a. Saa ɔyɛ ye zɔhane na nwanye ne anu yɛ ɛsesebɛ a, ɔkpuke nwoma ne na nwanye ne nee nwoma ne sɛkye. Nɔhalɛ, bɛfa nwanye ndokuma bɛgua nwoma kodoku fofolɛ nu.”
41002023	Ɛnwomenlelielɛ Kenle ko bie ɛnee Gyisɛse lua abɛlɛ ɛya bie anu; ye ɛdoavolɛma ne mɔ mɔɔ nee ye lua la bubule abɛlɛ ne bie.
41002024	Na Falasiima ne zele Gyisɛse kɛ, “Nea, ɔtia yɛ mɛla ne kɛ wɔ ɛdoavolɛma ne mɔ kɛyɛ zɛhae debie wɔ Ɛnwomenlelielɛ Kenle ye a!”
41002025	Gyisɛse buale bɛ kɛ, “Asoo bɛtɛkengale mɔɔ Devidi yɛle wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ ɛnee ɛhɔne ɛlɛku ye nee menli mɔɔ doa ye, na bɛnlɛ debie biala mɔɔ bɛdi la?
41002026	Wɔ Sɛlɛvolɛ Kpanyinli Abayata mekɛ zo, Devidi hɔle Nyamenle sua ne anu na ɔ nee ye menli ne mɔ lile kpanwo ne mɔɔ bɛva bɛbɔ azu bɛmaa Nyamenle la. Yɛ mɛla ne kile kɛ ɔwɔ kɛ sɛlɛvolɛma angome ala a di zɛhae kpanwo ne a. Noko Devidi lile bie, eza ɔvale bie ɔmanle menli mɔɔ ɔ nee bɛ lua la lile. Asoo bɛtɛtele ɛhye?”
41002027	Gyisɛse hanle zɔle zolɛ kɛ, “Nyamenle hyehyɛle Ɛnwomenlelielɛ Kenle ne dole ɛkɛ manle sonla ye ɛkpazilɛ; na tɛ Ɛnwomenlelielɛ Kenle ne ati a bɛbɔle sonla a.
41002028	Zɔhane ati medame Sonla Ra, melɛ tumi wɔ Ɛnwomenlelielɛ Kenle ne azo noko.”
41003001	Gyisɛse ziale hɔle nyianu sua ne anu bieko. Nrenya bie mɔɔ asa ko ɛdwe la wɔ ɛkɛ ne.
41003002	Menli bie dɛle Gyisɛse nleanle saa ɔkɛyɛ nrenya ne ayile wɔ Ɛnwomenlelielɛ Kenle ne a ɛnee bɛahɔdoa ye.
41003003	Gyisɛse zele nrenya ne mɔɔ asa ko ɛdwe la kɛ, “Dwazo bagyinla yɛ nyunlu ɛke.”
41003004	Akee ɔbizale menli ne kɛ, “Duzu yɛɛ yɛ mɛla ne maa nwolɛ adenle kɛ yɛyɛ wɔ Ɛnwomenlelielɛ Kenle ne a? Ɔmaa adenle kɛ yɛyɛ nyele anzɛɛ yɛli ɛtane? Yɛlie sonla ngoane anzɛɛ yɛzɛkye ye?” Na bɛambuke bɛ nloa.
41003005	Gyisɛse vale ɛya na ɔnleanle bɛ nyunlu ɔyiale, noko eza ɔlile bɛ nwo nyane, ɔluakɛ bɛle menli mɔɔ ɛzua anyetele na bɛ ti yɛ se a. Yemɔti ɔzele nrenya ne kɛ, “Tenrɛ ɛ sa ne anu.” Nrenya ne denrɛle ɔ sa ne mɔɔ ɛdwe la anu, na ɔyɛle kpalɛ bieko.
41003006	Zɔhane ati Falasiima ne vile nyianu sua ne anu vindele, na ndɛndɛ ne ala bɛ nee Belemgbunli Hɛlɔdo eku ne anu amra ne mɔ hɔvale adwenle kɛ bɛku ye.
41003007	Gyisɛse nee ye ɛdoavolɛma ne hwenle bɛ nwo hɔle Galeli Tandane ne anloa, na menli dɔɔnwo kpalɛ doale ye. Bɛvi Galeli nee Dwudiya,
41003008	Gyɛlusalɛm nee azua mɔɔ wɔ Ayedumia maanzinli nu nee Dwɔdan sunvoa mɔɔ di kɔ aduduleɛ la, nee ɛleka ɛleka mɔɔ bikye azuamgbole Taya nee Saedɛn la. Menli dɔɔnwo ɛhye rale Gyisɛse ɛkɛ, ɔluakɛ bɛde ninyɛne mɔɔ ɔlɛyɛ la nganeɛ.
41003009	Menli mɔɔ hɔle la zonle bo zo; yemɔti Gyisɛse zele ye ɛdoavolɛma ne mɔ kɛ bɛkpondɛ ɛlɛne bɛmaa ye, amaa menli ne anfofo ɔ nwo zo.
41003010	Ɛnee yeyɛ menli dɔɔnwo ne ala ayile, zɔhane ati bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnde kpɔkɛ la pelele kɛ bɛkɛbikye ye na bɛkɛva bɛ sa bɛkɛha ye bɔbɔ.
41003011	Sunsum ɛtane ne mɔ nwu Gyisɛse a, bɛtu bɛgua ɔ nyunlu na bɛtea nu kɛ, “Wɔmɔ a ɛle Nyamenle Ara ne a!”
41003012	Gyisɛse duale bɛ kpunli kɛ bɛmmaka zɔhane edwɛkɛ ne bɛkile ye sonlazule.
41003013	Akee Gyisɛse hɔle boka bie azo na ɔvɛlɛle menli mɔɔ ɔkpondɛ bɛ la. Bɛrale la
41003014	ɔkpale nu ɔyele bɛ nuhua bulu nee nwiɔ na ɔvɛlɛle bɛ ye ɛzoanvolɛma na ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Mekpa nu meye bɛ kɛ bɛ nee me ɛdɛnla. Mebazoa bɛ meamaa bɛahɔbɔ Edwɛkpa ne nolo,
41003015	na mebamaa bɛ tumi meamaa bɛahola bɛadu mbɔnsam.”
41003016	Menli bulu nee nwiɔ ne mɔɔ Gyisɛse vɛlɛle bɛ la a le ɛhye mɔ: Saemɔn mɔɔ Gyisɛse manle ye duma bieko kɛ bɛfɛlɛ ye Pita la,
41003017	Gyemise nee ɔ diema Dwɔn, mɔɔ le Zɛbɛdi amra ne mɔ mɔɔ Gyisɛse vɛlɛle bɛ “Bowanɛgyize” la, (Bowanɛgyize abo a le Ɛsɛnlɛmanye Mralɛ.)
41003018	Andelu, Felepe, Baatɔlomiyu, Mateyu, Tɔmase, Alefiyɛse ara Gyemise, Tadease, Saemɔn mɔɔ le Maanle Kulovolɛ ne,
41003019	yɛɛ Dwudase Yesekaleɔto mɔɔ yele Gyisɛse manle la.
41003020	Akee Gyisɛse hɔle sua nu na menli dɔɔnwo rayiale ye ɛkɛ ne bieko mɔɔ ɛnee akee ɔ nee ye ɛdoavolɛma ne mɔ bɛnnyia adenle bɛnli debie bɔbɔ a.
41003021	Ɔ nli nee ɔ mediema ne mɔ dele la, bɛrale kɛ bɛbava ye bɛahɔ, ɔluakɛ menli ɛlɛkeha kɛ, “Yezɛ!”
41003022	Mɛla kilehilevolɛma bie mɔɔ vi Gyɛlusalɛm rale la hanle kɛ, “Mbɔnsam kpanyinli ne mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye Biyɛlezɛbɛle la wɔ ɔ nwo, na yemɔ yɛɛ ɔmaa ye tumi mɔɔ ɔfa ɔtu mbɔnsam a.”
41003023	Ɛhye ati Gyisɛse vɛlɛle menli ne mɔ, na ɔbule bɛ mrɛlɛ ɛhye mɔ kɛ, “Asoo Seetan kola tu Seetan?
41003024	Saa maanle ko anu amra kyɛ bɛ nwo nu na bɛko bɛtia bɛ nwo a, maanle ne ɛngyinla,
41003025	yɛɛ saa awuke ko anu amra kyɛ bɛ nwo nu na bɛko bɛtia bɛ nwo a, awuke ne ɛngyinla.
41003026	Yemɔti saa Seetan ɛdwazo ɔ ngome ɔ nwo zo na ye nuhua ɛhyɛ nwiɔ a, ɛnee ɔnrɛhola gyinla, na ye awieleɛ ɛbikye.
41003027	“Awie biala ɛngola ɛmbu katakyie sua, ɔnwua ye, kyesɛ ɔdumua ɔkyekye katakyie ne kolaa na yeahola yeasesa ye sua ne anu ninyɛne.
41003028	“Bɛhakye ɛhye! Ɛtane biala ɛnle ɛkɛ mɔɔ sonla kɛyɛ anzɛɛ munzule edwɛkɛ biala ɛnle ɛkɛ mɔɔ sonla kɛha, mɔɔ bɛnrɛva bɛnrɛhyɛ ye a.
41003029	Noko awie biala mɔɔ kɛdendɛ ɛtane kɛtia Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne la ɛnrɛnyia fakyɛ ɛlɛ, ɔluakɛ yeyɛ ɛtane mɔɔ ɛnlɛ awieleɛ.”
41003030	(Gyisɛse hanle ɛhye, ɔluakɛ bie mɔ hanle kɛ, “Sunsum ɛtane wɔ ɔ nwo.”)
41003031	Gyisɛse ɔ nli nee ɔ mediema ne mɔ rale ragyinlanle sua ne anzi na bɛzoanle kɛ bɛvɛlɛ ye bɛmaa bɛ.
41003032	Ɛnee menli dɔɔnwo dede ɔ nwo ɛkɛ ne, na bɛzele ye kɛ, “Yɛmenle, ɛ nli nee ɛ mediema mraalɛ nee mrenya ne mɔ gyi sua ye anzi lɔ, bɛse bɛkpondɛ wɔ.”
41003033	Gyisɛse buale bɛ kɛ, “Me nli a le nwane? Me mediema a le nwane mɔ?”
41003034	Na ɔnleanle bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛdede ɔ nwo ɛkɛ ne la ɔyiale na ɔhanle kɛ, “Me nli nee me mediema a le bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛyia ɛke la.
41003035	Me diema nrenya nee me diema raalɛ nee me nli a le awie biala mɔɔ yɛ mɔɔ Nyamenle kpondɛ la.”
41004001	Gyisɛse eza bɔle ɔ bo bieko hilehilele wɔ Galeli Tandane ne anloa. Menli dɔɔnwo rayiale ɔ nwo ɛkɛ. Bɛzonle somaa la ati ɔhɔdɛnlanle ɛlɛne nu wɔ azule ne anye, yɛɛ menli ne noko dede azule ne anloa.
41004002	Ɔvale mrɛlɛbulɛ ɔhilehilele bɛ ninyɛne dɔɔnwo, na ye ngilehilelɛ ne anu ɔzele bɛ kɛ:
41004003	“Bɛdie! Nrenya bie hɔle kɛ ɔkagua ma.
41004004	Ɔgua la, ma ne bie guale adenle nu, na nloma rasusole.
41004005	Bie guale awolɛ nu, ɛleka mɔɔ anwea anzo la, na ndɛndɛ ne ala bɛfifile, ɔluakɛ azɛlɛ ne ɛmpi;
41004006	na mɔɔ ewia ne vile hanle bɛ la, bɛyelale, ɔluakɛ bɛ ndinli ne andwu azɛlɛ bo.
41004007	Bie mɔ guale mbowule nu, na mbowule ne nyinle hedale bɛ nwo zo, yemɔti bɛanzo ma.
41004008	Akee ma ne bie noko guale azɛlɛ kpalɛ zo, na bɛfifile, bɛnyinle, na bɛzole ma: bie mɔnwo abulasa, bie mɔnwo abulasia, yɛɛ bie mɔnwo ɛya.”
41004009	Gyisɛse hanle zɔle zolɛ kɛ, “Bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛlɛ ɛnzonlɛ la, bɛdie!”
41004010	Akee mɔɔ ɔhale Gyisɛse angome la, menli mɔɔ li ɔ nzi la bie mɔ mɔɔ dele ye edwɛkɛ ne la nee ye ɛdoavolɛma bulu nee nwiɔ ne rabizale ye ɛrɛlɛ ne abo.
41004011	Ɔbuale bɛ kɛ, “Bɛmɛ, Nyamenle ɛla ye belemgbunlililɛ ne anwo edwɛkɛ ne mɔɔ vea la ali wienyi ɛhile bɛ, na bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛmbikye me la, bɛte ye wɔ mrɛlɛ nu,
41004012	amaa ‘Bɛnea, bɛnea a, bɛannwu ye, bɛtie, bɛtie a, bɛande ɔ bo. Anrɛɛ bɛkɛzia bɛkɛra Nyamenle ɛkɛ, na ɔkɛva bɛ ɛtane ne mɔ ɔkɛhyɛ bɛ.’ ”
41004013	Akee Gyisɛse bizale bɛ kɛ, “Bɛnde ɛrɛlɛ ɛhye abo ɔ? Ɛnee kɛ ɔkɛyɛ na bɛade ɛrɛlɛ biala abo ɛ?
41004014	Nrenya ne gua Nyamenle edwɛkɛ ne.
41004015	Menli ne bie mɔ le kɛ ma ne mɔɔ gua adenle nu la; menli ɛhye mɔ te edwɛkɛ ne a, ndɛndɛ ne ala Seetan baye fi bɛ adwenle nu.
41004016	Zɔhane ala yɛɛ menli ne bie mɔ le kɛ ma ne mɔɔ gua awolɛ nu la a. Menli ɛhye mɔ te edwɛkɛ ne a, ndɛndɛ ne ala bɛfa fɛlɛko bɛdie bɛto nu.
41004017	Na kɛmɔ edwɛkɛ ne ɛnnyia debie mɔɔ le kɛ ndinli wɔ bɛ nu la ati, bɛngyinla bɛngyɛ. Saa anwongyelelɛ ba anzɛɛ edwɛkɛ ne ati aleɛabo amra yɛ bɛ kpɔdekpɔde a, ɛnee bɛkpo aze.
41004018	Menli ne bie mɔ le kɛ ma ne mɔɔ gua mbowule nu la, menli ɛhye mɔ te edwɛkɛ ne,
41004019	na ɛbɛlabɔlɛ ye anwo adwenleadwenle, anyiabɛnwo ɛhulolɛ, nee ninyɛne mgbane mgbane nwo atiakunluwɔzo fo keda edwɛkɛ ne azo, ɛhye ati bɛnzo ma.
41004020	Akee menli ne bie mɔ noko le kɛ ma ne mɔɔ gua azɛlɛ kpalɛ zo la. Menli ɛhye mɔ te edwɛkɛ ne, bɛdie bɛto nu, na bɛso ma: bie mɔnwo abulasa, bie mɔnwo abulasia, yɛɛ bie mɔnwo ɛya.”
41004021	Gyisɛse bizale bɛ kɛ, “Nwane a sɔ kɛnlaneɛ na ɔfa bondo ɔbutu zolɛ anzɛɛ ɔfa ɔsie mgba bo na ɔnva ɔnzie debie zo anwuma a?
41004022	Debie biala mɔɔ vea la bala ali wienyi, yɛɛ mɔɔ bɛheda zolɛ la anwo bala zo.
41004023	Bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛlɛ ɛnzonlɛ la, bɛdie!”
41004024	Eza ɔzele bɛ kɛ. “Bɛdie ye boɛ! Mɔɔ ɛsuzu ɛmaa awie mɔ la yɛɛ Nyamenle banlea zolɛ azuzu amaa wɔ a, na wɔmɔ bɔbɔ ɛbanyia ye molozo.
41004025	Ɔluakɛ mɔɔ lɛ bie la bɛbamaa ye bie yeaboka nwo, yɛɛ mɔɔ ɛnlɛ bie la, ekyi ne bɔbɔ mɔɔ ɔlɛ la, bɛbalie bɛavi ɔ sa nu.”
41004026	Gyisɛse hɔle zolɛ zele bɛ kɛ, “Nyamenle belemgbunlililɛ ne le kɛ nrenya bie mɔɔ gua ma wɔ ye ɛya nu la.
41004027	Aledwolɛ nu ɛnee yela. Aleɛ kye noko a ɔdwazo ɔduolua, na ɛnee ye ma ne mɔ mɔɔ yegua la ɛlɛfifi na bɛlɛnyi, noko ɔnze kɛ bɛyɛ bɛnyi a.
41004028	Azɛlɛ ne maa mbaka ne nyi na bɛso ma. Saa awule a, ɔbalumua yeawɔlɔ, yeanrenzɛ na nzinlii yeatulu mralɛ.
41004029	Awule ne bolo a nrenya ne kɔte, ɔluakɛ ɛnee ɛbuhenle ne ɛdwu.”
41004030	Akee Gyisɛse bizale bɛ kɛ, “Duzu a yɛva yɛdo Nyamenle Belemgbunlililɛ ne anwo a? Duzu ɛrɛlɛ a yɛva yɛhile nu a?
41004031	Ɔle kɛ baka ma nretee bie. Mekɛ mɔɔ bɛdua la ɛnee ɔle ma muala anu nretee kpalɛ kpalɛ,
41004032	noko nzinlii ɔfifi, ɔnyi, na ɔyɛ baka kpole ɔtɛla mbaka muala, ɔkpakye ngane mgbole na nloma bayɛ bɛ sane wɔ zolɛ.”
41004033	Gyisɛse vale mrɛlɛ mɔɔ le kɛ ɛhye mɔ la dɔɔnwo mɔɔ menli ne adwenle so nu la bɔle edwɛkɛ ne nolo hilele bɛ.
41004034	Mrɛlɛ nu ngome a ɔdendɛle ɔhilele bɛ a, na saa ɔka ɔdaye nee ye ɛdoavolɛma ne mɔ angome a akee yeahilehile bɛ mrɛlɛ ne mɔ abo.
41004035	Kenle ko ne nɔsolɛ nu, Gyisɛse zele ye ɛdoavolɛma ne mɔ kɛ, “Bɛmaa yɛpɛ yɛhɔ tandane ne anzi lɔ.”
41004036	Yemɔti bɛgyakyile menli dɔɔnwo ne ɛkɛ ne na bɛvole ɛlɛne ne mɔɔ Gyisɛse dɛnlanle nu la anu kɛ bɛkɔ. Nlɛne gyɛne noko bokale bɛ nwo.
41004037	Yeangyɛ biala yɛɛ ahumu kpole bie dwazole a, azɛlɛkye bule guale ɛlɛne ne anu, mɔɔ ɛnee ɔkpondɛ yeazia a.
41004038	Mekɛ ne anu ɛnee Gyisɛse la ɛlɛne ne abo lɔ, ɔ ti zɔ esumi na yelafe. Ye ɛdoavolɛma ne hɔdunwuele ye zele kɛ, “Kilehilevolɛ, ɔnvane ɛ nwo kɛ yɛwie wu ɔ?”
41004039	Gyisɛse dwazole na ɔdeanle ahumu ne nu na ɔzele azɛlɛkye ne mɔ kɛ, “Bɛgua diinyi!” Ɛkɛ ne ala ahumu ne gyakyile ɛdulɛ na maanle nu gyinlanle diinyi.
41004040	Na Gyisɛse bizale ye ɛdoavolɛma ne mɔ kɛ, “Duzu ati a bɛ ahonle ɛdu zɛhae ɛ? Ɛnɛ nee ɛnɛ ala bɛnlɛ diedi ɔ?”
41004041	Na ɛzulolɛ kpole hanle bɛ manle bɛbizale bɛ nwo ngoko kɛ, “Duzu sonla bɔbɔ a le ɛhye, mɔɔ anwoma nee nyevile tie ye a?”
41005001	Gyisɛse nee ye ɛdoavolɛma ne dwule aze wɔ Galeli Tandane ne anzi wɔ Gɛlasa maanle nu.
41005002	Gyisɛse vi ɛlɛne ne anu dwule la, nrenya bie mɔɔ sunsum ɛtane wɔ ɔ nwo la vi azie ne azo rayiale ye.
41005003	Nrenya ɛhye ɛva azie ne azo ɛyɛ ye sua nu; awie biala ɛngola ɛngua ye nwɔnzɔnwɔnzɔ.
