41005004	Mekɛ dɔɔnwo ne ala menli ɛzɔ ye ɛbɔ ye kpanwu, noko yedu kpanwu ne na yetete nwɔnzɔnwɔnzɔ ne mɔɔ gua ɔ sa nee ɔ gyakɛ la amuala; awie biala ɛngola ye sɔ.
41005005	Alehyenlɛ nee aledwolɛ muala ɛnee ɔluolua azie ne nee awoka ne mɔ azo ɔteɛdea nuhua na ɔfa awolɛ ɔpepɛ ɔ nwo.
41005006	Ɔnwunle Gyisɛse kɛ ɔlua moa moa lɔ ɔlɛba la, ɔnriandile ɔrahotole ɔ nyunlu ɛkɛ ne
41005007	na ɔhanle ye kpole kɛ, “Anwuma Anwuma Nyamenle Ara Gyisɛse, ɛ nee me lɛ bie ɔ? Mefa Nyamenle mekpa wɔ kyɛlɛ, mmatea me!”
41005008	(Ɔhanle ɛhye, ɔluakɛ ɛnee Gyisɛse ɛlɛka kɛ, “Sunsum ɛtane, ɛvi nrenya ye anwo tu!”)
41005009	Gyisɛse bizale ye kɛ, “Kɛ bɛfɛlɛ wɔ ɛ?” Nrenya ne buale ye kɛ, “Bɛfɛlɛ me ɛlɔne, ɔluakɛ yɛ nwo zonle.”
41005010	Na ɔbodole Gyisɛse kɛ ɔmmatu bɛ ɔfi maanle ne anu.
41005011	Mekɛ ne anu ɛnee agbolike dɔɔnwo bie ɛlɛdidi boka bie anye anwo wɔ ɛkɛ ne afoa nu.
41005012	Sunsum ɛtane ne mɔ bodole Gyisɛse kɛ, “Maa yɛ adenle maa yɛhɔwolo agbolike ne mɔ nu.”
41005013	Gyisɛse manle bɛ adenle. Sunsum ɛtane ne mɔ vile nrenya ne anwo, na bɛhɔwolole agbolike ne mɔ. Agbolike ne mɔ mɔɔ bo apenle nwiɔ la dule twi pianle bɛ nwo wɔ boka ne anye anwo na bɛhɔguale tandane ne anu bɛwule.
41005014	Menli mɔɔ ɛlɛnea agbolike ne mɔ la nriandile hɔbɔle suakpole ne nee namunamu ne mɔ azo amra amaneɛ. Menli rale kɛ bɛbanlea mɔɔ ɛzi la.
41005015	Bɛradwule la, ɛnee nrenya bɔnavolɛ ne mɔɔ anrɛɛ mbɔnsam dɔɔnwo wɔ ɔ nwo la anye zo ɛtete ye, na ɔheda ɛdanlɛ ɔde Gyisɛse anwo ɛkɛ. Ɛhye yɛle bɛ ɛzulolɛ kpole.
41005016	Menli mɔɔ nwunle mɔɔ zile la hanle kɛ ɔyɛle mɔɔ nrenya ne anye zo zile tetele ye nee mɔɔ zile agbolike ne mɔ anwo zo la amuala hilele bɛ.
41005017	Ɛhye ati bɛzele Gyisɛse kɛ ɔvi bɛ maanle ne anu ɔhɔ.
41005018	Gyisɛse kɔ ahɔvo ɛlɛne nu la, nrenya ne mɔɔ anrɛɛ mbɔnsam ne mɔ wɔ ɔ nwo la razɛlɛle ye kɛ, “Maa me nee wɔ ɛlua!”
41005019	Na Gyisɛse amkponle zo. Ɔzele ye kɛ, “Sia kɔ sua nu na kɔha debie mɔɔ Nyamenle ɛyɛ ɛmaa wɔ nee anwunvɔne mɔɔ yeze wɔ la kile ɛ gɔnwo mɔ.”
41005020	Yemɔti nrenya ne ziale hɔle na ɔbɔle ɔ bo kɛ ɔbɔ mɔɔ Gyisɛse ɛyɛ ɛmaa ye la nolo wɔ Azuamgbole Bulu ne mɔ azo. Na ɔyɛle bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛdele la amuala azibɛnwo.
41005021	Gyisɛse ziale pɛle rale azule nzi nehae bieko, na menli dɔɔnwo rayiale ye wɔ ɛnwea ne anloa.
41005022	Gyeeyaelɛse mɔɔ le sua ne azo nyianu sua ne mgbanyima ne mɔ ko la radule dɔle ɔ gyakɛ anu
41005023	na ɔbodole ye kɛ, “Me ra raalɛ ekyi ne ɛlɛdie ewule awu. Mebodo wɔ, bɛla bava ɛ sa to ɔ nwo zo maa ɔde kpɔkɛ na ɔnyia ngoane.”
41005024	Na Gyisɛse nee ye hɔle. Menli dɔɔnwo kpalɛ doale ye na bɛhyelele ɔ nwo zo.
41005025	Raalɛ bie wɔ ɛkɛ, yedudu mogya toonwo ɛvolɛ bulu nee nwiɔ,
41005026	na yenwu amaneɛ dɔɔnwo wɔ ninsinlima asa anu. Ɔ nwo ezukoa muala ɛwie, noko ɔnde kpɔkɛ; ye ewule ne, ɔ nyunlu ala a ɔkɔ a.
41005027	Ɛnee yede Gyisɛse nganeɛ, yemɔti ɔralile ɔ nzi wɔ menli ne anu,
41005028	na ɔhanle ye ɔ ti anu kɛ, “Saa mefa me sa meka ye tɛladeɛ ne bɔbɔ a, me nwo kɛza.” Ɛhye ati ɔvale ɔ sa ɔhanle Gyisɛse tɛladeɛ ne,
41005029	na ɛkɛ ne ala mogya ne mɔɔ ɛlɛtu ye la pɛle, na ɔdele ye wɔ ye nu kɛ yede kpɔkɛ.
41005030	Ɛkɛ ne ala Gyisɛse dele ye wɔ ye nu kɛ tumi vi ye nuhua ɛhɔ. Ɔhakyile ɔ nwo na ɔbizale kɛ, “Nwane a vale ɔ sa hanle me tɛladeɛ ne a?”
41005031	Ye ɛdoavolɛma ne mɔ buale ye kɛ, “Nea kɛ menli ɛhyele ɛ nwo zo bie a; duzu ati a ɛlɛbiza kɛ, ‘Nwane a vale ɔ sa hanle me a?’ ”
41005032	Na Gyisɛse vale ɔ nye kpɔlale nu kɛ ɔnea ahenle mɔɔ vale ɔ sa hanle ye la.
41005033	Raalɛ ne nwunle mɔɔ ɛzi ye nu la, ɔvale ɛzulolɛ nee anwowozolɛ ɔrahotole Gyisɛse agyakɛ anu, na ɔhanle ye edwɛkɛ nɔhalɛ nu ɔhilele ye.
41005034	Gyisɛse zele ye kɛ, “Me ra raalɛ, wɔ diedi ɛlie wɔ ngoane. Fa anzonudwolɛ kɔ na wɔ ewule ne ɛhɔ bɔkɔɔ.”
41005035	Gyisɛse anloa wɔ zo ɔlɛtendɛ la, ɛbɔfoɔ vi Gyeeyaelɛse sua nu razele ye kɛ, “Ɛ ra raalɛ ne ati ɛbɔ aze na mmagyegye kilehilevolɛ ne bieko.”
41005036	Gyisɛse dele mɔɔ bɛhanle la, noko ɔzile nyianu sua ne kpanyinli ne ahonle na ɔzele ye kɛ, “Mmasulo, wɔmɔ die di ala.”
41005037	Yeammaa adenle yeammaa awie biala nee ye angɔ kɛ Pita nee Gyemise nee ɔ diema Dwɔn ala.
41005038	Bɛdwule Gyeeyaelɛse awuke ne anu la, Gyisɛse nwunle menli dɔɔnwo wɔ ɛkɛ ne na bɛlɛsu bɛye awolɛ.
41005039	Ɔhɔle sua ne anu na ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Na ɛzunlɛ bebelebe ye ɛ? Kakula ne ɛtɛwule; ɔlɛdafe ala!”
41005040	Menli ne mɔ zelele ye. Yemɔti ɔdule bɛ muala ɔvile sua ne anu na ɔvale kakula raalɛ ne ɔ ze nee ɔ nli yɛɛ ye ɛdoavolɛma nsa ne na ɔ nee bɛ hɔle ɛleka mɔɔ bɛdeda kakula ne la.
41005041	Ɔzɔle kakula raalɛ ne asa na ɔzele ye kɛ, “Talita, Kumi!” Ɔ bo a le “Kakula raalɛ, mese, dwazo!”
41005042	Ɛkɛ ne ala ɔdwazole na ɔkpɔsale sua ne anu. (Ɛnee yeli ɛvolɛ bulu nee nwiɔ.) Ɛhye yɛle menli ne nwanwane kpole.
41005043	Na Gyisɛse bɔle bɛ nloa kɛ bɛmmaka bɛkile awie biala, na ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Bɛmaa ye debie ɔli.”
41006001	Gyisɛse vi ɛkɛ ne la ɔ nee ye ɛdoavolɛma ne ziale rale ye sua zo.
41006002	Ɛnwomenlelielɛ Kenle ne dwule la, ɔbɔle ɔ bo kɛ ɔyɛ ngilehilelɛ wɔ nyianu sua ne anu. Ɛnee menli dɔɔnwo kpalɛ wɔ ɛkɛ; bɛdiele ye bɛwiele la, ɔzinle bɛ nwo na bɛbizale kɛ, “Nienwu a nrenya ye nee ɛhye vi a? Ɔzukoale ye nrɛlɛbɛ ɛhye wɔ nienwu? Adenle boni anu a ɔfa ɔyɛ ye nwanwane ninyɛne ɛhye mɔ a?
41006003	Na tɛ Mɛle ara kapenta ye ɛ? Tɛ ɔ mediema mrenya a le Gyemise, Dwosefi, Dwudase, yɛɛ Saemɔn? Tɛ ɔ mediema mraalɛ noko a yɛ nee bɛ gua sua ye azo la ɔ?” Na bɛkpole ye.
41006004	Gyisɛse zele bɛ kɛ, “Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛ biala lɛ ɔ nyunlu wɔ ɛleka biala, kyesɛ ɔdaye ye sua zo, ye mbusua nu anzɛɛ ye sua nu ala.”
41006005	Yeangola yeanyɛ nwanwane debie wɔ ɛkɛ ne kɛ ɔ sa mɔɔ ɔvale ɔguale wuleravolɛma ekyi bie anwo zo ɔyɛle bɛ ayile la ala.
41006006	Na ɔyɛle ye azibɛnwo kpole kɛ menli ne ɛnlɛ diedi a. Akee Gyisɛse hɔkpɔsale namunamu ne mɔ mɔɔ zuozua ɛkɛ ne la azo hilehilele menli ne.
41006007	Ɔvɛlɛle Bulu nee Nwiɔ ne na ɔzoanle bɛ nwiɔ nwiɔ, na ɔmanle bɛ tumi wɔ sunsum ɛtane nwo zo,
41006008	na ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Bɛmmafa debie biala bɛtu adenle ne kɛ kpɔma ala; bɛmmafa aleɛ anzɛɛ kodoku, yɛɛ bɛmmafa ezukoa bɛbɔ bɛ nwo.
41006009	Bɛwula mgbɔlaboa, noko bɛmmafa tɛladeɛ bieko bɛboka mɔɔ bɛwula la anwo.”
41006010	Eza ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Awuke biala mɔɔ bɛkɛlie bɛ nu la, bɛdɛnla ɛkɛ ne ala bɛmaa ɔhɔkpula kenle mɔɔ bɛkɛvi sua ne azo la.
41006011	Saa bɛkɔ sua bie azo noko na menli ne anlie bɛ anzɛɛ ɛnrɛdie bɛ a, bɛvi ɛkɛ ne bɛhɔ na bɛkpɔlɔkpɔla bɛ gyakɛ anwo munlutu bɛgua, bɛva bɛhile kɛ menli ne di ɛzonle.”
41006012	Yemɔti bɛzile nu bɛhɔle na bɛbɔle nolo kɛ menli ɛnlu bɛ nwo.
41006013	Bɛdule mbɔnsam dɔɔnwo, na bɛvale nwole bɛkpokpale wuleravolɛma dɔɔnwo bɛyɛle bɛ ayile.
41006014	Belemgbunli Hɛlɔdo dele ɛhye mɔ anwo bie, ɔluakɛ Gyisɛse nganeɛ ɛdwu ɛleka biala, na menli ɛlɛkeha kɛ, “Dwɔn Sɔnevolɛ ne ɛzia ɛra ngoane nu bieko, yemɔti a ɔkola ɔyɛ nwanwane ninyɛne ɛhye mɔ a.”
41006015	Bie mɔ se, “Yilaegya ɔ.” Bie mɔ noko hanle kɛ, “Ɔle Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛ, kɛ mɔmoane Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛma ne mɔ anu ko la.”
41006016	Mɔɔ Hɛlɔdo dele ɛhye la ɔhanle kɛ, “Dwɔn Sɔnevolɛ ne mɔɔ memanle bɛpɛle ɔ ti la a ɛzia ɛra ngoane nu bieko la.”
41006017	Hɛlɔdo manle bɛhyele Dwɔn bɛguale ye nwɔnzɔnwɔnzɔ na bɛdole ye efiade wɔ ɔ diema Felepe aye Hɛlɔdease mɔɔ ɔdaye Hɛlɔdo ɔgyale ye la ati,
41006018	ɔluakɛ Dwɔn vale zile Hɛlɔdo anyunlu dahuu kɛ, “Ɔnle amaamuo kpalɛ kɛ ɛkɛgya ɛ diema ne aye ne.”
41006019	Ɛhye ati Dwɔn anwo yɛle Hɛlɔdease ɛya kpole na ɔbɔle kpɔkɛ kɛ ɔnyia ye a ɔkɛhu ye, noko Hɛlɔdo ammaa ye adenle.
41006020	Hɛlɔdo zulole, ɔboalekɛ Dwɔn le sonla mɔɔ ye ɛbɛla tenrɛ na ɔ nwo te a, yemɔti ɔvale ye ɔziele kpalɛ. Ɔhulole kɛ ɔkɛdie Dwɔn anloa edwɛkɛ, noko kenle mɔɔ ɔkɛdie ye la ɛnee ɔ ti akunlu ɛzɛkye bɔkɔɔ.
41006021	Nzinlii Hɛlɔdease asa hanle Dwɔn wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ ɛnee Hɛlɔdo ɛlɛdi ye awolɛ kenle ɛvoyia la. Hɛlɔdo dole ɛkponle na ɔvɛlɛvɛlɛle arane mbɔlɔba mgbanyinli, ye safohyenlema nee Galeli mgbanyima ne mɔ amuala.
41006022	Wɔ ɛkponledolɛ ne abo, Hɛlɔdease ara raalɛ ne razile agole manle ɔzɔle Hɛlɔdo nee mgbanyima ne mɔ anye. Na belemgbunli ne zele ye kɛ, “Biza me debie biala mɔɔ ɛkulo la na menwɔva menwɔmaa wɔ.”
41006023	Akee ɔhanle ndane kɛ, “Debie biala mɔɔ ɛkulo la, biza, saa me belemgbunli maanle ye foa ko bɔbɔ a, menwɔva menwɔmaa wɔ.”
41006024	Bɛlɛra ne vindele hɔbizale ɔ nli kɛ, “Duzu a membiza a?” Ɔ nli buale kɛ, “Biza die Dwɔn Sɔnevolɛ ne ati.”
41006025	Na ndɛndɛ ne ala bɛlɛra ne razele belemgbunli ne kɛ, “Mekpondɛ kɛ ɛfa Dwɔn Sɔnevolɛ ne ati ɛto apawa nu ɛmaa me kɛkala.”
41006026	Ɛhye yɛle belemgbunli ne nyane somaa, noko akee yeha ndane, yɛɛ wɔ ye mgbanyima ne mɔ nee ye nyɛvolɛ ne mɔ anyunlu, yeangulo kɛ ɔkɛdo ye ndane ne.
41006027	Ɛhye ati ɔzoanle sinzavolɛ ko ɔmanle ɔhɔle efiade ne ɔhɔpɛle Dwɔn ati,
41006028	ɔvale ɔdole apawa nu ɔrɛlɛle bɛlɛra ne, na ɔvale ɔhɔmanle ɔ nli.
41006029	Dwɔn ɛdoavolɛma ne mɔ dele, bɛhɔliele ye funli ne na bɛhɔziele ye.
41006030	Ɛzoanvolɛma ne ziale rale na bɛrahanle ninyɛne mɔɔ bɛyɛle nee mɔɔ bɛhilehilele la amuala bɛhilele Gyisɛse.
41006031	Kɛmɔ ɛnee menli dɔɔnwo si kɔ na bɛba Gyisɛse anwo ɛkɛ ne la, ɔ nee ye ɛdoavolɛma ne mɔ annyia adenle bɔbɔ na bɛade aleɛ bɛawula bɛ nloa anu. Yemɔti ɔzele ye ɛdoavolɛma ne mɔ kɛ, “Bɛrɛla bɛmaa yɛhɔvea ɛleka bie koonwu na bɛlie bɛ ɛnwomenle ekyii.”
41006032	Na bɛdabɛ bɛ ngome bɛvale ɛlɛne bɛzile nu kɛ bɛkɔ bɛahɔvea ɛleka bie koonwu.
41006033	Noko menli dɔɔnwo ze bɛ, yemɔti mɔɔ bɛnwunle kɛ bɛlɛkɔ la bɛvale ɛnriandilɛ bɛvi azua ne mɔ azo bɛbule bɛ nyunlu.
41006034	Gyisɛse vi ɛlɛne ne anu dwule aze la, ɔnwunle menli dɔɔnwo ne na ɔ kunlu yelɛyelale ye kpole, ɔluakɛ bɛle kɛ mboane mɔɔ ɛnlɛ neavolɛ la. Zɔhane ati ɔbɔle ɔ bo ɔhilehilele bɛ ninyɛne dɔɔnwo.
41006035	Mɔɔ aleɛ ne hɔle bie la, ye ɛdoavolɛma ne mɔ razele ye kɛ, “Aleɛ ne anloa ɛbɔ aze, yɛɛ ɛke noko ɛmbikye sua zo.
41006036	Yemɔti maa menli ye adenle maa bɛhɔ azua nee namunamu ne mɔ azo na bɛhɔdɔ debie bɛli.”
41006037	Gyisɛse buale bɛ kɛ, “Bɛdabɛ bɛmaa bɛ debie bɛli.” Bɛbizale ye kɛ, “Ɛnee yɛhɔdɔ kpanwo etaku nna nna ɛya nwiɔ yɛmaa bɛ ɔ?”
41006038	Gyisɛse zele bɛ kɛ, “Bɛhɔnlea kɛ bɛlɛ kpanwo nyɛ?” Bɛhɔnleanle na bɛrazele ye kɛ, “Kpanwo nnu yɛɛ fɛlɛ nwiɔ.”
41006039	Gyisɛse zele ye ɛdoavolɛma ne mɔ kɛ bɛmaa menli ne mɔ ɛdɛnlɛdɛnla aze ekpunli ekpunli wɔ ndile ne azo.
41006040	Menli ne mɔ dɛnlɛdɛnlanle aze ekpunli ekpunli, ekpunli ne bie anu amra le ɛya, bie noko le abulanlu.
41006041	Na Gyisɛse vale kpanwo nnu ne nee fɛlɛ nwiɔ ne na ɔnleanle anwomanyunlu, ɔyɛle Nyamenle mo, ɔbubule kpanwo ne ɔmanle ye ɛdoavolɛma ne mɔ kɛ bɛva bɛmaa menli ne mɔ. Eza ɔhyɛle fɛlɛ nwiɔ ne ɔmanle bɛ muala.
41006042	Awie biala nyianle bie lile manle ɔ ko yile tɛkɛɛ.
41006043	Na ɛdoavolɛma ne sesale kpanwo nee fɛlɛ ne abo zo ne ahɛndɛne bulu nee nwiɔ.
41006044	Menli mɔɔ lile kpanwo ne la, saa ɛye mraalɛ nee ngakula ne mɔ nu a bɛlua mrenya apenle nnu.
41006045	Ndɛndɛ ne ala Gyisɛse manle ye ɛdoavolɛma ne vale ɛlɛne ne lumuale ɔ nyunlu wɔ sunvoa lɔ, wɔ Bɛteseeyeda sua zo na ɔyɛle ɛ ɔnea yeagyakyi menli ne adenle.
41006046	Ɔ nee menli ne wiele nrɛlaleɛ di la, akee ɔhɔle boka bie azo kɛ ɔkazɛlɛ.
41006047	Aleɛ ne muanle nwo la, ɛnee ɛlɛne ne la tandane ne buma ne anu lɔ na yeha Gyisɛse angome wɔ ɛnwea ne anloa.
41006048	Ɔnwunle kɛ ye ɛdoavolɛma ne anwo ɛhyele bɛ wɔ azule ne anye lɔ, ɔluakɛ ɛnee anwoma ne ɛlɛbɔ atia bɛ. Zɔhane ati aleɛbahye ne kɛyɛ akɔlɛmɔleɛ, ɔdiale azule ne anye ɔrale bɛ nwo ɛkɛ ne na ɔyɛle kɛ ɔse bɛ nwo.
41006049	Mɔɔ ɛdoavolɛma ne mɔ nwunle ye la, bɛdwenlenle kɛ nwomenle ɔ, yemɔti bɛdeɛdeanle nu,
41006050	ɔluakɛ ɛnee bɛ ahonle ɛdu kpole kpalɛ. Ndɛndɛ ne ala Gyisɛse zele bɛ kɛ, “Bɛdo bɛ ahonle azule nu! Medame ɔ, bɛmmasulo!”
41006051	Na ɔvole ɛlɛne ne anu la, ɛkɛ ne ala anwoma ne gyakyile ɛdulɛ. Ɛhye yɛle ɛdoavolɛma ne nwanwane kpole,
41006052	ɔluakɛ ɛnee bɛtɛtele ɔ bo kɛ ɔzile ɔyɛle mɔɔ Gyisɛse holale manle menli apenle nnu ne aleɛ la; nɔhalɛ, ɛnee bɛ adwenle ɛnzo nu fee.
41006053	Bɛpɛle tandane ne bɛrale sua bie mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye Gɛnɛzalɛte la azo na bɛhendanle bɛ ɛlɛne ne wɔ ɛvoleɛ ne.
41006054	Bɛvi ɛlɛne ne anu bɛdwule aze ala la yɛɛ menli ne nwunle Gyisɛse a.
41006055	Zɔhane ati bɛhanle bɛ nwo bɛwolole maanzinli ne anu ɛleka biala; bɛhɔzoale bɛ wuleravolɛma wɔ ɛkpa nu bɛrɛlɛle Gyisɛse wɔ ɛleka biala mɔɔ bɛkɛde kɛ ɔwɔ la.
41006056	Ɛleka biala mɔɔ ɔhɔle la, saa namule nu o, saa suakpole zo o, anzɛɛ ɛya nu bɔbɔ a, menli vale bɛ wuleravolɛma raguale gua ne mɔ azo na bɛbodole ye kɛ ɔmaa adenle ɔmaa bɛva bɛ sa bɛha ye tɛladeɛ ne anloa ala, na bɛdabɛ noko mɔɔ bɛyɛle ye zɔhane la amuala dele kpɔkɛ bɔkɔɔ.
41007001	Falasiima bie nee mɛla kilehilevolɛma mɔɔ vi Gyɛlusalɛm la rayiale Gyisɛse.
41007002	Na bɛnwunle kɛ ye ɛdoavolɛma ne bie mɔ lɛ bɛ sa anwo evinli ɛlɛdi debie, yemɔ a le kɛ, bɛanrinzi bɛ sa anwo wɔ adenle mɔɔ Falasiima ne kile kɛ ɔwɔ kɛ bɛyɛ ye la anu. (
41007003	Falasiima nee Dwuuma mɔɔ ɛha la amuala di bɛ mɔmoane amra ngilehilelɛ ne azo la ati, bɛnli debie biala, kyesɛ bɛnrinzi bɛ sa anwo, kɛmɔ bɛ ngilehilelɛ ne se la.
41007004	Eza bɛnli debie biala mɔɔ vi gua nu la, kyesɛ bɛdumua bɛnrinzi nwolɛ, yɛɛ bɛlɛ ngilehilelɛ dɔɔnwo mɔɔ fane kɛ bɛsi bɛnrinzi ahɔpo, ahyɛnze yɛɛ kɔbele mbuakɛ nee mgba nwo la.)
41007005	Zɔhane ati Falasiima ne nee mɛla kilehilevolɛma ne mɔ bizale Gyisɛse kɛ, “Duzu ati a wɔ ɛdoavolɛma ne mɔ ɛnli ngilehilelɛ ne mɔɔ yɛ nlenya mɔ ɛva ɛgyakyi yɛ la azo na bɛfa bɛ sa anwo evinli bɛdi debie ɛ?”
41007006	Gyisɛse buale bɛ kɛ, “Ayezaya nwunle bɛ bɔkɔɔ yɛɛ ɔhanle a. Bɛle nabalabama kpalɛ kpalɛ, kɛmɔ ɔhɛlɛle ɔdole ɛkɛ ne la; ɔse, ‘Nyamenle se, Menli ɛhye mɔ fa bɛ nloa babonle mgbane a kanvo me a, na bɛ ahonle ɛdeɛ, ɔmbikye me.
41007007	Bɛsonle me mgbane, ɔluakɛ bɛkilehile mɔɔ menli ɛhyehyɛ la kɛ asɛɛ me mɛla ɔ!’
41007008	“Bɛmɛ, bɛva Nyamenle mɛla ne bɛzie ahane na bɛdi bɛ mɔmoane amra ngilehilelɛ ne mɔ azo.”
41007009	Gyisɛse vale zɔle zolɛ kɛ, “Bɛmɛ, bɛbɔ nrɛlɛbɛ adenle mɔɔ bɛfa zolɛ bɛtulu Nyamenle mɛla ne mɔ na bɛdi bɛdabɛ bɛ ngilehilelɛ zo a.
41007010	Mosisi hanle kɛ, ‘Di ɛ ze nee ɛ nli eni’, na ‘Awie biala mɔɔ kɛyɛ ɔ ze anzɛɛ ɔ nli aholoba la, bɛhu ye.’
41007011	Na bɛmɛ, bɛkilehile kɛ saa awie lɛ debie mɔɔ ɔkola ɔfa ɔnea ɔ ze anzɛɛ ɔ nli a ɔyɛ boɛ la na saa ɔka kɛ, ‘Ɛhye le Kɔban’ a, (ɔ bo a le, ‘Ɔle Nyamenle ɛdeɛ’)
41007012	ɛnee bɛmɛ bɛlie bɛdo nu kɛ moalɛ mɔɔ ɔwɔ kɛ ɔfa ɔboa ɔ ze nee ɔ nli la ɛwie.
41007013	Bɛlua zɛhae adenle zo bɛva bɛ ngilehilelɛ mɔɔ le zɛhae la bɛtia Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne azo; yɛɛ ninyɛne dɔɔnwo mɔɔ le kɛ ɛhye mɔ la angome a bɛyɛ a.”
41007014	Gyisɛse akee vɛlɛle menli dɔɔnwo ne wɔ ɔ nwo ɛkɛ ne bieko na ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Bɛ muala bɛdie mɔɔ meka la na bɛde ɔ bo kɛ,
41007015	debie biala ɛnle ɛkɛ mɔɔ kɔ sonla kunlu a ɔgua ɔ nwo evinli a, na mɔɔ vi sonla kunlu finde la a gua ɔ nwo evinli a. [
41007016	Bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛlɛ ɛnzonlɛ la, bɛdie!”]
41007017	Nzinlii mɔɔ ɔvile menli ne anu ɔhɔle sua nu la, ye ɛdoavolɛma ne bizale ye mɔɔ ɔhanle la abo.
41007018	Gyisɛse bizale bɛ kɛ, “Yemɔti bɛdabɛ noko bɛnde ɛhye abo? Debie biala mɔɔ wɔ findezo na ɔkɛhɔ sonla kunlu la ɛngua ɔ nwo evinli,
41007019	ɔluakɛ ɔngɔ ye ahonle nu na ɔkɔgua ɔ kunlu na ɔfa ye aze ɔse.” (Ɛhye mɔɔ Gyisɛse hanle la kile kɛ aleɛ biala bɛdi.)
41007020	Na ɔzɔle zolɛ ɔzele kɛ, “Mɔɔ vi sonla kunlu finde la a gua ɔ nwo evinli a.
41007021	Ɔluakɛ wɔ sonla kunlu, bɔbɔ wɔ ye ahonle nu yɛɛ adwenle ɛtane vi finde na ɔmaa ɔbɔ adwɔmane, ɔwua, ɔyɛ kɔdiawu,
41007022	ɔfa nwuvolɛ, ɔyɛ anyebolo, ɔyɛ amumuyɛ, ɔbɔ adalɛ, ɔyɛ ahulomrenya anzɛɛ ahulomraalɛ, ɔdi nzisi, ɔyɛ ngunzi, ɔtu ɔ nwo na ɔyɛ ngoaseade a.
41007023	Ninyɛne ɛtane ɛhye mɔ amuala vi sonla kunlu a finde a na bɛgua ɔ nwo evinli.”
41007024	Gyisɛse vile ɛkɛ ne na ɔhɔle maanzinli ne mɔɔ bikye suakpole ne mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye Taya la azo. Ɔhɔwolole awuke bie anu, na ɔyɛle kɛ ɔnrɛmaa awie ɛnrɛnwu kɛ ɔwɔ ɛkɛ ne, noko akee yeangola fea kyɛ.
41007025	-
41007026	Raalɛ bie mɔɔ ɛnle Dwuunli na bɛwole ye wɔ Fonehyea maanzinli nu wɔ Selea maanle nu la rale Gyisɛse anwo ɛkɛ. Raalɛ ɛhye, sunsum ɛtane wɔ ɔ ra raalɛ anwo. Ɔdele Gyisɛse nganeɛ la, ɔrale ɔradule ɔdɔle ɔ gyakɛ anu na ɔbodole ye kɛ ɔdu sunsum ɛtane ne wɔ ɔ ra ne anwo.
41007027	Gyisɛse buale ye kɛ, “Maa yɛlumua yɛmaa ngakula ne mɔ ɛli debie na bɛ ko ɛyi; ɔnle kpalɛ kɛ yɛkɛva ngakula ne mɔ aleɛ ne yɛkɛmaa ahwea mralɛ.”
41007028	Raalɛ ne hanle kɛ, “Ɔle zɔhane, Yɛmenle, noko akee ahwea mralɛ ne mɔ mɔɔ gua ɛkponle ne abo la, ɔyɛ a tafetafe ngakula ne mɔ aleɛ ne abo zo ne.”
41007029	Gyisɛse zele ye kɛ, “Wɔ edwɛkɛ ne mɔɔ wɔha la ati, kɔ sua nu na sunsum ɛtane ne ɛvi ɛ ra raalɛ ne anwo.”
41007030	Raalɛ ne hɔle sua nu na ɔhɔnwunle kɛ ɔ ra raalɛ ne la ɛkpa zo, na sunsum ɛtane ne ɛvi ɔ nwo amgba.
41007031	Akee Gyisɛse vile Taya afoa nu na ɔluale Saedɛn sua zo nee Azuamgbole Bulu ne mɔ maanzinli ne anu ɔrale Galeli Tandane ne anloa.
41007032	Menli bie vale nrenya bie mɔɔ anzo ɛdi na ɔle mumule la rɛlɛle ye na bɛbodole ye kɛ ɔva ɔ sa ɔdo ɔ nwo zo.
41007033	Gyisɛse vale nrenya ne vile ɛlɔne ne anu hɔle ahane na ɔvale ɔ sa mrɛlɛsɛka ɔwulowulale nrenya ne anzo nu, ɔdole nyɛlɛ, na ɔvale ɔ sa ɔhanle nrenya ne atafinlima.
41007034	Akee Gyisɛse nleanle anwuma, ɔgule ɛnwomenle kpole ko na ɔzele nrenya ne kɛ, “Ɛfata!” Ɔ bo a le, “Bɛbuke!”
41007035	Ɛkɛ ne ala nrenya ne anzo bukele, ɔ tafinlima zianyinle na ɔdendɛle kpalɛ.
41007036	Na Gyisɛse bɔle menli ne mɔ anloa kɛ bɛmmabɔ mɔɔ ɛzi la azo bɛkile awie biala, noko bɛamkponle na bɛhanle ye dɔɔnwo kpalɛ.
41007037	Ɔyɛle bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛdele la amuala azibɛnwo kpole na bɛbɔle nu bɛhanle kɛ, “Ɔyɛ debie biala boɛ! Ɔmaa anzondilira te edwɛkɛ na mumule tendɛ.”
41008001	Yeangyɛ biala yɛɛ menli dɔɔnwo bieko rayiale ɔ nwo ɛkɛ a. Bɛ aleɛ mɔɔ bɛdi la wiele la, Gyisɛse vɛlɛle ye ɛdoavolɛma ne mɔ na ɔzele bɛ kɛ,
41008002	“Me kunlu yelɛyela me wɔ menli ɛhye mɔ anwo, ɔluakɛ bɛ nee me ɛradɛnla kenle nsa, yɛɛ bɛnlɛ debie biala mɔɔ bɛdi ye kɛkala a.
41008003	Saa meammaa bɛ debie bɛanli na mese bɛ kɛ bɛhɔ sua nu a, bɛ nye zo kɛbulu bɛ wɔ adenle nu, ɔluakɛ bie mɔ vi moa a ɛra a.”
41008004	Ye ɛdoavolɛma ne mɔ bizale ye kɛ, “Ɛnee nienwu, wɔ fienemgbole ye anu, yɛɛ yɛkɛnyia aleɛ mɔɔ kɛza menli ɛhye mɔ di a?”
41008005	Gyisɛse bizale bɛ kɛ, “Kpanwo nyɛ a bɛlɛ a?” Bɛbuale kɛ, “Kpanwo mumua nsuu.”
41008006	Gyisɛse manle menli ne dɛnlanle aze na ɔvale kpanwo nsuu ne, ɔyɛle Nyamenle mo, na ɔbubule nu ɔmanle ye ɛdoavolɛma ne mɔ kɛ bɛhyɛ bɛmaa menli ne, na bɛyɛle ye zɔhane.
41008007	Eza bɛlɛ fɛlɛ ekyi bie wɔ ɛkɛ ne. Gyisɛse vale na ɔyɛle Nyamenle mo, na ɔhanle ɔhilele ye ɛdoavolɛma ne mɔ kɛ bɛhyɛ bɛmaa menli ne.
41008008	-
41008009	Awie biala lile bie manle ɔ ko yile, na menli ne, saa ɛye mraalɛ nee ngakula nu a, bɛlua menli kɛyɛ apenle nna. Ɛdoavolɛma ne wulowulale aleɛ ne abo zo ne ahɛndɛne tetɛkɛɛ nsuu. Na Gyisɛse gyakyile menli ne mɔ adenle,
41008010	na ndɛndɛ ne ala ɔ nee ye ɛdoavolɛma ne mɔ vole ɛlɛne nu hɔle Dalemanuta maanzinli nu.
41008011	Falasiima bie rale Gyisɛse ɛkɛ nee ye razule kpolera. Ɛnee bɛkpondɛ kɛ bɛsɔ ye bɛnea la ati, bɛzele ye kɛ ɔyɛ nwanwane sɛkɛlɛneɛ ɔmaa bɛnlea, ɔva ɔhile kɛ Nyamenle die mɔɔ ɔlɛyɛ la to nu.
41008012	Gyisɛse gule ɛnwomenle na ɔbizale kɛ, “Duzu ati a bɛmɛ adwuleso amra bɛkpondɛ sɛkɛlɛneɛ ɛ? Nɔhalɛ, bɛnrɛyɛ sɛkɛlɛneɛ biala bɛnrɛhile bɛdabɛ menli ɛhye mɔ ɛlɛ!”
41008013	Na ɔgyakyile bɛ ɛkɛ ne ɔvale ɛlɛne ɔpɛle ɔhɔle tandane ne anzi lɔ.
41008014	Ɛdoavolɛma ne mɔ arɛle vile kɛ bɛkɛva aleɛ bɛkɛzia bɛ nwo, yemɔti kpanwo mumua ko ala a ɛnee wɔ bɛ bɔlɛ nu a.
41008015	Gyisɛse hakyele bɛ kɛ, “Bɛnlea bɛ nwo boɛ wɔ Falasiima mgbɔvonle ne nee Hɛlɔdo mgbɔvonle ne anwo.”
41008016	Bɛdwenledwenlenle nwolɛ kɛ, “Ɛnee kpanwo mɔɔ yɛnlɛ ye la ati a ɔlɛka ɛhye a?”
41008017	Gyisɛse nwunle mɔɔ bɛlɛkeha la na ɔbizale bɛ kɛ, “Duzu ati a bɛlɛdwenle kpanwo mɔɔ bɛnlɛ ye la anwo ɛ? Yemɔti bɛnze anzɛɛ bɛnde ɔ bo ɔ? Bɛ adwenle ɛnzo nu ɔ?
41008018	Bɛlɛ ɛnyelɛ, na bɛnnwu debie ɔ? Anzɛɛ bɛlɛ ɛnzonlɛ na bɛnde edwɛkɛ ɔ? Yemɔti bɛngakye?
41008019	Mekɛ mɔɔ membubule kpanwo nnu ne anu memanle menli apenle nnu ne la, ahɛndɛne nyɛ yɛɛ bɛsesale ɔ bo zo mgbokpoloka ne la bɛnyianle a?” Bɛbuale kɛ, “Bulu nee nwiɔ.”
41008020	Eza Gyisɛse bizale bɛ kɛ, “Na membubule kpanwo nsuu ne memanle menli apenle nna ne noko la, ahɛndɛne nyɛ a ɔ bo zo mgbokpoloka ne yɛle a?” Bɛbuale kɛ, “Nsuu.”
41008021	Na ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Yɛɛ akee ɛnɛ nee ɛnɛ ala bɛnnyia ndelebɛbo a?”
41008022	Gyisɛse nee ye ɛdoavolɛma ne rale Bɛteseeyeda na menli bie vale nrenya bie mɔɔ anye ɛzi la rɛlɛle ye na bɛbodole ye kɛ ɔyɛ ye ayile.
41008023	Gyisɛse zɔle nrenya ne asa na ɔvale ye ɔhɔle namule ne kandiba. Ɔseanle nyɛlɛ ɔguale ɔ sa nu na ɔvale ɔhanle nrenya ne anye, ɔvale ɔ sa ɔguale ɔ nwo zo na akee ɔbizale ye kɛ, “Ɛnwu debie ɔ?”
41008024	Nrenya ne manle ɔ nye zo na ɔhanle kɛ, “Ɛhɛe, menwu menli, na bɛle kɛ mbaka mɔɔ ɛlɛtiedia la.”
41008025	Gyisɛse eza vale ɔ sa hanle nrenya ne anye na zolɛ dele kpalɛ na ɔnwunle debie bɔkɔɔ.
41008026	Gyisɛse zele ye kɛ, “Kɔ sua nu, mmasia ɛ nzi ɛkɔ namule ne azo bieko.”
41008027	Gyisɛse nee ye ɛdoavolɛma ne hɔle namunamu ne mɔ mɔɔ zuozua suakpole ne mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye Felepe Sizalia la azo. Bɛlua adenle zo bɛlɛkɔ la ɔbizale bɛ kɛ, “Menli se mame a le nwane? Bɛha bɛhile me.”
41008028	Bɛbuale ye kɛ, “Bie mɔ se wɔmɔ a ɛle Dwɔn Sɔnevolɛ ne; bie mɔ noko se wɔmɔ a ɛle Yilaegya, yɛɛ eza bie mɔ se ɛle Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛma ne mɔ ko.”
41008029	Na ɔbizale bɛ kɛ, “Na bɛdabɛ noko ɛ? Bɛse mame a le nwane?” Pita buale kɛ, “Wɔmɔ a ɛle Kelaese ne.”
41008030	Na Gyisɛse bɔle bɛ nloa kɛ, “Bɛmmaka mɔɔ bɛha ye wɔ me nwo la bɛkile awie biala.”
41008031	Akee Gyisɛse bɔle ɔ bo kɛ ɔkilehile ye ɛdoavolɛma ne kɛ, “Ɔwɔ kɛ Medame Sonla Ra, menwu amaneɛ somaa na mgbanyima ne nee sɛlɛvolɛ mgbanyinli nee mɛla kilehilevolɛma ne mɔ kpo me. Bɛbahu me na kenle nsa ne anzi mebadwazo meara ngoane nu bieko.”
41008032	Ɔkpale ɛhye anwo ɛdanlɛ wienyi ɔhilele bɛ. Yemɔti Pita vale Gyisɛse hɔle ahane na ɔhwile ɔ nyunlu.
41008033	Na Gyisɛse hakyile ɔ nwo na ɔnwunle ye ɛdoavolɛma ne mɔ la, ɔdeanle Pita ɔzele kɛ, “Seetan, twe ɛ nwo fi ɛkɛ ne. Ɛndu folɛ kpalɛ! Wɔ adwenle ne ɛnvi Nyamenle, ɔle sonla adwenle.”
41008034	Akee Gyisɛse vɛlɛle menli dɔɔnwo ne nee ye ɛdoavolɛma ne wɔ ɔ nwo ɛkɛ ne na ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Saa awie biala kpondɛ kɛ ɔ nee me dua a, ɛnee ɔkpo ɔ nwo na ɔva ye amaneɛnwunlɛ meanubaka ne ɔdo ɔ kɔme zo na ɔdoa me.
41008035	Awie biala mɔɔ pele ye ngoane nwo la minli ye; na awie biala mɔɔ kɛminli ye ngoane wɔ mame nee Edwɛkpa ne ati la kɛlie ye ɛkɛla ngoane.
41008036	Saa sonla nyia ewiade ninyɛne kɔsɔɔti na ɔminli ye ngoane a, ɛnee duzu nvasoɛ a ɔnyia a? Ɔnnyia ɛhwee.
41008037	Na duzu bɔbɔ yɛɛ sonla kɛhola kɛva kɛzenza ye ɛkɛla a? Bɛhakye kɛ bɛ nee amumuyɛma mɔɔ ɛnlie me ɛnli la a de a.
41008038	Yemɔti saa awie annea boɛ na ɔmaa me nwo nee me ngilehilelɛ ne yɛ ye nyiane wɔ ɛtane nee amumuyɛ mekɛ ye anu a, ɛnee noko ahenle ɛnwu ye kɛ, ɔdaye noko ɔ nwo bayɛ Medame Sonla Ra nyiane wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ me nee me anwuma soanvolɛma nwuanzanwuanza ne yɛkɛra Egya anyunlunyia ne anu la.”
41009001	Na ɔhanle ɔzɔle zolɛ kɛ, “Bɛhakye ɛhye! Bie mɔ gyi bɛ avinli ɛke mɔɔ bɛnrɛwu kɔkpula kɛ bɛkɛnwu Nyamenle belemgbunlililɛ ne kɛ yera zo wɔ tumi nu.”
41009002	Kenle nsia pɛle nu la, Gyisɛse vale Pita, Gyemise, yɛɛ Dwɔn hɔle boka tendenle bie azo, bɛ ngome ala a bɛwɔ ɛkɛ a. Na bɛnwunle kɛ Gyisɛse ɛhakyi bɛ nye zo,
41009003	na ye tɛladeɛ ne ɛyɛ nwohyee mɔɔ awie biala mɔɔ wɔ aleɛabo la ɛnrɛhola ɛnrɛkpo ɛnrɛmaa ɔnrɛyɛ zɔhane a.
41009004	Ɛdoavolɛma nsa ne nwunle Mosisi nee Yilaegya kɛ bɛ nee Gyisɛse ɛlɛtendɛ.
41009005	Na Pita hanle hilele Gyisɛse kɛ, “Kilehilevolɛ, ɔle kpalɛ kɛ yɛwɔ ɛke a. Yɛbabɔ nzeseɛ nsa, wɔ ɛdeɛ ko, Mosisi ɛdeɛ ko, yɛɛ Yilaegya ɛdeɛ ko.”
41009006	Ɛnee ɔdaye mumua ne ɔnnwu edwɛkɛ ko mɔɔ ɔha a, ɔboalekɛ ɛnee ɛzulolɛ kpole ɛha ye nee ɔ gɔnwo mɔ.
41009007	Amungu rahedale bɛ nwo zo, na ɛnelɛ bie dendɛle amungu ne anu zele kɛ, “Me ra mɔɔ mekulo ye la ɛne, bɛdie ye!”
41009008	Ɛkɛ ne ala bɛtotole bɛ nye, noko bɛannwu awie biala kɛ Gyisɛse angome mɔɔ bɛ nee ye gyi ɛkɛ ne la ala.
41009009	Na bɛvi boka ne azo bɛlɛdwu la, Gyisɛse bɔle ye ɛdoavolɛma ne anloa kɛ, “Bɛmmaka mɔɔ bɛnwu ye la bɛkile awie biala, kɔkpula mekɛ mɔɔ Sonla Ra ne vi ewule nu kɛdwazo la.”
41009010	Bɛlile ye edwɛkɛ ne azo, na bɛdabɛ ngome bɛdwenledwenlenle mɔɔ zile la anwo kɛ, “Ɛnee ewudwazo ɛhye a le duzu?”
41009011	Na bɛbizale Gyisɛse kɛ, “Duzu ati a mɛla kilehilevolɛma ne mɔ se ɔwɔ kɛ Yilaegya dumua ba ɛ?”
41009012	Ɔbuale bɛ kɛ, “Ɔwɔ kɛ amgba Yilaegya dumua ba batoto ninyɛne muala boɛ. Na duzu ati a Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne ka kɛ Sonla Ra ne banwu amaneɛ somaa, na menli akpo ye ɛ?
41009013	Memaa bɛade kɛ Yilaegya zɔhane ɛra dɛbadɛba, noko menli ambu ye, bɛyɛle ye mgbane mgbane, kɛmɔ Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne ka ye wɔ ɔ nwo la.”
41009014	Mɔɔ bɛradole ɛdoavolɛma mɔɔ ɛha la, bɛnwunle kɛ menli somaa ɛbɔ ɛyia bɛ, na mɛla kilehilevolɛma nee bɛ ɛlɛsu kpolera.
41009015	Menli ne mɔ nwunle Gyisɛse la ɔzinle bɛ nwo na bɛnriandile bɛhɔzomanle ye bie.
41009016	Gyisɛse bizale ɛdoavolɛma ne kɛ, “Duzu anwo kpolera a bɛ nee menli ne mɔ ɛlɛsu a?”
41009017	Nrenya ko mɔɔ wɔ menli ne anu la zele kɛ, “Kilehilevolɛ, menvale me ra nrenya membale, ɔluakɛ sunsum ɛtane mɔɔ ɔmmaa ɔngola tendɛ la wɔ ɔ nwo.
41009018	Kenle biala mɔɔ sunsum ɛtane ne kɛdwu aze la, ɔmaa kakula ne pɛ fi, ɔ nloa wu awubue, ɔtwi ɔ gye na ɔsa ketee. Menzele wɔ ɛdoavolɛma ne mɔ kɛ bɛdu sunsum ɛtane ne wɔ ɔ nwo, na bɛangola.”
41009019	Gyisɛse zele bɛ kɛ, “Bɛmɛ mɔɔ bɛnlɛ diedi a! Me nee bɛ ɛdɛnla ɔhɔkpula kenlenzu? Menyia bɛ nwo abotane ɔhɔkpula kenlenzu? Bɛva kakula ne bɛrɛlɛ me!”
41009020	Na bɛvale ye bɛrale. Sunsum ɛtane ne nwunle Gyisɛse ala la yɛɛ ɔmanle kakula ne dɔle mgbutike a. Ɔhundohundole ɔ nwo aze na ɔ nloa wule awubue.
41009021	Na Gyisɛse bizale kakula ne ɔ ze kɛ, “Ɔvale zɛhae ɛyɛlɛ la yehyɛ ɔ?” Nrenya ne buale kɛ, “Ye nretee ne anu ala yɛɛ ɔvale ye a.
41009022	Mekɛ dɔɔnwo, yevuandi ye yedo nzule nee senle nu, mɔɔ anrɛɛ ɔwɔ kɛ ɔwu a. Na saa ɛkola debie biala yɛ a, ɛnee nwu yɛ anwunvɔne na boa yɛ.”
41009023	Gyisɛse zele ye kɛ, “Saa ɛkola a? Sonla mɔɔ lɛ diedi la kola yɛ debie biala.”
41009024	Na ndɛndɛ ne ala kakula ne ɔ ze hanle kɛ, “Melɛ diedi, na ɔle ekyi. Boa me maa me diedi ɛnyi.”
41009025	Gyisɛse nwunle kɛ menli dɔɔnwo ɛlɛba arahyele bɛ nwo zo la, ɔdeanle sunsum ɛtane ne nu na ɔzele ye kɛ, “Sunsum mumule, ɛvi kakula nrenya ye anwo tu, mmabawolo ye bieko!”
41009026	Na sunsum ɛtane ne deɛdeanle nuhua maanle kakula ne dɔle mgbutike bieko, na ɔvi ɔ nwo ɔdule. Kakula ne yɛle kɛ sonla mɔɔ ɛwu la, na awie biala hanle kɛ, “Yewu!”
41009027	Na Gyisɛse zɔle ɔ sa manle ye zo na ɔdwazole ɔgyinlanle.
41009028	Gyisɛse hɔle sua nu la ye ɛdoavolɛma ne bizale ye kɛ, “Duzu ati a yɛangola sunsum ɛtane ne tu ɛ?”
41009029	Ɔbuale bɛ kɛ, “Debie biala ɛngola sunsum ɛtane ɛhye tu, kyesɛ nzɛlɛlɛ ala.”
41009030	Gyisɛse nee ye ɛdoavolɛma ne vile ɛkɛ ne na bɛhɔvale Galeli bɛhɔle. Yeangulo kɛ awie biala kɛnwu ɛleka mɔɔ ɔwɔ la,
41009031	ɔboalekɛ ɛnee ɔlɛkilehile ye ɛdoavolɛma ne kɛ, “Bɛbaye Medame Sonla Ra bɛawula menli sa nu bɛamaa bɛahu me, na ye kenle nsa ne anzi mebadwazo meara ngoane nu.”
41009032	Ɛdoavolɛma ne ande ngilehilelɛ ɛhye abo, noko akee bɛzulole kɛ bɛkɛbiza ye ɔ bo.
41009033	Nzinlii bɛrale Kapɛnayɛm, na bɛhɔle sua nu la Gyisɛse bizale ye ɛdoavolɛma ne kɛ, “Duzu a bɛzule nwolɛ kpolera wɔ adenle nu la?”
41009034	Na bɛanye ye ɔ nloa, ɔluakɛ bɛlua adenle ne anu la ɛnee bɛlɛsu kpolera kɛ bɛ nuhua boni a le kpole wɔ bɛ avinli a.
41009035	Yemɔti Gyisɛse dɛnlanle aze, ɔvɛlɛle ye ɛdoavolɛma bulu nee nwiɔ ne na ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Awie biala mɔɔ kpondɛ menli ti ali la ɛli bɛ nzi na ɔzonle awie biala.”
41009036	Akee ɔvale kakula ko ɔziele bɛ nyunlu ɛkɛ, ɔvale ɔ sa ɔdole ɔ kɔme na ɔzele kɛ,
41009037	“Awie biala mɔɔ ɔlua me ti ɔkɛlie ɛhye mɔ ko la, ɛlie me, na mɔɔ kɛlie me la, ɛtɛdiele me ngome, ɛnee yelie ahenle ne mɔɔ zoanle me la noko.”
41009038	Dwɔn zele Gyisɛse kɛ, “Kilehilevolɛ, yɛnwunle nrenya bie kɛ ɔlɛ wɔ duma ɔlɛtu mbɔnsam, na yɛduale ye, ɔluakɛ ɔmboka yɛ nwo.”
41009039	Gyisɛse zele bɛ kɛ, “Bɛmmatua ye, ɔluakɛ awie biala ɛnrɛhola ɛnrɛyɛ nwanwane debie wɔ me duma nu na nzinlii yeaha me nwo edwɛkɛ ɛtane.
41009040	Awie biala mɔɔ ɛngyi yɛ la wɔ yɛ afoa.
41009041	Bɛhakye ɛhye! Awie biala mɔɔ ɔluakɛ bɛle Kelaese ne ɛdeɛ la ati ɔkɛmaa bɛ nzule bɛkɛnlo la kɛnyia ahatualɛ wɔ nwolɛ.
41009042	“Awie biala mɔɔ kɛgyegye menli mɔɔ bɛ diedi mɔɔ wɔ me nu la le kɛ ngakula ɛhye mɔ anu ko, na ɔkɛmaa ɔkɛminli ye diedi ne la, ɛnee noko ɔle kpalɛ kɛ anrɛɛ bɛdwele ɛdibolɛ ɛnlomboɛ kpalɛ bɛhendanle ɔ kɔme na bɛvuandinle ye bɛdole nyevile nu.
41009043	Yemɔti saa ɛ sa ko twehwe wɔ ahɔ ɛtane nu a, pɛ ye to! Ɔle kpalɛ kɛ ɛ sa ko na ɛkɛnyia ngoane tɛla kɛ ɛ sa nwiɔ na ɛkɛhɔ senle ne mɔɔ ɛnnu ɛlɛ la anu. [
41009044	Ɛkɛ ne azonlɛ ɛnwu ɛlɛ, yɛɛ ye ndeanlɛ senle ne ɛnnu ɛlɛ.]
41009045	Saa ɛ gyakɛ gyegye wɔ ahwe wɔ ahɔ ɛtane nu a, pɛ ye to! Ɔle kpalɛ kɛ ɛ gyakɛ ko na ɛkɛnyia ngoane tɛla kɛ ɛ gyakɛ nwiɔ na bɛkɛvuandi wɔ bɛkɛdo senle ne mɔɔ ɛnnu ɛlɛ la anu a. [
41009046	Ɛkɛ ne azonlɛ ɛnwu ɛlɛ, yɛɛ ye ndeanlɛ senle ne ɛnnu ɛlɛ.]
41009047	Saa ɛ nye noko a twehwe wɔ ahɔ ɛtane nu a, tu ye to! Ɔle kpalɛ kɛ ɛ nye ko na ɛkɛnyia Nyamenle belemgbunlililɛ ne tɛla kɛ ɛ nye nwiɔ na bɛkɛvuandi wɔ bɛkɛdo senle ne mɔɔ ɛnnu ɛlɛ la anu a.
41009048	Ɛkɛ ne azonlɛ ɛnwu ɛlɛ, yɛɛ ye ndeanlɛ senle ne ɛnnu ɛlɛ.
41009049	“Bɛbava ndɛnebualɛ senle ne bɛade awie biala anwo kɛ bɛfa ngyenle bɛte azubɔdeɛ nwo la.
41009050	“Ngyenle le kpalɛ; na saa ɔta a, kɛ ɛkɛzi ɛkɛyɛ na yeayɛ menlemenle bieko ɛ? “Bɛmaa bɛ ɛbɛlabɔlɛ ne ɛyɛ kɛ ngyenle, ɛde bɛ, na bɛ nee menli kɔsɔɔti ɛdɛnla anzonudwolɛ nu.”
41010001	Gyisɛse vile ɛkɛ ne rale Dwudiya maanzinli nu na ɔpɛle ɔdɔle Azule Dwɔdan ne anzi. Menli dɔɔnwo rayiale ye bieko, na kɛmɔ ɔta ɔyɛ la, ɔhilehilele bɛ.
41010002	Falasiima bie rale kɛ bɛbazɔ ye bɛanlea, na bɛbizale ye kɛ, “Asoo yɛ mɛla ne maa nrenya adenle maa ɔbɔ ɔ ye ewole? Ka maa yɛdie.”
41010003	Gyisɛse bizale bɛ kɛ, “Duzu mɛla a Mosisi vale manle bɛ a?”
41010004	Bɛbuale kɛ, “Mosisi manle adenle kɛ nrenya ne ɛhɛlɛ ewolebɔlɛ kɛlata ɛmaa ɔ ye na ɔgyakyi ye.”
41010005	Gyisɛse zele bɛ kɛ, “Ɔlua bɛ anzosesebɛ ti yɛɛ Mosisi hɛlɛle mɛla ɛhye manle bɛ a.
41010006	Na aloa kabɔ ɔ bo la, Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne se, ‘Nyamenle bɔle bɛ nrenya nee raalɛ.
41010007	Ɛhye ati nrenya ne bade ɔ nwo avi ɔ ze nee ɔ nli bɛ nwo na ɔ nee ɔ ye ahɔdɛnla,
41010008	na bɛ mu nwiɔ bɛayɛ nwonane ko.’ Yemɔti ɛnee bɛnle nwiɔ bieko na bɛle nwonane ko.
41010009	Zɔhane ati mɔɔ Nyamenle ɛha ɛbɔ nu la, awie biala mmakpakye nu.”
41010010	Bɛziale bɛhɔle sua nu la, ɛdoavolɛma ne bizale Gyisɛse ewolebɔlɛ ne anwo edwɛkɛ bieko.
41010011	Na ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Saa nrenya bɔ ɔ ye ewole na ɔgya fofolɛ a, ɛnee yeyɛ ɛtane.
41010012	Zɔhane ala yɛɛ saa raalɛ gyakyi ɔ hu ɔkɔ agyalɛ fofolɛ a, ɛnee ɔdaye noko yeyɛ ɛtane a.”
41010013	Menli bie vale ngakula rale kɛ Gyisɛse ɛva ɔ sa ɛgua bɛ nwo zo, na ye ɛdoavolɛma ne duale bɛ kɛ bɛmmagyegye ye.
41010014	Mɔɔ Gyisɛse nwunle ye la, ɔvale ɛya na ɔzele ye ɛdoavolɛma ne mɔ kɛ, “Bɛgyakyi ngakula ne mɔ bɛmaa bɛrɛla me nwo, bɛmmatua bɛ, na bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛle kɛ ɛhye mɔ zɛhae la yɛɛ Nyamenle Belemgbunlililɛ ne le bɛ ɛdeɛ a.
41010015	Bɛhakye ɛhye! Awie biala mɔɔ anyɛ ɔ nwo kɛ kakula, anlie Nyamenle Belemgbunlililɛ ne ando nu la ɛnrɛnwu Nyamenle Belemgbunlililɛ ne.”
41010016	Na ɔmanle ngakula ne mɔ zo ngoko ngoko ɔziele ɔ gyakɛ azo, ɔvale ɔ sa ɔguale bɛ nwo zo na ɔyilale bɛ.
41010017	Gyisɛse zile nu bieko kɛ ɔkɔ la, nrenya bie lɛ ɛnriandilɛ rahotole ɔ nyunlu ɛkɛ ne na ɔzele ye kɛ, “Kilehilevolɛ kpalɛ, duzu a menyɛ na meanyia ngoane mɔɔ ɛnlɛ awieleɛ a?”
41010018	Gyisɛse bizale ye kɛ, “Duzu ati a ɛse mele kpalɛ ɛ? Awie biala ɛnle kpalɛ kɛ Nyamenle angomekye.
41010019	Ɛze mɛla ne mɔ: ‘Mmayɛ kɔdiawu, mmafa awuvolɛ, mmawua, mmadi daselɛ adalɛ, mmadi nzisi, di ɛ ze nee ɛ nli eni.’ ”
41010020	Nrenya ne buale kɛ, “Kilehilevolɛ, sumunli me ngakula nu yɛɛ menvale ɛhye mɔ azo ɛlilɛ a.”
41010021	Gyisɛse nleanle ye koonwu, ɔhulole ye na ɔzele ye kɛ, “Yeha wɔ debie ko. Kɔ na kɔdɔne ninyɛne mɔɔ ɛlɛ la amuala, na kyɛ ezukoa ne maa ehyianvolɛma na ɛkɛnyia anwonyia wɔ anwuma, na akee bɛla badoa me bo zo.”
41010022	Nrenya ne dele edwɛkɛ ɛhye la, ɔ nyunlu zale, na ɔvale nyane ɔhɔle, ɔluakɛ ɔle sukoavolɛ kpole.
41010023	Gyisɛse hakyile ɔ nye nleanle ye ɛdoavolɛma ne mɔ na ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Ɔbayɛ se yeamaa sukoavolɛma kɛ bɛkɛnyia Nyamenle Belemgbunlililɛ ne a.”
41010024	Edwɛkɛ ɛhye hwenle ɛdoavolɛma ne nu kpalɛ, na Gyisɛse hɔle zolɛ zele kɛ, “Ayi mɔ, Nyamenle Belemgbunlililɛ ne ɛnyianlɛ yɛ se kpalɛ!
41010025	Na ɔyɛ se noko kpalɛ ɔmaa sukoavolɛ kɛ ɔkɛnyia Nyamenle Belemgbunlililɛ ne, tɛla kɛ afunlumu kɛwolo agbuyia nye nu a.”
41010026	Edwɛkɛ ne zinle ɛdoavolɛma ne mɔ anwo kpole na bɛbizale bɛ nwo ngoko ngoko kɛ, “Ɛnee nwane bɔbɔ a kɛnyia ngoane a?”
41010027	Gyisɛse nleanle bɛ koonwu na ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Mɔɔ yɛ se bo sonla nwo zo la ɛnyɛ se ɛmmaa Nyamenle, ɔluakɛ Nyamenle kola yɛ debie biala.”
41010028	Pita hanle kɛ, “Nea o, na yɛgyakyi debie biala yɛɛ yɛdoa wɔ o!”
41010029	Gyisɛse zele bɛ kɛ, “Ɔle zɔhane, noko bɛdie! Awie biala mɔɔ me ti, nee Edwɛkpa ne ati yegyakyi sua, mediema mrenya anzɛɛ mediema mraalɛ, ninli anzɛɛ selɛ, mralɛ anzɛɛ azɛlɛ la
41010030	banyia bɛ molozo wɔ kɛkala mekɛ ye anu. Ɔbanyia azua, mediema mrenya nee mraalɛ, ninlima nee mralɛ nee azɛlɛ mɔnwo mɔnwo. Bɛbayɛ ye kpɔdekpɔde ɛdeɛ, noko kenle bie ɔkɛnyia ngoane mɔɔ ɛnlɛ awieleɛ.
41010031	Bɛdabɛ dɔɔnwo ne ala mɔɔ ɛnɛ lumua la bali amozi, na amozi amra alumua.”
41010032	Akee Gyisɛse nee ye ɛdoavolɛma ne dɔle adenle zo kɛ bɛkɔ Gyɛlusalɛm, na ɛnee Gyisɛse lumua bɛ nyunlu. Ɛdoavolɛma ne akunlu ɛdu kpalɛ, yɛɛ ɛzulolɛ noko ɛha menli mɔɔ doa bɛ la. Na Gyisɛse eza vale ye ɛdoavolɛma bulu nee nwiɔ ne hɔle ahane na ɔhanle ninyɛne mɔɔ bɛbava bɛayɛ ye la amuala ɔhilele bɛ.
41010033	Ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Bɛdie, yɛlɛkɔ Gyɛlusalɛm, na bɛbaye medame Sonla Ra bɛawula sɛlɛvolɛ mgbanyinli nee mɛla kilehilevolɛma ne mɔ asa anu. Bɛbabua me fɔlɛ kɛ bɛhu me na bɛaye me bɛawula bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnle Dwuuma la asa anu.
41010034	Menli ɛhye mɔ noko bagolo me nwo, atoto me nwo nyɛlɛ, abila me mbaka na bɛahu me. Na ye kenle nsa ne anzi, mebadwazo meara ngoane nu.”
41010035	Gyemise nee Dwɔn, mɔɔ le Zɛbɛdi amra ne mɔ rale Gyisɛse ɛkɛ rahanle kɛ, “Kilehilevolɛ, yɛkulo kɛ yɛsɛlɛ wɔ debie ko.”
41010036	Gyisɛse bizale bɛ kɛ, “Duzu a bɛkpondɛ kɛ meyɛ memaa bɛ a?”
41010037	Bɛbuale kɛ, “Anrɛɛ ɛnee kenle mɔɔ ɛkɛdɛnla wɔ anyunlunyia belemgbunli ebia ne anu la, wɔamaa yɛ nee wɔ adɛnla, ko adɛnla wɔ fema zo na ko noko adɛnla wɔ bɛne zo.”
41010038	Gyisɛse zele bɛ kɛ, “Bɛnze mɔɔ bɛlɛbiza bɛalie la. Asoo bɛkɛhola amaneɛnwunlɛ dwora ne mɔɔ ɔwɔ kɛ meno nu la anu no, anzɛɛ bɛkɛhola ewule ɛzɔnenlɛ ne mɔɔ ɔwɔ kɛ bɛfa bɛsɔne me la die?”
41010039	Bɛbuale kɛ, “Yɛkɛhola.” Gyisɛse zele bɛ kɛ, “Amgba, bɛkɛhola amaneɛnwunlɛ dwora ne mɔɔ ɔwɔ kɛ meno nu la anu no, bɛkɛlie ewule ɛzɔnenlɛ ne mɔɔ bɛfa bɛazɔne me la die,
41010040	noko me sa fema nee bɛne zo ɛdɛnlanlɛ ɛdeɛ, tɛ me a mekpa nu meye menli mɔɔ ɔwɔ kɛ tɛnla la a. Selɛ ne a bava amaa bɛdabɛ mɔɔ yeziezie yemaa bɛ la a.”
41010041	Mɔɔ ɛdoavolɛma ne mɔ mɔɔ hale la dele ɛhye anwo bie la, bɛvale Gyemise nee Dwɔn anwo ɛya kpole.
41010042	Yemɔti Gyisɛse vɛlɛle bɛ muala ɔ nwo ɛkɛ ne na ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Bɛze kɛ maanle maanle arelemgbunli si yɛ bɛ menli kpɔdekpɔde la, yɛɛ kɛ bɛ mgbanyima noko si di bɛ nwo zo tumi la.
41010043	Ɛhye ɛnle zɔhane wɔ bɛ nu. Saa bɛ nuhua bie kpondɛ kɛ ɔyɛ kpole wɔ bɛ avinli a, ɔyɛ bɛ muala bɛ sonvolɛ
41010044	yɛɛ saa bɛ nuhua bie kpondɛ bɛ ti ali a, ɔyɛ bɛ muala bɛ akɛlɛ.
41010045	Medame Sonla Ra bɔbɔ, meamba kɛ bɛzonle me; membale kɛ mebazonle na meava me ngoane meado aze meakpɔne menli dɔɔnwo.”
41010046	Bɛrale Gyɛleko, na mɔɔ Gyisɛse nee ye ɛdoavolɛma ne mɔ nee menli dɔɔnwo vi sua ne azo bɛlɛkɔ la, ɛnee nrenya anyenzinliravolɛ bie mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye Baatemeɛse, mɔɔ le nrenya Temeɛse ara ne, de adehane ne ɛlɛsɛlɛzɛlɛ ninyɛne.
41010047	Mɔɔ ɔdele kɛ Gyisɛse mɔɔ vi Nazalɛte la a ɛlɛse la, ɔdeanle nu kɛ, “Devidi Ara Gyisɛse! Nwu me anwunvɔne!”
41010048	Menli ne mɔ dɔɔnwo deanle ye na bɛzele ye kɛ ɔyɛ koonwu. Noko ɔdeanle nu kpalɛ kɛ, “Devidi Ara, nwu me anwunvɔne!”
41010049	Gyisɛse gyinlanle na ɔzele kɛ, “Bɛvɛlɛ ye bɛmaa me.” Bɛvɛlɛle nrenya anyenzinliravolɛ ne na bɛzele ye kɛ, “Ka wɔ ahonle to azule nu; dwazo na ɔlɛfɛlɛ wɔ.”
41010050	Nrenya ne dwazole, ɔvuandinle ye ɛdanlɛ ne ɔguale, na ɔrale Gyisɛse anwo ɛkɛ ne.
41010051	Gyisɛse bizale ye kɛ, “Duzu a ɛkulo kɛ meyɛ memaa wɔ a?” Nrenya ne buale kɛ, “Kilehilevolɛ, mekulo kɛ menwu debie bieko.”
41010052	Gyisɛse zele ye kɛ, “Kɔ, wɔ diedi ɛyɛ wɔ ayile.” Na ɛkɛ ne ala ɔnwunle debie na ɔdoale Gyisɛse.
41011001	Bɛbikyele Gyɛlusalɛm, mɔɔ ɛnee asɛɛ bɛdwu Bɛtefagye nee Bɛtani la, bɛradwule Ɔlivi Boka ne abo. Na Gyisɛse zoanle ye ɛdoavolɛma ne mɔ nwiɔ manle bɛlumuale ɔ nyunlu,
41011002	na ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Bɛhɔ namule ne mɔɔ wɔ bɛ nyunlu lɔ la azo, na bɛdwu ɛkɛ ne ala a bɛkɛnwu asoaso ralɛ mɔɔ awie ɛtɛtɛnlanle zolɛ ɛlɛ la kɛ ɔhenda ɛkɛ ne. Bɛzianyi ye bɛrɛla.
41011003	Saa awie biza bɛ mɔɔ bɛlɛyɛ la abo a, bɛze ye kɛ, ‘Yɛ menle ne ɛhyia nwolɛ’ na ɔbamaa bɛ nee ye ara.”
41011004	Ɛdoavolɛma nwiɔ ne hɔle na bɛhɔnwunle kɛ asoaso ne henda sua bie anuhɔlɛ wɔ gua ne azo. Mɔɔ bɛlɛsianyi ye la,
41011005	menli mɔɔ gyigyi ɛkɛ ne la bie bizale bɛ kɛ, “Kɛ bɛyɛ asoaso ne mɔɔ bɛlɛsianyi ye ɛ?”
41011006	Ɛdoavolɛma nwiɔ ne yele bɛ ɔ nloa, kɛmɔ Gyisɛse zele bɛ la, na menli ne mɔ gyakyile bɛ manle bɛ nee ye hɔle.
41011007	Bɛvale asoaso ralɛ ne bɛrɛlɛle Gyisɛse, bɛvale bɛ ndanlɛ bɛguale zolɛ na Gyisɛse vole dɛnlanle zolɛ.
41011008	Menli dɔɔnwo vale bɛ ndanlɛ sesɛle adenle ne anu, yɛɛ bie mɔ noko bubule nya guguale adenle ne anu.
41011009	Na menli mɔɔ li ɔ nyunlu nee bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛli ɔ nzi la deɛdeanle nu hanle kɛ, “Ayɛlɛyelɛ ɛha Nyamenle! Nyamenle ɛyila mɔɔ lua Awulae duma nu ɛlɛba la!
41011010	Nyamenle ɛyila yɛ ze Devidi Belemgbunlililɛ ne mɔɔ ɛlɛba la. Ayɛlɛyelɛ ɛha Nyamenle!”
41011011	Gyisɛse dwule Gyɛlusalɛm la, ɔhɔwolole Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne anu, na ɔnleɛnleanle nuhua ninyɛne ɔyiale. Na kɛmɔ ɛnee aleɛ asɛɛ ɛdwo la ati, ɔ nee ye ɛdoavolɛma bulu nee nwiɔ ne ziale hɔle Bɛtani.
41011012	Aleɛ hyenle na bɛvi Bɛtani bɛsia la, ɛhɔne hunle Gyisɛse.
41011013	Ɔnwunle feege baka bie mɔɔ ɛwula buzuu la wɔ moa moa lɔ, na ɔhɔle nwolɛ saa ɔkɛnyia ma bie wɔ zolɛ a. Ɔhɔdwule nwolɛ la, nya ala a ɔnwunle ye wɔ zolɛ a, ɔluakɛ ɛnee mekɛ ɛtɛdwule mɔɔ zɔhane mbaka ne mɔ so a.
41011014	Gyisɛse zele feege baka ne kɛ, “Awie ɛnrɛli wɔ ma bieko ɛlɛ!” Na ye ɛdoavolɛma ne dele mɔɔ ɔhanle la.
41011015	Bɛdwule Gyɛlusalɛm la, Gyisɛse hɔle Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne anu na ɔvoanle bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛlɛdi gua wɔ nu la amuala. Ɔbutubutule bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛlɛsenza ezukoa la ɛkponle ne mɔ nee bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛtɔne mɔlɔnoma la mbia ne mɔ,
41011016	na yeammaa adenle yeammaa awie biala anzoa debie ampɛ nu wɔ Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne anu.
41011017	Akee ɔhilehilele menli ne na ɔzele kɛ, “Bɛhɛlɛ ye Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne anu kɛ Nyamenle se, ‘Bɛbavɛlɛ me Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne maanle maanle nzɛlɛlɛ sua’; na bɛmɛ bɛhakyi ye awulema fealeka.” awulema fealeka (11.17) [AV-62]
41011018	Sɛlɛvolɛ mgbanyinli nee mɛla kilehilevolɛma ne mɔ dele ɛhye la, bɛbɔle ɔ bo kɛ bɛkpondɛ adenle bɛalua zolɛ bɛahu Gyisɛse. Noko bɛzulole, ɔluakɛ ye ngilehilelɛ ne zinle menli dɔɔnwo ne amuala anwo.
41011019	Ye nɔsolɛ nu, Gyisɛse nee ye ɛdoavolɛma ne vile suakpole ne azo hɔle.
41011020	Nwonlomɔ mangyee ne mɔɔ bɛlua adenle ne anu la, bɛnwunle kɛ feege baka ne ɛwu bɔkɔɔ.
41011021	Na Pita hakyele mɔɔ zile la na ɔhanle ɔhilele Gyisɛse kɛ, “Kilehilevolɛ, nea, feege baka ne mɔɔ ɛwale ye amonle la ɛwu.”
41011022	Gyisɛse buale kɛ, “Bɛlie Nyamenle bɛli.
41011023	Bɛhakye ɛhye: saa bɛdie Nyamenle bɛdi, na bɛanzu kpolera wɔ bɛ ahonle nu, na bɛdie bɛdi bɔkɔɔ kɛ mɔɔ bɛkɛha la kɛyɛ ɛkɛ a, bɛbahola bɛaze boka ɛhye kɛ, ‘Tudu kɔdɔ nyevile nu,’ na ɔkɛyɛ zɔhane.
41011024	Ɛhye ati meka meahile bɛ, saa bɛsɛlɛ bɛabiza debie a, bɛlie bɛli kɛ bɛ sa ɛha ye, na debie biala mɔɔ bɛkɛbiza la, Nyamenle kɛva kɛmaa bɛ.
41011025	Na saa bɛgyi bɛlɛsɛlɛ, na awie ɛvo bɛ a, bɛva bɛhyɛ ye na bɛ Ze mɔɔ wɔ anwuma la ava bɛ ɛtane ahyɛ bɛ. [
41011026	Na saa bɛanva bɛ gɔnwo mɔ ɛtane bɛangyɛ bɛ a, bɛ Ze mɔɔ wɔ anwuma la ɛnrɛva bɛ nyɛleɛ ɛtane ne mɔ ɛnrɛhyɛ bɛ.”]
41011027	Bɛradwule Gyɛlusalɛm bieko na Gyisɛse lua Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne anu la, sɛlɛvolɛ mgbanyinli ne nee mɛla kilehilevolɛma ne nee mgbanyima ne mɔ rale ɔ nwo ɛkɛ
41011028	na bɛbizale ye kɛ, “Duzu tumi a ɛlɛ ye kɛ ɔwɔ kɛ ɛyɛ ninyɛne ɛhye mɔ a? Nwane a manle wɔ tumi ɛhye a?”
41011029	Gyisɛse buale bɛ kɛ, “Medame noko mebiza bɛ edwɛkɛ ko, na saa bɛye me ɔ nloa a, menwɔha tumi holɛ ko mɔɔ mefa meyɛ ninyɛne ɛhye mɔ la menwɔhile bɛ.
41011030	Nienwu a Dwɔn tumi ne mɔɔ ɔvale ɔzɔnenle la vi a, ɔvi sonla anzɛɛ ɔvi Nyamenle ɛkɛ ɔ? Bɛha bɛhile me.”
41011031	Bɛ ngome bɛzule ɛhye anwo kpolera na bɛzele kɛ, “Duzu edwɛkɛ a yɛha a? Saa yɛbua kɛ, ‘Ɔvi Nyamenle ɛkɛ’ a, ɔkɛbiza kɛ, ‘Ɛnee duzu ati a bɛanlie Dwɔn bɛanli ɛ?’
41011032	Saa yɛka noko kɛ, ‘Ɔvi sonla a...’ ” (Bɛzulole menli ne mɔ, ɔluakɛ ɛnee awie biala ɛlie ɛdo nu kɛ Dwɔn le Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛ.)
41011033	Na bɛbuale kɛ, “Yɛnze.” Gyisɛse zele bɛ kɛ, “Medame noko menrɛha ahenle holɛ ko mɔɔ manle me tumi kɛ menyɛ ninyɛne ɛhye mɔ la menrɛhile bɛ.”
41012001	Gyisɛse akee dendɛle hilele bɛ wɔ mrɛlɛ nu zele kɛ, “Nrenya bie zonle ye ɛya, ɔluale vanye ma wɔ nu na ɔhyele nwolɛ, ɔdule kuma mɔɔ bɛbahwihwi vanye ma ne anu nzule bɛagua nu la, na ɔzile tawa mɔɔ bɛfo zo bɛsinza egyinli ne la wɔ nu. Akee ɔvale egyinli ne ɔwulale abunsama asa anu na ɔdule ye adenle.
41012002	Ɛbuhenle ne dwule la, ɔzoanle ye akɛlɛ ko wɔ abunsama ne ɛkɛ kɛ ɔhɔlie ye ɛkpɔ ɛdeɛ ne ɔrɛlɛ ye.
41012003	Abunsama ne zɔle akɛlɛ ne nu, bɛbole ye na bɛmanle ɔvale ɔ sa mgbane ɔziale ɔhɔle.
41012004	Egyinli menle ne zoanle akɛlɛ fofolɛ, na ɔdaye noko bɛbole ye, bɛbobɔle ɔ ti anwo mbaka na bɛzale ye.
41012005	Eza ɔzoanle akɛlɛ bieko, na abunsama ne hunle ye, zɔhane ala yɛɛ bɛyɛle ngɛkɛlɛ dɔɔnwo ne ala a; bɛbole bie mɔ yɛɛ bɛhunle bie mɔ.
41012006	Akee ɔhale egyinli menle ne ara kokye ne mɔɔ ɔwɔ kɛ ɔsoa ye a. Na nzinlii ɔzoanle ye wɔ abunsama ne ɛkɛ, ɔse, ‘Medie medi kɛ bɛkɛli me ra ye eni.’
41012007	Na abunsama ne hanle hilele bɛ nwo kɛ, ‘Kɔliagya ne ɛne; bɛmaa yɛyɛ ko yɛhu ye, na ye agyadeɛ ne ɛyɛ yɛ ɛdeɛ.’
41012008	Na bɛhyele ye bɛhunle ye, na bɛvuandinle ye bɛdole egyinli ne bane ne anzi lɔ.”
41012009	Gyisɛse bizale kɛ, “Ɛnee bɛdabɛ bɛnea a, duzu a vanye egyinli menle ne kɛyɛ a? Ɔkɛra na ɔkɛrahu menli zɔhane mɔ na ɔkɛva egyinli ne ɔkɛwula abunsama fofolɛ asa anu.
41012010	Meze kɛ bɛgenga Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ɛhye: ‘Bolɛ ko ne ala mɔɔ suasivoma ne kpole la ɛrayɛ bolɛ mɔɔ anwo hyia kpole kpalɛ kɛ sua mgbɛnezo sika la.
41012011	Ɛhye, Awulae a yɛle a; na yɛnea a ɔyɛ nwanwane kpole!’ ”
41012012	Dwuu mgbanyima ne yɛle kɛ bɛkye ye, ɔluakɛ bɛnwunle kɛ ɔbule ɛrɛlɛ ne ɔtiale bɛ. Noko bɛzulole menli dɔɔnwo ne, yemɔti bɛgyakyile ye na bɛhɔle.
41012013	Bɛzoanle Falasiima nee Hɛlɔdo asa zo ne bie mɔ wɔ Gyisɛse anwo ɛkɛ ne kɛ bɛhɔdo ye abɛla bɛhye ye wɔ edwɛkɛ ɛhanlɛ nu.
41012014	Bɛrale la bɛbizale ye kɛ, “Kilehilevolɛ, yɛze kɛ wɔmɔ ɛnnea sonla nyunlu, yɛɛ ɛndie menli ngehanleɛ, na ɛkilehile Nyamenle ɛhulolɛdeɛ ne nɔhalɛ nu. Na ɛnea a, ɛnee ɔtia yɛ mɛla ne kɛ yɛkɛdua adwule yɛkɛmaa Maanle Maanle Belemgbunli ne ɔ? Ɔwɔ kɛ yɛtua anzɛɛ ɔnle kɛ yɛtua? Ka kile yɛ.”
41012015	Gyisɛse nwunle bɛ nzi na ɔbizale bɛ kɛ, “Duzu ati a bɛra bɛbado me abɛla ɛ? Bɛva dwɛtɛ ne mɔɔ bɛdi la ko bɛrɛla bɛmaa menea.”
41012016	Bɛvale bie bɛmanle ye, na ɔbizale bɛ kɛ, “Nwane nvoninli nee ye duma a le ɛhye mɔ?” Bɛbuale kɛ, “Siza ɔ.”
41012017	Na Gyisɛse zele bɛ kɛ, “Aa, ɛnee noko bɛva mɔɔ le Siza ɛdeɛ la bɛmaa ye ɛ, na bɛva mɔɔ le Nyamenle ɛdeɛ la bɛmaa ye.” Na Gyisɛse anwo yɛle bɛ ɛzulolɛ kpole.
41012018	Mgbanyinli bie mɔɔ boka Sadusiima fane ne anwo la rale Gyisɛse ɛkɛ ne. Menli ɛhye mɔ se saa sonla wu a Nyamenle ɛnrɛdwazo ye.
41012019	Bɛbizale Gyisɛse kɛ, “Kilehilevolɛ, Mosisi hɛlɛle mɛla ɛhye manle yɛ, ɔse, ‘Saa nrenya wu na ɔgyakyi ɔ ye mɔɔ ɔ nee ye anwo la a, ɔwɔ kɛ ɔ diema gya kunlanvolɛ raalɛ ne na ɔ nee ye wo mralɛ maa ɔ diema ne mɔɔ ɛwu la.’
41012020	Na ɛnee mediema nsuu bie wɔ ɛkɛ. Bɛ nuhua kpanyinli ne gyale raalɛ na ɔ nee ye anwo na yeawu.
41012021	Adiema ne mɔɔ tɔ zolɛ nwiɔ la gyale raalɛ ne, na ɔdaye noko ɔ nee ye anwo na yeawu.
41012022	Zɔhane ala yɛɛ adiema ne mɔɔ tɔ zolɛ nsa nee mediema mɔɔ hale la amuala gyale raalɛ ne a, noko biala nee ye anwo na yeawu.
41012023	Ɛnee akee saa mɔwuamra dwazo ba ngoane nu wɔ ewudwazo kenle ne a, nwane aye a le raalɛ ye mɔɔ mediema nsuu ne amuala gyale ye bie la?”
41012024	Gyisɛse buale bɛ kɛ, “Bɛvo kpole! Na bɛze ɔ bo ɔ? Yemɔ a le kɛ bɛnze Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne, yɛɛ bɛnze ye tumi ne.
41012025	Ɔluakɛ saa mɔwuamra dwazo ba ngoane nu a, bɛbayɛ kɛ anwuma soanvolɛma la, agyalɛ biala ɛnle ɛkɛ.
41012026	Akee mɔɔ fane mɔwuamra ɛdwazolɛ ne, asoo bɛtɛkengale ye Mosisi buluku ne anu kɛ Nyamenle hanle hilele ye wɔ ɛbɔ ne anu kɛ, ‘Mame a mele Ebileham nee Ayezeke nee Gyekɔbo Nyamenle ne a?’
41012027	Ɛhye kile kɛ ɔle teasema Nyamenle, na ɔnle bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛwu la Nyamenle. Bɛvo kpole kpalɛ.”
41012028	Ɛnee mɛla kilehilevolɛ ko bie wɔ ɛkɛ. Ɔdele edwɛkɛbizalɛ ne na ɔnwunle kɛ Gyisɛse ɛmaa Sadusiima mualɛ kɛnlɛma gyɛlɛɛnye, yemɔti ɔbizale ye kɛ, “Mɛla ne anu boni a le titile kpalɛ kpalɛ a?”
41012029	Gyisɛse buale kɛ, “Ɛhye a le mɛla ne anu titile kpalɛ kpalɛ a: ‘Yizilayɛma, bɛdie! Awulae yɛ Nyamenle ne a le Awulae kokye ne a.
41012030	Fa wɔ ahonle muala, wɔ ɛkɛla muala, wɔ adwenle muala, nee wɔ anwosesebɛ muala kulo Awulae wɔ Nyamenle ne.’
41012031	Mɛla ne anu titile kpalɛ kpalɛ mɔɔ tɔ zolɛ nwiɔ la a le ɛhye: ‘Kulo ɛ gɔnwo sonla kɛ ɛdawɔ ɛ nwo la.’ Mɛla bieko ɛnle ɛkɛ mɔɔ le titile kpalɛ kpalɛ tɛla nwiɔ ɛhye mɔ a.”
41012032	Mɛla kilehilevolɛ ne zele Gyisɛse kɛ, “Kilehilevolɛ, mo! Ɔle nɔhalɛ, kɛmɔ ɛlɛka la, Awulae angome a le Nyamenle a, nyamenle bieko ɛnle ɛkɛ.
41012033	Na ɔwɔ kɛ sonla biala fa ye ahonle muala, ye adwenle muala, nee ye anwosesebɛ muala kulo Nyamenle, na ɔkulo ɔ gɔnwo sonla kɛ ɔdaye ɔ nwo la. Ɔhyia kpalɛ kɛ ɛkɛli mɛla nwiɔ ɛhye azo tɛla kɛ ɛkɛva nane nee ninyɛne ɛkɛbɔ azu ɛkɛmaa Nyamenle.”
41012034	Gyisɛse nwunle kɛ yeye edwɛkɛ ne anloa nrɛlɛbɛ nu, yemɔti ɔzele ye kɛ, “Ɛ nee Nyamenle Belemgbunlililɛ ne avinli anwa.” Ɔvi ɛhye azo awie biala angola anzi ye ahonle ambiza Gyisɛse edwɛkɛ bieko.
41012035	Gyisɛse kilehile wɔ Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne anu la, ɔbizale kɛ, “Kɛ ɔyɛ mɔɔ mɛla kilehilevolɛma ne ka kɛ Mɛzaya ne le Devidi anlɔnra ɛ?
41012036	Devidi luale Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne azo hanle kɛ, ‘Awulae zele me Awulae kɛ, tɛnla me fema zo ɛke, kɔkpula kɛ menwɔva wɔ agbɔvolɛ menwɔwula ɛ gyakɛ abo.’
41012037	“Na saa Devidi ɔdaye mumua ne ɔvɛlɛle ye ‘Awulae’ a, ɛnee kɛ ɔyɛ mɔɔ Mɛzaya ne yɛ ye anlɔnra ɛ?” Ɛnee menli dɔɔnwo lɛ fɛlɛko ɛlɛtie Gyisɛse.
41012038	Na mɔɔ ɔlɛkilehile la ɔhanle kɛ, “Bɛnlea boɛ wɔ mɛla kilehilevolɛma anwo. Ninyɛne mɔɔ bɛkulo la a le adɛladeɛ ndendenle ɛwulalɛ nee gua zo ɛkpɔsalɛ, amaa menli abɔ bɛ ti aze abiza bɛ ahye.
41012039	Kenle biala bɛkulo kɛ bɛkɛnyia nyianu azua ne mɔ anu mbia kpalɛ ne mɔ azo bɛkɛdɛnla.
41012040	Bɛbɛlɛbɛla ahunlanvolɛ mraalɛ bɛbɔ bɛ awuke ne mɔ na bɛakpati bɛayɛ nwolɛ nzɛlɛlɛ ndendenle. Bɛ ndeanlɛ bayɛ kpole kpalɛ!”
41012041	Gyisɛse dɛnlanle Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne anu ɛleka mɔɔ gya nlɛka ne mɔ gyigyi la, na ɔnleanle menli mɔɔ lɛ ezukoa ɛlɛgua gya ne anu la. Sukoavolɛma dɔɔnwo vale ezukoa mgbole raguale nu,
41012042	akee raalɛ kunlanvolɛ ehyianli bie ɔdaye ɔvale ɛkpɔsɛba nwiɔ ɔraguale nu.
41012043	Gyisɛse vɛlɛle ye ɛdoavolɛma ne amuala na ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Nɔhalɛ, raalɛ kunlanvolɛ ehyianli ɛhye ɛva mɔɔ le kpole tɛla awie biala ɛdeɛ ne la ɛgua gya ne anu.
41012044	Ɔluakɛ bɛdabɛ kɔsɔɔti, mɔɔ bɛlɛ ye la anwo nvasoɛ ne bie a bɛvale bɛraguale gya ne anu a, na raalɛ kunlanvolɛ ne, yemɔ ye kpokpoti ne ala a yeva yeragua nu la.”
41013001	Mɔɔ Gyisɛse vi Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne anu finde la, ye ɛdoavolɛma ne mɔ ko hanle kɛ, “Kilehilevolɛ! Nea awolɛ mgbole ngɛnlɛma bie mɔɔ bɛvale bɛzile azua mgbole ɛhye mɔ a!”
41013002	Gyisɛse buale ye kɛ, “Wɔnwu azua mgbole ɛhye mɔ? Bolɛ ko bɔbɔ ɛnrɛla bolɛ zo mɔɔ bɛnrɛdwula ye aze a.”
41013003	Gyisɛse hɔdɛnlanle Ɔlivi Boka ne azo, ɛleka mɔɔ ɔnwu Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne la. Pita, Gyemise, Dwɔn, yɛɛ Andelu rahanle hilele ye kɛ,
41013004	“Ka kenle mɔɔ ɛhye mɔ kɛzi la kile yɛ, na ka debie mɔɔ bazi ahile kɛ mekɛ ɛdwu mɔɔ ɔwɔ kɛ ninyɛne ɛhye mɔ sisi la noko kile yɛ.”
41013005	Gyisɛse zele bɛ kɛ, “Bɛnlea boɛ na awie ambɛlɛbɛla bɛ.
41013006	Menli dɔɔnwo balua me duma nu ara, na bɛaraha kɛ, ‘Mame a mele Mɛzaya ne!’ na bɛabɛlɛbɛla dɔɔnwo ne ala.
41013007	Noko saa konle si na ɔbikye bɛ, anzɛɛ bɛte kɛ konle ɛzi moa moa maanle bie anu a, bɛmmamaa bɛ ahonle tu. Ninyɛne ɛhye mɔ bazi, noko ɛnee awieleɛ ne ɛtɛdwule ɛkɛ.
41013008	Maanle nee maanle baho, na arelemgbunli adwazo atia bɛ nwo. Azɛlɛ bakpusu ɛleka biala, yɛɛ ɛhɔne bara, noko ninyɛne ɛhye mɔ le kɛ awolɛ nyane la.
41013009	“Na bɛmɛ, bɛnlea bɛ nwo boɛ kpalɛ. Bɛbahye bɛ bɛahɔ kɔɔto. Bɛbabo bɛ wɔ nyianu azua ne mɔ anu; ɔlua me ti, bɛbagyinla mgbanyima nee arelemgbunli nyunlu na bɛaha Edwɛkpa ne bɛahile bɛ.
41013010	Na saa ɔkɛra ye zɔhane bɔbɔ a, kyesɛ bɛdumua bɛbɔ Edwɛkpa ne nolo bɛkile maanle maanle kɔsɔɔti.
41013011	Saa bɛkye bɛ bɛ nee bɛ kɔ kɔɔto a, bɛmmadumua bɛdwenledwenle edwɛkɛ mɔɔ bɛbaha la anwo. Mekɛ ne dwu a bɛdendɛ, ɔluakɛ edwɛkɛ mɔɔ bɛbaha la vi Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne.
41013012	Mediema baye mediema amaa kɛ bɛhu bɛ, yɛɛ selɛma baye bɛ mra amaa. Ngakula badwazo bɛ awovolɛma anwo zo na bɛaye bɛ bɛamaa bɛahu bɛ.
41013013	Ɔlua me ti, awie biala bakpɔ bɛ. Na mɔɔ kɛgyinla kpundii kɛhɔ awieleɛ la kɛnyia ngoane mɔɔ ɛnlɛ awieleɛ.
41013014	“Saa bɛnwu ‘Munzudeɛ ne mɔɔ bɔ maanle la’ kɛ ɔgyi ɛleka mɔɔ ɔnle kɛ ɔgyinla la a, (Kengavolɛ, te ɛhye abo!) ɛnee bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛwɔ Dwudiya la, bɛnriandi bɛhɔ awoka ne mɔ azo.
41013015	Awie mɔɔ gyi ye sua ti zo la mmaka kɛ ɔdwu aze yeahɔ ye sua ne anu kɛ ɔkava debie.
41013016	Mɔɔ ɛhɔ ɛbɔ nu noko la mmasia ba sua zo kɛ ɔbava ye tɛladeɛ.
41013017	Mekɛ ne anu, mraalɛ mɔɔ ɛva ɛkolɛ nee mrɛladane mraalɛ mɔɔ bɛ mra no nyɛfonlɛ la, bɛ gyakɔ!
41013018	Bɛzɛlɛ Nyamenle na anwongyelelɛ ɛhye amba fɔsɛlɛ nu.
41013019	Ɔluakɛ mekɛ ne anu anwongyelelɛ ne bayɛ ɛzulolɛ kpalɛ mɔɔ sumunli kɛ Nyamenle bɔle ewiade toonwo mɔɔ yeradwu bekezɛ la, bie ɛtɛsile ɛlɛ, yɛɛ bie noko ɛnrɛzi ɛlɛ.
41013020	Na Awulae ɛnlea ye menli ne mɔɔ yekpa nu yeye bɛ la ati yede mekɛ ne azo, anrɛɛ sonla ko bɔbɔ ɛnrɛha.
41013021	“Saa awie biala se bɛ kɛ, ‘Nea, Mɛzaya ne wɔ ɛke’ anzɛɛ ‘Nea, yemɔ a wɔ nehane la’ a, bɛmmadie ye bɛdi.
41013022	Ɔluakɛ Mɛzayama nee Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛma alane dɔɔnwo bara. Bɛbaye ngonyia, bɛayɛ nwanwane ninyɛne mgbole kɛ bɛfa bɛabɛlɛbɛla Nyamenle menli ne mɔɔ yekpa nu yeye bɛ la saa ɔkɛyɛ boɛ a.
41013023	Bɛnlea bɛ nwo boɛ! Kɛ meha debie biala mehile bɛ kolaa na ɛhye mɔ azi ɛ!
41013024	“Mekɛ ne anu, wɔ anwongyelelɛ ne anzi, awozinli baheda sɛnzɛne ne azo, siane ɛnrɛda bieko,
41013025	nwɔlɔra badudu agua aze, yɛɛ bɛbadudu anwumaneamra bɛavi bɛ ndenle ne mɔ azo.
41013026	Akee bɛbanwu medame Sonla Ra kɛ melua amungu nu melɛba wɔ tumi bedevinli nee anyunlunyia nu.
41013027	Mebamaa anwuma soanvolɛma ahɔ ewiade muleɛ ne amuala azo ahɔhuohua Nyamenle menli ne mɔɔ yekpa nu yeye bɛ la anloa, ɔvi ewiade ye ati yeahɔkpula ɔ bo.
41013028	“Bɛnlea feege baka ne na bɛzukoa nrɛlɛbɛ wɔ nwolɛ. Mekɛ mɔɔ ɔkɛbolo na ye ngane ne kɛze kɛ bɛfefɛ nya la, ɛnee bɛze kɛ wawaa ɛbikye.
41013029	Zɔhane ala yɛɛ mekɛ mɔɔ bɛkɛnwu kɛ ninyɛne ɛhye mɔ ɛbɔ ɔ bo ɛlɛsisi la, ɛnee bɛhakye kɛ Mɛzaya ne ɛralɛ ɛbikye a.
41013030	Bɛhakye ɛhye! Ninyɛne ɛhye mɔ basisi wɔ bɛdabɛ mɔɔ kɛkala bɛde aze la dɔɔnwo ne ala anye zo.
41013031	Anwuma nee aze bapɛ nu aze, na me nloa edwɛkɛ ɛdeɛ, ɔnrɛpɛ nu ɛlɛ.
41013032	“Awie biala ɛnze kenle ne anzɛɛ dɔnehwele ko ne. Anwuma soanvolɛma yɛɛ Ralɛ ne bɔbɔ ɛnze. Selɛ ne angome ala a ze a.
41013033	Bɛzinza na bɛnlea boɛ, ɔluakɛ bɛnze kenle ne mɔɔ mekɛ ne kɛdwu la.
41013034	Ɛhye le kɛ nrenya bie mɔɔ ɛlɛtu adenle na yeva ye awuke yewula ye sonvolɛma asa nu la. Biala nee ye gyima, na ɔse mɔɔ nea anlenkɛ kpole ne la kɛ ɔzinza.
41013035	Zɔhane ati bɛzinza, ɔluakɛ bɛnze mekɛ mɔɔ awuke menle ne bara la, saa nɔsolɛ nu anzɛɛ alevinli mu nwiɔ avinli o, saa akɔlɛmɔleɛ anzɛɛ sɛnzɛnduduleɛ o.
41013036	Saa ɔba arɛlevilɛ nu a, ɔnle kɛ ɔbato bɛ kɛ bɛdeda.
41013037	Mɔɔ meka meahile bɛ la, meka meahile awie biala: Bɛzinza!”
41014001	Mɔɔ ɔhale kenle nwiɔ na Akpabɛnwo nee Angye Ɛvoyia ne adwu la, sɛlɛvolɛ mgbanyinli ne nee mɛla kilehilevolɛma ne mɔ kpondɛle adenle mɔɔ bɛdua zo bɛahye Gyisɛse ahane ɛleka bie bɛahu ye la, ɔluakɛ bɛse,
41014002	“Ɔnle kɛ yɛyɛ ye zɔhane wɔ ɛvoyialilɛ ne anu, anrɛɛ menli ne kɛli nzaka.”
41014003	Ɛnee Gyisɛse wɔ Saemɔn mɔɔ anrɛɛ le kokobɛvolɛ la sua nu wɔ Bɛtani. Mɔɔ ɛnee Gyisɛse ɛlɛkpula ɔ sa la, raalɛ bie vale anatele evuanlɛ bie mɔɔ ye bolɛ yɛ se kpalɛ na bɛvale “naade” a bɛyɛle la wɔ “alabaseta” bolɛ toba nu rabɔle ye guale Gyisɛse ati zo.
41014004	Menli mɔɔ wɔ ɛkɛ ne la bie mɔ vale ɛya na bɛhanle kɛ, “Na duzu ati a bɛzɛkye anatele evuanlɛ ye ɛ?
41014005	Anrɛɛ bɛkola bɛtɔne ye bɛdie ezukoa ala mɔɔ bo etaku nna nna ɛya nsa la na bɛfa bɛnea ehyianvolɛma!” Na bɛdendɛle raalɛ ne kpalɛ.
41014006	Gyisɛse zele kɛ, “Bɛgyakyi ye! Bɛmmagyegye ye. Yeli gyima kɛnlɛma yemaa me.
41014007	Bɛmɛ, bɛ nee ehyianvolɛma de dahuu, yɛɛ mekɛ biala mɔɔ bɛkulo la, bɛkola bɛboa bɛ; na mame, me nee bɛ ɛnrɛdɛnla dahuu.
41014008	Yeyɛ mɔɔ ɔkɛhola la; yewola anatele ye yegua me sonlabaka ye anwo yeva yeziezie ye kolaa na bɛazie ye.
41014009	Bɛhakye ɛhye! Ewiade ye anu ɛleka biala mɔɔ menli kɛbɔ Edwɛkpa ne nolo la, bɛkɛha debie mɔɔ raalɛ ye ɛyɛ la bɛkɛva bɛkɛhakye ye.”
41014010	Dwudase Yesekaleɔto mɔɔ le ɛdoavolɛma bulu nee nwiɔ ne mɔ anu ko la hɔle sɛlɛvolɛ mgbanyinli ne mɔ ɛkɛ ne kɛ ɔkaye Gyisɛse yeamaa bɛ.
41014011	Ɛhye yɛle sɛlɛvolɛ mgbanyinli ne mɔ fɛ kpole, na bɛbɔle ye ɛwɔkɛ kɛ bɛkɛmaa ye nwolɛ ezukoa. Na ɔvi mekɛ ne anu Dwudase bɔle ɔ bo kɛ ɔkpondɛ adenle yealua zolɛ yeaye Gyisɛse yeamaa.
41014012	Angye Ɛvoyia kenle ne mɔɔ lumua la yɛɛ bɛku mboane mralɛ bɛto Akpabɛnwo Ɛvoyia aleɛ ne a. Kenle zɔhane dwule la Gyisɛse ɛdoavolɛma ne mɔ bizale ye kɛ, “Nienwu a ɛkulo kɛ yɛkɔsiezie Akpabɛnwo Ɛvoyia aleɛ ne a?”
41014013	Na Gyisɛse zoanle bɛ nuhua nwiɔ kɛ, “Bɛhɔ suakpole ne azo na bɛ nee nrenya bie mɔɔ zo dwora mɔɔ nzule wɔ nu la bayia. Bɛdoa ye,
41014014	bɛ nee ye ɛhɔ sua mɔɔ ɔkɛhɔ nu la anu na bɛze sua menle ne kɛ, ‘Kilehilevolɛ ne se: Ekpumgbunli ne mɔɔ me nee me ɛdoavolɛma ne bali Akpabɛnwo Ɛvoyia aleɛ ne wɔ nu la wɔ nienwu?’
41014015	Na ɔbahile bɛ anwuma ekpumgbunli kpole bie mɔɔ bɛziezie nu dɛba la. Bɛdo Akpabɛnwo Ɛvoyia aleɛ ɛkponle ne wɔ ɛkɛ.”
41014016	Ɛdoavolɛma ne zile nu hɔle suakpole ne azo, na bɛhɔnwunle debie biala, kɛmɔ Gyisɛse hanle hilele bɛ ala la, na bɛdole Akpabɛnwo Ɛvoyia aleɛ ɛkponle ne.
41014017	Aleɛ muanle nwolɛ la, Gyisɛse nee ye ɛdoavolɛma bulu nee nwiɔ ne rale.
41014018	Na mɔɔ bɛde ɛkponle ne anwo bɛlɛdi debie la, Gyisɛse zele bɛ kɛ, “Nɔhalɛ, meka meahile bɛ kɛ, bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛ nee me yɛ sa wɔ ɛyɛba ye anu la, bɛ nuhua ko baye me amaa.”
41014019	Ɛhye yɛle ɛdoavolɛma ne mɔ nyane na bɛbizale ye ngoko ngoko kɛ, “Ɛnee mame ɔ?”
41014020	Gyisɛse buale kɛ, “Bɛdabɛ bulu nee nwiɔ ye anu ko ala ɔ.
41014021	Na mame Sonla Ra, mebawu, kɛmɔ Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne se la, na ahenle mɔɔ baye me amaa la, ye gyakɔ. Ɔle kpalɛ kɛ anrɛɛ bɛanwo ye!”
41014022	Mɔɔ bɛgua zolɛ bɛlɛdi aleɛ ne la, Gyisɛse vale kpanwo, ɔyɛle Nyamenle mo, ɔbubule nu ɔvale ɔmanle ye ɛdoavolɛma ne na ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Bɛlie bɛli, ɛhye a le me nwonane ne a.”
41014023	Akee ɔvale dwora ne mɔɔ nwanye ne wɔ nu la, ɔyɛle Nyamenle mo, ɔvale ɔmanle ye ɛdoavolɛma ne mɔ amuala nlonle bie
41014024	na ɔzele kɛ, “Ɛhye a le me mogya ne mɔɔ bɛbahwi bɛamaa menli dɔɔnwo na ɔsɔ Nyamenle ngyekyeleɛ ne anloa la.
41014025	Nɔhalɛ, menrɛnlo nwanye ɛhye bieko, kyesɛ Nyamenle Belemgbunlililɛ nu na meanlo nwanye bieko.”
41014026	Akee bɛdole ayɛlɛyelɛ edwɛne na bɛvindele bɛhɔle Ɔlivi Boka ne azo.
41014027	Akee Gyisɛse zele ye ɛdoavolɛma ne mɔ kɛ, “Bɛ muala bɛbanriandi me, ɔluakɛ Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne se, ‘Nyamenle bahu mboaneneavolɛ ne, na mboane ne mɔ amuala babɔ asande.’
41014028	Noko Nyamenle badwazo me ara ngoane nu na mealumua bɛ nyunlu wɔ Galeli.”
41014029	Pita buale kɛ, “Saa bɛ muala bɛnriandi wɔ a, me ngome ɛdeɛ, menrɛnriandi wɔ ɛlɛ.”
41014030	Gyisɛse zele Pita kɛ, “Kakye ɛhye, ɔ nee mɔɔ akɔlɛ kabɔ fane nwiɔ la, ɛnee ɛdawɔ, wɔha ye fane nsa ɛnɛ nɔe kɛ ɛnze me.”
41014031	Pita vuale kɛ, “Ewule nu bɔbɔ a, menrɛha kɛ menze wɔ!” Na ɛdoavolɛma mɔɔ hale la noko vuale zɔhane ala.
41014032	Gyisɛse nee ye ɛdoavolɛma ne hɔle ɛleka bie mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye Gɛtesɛmani la, na ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Bɛdɛnla ɛke na mekazɛlɛ.”
41014033	Ɔvale Pita, Gyemise, yɛɛ Dwɔn kɛ bɛhɔzɔho ye. Nyane nee alɔbɔlɛ hanle Gyisɛse somaa,
41014034	na ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Nyane ɛha me dedee yeha me ɛkɛla mɔɔ wɔ me nu la. Bɛdɛnla ɛke na bɛzinza.”
41014035	Akee ɔhɔle ɔ nyunlu ekyii, ɔdule ɔdɔle na ɔzɛlɛle kɛ, saa ɔyɛ na ɔkɛyɛ boɛ a, anrɛɛ ɛnee amaneɛnwunlɛ ɛhye akpa ɔ ti.
41014036	Na ɔzɛlɛle kɛ, “Egya! Me Papa, ɛkola debie biala yɛ; ye amaneɛnwunlɛ kɔpo ɛhye ɛkɛ ne maa me; noko akee, tɛ kɛmɔ mame mekulo la ɔ, na kɛmɔ wɔ ɛhulolɛdeɛ ne de la ɔ.”
41014037	Ɔziale ɔrale na ɔranwunle kɛ ɛdoavolɛma nsa ne ɛlafe. Ɔbizale Pita kɛ, “Saemɔn, wɔlafe? Wɔangola wɔanzinza dɔnehwele ko bɔbɔ?”
41014038	Na ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Bɛzinza, bɛzɛlɛ na bɛangɔndɔ munzule nu. Sunsum ne kulo na nwonane ne ɛngola.”
41014039	Ɔhɔle bieko na ɔhɔzɛlɛle ɔhanle edwɛkɛ ko ne ala.
41014040	Ɔziale ɔrale na eza ɔranwunle kɛ ɛdoavolɛma ne ɛdeda; bɛte bɛ nye a ɔnde, yɛɛ bɛnnwu edwɛkɛ mɔɔ bɛka bɛahile ye a.
41014041	Ɔziale ɔ nzi mɔɔ tɔ zolɛ fane nsa ne la, ɔbizale bɛ kɛ, “Bɛtɛda? Yeyɛ boɛ! Mekɛ ne ɛdwu! Bɛnlea, kɛkala bɛye Sonla Ra ne bɛwula ɛtanevolɛma asa anu.
41014042	Bɛdwazo bɛmaa yɛhɔ. Bɛnlea, sonla ne mɔɔ ɛye me ɛmaa la ɛne!”
41014043	Gyisɛse anloa wɔ zo ɔlɛtendɛ la yɛɛ Dwudase, mɔɔ le ɛdoavolɛma ne mɔ anu ko la nee ɛlɔne mɔɔ dedɛ dadeɛ nee ahoholombaka la rale a. Sɛlɛvolɛ mgbanyinli ne nee mɛla kilehilevolɛma ne yɛɛ mgbanyima ne mɔ a zoanle bɛ a.
41014044	Mɔɔ yele ye manle la ɛmaa ɛlɔne ne ɛde ɔ bo kɛ, “Sonla ne mɔɔ menwɔvo ɔ nloa anwo la a le ahenle ne mɔɔ bɛkpondɛ ye la. Bɛhye ye na bɛnlea ye boɛ bɛva ye bɛhɔ.”
41014045	Dwudase dwule ɛkɛ ne ala la, ɔhɔle Gyisɛse anwo ɛkɛ ne na ɔhɔzele ye kɛ, “Kilehilevolɛ!” na ɔvole ɔ nloa anwo.
41014046	Ɛkɛ ne ala ɛlɔne ne zɔle Gyisɛse nu.
41014047	Bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛgyigyi ɛkɛ ne la ko hwenle dadeɛ na ɔpɛle Sɛlɛvolɛ Kpanyinli ne akɛlɛ ne anzo.
41014048	Gyisɛse bizale ɛlɔne ne kɛ, “Ɛnee bɛnea a mele awule ati a bɛdedɛ ahoholombaka nee dadeɛ bɛra bɛbahye me a?
41014049	Mekɛ dɔɔnwo mɔɔ ɛnee me nee bɛ wɔ Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne anu melɛkilehile la, duzu ati a bɛangye me ɛ? Noko ɔwɔ kɛ mɔɔ bɛha ye wɔ Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne anu la yɛ zɔhane.”
41014050	Ɛkɛ ne ala ɛdoavolɛma ne amuala nriandile gyakyile Gyisɛse.
41014051	Kpavolɛ bie mɔɔ heda kisane ala la a ɛnee doa Gyisɛse a. Ɛlɔne ne yɛle kɛ bɛkye ye la,
41014052	ɔdaye noko ɔkpale ye ɛdanlɛ ne ɔmanle bɛ na ɔnriandile ɔhɔle.
41014053	Bɛvale Gyisɛse bɛhɔle Sɛlɛvolɛ Kpanyinli ne sua nu. Sɛlɛvolɛ mgbanyinli ne, mgbanyima ne, yɛɛ mɛla kilehilevolɛma ne mɔ rayiale ɛkɛ.
41014054	Pita doale bɛ nanamogya toonwo ɔhɔle Sɛlɛvolɛ Kpanyinli ne alie ne anwo, na ɔdɛnlanle sinzavolɛma ne mɔ anwo ɛkɛ ɔdele senle.
41014055	Sɛlɛvolɛ mgbanyinli ne nee ayiama ne mɔ amuala bɔle mɔdenle kɛ bɛkɛnyia edwɛkɛ bɛkɛtia Gyisɛse na bɛahu ye, noko bɛannyia bie.
41014056	Menli dɔɔnwo lile daselɛ adalɛ tiale ye, noko bɛ nuhua nwiɔ bɔbɔ anloa anyɛ ko.
41014057	Akee menli bie dwazole lile daselɛ adalɛ ɛhye tiale Gyisɛse. Bɛse,
41014058	“Yɛdele kɛ ɔlɛka kɛ, ‘Mebabubu Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ɛhye mɔɔ menli ɛzi la, na ye kenle nsa ne anzi meazi bie mɔɔ tɛ menli a zile la.’ ”
41014059	Noko bɔbɔ, bɛdabɛ bɛ nloa anyɛ ko.
41014060	Sɛlɛvolɛ Kpanyinli ne dwazole gyinlanle na ɔbizale Gyisɛse kɛ, “Ɛnlɛ edwɛkɛ biala ɛnga wɔ ɛzonle ye mɔɔ bɛlɛto wɔ la anwo ɔ?”
41014061	Na Gyisɛse andɛ ɔ nloa anu. Eza Sɛlɛvolɛ Kpanyinli ne bizale ye kɛ, “Wɔmɔ a ɛle Saleɛnli Nyamenle Ara Mɛzaya ne la ɔ?”
41014062	Gyisɛse buale ye kɛ, “Medame ɛne! Akee bɛ muala bɛbanwu medame, Sonla Ra, kɛ mede Tumivolɛ Nyamenle ne asa fema zo na melua amungu ne mɔ anu melɛba!”
41014063	Sɛlɛvolɛ Kpanyinli ne suosuanle ɔdaye mumua ne ye tɛladeɛ mɔɔ ɔwula la anu na ɔhanle kɛ, “Yɛngyia alasevolɛ bieko!
41014064	Bɛde ye munzule edwɛkɛ ne. Kɛ bɛse ɛ?” Na bɛ muala bɛbuale ye ewule fɔlɛ kɛ bɛhu ye.
41014065	Sinzavolɛma ne mɔ bobɔle ɔ nzo nu. Bie mɔ totole nyɛlɛ ɔ nyunlu, bɛkyekyele ɔ nye, bɛwulowulale ye ahutuku na bɛbizale ye kɛ, “Nwane a bɔle wɔ a?”
41014066	Pita de alie ne anwo la Sɛlɛvolɛ Kpanyinli ne sonvolɛ bɛlɛra ko rale ɛkɛ.
41014067	Ɔnwunle Pita kɛ ɔlɛte senle wɔ ɛkɛ ne la, ɔnleanle ye koonwu na ɔzele kɛ, “Wɔmɔ, ɛ nee Gyisɛse mɔɔ vi Nazalɛte la a lua a?”
41014068	Pita zale kɛ, “Menze ye. Mende mɔɔ ɛlɛka bɔbɔ la abo.” Na ɔdwazole ɔbɔle ɔ ti anuhɔlɛ lɔ. Mekɛ ne anu ala yɛɛ akɔlɛ bɔle a.
41014069	Sonvolɛ bɛlɛra ne nwunle ye ɛkɛ ne na ɔhanle ɔhilele menli mɔɔ gyigyi ɛkɛ ne la kɛ, “Nrenya ɛhye boka bɛ!”
41014070	Na Pita zale bieko. Ɔyɛle ekyii la, menli mɔɔ gyigyi ɛkɛ ne la zele Pita kɛ, “Nɔhalɛ, ɛboka bɛ, ɔluakɛ ɛdawɔ noko ɛvi Galeli.”
41014071	Pita bɔle ɔ bo kɛ ɔka ndane yeali amonle, na ɔvale ɔzɔle zolɛ kɛ, “Menze nrenya ne mɔɔ bɛlɛka ye edwɛkɛ la!”
41014072	Ɛkɛ ne ala akɔlɛ bɔle bieko, na Pita hakyele mɔɔ Gyisɛse hanle hilele ye la kɛ, “Ɔ nee mɔɔ akɔlɛ kabɔ fane nwiɔ la, ɛnee wɔha ye fane nsa kɛ ɛnze me.” Na ɔdukuele nu ɔzunle.
41015001	Nwonlomɔ mangyee ne ala, sɛlɛvolɛ mgbanyinli ne mɔ yiale Dwuu mgbanyima ne, mɛla kilehilevolɛma ne, yɛɛ ayiama ne mɔ amuala na ndɛndɛ ne ala bɛvale adwenle. Bɛguale Gyisɛse nwɔnzɔnwɔnzɔ na bɛvale ye bɛhɔmanle Wulomu Amɛnlado Paelɛte.
41015002	Na Paelɛte bizale ye kɛ, “Wɔmɔ a ɛle Dwuuma belemgbunli ne la ɔ?” Gyisɛse buale kɛ, “Ɔdaye ne ala a wɔha la.”
41015003	Sɛlɛvolɛ mgbanyinli ne mɔ doɔdoanle Gyisɛse dɔɔnwo kpalɛ,
41015004	yemɔti Paelɛte bizale ye bieko kɛ, “Ɛnrɛbua nwolɛ bie ɔ? Tie edwɛkɛ dɔɔnwo mɔɔ bɛlɛkeha bɛagua ɛ nwo zo la!”
41015005	Noko Gyisɛse andɛ ɔ nloa anu, na ɔyɛle Paelɛte azibɛnwo.
41015006	Saa Akpabɛnwo Ɛvoyia ne dwu zo a, Paelɛte ye pilizanli ko mɔɔ menli ne kɛbiza la maa bɛ.
41015007	Mekɛ ne anu ɛnee nrenya bie mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye Balabase, mɔɔ nee maamɔvoma bie yɛle adwenle na bɛhonle bɛtiale arane, bɛhunle menli la la efiade.
41015008	Mɔɔ menli ne yiale la, bɛzɛlɛle Paelɛte kɛ ɔyɛ mɔɔ ɛvoyia ne dwu a ɔyɛ la ɔmaa bɛ.
41015009	Na ɔbizale bɛ kɛ, “Menye Dwuuma belemgbunli ne memaa bɛ ɔ?”
41015010	Paelɛte ze kɛ ɛkpɔlɛ ti a sɛlɛvolɛ mgbanyinli ne mɔ ɛva Gyisɛse ɛrɛlɛ ye a.
41015011	Sɛlɛvolɛ mgbanyinli ne mɔ lile wulale menli dɔɔnwo ne kɛ bɛbiza Paelɛte bɛmaa ɔye Balabase ɔmaa bɛ.
41015012	Paelɛte bizale menli ne kɛ, “Ɛnee duzu a bɛkpondɛ kɛ meyɛ sonla ye mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye Dwuuma belemgbunli la a?”
41015013	Bɛdeɛdeanle nu bɛhanle kɛ, “Bɔ ye meanubaka nu!”
41015014	Paelɛte bizale bɛ kɛ, “Duzu ɛtane a yeyɛ a?” Na bɛdeɛdeanle nu mgbole kɛ, “Bɔ ye meanubaka nu!”
41015015	Paelɛte nyianle adwenle kɛ ɔyɛ mɔɔ menli dɔɔnwo ne kpondɛ la. Yemɔti ɔyele Balabase ɔmanle bɛ. Na akee ɔmanle bɛbilale Gyisɛse empele, na ɔvale ye ɔwulale sogyama ne mɔ asa anu kɛ bɛhɔbɔ ye meanubaka nu.
41015016	Sogyama ne vale Gyisɛse hɔle Amɛnlado ne suakunlu ɛkɛ ne na bɛvɛlɛle bɛ ekpunli ne anu amra bɛmanle bɛrayiale.
41015017	Bɛvale tɛladeɛ kɔkɔlɛ bie mɔɔ arelemgbunli ala a wula la bɛwulale Gyisɛse na bɛvale evileni bɛnwonle abɔtile bɛkpolole ɔ ti.
41015018	Bɛgolole ɔ nwo bɛhanle kɛ, “Dwuuma Belemgbunli! Nyi kyɛ.”
41015019	Bɛvale baka bɛbobɔle ɔ ti avinli, bɛtotole nyɛlɛ ɔ nyunlu, bɛzile ye amgbu na akee bɛahoto ye, bɛabɔ bɛ ti aze bɛamaa ye.
41015020	Bɛwiele ɔ nwo golo la, bɛyele arelemgbunli tɛladeɛ kɔkɔlɛ ne, bɛvale ɔdaye ye adɛladeɛ ɛdeɛ ne mɔ bɛwulowulale ye na bɛvale ye bɛhɔle kɛ bɛkabɔ ye meanubaka nu.
41015021	Bɛzile nu mɔɔ bɛkɔ la, bɛ nee nrenya bie mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye Saemɔn, mɔɔ ɛnee vi ye namule nu ɛlɛba suakpole ne azo la yiale, na bɛhyele ye bɛmanle ɔzoale Gyisɛse meanubaka ne. (Saemɔn ɛhye a le Alɛzɛnda nee Lufɛse bɛ ze ne. Ɔvi Saelin maanle nu.)
41015022	Bɛvale Gyisɛse bɛhɔle ɛleka bie mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye Hibulu nu “Gɔlogɔta” la, (ɔ bo a le “Etile Kanrɛlɛ Ɛleka.”)
41015023	Ɛkɛ ne bɛmanle ye nwanye mɔɔ bɛva alufuanlɛ bɛkpoto nu la kɛ ɔnlo; na Gyisɛse anno.
41015024	Bɛbɔle ye meanubaka nu na bɛhwenle adunyi bɛhyɛle ye adɛladeɛ ne mɔ.
41015025	Nwonlomɔ dɔne ngɔnla ne anu yɛɛ bɛbɔle ye meanubaka nu a.
41015026	Bɛhɛlɛle ye ɛzonledonlɛ kɛlata ne azo kɛ, “Dwuuma Belemgbunli ne ɛne!”
41015027	Eza bɛbɔle nwule nwiɔ bie meanubaka nu bɛbokale Gyisɛse anwo, ko wɔ ye fema zo yɛɛ ko noko wɔ ye bɛne zo. [
41015028	Ɛhye manle Nyamenle edwɛkɛ ne mɔɔ se, “Bɛdianle ye bɛbokale mɛlatovolɛma anwo” la yɛle nɔhalɛ.]
41015029	Menli mɔɔ pɛle nu ɛkɛ ne la kpusule bɛ ti na bɛgolole Gyisɛse anwo bɛhanle kɛ, “Wɔmɔ ɛse ɛbabubu Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne na wɔava kenle nsa wɔazi.
41015030	Ɛvi meanubaka ne azo dwu aze na die ɛ nwo ɛ!”
41015031	Zɔhane ala yɛɛ sɛlɛvolɛ mgbanyinli ne nee mɛla kilehilevolɛma ne mɔ golole Gyisɛse anwo na bɛhanle kɛ, “Ɔliele awie mɔ, noko ɔngola ɔ nwo die!
41015032	Bɛmaa yɛnlea kɛ Mɛzaya ne, mɔɔ le Yizilayɛ Belemgbunli ne, kɛvi meanubaka ne azo kɛdwu aze kɛkala, na yɛkɛlie ye yɛkɛli.” Nwule nwiɔ ne mɔɔ bɛbɔle bɛ meanubaka nu bɛbokale Gyisɛse anwo la noko yɛle ye aholoba.
41015033	Ɔdwule sɛnzɛngyinla la, awozinli hedale maanle ne azo dedee dɔnehwele nsa.
41015034	Na bɛbɔle ewiazo dɔne nsa la, Gyisɛse deanle nu zele kɛ, “Yilowae, Yilowae, lɛma sabaketani?” Ɔ bo a le, “Me Nyamenle, me Nyamenle, duzu ati a wɔkpo me ɛ?”
41015035	Bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛwɔ ɛkɛ la dele mɔɔ ɔhanle la na bɛzele kɛ, “Bɛdie, ɔlɛfɛlɛ Yilaegya!”
41015036	Na bɛ nuhua ko nriandile hɔvale emiane bɔle nwanye ɛnwonle nu vale zianle baka ti duale Gyisɛse anloa na ɔhanle kɛ, “Bɛgyinla. Bɛmaa yɛnlea saa Yilaegya kɛraye ye wɔ meanubaka ne azo a!”
41015037	Na Gyisɛse deanle nu kpole bie na ɔwule.
41015038	Ɛkɛ ne ala, Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne anu mgbɛnu ɛdanlɛ ne anu dele sinli nwiɔ, ɔvi anwuma ɔrapenle aze.
41015039	Sogya kpanyinli ne mɔɔ ɛnee gyi meanubaka ne anyunlu ɛkɛ ne la dele kɛ Gyisɛse zile deanle nu wule la, na ɔhanle kɛ, “Amgba, nrenya ɛhye le Nyamenle Ara.”
41015040	Ɛnee mraalɛ bie gyi ahane ɛlɛnea mɔɔ ɛlɛkɔ zolɛ la. Bie mɔ a le Mɛle mɔɔ vi Magedala la, Salome, yɛɛ Mɛle mɔɔ le Gyemise Ekyi nee Dwosefi bɛ nli ne.
41015041	Ɛnee mraalɛ ɛhye mɔ doa Gyisɛse wɔ Galeli na bɛsonle ye; yɛɛ mraalɛ gyɛne dɔɔnwo mɔɔ nee ye a rale Gyɛlusalɛm la noko wɔ ɛkɛ ne bie.
41015042	-
41015043	Aleɛ ne bɔle ɔ nloa aze la, Dwosefi mɔɔ vi Arelematia la rale. Ɔle Ayia mgbanyima ne mɔ ko mɔɔ menli di ye eni kpalɛ a. Ɔ nye la Nyamenle Belemgbunlililɛ ne ɛralɛ adenle. Kɛmɔ kenle ne le Anwoziezielɛ Kenle, na aleɛ kye a ɔkye Ɛnwomenlelielɛ Kenle la ati, Dwosefi zile ye ahonle hɔle Paelɛte ɛkɛ ne na ɔhɔzɛlɛle ye kɛ ɔdie Gyisɛse funli ne.
41015044	Paelɛte dele kɛ Gyisɛse ɛwu dɛbadɛba la, ɔzinle ɔ nwo. Ɔvɛlɛle ye sogya kpanyinli ne na ɔbizale ye kɛ, “Amgba Gyisɛse ɛwu ɔ?”
41015045	Na Paelɛte dele vile ye sogya kpanyinli ne ɛkɛ ne kɛ Gyisɛse ɛwu la, ɔvale funli ne ɔmanle Dwosefi.
41015046	Dwosefi dɔle kisane, ɔyele funli ne wɔ meanubaka ne azo, ɔvale kisane ne ɔkyekyele nwolɛ, ɔvale ye ɔdole nla bie mɔɔ bɛpɛ ye bodane bie anu la anu na bɛhundole bolɛ kpole bie bɛnyinle ɔ nloa.
41015047	Ɛnee Mɛle mɔɔ vi Magedala la nee Mɛle, mɔɔ le Dwosefi ɔ nli ne anye dua bɛ, bɛnwunle ɛleka mɔɔ bɛziele Gyisɛse la na bɛyɛle ɛkɛ ne nzonlɛ.
41016001	Ɛnwomenlelielɛ Kenle ne pɛle nu la, Mɛle mɔɔ vi Magedala, nee Salome, yɛɛ Mɛle mɔɔ le Gyemise ɔ nli ne totɔle nyile ngakyile mɔɔ bɛfa bɛyɛ alufuanlɛ la, kɛ bɛfa bɛahɔwɔza Gyisɛse funli ne.
41016002	Molɛ nwonlomɔ mangyee ne, mɔɔ ɛnee sɛnzɛne ne ɛdudu la, yɛɛ bɛhɔle sɛka ne azo a.
41016003	-
41016004	Mɔɔ bɛlua adenle zo la, ɛnee bɛ edwɛkɛ a le kɛ, “Na nwane bɔbɔ a kɛhundo bolɛ ne mɔɔ nyi nla ne anloa la kɛmaa yɛ a?” (Bolɛ ne le kpole kpalɛ.) Na bɛmanle bɛ nye zo la bɛnwunle kɛ bɛhundo bolɛ ne dɛbadɛba.
41016005	Bɛwolole nla ne anu na bɛnwunle kɛ kpavolɛ bie wula tɛladeɛ fufule de fema zo ɛkɛ ne, na bɛ ahonle dule.
41016006	Na kpavolɛ ne zele bɛ kɛ, “Bɛmmamaa bɛ ahonle tu, meze kɛ bɛkpondɛ Gyisɛse mɔɔ vi Nazalɛte, mɔɔ bɛbɔle ye meanubaka nu la. Ɔnle ɛke, Nyamenle ɛdwazo ye! Bɛnlea, ɛke a bɛdole ye a.
41016007	Bɛhɔ na bɛhɔze Pita nee ɛdoavolɛma mɔɔ ɛha la kɛ yelumua bɛ nyunlu wɔ Galeli, na ɛkɛ ne yɛɛ bɛkɛnwu ye a, kɛmɔ ɔhanle ɔhilele bɛ la.”
41016008	Mraalɛ ne mɔ vale anwowozolɛ nee azibɛnwo vile nla ne anu vindele na bɛnriandile bɛhɔle. Bɛambɔ zolɛ bɛangile awie biala, ɔluakɛ ɛnee bɛsulo. [
41016009	Gyisɛse dwazole vile ewule nu Molɛ nwonlomɔ mangyee ne la, ɔlumuale ɔyele ɔ nwo ɔhilele Mɛle mɔɔ vi Magedala, mɔɔ ɔ nwo a ɔdule mbɔnsam nsuu ne la.
41016010	Mɛle hɔbɔle ɛdoavolɛma ne mɔ amaneɛ. Ɛnee bɛlɛsu bɛabodo bɛ nwo;
41016011	yemɔti bɛdele kɛ Mɛle se Gyisɛse de aze na yenwu ye, noko bɛanlie bɛanli.
41016012	Ɛhye anzi, Gyisɛse yele ɔ nwo wɔ adenle bie azo hilele bɛ nuhua nwiɔ, wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ ɛnee bɛlɛkɔ namule nu la.
41016013	Bɛziale bɛrahanle bɛhilele menli mɔɔ ɛha la, noko bɛanlie bɛanli.
41016014	Ɛhye mɔ amuala anzi, Gyisɛse yele ɔ nwo hilele ye ɛdoavolɛma bulu nee ko ne wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ ɛnee bɛlɛdi debie la, na ɔhwile bɛ nyunlu wɔ diedi mɔɔ bɛnlɛ ye, nee bɛ anzosesebɛ ne mɔɔ yemɔti bɛnlie bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnwu ye kɛ ɔde aze la bɛnli la anwo.
41016015	Na akee ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Bɛhɔ ewiade ahodoka muala anu na bɛhɔbɔ Edwɛkpa ne nolo bɛhile aleɛabo amra kɔsɔɔti.
41016016	Awie biala mɔɔ kɛlie kɛli na bɛkɛzɔne ye la kɛnyia ngoane; na mɔɔ anlie anli la, bɛkɛbu ye ewule fɔlɛ.
41016017	Bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛkɛlie bɛkɛli la, bɛbamaa bɛ tumi bɛamaa bɛayɛ nwanwane gyima mgbole: bɛbalua me duma nu bɛadudu mbɔnsam; bɛbahola bɛaha aneɛ ngakyile;
41016018	saa bɛsɔ nwɔlɛ nu anzɛɛ bɛno pɔezen a, debie biala ɛnrɛyɛ bɛ. Bɛbava bɛ sa bɛagua wuleravolɛma anwo zo, na bɛ nwo baza.”
41016019	Awulae Gyisɛse nee ye ɛdoavolɛma ne dendɛle wiele la, bɛvale ye bɛhɔle anwuma na ɔhɔdɛnlanle Nyamenle asa fema zo.
41016020	Ɛdoavolɛma ne ziale hɔle na bɛhɔbɔle Edwɛkpa ne nolo wɔ ɛleka biala, na Awulae boale bɛ na ɔmanle bɛ sa anloa gyima hilele kɛ bɛ nolobɔlɛ ne le nɔhalɛ.] [ (v 9) Na mraalɛ ne mɔ hɔle Pita nee ɛdoavolɛma mɔɔ ɛha la ɛkɛ ne hɔbɔle bɛ amaneɛ. (v 10) Ɛhye anzi, Gyisɛse ɔdaye ɔzoanle ye ɛdoavolɛma ne mɔ ɔmanle bɛvale Nyamenle ngoanelielɛ ne mɔɔ ɛnlɛ awieleɛ la anwo edwɛkɛ bɛhɔle ewiade amuala anu.]
42001001	Nana Tiyɔfelɛse. Menli dɔɔnwo ɛbɔ mɔdenle ɛhɛlɛ ninyɛne mɔɔ ɛsisi yɛ nwo ɛke la anwo bie.
42001002	Bɛhɛlɛle ninyɛne mɔɔ bɛdabɛ mɔɔ mɔlebɛbo ne bɛnwunle ye bɛ nye zo na bɛbɔle ye nolo la hanle hilele yɛ la.
42001003	Zɔhane ati, Nana, kɛmɔ medame noko menleɛnlea ninyɛne ɛhye mɔ anu boɛ, ɔvi bɛ mɔlebɛbo ne la, medwenle nwolɛ kɛ ɔle kpalɛ kɛ menwɔhɛlɛ ye fɔɔnwo ne ala menwɔmaa wɔ.
42001004	Meyɛ ɛhye amaa wɔanwu nɔhalɛ mɔɔ wɔ ninyɛne ɛhye mɔ mɔɔ bɛhilehilele wɔ la anu.
42001005	Mekɛ mɔɔ Hɛlɔdo di belemgbunli wɔ Dwudiya maanle ne anu la, ɛnee sɛlɛvolɛ bie wɔ ɛkɛ, bɛfɛlɛ ye Zɛkalaya. Sɛlɛvolɛ ɛhye vi Abaegya sɛlɛvolɛma ekpunli ne anu. Bɛfɛlɛ ɔ ye Ɛlezabɛte. Ɔdaye noko ɔvi Sɛlɛvolɛ Kpanyinli ne mɔɔ lumua, mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye Aalɔn la abusua nu.
42001006	Bɛ mu nwiɔ bɛbɔle ɛbɛla kpalɛ mɔɔ nwolɛ te la wɔ Nyamenle anyunlu, na bɛlile Nyamenle mɛla ne mɔ azo bɔkɔɔ.
42001007	Bɛnlɛ ralɛ, ɔluakɛ ɛnee Ɛlezabɛte le mota, yɛɛ bɛ mu nwiɔ bɛwie mrelera yɛ.
42001008	Kenle ko bie, ɛnee Zɛkalaya sɛlɛvolɛ ekpunli ne a yɛ gyima a, na eza yedwu Zɛkalaya anwo zo wɔ bɛ dahudahu ɛzonlenlɛ gyima ne anu, na ɔlɛyɛ ye sɛlɛvolɛ gyima ne wɔ Nyamenle anyunlu.
42001009	Kɛmɔ sɛlɛvolɛma ngyehyɛlɛ ne de la, bɛguale nzeleba ne la ɔbɔle Zɛkalaya kɛ yemɔ a ɔwɔ kɛ ɔkpu ɛyɛlɛ wɔ azukponle ne azo a. Yemɔti ɔhɔwolole Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne anu na ɔhɔle Awulae azukponle ne anwo
42001010	kɛ ɔkakpu ɛyɛlɛ. Mekɛ ne anu ɛnee menli gua alie nwo nehane na bɛlɛsɛlɛ.
42001011	Arɛlevilɛ nu ala Nyamenle soanvolɛ bie yele ɔ nwo hilele ye, ɔragyinlanle azukponle ne fema zo, ɛleka mɔɔ bɛkpu ɛyɛlɛ ne la.
42001012	Zɛkalaya nwunle ye la, ɔbɔle mgbatike na ɛzulolɛ hanle ye.
42001013	Nyamenle soanvolɛ ne zele ye kɛ, “Zɛkalaya, mmasulo! Nyamenle ɛde wɔ nzɛlɛlɛ ne, ɛ ye Ɛlezabɛte bawo ralɛ nrenya, na ɛbavɛlɛ ye Dwɔn.
42001014	Bɛwo ye a ɛ nye balie, yɛɛ menli dɔɔnwo noko bali fɛlɛko kɛ bɛwo ye a.
42001015	Ɔbayɛ sonlakpole wɔ Awulae anyunlu. Ɔnle kɛ ɔno nwanye anzɛɛ nza ɛsesebɛ biala. Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne bawolo ye, bɔbɔ, wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ ɔla ɔ nli akunlu la.
42001016	Na ɔbahwe Yizilayɛma dɔɔnwo yeamaa bɛazia bɛara Awulae bɛ Nyamenle ne ɛkɛ.
42001017	Ɔbalumua Awulae anyunlu wɔ sunsum nee tumi nu kɛ Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛ Yilaegya la. Ɔbamaa selɛma nee bɛ mra abɔ nu bieko; ɔbamaa anzosesebɛma azia arava Nyamenle adenle fɔɔnwo ne azo, na yeaziezie Awulae menli ne yeamaa ye.”
42001018	Zɛkalaya bizale Nyamenle soanvolɛ ne kɛ, “Kɛkala mɔɔ me nee me ye yɛwie mrelera yɛ la, ɛnee kɛ ɔkɛyɛ na meanwu ɛhye nɔhalɛ ɛ?”
42001019	Nyamenle soanvolɛ ne buale kɛ, “Mame a mele Nyamenle soanvolɛ kpanyinli ne mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye Geebeleɛle la. Mame a megyi Nyamenle anyunlu a, yɛɛ yezoa me kɛ menva nrɛlaleɛ fɛlɛko ɛhye membɛlɛ wɔ a.
42001020	Na wɔanlie me nrɛlaleɛ ne mɔɔ ye mekɛ dwu a ɔbayɛ zɔhane la wɔanli. Zɔhane ati sɛkɛlɛneɛ ne mɔɔ ɛkpondɛ la, yemɔ ɛne! Ɛbadɔ mumule kɔkpula mekɛ mɔɔ ɛwɔkɛ ne kɛyɛ ɛkɛ la.”
42001021	Menli ne hendɛle dedee na Zɛkalaya ɛmba la, ɔyɛle bɛ azibɛnwo kɛ yehyɛ Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne anu zɛhae a.
42001022	Nzinlii mɔɔ ɔvindele la, yeangola yeandendɛ yeangile bɛ, ɔvale ɔ sa a ɔyɛle sɛkɛlɛneɛ ɔhilele bɛ a, na bɛnyianle adwenle kɛ yenwu ɛnyelɛzodeɛnwunlɛ bie wɔ Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne anu.
42001023	Mɔɔ ye ɛzonlenlɛ gyima mekɛ ne wiele la, ɔhɔle ye sua nu.
42001024	Yeangyɛ biala yɛɛ Ɛlezabɛte nrenzɛle a, ɔveale sua nu toonwo siane nnu
42001025	na ɔzele kɛ, “Awulae ɛboa me kpole, yeamaa menli angɔ zo anzi me amgbu kɛ mele mota.”
42001026	Ɛlezabɛte nyianle siane nsia la Nyamenle zoanle ye soanvolɛ Geebeleɛle wɔ Galeli maanzinli nu, wɔ sua ne mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye Nazalɛte la azo.
42001027	Ɔvale nrɛlaleɛ ɔhɔmanle bɛlɛra bie mɔɔ ɛnee ɛnze nrenya na nrenya bie mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye Dwosefi, mɔɔ vi Belemgbunli Devidi abusua nu la ɛyia ye la. Bɛlɛra ne duma a le Mɛle.
42001028	Nyamenle soanvolɛ ne rale ɔ nwo ɛkɛ ne na ɔzele ye kɛ, “Ɔmɔ mɔɔ Nyamenle ɛlo wɔ a, ahye o! Awulae nee wɔ de, na yeyila wɔ kpole!”
42001029	Mɛle dele soanvolɛ ne ahyebizalɛ ne la, ɔ ti akunlu yɛle ye kesee, na ɔdwenlenle deɛ mɔɔ zɛhae ahyebizalɛ ne kile la anwo.
42001030	Nyamenle soanvolɛ ne zele ye kɛ, “Mɛle, mmasulo, ɔluakɛ Nyamenle ɛlo wɔ kpole.
42001031	Nea, ɛbanrenzɛ wɔawo ralɛ nrenya, na ɛbavɛlɛ ye Gyisɛse.
42001032	Ɔbayɛ kpole na bɛavɛlɛ ye Anwuma Anwuma Nyamenle ne Ara. Awulae Nyamenle bayɛ ye belemgbunli kɛ ɔ nlenya Devidi la,
42001033	na ɔbali Gyekɔbo abo zo amra anwo zo belemgbunli mekɛ mɔɔ ɛnlɛ awieleɛ. Ye belemgbunlililɛ ɛnrɛbɔ aze ɛlɛ.”
42001034	Mɛle hanle hilele Nyamenle soanvolɛ ne kɛ, “Yɛmenle, menze nrenya, na kɛ ɔkɛyɛ na ɛhye ayɛ ɛkɛ ɛ?”
42001035	Nyamenle soanvolɛ ne buale ye kɛ, “Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne bara ɛ nwo zo, na Nyamenle tumi ne baheda ɛ nwo zo. Ɛhye ati bɛbavɛlɛ kakula ne Nwuanzanwuanza, yɛɛ Nyamenle Ara.
42001036	Nea, wɔ busuanli Ɛlezabɛte, mɔɔ ɛnee bɛfɛlɛ ye mota na yewie ɛrelera yɛ bɔbɔ la ɛnrenzɛ, ye siane nsia a la zolɛ la.
42001037	Ɔluakɛ debie biala ɛnle ɛkɛ mɔɔ Nyamenle ɛnrɛhola ɛnrɛyɛ a.”
42001038	Mɛle hanle kɛ, “Yɛmenle, Awulae sonvolɛ a le me; mɔɔ wɔha la ɛyɛ zɔhane ɛmaa me.” Na Nyamenle soanvolɛ ne hɔle.
42001039	Mekɛ ne anu Mɛle hanle ɔ nwo hɔle Zɛkalaya sua zo wɔ Dwudiya maanzinli nu suakpole bie azo. Dwudiya le maanle mɔɔ awoka wɔ nu kpalɛ a.
42001040	Mɛle dwule ala la, ɔhɔle Zɛkalaya sua nu na ɔhɔbizale Ɛlezabɛte ahye.
42001041	Mɔɔ Ɛlezabɛte dele Mɛle ahyebizalɛ ne la, ɔ ra ne mɔɔ la ɔ kunlu la hanle ɔ nwo, Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne wolole Ɛlezabɛte
42001042	na ɔmanle ɔ ne zo ɔzele kɛ, “Bɛyila wɔ kpole wɔ mraalɛ muala avinli, na bɛyila ralɛ ne mɔɔ la ɛ kunlu la.
42001043	Debie kpole ɛhye vi nienwu a ɛrado me a, kɛ me Awulae ɔ nli kɛra me ɛkpɔlalɛ?
42001044	Mɔɔ mendele wɔ ahyebizalɛ ne ala la yɛɛ ralɛ ye mɔɔ la me kunlu la vale fɛlɛkolilɛ hanle ɔ nwo a.
42001045	Nyilalɛ ɛha wɔ kɛ ɛliele ɛlile kɛ mɔɔ Awulae hanle hilele wɔ la bayɛ zɔhane a.”
42001046	Na Mɛle hanle kɛ, “Me ɛkɛla yeyɛ Awulae
42001047	yɛɛ me sunsum di fɛlɛko wɔ Nyamenle, me Ngoanedievolɛ ne ati,
42001048	ɔluakɛ yebu ye sonvolɛ awienvolɛ mɔɔ le kɛ medame la bie, na ɔvi ɛnɛ mɔɔ kɔ la awolɛndoazo kɔsɔɔti bavɛlɛ me saleɛnli.
42001049	Tumivolɛ Nyamenle ne ɛyɛ ninyɛne mgbole ɛmaa me. Ye duma a le Nwuanzanwuanza;
42001050	mekɛ biala ɔse bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛsulo ye la anwunvɔne.
42001051	Yedenrɛ ye tumi ɛsalɛ ne, na yebɔ bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛmemaa bɛ nwo zo la asande, yezɛkye bɛ ngyehyɛlɛ ne mɔ.
42001052	Yemaa katakyiema vi bɛ arelemgbunli mbia zo ɛdu ɛgua, na yekpogya awienvolɛma zo.
42001053	Yemaa bɛdabɛ mɔɔ ɛhɔne ɛlɛku bɛ la ninyɛne kpalɛ yemaa bɛ ko ɛyi, na yeye sukoavolɛma ali yemaa bɛlɛ bɛ sa mgbane.
42001054	Yeli ye ɛwɔkɛ ne mɔɔ ɔbɔle yɛ nlenya mɔ la azo, na yera kɛ ɔbaboa ye sonvolɛ Yizilayɛ.
42001055	Ɔ rɛle anvi kɛ ɔkɛze Ebileham nee ɔ bo zo amra anwunvɔne kɔkpula mekɛ mɔɔ ɛnlɛ awieleɛ.”
42001056	Mɛle nee Ɛlezabɛte dɛnlanle kɛyɛ siane nsa na yeazia yeahɔ ye sua zo.
42001057	Mekɛ dwule kɛ ɔwɔ kɛ Ɛlezabɛte bɔ ɛkolɛ, na ɔwole ralɛ nrenya.
42001058	Ye kpalɛzo amra nee ɔ nwo amra dele kɛ Awulae ɛhile ye ɛlolɛ kpole na bɛ nee ye lile nwolɛ fɛlɛko.
42001059	Ye kenle mɔtwɛ ne azo, bɛyɛle kakula ne mrenyanu nzonlɛ, na bɛyɛle kɛ bɛfa ye bɛado ɔ ze Zɛkalaya.
42001060	Na ɔ nli hanle kɛ, “Kyɛkyɛ, ye duma a le Dwɔn.”
42001061	Bɛzele ye kɛ, “Awie ɛnle wɔ abusua ne anu mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye zɔhane a!”
42001062	Yemɔti bɛyɛle sɛkɛlɛneɛ bɛhilele ɔ ze bɛbizale ye duma holɛ ko mɔɔ ɔkulo kɛ bɛfa bɛfɛlɛ kakula ne la.
42001063	Zɛkalaya bizale bɛ liele taboa mɔɔ bɛkɛlɛ zolɛ la, na ɔhɛlɛle zo kɛ, “Ye duma a le Dwɔn.” Ɛhye yɛle bɛ muala azibɛnwo.
42001064	Ɛkɛ ne ala Zɛkalaya holale dendɛle bieko na ɔbɔle ɔ bo kɛ ɔye Nyamenle ayɛlɛ.
42001065	Ɛzulolɛ hanle ye kpalɛzo amra amuala, na bɛhɔhanle mɔɔ ɛzi la wɔ Dwudiya maanzinli ne anu amuala.
42001066	Awie biala mɔɔ dele la dwenlenle nwolɛ, ɔluakɛ ɛnee yela ɛkɛ ne wienyi kɛ Awulae tumi ne wɔ kakula ne anwo zo. Yemɔti bɛhanle kɛ, “Nɔhalɛ, kakula ɛhye bayɛ sonlakpole!”
42001067	Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne wolole Dwɔn ɔ ze Zɛkalaya na ɔbɔle Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne nolo kɛ,
42001068	“Bɛmaa yɛye Awulae, Yizilayɛ Nyamenle ne ayɛlɛ! Yeraboa ye menli na yekpɔne bɛ.
42001069	Yemaa yɛ Ngoanedievolɛ kpole bie mɔɔ vi ye sonvolɛ Devidi abusua nu a.
42001070	Ɔluale ye kpɔmanvolɛma nwuanzanwuanza ne mɔ anwo zo ɔbɔle yɛ ɛwɔkɛ dɛba kɛ,
42001071	ɔbalie yɛ yeavi yɛ agbɔvolɛ asa nu, nee bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛkyi yɛ la tumi bo.
42001072	Ɔhanle kɛ ɔbaze yɛ nlenya mɔ anwunvɔne, na ɔ rɛle ɛnrɛvi ye ngyekyeleɛ nwuanzanwuanza ne.
42001073	-
42001074	Ɔvuale ɔhilele yɛ nlenya Ebileham, na ɔbɔle ɛwɔkɛ kɛ ɔkɛlie yɛ ɔkɛvi yɛ agbɔvolɛ asa nu, amaa yɛazonle ye, mɔɔ ɛzulolɛ biala ɛnle nu,
42001075	wɔ anwondelɛ nee fɔɔnwoyɛlɛ nu wɔ ɔ nyunlu wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ yɛde ngoane nu la.
42001076	“Na wɔmɔ, me awolɛ, bɛbavɛlɛ wɔ Anwuma Anwuma Nyamenle ne kpɔmanvolɛ, ɔluakɛ ɛbalumua Awulae anyunlu wɔahɔziezie ye ndenle ne mɔ,
42001077	na wɔamaa ye menli ne anwu kɛ bɛbava bɛ ɛtane bɛahyɛ bɛ na bɛalie bɛ ngoane.
42001078	Ɔlua yɛ Nyamenle ne ahunlunyele kpole ti, ɔbamaa ngoanelielɛ kenle ne ado yɛ;
42001079	ye wienyi ne bada bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛde awozinli nu nee bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛlɛkɔ ewule nu la anwo zo, na yealie yɛ yeava anzonudwolɛ adenle ne azo.”
42001080	Na kakula ne nyinle na ɔyɛle se wɔ sunsum nu. Ɔdɛnlanle fienemgbole ne anu toonwo ɔhɔkpulale kenle mɔɔ ɔyele ɔ nwo ɔhilele Yizilayɛma wɔ bagua nu la.
42002001	Mekɛ ne anu Wulomu Maanle Maanle Kpanyinli ne mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye Ɔgɛsetɛse la lile mɛla kɛ bɛdia menli mɔɔ wɔ Wulomu maanle maanle ne mɔ anu la kɔsɔɔti.
42002002	Ɛhye a le menli ɛdianlɛ mɔɔ lumua a. Mekɛ ne anu ɛnee Koyeleneɛse a di amɛnlado wɔ Selea maanzinli nu a.
42002003	Na awie biala hɔle ɔ nzi kɛ ɔkɔ yeamaa bɛadia ye wɔ ɔdaye ye abusua sua zo.
42002004	Dwosefi vi Nazalɛte mɔɔ wɔ Galeli maanzinli nu la hɔle Belemgbunli Devidi sua zo Bɛtelɛhɛm mɔɔ wɔ Dwudiya maanzinli nu la. Ɔhɔle ɛkɛ ne, ɔluakɛ ɔvi Devidi abusua nu.
42002005	Ɔhɔle kɛ ɔkɔ yeamaa bɛadia ye nee Mɛle, mɔɔ ɛnee yeyia ye la. Mekɛ ne anu ɛnee Mɛle ɛva ɛkolɛ,
42002006	yemɔti Bɛtelɛhɛm yɛɛ ɔ ko hanle ye a.
42002007	Ɔwole ye belamunli ralɛ ne nrenya na ɔvale avuazinli ɔkyekyele ɔ nwo na ɔdole ye mboane adidi ɛlɛka nu wɔ mboane tunli bie anu, ɔluakɛ bɛannyia ɛleka wɔ nyɛvolɛ sua ne anu.
42002008	Mboaneneavolɛma bie wɔ maanle ne anu na bɛlɛsi epe bɛanlea bɛ mboane wɔ fiene ne azo.
42002009	Nyamenle soanvolɛ vindele bɛ nwo ɛkɛ ne, na Awulae anyunlunyia ne dale bɛ nwo zo manle ɛzulolɛ kpole hanle bɛ.
