42002010	Nyamenle soanvolɛ ne zele bɛ kɛ, “Bɛmmasulo! Melɛ amaneɛ kpalɛ melɛbɛlɛ bɛ, mɔɔ bamaa fɛlɛkolilɛ kpole aha menli kɔsɔɔti a.
42002011	Ɛnɛ kenle ye bɛwo bɛ Ngoanedievolɛ ne, mɔɔ le Awulae Kelaese ne wɔ Devidi sua zo.
42002012	Bɛlua sɛkɛlɛneɛ ɛhye azo a bɛbanwu ye a: bɛbanwu kɛ bɛva avuazinli bɛkyekye adɔma ne anwo na bɛva ye bɛdo mboane adidi ɛlɛka nu.”
42002013	Arɛlevilɛ nu ala anwuma soanvolɛma dɔɔnwo rabokale Nyamenle soanvolɛ ko ne anwo na bɛdole edwɛne bɛyele Nyamenle ayɛlɛ kɛ:
42002014	“Anyunlunyia ɛha Nyamenle wɔ anwuma anwuma, anzonudwolɛ ɛha bɛdabɛ mɔɔ ɔ nye die bɛ nwo wɔ ewiade ye la.”
42002015	Mɔɔ Nyamenle soanvolɛma ne vi bɛ nwo ɛkɛ ne ziale hɔle anwuma la, mboaneneavolɛma ne hanle hilele bɛ nwo kɛ, “Bɛmaa yɛhɔ Bɛtelɛhɛm yɛhɔnlea mɔɔ ɛzi, mɔɔ Awulae ɛraha ɛhile yɛ la.”
42002016	Ndɛndɛ ne ala mboaneneavolɛma ne hɔle na bɛhɔnwunle Mɛle nee Dwosefi nee adɔma ne kɛ ɔla mboane adidi ɛlɛka nu.
42002017	Mɔɔ mboaneneavolɛma ne nwunle adɔma ne la, bɛhanle edwɛkɛ mɔɔ Nyamenle soanvolɛ ne hanle ye kakula ne anwo hilele bɛ la bɛhilele menli ne.
42002018	Na ɔyɛle bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛdele mɔɔ mboaneneavolɛma ne mɔ hanle la azibɛnwo.
42002019	Mɛle vale edwɛkɛ ɛhye mɔ amuala ziele ɔ ti anu na ɔdwenlenle nwolɛ kpalɛ.
42002020	Mboaneneavolɛma ne ziale hɔle, bɛdole edwɛne bɛyele Nyamenle ayɛlɛ wɔ mɔɔ bɛde nee mɔɔ bɛnwu ye la anwo; mɔɔ bɛnwunle ye la amgba le kɛ mɔɔ Nyamenle soanvolɛ ne hanle hilele bɛ ala la.
42002021	Mɔɔ ɔlile kenle mɔtwɛ la, bɛyɛle kakula ne mrenyanu nzonlɛ na bɛdonle ye duma Gyisɛse. Duma ɛhye a Nyamenle soanvolɛ ne vale manle ye kolaa na bɛanrenzɛ ye a.
42002022	Mekɛ dwule kɛ akee Dwosefi nee Mɛle yɛ mɔɔ Mosisi mɛla ne kile, mɔɔ fane kakula ne nee ɔ nli ɛnluanlɛ nwo la, bɛvale ye bɛhɔle Gyɛlusalɛm kɛ bɛkava ye bɛahile Awulae,
42002023	kɛmɔ bɛhɛlɛ ye wɔ Awulae Mɛla ne anu la. Ɔse, “Bɛdu belamunli ralɛ nrenya biala bɛmaa Awulae.”
42002024	Eza bɛvale abubule anzɛɛ mɔlɔnoma ngyikyi nwiɔ bɛhɔbɔle azu, kɛmɔ bɛhɛlɛ ye wɔ Awulae Mɛla ne anu la.
42002025	Mekɛ ne anu ɛnee nrenya bie mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye Semɛyɔn la wɔ Gyɛlusalɛm. Nrenya ɛhye le sonlakpalɛ. Nyamenle nwo ɛzulolɛ wɔ ye nu na ɔlɛkendɛ Yizilayɛma ngoanelielɛ ne. Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne wɔ ye nu,
42002026	na yeye yehile ye kɛ ɔnrɛwu ɛlɛ kyesɛ ɔnwu Awulae Mɛzaya ne mɔɔ ɔvale ɔbɔle ɛwɔkɛ la.
42002027	Sunsum ne vale Semɛyɔn hɔle Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne anu, na mɔɔ Gyisɛse awovolɛ ne vale ye rale ɛkɛ ne kɛ bɛbayɛ mɔɔ Nyamenle Mɛla ne se la,
42002028	Semɛyɔn liele kakula ne dole ɔ sa zo na ɔyɛle Nyamenle mo ɔhanle kɛ:
42002029	“Awulae, wɔli wɔ ɛwɔkɛ ne azo. Akee gyakyi wɔ akɛlɛ adenle anzonudwolɛ nu.
42002030	Me nye ɛnwu wɔ ngoanelielɛ ne
42002031	mɔɔ ɛvale ɛbɔle menli kɔsɔɔti ɛwɔkɛ la.
42002032	Ɔle wienyi mɔɔ baye wɔ ɛhulolɛdeɛ ne yeahile menli mɔɔ ɛnle Dwuuma la, na yeava anyunlunyia yearɛlɛ wɔ menli Yizilayɛma.”
42002033	Ɛhye mɔ mɔɔ Semɛyɔn hanle wɔ Gyisɛse anwo la zinle ɔ ze nee ɔ nli anwo.
42002034	Semɛyɔn yilale bɛ na ɔzele ɔ nli Mɛle kɛ, “Nyamenle ɛye kakula ɛhye ɛzie ɛkɛ. Yizilayɛma dɔɔnwo balua ɔ nwo zo adu koti, na dɔɔnwo noko alua ɔ nwo zo anyia ngoane; ɔbayɛ Nyamenle sɛkɛlɛneɛ mɔɔ menli dɔɔnwo ɛnrɛlie ɛnrɛdo nu,
42002035	noko ɔlua ɔ nwo zo, menli dɔɔnwo awozinli nu adwenle kpɔkɛ biala mɔɔ bɛkɛbɔ la bala ali wienyi. Na ɛhye anwo nyane bayɛ kɛ dadeɛ mɔɔ yɛ nla la awɔ wɔ ahonle ne anu.”
42002036	-
42002037	Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛ raalɛ bie noko wɔ ɛkɛ ne, bɛfɛlɛ ye Ana. Raalɛ ɛhye, bɛfɛlɛ ɔ ze Fanuwɛle, ɔvi Ahya abusua nu. Raalɛ ɛhye hɔle agyalɛ la ye ɛvolɛ nsuu ne azo yɛɛ ɔ hu wule a, na kɛkala yeyɛ kpanyinli kpalɛ, na yeyɛ kunlanvolɛ ɛvolɛ abulatwɛ nee nna. Ɔ gyakɛ amkpa Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne anu ɛlɛ; dahuu ɔvale ɛhɔnehyelɛ nee nzɛlɛlɛ ɔzonlenle ye Nyamenle nɔɔzo nee ewiazo.
42002038	Ɔdaye noko ɔrale Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne anu dɔnehwele ne ala anu ɔrayɛle Awulae mo na ɔhanle kakula ne anwo edwɛkɛ ɔhilele bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛ nye la kɛ Nyamenle barakpɔne Gyɛlusalɛm la.
42002039	Mɔɔ bɛwiele debie biala yɛ, kɛmɔ Awulae Mɛla ne se la, Mɛle nee Dwosefi ziale rale bɛ sua zo Nazalɛte mɔɔ wɔ Galeli maanzinli nu la.
42002040	Kakula ne nyinle na ɔ nwo yɛle se; nrɛlɛbɛ yile ye tɛkɛɛ, na Nyamenle yilale ye dɔɔnwo.
42002041	Ɛvolɛ biala Gyisɛse awovolɛ kɔ Gyɛlusalɛm kɔdi Akpabɛnwo Ɛvoyia ne bie.
42002042	Mɔɔ Gyisɛse lile ɛvolɛ bulu nee nwiɔ la, bɛhɔle Gyɛlusalɛm kɛ bɛkali ɛvoyia ne.
42002043	Bɛwiele ɛvoyia ne di na bɛsia bɛara la, kakula Gyisɛse hale Gyɛlusalɛm, na ye awovolɛ ne annwu ye zɔhane.
42002044	Bɛdwenlenle kɛ yebɔ menli dɔɔnwo ne anu, yemɔti bɛdiale kenle ko adenle na bɛhɔkpondɛle ye wɔ bɛ mbusua nee bɛ gɔnwo mɔ avinli,
42002045	na bɛannwu ye, yemɔti bɛziale bɛhɔle Gyɛlusalɛm kɛ bɛkakpondɛ ye.
42002046	Ye kenle nsa ne azo, bɛnwunle ye wɔ Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne anu kɛ ɔde Dwuu kilehilevolɛma avinli, ɔlɛtie bɛ edwɛkɛ ne bie na ɔbizebiza bɛ kpuyia.
42002047	Nrɛlɛbɛ mɔɔ wɔ ye nyelebɛnloa nee ye ndelebɛbo nu la zinle bɛdabɛ mɔɔ ɛnee bɛlɛtie ye la anwo.
42002048	Ye awovolɛ ne nwunle ye la ɔyɛle bɛ azibɛnwo, na ɔ nli zele ye kɛ, “Me ra, duzu ati a wɔyɛ yɛ zɛhae ɛ? Nea, me nee ɛ ze yɛvɛ kpalɛ wɔ wɔ ɛkpondɛlɛ nu.”
42002049	Ɔbuale bɛ kɛ, “Duzu ati a bɛkpondɛ me ɛ? Bɛnze kɛ ɔwɔ kɛ metɛnla Egya sua nu ɔ?”
42002050	Noko bɛande edwɛkɛ ne mɔɔ ɔhanle la abo.
42002051	Yemɔti Gyisɛse nee bɛ ziale rale Nazalɛte, na ɔyɛle tieyɛ ɔmanle bɛ. Ɔ nli vale edwɛkɛ ɛhye mɔ amuala ziele ɔ ti akunlu.
42002052	Na Gyisɛse nyinle nwonane nu nee nrɛlɛbɛ nu, na ɔnyianle ɔ nyunlu wɔ Nyamenle nee menli nyunlu.
42003001	Mɔɔ bɛvale Taebileɛse bɛziele Wulomu Maanle Maanle Belemgbunli na ɔnyianle ɛvolɛ bulu nee nnu la, ɛnee Pɔnteɛse Paelɛte a le amɛnlado wɔ Dwudiya a, yɛɛ Hɛlɔdo noko a ɛnee nea Galeli maanzinli ne azo a. Hɛlɔdo adiema Felepe ɔdaye ɛnee ɔnea Ayetulia nee Telakonaetɛse maanzinli zo, yɛɛ Laeseenease noko nea Abelin maanzinli zo.
42003002	Mekɛ ne anu ɛnee Anase nee Kayafase a le sɛlɛvolɛ mgbanyinli wɔ Yizilayɛ a, na Nyamenle edwɛkɛ ne razile Zɛkalaya ara Dwɔn anwo zo wɔ fienemgbole ne anu.
42003003	Dwɔn hɔle azua mɔɔ gua Azule Dwɔdan ne anloa la azo na ɔbɔle nolo ɔzele kɛ, “Bɛnlu bɛ nwo na bɛrɛla bɛmaa bɛzɔne bɛ, na Nyamenle kɛva bɛ ɛtane ne mɔ kɛhyɛ bɛ.”
42003004	Kɛmɔ bɛhɛlɛ ye wɔ Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛ Ayezaya buluku ne anu la: “Awie ɛlɛtea nu wɔ fienemgbole ne anu kɛ: ‘Bɛziezie Awulae adenle ne; bɛdenrɛdenrɛ ye ndenle ne mɔ!
42003005	Bɛdua bɔnza biala, bɛha awoka mgbole nee ngyikyi kpokpoti aze. Bɛdenrɛdenrɛ ndenle ahyeɛhyealera ne mɔ, na bɛduodua ahuma ne mɔ.
42003006	Na menli kɔsɔɔti kɛnwu Nyamenle ngoanelielɛ ne!’ ”
42003007	Menli dɔɔnwo rale Dwɔn ɛkɛ ne kɛ ɔzɔne bɛ. Na ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Bɛmɛ ɛkyelebenle mralɛ! Nwane a zele bɛ kɛ bɛnriandi bɛvi Nyamenle ndeanlɛ ne mɔɔ bara la anwo a?
42003008	Bɛbɔ ɔ bo bɛyɛ debie mɔɔ kile kɛ bɛnlu bɛ nwo, na bɛmmakɔ zo bɛka kɛ, ‘Yɛle Ebileham amra.’ Meka meahile bɛ kɛ Nyamenle kola maa awolɛ ɛhye mɔ yɛ Ebileham abo zo amra!
42003009	Baka biala mɔɔ anzo ma kpalɛ la, bɛkɛpɛ ye bɛkɛwula senle nu. Bɛhakye kɛ, kɛkala bɔbɔ, bɛziezie akuma mɔɔ bɛfa bɛadudu mbaka wɔ bɛ ndinli bo a.”
42003010	Menli ne mɔ bizale ye kɛ, “Ɛnee duzu a yɛyɛ a?”
42003011	Dwɔn buale bɛ kɛ, “Bɛmaa mɔɔ lɛ ndanlɛ nwiɔ la ɛva ko ɛmaa mɔɔ ɛnlɛ bie la, na mɔɔ lɛ aleɛ la nee ɔ gɔnwo mɔ ɛli.”
42003012	Adwuledievolɛma bie rale kɛ bɛba bɛamaa bɛazɔne bɛ, na bɛbizale Dwɔn kɛ, “Kilehilevolɛ, duzu a yɛyɛ a?”
42003013	Na ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Bɛmmadie adwule mɔɔ ɛngɔ mɛla nu la.”
42003014	Sogyama bie noko bizale ye kɛ, “Na yɛdayɛ noko ɛ? Duzu a yɛyɛ a?” Dwɔn zele bɛ kɛ, “Bɛmmabɔ awie apo bɛdie ye ezukoa, anzɛɛ bɛmmato awie biala ɛzonle. Bɛmaa bɛ kunlu ɛdwo bɛ ezukoa mɔɔ bɛtua bɛ la anwo.”
42003015	Kɛmɔ ɛnee menli dɔɔnwo anye la Mɛzaya ne ɛralɛ zo la, bɛdwenlenle kɛ bekezɛ yemɔ a le Dwɔn.
42003016	Yemɔti Dwɔn zele bɛ kɛ, “Mame, mefa nzule a mesɔne bɛ a, na awie ɛlɛba mɔɔ ɔle kpole ɔtɛla me a. Sonla zɔhane mgbɔlaboa bɔbɔ, menfɛta kɛ menwɔzianyi zolɛ nyɛma. Na yemɔ, ɔbava Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne nee senle a yeazɔne bɛ a.
42003017	Ɔlɛ ye akegyebɛ ɔ sa nu, ɔbava yeahegye ye ma. Ɔbazoa kpalɛ ne yeahɔgua ye bonwolo ne azo, na yeayela abonle ne wɔ senle ne mɔɔ ɛnnu ɛlɛ la anu.”
42003018	Dwɔn luale ndenle dɔɔnwo azo bɔle Edwɛkpa ne nolo hilele menli ne na ɔdule bɛ folɛ kɛ bɛhakyi bɛ subane.
42003019	Na Dwɔn hwile Hɛlɔdo mɔɔ le Galeli maanzinli zo neavolɛ la anyunlu, ɔluakɛ ɛnee Hɛlɔdo ɛgya ɔ diema aye. Raalɛ ne bɛfɛlɛ ye Hɛlɔdease; eza ɛnee Hɛlɔdo ɛyɛ ninyɛndane dɔɔnwo.
42003020	Ɛtane kpole bɔbɔ mɔɔ bo ɛhye mɔ amuala azo, mɔɔ Hɛlɔdo akee yɛle la a le kɛ ɔhyele Dwɔn ɔdole efiade.
42003021	Mɔɔ bɛzɔnenle menli ne amuala bɛwiele la, nzinlii bɛzɔnenle Gyisɛse ɔdaye noko, na mɔɔ ɔyɛ nzɛlɛlɛ la, anwuma bukele,
42003022	na Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne le kɛ abubule la dwule ɔ nwo zo. Ɛnelɛ bie vi anwuma zele kɛ, “Wɔmɔ a ɛle me Ra mɔɔ mekulo wɔ kpalɛ a. Me nye die ɛ nwo kpole.”
42003023	Mɔɔ Gyisɛse bɔle ye gyima ne abo la ɛnee yeli ɛvolɛ kɛyɛ abulasa, na ɛnee menli ze kɛ Dwosefi ara ɔ. Dwosefi le Hilae ara.
42003024	Hilae le Matate ara, Matate le Livae ara, Livae le Mɛlekae ara, Mɛlekae le Gyanae ara, Gyanae le Dwosefi ara.
42003025	Dwosefi le Matatayase ara, Matatayase le Emɔso ara. Emɔso le Neehum ara, Neehum le Ɛselae ara, Ɛselae le Nagae ara.
42003026	Nagae le Meeyate ara, Meeyate le Matatayase ara, Matatayase le Semɛyɔn ara, Semɛyɔn le Dwosɛke ara, Dwosɛke le Dwoda ara.
42003027	Dwoda le Dwowanan ara, Dwowanan le Rilisa ara, Rilisa le Zɛlubabɛle ara, Zɛlubabɛle le Hyealeteɛle ara, Hyealeteɛle le Nilae ara.
42003028	Nilae le Mɛlekae ara, Mɛlekae le Adae ara, Adae le Kosam ara, Kosam le Ɛlemadam ara, Ɛlemadam le Ɛɛ ara,
42003029	Ɛɛ le Dwɔhyua ara, Dwɔhyua le Ɛleyizɛ ara, Ɛleyizɛ le Dwolem ara, Dwolem le Matate ara, Matate le Livae ara,
42003030	Livae le Semɛyɔn ara, Semɛyɔn le Dwuda ara, Dwuda le Dwosefi ara, Dwosefi le Dwonam ara, Dwonam le Yilayakem ara,
42003031	Yilayakem le Mɛlɛya ara, Mɛlɛya le Mina ara, Mina le Matata ara, Matata le Neetan ara, Neetan le Devidi ara.
42003032	Devidi le Gyɛsi ara, Gyɛsi le Obɛde ara, Obɛde le Bowaze ara, Bowaze le Salemɔn ara, Salemɔn le Nahyɔn ara.
42003033	Nahyɔn le Amenadabe ara, Amenadabe le Ademen ara, Ademen le Aanae ara, Aanae le Hɛzelɔn ara, Hɛzelɔn le Pɛlɛze ara, Pɛlɛze le Dwuda ara,
42003034	Dwuda le Gyekɔbo ara, Gyekɔbo le Ayezeke ara, Ayezeke le Ebileham ara, Ebileham le Tɛla ara, Tɛla le Neehɔ ara.
42003035	Neehɔ le Sɛlɛge ara, Sɛlɛge le Riliyu ara, Riliyu le Pɛlɛge ara, Pɛlɛge le Yibɛ ara, Yibɛ le Hyɛla ara.
42003036	Hyɛla le Keenan ara, Keenan le Aafazade ara, Aafazade le Hyɛm ara, Hyɛm le Nowa ara, Nowa le Leemɛke ara,
42003037	Leemɛke le Matusɛla ara, Matusɛla le Yinɔko ara, Yinɔko le Gyɛlɛde ara, Gyɛlɛde le Mahalɛli ara, Mahalɛli le Kinan ara,
42003038	Kinan le Yinɔhye ara, Yinɔhye le Sɛte ara, Sɛte le Adam ara, yɛɛ Adam le Nyamenle ara.
42004001	Gyisɛse vi Azule Dwɔdan ne anloa ziale rale la ɛnee Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne ɛyi ye tɛkɛɛ. Sunsum ne vale ye hɔle fienemgbole ne anu
42004002	na abɔnsam zɔle ye nleanle kenle abulanla. Yeanli debie biala wɔ mekɛ zɔhane anu, yemɔti mɔɔ ɔwiele la ɛhɔne hunle ye.
42004003	Abɔnsam zele ye kɛ, “Saa wɔmɔ a ɛle Nyamenle Ara ne a, ɛnee maa bolɛ ɛhye ɛhakyi kpanwo.”
42004004	Gyisɛse buale ye kɛ, “Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne se, ‘Tɛ kpanwo angome a sonla di nyia ngoane a.’ ”
42004005	Abɔnsam vale ye hɔle anwuma na ɛkɛ ne ala ɔvale aleɛabo arelemgbunli maanle maanle kɔsɔɔti ɔhilele ye,
42004006	na ɔzele ye kɛ, “Mebava tumi ɛhye nee anwonyia ɛhye mɔ amuala meamaa wɔ. Bɛva bɛ muala bɛwula me sa nu, na mekola mefa memaa awie biala mɔɔ mekulo la.
42004007	Zɔhane ati saa ɛbɔ ɛ ti aze ɛmaa me, ɛsonle me a, ye kɔsɔɔti bayɛ wɔ ɛdeɛ.”
42004008	Gyisɛse buale ye kɛ, “Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne se, ‘Yeyɛ Awulae wɔ Nyamenle ne na sonle ɔdaye ɔ ngomekye.’ ”
42004009	Abɔnsam eza vale ye hɔle Gyɛlusalɛm na ɔvale ye ɔhɔziele Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne ati twɔɔnwo ne azo anwuma na ɔzele ye kɛ, “Saa ɛle Nyamenle Ara a, ɛnee gyakyi ɛ nwo te aze.
42004010	Ɔluakɛ Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne se, ‘Nyamenle kɛmaa ye soanvolɛma kɛnlea wɔ gyɛlɛɛnye.’
42004011	Eza bɛhɛlɛ ye kɛ, ‘Bɛbazɔ wɔ bɛ sa nu anwuma amaa wɔanva ɛ gyakɛ wɔamkpula bolɛ.’ ”
42004012	Gyisɛse buale kɛ, “Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne se, ‘Mmasɔ Awulae wɔ Nyamenle ne ɛnea.’ ”
42004013	Mɔɔ abɔnsam zɔle Gyisɛse nleanle wɔ adenle biala anu wiele la, ɔvile ɔ nwo ɛkɛ ne ɔhwenle ɔ nzi ekyii ɔhɔhendɛle mekɛ mɔɔ ɔkɛnyia Gyisɛse anwo adenle kpalɛ bieko la.
42004014	Gyisɛse ziale rale Galeli, na ɛnee Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne tumi ne wɔ ɔ nwo. Ye nganeɛ dendenle hɔle maanle ne amuala anu.
42004015	Ɔhilehilele wɔ bɛ nyianu azua ne mɔ anu na awie biala yele ye ayɛlɛ.
42004016	Gyisɛse akee hɔle Nazalɛte, ɛleka mɔɔ bɛtetele ye la, ɔhɔle nyianu sua ne anu Ɛnwomenlelielɛ Kenle ne, kɛmɔ ɔyɛ ye dahuu la, na ɔdwazole kɛ ɔkenga Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne.
42004017	Bɛvale Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛ Ayezaya nwoma ne bɛmanle ye. Ɔbukele ɛleka mɔɔ bɛhɛlɛ ye kɛ,
42004018	“Awulae Sunsum ne wɔ me nwo zo, ɔboalekɛ yekpa nu yeye me kɛ menva Edwɛkpa ne membɛlɛ ehyianvolɛma. Yezoa me kɛ membɔ fanwodi nwo nolo mengile bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛhye bɛ nuokɛ la, na memaa anyenzinliravolɛma ɛnwu debie. Menye bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛlɛsisi bɛ la menvi anwongyelelɛ nu,
42004019	na membɔ nolo kɛ mekɛ ɛdwu mɔɔ Awulae balie ye menli ngoane a.”
42004020	Gyisɛse wiele la, ɔbubule nwoma ne na ɔvale ɔmanle sonvolɛ ne na akee ɔdɛnlanle aze. Bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛwɔ nyianu sua ne anu la amuala hakyile bɛ nye wɔ ɔ nwo,
42004021	na ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Ɛnɛ kenle ye Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ɛhye ɛra nuhua, kɛmɔ bɛdabɛ bɛde ala la.”
42004022	Bɛ muala bɛ nye liele ɔ nwo na ye ɛdendɛlɛ bɔbɔ zinle bɛ nwo, na bɛzele kɛ, “Asoo tɛ Dwosefi ara ye ɛ?”
42004023	Na ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Meze kɛ bɛbaha bɛahile me kɛ, ‘Ninsinli, ɛdawɔ yɛ ɛ nwo ayile!’ Eza bɛbaha bɛahile me kɛ, ‘Ninyɛne mɔɔ ɛyɛle wɔ Kapɛnayɛm la, yɛde bɛ nganeɛ wɔ ɛke, yemɔti yɛ bie maa yɛnlea.’ ”
42004024	Gyisɛse zɔle zo hanle kɛ, “Meka ko ɛhye meahile bɛ: Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛ biala ɛnlɛ ɔ nyunlu wɔ ye sua zo.
42004025	“Bɛdie mɔɔ meka la. Ɔle nɔhalɛ kɛ Yilaegya mekɛ zo, ezule andɔ toonwo ɛvolɛ nsa siane nsia, na sane kpole zile maanle ne kpokpoti anu.
42004026	Mekɛ ne anu ɛnee ahunlanvolɛ mraalɛ dɔɔnwo wɔ Yizilayɛ, noko bɛanzoa Yilaegya wɔ biala anwo kɛ kunlanvolɛ raalɛ bie mɔɔ wɔ Zalɛfate mɔɔ wɔ Saedɛn maanzinli nu la ala.
42004027	Eza Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛ Yilaehya mekɛ zo ɛnee kokobɛvolɛma dɔɔnwo wɔ Yizilayɛ maanle ye anu noko bɛammaa biala anwo anza kɛ Neeyaman mɔɔ vi Selea la ala.”
42004028	Mɔɔ bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛwɔ nyianu sua ne anu la dele ɛhye la, ɛya hunle bɛ kpole.
42004029	Bɛzɔle ye nu na bɛhwenlenle ye bɛvile suakpole ne azo bɛhɔle boka ne mɔɔ bɛhye suakpole ne zolɛ la abati kɛ bɛkavuandi ye bɛado kuma ne anu.
42004030	Na Gyisɛse luale bɛ avinli ɛkɛ ne ala hɔle ye ɛleka bie.
42004031	Akee Gyisɛse hɔle Galeli maanzinli nu suakpole bie mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye Kapɛnayɛm la azo, na ɔhilehilele menli ne wɔ Ɛnwomenlelielɛ Kenle ne.
42004032	Ye ngilehilelɛ ne zinle bɛ nwo, ɔluakɛ ɔfa tumi a ɔtendɛ a.
42004033	Nrenya ko wɔ nyianu sua ne anu mɔɔ ɛnee sunsum ɛtane wɔ ɔ nwo a; na ɔdeanle nu ɔzele kɛ,
42004034	“Aa! Wɔmɔ Gyisɛse mɔɔ ɛvi Nazalɛte, kɛ yɛze wɔ ɛ? Wɔra kɛ ɛbazɛkye yɛ ɔ? Meze wɔ sonlazule. Wɔmɔ a ɛle Nyamenle Sonla ne mɔɔ anwo te la!”
42004035	Gyisɛse deanle sunsum ɛtane ne nu zele kɛ, “Yɛ koonwu na ɛvi ɔ nwo tu!” Sunsum ɛtane ne manle nrenya ne pɛle finle menli ne anyunlu ɛkɛ na ɔvile ɔ nwo ɔdule, noko nrenya ne anwo ambu ɛbonle.
42004036	Ɔyɛle bɛ muala azibɛnwo na bɛhanle bɛhilele bɛ nwo ngoko kɛ, “Duzu edwɛkɛ a le ɛhye? Nrenya ɛhye lɛ tumi ɔfa ɔtea sunsum ɛtane ne mɔ nu ɔmaa bɛfi menli nwo bɛtu.”
42004037	Na Gyisɛse nganeɛ dendenle hɔle maanzinli ne anu amuala.
42004038	Gyisɛse vile nyianu sua ne anu na ɔhɔle Saemɔn sua nu la, ɛnee ɛyɛlɛyɛlɛ gyi Saemɔn aye ɔ nli ne anwo, na bɛhanle bɛhilele Gyisɛse.
42004039	Ɔhɔle ɔhɔgyinlanle ye ɛkpa ne anwo na ɔzele kɛ ɛyɛlɛyɛlɛ ne vi ɔ nwo ɛdu. Ɔ nwo zale ɛkɛ ne ala, na ɔdwazole ɔkpondɛle debie ɔmanle bɛ.
42004040	Mɔɔ sɛnzɛne ne ɛlɛkɔ ahɔdɔ la, bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛlɛ agɔnwolɛma mɔɔ ewule ngakyile ɛha bɛ la vale bɛ rɛlɛle Gyisɛse, na ɔvale ɔ sa ɔguguale bɛ nwo zo ngoko ngoko, ɔyɛle bɛ muala ayile ɔmanle bɛ nwo zale.
42004041	Sunsum ɛtane ne mɔ noko vi menli dɔɔnwo anwo nriandile, na bɛdeɛdeanle nu kɛ, “Wɔmɔ a ɛle Nyamenle Ara ne a!” Gyisɛse duale sunsum ɛtane ne mɔ, yeamaa bɛandendɛ bieko, ɔluakɛ bɛze kɛ yemɔ a ɔle Mɛzaya ne a.
42004042	Aleɛ hyenle la, Gyisɛse vi sua ne azo hɔle ɛleka sulokoko bie. Menli ne kpondɛle ye na bɛnwunle ye la, bɛbɔle mɔdenle kɛ bɛnrɛmaa ɔnrɛvi sua ne azo bieko.
42004043	Na ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Ɔwɔ kɛ mebɔ Edwɛkpa ne mɔɔ fane Nyamenle Belemgbunlililɛ ne anwo la nolo wɔ azua mɔɔ ɛha la azo noko, ɔluakɛ ɛhye ati yɛɛ Nyamenle zoanle me a.”
42004044	Yemɔti ɔhɔbɔle Edwɛkpa ne nolo wɔ nyianu azua ne mɔ mɔɔ wɔ Dwudiya maanzinli ne anu la amuala anu.
42005001	Kenle ko bie mɔɔ Gyisɛse gyi Ginazalɛte Tandane ne anloa la, menli dɔɔnwo rale ɔ nwo ɛkɛ ne kɛ bɛbadie Nyamenle edwɛkɛ ne; na bɛhyelele ɔ nwo zo kpalɛ.
42005002	Ɔnwunle nlɛne nwiɔ kɛ bɛgyigyi ɛvoleɛ ne na bɛ menle mɔ ɛdwu aze, bɛlɛnrinzinrinzi bɛ avonle ne mɔ anu.
42005003	Gyisɛse vole nlɛne ne mɔ ko, mɔɔ le Saemɔn ɛdeɛ la anu, na ɔzele Saemɔn kɛ ɔzuhu ye ɔhɔ azukunlu ekyii. Gyisɛse akee dɛnlanle aze wɔ ɛlɛne ne anu na ɔhilehilele menli ne.
42005004	Ɔ nloa penle la, ɔzele Saemɔn kɛ, “Ɛ nee ɛ sa zo ne mɔ bɛdu bɛ ɛlɛne ne bɛhɔ buma ne anu na bɛdo avonle ne bɛhye fɛlɛ.”
42005005	Saemɔn buale ye kɛ, “Kilehilevolɛ, sumunli nɔe, yɛyɛ gyima dedee, noko yɛangye fɛlɛ. Na kɛmɔ ɛdawɔ wɔha la, yɛbahɔ yɛahɔdo avonle ne.”
42005006	Bɛhɔdole avonle ne na bɛhyele fɛlɛ dɔɔnwo kpalɛ mɔɔ bɛ avonle ne anrɛɛ kpuke a.
42005007	Yemɔti bɛdole bɛ sa bɛvɛlɛle bɛ gɔnwo mɔ mɔɔ wɔ ɛlɛne ɛhendeɛ ne anu la kɛ bɛrɛla bɛraboa bɛ. Bɛrale la nlɛne nwiɔ ne yiyile tetɛkɛɛ mɔɔ ɛnee asɛɛ bɛwie sia a.
42005008	Mɔɔ Saemɔn Pita nwunle mɔɔ ɛzi la, ɔhotole Gyisɛse anyunlu ɛkɛ ne na ɔzele ye kɛ, “Awulae, twe ɛ nwo fi me nwo kɔ. Mele ɛtanevolɛ!”
42005009	Ɔlua fɛlɛ dɔɔnwo mɔɔ bɛhyele la ati, ɛzulolɛ kpole hanle Pita nee bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛwɔ ɛkɛ ne la amuala.
42005010	Zɔhane ala noko yɛɛ Saemɔn agɔnwo mɔ, Gyemise nee Dwɔn, mɔɔ le Zɛbɛdi amra ne mɔ, bɛdabɛ ɛzulolɛ hanle bɛ a. Gyisɛse zele Saemɔn kɛ, “Mmasulo, ɔvi ɛnɛ mɔɔ kɔ la ɛbahye menli wɔamaa Nyamenle.”
42005011	Bɛhwenle bɛ nlɛne ne mɔ aze, bɛgyakyile debie biala ɛkɛ, na bɛdoale Gyisɛse.
42005012	Mekɛ bie ɛnee Gyisɛse wɔ sua bie azo, na nrenya ko mɔɔ ɛnee kokobɛ ɛgua ɔ nwo amuala la wɔ ɛkɛ ne. Mɔɔ ɔnwunle Gyisɛse la ɔdule ɔdɔle ɔ gyakɛ anu na ɔbodole ye kɛ, “Awulae, saa ɔyɛ wɔ ɛhulolɛ a, ɛkola ɛmaa me nwo sa.”
42005013	Gyisɛse vale ɔ sa hanle ye na ɔzele ye kɛ, “Mekulo! Ɛ nwo ɛza!” Na ɛkɛ ne ala ɔ nwo zale.
42005014	Gyisɛse bɔle ɔ nloa kɛ ɔmmaka ɔkile awie biala, ɔzele ye kɛ, “Kɔ na kɔva ɛ nwo kile sɛlɛvolɛ ne, na bɔ wɔ anwonzalɛ azu ne mɔɔ Mosisi hyehyɛle dole ɛkɛ ne la fa kile kɛ ɛ nwo ɛza.”
42005015	Na Gyisɛse nganeɛ dendenle hɔle ndɛndɛ kpalɛ, na menli somaa ne ala pianle rale kɛ bɛbadie ye edwɛkɛ ne na yeayɛ bɛ ayile;
42005016	noko ɔyɛ a ɛnee yehwe ɔ nwo yehɔ ɛleka sulokoko bie yehɔzɛlɛ.
42005017	Kenle ko bie mɔɔ ɛnee Gyisɛse ɛlɛkilehile la, Falasiima bie nee mɛla kilehilevolɛma mɔɔ vi azua mɔɔ wɔ Galeli nee Dwudiya maanzinli ne mɔ anu nee Gyɛlusalɛm la radɛnlanle ɛkɛ ne bie. Nyamenle tumi ne rale Gyisɛse anwo zo na ɔyɛle wuleravolɛma ayile.
42005018	Menli bie vale nrenya bie mɔɔ ɛdwidwe la wɔ ɛkpa nu rale, na bɛbɔle mɔdenle kɛ bɛfa ye bɛawolo sua ne anu bɛahɔdo Gyisɛse anyunlu ɛkɛ ne.
42005019	Na kɛmɔ menli ne zonle la ati, bɛannyia adenle bɛangɔ sua ne anu. Yemɔti bɛvale ye bɛvole sua ne ati zo, bɛpɛle sua ne ati zo tokule na bɛvale ye nee ɛkpa ne mɔɔ ɔla zo la bɛdwulale ye aze wɔ menli ne avinli bɛdole ye Gyisɛse anyunlu ɛkɛ ne.
42005020	Gyisɛse nwunle menli ne mɔ diedi la, ɔzele nrenya ne mɔɔ ɛdwidwe la kɛ, “Me gɔnwo, bɛva wɔ ɛtane ne mɔ bɛhyɛ wɔ.”
42005021	Mɛla kilehilevolɛma nee Falasiima ne mɔ bɔle ɔ bo kɛ bɛka bɛahile bɛ nwo ngoko kɛ, “Nwane a le ɛhye mɔɔ ɔka munzule edwɛkɛ zɛhae a? Awie biala ɛngola ɛnva ɛtane ɛngyɛ kyesɛ Nyamenle angomekye.”
42005022	Gyisɛse nwunle bɛ adwenle na ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Duzu ati a bɛdwenle ninyɛne ɛhye mɔ anwo ɛ?
42005023	Boni a ye ɛhanlɛ yɛ se a, kɛ ɛka kɛ, ‘Bɛva wɔ ɛtane ne mɔ bɛhyɛ wɔ,’ anzɛɛ ‘Dwazo na tia?’
42005024	Memaa bɛanwu kɛ medame Sonla Ra, melɛ tumi wɔ azɛlɛ ye azo kɛ mefa ɛtane mekyɛ.” Yemɔti ɔzele nrenya ne mɔɔ ɛdwidwe la kɛ, “Mese, dwazo, fa wɔ ɛkpa ne, na kɔ sua nu!”
42005025	Ɛkɛ ne ala nrenya ne dwazole, na wɔ bɛ muala bɛ nyunlu ɛkɛ ne, ɔvale ye ɛkpa ne mɔɔ ɔla zo la, na ɔyele Nyamenle ayɛlɛ ɔhɔle sua nu.
42005026	Ɔzinle bɛ muala bɛ nwo kpole, na bɛvale sulosulo bɛyele Nyamenle ayɛlɛ bɛzele kɛ, “Ɛnɛ yɛnwu ninyɛne ɛzulolɛ kpalɛ!”
42005027	Nzinlii Gyisɛse vindele alie nwo na ɔnwunle adwuledievolɛ bie mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye Livae la kɛ ɔde ye gyima nu. Gyisɛse zele ye kɛ, “Bɛla maa yɛhɔ.”
42005028	Livae dwazole, ɔgyakyile debie biala ɛkɛ na ɔdoale ye.
42005029	Nzinlii Livae dole ɛkponle kpole bie wɔ ye sua nu ɛkɛ ne manle Gyisɛse, na adwuledievolɛma dɔɔnwo nee menli mɔɔ bɛdabɛ noko awie ɛmbu bɛ la hɔle ɛkponledolɛ ne abo.
42005030	Falasiima bie nee mɛla kilehilevolɛma bie mɔ mɔɔ boka Falasiima fane ne anwo la bizale Gyisɛse ɛdoavolɛma ne kɛ, “Duzu ati a bɛ nee adwuledievolɛma nee menli mɔɔ awie ɛmbu bɛ la to bɛ sa ɛyɛba ko anu ɛ?”
42005031	Gyisɛse buale bɛ kɛ, “Menli mɔɔ te kpɔkɛ la ɛngyia ninsinli nwo kɛ wuleravolɛma.
42005032	Bɛse membale kɛ mebavɛlɛ bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛkpazi la? Membale menli mɔɔ awie ɛmbu bɛ la ɛvɛlɛlɛ, amaa bɛanlu bɛ nwo.”
42005033	Menli bie bizale Gyisɛse kɛ, “Dwɔn ɛdoavolɛma ne ta kɛ bɛkye ɛhɔne na bɛsɛlɛ, Falasiima ɛdoavolɛma ne noko yɛ zɔhane ala; na wɔ ɛdoavolɛma ɛdeɛ dahuu bɛdi debie.”
42005034	Gyisɛse buale bɛ kɛ, “Bɛdwenle kɛ menli mɔɔ bɛkɛyia bɛ wɔ atɔfolɛ bo la kɛhye ɛhɔne wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ atɔfolɛ nrenya ne nee bɛ de la ɔ? Ɔnrɛyɛ zɔhane ɛlɛ.
42005035	Noko saa mekɛ dwu na bɛbaye atɔfolɛ nrenya ne wɔ bɛ nu a, ɛnee bɔ zo mɔɔ yedwu mɔɔ bɛbua bɛda a.”
42005036	Gyisɛse eza bule bɛ ɛrɛlɛ ɛhye: “Awie ɛnde tɛladeɛ fofolɛ ɛdanlɛ ɛnda tɛladeɛ dɛba nu; saa ɔyɛ ye zɔhane a, ɛnee yede fofolɛ ne mgbane, ɛdanlɛ fofolɛ ne bɔbɔ nee dɛba ne ɛnrɛyɛ ko.
42005037	Eza sonla biala ɛnva nwanye ndokuma ɛngua nwanye nwoma kodoku dɛba nu. Saa ɔyɛ ye zɔhane a, nwanye ndokuma ne kɛkpuke kodoku ne na nwanye ne kɛzɛkye.
42005038	Mɔɔ bɛyɛ la a le kɛ, bɛfa nwanye ndokuma bɛgua nwoma kodoku fofolɛ nu.
42005039	Eza bɔbɔ awie biala ɛnrɛnlo nwanye dɛba na nzinlii eza yeakpondɛ nwanye ndokuma bo zo. Mɔɔ ɔbaha la a le kɛ, ‘Dɛba ne le kpalɛ.’ ”
42006001	Ɛnwomenlelielɛ Kenle ko bie ɛnee Gyisɛse lua atoko ɛya bie anu. Ye ɛdoavolɛma ne bubule atoko ne bie lile.
42006002	Falasiima ne bie mɔ bizale bɛ kɛ, “Kɛmɔti a bɛlɛyɛ mɔɔ yɛ mɛla ne tua kɛ yɛmmayɛ ye wɔ Ɛnwomenlelielɛ Kenle ne la ɛ?”
42006003	Na Gyisɛse buale bɛ kɛ, “Asoo bɛtɛkengale mɔɔ Devidi yɛle wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ ɛhɔne hunle ye nee ye menli ne mɔ la?
42006004	Ɔhɔle Nyamenle sua ne anu na ɔhɔvale kpanwo ne mɔɔ bɛva bɛbɔ azu bɛmaa Nyamenle la, ɔlile bie na ɔvale bie ɔmanle ye menli ne mɔ lile. Noko yɛ mɛla ne tua kɛ awie gyɛne mmadi bie kyesɛ sɛlɛvolɛma ne mɔ ala.”
42006005	Na Gyisɛse dwulale ye edwɛkɛ ne kɛ, “Medame Sonla Ra, melɛ tumi wɔ Ɛnwomenlelielɛ Kenle ne azo.”
42006006	Ɛnwomenlelielɛ Kenle bieko Gyisɛse hɔle nyianu sua ne anu hɔhilehilele. Nrenya ko wɔ ɛkɛ ne mɔɔ ɔ sa fema ne ɛdwe a.
42006007	Mɛla kilehilevolɛma nee Falasiima bie mɔ ɛnee kpondɛ adenle alua zo adoa Gyisɛse la ati, bɛnleanle saa ɔkɛyɛ nrenya ne ayile wɔ Ɛnwomenlelielɛ Kenle ne a.
42006008	Gyisɛse nwunle bɛ adwenle na ɔzele nrenya ne mɔɔ asa ɛdwe la kɛ, “Dwazo bagyinla yɛ nyunlu ɛke.” Nrenya ne dwazole ragyinlanle ɛkɛ ne.
42006009	Gyisɛse zele bɛ kɛ, “Mebiza bɛ, duzu a yɛ mɛla ne maa nwolɛ adenle kɛ yɛyɛ wɔ Ɛnwomenlelielɛ Kenle ne a? Yɛyɛ ahunlunyele anzɛɛ yɛli ɛtane? Yɛlie sonla ngoane anzɛɛ yɛzɛkye ye?”
42006010	Akee ɔnleanle bɛ nyunlu ɔyiale na ɔzele nrenya ne kɛ, “Tenrɛ ɛ sa ne anu!” Nrenya ne denrɛle ɔ sa ne anu na ɔ sa ne yɛle kpalɛ bieko.
42006011	Ɛhye anwo ɛya hunle menli ne kpole na bɛvale mɔɔ bɛbava bɛayɛ Gyisɛse la anwo adwenle.
42006012	Mekɛ ne anu Gyisɛse hɔle boka bie azo kɛ ɔkazɛlɛ; na ɔzɛlɛle Nyamenle nɔe ne amuala.
42006013	Aleɛ hyenle la, ɔvɛlɛle ye ɛdoavolɛma ne amuala na ɔkpale bɛ nuhua bulu nee nwiɔ, na ɔvɛlɛle bɛ ɛzoanvolɛma.
42006014	Bɛmɛ a le: Saemɔn mɔɔ ɔmanle ye duma fofolɛ kɛ bɛfɛlɛ ye Pita la, nee ɔ diema Andelu; Gyemise nee Dwɔn, Felepe yɛɛ Baatɔlomiyu,
42006015	Mateyu nee Tɔmase, Afeɛse ara Gyemise nee Saemɔn mɔɔ le Maanle Kulovolɛ ne,
42006016	Gyemise ara Dwudase, yɛɛ Dwudase Yesekaleɔto, mɔɔ yele Gyisɛse manle la.
42006017	Gyisɛse nee ye ɛzoanvolɛma ne vi boka ne azo tolole, ɔ nee ye ɛdoavolɛma dɔɔnwo hɔgyinlanle ɛleka bie mɔɔ la aze fɛɛnye la. Menli dɔɔnwo kpalɛ noko mɔɔ bie mɔ vi Dwudiya maanzinli ne kodoka biala anu, nee bie mɔ mɔɔ vi Gyɛlusalɛm nee ɛnweanloa azua mɔɔ le Taya nee Saedɛn la azo rayiale ye wɔ ɛkɛ ne;
42006018	bɛrale kɛ bɛbadie ye na bɛamaa yeayɛ bɛ ayile. Bɛdabɛ mɔɔ sunsum ɛtane gyegye bɛ la noko rale, na ɔyɛle bɛ ayile.
42006019	Menli dɔɔnwo ne amuala pelele kɛ bɛkɛva bɛ sa bɛkɛha ye, ɔluakɛ ɛnee tumi vi ye nu ɛlɛyɛ bɛ muala ayile.
42006020	Gyisɛse manle ɔ nye zo nleanle ye ɛdoavolɛma ne na ɔzele kɛ, “Nyilalɛ ɛha bɛdabɛ ehyianvolɛma; Nyamenle bamaa bɛanyia ye belemgbunlililɛ ne.
42006021	“Nyilalɛ ɛha bɛdabɛ mɔɔ ɛhɔne ɛlɛku bɛ kɛkala la; Nyamenle bamaa bɛ ko ayi. “Nyilalɛ ɛha bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛlɛsu kɛkala la; Nyamenle bamaa bɛazele.
42006022	“Nyilalɛ ɛha bɛ, wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ menli kɛkpo bɛ, kɛyɛ bɛ aholoba, na bɛkɛze bɛ kɛ bɛle musuofoɔ, wɔ mame Sonla Ra me ti la!
42006023	Saa ɔba ye zɔhane a, bɛli fɛlɛko, bɛzi agole, na bɛmaa bɛ nye ɛlie, ɔboalekɛ Nyamenle ɛva nwolɛ ahatualɛ kpole bie ɛzie bɛ wɔ anwuma. Ɔluakɛ kɛ bɛ nlenya mɔ yɛle Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛma mɔɔ lumua la ɛne.
42006024	“Noko akee munzule ɛha bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnyia bɛ nwo kɛkala la, ɔluakɛ bɛmɛ, bɛli bɛ ti bɛwie.
42006025	“Munzule ɛha bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛ ko ɛyi kɛkala la, ɔluakɛ ɛhɔne bahu bɛ. “Munzule ɛha bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛlɛsele kɛkala la, ɔluakɛ bɛbazu bɛadedɛ bɛ nwo bonrane nu.
42006026	“Munzule ɛha bɛ kɛ menli muala kɛyileyila bɛ kosoɛ a, ɔluakɛ zɔhane ala a bɛ nlenya mɔ yɛle Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛma alane ne mɔ a.
42006027	“Na meka meahile bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛlɛtie me la kɛ: Bɛhulo menli mɔɔ kpɔ bɛ la na bɛyɛ kpalɛ bɛmaa bɛ.
42006028	Bɛyileyila menli mɔɔ wa bɛ amonle la, na bɛzɛlɛ bɛmaa menli mɔɔ yɛ bɛ kpɔdekpɔde la.
42006029	Saa awie bɔ ɛ nzo ko anu a, kakyi ko ne noko maa ɔbɔ nu. Saa awie die wɔ anwuma tɛladeɛ ne a, fa bubu ne noko maa ye.
42006030	Awie biza wɔ debie na ɛlɛ bie a, maa ye bie, yɛɛ awie fa wɔ debie a, mmabiza ɔ bo zo bieko.
42006031	Mɔɔ ɛkpondɛ kɛ awie mɔ yɛ maa wɔ la, yɛ zɔhane ala maa bɛdabɛ noko.
42006032	“Na saa bɛkulo menli mɔɔ kulo bɛ la angome a, ɛnee duzu nyilalɛ a bɛnyia ye a? Ɛtanevolɛma bɔbɔ kulo menli mɔɔ kulo bɛ la.
42006033	Saa bɛyɛ kpalɛ bɛmaa menli mɔɔ yɛ kpalɛ maa bɛ la angome a, duzu nyilalɛ a bɛnyia ye a? Ɛtanevolɛma bɔbɔ, bɛdabɛ kɛ bɛyɛ ye ala la ɛne.
42006034	Saa bɛbɔ menli mɔɔ bɛ nye la bɛ nwo zo kɛ bɛkɛdua la angome bosea a, ɛnee duzu nyilalɛ a bɛnyia ye a? Ɛtanevolɛma bɔbɔ bɔ ɛtanevolɛma bosea na bɛdie bɛ ezukoa ne ala.
42006035	Kyɛkyɛ! Bɛhulo menli mɔɔ kpɔ bɛ la na bɛyɛ kpalɛ bɛmaa bɛ, bɛbɔ bɛ bosea, noko bɛmmamaa bɛ nye da kɛ bɛ sa kɛha ye, na Anwuma Anwuma Nyamenle ne bamaa bɛ nwolɛ ahatualɛ kpole, na yeavɛlɛ bɛ ɔ mra, ɔluakɛ ɔyɛ nyele ɔmaa anzeayɛlɛma nee angomedima amuala.
42006036	Bɛ Ze mɔɔ wɔ anwuma la se anwunvɔne, yemɔti bɛdabɛ noko bɛze anwunvɔne.
42006037	“Bɛmmabua awie mɔ ndɛne, na Nyamenle ambua bɛ ndɛne; bɛmmabua awie ewule fɔlɛ, na Nyamenle ambua bɛ ewule fɔlɛ. Bɛva ɛtane bɛhyɛ, na Nyamenle ava bɛ ɛtane ahyɛ bɛ.
42006038	Bɛmaa bɛ sa ɛdwu awie mɔ anwo zo, na Nyamenle asa adwu bɛdabɛ noko bɛ nwo zo. Nɔhalɛ, bɛkɛnyia ye dɔɔnwo kpalɛ mɔɔ kɛyi bɛ sa a, na ɔkɛbulu zolɛ bɔbɔ. Nzuzulɛ mɔɔ bɛkɛzuzu bɛkɛmaa awie mɔ la yɛɛ Nyamenle bazuzu amaa bɛdabɛ noko a.”
42006039	Na Gyisɛse bule bɛ ɛrɛlɛ ɛhye: “Anyenzinliravolɛ ɛnrɛhola ɛnrɛhile anyenzinliravolɛ ko noko adenle; saa ɔyɛ ye zɔhane a, bɛ mu nwiɔ bɛkɛgua kuma nu.
42006040	Ɛdoavolɛ ɛnle kpole ɛndɛla ye kilehilevolɛ, yɛɛ ɛdoavolɛ biala di munli wɔ ye ndetelɛ nu a, ɔyɛ kɛ ye kilehilevolɛ ne ala la.
42006041	“Duzu ati a ɛnwu mumunli ne mɔɔ la ɛ diema bie anye zo la, na ɛndwenle dubinli ne mɔɔ la ɛ nye zo la anwo ɛ?
42006042	Na duzu ati a ɛse ɛ diema kɛ, ‘Me diema, mebodo wɔ, maa menye mumunli ne mɔɔ la ɛ nye zo la,’ wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ dubinli la ɛdawɔ mumua ne ɛ nye zo la ɛ? Wɔmɔ nabalabanli, dumua ye dubinli ne wɔ ɛ nye zo, na wɔanwu debie kpalɛ, na wɔahola wɔaye mumunli ne mɔɔ la adiema ne anye zo la.
42006043	“Baka kpalɛ biala ɛnzo ma ɛtane, yɛɛ baka ɛtane ɛnzo ma kpalɛ.
42006044	Baka biala ma yɛɛ bɛfa bɛnwu ye a; bɛntete feege ma wɔ evileni zo, yɛɛ bɛntete vanye ma wɔ andɔma zo.
42006045	Sonlakpalɛ biala ninyɛne kpalɛ mɔɔ yezie bɛ wɔ ye ahonle nu la finde ye ɛbɛlabɔlɛ nu, yɛɛ sonlatane biala ninyɛndane mɔɔ yezie bɛ wɔ ye ahonle nu la finde ye ɛbɛlabɔlɛ nu. Ɔluakɛ mɔɔ ɛyi sonla ahonle nu tɛkɛɛ la yɛɛ ɔ nloa ka a.
42006046	“Kɛmɔti a bɛfɛlɛ me ‘Awulae, Awulae,’ noko bɛnyɛ mɔɔ menwɔze bɛ kɛ bɛyɛ la ɛ?
42006047	Awie mɔɔ ba me nwo na ɔtie me edwɛkɛ ne na ɔdi zolɛ la kɛ de la ɛne:
42006048	Ɔle kɛ nrenya bie mɔɔ ɛnee ɛlɛsi ye sua la, ɔpɛle kuma ne ɔmanle ɔhɔle kolaa na yeawula sua ne aze wɔ bolɛ zo. Ezule ne bule aze na ɔravale sua ne, na yeangola ye bu, ɔluakɛ bɛzile ye boɛ.
42006049	Na awie mɔɔ tie me edwɛkɛ ne na ɔnli zolɛ la le kɛ nrenya ne mɔɔ si ye sua ɛdeɛ ne la yeanwula ɔ bo aze kpalɛ la; ezule ne bule aze na ɔravale ye sua ne na ndɛndɛ ne ala ɔbule ɔguale ɔzɛkyele bɔkɔɔ, na ye azedɔlɛ ne yɛle ɛzulolɛ!”
42007001	Mɔɔ Gyisɛse hanle ɛhye mɔ amuala hilele menli ne mɔ na ɔwiele la, ɔhɔle Kapɛnayɛm.
42007002	Wulomu sogya kpanyinli bie mɔɔ wɔ ɛkɛ ne la lɛ ye sonvolɛ ko mɔɔ ɔkulo ye edwɛkɛ kpole kpalɛ a. Akɛlɛ ɛhye anwo ɛdo ye na ɔlɛdie adenle yeawu.
42007003	Mɔɔ sogya kpanyinli ne dele Gyisɛse nganeɛ la, ɔzoanle Dwuu mgbanyinli bie wɔ ɔ nwo lɔ kɛ bɛhɔzɛlɛ ye bɛmaa ɔrayɛ ye akɛlɛ ne ayile.
42007004	Mgbanyinli ne mɔ rale Gyisɛse anwo ɛkɛ ne na bɛbodole ye ɛsesebɛ kɛ, “Nrenya ɛhye fɛta wɔ moalɛ bɔkɔɔ.
42007005	Ɔkulo yɛ menli ne edwɛkɛ yɛɛ ɔdaye a ɔzile nyianu sua ne ɔmanle yɛ a.”
42007006	Yemɔti Gyisɛse nee bɛ hɔle. Na mɔɔ ɔka ekyii ɔdwu sua nu ɛkɛ ne la, Wulomu sogya kpanyinli ne zoanle ɔ gɔnwo mɔ manle bɛhɔyiale Gyisɛse na bɛzele ye kɛ, “Yɛmenle, mmafa ɛvɛlɛ ɛhye ɛto ɛ nwo zo na menfɛta kɛ wɔmɔ ɛkɛra me kpɔda ye abo.
42007007	Eza menea a medame bɔbɔ menfɛta kɛ menwɔra ɛ nyunlu. Zɔhane ati wɔmɔ ka ɛ nloa edwɛkɛ ne ala na me sonvolɛ ne anwo kɛza.
42007008	Melɛ sogyama bɔbɔ wɔ me bo ɛdeɛ, mɔɔ meka mekile bie kɛ, ‘Kɔ’ a, ɔkɔ; meka mekile bie noko kɛ, ‘Yɛ ɛhye’ a, ɔyɛ, noko medame mumua ne mewɔ tumi bo.”
42007009	Gyisɛse dele ɛhye la ɔzinle ɔ nwo; ɔhakyile ɔ nye wɔ menli dɔɔnwo ne mɔɔ doa ye la anwo na ɔzele kɛ, “Meka meahile bɛ kɛ metɛnwunle diedi kpole zɛhae bie ɛlɛ, bɔbɔ wɔ Yizilayɛma avinli.”
42007010	Menli mɔɔ bɛzoanle bɛ la ziale hɔle Wulomu sogya kpanyinli ne sua nu, na bɛhɔnwunle kɛ sonvolɛ ne ɛde kpɔkɛ.
42007011	Aleɛ hyenle la Gyisɛse hɔle suakpole bie mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye Neeyen la azo. Ye ɛdoavolɛma ne nee menli dɔɔnwo nee ye a hɔle a.
42007012	Ɔhɔdwule sua ne kandiba la ɛnee bɛdo ɛlɔnwɔne na bɛ nee funli vi sua ne azo anuhɔlɛ kpole ne anu ɛlɛfinde. Ahenle mɔɔ ɛwu la le raalɛ kunlanvolɛ bie ara nrenya kokye, ɛhye ati ɛnee sua ne azo amra dɔɔnwo doa raalɛ ne.
42007013	Mɔɔ Awulae nwunle raalɛ ne la alɔbɔlɛ hunle ye, na ɔzele ye kɛ, “Mmasu.”
42007014	Akee ɔhɔvale ɔ sa ɔhanle ɛlɛka ne na bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛzo funli ne la gyinlanle na bɛzokoɛle. Gyisɛse zele kɛ, “Kpavolɛ! Mese, dwazo!”
42007015	Sonla ne mɔɔ ɛwu la dwazole dɛnlanle aze na ɔbɔle ɔ bo kɛ ɔtendɛ, na Gyisɛse vale ye manle ɔ nli.
42007016	Ɛzulolɛ hanle bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛwɔ ɛkɛ ne la amuala, na bɛyele Nyamenle ayɛlɛ bɛzele kɛ, “Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛ kpole bie ɛvinde yɛ avinli! Nyamenle ɛra baboa ye menli.”
42007017	Gyima ɛhye mɔɔ Gyisɛse lile la nganeɛ hɔle Dwudiya maanle ne anu amuala, na ɔdwule maanle maanle mɔɔ bikye ye la kɔsɔɔti anu noko.
42007018	Dwɔn Sɔnevolɛ ne ɛdoavolɛma hanle ɛhye mɔ amuala hilele ye. Yemɔti ɔvɛlɛle ye ɛdoavolɛma ne mɔ nwiɔ
42007019	na ɔzoanle bɛ wɔ Awulae anwo ɛkɛ ne kɛ bɛhɔbiza ye kɛ, “Ɛnee wɔmɔ a ɛle ahenle ne mɔɔ ɛlɛba la, anzɛɛ yɛmaa yɛ nye ɛla awie fofolɛ ade ɔ?”
42007020	Na mɔɔ bɛhɔle Gyisɛse ɛkɛ ne la, bɛhanle kɛ, “Dwɔn Sɔnevolɛ ne zoanle yɛ kɛ yɛrabiza wɔ saa wɔmɔ a ɛle ahenle ne mɔɔ ɔdaye Dwɔn ɔhanle kɛ ɔbara la, anzɛɛ yɛmaa yɛ nye ɛla awie fofolɛ ade ɔ?”
42007021	Mekɛ zɔhane, Gyisɛse yɛle menli dɔɔnwo mɔɔ ɛnde kpɔkɛ nee bɛdabɛ mɔɔ ewulenzane wɔ bɛ nwo la ayile manle bɛdele kpɔkɛ, ɔdudule sunsum ɛtane ɔvile menli nwo na ɔdukuedukuele anyenzinliravolɛma dɔɔnwo anye.
42007022	Na ɔbuale Dwɔn ɛdoavolɛma ne kɛ, “Bɛzia bɛhɔ na bɛhɔha mɔɔ bɛnwu ye nee mɔɔ bɛde la amuala bɛhile Dwɔn: anyenzinliravolɛma nwu debie, abuburama tia, kokobɛvolɛma anwo sa, anzondiliravolɛma te edwɛkɛ, bɛdwazo menli mɔɔ ɛwu la bɛba ngoane nu, na bɛbɔ Edwɛkpa ne nolo bɛkile ehyianvolɛma.
42007023	Nyilalɛ ɛha bɛdabɛ mɔɔ medame ti bɛmkpo aze wɔ diedi nu la.”
42007024	Nzinlii mɔɔ menli mɔɔ Dwɔn zoanle bɛ la hɔle la, Gyisɛse bɔle ɔ bo kɛ ɔka Dwɔn anwo edwɛkɛ yeahile menli dɔɔnwo ne kɛ, “Mɔɔ bɛhɔle Dwɔn anwo ɛkɛ ne wɔ fienemgbole ne anu la, duzu a ɛnee bɛ nye la kɛ bɛkɛnwu ye a? Ndile mɔɔ anwoma ɛlɛkpusu ye la ɔ?
42007025	Duzu a bɛhɔle ye ɛnleanlɛ a? Sonla mɔɔ heda ɛdakpa la ɔ? Nɔhalɛ, bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛkeda ɛdakpa na bɛde anyelielɛ nu la wɔ arelemgbunli azua nu.
42007026	Bɛha bɛhile me ɛ, duzu a ɛnee akee bɛhɔle ye ɛnleanlɛ a? Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛ ɔ? Ɔle zɔhane, noko bɛnwunle mɔɔ tɛla Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛ bɔbɔ la.
42007027	Ɔluakɛ Dwɔn a Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne ka ye ɔ nwo kɛ, ‘Nyamenle se: Mebazoa ɛbɔfoɔ meamaa yealumua ɛ nyunlu na yeahɔziezie adenle ne yeamaa wɔ’ la.”
42007028	Na Gyisɛse hanle zɔle zolɛ kɛ, “Meka meahile bɛ, Dwɔn le kpole tɛla sonla biala mɔɔ bɛwo ye la; noko akee mɔɔ le ekyi kpalɛ wɔ Nyamenle Belemgbunlililɛ nu la le kpole tɛla ye.”
42007029	Menli mɔɔ dele ɛhye, nee adwuledievolɛma amuala lile fɛlɛko na bɛyele Nyamenle ayɛlɛ kɛ bɛdiele Dwɔn, bɛnlunle bɛ nwo na bɛmanle ɔzɔnenle bɛ a.
42007030	Noko Falasiima nee mɛla kilehilevolɛma ɛdeɛ, bɛkpole mɔɔ Nyamenle kpondɛ kɛ bɛyɛ la na bɛkpole kɛ bɛnrɛmaa Dwɔn ɛnrɛzɔne bɛ.
42007031	Gyisɛse zɔle ye edwɛkɛ ne azo zɛhae, “Duzu a menva adwuleso amra ye mendo nwo a? Kɛ bɛde la ɛne:
42007032	Bɛle kɛ ngakula mɔɔ ɛlɛdi nwɔhoa wɔ gua zo la. Bɛdede ye ekpunli ekpunli. Ekpunli ko tea nu se ko kɛ, ‘Yɛbɔle anyelielɛ edwɛne yɛmanle bɛ, na bɛanzi; yɛyele awolɛ, na bɛanlie zo.’
42007033	Dwɔn Sɔnevolɛ ne rale, ɔhyele ɛhɔne dahuu na ɔhyile nza la bɛse, ‘Ɔle ayɛne!’
42007034	Medame Sonla Ra noko mera, medi na meno a eza bɛse, ‘Nea ɛhye! Adidikpoku, nzanli nee adwuledievolɛma nee bɛdabɛ mɔɔ awie ɛmbu bɛ bie la agɔnwo!’
42007035	Noko, Nyamenle nrɛlɛbɛ ne amra ne mɔ nyɛleɛ maa bɛnwu kɛ ɔle nɔhalɛ.”
42007036	Falasiinli ko bie dole Gyisɛse ɛkponle. Gyisɛse hɔle na ɔdɛnlanle aze kɛ ɔdi debie.
42007037	Raalɛ bie wɔ sua ne azo mɔɔ bɔle ɛbɛla mgbane mgbane a. Ɔdele kɛ Gyisɛse wɔ Falasiinli ne sua nu la, ɔvale anatele mɔɔ wɔ toba mɔɔ bɛvale “alabaseta” bolɛ a bɛyɛle la anu la ko ɔhɔle ɛkɛ ne;
42007038	ɔhɔhotole Gyisɛse agyakɛ anu na ɔbɔle ɔ bo kɛ ɔsu yeava ɔ nye monle yeanrinzi ɔ gyakɛ nwiɔ ne anwo. Akee ɔvale ɔ ti enrinli ɔkyikyile, ɔvole ɔ gyakɛ anwo na ɔwolale anatele ne ɔguale nwo.
42007039	Mɔɔ Falasiinli ne mɔɔ yiale Gyisɛse la nwunle ɛhye la, ɔhanle ye ɔ ti akunlu kɛ, “Saa amgba nrenya ɛhye le Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛ a, anrɛɛ ɔkɛnwu raalɛ holɛ ko mɔɔ ɛlɛfa ɔ sa aha ye la, na ɔkɛnwu ye ɛbɛla mgbane mgbane mɔɔ ɔbɔ la.”
42007040	Gyisɛse zele ye kɛ, “Saemɔn, melɛ edwɛkɛ meka meahile wɔ.” Saemɔn zele kɛ, “Kilehilevolɛ, ka kile me.”
42007041	Gyisɛse bɔle ɔ bo zɛhae: “Nrenya bie mɔɔ bɔ bosea la woale ɛkɛ, ɔlɛ kavolɛma nwiɔ. Ko tua ye etaku nna nna ɛya nnu, yɛɛ ko noko tua ye etaku nna nna abulanlu.
42007042	Kɛmɔ bɛannyia ye bɛandua la ati, ɔvale bɛ mu nwiɔ bɛ kakɛ ne ɔhyɛle bɛ. Na ɛnee ɛnea a, menli nwiɔ ɛhye, boni a kɛhulo nrenya ne edwɛkɛ kpalɛ a?”
42007043	Saemɔn buale kɛ, “Medie medi kɛ mɔɔ ɔvale ye kakɛ kpole ne ɔhyɛle ye la ɔ.” Gyisɛse zele ye kɛ, “Wɔbua ye bɔkɔɔ.”
42007044	Akee ɔhakyile ɔ nye wɔ raalɛ ne anwo ɛkɛ na ɔzele Saemɔn kɛ, “Wɔnwu raalɛ ɛhye? Membale wɔ sua nu ɛke la wɔammaa me nzule meanwowo me gyakɛ anwo, na yemɔ, yeva ɔ nye monle yewowo me gyakɛ anwo na yeva ɔ ti enrinli yekyikyi.
42007045	Wɔmɔ, wɔammiti me bie wɔanyɛ me akɔaba, na yemɔ, sumunli kɛ de la ɔtɛgyakyile me gyakɛ anwo ɛvolɛ.
42007046	Wɔanva ɔlivi nwole wɔanyɛ me ti zo, na yemɔ, yeva anatele yegua me gyakɛ anwo.
42007047	Ɛhye ati meka meahile wɔ kɛ, ɛhulolɛ kpole ne mɔɔ yehile la, kile kɛ bɛva ye ɛtane bebelebe ne bɛhyɛ ye. Mɔɔ bɛkɛva ekyi bɛkɛhyɛ ye la ɛhulolɛ le ekyi bie ala.”
42007048	Akee Gyisɛse zele raalɛ ne kɛ, “Bɛva wɔ ɛtane ne mɔ bɛhyɛ wɔ.”
42007049	Bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛdede ɛkponle ne anwo la bɔle ɔ bo kɛ bɛka ye bɛ ti anu kɛ, “Na nwane bɔbɔ a le ɛhye, mɔɔ ɔkola ɔfa ɛtane ɔkyɛ a?”
42007050	Na Gyisɛse zele raalɛ ne kɛ, “Kɔ anzonudwolɛ nu; wɔ diedi ɛlie wɔ ngoane.”
42008001	Nzinlii Gyisɛse hɔkpɔsale azua nee namunamu zo na ɔbɔle Edwɛkpa ne mɔɔ fane Nyamenle Belemgbunlililɛ ne nolo. Ɛdoavolɛma bulu nee nwiɔ ne nee ye hɔle.
42008002	Mraalɛ bie mɔɔ bɛdule sunsum ɛtane wɔ bɛ nwo, nee mɔɔ bɛyɛle bɛ anwonyane ayile la noko nee ye hɔle. Bɛmɛ a le Mɛle mɔɔ vi Magedala, mɔɔ ɔ nwo a bɛdule mbɔnsam nsuu ne la;
42008003	Twuza, mɔɔ le Hɛlɔdo suakunlu ɛkɛ ne abɔlɔba kpanyinli ne mɔɔ nea ye ninyɛne zo la aye ne mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye Dwowana la, yɛɛ Susana nee mraalɛ dɔɔnwo bie mɔ. Mraalɛ ɛhye mɔ, bɛdabɛ bɛvale mɔɔ bɛlɛ ye la bɛboale Gyisɛse nee ye ɛdoavolɛma ne mɔ.
42008004	Menli dɔɔnwo vi azua azua ne mɔ azo rale Gyisɛse ɛkɛ ne, na mɔɔ menli ne mɔ yɛle dɔɔnwo kpalɛ la, Gyisɛse bule bɛ ɛrɛlɛ ɛhye:
42008005	“Nrenya bie hɔle kɛ ɔkagua ye ma. Mɔɔ ɔgua ma ne la, bie guale adenle nu, menli tietiale zolɛ, na nloma rasusole.
42008006	Bie guale awolɛ nu, na bɛfifile la, bɛnwosonle, ɔluakɛ azɛlɛ ne abo ɛnlɛ nzule.
42008007	Bie guale mbowule nu, na mbowule ne nyinle hedale bɛ nwo zo,
42008008	yɛɛ bie noko guale azɛlɛ kpalɛ zo, na bɛfifile bɛzole ma mɔnwo ɛya.” Gyisɛse dwulale ye edwɛkɛ ne kɛ, “Bɛdie, mɔɔ lɛ ɛnzonlɛ la ɛdie!”
42008009	Gyisɛse ɛdoavolɛma ne mɔ bizale ye ɛrɛlɛ ne abo,
42008010	na ɔbuale bɛ kɛ, “Bɛmɛ, Nyamenle ɛla ye belemgbunlililɛ ne anwo edwɛkɛ mɔɔ vea la ali wienyi ɛhile bɛ, na menli mɔɔ ɛha la bɛte ye wɔ mrɛlɛ nu, amaa bɛnea a bɛannwu ye, yɛɛ bɛtie a bɛande ɔ bo.
42008011	“Akee ɛrɛlɛ ne abo ɛne: Ma ne a le Nyamenle edwɛkɛ ne.
42008012	Mɔɔ guale adenle nu la gyi ɛkɛ ne maa bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛtie edwɛkɛ ne, na Abɔnsam baye edwɛkɛ ne wɔ bɛ ahonle nu, amaa bɛanlie bɛanli na bɛanyia ngoane la.
42008013	Ma ne mɔɔ guale awolɛ nu la a le bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛte edwɛkɛ ne a bɛfa fɛlɛko bɛdie noko ɔnwolowolo bɛ kpalɛ la. Bɛdie bɛdi wɔ mekɛ ekyi bie ala na kɛ sɔnea ba la ɛnee bɛkpo aze.
42008014	Ma ne mɔɔ guale mbowule nu la a le bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛtie edwɛkɛ ne, na bɛmaa ɛbɛlabɔlɛ nwo adwenleadwenle, anwonyia nee anyelielɛ fo keda edwɛkɛ ne azo la, ɛhye ati bɛ ma ɛnyɛ kpalɛ.
42008015	Ma ne mɔɔ guale azɛlɛ kpalɛ zo la a le bɛdabɛ mɔɔ saa bɛtie edwɛkɛ ne a bɛsɔ nu kpundii wɔ ahonle kpalɛ nu, na bɛfa abotane bɛyɛ tieyɛ bɛgyinla kpundii kɔkpula kɛ bɛkɛzo ma la.
42008016	“Sonla ɛnzɔ kɛnlaneɛ na ɔnva bondo ɔmbutu zolɛ, anzɛɛ ɔnva ɔnzie mgba bo; ɔfa ɔsie debie zo anwuma, amaa menli mɔɔ ba sua ne anu la anwu wienyi ne.
42008017	“Debie biala mɔɔ vea la bala ali wienyi; yɛɛ mɔɔ bɛheda zolɛ la anwo bala zolɛ.
42008018	“Zɔhane ati bɛdie ye boɛ, ɔboalekɛ mɔɔ lɛ bie la, ɔbanyia bie dɔɔnwo yeaboka nwolɛ, na mɔɔ ɛnlɛ bie la, ekyi ne bɔbɔ mɔɔ ɔdwenle kɛ ɔlɛ la, bɛbalie bɛavi ɔ sa nu.”
42008019	Gyisɛse ɔ nli nee ɔ mediema ne mɔ rale ɛleka mɔɔ ɔwɔ la, na kɛmɔ menli mɔɔ wɔ ɔ nwo ɛkɛ ne la zonle la ati, bɛangola bɛandwu ɔ nwo ɛkɛ ne.
42008020	Awie hanle hilele Gyisɛse kɛ, “Ɛ nli nee ɛ mediema ne mɔ gyi alie nwo lɔ, na bɛkulo kɛ bɛnwu wɔ.”
42008021	Gyisɛse zele bɛ kɛ, “Me nli nee me mediema a le bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛtie Nyamenle edwɛkɛ ne na bɛdi zolɛ la.”
42008022	Kenle ko Gyisɛse nee ye ɛdoavolɛma ne hɔvole ɛlɛne nu na ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Bɛmaa yɛpɛ yɛhɔ tandane ne anzi lɔ.” Yemɔti bɛdule.
42008023	Mɔɔ bɛlɛkɔ la Gyisɛse lafele. Arɛlevilɛ nu ala ahumu kpole bie vale bɛ, na nzule bɔle ɔ bo kɛ ɔbu yeagua ɛlɛne ne anu. Ɛzulolɛ kpole hanle bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛwɔ ɛlɛne ne anu la.
42008024	Ɛdoavolɛma ne hɔdunwuele Gyisɛse na bɛzele kɛ, “Yɛmenle, Yɛmenle, yɛwie wu!” Gyisɛse dwazole na ɔdeanle ahumu ne nee azule ne mɔɔ ɛyɛ begyebegye la nu, na bɛguale diinyi, na maanle nu gyinlanle.
42008025	Akee ɔzele ye ɛdoavolɛma ne kɛ, “Bɛ diedi ne wɔ nienwu?” Na ɔyɛle bɛ azibɛnwo na bɛzulole, na bɛhanle bɛhilele bɛ nwo ngoko kɛ, “Duzu sonla a le ɛhye? Ɔtendɛ a anwoma nee azule bɔbɔ tie ye!”
42008026	Gyisɛse nee ye ɛdoavolɛma ne hɔdwule aze wɔ Gɛlasa maanle nu wɔ Galeli tandane ne anzi lɔ.
42008027	Gyisɛse dwule aze ala la, nrenya bie mɔɔ vi sua ne azo na sunsum ɛtane dɔɔnwo ɛva ye la yiale ye. Mekɛ dɔɔnwo mɔɔ ɛze la, nrenya ɛhye ɛngeda bie yɛɛ ɔmmo bie. Ɔnla sua nu, ye dabelɛ a le azie zo sɛka ne mɔ anu.
42008028	Mɔɔ ɔnwunle Gyisɛse la, ɔdeanle nu kpole bie, ɔradule ɔdɔle ɔ nyunlu na ɔhanle ye kpole kpalɛ kɛ, “Anwuma Anwuma Nyamenle Ara Gyisɛse, ɛ nee me lɛ bie ɔ? Mekpa wɔ kyɛlɛ, mmatea me!”
42008029	Ɔhanle ɛhye, ɔluakɛ ɛnee Gyisɛse ɛze sunsum ɛtane ne kɛ ɔvi ɔ nwo ɔdu. Mekɛ dɔɔnwo sunsum ɛtane zɛhae ɛvo nrenya ne ɛmaa bɛhye ye bɛdo sua nu, bɛgua ɔ sa nee ɔ gyakɛ nwɔnzɔnwɔnzɔ, noko sunsum ɛtane ne ɛmaa yebubu nwɔnzɔnwɔnzɔ ne na yeva ye yedɔ ɛbɔ nu wɔ fienemgbole ne anu.
42008030	Gyisɛse bizale ye kɛ, “Kɛ bɛfɛlɛ wɔ ɛ?” Nrenya ne buale kɛ, “Bɛfɛlɛ me ɛlɔne”, ɔluakɛ ɛnee sunsum ɛtane dɔɔnwo kpalɛ a gyi ɔ nwo a.
42008031	Sunsum ɛtane ne mɔ zɛlɛle Gyisɛse kɛ ɔmmagua bɛ azɛlɛ bo kuma kpole ne mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye “abese” la anu.
42008032	Ɛnee agbolike kpolane bie bikye ɛleka mɔɔ bɛwɔ la, na bɛlɛdidi wɔ boka bie abati. Sunsum ɛtane ne mɔ bodole Gyisɛse kɛ ɔmaa bɛ adenle ɔmaa bɛhɔwolo agbolike ne mɔ, na Gyisɛse kponlenle zolɛ.
42008033	Sunsum ɛtane ne mɔ vile nrenya ne anwo na bɛhɔwolole agbolike ne mɔ, na agbolike ne mɔ pianle bɛ nwo vi boka ne abati radule guale tandane ne anu na bɛwule bɔkɔɔ.
42008034	Menli mɔɔ ka agbolike ne mɔ la nwunle mɔɔ zile la, bɛnriandile bɛhɔhanle ye wɔ sua ne azo bɛmanle ɔdwule menli mɔɔ wɔ namunamu ne mɔ mɔɔ zuozua ɛkɛ ne la amuala anzo nu.
42008035	Menli hɔle kɛ bɛkanlea mɔɔ ɛzi la. Bɛrale Gyisɛse anwo ɛkɛ ne la bɛnwunle nrenya ne mɔɔ bɛdule sunsum ɛtane ne mɔ wɔ ɔ nwo la kɛ ɔde Gyisɛse anwo ɛkɛ ne na ɔheda ɛdanlɛ, ye adwenle la ɛkɛ ne wienyi; na bɛzulole.
42008036	Bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnwunle mɔɔ zile la hanle kɛ nrenya ne mɔɔ sunsum ɛtane ne wɔ ɔ nwo la zile dele kpɔkɛ la hilele menli ne.
42008037	Ɛzulolɛ kpole mɔɔ hanle Gɛlasa maanlema la manle bɛzele Gyisɛse kɛ ɔvi bɛ maanle ne anu ɔhɔ. Yemɔti Gyisɛse vole ɛlɛne nu kɛ ɔkɔ.
42008038	Nrenya ne mɔɔ mbɔnsam ne mɔ vi ɔ nwo dule la bodole Gyisɛse kɛ, “Maa me nee wɔ ɛhɔ.” Gyisɛse amkponle zolɛ na ɔzele ye kɛ,
42008039	“Sia kɔ sua nu na kɔha mɔɔ Nyamenle ɛyɛ ɛmaa wɔ la.” Nrenya ne ziale hɔle na ɔhɔhanle mɔɔ Gyisɛse ɛyɛ ɛmaa ye la amuala wɔ sua bɔdenle ne azo amuala.
42008040	Gyisɛse ziale ɔ nzi pɛle rale azule nzi nehae la, menli ne rayiale ye, ɔluakɛ ɛnee bɛ muala bɛlɛkendɛ ye.
42008041	Nrenya bie mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye Gyeeyaelɛse la rale ɛkɛ ne. Nrenya ɛhye le sua ne azo nyianu sua ne neavolɛ. Ɔdule ɔdɔle Gyisɛse agyakɛ anu na ɔbodole ye kɛ ɔmaa bɛhɔ ye sua nu,
42008042	ɔluakɛ ɔ ra raalɛ kokye mɔɔ ɛli ɛvolɛ bulu nee nwiɔ la ɛlɛdie ewule awu. Gyisɛse nee nrenya ne bɛlɛkɔ la, menli dɔɔnwo doale ye na bɛhyelele ɔ nwo zo kpalɛ.
42008043	Raalɛ bie wɔ ɛlɔne ne anu mɔɔ mogya ɛdudu ye toonwo ɛvolɛ bulu nee nwiɔ, yezɛkye ye ezukoa muala wɔ ninsinlima asa anu, noko awie biala angola ye ayile yɛ a.
42008044	Ɔbɔle mɔdenle ɔralile Gyisɛse anzi na ɔvale ɔ sa ɔhanle ye tɛladeɛ ne anloa, na ɛkɛ ne ala mogya ne pɛle.
42008045	Na Gyisɛse bizale kɛ, “Nwane a ɛva ɔ sa ɛha me la?” Awie biala zale, na Pita zele kɛ, “Yɛmenle, ɛgyi menli avinli yɛɛ bɛhyele zo kpalɛ!”
42008046	Na Gyisɛse zele kɛ, “Awie ɛva ɔ sa ɛha me, ɔluakɛ mede ye me nu kɛ tumi vi me nuhua ɛhɔ.”
42008047	Raalɛ ne nwunle kɛ ɔfea ɔ nwo a ɔnyɛ boɛ, yemɔti ɔvale anwowozolɛ ɔradule ɔdɔle Gyisɛse agyakɛ anu, ɔkpale ye edwɛkɛ nwo ɛdanlɛ wienyi wɔ menli ɛwolaa ne anyunlu na ɔhanle deɛ mɔɔ yemɔti ɔvale ɔ sa ɔhanle ye, nee ɔ nwo mɔɔ ɛza ɛkɛ ne ala la noko.
42008048	Gyisɛse zele ye kɛ, “Me ra raalɛ, wɔ diedi ɛlie wɔ ngoane; kɔ anzonudwolɛ nu.”
42008049	Gyisɛse anloa wɔ ɛhye azo la, nrenya bie vi nyianu sua ne neavolɛ ne sua nu razele Gyeeyaelɛse kɛ, “Ɛ ra raalɛ ne ɛwu, yemɔti mmagyegye kilehilevolɛ ne.”
42008050	Gyisɛse dele edwɛkɛ ne na ɔzele Gyeeyaelɛse kɛ, “Mmasulo, wɔmɔ die di ala na ɔbade kpɔkɛ.”
42008051	Mɔɔ Gyisɛse dwule sua nu ɛkɛ ne la, yeamaa awie biala adenle yeamaa yeanwolo ɛkɛ ne kɛ Pita, Dwɔn nee Gyemise, yɛɛ kakula ne ɔ ze nee ɔ nli ala.
42008052	Ɛnee awie biala mɔɔ wɔ sua nu ɛkɛ ne la ɛlɛsu aye awolɛ wɔ kakula ne mɔɔ ɛwu la ati. Na Gyisɛse zele bɛ kɛ, “Bɛmmasu na kakula ne ɛtɛwule; ɔlɛdafe ala!”
42008053	Bɛ muala bɛzelele ye, ɔboalekɛ bɛze kɛ kakula ne ɛwu.
42008054	Na Gyisɛse zɔle kakula ne asa na ɔzele kɛ, “Kakula raalɛ, dwazo!”
42008055	Ɛkɛ ne ala ɛnwomenle ziale rale kakula ne nu bieko na ɔdwazole. Gyisɛse manle bɛmanle ye debie ɔlile.
42008056	Na ɔyɛle kakula ne awovolɛ ne azibɛnwo. Na ɔduale bɛ kɛ mɔɔ ɛzi la, bɛmmabɔ zolɛ bɛkile awie biala.
42009001	Mekɛ guale nu ekyii la, Gyisɛse vɛlɛle ɛdoavolɛma bulu nee nwiɔ ne na ɔmanle bɛ tumi kɛ bɛva bɛdu sunsum ɛtane ne mɔ na bɛyɛ ewule ngakyile ayile.
42009002	Akee ɔzoanle bɛ kɛ bɛhɔbɔ Nyamenle Belemgbunlililɛ ne nolo na bɛyɛ wuleravolɛma ayile;
42009003	na ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Wɔ bɛ adendulɛ ne anu bɛmmafa debie biala mɔɔ le kɛ kpɔma anzɛɛ kodoku, aleɛ anzɛɛ ezukoa, yɛɛ bɛmmafa tɛladeɛ bieko bɛboka mɔɔ bɛwula la anwo.
42009004	Awuke biala mɔɔ bɛkɛlie bɛ nu la, bɛdɛnla ɛkɛ ne kɔkpula mekɛ mɔɔ bɛkɛvi sua ne azo la,
42009005	na ɛleka biala mɔɔ menli ne anlie bɛ la, bɛvi sua ne azo bɛhɔ na bɛkpokpo bɛ gyakɛ abo anwea ne bɛgua zolɛ bɛmaa ɔyɛ daselɛ ɔtia bɛ.”
42009006	Ɛdoavolɛma ne hɔle na bɛhɔkpɔsɛkpɔsale namunamu ne mɔ amuala azo, bɛbɔle Edwɛkpa ne nolo na bɛyɛle menli ayile.
42009007	Hɛlɔdo mɔɔ ɛnee le Galeli maanzinli zo neavolɛ la dele mɔɔ ɛlɛkɔ zolɛ la amuala, na ye adwenle zɛkyele. Ɔluakɛ ɛnee bie mɔ ɛlɛka kɛ, Dwɔn Sɔnevolɛ ne ɛzia ɛra ngoane nu.
42009008	Bie mɔ noko se Yilaegya ɛye ɔ nwo ɛhile, yɛɛ bie mɔ eza se mɔmoane Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛma ne mɔ anu ko a ɛra ngoane nu bieko la.
42009009	Hɛlɔdo zele kɛ, “Memanle bɛpɛle Dwɔn ati, na nwane noko a le ɛhye mɔɔ bɛlɛka ye edwɛkɛ la?” Na ɔbɔle mɔdenle kɛ ɔkɛnwu Gyisɛse.
42009010	Ɛdoavolɛma ne ziale rale rahanle mɔɔ bɛyɛle la amuala bɛhilele Gyisɛse. Na ɔvale bɛ ɔ nee bɛ hɔle sua bie mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye Bɛteseeyeda la azo.
42009011	Mɔɔ menli ne mɔ dele la, bɛdoale ye wɔ lɔ. Na ɔliele bɛ, ɔhanle Nyamenle Belemgbunlililɛ ne anwo edwɛkɛ ɔhilele bɛ, na ɔyɛle bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnde kpɔkɛ la ayile.
42009012	Mɔɔ sɛnzɛne ne ɛlɛkɔ ahɔdɔ la, ɛdoavolɛma bulu nee nwiɔ ne rahanle hilele Gyisɛse kɛ, “Maa menli ye adenle maa bɛhɔ namunamu ne mɔ mɔɔ bikye ɛke la azo kɛ bɛkɛnyia dabelɛ nee aleɛ, ɔluakɛ kpɔkɛ ye anu ɛhwee ɛnle ɛke.”
42009013	Gyisɛse buale bɛ kɛ, “Bɛdabɛ bɛmaa bɛ debie bɛli.” Bɛbuale ye kɛ, “Yɛlɛ kpanwo ahunguma nnu nee fɛlɛ nwiɔ ala. Ɛkpondɛ kɛ yɛkɔtɔ aleɛ yɛmaa menli ɛwolaa ɛhye ɔ?”
42009014	Menli ne, saa ɛye ngakula nee mraalɛ nu a bɛkɛyɛ apenle nnu. Gyisɛse zele bɛ kɛ, “Bɛmaa menli ne ɛdɛnlɛdɛnla aze ekpunli ekpunli, ekpunli ko biala anu amra ɛyɛ abulanlu.”
42009015	Ɛdoavolɛma ne yɛle ye zɔhane na bɛmanle bɛ muala bɛdɛnlanle aze.
42009016	Gyisɛse vale kpanwo nnu ne nee fɛlɛ nwiɔ ne, ɔnleanle anwuma, ɔyɛle Nyamenle mo, ɔbubule nuhua, ɔvale ɔmanle ye ɛdoavolɛma ne kɛ bɛhyɛ bɛmaa menli ne mɔ.
42009017	Bɛ muala bɛlile debie bɛ ko yile, na bɛsesale ɔ bo zo ne ahɛndɛne bulu nee nwiɔ.
42009018	Kenle ko bie mɔɔ ɛnee Gyisɛse angome a ɛlɛyɛ nzɛlɛlɛ la, ye ɛdoavolɛma ne rale ɔ nwo ɛkɛ ne, na ɔbizale bɛ kɛ, “Menli se mame a le nwane?”
42009019	Bɛbuale ye kɛ, “Bie mɔ se wɔmɔ a le Dwɔn Sɔnevolɛ ne, bie mɔ noko se wɔmɔ a le Yilaegya, yɛɛ bie mɔ se mɔmoane Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛma ne mɔ anu ko a ɛzia ɛra ngoane nu a.”
42009020	Na ɔbizale bɛ kɛ, “Na bɛdabɛ noko ɛ? Bɛse mame a le nwane?” Pita buale kɛ, “Wɔmɔ a ɛle Nyamenle Mɛzaya ne!”
42009021	Na Gyisɛse duale bɛ kɛ bɛmmaka ɛhye bɛkile awie biala.
42009022	Akee Gyisɛse zele bɛ kɛ, “Medame Sonla Ra, ɔwɔ kɛ menwu amaneɛ somaa na mgbanyima ne, sɛlɛvolɛ mgbanyinli ne, yɛɛ mɛla kilehilevolɛma ne mɔ kpo me. Bɛbahu me, na ye kenle nsa ne anzi Nyamenle badwazo me ara ngoane nu.”
42009023	Na ɔhanle ɔhilele bɛ muala kɛ, “Saa awie kpondɛ kɛ ɔ nee me dua a, ɛnee ɔkpo ɔ nwo, ɔva ye (amaneɛnwunlɛ) meanubaka ne ɔdo ɔ kɔme zo kenle biala, na ɔdoa me.
42009024	Ɔluakɛ awie biala mɔɔ pele ye ngoane nwo la minli ye, na awie biala mɔɔ kɛminli ye ngoane wɔ me ti la kɛlie ye ɛkɛla ngoane.
42009025	Saa sonla nyia ewiade ninyɛne muala na ɔminli ɔdaye mumua ne ɔ nwo anzɛɛ bɛko bɛfa ye a, ɛnee duzu nvasoɛ a ɔnyia ye a? Ɔnnyia ɛhwee!
42009026	Awie biala mɔɔ me nwo nee me ngilehilelɛ ne kɛyɛ ye nyiane wɔ ɛtane ewiade ye anu la, ɔdaye noko ɔ nwo bayɛ medame Sonla Ra nyiane wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ menwɔra anyunlunyia nee Selɛ ne nee Anwuma soanvolɛma nwuanzanwuanza ne anyunlunyia nu la.
42009027	Bɛhakye ɛhye! Bie mɔ wɔ ɛke mɔɔ bɛnrɛwu kɔkpula kɛ bɛkɛnwu kɛ Nyamenle belemgbunlililɛ ne ɛra la.”
42009028	Ɔhanle ɛhye mɔ ɔwiele na ye kenle mɔtwɛ ne anzi, Gyisɛse vale Pita, Dwɔn, yɛɛ Gyemise na ɔ nee bɛ hɔle boka bie azo kɛ ɔkazɛlɛ.
42009029	Mɔɔ ɔwɔ zo ɔlɛsɛlɛ la, ɔ nyunlu hakyile, na ye tɛladeɛ ne mɔɔ ɔwula la yɛle fufule nwohyee mɔɔ wowɔ ɛnyelɛ zo a.
42009030	Na nea, menli nwiɔ nee ye dendɛle, bɛmɛ a le Mosisi nee Yilaegya.
42009031	Bɛyele bɛ nwo bɛhilele wɔ anwuma anyunlunyia nu, na bɛ nee Gyisɛse hanle Nyamenle ngyehyɛlɛ ne mɔɔ fane Gyisɛse ewule mɔɔ ɔbawu Gyɛlusalɛm la anwo edwɛkɛ.
42009032	Mekɛ ne anu ɛnee Pita nee bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛwɔ ɔ nwo ɛkɛ ne la ɛlafe. Bɛdunwuele la bɛnwunle Gyisɛse anyunlunyia ne nee menli nwiɔ ne mɔɔ nee ye gyi ɛkɛ ne la.
42009033	Mɔɔ menli nwiɔ ne kpondɛ avi Gyisɛse anwo ɛkɛ ne ahɔ la, Pita zele Gyisɛse kɛ, “Yɛmenle, ɔle kpalɛ kɛ yɛwɔ ɛke a. Maa yɛbɔ nzeseɛ nsa, wɔ ɛdeɛ ko, Mosisi ɛdeɛ ko yɛɛ Yilaegya ɛdeɛ ko.” (Ɛnee Pita ɛnze edwɛkɛ mɔɔ ɔdaye mumua ne ɔlɛka la.)
42009034	Mɔɔ Pita anloa wɔ zolɛ ɔlɛtendɛ la, amungu rahedale bɛ nwo zo, na ɛzulolɛ hanle bɛ.
42009035	Ɛnelɛ bie vi amungu ne anu zele kɛ, “Me Ra mɔɔ mekpa nu meye ye la ɛne, bɛdie ye!”
42009036	Ɛnelɛ ne dendɛle wiele la, ɔhale Gyisɛse angome. Ɛdoavolɛma ne hanle bɛ nloa dole nu, na bɛanga mɔɔ bɛnwunle ye la anwo bie bɛangile awie biala wɔ mekɛ ne anu.
42009037	Aleɛ hyenle la Gyisɛse nee ɛdoavolɛma nsa ne vi boka ne azo tolole rale, na menli dɔɔnwo kpalɛ rayiale ye.
42009038	Nrenya bie vi menli ne anu deanle nu kɛ, “Kilehilevolɛ, mesɛlɛ wɔ, nea me ra nrenya ye maa me, me ra ala ɛne.
42009039	Sunsum ɛtane bie bawolo ye maa ɔteɛdea nu, ɔpɛ ɔfi, na ɔ nloa wu awubue, yɛɛ kɛ ɔgyi ɔ nwo ɔbodɛboda ye ala ɛne. Ɔngyakyi ye fee zɛhae.
42009040	Membodole wɔ ɛdoavolɛma ne mɔ kɛ bɛdu ye wɔ ɔ nwo bɛmaa me, noko bɛangola.”
42009041	Gyisɛse buale kɛ, “Bɛmɛ mɔɔ bɛnlɛ diedi na ɛvonlɛ ala a bɛfo a! Me nee bɛ ɛdɛnla ɔhɔkpula kenlenzu? Menyia bɛ nwo abotane ɔhɔkpula kenlenzu?” Na ɔzele nrenya ne kɛ, “Fa ɛ ra ne bɛla ɛke.”
42009042	Mɔɔ kakula ne ɛlɛba la, sunsum ɛtane ne manle ɔpɛle ɔfinle na ye mgbutike ne rale. Gyisɛse deanle sunsum ɛtane ne nu, ɔdule ye, ɔyɛle kakula ne ayile, na ɔvale ye ɔmanle ɔ ze.
42009043	Na Nyamenle tumi kpole ne yɛle menli dɔɔnwo ne amuala azibɛnwo. Mɔɔ ɛnee menli ne anye ɛha Gyisɛse anwo wɔ ye nwanwane ninyɛne mɔɔ ɔlɛyɛ la anwo la, ɔzele ye ɛdoavolɛma ne kɛ,
42009044	“Bɛmaa ɛhye ɛhɔ bɛ nzo nu! Bɛbaye medame Sonla Ra bɛawula menli sa nu.”
42009045	Na ɛdoavolɛma ne ande ɛhye abo. Bɛvale bɛveale bɛ, yemɔti bɛande ɔ bo, eza bɛzulole kɛ bɛkɛbiza ye mɔɔ ɔhanle la anwo bie.
42009046	Kpolerazulɛ radɔle ɛdoavolɛma ne avinli kɛ bɛkpondɛ kɛ bɛnwu bɛ nuhua ko mɔɔ le sonlakpole kpalɛ a.
42009047	Gyisɛse nwunle mɔɔ bɛlɛdwenledwenle nwolɛ la, yemɔti ɔzɔle kakula ko ɔziele ɔ nwo ɛkɛ ne,
42009048	na ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Awie biala mɔɔ kɛlie kakula ɛhye wɔ me duma nu la, ɛlie medame; yɛɛ awie biala mɔɔ kɛlie me la, ɛlie ahenle mɔɔ zoanle me la noko. Ɔluakɛ mɔɔ le bɛ nuhua ekyi la a le sonlakpole kpalɛ wɔ bɛ avinli a.”
42009049	Ɛdoavolɛma ne ko mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye Dwɔn la hanle hilele Gyisɛse kɛ, “Yɛmenle, yɛnwunle nrenya bie kɛ ɔlɛ wɔ duma ɔlɛtu mbɔnsam na yɛduale ye, ɔluakɛ ɔmboka yɛ nwo.”
42009050	Gyisɛse zele ye nee ɛdoavolɛma ne amuala kɛ, “Bɛmmatua ye, ɔluakɛ sonla mɔɔ ɛngyi bɛ la wɔ bɛ afoa.”
42009051	Mɔɔ ɛnee mekɛ asɛɛ ɛdwu kɛ Nyamenle fa Gyisɛse kɔ anwuma la, Gyisɛse zile ye ahonle kɛ akee ɔkɔ Gyɛlusalɛm.
42009052	Yemɔti ɔzoanle menli ɔmanle bɛlumuale ɔ nyunlu wɔ Samɛlea sua bie azo kɛ bɛhɔziezie ɛkɛ ne bɛmaa ye.
42009053	Na menli ne anlie ye, ɔluakɛ ɛnee yela ali wienyi kɛ ɔkɔ Gyɛlusalɛm.
42009054	Mɔɔ ye ɛdoavolɛma, Gyemise nee Dwɔn, nwunle ɛhye la bɛzele kɛ, “Awulae, ɛkulo kɛ yɛka yɛmaa senle vi anwuma bayela bɛ ɔ?”
42009055	Gyisɛse hakyile ɔ nwo na ɔhwile bɛ nyunlu [na ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Bɛnze sunsum holɛ ko mɔɔ bɛle ye ɛdeɛ la, ɔluakɛ Medame Sonla Ra, meamba kɛ mebazɛkye menli ngoane, membale kɛ mebalie bɛ ngoane.”]
42009056	Na Gyisɛse nee ye ɛdoavolɛma ne hɔle sua fofolɛ zo.
42009057	Mɔɔ bɛlua adenle zo bɛlɛkɔ la, nrenya bie zele Gyisɛse kɛ, “Ɛleka biala mɔɔ ɛkɔ la me nee wɔ bahɔ.”
42009058	Gyisɛse zele ye kɛ, “Ɛzonlɛ lɛ bɛ mbɔne, yɛɛ nloma lɛ bɛ sane, na mame Sonla Ra, menlɛ ɛleka mɔɔ meto me ti a.”
42009059	Ɔzele awie ko noko kɛ, “Bɛla maa yɛhɔ.” Na sonla zɔhane zele ye kɛ, “Yɛmenle, maa menlumua mengɔnzie egya kolaa na meara.”
42009060	Gyisɛse buale ye kɛ, “Gyakyi menli mɔɔ ɛnde Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne abo la ati, bɛle kɛ avunli la maa bɛzie bɛ avunli. Wɔmɔ kɔ na kɔbɔ Nyamenle Belemgbunlililɛ ne nolo.”
42009061	Awie ko noko hanle hilele Gyisɛse kɛ, “Yɛmenle, mekulo kɛ me nee wɔ kɔ; noko maa menlumua mengɔngɛla me sua nu amra.”
42009062	Gyisɛse zele ye kɛ, “Awie biala mɔɔ kɛzɔ koanlɛ nu wɔ ye ɛya nu na ɔkɛtoto ɔ nye ɔ nzi la ɛnfɛta Nyamenle Belemgbunlililɛ ne.”
42010001	Nzinlii Awulae yele menli abulasuu nee nwiɔ noko na ɔzoanle bɛ nwiɔ nwiɔ ɔmanle bɛlumuale bɛhɔle sua biala azo nee ɛleka biala mɔɔ ɔdaye ɔbahɔ la.
42010002	Ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Bɛyɔba ne ɛra dɔɔnwo, na gyimayɛvoma mɔɔ bu la le ekyi. Zɔhane ati bɛzɛlɛ kɛ egyinli menle ne kɛnyia gyimayɛvoma dɔɔnwo kɛmaa bɛkɛhɔbu bɛyɔba ne.
42010003	Bɛhɔ! Melɛsoa bɛ kɛ mboane mralɛ wɔ menli mɔɔ le kɛ bedi la avinli.
42010004	Bɛmmafa kodoku, yɛɛ bɛmmafa mgbɔlaboa; bɛmmagyinla bɛbiza awie biala ahye wɔ adenle nu.
42010005	Awuke biala mɔɔ bɛkɛwolo nu la, bɛlumua bɛze kɛ, ‘Nyamenle anzonudwolɛ ɛha awuke ye anu amra.’
42010006	Saa awie mɔɔ kpondɛ anzonudwolɛ la bie wɔ awuke ne anu a bɛ anzonudwolɛ ne nee ye badɛnla. Na saa bie ɛnle ɛkɛ ne a bɛ anzonudwolɛ ne bazia ara bɛ nwo.
42010007	Bɛmmadi tutɛnla. Bɛdɛnla awuke mɔɔ bɛkɛwolo nu na bɛkɛlie bɛ la anu ala, yɛɛ mɔɔ awuke ne anu amra kɛnyia ye kɛmaa bɛ la, bɛli na bɛnlo, ɔboalekɛ ɔwɔ kɛ gyimayɛvo biala nyia ye gyima nwo ahatualɛ.
42010008	Sua biala mɔɔ bɛkɛhɔ zo na bɛkɛlie bɛ la, debie biala mɔɔ menli ne kɛva kɛmaa bɛ la bɛli,
42010009	bɛyɛ wuleravolɛma mɔɔ wɔ sua ne azo la ayile, na bɛze menli mɔɔ wɔ ɛkɛ ne la kɛ, ‘Nyamenle Belemgbunlililɛ ne ɛbikye bɛ.’
42010010	Sua biala noko mɔɔ bɛkɛhɔ zo na bɛanlie bɛ la, bɛhɔ ye awɔdenle ne mɔ azo na bɛha kɛ,
42010011	‘Munzule ɛha bɛ; bɛ sua ye azo anwea bɔbɔ mɔɔ wɔ yɛ gyakɛ abo la yɛkpokpo yɛagua bɛ ti zo; noko bɛhakye kɛ Nyamenle Belemgbunlililɛ ne ɛbikye bɛ.’
42010012	Na meka meahile bɛ: Ndɛnebualɛ Kenle ne Nyamenle baze Sodɔmma amumuyɛ anwunvɔne dɔɔnwo adɛla sua zɔhane azo amra.
42010013	“Munzule ɛha bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛwɔ Koleezen la! Munzule ɛha bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛwɔ Bɛteseeyeda la! Ɔluakɛ nwanwane ninyɛne mgbole mɔɔ bɛyɛle wɔ bɛ azua ne mɔ azo la saa bɛyɛle bie wɔ Taya nee Saedɛn a, anrɛɛ menli ne dɛnlanle aze, hedale ɛrele na bɛbɔle nzonle bɛhilele kɛ bɛnlu bɛ nwo wɔ bɛ ɛtane nwo.
42010014	Yemɔti Ndɛnebualɛ Kenle ne Nyamenle baze Tayama nee Saedɛnema anwunvɔne dɔɔnwo adɛla bɛ.
42010015	Na bɛmɛ Kapɛnayɛmma! Bɛkpondɛ kɛ bɛmaa bɛ zo anwuma ɔ? Kyɛkyɛ, bɛbavuandi bɛ bɛagua Ɛbolɔ senle nu.”
42010016	Gyisɛse zele ye ɛdoavolɛma ne kɛ, “Sonla mɔɔ kɛdie bɛ la ɛdie me; sonla mɔɔ andie bɛ la andie me, yɛɛ mɔɔ andie me la andie ahenle mɔɔ zoanle me la.”
42010017	Abulasuu nee nwiɔ ne vale fɛlɛkolilɛ ziale rahanle hilele Gyisɛse kɛ, “Awulae, saa yɛbɔ wɔ duma yɛtendɛ yɛkile sunsum ɛtane ne mɔ bɔbɔ a bɛbɛlɛ bɛ nwo aze bɛtie yɛ!”
42010018	Gyisɛse buale bɛ kɛ, “Menwunle kɛ Seetan vi anwuma kɛ ɛsɛlɛmanye la ɛrade aze.
42010019	Na bɛdie! Memaa bɛ tumi wɔ Kpɔvolɛ ne anwo zo. Eza memaa bɛ tumi kɛ bɛtietia nwɔlɛ nee nyamenleakɛlɛ nwo zo na debie biala ɛnrɛyɛ bɛ.
42010020	Noko bɛmmadi fɛlɛko kɛ sunsum ɛtane ne mɔ tie bɛ a; bɛli fɛlɛko kɛ bɛhɛlɛ bɛ aluma wɔ anwuma.”
42010021	Mekɛ ne anu Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne manle fɛlɛko yile Gyisɛse ahonle nu tɛkɛɛ na ɔhanle kɛ, “Egya, anwuma nee aze Awulae, meyɛ wɔ mo kɛ ninyɛne ɛhye mɔ mɔɔ wɔva wɔvea nrɛlɛbɛvolɛma nee nwomama la wɔye wɔhile menli mɔɔ ɛnze nwolɛ bie la. Ɛhɛe, Egya, ɛnee kɛ ɛkpondɛ kɛ ɔba ye la ɛne.
42010022	“Egya ɛva ninyɛne kɔsɔɔti ɛwula me sa nu. Awie biala ɛnze Ralɛ ne sonla holɛ kɛ Selɛ ne ala, yɛɛ awie biala ɛnze Selɛ ne sonla holɛ kɛ Ralɛ ne nee bɛdabɛ mɔɔ Ralɛ ne kulo kɛ ɔye ye ɔkile bɛ la ala.”
42010023	Akee Gyisɛse hakyile ɔ nwo wɔ ye ɛdoavolɛma ne anwo na ɔhanle ye ahane ɔhilele bɛ kɛ, “Bɛ nwo ɛyɛ moavolɛ kɛ bɛmɛ bɛnwu ninyɛne mɔɔ bɛnwu bɛ kɛkala la!
42010024	Meka meahile bɛ kɛ Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛma nee arelemgbunli dɔɔnwo hulole kɛ anrɛɛ bɛkɛnwu mɔɔ bɛmɛ bɛnwu ye la, noko bɛannwu ye, anzɛɛ bɛkɛde mɔɔ bɛde la, noko bɛande.”
42010025	Mɛla kilehilevolɛ bie rale kɛ ɔbazɔ Gyisɛse yeanlea, na ɔbizale ye kɛ, “Kilehilevolɛ, duzu a menyɛ na meanyia ngoane mɔɔ ɛnlɛ awieleɛ a?”
42010026	Gyisɛse buale kɛ, “Duzu a bɛhɛlɛ ye wɔ mɛla ne anu a? Kɛ ɛsi ɛkile ɔ bo ɛ?”
42010027	Nrenya ne buale kɛ “Mɛla ne se, ‘Fa wɔ ahonle muala, wɔ ɛkɛla muala, wɔ anwosesebɛ muala, yɛɛ wɔ adwenle muala kulo Awulae wɔ Nyamenle ne’; na akee ‘Kulo ɛ gɔnwo kɛ ɛdawɔ ɛ nwo.’ ”
42010028	Gyisɛse zele ye kɛ, “Wɔbua ye boɛ; yɛ ye zɔhane ala na ɛkɛnyia ngoane mɔɔ ɛnlɛ awieleɛ.”
42010029	Na kɛmɔ mɛla kilehilevolɛ ne kpondɛ kɛ ɔbua ɔ nwo benle la ati, ɔbizale Gyisɛse kɛ, “Na me gɔnwo a le nwane?”
42010030	Gyisɛse buale ye kɛ, “Nrenya bie vi Gyɛlusalɛm ɛlɛtolo ahɔ Gyɛleko na ɔhɔdɔle nwule avinli. Bɛkpokpole ye, na bɛbole ye bɛmanle asɛɛ ɔwule bɔkɔɔ, na bɛgyakyile ye ɛkɛ ne bɛhɔle.
42010031	Na ɔrale kɛ sɛlɛvolɛ bie vale adenle ne azo, na mɔɔ ɔnwunle ye la, ɔbule ahane ɔhɔle.
42010032	Zɔhane ala yɛɛ nrenya bie mɔɔ vi Livae abusua ne anu la ɔdaye ɔvale adenle ne azo a, na ɔhɔvindele nrenya ne mɔɔ bɛbodɛboda ye la anwo zo. Ɔdaye noko ɔdole ɔ nye ɔnleanle ye na ɔbule foa ko ɔhɔle.
42010033	Akee Samɛleanli bie ɔdaye ɔvale adenle ne azo na ɔradole ye. Mɔɔ ɔnwunle ye la, alɔbɔlɛ hunle ye.
42010034	Ɔhɔle ɔ nwo ɛkɛ ne, ɔvale nwanye ɔnrinzinle ye nganlɛ ne mɔ anyunlu, ɔtotole nwole nu na ɔkyekyele; akee ɔvale ye ɔdɛnlanle ɔdaye ye ɛkpɔnwɔ ne azo na ɔ nee ye hɔle nyɛvolɛ sua bie anu na ɔnleanle ye gyɛlɛɛnye.
42010035	Aleɛ hyenle la ɔyele dwɛtɛ fufule nwiɔ ɔmanle nyɛvolɛ sua menle ne na ɔzele ye kɛ, ‘Nea ye gyɛlɛɛnye maa me, na kakɛ biala mɔɔ ɛkɛbɔ ye wɔ dwɛtɛ ɛhye anzi la, saa mesia meba a, mebadua meamaa wɔ.’ ” nwunle ye la... (10.33) [AV-95c]
42010036	Akee Gyisɛse dwulale ye edwɛkɛ ne kɛ, “Ɛnee menli nsa ye, ɛdawɔ ɛnea a bɛ nuhua boni a yɛle agɔnwolɛ manle nrenya ne mɔɔ dɔle nwule avinli la?”
42010037	Mɛla kilehilevolɛ ne buale kɛ, “Sonla ne mɔɔ hilele ahunlunyele manle ye la ɔ.” Gyisɛse zele kɛ, “Ɛdawɔ noko kɔ na kɔyɛ zɔhane ala.”
42010038	Gyisɛse nee ye ɛdoavolɛma ne tu adenle la, bɛrale namule bie azo, na raalɛ bie mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye Maata la liele ye hɔle ye sua nu.
42010039	Maata lɛ ɔ diema raalɛ ko, bɛfɛlɛ ye Mɛle. Mɛle dɛnlanle Awulae agyakɛ abo ɛkɛ ne na ɔdiele ye ngilehilelɛ ne.
42010040	Gyima ne mɔɔ ɛnee Maata angome gyi nwo la somaa ti, ɔmanle ye adwenle bɔle nu. Yemɔti ɔhɔle Gyisɛse anwo ɛkɛ ne na ɔhanle ɔhilele ye kɛ, “Awulae, wɔnwu kɛ me diema raalɛ ye ɛgyakyi gyima ye ɛkpolo me ngome la? Ka kile ye maa ɔrazɔ me nu.”
42010041	Awulae buale ye kɛ, “Maata, Maata! Ninyɛne dɔɔnwo gyegye wɔ sɛkye wɔ adwenle.
42010042	Debie ko ala a hyia a, na Mɛle ɛkpa nu ɛva mɔɔ le kpalɛ la, na bɛnrɛlie ye ɔ sa nu ɛlɛ.”
42011001	Kenle ko Gyisɛse hɔle ɛleka bie kɛ ɔkayɛ nzɛlɛlɛ. Ɔwiele la, ye ɛdoavolɛma ne anu ko hanle hilele ye kɛ, “Awulae, kile yɛ kɛ bɛsi bɛyɛ nzɛlɛlɛ la, kɛmɔ Dwɔn hilele ye ɛdoavolɛma ne mɔ la.”
42011002	Gyisɛse zele bɛ kɛ, “Saa bɛyɛ nzɛlɛlɛ a bɛha ɛhye: ‘Egya, Wɔ duma ne anwo ɛde; wɔ belemgbunlililɛ ɛrɛla.
42011003	Maa yɛ kenle biala yɛ dahuu aleɛ.
42011004	Na fa yɛ ɛtane ne mɔ kyɛ yɛ, ɔluakɛ awie mɔɔ fo yɛ la, yɛfa yɛkyɛ ye. Na mmamaa yɛkɔ sɔnea nu.’ ”
42011005	Na Gyisɛse zele ye ɛdoavolɛma ne kɛ, “Saa bɛ nuhua bie lɛ ɔ gɔnwo na ɔkɔ ɔ nwo ɛkɛ ne alevinli mu nwiɔ avinli ɔkɔse ye kɛ, ‘Agɔnwolɛ, fɛne me kpanwo ahunguma nsa,
42011006	ɔluakɛ me gɔnwo bie vi adenle zo ɛra; menlɛ debie biala mɔɔ mefa meamaa ye a’
42011007	na ɔ gɔnwo ne fea ye sua ne anu bua ye kɛ, ‘Mmagyegye me! Bɛdo anlenkɛ ne anu dɛbadɛba, yɛɛ me nee me mra yɛla; menrɛhola dwazo na meamaa wɔ debie biala.’
42011008	Meka meahile bɛ: Saa anrɛɛ ɔnrɛdwazo ɔnrɛmaa wɔ kpanwo ne bie kɛmɔ ɛle agɔnwolɛ la ati bɔbɔ a, saa wɔanze ɛvɛlɛ na ɛkɔ zo ɛbiza ye a, ɔbadwazo yeamaa wɔ debie biala mɔɔ ɛhyia nwolɛ la.
42011009	“Yemɔti meka meahile bɛ: Bɛbiza, na bɛ sa kɛha ye; bɛkpondɛ, na bɛkɛnwu ye; bɛbɔ nu, na bɛkɛbuke anlenkɛ ne bɛkɛmaa bɛ.
42011010	Ɔluakɛ awie biala mɔɔ biza la asa ka ye, mɔɔ kpondɛ la nwu ye, yɛɛ bɛkɛdukue anlenkɛ ne bɛkɛmaa awie biala mɔɔ kɛbɔ nu la.
42011011	Bɛ nuhua boni yɛɛ saa ɔ ra biza ye fɛlɛ a, ɔkɛmaa ye ɛwɔlɛ a?
42011012	Anzɛɛ saa ɔbiza ye kolonvia a, ɔkɛmaa ye nyamenleakɛlɛ a?
42011013	Na saa bɛmɛ bɔbɔ mɔɔ bɛle ɛtanevolɛma la, bɛze kɛ ɔwɔ kɛ bɛfa ninyɛne kpalɛ bɛmaa bɛ mra a, ɛnee fane nyɛ yɛɛ Selɛ ne mɔɔ wɔ anwuma la ɛnrɛva Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne ɛnrɛmaa bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛkɛbiza ye la ɛ?”
42011014	Mekɛ ne anu ɛnee Gyisɛse ɛlɛtu sunsum ɛtane bie mɔɔ le mumule la avi nrenya bie anwo. Ɔdule sunsum ɛtane ne la nrenya ne bɔle ɔ bo kɛ ɔtendɛ, na ɛhye zinle menli ɛwolaa ne anwo kpole,
42011015	na bɛ nuhua bie mɔ zele kɛ, “Ɔdua mbɔnsam kpanyinli ne mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye Biyɛlezɛbɛle la anwo zo a ɔtu mbɔnsam ne mɔ a.”
42011016	Menli ne bie mɔ noko mɔɔ ɛnee kpondɛ kɛ bɛsɔ Gyisɛse bɛnea la hanle kɛ ɔyɛ nwanwane sɛkɛlɛneɛ mɔɔ kile kɛ Nyamenle die ye to nu la ɔhile bɛ.
42011017	Na Gyisɛse nwunle bɛ adwenle, na ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Maanle biala mɔɔ anu kɛhyɛ nwiɔ la bɔ.
42011018	Yemɔti saa Seetan ɔdaye noko ye belemgbunlililɛ ne anu gyigya na bɛko bɛtia bɛ nwo a, ɛnee kɛ ɔkɛyɛ na yeagyinla ɛ? Bɛse medua Biyɛlezɛbɛle anwo zo a metu mbɔnsam a;
42011019	na saa adenle ɛhye azo a medua metu mbɔnsam a, ɛnee bɛmɛ, kɛ bɛ mra si tu bɛ mbɔnsam ɛ? Bɛdabɛ bɛ mra ne mɔ kile kɛ bɛvo!
42011020	Na saa medua Nyamenle tumi ne azo a metu mbɔnsam a, ɛnee ɛhye kile kɛ Nyamenle Belemgbunlililɛ ne ɛdwu bɛ nwo ɛke dɛbadɛba.
42011021	“Saa katakyie siezie ɔ nwo kɛ ɔsinza ye sua a, ɛnee ye ninyɛne mɔɔ ɔlɛ la amuala anwo le kɔlɔnwo.
42011022	Na saa awie mɔɔ anwo yɛ se tɛla ye la ba na ɔ nee ye bɛko na ɔfo ɔ nwo zo a, ɔsesa ye konle ninyɛne ne mɔɔ le ye nzuzuguazo la ɔkɔ na ɔ nee ye ɛlɔnema bɛkyɛ ninyɛne ne mɔɔ ɔwuale la.
42011023	“Awie mɔɔ ɛnle me afoa la tia me, yɛɛ mɔɔ ɛmboa ɛmmaa yɛnguohua la bɔ bɛ asande.”
42011024	Gyisɛse zɔle zolɛ hanle kɛ, “Saa sunsum ɛtane fi sonla nwo tu a, ɔduolua ɛleka reresee kɛ ɔkpondɛ ɛleka yealie ye ɛnwomenle, na saa yeannyia bie a, ɔka ɔkile ɔ nwo kɛ, ‘Mesia meahɔ me sua ne mɔɔ mevi nu menvindele la anu.’
42011025	Ɔsia ɔba na ɔbanwu kɛ bɛkpoɔkpoa nuhua bɛziezie nuhua, noko awie ɛnle nu a,
42011026	akee ɔfinde ɔkɔ na ɔkɔfa sunsum ɛtane nsuu mɔɔ le amumuyɛ tɛla ɔdaye mumua ne la ɔba na bɛbatɛnla ɛkɛ ne, na nzinlii sonla zɔhane gyinlabelɛ sɛkye kpalɛ tɛla alumua ne.”
42011027	Mɔɔ Gyisɛse hanle edwɛkɛ ɛhye la, raalɛ bie manle ɔ ne zo wɔ menli ne anu na ɔhanle kɛ, “Nyilalɛ ɛha raalɛ ne mɔɔ wole wɔ na ɔlile wɔ adane la!”
42011028	Na Gyisɛse buale kɛ, “Bɔbɔ, nyilalɛ ɛha bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛtie Nyamenle edwɛkɛ ne na bɛdi zolɛ la!”
42011029	Akee mɔɔ menli ne rabɔle yiale Gyisɛse la, ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Adwuleso amra ye le ɛtanevolɛma! Bɛkpondɛ nyamenlezo sɛkɛlɛneɛ bɛanlea, na bɛnrɛnyia bie kyesɛ Dwona sɛkɛlɛneɛ ɛdeɛ ne ala.
42011030	Kɛmɔ Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛ Dwona yɛle sɛkɛlɛneɛ manle Nenɛvɛma la, zɔhane ala yɛɛ medame Sonla Ra, mebayɛ sɛkɛlɛneɛ meamaa adwuleso amra noko a.
42011031	Ndɛnebualɛ Kenle ne Hyiba maanle nu Belemgbunli Raalɛ ne badwazo adoɔdoa adwuleso amra, ɔboalekɛ ɔvi ye maanle nu moa moa lɔ ɔdiale asɛɛ azɛlɛ ye foa ko na ɔradiele Sɔlɔmɔn nrɛlɛbɛ ngilehilelɛ ne; noko meka meahile bɛ, awie mɔɔ le kpole tɛla Sɔlɔmɔn la wɔ ɛke.
42011032	Ndɛnebualɛ Kenle ne, Nenɛvɛma badwazo adoɔdoa bɛmɛ adwuleso amra, ɔluakɛ mɔɔ bɛdele kɛ Dwona ɛlɛbɔ Nyamenle edwɛkɛ ne nolo la, bɛnlunle bɛ nwo wɔ bɛ ɛtane nwo; noko meka meahile bɛ, awie mɔɔ le kpole tɛla Dwona la wɔ ɛke!
42011033	“Awie biala ɛnzɔ kɛnlaneɛ na ɔnva bondo ɔmbutu zolɛ; ɔfa ɔsie kɛnlaneɛbaka zo anwuma, amaa bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛba sua ne anu la bɛanwu aze.
42011034	Ɛnyelɛ le sonlabaka ne kɛnlaneɛ. Saa zolɛ te nwaanye a, sonlabaka ne anu le wienyi, yɛɛ saa zolɛ le kisii a, sonlabaka ne anu le awozinli.
42011035	Zɔhane ati bɛnlea boɛ na mɔɔ maa wienyi wɔ bɛ nu la annu, na awozinli anva bɛ.
42011036	Ɔluakɛ saa bɛ sonlabaka ne anu le wienyi, mɔɔ awozinli ɛnle ye kodoka biala anu la a, yɛɛ ɔbada kɛ kɛnlaneɛ la a.”
42011037	Gyisɛse wiele tendɛ la, Falasiima bie dole ɛsalɛ vɛlɛle ye kɛ ɔrɛla ɔmaa bɛkpula bɛ sa. Yemɔti Gyisɛse hɔle na ɔhɔdɛnlanle ɛkponle ne anwo kɛ ɔdi debie.
42011038	Falasiinli ne nwunle kɛ Gyisɛse annrinzi ɔ sa anwo, kɛmɔ bɛ mɛla ne kile la na yeabɔ ɔ bo kɛ ɔdi debie, yemɔti ɔzinle ɔ nwo.
42011039	Na Awulae zele ye kɛ, “Bɛmɛ Falasiima, bɛkpuda bɛ kanrɛlɛ nee bɛ ɛyɛba nwo, noko bɛ ahonle ne mɔ anu, atisesebɛ nee ɛtane ngome ɛyi bɛ tetɛkɛɛ.
42011040	Ahɔnwɔne! Asoo tɛ Nyamenle mɔɔ yɛle nwolɛ ne la a yɛle ɔ kunlu ne noko a?
42011041	Bɛva mɔɔ ɛyi bɛ kanrɛlɛ ne mɔ nee bɛ ɛyɛba ne mɔ la bɛmaa ehyianvolɛma na debie biala anwo kɛde kɛmaa bɛ.
42011042	“Munzule ɛha bɛdabɛ Falasiima, ɔluakɛ bɛmɛ, bɛkyɛ aledonlɛ nya nya evuanlɛ mɔɔ le kɛ kabɛle nee nya nya evuanlɛ mɔɔ ɛha, mɔɔ bɛfa bɛto aleɛ la anu bulu bɛtu ko bɛmaa Nyamenle, na bɛbu bɛ nye bɛgua pɛlepɛlelilɛ nee Nyamenle anwo ɛhulolɛ zo. Ninyɛne nwiɔ ɛhye yɛɛ ɔwɔ kɛ bɛyɛ a, yɛɛ eza ɔnle kɛ bɛbu bɛ nye bɛgua alumua ɛdeɛ ne mɔ azo.
42011043	“Munzule ɛha bɛdabɛ Falasiima! Bɛmɛ, bɛkulo nyianu azua ne mɔ anu mbia ne mɔ mɔɔ wɔ ɔ nyunlu la azo ɛdɛnlanlɛ nee gua zo ahyebizalɛ mɔɔ menli bɔ bɛ ti aze abiza bɛ ahye la.
42011044	Munzule ɛha bɛ, ɔluakɛ bɛle kɛ aziezo sɛka mɔɔ bɛanyɛ ye nzonlɛ la, menli ɛnze la ati bɛtietia zolɛ na bɛmaa evinli ka bɛ.”
42011045	Mɛla kilehilevolɛma ne mɔ anu ko zele ye kɛ, “Kilehilevolɛ, saa ɛka ɛhye a, ɛnee wɔtia yɛ o!”
42011046	Gyisɛse buale kɛ, “Munzule ɛha bɛdabɛ mɛla kilehilevolɛma noko! Bɛmɛ, bɛkyekye adesoa ɛnlomboɛ mɔɔ bɛngola bɛ la bɛsoa menli, noko bɛndenrɛ bɛ sa ɛrɛlɛsɛka ko bɔbɔ bɛnzɔ nu bɛmmaa menli ne ɛnzoa adesoa zɔhane mɔ.
42011047	Munzule ɛha bɛ! Bɛmɛ, bɛyɛ sɛka ngɛnlɛma bɛmaa Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛma ne mɔɔ bɛ nlenya mɔ hunle bɛ la.
42011048	Yemɔti bɛdi daselɛ, yɛɛ bɛ kunlu dwo mɔɔ bɛ nlenya mɔ yɛle la anwo, ɔluakɛ bɛ nlenya mɔ hunle Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛma ne mɔ, yɛɛ bɛmɛ bɛdole bɛ nla ne mɔ.
42011049	Ɛhye ati a Nyamenle Nrɛlɛbɛ ne hanle la, ɔse: ‘Bɛbayɛ Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛma nee bɛdabɛ mɔɔ mebazoa bɛ wɔ bɛ nwo la kpɔdekpɔde na bɛahu bie mɔ.’
42011050	Zɔhane ati bɛbadea adwuleso amra noko wɔ Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛma kɔsɔɔti mɔɔ sumunli kɛ bɛbɔle ewiade la bɛhu bɛ la anwo,
42011051	ɔvi mekɛ mɔɔ bɛhunle Ebulu, bakpula Zɛkalaya, mɔɔ bɛhunle ye wɔ azukponle ne nee Ɛleka Nwuanzanwuanza ne avinli la anwo zo. Ɛhɛe, mese, bɛbadea adwuleso amra wɔ ɛhye mɔ amuala anwo.
42011052	“Munzule ɛha bɛdabɛ mɛla kilehilevolɛma! Bɛmɛ, bɛdo nrɛlɛbɛ sua ne anlenkɛ ne anu, bɛva ye sanvɛ ne bɛvea; bɛmɛ a bɛnrɛwolo nu, yɛɛ bɛnrɛmaa awie noko ɛnrɛwolo nu!”
42011053	Mɔɔ Gyisɛse vile ɛkɛ ne la, mɛla kilehilevolɛma ne nee Falasiima ne mɔ vale edwɛkɛbizalɛ zɔle ye na bɛgyegyele ye dɔɔnwo,
42011054	kɛ saa ɔ nloa kɛhoati a bɛazɔ ye nu.
42012001	Menli dɔɔnwo rabɔle yiale ye, mɔɔ ɛnee akee asɛɛ bɛlɛtietia bɛ nwo zo la, Gyisɛse lumuale dendɛle hilele ye ɛdoavolɛma ne mɔ kɛ, “Bɛnlea bɛ nwo boɛ wɔ Falasiima mgbɔvonle ne anwo, meka bɛ adalɛ nabalaba ngilehilelɛ ne
42012002	Debie biala mɔɔ bɛheda zolɛ la, bɛbadukue zolɛ, yɛɛ debie biala mɔɔ vea la bala ali.
42012003	Yemɔti, edwɛkɛ biala mɔɔ bɛha ye wɔ awozinli nu la, bɛbade ye ewia henlema, yɛɛ edwɛkɛ biala mɔɔ bɛdu ye azukue wɔ sua kunlu la, bɛbabɔ ye nolo wɔ sua ti zo.”
42012004	Akee ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Me gɔnwo mɔ, meka meahile bɛ, bɛmmasulo bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛkola bɛku nwonane ye ala, na bɛngola bɛnzɛkye ɛkɛla ne la.
42012005	Mekile bɛ mɔɔ ɔwɔ kɛ bɛsulo ye la; bɛzulo Nyamenle, yemɔ yɛɛ ɔku sonla a ɔlɛ tumi ɔfuandi ye ɛkɛla ɔto senle ne mɔɔ ɛnnu ɛlɛ la anu a. Nɔhalɛ, meka meahile bɛ kɛ bɛzulo yemɔ.
42012006	“Bɛtɔne nyamenleakatiba nnu ɛkpɔsɛba nwiɔ! Noko Nyamenle anye ɛnvo nuhua ko bɔbɔ ɛlɛ.
42012007	Na bɛmɛ, bɛ ti enrinli bɔbɔ bɛdia ɔ muala. Yemɔti bɛmmasulo, ɔluakɛ bɛmɛ, bɛsonle bolɛ kpole bɛtɛla nyamenleakatiba kpolane!
42012008	“Meka meahile bɛ, awie biala mɔɔ kɛbɔ ye te wɔ bagua nu kɛ ɔle me ɛdeɛ la, medame Sonla Ra, mebayɛ ye zɔhane ala meamaa ye wɔ Nyamenle soanvolɛma anyunlu.
42012009	Zɔhane ala yɛɛ mɔɔ kɛhakyi ɔ nzi kɛzi me wɔ bagua nu la, medame Sonla Ra noko menwɔhakyi me nzi menwɔzi ye wɔ Nyamenle soanvolɛma anyunlu a.
42012010	“Awie biala mɔɔ kɛdendɛ kɛtia Sonla Ra ne la bɛkɛva ye ɛtane bɛkɛhyɛ ye. Na mɔɔ kɛha ɛtane kɛtia Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne la bɛnrɛva bɛnrɛhyɛ ye.
42012011	“Saa bɛfa bɛ bɛkɔ kɛ bɛkali bɛ edwɛkɛ wɔ nyianu azua ne mɔ anu anzɛɛ amɛnladoma nee arelemgbunli nyunlu a, bɛmmadwenle mɔɔ bɛbaha anzɛɛ kɛ ɔkɛyɛ na bɛalie bɛ nwo la anwo.
42012012	Ɔluakɛ mekɛ ne anu, Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne bahilehile bɛ mɔɔ ɔwɔ kɛ bɛka la.”
42012013	Nrenya ko mɔɔ wɔ menli dɔɔnwo ne anu la hanle hilele Gyisɛse kɛ, “Kilehilevolɛ, ka kile me diema ne maa ɔ nee me ɛhyɛ agya ninyɛne ne mɔɔ yɛ ze gyakyile yɛ la.”
42012014	Gyisɛse buale ye kɛ, “Me gɔnwo, nwane a manle me tumi kɛ membua ndɛne anzɛɛ mengyɛ bɛ mu nwiɔ bɛ agya ninyɛne memaa bɛ a?”
42012015	Na ɔzɔle zolɛ ɔzele menli ne amuala kɛ, “Bɛmmayɛ anyebolo wɔ adenle biala anu, ɔboalekɛ sonla ngoane ɛnle ye anwonyia anzɛɛ ye ezukoa kpole mɔɔ ɔlɛ la anu.”
42012016	Na Gyisɛse bule bɛ ɛrɛlɛ ɛhye: “Sukoavolɛ bie woale ɛkɛ mɔɔ ye egyinli nu aleɛ hyenle kpole kpalɛ a.
42012017	Na ɔbɔle ɔ bo ɔdwenlenle nwolɛ kɛ, ‘Menlɛ ɛleka mɔɔ mesie me aleɛ ɛwolaa ɛhye a. Duzu a menyɛ a?’
42012018	Na ɔzele ɔ nwo kɛ, ‘Ɛhye yɛɛ meyɛ a; megolo me bonwolo dɛba ne mɔ na measisi bie mgbole, na meava me aleɛ nee me ninyɛne ne mɔ amuala meagugua zolɛ.
42012019	Na akee meaze me nwo kɛ, Me ɛkɛla, ɛ ti ɛyɛ boɛ! Wɔnyia ninyɛne kpalɛ dɔɔnwo mɔɔ nee wɔ badwu ɛvolɛ dɔɔnwo a. Die wɔ ɛnwomenle, di, no, na die ɛ nye!’
42012020	Na Nyamenle zele ye kɛ, ‘Ɛle kɔnwɔne! Ɛnɛ nɔe ala bɛbaye wɔ ngoane ne bɛavi wɔ nuhua; na nwane a bava ninyɛne ɛhye mɔ amuala mɔɔ wɔva wɔzie wɔmaa ɛ nwo la a?’ ”
42012021	Na Gyisɛse dwulale ye edwɛkɛ ne kɛ, “Kɛ menli mɔɔ kuohua anwonyia maa bɛ nwo na bɛnle sukoavolɛma wɔ Nyamenle anyunlu la de la ɛne.”
42012022	Akee Gyisɛse zele ye ɛdoavolɛma ne kɛ, “Ɛhye ati meka meahile bɛ, bɛmmadwenle aleɛ mɔɔ bɛdi bɛanyia ngoane anzɛɛ ɛdanlɛ mɔɔ bɛkɛheda la anwo.
42012023	Ngoane hyia kpole kpalɛ tɛla aleɛ, yɛɛ sonlabaka hyia kpole kpalɛ tɛla ndanlɛ.
42012024	Bɛnlea ahɔhɔsɛlɛ: bɛnlua yɛɛ bɛmbu; bɛnlɛ bonwolo anzɛɛ ɛleka mɔɔ bɛsie bɛ ninyɛne a; Nyamenle a yɛne bɛ a. Bɛmɛ, bɛsonle bolɛ bɛtɛla nloma!
42012025	Bɛ nuhua boni a saa ɔdwenle dɔɔnwo wɔ ye ngoane nwo a, ɔkɛhola ɔkɛva kenle ekyi bɔbɔ ɔkɛgua ye ngoane mekɛ zo a?
42012026	Na saa nretee ɛhye bɔbɔ bɛngola ye yɛ a, ɛnee duzu ati a bɛdwenle ninyɛne mɔɔ ɛha la anwo ɛ?
42012027	Bɛnlea kɛ ɛhoayelɛ nu aloa si nyi la: bɛnyɛ gyima yɛɛ bɛnnwo ndanlɛ. Noko meka meahile bɛ kɛ Belemgbunli Sɔlɔmɔn, wɔ ye anyunlunyia mekɛ ne amuala anu, yeannyia ndanlɛ mɔɔ le ngɛnlɛma kɛ ndotolo ɛhye mɔ la anu ko bɔbɔ.
42012028	Nyamenle a keda ndile mɔɔ wɔ ɛbɔ nu, mɔɔ ɛnɛ fifi a, ɛhyema ɛnee bɛyela bɛ wɔ fonlomo nu la ndanlɛ a. Ɛnee bɛnea a ɔnrɛhola ɔnrɛheda bɛ ndanlɛ ɔ? Bɛ diedi le ekyi somaa!
42012029	“Yemɔti bɛmmamaa bɛ adwenle sɛkye wɔ mɔɔ bɛkɛli nee mɔɔ bɛkɛnlo la anwo.
42012030	(Ɔluakɛ bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnze Nyamenle la a dwenledwenle ɛhye mɔ anwo a.) Bɛ Ze mɔɔ wɔ anwuma la ze kɛ bɛhyia ɛhye mɔ anwo.
42012031	Zɔhane ati, bɛmaa Nyamenle Belemgbunlililɛ ne ɛhyia bɛ, na ɔdaye noko ɔkɛva ɛhye mɔ ɔkɛmaa bɛ.
42012032	“Me mboane ekpunli ekyi, bɛmmasulo, ɔluakɛ bɛ Ze mɔɔ wɔ anwuma la kulo kɛ bɛnyia Belemgbunlililɛ ne.
42012033	Bɛdɔne mɔɔ bɛlɛ la amuala na bɛva ezukoa ne bɛmaa ehyianvolɛma. Bɛyɛ gya ahodoku mɔɔ ɛnzɛkye ɛlɛ la bɛmaa bɛ nwo, na bɛva bɛ anwonyia bɛzie ɛleka mɔɔ ɔnrɛminli ɛlɛ la, ɔboalekɛ awule asa ɛnrɛha ye, yɛɛ ɛlɛtɛba ɛnrɛhola ɛnrɛzɛkye ye.
42012034	Ɛleka mɔɔ bɛ anwonyia ne wɔ la, ɛkɛ ne yɛɛ bɛ ahonle noko wɔ a.
42012035	“Bɛziezie bɛ nwo bɛmaa debie biala mɔɔ kɛzi bɛ adenle nu la, na bɛmaa bɛ ahɛnlaneɛ ɛda
42012036	kɛ sonvolɛma mɔɔ ɛlɛkendɛ bɛ menle mɔɔ vi atɔfolɛlielɛ bo ɛlɛba la, amaa saa ɔba na ɔbabɔ anlenkɛ ne anu a, bɛadukue ye ndɛndɛ.
42012037	Nyilalɛ ɛha sonvolɛma mɔɔ mekɛ mɔɔ bɛ menle kɛra la ɔkɛrado bɛ kɛ bɛ nye gyi zo na bɛlɛkendɛ ye la. Nɔhalɛ, meka meahile bɛ kɛ ɔkɛmaa bɛkɛdɛnlɛdɛnla aze, ɔkɛkpa ɔkɛgua, na ɔkɛmaa bɛ debie.
42012038	Na saa ɔsia ɔba alevinli mu nwiɔ avinli o, anzɛɛ akɔlɛmɔleɛ o, na ɔbato bɛ zɔhane ala a, bɛ nyilalɛ le kpole.
42012039	Na bɛhakye ɛhye! Saa awuke menle ze mekɛ holɛ ko mɔɔ awule ne kɛva kɛra la a, anrɛɛ ɔnrɛmaa ye adenle ɔnrɛmaa ɔnrɛbu ɔnrɛra ye sua ne anu.
42012040	Zɔhane ala yɛɛ bɛdabɛ noko bɛziezie bɛ nwo a, ɔboalekɛ medame Sonla Ra, mebara bieko wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ bɛ nye ɛnla la.”
42012041	Pita bizale Gyisɛse kɛ, “Awulae, ɛbu ɛrɛlɛ ɛhye wɔamaa yɛdayɛ yɛ ngome anzɛɛ awie biala ɔ?”
42012042	Awulae buale kɛ, “Ɛnee nwane a le sonvolɛ mɔɔ di nɔhalɛ na ɔle nrɛlɛbɛvolɛ la? Yemɔ a le sonla ne mɔɔ ɔ menle kɛyɛ ye kpanyinli wɔ ye awuke ne anu kɛ ɔmaa sonvolɛma mɔɔ ɛha la aleɛ wɔ mekɛ ne anloa la.
42012043	Nyilalɛ ɛha sonvolɛ ne mɔɔ mekɛ mɔɔ ɔ menle kɛra sua nu la ɔkɛrado ye kɛ ɔlɛyɛ ɛhye la.
42012044	Nɔhalɛ, meka meahile bɛ kɛ, ɔ menle ne kɛmaa ɔkɛnlea ye ninyɛne kpokpoti azo.
42012045	Na saa sonvolɛ zɔhane ka kɛ, ‘Me menle bahyɛ na yeara,’ na ɔbɔ ɔ bo kɛ ɔbo sonvolɛma mɔɔ ɛha la, mrenya nee mraalɛ, na ɔdi, ɔno na ɔbo a,
42012046	ɔ menle ne bara wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ ɔnze na ɔ nye ɛnla la. Na ɔ menle ne kɛye ye ali kɛmaa ɔkɛhɔboka anzosesebɛma anwo.
42012047	“Sonvolɛ mɔɔ ze deɛ mɔɔ ɔ menle kpondɛ kɛ ɔyɛ, noko ɔnziezie ɔ nwo kɛ ɔyɛ mɔɔ ɔ menle kpondɛ la, bɛkɛbila ye empele kpalɛ kpalɛ.
42012048	Na sonvolɛ mɔɔ ɛnze mɔɔ ɔ menle kpondɛ, na ɔyɛ debie mɔɔ ɔwɔ kɛ bɛbila ye empele a, yemɔ bɛkɛbila ye ekyii bie ala. Sonla mɔɔ bɛkɛmaa ye ninyɛne dɔɔnwo la, bɛkɛlie ninyɛne dɔɔnwo wɔ ye ɛkɛ ne, yɛɛ mɔɔ bɛkɛva dɔɔnwo kpalɛ bɛkɛwula ɔ sa nu la, bɛkɛbiza ye bɛkɛlie dɔɔnwo kpalɛ bɛkɛvi ye ɛkɛ.
42012049	“Membale kɛ mebado senle wɔ azɛlɛ ye azo, yɛɛ me kunlu a anrɛɛ yezɔ dɛbadɛba.
42012050	Noko akee ɔwɔ kɛ mesɔ amaneɛnwunlɛ sa, na saa ɛhye ɛtɛsenle a me ti akunlu ɛtɛgyale!
42012051	Bɛdwenle kɛ menvale anzonudwolɛ membale ewiade ɔ? Meka meahile bɛ, tɛ anzonudwolɛ ɔ, na mgbakyemgbakye ɔ.
42012052	Ɔvi ɛnɛ mɔɔ kɔ la abusua ko mɔɔ menli nnu a wɔ nu la anu babu nwiɔ, na nwiɔ ne atia nsa ne.
42012053	Selɛma batia bɛ mra mrenya, yɛɛ mralɛ mrenya batia bɛ ze mɔ; ninlima batia bɛ mra mraalɛ, yɛɛ mralɛ mraalɛ batia bɛ nli mɔ; azebɛla batia ahileni na ahileni atia azebɛla.”
42012054	Gyisɛse eza zele menli ne kɛ, “Saa bɛnwu kɛ maanle nu ɛmunla sɛnzɛne adɔleɛ na ɔlɛfo yeara a, ɛnee bɛse, ‘Ezule badɔ’, na ɔyɛ zɔhane.
42012055	Mekɛ mɔɔ nyiakɛ anwoma ne kɛze kɛ ɔbɔ noko la, ɛnee bɛse, ‘Wuluwulu bara’, na ɔyɛ zɔhane.
42012056	Adalɛ nabalabama! Bɛkola bɛnwu azɛlɛ ye azo nee anwomanyunlu sɛkɛlɛneɛ ne mɔ abo bɛkile, na kɛmɔti a bɛngola bɛngile mekɛ ɛhye mɔɔ yɛwɔ nu la abo ɛ?
42012057	“Kɛmɔti a bɛdabɛ bɛ ngome bɛngola bɛmbua bɛ nwo ndɛne fɔɔnwo ɛ?
42012058	Saa sonla nee wɔ lɛ edwɛkɛ na ɔfa wɔ ɔkɔ suakunlu a, bɔ mɔdenle kɛ mɔɔ bɛtɛnyianle bɛtɛkɔle edwɛkɛ ne azo la, ɛ nee ye bɛkɛziezie edwɛkɛ ne wɔ adenle nu kolaa na bɛadwu lɔ, amaa yeanva wɔ yeangɔmaa ndɛnebuavolɛ ne, na ndɛnebuavolɛ ne aye wɔ awula kpolisima asa anu, na kpolisima ahɔdo wɔ efiade.
42012059	Na meka meahile bɛ, anrɛɛ bɛnrɛvi nu ɛlɛ, kyesɛ bɛtua bɛ kakɛ ne mɔɔ ndɛnebuavolɛ ne bule dole bɛ nwo zo la amuala mɔɔ ɛkpɔsɛba bɔbɔ ɛnga nu a.”
42013001	Mekɛ ne anu menli bie rahanle Galelima bie mɔɔ Paelɛte ɛmaa bɛhu bɛ wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ ɛnee bɛlɛbɔ azu bɛamaa Nyamenle la anwo edwɛkɛ hilele Gyisɛse.
42013002	Gyisɛse buale bɛ kɛ, “Kɛmɔ bɛhunle Galelima zɔhane mɔ wɔ adenle zɔhane anu la, ɛnee bɛdabɛ bɛnea a ɔkile kɛ bɛle ɛtanevolɛma kpole bɛtɛla Galelima mɔɔ ɛha la amuala ɔ?
42013003	Ɔnle zɔhane. Meka meahile bɛ, saa bɛdabɛ noko bɛanzia bɛanvi bɛ ɛtane ne mɔ anwo a, bɛ muala bɛbawu kɛ menli zɔhane mɔ ala la.
42013004	Na menli bulu nee mɔtwɛ ne mɔɔ sua tendenle ne bule guale bɛ nwo zo hunle bɛ wɔ Saelowam la noko ɛ? Bɛdabɛ bɛnea a, ɛnee ɛhye kile kɛ menli zɔhane mɔ le ɛtanevolɛma kpole tɛla menli mɔɔ wɔ Gyɛlusalɛm la ɔ?
42013005	Ɔnle zɔhane. Na meka meahile bɛ, saa bɛdabɛ noko bɛanzia bɛanvi bɛ ɛtane ne mɔ anwo a, bɛ muala bɛbawu kɛ menli zɔhane mɔ ala la.”
42013006	Akee Gyisɛse bule bɛ ɛrɛlɛ ɛhye. Ɔse, “Ɛnee nrenya bie lɛ feege baka wɔ ye vanye tola bie anu. Na ɔhɔle kɛ ɔkakpondɛ ma wɔ zolɛ na yeannyia bie.
42013007	Yemɔti ɔzele ye tola ne azo neavolɛ ne kɛ, ‘Nea, mekpɔla feege baka ye azo ɛvolɛ nsa kɛ mekpondɛ ma wɔ zolɛ na mennyia bie. Pɛ ye to aze! Ɔnle kɛ ɔgyinla ɛkɛ ne ɔsɛkye azɛlɛ ne mgbane!’
42013008	Na tola neavolɛ ne buale ye kɛ, ‘Yɛmenle, maa ɔgyinla ɛkɛ ne na yɛnlea ye ɛvolɛ ye noko; mebavuduvudu ɔ bo na meagugua ewula ɔ bo.
42013009	Na saa ɛvolɛ ne kadwu na ɔso a, ɔle kpalɛ; yeanzo noko a, yɛkɛpɛ ye yɛkɛdo.’ ”
42013010	Ɛnwomenlelielɛ Kenle ko bie ɛnee Gyisɛse ɛlɛkilehile wɔ nyianu sua bie anu.
42013011	Raalɛ ko wɔ ɛkɛ ne mɔɔ sunsum ɛtane vale ye la yedwu ɛvolɛ bulu nee mɔtwɛ, na yemaa ewule ɛdɔ ɔ nwo, yekpo kondokondo mɔɔ ɔngola ɔ nwo tenrɛ fee a.
42013012	Mɔɔ Gyisɛse nwunle ye la, ɔvɛlɛle ye na ɔzele ye kɛ, “Ɔmɔ, bɛye wɔ bɛvi wɔ anwonyane ne anu!”
42013013	Akee ɔvale ɔ sa ɔguale raalɛ ne anwo zo, na ɛkɛ ne ala ɔdenrɛle ɔ nwo fɔɔnwo na ɔyele Nyamenle ayɛlɛ.
42013014	Nyianu sua ne kpanyinli ne vale ɛya kɛ Gyisɛse ɛyɛ ayile wɔ Ɛnwomenlelielɛ Kenle ne a, na ɔzele menli mɔɔ wɔ ɛkɛ ne la kɛ, “Yɛlɛ kenle nsia mɔɔ ɔwɔ kɛ yɛfa yɛyɛ gyima a; yemɔti bɛrɛla kenle zɔhane mɔ bɛmaa bɛyɛ bɛ ayile, na bɛgyakyi Ɛnwomenlelielɛ Kenle ne bɛmaa ɔla ɛkɛ ne.”
42013015	Awulae buale ye kɛ, “Bɛmɛ nabalabama! Saa ɔdwu Ɛnwomenlelielɛ Kenle a bɛ biala sianyi ye ɛnlankɛ anzɛɛ asoaso ɔfa ye ɔkɔmaa ye nzule.
42013016	Na raalɛ ɛhye mɔɔ le Ebileham abo zo sonla, na Seetan ɛva ewule ɛkyekye ye toonwo ɛvolɛ bulu nee mɔtwɛ la, yɛɛ ɔnle kɛ bɛsianyi ye wɔ Ɛnwomenlelielɛ Kenle a?”
42013017	Ye mualɛ ne manle ye agbɔvolɛ ne mɔ amuala anyunlu guale aze, na menli ne amuala lile fɛlɛko wɔ nwanwane ninyɛne mgbole mɔɔ ɔyɛle la anwo.
42013018	Gyisɛse bizale kɛ, “Kɛ Nyamenle Belemgbunlililɛ ne si de ɛ? Duzu a menva mendo nwolɛ a?
42013019	Ɔle kɛ mɛsetade baka ma nretee bie mɔɔ awie vale luale ye tola nu la; ɔfifile, ɔnyinle ɔyɛle baka, na nloma yɛle bɛ sane wɔ ye ngane ne mɔ anu.”
42013020	Gyisɛse bizale bɛ bieko kɛ, “Duzu a menva Nyamenle Belemgbunlililɛ ne mendo nwolɛ a?
42013021	Ɔle kɛ mgbɔvonle mɔɔ raalɛ fa wula ɛdɔkɛ nu la. Ɔmaa ɛdɔkɛ ne amuala tu.”
42013022	Gyisɛse kpɔsale azua nee namunamu zo hilehilele menli ne, na ɛnee ɔlua zo ɔlɛkɔ Gyɛlusalɛm.
42013023	Awie bie bizale ye kɛ, “Yɛmenle, asoo ɔle nɔhalɛ kɛ menli ekyi bie ala a bɛbalie bɛ ngoane a?” Gyisɛse buale bɛ kɛ,
42013024	“Bɛbɔ mɔdenle bɛva anlenkɛ ekyi ne anu, ɔboalekɛ menli dɔɔnwo babɔ mɔdenle kɛ bɛfa nu, noko bɛnrɛhola.
42013025	Sua menle ne badwazo ado anlenkɛ ne anu, na saa bɛka alie nwo na bɛbɔ anlenkɛ ne anu bɛse kɛ, ‘Yɛmenle, tukue yɛ anlenkɛ ne!’ a, ɔkɛbua bɛ kɛ, ‘Menze ɛleka mɔɔ bɛvi a!’
