42013026	Na bɛmɛ bɛbabua kɛ, ‘Yɛ nee wɔ lile, nlonle; ɛhilehilele wɔ yɛ sua zo.’
42013027	Na ɔbaze bɛ bieko kɛ, ‘Menze ɛleka mɔɔ bɛvi a. Bɛvi ɛkɛ ne bɛhɔ, amumuyɛma!’
42013028	-
42013029	Na akee mɔɔ bɛkɛnwu bɛ nlenya mɔ Ebileham, Ayezeke nee Gyekɔbo nee Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛma ne mɔ mɔɔ bɛfa bɛ bɛtu bɛ nloa nu la amuala wɔ Nyamenle Belemgbunlililɛ ne anu, na menli vi aduduleɛ nee adɔleɛ, ɛbɔ nu nee nyevile nu ɛra ɛvoyia ne abo, na akee bɛye bɛmɛ bɛgua alie nwo nehane la, ɛkɛ ne yɛɛ bɛbazu na bɛadedɛ bɛ nwo bonrane nu a.
42013030	Bɛdabɛ mɔɔ kɛkala bɛli amozi la baralumua, na bɛdabɛ mɔɔ kɛkala bɛlumua la arali amozi.”
42013031	Mekɛ ne anu Falasiima bie rale Gyisɛse anwo ɛkɛ ne razele ye kɛ, “Ye ɛ nwo ɛke na kɔ ɛleka fofolɛ, ɔluakɛ Hɛlɔdo kpondɛ wɔ ahu wɔ.”
42013032	Gyisɛse buale bɛ kɛ, “Bɛhɔ na bɛhɔze musuofoɔ ne kɛ, melɛtu mbɔnsam, meayɛ ayile ɛnɛ nee ɛhyema, na ye kenle nsa ne azo menwɔwie me gyima ne.
42013033	Noko ɔwɔ kɛ mesɔ me adendulɛ ne azo ɛnɛ nee ɛhyema nee ye alehyenlɛ nu. Ɔnle kpalɛ kɛ bɛkɛhu Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛ wɔ ɛleka gyɛne biala kyesɛ Gyɛlusalɛm ala.
42013034	“Gyɛlusalɛm, O Gyɛlusalɛm! Wɔhu Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛma ne, wɔzi menli mɔɔ Nyamenle zoanle bɛ ɛ nwo la awolɛ! Fane dɔɔnwo yɛɛ mehulo kɛ anrɛɛ menwɔva me sa menwɔbɛla bɛmɛ Gyɛlusalɛmma kɛ akɔlɛ ɛdane fa ɔ mra fea ɔ ndɛba abo la; na bɛammaa me adenle.
42013035	Yemɔti bɛ sua ye badɔ mgbane. Meka meahile bɛ kɛ bɛnrɛnwu me, kɔkpula kɛ mekɛ ne kɛdwu mɔɔ bɛbadeɛdea nu bɛaze kɛ, ‘Nyilalɛ ɛha mɔɔ lua Awulae duma nu ɛlɛba la.’ ”
42014001	Ɛnwomenlelielɛ Kenle ko Gyisɛse hɔle kɛ ɔkakpula ɔ sa wɔ Falasii mgbanyima ne mɔ ko sua nu. Mekɛ ne anu ɛnee menli ɛlɛtɛ ye kpalɛ.
42014002	Nrenya bie mɔɔ mutulemutule ɛyɛ ye la rale Gyisɛse anwo ɛkɛ ne,
42014003	na Gyisɛse bizale mɛla kilehilevolɛma ne nee Falasiima ne mɔ kɛ, “Asoo yɛ mɛla ne tua ayileyɛlɛ wɔ Ɛnwomenlelielɛ Kenle ne, anzɛɛ ɔndua?”
42014004	Na bɛandɛ bɛ nloa anu. Yemɔti Gyisɛse vale nrenya ne na ɔyɛle ye ayile ɔmanle ɔhɔle.
42014005	Akee ɔbizale bɛ kɛ, “Bɛ nuhua boni yɛɛ saa ɔ ra nrenya anzɛɛ ye ɛnlankɛ tɔ bula nu Ɛnwomenlelielɛ Kenle ne a, ɛkɛ ne ala ɔnrɛye ye a?”
42014006	Na bɛangola ɛhye noko anloa ye.
42014007	Gyisɛse nwunle bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛdole ɛsalɛ bɛvɛlɛle bɛ la kɛ bie mɔ anye ɛbolo ɛlɛkpondɛ ɛleka kpalɛ adɛnla, yemɔti ɔbule bɛ muala ɛrɛlɛ ɛhye:
42014008	“Saa awie to ɔ sa fɛlɛ wɔ wɔ atɔfolɛlielɛ bo a, mmakɔtɛnla ɛleka kpalɛ ne. Ɔkɛyɛ kɛ bie a ɛnee bɛvɛlɛ awie mɔɔ lɛ dibile tɛla wɔ la,
42014009	na ahenle mɔɔ vɛlɛle yemɔ nee wɔmɔ la ɔwɔ kɛ ba na ɔbase wɔ kɛ, ‘Dwazo, fa ɛ bo zo ne maa sonla ɛhye.’ Ɛnee akee ɛlɛ nyiane ɛbahɔdɛnla bɛ nzi lɔ ebia zo.
42014010	Yemɔti saa bɛto ɛsalɛ bɛfɛlɛ wɔ a, kɔdɛnla bɛ nzi lɔ ɛleka bie, na saa mɔɔ vɛlɛle wɔ la ba a, yeaze wɔ kɛ, ‘Me gɔnwo, bɛla badɛnla ɛleka kpalɛ.’ Ɛhye kɛyɛ anyunlunyia kɛmaa wɔ wɔ menli mɔɔ nee wɔ de ɛkponle ne anwo la anyunlu.
42014011	Ɔluakɛ mɔɔ memaa ɔ nwo zo la Nyamenle bɛlɛ ye aze, yɛɛ mɔɔ bɛlɛ ɔ nwo aze la Nyamenle kpogya ye zo.”
42014012	Akee Gyisɛse zele nrenya ne mɔɔ dole ɛkponle ne la kɛ, “Saa ɛto ɛkponle ewiazo anzɛɛ nɔsolɛ nu a, mmafɛlɛvɛlɛ ɛ gɔnwo mɔ anzɛɛ ɛ mediema anzɛɛ wɔ mbusuafoɔ anzɛɛ wɔ kpalɛzo sukoavolɛma angome, ɔluakɛ bɛdabɛ noko bɛbavɛlɛ wɔ bie bɛazie wɔ ɛdeɛ ne abo zo.
42014013	Na saa ɛto ɛkponle a, fɛlɛvɛlɛ ehyianvolɛma, abuburama, bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛ sa anzɛɛ bɛ gyakɛ le azinli, yɛɛ anyenzinliravolɛma,
42014014	na Nyamenle kɛyila wɔ. Ɔluakɛ bɛmɛ, bɛdabɛ bɛnrɛhola bɛnrɛzie wɔ ɛdeɛ ne abo zo. Nyamenle ala a bazie ɔ bo zo amaa wɔ wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ menli kpalɛ ne mɔ vi ewule nu kɛdwazo la a.”
42014015	Menli mɔɔ de ɛkponle ne anwo la anu ko mɔɔ dele ɛhye la hanle hilele Gyisɛse kɛ, “Nyilalɛ ɛha bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛbadɛnla ɛkponledolɛ kpole ne abo wɔ Nyamenle Belemgbunlililɛ ne anu la!”
42014016	Gyisɛse zele ye kɛ, “Nrenya bie dole ɛkponle na ɔvɛlɛle menli dɔɔnwo.
42014017	Mɔɔ mekɛ ne dwule la, ɔzoanle ye sonvolɛma kɛ bɛhɔze bɛdabɛ mɔɔ yedo ɛsalɛ yevɛlɛ bɛ la kɛ, ‘Bɛrɛla na mewie debie biala yɛ.’
42014018	Na bɛ muala bɛbɔle ɔ bo kɛ bɛtwenlehwenle bɛ bo aze. Mɔɔ lumua la zele kɛ, ‘Medɔ me azɛlɛ bie na ɔwɔ kɛ mekɔnea. Yemɔti mmanyia ɛya.’
42014019	Ko noko ɔdaye ɔhanle kɛ, ‘Medɔ nlankɛ nwiɔ nwiɔ fane nnu na mekɔ meahɔnlea bɛ. Yemɔti mebodo wɔ mmanyia ɛya.’
42014020	Bieko noko zele kɛ, ‘Megya raalɛ, zɔhane ati menrɛhola ba.’
42014021	“Sonvolɛ ne ziale hɔbɔle ɔ menle ne amaneɛ. Awuke menle ne vale ɛya kpole na ɔzele ye sonvolɛ ne kɛ, ‘Maa ɔyɛ ndɛ, kɔ sua ye azo kpalɛ ne mɔ azo nee awɔdenle ne mɔ anu kɔsesa ehyianvolɛma, abuburama, anyenzinliravolɛma, yɛɛ bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛ sa nee bɛ gyakɛ le azinli la ɛ nee bɛ ɛrɛla.’
42014022	Yeangyɛ biala yɛɛ sonvolɛ ne ziale rale a na ɔrahanle ɔhilele ɔ menle ne kɛ, ‘Yɛmenle, mɔɔ ɛhanle la meyɛ ye zɔhane, noko ɛleka tɛbɔ ɛkɛ ne.’
42014023	Yemɔti awuke menle ne zele ye sonvolɛ ne kɛ, ‘Kɔ ademgbole ne mɔ nee ndenle ngyikyi ne mɔ anu na twe menli maa bɛrɛla bɛrayi me sua ye.
42014024	Na meka meahile bɛ, bɛdabɛ mɔɔ menlumuale menvɛlɛle bɛ a bɛamba la, me aleɛ ne nretee bɔbɔ ɛnrɛtia biala agye zo.’ ”
42014025	Kenle ko menli dɔɔnwo bie nee Gyisɛse lua bɛlɛkɔ la, ɔhakyile ɔ nwo ɔzele bɛ kɛ,
42014026	“Awie biala mɔɔ ba me nwo arayɛ me ɛdoavolɛ, na yeangulo me edwɛkɛ yeandɛla ɔ ze nee ɔ nli, ɔ ye nee ɔ mra, ɔ mediema mrenya nee mraalɛ nee ɔdaye mumua ne ɔ nwo la ɛnrɛhola ɛnrɛyɛ me ɛdoavolɛ.
42014027	Awie biala mɔɔ anzoa ye meanubaka ne anli me nzi la ɛnrɛhola ɛnrɛyɛ me ɛdoavolɛ.
42014028	“Saa bɛ nuhua bie kpondɛ kɛ ɔsi sua a, ɔdumua ɔtɛnla aze, ɔsese ye bolɛ, na ɔnea saa ɔlɛ ezukoa mɔɔ sa ye si la a.
42014029	Saa yeanyɛ ye zɔhane na ɔwula sua ne aze a, bie a ɛnee yeangola ye si. Saa bɛnwu ye zɛhae noko a bɛbazi ye amgbu kɛ
42014030	‘Nea, nrenya ɛhye sua ko mɔɔ ɔbɔle ɔ bo la, yeanwie ye si ɛlɛ!’
42014031	“Saa belemgbunli bie fa menli apenle bulu kɛ ɔ nee belemgbunli ko mɔɔ lɛ menli apenle abulanwiɔ la kaho a, ɔbalumua yeadɛnla aze yeadwenle nwolɛ saa ɔkɛhola ɔkɛgyinla belemgbunli zɔhane anyunlu wɔ konle nu a.
42014032	Saa ɔnea na ɔnrɛhola ye a, ɛnee mɔɔ belemgbunli zɔhane yɛ la a le kɛ, mɔɔ kpɔvolɛ ne wɔ moa moa, na ɔtɛnyianle ɔtɛdwule ɛkɛ ne la, ɔsoa ye kpɔmanvolɛ ɔmaa bɛkɔka bɛyɛ anzonudwolɛ ngyehyɛlɛ.”
42014033	Na Gyisɛse dwulale ye edwɛkɛ ne kɛ, “Zɔhane ala yɛɛ saa bɛ nuhua ko biala angyakyi debie biala mɔɔ ɔlɛ la anzi ɛlilɛ a, ɔnrɛhola ɔnrɛyɛ me ɛdoavolɛ a.
42014034	“Ngyenle sonle bolɛ, na saa ɔta a bɛngola bɛnyɛ ye menlemenle.
42014035	Bɛfa bɛyɛ debie biala a ɔnyɛ boɛ; bɛgua ye lɔ. Yemɔti mɔɔ lɛ ɛnzonlɛ la ɛdie!”
42015001	Kenle ko bie adwuledievolɛma dɔɔnwo nee menli mɔɔ awie ɛmbu bɛ la rale kɛ bɛbadie Gyisɛse anloa edwɛkɛ.
42015002	Na Falasiima ne nee mɛla kilehilevolɛma ne mɔ dendɛle bɛ nzo abo kɛ, “Nrenya ɛhye nee ɛtanevolɛma tu na ɔ nee bɛ to bɛ sa ɛyɛba ko anu.”
42015003	Yemɔti Gyisɛse bule bɛ ɛrɛlɛ ɛhye:
42015004	“Bɛ nuhua boni, yɛɛ saa ɔlɛ mboane ɛya, na ko minli a, ɔnrɛgyakyi abulahɔnla nee ngɔnla ne wɔ fienemgbole ne anu, na ɔnrɛhɔkpondɛ ko ne toonwo kɔkpula kɛ ɔkɛnwu ye la a?
42015005	Saa ɔnwu ye a, ɔdi fɛlɛko, na ɔfa ye ɔto ɔ kɔme zo,
42015006	ɔfa ye ɔba sua nu. Akee ɔfɛlɛvɛlɛ ɔ gɔnwo mɔ nee ye kpalɛzo amra, na ɔse bɛ kɛ, ‘Ɔyɛ me fɛ kɛ menwu me boane ne mɔɔ minlinle la. Bɛmaa yɛlie yɛ nye!’
42015007	Meka meahile bɛ kɛ zɔhane ala yɛɛ anyelielɛ kɛra anwuma lɔ wɔ ɛtanevolɛ ko mɔɔ kɛnlu ɔ nwo la anwo kɛdɛla menli abulahɔnla nee ngɔnla mɔɔ di boɛ na bɛngyia anlubɛnwo la a.
42015008	“Anzɛɛ saa raalɛ lɛ dwɛtɛ fufule bulu na ko minli a, duzu a ɔyɛ a? Ɔsɔ kɛnlaneɛ, ɔkpoɔkpoa ye sua ne anu, na ɔka ɔ nye aze ɔkpondɛ dedee kɔkpula kɛ ɔkɛnwu ye la.
42015009	Saa ɔnwu ye a, ɔfɛlɛvɛlɛ ɔ gɔnwo mɔ nee ye kpalɛzo amra, na ɔse bɛ kɛ, ‘Ɔyɛ me fɛ kɛ menwu me kpɔba ne mɔɔ minlinle la. Bɛmaa yɛlie yɛ nye!’
42015010	Meka meahile bɛ kɛ, zɔhane ala yɛɛ Nyamenle soanvolɛma di fɛlɛko wɔ ɛtanenli ko mɔɔ kɛnlu ɔ nwo la anwo a.”
42015011	Gyisɛse hɔle zolɛ hanle kɛ, “Nrenya ko wɔ ɛkɛ. Ɔlɛ mralɛ mrenya nwiɔ.
42015012	Bɛ nuhua ekyi ne hanle hilele ɔ ze kɛ, ‘Egya, fa me agyadeɛ ɛdeɛ maa me.’ Yemɔti ɔ ze hyɛle mɔɔ ɔlɛ la amuala anu nwiɔ manle ɔ mra nwiɔ ne.
42015013	Kenle ekyi guale nu la ralɛ nrenya kakula ne dɔnenle ye ninyɛne ɛdeɛ ne kɔsɔɔti na ɔvale ezukoa ne ɔbɔle ɔ nwo ɔhɔle maanle zo. Ɔhɔle la, ɔbɔle ɛbɛla mgbane mgbane na ɔzɛkyele ye ezukoa ne amuala.
42015014	Mɔɔ ɔwiele ye ezukoa ne di la ɛhɔne kpole bie zile maanle ne mɔɔ ɔwɔ nu la anu, na ɛnee akee noko ɛhwee ɛnle ɔ nwo.
42015015	Yemɔti ɔvale ɔ nwo ɔhɔbetanle mandimasema ne mɔ anu ko, na sonla zɔhane vale ye kɛ ɔhɔnlea agbolike wɔ ye ɛya nu.
42015016	Ɛhɔne hunle ye mɔɔ saa ɔnyianle agbolike ne mɔ aleɛ ne bie bɔbɔ a anrɛɛ ɔkɛli, noko yeannyia awie ammaa ye bie.
42015017	Nzinlii ye adwenle rale ɔ nwo na ɔzele kɛ, ‘Gyimayɛvoma mɔɔ wɔ egya gyima nu la di aleɛ maa ɔbo bɛ nwo zo, mame a mela ɛke mɔɔ ɛhɔne ɛlɛku me la!
42015018	Medwazo meahɔ egya anwo lɔ meahɔze ye kɛ, Egya, meyɛ ɛtane metia Nyamenle nee ɛdawɔ.
42015019	Menfɛta kɛ ɛkɛvɛlɛ me ɛ ra bɔbɔ; fa me yɛ wɔ ɛkpama ne mɔ anu ko.’
42015020	Yemɔti ɔdwazole na ɔzile nu kɛ ɔkɔ ɔ ze anwo lɔ. “Mɔɔ ɔkpukele moa moa lɔ mɔɔ ɔlɛba la ɔ ze nwunle ye, alɔbɔlɛ hunle ye kpole, na ɔnriandile ɔhɔyiale ye, ɔbɛkale ye, na ɔvole ɔ nloa anwo.
42015021	Ralɛ nrenya kakula ne hanle hilele ɔ ze kɛ, ‘Egya, meyɛ ɛtane metia Nyamenle nee ɛdawɔ. Kɛkala, menfɛta kɛ ɛkɛvɛlɛ me ɛ ra bieko.’
42015022	Na ɔ ze vɛlɛle ye sonvolɛma ne mɔ na ɔzele bɛ kɛ, ‘Bɛha bɛ nwo na bɛhɔva tɛladeɛ kpalɛ bɛrawula ye. Bɛva kpɔdelera bɛwula ɔ sa, na bɛva mgbɔlaboa bɛwula ye.
42015023	Akee bɛhɔva ɛnlankɛ ralɛ mɔɔ ɛlɔ kpalɛ la bɛrahu ye bɛmaa yɛlie yɛ nye.
42015024	Ɔluakɛ me ra ɛhye, mefa ye kɛ ɔwule, na kɛkala yera ngoane nu; ɔminlinle, na kɛkala menwu ye.’ Na bɛbɔle ɔ bo kɛ bɛdie bɛ nye.
42015025	“Mekɛ ne anu ɛnee ralɛ nrenya kpanyinli ne ɛhɔ ye ɛya nu. Na mɔɔ ɔlɛba na ɔbikyele ɔ ze awuke ne la, ɔdele edwɛne nee agolehanlɛ ne.
42015026	Yemɔti ɔvɛlɛle ɔ ze sonvolɛma ne mɔ mɔɔ wɔ sua nu ɛkɛ ne la anu ko na ɔbizale ye kɛ, ‘Duzu edwɛkɛ ɔ?’
42015027	Na ɔbuale ye kɛ, ‘Ɛ diema ne ɛzia ɛra sua nu, na ɛ ze ɛmaa bɛhu ɛnlankɛ ralɛ kyenlera ne mɔɔ ɛwie dɔ la yɛɛ bɛlɛdie bɛ nye a, ɔboalekɛ ɔ sa ɛha ye, ɔ nwo kɔlɔnwo, ɔte kpɔkɛ.’
42015028	“Ralɛ nrenya kpanyinli ne vale ɛya kpole, yemɔti yeangulo kɛ ɔkɛwolo awuke ne anu. Zɔhane ati ɔ ze vindele rabodole ye kɛ ɔrɛla sua nu.
42015029	Na ɔbuale ɔ ze kɛ, ‘Egya, mezonle wɔ kɛ akɛlɛ la toonwo a yeradwu ɛnɛ a, yɛɛ metɛtule ɛ nloa edwɛkɛ metɛtole ɛlɛ. Duzu a wɔva wɔmaa me a? Ɛtɛfale abɔnkye ralɛ nretee ko bɔbɔ ɛtɛmanle me kɛ menva me nee me gɔnwo mɔ yɛva yɛlie yɛ nye.
42015030	Na ɛ ra ɛhye mɔɔ ɛzɛkye wɔ agyadeɛ ne amuala wɔ tuutuuma anwo, na yezia yera sua nu la, wɔhu ɛnlankɛ ralɛ kyenlera ne mɔɔ ɛwie dɔ la wɔmaa ye.’
42015031	Na ɔ ze buale ye kɛ, ‘Me ra, wɔmɔ ɛ nee me a de ɛke dahuu a, yɛɛ debie biala mɔɔ melɛ la le wɔ ɛdeɛ.
42015032	Noko ɔwɔ kɛ yɛdie yɛ nye na yɛdi fɛlɛko ala, ɔboalekɛ, ɛ diema ye, ɔwule, yɛɛ yezia yera ngoane nu bieko a; ɔminlinle, yɛɛ yɛnwu ye a.’ ”
42016001	Gyisɛse zele ye ɛdoavolɛma ne mɔ kɛ, “Sukoavolɛ bie mɔɔ lɛ sonla mɔɔ nea ye gya zo la woale ɛkɛ. Bɛdoanle gyaneavolɛ ne bɛhilele ɔ menle ne kɛ ɔlɛsɛkye ye ezukoa ne.
42016002	Yemɔti nrenya sukoavolɛ ne vɛlɛle ye na ɔzele ye kɛ, ‘Duzu edwɛkɛ a metete ye ɛ nwo la? Bɛla babu me ninyɛne mɔɔ wɔ ɛ sa nu la anwo mgbonda kile me, ɔluakɛ ɔvi ɛnɛ mɔɔ kɔ la ɛnle me gyaneavolɛ bieko.’
42016003	Na gyaneavolɛ ne hanle ye ɔ ti akunlu kɛ, ‘Duzu a menyɛ a, ɔluakɛ me menle ɛlɛdie me gyima ye avi me sa nu? Ɛyazonlɛ a, menlɛ nwolɛ anwosesebɛ, asɛlɛ noko yɛ me nyiane.
42016004	Meze mɔɔ mebayɛ a, amaa saa bɛdie gyima ye wɔ me sa nu a me gɔnwo mɔ alie me wɔ bɛ azua nu.’
42016005	“Zɔhane ati ɔvɛlɛvɛlɛle ɔ menle ne kavolɛma ne mɔ ngoko ngoko na ɔbizale mɔɔ lumua la kɛ, ‘Wɔmɔ, ɛtua me menle ɛzɛ?’
42016006	Ɔbuale kɛ, ‘Nwole angola ɛya ko.’ Gyaneavolɛ ne hanle kɛ, ‘Wɔ mgbonda ne ɛne, tɛnla aze na kɛlɛ abulanlu.’
42016007	Akee ɔbizale ko noko kɛ, ‘Na ɛdawɔ noko ɛ, ɛtua ɛzɛ?’ Ɔbuale kɛ, ‘Abɛlɛ ahodoku apenle ko.’ Gyaneavolɛ ne hanle hilele ye kɛ, ‘Wɔ mgbonda ne ɛne, kɛlɛ ɛya mɔtwɛ.’
42016008	“Na nrenya sukoavolɛ ne hanvole gyaneavolɛ anyebolo ne wɔ ye nrɛlɛbɛ mɔɔ ɔbɔle ɔyɛle ye alane gyima ne la anwo, ɔluakɛ ɔnwunle kɛ ɛtane ewiade ye anu amra ze awule nwo nrɛlɛbɛ fa yɛ nwule ninyɛne nea bɛ nwo tɛla wienyi nu amra.”
42016009	Na Gyisɛse hɔle zo zele kɛ, “Yemɔti meka meahile bɛ, ezukoa ɛnle kpalɛ ɛdeɛ, noko anrɛɛ bɛva bɛ ezukoa nee bɛ anwonyia bɛdila agɔnwolɛ, amaa saa bɛkpo aze a, bɛalie bɛ wɔ awuke mɔɔ ɛmbɔ ɛlɛ la anu.
42016010	Sonla biala mɔɔ di nɔhalɛ wɔ debie nretee biala anwo la di nɔhalɛ noko wɔ ninyɛne mgbole nwo, yɛɛ sonla biala mɔɔ le awule wɔ debie nretee nwo la le awule wɔ ninyɛne mgbole nwo.
42016011	Na saa bɛngola bɛnli nɔhalɛ wɔ ewiade ye anyiabɛnwo nwo a, ɛnee kɛ ɔkɛyɛ na bɛava nɔhalɛ anwonyia ne bɛawula bɛ sa nu ɛ?
42016012	Saa bɛnli nɔhalɛ wɔ awie debie nwo a ɛnee nwane a kɛva mɔɔ le bɛdabɛ noko bɛ ɛdeɛ la kɛmaa bɛ a?
42016013	“Sonvolɛ biala ɛnrɛhola ɛmenlenlɛ nwiɔ sonle, ɔluakɛ ɔbakpɔ ko na yeahulo ko; ɔbali nɔhalɛ yeamaa ko na yeakpɔ ko. Zɔhane ala noko yɛɛ ɔde ɔmaa bɛ a, bɛnrɛhola Nyamenle nee ezukoa sonle.”
42016014	Falasiima ne mɔ dele ɛhye amuala la, bɛgolole Gyisɛse anwo, ɔboalekɛ bɛkulo ezukoa kpalɛ.
42016015	Gyisɛse zele bɛ kɛ, “Bɛmɛ, bɛle menli bie mɔɔ bu bɛ nwo wɔ menli nyunlu kɛ asɛɛ bɛdi pɛlepɛle, noko Nyamenle ze bɛ ahonle ne mɔ anu. Ɔluakɛ mɔɔ menli dwenle a ɔsonle bolɛ wɔ bɛ nye zo la le debie mgbane wɔ Nyamenle anye zo.
42016016	“Ɛnee Mosisi mɛla ne nee mɔɔ Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛma hɛlɛle la gyi kpundii hɔkpulale mekɛ mɔɔ Dwɔn Sɔnevolɛ ne rale la; ɔvi mekɛ ne anu toonwo mɔɔ ɛrakpula ɛnɛ, mɔɔ bɛvale Edwɛkpa ne mɔɔ fane Nyamenle Belemgbunlililɛ ne anwo la nolobɔlɛ la, awie biala ɛlɛpele kɛ ɔkɛnyia ye.
42016017	Na ɔnyɛ se kɛ anwuma nee aze kɛpɛ nu kɛze, tɛla kɛ mɛla ne anu edwɛkɛkpɔkɛ nretee ko kɛminli a.
42016018	“Nrenya biala mɔɔ kɛbɔ ɔ ye ewole na ɔkɛgya raalɛ fofolɛ la ɛdo awuvolɛvalɛ mɛla ne; yɛɛ nrenya mɔɔ kɛgya raalɛ mɔɔ ɔ hu ɛbɔ ye ewole la ɛdo awuvolɛvalɛ mɛla ne.
42016019	“Nrenya sukoavolɛ bie woale ɛkɛ; ɔhedale ndanlɛ ngɛnlɛma mɔɔ awolɛ yɛ se la na ɔlile ɔ ti dahuu.
42016020	Nrenya ehyianli bie noko ɔdaye ɔwoale ɛkɛ, bɛfɛlɛ ye Lazalɛse. Nganlɛ ɛdudu ye, na bɛfa ye bɛbatɛnla sukoavolɛ ne anuhɔlɛ dahuu,
42016021	saa ɔkɛnyia mgbokpoloka ne mɔɔ vi sukoavolɛ ne ɛkponle ne azo gua aze la bie ɔkɛli a; na dahuu ahwea ne mɔ batafe ye nganlɛ ne mɔ anu.
42016022	“Nrenya ehyianli ne wule na anwuma soanvolɛma ravale ye ɛkɛla anyelielɛ nu hɔdole Ebileham akɛnra anu. Nzinlii, sukoavolɛ ne ɔdaye ɔwule na bɛziele ye.
42016023	Ɛbolɔ nehane, mɔɔ ɛnee ɔlɛnwu amaneɛ la, ɔmanle ɔ nye zo na ɔnwunle Ebileham wɔ moa moa lɔ na Lazalɛse de ɔ nwo ɛkɛ ne.
42016024	Yemɔti ɔdeanle nu ɔhanle kɛ, ‘Egya Ebileham, nwu me anwunvɔne, na soa Lazalɛse maa ɔva ɔ sa ɛrɛlɛsɛka ko ɔbɔ nzule nu na ɔva ɔrape me tafinlima azo, ɔluakɛ me ɛbolɛ ɛlɛte wɔ sendɔlɔra ye anu!’
42016025	“Na Ebileham zele ye kɛ, ‘Me ra, kakye kɛ mekɛ mɔɔ ɛde aze la ɛnyianle ɛbɛla nu ninyɛne kpalɛ ngome, yɛɛ Lazalɛse nyianle ninyɛne ɛtane ngome. Na kɛkala, wɔ ɛke, ɔ rɛle ɛkyekye, yɛɛ wɔmɔ ɛlɛnwu amaneɛ a.
42016026	Saa ɛtu ɛhye bɔbɔ ɛsie ahane a, eza kuma kpole bie la wɔ nee yɛ avinli, amaa awie angola anvi ɛke amba ɛ nwo lɔ, na awie noko vi nehane ara ɛke.’
42016027	Nrenya sukoavolɛ ne hanle kɛ, ‘Saa zɔhane ɛdeɛ a, ɛnee mesɛlɛ wɔ, soa Lazalɛse wɔ me sua nu ɛkɛ.
42016028	Melɛ mediema nnu wɔ ɛkɛ ne, maa ɔhɔbɔ bɛ kɔkɔ, amaa bɛdabɛ noko bɛamba abodelɛ ɛleka ɛhye.’
42016029	“Ebileham zele ye kɛ, ‘Bɛlɛ menli wɔ bɛ nwo lɔ ɛlɛkakyehakye bɛ Mosisi mɛla ne nee Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛma ngilehilelɛ ne mɔ, na ɔwɔ kɛ ɛ mediema ne mɔ tie bɛ.’
42016030	Nrenya sukoavolɛ ne buale kɛ, ‘Egya Ebileham, ɔle kpalɛ ɛdeɛ, noko saa awie vi mɔwuamra anu dwazo kɔ kɔbɔ bɛ amaneɛ a, yɛɛ bɛkɛnlu bɛ nwo a.’
42016031	Na Ebileham zele kɛ, ‘Saa bɛnrɛdie menli mɔɔ ɛlɛkilehile bɛ Mosisi mɛla ne nee mɔɔ Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛma ne hanle la a, ɛnee saa awie vi mɔwuamra anu dwazo kɔ bɔbɔ a, bɛnrɛdie ye.’ ”
42017001	Gyisɛse zele ye ɛdoavolɛma ne kɛ, “Ɔwɔ kɛ ninyɛne mɔɔ twehwe sonla kɔ ɛtane nu la sisi, na mɔɔ ɔkɛlua ɔ nwo zo ɔkɛzi la, ye gyakɔ.
42017002	Ɔle kpalɛ kɛ anrɛɛ bɛkɛdwe ɛdibolɛ kpole bɛkɛhenda ɔ kɔme na bɛkɛhɔdo ye nyevile nu tɛla kɛ ɔkɛmaa awie mɔɔ ye diedi wɔ me nu kɛ ngakula ɛhye mɔ la ko kɛyɛ ɛtane.
42017003	Yemɔti bɛnlea mɔɔ bɛyɛ la. “Saa ɛ diema fo wɔ a, tea ye, na saa ɔnu ɔ nwo a, fa ye ɛtane kyɛ ye.
42017004	Saa kenle ko bɔbɔ ɔfo wɔ fane nsuu, na ɔsia ɔba fane nsuu ɔbaka ɔkile wɔ kɛ, ‘Menlu me nwo’ a, ɔwɔ kɛ ɛfa ye ɛtane ɛkyɛ ye.”
42017005	Ɛzoanvolɛma ne hanle hilele Awulae kɛ, “Maa yɛ diedi ɛnyi.”
42017006	Awulae buale bɛ kɛ, “Saa bɛlɛ diedi mɔɔ ye kpole le kɛ ‘mɛsetade’ baka ma ekyi bie bɔbɔ la a, anrɛɛ bɛkɛhola bɛkɛha bɛkɛhile baka kpole ɛhye mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye ‘sekamɔ’ la kɛ, ‘Tu kɔgyinla nyevile nu lɔ’ a, ɔkɛyɛ zɔhane.”
42017007	“Saa bɛ nuhua bie lɛ ye sonvolɛ wɔ ye egyinli nu anzɛɛ mɔɔ ka ye mboane na saa ɔvi ɛbɔ nu ɔba a, asoo ɔkɛze ye kɛ, ‘Ka ɛ nwo bɛla badɛnla aze di debie’ ɔ?
42017008	Kyɛkyɛ! Ɔbaze ye kɛ, ‘Siezie me aleɛ ne na kendɛ maa menli debie na mewie a wɔahɔli wɔ ɛdeɛ ne.’
42017009	Sonvolɛ ɛnfɛta moyɛlɛ wɔ mɔɔ ɔ menle kɛze ye kɛ ɔyɛ na yeyɛ la anwo.
42017010	Zɔhane ala yɛɛ bɛdabɛ noko saa bɛyɛ mɔɔ bɛkɛze bɛ kɛ bɛyɛ la amuala bɛwie a, bɛha kɛ, ‘Yɛle sonvolɛma mɔɔ yɛ nwo ɛnlɛ nvasoɛ a; yɛyɛ yɛ gyima mɔɔ ɔwɔ kɛ yɛyɛ la.’ ”
42017011	Mɔɔ Gyisɛse kɔ Gyɛlusalɛm la, ɔpenle Samɛlea nee Galeli ɛweɛne zo.
42017012	Na mɔɔ ɔka ekyii ɔdwu namule bie azo la, mrenya bulu mɔɔ le kokobɛvolɛma la yiale ye. Bɛgyinlanle moa moa
42017013	na bɛdeanle nu bɛzele kɛ, “Gyisɛse! Awulae! Nwu yɛ anwunvɔne.”
42017014	Gyisɛse nwunle bɛ la ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Bɛhɔ na bɛva bɛ nwo bɛhɔhile sɛlɛvolɛma ne mɔ.” Mɔɔ bɛlua adenle zo bɛlɛkɔ la, bɛ nwo zale.
42017015	Na bɛ nuhua ko nwunle kɛ ɔ nwo ɛza, yemɔti ɔziale ɔ nzi, ɔyele Nyamenle ayɛlɛ.
42017016	na ɔradule ɔdɔle Gyisɛse agyakɛ anu mutule nu na ɔyɛle ye mo somaa. Nrenya ɛhye le Samɛleanli.
42017017	Gyisɛse hanle kɛ, “Menli bulu a menyɛle bɛ ayile a, na ngɔnla ne wɔ nienwu?
42017018	Duzu ati a ɛyɛvolɛ ye ala a ɛzia ɛra bayɛ Nyamenle mo a?”
42017019	Na Gyisɛse zele nrenya ne kɛ, “Dwazo kɔ; wɔ diedi ɛyɛ wɔ ayile.”
42017020	Falasiima bie bizale Gyisɛse kenle mɔɔ Nyamenle Belemgbunlililɛ ne kɛra la. Gyisɛse buale kɛ, “Nyamenle Belemgbunlililɛ ne ɛnrɛra ye mɔɔ awie anye dua ye a.
42017021	Awie ɛnrɛha kɛ, ‘Nea, yemɔ ɛne!’ anzɛɛ ‘Yemɔ a wɔ lɔ la!’ ɔboalekɛ Nyamenle Belemgbunlililɛ ne ɛra na ɔde bɛ ahonle nu.”
42017022	Akee ɔzele ye ɛdoavolɛma ne kɛ, “Mekɛ bara mɔɔ bɛ kunlu a anrɛɛ bɛkɛnwu Sonla Ra ne mekɛ ne anu kenle ko bɔbɔ, na bɛnrɛnwu ye.
42017023	Bie mɔ baze bɛ kɛ, ‘Nea, ɔwɔ nehane’ anzɛɛ ‘Nea, ɔwɔ ɛke!’ Noko bɛmmafinde kɛ bɛkanlea.
42017024	Kɛ ɛsɛlɛmanye si kpakye wienyi ta anwomanyunlu vi ɔ ti kɔkpula ɔ bo la, zɔhane ala yɛɛ medame Sonla Ra, mebara wɔ mekɛ ne anu a.
42017025	Noko ɔwɔ kɛ medumua menwu amaneɛ dɔɔnwo na adwuleso amra kpo me.
42017026	Kɛmɔ Nowa mekɛ zo ɔyɛle la, zɔhane ala yɛɛ medame Sonla Ra, me mekɛ zo ɔbayɛ a.
42017027	Awie biala hɔle zolɛ lile, nlonle; mraalɛ ɛgyalɛ nee agyalɛ ɛhɔlɛ liele ebia hɔkpulale kenle mɔɔ Nowa hɔvole ɛlɛne ne anu na ezule ne dɔle bule aze na ɔhunle bɛ muala la.
42017028	Ɔbayɛ kɛ Lɔɔto mekɛ zo ala la. Menli hɔle zolɛ lile, nlonle, bɛlile gua, bɛyɛle egyinli na bɛsisile azua.
42017029	Na kenle ko ne mɔɔ Lɔɔto vile Sodɔm la, Nyamenle manle senle nee sɔlefe vi anwuma dɔle kɛ ezule la rahunle bɛ muala.
42017030	Zɔhane ala yɛɛ kenle mɔɔ medame Sonla Ra, mebara la ɔbayɛ a.
42017031	“Kenle zɔhane, awie mɔɔ wɔ ye sua ti zo la mmadwu aze kɛ ɔkɔ ye sua ne anu yeahɔva ye ninyɛne; zɔhane ala yɛɛ mɔɔ wɔ ye ɛya nu la mmasia ba sua zo a.
42017032	Bɛhakye mɔɔ zile Lɔɔto aye ne anwo zo la!
42017033	Awie biala mɔɔ pele ye ngoane nwo la minli ye; na mɔɔ kɛminli ye ngoane wɔ mame me ti la kɛnyia ngoane mɔɔ ɛnlɛ awieleɛ.
42017034	Meka meahile bɛ, kenle ko ne nɔe ne, menli nwiɔ mɔɔ la ɛkpa ko azo la, bɛbava ko bɛahɔ bɛagyakyi ko.
42017035	Mraalɛ nwiɔ bahɔ abɛlɛ ɛdinlɛ wɔ ɛleka ko, bɛbava ko bɛahɔ bɛagyakyi ko. [
42017036	Menli nwiɔ bahɔ ɛya nu, bɛbava ko bɛahɔ bɛagyakyi ko.”]
42017037	Ɛdoavolɛma ne bizale ye kɛ, “Awulae, ɛnee nienwu ɔ?” Gyisɛse buale kɛ, “Ɛleka mɔɔ debie funli la la, ɛkɛ ne a mgbɔtɛ kuohua bɛ nloa a.”
42018001	Akee Gyisɛse bule ɛrɛlɛ ɛhye hilele ye ɛdoavolɛma ne mɔ vale hilele kɛ ɔwɔ kɛ bɛyɛ nzɛlɛlɛ dahuu na ɔnle kɛ bɛkpo aze.
42018002	Ɔse, “Ndɛnebuavolɛ bie woale suakpole bie azo. Ndɛnebuavolɛ ɛhye ɛnzulo Nyamenle yɛɛ ɔmbu sonla biala.
42018003	Kunlanvolɛ raalɛ bie noko wɔ sua ne azo; dahuu ɔkɔ ndɛnebuavolɛ ne ɛkɛ ɔfa ye edwɛkɛ ɔkɔto ɔ nyunlu kɛ, ‘Awie ɛlɛgyegye me, di me edwɛkɛ ye maa me.’
42018004	Mekɛ dɔɔnwo ne ala ɛnee ɔngulo kɛ ɔkɛboa raalɛ ne, na nzinlii ɔhanle ɔhilele ɔ nwo kɛ, ‘Menzulo Nyamenle, yɛɛ membu sonla bɔbɔ ɛdeɛ,
42018005	noko kɛ raalɛ kunlanvolɛ ɛhye ɛlɛsi agyegye me la, mebanlea ye edwɛkɛ ne meamaa ye, anrɛɛ ɔnrɛmaa me nwo ɛnrɛdɔ me.’ ”
42018006	Na Awulae vale zɔle zolɛ kɛ, “Bɛdie mɔɔ ndɛnebuavolɛ alane ne hanle a.
42018007	Asoo Nyamenle ɛnrɛli ɔdaye ye menli ne mɔɔ kpondɛ moalɛ na bɛtea bɛfɛlɛ ye nɔɔzo nee ewiazo la ati edwɛkɛ? Asoo ɔkɛhwenlehwenle ɔ bo aze wɔ bɛ moalɛ nwo?
42018008	Meka meahile bɛ, ɔkɛli bɛ edwɛkɛ ɔkɛmaa bɛ ndɛndɛ zo somaa. Na asoo saa medame Sonla Ra meba a, menwɔnwu awie mɔɔ ɔ rɛle wɔ Nyamenle anu la?”
42018009	Eza Gyisɛse bule ɛrɛlɛ ɛhye hilele bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛbu bɛ nwo na bɛmbu awie biala la.
42018010	Ɔse, “Menli nwiɔ bie hɔle Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne anu kɛ bɛkazɛlɛ; ko le Falasiinli yɛɛ ko le adwuledievolɛ.
42018011	“Falasiinli ne gyinlanle nzisi na ɔzɛlɛle kɛ, ‘Nyamenle, meyɛ wɔ mo kɛ membɔ apo, menli nzisi yɛɛ mendo awuvolɛvalɛ mɛla ne kɛ awie biala de la; meyɛ wɔ mo kɛ menle kɛ adwuledievolɛ ɛhye bɔbɔ mɔɔ wɔ lɔ la.
42018012	Dapɛne ko anu mekye ɛhɔne fane nwiɔ, yɛɛ mebu me ezukoa mɔɔ menyia ye la anu bulu metu ko memaa wɔ.’
42018013	“Na adwuledievolɛ ne gyinlanle ahane ɛleka bie, yeangulo kɛ ɔkɛkpogya ɔ ti zo bɔbɔ. Ɔvale ɔ sa ɔguale ye ɛbolɛ zo na ɔzele kɛ, ‘O Awulae Nyamenle, nwu me anwunvɔne na mele ɛtanevolɛ!’ ”
42018014	Na Gyisɛse vale zɔle zolɛ kɛ, “Meka meahile bɛ, adwuledievolɛ ne zɔle Nyamenle anye wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ ɔlɛkɔ sua nu la dɛlale Falasiinli ne. Ɔluakɛ awie biala mɔɔ memaa ɔ nwo zo la Nyamenle bɛlɛ ye aze, yɛɛ mɔɔ bɛlɛ ɔ nwo aze la Nyamenle kpogya ye zo.”
42018015	Menli bie vale bɛ mra rale kɛ Gyisɛse ɛva ɔ sa ɛgua bɛ nwo zo na ɔyila bɛ. Ɛdoavolɛma ne nwunle bɛ la bɛdendɛle bɛ.
42018016	Na Gyisɛse vɛlɛle ngakula ne mɔ wɔ ɔ nwo ɛkɛ ne na ɔzele kɛ, “Bɛgyakyi ngakula ne mɔ bɛmaa bɛrɛla me nwo, bɛmmatua bɛ, ɔboalekɛ bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛle kɛ ɛhye mɔ zɛhae la yɛɛ Nyamenle Belemgbunlililɛ ne le bɛ ɛdeɛ a.
42018017	Bɛhakye ɛhye, awie biala mɔɔ anyɛ ɔ nwo kɛ kakula anlie Nyamenle Belemgbunlililɛ ne ando nu la ɛnrɛnyia ye.”
42018018	Dwuu kpanyinli bie bizale Gyisɛse kɛ, “Kilehilevolɛ kpalɛ, duzu a menyɛ na meanyia ngoane mɔɔ ɛnlɛ awieleɛ a?”
42018019	Gyisɛse bizale ye kɛ, “Duzu ati a ɛse mele kpalɛ a? Awie biala ɛnle kpalɛ kɛ Nyamenle angomekye.
42018020	Ɛze mɛla ne mɔ: mmato awuvolɛvalɛ mɛla ne, mmayɛ kɔdiawu, mmadi daselɛ adalɛ, mmawua, di ɛ ze nee ɛ nli eni.”
42018021	Nrenya ne buale kɛ, “Sumunli me nretee ne ala yɛɛ menvale mɛla ɛhye mɔ azo ɛlilɛ a.”
42018022	Gyisɛse dele ɛhye la, ɔzele ye kɛ, “Yeha wɔ debie ko. Tɔne debie biala mɔɔ ɛlɛ la amuala na kyɛ ezukoa ne maa ehyianvolɛma, na ɛkɛnyia anwonyia wɔ Nyamenle anwo lɔ, na akee bɛla badoa me bo zo.”
42018023	Nrenya ne dele ɛhye la nyane hunle ye kpole, ɔluakɛ ɔle sukoavolɛ kpole.
42018024	Gyisɛse nleanle ye koonwu na ɔzele kɛ, “Ɔyɛ se ɔmaa bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnyia bɛ nwo la kɛ bɛkɛnyia Nyamenle Belemgbunlililɛ ne a.
42018025	Ɔluakɛ ɔnyɛ se kɛ afunlumu kɛwolo agbuyia tokule nu tɛla kɛ sukoavolɛ kɛnyia Nyamenle Belemgbunlililɛ ne a.”
42018026	Menli mɔɔ dele mɔɔ Gyisɛse hanle la bizale kɛ, “Ɛnee nwane bɔbɔ a kɛnyia ngoane a?”
42018027	Gyisɛse buale kɛ, “Mɔɔ yɛ se maa sonla la ɛnyɛ se ɛmmaa Nyamenle.”
42018028	Na Pita zele kɛ, “Nea o, yɛgyakyi debie biala yɛɛ yɛdoa ɛbo zo o!”
42018029	Gyisɛse zele bɛ kɛ, “Ɛhɛe, ɔle zɔhane, noko bɛdie: Awie biala mɔɔ ɛgyakyi ye sua, ɔ ye nee ɔ mediema, ye awovolɛ anzɛɛ ɔ mra wɔ Nyamenle Belemgbunlililɛ ne ati la
42018030	banyia ye mɔnwo wɔ mekɛ ɛhye ala anu nee ngoane mɔɔ ɛnlɛ awieleɛ, wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ bara la anu.”
42018031	Gyisɛse vale ɛdoavolɛma bulu nee nwiɔ ne hɔle ahane na ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Bɛdie! Yɛlɛkɔ Gyɛlusalɛm, na ɛkɛ ne yɛɛ debie biala mɔɔ Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛma hɛlɛle wɔ medame Sonla Ra me nwo la bayɛ zɔhane a.
42018032	Bɛbaye me bɛawula menli mɔɔ ɛnle Dwuuma la asa anu, na bɛbazi me amgbu, bɛayɛ me aholoba na bɛatoto nyɛlɛ me nyunlu.
42018033	Bɛbabila me mbaka na bɛahu me, na ye kenle nsa ne anzi, mebadwazo meara ngoane nu.”
42018034	Ɛdoavolɛma ne ande ninyɛne ɛhye mɔ biala abo; bɛvale edwɛkɛ ne anwo ndelebɛbo bɛveale bɛ, yemɔti bɛannwu mɔɔ Gyisɛse ɛlɛka la anzi.
42018035	Mɔɔ Gyisɛse bikyele Gyɛleko la, ɛnee anyenzinliravolɛ bie de adehane ne ɛlɛsɛlɛzɛlɛ ninyɛne,
42018036	na ɔdele menli dɔɔnwo ne mɔɔ ɛlɛse la ane la, ɔbizale kɛ, “Duzu ɔ?”
42018037	Bɛbuale ye kɛ, “Gyisɛse mɔɔ vi Nazalɛte la a ɛlɛse a.”
42018038	Na ɔdeanle nu ɔzele kɛ, “Gyisɛse, Devidi ara! Nwu me anwunvɔne!”
42018039	Menli mɔɔ lumua la deɛdeanle ye nu na bɛzele ye kɛ ɔyɛ koonwu; na akee ɔdeanle nu kpole kpalɛ kɛ, “Devidi ara, nwu me anwunvɔne!”
42018040	Yemɔti Gyisɛse gyinlanle na ɔzele kɛ, “Bɛva nrenya anyenzinliravolɛ ne bɛrɛla.” Mɔɔ ɔrale la, Gyisɛse bizale ye kɛ,
42018041	“Duzu a ɛkulo kɛ meyɛ memaa wɔ a?” Na ɔbuale kɛ, “Yɛmenle, mekulo kɛ menwu debie bieko.”
42018042	Na Gyisɛse zele ye kɛ, “Nwu debie! Wɔ diedi ɛyɛ wɔ ayile.”
42018043	Na ɛkɛ ne ala ɔnwunle debie, na ɔdoale Gyisɛse ɔyele Nyamenle ayɛlɛ. Mɔɔ menli dɔɔnwo ne nwunle ɛhye la, bɛ muala bɛyele Nyamenle ayɛlɛ.
42019001	Gyisɛse hɔle Gyɛleko na ɔlɛpɛ nu sua ne azo.
42019002	Adwuledievolɛ kpanyinli bie noko wɔ sua ne azo mɔɔ ɛnyia ɔ nwo kpole a; bɛfɛlɛ ye Zakeɛse.
42019003	Nrenya ɛhye bɔle mɔdenle kɛ ɔkɛnwu Gyisɛse sonla holɛ na kɛmɔ ɔle adwola na menli ne zonle la ati ɛnee ɔnnwu ye.
42019004	Yemɔti ɔnriandile ɔlumuale ɛlɔne ne anyunlu na ɔhɔvole baka bie mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye “sekamɔ” la azo saa ɔkɛnwu ye a, ɔluakɛ ɛkɛ ne ala a Gyisɛse bape a.
42019005	Gyisɛse dwule ɛkɛ ne la, ɔdole ɔ nye anwuma na ɔzele Zakeɛse kɛ, “Zakeɛse, ka ɛ nwo dwu aze, na ɛnɛ mebazokoɛ wɔ.”
42019006	Ndɛndɛ ne ala Zakeɛse dwule aze na ɔvale fɛlɛkolilɛ kpole ɔliele Gyisɛse.
42019007	Menli mɔɔ nwunle ye la amuala dendɛle bɛ nzo abo kɛ, “Akee ɛtanenli ɛhye sua nu a nrenya ye ɛhɔ kazokoɛ a!”
42019008	Na Zakeɛse dwazole na ɔhanle ɔhilele Awulae kɛ, “Awulae, mebabu me ninyɛne mɔɔ melɛ la anu nwiɔ na meava ko meamaa ehyianvolɛma, na saa meli awie ndunlumi a, mebadua ye kakɛ mɔnwo nna.”
42019009	Gyisɛse zele ye kɛ, “Ɛnɛ kenle ye, bɛlie wɔ ngoane, ɛdawɔ noko ɛle Ebileham anlɔnra.
42019010	Ɛhye ala ati yɛɛ medame Sonla Ra membale a. Membale kɛ mebakpondɛ bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛminli la na mealie bɛ ngoane.”
42019011	Menli mɔɔ ɛnee ɛlɛtie edwɛkɛ ɛhye mɔ la zuzule ye bɛ ti anu kɛ, kɛmɔ bɛbikye Gyɛlusalɛm la, Nyamenle Belemgbunlililɛ ne asɛɛ ɛra ɛwie. Yemɔti Gyisɛse bule bɛ ɛrɛlɛ ɛhye.
42019012	Ɔse, “Nrenya bie mɔɔ lɛ duma la yɛle kɛ ɔkɔ maanle zo moa moa yeamaa bɛazie ye belemgbunli na akee yeazia yeara sua nu.
42019013	Mɔɔ ɔbanyia nwo la, ɔvɛlɛle ye sonvolɛma bulu ne, ɔmanle ko biala sɔnvɛlɛ ko na ɔzele bɛ kɛ, ‘Menle ɛke, yemɔti bɛva ezukoa ɛhye bɛli gua bɛnlea mɔɔ bɛkɛnyia ye nwolɛ la.’
42019014	Kɛmɔ ɔdaye ye maanle ne anu amra kpɔ ye la ati, bɛdule menli bɛmanle bɛhɔzele kɛ, ‘Yɛngulo kɛ nrenya ɛhye di yɛ belemgbunli.’
42019015	“Noko bɛziele nrenya ne belemgbunli na ɔziale ɔrale sua nu. Ɔradwule ala la, ɔmanle bɛvɛlɛvɛlɛle ye sonvolɛma ne kɛ bɛrabu bɛ mgbonda bɛmaa ɔnwu nvasoɛ mɔɔ bɛnyianle ye la.
42019016	Mɔɔ lumua la rale rahanle kɛ, ‘Yɛmenle, menyia sɔnvɛlɛ bulu meboka wɔ ɛdeɛ ko ne mɔɔ ɛvale ɛmanle me la anwo.’
42019017	Belemgbunli ne zele ye kɛ, ‘Mo, ɛle sonvolɛ kpalɛ! Kɛmɔ wɔli nɔhalɛ wɔ ninyɛne ngyikyi nwo la, mebamaa wɔanlea azuamgbole bulu azo.’
42019018	Mɔɔ tɔ zo nwiɔ la rahanle kɛ, ‘Yɛmenle, menyia sɔnvɛlɛ nnu meboka ko ne mɔɔ ɛvale ɛmanle me la anwo.’
42019019	Belemgbunli ne zele ye kɛ, ‘Ɛdawɔ noko ɛbanlea azuamgbole nnu azo.’
42019020	“Sonvolɛ ko noko rale na ɔrahanle kɛ, ‘Yɛmenle, wɔ sɔnvɛlɛ ko ne ɛne; membɔle ye duku nloa menziele.
42019021	Mesulo wɔ, ɔboalekɛ ɛle sonla mɔɔ ɛ ti yɛ se; ɛfa mɔɔ ɛnle wɔ ɛdeɛ la yɛɛ ɛbu mɔɔ wɔanlua la.’
42019022	Belemgbunli ne zele ye kɛ, ‘Wɔmɔ sonvolɛ ɛhye, ɛnle kpalɛ! Mefa ɛdawɔ ɛ nloa edwɛkɛ meabua wɔ ndɛne. Ɛse me kɛ me ti yɛ se, mefa mɔɔ ɛnle me ɛdeɛ yɛɛ mebu mɔɔ tɛ me a menluale la.
42019023	Duzu ati a wɔanva me ezukoa ne wɔangɔndo bange ɛ? Anrɛɛ mera la, mehɔlie me ezukoa ne boka nwolɛ nzinwo ne amuala.’
42019024	“Na ɔzele menli mɔɔ gyigyi ɛkɛ ne la kɛ, ‘Bɛlie sɔnvɛlɛ ko ne wɔ ɔ sa nu bɛva bɛmaa mɔɔ lɛ bulu ne la.’
42019025	Bɛzele ye kɛ, ‘Yɛmenle, yemɔ, ɔlɛ sɔnvɛlɛ bulu dɛba.’
42019026	Na ɔbuale bɛ kɛ, ‘Meka meahile bɛ: Mɔɔ lɛ bie la, bɛmaa ye bie dɔɔnwo bɛboka mɔɔ ɔlɛ la anwo; na mɔɔ ɛnlɛ bie la, ekyi ne bɔbɔ mɔɔ ɔlɛ la, bɛdie ye wɔ ɔ sa nu.
42019027	Akee me agbɔvolɛ ne mɔ mɔɔ se bɛngulo kɛ medi bɛ belemgbunli la, bɛva bɛ bɛrɛla bɛrahu bɛ wɔ me nyunlu ɛke!’ ”
42019028	Gyisɛse hanle ɛhye na akee ɔlumuale bɛ nyunlu kɛ ɔkɔ Gyɛlusalɛm.
42019029	Ɔbikyele Bɛtefagyi nee Bɛtani, wɔ Ɔlivi Boka ne azo la, ɔzoanle ye ɛdoavolɛma ne nwiɔ ɔmanle bɛlumuale ɔ nyunlu,
42019030	na ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Bɛhɔ namule ne mɔɔ wɔ bɛ nyunlu lɔ la azo. Saa bɛdwu ɛkɛ ne a, bɛkɛnwu asoaso ralɛ mɔɔ awie ɛtɛtɛnlanle zo ɛlɛ la kɛ ɔhenda ɛkɛ; bɛzianyi ye bɛrɛla.
42019031	Saa awie biza bɛ kɛ duzu ati a bɛlɛsianyi ye a, bɛze ye kɛ, ‘Awulae ɛhyia nwolɛ.’ ”
42019032	Bɛhɔle na bɛhɔnwunle debie biala, kɛmɔ Gyisɛse hanle hilele bɛ la.
42019033	Mɔɔ bɛlɛsianyi asoaso ne la, ɔ menle mɔ bizale bɛ kɛ, “Duzu ati a bɛlɛsianyi asoaso ne ɛ?”
42019034	Ɛdoavolɛma ne buale kɛ, “Awulae ɛhyia nwolɛ.”
42019035	Na bɛvale asoaso ne bɛrɛlɛle Gyisɛse. Akee bɛsesɛle bɛ ndanlɛ wɔ asoaso ne azo na bɛmanle Gyisɛse dɛnlanle zolɛ.
42019036	Na mɔɔ ɔlɛkɔ la, bɛsesɛle ndanlɛ azɛlɛ nwo bɛmanle ɔluale zolɛ.
42019037	Ɔbikyele Gyɛlusalɛm wɔ Ɔlivi Boka ne ndololeɛ nu la, ye ɛdoavolɛma bebelebe ne bɔle ɔ bo vale fɛlɛkolilɛ yɛle Nyamenle mo yele ye ayɛlɛ wɔ ninyɛne mgbole ne mɔ mɔɔ bɛnwunle bɛ la ati,
42019038	na bɛzele kɛ, “Nyamenle ɛyila belemgbunli ne mɔɔ lua Awulae duma nu ɛlɛba la! Anzonudwolɛ wɔ anwuma na anyunlunyia ɛha Nyamenle!”
42019039	Falasiima mɔɔ wɔ menli ne anu la bie mɔ zele Gyisɛse kɛ, “Kilehilevolɛ, maa wɔ ɛdoavolɛma ne ɛmua bɛ nloa!”
42019040	Gyisɛse buale kɛ, “Meka meahile bɛ, saa bɛmua bɛ nloa bɔbɔ a, awolɛ bɔbɔ kɛdeɛdea nuhua.”
42019041	Gyisɛse bikyele Gyɛlusalɛm na ɔnwunle sua ne la, ɔzunle,
42019042	na ɔzele kɛ, “Anrɛɛ ɛnɛ kenle ye bɔbɔ wɔahola wɔanwu deɛ mɔɔ maa anzonudwolɛ la! Na kɛkala ɛdeɛ, ɛnrɛhola ɛnrɛnwu ye!
42019043	Mekɛ bara mɔɔ wɔ kpɔvolɛma bapɛ ɛ bo kuma ayia; bɛbadua wɔ adenle, na bɛvi ɛbɔ nu nee ɛnweazo bɛaraholo ɛ nwo zo.
42019044	Bɛbagologolo wɔ bɛagua na bɛazɛkye menli mɔɔ wɔ zolɛ la amuala; bɛnrɛgyakyi bolɛ ko bɔbɔ wɔ ɔ bo zo ne, ɔboalekɛ wɔannwu mekɛ ne mɔɔ Nyamenle rale kɛ ɔbalie wɔ ngoane la.”
42019045	Akee Gyisɛse wolole Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne anu, na ɔbɔle ɔ bo kɛ ɔfoa gualilɛma ne mɔ,
42019046	na ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Bɛhɛlɛ ye wɔ Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne anu kɛ, Nyamenle se, ‘Bɛbavɛlɛ me Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne Nzɛlɛlɛ Sua!’ Na bɛmɛ, bɛhakyi ye nwule fealeka.”
42019047	Kenle biala Gyisɛse kilehile wɔ Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne anu. Sɛlɛvolɛ mgbanyinli ne, mɛla kilehilevolɛma ne, yɛɛ mgbanyima ne mɔ kpondɛle kɛ bɛkɛhu ye,
42019048	na bɛannyia nwolɛ adenle, ɔboalekɛ ɛnee menli ne amuala kulo kɛ bɛtie ye, amaa ye edwɛkɛ ne kpɔkɛ ko bɔbɔ andɛla bɛ nzo.
42020001	Kenle ko Gyisɛse wɔ Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne anu ɔlɛkilehile na ɔbɔ Edwɛkpa ne nolo la, sɛlɛvolɛ mgbanyinli ne, mɛla kilehilevolɛma ne, yɛɛ mgbanyima ne mɔ
42020002	rabizale ye kɛ, “Ka kile yɛ, duzu tumi a ɛlɛ, kɛ ɔwɔ kɛ ɛyɛ ninyɛne ɛhye mɔ a? Nwane a manle wɔ tumi ne a?”
42020003	Gyisɛse buale bɛ kɛ, “Bɛmaa medame noko membiza bɛ edwɛkɛ ko. Bɛha bɛhile me,
42020004	Dwɔn Sɔnevolɛ ne tumi ne mɔɔ ɔvale ɔzɔnenle menli la, ɔvi Nyamenle anzɛɛ sonla?”
42020005	Bɛbɔle ɔ bo kɛ bɛsu bɛ nwo kpolera kɛ, “Duzu edwɛkɛ a yɛha a? Saa yɛka kɛ, ‘Ɔvi Nyamenle’ a, ɔkɛha kɛ, ‘Ɛnee duzu ati a bɛanlie Dwɔn bɛanli a?’
42020006	Saa yɛka noko kɛ, ‘Ɔvi sonla’ a, menli ɛwolaa ye mɔɔ wɔ ɛke la amuala kɛzi yɛ awolɛ, ɔboalekɛ bɛdie bɛto nu kɛ Dwɔn le Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛ.”
42020007	Yemɔti bɛbuale ye kɛ, “Yɛnze ɛleka mɔɔ ye tumi ne vi a.”
42020008	Na Gyisɛse zele bɛ kɛ, “Ɛnee medame noko menrɛha tumi holɛ ko mɔɔ mefa meyɛ ninyɛne ɛhye mɔ la menrɛhile bɛ.”
42020009	Akee Gyisɛse bule menli ne ɛrɛlɛ ɛhye kɛ, “Nrenya bie hyele ye tola na ɔluale vanye ma wɔ nu. Ɔvale ɔmanle abunsama na ɔhɔle maanle zo ɔhɔhyɛle kpalɛ.
42020010	Ɛbuhenle ne dwule la, ɔzoanle ye sonvolɛ ko ɔmanle ɔhɔzele abunsama ne kɛ bɛva ye ɛkpɔ ɛdeɛ bɛmaa ɔrɛlɛ ye. Na abunsama ne bole ye na bɛmanle ɔlɛle ɔ sa mgbane ɔhɔle.
42020011	Yemɔti ɔzoanle sonvolɛ fofolɛ, na ɔdaye noko bɛbole ye, bɛzale ye, na bɛmanle ɔlɛle ɔ sa mgbane ɔhɔle.
42020012	Akee ɔzoanle ye sonvolɛ ne mɔɔ tɔ zo nsa la, na abunsama ne bodɛbodale ye, na bɛvuandinle ye bɛdole tola ne anzi lɔ.
42020013	Na tola menle ne zele kɛ, ‘Duzu a menyɛ a? Mesoa medame me ra ye mɔɔ mekulo ye la; medie medi kɛ bɛkɛli ye eni!’
42020014	Na mɔɔ abunsama ne nwunle ye la, bɛhanle bɛhilele bɛ nwo ngoko kɛ, ‘Ɛya menle ne ara ne ɛne. Bɛmaa yɛhu ye na ye agyadeɛ ne ɛyɛ yɛ ɛdeɛ.’
42020015	Yemɔti bɛvuandinle ye bɛdole ɛya ne anzi lɔ na bɛhunle ye.” Gyisɛse bizale bɛ kɛ, “Ɛnee akee duzu a tola menle ne kɛyɛ abunsama ne ɛ?
42020016	Ɔkɛrahu abunsama ne mɔ amuala, na ɔkɛva ɛya ne ɔkɛwula abunsama fofolɛ asa anu.” Menli ne mɔ dele ɛhye la, bɛzele kɛ, “Kyɛkyɛ, ɔnrɛyɛ ye zɔhane.”
42020017	Gyisɛse nleanle bɛ koonwu na ɔbizale bɛ kɛ, “Ɛnee akee kɛ Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ɛhye abo se ɛ? ‘Bolɛ ne mɔɔ suasivoma ne kpole la, ɛrayɛ bolɛ mɔɔ anwo hyia kpole kpalɛ a.’
42020018	“Awie biala mɔɔ kɛdɔ bolɛ zɔhane azo la, ɔbatete nzokanzoka; yɛɛ saa ɔtɔ awie anwo zo a, ɔbabɛtɛ ye kɛ tata.”
42020019	Mɛla kilehilevolɛma ne nee sɛlɛvolɛ mgbanyinli ne mɔ yɛle kɛ bɛkye Gyisɛse ɛkɛ ne ala, ɔboalekɛ bɛze kɛ ɔbule ɛrɛlɛ ne ɔtiale bɛ; noko akee bɛzulole menli ne anye.
42020020	Yemɔti bɛtetɛle ye. Bɛmanle menli bie ndoloboa bɛmanle bɛyɛle bɛ nwo kɛ asɛɛ bɛdi nɔhalɛ, na bɛzoanle bɛ kɛ bɛhɔdo Gyisɛse abɛla bɛbizebiza ye edwɛkɛ, amaa saa ɔ nloa fo a bɛahye ye na bɛava ye bɛahɔmaa Wulomu Amɛnlado ne ali ye edwɛkɛ.
42020021	Menli ɛhye mɔ zele Gyisɛse kɛ, “Kilehilevolɛ, yɛze kɛ mɔɔ ɛka nee mɔɔ ɛkilehile la le fɔɔnwo. Yɛze kɛ wɔmɔ ɛnnea sonla nyunlu yɛɛ ɛndie menli ngehaleɛ, na ɛkilehile Nyamenle ɛhulolɛdeɛ ne nɔhalɛ nu.
42020022	Ka kile yɛ, asoo yɛ mɛla ne tua kɛ yɛmmatua adwule yɛmaa Wulomu Maanle Maanle Belemgbunli ne anzɛɛ ɔwɔ kɛ yɛtua?”
42020023	Na Gyisɛse nwunle bɛ agyiba ne anzi na ɔzele bɛ kɛ,
42020024	“Bɛva dwɛtɛ fufule bɛrɛla bɛmaa menea. Nwane nvoninli nee ye duma a wɔ zolɛ la?” Bɛzele ye kɛ, “Wulomu Maanle Maanle Belemgbunli ne ɔ.”
42020025	Yemɔti Gyisɛse zele bɛ kɛ, “Ɛnee mɔɔ le Wulomu Maanle Maanle Belemgbunli ne ɛdeɛ la, bɛdua bɛmaa ye, na bɛdua mɔɔ le Nyamenle noko ɛdeɛ la bɛmaa ye.”
42020026	Gyisɛse nyelebɛnloa ne zinle bɛ nwo, yemɔti bɛ sa anga ye wɔ debie biala anu wɔ menli ne anyunlu ɛkɛ ne, na bɛhanle bɛ nloa bɛdole nu.
42020027	Akee Sadusiima bie noko rale Gyisɛse ɛkɛ ne. Menli ɛhye mɔ se sonla wu a bɛnrɛdwazo ye bɛnrɛra ngoane nu. Bɛbizale Gyisɛse kɛ,
42020028	“Kilehilevolɛ, Mosisi hɛlɛle mɛla ɛhye manle yɛ, ɔse: ‘Saa nrenya wu na ɔgyakyi ɔ ye mɔɔ ɔ nee ye anwo la a, ɔwɔ kɛ ɔ diema gya kunlanvolɛ raalɛ ne, na ɔ nee ye wo mralɛ maa ɔ diema ne mɔɔ ɛwu la.’
42020029	Na mediema nsuu bie ɛnee wɔ ɛkɛ. Bɛ nuhua kpanyinli ne gyale raalɛ na ɔ nee ye anwo yɛɛ ɔwule a.
42020030	Adiema ne mɔɔ tɔ zo nwiɔ la gyale raalɛ ne,
42020031	eza mɔɔ tɔ zo nsa la gyale ye. Zɔhane ala yɛɛ bɛdabɛ nsuu ne amuala bɛyɛle a. Bɛ biala nee ye anwo na yeawu.
42020032	Nzinlii raalɛ ne ɔdaye ɔwule.
42020033	Ɛnee akee kenle mɔɔ mɔwuamra kɛdwazo kɛra ngoane nu la, boni aye ɔ? Bɛdabɛ nsuu ne amuala bɛgyale ye bie.”
42020034	Gyisɛse buale bɛ kɛ, “Adwuleso mrenya nee mraalɛ gya bɛ nwo,
42020035	na mrenya nee mraalɛ mɔɔ anwo fɛta Nyamenle Belemgbunlililɛ ne la, saa mekɛ ne dwu na bɛdwazo bɛ bɛfi ewule nu a bɛngya bɛ nwo.
42020036	Bɛbayɛ kɛ anwuma soanvolɛma la na bɛnrɛwu ɛlɛ. Bɛle Nyamenle amra, ɔboalekɛ bɛdwazo bɛ bɛvi ewule nu.
42020037	Mosisi noko kile nu wienyi kɛ bɛdwazo mɔwuamra bɛba ngoane nu. Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne mɔɔ fane ɛbɔ ne mɔɔ ɛnee ɛlɛsɔ la anwo la, Mosisi ka kɛ Awulae le ‘Ebileham Nyamenle, Ayezeke Nyamenle, yɛɛ Gyekɔbo Nyamenle.’
42020038	Ɛhye kile kɛ ɔle teasema Nyamenle, ɔnle bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛwu la Nyamenle; ɔluakɛ ɔ nye zo a bɛ muala bɛde ngoane nu.”
42020039	Mɛla kilehilevolɛma ne bie mɔ zele kɛ, “Kilehilevolɛ, wɔ nyelebɛnloa ne le kpalɛ bɔkɔɔ!”
42020040	Na ɔvi kenle ko ne bɛangola ye kpuyia bieko biza.
42020041	Gyisɛse bizale bɛ kɛ, “Kɛmɔti a bɛka kɛ Mɛzaya ne bayɛ Devidi anlɔnra ɛ?
42020042	Ɔluakɛ Devidi mumua ne ka ye wɔ Edwɛndolɛ Buluku ne anu kɛ, ‘Awulae zele me Awulae kɛ, tɛnla me fema zo ɛke,
42020043	kɔkpula kɛ menwɔva wɔ kpɔvolɛma menwɔyɛ ɛ gyakɛ abo ebia.’
42020044	Saa Devidi vɛlɛle ye ‘Awulae’ a, ɛnee kɛ ɔsi mɔɔ Mɛzaya ne yɛ ye anlɔnra ɛ?”
42020045	Gyisɛse akee zele ye ɛdoavolɛma ne mɔ wɔ menli ne amuala anyunlu ɛkɛ ne kɛ,
42020046	“Bɛnlea boɛ wɔ mɛla kilehilevolɛma ne anwo; bɛmɛ, mɔɔ bɛkulo la a le adɛladeɛ ndendenle ɛwulalɛ, gua zo ɛkpɔsalɛ nee menli mɔɔ bɔ bɛ ti aze abiza bɛ ahye wɔ gua nu la; bɛkulo nyianu azua nu mgbanyinli ɛleka nee ɛkponledolɛ bo ɛleka kpalɛ ne mɔ ɛdɛnlanlɛ.
42020047	Bɛbɛlɛbɛla ahunlanvolɛ mraalɛ bɛbɔ bɛ awuke ne mɔ, na akee bɛakpati bɛayɛ nwolɛ nzɛlɛlɛ ndendenle. Bɛ ndeanlɛ bayɛ kpole kpalɛ!”
42021001	Gyisɛse dole ɔ nye na ɔnwunle kɛ sukoavolɛma lɛ bɛ ahyɛlɛ ninyɛne ɛlɛgua Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne gya ɛlɛka ne anu.
42021002	Eza ɔnwunle kɛ kunlanvolɛ raalɛ ehyianli ko noko lɛ ɛkpɔsɛba nwiɔ ɛlɛgua gya ne anu.
42021003	Gyisɛse zele kɛ, “Meka meahile bɛ, kunlanvolɛ raalɛ ehyianli ne ɛva mɔɔ le kpole la ɛgua gya ne anu ɛdɛla bɛ kɔsɔɔti.
42021004	Ɔluakɛ bɛdabɛ kɔsɔɔti, mɔɔ bɛlɛ la anwo nvasoɛ ne bie a bɛvale bɛraguale nu a, na raalɛ kunlanvolɛ ne, yemɔ, ye kpokpoti ne ala a yeva yeragua nu la.”
42021005	Ɛdoavolɛma ne bie mɔ hanle Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne anwo edwɛkɛ, ye kɛnlɛma, awolɛ ngɛnlɛma mɔɔ bɛvale bɛzile nee azubɔdeɛ mɔɔ bɛvale bɛmanle Nyamenle la. Na Gyisɛse zele kɛ,
42021006	“Ɛhye mɔ amuala mɔɔ bɛnwu bɛ la, mekɛ bara mɔɔ bolɛ ko bɔbɔ ɛnrɛla bolɛ zo a; bɛbagologolo bɛ muala bɛagua aze.”
42021007	Bɛbizale ye kɛ, “Kilehilevolɛ, kenlenzu a ɛhye mɔ bazi a? Duzu debie a bazi ahile kɛ mekɛ ɛdwu mɔɔ ɛhye mɔ si a?”
42021008	Gyisɛse zele kɛ, “Bɛnlea boɛ; bɛmmamaa bɛbɛlɛbɛla bɛ. Ɔluakɛ menli dɔɔnwo balua me duma nu ara na bɛaraze bɛ kɛ, ‘Mame a mele Kelaese ne a,’ na eza bɛaha kɛ, ‘Mekɛ ne ɛbikye.’ Na bɛmmatoa bɛ.
42021009	Saa bɛte konle nee nzakadolɛ nganeɛ a, bɛmmasulo; ɔwɔ kɛ ninyɛne ɛhye mɔ dumua sisi, na bɛngile kɛ awieleɛ ne ɛbikye.”
42021010	Ɔzɔle zolɛ ɔhanle kɛ, “Maanle maanle baho atia bɛ nwo, yɛɛ arelemgbunli badwazo arelemgbunli nwo zo.
42021011	Azɛlɛ bakpusu, ɛhɔne nee ewule ngakyile bara ɛleka dɔɔnwo, sɛkɛlɛneɛ mgbole nee ninyɛne ɛzulolɛ ngakyile basisi anwomanyunlu.
42021012	Bɛbahyehye bɛ, bɛayɛ bɛ kpɔdekpɔde, bɛbaye bɛ bɛamaa bɛali bɛ edwɛkɛ wɔ bɛ nyianu azua ne mɔ anu na bɛagua bɛ efiade; bɛbava bɛ bɛahɔgyinla arelemgbunli nee maanle mgbanyima nyunlu wɔ me ti kolaa na ɛhye mɔ asisi.
42021013	Mekɛ ne anu yɛɛ ɔwɔ kɛ akee bɛbɔ Edwɛkpa ne nolo a.
42021014	Bɛzie bɛ adwenle koonwu, bɛmmadwenle mɔɔ bɛbaha bɛalie bɛ nwo la anwo;
42021015	ɔboalekɛ mebamaa bɛ nrɛlɛbɛ nee edwɛkɛ agbɔkɛ meamaa bɛaha na bɛ kpɔvolɛma biala ɛnrɛhola bɛ nyunlu gyinla yeye bɛ nloa azo.
42021016	Bɛ awovolɛma nee bɛ mediema, bɛ mbusuafoɔ nee bɛ gɔnwo mɔ baye bɛ amaa, yɛɛ bɛbahu bɛ bie mɔ.
42021017	Ɔlua me ti, awie biala bakpɔ bɛ.
42021018	Na bɛ ti enrinli ko bɔbɔ ɛnrɛminli.
42021019	Bɛgyinla kpundii, na bɛkɛnyia ngoane.”
42021020	“Na saa bɛnwu kɛ ɛlɔnema ɛbɔ ɛyia Gyɛlusalɛm a, ɛnee bɛnwu ye kɛ ɔnrɛhyɛ biala na bɛazɛkye ye.
42021021	Saa ɔba ye zɛhae a, bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛwɔ Dwudiya la ɛnriandi ɛhɔ awoka ne mɔ azo lɔ; bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛwɔ suakpole ne azo la ɔwɔ kɛ fi ɛkɛ, yɛɛ bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛhɔ namule nu la mmaba suakpole ne azo.
42021022	Ɔluakɛ mekɛ ne le ‘Ndeanlɛ Mekɛ’ mɔɔ bamaa mɔɔ Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne ka la ayɛ nɔhalɛ a.
42021023	Mekɛ ne anu, mraalɛ mɔɔ ɛva ɛkolɛ nee mɔɔ via mraalɛ la, bɛ gyakɔ! Nyanenwunlɛ ɛzulolɛ kpole kpalɛ bara azɛlɛ ye azo, na Nyamenle ndeanlɛ ne bara menli ɛhye mɔ anwo zo.
42021024	Bie mɔ badɔ dadeɛ nloa, bɛbahye bie mɔ nuokɛ bɛ nee bɛ ahɔ maanɔne; menli mɔɔ ɛnze Nyamenle la barava Gyɛlusalɛm azɛlɛ ye adɛnla zo kɔkpula kɛ bɛ mekɛ kɛdwu la.
42021025	“Sɛkɛlɛneɛ ɛzulolɛ basisi sɛnzɛne ne, siane ne nee nwɔlɔra ne mɔ anyunlu. Maanle maanle arɛle babɔ, na bɛ ti akunlu azɛkye nyevile ne ɛzɛkyelɛ nee ye ɛhululɛ nwo.
42021026	Ɛzulolɛ ngome bamaa menli nye zo abulu wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ bɛlɛkendɛ mɔɔ bazi aleɛabo amra anwo zo la, ɔluakɛ bɛbadudu anwumaneamra bɛavi bɛ ndenle ne mɔ azo.
42021027	Na akee bɛbanwu medame, Sonla Ra kɛ melua amungu ne anu, melɛ tumi nee anyunlunyia kpole melɛba.
42021028	Mɔɔ ninyɛne ɛhye mɔ kɛbɔ ɔ bo kɛ bɛsisi la, anrɛɛ bɛmaa bɛ nye zo bɛnlea maanle nu, ɔboalekɛ ɛnee bɛ ngoanelielɛ ne ɛbikye.”
42021029	Akee Gyisɛse bule bɛ ɛrɛlɛ ɛhye: “Bɛnlea feege baka ne nee mbaka mɔɔ ɛha la kɔsɔɔti.
42021030	Mekɛ mɔɔ bɛkɛbɔ ɔ bo kɛ bɛyeye nya fofolɛ la ɛnee bɛze kɛ wawaa ɛbikye.
42021031	Zɔhane ala yɛɛ mekɛ mɔɔ bɛkɛnwu kɛ ninyɛne ɛhye mɔ ɛlɛsisi la, ɛnee bɛnwu ye kɛ Nyamenle Belemgbunlililɛ ne ɛbikye a.
42021032	“Bɛhakye kɛ ninyɛne ɛhye mɔ basisi kolaa na menli mɔɔ kɛkala de aze la amuala awie wu.
42021033	Anwuma nee aze bapɛ nu aze, na me nloa edwɛkɛ ɛdeɛ ɔnrɛpɛ nu ɛlɛ.”
42021034	“Bɛnlea bɛ nwo boɛ! Bɛmmamaa anyelielɛ dɔɔnwo, nza ɛbolɛ nee ɛbɛla ye anu ɛvɛlɛvɛlɛ di bɛ adwenle somaa, anrɛɛ Ndɛnebualɛ Kenle ne ɛralɛ kɛli bɛ nvunu kɛhye bɛ kɛ ɛhane;
42021035	ɔluakɛ ɔbara awie biala mɔɔ wɔ aleɛabo la anwo zo.
42021036	Zɔhane ati bɛzinza na bɛzɛlɛ dahuu na bɛanyia anwosesebɛ bɛali ninyɛne ɛhye mɔ mɔɔ basisi la anwo zo konim, na bɛahola medame Sonla Ra, me nyunlu gyinla.”
42021037	Gyisɛse vale mekɛ ɛhye hilehilele wɔ nyianu sua ne anu, na ye nɔsolɛ nu yeahɔla Ɔlivi Boka ne azo.
42021038	Nwonlomɔ biala menli ne amuala yia ye wɔ nyianu sua ne anu kɛ bɛbadie ye edwɛkɛ.
42022001	Mɔɔ Angye Ɛvoyia ne, mɔɔ ye ko ne ala a le Akpabɛnwo Ɛvoyia ne la bikyele la,
42022002	sɛlɛvolɛ mgbanyinli ne nee mɛla kilehilevolɛma ne mɔ bɔle adwenle kɛ bɛfa adenle bie azo kɛ bɛ sa kɛha Gyisɛse bɛkɛhu ye bɛkɛvea, ɔluakɛ bɛsulo menli ne.
42022003	Seetan wolole Dwudase, mɔɔ eza bɛfɛlɛ ye Yesekaleɔto na ɔle ɛdoavolɛma bulu nee nwiɔ ne anu ko la.
42022004	Yemɔti ɔhɔle na ɔ nee sɛlɛvolɛ mgbanyinli ne nee Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne sinzavolɛma mgbanyinli ne mɔ hɔdwenlenle nwolɛ kɛ ɔkɛzi ɔkɛyɛ na yeaye Gyisɛse yeamaa bɛ la.
42022005	Ɛhye yɛle bɛ fɛ, na bɛbɔle ɛwɔkɛ kɛ bɛkɛmaa ye ezukoa.
42022006	Dwudase kponlenle zolɛ na ɔbɔle ɔ bo kɛ ɔkpondɛ mekɛ kpalɛ yeaye Gyisɛse yeamaa bɛ mɔɔ menli ne ɛnrɛde nwolɛ bie a.
42022007	Angye Ɛvoyia ne dwule na ɔwɔ kɛ bɛku mboane mɔɔ bɛfa bɛado Akpabɛnwo Ɛvoyia aleɛ ne la,
42022008	Gyisɛse zoanle Pita nee Dwɔn kɛ, “Bɛhɔ bɛhɔziezie yɛ Akpabɛnwo Ɛvoyia aleɛ ne bɛmaa yɛli.”
42022009	Bɛbizale ye kɛ, “Nienwu a ɛkulo kɛ yɛsiezie ye a?”
42022010	Ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Bɛhɔ suakpole ne azo na bɛ nee nrenya bie mɔɔ zo nzule wɔ buakɛ nu la bayia. Bɛdoa ye bɛ nee ye ɛhɔ awuke ne mɔɔ ɔkɛwolo nu la anu,
42022011	na bɛze awuke menle ne kɛ, ‘Kilehilevolɛ ne se, ekpumgbunli ne boni anu a me nee me ɛdoavolɛma ne bali Akpabɛnwo Ɛvoyia aleɛ ne a?’
42022012	Na ɔkɛhile bɛ ekpumgbunli kpole bie wɔ ɛbolɔnsam ne azo mɔɔ bɛziezie nuhua a, na ɛkɛ ne yɛɛ bɛziezie aleɛ ne a.”
42022013	Na ɛdoavolɛma ne hɔle na bɛhɔnwunle ye, kɛmɔ Gyisɛse hanle hilele bɛ ala la, na bɛzieziele Akpabɛnwo Ɛvoyia aleɛ ne.
42022014	Mekɛ ne dwule la, Gyisɛse nee ye ɛdoavolɛma ne dɛnlanle aze wɔ ɛkponle nwo,
42022015	na ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Mɔɔ mekpondɛ ye ɛsesebɛ ɛsesebɛ a le kɛ me nee bɛ kɛli Akpabɛnwo Ɛvoyia aleɛ ɛhye kolaa na meazɔ me nyanenwunlɛ sa!
42022016	Ɔluakɛ meka meahile bɛ kɛ, menrɛli ye bieko kɔkpula kɛ ye kpɔkɛ mɔɔ ɔgyi zo la ɛli munli wɔ Nyamenle Belemgbunlililɛ nu.”
42022017	Akee Gyisɛse vale dwora ne, ɔyɛle Nyamenle mo, na ɔzele kɛ, “Bɛlie ɛhye bɛnlo.
42022018	Ɔluakɛ meka meahile bɛ, ɔvi ɛnɛ mɔɔ kɔ la menrɛnlo vanye ma nu nzule bieko kɔkpula kɛ Nyamenle Belemgbunlililɛ ne kɛra la.”
42022019	Akee ɔvale kpanwo, ɔyɛle Nyamenle mo, ɔbubule nuhua, ɔvale ɔmanle bɛ na ɔzele kɛ, “Ɛhye a le me nwonane ne [mɔɔ bɛva bɛmaa bɛ la. Anrɛɛ bɛyɛ ɛhye bɛva bɛhakye me.”
42022020	Zɔhane ala noko yɛɛ mɔɔ bɛwiele debie di la, ɔvale dwora ne ɔmanle bɛ na ɔhanle kɛ, “Dwora ɛhye mɔɔ bɛlɛno nu la a le Nyamenle ngyekyeleɛ fofolɛ ne mɔɔ bɛva me mogya ne bɛzɔ ɔ nloa la; bɛlie bɛnlo.]
42022021	“Na bɛnlea, sonla ne mɔɔ ye me amaa la nee me de ɛkponle ye anwo ɛke!
42022022	Na medame Sonla Ra mebawu, kɛmɔ Nyamenle ɛhyehyɛ ala la, na munzule doa sonla ne mɔɔ ye me amaa la!”
42022023	Yemɔti bɛbɔle ɔ bo kɛ bɛbizebiza bɛ nwo kɛ bɛ nuhua boni a bayɛ deɛ ɛhye a.
42022024	Kpolerazulɛ dɔle ɛdoavolɛma ne avinli mɔɔ fane bɛ nuhua mɔɔ le kpole kpalɛ wɔ bɛ nu la anwo.
42022025	Na Gyisɛse zele bɛ kɛ, “Aleɛabo arelemgbunli kile tumi wɔ bɛ menli nwo zo, yɛɛ menli mɔɔ lɛ dibile la maa bɛfɛlɛ bɛ ‘nyeleyɛvolɛma.’
42022026	Na bɛmɛ, asolo bɛ, ɔwɔ kɛ bɛ nuhua kpole kpalɛ ne yɛ ɔ nwo kakula nretee, yɛɛ ɔwɔ kɛ mɔɔ gyi bɛ ti la yɛ ɔ nwo kɛ sonvolɛ.
42022027	Mɔɔ tɛnla aze di debie, yɛɛ mɔɔ sonle mɔɔ ɛlɛdi debie la, boni a le kpole a? Mɔɔ tɛnla aze la ɔ. Na mame, me nee bɛ de kɛ mesonle bɛ.
42022028	“Bɛ nee me ɛdɛnla ɛhyɛ wɔ me sɔnea ne mɔ anu;
42022029	yemɔti kɛmɔ Egya ɛmaa me tumi kɛ menli belemgbunli la, zɔhane ala noko yɛɛ bɛbayɛ a.
42022030	Bɛ nee me badɛnla me ɛkponle nwo, bɛali debie na bɛanlo wɔ me Belemgbunlililɛ ne anu, na bɛbadɛnlɛdɛnla arelemgbunli mbia zo bɛabua mbusua bulu nee nwiɔ ne ndɛne.”
42022031	Akee Gyisɛse zele Pita kɛ, “Saemɔn, Saemɔn! Tie! Seetan ɛnyia adenle kɛ ɔsɔ bɛ muala yeanlea, na yeakpa bɛ nu yeaye kpalɛ ne yeavi ɛtane ne anu kɛ ɛyazonlɛnli kpa abɛlɛ nu la.
42022032	Na mezɛlɛ memaa wɔmɔ Saemɔn, amaa wɔ diedi amkpo aze. Na saa ɛsia ɛba me nwo bieko a, si ɛ mediema ne mɔ ahonle.”
42022033	Pita buale kɛ, “Awulae, meziezie me nwo kɛ saa ewule nu o, efiade nla nu o, me nee wɔ kɛhɔ!”
42022034	Gyisɛse zele ye kɛ, “Pita, meka meahile wɔ, ɛnɛ nɔe, mɔɔ akɔlɛ kabɔ la ɛnee wɔha ye fane nsa kɛ ɛnze me.”
42022035	Akee Gyisɛse bizale ye ɛdoavolɛma ne kɛ, “Ɛkenle mɔɔ menzoanle bɛ mɔɔ bɛanva ezukoa kodoku, adendulɛ kodoku, anzɛɛ mgbɔlaboa la, asoo bɛhyianle debie nwo?” Bɛbuale kɛ, “Kyɛkyɛ, yeangyia ɛhwee nwo.”
42022036	Gyisɛse zele bɛ kɛ, “Na kɛkala, mɔɔ lɛ ezukoa kodoku anzɛɛ adendulɛ kodoku la ɛva; yɛɛ mɔɔ ɛnlɛ dadeɛ la ɛdɔne ye tɛladeɛ ne na ɔdɔ bie.
42022037	Ɔluakɛ meka meahile bɛ, ɔwɔ kɛ mɔɔ Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne ɛha ye wɔ me nwo la yɛ nɔhalɛ. Ɔse, ‘Bɛdianle ye bɛbokale maamɔvoma anwo,’ ɔboalekɛ mɔɔ bɛhɛlɛle mɔɔ fane me nwo la ɛlɛba arape zolɛ.”
42022038	Ɛdoavolɛma ne zele ye kɛ, “Awulae, nea, yɛlɛ dadeɛ nwiɔ wɔ ɛke!” Ɔbuale bɛ kɛ, “Yeyɛ boɛ!”
42022039	Gyisɛse vile suakpole ne azo na ɔhɔle Ɔlivi Boka ne azo, kɛmɔ ɔyɛ ye dɛba ne ala la, na ye ɛdoavolɛma ne doale ye.
42022040	Ɔdwule ɛkɛ ne la, ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Bɛzɛlɛ na bɛangɔ ngyegyelɛ nu.”
42022041	Akee ɔvile bɛ nwo ɛkɛ ne ɔhɔle ɔ nyunlu ekyii na ɔhotole ɔzɛlɛle kɛ,
42022042	“Egya, saa ɔyɛ wɔ ɛhulolɛ a, ye nyanenwunlɛ dwora ɛhye fi me nloa; tɛ me ɛhulolɛdeɛ ɔ, na wɔ ɛhulolɛdeɛ ɛyɛ ɛkɛ.” [
42022043	Nyamenle soanvolɛma vi anwuma rale na bɛramanle ye anwosesebɛ.
42022044	Ɔvale nyane kpole kpalɛ ɔzɛlɛle ɛsesebɛ ɛsesebɛ, na ɛhɛlɛnra mɔɔ dule ye la le kɛ mogya ndɔkɛ tetele guale aze.]
42022045	Ɔwiele nzɛlɛlɛ ne yɛ la, ɔdwazole ɔrale ye ɛdoavolɛma ne mɔ anwo ɛkɛ na ɔnwunle kɛ nyane dɔɔnwo mɔɔ ɛlɛku bɛ la ɛmaa bɛlafe.
42022046	Na ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Duzu ati a bɛlɛdafe ɛ? Bɛdwazo na bɛzɛlɛ na bɛangɔ ngyegyelɛ nu.”
42022047	Gyisɛse anloa wɔ zo ɔlɛtendɛ la yɛɛ ɛlɔne vindele ɛkɛ ne a. Dwudase mɔɔ le bulu nee nwiɔ ne anu ko la li bɛ nyunlu. Ɔbikyele Gyisɛse na ɔvole ɔ nloa anwo.
42022048	Na Gyisɛse bizale ye kɛ, “Dwudase, ɛfo me nloa anwo wɔaye medame Sonla Ra wɔamaa ɔ?”
42022049	Ɛdoavolɛma mɔɔ wɔ Gyisɛse anwo ɛkɛ ne la nwunle mɔɔ ɛlɛba arazi la, bɛzele kɛ, “Awulae, yɛva yɛ dadeɛ ne yɛho ɔ?”
42022050	Ɛkɛ ne ala bɛ nuhua ko hwenle dadeɛ pɛle sɛlɛvolɛ kpanyinli ne sonvolɛ ne anzo fema ne.
42022051	Na Gyisɛse zele bɛ kɛ, “Yeyɛ boɛ!” Na ɔvale ɔ sa ɔhanle nrenya ne anzo ɔyɛle ye ayile.
42022052	Akee Gyisɛse zele sɛlɛvolɛ mgbanyinli ne nee Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne neavolɛ mgbanyinli ne nee mgbanyima ne mɔ mɔɔ hɔle kɛ bɛkahye ye la kɛ, “Na ɔhyia kɛ bɛkɛva dadeɛ nee ahoholombaka bɛkɛra me ɛhyelɛ ɔ?
42022053	Dahuu me nee bɛ a wɔ Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne anu a, na bɛangola bɛangye me. Na awozinli nu tumi ne ɛdwazo, yemɔti bɛ mekɛ ne ala ɛne!”
42022054	Bɛhyele Gyisɛse bɛ nee ye hɔle Sɛlɛvolɛ Kpanyinli ne sua nu; na Pita doale bɛ nanamogya.
42022055	Ɛnee menli bie ɛwuda senle wɔ suakunlu ɛkɛ ne na bɛde nwolɛ, na Pita hɔdɛnlanle bɛ nwo ɛkɛ ne.
42022056	Mɔɔ sonvolɛ mbɛlɛra ne mɔ anu ko nwunle ye kɛ ɔde senle ne anwo la, ɔnleanle ye koonwu na ɔzele kɛ, “Nrenya ɛhye noko nee Gyisɛse a lua a!”
42022057	Pita zale na ɔzele kɛ, “Ɔmɔ, menze ye bɔbɔ!”
42022058	Ɔ nzi hyɛle ekyii la, nrenya bie ɔdaye ɔranwunle Pita na ɔzele kɛ, “Ɛdawɔ noko ɛboka bɛ nwo!” Pita zele kɛ, “Ayi, memboka nwo!”
42022059	Kɛyɛ dɔnehwele ko anzi nrenya ko ɔdaye ɔrahanle ye ndinlizo kɛ, “Ɔle nɔhalɛ bɔkɔɔ kɛ nrenya ɛhye nee Gyisɛse a lua a; ɔle Galelinli!”
42022060	Na Pita buale kɛ, “Yɛmenle, menze mɔɔ ɛlɛka la anwo bie fee!” Na ɛkɛ ne ala, mɔɔ ɛnee ɔ nloa wɔ zolɛ ɔlɛtendɛ la, akɔlɛ bɔle.
42022061	Awulae hakyile ɔ nye nleanle Pita, na Pita hakyele Awulae edwɛkɛ ne mɔɔ ɔhanle kɛ, “Mɔɔ akɔlɛ kabɔ la, ɛnee wɔha ye fane nsa kɛ ɛnze me” la.
42022062	Na Pita vindele hɔzunle alɔbɔlɛ ɛzunlɛ.
42022063	Menli mɔɔ ɛnee ɛlɛsinza Gyisɛse la zile ye amgbu na bɛbole ye.
42022064	Bɛkyekyele ɔ nye na bɛlile ye ahodomgbole. Bɛbɔ ye na bɛabiza ye kɛ, “Nwane a bɔle wɔ a? Ye ahenle!”
42022065	Na bɛhanle edwɛkɛ ɛtane ɛtane dɔɔnwo bɛtietiale ye.
42022066	Mɔɔ maanle nu tetele la, mgbanyima ne, sɛlɛvolɛ mgbanyinli ne, yɛɛ mɛla kilehilevolɛma ne mɔ yiale nu na bɛvale Gyisɛse bɛraziele ayia ne anyunlu.
42022067	Bɛbizale ye kɛ, “Ka maa yɛdie bie, wɔmɔ a ɛle Mɛzaya ne ɔ?” Gyisɛse buale kɛ, “Saa meka a, bɛnrɛlie me bɛnrɛli,
42022068	yɛɛ mebiza bɛ edwɛkɛ a, bɛnrɛye me ɔ nloa.
42022069	Na ɔvi ɛnɛ mɔɔ kɔ la medame Sonla Ra, mebadɛnla Tumivolɛ Nyamenle ne asa fema zo.”
42022070	Bɛ muala bɛhanle kɛ, “Ɛnee wɔmɔ a ɛle Nyamenle Ara ne a?” Ɔbuale bɛ kɛ, “Ɛhɛe, yemɔ ala a bɛdabɛ bɛha la.”
42022071	Na bɛhanle kɛ, “Yɛngyia alasevolɛ biala! Yɛdayɛ mumua ne yɛde ɔ nloa edwɛkɛ!”
42023001	Menli ne amuala dwazole na bɛvale Gyisɛse bɛhɔle Paelɛte anyunlu,
42023002	na bɛbɔle ɔ bo kɛ bɛtoɔdoa ye kɛ, “Yɛhyele nrenya ɛhye kɛ ɔlɛsɛkye yɛ menli ne mɔ adwenle, ɔse bɛmmatua adwule bɛmaa Maanle Maanle Belemgbunli ne na eza ɔkilehile kɛ ɔdaye mumua ne ɔle Kelaese, belemgbunli bie.”
42023003	Na Paelɛte bizale ye kɛ, “Wɔmɔ a ɛle Dwuuma belemgbunli ne la ɔ?” Gyisɛse buale kɛ, “Yemɔ ala a wɔha la.”
42023004	Paelɛte zele sɛlɛvolɛ mgbanyinli ne nee menli dɔɔnwo ne kɛ, “Mennwu ɛtane biala mɔɔ nrenya ye ɛyɛ a.”
42023005	Na bɛ nye bolole ɛsesebɛ bɛzele kɛ, “Ɔlɛfa ye ngilehilelɛ ne yeamaa menli ne ado nzaka wɔ Dwudiya amuala. Ɔbɔle ɔ bo wɔ Galeli yɛɛ yeradwu ɛke a.”
42023006	Paelɛte dele ɛhye la, ɔbizale kɛ, “Na nrenya ɛhye le Galelinli ɔ?”
42023007	Na mɔɔ ɔdele ɔ bo kɛ Gyisɛse vi maanzinli ne mɔɔ Hɛlɔdo a nea zo la anu la, ɔmanle bɛvale ye bɛhɔmanle Hɛlɔdo; mekɛ ne anu ɛnee Hɛlɔdo ɔdaye yera Gyɛlusalɛm.
42023008	Hɛlɔdo nwunle Gyisɛse la ɔlile fɛlɛko kpole, ɔluakɛ ɛnee yede ye nganeɛ na dɛba dɛba ye amuala ɔkpondɛ kɛ ɔnwu ye. Eza ɔ nye la kɛ ɔkɛnwu Gyisɛse kɛ ɔlɛyɛ nwanwane debie.
42023009	Yemɔti Hɛlɔdo bizebizale Gyisɛse edwɛkɛ dɔɔnwo, na Gyisɛse ambua ye.
42023010	Sɛlɛvolɛ mgbanyinli ne nee mɛla kilehilevolɛma ne mɔ zile gyinlanle, bɔle bɛ nyunlu bile, totonle Gyisɛse ɛzonle mgbole.
42023011	Hɛlɔdo nee ye ɛlɔnema ne noko golole Gyisɛse anwo na bɛzile ye amgbu. Bɛvale tɛladeɛ kɛnlɛma bie mɔɔ arelemgbunli ala a wula la bie bɛwulale ye, na ɔzianenle ye ɔhɔmanle Paelɛte.
42023012	Ɔvi kenle ko ne ala Paelɛte nee Hɛlɔdo yɛle agɔnwolɛ, ɔluakɛ ɛnee bɛ mu nwiɔ bɛnga.
42023013	Paelɛte vɛlɛle sɛlɛvolɛ mgbanyinli ne, mgbanyima ne mɔ yɛɛ ɛlɔne ne amuala manle bɛyiale,
42023014	na ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Bɛvale nrenya ɛhye bɛrɛlɛle me kɛ ɔlɛsɛkye menli adwenle. Kɛkala, mebizebiza ye edwɛkɛ wɔ bɛ nyunlu ɛke, na mennwu debie biala mɔɔ tia ye wɔ edwɛkɛ mɔɔ bɛha bɛdo ɔ nwo zo la anwo a.
42023015	Hɛlɔdo ɔdaye yeambua ye fɔlɛ, ɔluakɛ yeziane ye yerɛlɛ yɛ. Ɔtɛyɛle debie biala mɔɔ fɛta ewule a.
42023016	Yemɔti memaa bɛabila ye mbaka na meagyakyi ye meamaa yeahɔ.” [
42023017	Akpabɛnwo Ɛvoyia ne dwu a ɔwɔ kɛ Paelɛte gyakyi sonla ko mɔɔ bɛdo ye efiade la maa bɛ.]
42023018	Menli ne amuala deɛdeanle nuhua zele kɛ, “Ku ye! Ye Balabase maa yɛ!”
42023019	(Balabase, ɔlua nzaka mɔɔ bɛdole wɔ suakpole ne azo, nee ye kɔdiawu ti yɛɛ bɛhyele ye bɛdole efiade a.)
42023020	Ɛnee Paelɛte kpondɛ kɛ ɔgyakyi Gyisɛse, yemɔti ɔdendɛle ɔhilele menli ne bieko.
42023021	Na bɛdeɛdeanle nuhua bieko kɛ, “Bɔ ye meanubaka nu! Bɔ ye meanubaka nu!”
42023022	Paelɛte hanle ye fane nsa ne azo hilele bɛ kɛ, “Na duzu ɛtane a nrenya ye ɛyɛ a? Mennwu debie biala mɔɔ yeyɛ mɔɔ fɛta ewule a. Yemɔti memaa bɛabila ye mbaka na meagyakyi ye.”
42023023	Na bɛhɔle zolɛ bɛdeɛdeanle nuhua ɛsesebɛ kɛ ɔwɔ kɛ bɛbɔ Gyisɛse meanubaka nu, na nzinlii bɛlile konim.
42023024	Yemɔti Paelɛte buale Gyisɛse ndɛne, kɛmɔ bɛkpondɛ la.
42023025	Ɔyele sonla ne mɔɔ ɔlua ye kɔdiawu nee ye maamɔlɛ nzakadolɛ zo bɛdole ye efiade na bɛse bɛkpondɛ ye la ɔmanle bɛ, na ɔvale Gyisɛse ɔmanle bɛ kɛ mɔɔ bɛkulo la, bɛyɛ.
42023026	Sogyama ne vale Gyisɛse hɔle. Mɔɔ bɛkɔ la, bɛ nee nrenya bie mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye Saemɔn mɔɔ vi Saelin la yiale kɛ ɔvi ye namule zo ɔlɛba suakpole ne azo. Bɛhyele ye nuokɛ na bɛvale meanubaka ne bɛzoale ye kɛ ɔli Gyisɛse anzi.
42023027	Menli dɔɔnwo kpalɛ doale Gyisɛse. Mraalɛ mɔɔ ɛnee ɛlɛsu ye ye ye awolɛ la noko boka nwo.
42023028	Na Gyisɛse hakyile ɔ nye wɔ bɛ nwo na ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Gyɛlusalɛm mraalɛ! Bɛmmasu me, bɛzu bɛ nwo nee bɛ mra.
42023029	Ɔluakɛ mekɛ ɛlɛba mɔɔ menli baze kɛ, ‘Mraalɛ mɔɔ le mota, mɔɔ anwo mralɛ, yɛɛ bɛtɛnoanle ngakula nyɛfolɛ ɛlɛ la ati ɛyɛ boɛ!’
42023030	Mekɛ ne anu, menli baze awoka mgbole kɛ, ‘Bɛdu bɛgua yɛ nwo zo!’ Na bɛaze awoka ngyikyi kɛ, ‘Bɛva yɛ bɛvea!’
42023031	Ɔluakɛ saa bɛyɛ ninyɛne ɛhye mɔ wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ baka ne le amolɛ la a, ɛnee saa baka ne wu a, duzu a bɛkɛyɛ a?”
42023032	Bɛvale menli nwiɔ mɔɔ le maamɔvoma la bɛbokale Gyisɛse anwo bɛhɔle kɛ bɛkahu bɛ.
42023033	Mɔɔ bɛdwule ɛleka bie mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye “Etile Kanrɛlɛ” la, bɛbɔle Gyisɛse meanubaka nu wɔ ɛkɛ ne, yemɔ yɛɛ maamɔvoma nwiɔ ne, ko wɔ ye fema zo yɛɛ ko noko wɔ ye bɛne zo.
42023034	Na Gyisɛse zele kɛ, “Egya, fa bɛ ɛtane kyɛ bɛ! Bɛnze mɔɔ bɛlɛyɛ la.” Bɛguale ye adɛladeɛ ne mɔ anwo nzeleba na bɛhyɛle.
42023035	Mekɛ mɔɔ menli ne gyi ɛkɛ ne ɛlɛnea la ɛnee Dwuu mgbanyima ne mɔ mɔɔ wɔ bɛ nu la ɛlɛsi ye amgbu kɛ, “Se ɔliele awie mɔ ngoane o; saa yemɔ a ɔle Mɛzaya ne mɔɔ Nyamenle ɛkpa nu ɛye ye la amgba a, bɛmaa ɔlie ɔ nwo ngoane ɔmaa yɛnlea!”
42023036	Sogyama ne bɛdabɛ bɛzile ye amgbu; bɛhɔle ɔ nwo ɛkɛ ne na bɛvale nwanye ɛnwonle bie bɛmanle ye,
42023037	na bɛzele kɛ, “Saa wɔmɔ a ɛle Dwuuma belemgbunli ne a ɛnee die ɛ nwo ɛ!”
42023038	Bɛhɛlɛle debie bɛbɔle ɔ ti zo anwuma kɛ, “Dwuuma belemgbunli ne ɛne.”
42023039	Maamɔvoma ne mɔ mɔɔ ɛnee bɛbɔ bɛ meanubaka nu la anu ko dendɛle tiale Gyisɛse kɛ, “Tɛ wɔmɔ a ɛle Kelaese ne la ɔ? Die ɛ nwo na die yɛdayɛ noko ɛ!”
42023040	Na ko ne hwile ɔ nyunlu zele kɛ, “Wɔmɔ ɛnzulo Nyamenle? Bɛbua wɔ ewule fɔlɛ kɛ ɔdaye ala la.
42023041	Na yɛmɛ yɛ ɛdeɛ ne le fɔɔnwo, ɔboalekɛ mɔɔ yɛyɛ la yɛɛ bɛlɛtua yɛ nwolɛ kakɛ a; na yemɔ, ɔtɛyɛle ɛtane biala.”
42023042	Akee ɔhanle ɔhilele Gyisɛse kɛ, “Yɛmenle Gyisɛse, saa ɛdi wɔ belemgbunli ne a kakye me.”
42023043	Gyisɛse zele ye kɛ, “Mebɔ wɔ ɛwɔkɛ kɛ, ɛnɛ kenle ye, me nee wɔ bahɔ Paladaese.”
42023044	-
42023045	Kɛyɛ sɛnzɛngyinla yɛɛ ewia ne nlunle a, na awozinli hedale maanle ne amuala azo toonwo ewiazo dɔne nsa. Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne anu mgbɛnu ɛdanlɛ ne dele sinli nwiɔ.
42023046	Na Gyisɛse deanle nu kpole kɛ, “Egya! Me ɛkɛla wɔ ɛ sa nu!” Ɔhanle ɛhye na ɔwule.
42023047	Sogya kpanyinli ne nwunle mɔɔ ɛzi la, na ɔyele Nyamenle ayɛlɛ ɔhanle kɛ, “Amgba, nrenya ne ati anu fufule!”
42023048	Menli dɔɔnwo ne mɔɔ rale ɛkɛ ne kɛ bɛbanlea bie la nwunle mɔɔ zile la, bɛbɔle bɛ sa ati na bɛziale bɛhɔle.
42023049	Manivolɛma mɔɔ ze Gyisɛse, nee mraalɛ ne mɔ mɔɔ doale ye vi Galeli rale la gyinlanle ahane moa moa nleanle mɔɔ ɛlɛkɔ zolɛ la.
42023050	-
42023051	Nrenya bie wɔ ɛkɛ, bɛfɛlɛ ye Dwosefi. Ɔvi Arelematia mɔɔ wɔ Dwudiya maanzinli nu la. Nrenya ne le sonlakpalɛ, ɔdi nɔhalɛ na ɔlɛkendɛ Nyamenle Belemgbunlililɛ ne ɛralɛ. Ɔboka Ayiama ne anwo, noko yeanlie bɛ kpɔkɛbɔlɛ ne nee mɔɔ bɛyɛle la yeando nu.
42023052	Ɔhɔle Paelɛte ɛkɛ ne na ɔhɔzɛlɛle ye Gyisɛse funli ne.
42023053	Ɔdwulale funli ne aze, ɔvale lenen ɛdanlɛ ɔkyekyele funli ne na ɔvale ye ɔdole nla bie mɔɔ bɛpɛ ye wɔ bolɛ bie anu na bɛtɛsiele awie biala nu la anu.
42023054	Kenle ne le Yalɛ, na Ɛnwomenlelielɛ Kenle ne ɛbikye.
42023055	Mraalɛ ne mɔ mɔɔ nee Gyisɛse vi Galeli rale la nee Dwosefi hɔle hɔnwunle sɛka ne nee kɛ bɛzile bɛziele ye la.
42023056	Akee bɛziale bɛhɔle sua nu bɛhɔkpondɛle alufuanlɛ nee sakyeɛ evuanlɛ mɔɔ bɛfa bɛakpokpa funli ne la. Akee bɛliele bɛ ɛnwomenle wɔ Ɛnwomenlelielɛ Kenle ne, kɛmɔ mɛla ne se la.
42024001	Molɛ nwonlomɔ mangyee ne ala mraalɛ ne mɔ vale bɛ alufuanlɛ ne mɔɔ bɛyɛle la hɔle sɛka ne azo.
42024002	Bɛnwunle kɛ bɛhundo bolɛ ne bɛvi nla ne anloa,
42024003	yemɔti bɛwolole nuhua, na bɛannwu Awulae Gyisɛse funli ne.
42024004	Bɛ adwenle yɛle bɛ kpomgbondee, na arɛlevilɛ nu ala mrenya nwiɔ mɔɔ wula adɛladeɛ nwohyee la ragyinlanle bɛ nwo ɛkɛ ne.
42024005	Ɛzulolɛ hanle bɛ la ati, bɛbutubutule bɛ nye aze, na menli ne mɔ bizale bɛ kɛ, “Duzu ati a bɛlɛkpondɛ mɔɔ de aze la wɔ mɔwuamra anu ɛ?
42024006	Ɔnle ɛke, bɛdwazo ye. Bɛhakye mɔɔ ɔhanle ɔhilele bɛ wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ ɛnee ɔwɔ Galeli la. Ɔhanle kɛ, Luk 9.22; 18.31-33
42024007	‘Ɔwɔ kɛ bɛye Sonla Ra ne bɛwula ɛtanevolɛma asa anu, na bɛbɔ ye meanubaka nu bɛku ye; na ye kenle nsa ne anzi ɔdwazo ɔba ngoane nu.’ ”
42024008	Mraalɛ ne mɔ hakyele ye edwɛkɛ ne,
42024009	bɛvi sɛka ne azo bɛziale bɛhɔle, na bɛhɔhanle edwɛkɛ ne bɛhilele bulu nee ko ne nee bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛha la amuala.
42024010	Mraalɛ ne mɔ a le Mɛle mɔɔ vi Magedala la, Dwowana, yɛɛ Gyemise ɔ nli Mɛle. Bɛmɛ yɛɛ mraalɛ ɛhendeɛ ne mɔ mɔɔ nee bɛ lua la a hanle edwɛkɛ ne hilele ɛzoanvolɛma ne mɔ a.
42024011	Na ɛzoanvolɛma ne dwenlenle kɛ mɔɔ mraalɛ ne mɔ hanle la le adalɛ, yemɔti bɛanlie bɛ bɛanli. [
42024012	Na Pita dwazole na ɔnriandile ɔhɔle sɛka ne azo. Ɔbutule ɔnleanle nla ne anu, na ɔnwunle kɛ lenen ndanlɛ ne mɔɔ bɛvale bɛkyekyele funli ne la gua nu na yeannwu debie gyɛne bieko. Mɔɔ ɛzi la yɛle ye azibɛnwo kpole na ɔziale ɔhɔle sua nu.]
42024013	Kenle ko ne ala ɛnee Gyisɛse ɛdoavolɛma nwiɔ bie ɛlɛkɔ sua bie mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye Ɛmeeyɛse la azo; ɔ nee Gyɛlusalɛm bɛ avinli kɛyɛ kilomita bulu nee ko,
42024014	na ɛnee bɛlɛdi bɛ adwelie wɔ ninyɛne mɔɔ ɛsisi la anwo.
42024015	Mɔɔ bɛ nloa wɔ zo na bɛlɛsuzu mɔɔ ɛzi la anwo la, Gyisɛse ɔdaye mumua ne ɔbikyele bɛ na ɔ nee bɛ luale nwolɛ.
42024016	Bɛnwunle ye, noko bɛannwu ye sonla holɛ.
42024017	Na Gyisɛse zele bɛ kɛ, “Duzu a bɛlɛka nwolɛ edwɛkɛ wɔ adenle ye anu la?” Alɔbɔlɛ ngome manle bɛgyinlanle,
42024018	na bɛ nuhua ko mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye Kiliopase la bizale ye kɛ, “Ɛ ngomekye ala yɛɛ ɛle ɛyɛvolɛ wɔ Gyɛlusalɛm a, mɔɔ ɛnze edwɛkɛ mɔɔ ɛzi nehane kenle nsa ye la ɔ?”
42024019	Ɔbizale bɛ kɛ, “Duzu edwɛkɛ?” Bɛbuale ye kɛ, “Edwɛkɛ mɔɔ ɛzi Gyisɛse mɔɔ vi Nazalɛte la anwo zo la.” Akee bɛvale bɛzɔle zolɛ kɛ, “Nrenya ɛhye le Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛ, yɛɛ wɔ Nyamenle nee menli kɔsɔɔti anyunlu, ɔhilele kɛ tumi wɔ ye edwɛkɛhanlɛ nee ye nyɛleɛ nu.
42024020	Yɛ sɛlɛvolɛ mgbanyinli nee mgbanyima ne mɔ yele ye manle bɛbule ye ewule fɔlɛ, na bɛbɔle ye meanubaka nu.
42024021	Ɛnee yɛ nye la kɛ yemɔ yɛɛ ɔbarakpɔne Yizilayɛma a! Yeanga ɛhye angome, edwɛkɛ ne zile la ɛnɛ le kenle nsa.
42024022	Mraalɛ bie noko mɔɔ wɔ yɛ avinli la yɛɛ akee dule yɛ kunlu bɔbɔ a. Bɛhɔle sɛka ne azo nwonlomɔ mangyee ne,
42024023	na bɛannwu ye funli ne. Bɛziale bɛrahanle kɛ bɛnwunle anwuma soanvolɛ bie mɔɔ ɛha ɛhile bɛ kɛ ɔde ngoane nu a.
42024024	Yɛ bie mɔ noko hɔle sɛka ne azo la bɛhɔnwunle ye, kɛmɔ mraalɛ ne mɔ hanle la, na ɔdaye mumua ne ɛdeɛ, bɛannwu ye.”
42024025	Na Gyisɛse zele bɛ kɛ, “Bɛdabɛ, bɛle ahɔnwɔne kpalɛ. Duzu ati a bɛngola bɛnlie mɔɔ Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛma ɛha nwolɛ edwɛkɛ la amuala bɛnli ɛ?
42024026	Asoo bɛnnwu ye kɛ ɔwɔ kɛ Mɛzaya ne nwu amaneɛ ɛhye mɔ amuala na yeahɔ ye anyunlunyia ne anu?”
42024027	Akee Gyisɛse bɔle ɔ bo vile Mosisi mbuluku ne mɔ nee mɔɔ Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛma ɛha na bɛhɛlɛ wɔ Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne anu wɔ ɔ nwo la azo na ɔhilehilele nu ɔhilele bɛ.
42024028	Bɛbikyele sua ne mɔɔ bɛkɔ zo la azo la, Gyisɛse yɛle kɛ ɔpɛ nuhua yeahɔ;
42024029	na bɛzele ye kɛ, “Maa yɛhɔla na mekɛ ne ɛhɔ, aleɛ ɛlɛdwo.” Yemɔti Gyisɛse nee bɛ hɔle sua nu.
42024030	Ɔ nee bɛ dɛnlanle aze kɛ bɛdi debie la, ɔvale kpanwo ne, ɔyilale zolɛ, ɔbubule nuhua na ɔvale ɔmanle bɛ.
42024031	Ɛkɛ ne ala bɛ nye zo dele na bɛnwunle ye sonla holɛ, na eza ɛkɛ ne ala ɔminliminlinle bɛ nye zo.
42024032	Na bɛhanle bɛhilele bɛ nwo ngoko kɛ, “Mekɛ mɔɔ ɔlɛtendɛ wɔ adenle ne anu na ɔlɛkilehile yɛ Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne anu la ɛnee ɔle kɛ asɛɛ bɛwuda senle yɛ ahonle nu la.”
42024033	Na ɛkɛ ne ala bɛdwazole na bɛziale bɛhɔle Gyɛlusalɛm. Bɛhɔdwule la ɛnee ɛdoavolɛma bulu nee ko ne nee menli mɔɔ nee bɛ wɔ ɛkɛ ne la ɛyia nu
42024034	na bɛlɛka kɛ, “Amgba, Awulae ɛdwazo! Yeye ɔ nwo yehile Saemɔn!”
42024035	Na menli nwiɔ ne mɔɔ vi Ɛmeeyɛse la noko hanle edwɛkɛ mɔɔ zile adenle ne anu, nee kɛ bɛzile bɛnwunle Awulae sonla holɛ wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ ɔbubule kpanwo ne ɔmanle bɛ la hilele ɛdoavolɛma ne mɔ.
42024036	Mɔɔ bɛ nloa wɔ zolɛ bɛlɛka ɛhye mɔ anwo bie la, Awulae mumua ne ragyinlanle bɛ avinli [na ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Anzonudwolɛ ɛha bɛ.”]
42024037	Ɛzulolɛ kpole hanle bɛ na bɛdwenlenle kɛ bɛnwu nwomenle.
42024038	Na Gyisɛse zele bɛ kɛ, “Duzu ati a ɛzulolɛ ɛha bɛ a? Duzu ati a bɛ ti akunlu ɛyɛ bɛ kesee ɛ?
42024039	Bɛnlea me sa nee me gyakɛ, na bɛnwu ye kɛ medame mumua ne ɛne. Bɛsosɔ me na bɛnlea, ɔluakɛ nwomenle ɛnlɛ nwonane nee mbowule, kɛmɔ bɛnwu me kɛ melɛ la.” [
42024040	Mɔɔ ɔhanle ɛhye ɔwiele la, ɔvale ɔ sa nee ɔ gyakɛ ɔhilele bɛ.]
42024041	Noko fɛlɛko kpole nee azibɛnwo ammaa bɛanlie bɛanli. Yemɔti ɔbizale bɛ kɛ, “Bɛlɛ aleɛ wɔ ɛke ɔ?”
42024042	Na bɛmanle ye fɛlɛ sinli mɔɔ bɛze la,
42024043	na ɔlile ye bɛ nyunlu ɛkɛ ne.
42024044	Akee ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Ɛhye mɔ a le ninyɛne mɔɔ menganle nwolɛ edwɛkɛ mengilele bɛ wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ ɛnee me nee bɛ de la: debie biala mɔɔ bɛhɛlɛ ye wɔ Mosisi mɛla ne anu, nee mɔɔ wɔ Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛma, nee Edwɛndolɛ mbuluku ne mɔ anu mɔɔ fane me nwo la kpokpoti ɔwɔ kɛ yɛ nɔhalɛ.”
42024045	Akee ɔbukele bɛ adwenle ɔmanle bɛdele Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne abo,
42024046	na ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Mɔɔ bɛhɛlɛ bɛdo ɛkɛ ne la ɛne: Ɔwɔ kɛ Mɛzaya ne nwu amaneɛ na ye kenle nsa ne anzi bɛdwazo ye bɛfi mɔwuamra anu.
42024047	Akee bɛbɔ ɔ bo wɔ Gyɛlusalɛm ɛke bɛva me duma bɛbɔ anlubɛnwo nolo bɛhile maanle maanle kɔsɔɔti, na saa bɛdie bɛdi a, Nyamenle ava bɛ ɛtane ahyɛ bɛ.
42024048	Bɛmɛ a bɛdi ninyɛne ɛhye mɔ anwo daselɛ a.
42024049	Medame mumua ne mebazoa deɛ mɔɔ Egya vale bɔle ɛwɔkɛ la wɔ bɛ nwo. Bɛdɛnla suakpole ɛhye azo ɛke kɔkpula kɛ tumi vi anwuma kɛra bɛ nwo zo la.”
42024050	Akee Gyisɛse nee bɛ vi suakpole ne azo hɔle mɔɔ asɛɛ bɛdwu Bɛtani la, na ɔmanle ɔ sa zo ɔyilale bɛ.
42024051	Mɔɔ ɔyila bɛ la, ɔdele ɔ nwo ɔvile bɛ nwo [na bɛvale ye bɛhɔle anwuma.]
42024052	Ɛzoanvolɛma ne mɔ zonlenle ye na bɛvale fɛlɛkolilɛ kpole bɛziale bɛhɔle Gyɛlusalɛm,
42024053	na bɛhɔle Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne anu dahuu bɛhɔyɛle Nyamenle mo.
43001001	Mekɛ mɔɔ bɛkabɔ ewiade la, ɛnee Edwɛkɛ ne wɔ ɛkɛ; Edwɛkɛ ne nee Nyamenle a wɔ ɛkɛ a, na Edwɛkɛ ne le Nyamenle.
43001002	Mɔlebɛbo ne amuala ɛnee Edwɛkɛ ne nee Nyamenle a wɔ ɛkɛ a.
43001003	Ɔ nwo zo yɛɛ Nyamenle luale yɛle ninyɛne kɔsɔɔti a; bɛangoati ye bɛanyɛ debie biala mɔɔ wɔ aleɛabo amuala la.
43001004	Ngoane kɔsɔɔti vi Edwɛkɛ ne anu a ba a, na ngoane ɛhye a le menli wienyi ne a.
43001005	Wienyi ne ta awozinli nu, na awozinli ɛngola ɛngye ye.
43001006	Nyamenle zoanle nrenya bie mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye Dwɔn la,
43001007	manle ɔrahanle wienyi ne anwo edwɛkɛ ɔhilele menli, amaa bɛ kɔsɔɔti bɛade nrɛlaleɛ ne na bɛalie bɛali.
43001008	Tɛ yemɔ a ɔle wienyi ne; ɔrale kɛ ɔbaha wienyi ne anwo edwɛkɛ.
43001009	Edwɛkɛ ne a le nɔhalɛ wienyi ne mɔɔ ta menli kɔsɔɔti anwo zo na ɔba ewiade la.
43001010	Ɛnee Edwɛkɛ ne wɔ ewiade ye. Nyamenle luale ɔ nwo zo a bɔle ewiade a, noko ewiade amra ɛnze ye.
43001011	Ɔrale ɔdaye ye maanle nu, na ye menli ne anlie ye.
43001012	Bie mɔ dɔɔnwo liele ye na bɛliele ye bɛlile; ɛhye ati ɔmanle bɛ adenle kɛ bɛyɛ Nyamenle amra,
43001013	mɔɔ bɛanlua nwonane nee mogya ngyehyɛlɛ zo a bɛwole bɛ na bɛarayɛ Nyamenle amra a, ɔluakɛ Nyamenle ɔdaye a ɔle bɛ ze a.
43001014	Edwɛkɛ ne rayɛle sonla mɔɔ ɛlolɛ nee nɔhalɛ ɛyi ye tɛkɛɛ a, na ɔ nee yɛ dɛnlanle. Yɛnwunle ye anyunlunyia mɔɔ ɔnyianle ye kɛ ɔle Selɛ ne Ara kokye la.
43001015	Dwɔn hanle ɔ nwo edwɛkɛ. Ɔse, “Ɛhye a le mɔɔ menganle ɔ nwo edwɛkɛ kɛ, ‘Ɔli me nzi ɔlɛba, na ɔle sonlakpole ɔtɛla me la, ɔboalekɛ bɛkawo me la ɛnee ɔwɔ ɛkɛ.’ ”
43001016	Ye ɛlolɛ bebelebe ne ati, yeyila yɛ muala kɔsɔɔti, na ɔyila yɛ dahuu.
43001017	Nyamenle luale Mosisi anwo zo vale mɛla ne rɛlɛle yɛ, na ɛlolɛ nee nɔhalɛ luale Gyisɛse Kelaese anwo zo a rale a.
43001018	Awie biala ɛtɛnwunle Nyamenle ɛlɛ. Ralɛ ne ala mɔɔ ɔdaye ko ne ala a ɔle Nyamenle, na ɔde Selɛ ne anwo ɛkɛ ne la, yemɔ yɛɛ ɛmaa yɛnwu ye a.
43001019	Dwuu mgbanyima mɔɔ wɔ Gyɛlusalɛm la zoanle sɛlɛvolɛma nee Livaema bie mɔ wɔ Dwɔn ɛkɛ kɛ bɛhɔbiza ye kɛ, “Wɔmɔ a le nwane?”
43001020	Dwɔn anva anvea bɛ na ɔkpale nwolɛ ɛdanlɛ wienyi kɛ, “Tɛ mame a mele Mɛzaya ne a.”
43001021	Bɛbizale ye kɛ, “Ɛnee wɔmɔ a le nwane? Wɔmɔ a ɛle Yilaegya ɔ?” Dwɔn buale bɛ kɛ, “Kyɛkyɛ, tɛ yemɔ a le me.” Bɛbizale ye kɛ, “Wɔmɔ a ɛle Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛ ne ɔ?” Ɔbuale kɛ, “Kyɛkyɛ.”
43001022	Bɛzele ye kɛ, “Ɛnee kile yɛ wɔ sonlazule. Ɔluakɛ ɔwɔ kɛ yɛfa mualɛ yɛkɔmaa menli mɔɔ zoanle yɛ la. Duzu a ɛka ye wɔ ɛ nwo a?”
43001023	Dwɔn buale kɛmɔ Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛ Ayezaya hanle la: “Mame a mele ɛnelɛ ne mɔɔ ɛlɛtea nu wɔ ɛsɛlɛ ne anu, ‘Bɛdenrɛdenrɛ adenle ne bɛmaa Awulae ɛlua nu!’ la.”
43001024	Menli mɔɔ rale la, Falasiima a zoanle bɛ a.
43001025	Bɛbizale Dwɔn kɛ, “Saa tɛ wɔ a ɛle Mɛzaya ne, Yilaegya anzɛɛ Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛ ne a, ɛnee duzu ati a ɛsɔne menli a?”
43001026	Dwɔn buale kɛ, “Mame mefa nzule a mesɔne a, na ko bie gyi bɛ avinli ɛkɛ ne mɔɔ bɛnze ye a.
43001027	Yemɔ, ɔli me nzi ɔlɛba, na menfɛta kɛ menwɔzianyi ye mgbɔlaboa zo nyɛma bɔbɔ.”
43001028	Ɛhye mɔ amuala zile Bɛtani, Azule Dwɔdan ne anloa mɔɔ di kɔ aduduleɛ, ɛleka mɔɔ Dwɔn ɛlɛsɔne menli la.
43001029	Aleɛ hyenle la Dwɔn nwunle kɛ Gyisɛse ɛlɛba ɛleka mɔɔ ɔwɔ la na ɔhanle kɛ, “Bɛnlea, Nyamenle Boaneralɛ ne mɔɔ ɔbava yeabɔ azu yeaye ewiade amra ɛtane yeahɔ la ɛne!
43001030	Ɛhye a ɛnee melɛka ye edwɛkɛ mɔɔ menganle kɛ ‘Nrenya bie li me nzi ɛlɛba na ɔle sonlakpole ɔtɛla me la, ɔboalekɛ mɔɔ bɛkawo me la ɛnee ɔwɔ ɛkɛ.’
43001031	Ɛnee menze ye sonlazule, noko membale kɛ mebava nzule meazɔne menli amaa Yizilayɛma anwu ye.”
43001032	Daselɛ mɔɔ Dwɔn lile la ɛne. Ɔse, “Menwunle kɛ Sunsum ne vi anwuma ɛlɛdwu ɔ nwo zo kɛ abubule la, na ɔrazinzele ɔ nwo zo.
43001033	Ɛnee menze kɛ yemɔ ɔ; noko Nyamenle ne mɔɔ zoanle me kɛ menva nzule menzɔne la zele me kɛ, ‘Ɛbanwu kɛ Sunsum ne ɛrazinze nrenya bie anwo zo; sonla zɔhane a le sonla ne mɔɔ ɔbava Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne yeazɔne la.’
43001034	Na mese, menwu ye, na meka meahile bɛ kɛ, nrenya ɛhye, yemɔ a ɔle Nyamenle Ara ne a.”
43001035	Ye alehyenlɛ nu ɛnee Dwɔn nee ye ɛdoavolɛma nwiɔ gyi ɛkɛ ne ko ne ala,
43001036	na bɛnwunle kɛ Gyisɛse ɛlɛse. Na Dwɔn hanle kɛ, “Bɛnlea, Nyamenle Boaneralɛ ne ɛne!”
43001037	Ɛdoavolɛma nwiɔ ne dele la bɛgyakyile ye ɛkɛ bɛdoale Gyisɛse.
43001038	Gyisɛse dole ɔ nye na ɔnwunle kɛ bɛdoa ye la, ɔbizale bɛ kɛ, “Bɛkpondɛ duzu?” Bɛbuale kɛ, “Relabae, nienwu ɛleka yɛɛ ɛde a?” (Relabae abo a le “Kilehilevolɛ”)
43001039	Ɔbuale bɛ kɛ, “Bɛrɛla bɛranlea.” Yemɔti bɛ nee ye hɔle sua nu na bɛhɔnwunle ɛleka mɔɔ ɔde la, na bɛ nee ye dɛnlanle kenle ko ne. (Mekɛ ne anu ɛnee bɛbɔ nɔsolɛ dɔne nna.)
43001040	Bɛ mu nwiɔ mɔɔ bɛdele Dwɔn edwɛkɛ ne, na bɛdoale Gyisɛse la anu ko a le Andelu, mɔɔ le Saemɔn Pita adiema ne.
43001041	Na ndɛndɛ ne ala Andelu hɔkpondɛle ɔ diema Saemɔn na ɔzele ye kɛ, “Yɛnwu Mɛzaya ne.” (Mɛzaya abo a le Kelaese.)
43001042	Na ɔ nee Saemɔn bɛrale Gyisɛse ɛkɛ. Gyisɛse nleanle Pita koonwu na ɔzele ye kɛ, “Wɔmɔ a ɛle Saemɔn, mɔɔ le Dwɔn ara ne. Bɛbavɛlɛ wɔ Sifase.” (“Sifase” yemɔ ala a le “Pita” na ɔ bo a le “Bodane”.)
43001043	Aleɛ hyenle la Gyisɛse yɛle kɛ ɔkɔ Galeli. Ɔnwunle Felepe na ɔzele ye kɛ, “Bɛla maa yɛhɔ!”
43001044	(Felepe vi Bɛteseeyeda, Andelu nee Pita sua zo.)
43001045	Felepe hɔkpondɛle Natanayɛle na ɔzele ye kɛ, “Yɛnwu sonla ne mɔɔ Mosisi hɛlɛle ɔ nwo edwɛkɛ wɔ mɛla ne anu, na Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛma noko hɛlɛle ɔ nwo edwɛkɛ la. Yemɔ a le Gyisɛse, Dwosefi mɔɔ vi Nazalɛte la ara ne.”
43001046	Natanayɛle bizale ye kɛ, “Asoo debie kpalɛ bie kola fi Nazalɛte finde?” Felepe buale kɛ, “Bɛla banlea.”
43001047	Mɔɔ Gyisɛse nwunle kɛ Natanayɛle ɛlɛba la, ɔzele kɛ, “Bɛnlea, Yizilayɛnli kpalɛ mɔɔ ɛnze adalɛ bɔ la ɛne!”
43001048	Natanayɛle bizale ye kɛ, “Na ɛze me nienwu?” Gyisɛse buale kɛ, “Menwunle wɔ wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ ɛnee ɛde feege baka ne abo la kolaa na Felepe aravɛlɛ wɔ.”
43001049	Natanayɛle hanle kɛ, “Kilehilevolɛ, wɔmɔ a ɛle Nyamenle Ara ne. Wɔmɔ a ɛle Yizilayɛ Belemgbunli ne a!”
43001050	Gyisɛse buale ye kɛ, “Kɛmɔ meha kɛ menwunle wɔ wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ ɛnee ɛde feege baka ne abo la ati yɛɛ wɔlie wɔli a. Ɛbanwu nwanwane ninyɛne mgbole mɔɔ tɛla ɛhye a!”
43001051	Na ɔhanle ɔhilele bɛ muala kɛ, “Meka nɔhalɛ ne meahile bɛ: bɛbanwu kɛ anwuma ɛbuke na Sonla Ra ne ati, Nyamenle soanvolɛma ɛlɛfo dwu.”
43002001	Ye kenle nwiɔ ne anzi bɛliele atɔfolɛ bie wɔ Kana sua zo, wɔ Galeli maanzinli nu. Gyisɛse ɔ nli wɔ ɛkɛ ne bie,
43002002	yɛɛ bɛdole ɛsalɛ bɛvɛlɛle Gyisɛse nee ye ɛdoavolɛma ne mɔ noko.
43002003	Mɔɔ bɛnlonle nwanye ne na ɔwiele la, Gyisɛse ɔ nli zele ye kɛ, “Bɛ nwanye ɛwie.”
43002004	Gyisɛse buale ye kɛ, “Ɔmɔ, mmaka mɔɔ ɔwɔ kɛ meyɛ la ɛkile me, me mekɛ ɛtɛdwule.”
43002005	Gyisɛse ɔ nli zele sonvolɛma ne mɔ kɛ, “Mɔɔ ɔkɛha ɔkɛhile bɛ biala la, bɛyɛ.”
43002006	Dwuuma lɛ ɛzonlenlɛ nu ngyehyɛlɛ bie mɔɔ fane ɛnluanlɛ nwo. Debie zɛhae ati bolɛ dwora nsia wɔ awuke ne anu, ko biala kola di nzule litili ɛya ko.
43002007	Gyisɛse zele soanvolɛma ne mɔ kɛ, “Bɛsesa nzule bɛgua dwora ne mɔ anu bɛmaa bɛyi tetɛkɛɛ.” Na bɛyɛle ye zɔhane.
43002008	Ɔhanle ɔhilele bɛ kɛ, “Akee bɛza nzule ne bie bɛhɔmaa mɔɔ ɛlɛnea atɔfolɛlielɛ ne azo la.” Bɛzale bie bɛhɔle,
43002009	na ɔzɔle nzule ne mɔɔ ɛnee ɛhakyi nwanye la bie ɔnleanle la, ɛnee ɔngola ɔnnwu ɛleka mɔɔ nwanye ne vi a (sonvolɛma ne mɔ mɔɔ sesale nzule ne la bɛmɛ bɛze); yemɔti ɔvɛlɛle atɔfolɛ nrenya ne
43002010	na ɔzele ye kɛ, “Awie biala die atɔfolɛ a, ɔdumua ɔye ye nwanye kpalɛ ne ɔfinde, na mɔɔ bɛkɛbo ekyii la akee yeava nwanye mɔɔ anwo ɛngyia la yeara. Na wɔ ɛdeɛ ne, yeanyɛ zɔhane. Wɔva kpalɛ ne wɔzie dedee yeradwu bekezɛ!”
43002011	Gyisɛse yɛle nwanwane gyima ɛhye mɔɔ lumua la wɔ Kana mɔɔ wɔ Galeli la; ɛkɛ ne yɛɛ ɔyele ye anyunlunyia ne ɔhilele a, na ye ɛdoavolɛma ne mɔ liele ye lile.
43002012	Ɛhye anzi, Gyisɛse nee ɔ nli, ɔ mediema ne mɔ, yɛɛ ye ɛdoavolɛma ne mɔ hɔle Kapɛnayɛm hɔdɛnlanle ɛkɛ ne mekɛ ekyi.
43002013	Ɛnee Dwuuma Akpabɛnwo Ɛvoyia ne asɛɛ ɛdwu, yemɔti Gyisɛse hɔle Gyɛlusalɛm.
43002014	Ɔhɔdole kɛ menli ɛlɛdi nlankɛ, mboane, yɛɛ mɔlɔnoma gua wɔ Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne anu, na eza menli dede ɛkponle nwo ɛlɛsenza ezukoa.
43002015	Gyisɛse vale nyɛma yɛle empele na ɔvale ɔvoanle nane ne mɔ, mboane nee nlankɛ kɔsɔɔti, ɔvile Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne anu; akee ɔbutubutule ɛkponle ne mɔ mɔɔ bɛlɛfa bɛazenza ezukoa la ɔmanle ezukoa ne zandele sua ne anu,
43002016	na ɔzele bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛtɔne mɔlɔnoma ne la kɛ, “Bɛva bɛ bɛvinde! Bɛmmafa Egya sua ne bɛyɛ gua nu!”
43002017	Ye ɛdoavolɛma ne hakyele kɛ Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne ɛha ɛdo ɛkɛ ne kɛ, “Nyamenle, wɔ sua ne anwo ɛhulolɛ sɔ kɛ senle la wɔ me nu.”
43002018	Dwuu mgbanyima ne mɔ ziale rale na bɛrabizale ye kɛ, “Duzu nwanwane nyɛleɛ yɛɛ ɛkɛhola ɛkɛyɛ ɛkɛhile kɛ ɛlɛ adenle ɛyɛ ɛhye mɔ a?”
43002019	Gyisɛse buale kɛ, “Bɛbubu Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ɛhye bɛgua na mebava kenle nsa meazi ye bieko.”
43002020	Bɛbizale ye kɛ, “Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ɛhye mɔɔ yɛvale ɛvolɛ abulanla nee nsia a yɛzile la, wɔmɔ ɛfa kenle nsa wɔazi?”
43002021	Na Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne mɔɔ ɛnee Gyisɛse ɛlɛka nwolɛ edwɛkɛ la a le ɔdaye mumua ne ye sonlabaka ne.
43002022	Yemɔti mɔɔ bɛdwazole ye bɛvile ewule nu la, ye ɛdoavolɛma ne hakyele kɛ yeha ɛhye ɛlɛ, na bɛliele Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne nee mɔɔ Gyisɛse hanle la noko bɛlile.
43002023	Akpabɛnwo Ɛvoyia ne anu ɛnee Gyisɛse wɔ Gyɛlusalɛm, na bɛdabɛ dɔɔnwo mɔɔ bɛnwunle gyima mgbole mɔɔ ɔlile la liele ye lile.
43002024	Na Gyisɛse anva ɔ nwo ando awie biala anwo zo, ɔboalekɛ ɔze bɛ kɔsɔɔti kpalɛ.
43002025	Yeangyia kɛ awie kɛha sonla nwo edwɛkɛ kɛhile ye, ɔboalekɛ ɔdaye mumua ne ɔze mɔɔ wɔ sonla biala ahonle nu la.
43003001	Nrenya bie wɔ ɛkɛ, bɛfɛlɛ ye Nekɔdimɛse. Ɔle Dwuu mgbanyima ne mɔ ko yɛɛ ɔboka fane ne mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye Falasii la anwo.
43003002	Kenle ko nɔɔzo ɔhɔle Gyisɛse ɛkɛ ne na ɔzele ye kɛ, “Relabae, yɛze kɛ wɔmɔ a ɛle kilehilevolɛ mɔɔ Nyamenle ɛzoa wɔ a. Awie biala ɛnrɛhola nwanwane ninyɛne mgbole mɔɔ ɛlɛyɛ la bie yɛ kyesɛ Nyamenle nee ye lua.”
43003003	Gyisɛse buale ye kɛ, “Meka nɔhalɛ meahile wɔ: awie biala ɛnrɛnwu Nyamenle Belemgbunlililɛ ne kyesɛ bɛwo ye fofolɛ.”
43003004	Nekɔdimɛse bizale ye kɛ, “Kɛ ɔkɛyɛ na sonla mɔɔ ɛwie nyi la bɛawo ye fofolɛ ɛ? Ɔnrɛhola ɔ nli akunlu wolo ɔnrɛmaa bɛnrɛwo ye fofolɛ!”
43003005	Gyisɛse buale kɛ, “Meka nɔhalɛ ne meahile wɔ: kyesɛ bɛfa nzule nee Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne bɛsɔne sonla anrɛɛ ɔnrɛnwu Nyamenle Belemgbunlililɛ ne ɛlɛ.
43003006	Mɔɔ bɛkɛlua nwonane ne azo bɛkɛwo ye la le nwonane, yɛɛ mɔɔ bɛkɛlua Sunsum ne azo bɛkɛwo ye la le sunsum.
43003007	Mmamaa ɔyɛ wɔ ɛzulolɛ kɛ meha kɛ, ‘Ɔwɔ kɛ bɛwo wɔ fofolɛ’ a.
43003008	Anwoma ne bɔ kɔ ɛleka mɔɔ ɔkulo la; ɛte ɔ ne, na ɛnze ɛleka mɔɔ ɔvi ɔba a, yɛɛ ɛnze ɛleka mɔɔ ɔkɔ a. Zɔhane ala yɛɛ awie biala mɔɔ bɛkɛwo ye Sunsum nu la de a.”
43003009	Nekɔdimɛse bizale ye kɛ, “Kɛ ɔkɛyɛ na ɛhye ayɛ zɔhane ɛ?”
43003010	Gyisɛse buale ye kɛ, “Ɛle Yizilayɛ kilehilevolɛ kpole zɛhae, noko ɛnze ɛhye?
43003011	Meka nɔhalɛ meahile wɔ: yɛka mɔɔ yɛnwu ye na yɛbɔ mɔɔ yɛde la nolo, noko bɛ biala ɛnlie yɛ edwɛkɛ ne ɛndo nuhua.
43003012	Saa meka ninyɛne mɔɔ wɔ ewiade ye anu la anwo edwɛkɛ mekile bɛ na bɛnlie bɛnli a, ɛnee saa meka anwuma lɔ edwɛkɛ mekile bɛ a kɛ ɔkɛyɛ na bɛalie bɛali ɛ?
43003013	Awie biala noko ɛtɛkɔle anwuma lɔ kɛ Sonla Ra ne mɔɔ vi anwuma lɔ rale la ala.”
43003014	Kɛmɔ Mosisi manle kɔbele ɛwɔlɛ ne zo wɔ baka zo wɔ ɛsɛlɛ ne anu la, zɔhane ala yɛɛ bɛbamaa Sonla Ra ne zo a,
43003015	amaa awie biala mɔɔ kɛlie ye kɛli la anwu na yeanyia ngoane mɔɔ ɛnlɛ awieleɛ.
43003016	Ɔluakɛ Nyamenle hulole ewiade amra kpole kpalɛ la ati yɛɛ ɔvale Ɔ Ra kokye ne ɔmanle a, amaa awie biala mɔɔ kɛlie ye kɛli la anwu na yeanyia ngoane mɔɔ ɛnlɛ awieleɛ.
43003017	Ɔluakɛ Nyamenle anzoa Ɔ Ra ne wɔ ewiade ye kɛ ɔrabua menli mɔɔ wɔ nu la ndɛne, na ɔralie ewiade amra ngoane.
43003018	Mɔɔ kɛlie Ralɛ ne kɛli la bɛnrɛbua ye ndɛne, na mɔɔ anlie ye anli la, bɛbua ye ndɛne dɛbadɛba, ɔboalekɛ yeanlie Nyamenle Ara kokye ne yeanli.
43003019	Kɛ ndɛnebualɛ ne de la ɛne: wienyi ne ɛra ewiade ye na bɛ ninyɛndane ti, menli kulo awozinli tɛla wienyi ne.
43003020	Awie biala mɔɔ yɛ ninyɛndane la kyi wienyi ne yɛɛ ɔnrɛlua nu ɛlɛ, ɔboalekɛ ɔnrɛhulo kɛ ɔkɛye ye nyɛleɛ ɛtane ne mɔ ɔkɛhile.
43003021	Na mɔɔ di nɔhalɛ la kɔ wienyi ne anu, amaa wienyi ne ada agua ye gyima kpalɛ mɔɔ ɔlile la azo ahile kɛ ɔbɛlɛle ɔ nwo aze ɔmanle Nyamenle.
43003022	Ɛhye anzi, Gyisɛse nee ye ɛdoavolɛma ne hɔle Dwudiya maanzinli nu. Ɔlile kenle ekyi wɔ ɛkɛ ne na ɔzɔnenle menli.
43003023	Mekɛ ne anu ɛnee Dwɔn noko ɛlɛsɔne menli wɔ Enɔn mɔɔ bikye Salem la, ɔboalekɛ nzule dɔɔnwo wɔ ɛkɛ, na menli dɔɔnwo hɔle ɔ nwo ɛkɛ manle ɔzɔnenle bɛ.
43003024	(Mekɛ ne anu ɛnee bɛtɛtole Dwɔn efiade.)
43003025	Dwɔn ɛdoavolɛma ne bie mɔ bɔle ɔ bo kɛ bɛ nee Dwuuma bie mɔ su kpolera wɔ ɛzonlenlɛ nu ɛnluanlɛ nwo.
43003026	Yemɔti bɛhɔle Dwɔn ɛkɛ ne na bɛbizale ye kɛ, “Kilehilevolɛ, ɛkakye nrenya ne mɔɔ ɛnee nee wɔ wɔ azule Dwɔdan ne anzi lɔ, mɔɔ ɛhanle ɔ nwo edwɛkɛ la ɔ? Kɛkala ɔlɛsɔne menli, na awie biala asɛɛ ɛlɛkɔ ye ɛkɛ.”
43003027	Dwɔn buale kɛ, “Awie biala ɛnrɛnyia ɛhwee kyesɛ Nyamenle fa maa ye.
43003028	Bɛdabɛ bɛdi daselɛ kɛ menganle kɛ, ‘Tɛ me a mele Mɛzaya ne, na bɛzoanle me kɛ menlumua ɔ nyunlu.’
43003029	Atɔfolɛ nrenya ne a le mɔɔ gya atɔfolɛ ne la, saa atɔfolɛ nrenya ne agɔnwo ne mɔɔ gyi ahane la te atɔfolɛ nrenya ne ane a, ɔ nye die. Me fɛlɛkolilɛ ne, ye munlililɛ kɛ de la ɛne.
43003030	Ɔwɔ kɛ ɔyɛ sonlakpole ɔtɛla me, na meyɛ ekyi.”
43003031	Sonla mɔɔ vi anwuma ba la le sonlakpole tɛla bɛ muala; mɔɔ vi ewiade ye anu la le ewiade ɛdeɛ yɛɛ ɔka ewiade edwɛkɛ, na sonla mɔɔ vi anwuma la bo ɔ muala azo.
43003032	Ɔka mɔɔ yenwu ye nee mɔɔ yede la, noko awie biala ɛndie ye edwɛkɛ.
43003033	Mɔɔ die ye edwɛkɛ ne to nu la kile maa bɛnwu kɛ Nyamenle le nɔhalɛ.
43003034	Mɔɔ Nyamenle ɛzoa ye la ka Nyamenle anloa edwɛkɛ, ɔboalekɛ Nyamenle maa ye Sunsum ne yi ye tɛkɛɛ.
43003035	Selɛ ne kulo Ɔ Ra ne, na yeva ninyɛne muala yewula ɔ sa nu.
43003036	Awie biala mɔɔ die Ralɛ ne di la lɛ ngoane mɔɔ ɛnlɛ awieleɛ, na mɔɔ kɛkpo kɛ ɔnrɛlie Ralɛ ne ɔnrɛli la ɛnrɛnyia ngoane mɔɔ ɛnlɛ awieleɛ la ɛlɛ, Nyamenle ndeanlɛ ne wɔ ɔ nwo zo dahuu.
43004001	Falasiima ne dele kɛ Gyisɛse ɛlɛnyia menli dɔɔnwo azɔne bɛ, yeava bɛ yeayɛ ɛdoavolɛma adɛla Dwɔn.
43004002	(Nɔhalɛ mɔɔ wɔ nu la a le kɛ Gyisɛse ɔdaye mumua ne yeanzɔne awie biala; ye ɛdoavolɛma ne mɔ a zɔnenle menli a.)
43004003	Yemɔti mɔɔ Gyisɛse dele mɔɔ bɛlɛkeha la, ɔvile Dwudiya ɔziale ɔhɔle Galeli.
43004004	Ɔkɔ la ɔvale Samɛlea maanzinli nu.
43004005	Ɔradwule Samɛlea sua bie mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye Saekaa la azo. Ɛkɛ ne nee ɛleka mɔɔ Gyekɔbo vale ye azɛlɛ ne manle ɔ ra Dwosefi la anwa biala.
43004006	Gyekɔbo bula ne wɔ ɛkɛ ne ala, na kɛmɔ ɛnee Gyisɛse ɛvɛ la ati, ɔdɛnlanle bula ne azo. Mekɛ ne kɛyɛ sɛnzɛngyinla.
43004007	Samɛlea raalɛ bie rale kɛ ɔbado bula ne bie, na Gyisɛse zele ye kɛ, “Maa me nzule ne bie meno.”
43004008	(Mekɛ ne anu ɛnee ye ɛdoavolɛma ne ɛhɔ sua zo kadɔ aleɛ.)
43004009	Raalɛ ne buale ye kɛ, “Ɛle Dwuunli, mele Samɛleanli. Kɛ ɔyɛ mɔɔ ɛlɛsɛlɛ me nzule ɛ?” (Dwuunli ɛnrɛva ɔ sa ɛnrɛha ɛyɛba anzɛɛ dwora mɔɔ Samɛleanli ɛli nu anzɛɛ ɛnlo nu la ɛlɛ.)
43004010	Gyisɛse buale kɛ, “Saa ɛze kɛ Nyamenle ahyɛlɛdeɛ ne si de, nee ahenle mɔɔ ɛlɛsɛlɛ wɔ nzule ne la a, anrɛɛ wɔbiza ye wɔmaa yemaa wɔ ngoane nzule.”
43004011	Raalɛ ne zele kɛ, “Yɛmenle, na ɛnlɛ bokiti, yɛɛ bula ye noko anu kɔ. Na ɛnee nienwu yɛɛ ɛnyia ngoane nzule ne a?
43004012	Yɛ nlenya Gyekɔbo a manle yɛ bula ɛhye a, yɛɛ yemɔ, ɔ mra yɛɛ ye nyɛmoa nlonle nuhua nzule. Na ɛkpondɛ wɔaha kɛ wɔmɔ ɛle sonlakpole ɛtɛla Gyekɔbo ɔ?”
43004013	Gyisɛse buale kɛ, “Awie biala mɔɔ no nzule ɛhye bie la, nzuhɔne bahu ye bieko,
43004014	na mɔɔ kɛnlo nzule ne mɔɔ mebava meamaa ye la bie la, nzuhɔne ɛnrɛhu ye ɛlɛ. Nzule ne mɔɔ mebava meamaa ye la bahakyi nzubula wɔ ye nu mɔɔ bamaa ye ngoane nzule nee ngoane mɔɔ ɛnlɛ awieleɛ a.”
43004015	Raalɛ ne buale kɛ, “Yɛmenle, maa me nzule ɛhye bie maa meno na nzuhɔne angu me bieko na eza meara ɛke kɛ mebaza nzule.”
43004016	Gyisɛse zele ye kɛ, “Kɔvɛlɛ ɛ hu na ɛ nee ye bɛrɛla.”
43004017	Raalɛ ne buale kɛ, “Mengya nrenya.” Gyisɛse zele ye kɛ, “Saa ɛse ɛngya nrenya a ɛnee ɛle nɔhalɛ.
43004018	Ɔluakɛ ɛdawɔ mumua ne wɔhɔ agyalɛ nnu, yɛɛ nrenya ne bɔbɔ mɔɔ ɛ nee ye de kɛkala la, tɛ ɛ hu ɔ. Wɔha nɔhalɛ bɔkɔɔ.”
43004019	Raalɛ ne zele kɛ, “Yɛmenle, menea wɔ a ɛle Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛ.
43004020	Me nlenya mɔ Samɛleama zonlenle Nyamenle wɔ boka ye azo, na bɛmɛ Dwuuma bɛse Gyɛlusalɛm ala a le ɛleka mɔɔ ɔwɔ kɛ bɛsonle Nyamenle a.”
