43004021	Gyisɛse zele ye kɛ, “Ɔmɔ, die me di, mekɛ bara mɔɔ menli ɛnrɛzonle Selɛ ne wɔ boka ye azo anzɛɛ wɔ Gyɛlusalɛm a.
43004022	Nɔhalɛ, bɛmɛ Samɛleama, bɛnze mɔɔ bɛsonle ye la, na yɛmɛ Dwuuma, yɛze mɔɔ yɛsonle ye la. Ɔboalekɛ ngoanelielɛ kɛra a ɔvi Dwuuma.
43004023	Na mekɛ ne ɛlɛba, yɛɛ yedwu bɔbɔ, mɔɔ ɛzonlenlɛma kpalɛ ne bazonle Selɛ ne wɔ sunsum nu nee nɔhalɛ nu a. Ɔluakɛ kɛ Selɛ ne kpondɛ kɛ bɛsonle ye la ɛne.
43004024	Nyamenle le Sunsum, yemɔti ɔwɔ kɛ bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛsonle ye la bɛsonle ye wɔ sunsum nu nee nɔhalɛ nu.”
43004025	Raalɛ ne hanle kɛ, “Meze kɛ Mɛzaya ne mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye Kelaese ne la bara. Saa ɔba a, ɔbaha mɔɔ ɔwɔ ɛkɛ ne la amuala yeahile yɛ.”
43004026	Gyisɛse buale ye kɛ, “Medame a me nee wɔ ɛlɛtendɛ la.”
43004027	Mekɛ ne anu ala yɛɛ Gyisɛse ɛdoavolɛma ne ziale rale a, na ɔyɛle bɛ azibɛnwo kpole kɛ ɔ nee raalɛ ɛlɛtendɛ a. Na bɛ nuhua biala angola ambiza raalɛ ne kɛ, “Duzu yɛɛ ɛkpondɛ a?” na bɛabiza Gyisɛse kɛ, “Duzu ati a ɛ nee raalɛ ne ɛlɛtendɛ a?”
43004028	Na raalɛ ne gyakyile ye nzule buakɛ ne ɛkɛ, ɔziale ɔhɔle na ɔhɔhanle ɔhilele sua ne azo amra kɛ,
43004029	“Bɛrɛla bɛranlea awie bie mɔɔ ɛha debie biala mɔɔ meyɛ la ɛhile me a. Asoo tɛ yemɔ a ɔle Mɛzaya ne?”
43004030	Yemɔti menli dule twi, bɛvi sua ne azo bɛrale ɛleka mɔɔ Gyisɛse wɔ la.
43004031	Mekɛ ne anu ɛnee ɛdoavolɛma ne gua zo ɛlɛkpa Gyisɛse kyɛlɛ kɛ, “Kilehilevolɛ, bakpula ɛ sa!”
43004032	Na ɔbuale bɛ kɛ, “Melɛ aleɛ medi mɔɔ bɛnze a.”
43004033	Yemɔti ɛdoavolɛma ne mɔ bɔle ɔ bo kɛ bɛbizebiza bɛ nwo kɛ, “Ɛnee awie ɛrɛlɛ ye aleɛ ɔ?”
43004034	Gyisɛse zele bɛ kɛ, “Me aleɛ a le kɛ menwɔli mɔɔ zoanle me la ɛhulolɛdeɛ zo na menwɔwie gyima mɔɔ ɔvale ɔmanle me kɛ menyɛ la yɛ.
43004035	Bɛmɛ bɛse, ‘Yeha siane nna na ɛbuhenle ne adwu.’ Na meka meahile bɛ kɛ bɛdo bɛ nye bɛnlea ɛya nu lɔ boɛ; nzoleɛ ɛbolo, na yedwu mɔɔ ɔwɔ kɛ bɛbu a.
43004036	Mɔɔ bu bɛyɔba ne la bɛtua ye kakɛ na ɔsoa nzoleɛ ne ɔkɔ ngoane mɔɔ ɛnlɛ awieleɛ la anu, amaa mɔɔ dua nee mɔɔ bu la abɔ nu ali fɛlɛko.
43004037	Ɛrɛlɛ ne le nɔhalɛ bɔkɔɔ, ‘Ko dua na ko bu.’
43004038	Mezoa bɛ kɛ bɛhɔva bɛyɔba wɔ ɛya mɔɔ bɛanyɛ nuhua gyima la anu; awie mɔ gyɛne a yɛle nuhua gyima a, na bɛmɛ, bɛnyia menli zɔhane mɔ anwo nvasoɛ.”
43004039	Samɛleama dɔɔnwo mɔɔ wɔ sua ne azo la liele Gyisɛse lile, ɔboalekɛ raalɛ ne lile daselɛ kɛ, “Yeha debie biala mɔɔ meyɛ la yehile me.”
43004040	Yemɔti mɔɔ Samɛleama rale Gyisɛse anwo ɛkɛ ne la, bɛzɛlɛle ye kɛ ɔ nee bɛ ɛradɛnla, na ɔ nee bɛ dɛnlanle kenle nwiɔ.
43004041	Bie mɔ dɔɔnwo noko liele ye lile wɔ ɔ nloa edwɛkɛ ti,
43004042	na bɛhanle bɛhilele raalɛ ne kɛ, “Kɛkala, tɛ mɔɔ ɛhanle la ati yɛɛ ɛmaa yɛlie ye yɛli a. Yɛlie ye yɛli, ɔluakɛ yɛdayɛ noko yɛde ɔ nloa edwɛkɛ yɛ nzo nu na yɛnwu kɛ amgba yemɔ a ɔle ewiade Ngoanedievolɛ ne a.”
43004043	Gyisɛse lile kenle nwiɔ wɔ ɛkɛ ne la, ɔvile ɛkɛ ne na ɔhɔle Galeli,
43004044	ɔluakɛ Gyisɛse ɔdaye mumua ne yeha ye ɛlɛ kɛ, “Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛ biala ɛnlɛ ɔ nyunlu wɔ ɔdaye ye maanle nu.”
43004045	Na mɔɔ ɔdwule Galeli la, menli mɔɔ wɔ ɛkɛ ne la liele ye gyɛlɛɛnye, ɔluakɛ Akpabɛnwo Ɛvoyia ne mɔɔ bɛlile wɔ Gyɛlusalɛm la, bɛhɔle bie na bɛnwunle debie biala mɔɔ ɔyɛle wɔ ɛvoyia ne abo la.
43004046	Akee Gyisɛse ziale hɔle Galeli sua ne mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye Kana la azo bieko, ɛleka mɔɔ ɔhakyile nzule ne nwanye la. Arane abɔlɔba bie wɔ ɛkɛ mɔɔ ɔ ra wɔ Kapɛnayɛm na ɔnde kpɔkɛ a.
43004047	Ɔdele kɛ Gyisɛse vi Dwudiya ɛra Galeli la ɔhɔle ɔ nwo ɛkɛ ne na ɔzɛlɛle ye kɛ ɔmaa bɛhɔ Kapɛnayɛm na ɔhɔyɛ ɔ ra ne ayile, ɔluakɛ asɛɛ yewu.
43004048	Gyisɛse zele ye kɛ, “Bɛmɛ, bɛ biala ɛnrɛlie ɛnrɛli ɛlɛ kyesɛ bɛnwu nwanwane sɛkɛlɛneɛ mgbole bie.”
43004049	Abɔlɔba ne hanle kɛ, “Yɛmenle, mesɛlɛ wɔ, maa yɛhɔ na me ra ne kɛwu.”
43004050	Gyisɛse zele ye kɛ, “Kɔ na ɛ ra ne ɛde kpɔkɛ.” Nrenya ne liele Gyisɛse edwɛkɛ ne lile, na ɔhɔle.
43004051	Ɔlua adenle zo mɔɔ ɔlɛkɔ la, ye sonvolɛma nee ye yiale na bɛhanle kɛ, “Ɛ ra ne ɛde kpɔkɛ.”
43004052	Ɔbizale bɛ mekɛ mɔɔ ɔ ra ne dele kpɔkɛ la, na bɛhanle kɛ, “Anoma ewiazo dɔne ko yɛɛ ɛyɛlɛyɛlɛ ne dule a.”
43004053	Nrenya ne hakyele kɛ zɔhane mekɛ ne anu ala yɛɛ Gyisɛse hanle hilele ye kɛ, “Ɛ ra ne ɛde kpɔkɛ” a. Yemɔti ɔ nee ye sua nu amra amuala liele lile.
43004054	Ɛhye a le nwanwane gyima kpole mɔɔ tɔ zolɛ nwiɔ mɔɔ Gyisɛse vi Dwudiya rale Galeli la ɔyɛle a.
43005001	Ɛhye anzi Gyisɛse hɔle Gyɛlusalɛm wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ ɛnee Dwuuma ɛlɛdi bɛ Nyamenle ɛzonlenlɛ ɛvoyia bie la.
43005002	Wɔ Gyɛlusalɛm “Mboane Anuhɔlɛ” ne anloa, nzubula bie wɔ ɛkɛ ne, ɔlɛ kpɔda nnu wɔ nwolɛ, bɛfɛlɛ nzubula ne wɔ Hibulu aneɛ nu “Bɛtezata.”
43005003	Menli dɔɔnwo mɔɔ ɛnde kpɔkɛ la gugua kpɔda ne mɔ abo, anyenzinliravolɛma, abuburama, yɛɛ bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛ foa ko ɛdwe la amuala. [Bɛlɛkendɛ bɛamaa bɛakpoto azule ne,
43005004	ɔboalekɛ ɔdwu mekɛ ne bie a, Nyamenle soanvolɛ dwu azule ne anu kpoto ye. Saa ɔyɛ ye zɔhane a, wuleravolɛ biala mɔɔ kɛlumua kɛhɔdɔ nuhua la anwo sa bɔkɔɔ.]
43005005	Nrenya bie wɔ nzubula ne anloa mɔɔ ye ewule ne hanle ye la ye ɛvolɛ abulasa nee mɔtwɛ ɛ.
43005006	Gyisɛse nwunle ye la, ɛnee yenwu kɛ ɔ nwo dole ye la ɛhyɛ kpalɛ; yemɔti ɔbizale ye kɛ, “Ɛkulo kɛ ɛte kpɔkɛ ɔ?”
43005007	Nrenya ne buale kɛ, “Yɛmenle, menlɛ awie wɔ ɛke mɔɔ saa bɛkpoto azule ne a ɔfa me ɔto nu a; mekɛ biala mɔɔ menwɔbɔ mɔdenle kɛ mekadɔ nu la, ɛnee sonla fofolɛ ɛlumua me nyunlu ɛhɔdɔ nu.”
43005008	Gyisɛse zele ye kɛ, “Dwazo, fa wɔ ɛkpa ne na kɔ.”
43005009	Ɛkɛ ne ala nrenya ne dele kpɔkɛ; ɔvale ye ɛkpa ne na ɔhɔle. Kenle mɔɔ ɛhye zile la le Ɛnwomenlelielɛ Kenle.
43005010	Yemɔti Dwuu mgbanyima ne zɔle nrenya ne mɔɔ bɛyɛ ye ayile la nu na bɛzele ye kɛ, “Ɛnɛ le Ɛnwomenlelielɛ Kenle, yemɔti ɔtia yɛ mɛla ne kɛ ɛkɛzoa wɔ ɛkpa ne.”
43005011	Nrenya ne buale kɛ, “Sonla ne mɔɔ yɛle me ayile la a zele me kɛ, ‘Fa wɔ ɛkpa ne na kɔ’ a.”
43005012	Bɛbizale ye kɛ, “Ɛnee nwane a ɔdaye yeze wɔ kɛ ɛva wɔ ɛkpa ne na ɛhɔ a?”
43005013	Na nrenya ne mɔɔ bɛyɛ ye ayile ne la ɛnze Gyisɛse sonla holɛ, ɔluakɛ ɛnee menli dɔɔnwo wɔ ɛkɛ, yɛɛ Gyisɛse noko ɛvinde ɛhɔ.
43005014	Nzinlii, Gyisɛse nwunle nrenya ne wɔ Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne anu na ɔzele ye kɛ, “Nea o, kɛkala wɔde kpɔkɛ. Gyakyi wɔ ɛtane ne mɔ anzi ɛlilɛ, anrɛɛ mɔɔ kɛzi ɛ nwo zo la kɛbo zolɛ.”
43005015	Nrenya ne hɔle na ɔhɔhanle ɔhilele Dwuu mgbanyima ne mɔ kɛ Gyisɛse a yɛle ye ayile a.
43005016	Ɛhye ati bɛbɔle ɔ bo kɛ bɛyɛ Gyisɛse kpɔdekpɔde kɛ yeyɛ ayile wɔ Ɛnwomenlelielɛ Kenle a.
43005017	Gyisɛse buale bɛ kɛ, “Egya yɛ gyima kenle biala, yemɔti ɔwɔ kɛ medame noko meyɛ gyima.”
43005018	Edwɛkɛ ɛhye akee manle Dwuu mgbanyima ne nyianle adwenle kɛ ɔwɔ kɛ bɛku ye bɛye ye ɛkɛ, ɔluakɛ tɛ kɛ yetia Ɛnwomenlelielɛ Kenle ne mɛla ne angome ɔ, na eza ɔse Nyamenle le Ɔ Ze, na ɔlua adenle ɛhye azo yehile kɛ ɔ nee Nyamenle bɛsɛ.
43005019	Yemɔti Gyisɛse zele bɛ kɛ, “Meka nɔhalɛ ne meahile bɛ: Ralɛ ne angome ɛnli ɔ ti anwo ɛnyɛ debie biala; ɔyɛ mɔɔ ɔkɛnwu kɛ Selɛ ne ɛlɛyɛ la ala angome. Mɔɔ Selɛ ne yɛ la, yɛɛ Ralɛ ne ɔdaye ɔyɛ a.
43005020	Ɔluakɛ Selɛ ne kulo Ralɛ ne, yɛɛ ɔkile ye mɔɔ ɔdaye mumua ne ɔlɛyɛ la amuala. Ɔbahile ye ninyɛne mgbole bɔbɔ mɔɔ tɛla ɛhye mɔ la yeamaa yeayɛ, na ɔbayɛ bɛ muala azibɛnwo.
43005021	Kɛmɔ Selɛ ne dwazo mɔwuamra na ɔmaa bɛ ngoane la, zɔhane ala yɛɛ Ralɛ ne ɔdaye ɔmaa awie biala mɔɔ ɔkulo kɛ ɔmaa ye ngoane la ngoane a.
43005022	Selɛ ne ɔdaye mumua ne ɔmbua awie ndɛne. Yemaa Ralɛ ne tumi biala kɛ ɔbua ndɛne,
43005023	amaa menli kɔsɔɔti ali Ralɛ ne eni, kɛmɔ bɛdi Selɛ ne eni la. Awie biala mɔɔ ɛnli Ralɛ ne eni la, ɛnli Selɛ ne mɔɔ zoanle ye la eni.
43005024	“Meka nɔhalɛ ne meahile bɛ: Mɔɔ kɛdie me edwɛkɛ na ɔkɛlie mɔɔ zoanle me la kɛli la lɛ ngoane mɔɔ ɛnlɛ awieleɛ. Bɛnrɛbua ye ndɛne, na ɔvi ewule nu yera ngoane nu.
43005025	Meka nɔhalɛ ne meahile bɛ: mekɛ ɛlɛba, yɛɛ yera bɔbɔ, mɔɔ mɔwuamra bade Nyamenle Ara ne ane, na bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛkɛde la bɛbadwazo bɛ bɛara ngoane nu.
43005026	Kɛmɔ Selɛ ne a le ngoanemaavolɛ la, zɔhane ala yɛɛ yeyɛ Ralɛ ne ngoanemaavolɛ a.
43005027	Eza yemaa Ralɛ ne tumi kɛ ɔbua ndɛne, ɔboalekɛ yemɔ a ɔle Sonla Ra ne a.
43005028	Bɛmmamaa ɛhye yɛ bɛ azibɛnwo; mekɛ ɛlɛba mɔɔ mɔwuamra amuala bade ɔ ne wɔ bɛ nla ne mɔ anu,
43005029	na bɛvi bɛ nla ne mɔ anu bɛbavinde: bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛlile boɛ la badwazo na bɛanyia ngoane mɔɔ ɛnlɛ awieleɛ, na bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛlile ɛtane la badwazo na bɛabua bɛ ewule fɔlɛ.”
43005030	“Menva me tumi menyɛ debie biala; mebua me ndɛne kɛmɔ Nyamenle kɛze me la, yemɔti me ndɛnebualɛ ne le fɔɔnwo, ɔboalekɛ mempele menyɛ mɔɔ medame mekulo la, na meyɛ mɔɔ ahenle mɔɔ zoanle me la kpondɛ la.
43005031	“Saa me ngome medi me nwo daselɛ a, mɔɔ menwɔha la bɛdie bɛto nu a ɔnyɛ boɛ.
43005032	Na awie ko wɔ ɛkɛ ne mɔɔ di me nwo daselɛ a, yɛɛ meze kɛ mɔɔ ɔka ye me nwo la le nɔhalɛ.
43005033	Bɛzoanle menli bɛmanle bɛhɔle Dwɔn anwo ɛkɛ ne, na ɔhanle nɔhalɛ ne anwo edwɛkɛ ɔhilele bɛ.
43005034	Tɛ kɛ asɛɛ mekpondɛ sonla daselɛ la ati ɔ; meka ɛhye amaa bɛalie bɛ ngoane.
43005035	Dwɔn le kɛ kɛnlaneɛ la, ɔzɔle na ɔdale, noko bɛ nye liele ye wienyi ne anu mekɛ ekyi bie ala.
43005036	Melɛ dasevolɛ kpole bie mɔɔ ka me nwo edwɛkɛ kpalɛ tɛla mɔɔ Dwɔn hanle la. Gyima ne mɔɔ meyɛ, gyima ne mɔɔ Selɛ ne ɛva ɛmaa me kɛ menyɛ la, yemɔ a di me daselɛ kpalɛ na ɔkile kɛ Selɛ ne a zoanle me a.
43005037	Eza Selɛ ne mɔɔ zoanle me la ɔdaye ɔdi me daselɛ. Bɛtɛtele ɔ ne ɛlɛ, yɛɛ bɛtɛnwunle ɔ nyunlu ɛlɛ.
43005038	Bɛnva ye edwɛkɛ ne bɛnzie bɛ ahonle nu, ɔluakɛ bɛnlie mɔɔ zoanle ye la bɛnli.
43005039	Bɛmɛ, bɛsukoa Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne, ɔluakɛ bɛdwenle kɛ nuhua yɛɛ bɛkɛnwu ngoane mɔɔ ɛnlɛ awieleɛ ne a. Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ mumua ne ɔdaye ɔka me nwo edwɛkɛ.
43005040	Noko akee bɛkpo kɛ bɛnrɛra me nwo ɛkɛ na bɛanyia ngoane.
43005041	“Tɛ menli ayɛlɛyelɛ yɛɛ mekpondɛ a.
43005042	Bɛmɛ, meze bɛ, meze kɛ bɛnlɛ Nyamenle anwo ɛhulolɛ nretee zɛhae wɔ bɛ ahonle nu.
43005043	Egya tumi nu yɛɛ melua mɔɔ membale a, na bɛmɛ, bɛanlie me; na saa awie gyɛne ɔdaye ɔfa ye tumi ɔba a, bɛbalie ye.
43005044	Bɛkpondɛ kɛ bɛkanvo bɛ ngome bɛ nwo ngoko ngoko, na bɛmpele bɛnlie nganvolɛ bɛnvi Nyamenle kokye ne ɛkɛ ne, na ɛnee kɛ ɔkɛyɛ na bɛalie me bɛali ɛ?
43005045	Bɛmmadwenle nwolɛ kɛ mame a mebadoa bɛ meahile Egya a. Mosisi mɔɔ bɛ nye la ɔ nwo zo la a badoa bɛ a.
43005046	Saa bɛliele Mosisi bɛlile a anrɛɛ bɛlie medame noko bɛli; ɔboalekɛ ɔhɛlɛle me nwo edwɛkɛ.
43005047	Na kɛmɔ bɛnlie mɔɔ ɔhɛlɛle la bɛanli la, kɛ ɔkɛyɛ na bɛalie mɔɔ meka la bɛali ɛ?”
43006001	Ɛhye anzi Gyisɛse pɛle hɔle Galeli Tandane ne, mɔɔ eza bɛfɛlɛ ye Taebilease Tandane la anzi lɔ.
43006002	Menli dɔɔnwo doale ye, ɔluakɛ bɛnwu kɛ ye ayileyɛlɛ si de nwanwane la.
43006003	Gyisɛse nee ye ɛdoavolɛma ne hɔle boka bie azo na bɛdɛnlanle aze.
43006004	Mekɛ ne anu ɛnee Dwuuma Akpabɛnwo Ɛvoyia ne ɛbikye.
43006005	Gyisɛse manle ɔ nye zo na ɔnwunle kɛ menli dɔɔnwo ɛlɛba ɔ nwo ɛkɛ ne, yemɔti ɔzele Felepe kɛ, “Nienwu a yɛkɛnyia aleɛ yɛkɛdɔ yɛkɛmaa menli ɛwolaa ɛhye a?”
43006006	(Ɔhanle ɛhye ɔvale ɔzɔle Felepe ɔnleanle; na ɛnee ɔze mɔɔ ɔdaye mumua ne ɔbayɛ la.)
43006007	Felepe buale kɛ, “Amaa awie biala anyia ekyi bɔbɔ ali la, ɔwɔ kɛ yɛnyia kpanwo mɔɔ bo dwɛtɛ fufule ɛya nwiɔ.”
43006008	Ye ɛdoavolɛma ne mɔ anu ko, Saemɔn Pita adiema Andelu hanle kɛ,
43006009	“Kakula nrenya ko wɔ ɛke mɔɔ lɛ abɛlɛ kpanwo ngunguma nnu nee fɛlɛ nwiɔ a. Na ɛhye ɛnrɛdwu bɛ ɛleka bie.”
43006010	Gyisɛse zele bɛ kɛ, “Bɛmaa menli ne mɔ ɛdɛnlɛdɛnla aze.” (Ndile mondonloo dɔɔnwo bie wɔ ɛkɛ.) Yemɔti bɛmanle menli ne amuala dɛnlɛdɛnlanle aze; bɛ nloa dwu menli kɛyɛ apenle nnu.
43006011	Gyisɛse vale kpanwo ne, ɔyɛle Nyamenle mo, na ɔhyɛle ɔmanle menli ne mɔ. Ɔvale fɛlɛ ne na ɔyɛle zɔhane ala, na awie biala nyianle bie lile manle ɔ ko yile.
43006012	Mɔɔ awie biala ako yile la, Gyisɛse zele ye ɛdoavolɛma ne mɔ kɛ, “Bɛsesa ɔ bo zo ne mɔɔ ɛha la, bɛmmamaa yɛsɛkye ye.”
43006013	Yemɔti bɛsesale, na kpanwo nnu ne mɔɔ menli ne lile la, ɔ bo zo ne mɔɔ hale la yile ahɛndɛne bulu nee nwiɔ.
43006014	Mɔɔ menli ne nwunle nwanwane gyima kpole ɛhye mɔɔ Gyisɛse ɛli la bɛhanle kɛ, “Nɔhalɛ, ɛhye a le Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛ ne mɔɔ bara ewiade la!”
43006015	Gyisɛse nwunle kɛ bɛkpondɛ bɛahye ye ɛkɛ ne ala bɛazie belemgbunli la ati, ɔhwenle ɔ nwo na ɔdaye ɔ ngome ɔhɔle awoka ne mɔ azo lɔ bieko.
43006016	Mɔɔ aleɛ ne ɛlɛmua nwo la, Gyisɛse ɛdoavolɛma ne tolole rale tandane ne anloa,
43006017	bɛvole ɛlɛne nu na bɛziale bɛ nzi kɛ bɛpɛ bɛadɔ Kapɛnayɛm. Aleɛ dwole kpalɛ la, ɛnee Gyisɛse ɛtɛbale.
43006018	Mekɛ ne anu ɛnee anwoma kpole bie ɛdwazo na azule ne ɛlɛtu ɛsesebɛ.
43006019	Ɛdoavolɛma ne hanle ɛlɛne ne hɔle kilomita kɛyɛ nnu anzɛɛ nsia la yɛɛ bɛnwunle kɛ Gyisɛse ɛlɛtia azule ne anye ara ɛlɛne ne anwo a. Bɛ ahonle dule kpole
43006020	na Gyisɛse zele bɛ kɛ, “Bɛmmasulo, na medame ɔ!”
43006021	Bɛmanle ɔvole ɛlɛne ne anu, na ɛkɛ ne ala ɛlɛne ne hɔnwenle aze wɔ ɛleka mɔɔ ɛnee bɛ nye gyi kɛ bɛkɔ la.
43006022	Aleɛ hyenle la menli dɔɔnwo ne mɔɔ Gyisɛse ati bɛhale tandane ne anzi lɔ la nwunle kɛ ɛlɛne ko pɛ a ɛnee wɔ ɛkɛ ne a. Bɛze noko kɛ Gyisɛse anvo ɛdoavolɛma ne mɔ ɛlɛne ne anu, na bɛdule bɛgyakyile ye.
43006023	Nzinlii nlɛne gyɛne vi Taebilease rale ɛleka mɔɔ Gyisɛse vale kpanwo ne na ɔyɛle mo ɔvale ɔmanle menli ne lile la.
43006024	Yemɔti mɔɔ menli ne nwunle kɛ Gyisɛse ɛnle ɛkɛ, yɛɛ ye ɛdoavolɛma ne noko ɛhɔ la, bɛdabɛ noko bɛvale nlɛne mɔɔ rale la na bɛpɛle bɛrale Kapɛnayɛm kɛ bɛkakpondɛ ye.
43006025	Menli ne nwunle Gyisɛse wɔ tandane ne anzi nehae la, bɛbizale ye kɛ, “Kilehilevolɛ, na kenlenzu a ɛrale ɛke a?”
43006026	Gyisɛse buale bɛ kɛ, “Meka nɔhalɛ ne meahile bɛ: Bɛlile kpanwo ne na bɛ ko yile la ati yɛɛ bɛlɛkpondɛ me bo zo a, na tɛ kɛ asɛɛ bɛdele me nwanwane gyima mgbole mɔɔ menyɛle la abo la ati ɔ.
43006027	Bɛmmayɛ gyima bɛkpondɛ aleɛ mɔɔ ɛngyɛ na azɛkye la; bɛyɛ gyima bɛkpondɛ aleɛ mɔɔ fa bɛ kɔ ngoane mɔɔ ɛnlɛ awieleɛ la anu la. Aleɛ ɛhye yɛɛ medame Sonla Ra, mebava meamaa bɛ a, ɔboalekɛ Nyamenle Selɛ ne ɛlie me ɛdo nu na yemaa me tumi kɛ menyɛ ye zɔhane.”
43006028	Bɛbizale ye kɛ, “Duzu yɛɛ yɛyɛ na yɛahola yɛayɛ gyima mɔɔ Nyamenle kpondɛ la a?”
43006029	Gyisɛse zele bɛ kɛ, “Gyima mɔɔ Nyamenle kpondɛ kɛ bɛyɛ la a le kɛ bɛkɛlie mɔɔ ɔzoanle ye la bɛkɛli.”
43006030	Bɛbizale ye kɛ, “Duzu nwanwane gyima yɛɛ ɛkɛyɛ ɛkɛhile yɛ na yɛalie wɔ yɛali a? Duzu debie a ɛkɛyɛ a?
43006031	Yɛ nlenya mɔ lile aleɛ ne mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye mana la wɔ ɛsɛlɛ ne azo, kɛmɔ Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne se la, ‘Ɔmanle bɛ aleɛ mɔɔ vi anwuma la bɛlile.’ ”
43006032	Gyisɛse zele bɛ kɛ, “Meka nɔhalɛ ne meahile bɛ: tɛ Mosisi a vale aleɛ ne mɔɔ vi anwuma la manle bɛ a; Egya a maa bɛ aleɛ kpalɛ mɔɔ vi anwuma la a.
43006033	Ɔluakɛ aleɛ ne mɔɔ Nyamenle fa maa bɛ la a le sonla ne mɔɔ vi anwuma ɛdwu aze na ɔmaa ewiade amra ngoane mɔɔ ɛnlɛ awieleɛ la.”
43006034	Bɛzele ye kɛ, “Yɛmenle, maa yɛ aleɛ ɛhye bie kenle biala.”
43006035	Gyisɛse buale bɛ kɛ, “Mame a mele ngoane kpanwo ne a. Mɔɔ kɛra me nwo la, ɛhɔne ɛnrɛhu ye ɛlɛ, yɛɛ mɔɔ kɛlie me kɛli la, nzuhɔne ɛnrɛhu ye ɛlɛ.
43006036	Kɛkala, meka meahile bɛ kɛ bɛnwu me, noko bɛnrɛlie bɛnrɛli.
43006037	Awie biala mɔɔ Egya bava ye amaa me la bara me nwo. Awie biala mɔɔ kɛra me nwo la menrɛvoa ye,
43006038	ɔboalekɛ mevi anwuma membale kɛ mebayɛ mɔɔ zoanle me la ɛhulolɛdeɛ, na meamba kɛ mebali me ti anwo.
43006039	Mɔɔ zoanle me la kpondɛ kɛ meyɛ ɛhye, amaa meamminli mɔɔ yeva yemaa me la bie, na meava bɛ muala meara ngoane nu wɔ mekɛ ne mɔɔ li awieleɛ la.
43006040	Ɔluakɛ mɔɔ Egya kpondɛ la a le kɛ, bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛkɛnwu Ralɛ ne na bɛkɛlie ye bɛkɛli la kɛnyia ngoane mɔɔ ɛnlɛ awieleɛ; na mebadwazo bɛ meara ngoane nu wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ li awieleɛ la.”
43006041	Dwuuma ne mɔ bɔle ɔ bo kɛ bɛtendɛ Gyisɛse bɛ nzo abo, ɔboalekɛ yeha kɛ, “Mame a mele kpanwo ne mɔɔ vi anwuma rale la.”
43006042	Na bɛhanle kɛ, “Tɛ Dwosefi ara Gyisɛse ɛhye ɔ? Yɛze ɔ ze nee ɔ nli. Adenle boni azo a ɔlua mɔɔ ɔka kɛ ɔvi anwuma a yera a?”
43006043	Gyisɛse zele bɛ kɛ, “Bɛgyakyi bɛ nzo abo ɛdendɛlɛ ne.
43006044	Awie biala ɛnrɛhola ɛnrɛra me nwo, kyesɛ Selɛ ne mɔɔ zoanle me la twe ye bɛlɛ me; na mebadwazo ye meara ngoane nu wɔ mekɛ ne mɔɔ li awieleɛ la.
43006045	Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛma hɛlɛle kɛ, ‘Nyamenle a kilehile menli kɔsɔɔti a.’ Awie biala mɔɔ te Selɛ ne ane na ɔtietia ɔ gyakɛ abo zo la ba me ɛkɛ.
43006046	Ɛhye ɛngile kɛ awie biala ɛnwu Selɛ ne; mɔɔ vi Nyamenle ɛkɛ ne rale la a le sonla mɔɔ ɛnwu Selɛ ne a.
43006047	Meka nɔhalɛ ne meahile bɛ: Mɔɔ kɛlie kɛli la lɛ ngoane mɔɔ ɛnlɛ awieleɛ.
43006048	Mame a mele ngoane kpanwo ne a.
43006049	Bɛ nlenya mɔ lile mana wɔ ɛsɛlɛ ne azo, na bɛwule.
43006050	Kpanwo ne mɔɔ vi anwuma ba la le aleɛ mɔɔ awie biala mɔɔ kɛli bie la ɛnrɛwu ɛlɛ a.
43006051	Mame a mele ngoane kpanwo ne mɔɔ vi anwuma rale la. Mɔɔ kɛli kpanwo ɛhye bie la badɛnla ngoane nu dahuu. Kpanwo ne mɔɔ mefa meamaa ye la a le me nwonane ye mɔɔ meva memaa la, amaa ewiade anyia ngoane.”
43006052	Ɛhye vale kpolera kpole radole Dwuuma ne mɔ avinli na bɛbizale kɛ, “Kɛ sonla ɛhye si ava ye nwonane amaa yɛali ɛ?”
43006053	Gyisɛse zele bɛ kɛ, “Meka nɔhalɛ ne meahile bɛ: Saa bɛanli medame Sonla Ra me nwonane, bɛanno me mogya a bɛnrɛnyia ngoane mɔɔ ɛnlɛ awieleɛ.
43006054	Mɔɔ kɛli me nwonane ne bie na ɔkɛnlo me mogya ne bie la lɛ ngoane mɔɔ ɛnlɛ awieleɛ, na mebadwazo ye meara ngoane nu wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ li awieleɛ la.
43006055	Ɔluakɛ me nwonane ne a le aleɛ kpalɛ ne a, yɛɛ me mogya ne a le nzule kpalɛ ne a.
43006056	Sonla mɔɔ di me nwonane na ɔno me mogya la de me nu, yɛɛ medame mede ye nu.
43006057	Egya mɔɔ zoanle me la de aze, yɛɛ ɔdaye ɔ ti melɛ ngoane. Zɔhane ala yɛɛ mɔɔ kɛva me kɛli la, medame me ti ɔkɛnyia ngoane a.
43006058	Ɛhye a le kpanwo ne mɔɔ vi anwuma rale la; ɔnle kɛ mana ne mɔɔ bɛ nlenya mɔ lile a nzinlii bɛwule la. Mɔɔ kɛli kpanwo ɛhye bie la kenyia ngoane mɔɔ ɛnlɛ awieleɛ.”
43006059	Gyisɛse hanle ɛhye wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ ɛnee ɔlɛkilehile wɔ Kapɛnayɛm nyianu sua ne anu la.
43006060	Menli ne mɔɔ doa ye la anu dɔɔnwo dele ɛhye mɔɔ ɔhanle la na bɛhanle kɛ, “Ngilehilelɛ ɛhye yɛ se. Nwane a kɛhola ɛhye azo di a?”
43006061	Awie anga angile Gyisɛse, noko ɔnwunle mɔɔ menli mɔɔ doa ye la ɛlɛka ye bɛ nzo abo wɔ ɛhye anwo la; yemɔti ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Ɛhye kpondɛ amaa bɛakpo aze ɔ?
43006062	Na saa akee bɛnwu Sonla Ra ne kɛ ɔlɛkɔ anwuma, ɛleka mɔɔ ɔvi ɔrale la ɛ?
43006063	Mɔɔ maa ngoane la a le Nyamenle Sunsum ne; sonla anwosesebɛ ɛngola ɛnyɛ ɛhwee. Edwɛkɛ ne mɔɔ meha mehile bɛ la a le Nyamenle Sunsum mɔɔ maa ngoane la.
43006064	Noko bɛ bie mɔ ɛnlie ɛnli.” (Mɔlebɛbo ne amuala ɛnee Gyisɛse ze bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnrɛlie bɛnrɛli, nee sonla mɔɔ baye ye amaa la.)
43006065	Na ɔvale ɔzɔle zolɛ kɛ, “Ɛhye ati a menganle mengilele bɛ kɛ awie biala ɛnrɛhola ɛnrɛra me nwo kyesɛ Selɛ ne ɛva ye ɛrɛlɛ me la.”
43006066	Ɛhye ati, menli mɔɔ doa ye la anu dɔɔnwo ziale bɛ nzi na bɛangola bɛ nee ye anlua bieko.
43006067	Zɔhane ati Gyisɛse bizale ye ɛdoavolɛma bulu nee nwiɔ ne kɛ, “Na bɛdabɛ noko ɛ, bɛkɛhulo kɛ bɛkɛhɔ ɔ?”
43006068	Saemɔn Pita buale ye kɛ, “Awulae, nwane ɛkɛ a yɛkɔ a? Wɔmɔ a ɛlɛ edwɛkɛ mɔɔ maa ngoane mɔɔ ɛnlɛ awieleɛ a.
43006069	Kɛkala yɛlie yɛli, na yɛze kɛ wɔmɔ a ɛle Nwuanzanwuanza Ko ne mɔɔ vi Nyamenle ɛkɛ ɛra a.”
43006070	Gyisɛse buale kɛ, “Bɛmɛ bulu nee nwiɔ ye, se memkpale nu menyele bɛ o? Noko bɛ nuhua ko le musuɔfoɔ!”
43006071	Ɛnee ɔlɛka Dwudase mɔɔ le Saemɔn Yesekaleɔto ara ne edwɛkɛ. Ɔluakɛ ɛnee Dwudase le bulu nee nwiɔ ne anu ko bɔbɔ ɛdeɛ, noko ɔdaye ala a ɔbaye ye yeamaa a.
43007001	Ɛhye anzi, Gyisɛse hɔle akpɔsa wɔ Galeli maanzinli nu. Yeangulo kɛ ɔkɛhɔ Dwudiya, ɔluakɛ ɛnee Dwuu mgbanyima ne mɔ ɛlɛtɛ ye wɔ ɛkɛ ne ahu ye.
43007002	Mɔɔ Dwuuma Belandane Bo Ɛdɛnlanlɛ Ɛvoyia ne bikyele la,
43007003	Gyisɛse amediema mrenya ne mɔ zele ye kɛ, “Kɔ Dwudiya ɛ, amaa menli mɔɔ doa wɔ la anwu wɔ nwanwane gyima mɔɔ ɛlɛdi la.
43007004	Awie biala mɔɔ kpondɛ kɛ menli nwu ye kpalɛ la ɛnvea ye ninyɛne ɛyɛlɛ nwo. Kɛmɔ ɛlɛyɛ ɛhye mɔ la, ɛnee ɛbɔneko ɛngɔ ɛmaa ewiade amra amuala ɛnwu wɔ!”
43007005	(Nea, ɔ mediema ne mɔ bɔbɔ ɛnlie ye ɛnli.)
43007006	Gyisɛse zele bɛ kɛ, “Me mekɛ kpalɛ ne ɛtɛdwule. Bɛmɛ, mekɛ biala le kpalɛ maa bɛ.
43007007	Ɛtane ewiade ye ɛmkpɔ bɛ, na mame, ɔkpɔ me, ɔluakɛ meka mekile ye dahuu kɛ ye ndenle ne mɔ ɛnle kpalɛ.
43007008	Bɛmɛ bɛhɔ bɛ ɛvoyialilɛ ne. Na mame, menrɛhɔ, ɔboalekɛ me mekɛ kpalɛ ne ɛtɛdwule.”
43007009	Ɔhanle ɛhye na ɔdɛnlanle Galeli.
43007010	Mɔɔ Gyisɛse amediema ne mɔ hɔle ɛvoyialilɛ ne la, nzinlii ɔdaye noko ɔhɔle, noko yeanye ɔ nwo yeangile, ɔveale ɔ nwo.
43007011	Mekɛ ne anu ɛnee Dwuu mgbanyima ne mɔ ɛlɛkpondɛ ye ɛsesebɛ wɔ ɛvoyia ne abo, na bɛbizale kɛ, “Ɔwɔ nienwu?”
43007012	Menli dɔɔnwo mɔɔ rale ɛvoyialilɛ ne bie la hanle ɔ nwo edwɛkɛ huhuhuhu dɔɔnwo. Bie mɔ se, “Ɔle sonla kpalɛ.” Bie mɔ noko se, “Ɔnle sonlakpalɛ, ɔlɛyɛ menli ne koasea.”
43007013	Noko biala angola anye ɔ nyunlu anga ɔ nwo edwɛkɛ baguase, ɔboalekɛ bɛsulo Dwuu mgbanyima ne mɔ.
43007014	Mɔɔ bɛlile ɛvoyia ne dedee na ɔhɔdwule ye avinli bie la, Gyisɛse hɔle Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne anu, na ɔbɔle ɔ bo kɛ ɔkilehile.
43007015	Ye ngilehilelɛ ne zinle Dwuu mgbanyima ne mɔ anwo kpole manle bɛhanle kɛ, “Na kenlenzu a sonla ɛhye zukoale ye nwoma ye, mɔɔ ɔtɛkɔle sukulu ɛlɛ, noko ɔze debie kpole zɛhae a?”
43007016	Gyisɛse buale bɛ kɛ, “Mɔɔ melɛkilehile la ɛnle me ti anwo ngilehilelɛ. Ɔvi Nyamenle ne mɔɔ zoanle me la ɛkɛ.
43007017	Mɔɔ kɛboɔboa ɔ nwo kɛ ɔyɛ mɔɔ Nyamenle kpondɛ la banwu kɛ mɔɔ melɛkilehile la vi Nyamenle ɛkɛ anzɛɛ medame me ti anwo ngilehilelɛ ɔ.
43007018	Awie mɔɔ di ɔ ti anwo kilehile la kpondɛ ɔdaye ɔ ngome ɔ nyunlu. Mɔɔ kpondɛ anyunlunyia maa mɔɔ zoanle ye la ka nɔhalɛ ne, yɛɛ nvonleɛ biala ɛnle ye nu.
43007019	Tɛ Mosisi a vale mɛla ne rɛlɛle bɛ la ɔ? Noko bɛ nuhua ko biala ɛnli mɛla ne azo. Duzu ati a bɛkpondɛ kɛ bɛku me ɛ?”
43007020	Ɛlɔne ne buale kɛ, “Ɛnlɛ ɛ sa! Nwane a ɛlɛkpondɛ wɔ ahu wɔ a?”
43007021	Gyisɛse buale kɛ, “Nwanwane gyima kpole ko pɛ mɔɔ menyɛle la ɛzi bɛ muala bɛ nwo.
43007022	Se Mosisi hanle kɛ bɛyɛ bɛ mra mrenyanu nzonlɛ la ati, (noko tɛ Mosisi bɔbɔ a bɔle ɔ bo a, bɛ nlenya mɔ a bɔle ɔ bo a) saa ɔdwu Ɛnwomenlelielɛ Kenle bɔbɔ a, bɛyɛ.
43007023	Na saa bɛyɛ kakula nrenya mrenyanu nzonlɛ wɔ Ɛnwomenlelielɛ Kenle na bɛndo Mosisi mɛla ne a, ɛnee duzu ati yɛɛ bɛva me nwo ɛya kɛ meyɛ sonla ayile memaa ɔ nwo ɛza wɔ Ɛnwomenlelielɛ Kenle ɛ?
43007024	Anrɛɛ bɛmmanea sonla nyunlu bɛbua ye ndɛne, bɛbua ndɛne wɔ ye adenle zo.”
43007025	Menli mɔɔ vi Gyɛlusalɛm ɛkɛ ne la bie mɔ hanle kɛ, “Asoo tɛ nrenya ne mɔɔ bɛlɛkpondɛ ye bɛahu ye la ɛne?
43007026	Nea! ɔlɛtendɛ bagua nu, noko awie biala ɛngola ɛnga edwɛkɛ biala ɛntia ye! Ɛnee mgbanyima ne mɔ akee ɛlie ɛdo nu kɛ yemɔ a ɔle Mɛzaya ne ɔ?
43007027	Saa Mɛzaya ne ba a, awie biala ɛnrɛnwu ɛleka mɔɔ ɔvi a. Noko nrenya ɛhye, yɛze ɛleka mɔɔ ɔvi la.”
43007028	Mɔɔ Gyisɛse ɛlɛkilehile wɔ Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne anu la ɔhanle ye kpole kpalɛ kɛ, “Asoo amgba bɛze me yɛɛ bɛze ɛleka mɔɔ mevi la? Meamba me ti anwo adenle. Mɔɔ zoanle me la le nɔhalɛ. Bɛmɛ bɛnze ye,
43007029	na mame meze ye, ɔboalekɛ mevi ɔ nwo lɔ a membale a yɛɛ ɔdaye a ɔzoanle me a.”
43007030	Yemɔti bɛyɛle kɛ bɛkye ye, noko awie angola anzɔ ye nu, ɔboalekɛ ɛnee ye mekɛ ne ɛtɛdwule.
43007031	Menli dɔɔnwo mɔɔ wɔ ɛlɔne ne anu la liele ye lile na bɛhanle kɛ, “Asoo Mɛzaya ne ba a, ɔbayɛ nwanwane gyima mgbole yeadɛla mɔɔ nrenya ɛhye ɛyɛ la?”
43007032	Falasiima dele mɔɔ menli ne ɛlɛka ye huhuhuhu wɔ Gyisɛse anwo la, yemɔti bɛ nee sɛlɛvolɛ mgbanyinli ne mɔ yɛle adwenle na bɛzoanle kɛ bɛhɔhye ye bɛrɛla.
43007033	Gyisɛse zele bɛ kɛ, “Me nee bɛ badɛnla mekɛ ekyi bie ala na akee meahɔ mɔɔ zoanle me la anwo lɔ.
43007034	Bɛbakpondɛ me, na bɛnrɛnwu me, ɔluakɛ ɛleka mɔɔ mekɔ la bɛnrɛhola ɛkɛ ne kɔ.”
43007035	Dwuu mgbanyima ne hanle ye wɔ bɛ nwo ɛkɛ ne kɛ, “Ɛnee nienwu ɛleka a ɔkɔ mɔɔ yɛkpondɛ ye a yɛnrɛnwu ye a? Ɛnee ɔkɔ Giliki azuamgbole ne mɔ bie azo ɛleka mɔɔ Dwuuma bie mɔ wɔ la yeahɔhilehile Gilikima ɔ?
43007036	Ɔse, ‘Bɛbakpondɛ me, na bɛnrɛnwu me’, yɛɛ eza ɔse, ‘Bɛnrɛhola ɛleka mɔɔ melɛkɔ la kɔ.’ Ɛnee duzu edwɛkɛ a ɔkpondɛ yeaha a?”
43007037	Kenle mɔɔ li awieleɛ wɔ ɛvoyia ne ɛlilɛ nu la hyia kpole. Kenle ko zɔhane Gyisɛse dwazole na ɔhanle ye kpole kpalɛ kɛ, “Mɔɔ nzuhɔne ɛlɛku ye la ɛrɛla me ɛkɛ ɛranlo nzule.
43007038	Kɛmɔ Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne se la, ‘Mɔɔ die me di la, ngoane azudenle vi ye ahonle nu baze.’ ”
43007039	Gyisɛse hanle ɛhye wɔ Sunsum ne mɔɔ menli mɔɔ die ye di la banyia ye la anwo. Mekɛ ne anu ɛnee bɛtɛfale Sunsum ne bɛtɛmanle, ɔboalekɛ ɛnee bɛtɛdwazole Gyisɛse bɛtɛbale ye anyunlunyia ne anu.
43007040	Menli mɔɔ wɔ ɛlɔne ne anu la anu dɔɔnwo dele mɔɔ ɔhanle la, na bɛzele kɛ, “Amgba, nrenya ɛhye a le Nyamenle Kpɔmanvolɛ ne!”
43007041	Bie mɔ noko se, “Yemɔ a ɔle Mɛzaya ne.” Eza bie mɔ noko se, “Mɛzaya ne vi Galeli ɛnrɛra.
43007042	Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne se Mɛzaya ne bayɛ Belemgbunli Devidi dehelɛ, yɛɛ bɛbawo ye wɔ Bɛtelɛhɛm, ɛleka mɔɔ Devidi dɛnlanle la.”
43007043	Ɛhye ati mgbakyelɛ ralale menli ne avinli wɔ Gyisɛse ati.
43007044	Bie mɔ yɛle kɛ bɛkye ye, noko awie biala angola anzɔ ye nu.
43007045	Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne sinzavolɛma mɔɔ sɛlɛvolɛ mgbanyinli nee Falasiima ne mɔ zoanle bɛ kɛ bɛhɔhye Gyisɛse la ziale rale, na bɛbizale bɛ kɛ, “Duzu ati a bɛangye ye bɛamba ɛ?”
43007046	Bɛbuale bɛ kɛ, “Awie biala ɛtɛtendɛle kɛ nrenya ɛhye tendɛ la.”
43007047	Falasiima ne bizale bɛ kɛ, “Bɛmaa yeyɛ bɛdabɛ noko koasea ɔ?
43007048	Asoo bɛnwu kɛ mgbanyima ne mɔ bie anzɛɛ Falasiima bie bɔbɔ ɛlie ye ɛli?
43007049	Na ɛlɔne ne die ye di, ɔboalekɛ bɛ nuhua ko bɔbɔ ɛnze Mosisi mɛla ne, yemɔti abule kpalɛ a ɛbu bɛ a!”
43007050	Nekɔdimɛse ɛnee wɔ ɛkɛ ne bie, ɔle sonla mɔɔ ɛhɔ Gyisɛse anwo ɛlɛ a. Ɔzele bɛ kɛ,
43007051	“Yɛ mɛla ne kile kɛ saa yɛtɛtele sonla anloa anu edwɛkɛ, yɛtɛnwunle mɔɔ yeyɛ la a, yɛmbu ye ewule fɔlɛ.”
43007052	Bɛbizale ye kɛ, “Ɛnee ɛdawɔ noko ɛvi Galeli ɔ? Kɔvedevede Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne anu kpalɛ nea kɛ saa ɛkɛnwu kɛ Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛ ko bɔbɔ vi Galeli ɛvinde a!”
43008001	Akee awie biala hɔle sua nu, na Gyisɛse hɔle Ɔlivi Boka ne azo.
43008002	Aleɛ hyenle nwonlomɔ mangyee ne la, ɔziale ɔhɔle Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne anu. Menli ne amuala rabɔle yiale ye na ɔdɛnlanle aze kɛ ɔkilehile bɛ.
43008003	Mɛla kilehilevolɛma ne nee Falasiima vale raalɛ bie mɔɔ bɛhɔhye ye kɛ ɔlɛto awuvolɛvalɛ mɛla ne la rale na bɛvale ye bɛziele bɛ avinli ɛkɛ ne.
43008004	Bɛzele Gyisɛse kɛ, “Kilehilevolɛ, raalɛ ɛhye, yɛhyele ye kɛ nrenya ɛlɛfa ye awuvolɛ.
43008005	Wɔ yɛ mɛla ne anu, Mosisi ɛhile kɛ ɔwɔ kɛ bɛsi raalɛ zɔhane awolɛ dedee bɛmaa ɔwu. Na kɛ ɛse ɛ?”
43008006	Bɛhanle ɛhye bɛdole ye abɛla, amaa bɛanyia bie bɛagyinla zolɛ bɛahɔdoa ye. Na Gyisɛse hanle ɔ nwo aze na ɔvale ɔ sa ɔhɛlɛhɛlɛle azɛlɛ ne anwo.
43008007	Bɛhɔle zolɛ bɛbizebizale Gyisɛse kpuyia, na ɔdenrɛle ɔ nwo na ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Bɛ nuhua biala mɔɔ ɔnea a ɔtɛyɛle ɛtane ɛlɛ la ɛlumua ɛdo bolɛ ɛbɔ raalɛ ye.”
43008008	Ɔhanle ɛhye la eza ɔhanle ɔ nwo aze na ɔhɛlɛhɛlɛle azɛlɛ ne anwo.
43008009	Menli ne dele ɛhye la, bɛbɔle ɔ bo, ɔvi bɛ mgbanyinli ne mɔ anwo zo, bɛhɔle ngoko ngoko dedee bɛwiele kɔ bɔkɔɔ. Ɔhale Gyisɛse nee raalɛ ne angome wɔ ɛkɛ ne.
43008010	Gyisɛse denrɛle ɔ nwo na ɔbizale raalɛ ne kɛ, “Ɔmɔ, na menli ne mɔ wɔ nienwu? Ko bɔbɔ anga ambua wɔ ewule fɔlɛ ɔ?”
43008011	Raalɛ ne buale kɛ, “Yɛmenle, ko bɔbɔ anga o!” Gyisɛse zele ye kɛ, “Ɛnee medame noko membua wɔ ewule fɔlɛ. Kɔ, na mmayɛ ɛtane bieko.”]
43008012	Gyisɛse dendɛle hilele Falasiima ne bieko kɛ, “Mame a mele ewiade wienyi ne a. Awie biala mɔɔ kɛdoa me bo zo la kɛnyia ngoane nu wienyi ne, ɔnrɛlua awozinli nu ɛlɛ.”
43008013	Falasiima ne zele ye kɛ, “Kɛkala, akee ɛlɛdi ɛ nwo daselɛ, mɔɔ wɔha la ɛndo ɛhwee.”
43008014	Gyisɛse buale kɛ, “Saa medi me nwo daselɛ bɔbɔ a, mɔɔ meka la le nɔhalɛ, ɔboalekɛ meze ɛleka mɔɔ mevi membale a, yɛɛ meze ɛleka mɔɔ melɛkɔ la. Bɛmɛ, bɛnze ɛleka mɔɔ mevi membale a yɛɛ bɛnze ɛleka mɔɔ melɛkɔ a.
43008015	Bɛmɛ bɛnea sonla nyunlu na bɛabua ye ndɛne, na mame membua ndɛne.
43008016	Na saa mebua ndɛne bɔbɔ a anrɛɛ me ndɛnebualɛ bayɛ fɔɔnwo, ɔluakɛ tɛ me ngome a melua a; Selɛ ne mɔɔ zoanle me la boka me nwo.
43008017	Bɛhɛlɛ ye wɔ bɛ mɛla ne anu kɛ saa dasevolɛma nwiɔ anloa yɛ ko a, ɛnee mɔɔ bɛkɛha la le nɔhalɛ.
43008018	Medi me nwo daselɛ yɛɛ Selɛ ne mɔɔ zoanle me la di me nwo daselɛ.”
43008019	Bɛbizale ye kɛ, “Ɛ ze ne wɔ nienwu?” Gyisɛse buale bɛ kɛ, “Bɛnze me, yemɔti bɛnze Egya. Saa bɛze me a anrɛɛ bɛze Egya noko.”
43008020	Gyisɛse hanle ɛhye mɔ amuala wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ ɛnee ɔlɛkilehile wɔ Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne anu, wɔ ɛleka mɔɔ azubɔlɛ nlɛka ne mɔ gyigyi la. Na awie biala angola ye kye, ɔboalekɛ ɛnee ye mekɛ ɛtɛdwule.
43008021	Gyisɛse hanle hilele bɛ bieko kɛ, “Mebahɔ; bɛbakpondɛ me, na bɛbawu bɛala bɛ ɛtane ne mɔ anu. Bɛnrɛhola ɛleka mɔɔ melɛkɔ la kɔ.”
43008022	Yemɔti Dwuu mgbanyima ne mɔ hanle kɛ, “Ɔse, ‘Bɛnrɛhola ɛleka mɔɔ melɛkɔ la kɔ.’ Ɛnee ɔkpondɛ yeaze kɛ ɔkahu ɔ nwo ɔ?”
43008023	Gyisɛse buale kɛ, “Bɛmɛ bɛvi azɛlɛ ye azo, na mame mevi anwuma. Bɛvi ewiade ɛhye anu, na mame menvi ewiade ye anu.
43008024	Ɛhye ati yɛɛ meha mehile bɛ kɛ bɛbawu bɛala bɛ ɛtane ne mɔ anu la. Saa bɛanlie bɛanli kɛ, ‘Medame a le Medame’ a bɛbawu bɛala bɛ ɛtane ne mɔ anu bɔkɔɔ.”
43008025	Bɛbizale ye kɛ, “Ɛdawɔ a le nwane?” Gyisɛse buale kɛ, “Kɛmɔ melumua meha mehile bɛ ala la.
43008026	Melɛ edwɛkɛ dɔɔnwo meka ye bɛ nwo, yɛɛ melɛ dɔɔnwo mebua bɛ nwolɛ ndɛne. Mɔɔ zoanle me la le nɔhalɛ yɛɛ mɔɔ menwɔde menwɔvi ye ɛkɛ ne la a meka mekile ewiade a.”
43008027	Bɛande ɔ bo kɛ Selɛ ne anwo edwɛkɛ a Gyisɛse ɛlɛka ahile bɛ a.
43008028	Yemɔti Gyisɛse zele bɛ kɛ, “Saa bɛmaa medame Sonla Ra zo wɔ meanubaka ne azo anwuma a yɛɛ bɛkɛnwu kɛ ‘Medame a le Medame’ a; na bɛanwu kɛ menva me ngome me tumi menyɛ debie, na meka mɔɔ Selɛ ne kɛhilehile me la ala.
43008029	Eza mɔɔ zoanle me la nee me lua. Ɔtɛgyakyile me, ɔluakɛ dahuu meyɛ mɔɔ ɔkpondɛ la.”
43008030	Bɛdabɛ dɔɔnwo mɔɔ bɛdele kɛ Gyisɛse ɛlɛka ɛhye mɔ la liele ye lile.
43008031	Yemɔti Gyisɛse zele Dwuuma mɔɔ liele ye lile la kɛ, “Saa bɛkɔ zolɛ bɛdi me ngilehilelɛ zo a, ɛnee bɛle me ɛdoavolɛma amgba;
43008032	bɛbanwu nɔhalɛ ne, na nɔhalɛ ne bamaa bɛanyia bɛ ti.”
43008033	Bɛbuale ye kɛ, “Yɛle Ebileham abo zo amra, yɛɛ yɛtɛyɛle awie biala ngɛkɛlɛ ɛlɛ. Na kɛ ɔyɛ mɔɔ ɛse yɛkɛnyia yɛ ti ɛ? Duzu edwɛkɛ a ɛkpondɛ wɔaha a?”
43008034	Gyisɛse zele bɛ kɛ, “Meka nɔhalɛ ne meahile bɛ: Awie biala mɔɔ kɛyɛ ɛtane la le ɛtane akɛlɛ.
43008035	Akɛlɛ ɛmbɔ abusua ne bie dahuu, na dehelɛ boka abusua ne anwo dahuu.
43008036	Saa Ralɛ ne yɛ bɛ alehelɛ a, ɛnee bɛle alehelɛ amgba.
43008037	Meze kɛ bɛle Ebileham abo zo amra. Noko kɛmɔ bɛnlie me ngilehilelɛ ne bɛndo nu la ati, bɛkpondɛ kɛ bɛku me.
43008038	Meka mɔɔ Egya ɛhilehile me la, yɛɛ bɛdabɛ bɛyɛ mɔɔ bɛ ze ɛha ɛhile bɛ la.”
43008039	Bɛbuale ye kɛ, “Yɛ ze a le Ebileham.” Gyisɛse zele bɛ kɛ, “Saa amgba ala bɛ ze a le Ebileham a, anrɛɛ bɛyɛ mɔɔ bɛ ze yɛle la bie.
43008040	Mɔɔ meyɛ la amuala a le kɛ menwɔha nɔhalɛ ne mɔɔ mede mevi Nyamenle ɛkɛ ne la menwɔhile bɛ. Noko bɛkpondɛ me bɛahu me. Ebileham anyɛ ɛhye!
43008041	Bɛlɛyɛ mɔɔ bɛ ze kpalɛ ne yɛle la bie!” Bɛbuale ye kɛ, “Yɛnle arelazinli mralɛ; yɛ ze ala a le Nyamenle. Yɛle ɔ mra kpalɛ kpalɛ.”
43008042	Gyisɛse zele bɛ kɛ, “Saa amgba bɛ ze a le Nyamenle a, anrɛɛ bɛkulo me, ɔboalekɛ mevi Nyamenle anwo lɔ a membale a. Meamba me ti anwo adenle. Ɔdaye a ɔzoanle me a.
43008043	Duzu ati a bɛnde mɔɔ melɛka la abo ɛ? Ɔboalekɛ bɛngulo kɛ bɛtie me nrɛlaleɛ ne la ati ɔ.
43008044	Bɛ ze kpalɛ ne a le Abɔnsam. Ɔ mra a le bɛ, yɛɛ bɛlɛyɛ mɔɔ bɛ ze kpalɛ ne kulo la. Ɔbɔ ɔ bo amuala la ɛnee ɔle kɔdiawu. Yeanli nɔhalɛ ɛlɛ, ɔboalekɛ nɔhalɛ nretee zɛhae ɛnle ye nu. Saa ɔbɔ adalɛ a ɛnee ɔlɛyɛ mɔɔ ɔwɔ kɛ ɔyɛ la, ɔboalekɛ ɔle alane, yɛɛ ɔle adalɛ kɔsɔɔti bɛ ze.
43008045	Mame meka nɔhalɛ ne, na ɛhye ati noko yɛɛ bɛnlie me bɛnli a.
43008046	Bɛ nuhua boni a kɛzi ɔ kɛnra kɛha kɛ medi ɛtane nwo fɔlɛ a?
43008047	Mɔɔ vi Nyamenle ɛkɛ ne la tie Nyamenle edwɛkɛ ne. Bɛmɛ, bɛnvi Nyamenle ɛkɛ, na ɛhye ati yɛɛ bɛduodua bɛ nzo kɛ bɛnrɛdie Nyamenle edwɛkɛ ne a.”
43008048	Dwuuma ne zele Gyisɛse kɛ, “Saa yɛka kɛ ɛle Samɛleanli na ɛlɛ ayɛne a ɛnee yɛbɔ adalɛ ɔ?”
43008049	Gyisɛse buale kɛ “Menlɛ ayɛne. Medi Egya eni, na bɛmɛ bɛngulo kɛ bɛdi me eni.
43008050	Memkpondɛ anyunlunyia memmaa me nwo. Awie wɔ ɛkɛ ne mɔɔ yemɔ a anyunlunyia ne le ye ɛdeɛ a, na yemɔ a bua me benle a.
43008051	Meka nɔhalɛ ne meahile bɛ: Mɔɔ kɛli me edwɛkɛ zo la ɛnrɛwu ɛlɛ.”
43008052	Dwuuma ne zele ye kɛ, “Akee yɛnwu ye bɔkɔɔ kɛ ɛlɛ ayɛne kpole kpalɛ! Ebileham wule, yɛɛ Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛma wule, noko wɔmɔ ɛse, ‘Mɔɔ kɛli me edwɛkɛ zo la ɛnrɛwu ɛlɛ.’
43008053	Yɛ ze Ebileham bɔbɔ wule; ɛngola ɛnga kɛ ɛle kpole ɛtɛla Ebileham, na kɛ ɛse ɛ? Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛma noko wule. Na ɛdwenle kɛ ɛle duzu?”
43008054	Gyisɛse buale kɛ, “Saa me ngome mewula me nwo anyunlunyia a, ɛnee me anyunlunyia ɛndo ɛhwee. Ahenle mɔɔ wula me anyunlunyia la a le Egya, mɔɔ yemɔ a bɛse ɔle bɛ Nyamenle la.
43008055	Bɛtɛnwunle ye ɛlɛ, na mame meze ye. Saa meka kɛ menze ye a, ɛnee mebɔ adalɛ kɛ bɛdabɛ la. Meze ye, yɛɛ medi ye edwɛkɛ zo.
43008056	Bɛ ze Ebileham lile fɛlɛko kɛ ɔkɛnwu me ɛralɛ kenle ne, yɛɛ ɔnwunle ye na ɔlile nwolɛ fɛlɛko.”
43008057	Dwuuma ne zele ye kɛ, “Ɛdawɔ mumua ne ɛtɛdile ɛvolɛ abulanlu bɔbɔ, noko ɛse ɛnwunle Ebileham?”
43008058	Gyisɛse buale bɛ kɛ, “Meka nɔhalɛ ne meahile bɛ: Mɔɔ bɛkawo Ebileham la, ɛnee bɛfɛlɛ me ɛtease.”
43008059	Bɛsesale awolɛ kɛ bɛto bɛazi ye, na Gyisɛse veale ɔ nwo na ɔvile Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne anu ɔhɔle.
43009001	Gyisɛse kpɔsa kpɔsa la, ɔnwunle nrenya bie mɔɔ bɛkawo ye la ɛnee ɔ nye ɛzi la.
43009002	Ye ɛdoavolɛma ne bizale ye kɛ, “Kilehilevolɛ, nwane ɛtane ti a bɛwole nrenya ɛhye anyenzinliravolɛ a? Ɔdaye mumua ne ye ɛtane ti anzɛɛ ye awovolɛ ɛtane ti ɔ?”
43009003	Gyisɛse buale kɛ, “Ye anyenzinlira ne ɛnvane ɔdaye ye ɛtane anzɛɛ ye awovolɛ ɛtane mɔɔ bɛyɛ la anwo. Bɛwole ye anyenzinlira amaa menli anwu kɛ Nyamenle tumi ne ɛlɛyɛ gyima wɔ ye nu.
43009004	Alehyenlɛ ye wɔ zo la, ɔwɔ kɛ yɛkɔ zolɛ yɛyɛ mɔɔ zoanle me la gyima ne; aledwolɛ ɛlɛba mɔɔ awie ɛngola ɛnyɛ gyima a.
43009005	Mewɔ ewiade ye anu ala la, medame a mele ewiade ye wienyi ne a.”
43009006	Gyisɛse hanle ɛhye la, ɔdole nyɛlɛ azɛlɛ nwo, ɔvale ɔfɔtɔle ndɛtɛlɛ, ɔvale ndɛtɛlɛ ne ɔkpudale nrenya ne anye
43009007	na ɔzele ye kɛ, “Kɔ kɔnrinzi ɛ nyunlu wɔ nzubula ne mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye Saelowam la anu.” (Saelowam abo a le “Ɛzoanlɛ”.) Nrenya ne hɔle hɔnrinzinle ɔ nyunlu wɔ nzubula ne anu, na ɔkara la ɛnee ɔnwu debie.
43009008	Ye kpalɛ zo amra nee menli mɔɔ ɛnwu ye ɛlɛ kɛ ɔde ɔlɛsɛlɛzɛlɛ la bizale kɛ, “Asoo tɛ nrenya ne mɔɔ tɛnla sɛlɛzɛlɛ la ɛne?”
43009009	Bie mɔ zele kɛ, “Ɔdaye ɔ,” Bie mɔ noko hanle kɛ, “Kyɛkyɛ, tɛ ye ɔ, ɔzɔho ye ala.” Nrenya mumua ne hanle kɛ, “Medame ɔ.”
43009010	Bɛbizale ye kɛ, “Kɛ ɔyɛle mɔɔ ɛ nye ne dukuele ɛ?”
43009011	Ɔbuale kɛ, “Nrenya ne mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye Gyisɛse la fɔtɔle ndɛtɛlɛ vale kpudale me nye na ɔzele me kɛ, ‘Kɔnrinzi ɛ nyunlu wɔ Saelowam ne anu’; na mengɔnyɛle ye zɔhane yɛɛ me nye ne dukuele a.”
43009012	Bɛbizale ye kɛ, “Na nrenya zɔhane wɔ nienwu?” Ɔbuale kɛ, “Menze.”
43009013	Bɛvale nrenya ne mɔɔ ɛnee ɔ nye ɛzi la bɛhɔmanle Falasiima ne.
43009014	Kenle ko ne mɔɔ Gyisɛse fɔtɔle ndɛtɛlɛ ne vale dukuele nrenya ne anye la le Ɛnwomenlelielɛ Kenle.
43009015	Falasiima ne eza bizale nrenya ne adenle mɔɔ ɔlua zo mɔɔ ɔ nye ne dukuele la. Ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Ɔvale ndɛtɛlɛ ɔyɛle me nye, na menrinzinle la yɛɛ menwunle debie a.”
43009016	Falasiima ne bie mɔ hanle kɛ, “Sonla mɔɔ yɛle ɛhye la ɛnvi Nyamenle ɛkɛ, ɔboalekɛ ɔnli Ɛnwomenlelielɛ Kenle mɛla ne azo.” Bie mɔ noko hanle kɛ, “Na kɛ ɔkɛyɛ na sonla mɔɔ le ɛtanenli la ayɛ nwanwane gyima mɔɔ le zɛhae ɛ?” Na menli ne lile abunwiɔ.
43009017	Yemɔti Falasiima ne bizale nrenya ne bieko kɛ, “Ɛse ɔdaye yɛɛ ɔdukuele ɛ nye a, ɛnee duzu edwɛkɛ a ɛka ye wɔ ɔ nwo a?” Ɔbuale kɛ, “Ɔle Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛ.”
43009018	Dwuu mgbanyima ne mɔ anlie ando nu kɛ ɛnee ɔle anyenzinliravolɛ yɛɛ bɛdukue ɔ nye a. Yemɔti bɛvɛlɛle ye awovolɛ
43009019	na bɛbizale bɛ kɛ, “Asoo bɛ ra nrenya ne mɔɔ bɛse bɛwole ye la ɛnee ɔ nye ɛzi la ɛne, na kɛ ɔyɛle mɔɔ ɛnɛ ɔnwu debie ɛ?”
43009020	Ye awovolɛ ne buale kɛ, “Yɛmɛ yɛze kɛ yɛ ra nrenya ne ɛne, yɛɛ yɛze kɛ yɛwole ye la ɛnee ɔ nye ɛzi.
43009021	Na yɛnze kɛ ɔyɛle mɔɔ ɛnɛ ɔkola ɔnwu debie a, yɛɛ yɛnze ahenle mɔɔ dukuele ɔ nye a. Ɔdaye yenyi; bɛbiza ye, na ɔkola ɔye ɔ nloa.”
43009022	Ye awovolɛ ne hanle ɛhye, ɔluakɛ bɛsulo Dwuu mgbanyima ne mɔ. Dwuu mgbanyima ne mɔ ɛbɔ kpɔkɛ kɛ awie biala mɔɔ kɛha kɛ Gyisɛse le Mɛzaya la, bɛkɛye ye bɛkɛvi nyianu sua ne anu.
43009023	Ɛhye ati a ye awovolɛ ne hanle kɛ, “Yenyi na bɛbiza ye” la.
43009024	Eza bɛvɛlɛle nrenya ne mɔɔ bɛwole ye anyenzinliravolɛ la bieko na bɛzele ye kɛ, “Nea Nyamenle anyunlu na ka nɔhalɛ ne! Yɛze kɛ nrenya ɛhye mɔɔ dukuele ɛ nye ne la le ɛtanenli.”
43009025	Nrenya ne buale kɛ, “Saa ɔle ɛtanenli o, saa ɔnle ɛtanenli o, menze. Debie ko ala yɛɛ meze a; yemɔ a le kɛ, ɛnee me nye ɛzi, na kɛkala menwu debie.”
43009026	Bɛbizale ye kɛ, “Kɛ ɔzile ɔdukuele ɛ nye ne ɛ?”
43009027	Ɔbuale bɛ kɛ, “Se meha mehile bɛ dɛba, na bɛande. Duzu ati a bɛkpondɛ kɛ meka ye bieko ɛ? anzɛɛ bɛkulo kɛ bɛyɛ ye ɛdoavolɛma ɔ?”
43009028	Bɛbɔle nrenya ne aholoba kɛ, “Wɔmɔ a ɛle ye ɛdoavolɛ a, na yɛmɛ yɛle Mosisi ɛdoavolɛma.
43009029	Yɛze kɛ Nyamenle dendɛle hilele Mosisi; sonla ɛhye, yɛnze ɛleka mɔɔ ɔvi a.”
43009030	Nrenya ne buale kɛ, “Edwɛkɛ ɛzulolɛ kpalɛ! Bɛnze ɛleka mɔɔ ɔvi a, noko yehola yedukue me nye.
43009031	Yɛze kɛ Nyamenle ɛndie ɛtanevolɛma, ɔtie bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛbu ye bie na bɛyɛ mɔɔ ɔkpondɛ kɛ bɛyɛ la.
43009032	Sumunli kɛ aloa bɔle la yɛtɛtele kɛ awie ɛdukue sonla mɔɔ bɛwole ye anyenzinliravolɛ la anye ɛlɛ.
43009033	Saa nrenya ɛhye ɛnvi Nyamenle ɛkɛ ne a, anrɛɛ ɔnrɛhola ɔnrɛli gyima mɔɔ le zɛhae la ɛlɛ.”
43009034	Bɛbuale ye kɛ, “Ɛdawɔ mɔɔ bɛwole wɔ na bɛtetele wɔ wɔ ɛtane nu la, ɛkulo kɛ ɛkilehile yɛmɛ ɔ?” Na bɛvoanle ye bɛvile nyianu sua ne anu.
43009035	Gyisɛse dele kɛ bɛvoa nrenya ne bɛvi nyianu sua ne anu la, ɔkpondɛle ye ɔnwunle ye na ɔbizale ye kɛ, “Asoo ɛdie Sonla Ra ne ɛdi?”
43009036	Nrenya ne buale ye kɛ, “Yɛmenle, na yemɔ a le nwane, amaa mealie ye meali?”
43009037	Gyisɛse zele ye kɛ, “Wɔnwu ye dɛbadɛba, na yemɔ ala a nee wɔ ɛlɛtendɛ la.”
43009038	Nrenya ne zele kɛ, “Awulae, medie medi somaa!” Akee ɔhotole Gyisɛse agyakɛ anu ɛkɛ na ɔzonlenle ye.
43009039	Na Gyisɛse zele ye kɛ, “Membale ewiade kɛ mebabua ndɛne, amaa bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛ nye ɛzi la anwu debie, na bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnwu debie la anye azi.”
43009040	Falasiima bie mɔ mɔɔ ɛnee wɔ ɛkɛ ne la dele mɔɔ ɔhanle la na bɛbizale ye kɛ, “Ɛnee ɛkpondɛ wɔaze kɛ yɛdayɛ noko yɛ nye ɛzi ɔ?”
43009041	Gyisɛse buale kɛ, “Saa bɛ nye ɛzi a, anrɛɛ bɛnli fɔlɛ, na kɛmɔ bɛdabɛ bɛse bɛnwu debie la, bɛ fɔlɛlilɛ doa bɛ.”
43010001	Gyisɛse zele bɛ kɛ, “Meka nɔhalɛ ne meahile bɛ: Awie mɔɔ ɛlɛkɔ mboane tunli ne anu na yeanlua anlenkɛ ne anu, na ɔkɛvo bane ne la le awule, ɔle kɔdiawu.
43010002	Sonla ne mɔɔ fa anlenkɛ ne anu kɔ nuhua la a le mboaneneavolɛ ne a.
43010003	Anlenkɛ sinzavolɛ ne tukue ye anlenkɛ ne; mboane ne mɔ te ɔ ne, ɔfa boane ko biala duma ɔfɛlɛ ye na ɔfa bɛ ɔfinde ɔkɔ adidi.
43010004	Saa ɔfa bɛ ɔfinde a ɔdi bɛ nyunlu na mboane ne adoa ye, ɔluakɛ bɛze ɔ ne.
43010005	Bɛnrɛdoa awie gyɛne biala; bɛnriandi ye, ɔluakɛ bɛnze ɔ ne.”
43010006	Gyisɛse bule ɛrɛlɛ ɛhye, na bɛande mɔɔ ɔlɛka yeahile bɛ la abo.
43010007	Yemɔti Gyisɛse hanle ye bieko kɛ, “Meka nɔhalɛ ne meahile bɛ: Mame a mele anlenkɛ ne mɔɔ bɛfa nu bɛkɔ mboane tunli ne anu la.
43010008	Awie mɔ gyɛne mɔɔ lumuale me nyunlu rale la le nwule nee ahɔdiawu, na mboane ne mɔ andie bɛ ne.
43010009	Mame a mele anlenkɛ ne; mɔɔ kɛlua me nwo zo kɛhɔ nu la kɛnyia ngoane mɔɔ ɛnlɛ awieleɛ. Ɔbawolo nu na yeavinde yeahɔkpondɛ aleɛ.
43010010	Awule sonla biala ba kɛ ɔbawua, yeahu, na yeazɛkye mboane ne mɔ. Mera amaa bɛanyia ngoane, na bɛanyia ye molozo.
43010011	“Mame a mele mboaneneavolɛ kpalɛ ne a. Mboaneneavolɛ kpalɛ ne fa ye ngoane to aze maa ye mboane ne.
43010012	Awie mɔɔ bɛkɛbɔ ye ɛkpa, mɔɔ mboane ne ɛnle ye ɛdeɛ, na ɔnle mboaneneavolɛ kpalɛ la, saa ɔnwu nane kpole anwo ɛzulolɛ bie mɔɔ le kɛ bedi la a, ɔnriandi ɔgyakyi mboane ne mɔ, yemɔti bɛdi ne babɔ mboane ne anu na ɔbɔ bɛ asande.
43010013	Ɛkpanli ne nriandi kɔ, ɔluakɛ yemɔ, bɛbɔle ye ɛkpa ala, mboane ne mɔ edwɛkɛ ɛnyɛ ye edwɛkɛ.
43010014	-
43010015	Mame a mele mboaneneavolɛ kpalɛ ne a. Kɛmɔ Selɛ ne ze me na meze Selɛ ne la, zɔhane ala yɛɛ meze me mboane ne na bɛdabɛ noko bɛze me a; yɛɛ mekponle zolɛ kɛ menwɔwu menwɔmaa bɛ.
43010016	Me mboane ne mɔ bie ɛnle mboane tunli ye anu. Ɔwɔ kɛ mekpondɛ bɛ bo zo; bɛbade me ne, na bɛ muala bɛbayɛ mboane ekpunli ko mɔɔ bɛ neavolɛ ko a.
43010017	“Selɛ ne kulo me, ɔluakɛ mekponle zolɛ kɛ menwɔva me ngoane menwɔdo aze, amaa meazia meava ye bieko.
43010018	Awie ɛngola ɛnye me ngoane. Medame me ngome a mekola megyakyi nu a. Melɛ adenle mekola mefa memaa, yɛɛ melɛ adenle mefa me debie bieko. Mɔɔ Egya ɛhyehyɛ ɛmaa me kɛ ɔwɔ kɛ meyɛ la ɛne.”
43010019	Edwɛkɛ ɛhye manle Dwuuma ne lile abunwiɔ.
43010020	Bɛ nuhua dɔɔnwo hanle kɛ, “Ɔlɛ ayɛne! Ɔlɛsɛ; duzu ati a bɛkɛdie ye ɛ?”
43010021	Bie mɔ noko hanle kɛ “Sonla mɔɔ lɛ ayɛne la ɛnrɛdendɛ kɛmɔ ɔlɛtendɛ la. Kɛ sonla zɛhae si yɛ tukue anyenzinliravolɛma anye ɛ?”
43010022	Ɛyɛlɛ mekɛ ne dwule la ɛnee bɛlɛdi Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne Ɛnluanlɛ Ɛvoyia ne wɔ Gyɛlusalɛm.
43010023	Gyisɛse ɛnee lua Sɔlɔmɔn Kpɔda ne abo wɔ Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne anu.
43010024	Dwuuma bɔle yiale ye na bɛbizale ye kɛ, “Na ɛmaa yɛ nye agyinla ahɔdwu kenlenzu? Saa wɔmɔ a ɛle Mɛzaya ne a ɛnee ka ye wienyi kile yɛ.”
43010025	Gyisɛse buale bɛ kɛ, “Meha mehile bɛ dɛba, na bɛanlie me bɛanli, Gyima mɔɔ Egya maa meyɛ la di me daselɛ,
43010026	na bɛnlie bɛnli, ɔboalekɛ bɛmboka me mboane ne anwo.
43010027	Me mboane ne tie me ne; meze bɛ, yɛɛ bɛtoa me bo zo.
43010028	Memaa bɛ ngoane mɔɔ ɛnlɛ awieleɛ, yemɔti bɛnrɛwu ɛlɛ, yɛɛ awie ɛnrɛhola ɛnrɛlie bɛ ɛnrɛvi me sa nu.
43010029	Egya mɔɔ vale bɛ manle me la le kpole tɛla awie biala, yemɔti awie biala ɛnrɛhola ɛnrɛlie bɛ ɛnrɛvi Egya asa anu.
43010030	Selɛ ne nee medame yɛle ko.”
43010031	Dwuuma ne eza sesale awolɛ kɛ bɛtoto bɛazi ye.
43010032	Gyisɛse bizale bɛ kɛ, “Selɛ ne ɛmaa meli gyima kpalɛ dɔɔnwo memaa bɛ; na nuhua ne boni ati yɛɛ bɛkpondɛ kɛ bɛsi me nwolɛ awolɛ a?”
43010033	Dwuuma ne buale kɛ, “Yɛnzi wɔ awolɛ kɛ wɔyɛ gyima kpalɛ la ati ɔ, yɛsi wɔ awolɛ kɛ wɔha munzule edwɛkɛ! Ɛle sonla ala, noko ɛlɛyɛ ɛ nwo Nyamenle!”
43010034	Gyisɛse buale kɛ, “Bɛhɛlɛ ye wɔ bɛdabɛ bɛ mɛla ne anu kɛ Nyamenle se, ‘Bɛdabɛ, bɛle nyamenlema!’
43010035	Yɛze kɛ mɔɔ Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne ka la le nɔhalɛ dahuu, na saa Nyamenle ɛvɛlɛ bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛhanle ye edwɛkɛ ne bɛhilele bɛ la kɛ bɛle nyamenlema a,
43010036	ɛnee mame mɔɔ Selɛ ne ɛnlea nu ɛye me, na yezoa me wɔ ewiade ye anu la, saa meka kɛ mele Nyamenle Ara a, ɛnee munzule ne mɔɔ mebɔ la a le boni?
43010037	Saa menyɛ Selɛ ne gyima a ɛnee bɛmmadie me bɛdi ɛ!
43010038	Na saa meyɛ Selɛ ne gyima ne na bɛnlie me bɛnli bɔbɔ a, bɛlie me gyima ne bɛdo nu, amaa bɛanwu ye wienyi kɛ Egya de me nu yɛɛ medame mede Egya nu.”
43010039	Bɛyɛle ye bieko kɛ bɛkye ye, na ɔvile bɛ sa.
43010040	Gyisɛse eza pɛle hɔle Azule Dwɔdan ne anzi lɔ, ɛleka mɔɔ Dwɔn lumuale zɔnenle menli la na ɔdɛnlanle ɛkɛ.
43010041	Menli dɔɔnwo hɔle ɔ nwo ɛkɛ. Bɛse, “Dwɔn anyɛ nwanwane gyima mgbole biala, noko edwɛkɛ biala mɔɔ ɔhanle wɔ nrenya ɛhye anwo la le nɔhalɛ.”
43010042	Na bɛdabɛ dɔɔnwo mɔɔ bɛwɔ ɛkɛ ne la liele ye lile.
43011001	Nrenya bie anwo dole ye wɔ Bɛtani. Bɛfɛlɛ ye Lazalɛse. Mɛle nee ɔ diema raalɛ Maata bɛ sua zo a le Bɛtani.
43011002	(Mɛle ɛhye a wolale nwole evuanlɛ ne guale Awulae agyakɛ anwo na ɔvale ɔ ti enrinli ɔkyikyile la, yɛɛ ɔ diema nrenya a le Lazalɛse ɛhye mɔɔ ɛnde kpɔkɛ la.)
43011003	Mediema mraalɛ ne mɔ zoanle manle bɛhɔzele Gyisɛse kɛ, “Awulae, ɛ gɔnwo kpalɛ ne ɛnde kpɔkɛ.”
43011004	Mɔɔ Gyisɛse asa hanle nrɛlaleɛ ne la ɔhanle kɛ, “Anwondolɛ ɛhye ɛnrɛmaa Lazalɛse ɛnrɛwu. Nyamenle anyunlunyia ti yɛɛ ɛhye ɛzi a, na ɔbayɛ debie mɔɔ ɔlua zolɛ Nyamenle Ara ne ɔdaye ɔbanyia anyunlunyia a.”
43011005	Gyisɛse kulo Maata nee ɔ diema Mɛle nee Lazalɛse edwɛkɛ kpole.
43011006	Noko mɔɔ ɔdele Lazalɛse anwondolɛ nrɛlaleɛ ne la, ɔzile aze kenle nwiɔ wɔ ɛleka mɔɔ ɔwɔ la.
43011007	Na akee ɔhanle ɔhilele ye ɛdoavolɛma ne kɛ, “Bɛmaa yɛzia yɛ nzi yɛhɔ Dwudiya.”
43011008	Ɛdoavolɛma ne zele ye kɛ, “Kilehilevolɛ, ɔtɛkyɛle biala yɛɛ Dwuuma ne yɛle kɛ bɛsi wɔ awolɛ a; na eza wɔyɛ wɔ adwenle kɛ ɛkɔ lɔ bieko ɔ?”
43011009	Gyisɛse buale bɛ kɛ, “Dɔnehwele bulu nee nwiɔ a wɔ alehyenlɛ ko anu a. Yemɔti saa sonla tudu agyakɛ wɔ alehyenlɛ nu a ɔmkpula, ɔboalekɛ maanle nu le wienyi.
43011010	Na saa ɔtudu agyakɛ wɔ aledwolɛ nu a ɔkpulokpula, ɔboalekɛ awozinli ne ɛmmaa ɔnnwu aze.”
43011011	Gyisɛse hanle ɛhye na ɔvale ɔzɔle zolɛ kɛ, “Yɛ gɔnwo Lazalɛse ɛlafe, na mekɔ meahɔdunwue ye.”
43011012	Ɛdoavolɛma ne buale kɛ, “Awulae, saa yelafe a, ɛnee ɔbadunwue!”
43011013	Gyisɛse ɛnee kpondɛ aze kɛ Lazalɛse ɛwu, na bɛmɛ bɛdwenlenle nafelɛ kpalɛ nwo.
43011014	Yemɔti Gyisɛse hanle ye wienyi hilele bɛ kɛ, “Lazalɛse ɛwu,
43011015	na bɛmɛ ti, ɔyɛ me fɛ kɛ menle lɔ a, amaa bɛalie bɛali. Bɛmaa yɛhɔ ɛleka mɔɔ ɔwɔ la.”
43011016	Tɔmase (mɔɔ eza bɛfɛlɛ ye Nda la) zele ɔ gɔnwo mɔ ɛdoavolɛma ne mɔ kɛ, “Bɛmaa yɛ nee Kilehilevolɛ ne ɛhɔ na saa ewule bɔbɔ a yɛ nee ye ɛhɔwu.”
43011017	Mɔɔ Gyisɛse radwule la, ɔnwunle kɛ Lazalɛse ɛwu, bɛzie ye na yeli kenle nna.
43011018	Bɛtani mɔɔ kɔ Gyɛlusalɛm la le “kilomita” kɛyɛ nsa,
43011019	yemɔti Dwuuma dɔɔnwo ɛra kɛ bɛbakyekye Maata nee ɔ diema Mɛle arɛle wɔ bɛ diema nrenya ne ewule ne anwo.
43011020	Maata dele kɛ Gyisɛse ɛlɛba la, ɔhɔle ɔhɔyiale ye adenle. Mɛle angɔ bie.
43011021	Maata hanle hilele Gyisɛse kɛ, “Awulae, saa ɛwɔ ɛke a, anrɛɛ me diema nrenya ne anwu!
43011022	Na eza meze kɛ, kɛkala bɔbɔ, debie biala mɔɔ ɛkɛbiza Nyamenle la, ɔkɛyɛ ɔkɛmaa wɔ.”
43011023	Gyisɛse zele ye kɛ, “Ɛ diema nrenya ne badwazo ara ngoane nu.”
43011024	Maata buale kɛ, “Meze kɛ ɔbadwazo yeara ngoane nu wɔ mekɛ ne mɔɔ li awieleɛ la anu.”
43011025	Gyisɛse zele ye kɛ, “Mame a mele ewudwazo ne nee ngoane ne a. Mɔɔ kɛlie me kɛli la, saa ɔwu bɔbɔ a ɔkɛnyia ngoane;
43011026	yɛɛ mɔɔ de aze na ɔdie me ɔdi la ɛnrɛwu ɛlɛ. Ɛdie ɛhye ɛdi ɔ?”
43011027	Maata buale kɛ, “Ɛhɛe, Awulae! Medie medi kɛ wɔmɔ a ɛle Mɛzaya ne, Nyamenle Ara ne mɔɔ ɔwɔ kɛ ba ewiade la.”
43011028	Maata hanle ɛhye la, ɔziale ɔhɔle na ɔhɔdule ɔ diema Mɛle azukue kɛ, “Kilehilevolɛ ne ɛra na yebiza wɔ.”
43011029	Mɛle dele la, ɔdwazole na ɔnriandile ɔhɔyiale Gyisɛse.
43011030	(Ɛnee Gyisɛse ɛtɛdwule sua ne azo, na ɔtɛbɔ ɛleka mɔɔ Maata hɔyiale ye la.)
43011031	Dwuuma mɔɔ ɛnee wɔ sua nu ɛkɛ ne ɛlɛkyekye Mɛle arɛle la nwunle kɛ yezi yemaa ɔ nwo zo na ɔlɛnriandi yeahɔ la, bɛdwenlenle kɛ ɔlɛkɔ ɔ diema ne sɛka zo lɔ yeahɔzu. Yemɔti bɛdoale ye.
43011032	Mɛle dwule ɛleka mɔɔ Gyisɛse wɔ na ɔnwunle ye la, ɔdule ɔdɔle ɔ gyakɛ anu na ɔzele kɛ, “Awulae, saa ɛwɔ ɛke a, anrɛɛ me diema nrenya ne anwu.”
43011033	Gyisɛse nwunle kɛ Mɛle ɛlɛsi azu, na Dwuuma mɔɔ nee ye ɛra la ɛlɛsu la, nyane kpole hanle ye manle alɔbɔlɛ hunle ye.
43011034	Ɔbizale bɛ kɛ, “Nienwu a bɛdole ye a?” Bɛzele ye kɛ, “Awulae, bɛla banlea.”
43011035	Gyisɛse zunle.
43011036	Yemɔti menli mɔɔ wɔ ɛkɛ ne la hanle kɛ, “Nea, amgba ɔkulo ye edwɛkɛ kpalɛ!”
43011037	Na bie mɔ hanle kɛ, “Se anrɛɛ ɔtukuedukue anyenzinliravolɛma anye o! Duzu ati a yeanlie Lazalɛse yeanvi ewule nu a?”
43011038	Gyisɛse lile nyane kpole bieko na ɔhɔle nla ne anwo. Nla ne le bolɛ bɔne yɛɛ bɛvale bolɛ bɛnyinle ɔ nloa.
43011039	Gyisɛse zele bɛ kɛ, “Bɛye bolɛ ne!” Maata, mɔɔ le nrenya ne mɔɔ ɛwu la adiema raalɛ ne zele kɛ, “Awulae, yebɔ! Bɛziele ye la ɛnɛ le kenle nna!”
43011040	Gyisɛse zele ye kɛ, “Metɛkanle metɛkilele wɔ kɛ saa ɛdie ɛdi a ɛkɛnwu kɛ Nyamenle anyunlunyia ne si de la ɔ?”
43011041	Bɛhundole bolɛ ne bɛyele ye ɛkɛ. Gyisɛse nleanle anwuma na ɔhanle kɛ, “Egya, meyɛ wɔ mo somaa kɛ wɔdie me a.
43011042	Meze kɛ dahuu ɛtie me edwɛkɛ, na melɛka ɛhye wɔ menli mɔɔ kɛkala wɔ ɛke la ati, amaa bɛalie bɛali kɛ ɛdawɔ a ɛzoanle me a.”
43011043	Ɔhanle ɛhye la, ɔdeanle nu kpole ɔzele kɛ, “Lazalɛse, dwazo bɛla!”
43011044	Nrenya ne mɔɔ ɛwu la vindele rale, na ndanlɛ mɔɔ bɛvale bɛkyekyele ye funli ne la kyekye ɔ sa, ɔ gyakɛ nee ɔ da. Gyisɛse zele bɛ kɛ, “Bɛzianyizianyi ye na bɛmaa ɔhɔ.”
43011045	Dwuuma dɔɔnwo mɔɔ rale Mɛle ɛkpɔlalɛ la nwunle mɔɔ Gyisɛse ɛyɛ la, na bɛliele ye bɛlile.
43011046	Na bie mɔ ziale hɔle Falasiima ɛkɛ ne na bɛhɔhanle mɔɔ Gyisɛse ɛyɛ la bɛhilele bɛ.
43011047	Yemɔti Falasiima ne nee sɛlɛvolɛ mgbanyima ne mɔ yiale Ayiama ne na bɛhanle kɛ, “Duzu bɔbɔ yɛɛ akee yɛyɛ a? Nea nwanwane gyima mɔɔ akee nrenya ne ɛlɛyɛ la!
43011048	Saa yɛmaa ɔkɔ zolɛ ɔyɛ a, awie biala balie ye ali, na Wulomu arane ne bava ɛya na yearazɛkye yɛ Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ye nee yɛ maanle ye amuala.”
43011049	Ɛvolɛ ne anu Sɛlɛvolɛ Kpanyinli ne, mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye Kayafase la zele bɛ kɛ, “Bɛdabɛ, bɛnze ɛhwee!
43011050	Yemɔti bɛnze kɛ ɔle kpalɛ kɛ sonla ko kɛwu kɛmaa maanle ne tɛla kɛ yɛ maanle ne amuala kɛbɔ ɔ?”
43011051	Nɔhalɛ, ɔ nye ɛnla nwo yɛɛ ɔhanle ɛhye a, na kɛmɔ yemɔ a ɛvolɛ ne anu ɔle Sɛlɛvolɛ Kpanyinli la, ɛnee ɔlɛka mɔɔ Nyamenle ɛye ɛhile ye la kɛ ɔwɔ kɛ Gyisɛse wu maa Dwuuma amuala,
43011052	yɛɛ tɛ Dwuuma angome bɔbɔ, na kɛ ɔkɛva Nyamenle amra mɔɔ ɛde ɛkponde ewiade amuala la kɔsɔɔti ɔkarabɔ nu ɔkɛyɛ bɛ menli ko.
43011053	Ɔvi kenle ko zɔhane, Dwuu mgbanyima ne mɔ yɛle ngyehyɛlɛ kɛ ɔwɔ kɛ bɛku Gyisɛse.
43011054	Yemɔti Gyisɛse anye ɔ nwo anlua Dwudiya maanzinli ne anu, na ɔvile ɛkɛ ne ɔhɔle ɛleka bie mɔɔ bikye ɛsɛlɛ ne azo la, wɔ sua bie mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye Yifelaem la azo; ɛkɛ ne yɛɛ ɔ nee ye ɛdoavolɛma ne dɛnlanle a.
43011055	Dwuuma Akpabɛnwo Ɛvoyia ne ɛbikye, na menli dɔɔnwo vi namunamu ne mɔ azo ɛra Gyɛlusalɛm kɛ bɛbanlua bɛ nwo kolaa na ɛvoyia ne adwu.
43011056	Mekɛ ne anu ɛnee bɛlɛkpondɛ Gyisɛse, yemɔti mɔɔ bɛyiale Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne anu la, bɛbizebizale bɛ nwo kɛ, “Kɛ ɔde ɛ? Asoo ɔkɛhola ɛvoyia ye bie ba ɔ?”
43011057	Sɛlɛvolɛ mgbanyima ne nee Falasiima ɛva ɛdo gua kɛ saa awie biala ze ɛleka mɔɔ Gyisɛse vea la a, ɔraha, amaa bɛahɔhye ye.
43012001	Mɔɔ ɔhale kenle nsia na Akpabɛnwo Ɛvoyia ne adwu la, Gyisɛse hɔle Bɛtani. Bɛtani a Lazalɛse vi a. Lazalɛse ɛhye a wule mɔɔ Gyisɛse dunwuele ye la.
43012002	Bɛdole Gyisɛse ɛkponle wɔ ɛkɛ ne, na Maata boka bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛzonlenle la anwo, yɛɛ Lazalɛse noko nee Gyisɛse a de ɛkponle ne anwo a.
43012003	Mɛle vale nwole evuanlɛ bie mɔɔ ye bolɛ yɛ se kpalɛ na bɛfɛlɛ ye “naade” la toba kpole ko mɔɔ kɛyɛ litili ko la rawolale guale Gyisɛse agyakɛ anwo, na ɔvale ɔ ti enrinli ɔkyikyile. Nwole ne evuanlɛ vale sua ne anu amuala.
43012004	Gyisɛse ɛdoavolɛma ne anu ko, mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye Dwudase Yesekaleɔto mɔɔ yele Gyisɛse manle la hanle kɛ,
43012005	“Duzu ati a bɛandɔne nwole ye kɛyɛ dwɛtɛ fufule ɛya nsa na bɛanva ezukoa ne bɛamboa ehyianvolɛma ɛ?”
43012006	Tɛ kɛ asɛɛ ɔdwenle ehyianvolɛma anwo somaa la ati a ɔhanle ɛhye a, na ɔle awule, eza kɛmɔ ɔdaye a ɔsie bɛ gya ne la, ɔyɛ a ɔto ɔ sa nu.
43012007	Na Gyisɛse zele kɛ, “Bɛgyakyi raalɛ ne! Me ɛzielɛ ti a yeyɛ ɛhye a.
43012008	Bɛmɛ bɛ nee ehyianvolɛma de dahuu, na mame bɛ nee me ɛnrɛdɛnla dahuu.”
43012009	Dwuuma dɔɔnwo kpalɛ dele kɛ Gyisɛse wɔ Bɛtani la, bɛhɔle ɛkɛ ne. Tɛ Gyisɛse angome ati a bɛhɔle a, na eza bɛhɔle kɛ bɛkanlea Lazalɛse mɔɔ Gyisɛse dwazole ye vile ewule nu la.
43012010	Zɔhane ati sɛlɛvolɛ mgbanyinli ne mɔ vale adwenle kɛ bɛku Lazalɛse noko,
43012011	ɔluakɛ ɔdaye ɔ ti yɛɛ Dwuuma dɔɔnwo ɛlɛgyakyi bɛ mgbanyima dɛba ne anzi ɛlilɛ na bɛalie Gyisɛse bɛali a.
43012012	Aleɛ hyenle la menli dɔɔnwo mɔɔ rale Akpabɛnwo Ɛvoyia ne ɛlilɛ ne bie la dele kɛ Gyisɛse ɛlɛba Gyɛlusalɛm.
43012013	Yemɔti bɛvale mrɛlakɛ bɛhɔyiale ye adenle, bɛdeɛdeanle nu kɛ, “Bɛye Nyamenle ayɛlɛ! Nyamenle ɛyila mɔɔ lua Awulae duma nu ɛlɛba la! Nyamenle ɛyila Yizilayɛ belemgbunli ne!”
43012014	Gyisɛse dɛnlanle asoaso zo, kɛmɔ Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne se la. Ɔse,
43012015	“Suakpole Zayɔn, mmasulo! Wɔ belemgbunli ne de asoaso zo ɛlɛba.”
43012016	Mekɛ ne anu ye ɛdoavolɛma ne ande ɛhye abo; na mɔɔ bɛdwazole Gyisɛse anyunlunyia nu bɛvile ewule nu la, bɛhakyele kɛ Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne ɛha ɛhye wɔ ɔ nwo, na bɛmɛ yɛɛ bɛyɛle ɛhye bɛmanle ye a.
43012017	Menli mɔɔ ɛnee wɔ ɛkɛ ne a Gyisɛse vɛlɛle Lazalɛse vile ye nla ne anu, na ɔdwazole ye ɔvile ewule nu la hɔhanle mɔɔ bɛnwunle ye la.
43012018	Ɛhye ati menli dɔɔnwo rayiale ye adenle, ɔboalekɛ bɛdele kɛ ɔdaye a yeyɛ nwanwane sɛkɛlɛneɛ mɔɔ le zɛhae la a.
43012019	Na Falasiima ne hanle hilele bɛ nwo kɛ, “Bɛnwu kɛ yɛangola ɛhwee yɛ ɛ! Nea kɛ ewiade amuala ɛdu doa ye ɛ!”
43012020	Gilikima bie boka menli mɔɔ hɔle Gyɛlusalɛm kɛ bɛkazonle la anwo wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ bɛdi ɛvoyia ne la.
43012021	Bɛrale Felepe anwo ɛkɛ ne na bɛzele ye kɛ, “Yɛmenle, yɛkulo kɛ yɛnwu Gyisɛse.” (Felepe vi Bɛteseeyeda mɔɔ wɔ Galeli maanzinli nu la.)
43012022	Felepe hɔhanle hilele Andelu, na bɛ mu nwiɔ bɛhɔhanle bɛhilele Gyisɛse.
43012023	Gyisɛse buale kɛ, “Mekɛ akee ɛdwu kɛ bɛkɛwula medame Sonla Ra anyunlunyia kpole a.
43012024	Meka nɔhalɛ ne meahile bɛ: Abɛlɛ ma ko anwo ɛnrɛzo dɔɔnwo kyesɛ bɛdua na ɔkpɔlɔ. Saa ɔkpɔlɔ a, ɔfifi na ɔso ma dɔɔnwo.
43012025	Mɔɔ ye ngoane hyia ye la baminli ye, na mɔɔ ye ngoane ɛngyia ye wɔ ewiade ɛhye anu la banyia ngoane mɔɔ ɛnlɛ awieleɛ.
43012026	Awie mɔɔ kpondɛ kɛ ɔsonle me la ɔwɔ kɛ toa me bo zo, amaa ɛleka mɔɔ mewɔ la, me sonvolɛ ne ɔdaye yeara ɛkɛ ne, yɛɛ Egya bawula mɔɔ sonle me la anyunlunyia.
43012027	“Nyane ɛha me kpole; na duzu edwɛkɛ a menga a? Asoo menga ye kɛ, ‘Egya, mmamaa mekɛ zɔhane to me’ ɔ? Kyɛkyɛ, ɛhye ala ati a membale a; membale kɛ meba mearazɔ nyane sa wɔ zɔhane mekɛ ne anu.
43012028	Egya, maa anyunlunyia ɛha wɔ duma ne.” Ɔhanle ɛhye la, ɛnelɛ bie vi anwuma zele kɛ, “Mewula ye anyunlunyia dɛba, na mebawula ye bieko.”
43012029	Ɛlɔne mɔɔ gyi ɛkɛ ne la dele ɛnelɛ ne na bɛhanle kɛ, “Ɔhulule kɛ ezule!” Bie mɔ noko hanle kɛ, “Nyamenle soanvolɛ ɛdendɛ ɛhile ye!”
43012030	Na Gyisɛse zele bɛ kɛ, “Tɛ me ti a ɛnelɛ ɛhye rale a, na bɛdabɛ bɛ ti ɔ.
43012031	Mekɛ ɛdwu mɔɔ akee ɔwɔ kɛ bɛbua ewiade ndɛne a; akee bɛbadu Seetan mɔɔ sie ɛtane ewiade ɛhye la bɛavi ɛkɛ.
43012032	Na mame, saa bɛmaa me zo wɔ azɛlɛ ye azo a, mebahwe menli kɔsɔɔti meamaa me nwo.”
43012033	(Ɔhanle ɛhye ɔvale ɔhilele ewule holɛ ko mɔɔ ɔbawu la.)
43012034	Ɛlɔne ne bizale ye kɛ, “Yɛ mɛla ne ka kile yɛ kɛ Mɛzaya ne ɛnrɛwu ɛlɛ. Na duzu ati a ɛse ɔwɔ kɛ bɛmaa Sonla Ra ne zo a? Nwane a le Sonla Ra ɛhye?”
43012035	Gyisɛse buale kɛ, “Wienyi ne nee bɛ badɛnla mekɛ ekyi. Yemɔti bɛva wienyi ne bɛhɔdwu, amaa awozinli anva bɛ, ɔluakɛ mɔɔ dua awozinli nu la ɛnnwu ɛleka mɔɔ ɔlɛkɔ la.
43012036	Zɔhane ati bɛlie wienyi ne bɛli wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ ɔ nee bɛ de la, amaa bɛayɛ wienyi nu menli.” Gyisɛse hanle ɛhye la, ɔhɔveale.
43012037	Ɔluakɛ yeyɛ nwanwane sɛkɛlɛneɛ dɔɔnwo ɛhye mɔ yemaa bɛnwu bɛ ɛdeɛ, noko bɛanlie ye bɛanli,
43012038	amaa mɔɔ Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛ Ayezaya hanle la ayɛ nɔhalɛ kɛ, “Awulae, na awie liele wɔ edwɛkɛ ne mɔɔ yɛhanle la lile ɔ? Na Awulae yele ye tumi ne hilele awie ɔ?”
43012039	Yemɔti bɛangola bɛanlie Gyisɛse bɛanli, ɔboalekɛ Ayezaya eza hanle kɛ,
43012040	“Nyamenle ɛzi bɛ nye na yemaa bɛsolo, amaa bɛ nye annwu debie na bɛ nzo ade edwɛkɛ, na bɛahakyi bɛara me nwo kɛ menyɛ bɛ ayile.”
43012041	Ayezaya hanle ɛhye, ɔluakɛ ɔnwunle Gyisɛse anyunlunyia ne dɛba yɛɛ ɔhanle ɔ nwo edwɛkɛ a.
43012042	Noko bɔbɔ, Dwuu mgbanyima ne mɔ anu dɔɔnwo liele Gyisɛse lile; na Falasiima ati bɛangola nwolɛ edwɛkɛ ka bagua nu anrɛɛ bɛkɛye bɛ ali bɛkɛvi nyianu sua ne anu.
43012043	Bɛkulo menli nganvolɛ bɛtɛla Nyamenle nganvolɛ.
43012044	Gyisɛse manle ɔ ne zo hanle kɛ, “Sonla mɔɔ die me di la ɛnlie me ngome ɛnli na ɔdie mɔɔ zoanle me la noko ɔdi.
43012045	Mɔɔ ɛnwu me la ɛnwu mɔɔ zoanle me la.
43012046	Mera kɛ mame a mele ewiade wienyi ne a, amaa mɔɔ kɛlie me kɛli la anga awozinli nu.
43012047	Sonla mɔɔ kɛde me edwɛkɛ ne na yeanli zolɛ la, menrɛbua ye ewule fɔlɛ. Meamba kɛ mebabua ewiade ewule fɔlɛ; membale kɛ mebalie ye.
43012048	Na mɔɔ kɛkpo me na yeanlie me edwɛkɛ ne la lɛ mɔɔ babua ye ewule fɔlɛ a. Edwɛkɛ ne mɔɔ meha la yɛɛ babua ye ewule fɔlɛ wɔ mekɛ ne mɔɔ li awieleɛ la a.
43012049	Ɔle zɔhane, ɔboalekɛ tɛ medame me tumi zo a medua metendɛ a. Selɛ ne mɔɔ zoanle me la a kile me mɔɔ ɔwɔ kɛ meka la a;
43012050	yɛɛ meze kɛ ye edwɛkɛ ne maa sonla ngoane mɔɔ ɛnlɛ awieleɛ. Yemɔti mɔɔ Selɛ ne ɛha ɛhile me la, yemɔ yɛɛ meka a.”
43013001	Gyisɛse nwunle kɛ akee mekɛ ɛdwu mɔɔ ɔwɔ kɛ ɔfi ewiade ɛhye anu na ɔkɔ Selɛ ne anwo lɔ a. Mekɛ ne anu ɛnee aleɛ kye a bɛkɛli Akpabɛnwo Ɛvoyia ne. Yehulo bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛle ye ɛdeɛ wɔ ewiade ye anu la dahuu, yɛɛ yehulo bɛ yehɔ awieleɛ.
43013002	Gyisɛse nee ye ɛdoavolɛma ne dɛnlanle aze nɔsolɛ nu kɛ bɛdi debie. Abɔnsam noko ɛbɔ kpɔkɛ ɛwie kɛ ɔwɔ kɛ Dwudase, Saemɔn Yesekaleɔto ara ne ye Gyisɛse maa.
43013003	Gyisɛse ze kɛ Selɛ ne ɛmaa ye tumi bɔkɔɔ; ɔze kɛ ɔdaye Gyisɛse, ɔvi Nyamenle anwo lɔ a ɔrale a na eza ɔbazia yeahɔ Nyamenle anwo lɔ.
43013004	Yemɔti ɔvile ɛkponle ne anwo ɔdwazole, ɔkpale ɔguale, na ɔvale tohulu ɔpɛle ɔ bo.
43013005	Akee ɔvale nzule ɔguale kyɛnze kpole bie anu na ɔbɔle ɔ bo kɛ ɔnrinzi ye ɛdoavolɛma ne agyakɛ anwo. Ɔnrinzi ɔwie a ɛnee yeva tohulu ne mɔɔ pɛ ɔ bo la yekyikyi.
43013006	Ɔradwule Saemɔn Pita anwo zo la, Pita bizale Gyisɛse kɛ, “Awulae, na akee wɔmɔ yɛɛ ɛnrinzi me gyakɛ anwo a?”
43013007	Gyisɛse buale ye kɛ, “Ɛnrɛde mɔɔ melɛyɛ la abo kɛkala, na nzinlii ɛbade ɔ bo.”
43013008	Pita zele ye kɛ, “Menrɛmaa ɛnrɛnrinzi me gyakɛ anwo kenle bie maanle nu!” Gyisɛse buale ye kɛ, “Saa meanrinzi ɛ gyakɛ anwo a ɛnee ɛnle me ɛdoavolɛ bieko.”
43013009	Saemɔn Pita zele ye kɛ, “Awulae, ɛnee noko mmanrinzi me gyakɛ anwo ala! Nrinzi me sa anwo nee me ti zo amuala noko!”
43013010	Gyisɛse zele ye kɛ, “Mɔɔ ɛbia la anwo le bɔkɔbɔkɔ na ɔngyia kɛ ɔkɛbia bieko. Debie mɔɔ ɔwɔ kɛ ɔyɛ la a le kɛ ɔnrinzi ɔ gyakɛ anwo ala. Bɛ muala bɛ nwo le bɔkɔbɔkɔ. Sonla ko ala yɛɛ anwo ɛnle bɔkɔbɔkɔ a.”
43013011	Ɛnee Gyisɛse ze sonla mɔɔ baye ye amaa la, ɛhye ati a ɔhanle kɛ, “Bɛ muala bɛ nwo le bɔkɔbɔkɔ, sonla ko ala a anwo ɛnle bɔkɔbɔkɔ a.”
43013012	Gyisɛse wiele bɛ gyakɛ anwo nrinzi la, ɔwulale ye tɛladeɛ ne na ɔziale ɔhɔdɛnlanle ɔ bo zo ne wɔ ɛkponle ne anwo, na ɔbizale bɛ kɛ, “Asoo bɛte mɔɔ meyɛ ye kɛkala la abo?
43013013	Bɛfɛlɛ me Kilehilevolɛ nee Awulae, na ɔle kpalɛ kɛ bɛkɛvɛlɛ me zɔhane a, ɔluakɛ mele zɔhane.
43013014	Mele bɛ Awulae nee bɛ Kilehilevolɛ, noko menrinzinrinzi bɛ gyakɛ anwo. Bɛdabɛ noko bɛnrinzinrinzi bɛ gyakɛ anwo ngoko ngoko.
43013015	Meyɛ ndonwo ɛhye mehile bɛ, amaa bɛdabɛ noko bɛayɛ ye zɔhane ala.
43013016	Meka nɔhalɛ meahile bɛ: Akɛlɛ biala ɛnle kpole ɛndɛla ɔ menle; soanvolɛ biala ɛnle kpole ɛndɛla ahenle mɔɔ zoanle ye la,
43013017	Kɛkala mɔɔ bɛnwu nɔhalɛ ɛhye la, saa bɛfa bɛyɛ gyima a bɛkɛli fɛlɛko kpole!
43013018	“Tɛ bɛ muala bɛ nwo edwɛkɛ a melɛka a; meze mɔɔ mekpa nu meye bɛ la. Na Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne mɔɔ se, ‘Sonla ne mɔɔ nee me di nee me no la hakyile ɔ nzi zile me’ la ɔwɔ kɛ yɛ zɔhane.
43013019	Meka ɛhye meahile bɛ kɛkala kolaa na yeazi, amaa saa ɔsi a, bɛalie bɛali kɛ ‘Medame a le Medame’,
43013020	Meka nɔhalɛ ne meahile bɛ: Awie mɔɔ kɛlie awie biala mɔɔ menwɔzoa ye la ɛlie medame noko, yɛɛ mɔɔ kɛlie me la ɛlie ahenle mɔɔ zoanle me la.”
43013021	Gyisɛse hanle ɛhye la, ɛnee akee nyane ɛha ye kpole kpalɛ, na ɔhanle ɔdole gua kɛ, “Meka nɔhalɛ ne meahile bɛ: Bɛdabɛ, bɛ nuhua ko baye me amaa.”
43013022	Ɛhye yɛle ɛdoavolɛma ne azibɛnwo kpole na bɛnleɛnleanle bɛ nyunlu.
43013023	Ɛnee ɛdoavolɛ ne mɔɔ Gyisɛse kulo ye edwɛkɛ la de Gyisɛse anwo ɛkɛ ne.
43013024	Yemɔti Saemɔn Pita bɔle ɔ nye hilele ye kɛ, “Biza ye ahenle mɔɔ ɔlɛka ɔ nwo edwɛkɛ la.”
43013025	Ɛdoavolɛ ne hwenle bikyele Gyisɛse na ɔbizale ye kɛ, “Awulae, ɛnee nwane ɔ?”
43013026	Gyisɛse buale kɛ, “Saa mebu kpanwo ne mebɔ subue ne anu na mɔɔ menwɔva menwɔmaa ye la, yemɔ ɔ.” Yemɔti Gyisɛse bule kpanwo ne ekyi, ɔvale ɔbɔle subue ne anu na ɔvale ɔmanle Dwudase, Saemɔn Yesekaleɔto ara ne.
43013027	Dwudase liele kpanwo ne la yɛɛ Seetan wolole ye a. Gyisɛse zele ye kɛ, “Ka ɛ nwo yɛ mɔɔ ɛyɛ la.”
43013028	Awie biala mɔɔ de ɛkponle ne anwo la ande mɔɔ Gyisɛse hanle hilele Dwudase la abo.
43013029	Kɛmɔ Dwudase a ɛnee nea bɛ gya zo la ati, ɛdoavolɛma ne bie mɔ dwenlenle kɛ Gyisɛse ɛzoa ye kɛ ɔhɔtotɔ ninyɛne mɔɔ bɛbahyia nwolɛ wɔ ɛvoyia ne ɛlilɛ nu la, anzɛɛ yeha yehile ye kɛ ɔva debie ɔhɔmaa ehyianvolɛma.
43013030	Dwudase liele kpanwo ne la, ndɛndɛ ne ala ɔvindele; na ɛnee aleɛ ɛdwo.
43013031	Dwudase vindele la, Gyisɛse hanle kɛ, “Akee bɔ zo mɔɔ medame Sonla Ra, me anyunlunyia ne ɛla ali a; bɛbalua me nwo zo bɛaye Nyamenle anyunlunyia ne bɛahile.
43013032	Na saa bɛdua me nwo zo bɛye Nyamenle anyunlunyia ne bɛkile a, Nyamenle ɔdaye ɔbaye medame Sonla Ra ne noko, me anyunlunyia ne yeahile, na ɔbayɛ ɛhye ndɛndɛ ne ala.
43013033	Me mra, me nee bɛ ɛnrɛdɛnla ɛnrɛhyɛ. Bɛbakpondɛ me, na mɔɔ menganle mengilele Dwuu mgbanyima ne mɔ la yɛɛ meka meahile bɛdabɛ noko a. ‘Bɛnrɛhola ɛleka mɔɔ melɛkɔ la kɔ’.
43013034	Memaa bɛ mɛla fofolɛ: Bɛhulo bɛ nwo ngoko ngoko. Kɛ mezi mehulo bɛ la, zɔhane ala yɛɛ bɛhulo bɛ nwo ngoko ngoko a.
43013035	Saa bɛkulo bɛ nwo ngoko ngoko a yɛɛ awie biala kɛnwu kɛ bɛle me ɛdoavolɛma a.”
43013036	Saemɔn Pita bizale ye kɛ, “Awulae, na nienwu a ɛkɔ a?” Gyisɛse buale ye kɛ, “Kɛkala, ɛleka mɔɔ melɛkɔ la, ɛnrɛhola me toa, na nzinlii ɛbadoa me lɔ.”
43013037	Pita bizale ye kɛ, “Awulae, duzu ati a menrɛhola wɔ toa kɛkala ɛ? Meziezie me nwo kɛ saa ewule bɔbɔ a menwɔwu menwɔmaa wɔ.”
43013038	Gyisɛse buale ye kɛ, “Amgba wɔboɔboa ɛ nwo kɛ ɛkɛwu ɛkɛmaa me ɔ? Meka nɔhalɛ ne meahile wɔ: Akɔlɛ kabɔ la ɛnee wɔha ye fane nsa kɛ ɛnze me.”
43014001	Gyisɛse zele bɛ kɛ, “Bɛmmamaa bɛ rɛle bɔ na bɛdi nyane. Bɛlie Nyamenle bɛli na bɛlie medame noko bɛli.
43014002	Egya awuke nu ɛkɛ ne, azua ngome; mekɔ meahɔziezie ɛleka meamaa bɛ. Saa ɔnle zɔhane a anrɛɛ menrɛha menrɛhile bɛ.
43014003	Saa mekɔ na mesiezie ɛleka memaa bɛ a, mebara bieko na mearava bɛ meahɔ me nwo lɔ, amaa bɛadɛnla ɛleka mɔɔ mewɔ la.
43014004	Bɛdabɛ bɛze adenle ne mɔɔ kɔ ɛleka mɔɔ melɛkɔ la.”
43014005	Tɔmase bizale ye kɛ, “Awulae, yɛnze ɛleka mɔɔ ɛlɛkɔ la; na kɛ ɔkɛyɛ na yɛanwu adenle ne mɔɔ kɔ ɛkɛ ne la ɛ?”
43014006	Gyisɛse buale ye kɛ, “Mame a mele adenle ne, nɔhalɛ ne, nee ngoane ne a; awie biala ɛnrɛhola Selɛ ne ɛkɛ ne kɔ kyesɛ ɔdua me nwo zo.”
43014007	Ɔvale ɔzɔle zo kɛ, “Saa bɛze me a anrɛɛ bɛze Egya noko, yɛɛ ɔvi ɛnɛ mɔɔ kɔ la, bɛnwu ye yɛɛ bɛze ye.”
43014008	Felepe hanle kɛ, “Awulae, kile yɛ Selɛ ne; mɔɔ yɛkpondɛ la ala ɛne.”
43014009	Gyisɛse buale ye kɛ, “Felepe, yemɔti mekɛ tendenle ye mɔɔ me nee bɛ muala ɛdɛnla la bɛnze me? Awie mɔɔ ɛnwu me la ɛnwu Selɛ ne. Duzu ati a akee ɛbiza me kɛ, ‘Kile yɛ Selɛ ne ɛ?’
43014010	Felepe, na ɛnlie ɛnli kɛ mede Selɛ ne nu yɛɛ Selɛ ne de me nu ɔ?” Gyisɛse akee hanle hilele ye ɛdoavolɛma ne amuala kɛ, “Edwɛkɛ mɔɔ meha mehile bɛ la ɛnle me ti anwo edwɛkɛ. Selɛ ne mɔɔ de me nu la a yɛ ye gyima a.
43014011	Bɛlie me bɛli kɛ mede Selɛ ne nu yɛɛ Selɛ ne de me nu. Saa tɛ ye zɔhane a, ɛnee gyima mɔɔ meyɛ la ati, bɛlie me bɛli.
43014012	Meka nɔhalɛ ne meahile bɛ: Awie mɔɔ kɛlie me kɛli la kɛyɛ gyima mɔɔ meyɛ la bie, yɛɛ ɔbayɛ mɔɔ tɛla ɛhye mɔ la bɔbɔ, ɔluakɛ melɛkɔ Selɛ ne anwo lɔ,
43014013	yɛɛ mɔɔ bɛkɛbiza ye biala wɔ me duma nu la, mebayɛ, amaa bɛalua Ralɛ ne anwo zo bɛaye Selɛ ne anyunlunyia bɛahile.
43014014	Saa bɛbiza debie biala wɔ me duma nu a, mebayɛ.
43014015	“Saa bɛkulo me a, bɛbali me mɛla ne mɔ azo.
43014016	Mebabiza Selɛ ne meamaa yeamaa bɛ Boavolɛ fofolɛ, na ɔ nee bɛ aradɛnla dahuu.
43014017	Boavolɛ zɔhane, yemɔ a le Sunsum ne mɔɔ baye nɔhalɛ ne mɔɔ fane Nyamenle anwo la ahile bɛ la. Ewiade ɛnrɛhola ɛnrɛlie ye, ɔboalekɛ ɔnrɛnwu ye yɛɛ ɔnze ye. Na bɛmɛ bɛze ye, ɔluakɛ ɔ nee bɛ a de a yɛɛ ɔde bɛ nu.
43014018	“Saa mekɔ a, menrɛgyakyi bɛ nrisa; mebara bɛ nwo bieko.
43014019	Ɔnrɛhyɛ biala ɛnee ewiade ɛnnwu me bieko, na bɛmɛ, bɛbanwu me, na kɛmɔ mede ngoane nu la, bɛdabɛ noko bɛbadɛnla ngoane nu.
43014020	Saa mekɛ zɔhane dwu a bɛkɛnwu kɛ mede Egya nu na bɛdabɛ noko bɛde me nu, na medame mede bɛ nu la.
43014021	“Awie biala mɔɔ kɛlie me mɛla ne mɔ na ɔkɛli zolɛ la, yemɔ a kulo me a. Egya bahulo awie biala mɔɔ kulo me la, na medame noko mebahulo ye na meaye me nwo meahile ye.”
43014022	Dwudase (tɛ Dwudase Yesekaleɔto ɔ) bizale ye kɛ, “Awulae, duzu ati a ɛye ɛ nwo wɔahile yɛ na ɛnrɛye ɛ nwo ɛnrɛhile ewiade ɛ?”
43014023	Gyisɛse buale ye kɛ, “Awie biala mɔɔ kulo me la bali me ngilehilelɛ zo. Egya bahulo ye, na me nee Egya yɛbara ɔ nwo ɛkɛ yɛ nee ye aradɛnla.
43014024	Mɔɔ ɛngulo me la ɛnli me ngilehilelɛ zo. Edwɛkɛ ne mɔɔ bɛde la ɛnvi me ɛkɛ ne, ɔvi Selɛ ne mɔɔ zoanle me la ɛkɛ.
43014025	“Mekɛ mɔɔ me nee bɛ de ala ye yɛɛ meha ɛhye mehile bɛ la o!
43014026	Boavolɛ ne, mɔɔ le Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne, mɔɔ Selɛ ne bazoa ye wɔ me duma nu la, barahilehile bɛ debie biala, na yeamaa bɛahakye mɔɔ meha mehile bɛ la amuala.
43014027	“Anzonudwolɛ a mefa megyakyi bɛ a; medame me anzonudwolɛ a mefa megyakyi bɛ a. Menva memmaa bɛ kɛmɔ ewiade fa maa la. Bɛmmamaa bɛ rɛle bɔ na bɛdi nyane; bɛmmasulo noko.
43014028	Bɛdele kɛ meha kɛ, ‘Melɛkɔ na mebara bieko.’ Saa bɛhulole me a, anrɛɛ bɛ nye ɛlie kɛ melɛkɔ Selɛ ne anwo lɔ a, ɔboalekɛ yemɔ, ɔle kpole ɔtɛla me.
43014029	Kɛkala meha ɛhye mehile bɛ, kolaa na yeazi, amaa saa ɔsi a, bɛalie bɛali.
43014030	Menrɛhola me nee bɛ ɛnrɛdendɛ ɛnrɛhyɛ dɔɔnwo biala, ɔboalekɛ mɔɔ sie ɛtane ewiade ɛhye la ɛlɛba. Ɔnlɛ me nwo zo tumi ɛdeɛ,
43014031	noko ɔwɔ kɛ ewiade nwu kɛ mekulo Selɛ ne; yemɔti meyɛ debie biala mɔɔ ɔkɛze me la. “Bɛdwazo bɛmaa yɛhɔ.”
43015001	“Mame a mele vanye baka kpalɛ ne a, yɛɛ Egya a le tola ne amenle a.
43015002	Me sa ngane biala mɔɔ ɛnzo ma la, ɔkpane ye ɔto, na ɔsiezie ngane ne mɔ mɔɔ so ma la, amaa bɛazo ma dɔɔnwo.
43015003	Ngilehilelɛ mɔɔ meva memaa bɛ la ɛziezie bɛ ɛwie.
43015004	Bɛhɔ zolɛ bɛdɛnla me nu, na medame mendɛnla bɛ nu. Baka ɛhane ngome ɛngola ɛnzo ma; saa ɔwɔ vanye baka ne anwo a yɛɛ ɔso ma a. Zɔhane ala yɛɛ bɛdabɛ noko bɛnrɛhola bɛnrɛyɛ Nyamenle ɛhulolɛdeɛ ne a, kyesɛ bɛmeta me nwo kɛ baka ngane la.
43015005	“Mame a mele vanye baka ne a, yɛɛ bɛmɛ a bɛle ye ngane ne mɔ a. Mɔɔ kɛdɛnla me nu na menwɔdɛnla ye nu la bazo ma dɔɔnwo; ɔluakɛ saa menle nu a bɛ ngome bɛnrɛhola ɛhwee yɛ.
43015006	Awie biala mɔɔ andɛnla me nu la bɛfuandi ye bɛto kɛ baka ɛhane mɔɔ bɛpɛ la; ɔwe na ɔkyengye. Mbaka ngane mɔɔ le zɛhae la, bɛboɔboa bɛ nloa na bɛfuandi bɛ bɛgua senle nu bɛyela bɛ.
43015007	Saa bɛde me nu na me edwɛkɛ ne de bɛ nu a, ɛnee bɛbiza debie biala mɔɔ bɛkulo la, na bɛ sa kɛha ye.
43015008	Saa bɛyɛ Nyamenle ɛhulolɛdeɛ a, ɛnee bɛlɛye Egya anyunlunyia bɛahile; na ye zɛhae azo a bɛlua a bɛkɛhile kɛ bɛle me ɛdoavolɛma a.
43015009	Mekulo bɛ kɛ mɔɔ Selɛ ne kulo me la; bɛdɛnla me ɛhulolɛ ne anu.
43015010	Saa bɛdi me mɛla ne mɔ azo a ɛnee bɛde me ɛhulolɛ ne anu, kɛmɔ meli Selɛ ne mɛla zo na mede ye ɛhulolɛ ne anu la.
43015011	“Meha ɛhye mehile bɛ, amaa me fɛlɛkolilɛ adɛnla bɛ nu na bɛdabɛ noko bɛ fɛlɛkolilɛ ne ali munli.
43015012	Me mɛla ne a le ɛhye: Bɛhulo bɛ nwo ngoko ngoko, kɛmɔ mehulo bɛ la.
43015013	Ɛhulolɛ kpalɛ mɔɔ sonla kɛnyia ye wɔ ɔ gɔnwo mɔ anwo la a le kɛ ɔkɛva ye ngoane ɔkɛdo aze ɔkɛmaa bɛ.
43015014	Saa bɛyɛ mɔɔ meha mehile bɛ la a, ɛnee bɛle me gɔnwo mɔ.
43015015	Menvɛlɛ bɛ sonvolɛma bieko, ɔboalekɛ sonvolɛ biala ɛnze mɔɔ ɔ menle ne ɛlɛyɛ la. Mefɛlɛ bɛ me gɔnwo mɔ, ɔboalekɛ mɔɔ mendele ye wɔ Egya ɛkɛ ne la meha ye kpokpoti mehile bɛ.
43015016	Tɛ bɛmɛ a bɛnleanle bɛyele me a; medame a memkpale nu menyele bɛ a, yɛɛ mezoa bɛ kɛ bɛhɔlua Nyamenle edwɛkɛ ne bɛmaa ɔzo ma dɔɔnwo kpalɛ mɔɔ ɛmkpɔlɔ ɛlɛ la a. Yemɔti Selɛ ne bava debie biala mɔɔ bɛkɛbiza ye wɔ me duma nu la amaa bɛ.
43015017	Ɛhye ati, mɔɔ meka meahile bɛ la a le kɛ; bɛhulo bɛ nwo ngoko ngoko.
43015018	“Bɛhakye kɛ saa ɛtane ewiade ye kpɔ bɛ a, ɛnee bɛnwu ye kɛ yelumua yekpɔ me.
43015019	Saa bɛle ewiade ɛdeɛ a ɛnee ewiade bahulo bɛ kɛ ɔ ti anwo ɛdeɛ la. Na mekpa nu meye bɛ mevi ɛtane ewiade ɛhye anu amra avinli, yemɔti bɛnle ɛtane ewiade ɛdeɛ. Ɛhye ati ɛtane ewiade ɛhye anu amra kpɔ bɛ.
43015020	Bɛhakye mɔɔ meha mehile bɛ la; ‘Akɛlɛ ɛnle kpole ɛndɛla ɔ menle.’ Saa bɛyɛle me kpɔdekpɔde a ɛnee bɛbayɛ bɛdabɛ noko kpɔdekpɔde; saa bɛlile me ngilehilelɛ zo a, ɛnee bɛbali bɛdabɛ noko bɛ ngilehilelɛ zo.
43015021	Bɛbayɛ bɛ ɛhye mɔ amuala ɔboalekɛ bɛmɛ, bɛle me ɛdeɛ, na ɛtane ewiade ɛnze mɔɔ zoanle me la.
43015022	Saa meamba meammanga edwɛkɛ ne meangile bɛ a anrɛɛ bɛnli ɛtane nwo fɔlɛ; kɛkala, bɛnlɛ bɛ ɛtane nwo nyelebɛnloa biala.
43015023	Awie mɔɔ kpɔ me la kpɔ Egya.
43015024	Saa meambanyɛ nwanwane gyima ɛhye mɔ mɔɔ awie ɛtɛyɛle bie ɛlɛ la wɔ bɛ avinli a, anrɛɛ bɛnli ɛtane nwo fɔlɛ; na kɛkala, bɛnwu mɔɔ menyɛle la yɛɛ bɛkpɔ me nee Egya a.
43015025	Na kɛ ɔwɔ kɛ ɔba ye noko ala la ɛne, amaa mɔɔ bɛhɛlɛ ye wɔ bɛ mɛla ne anu la ayɛ nɔhalɛ kɛ, ‘Mgbane gyɛne ne ala yɛɛ bɛkpɔle me a.’
43015026	“Boavolɛ ne mɔɔ le Sunsum ne, mɔɔ ye nɔhalɛ ne mɔɔ fane Nyamenle anwo la finde, na ɔvi Selɛ ne ɛkɛ ne la bara. Mebazoa ye wɔ bɛ nwo meamaa ɔvi Selɛ ne ɛkɛ yearaha me nwo edwɛkɛ yeahile bɛ.
43015027	Na bɛdabɛ noko bɛbaha me nwo edwɛkɛ, ɔboalekɛ ɔvi mɔlebɛbo ne amuala, bɛ nee me a lua a.
43016001	“Meha ɛhye mehile bɛ, amaa bɛangyakyi bɛ diedi ne anu.
43016002	Bɛbaye bɛ ali bɛavi bɛ nyianu azua ne mɔ anu. Mekɛ bara mɔɔ awie biala mɔɔ kɛhu bɛ nuhua bie la badwenle kɛ ɔlɛyɛ ye Nyamenle gyima.
43016003	Bɛbayɛ ɛhye mɔ amuala, ɔluakɛ bɛnze Selɛ ne yɛɛ bɛnze me.
43016004	Na meha ɛhye mɔ mehile bɛ, amaa saa mekɛ ne dwu na bɛlɛfa bɛayɛ bɛ a, bɛahakye kɛ menganle mengilele bɛ. “Meanga ɛhye mɔ meangile bɛ alumua ne, ɔboalekɛ ɛnee me nee bɛ a de a.
43016005	Na kɛkala, melɛkɔ mɔɔ zoanle me la anwo lɔ, noko bɛ biala ɛmbiza me kɛ, ‘Ɛkɔ nienwu?’
43016006	Kɛkala mɔɔ meha ɛhye mehile bɛ la, nyane ɛyi bɛ ahonle tɛkɛɛ.
43016007	Na meka nɔhalɛ ne meahile bɛ: Ɔle kpalɛ ɔmaa bɛ kɛ melɛkɔ a, ɔboalekɛ saa meangɔ a Boavolɛ ne ɛnrɛra bɛ nwo. Na saa mekɔ a, mebazoa ye wɔ bɛ nwo.
43016008	Na ɔba a, ɔbahile yeamaa ewiade amra anwu kɛ bɛvo kpole wɔ bɛ adwenle mɔɔ bɛlɛ ye wɔ ɛtane nwo nee mɔɔ bɛlɛ ye wɔ kpalɛ nwo, nee Nyamenle ndɛnebualɛ ne anwo la anwo.
43016009	Bɛvo wɔ bɛ adwenle mɔɔ bɛlɛ ye wɔ ɛtaneyɛlɛ nwo la, ɔboalekɛ bɛnlie me bɛnli;
43016010	bɛvo wɔ pɛlepɛlelilɛ nwo, ɔboalekɛ melɛkɔ Selɛ ne anwo lɔ, na bɛnrɛnwu me bieko;
43016011	yɛɛ bɛvo wɔ Nyamenle ndɛnebualɛ ne anwo, ɔboalekɛ mɔɔ sie ɛtane ewiade ɛhye la bɛbua ye ndɛne dɛbadɛba.
43016012	“Melɛ edwɛkɛ dɔɔnwo meka mekile bɛ, noko kɛkala, bɛnrɛhola ɔ muala anu sɔ.
43016013	Na saa Sunsum ne mɔɔ baye nɔhalɛ ne mɔɔ fane Nyamenle anwo la ba a, ɔbamaa bɛanwu nɔhalɛ ne amuala. Ɔnrɛva ɔdaye ye tumi ɔnrɛdendɛ, na ɔbaha mɔɔ ɔkɛde, na yeaha ninyɛne mɔɔ bara la anwo edwɛkɛ yeahile bɛ.
43016014	Ɔbawula me anyunlunyia, ɔboalekɛ ɔbaha mɔɔ meka la yeahile bɛ.
43016015	Mɔɔ Egya lɛ bɛ la amuala le me ɛdeɛ; ɛhye ati yɛɛ meha kɛ Sunsum ne baha mɔɔ menwɔva menwɔmaa ye la ahile bɛ a.
43016016	“Ɔnrɛhyɛ biala ɛnee bɛnnwu me bieko, yɛɛ ɔnrɛhyɛ biala, bɛbanwu me.”
43016017	Ye ɛdoavolɛma ne bie mɔ bizebizale bɛ nwo kɛ, “Ɛnee ɛhye abo a le duzu? Ɔse, ‘Ɔnrɛhyɛ biala ɛnee bɛnnwu me bieko, yɛɛ ɔnrɛhyɛ biala bɛbanwu me’; eza ɔse, ‘ɔboalekɛ melɛkɔ Selɛ ne anwo lɔ.’
43016018	Ɛnee ‘Ɔnrɛhyɛ biala’ ɛhye abo a le duzu? Yɛnnwu mɔɔ ɔlɛka la anu.”
43016019	Gyisɛse nwunle mɔɔ bɛkpondɛ bɛabiza ye la, yemɔti ɔhanle ɔhilele bɛ kɛ, “Menganle kɛ, ‘Ɔnrɛhyɛ biala, bɛnrɛnwu me, yɛɛ eza ɔnrɛhyɛ biala, bɛbanwu me.’ Se mɔɔ bɛlɛbizebiza bɛ nwo la ɛne?
43016020	Meka nɔhalɛ ne meahile bɛ: Bɛbazu bɛayi, na ɛtane ewiade ye bali fɛlɛko; bɛbali nyane, na bɛ nyanelilɛ ne bahakyi fɛlɛkolilɛ.
43016021	Saa raalɛ fo awolɛ zo a, ye adwenle sɛkye, ɔboalekɛ ye nyanedelɛ mekɛ ɛdwu; na saa ɔwo a, ɔ rɛle fi ye nyane ne, ɔboalekɛ ɛnee ɔlɛdi fɛlɛko kɛ yewo ralɛ yedo ewiade a.
43016022	Zɔhane ala yɛɛ ɔle ɔmaa bɛ a; kɛkala alɔbɔlɛ ɛha bɛ, na mebaranwu bɛ bieko na fɛlɛkolilɛ bayi bɛ ahonle nu tɛkɛɛ, fɛlɛkolilɛ mɔɔ awie biala ɛnrɛhola bɛ sa die ɛlɛ a.
43016023	“Saa mekɛ zɔhane dwu a, bɛnrɛbiza me bɛnrɛlie debie biala. Meka nɔhalɛ ne meahile bɛ: Debie biala mɔɔ bɛkɛbiza Selɛ ne wɔ me duma nu la, ɔkɛva ɔkɛmaa bɛ.
43016024	Toonwo mɔɔ yeradwu bekezɛ la, bɛtɛbizale debie biala wɔ me duma nu; bɛbiza na bɛ sa kɛha ye, amaa bɛ fɛlɛkolilɛ ne ali munli.
43016025	“Mebubu ɛhye mɔ mrɛlɛ nu mehile bɛ. Na mekɛ bara mɔɔ menrɛbu bɛ mrɛlɛ nu bieko a, mebaha Selɛ ne anwo edwɛkɛ wienyi meahile bɛ.
43016026	Saa mekɛ zɔhane dwu a, bɛbabiza ye wɔ me duma nu; menga kɛ mebabiza meamaa bɛ,
43016027	ɔluakɛ Selɛ ne ɔdaye ɔkulo bɛ. Ɔkulo bɛ ɔluakɛ bɛkulo me na bɛlie bɛli kɛ mevi Nyamenle anwo lɔ a membale a.
43016028	Mevi Selɛ ne anwo lɔ a membale ewiade a; yɛɛ kɛkala melɛfi ewiade meahɔ Selɛ ne anwo lɔ.”
43016029	Ye ɛdoavolɛma ne zele ye kɛ, “Awulae, wɔ edwɛkɛ ne akee ɛkpa nwolɛ ɛdanlɛ wienyi, ɛmbu ye mrɛlɛ nu bieko.
43016030	Kɛkala yɛnwu kɛ ɛkola ɛnwu debie biala; ɔngyia kɛ awie kɛbiza wɔ kpuyia bɔbɔ. Ɛhye maa yɛdie yɛdi kɛ ɛvi Nyamenle anwo lɔ a ɛrale a.”
43016031	Gyisɛse buale kɛ, “Akee bɛlie bɛli ɔ?
43016032	Mekɛ ɛlɛba, na yedwu bɔbɔ, bɛbabɔ bɛ kɔsɔɔti asande, na awie biala ahɔ ɔdaye ye sua nu, na yeaha me ngomekye. Noko ɔnrɛha me ngome, ɔboalekɛ Selɛ ne nee me lua.
43016033	Meha ɛhye mehile bɛ amaa saa bɛmeta me nwo a bɛanyia anzonudwolɛ. Ɛtane ewiade ɛhye bamaa bɛali nyane, noko bɛgyinla kpundii. Meli ɛtane ewiade ɛhye anwo zo konim!”
43017001	Gyisɛse wiele ɛhye ka la, ɔnleanle anwuma na ɔhanle kɛ, “Egya, mekɛ ne ɛdwu. Wula Ɛ Ra anyunlunyia na maa Ralɛ ne ɛwula wɔ anyunlunyia.
43017002	Ɔluakɛ wɔmaa ye menli kɔsɔɔti anwo zo tumi, amaa yeava ngoane mɔɔ ɛnlɛ awieleɛ la yeamaa menli mɔɔ wɔva bɛ wɔmaa ye la.
43017003	Ngoane mɔɔ ɛnlɛ awieleɛ la a le kɛ bɛkɛnwu kɛ wɔmɔ a ɛle nɔhalɛ Nyamenle kokye ne a, na bɛkɛnwu Gyisɛse Kelaese, mɔɔ wɔzoa ye la.
43017004	Mehile wɔ anyunlunyia ne wɔ azɛlɛ ye azo; mewie gyima mɔɔ ɛvale ɛmanle me la di.
43017005	Egya, fa me anyunlunyia maa me, anyunlunyia ne mɔɔ bɛkabɔ ewiade ye la ɛnee melɛ ye la, fa maa me wɔ ɛ nyunlu ɛke kɛkala.
43017006	“Mela wɔ ali mehile menli mɔɔ ɛvale bɛ ɛvile ɛtane ewiade ye anu ɛmanle me la. Ɛnee bɛle wɔ ɛdeɛ, yɛɛ ɛvale bɛ ɛmanle me a. Bɛli wɔ edwɛkɛ ne azo,
43017007	na kɛkala bɛnwu kɛ debie biala mɔɔ ɛvale ɛmanle me la vi wɔ ɛkɛ.
43017008	Nrɛlaleɛ mɔɔ ɛvale ɛmanle me la, meva memaa bɛ, yɛɛ bɛzɔ nu noko; bɛze kɛ ɔle nɔhalɛ kɛ mevi ɛ nwo lɔ a membale a, yɛɛ bɛdie bɛdi kɛ ɛdawɔ a ɛzoanle me a.
43017009	“Mesɛlɛ meamaa bɛ. Menzɛlɛ memmaa ɛtane ewiade ye. Mesɛlɛ meamaa menli mɔɔ ɛvale bɛ ɛmanle me la, ɔboalekɛ bɛle wɔ ɛdeɛ.
43017010	Mɔɔ melɛ la le wɔ ɛdeɛ, yɛɛ mɔɔ ɛlɛ la amuala le me ɛdeɛ; na bɛ nwo zo yɛɛ me anyunlunyia dua da ali a.
43017011	Kɛkala melɛba ɛ nwo lɔ; menle ewiade ye anu bieko, na bɛmɛ bɛwɔ ewiade ye anu. Selɛ Nwuanzanwuanza, wɔ duma ne mɔɔ ɛvale ɛmanle me la tumi nu ti, fa bɛ sie gyɛlɛɛnye, amaa bɛayɛ ko kɛ ɛdawɔ nee medame yɛle la.
43017012	Mɔɔ ɛnee me nee bɛ de la, menziele bɛ gyɛlɛɛnye wɔ wɔ duma ne mɔɔ ɛvale ɛmanle me la tumi nu. Membɔle bɛ nwo bane, na ko bɔbɔ amminli, kyesɛ kokye ne, Dwudase musuofoɔ ala mɔɔ ɔwɔ kɛ minli la, amaa Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne ayɛ nɔhalɛ.
43017013	Kɛkala melɛba ɛ nwo lɔ, yɛɛ melɛka ɛhye mɔ noko wɔ ewiade ye anu, amaa bɛ nye alie me nwo kpole wɔ bɛ ahonle nu.
43017014	Meha wɔ nrɛlaleɛ ne mehile bɛ, yemɔti ɛtane ewiade ɛhye kpɔ bɛ, ɔboalekɛ bɛnle ɛtane ewiade ye ɛdeɛ, kɛmɔ menle ɛtane ewiade ye ɛdeɛ la.
43017015	Membiza kɛ ɛye bɛ ɛvi ewiade ye anu, mesɛlɛ kɛ ɛkɛzie bɛ gyɛlɛɛnye ɛkɛvi amumuyɛnli Seetan asa anu.
43017016	Kɛmɔ menle ɛtane ewiade ɛdeɛ la, bɛdabɛ noko bɛnle ye ɛdeɛ.
43017017	Dua nɔhalɛ ne azo te bɛ nwo na fa bɛ yɛ wɔ ɛdeɛ; wɔ edwɛkɛ ne a le nɔhalɛ ne.
43017018	Mezoa bɛ wɔ ewiade ye anu, kɛmɔ ɛzoanle me wɔ ewiade ye anu la;
43017019	yɛɛ ɔlua bɛ ti medu me nwo memaa wɔ, amaa bɛdabɛ noko bɛadu bɛ nwo nɔhalɛ nu bɛamaa wɔ.
43017020	“Menzɛlɛ memmaa bɛ ngome. Mesɛlɛ meamaa bɛdabɛ noko mɔɔ wɔ edwɛkɛ ne ati bɛdie me bɛdi la.
43017021	Mesɛlɛ kɛ bɛ muala bɛkɛyɛ ko. Egya! Maa bɛdɛnla yɛ nu, kɛmɔ ɛde me nu na medame mede wɔ nu la. Maa bɛyɛ ko, amaa ewiade amra alie ali kɛ amgba ɛdawɔ a ɛzoanle me a.
43017022	Anyunlunyia ne mɔɔ ɛvale ɛmanle me la meva zɔhane ala bie memaa bɛ, amaa bɛayɛ ko, kɛmɔ ɛdawɔ nee medame yɛle ko la;
43017023	maa mendɛnla bɛ nu, na ɛdawɔ noko tɛnla me nu, amaa bɛayɛ ko kpalɛ kpalɛ, na ewiade amra anwu kɛ ɛdawɔ a ɛzoanle me a, na ɛkulo bɛ kɛmɔ ɛkulo me la.
43017024	“Egya! Wɔva bɛ wɔmaa me, na mekpondɛ kɛ bɛ nee me tɛnla ɛleka mɔɔ mewɔ la, amaa bɛanwu me anyunlunyia ne mɔɔ ɛvale ɛmanle me la, ɔluakɛ ɛhulole me kolaa na bɛabɔ ewiade ye.
43017025	Pɛlepɛlelilɛ Egya! Ɛtane ewiade ye ɛnze wɔ, na mame meze wɔ, yɛɛ ɛhye mɔ ze kɛ ɛdawɔ a ɛzoanle me a.
43017026	Mela wɔ ali mehile bɛ na mebahɔ zo meayɛ ye zɔhane, amaa ɛhulolɛ ne mɔɔ ɛlɛ ye me nwo la adɛnla bɛ nu, na medame noko meadɛnla bɛ nu.”
43018001	Gyisɛse wiele nzɛlɛlɛ ɛhye yɛ la, ɔ nee ye ɛdoavolɛma ne hɔpɛle hɔle azule ekyi bie mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye Kedelɔn la anzi. Tola bie wɔ azule ne anzi na Gyisɛse nee ye ɛdoavolɛma ne hɔle nu.
43018002	Ɔyɛ a Gyisɛse nee ye ɛdoavolɛma ne ta yia tola ɛhye anu. Yemɔti Dwudase mɔɔ yele Gyisɛse manle la ze ɛkɛ ne.
43018003	Ɛhye ati Dwudase vale Wulomu sogyama nee Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne sinzavolɛma mɔɔ sɛlɛvolɛ mgbanyima ne nee Falasiima zoanle bɛ la rale tola ne anu. Bɛkɔ la bɛdedɛ ahoholombaka nee dadeɛ, tɛkɛ, yɛɛ tayia.
43018004	Gyisɛse ze mɔɔ bazi ɔ nwo zo la ati, ɔrale ɔ nyunlu na ɔbizale bɛ kɛ, “Nwane a bɛkpondɛ ye a?”
43018005	Bɛbuale ye kɛ, “Yɛkpondɛ Gyisɛse mɔɔ vi Nazalɛte la.” Gyisɛse zele bɛ kɛ, “Medame ɛne.” Mekɛ ne anu ɛnee Dwudase mɔɔ yele Gyisɛse manle la gyi ɛlɔne ne anu.
43018006	Mɔɔ Gyisɛse hanle kɛ, “Medame ɛne” la, ɛlɔne ne dule hɔle bɛ nzi na bɛdule bɛguale aze.
43018007	Gyisɛse eza bizale bɛ kɛ, “Nwane a bɛkpondɛ ye a?” Bɛhanle kɛ, “Yɛkpondɛ Gyisɛse mɔɔ vi Nazalɛte la.”
43018008	Gyisɛse zele bɛ kɛ, “Se meha mehile bɛ kɛ medame ɛne. Saa medame yɛɛ bɛkpondɛ me a, ɛnee bɛmaa ɛhye mɔ ɛhɔ.”
43018009	(Ɔhanle ɛhye amaa ye edwɛkɛ ne mɔɔ ɔhanle kɛ, “Egya, meamminli bɛdabɛ mɔɔ ɛvale bɛ ɛmanle me la anu ko bɔbɔ” la ayɛ nɔhalɛ.)
43018010	Saemɔn Pita ɛnee lɛ dadeɛ, na ɔhwenle ɔpɛle Sɛlɛvolɛ Kpanyinli ne akɛlɛ ne anzo fema ne. Akɛlɛ ne bɛfɛlɛ ye Malekɛse.
43018011	Gyisɛse zele Pita kɛ, “Fa wɔ dadeɛ ne wula ye boa ne anu. Ɛdwenle kɛ menrɛnlo nyane kɔpo ne mɔɔ Egya ɛva ɛmaa me la anu ɔ?”
43018012	Akee Wulomu sogyama ne nee bɛ kpanyinli ne nee Dwuu sinzavolɛma ne mɔ hyele Gyisɛse, bɛkyekyele ye,
43018013	na bɛlumuale bɛvale ye bɛhɔle Sɛlɛvolɛ Kpanyinli Anase ɛkɛ. Anase le Kayafase, mɔɔ le ɛvolɛ ne anu Sɛlɛvolɛ Kpanyinli la aye ne ɔ ze.
43018014	Kayafase ɛhye a dule Dwuuma ne folɛ kɛ ɔle kpalɛ kɛ sonla ko kɛwu kɛmaa menli ne amuala la.
43018015	Saemɔn Pita nee ɛdoavolɛ ko noko doale Gyisɛse nanamogya. Ɛdoavolɛ zɔhane Sɛlɛvolɛ Kpanyinli ne ze ye kpalɛ kpalɛ, yemɔti ɔwolole ɔdoale Gyisɛse wɔ Sɛlɛvolɛ Kpanyinli ne alie nwo lɔ.
43018016	Pita hale anuhɔlɛ ɛkɛ ne anlenkɛ kpole ne anzi. Yemɔti ɛdoavolɛ ne mɔɔ Sɛlɛvolɛ Kpanyinli ne ze ye kpalɛ la ziale ɔ nzi hɔdendɛle hilele bɛlɛra ne mɔɔ gyi anuhɔlɛ ɛkɛ ne la na ɔvale Pita ɔwolole.
43018017	Bɛlɛra ne mɔɔ gyi anuhɔlɛ ɛkɛ ne la zele Pita kɛ, “Wɔmɔ, se ɛle nrenya ne ɛdoavolɛma ne mɔ anu ko.” Pita buale kɛ, “Kyɛkyɛ, memboka nwo.”
43018018	Ɛnee maanle nu yɛ ɛyɛlɛ kpalɛ la ati, sonvolɛma nee sinzavolɛma ne ɛhua senle na bɛgyigyi nwo bɛlɛte. Pita ɔdaye noko ɔhɔgyinlanle bɛ nwo ɛkɛ ne kɛ ɔte senle ne bie.
43018019	Sɛlɛvolɛ Kpanyinli ne bizebizale Gyisɛse edwɛkɛ mɔɔ fane ye ɛdoavolɛma ne nee ye ngilehilelɛ ne anwo.
43018020	Gyisɛse buale ye kɛ, “Dahuu metendɛ baguase, meyɛ me ngilehilelɛ ne wɔ nyianu azua ne mɔ anu nee Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne anu, ɛleka mɔɔ Dwuuma yia nu mekɛ biala la. Metɛkanle edwɛkɛ biala wɔ fealera nu.
43018021	Na duzu ati a akee ɛlɛbizebiza me kpuyia ɛhye mɔ ɛ? Biza menli mɔɔ diele me la. Biza bɛ maa bɛha mɔɔ menganle la bɛhile wɔ; bɛze mɔɔ menganle la amuala.”
43018022	Gyisɛse hanle ɛhye la, sinzavolɛma ne mɔ anu ko bɔle ɔ nzo nu na ɔzele ye kɛ, “Ɛ nye ɛnzɔ sonla; ɛtendɛ wɔahile Sɛlɛvolɛ Kpanyinli ne a, anrɛɛ dwenle nwolɛ!”
43018023	Gyisɛse buale ye kɛ, “Saa meha ɛtane a, ɛnee ka mɔɔ ɛdele la maa awie biala mɔɔ wɔ ɛke la ɛde bie. Na saa mɔɔ meha la le nɔhalɛ a, ɛnee duzu ati a ɛbɔle me a?”
43018024	Anase akee manle bɛvale ye, kɛmɔ bɛkyekyele ye bɛ nee ye rale ala la, bɛhɔmanle Kayafase, mɔɔ ɛvolɛ ne anu ɔle Sɛlɛvolɛ Kpanyinli la.
43018025	Pita gyi senle ne anwo ɛlɛte la, menli ne mɔ ko bizale ye kɛ, “Na wɔmɔ, tɛ nrenya ne ɛdoavolɛma ne ko a le wɔ ɔ?” Na Pita zale na ɔhanle kɛ, “Kyɛkyɛ, memboka bɛ.”
43018026	Sɛlɛvolɛ Kpanyinli ne akɛlɛ ko mɔɔ ye awie a le nrenya ne mɔɔ Pita pɛle ɔ nzo la zele kɛ, “Na tɛ wɔmɔ a menwunle wɔ kɛ ɛ nee ye wɔ tola ne anu la ɔ?”
43018027	Pita buale kɛ, “Medame? Kosoɛ, tɛ me ɔ!” Na ɛkɛ ne ala akɔlɛ bɔle.
43018028	Bɛvale Gyisɛse bɛvile Kayafase sua nu na bɛ nee ye hɔle Wulomu amɛnlado ne suakunlu; ɛnee asɛɛ maanle nu ɛtete. Dwuuma ne angɔ amɛnlado ne suakunlu ɛkɛ ne bie, ɔboalekɛ ɛnee bɛkulo kɛ bɛsie bɛ nwo bɔkɔbɔkɔ, kɛmɔ bɛ ɛzonlenlɛ ne kile la, amaa bɛanyia adenle bɛali Akpabɛnwo Ɛvoyia aleɛ ne bie.
43018029	Paelɛte vindele rabizale bɛ kɛ, “Duzu ɛtane a sonla ɛhye ɛyɛ a?”
