43018030	Bɛbuale ye kɛ, “Saa ɔtɛtonle mɛla a anrɛɛ yɛnrɛva ye yɛnrɛrɛlɛ wɔ.”
43018031	Paelɛte zele bɛ kɛ, “Ɛnee bɛdabɛ bɛva ye bɛhɔ bɛhɔli ye edwɛkɛ, kɛmɔ bɛ mɛla ne se la!” Dwuuma ne buale kɛ, “Bɛmɛ Wulomuma bɛ mɛla ne ɛmmaa yɛ adenle yɛmbua awie fɔlɛ yɛngu ye.”
43018032	(Ɛhye zile, amaa Gyisɛse edwɛkɛ ne mɔɔ ɔhanle wɔ ye ewule nwo la ayɛ nɔhalɛ.)
43018033	Paelɛte ziale hɔle ɛleka mɔɔ Gyisɛse wɔ la na ɔbizale ye kɛ, “Wɔmɔ a ɛle Dwuuma belemgbunli ne la ɔ?”
43018034	Gyisɛse buale ye kɛ, “Ɛnee kpuyia ɛhye vi ɛdawɔ wɔ ɛkɛ ne anzɛɛ awie mɔ yɛɛ ɛha ye me nwo ɛhile wɔ a?”
43018035	Paelɛte buale ye kɛ, “Ɛdwenle kɛ mele Dwuunli ɔ? Ɛdawɔ wɔ menli ne nee bɛ sɛlɛvolɛ mgbanyinli yɛɛ ɛva wɔ ɛrɛlɛ me a. Duzu debie a wɔyɛ a?”
43018036	Gyisɛse buale ye kɛ, “Me belemgbunlililɛ ne ɛnle ewiade ɛhye anu; saa me belemgbunlililɛ ne wɔ ewiade ye anu a, anrɛɛ me ɛlɔnema kɛho kɛmaa me na bɛnrɛmaa bɛnrɛva me bɛnrɛmaa Dwuu mgbanyima ne mɔ. Kyɛkyɛ, me belemgbunlililɛ ne ɛnle ɛke.”
43018037	Paelɛte zele ye kɛ, “Se ɛnee ɛle belemgbunli o!” Gyisɛse buale ye kɛ, “Ɛdawɔ ɛse mele belemgbunli. Na ɛhye ala ati yɛɛ bɛwole me bɛmanle membale ewiade ye anu a, kɛ membanli nɔhalɛ ne anwo daselɛ. Mɔɔ le nɔhalɛ ne ɛdeɛ la tie mɔɔ meka la.”
43018038	Paelɛte bizale kɛ, “Duzu a le nɔhalɛ ne?” Paelɛte eza vindele doale Dwuuma ne wɔ gua ne azo nehane na ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Mennwu debie mɔɔ yemɔti ɔwɔ kɛ mebu sonla ne ewule fɔlɛ a.
43018039	Na bɛ amaamuo ne kile kɛ, saa bɛbali bɛ Akpabɛnwo Ɛvoyia ne a ɔwɔ kɛ medwula pilizanli ko memaa bɛ. Bɛkɛhulo kɛ menwɔdwula Dwuuma Belemgbunli ne menwɔmaa bɛ ɔ?”
43018040	Bɛdeɛdeanle nu bɛbuale kɛ, “Kyɛkyɛ! Yɛmkpondɛ ye! Yɛkpondɛ Balabase.” (Balabase le maamɔvo.)
43019001	Paelɛte manle bɛbilale Gyisɛse empele.
43019002	Sogyama ne vale evileni nwonle abɔtile na bɛvale bɛkpolole Gyisɛse ati; bɛwulale ye tɛladeɛ kɔkɔlɛ bie mɔɔ arelemgbunli ala a wula la
43019003	na bɛrahotole ye bɛgolole ɔ nwo bɛzele kɛ, “Dwuuma Belemgbunli, nyi kyɛ!” Bɛka ye zɛhae a ɛnee bɛhɔ ɔ nwo ɛkɛ ne bɛhɔbɔ ɔ nzo nu.
43019004	Paelɛte eza ziale doale Dwuuma ne wɔ gua ne azo lɔ na ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Bɛdie, me nee ye ba ɛke meamaa bɛanwu kɛ mennwu nvonleɛ biala wɔ ɔ nwo mɔɔ medua zolɛ mebu ye ewule fɔlɛ a.”
43019005	Yemɔti ɔmanle bɛvale Gyisɛse bɛvindele, ɔbɔ ye evileni abɔtile ne na ɔwula ye arelemgbunli tɛladeɛ kɔkɔlɛ ne. Paelɛte zele kɛ, “Bɛnlea! Sonla ne ɛne!”
43019006	Sɛlɛvolɛ mgbanyinli ne nee sinzavolɛma ne mɔ nwunle ye la bɛdeɛdeanle nu kɛ, “Bɔ ye meanubaka nu! Bɔ ye meanubaka nu!” Paelɛte zele bɛ kɛ, “Ɛnee bɛdabɛ bɛrava ye bɛhɔbɔ ye meanubaka nu. Mennwu debie mɔɔ yemɔti ɔwɔ kɛ mebu ye ewule fɔlɛ a!”
43019007	Dwuuma ne buale ye kɛ, “Yɛlɛ mɛla, na mɛla ne kile kɛ ɔwɔ kɛ ɔwu, ɔboalekɛ ɔyɛ ɔ nwo kɛ ɔle Nyamenle Ara.”
43019008	Paelɛte dele ɛhye la, ɛzulolɛ kpole hanle ye.
43019009	Ɔwolole ɔhɔle ye suakunlu ɛkɛ ne na ɔbizale Gyisɛse kɛ, “Ɛvi nienwu?” Na Gyisɛse andɛ ɔ nloa anu.
43019010	Paelɛte zele ye kɛ, “Ɛnrɛdɛne me zo? Kakye kɛ melɛ tumi mekola megyakyi wɔ anzɛɛ memaa bɛbɔ wɔ meanubaka nu bɛku wɔ.”
43019011	Gyisɛse buale ye kɛ, “Ɛlɛ me nwo zo tumi, ɔluakɛ Nyamenle yɛɛ ɛva ɛmaa wɔ a. Yemɔti sonla ne mɔɔ vale me rawulale ɛ sa nu la a di ɛzonle kpole kpalɛ a.”
43019012	Paelɛte dele ɛhye la, akee ɔbɔle nwolɛ mɔdenle biala kɛ ɔkpondɛ adenle yealua zolɛ yeagyakyi Gyisɛse. Na Dwuuma ne hanle ye anyebolo zo kɛ, “Saa ɛgyakyi ye a ɛnee ɛnle Wulomu Maanle Maanle Belemgbunli ne agɔnwo! Awie biala mɔɔ ɔdaye ɔfɛlɛ ɔ nwo belemgbunli la le Wulomu Maanle Maanle Belemgbunli ne kpɔvolɛ!”
43019013	Paelɛte dele edwɛkɛ ɛhye la, ɔvale Gyisɛse ɔvindele na ɔradɛnlanle ndɛnebualɛ ebia ne anu wɔ ɛleka bie mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye Hibulu aneɛ nu Gabata la. (Gabata abo a le “Bolɛ Bama”)
43019014	Ɛnee akee asɛɛ yedwu sɛnzɛngyinla, wɔ Akpabɛnwo Ɛvoyia kenle ne anu. Paelɛte hanle hilele bɛ kɛ, “Bɛ Belemgbunli ne ɛne!”
43019015	Dwuuma ne hanle ye kpole kpalɛ kɛ, “Ku ye! Ku ye! Bɔ ye meanubaka nu!” Paelɛte bizale bɛ kɛ, “Bɛkpondɛ kɛ mebɔ bɛ belemgbunli ne meanubaka nu ɔ?” Sɛlɛvolɛ mgbanyinli ne mɔ buale ye kɛ, “Yɛ belemgbunli ala a le Siza!”
43019016	Na Paelɛte yele Gyisɛse manle bɛ kɛ bɛhɔbɔ ye meanubaka nu. Bɛvale Gyisɛse bɛhɔle.
43019017	Bɛmanle ɔzoale ye meanubaka ne na ɔrale ɛleka bie mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye wɔ Hibulu aneɛ nu “Gɔlogɔta” la. (Gɔlogɔta abo a le Etile Kanrɛlɛ Ɛleka)
43019018	Ɛkɛ ne yɛɛ bɛbɔle ye meanubaka nu a; bɛbɔle menli nwiɔ noko meanubaka nu wɔ ɛkɛ ne, ko wɔ Gyisɛse fema zo yɛɛ ko wɔ ye bɛne zo na Gyisɛse wɔ avinli.
43019019	Paelɛte hɛlɛle edwɛkɛ bɔle Gyisɛse meanubaka ne ati zo kɛ, “Nazalɛtenli Gyisɛse, Dwuuma Belemgbunli.”
43019020	Dwuuma dɔɔnwo gengale, ɔboalekɛ ɛleka mɔɔ bɛbɔle Gyisɛse meanubaka nu la nee sua zo anwa biala. Edwɛkɛ ne, bɛhɛlɛle ye wɔ Hibulu, Laten, yɛɛ Giliki aneɛ ne mɔ anu.
43019021	Dwuuma sɛlɛvolɛ mgbanyinli ne mɔ zele Paelɛte kɛ, “Mmakɛlɛ kɛ, ‘Ɔle Dwuuma Belemgbunli’, na kɛlɛ kɛ, ‘Nrenya ɛhye se: Mele Dwuuma Belemgbunli!’ ”
43019022	Paelɛte buale kɛ, “Mɔɔ mehɛlɛ la a mehɛlɛ a!”
43019023	Sogyama ne bɔle Gyisɛse meanubaka nu wiele la, bɛhyɛle ye adɛladeɛ ne mɔ anu nna; sogyanli ko biala ɛdeɛ ko. Akee ɔhale ye bubu ne mɔɔ bɛnwonle ye woladapi la,
43019024	sogyama ne zele bɛ nwo kɛ, “Bɛmmamaa yɛsuosua nu; bɛmaa yɛgua nwolɛ nzeleba yɛnlea ahenle mɔɔ ɔkɛyɛ ye ɛdeɛ la.” Ɛhye zile amaa Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne ayɛ nɔhalɛ kɛ, “Bɛhyɛle me adɛladeɛ ne mɔ bɛvale, na me bubu ne, bɛguale nwolɛ nzeleba.” Mɔɔ sogyama ne mɔ yɛle la ɛne.
43019025	Menli mɔɔ ɛnee gyigyi Gyisɛse meanubaka ne anwo la a le Gyisɛse ɔ nli nee ɔ nli adiema Mɛle, Kulopase aye ne, yɛɛ Mɛle ne mɔɔ vi Magedala la.
43019026	Gyisɛse nwunle kɛ ɔ nli nee ɛdoavolɛ ne mɔɔ ɔkulo ye edwɛkɛ la gyi ɛkɛ ne la ɔhanle ɔhilele ɔ nli kɛ, “Ɔmɔ, nea, ɛ ra nrenya ɛne.”
43019027	Akee ɔzele ɛdoavolɛ ne kɛ, “Ayi, ɛ nli ɛne.” Ɔvi mekɛ zɔhane, ɛdoavolɛ ne vale Gyisɛse ɔ li na ɔ nee ye hɔdɛnlanle.
43019028	Gyisɛse nwunle kɛ akee debie biala ɛli munli ɛwie. Yemɔti amaa Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne ayɛ nɔhalɛ la, ɔhanle kɛ, “Nzuhɔne ɛlɛku me.”
43019029	Buakɛ bie mɔɔ nwanye bisii bie wɔ nu la gyi ɛkɛ: bɛvale emiane bɛbɔle nu, bɛvale bɛzianle nyinlanyinla baka ti, na bɛmanle ye zo bɛkpulale Gyisɛse anloa.
43019030	Gyisɛse liele nwanye ne na ɔhanle kɛ, “Yewie!” Akee ɔbɔle ɔ ti aze na ɔwule.
43019031	Akee Dwuu mgbanyima ne zɛlɛle Paelɛte kɛ ɔmaa bɛ adenle ɔmaa bɛhɔbubu menli mɔɔ bɛbɔ bɛ meanubaka nu la agyakɛ bɛmaa bɛwu ndɛndɛ na bɛdwula bɛ aze bɛvi meanubaka ne mɔ azo. Bɛzɛlɛle ɛhye, ɔluakɛ ɛnee kenle ne le Yalɛ na aleɛ kye a ɔle Ɛnwomenlelielɛ Kenle. Ɛnwomenlelielɛ Kenle ɛhye le kenle nwuanzanwuanza kpalɛ kpalɛ maa bɛ la ati, bɛangulo kɛ avunli ne mɔ kɛhendɛhenda meanubaka ne mɔ azo zɔhane kenle ne.
43019032	Zɔhane ati sogyama ne hɔle na bɛhɔbubule sonla ne mɔɔ lumua nee ko ne mɔɔ tɔ zolɛ nsa la agyakɛ.
43019033	Bɛdwule Gyisɛse anwo ɛkɛ ne la, bɛnwunle kɛ yewu dɛbadɛba; yemɔti bɛambubu ɔ gyakɛ.
43019034	Na sogyama ne mɔ anu ko wɔle Gyisɛse anvenle atwɛ, na ɛkɛ ne ala mogyanzule hwinle guale.
43019035	(Ahenle mɔɔ nwunle kɛ ɛhye ɛzi la a ɛdendɛ la, amaa wɔalie wɔali. Mɔɔ ɔhanle la le nɔhalɛ, yɛɛ ɔze noko kɛ ɔlɛka nɔhalɛ ne.)
43019036	Bɛyɛle ɛhye amaa Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne ayɛ nɔhalɛ kɛ, “Bɛambu ye bowule ko bɔbɔ.”
43019037	Eza Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne ko noko se, “Menli anye banwu mɔɔ bɛwɔle ɔ nvenle atwɛ la.”
43019038	Ɛhye anzi, Dwosefi, mɔɔ vi Arelematia la hɔzɛlɛle Paelɛte kɛ ɔva Gyisɛse funli ne ɔmaa ye. (Dwosefi le Gyisɛse ɛdoavolɛ, noko yeanye ɔ nyunlu, ɔluakɛ ɔsulo Dwuu mgbanyima ne mɔ.) Paelɛte kponlenle zolɛ manle ye, yemɔti Dwosefi hɔvale Gyisɛse funli ne.
43019039	Nekɔdimɛse mɔɔ kenle ko nɔɔzo bie hɔnwunle Gyisɛse la nee Dwosefi a hɔle a; bɛkɔ la bɛlɛ ayile evuanlɛ mɔɔ le kɛ alufuanlɛ nee aabɛya mɔɔ kɛdo tone nu kɛyɛ kilo abulanlu la a hɔle a.
43019040	Bɛdabɛ mu nwiɔ bɛvale ayile evuanlɛ ne bɛyɛle Gyisɛse anwo na bɛkyekyele ye wɔ kisane nu, ɔluakɛ kɛ Dwuuma yɛ bɛ funli la ɛne.
43019041	Tola bie zua ɛleka mɔɔ bɛbɔle Gyisɛse meanubaka nu la, nla fofolɛ bie mɔɔ bɛtɛtole sonla nu ɛlɛ la wɔ ɛkɛ ne.
43019042	Kɛmɔ aleɛ kye a ɔle Ɛnwomenlelielɛ Kenle, na eza nla ne bikye la ati, bɛdole Gyisɛse nu.
43020001	Molɛ nwonlomɔ mangyee ne ala mɔɔ maanle nu ɛtɛwiele tete la, Mɛle mɔɔ vi Magedala la hɔle sɛka ne azo na ɔnwunle kɛ bɛye bolɛ ne mɔɔ bɛvale bɛnyinle nla ne anloa la.
43020002	Ɔnriandile ɔhɔbɔle Saemɔn Pita nee ɛdoavolɛ ne mɔɔ Gyisɛse kulo ye edwɛkɛ la amaneɛ kɛ, “Bɛye Awulae wɔ nla ne anu bɛhɔ, na yɛnnwu ɛleka mɔɔ bɛhɔdo ye a.”
43020003	Pita nee ɛdoavolɛ ko ne hɔle hɔnleanle nla ne.
43020004	Bɛ mu nwiɔ bɛlɛkɔ la bɛlɛ ɛnriandilɛ, na ɛdoavolɛ ɛhendeɛ ne nriandile ndɛndɛ dɛlale Pita na ɔhɔdwule sɛka ne azo.
43020005	Ɔhanle ɔ nwo aze ɔnleanle nla ne anu la ɔnwunle kɛ kisane ne mɔ gua nu, na yeandwu nu.
43020006	Saemɔn Pita vi amozi rale, na ɛkɛ ne ala ɔdwule nla ne anu. Ɔnwunle kɛ kisane ne
43020007	yɛɛ ɛdanlɛ ne mɔɔ bɛvale bɛzɔle Gyisɛse ada la gua ɛkɛ. Bɛ muala bɛngua ɛleka ko. Bɛbubu ɛdanlɛ ne bɛgua ɔ ngome.
43020008	Akee ɛdoavolɛ ne mɔɔ lumuale dwule sɛka ne azo la ɔdaye ɔdwule nla ne anu; ɔnwunle ɛhye mɔ na ɔliele ɔlile.
43020009	(Ɛnee bɛtɛtele Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne abo kɛ ɔse ɔwɔ kɛ ɔdwazo ɔfi ewule nu.)
43020010	Na ɛdoavolɛma nwiɔ ne hɔle sua nu.
43020011	Mɛle hale sɛka ne azo zunle. Mɔɔ ɔsu la, ɔnleanle nla ne anu.
43020012	Na ɔnwunle Nyamenle soanvolɛma nwiɔ mɔɔ wula adɛladeɛ fufule la kɛ bɛde ɛleka mɔɔ anrɛɛ Gyisɛse funli ne la la, ko de ɔ ti sɔlɔ yɛɛ ko de ɔ gyakɛ anu.
43020013	Bɛbizale ye kɛ, “Ɔmɔ, duzu ati a ɛlɛsu a?” Ɔbuale bɛ kɛ, “Bɛrava me Awulae bɛhɔ, na mennwu ɛleka mɔɔ bɛhɔdo ye a.”
43020014	Ɔhanle ɛhye la ɔhakyile ɔ nwo na ɔnwunle kɛ Gyisɛse gyi ɛkɛ, noko yeannwu ye sonla holɛ.
43020015	Gyisɛse bizale ye kɛ, “Ɔmɔ, duzu ati a ɛlɛsu a? Nwane a ɛkpondɛ ye a?” Ɛnee Mɛle dwenle kɛ ahenle ne mɔɔ gyi ɔ nyunlu ɛkɛ ne la a le sonla ne mɔɔ nea tola ne azo la ati, ɔzele ye kɛ, “Yɛmenle, saa ɛdawɔ yɛɛ ɛrayele ye ɛhɔle a, ka na kile me ɛleka mɔɔ ɛhɔdole ye la maa mengɔnva.”
43020016	Gyisɛse vɛlɛle ye, “Mɛle!” Ɔhakyile ɔ nye wɔ ɔ nwo ɛkɛ ne na ɔhanle ye Hibulu nu kɛ, “Labonae!” (Ɔ bo a le “Kilehilevolɛ”)
43020017	Gyisɛse zele ye kɛ, “Mmasɔ me, ɔboalekɛ metɛkɔle Selɛ ne anwo lɔ. Na wɔmɔ kɔ na kɔze me mediema ne mɔ kɛ, ‘Melɛkɔ Egya nee bɛ Ze ne, me Nyamenle nee bɛ Nyamenle ne anwo lɔ.’ ”
43020018	Zɔhane ati Mɛle mɔɔ vi Magedala la hɔle na ɔhɔhanle ɔhilele ɛdoavolɛma ne kɛ yenwu Awulae na yeva zɛhae nrɛlaleɛ yemaa ye.
43020019	Molɛ kenle ko ne ala mɔɔ ɛnee aleɛ ɛdwo kpalɛ la, ɛnee ɛdoavolɛma ne ɛhuohua bɛ nloa na bɛdo bɛ nwo anlenkɛ nu, ɔboalekɛ bɛsulo Dwuu mgbanyima ne mɔ. Gyisɛse ragyinlanle bɛ avinli na ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Anzonudwolɛ ɛha bɛ.”
43020020	Ɔhanle ɛhye la, ɔvale ɔ sa nee ɔ nvenle ɔhilele bɛ. Ɛdoavolɛma ne anye liele kpole kɛ bɛnwu Awulae a.
43020021	Na Gyisɛse zele bɛ bieko kɛ, “Anzonudwolɛ ɛha bɛ. Kɛmɔ Selɛ ne zoanle me la, zɔhane ala yɛɛ medame noko mesoa bɛ a.”
43020022	Akee ɔliele ɛnwomenle ɔguale bɛ nwo zo na ɔhanle kɛ, “Bɛlie Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne.
43020023	Saa bɛfa awie ɛtane bɛkyɛ ye a, ɛnee bɛva bɛhyɛ ye; saa bɛanva bɛangyɛ ahenle a, bɛnrɛva bɛnrɛhyɛ ye.”
43020024	Ɛdoavolɛma bulu nee nwiɔ ne anu ko mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye Tɔmase (mɔɔ eza bɛfɛlɛ ye Nda) la, ɛnle ɛkɛ ne a Gyisɛse rale a.
43020025	Yemɔti ɛdoavolɛma mɔɔ hale la hanle hilele ye kɛ, “Yɛnwu Awulae!” Tɔmase zele bɛ kɛ, “Saa metɛnwunle ɔ sa nu pɛlɛko ne mɔɔ bɛbɔle ye la abo zo kapenle ne, metɛfale me sa metɛfuale kapenle ne, na metɛfale me sa metɛkanle ɔ nvenle kapenle ne a, menrɛlie menrɛli.”
43020026	Ɔlile dapɛne ko la ɛdoavolɛma ne mɔ eza huohuanle bɛ nloa na bɛdole bɛ nwo anlenkɛ nu bieko, mekɛ ne anu ɛnee Tɔmase boka bɛ nwo. Bɛtotole nlenkɛ ne mɔ anu ɛdeɛ, noko Gyisɛse ragyinlanle bɛ avinli na ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Anzonudwolɛ ɛha bɛ.”
43020027	Akee ɔzele Tɔmase kɛ, “Tɔmase, fa ɛ sa bɛla ɛke na nea me sa nu; tenrɛ ɛ sa fua me nvenle. Gyakyi wɔ kpolerazulɛ ne na die di!”
43020028	Tɔmase buale kɛ, “Me Awulae nee me Nyamenle!”
43020029	Gyisɛse zele ye kɛ, “Wɔnwu me la ati yɛɛ wɔlie wɔli a? Nyilalɛ ɛha bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛtɛnwunle me na bɛlie bɛli la!”
43020030	Gyisɛse yɛle nwanwane ninyɛne dɔɔnwo mɔɔ ye ɛdoavolɛma ne mɔ nwunle bɛ, mɔɔ bɛangɛlɛ bɛ wɔ buluku ɛhye anu a.
43020031	Mɔɔ bɛhɛlɛ ye wɔ ɛke la, bɛhɛlɛ amaa bɛalie bɛali kɛ Gyisɛse a le Mɛzaya ne mɔɔ le Nyamenle Ara ne la, na ɔlua bɛ diedi mɔɔ bɛlɛ ye wɔ ye nu la azo bɛanyia ngoane.
43021001	Ɛhye anzi, Gyisɛse eza yele ɔ nwo hilele ɛdoavolɛma ne wɔ Taebilease Tandane ne anloa. Kɛ ɔyɛle la ɛne:
43021002	Saemɔn Pita, Tɔmase, mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye Nda, Natanayɛle, mɔɔ vi Kana mɔɔ wɔ Galeli maanzinli nu la, Zɛbɛdi amra ne mɔ, yɛɛ Gyisɛse ɛdoavolɛma gyɛne nwiɔ, bɛ muala bɛwɔ ɛkɛ.
43021003	Saemɔn Pita zele bɛ kɛ, “Mekɔ azule zo.” Bɛzele ye kɛ, “Yɛ nee wɔ kɔ.” Zɔhane ati bɛ muala bɛhɔvale ɛlɛne na bɛhɔle, na nɔe ne amuala bɛyɛle biala na bɛangye fɛlɛ.
43021004	Mɔɔ sɛnzɛne ne ɛlɛba aradudu la, Gyisɛse ragyinlanle tandane ne anloa, noko ɛdoavolɛma ne annwu kɛ ɔdaye ɔ.
43021005	Na ɔbizale bɛ kɛ, “Mgbavolɛ ye mɔ, bɛhyele fɛlɛ ɔ?” Bɛbuale ye kɛ, “Yɛannyia debie!”
43021006	Gyisɛse zele bɛ kɛ, “Bɛdo bɛ avonle ne wɔ bɛ sa fema zo ɛkɛ ne, na bɛkɛhye bie.” Amgba bɛdole avonle ne bɛ fema zo, na fɛlɛ ngome mɔɔ bɛhyele la ammaa bɛangola avonle ne twehwe gua ɛlɛne ne anu.
43021007	Ɛdoavolɛ ne mɔɔ Gyisɛse kulo ye edwɛkɛ la hanle hilele Pita kɛ, “Awulae ɔ.” Saemɔn Pita dele kɛ Awulae la, ɔvale ye anwuma tɛladeɛ ne ɔwulale (ɔluakɛ ɛnee yekpa yegua) na ɔwulule ɔdɔle azule ne anu ɔweɛle ɔrale file zo.
43021008	Ɛdoavolɛma ne mɔ mɔɔ hale la vale ɛlɛne ne radwule aze, bɛhwenle avonle ne mɔɔ fɛlɛ ɛyi ye tɔ la bɛrale. Ɛnee bɛ nee aze anwa biala, ɔkɛyɛ abɛsamu abulanlu.
43021009	Mɔɔ bɛdwule aze la, bɛnwunle kɛ bɛva emunlike bɛwuda senle na fɛlɛ gua zo yɛɛ kpanwo noko wɔ ɛkɛ.
43021010	Gyisɛse zele bɛ kɛ, “Bɛva fɛlɛ ne mɔɔ bɛhye bɛ kɛkala la bie bɛrɛla.”
43021011	Saemɔn Pita hɔle ɛlɛne ne anu na ɔhɔhwehwenle avonle ne ɔrale file zo, fɛlɛ mgbole ɛya ko abulanlu nee nsa ɛyi ye tɛkɛɛ! Bɛhyele fɛlɛ dɔɔnwo, noko avonle ne anye ko bɔbɔ ande.
43021012	Gyisɛse zele bɛ kɛ, “Bɛrɛla bɛrali debie.” Ɛdoavolɛma ne anu biala angola ambiza ye kɛ, “Na ɛdawɔ a le nwane?” Ɔluakɛ bɛze kɛ Awulae ɔ.
43021013	Na Gyisɛse hɔvale kpanwo ne, na ɔbubule ɔmanle bɛ; eza ɔhɔvale fɛlɛ ne, na ɔyɛle ye zɔhane ala.
43021014	Ɛhye a tɔ zolɛ nsa mɔɔ Gyisɛse yele ɔ nwo hilele ye ɛdoavolɛma ne mɔ wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ bɛdwazole ye bɛvile ewule nu la a.
43021015	Bɛwiele debie di la, Gyisɛse zele Saemɔn Pita kɛ, “Dwɔn ara Saemɔn, asoo ɛkulo me kpalɛ ɛtɛla ɛhye mɔ?” Pita buale ye kɛ, “Ɛhɛe, Awulae, ɛze kɛ mekulo wɔ.” Gyisɛse zele ye kɛ, “Nea me mboane mralɛ ne mɔ boɛ.”
43021016	Gyisɛse eza bizale Pita kɛ, “Dwɔn ara Saemɔn, asoo ɛkulo me?” Pita buale kɛ, “Ɛhɛe, Awulae, ɛze kɛ mekulo wɔ.” Gyisɛse zele ye kɛ, “Nea me mboane ne mɔ boɛ.”
43021017	Fane nsa ne azo eza Gyisɛse bizale Pita kɛ, “Dwɔn ara Saemɔn, asoo ɛkulo me?” Nyane hanle Pita kɛ Gyisɛse ɛbiza ye fane nsa kɛ, “Asoo ɛkulo me?” a, na ɔbuale ye kɛ, “Awulae ɛze debie biala; ɛze kɛ mekulo wɔ.” Gyisɛse zele ye kɛ, “Nea me mboane ne mɔ boɛ.
43021018	Meka nɔhalɛ ne meahile wɔ: Mekɛ mɔɔ ɛle kpavolɛ la, ɛnee ɛdawɔ ɛkola ɛmaa ɛ nwo zo ɛkɔ ɛleka biala mɔɔ ɛkulo la, na saa ɛyɛ kpanyinli a, ɛbadenrɛ ɛ sa na awie akyekye bɛ na yeava wɔ yeahɔ ɛleka mɔɔ ɛngulo kɛ ɛkɔ la.”
43021019	(Gyisɛse hanle ɛhye hilele adenle holɛ ko mɔɔ Pita balua zo awu awula Nyamenle anyunlunyia la.) Akee Gyisɛse zele Pita kɛ, “Bɛla maa yɛhɔ!”
43021020	Pita hakyile ɔ nwo na ɔnwunle kɛ ɛdoavolɛ ko ne mɔɔ Gyisɛse kulo ye edwɛkɛ la doa bɛ. Ɛdoavolɛ ɛhye ala a mekɛ mɔɔ bɛdi aleɛ ne la, ɔhwenle ɔbikyele Gyisɛse na ɔbizale ye kɛ, “Awulae, nwane a baye wɔ amaa?” la.
43021021	Pita nwunle ye la ɔbizale Gyisɛse kɛ, “Awulae, na nrenya ɛhye ɛ?”
43021022	Gyisɛse buale ye kɛ, “Saa mekulo kɛ ɔtɛnla aze kɔkpula kɛ menwɔra la a, ɔle wɔ edwɛkɛ ɔ? Wɔmɔ baze maa yɛhɔ!”
43021023	Yemɔti edwɛkɛ ne dendenle dwule Gyisɛse ɛdoavolɛma ne mɔ amuala anzo nu kɛ ɛdoavolɛ ɛhye ɛnrɛwu ɛlɛ. Noko Gyisɛse anga ye zɔhane. Ɔse, “Saa mekulo kɛ ɔtɛnla aze kɔkpula kɛ menwɔra la a, ɔle wɔ edwɛkɛ ɔ?”
43021024	Ɛdoavolɛ zɔhane a le ɛdoavolɛ ne mɔɔ ɛlɛka edwɛkɛ ɛhye mɔ la, yemɔ noko ala a eza hɛlɛle a, na yɛze kɛ mɔɔ yeha la le nɔhalɛ.
43021025	Akee ninyɛne dɔɔnwo wɔ ɛkɛ ne mɔɔ Gyisɛse yɛle a. Saa bɛhɛlɛle bɛ muala ngoko ngoko a anrɛɛ menea a nwolɛ mbuluku ɛnrɛzo ewiade ye amuala anu.
44001001	Nana Tiyɔfelɛse: Wɔ me alumua buluku ne anu, menganle ninyɛne mɔɔ Gyisɛse yɛle nee mɔɔ ɔhilehilele la anwo edwɛkɛ
44001002	ɔhɔdwule mekɛ mɔɔ bɛvale ye bɛhɔle anwuma la. Mɔɔ bɛbava ye bɛahɔ anwuma la, ɔluale Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne azo ɔhilehilele ye ɛzoanvolɛma ne mɔɔ yekpa nu yeye bɛ la debie mɔɔ ɔwɔ kɛ bɛyɛ la amuala.
44001003	Bɛdwazole ye bɛvile ewule nu la, ɔyele ɔ nwo ɔhilele bɛ wɔ ndenle dɔɔnwo anu kenle abulanla ɔmanle bɛnwunle ye wienyi kɛ ɔde aze, na ɔhanle Nyamenle Belemgbunlililɛ ne anwo edwɛkɛ ɔhilele bɛ.
44001004	Mekɛ mɔɔ ɔ nee bɛ yiale la ɔhanle ɔhilele bɛ kɛ, “Bɛmmatu bɛ bo bɛfi Gyɛlusalɛm, na bɛhendɛ Egya ahyɛlɛdeɛ ne mɔɔ yeva yebɔ bɛ ɛwɔkɛ na meha nwolɛ edwɛkɛ mehile bɛ la.
44001005	Dwɔn vale nzule a zɔnenle a, na bɛmɛ, ɔnrɛhyɛ biala, bɛbava Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne a bɛazɔne bɛ a.”
44001006	Mɔɔ ɛzoanvolɛma ne nee Gyisɛse yiale nu la bɛbizale ye kɛ, “Awulae, akee mekɛ ɛdwu mɔɔ ɛbava Belemgbunlililɛ ne wɔamaa Yizilayɛma bieko ɔ?”
44001007	Gyisɛse buale bɛ kɛ, “Egya a kyehyɛ mekɛ nee ɛlobɔ muala a, yemɔti ɔngyia kɛ bɛkɛnwu kenle mɔɔ ɛhye mɔ kɛzi la.
44001008	Na saa Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne ba bɛ nwo zo a bɛbanyia tumi, na bɛali me nwo daselɛ wɔ Gyɛlusalɛm, nee Dwudiya amuala nee Samɛlea bɛahɔdwu aleɛabo ɛleka biala.”
44001009	Mɔɔ ɔhanle ɛhye la, bɛmanle ye zo anwuma, na mɔɔ bɛ nye gyi ɔ nwo ala la amungu liele ye vile bɛ nye zo.
44001010	Bɛ nye hale anwomanyunlu, na arɛlevilɛ nu ala mrenya nwiɔ mɔɔ wula adɛladeɛ fufule la ragyinlanle bɛ nwo ɛkɛ ne na bɛzele ɛzoanvolɛma ne kɛ,
44001011	“Galelima, duzu ati a bɛgyi ɛke na bɛ nye ɛha anwuma ɛ? Gyisɛse ɛhye mɔɔ bɛrava ye wɔ bɛ avinli ɛke bɛhɔ anwuma la bazia alua adenle zɔhane ala azo ara bieko, kɛmɔ bɛnwu ye kɛ ɔlɛkɔ la.”
44001012	Ɛzoanvolɛma ne vi boka ne mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye Ɔlivi la azo ziale rale Gyɛlusalɛm; adenle ne kɛyɛ kilomita ko.
44001013	Bɛdwule la, bɛhɔle anwuma sua ne mɔɔ ɛnee bɛwɔ nu la anu. Bɛmɛ a le: Pita, Dwɔn, Gyemise yɛɛ Andelu; Saemɔn mɔɔ le Maanle Kulovolɛ ne yɛɛ Felepe nee Tɔmase; Baatɔlomiyu, Mateyu, Afeɛse ara Gyemise, yɛɛ Dwudase mɔɔ le Gyemise ara ne.
44001014	Bɛ muala bɛyia nu dahuu na bɛfa koyɛlɛ bɛ nee mraalɛ ne mɔ yɛɛ Mɛle mɔɔ le Gyisɛse ɔ nli ne nee ɔ mediema mrenya ne mɔ yɛ nzɛlɛlɛ.
44001015	Mekɛ ne anu diedima ne yiale nu. Bɛ nloa kɛyɛ ɛya ko abulanwiɔ. Pita dwazole zele bɛ kɛ,
44001016	“Ayi mɔ, ɔwɔ kɛ Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne mɔɔ Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne luale Belemgbunli Devidi anwo zo hanle dole ɛkɛ ne, mɔɔ fane Dwudase mɔɔ lile menli mɔɔ rahyele Gyisɛse la anyunlu la anwo la yɛ nɔhalɛ.
44001017	Ɔluakɛ ɛnee Dwudase boka yɛ nwo wɔ gyima ɛhye anu.”
44001018	(Ezukoa ne mɔɔ Dwudase luale ye ninyɛndane zo liele la, ɔvale ɔdɔle azɛlɛ, na ɛkɛ ne a ɔvuandinle ɔ nwo ɔdele, ɔ ko kpukele na ɔ kunlu anyalɛ muala tulule guale na ɔwule a.
44001019	Awie biala mɔɔ de Gyɛlusalɛm la dele ɛhye. Yemɔti bɛvɛlɛle azɛlɛ ne wɔ Hibulu aneɛ nu “Akɛledɛma.” Ɔ bo a le “Mogya azɛlɛ.”)
44001020	“Ɔluakɛ bɛhɛlɛ ye wɔ Edwɛndolɛ Buluku ne anu kɛ, ‘Bɛmaa ye awuke ɛbɔ; awie mmatɛnla nu ɛlɛ.’ Eza bɛhɛlɛ ye kɛ, ‘Bɛmaa awie fofolɛ ɛli ɔ gyakɛ anu.’
44001021	-
44001022	“Zɔhane ati, bɛdabɛ mɔɔ ɛnee bɛboka yɛ nwo, ɔvi mekɛ mɔɔ Dwɔn bɔle ɔ bo kɛ ɔsɔne menli nee mekɛ mɔɔ Gyisɛse yɛ ye gyima ne, bakpula mekɛ mɔɔ bɛvale Awulae bɛhɔle anwuma la amuala, ɔwɔ kɛ bɛ nuhua ko baboka yɛ nwo maa yɛdi Awulae ewudwazo ne anwo daselɛ.”
44001023	Yemɔti bɛzuzule menli nwiɔ, Dwosefi mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye Baasabase (na eza ɔyɛ a bɛfɛlɛ ye Gyɛsetɛse la) nee Matayase.
44001024	Bɛyɛle nzɛlɛlɛ bɛzele kɛ, “Awulae, wɔmɔ yɛɛ ɛze menli kɔsɔɔti ahonle nu a. Zɔhane ati Awulae, ɛdawɔ kilehile yɛ maa yɛye menli nwiɔ ye anu ko mɔɔ wɔvɛlɛ ye la,
44001025	maa ɔrayɛ wɔ ɛzoanvolɛ, ɔli gyima ne mɔɔ Dwudase gyakyile ziele ahane hɔle ye ɛdeɛ nu la.”
44001026	Na bɛguale menli nwiɔ ne ati nzeleba la ɔbɔle Matayase. Yemɔti bɛvale ye bɛbokale ɛzoanvolɛma bulu nee ko ne anwo.
44002001	Mɔɔ Pɛntekɔso kenle ne dwule la, ɛnee diedima ne amuala ɛboa bɛ nloa ɛleka ko.
44002002	Na arɛlevilɛ nu ala alɛra bie vi anwuma kɛ ahumu kpole bie la rayile sua ne mɔɔ bɛwɔ nu la.
44002003	Na bɛnwunle kɛ debie mɔɔ le kɛ senle ndafinlima la zandele na bɛzinzele bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛwɔ ɛkɛ ne la ati zo ngoko ngoko.
44002004	Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne rayile bɛ tɛkɛɛ na bɛbɔle ɔ bo kɛ bɛka aneɛ ngakyile, kɛmɔ Sunsum ne vale manle bɛ kɛ bɛha la.
44002005	Dwuuma mɔɔ Nyamenle ɛzonlenlɛ ti bɛvi maanle gyɛne gyɛne nu bɛrale la tɛbɔ Gyɛlusalɛm.
44002006	Mɔɔ bɛdele ɛnelɛ ɛhye la, bɛ nuhua dɔɔnwo kpalɛ rale ɛkɛ, na ɔyɛle bɛ ɛzulolɛ kpole; ɔluakɛ bɛ nuhua ko biala dele kɛ diedima ne ɛlɛka ye sua zo aneɛ ne bie.
44002007	Ɔyɛle bɛ nwanwane ɔmanle bɛhanle kɛ, “Na menli ɛhye mɔ, se bɛ muala bɛle Galelima o?
44002008	Na kɛ ɔyɛ mɔɔ akee yɛte kɛ bɛlɛka yɛdayɛ yɛ maanle nu aneɛ ɛ?
44002009	Yɛdayɛ mɔɔ yɛvi Patea, Medea, yɛɛ Yilam, Mɛsɔpɔteemea, Dwudiya, yɛɛ Kapadosea, Pɔntɛse, yɛɛ Ehyea,
44002010	Felegyea, Pamefelea, Yigyibiti nee Lebea maanzinli ne mɔɔ bikye Saelin. Yɛ bie mɔ noko vi Wulomu,
44002011	Dwuuma nee bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnle Dwuuma na bɛhakyi bɛsonle Dwuuma Nyamenle ne la, Kilitima nee Areleebeama, noko yɛ muala yɛte kɛ bɛlɛfa yɛ maanle nu aneɛ bɛaha ninyɛne mgbole mɔɔ Nyamenle ɛyɛ la.”
44002012	Na azibɛnwo nu ala, bɛbizale kɛ, “Ɛnee ɛhye abo a le duzu?”
44002013	Na bie mɔ golole bɛ nwo na bɛzele kɛ, “Menli ɛhye mɔ ɛbo nza.”
44002014	Na Pita nee ɛzoanvolɛma bulu nee ko ne mɔɔ hale la dwazole na ɔmanle ɔ ne zo ɔzele ɛlɔne ne kɛ, “Ebiamɔ Dwuuma nee bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛwɔ Gyɛlusalɛm ɛke la amuala, bɛdie bɛmaa mengile bɛ ɛhye mɔ abo.
44002015	Menli ɛhye mɔ ɛtɛbole nza, kɛmɔ bɛ adwenle yɛ bɛ la, ɔluakɛ aleɛ hyenle la bɔ zo mɔɔ dɔne ngɔnla ɛbɔ a.
44002016	Na ɛhye a le mɔɔ Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛ Dwowɛle hanle dole ɛkɛ ne la. Ɔse,
44002017	‘Nyamenle se, mɔɔ mebayɛ wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ li awieleɛ la ɛne. Mebamaa me Sunsum ne ara menli muala anwo zo. Na bɛ mra mrenya nee mraalɛ baha Nyamenle nrɛlaleɛ. Bɛ mgbavolɛ banwu ɛnyelɛzodeɛnwunlɛ, na bɛ mrenya mgbanyinli aha ɛlalɛ.
44002018	Ɛhɛe, mebamaa me Sunsum ne ara me ngɛkɛlɛ mrenya nee mraalɛ anwo zo, na bɛaha Nyamenle nrɛlaleɛ ne.
44002019	Mebayɛ nwanwane ninyɛne wɔ anwomanyunlu na meayɛ sɛkɛlɛneɛ wɔ azɛlɛ ye azo. Bɛbanwu mogya, senle, yɛɛ esike mungumungu.
44002020	Sɛnzɛne ne bayɛ awozinli, na siane ne ayɛ yɔɔnwo kɛ mogya, kolaa na Awulae anyunlunyia kenle kpole ne adwu.
44002021	Na ɔbara kɛ awie biala mɔɔ kɛbɔ Awulae duma la bɛkɛlie ye ngoane.’
44002022	“Yizilayɛma, bɛdie! Gyisɛse mɔɔ vi Nazalɛte la le sonla mɔɔ Nyamenle yele ye manle bɛ a; ɔluale ɔ nwo zo ɔlile gyima mgbole, ɔyɛle nwanwane ninyɛne nee sɛkɛlɛneɛ wɔ bɛdabɛ bɛ nye zo, mɔɔ bɛdabɛ bɛze a.
44002023	Nyamenle ɔdaye ye ɛhulolɛ zo, ɔliele ɔdole nu kɛ bɛkɛye Gyisɛse bɛkɛmaa bɛ; yɛɛ bɛdabɛ noko bɛmanle menli mɔɔ ɛnze Nyamenle la bɔle ye meanubaka nu hunle ye a.
44002024	Na Nyamenle dwazole ye vile mɔwuamra anu na ɔyele ye ɔvile ewule asa nu; ɔluakɛ ɔnle kɛ ewule di ɔ nwo zo konim.
44002025	Devidi ɛha ɔ nwo edwɛkɛ kɛ, ‘Menwu Awulae dahuu kɛ ɔgyi me sa fema zo, yemɔti menzulo.
44002026	Ɛhye ati medi fɛlɛko me ahonle nu, na me nwo sande me wɔ me ɛdendɛlɛ nu, kɛ medame zɛhae ala, mɔɔ ewule a fɛta me la mede anyelazo nu;
44002027	Ɔluakɛ wɔmɔ Nyamenle, ɛnrɛgyakyi me ɛkɛla wɔ mɔwuamra anu, yɛɛ ɛnrɛmaa wɔ Nwuanzanwuanza Ko ne nwonane ɛnrɛkpɔlɔ.
44002028	Wɔhile me ngoane adenle ne, na medi fɛlɛko kɛ ɛ nee me lua.’
44002029	“Mediema, bɛmaa menga ye wienyi mengile bɛ kɛ yɛ ze Devidi wule na bɛziele ye, na ye sɛka wɔ ɛkɛ kɛkala.
44002030	Ɔle Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛ yɛɛ ɔze ɛwɔkɛ mɔɔ Nyamenle ɛbɔ ye a: Nyamenle hanle ndane dole zolɛ kɛ ɔbamaa Devidi abo zo amra ne bie ali belemgbunli kɛ ɔdaye Devidi la.
44002031	Devidi noko nwunle mɔɔ Nyamenle bayɛ la, yemɔti a ɔhanle Mɛzaya ne ewudwazo ne anwo edwɛkɛ kɛ, ‘Bɛangyakyi ye wɔ mɔwuamra anu, yɛɛ ye nwonane amkpɔlɔ.’
44002032	Nyamenle ɛdwazo Gyisɛse ɛhye ɛvi mɔwuamra anu, kɛmɔ yɛ muala yɛdi nwolɛ daselɛ la.
44002033	Bɛmaa ye zo bɛzie Nyamenle asa fema zo, na yenyia Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne, kɛmɔ ɔze vale bɔle ye ɛwɔkɛ la; na mɔɔ bɛnwu ye nee mɔɔ kɛkala bɛte la a le ye ahyɛlɛdeɛ mɔɔ yeva yemaa yɛ la a.
44002034	Ɔluakɛ Devidi ɔdaye mumua ne yeangɔ anwuma, noko ɔhanle ɔdole ɛkɛ ne kɛ, ‘Awulae Nyamenle ne zele me Awulae kɛ, tɛnla me sa fema zo ɛke,
44002035	kɔkpula kɛ menwɔva wɔ agbɔvolɛ muala menwɔwula ɛ gyakɛ abo.’
44002036	“Zɔhane ati, bɛmaa Yizilayɛma amuala ɛnwu ye wienyi kɛ, Gyisɛse ɛhye mɔɔ bɛbɔle ye meanubaka nu la, yemɔ ala yɛɛ Nyamenle ɛyɛ ye Awulae nee Mɛzaya a.”
44002037	Mɔɔ menli ne dele ɛhye la, ɛzulolɛ kpole hanle bɛ na bɛbizale Pita nee ɛzoanvolɛma ne mɔ kɛ, “Ayi mɔ, duzu a ɔwɔ kɛ yɛyɛ a?”
44002038	Pita zele bɛ kɛ, “Bɛnlu bɛ nwo na bɛgyakyi ɛtane ɛyɛlɛ, na bɛmaa bɛzɔne bɛ wɔ Gyisɛse Kelaese duma nu, amaa bɛava bɛ ɛtane bɛahyɛ bɛ na bɛanyia Nyamenle ahyɛlɛdeɛ ne, mɔɔ le Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne.
44002039	Ɔluakɛ Nyamenle ɛwɔkɛ ne le bɛ nee bɛ mra nee menli mɔɔ wɔ ɛleka muala, mɔɔ yɛ Awulae Nyamenle ne kɛvɛlɛ bɛ la ɛdeɛ.”
44002040	Na Pita hɔle zolɛ hanle edwɛkɛ dɔɔnwo hilele bɛ na ɔdule bɛ folɛ kɛ, “Bɛhwe bɛ nwo bɛvi amaneɛ mɔɔ amumuyɛma ɛhye mɔ banwu ye la anu.”
44002041	Bie mɔ dɔɔnwo liele lile na bɛmanle bɛzɔnenle bɛ. Na kenle ko ne menli kɛyɛ apenle nsa rabokale ekpunli ne anwo.
44002042	Na bɛdule bɛ nwo bɛmanle ɛzoanvolɛma ne ngilehilelɛ ne, bɛ nee bɛ zonlenle, na bɛbɔle nu bɛlile debie wɔ mediema ɛyɛlɛ nu.
44002043	Ɛzoanvolɛma ne mɔ yɛle nwanwane ninyɛne dɔɔnwo manle ɔyɛle awie biala ɛzulolɛ nee azibɛnwo.
44002044	Bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛliele Gyisɛse bɛlile la lile ahua na bɛhyɛle ninyɛne mɔɔ bɛlɛ la bɛmanle bɛ nwo.
44002045	Bɛdɔnedɔnenle bɛ nwo ninyɛne nee bɛ agyadeɛ ne mɔ na bɛhyɛle ezukoa ne bɛmanle bɛ muala, kɛmɔ biala ɛhyianlɛ de la.
44002046	Kenle biala bɛyia nu wɔ Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne anu bɛyɛ nzɛlɛlɛ, bɛbɔ nu bɛdi debie wɔ koyɛlɛ nu,
44002047	na bɛye Nyamenle ayɛlɛ. Bɛnyianle bɛ nyunlu wɔ menli kɔsɔɔti avinli, na dahuu Awulae fa menli mɔɔ bɛlɛdie bɛ ngoane la baboka bɛ nwo.
44003001	Kenle ko Pita nee Dwɔn kɔ Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne anu wɔ ewiazo dɔne nsa nzɛlɛlɛ mekɛ ne anu la,
44003002	bɛhɔdole nrenya bie mɔɔ bɛwole ye abubura la. Dahuu bɛsoa ye bɛba Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne anuhɔlɛ ne mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye “Anlenkɛ Kɛnlɛma” la anloa bɛmaa ɔsɛlɛzɛlɛ menli mɔɔ ɛlɛkɔ nu la ninyɛne.
44003003	Ɔnwunle Pita nee Dwɔn kɛ bɛlɛkɔ Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne anu la, ɔzɛlɛle bɛ kɛ bɛhyɛ ye debie.
44003004	Bɛnleanle ye koonwu, na Pita zele ye kɛ, “Nea yɛ!”
44003005	Ɔnleanle bɛ, na ɔdwenlenle kɛ bɛbahyɛ ye debie.
44003006	Na Pita zele ye kɛ, “Menlɛ ezukoa fee, na mɔɔ melɛ ye la a mefa meamaa wɔ la. Ɔlua Gyisɛse Kelaese mɔɔ vi Nazalɛte la duma nu, mese wɔ kɛ, dwazo tia!”
44003007	Ɔzɔle ɔ sa fema ne ɔdwazole ye, na ɛkɛ ne ala ɔ gyakɛ nee ye adwongu ne mɔ anu mianle,
44003008	ɔwulule ɔpenle na ɔbɔle ɔ bo kɛ ɔtia. Ɔ nee bɛ hɔle Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne anu, na ɔwuluwulule ɔyele Nyamenle ayɛlɛ.
44003009	Menli ne amuala nwunle kɛ ɔlɛwuluwulu ɔye Nyamenle ayɛlɛ,
44003010	na nzinlii mɔɔ akee bɛnwunle kɛ sonla ne mɔɔ anrɛɛ tɛnla sɛlɛzɛlɛ ninyɛne wɔ Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne anuhɔlɛ ne mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye “Anlenkɛ Kɛnlɛma” la anloa la, ɔyɛle bɛ azibɛnwo, na mobolɛ kpole bole bɛ wɔ mɔɔ ɛzi la anwo.
44003011	Mɔɔ nrenya ne doa Pita nee Dwɔn la, ɔyɛle menli ne nwanwane ɔmanle dɔɔnwo nriandile hɔyiale bɛ wɔ Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne “Sɔlɔmɔn Kpɔda” ne abo.
44003012	Pita nwunle bɛ la ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Yizilayɛma, duzu ati a ɛhye ɛyɛ bɛ azibɛnwo na bɛ nye ɛha yɛ nwo ɛ? Anzɛɛ bɛdwenle kɛ yɛdayɛ yɛ anwosesebɛ nee yɛ ɛzonlenlɛ kpalɛ zo, yɛɛ yɛlua mɔɔ yɛmaa nrenya ɛhye ɛdia a?
44003013	Ebileham, Ayezeke nee Gyekɔbo bɛ Nyamenle ne, nee yɛ nlenya mɔ Nyamenle ne yɛɛ ɛwula ye Sonvolɛ Gyisɛse anyunlunyia a. Bɛyele ye bɛmanle mgbanyima ne mɔ na bɛkpole ye wɔ Paelɛte anyunlu, wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ ɛnee Paelɛte mumua ne kulo kɛ ɔgyakyi ye la.
44003014	Ɔle sonlakpalɛ mɔɔ anwo te a, noko bɛkpole ye, na bɛkpale Paelɛte kyɛlɛ kɛ ɔdwula kɔdiawu ne ɔmaa bɛ.
44003015	Bɛhunle sonla ne mɔɔ maa ngoane la, na Nyamenle dwazole ye vile mɔwuamra anu; yɛ muala yɛdi ɛhye anwo daselɛ.
44003016	Gyisɛse ɛhye duma nu nee ye tumi zo nee diedi wɔ ye duma ne anu yɛɛ nrenya ɛhye ɛnɛ gyi bɛ nyunlu ɛke kɛ yede kpɔkɛ bɔkɔɔ a.
44003017	“Na mediema, meze kɛ mɔɔ bɛ nee bɛ mgbanyima ne mɔ yɛle Gyisɛse la, tɛ bɛ ɔ.
44003018	Nyamenle luale ye kpɔmanvolɛma anwo zo hanle dole ɛkɛ ne dɛba, kɛ ɔwɔ kɛ Mɛzaya ne nwu amaneɛ, yemɔti a ɔmanle ɔrale ye zɔhane a.
44003019	Zɔhane ati bɛnlu bɛ nwo na bɛzia bɛrɛla Nyamenle ɛkɛ, amaa yeava bɛ ɛtane ne mɔ amuala yeahyɛ bɛ,
44003020	na mekɛ dwu a Awulae arɛlɛ bɛ Sunsum nu anwosesebɛ, na yeava Mɛzaya ne, mɔɔ le Gyisɛse, mɔɔ yeye ye dɛba yemaa bɛ la yɛarɛlɛ bɛ.
44003021	Ɔwɔ kɛ ɔtɛnla anwuma lɔ kɔkpula kɛ bɛkɛyɛ ninyɛne kɔsɔɔti fofolɛ, kɛmɔ Nyamenle ɛlua ye kpɔmanvolɛma nwuanzanwuanza ne mɔ anwo zo ɛha ye dɛba la.
44003022	Mosisi hanle kɛ, ‘Awulae bɛ Nyamenle ne baye kpɔmanvolɛ avi bɛ avinli na yeazoa ye wɔ bɛ nwo ɛkɛ, kɛmɔ yezoa me la, na ɔwɔ kɛ bɛtie ye na bɛdi mɔɔ ɔkɛha ɔkɛhile bɛ la amuala azo.
44003023	Awie biala mɔɔ andie kpɔmanvolɛ zɔhane la, bɛbaye ye bɛavi Nyamenle menli ne avinli na bɛazɛkye ye.’
44003024	Eza Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛma, Samoɛle nee bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛli ɔ nzi la amuala, biala hanle mekɛ ɛhye anwo edwɛkɛ.
44003025	Nyamenle ɛwɔkɛ ne mɔɔ ɔluale ye kpɔmanvolɛma anwo zo ɔbɔle la le bɛ ɛdeɛ, yɛɛ ngyekyeleɛ ne mɔɔ Nyamenle nee bɛ nlenya mɔ kyekyele la, bɛwɔ nu bie, ɔluakɛ ɔhanle ɔhilele Ebileham kɛ, ‘Ɛ bo zo amra anwo zo yɛɛ mebalua meayila maanle maanle kɔsɔɔti a.’
44003026	Yemɔti Nyamenle yele ye Sonvolɛ ne na ɔzoanle ye ɔmanle ɔlumuale ɔrale bɛ ɛkɛ kɛ ɔmaa awie biala ɛhwe ɔ nwo ɛvi ɛtane nwo na ɔyila bɛ.”
44004001	Mɔɔ Pita nee Dwɔn anloa wɔ zolɛ bɛlɛtendɛ bɛahile menli ne mɔ la, sɛlɛvolɛma bie nee Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne neavolɛ kpanyinli ne nee Sadusiima fane ne anu amra bie mɔ ravindele bɛ nwo zo.
44004002	Bɛvale ɛya kpole, ɔluakɛ ɛnee ɛzoanvolɛma ne ɛlɛkilehile menli ne mɔ kɛ Gyisɛse ɛdwazo ɛvi ewule nu, na ɔle sɛkɛlɛneɛ mɔɔ kile kɛ mɔwuamra badwazo ara ngoane nu bieko a.
44004003	Ɛhye ati bɛhyele bɛ bɛhɔguale efiade kɛ aleɛ kye a bɛ nee bɛ kɛli, ɔluakɛ ɛnee aleɛ ɛdwo.
44004004	Na bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛdele edwɛkɛ ne la anu dɔɔnwo liele lile na bɛkɛyɛ mrenya apenle nnu.
44004005	Aleɛ hyenle la Dwuu mgbanyima ne nee asɔne ne anu adile adile ne mɔ nee mɛla kilehilevolɛma ne yiale Gyɛlusalɛm.
44004006	Bɛdabɛ mɔɔ ɛnee bɛwɔ ɛkɛ ne bie la a le Sɛlɛvolɛ Kpanyinli Anase nee Kayafase, Dwɔn, Alɛzanda, yɛɛ bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛvi Sɛlɛvolɛ Kpanyinli ne abusua nu la.
44004007	Bɛmanle ɛzoanvolɛma nwiɔ ne ragyinlanle bɛ nyunlu ɛkɛ ne na bɛbizale bɛ kɛ, “Kɛ bɛzile bɛyɛle nrenya ye ayile ɛ? Tumi boni azo anzɛɛ duma boni anu a bɛluale bɛyɛle zɛhae gyima a?”
44004008	Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne vale Pita nyinle, na ɔbuale bɛ kɛ, “Nana mɔ nee egya mɔ,
44004009	saa ɛnɛ kenle ye bɛlɛbiza yɛ kpalɛ mɔɔ yɛyɛ yɛmaa nrenya abubura ye nee kɛ yɛzile yɛyɛle ye ayile la a,
44004010	ɛnee bɛdie bɛmaa ɔdo Yizilayɛma kɔsɔɔti kɛ, ɔlua Gyisɛse Kelaese mɔɔ vi Nazalɛte, mɔɔ bɛmɛ bɛbɔle ye meanubaka nu bɛhunle ye, na Nyamenle dwazole ye vile ewule nu la duma nu a ɛnɛ nrenya ɛhye gyi bɛ nyunlu ɛke kɛ yede kpɔkɛ bɔkɔɔ a.
44004011	Gyisɛse a le mɔɔ Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne ka ye ɔ nwo kɛ, ‘Bolɛ ne mɔɔ bɛmɛ suasivoma bɛkpole la ɛrayɛ bolɛ mɔɔ anwo hyia kpole kpalɛ kɛ sua mgbɛnezo sika la.’
44004012	Ɔ nwo zo yɛɛ yɛlua a yɛkɛnyia ngoane a, ɔluakɛ awie bieko ɛnle aleɛabo mɔɔ Nyamenle ɛva ye duma ɛmaa mɔɔ yɛdua ɔ nwo zo a yɛkɛnyia ngoane a.”
44004013	Ɔyɛle ayiama ne azibɛnwo kɛ Pita nee Dwɔn ɛnyia akɛnrasesebɛ mɔɔ le zɛhae a, ɔluakɛ bɛze kɛ bɛle menli mɔɔ ɛnze nwoma a, na bɛliele bɛdole nu kɛ bɛ nee Gyisɛse a anrɛɛ lua a.
44004014	Eza noko bɛnnwu mɔɔ bɛka a, ɔluakɛ nrenya ne mɔɔ bɛyɛle ye ayile la gyi bɛ nwo ɛkɛ.
44004015	Ɛhye ati bɛvale bɛ bɛziele ahane ekyii, na bɛbɔle ɔ bo kɛ bɛdwenledwenle nwolɛ.
44004016	Bɛbizale bɛ nwo kɛ, “Menli ɛhye mɔ kɛ yɛyɛ bɛ ɛ? Awie biala mɔɔ de Gyɛlusalɛm ɛke la ze kɛ bɛmɛ a bɛyɛ nwanwane gyima mɔɔ le zɛhae a, yɛɛ yɛngola yɛnga kɛ ɔnle zɔhane.
44004017	Na amaa edwɛkɛ ne andende la bɛmaa yɛdua bɛ kɛ bɛmmabɔ Gyisɛse duma bɛka edwɛkɛ bɛkile awie biala bieko.”
44004018	Yemɔti bɛvɛlɛle bɛ na bɛduale bɛ kɛ bɛmmatendɛ menli nu anzɛɛ bɛmmabɔ Gyisɛse duma bɛkilehile menli.
44004019	Na Pita nee Dwɔn buale bɛ kɛ, “Saa ɔle kpalɛ wɔ Nyamenle anyunlu kɛ yɛkɛdie bɛmɛ na yɛkɛgyakyi Nyamenle a ɛnee bɛdabɛ bɛbua;
44004020	na yɛmɛ, mɔɔ yɛde nee mɔɔ yɛnwu ye la, yɛnrɛhola yɛnrɛgyakyi ye ɛhanlɛ!”
44004021	Ayiama ne bɔle bɛ kɔkɔ ɛsesebɛ na bɛgyakyile bɛ kɛ bɛhɔ, ɔluakɛ bɛnlɛ edwɛkɛ kpaziwɔkɛ biala mɔɔ bɛgyinla zolɛ bɛtwe bɛ nzo a ɔyɛ boɛ a, yɛɛ eza menli ne amuala ɛlɛyeyɛ Nyamenle wɔ mɔɔ ɛzi la anwo.
44004022	Nrenya ne mɔɔ ɔlua ɔ nwo zo bɛyɛle nwanwane gyima kpole zɛhae la ɛnee ɛli ɛvolɛ mɔɔ bo abulanla.
44004023	Mɔɔ bɛgyakyile bɛ la, Pita nee Dwɔn ziale hɔle bɛ gɔnwo mɔ anwo ɛkɛ na bɛhanle mɔɔ sɛlɛvolɛ mgbanyinli nee maanle mgbanyinli ne mɔ hanle la amuala bɛhilele bɛ.
44004024	Bɛdele edwɛkɛ ne la, bɛ muala bɛbɔle nu bɛzɛlɛle, “O Tumivolɛ Awulae mɔɔ bɔle anwuma nee azɛlɛ, nyevile nee mɔɔ wɔ nu la amuala,
44004025	ɛluale wɔ Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne anwo zo ɛmanle yɛ nlenya Devidi, wɔ akɛlɛ ne dendɛle zele kɛ, ‘Duzu ati a maanle maanle ɛva ɛya kpole zɛhae a na menli dwenle adwenle ɛtane zɛhae ɛ?
44004026	Azɛlɛ ye azo arelemgbunli ɛboɔboa bɛ nloa, maanle mgbanyinli ɛva adwenle ko na bɛtia Nyamenle nee ye Mɛzaya ne.’
44004027	Hɛlɔdo nee Pɔnteɛse Paelɛte, nee bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnle Dwuuma la, nee menli mɔɔ wɔ Yizilayɛ la amuala yiale nu wɔ suakpole ɛhye azo na bɛvale adwenle bɛtiale wɔ Sonvolɛ Nwuanzanwuanza Gyisɛse mɔɔ wɔyɛ ye Mɛzaya la.
44004028	Bɛyiale nu bɛvale adwenle bɛyɛle debie biala, kɛmɔ ɛdawɔ wɔ tumi ɛhulolɛ ngyehyɛlɛ ne de la.
44004029	Na Awulae, akee nea kɛ bɛlɛsi bɛanwunlonwunla yɛ a. Maa yɛ, wɔ ɛzoanvolɛma, akɛnrasesebɛ maa yɛhola yɛha wɔ Edwɛkpa ne.
44004030	Kile wɔ tumi wɔ ayileyɛlɛ nu, na boa maa yɛlua wɔ Sonvolɛ Nwuanzanwuanza Gyisɛse duma nu yɛyɛ nwanwane ninyɛne.”
44004031	Mɔɔ bɛwiele nzɛlɛlɛ ne yɛ la, ɛleka mɔɔ bɛyiale nu la kpusule. Na Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne rawolole bɛ na bɛnyianle akɛnrasesebɛ kɛ akee bɛka Nyamenle edwɛkɛ ne kpalɛ.
44004032	Diedima ne amuala lile ahua wɔ ahonle nee adwenle nu. Bɛ nuhua biala anva ye debie biala ambɔ ye ɛbolɛ na bɛ nee bɛ gɔnwo mɔ hyɛle debie biala mɔɔ ko lɛ ye la.
44004033	Na ɛzoanvolɛma ne vale tumi kpole lile Awulae Gyisɛse ewudwazo ne anwo daselɛ, na Nyamenle lole bɛ nyilalɛ dɔɔnwo.
44004034	Bɛ nuhua biala angyia, ɔluakɛ bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛlɛ ninyɛne mɔɔ le kɛ azɛlɛ anzɛɛ azua la dɔnedɔnenle bɛ, bɛvale ezukoa mɔɔ bɛnyianle ye wɔ nu la
44004035	bɛrɛlɛle ɛzoanvolɛma ne na bɛhyɛle bɛmanle awie biala nyianle bie, kɛmɔ bɛ ɛhyianlɛ ngakyile ne mɔ de la.
44004036	Zɔhane ala yɛɛ Dwosefi ɔdaye noko ɔyɛle a. Nrenya ɛhye boka Livae abusua ne anwo. Bɛwole ye wɔ bɔra ne mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye Saepelɛse la azo na ɛzoanvolɛma ne donle ye Baanabase. (Wɔ Hibulu aneɛ ne anu a duma ne abo a le “Sonla mɔɔ maa akɛnrasesebɛ la.”)
44004037	Dwosefi hɔdɔnenle ye azɛlɛ mɔɔ ɔlɛ la na ɔvale ezukoa mɔɔ ɔnyianle ye wɔ nu la amuala ɔrɛlɛle ɛzoanvolɛma ne.
44005001	Nrenya ko wɔ ɛkɛ, bɛfɛlɛ ye Ananayase. Ɔ ye bɛfɛlɛ ye Safaela. Bɛdabɛ noko bɛdɔnenle bɛ agyadeɛ mɔɔ bɛlɛ la;
44005002	ɔ nee ɔ ye yɛle adwenle ko, ɔdele ezukoa mɔɔ bɛnyianle ye la bie ɔziele, na ɔvale mɔɔ hale la ɔradole ɛzoanvolɛma ne anyunlu.
44005003	Pita zele ye kɛ, “Ananayase, duzu ati a wɔmaa Seetan ɛvo ɛ nwo zo na yemaa wɔbɛlɛbɛla Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne na wɔde ezukoa mɔɔ ɛnyianle ye la bie wɔvea ɛ?
44005004	Mɔɔ ɛtɛtɔnenle wɔ agyadeɛ ne la, ɛnee ɔle wɔ ɛdeɛ, yɛɛ mɔɔ ɛdɔnenle wɔ agyadeɛ ne la, ɛnee ɔle wɔ ɛdeɛ, yɛɛ mɔɔ ɛdɔnenle ye la, ɛnee ezukoa ne noko le wɔ ɛdeɛ. Na duzu yɛɛ hanle wɔ manle ɛvale adwenle ɛhye a? Adalɛ ɛhye wɔambɔ wɔangile sonla; wɔbɔ wɔhile Nyamenle!”
44005005	Ananayase dele edwɛkɛ ɛhye la, ɔpɛle ɔfinle na ɔwule ɛkɛ ne ala; na ɛzulolɛ kpole hanle bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛdele edwɛkɛ ne la amuala.
44005006	Mgbavolɛ ne mɔ dwazole, bɛyɛle ɔ nwo boɛ na bɛhɔziele ye.
44005007	Nzinlii, kɛyɛ dɔnehwele nsa anzi, ɔ ye noko rale; na ɛnee ɔtɛtele mɔɔ ɛzi la anwo bie fee.
44005008	Pita bizale ye kɛ, “Ka nɔhalɛ kile me, ɛ nee ɛ hu bɛ agyadeɛ ne mɔɔ bɛdɔnenle ye la mɔɔ bɛnyianle ye la amuala a le ɛhye ɔ?” Raalɛ ne buale ye kɛ, “Ɛhɛe, ɔ muala ɔ.”
44005009	Na Pita zele ye kɛ, “Duzu ati a ɛ nee ɛ hu bɛyɛ adwenle ko kɛ bɛbazɔ Awulae Sunsum ne bɛanlea ɛ? Nea, menli mɔɔ hɔziele ɛ hu la agyakɛ abo a ɛte ye wɔ anuhɔlɛ lɔ la, na bɛ nee ɛdawɔ noko bahɔ.”
44005010	Ɛkɛ ne ala ɔdaye noko ɔpɛle ɔfinle Pita anyunlu ɛkɛ na ɔwule. Mɔɔ mgbavolɛ ne mɔ ziale rale la, bɛranwunle kɛ ɔdaye noko yewu, na bɛvale ye bɛhɔziele ye ɔ hu anwo ɛkɛ ne.
44005011	Na ɛzulolɛ kpole hanle diedima ne nee menli mɔɔ dele edwɛkɛ ne la amuala.
44005012	Ɛzoanvolɛma ne yɛle sɛkɛlɛneɛ ngakyile nee nwanwane ninyɛne dɔɔnwo wɔ menli ne avinli. Ɛleka mɔɔ diedima ne amuala bɔ nu yia la a le Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne kpɔda ne mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye “Sɔlɔmɔn Kpɔda” la abo.
44005013	Awie mɔɔ ɛmboka diedima ne anwo la ɛnwolo bɛ nu, noko menli kɔsɔɔti hanle bɛ nwo edwɛkɛ kpalɛ.
44005014	Menli dɔɔnwo kpalɛ, mraalɛ nee mrenya mɔɔ liele Awulae lile la rabokale bɛ nwo.
44005015	Na ɔlua ɛzoanvolɛma ne gyima zo, nzinlii ɛnee akee bɛsoa wuleravolɛma bɛbagua ɛkpa zo wɔ awɔdenle ne mɔ azo, amaa ngyengyene nu bie ala Pita se ɛkɛ a ye ɛlawolɛ adɔ bie anwo zo na ɔ nwo aza.
44005016	Na menli mɔɔ wɔ azua mɔɔ bikye Gyɛlusalɛm la amuala vale bɛ awuleravolɛ nee bɛdabɛ mɔɔ sunsum ɛtane gyegye bɛ la amuala rale manle bɛyɛle bɛ ayile.
44005017	Ɛzoanvolɛma ne anwo anyebolo dɔle Sɛlɛvolɛ Kpanyinli ne nee ɔ sa zo ne mɔ, mɔɔ le fane ne mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye Sadusii la anu amra anwo, na bɛvale adwenle kɛ bɛyɛ nwolɛ bie.
44005018	Yemɔti bɛdwazole ɛzoanvolɛma ne anwo zo na bɛhyele bɛ bɛguale efiade.
44005019	Na kenle ko ne nɔe ne, Awulae soanvolɛ rabukele efiade ne nlenkɛ ne mɔ na ɔvale bɛ ɔvindele na ɔzele bɛ kɛ,
44005020	“Bɛhɔ Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne anu na bɛhɔha ngoane fofolɛ ɛhye anwo edwɛkɛ bɛhile menli kɔsɔɔti.”
44005021	Aleɛ hyenle nwonlomɔ mangyee ne la, ɛzoanvolɛma ne hɔle Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne anu na bɛbɔle ɔ bo kɛ bɛkilehile. Sɛlɛvolɛ Kpanyinli ne nee ɔ sa zo ne mɔ manle bɛvɛlɛle mgbanyima ayia, na bɛdule menli kɛ bɛhɔye ɛzoanvolɛma ne wɔ efiade ne bɛrɛla.
44005022	Na mɔɔ menli ne mɔ hɔle la bɛannwu ɛzoanvolɛma ne mɔ na bɛziale bɛrabɔle amaneɛ kɛ,
44005023	“Yɛhɔle la ɛnee efiade ne nlenkɛ ne mɔ wɔ nyinlira nu, yɛɛ sinzavolɛma ne noko amuala gyigyi nlenkɛ ne mɔ anloa; noko yɛbukele nlenkɛ ne mɔ la, yɛannwu awie biala wɔ ɛkɛ.”
44005024	Ɛhye yɛle kpanyinli ne mɔɔ nea Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne sinzavolɛma ne anwo zo, nee sɛlɛvolɛ mgbanyinli ne mɔ naa ekyii, na bɛdwenlenle nwo kɛ kabezɛ edwɛkɛ bie ɛzi ɛzoanvolɛma ne anwo zo.
44005025	Na yeangyɛ yɛɛ nrenya ko rabɔle bɛ amaneɛ kɛ, “Bɛnlea, menli ne mɔɔ bɛguale bɛ efiade la wɔ Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua nu lɔ ɛlɛkilehile menli.”
44005026	Yemɔti sinzavolɛ kpanyinli ne vale ye ɛlɔnema ne na bɛhɔvale ɛzoanvolɛma ne mɔ bɛrale, noko bɛanyɛ bɛ mgbane mgbane biala, ɔluakɛ ɛnee bɛsulo kɛ saa bɛyɛ ye kikilikikili a ɛlɔne ne kɛzi bɛ awolɛ.
44005027	Bɛvale bɛ gyɛlɛɛnye bɛragyinlanle ayiama ne anyunlu, na Sɛlɛvolɛ Kpanyinli ne bizale bɛ kɛ,
44005028	“Bɛmɛ, yɛbɔ bɛ kɔkɔ kɛ bɛmmabɔ sonla zɔhane duma bɛkilehile menli wɔ ɛleka biala, noko nea mɔɔ akee bɛlɛyɛ a. Bɛva bɛ ngilehilelɛ ne bɛkponde Gyɛlusalɛm amuala; bɛyɛ bɛamaa yɛmɛ yɛali ɛzonle wɔ sonla ne ewule nwo!”
44005029	Na Pita nee ɛzoanvolɛma ne buale kɛ, “Ɔwɔ kɛ yɛtie Nyamenle yɛtɛla sonla.
44005030	Yɛ nlenya mɔ Nyamenle ne dwazole Gyisɛse mɔɔ bɛmɛ bɛbɔle ye meanubaka nu bɛhunle ye la vile ewule nu.
44005031	Na yemɔ yɛɛ Nyamenle ɛmaa ye zo ɛzie ye ye fema zo ɛyɛ ye Adenlekilevolɛ nee Dievolɛ kɛ ɔhile Yizilayɛma adenle ɔmaa bɛnlu bɛ nwo na bɛanyia ɛtanefakyɛ a.
44005032	Na yɛmɛ yɛɛ Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne mɔɔ le Nyamenle ahyɛlɛdeɛ ne mɔɔ ɔfa ɔmaa bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛtie ye la, yɛdi ɛhye anwo daselɛ.”
44005033	Ɛhye yelale ayiama ne kpole manle bɛyɛle kɛ bɛku ɛzoanvolɛma ne.
44005034	Na bɛ nuhua ko dwazole. Ɔle Falasiinli, bɛfɛlɛ ye Gameeleɛle. Ɔle mɛla kilehilevolɛ yɛɛ maanlema bu ye kpole kpalɛ. Ɔmanle bɛvale ɛzoanvolɛma ne mɔ bɛvindele,
44005035	na ɔzele ayiama ne kɛ, “Yizilayɛ mgbanyima, bɛnlea boɛ wɔ mɔɔ bɛkpondɛ bɛayɛ menli ɛhye mɔ la anwo.
44005036	Mekɛ bie mɔɔ ɛraze ɛhɔ la, Tiyudase dwazole na ɔyɛle ɔ nwo kɛ ɔle sonlakpole bie, na ɔhwenle menli ala kɛyɛ ɛya nna ɔlile ɔ nzi. Na nzinlii bɛhunle ye, na ye ɛdoavolɛma ne bɔle asande manle ye fane ne gule.
44005037	Ɛhye anzi, wɔ menli ɛdianlɛ mekɛ ne anu, Dwudase mɔɔ vi Galeli la ɔdaye ɔdwazole. Ɔdaye ɔhwenle menli dɔɔnwo ɔlile ɔ nzi. Na ɔdaye bɛhunle ye na menli mɔɔ li ɔ nzi la amuala zandele.
44005038	Yemɔti mɔɔ meka meahile bɛ wɔ ɛhye anwo la a le kɛ, bɛgyakyi bɛ, bɛmmayɛ bɛ ɛhwee. Na saa mɔɔ bɛlɛyɛ la le sonla ngyehyɛlɛ a, ɔbazɛkye.
44005039	Saa ɔvi Nyamenle noko a, yemɔ ɔyɛ se kɛ bɛkɛhola ye sɛkye, yɛɛ eza noko bɛannea boɛ a, bɛbaho bɛatia Nyamenle.” Ayiama ne vale Gameeleɛle folɛdulɛ ne.
44005040	Bɛvale ɛzoanvolɛma ne bɛrale ayiama ne anyunlu bieko, bɛbilale bɛ empele, na bɛduale bɛ kɛ bɛmmabɔ Gyisɛse duma bieko ɛlɛ ɛleka biala; na bɛgyakyile bɛ.
44005041	Ɛzoanvolɛma ne vale fɛlɛkolilɛ vile ayia sua ne anu hɔle, kɛ bɛdabɛ bɔbɔ Nyamenle ɛbu bɛ bie, na ɔlua Gyisɛse duma ne ati bɛnwu amaneɛ a.
44005042	Yemɔti dahuu bɛhɔle Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne anu nee azua nu bɛhilehilele na bɛbɔle Edwɛkpa ne mɔɔ fane Gyisɛse anwo la nolo kɛ yemɔ a ɔle Mɛzaya ne a.
44006001	Nzinlii, mɔɔ ɛnee akee ɛdoavolɛma ne anwo ɛlɛso la, ɛdendɛlɛ radɔle Dwuuma mɔɔ ka Giliki nee Dwuuma mɔɔ wɔ maanle ne anu la avinli. Dwuuma mɔɔ ka Giliki la se bɛbu bɛ nye bɛgua bɛ ahunlanvolɛ mraalɛ ne mɔ anwo zo wɔ dahuu ndɔnielilɛ nu.
44006002	Zɔhane ati ɛzoanvolɛma bulu nee nwiɔ ne vɛlɛle ɛdoavolɛma ne amuala na bɛzele bɛ kɛ, “Ɔnle kpalɛ kɛ ndɔnielilɛ ti yɛkɛbu yɛ nye yɛkɛgua Nyamenle edwɛkɛ ne ɛhanlɛ zo.
44006003	Yemɔti, ayi mɔ, bɛnlea na bɛye bɛ nuhua nsuu mɔɔ menli bu bɛ, mɔɔ Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne wɔ bɛ nwo zo na bɛze nrɛlɛbɛ la bɛmaa yɛ, na yɛva bɛ yɛzie zɛhae gyima ye anloa,
44006004	amaa yɛdayɛ noko yɛanyia mekɛ yɛayɛ nzɛlɛlɛ nee Edwɛkpa ne ɛhanlɛ gyima ne.”
44006005	Ɛzoanvolɛma ne mɔ nzuzulɛ ne zɔle bɛ kɔsɔɔti bɛ nye, na bɛyele Sitivin, mɔɔ lɛ diedi ne anu kpundii na Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne ɛyi ye tɛkɛɛ la, Felepe, Polɔkɔlɛse, Nekanɔ, Taemɔn, Paamɛnase, yɛɛ Nekɔlɔso mɔɔ vi Anteɔko, mɔɔ ɛnle Dwuunli na yehakyi ɔsonle Dwuuma Nyamenle ne la.
44006006	Bɛvale bɛ bɛmanle ɛzoanvolɛma ne, ɛzoanvolɛma ne vale bɛ sa guale bɛ ti zo na bɛyɛle nzɛlɛlɛ bɛmanle bɛ.
44006007	Na Nyamenle edwɛkɛ ne akee nyinle kpole manle menli somaa rabokale bɛ nwo, na bɛyɛle dɔɔnwo wɔ Gyɛlusalɛm, yɛɛ eza sɛlɛvolɛma dɔɔnwo liele Edwɛkpa ne lile.
44006008	Nyamenle lole Sitivin dɔɔnwo na ɔmanle ye tumi kpole ɔmanle ɔyɛle nwanwane ninyɛne mgbole ɔhilele menli.
44006009	Yemɔti menli bie mɔɔ fɛlɛ bɛ nwo “Fanwodi Sukuluma” na bɛvi Saelin nee Alɛzandelea, nee bie mɔ mɔɔ vi Selesea nee Ehyea la bɔle ɔ bo kɛ bɛ nee Sitivin su kpolera.
44006010	Na Sunsum ne manle Sitivin nrɛlɛbɛ dɔɔnwo, yemɔti bɛangola ye fee.
44006011	Ɛhye ati bɛwulowulale menli bie abo bɛmanle bɛhanle kɛ, “Yɛdele kɛ ɔlɛka munzule edwɛkɛ yeatia Mosisi nee Nyamenle.”
44006012	Na bɛluale adenle ɛhye azo bɛmanle maanlema nee asɔne mgbanyima ne nee mɛla kilehilevolɛma ne mɔ vale ɛya na bɛhyele Sitivin bɛ nee ye hɔle ayiama ne anyunlu.
44006013	Bɛmanle menli ralile dasewia kɛ, “Nrenya ɛhye, dahuu ɔtendɛ ɔtia yɛ Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua nwuanzanwuanza ye nee Mosisi mɛla ne.
44006014	Yɛdele kɛ ɔlɛka kɛ Gyisɛse ne mɔɔ vi Nazalɛte la barazɛkye Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ye, na yeahakyi maamɛla biala mɔɔ Mosisi hyehyɛle manle yɛ la!”
44006015	Bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛwɔ ayia ne abo la amuala anye hale Sitivin anwo, na bɛnwunle kɛ ɛnee ɔ nyunlu ɛyɛ kɛ Nyamenle soanvolɛ nyunlu la.
44007001	Sɛlɛvolɛ Kpanyinli ne bizale Sitivin kɛ, “Asoo ɛhye mɔ le zɔhane?”
44007002	Sitivin buale kɛ, “Mediema mrenya nee egya mɔ, bɛdie me! Anyunlunyia Nyamenle ne yele ɔ nwo hilele yɛ nlenya Ebileham wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ ɛnee ɔwɔ Mɛsɔpɔteemea la, kolaa na yeadu yeahɔdɛnla Hɛlan.
44007003	Ɔzele ye kɛ, ‘Ɛvi wɔ abusua nee wɔ maanle ye anu tu na kɔ azɛlɛ ne mɔɔ mebahile wɔ la azo.’
44007004	Ɛhye ati yɛɛ ɔvi Kaledea mɔɔ le ɔdaye ye maanle nu la ɔdule ɔhɔdɛnlanle Hɛlan a. Nzinlii mɔɔ Ebileham ɔ ze wule la, Nyamenle manle ɔradɛnlanle azɛlɛ ɛhye mɔɔ ɛnɛ bɛmɛ bɛde zolɛ la azo.
44007005	Ɛnee Nyamenle ɛtɛfale azɛlɛ ne ɛleka biala ɛtɛmanle Ebileham kɛ ɔle ɔdaye ye ɛdeɛ. Azɛlɛ waa ko bɔbɔ bɔle ye, noko ɛnee Nyamenle ɛva ɛbɔ ye ɛwɔkɛ kɛ ɔbava yeamaa ye nee ɔ bo zo amra, wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ ɛnee Ebileham mumua ne ɛnlɛ ralɛ la.
44007006	Kɛ Nyamenle zele ye la ɛne, ‘Ɛ bo zo amra bahɔ maanɔne ahɔyɛ ahanra, bɛahile bɛ nyane toonwo ɛvolɛ ɛya nna.
44007007	Nzinlii mebadea menli zɔhane mɔɔ bɛbahɔzonle bɛ la, na bɛvi maanle zɔhane anu bɛbaye bɛ nwo na bɛarazonle me wɔ ɛke ala.’
44007008	Na Nyamenle manle Ebileham ngyekyeleɛ ɛhye anwo sɛkɛlɛneɛ, yemɔ a le mrenyanu nzonlɛyɛlɛ. Yemɔti Ebileham wole Ayezeke la ye kenle mɔtwɛ ne azo ɔyɛle ye mrenyanu nzonlɛ. Ayezeke wole Gyekɔbo na ɔyɛle ye mrenyanu nzonlɛ, yɛɛ Gyekɔbo wole mralɛ mrenya bulu nee nwiɔ ne, mɔɔ le yɛ nlenya mɔ titile ne, na ɔyɛle bɛ mrenyanu nzonlɛ.
44007009	“Dwosefi anwo yɛle ɔ mediema ne mɔ ɛya na ɔlua zolɛ bɛdɔnenle ye kɛ kanra bɛmanle bɛ nee ye hɔle Yigyibiti, na Nyamenle lile ɔ nzi,
44007010	na ɔyele ye ɔvile ye amaneɛnwunlɛ muala anu. Mɔɔ Dwosefi dwule Yigyibiti belemgbunli ne (Falo) anyunlu la, Nyamenle manle ye nrɛlɛbɛ na ɔlua zo ɔnyianle ɔ nyunlu. Na Yigyibiti belemgbunli yɛle ye amɛnlado wɔ ye maanle ne anu nee ye suakunlu ɛkɛ ne neavolɛ.
44007011	Mekɛ ne anu, sane nee ɛhɔne rale Yigyibiti nee Keena maanle ne mɔ anu, manle ɔyɛle abodelɛ kpalɛ, mɔɔ ɛnee yɛ nlenya mɔ ɛnnyia aleɛ wɔ ɛleka biala a.
44007012	Yemɔti mɔɔ Gyekɔbo dele kɛ aleɛ wɔ Yigyibiti la, ɔzoanle ɔ mra mrenya ne mɔ, mɔɔ le yɛ nlenya mɔ wɔ ɛkɛ.
44007013	Bɛhɔle mɔɔ tɔ zolɛ nwiɔ ne la, Dwosefi yele ɔ nwo hilele ɔ mediema ne mɔ, na ɔlua zolɛ Yigyibiti belemgbunli ne nwunle Dwosefi abusua ne.
44007014	Dwosefi vale nrɛlaleɛ hɔmanle ɔ ze Gyekɔbo kɛ ɔ nee ye sua nu amra amuala ɛrɛla Yigyibiti. Bɛle menli abulasuu nee nnu.
44007015	Yemɔti Gyekɔbo hɔle Yigyibiti, na ɛkɛ ne yɛɛ ɔwule na yɛ nlenya mɔ noko wule a.
44007016	Bɛdule bɛ avunli ne mɔ bɛrale Hyikɛm na bɛziele bɛ wɔ sɛka ne mɔɔ Ebileham dɔle vile Heemɔ abusua ne lɔ la anu.
44007017	“Mɔɔ mekɛ ne bikyele mɔɔ ɔwɔ kɛ Nyamenle akee ye ye ɛwɔkɛ ne mɔɔ ɔbɔle yɛ nlenya Ebileham la, ɛnee yɛ nlenya mɔ mɔɔ wɔ Yigyibiti la anwo ɛzo kpalɛ.
44007018	Nzinlii belemgbunli fofolɛ bie mɔɔ ɛnze Dwosefi anwo edwɛkɛ biala la rale ebia ne azo.
44007019	Ɔvale nrɛlɛbɛ adenle zo ɔbɔle yɛ mgbanyima ne mɔ abolɛ ɔmanle bɛvuandinle bɛ nlɔma bɛguale bɛmanle bɛwule.
44007020	Mekɛ ɛhye anu ala yɛɛ bɛwole Mosisi a, ɔle kakula kɛnlɛma kpalɛ! Na bɛvale ye bɛveale sua nu bɛnleanle ye toonwo ɔlile siane nsa.
44007021	Nzinlii mɔɔ bɛyele ye bɛdole ye lɔ la, Yigyibiti belemgbunli ne ara raalɛ hɔvale ye yɛle ɔ ra na ɔhɔtetele ye wɔ ye sua nu ɛkɛ.
44007022	Bɛhilehilele ye Yigyibiti nrɛlɛbɛ nee ye amaamuo ne amuala. Na ɔnyinle ɔyɛle sonlakpole wɔ edwɛkɛhanlɛ nee nyɛleɛ nu.
44007023	“Mɔɔ Mosisi lile ɛvolɛ abulanla la, ɔyɛle ye adwenle kɛ ɔkakpɔla ɔ mediema Yizilayɛma, yeanlea bɛ tɛnlabelɛ nu nee kɛ bɛsi bɛyɛ bɛ la.
44007024	Ɔnwunle bɛ nuhua ko kɛ Yigyibitinli bie ɛlɛyɛ ye asa, na ɔhɔliele ɔ ti na ɔbɔle Yigyibitinli ne ɔmanle ɔwule.
44007025	(Ɛnee ye adwenle a le kɛ ye menli ne kɛnwu kɛ Nyamenle balua ɔ nwo zo araye bɛ, na bɛannyia zɔhane ndelebɛbo ne.)
44007026	Ye alehyenlɛ nu ɔnwunle kɛ Yizilayɛma nwiɔ ɛlɛko, ɔhɔle kɛ ɔkakpɔda, na ɔzele bɛ kɛ, ‘O, ebiamɔ! Bɛle mediema; duzu ati a bɛlɛko bɛayɛ bɛ nwo asa ɛ?’
44007027	Na ko ne mɔɔ ɛnee ɛlɛyɛ ɔ gɔnwo asa la zuhunle Mosisi ziele ahane na ɔzele ye kɛ, ‘Nwane a dule wɔ kɛ ɛrali yɛ nwo zo belemgbunli na ɛyɛ yɛ ndɛnebuavolɛ a?
44007028	Anzɛɛ ɛkpondɛ kɛ ɛku medame noko, kɛmɔ anoma ɛhunle Yigyibitinli ne la ɔ?’
44007029	Mɔɔ Mosisi dele ɛhye la, ɔvi Yigyibiti ɔnriandile ɔhɔle Medea azɛlɛ zo. Ɔwole mralɛ mrenya nwiɔ wɔ ɛkɛ.
44007030	“Ɛvolɛ abulanla pɛle nu la, Nyamenle soanvolɛ yele ɔ nwo hilele Mosisi wɔ sendɔlɔra nu wɔ fienemgbole ne mɔɔ zua Boka Saenae la anu.
44007031	Mosisi nwunle ɛhye la ɔyɛle ye azibɛnwo na ɔbikyele nwolɛ kɛ ɔkanlea ye boɛ. Na ɔdele Awulae ane, ɔse,
44007032	‘Mame a mele ɛ nlenya mɔ Nyamenle ne, Ebileham, Ayezeke, yɛɛ Gyekɔbo Nyamenle ne a.’ Mosisi ahonle dule kpole na yeangulo kɛ ɔkɛmaa ɔ nye zo ɔkɛnlea deɛ ne bieko.
44007033	Na Awulae zele ye kɛ, ‘Yeye ɛ gyakɛ mgbɔlaboa ne, ɔluakɛ ɛleka mɔɔ ɛgyi la azɛlɛ ne le nwuanzanwuanza.
44007034	Menwu kɛ bɛlɛsi bɛayɛ me menli mɔɔ wɔ Yigyibiti la amumuyɛ la, yɛɛ mede bɛ ɛzunlɛ noko, na mera kɛ mebalie bɛ. Yemɔti bɛla na mesoa wɔ wɔ Yigyibiti.’
44007035	“Mosisi ɛhye mɔɔ bɛkpole ye, na bɛzele ye kɛ, ‘Nwane a yɛle wɔ belemgbunli nee ndɛnebuavolɛ wɔ yɛ nwo zo’ la, yemɔ ala a Nyamenle luale soanvolɛ ne mɔɔ vindele sendɔlɔra ne anu wɔ ɛsɛlɛ ne azo la anwo zo zoanle ye kɛ ɔli bɛ nwo zo belemgbunli na ɔlie bɛ a.
44007036	Ɔvale ɛvolɛ abulanla ɔyɛle nwanwane ninyɛne nee sɛkɛlɛneɛ wɔ Yigyibiti nee Nyevile Kɔkɔlɛ ne anloa, yɛɛ fienemgbole ne anu na ɔyele menli ne ɔvile Yigyibiti.
44007037	Mosisi ɛhye ala a zele Yizilayɛma kɛ, ‘Nyamenle baye ye kpɔmanvolɛ avi bɛ avinli yeazoa ye bɛ nwo, kɛmɔ ɔzoanle me la.’
44007038	Yemɔ yɛɛ mekɛ mɔɔ bɛyiale ɛsɛlɛ ne azo la ɔ nee Nyamenle soanvolɛ ne dendɛle wɔ Boka Saenae azo, na ɔliele Nyamenle nrɛlaleɛ ne mɔɔ ɛnɛ ɛradwu yɛ nwo zo la ɔrɛlɛle yɛ nlenya mɔ a.
44007039	“Na yɛ nlenya mɔ kpole kɛ bɛnrɛdie ye; bɛvale ye bɛziele ahane na bɛhulole kɛ anrɛɛ bɛkɛzia bɛkɛhɔ Yigyibiti.
44007040	Yemɔti bɛzele Sɛlɛvolɛ Aalɔn kɛ, ‘Yɛ awozonle maa bɛli yɛ nyunlu, na Mosisi ɛhye mɔɔ yele yɛ vile Yigyibiti la yɛnze mɔɔ ɛzi ɔ nwo zo a.’
44007041	Mekɛ ne anu bɛyɛle ɛnlankɛ ralɛ ananze na bɛvale bɛyɛle amonle bɛzɔle, bɛlile nwolɛ nwɔhoa na bɛyeyɛle deɛ ne mɔɔ bɛdabɛ bɛva bɛ sa bɛyɛ la.
44007042	Yemɔti Nyamenle hwenle ɔ nwo vile bɛ nwo na ɔyele bɛ ɔmanle kɛ bɛzonle anwomanyunlu ninyɛne, kɛmɔ bɛhɛlɛ ye wɔ Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛma mbuluku ne mɔ anu la. Ɔse, ‘Yizilayɛma, ɛvolɛ abulanla ne mɔɔ bɛlile wɔ ɛsɛlɛ ne azo la, bɛhunle nane bɛbɔle azu bɛmanle me ɔ?
44007043	Bɛzoale bɛ bozonle Molɛke ɛdanlɛ sua ne, yɛɛ bɛzoale bɛ ɛwɔlɔra bozonle Relɛfaa ɛdanlɛ sua ne noko; bɛdabɛ a bɛnwonle bɛ yɛɛ bɛzonlenle bɛ a. Yemɔti mebava bɛ meahɔ nlɔnu wɔ Babelɔn anzi lɔ.’
44007044	“Ɛsɛlɛ ne azo yɛɛ yɛ nlenya mɔ nyianle Ɛdanlɛ Sua ne mɔɔ kile kɛ Nyamenle de bɛ avinli la a. Bɛyɛle ye kɛmɔ Nyamenle zele Mosisi ala la, nzonlɛ mɔɔ Nyamenle vale hilele Mosisi la azo a ɔnleanle ɔzile a.
44007045	Nzinlii yɛ nlenya mɔ vale Ɛdanlɛ Sua ne mɔɔ bɛliele ye bɛ ze mɔ ɛkɛ ne la lile bɛ nyunlu na bɛ nee Dwɔhyua hɔle bɛhɔhonle bɛvale maanle maanle mɔɔ Nyamenle manle bɛlile bɛ nwo zo konim la. Na ɔwoale bɛ nwo ɛkɛ ne toonwo ɔradwule Devidi mekɛ zo.
44007046	Nyamenle anye zɔle Devidi na Devidi zɛlɛle Nyamenle kɛ ɔmaa ye adenle ɔmaa ɔzi sua ɔmaa Gyekɔbo Nyamenle ne.
44007047	Noko Sɔlɔmɔn a zile sua ne a.
44007048	“Noko akee Anwuma Anwuma Nyamenle ne ɛndɛnla sua mɔɔ menli ɛzi la anu. Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛma ɛha kɛ,
44007049	‘Awulae se, Anwuma le me belemgbunli ebia, yɛɛ azɛlɛ ye le me gyakɛ abo ebia. Duzu sua a bɛsi bɛamaa me a? Nienwu ɛleka a metɛnla mealie me ɛnwomenle a?
44007050	Anzɛɛ tɛ mame medame a menyɛle ɛhye mɔ amuala ɔ?’ ”
44007051	Sitivin hɔle zolɛ zele bɛ kɛ, “Bɛdabɛ, bɛ nzo yɛ se kpalɛ! Bɛnlie Nyamenle bɛnli fee; bɛkpɔla bɛ nzo anzi wɔ Nyamenle edwɛkɛ ne anwo! Bɛva bɛ nlenya mɔ agyakɛ, dahuu bɛko bɛtia Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne!
44007052	Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛ ko bɔbɔ ɛnle ɛkɛ mɔɔ bɛ mgbanyima andwazo ɔ nwo zo a. Bɛhunle menli mɔɔ Nyamenle zoanle bɛ kɛ bɛrabɔ ye Sonvolɛ Nwuanzanwuanza ne anwo nolo la amuala, na eza bɛye ɔdaye mumua ne bɛmaa bɛhu ye.
44007053	Bɛmɛ a bɛliele Nyamenle mɛla ne mɔɔ ye soanvolɛma nee ye rale la a; noko bɛanli zolɛ!”
44007054	Mekɛ mɔɔ ayiama ne ɛlɛtie Sitivin la ɛnee ɛya ɛwie bɛ wolowolo na bɛ nwo ndinli ɛlɛtwehwe bɛ kikilikikili zɛhae.
44007055	Na ɛnee Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne ɛyi Sitivin tɛkɛɛ la ati, ɔdole ɔ nye anwuma na ɔnwunle Nyamenle anyunlunyia ne na Gyisɛse gyi Nyamenle asa fema zo.
44007056	Na ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Bɛnlea, menwu kɛ anwuma ɛbuke, na menwu kɛ Sonla Ra ne gyi Nyamenle asa fema zo.”
44007057	Ɛkɛ ne ala bɛduoduale bɛ nzo, na bɛdeanle nu kokye la ɛnee bɛwɔ Sitivin anwo zo, nwee!
44007058	Bɛhwenle ye bɛ nee ye hɔle suakpole ne kandiba, na bɛzile ye awolɛ. Dasevolɛma ne mɔ yeyele bɛ adɛladeɛ manle kpavolɛ bie mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye Sɔɔlo la lɛle.
44007059	Mɔɔ bɛlɛsi Sitivin awolɛ la ɛnee ɔ ne la nu ɔlɛtea ɔfɛlɛ Awulae kɛ, “Awulae Gyisɛse, die me ɛkɛla!”
44007060	Akee ɔhotole na ɔdeanle nu kpole kɛ, “Awulae, fa ɛtane ɛhye kyɛ bɛ!” Ɔhanle ɛhye la, ɔwule.
44008001	Na Sɔɔlo liele ye ɛhunlɛ ne dole nu. Ɔvi kenle ko ne ala bɛbɔle ɔ bo kɛ bɛyɛ diedima mɔɔ wɔ Gyɛlusalɛm la kpɔdekpɔde. Yemɔti diedima ne amuala zandele; bie mɔ hɔle Dwudiya nee Samɛlea maanzinli ne mɔ anu, na ɔhale ɛzoanvolɛma ne ala.
44008002	Na Nyamenlezonlenlɛma bie mɔ hɔvale Sitivin hɔziele ye na bɛzunle ye kpole kpalɛ.
44008003	Na Sɔɔlo bɔle mɔdenle ala kɛ ɔkɛzɛkye Asɔne ne. Ɔwolowolole azua nu ɔhɔhwenle mraalɛ nee mrenya mɔɔ ɛzɔ diedi ne anu la na ɔvale bɛ ɔvindele ɔmanle bɛguale bɛ efiade.
44008004	Diedima ne bɔle asande la bɛnriandile bɛhɔle azua azua zo na bɛhɔhanle Edwɛkpa ne.
44008005	Felepe hɔle Samɛlea suakpole bie azo hɔhanle Mɛzaya ne anwo edwɛkɛ hilele menli mɔɔ wɔ ɛkɛ ne la.
44008006	Mɔɔ menli ne diele na bɛnwunle nwanwane ninyɛne mɔɔ ɔyɛle la, bɛ muala bɛliele bɛlile,
44008007	ɔluakɛ ɔmanle sunsum ɛtane dɔɔnwo deɛdeanle nu na bɛvile menli somaa ne ala anwo. Menli mɔɔ ɛdwidwe nee abuburama dele kpɔkɛ,
44008008	na suakpole ne azo amra lile fɛlɛko kpole.
44008009	Nrenya bie wɔ suakpole ne azo; bɛfɛlɛ ye Saemɔn. Nrenya ɛhye ɛva ngonyiayelɛ ɛha Samɛlea maanlema ne ɛzulolɛ, na ɔka kɛ ɔdaye ɔle sonlakpole.
44008010	Awie biala mɔɔ wɔ maanle ne anu, mgbanyinli nee ngakula muala tie ye. Bɛse, “Sonla ɛhye a le Nyamenle tumi ne mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye ‘Tumi Bedevinli’ la.”
44008011	Ɔvale ngonyia ɔdanle bɛ nye zo na ɔmanle bɛzulole ye kpalɛ na bɛliele ye bɛlile.
44008012	Na mɔɔ bɛdele Edwɛkpa ne mɔɔ fane Nyamenle Belemgbunlililɛ ne anwo nee Gyisɛse Kelaese duma ne mɔɔ Felepe hanle nwolɛ edwɛkɛ la, mraalɛ nee mrenya kɔsɔɔti liele lile na bɛmanle bɛzɔnenle bɛ.
44008013	Saemɔn ɔdaye ɔliele ɔlile na bɛzɔnenle ye. Nzinlii ɔvale ɔ nwo ɔbɔnenle Felepe, na ɔ nee ye luale. Mɔɔ ɔnwunle sɛkɛlɛneɛ nee nwanwane ninyɛne mɔɔ Felepe yɛle la, ɔyɛle ye azibɛnwo kpole.
44008014	Ɛzoanvolɛma ne dele wɔ Gyɛlusalɛm kɛ menli mɔɔ wɔ Samɛlea la ɛzɔ Nyamenle edwɛkɛ ne anu la bɛzoanle Pita nee Dwɔn wɔ lɔ.
44008015	Bɛhɔle la bɛzɛlɛle Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne bɛmanle diedima ne mɔ.
44008016	Ɔluakɛ ɛnee bɛzɔne bɛ wɔ Awulae Gyisɛse duma nu ɛdeɛ, noko Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne ɛtɛbale bɛ nwo zo.
44008017	Pita nee Dwɔn vale bɛ sa guale menli ne mɔ ati zo zɛlɛle, na bɛnyianle Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne.
44008018	-
44008019	Mɔɔ Saemɔn nwunle kɛ ɛzoanvolɛma ne fa bɛ sa gua menli ti zo a bɛnyia Nyamenle Sunsum ne la, ɔhanle kɛ, “Bɛlie ezukoa na bɛmaa medame noko tumi ɛhye bie, amaa awie biala mɔɔ menwɔva me sa menwɔgua ɔ ti zo la anyia Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne bie.”
44008020	Na Pita buale ye kɛ, “Abule ɛbu wɔ nee wɔ ezukoa ne amuala, kɛ ɛkɛdwenle kɛ bɛfa ezukoa a bɛtɔ Nyamenle ahyɛlɛdeɛ a!
44008021	Ɛyɛ yɛ gyima ɛhye bie a ɔnrɛyɛ boɛ, ɔluakɛ ɛnli nɔhalɛ wɔ Nyamenle anyunlu.
44008022	Zɔhane ati, nu ɛ nwo wɔ wɔ amumuyɛ adwenle ɛhye anwo, na sɛlɛ Awulae kɛ saa ɔyɛ na ɔkɛyɛ boɛ a, ɔva wɔ ɛtane ɔhyɛ wɔ kɛ wɔdwenle zɔhane a.
44008023	Ɔluakɛ menwu kɛ ɛle anyebolo kpole kpalɛ na ɛtane ɛbɔ wɔ kpanwu.”
44008024	Saemɔn zele Pita nee Dwɔn kɛ, “Mekpa bɛ kyɛlɛ, bɛzɛlɛ Awulae bɛmaa me, amaa mɔɔ bɛha la biala anzi me nwo zo.”
44008025	Nzinlii Pita nee Dwɔn hanle Edwɛkpa ne, lile Awulae anwo daselɛ, na bɛziale bɛhɔle Gyɛlusalɛm. Bɛkɔ la bɛvale Samɛlea namunamu ne mɔ dɔɔnwo azo bɛhanle Edwɛkpa ne.
44008026	Awulae soanvolɛ dendɛle zele Felepe kɛ, “Kɔ nyiakɛ nehane, wɔ Gyɛlusalɛm nee Gaza adenle ne azo.” (Adenle ɛhye la ɛsɛlɛ zo; ɛnɛ bɛnva zolɛ.)
44008027	-
44008028	Na Felepe zile nu hɔle. Ɛnee Yiteyopeanli kpanyinli bie mɔɔ le abɔlɔba kpanyinli mɔɔ nea Yiteyopea Belemgbunli Raalɛ ne gya zo la ɔdaye ɔlua adenle ne azo. Ɔhɔle Nyamenle ɛzonlenlɛ wɔ Gyɛlusalɛm na ɔde ye ehwili nu yezia ɔlɛkɔ ye sua zo. Mɔɔ ɔde ehwili ne anu la ɛnee ɔlɛkenga Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛ Ayezaya nwoma ne.
44008029	Sunsum ne zele Felepe kɛ, “Twe bikye ehwili ne.”
44008030	Yemɔti Felepe nriandile hɔle ehwili ne anwo, na ɔdele kɛ ɔlɛkenga Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛ Ayezaya nwoma ne, na ɔbizale ye kɛ, “Asoo ɛte mɔɔ ɛlɛkenga la abo?”
44008031	Nrenya ne buale ye kɛ, “Na kɛ mesi meyɛ mete ɔ bo ɛ? Kyesɛ awie kilehile nu kile me.” Na ɔmanle Felepe radɛnlanle ehwili ne anu wɔ ɔ nwo ɛkɛ ne.
44008032	Ɛleka mɔɔ ɛnee ɔlɛkenga la se, “Ɔle kɛ boane mɔɔ bɛ nee ye ɛhɔ ahunleɛ, anzɛɛ boaneralɛ mɔɔ bɛlɛpepɛ ye enrinli la, yeambuke ɔ nloa.
44008033	Bɛgolole ɔ nwo, bɛbuale ye mgbɔvondɛne, awie ɛnrɛhola ɔ bo zo amra kile, ɔluakɛ bɛpɛle ye ɛbɛla ne sinli wɔ ewiade ye anu.”
44008034	Na abɔlɔba ne bizale Felepe kɛ, “Kile ɛhye anu kile me. Nwane anwo edwɛkɛ a Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛ ne ɛlɛka a, ɔdaye ɔ nwo edwɛkɛ yɛɛ ɔlɛka a anzɛɛ awie gyɛne ɔ?”
44008035	Na Felepe bɔle ɔ bo wɔ Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ɛhye azo, na ɔhanle Edwɛkpa ne mɔɔ fane Gyisɛse anwo la ɔhilele ye.
44008036	Mɔɔ bɛlua adenle zo bɛlɛkɔ la, bɛrale azule bie anloa, na nrenya ne zele Felepe kɛ, “Nea, nzule ɛ! Duzu a si wɔ adenle mɔɔ ɔmaa ɛsɔne me a ɔnyɛ boɛ a?” [
44008037	Felepe zele ye kɛ, “Saa ɛdie ɛdi bɔkɔɔ wɔ wɔ ahonle nu a, bɛsɔne wɔ a ɔyɛ boɛ.” Ɔbuale ye kɛ, “Ɛhɛe, medie medi kɛ Gyisɛse Kelaese a le Nyamenle Ara ne a.”]
44008038	Nrenya ne manle ehwili ne gyinlanle, ɔ nee Felepe bɛhɔle azule ne anu na ɔmanle Felepe zɔnenle ye.
44008039	Mɔɔ bɛvi azule ne anu bɛvole file zo la, Sunsum ne vale Felepe minliminlinle. Nrenya ne annwu ye bieko, na ɔvale fɛlɛko ɔhɔle.
44008040	Felepe hɔvindele Azotɛse na ɔhɔkpɔsale namunamu ne mɔ anu ɔhanle Edwɛkpa ne toonwo ɔradwule Sizalia.
44009001	Mekɛ ne anu ɛnee Sɔɔlo lɛ ye kɔdiawu adwenle ne tɛgyegye Awulae ɛdoavolɛma ne. Ɔhɔle Sɛlɛvolɛ Kpanyinli ne ɛkɛ
44009002	na ɔhɔliele tumi ngɛlɛta kɛ ɔkɔ Dɛmasekɛse nyianu azua ne mɔ anu yeahɔhye bɛdabɛ mraalɛ nee mrenya mɔɔ bɛlua Awulae Adenle ne azo la, yeakyekye bɛ, ɔ nee bɛ ara Gyɛlusalɛm.
44009003	Mɔɔ ɔlua adenle zo na ɔka ekyii ɔdwu Dɛmasekɛse la, wienyi kpole bie vi anwomanyunlu rabɔle yiale ye.
44009004	Ɔpɛle ɔfinle na ɔdele kɛ ɛnelɛ bie se, “Sɔɔlo! Sɔɔlo! Duzu ati a ɛlɛyɛ me kpɔdekpɔde zɛhae ɛ?”
44009005	Na ɔbizale kɛ, “Awulae, ɛdawɔ nwane ɔ?” Ɛnelɛ ne buale ye kɛ, “Medame a mele Gyisɛse mɔɔ ɛlɛyɛ me kpɔdekpɔde la.
44009006	Dwazo kɔ suakpole ne azo na bɛbahile wɔ debie mɔɔ ɔwɔ kɛ ɛyɛ la.”
44009007	Menli mɔɔ nee Sɔɔlo lua la dɔle mumule, bɛandɛ bɛ nloa anu, ɔluakɛ bɛdele ɛnelɛ ne, na bɛannwu awie biala.
44009008	Sɔɔlo vi azɛlɛ ne anwo dwazole la ɛnee ɔ nye ɛzi. Yemɔti bɛsosɔle ɔ sa bɛ nee ye hɔle Dɛmasekɛse.
44009009	Kenle nsa, ɛnee ɔnnwu debie, yɛɛ ɔnli debie na yeanlo nzule.
44009010	Kelaese ɛdoavolɛ bie wɔ Dɛmasekɛse, bɛfɛlɛ ye Ananayase. Wɔ ɛnyelɛzodeɛnwunlɛ nu, ɔdele kɛ Awulae se, “Ananayase!” Ɔliele zolɛ kɛ, “Awulae, medame ɛ.”
44009011	Na Awulae zele ye kɛ, “Kɔ kpalɛ ne mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye ‘Fɔɔnwo’ la azo, na kɔ Dwudase sua nu, na biza awie bie mɔɔ vi Taasɛse na bɛfɛlɛ ye Sɔɔlo la. Ɔgua zolɛ ɔlɛyɛ nzɛlɛlɛ,
44009012	na wɔ ɛnyelɛzodeɛnwunlɛ nu yenwu nrenya bie mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye Ananayase la kɛ yera ɔ nwo ɛkɛ yerava ɔ sa yegua ɔ ti zo yemaa yenwu debie bieko.”
44009013	Ananayase zele kɛ, “Awulae, menli dɔɔnwo ɛha sonla ɛhye anwo edwɛkɛ nee debie mɔɔ yeva yehile wɔ menli ne mɔɔ wɔ Gyɛlusalɛm la ɛhile me.
44009014	Na yera ɛke kɛ ɔlɛ tumi ngɛlɛta vi sɛlɛvolɛ mgbanyinli ne mɔ ɛkɛ kɛ ɔbahye bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛsonle wɔ la amuala.”
44009015	Awulae zele ye kɛ, “Wɔmɔ kɔ, na meye ye kɛ ɔrayɛ me sonvolɛ, ɔva me duma ɔhɔ bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnle Dwuuma la anu nee arelemgbunli nee Yizilayɛma kɔsɔɔti anwo zo.
44009016	Na medame mebahile ye amaneɛ mɔɔ ɔbanwu ye wɔ me duma nu la.”
44009017	Yemɔti Ananayase hɔle sua nu ɛkɛ, ɔvale ɔ sa ɔguale Sɔɔlo ati zo na ɔzele ye kɛ, “Adiema Sɔɔlo, Awulae Gyisɛse, mɔɔ ɛlua adenle zo ɛlɛba ɛke mɔɔ ɔyele ɔ nwo ɔhilele wɔ la ɛzoa me ɛ nwo ɛke, amaa wɔanwu debie bieko na Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne ara ɛ nwo zo.”
44009018	Ɛkɛ ne ala debie bie mɔɔ le kɛ fɛlɛ nwo abonle la vi Sɔɔlo anye zo guale aze, na ɔnwunle debie bieko; na ɔdwazole ɔmanle bɛzɔnenle ye.
44009019	Akee ɔlile debie na ɔ nwo gyinlanle ye. Sɔɔlo nee ɛdoavolɛma ne dɛnlanle mekɛ ekyi wɔ Dɛmasekɛse,
44009020	na ɔhɔle nyianu azua ne mɔ anu ɔhɔbɔle nolo kɛ Gyisɛse, “Yemɔ a ɔle Nyamenle Ara ne a.”
44009021	Ɔyɛle bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛdele ye edwɛkɛ ne la azibɛnwo kpole na bɛbizale kɛ, “Na tɛ sonla ɛhye a ɛlɛkuhu menli mɔɔ bɔ Gyisɛse duma wɔ Gyɛlusalɛm la ɔ? Anzɛɛ yeamba ɛke kɛ ɔbahye bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛbɔ Gyisɛse duma la yeahɔmaa sɛlɛvolɛ mgbanyinli ne mɔ ɔ?”
44009022	Na Sɔɔlo nyianle anwosesebɛ kpalɛ wɔ ye edwɛkɛhanlɛ nu na ɔholale ɔhilehilele nu kɛ Gyisɛse a le Mɛzaya ne, ɔmanle ɔrale kɛ Dwuuma bɔbɔ mɔɔ wɔ Dɛmasekɛse la dɔle mumule wɔ nwolɛ.
44009023	Kenle guale nu ekyii la, Dwuuma ne hɔle akpamo kɛ bɛku ye,
44009024	na Sɔɔlo dele. Dwuuma ne dɛle ye wɔ sua ne azo nlenkɛ mgbole ne mɔ anloa nɔɔzo nee ewiazo kɛ bɛ sa kɛha ye bɛkɛhu ye.
44009025	Na kenle ko nɔɔzo Sɔɔlo ɛdoavolɛma ne vale ye dɛnlanle kɛndɛne nu, vale ye wulale suakpole ne bane ne tokule bie anu, na bɛliele ye bɛtɛɛ bɛdwulale ye aze wɔ suakpole ne bane ne anzi lɔ.
44009026	Sɔɔlo hɔle Gyɛlusalɛm na ɔyɛle kɛ ɔlɛ ɔ nwo ɔkabɔ ɛdoavolɛma ne anwo la bɛanlie ye bɛanli, na bɛzulole ye.
44009027	Zɔhane ati Baanabase raboale ye na ɔ nee ye hɔle ɛzoanvolɛma ne ɛkɛ. Ɔhilehilele kɛ Sɔɔlo zile nwunle Awulae wɔ adevinli ne na Awulae dendɛle hilele ye, nee Sɔɔlo ahonle mɔɔ zile na ɔvale Gyisɛse duma ɔbɔle Edwɛkpa ne nolo wɔ Dɛmasekɛse la amuala ɔhilele bɛ.
44009028	Yemɔti akee bɛmanle Sɔɔlo nee bɛ luale, na ɔyele ɔ nyunlu wienyi ɔvale Awulae duma ɔbɔle Edwɛkpa ne nolo wɔ Gyɛlusalɛm amuala.
44009029	Eza ɔ nee Dwuuma mɔɔ ka Giliki la zule kpolera ɔmanle bɛnyianle adwenle kɛ bɛku ye.
44009030	Mɔɔ diedima ne bie mɔ dele ɛhye la, bɛvale Sɔɔlo bɛhɔle Sizalia na bɛmanle ɔhɔle Taasɛse.
44009031	Ɔlua Sɔɔlo ɛhakyilɛ zo akee Asɔne ne mɔɔ wɔ Dwudiya, Galeli, yɛɛ Samɛlea la nyianle anzonudwolɛ na ɔnyinle. Na ɔlua Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne moalɛ zo Asɔne ne nyianle anwosesebɛ, menli dɔɔnwo rale nu na bɛvale Nyamenlezulolɛ bɛluale.
44009032	Pita hɔle ɛleka dɔɔnwo, na kenle ko ɔhɔkpɔlale Nyamenle menli ne mɔɔ wɔ Leda la.
44009033	Ɛkɛ ne yɛɛ ɔhɔnwunle nrenya bie mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye Yiniase la kɛ yedwidwe na yela ɛleka ko toonwo ɛvolɛ mɔtwɛ.
44009034	Na Pita zele ye kɛ, “Yiniase, Gyisɛse Kelaese ɛyɛ wɔ ayile. Dwazo na nyenya wɔ ɛkpa ne.” Na ɛkɛ ne ala Yiniase dwazole.
44009035	Menli mɔɔ wɔ Leda nee Hyɛlɔn la nwunle nrenya ne na bɛhakyile bɛdoale Awulae.
44009036	Dwɔpa noko, raalɛ bie wɔ ɛkɛ, bɛfɛlɛ ye Tabeta. (Ye duma ne Giliki nu a le Dɔkase.) Ɔle ɛdoavolɛ. Raalɛ ɛhye vale ye mekɛ yɛle ahunlunyele gyima na ɔboale ehyianvolɛma.
44009037	Mekɛ ne anu ɔ nwo dole ye na ɔwule. Bɛbiale ye na bɛdedale ye wɔ ɛbolɔnsane zo ekpumgbunli ne mɔ bie anu.
44009038	Dwɔpa nee Leda anwa biala. Yemɔti mɔɔ diedima ne mɔɔ wɔ Dwɔpa la dele kɛ Pita wɔ Leda la, bɛzoanle menli nwiɔ bɛmanle bɛhɔvale nrɛlaleɛ bɛhɔmanle ye kɛ. “Yɛsɛlɛ wɔ, bɔ mɔdenle ka ɛ nwo bɛla.”
44009039	Pita noko anzi aze na ɔ nee bɛ hɔle. Ɔhɔdwule la, bɛ nee ye hɔle ɛbolɔnsane ne azo ɛleka mɔɔ bɛdeda ye la. Ahunlanvolɛ mraalɛ mɔɔ Dɔkase ɛyɛ bɛ nyele ɛlɛ la vale ɛzunlɛ rabɔle yiale Pita na bɛvale adɛladeɛ mɔɔ Dɔkase kpomgbale hyɛle bɛ, wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ ɔde aze la bɛhilele ye.
44009040	Pita vindele bɛ, na ɔhotole ɔzɛlɛle; ɔhakyile ɔ nye funli ne anwo na ɔzele kɛ, “Tabeta, dwazo!” Raalɛ ne bukele ɔ nye na ɔnwunle Pita la, ɔmanle ɔ nwo zo ɔdɛnlanle aze.
44009041	Pita zɔle ye manle ɔdwazole ɔgyinlanle. Akee ɔvɛlɛle diedima ne nee ahunlanvolɛ mraalɛ ne mɔ na ɔvale ye ɔmanle bɛ.
44009042	Edwɛkɛ ɛhye kpondenle Dwɔpa amuala, na menli somaa ne ala liele Awulae lile.
44009043	Pita dɛnlanle Dwɔpa hyɛle dɔɔnwo wɔ nrenya bie mɔɔ yɛ nwoma nwo gyima mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye Saemɔn la sua nu.
44010001	Nrenya bie wɔ Sizalia, bɛfɛlɛ ye Kɔnileɛse. Ɔle Wulomu Ɛlɔne ekpunli ne mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye “Yetalea” la safohyenle.
44010002	Ɔle sonla mɔɔ sulo Nyamenle a, yɛɛ ɔ nee ye sua nu amra amuala bɛsonle Nyamenle. Ɔ sa do Dwuuma ehyianvolɛma anwo zo, yɛɛ ɔnva ye nzɛlɛlɛ wɔ Nyamenle anyunlu ɔndo aze.
44010003	Kenle ko ewiazo kɛyɛ dɔne nsa ɔhɔle nzɛlɛlɛ ɛyɛlɛ la ɔnwunle ɛnyelɛzodeɛnwunlɛ. Nyamenle soanvolɛ ragyinlanle ɔ nyunlu ɛkɛ na ɔvɛlɛle ye kɛ, “Kɔnileɛse!”
44010004	Ɔnwunle Nyamenle soanvolɛ ne la, ɛzulolɛ hanle ye na ɔhanle kɛ, “Yɛmenle, duzu edwɛkɛ ɔ?” Nyamenle soanvolɛ ne buale ye kɛ, “Nyamenle ɛde wɔ nzɛlɛlɛ na yenwu wɔ ahunlunyele gyima ne amuala.
44010005	Yemɔti soa maa bɛhɔ Dwɔpa bɛhɔva nrenya bie mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye Saemɔn Pita la.
44010006	Ɔde nrenya bie mɔɔ yɛ nwoma nwo gyima mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye Saemɔn la sua nu, wɔ nyevile ne anloa ɛkɛ ne ala.”
44010007	Mɔɔ Nyamenle soanvolɛ ne wiele la ɔhɔle. Kɔnileɛse vɛlɛle ye sua nu ɛkɛ ne ngɛkɛlɛ ne mɔ nwiɔ yɛɛ sogyanli ko mɔɔ sulo Nyamenle na ɔboka menli mɔɔ sinza ɔdaye Kɔnileɛse la anwo la,
44010008	ɔhanle mɔɔ ɛzi la amuala ɔhilele bɛ na ɔzoanle bɛ wɔ Dwɔpa.
44010009	Aleɛ hyenle, na mɔɔ bɛlua adenle zo na ɔka ekyii bɛdwu Dwɔpa la, ɛnee Pita ɔdaye yevo yehɔ sua ne mɔɔ ɔwɔ nu la ati zo anwuma kɛ ɔkayɛ ewiazo nzɛlɛlɛ.
44010010	Ɛhɔne hunle ye na mɔɔ ɔlɛkendɛ aleɛ mɔɔ bɛlɛto bɛamaa ye la, ɔ nye hɔle dɔɔnwo na ɔnwunle
44010011	kɛ anwuma ɛbuke, na bɛlɛdwula debie bie mɔɔ le kɛ ɛdanlɛ mɔɔ bɛsosɔ ɔ nloa nna ne amuala anu la aze.
44010012	Wɔ deɛ ne anu, ɔnwunle nane, nwɔlɛ, yɛɛ nloma ngakyile dɔɔnwo.
44010013	Na ɛnelɛ bie zele ye kɛ, “Pita, dwazo na ku bie di!”
44010014	Na Pita zele kɛ, “Kyɛkyɛ, Awulae, debie mɔɔ nwolɛ ɛnde na ɔle kyibadeɛ la, metɛdile bie ɛlɛ.”
44010015	Ɛnelɛ ne eza zele ye kɛ, “Debie mɔɔ Nyamenle ɛde nwolɛ la, mmaka kɛ nwolɛ ɛnde.”
44010016	Ɛhye zile fane nsa, na bɛhwenle deɛ ne bɛhɔle anwuma.
44010017	Mɔɔ Pita ɛlɛdwenle mɔɔ yenwu ye la anwo la, ɛnee menli mɔɔ Kɔnileɛse zoanle bɛ la noko ɛbizebiza dedee bɛnwu Saemɔn sua nu na bɛra, bɛwɔ anuhɔlɛ ɛkɛ ne.
44010018	Bɛvɛlɛle na bɛbizale kɛ, “Ɛyɛvolɛ bie wɔ ɛke mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye Saemɔn Pita ɔ?”
44010019	Mɔɔ Pita gua zolɛ tɛdwenle mɔɔ yenwu ye la anwo na ɔkulo kɛ ɔte ɔ bo la, Nyamenle Sunsum ne zele ye kɛ, “Nea, menli nsa ɛra ɛke bakpondɛ wɔ.
44010020	Yemɔti dwu aze kɔyia bɛ; mmadwenle nwolɛ, ɛ nee bɛ ɛhɔ. Ɔluakɛ medame a mezoa bɛ a.”
44010021	Pita dwule aze na ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Ahenle mɔɔ bɛkpondɛ ye la a le medame. Na bɛ ɛdialɛ nu ɛ?”
44010022	Bɛbuale ye kɛ, “Safohyenle Kɔnileɛse a ɛzoa yɛ a. Ɔle sonlakpalɛ somaa, ɔsulo Nyamenle, yɛɛ Dwuuma amuala bu ye bie kpalɛ. Ɛkenle Nyamenle soanvolɛ bie zele ye kɛ ɔrava wɔ ɔhɔ ye sua nu, na ɔdie mɔɔ ɛlɛ ye ɛka wɔahile ye la.”
44010023	Na Pita vale bɛ hɔle sua nu na ɔmanle bɛ ɛleka bɛlale. Aleɛ hyenle la ɔboɔboale ɔ nwo na ɔ nee bɛ hɔle; diedima bie mɔ mɔɔ wɔ Dwɔpa la nee ye hɔle.
44010024	Bɛzile nu la ye alehyenlɛ nu yɛɛ bɛdwule Sizalia a, na bɛhɔdole kɛ Kɔnileɛse nee ye sua nu amra, nee ɔ gɔnwo mɔ mɔɔ yedo ɛsalɛ yevɛlɛ bɛ la ɛwie yia na bɛlɛkendɛ ye.
44010025	Kɔnileɛse yiale Pita wɔ anlenkɛ ne anloa, ɔdule ɔdɔle ɔ gyakɛ anu na ɔzonlenle ye.
44010026	Na Pita manle ɔdwazole na ɔzele ye kɛ, “Dwazo na medame mele sonla.”
44010027	Mɔɔ Pita anloa wɔ zolɛ ɔlɛtendɛ yeahile Kɔnileɛse la, bɛhɔwolole sua ne anu, na ɔnwunle kɛ menli dɔɔnwo kpalɛ ɛrayia.
44010028	Na ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Bɛdabɛ bɛze ye wienyi kɛ wɔ Dwuu ɛzonlenlɛ ne anu, bɛmmaa adenle bɛmmaa yɛ nee bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnle Dwuuma la ɛnfonla. Noko Nyamenle ɛye ɛhile me kɛ memmabu awie biala kɛ ɔ nwo ɛnde.
44010029	Ɛhye ati yɛɛ bɛzoanle kɛ bɛrava me la meandwenlehwenle me bo aze na mera a. Yemɔti mebiza bɛ kɛ duzu ati a bɛravale me a?”
44010030	Kɔnileɛse zele ye kɛ, “Ɛnɛ le kenle nna, kɛyɛ bekezɛ ala, ɛnee melɛyɛ ewiazo dɔne nsa nzɛlɛlɛ wɔ me sua ye anu, na nrenya bie mɔɔ wula tɛladeɛ fufule la ragyinlanle me nyunlu ɛkɛ
44010031	na ɔzele me kɛ, ‘Kɔnileɛse! Wɔ nzɛlɛlɛ ɛdwu Nyamenle anyunlu na yenwu wɔ ahunlunyele gyima ne amuala.
44010032	Yemɔti soa awie wɔ Dwɔpa maa ɔhɔva nrenya ne mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye Saemɔn Pita la. Ɔ nee Saemɔn mɔɔ yɛ nwoma nwo gyima la a de a, wɔ nyevilenloa ɛkɛ.’
44010033	Ɛhye ati a menzoanle kɛ bɛrava wɔ a, yɛɛ ɛdawɔ noko wɔandwenlehwenle ɛ bo aze na wɔra a. Yemɔti yɛ muala yɛyia wɔ Nyamenle anyunlu ɛke kɛ yɛtie mɔɔ Awulae ɛva ɛmaa wɔ kɛ ɛraha ɛhile yɛ la.”
44010034	Na Pita zele bɛ kɛ, “Nɔhalɛ, menwu ye wienyi kɛ Nyamenle bu menli kɔsɔɔti kɛ bɛsɛ.
44010035	Awie biala mɔɔ sulo ye na ɔdi boɛ la ɔdie ye ɔto nu, yɛɛ ɔnnea ɛleka mɔɔ ɔvi nee maanle holɛ ko mɔɔ ɔvi nu la.
44010036	Bɛdabɛ bɛze kɛ ɔzile mɔɔ ɔlua Gyisɛse Kelaese, mɔɔ le menli kɔsɔɔti Awulae la anwo zo Nyamenle vale anzonudwolɛ nwo Edwɛkpa ne rɛlɛle Yizilayɛma la.
44010037	Bɛbɔle Edwɛkpa ɛhye nolobɔlɛ bo wɔ Galeli, na bɛbɔle ye Dwudiya amuala wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ Dwɔn bɔle ɛzɔnenlɛ nwo nolo wiele la.
44010038	Bɛze Gyisɛse mɔɔ vi Nazalɛte la anwo edwɛkɛ nee kɛ Nyamenle zile vale Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne wulale ye na ɔmanle ye tumi la amuala. Gyisɛse kpɔsale ɛleka dɔɔnwo yɛle ahunlunyele gyima, na ɔyɛle bɛdabɛ mɔɔ Abɔnsam ɛlɛfa ye tumi ne agyegye bɛ la ayile, ɔluakɛ Nyamenle nee ye lua.
44010039	Yɛdi mɔɔ ɔyɛle ye wɔ Yizilayɛ maanle ne anu nee Gyɛlusalɛm la amuala anwo daselɛ. Bɛbɔle ye meanubaka nu bɛhunle ye.
44010040	Na ye kenle nsa ne azo Nyamenle dwazole ye vile mɔwuamra anu na ɔmanle ɔyele ɔ nwo ɔhilele
44010041	yɛmɛ mɔɔ Nyamenle ɛye yɛ kɛ yɛli daselɛ la. Yɛ nee ye lile, nlonle, wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ ɔdwazole ɔvile ewule nu la,
44010042	na ɔzele yɛ kɛ yɛha ɔ nwo Edwɛkpa ne yɛhile menli kɔsɔɔti, na yɛli ɔ nwo daselɛ kɛ yemɔ yɛɛ Nyamenle ɛyɛ ye mɔwuamra nee anyewɔzoamra ndɛnebuavolɛ a.
44010043	Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛma amuala ka ɔ nwo edwɛkɛ kɛ awie biala mɔɔ kɛlie ye kɛli la, ɔlua ye duma ne tumi zo bɛkɛva ye ɛtane bɛkɛhyɛ ye.”
44010044	Mɔɔ Pita anloa wɔ zolɛ ɛlɛtendɛ la, Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne rawolole bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛlɛtie edwɛkɛ ne la.
44010045	Ɛhye yɛle Dwuuma mɔɔ ɛlie Edwɛkpa ne ɛli na bɛ nee Pita vi Dwɔpa rale la azibɛnwo kpole kɛ Nyamenle Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ahyɛlɛdeɛ ne ɛra menli mɔɔ ɛnle Dwuuma la noko anwo zo a.
44010046	Ɔluakɛ bɛdele kɛ ɛnee bɛlɛka ɛdendɛlɛ ngakyile bɛahanvo Nyamenle ye bedevinli mɔɔ ɔde la. Na Pita manle ɔ ne zo zele kɛ,
44010047	“Menli ɛhye mɔ ɛnyia Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne, kɛmɔ yɛnyianle ye ala la. Anzɛɛ awie kɛhola kɛze kɛ ɔnle kɛ yɛfa nzule yɛsɔne bɛ ɔ?”
44010048	Yemɔti ɔmanle bɛzɔnenle bɛ wɔ Gyisɛse Kelaese duma nu. Na bɛzɛlɛle ye bɛ nee ye dɛnlanle mekɛ ekyi.
44011001	Ɛzoanvolɛma ne nee diedima mɔɔ wɔ Dwudiya la dele kɛ menli mɔɔ ɛnle Dwuuma la noko ɛlie Nyamenle edwɛkɛ ne ɛli.
44011002	Yemɔti mɔɔ Pita hɔle Gyɛlusalɛm la, bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛmɛ bɛ adwenle wɔ mrenyanu nzonlɛyɛlɛ zo la dendɛle ye nwolɛ,
44011003	na bɛbizale ye kɛ, “Kɛ ɔyɛle mɔɔ ɛhɔle menli mɔɔ ɛtɛyɛle bɛ mrenyanu nzonlɛ la sua nu na ɛ nee bɛ dole bɛ sa ɛyɛba ko anu ɛ?”
44011004	Na Pita bɔle ɔ bo hanle edwɛkɛ ne nee mɔɔ zile la amuala hilele bɛ.
44011005	Ɔse, “Ɛnee mewɔ suakpole ne mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye Dwɔpa la azo melɛyɛ nzɛlɛlɛ, na me nye hɔle dɔɔnwo, na menwunle debie bie mɔɔ le kɛ ɛdanlɛ mɔɔ bɛdedɛ ɔ nloa nna ne amuala anu la kɛ ɔvi anwuma na bɛlɛdwula ye aze, na ɔradwule me nyunlu ɛkɛ ne la, ɔgyinlanle.
44011006	Mɔɔ meneanle nuhua la menwunle nane, nwɔlɛ, yɛɛ nloma ngakyile wɔ nuhua.
44011007	Na mendele kɛ ɛnelɛ bie se, ‘Pita, dwazo na ku bie di!’
44011008	Na menganle kɛ, ‘Kyɛkyɛ, Awulae, debie mɔɔ le kyibadeɛ anzɛɛ nwolɛ ɛnde la metɛdile bie ɛlɛ.’
44011009	Na ɛnelɛ ne vi anwuma rale bieko kɛ, ‘Debie biala mɔɔ Nyamenle ɛde nwolɛ la mmabu ye kɛ nwolɛ ɛnde!’
44011010	Ɛhye zile fane nsa, na nzinlii bɛhwenle ye bɛhɔle anwuma.
44011011	Mekɛ ne anu ala yɛɛ menli nsa mɔɔ ɛnee bɛzoa bɛ vi Sizalia wɔ me nwo ɛkɛ ne la rale sua nu ɛkɛ a.
44011012	Na Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne zele me kɛ me nee bɛ ɛhɔ, memmasi aze. Mediema nsia ɛhye mɔ mɔɔ vi Dwɔpa la bokale me nwo manle yɛ muala yɛhɔle Sizalia wɔ Kɔnileɛse sua nu.
44011013	Kɔnileɛse hanle kɛ ɔzile ɔnwunle Nyamenle soanvolɛ bie wɔ sua ne anu na ɔzele ye kɛ, ‘Soa maa bɛhɔ Dwɔpa bɛhɔva nrenya bie mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye Saemɔn Pita la,
44011014	na ɔbaha edwɛkɛ mɔɔ kɛmaa ɛ nee wɔ sua nu amra kɛnyia ngoane la.’
44011015	Na membɔle ɔ bo kɛ metendɛ ala la yɛɛ Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne rale bɛ nwo zo, kɛmɔ mɔlebɛbo ne ɔrale yɛ nwo zo la a.
44011016	Na mengakyele mɔɔ Awulae hanle la, ɔse, ‘Dwɔn vale nzule a zɔnenle a, na bɛmɛ, bɛbava Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne a bɛazɔne bɛ a.’
44011017	Na saa Nyamenle ɛmaa bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnle Dwuuma la ahyɛlɛdeɛ, kɛmɔ mɔlebɛbo ne ɔvale ɔhyɛle yɛ kɛ yɛlie Awulae Gyisɛse Kelaese yɛli la a, ɛnee mame a le nwane, mɔɔ ɔwɔ kɛ metua Nyamenle adenle a!”
44011018	Bɛdele ɛhye la, bɛgyakyile bɛ nvefenu ne na bɛyeyɛle Nyamenle bɛzele kɛ, “Nyamenle ɛmaa bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnle Dwuuma la noko adenle kɛ bɛnlu bɛ nwo na bɛnyia ngoane mɔɔ ɛnlɛ awieleɛ.”
44011019	Sitivin ɛhunlɛ ne anzi, kpɔdekpɔde mɔɔ bɛyɛle diedima ne la manle bɛbɔle asande, bie mɔ hɔvindele Fonehyea, Saepelɛse nee Anteɔko bɛhɔhanle Edwɛkpa ne bɛhilele Dwuuma mɔɔ wɔ lɔ la ala.
44011020	Diedima ne bie mɔ mɔɔ vi Saepelɛse nee Saelin la noko hɔhanle Edwɛkpa ne wɔ Anteɔko hilele bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnle Dwuuma la.
44011021	Awulae lile bɛ nzi manle menli dɔɔnwo liele lile na bɛhakyile bɛrale Awulae ɛkɛ.
44011022	Gyɛlusalɛm asɔne ne dele ɛhye, na bɛzoanle Baanabase wɔ Anteɔko.
44011023	Mɔɔ ɔhɔdwule na ɔnwunle kɛ Nyamenle ɛzi ɛlo menli ne la, ɔlile fɛlɛko na ɔzile bɛ kɛnra kɛ bɛva bɛ ahonle muala bɛzɔ diedi ne anu kpalɛ na bɛli nɔhalɛ bɛmaa Awulae.
44011024	Baanabase mumua ne le sonlakpalɛ mɔɔ diedi nee Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne ɛyi ye tɛkɛɛ la ati, ɔhwenle menli dɔɔnwo ɔrale Awulae ɛkɛ.
44011025	Baanabase akee hɔle Taasɛse kɛ ɔkakpondɛ Sɔɔlo.
44011026	Mɔɔ ɔnwunle ye la ɔ nee ye rale Anteɔko. Bɛ mu nwiɔ bɛ nee asɔnema ne dɛnlanle ɛvolɛ ko na bɛhilehilele bɛ. Na Anteɔko ɛkɛ yɛɛ bɛlumuale bɛvɛlɛle ɛdoavolɛma ne Keleseɛnema a.
44011027	Mekɛ ne anu ala Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛma bie vi Gyɛlusalɛm rale Anteɔko.
44011028	Bɛ nuhua ko mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye Agabɛse la dwazole luale Sunsum ne tumi ne azo hanle dole ɛkɛ kɛ ɛhɔne kpole bie bara ewiade amuala. (Ɛhye yɛle zɔhane wɔ Maanle Maanle Belemgbunli Kolɔdeɛse mekɛ zo.)
44011029	Yemɔti diedima ne bɔle kpɔkɛ kɛ bɛkeha bɛ sa aze na mɔɔ bɛkɛnyia ye la bɛava bɛahɔboa mediema mɔɔ wɔ Dwudiya la.
44011030	Bɛyɛle ɛhye na bɛvale mɔɔ bɛnyianle ye la bɛmanle Baanabase nee Sɔɔlo hɔmanle mgbanyima ne mɔ wɔ Gyɛlusalɛm.
44012001	Mekɛ ɛhye anu ala Belemgbunli Hɛlɔdo vale ɔ nye wulale diedima ne bie mɔ anyunlu.
44012002	Ɔmanle bɛpɛle Dwɔn adiema Gyemise ati.
44012003	Na mɔɔ ɔnwunle kɛ ɛhye ɛyɛ Dwuuma fɛ la, ɔdoale zo na ɔhyele Pita ɔdaye. (Ɛhye zile Angye Ɛvoyia ne anu.)
44012004	Mɔɔ bɛhyele Pita la, ɔdole ye efiade na ɔyele sogyama nna-nna ekpunli nna kɛ bɛzinza ye. Hɛlɔdo yɛle kɛ saa bɛdi Akpabɛnwo Ɛvoyia ne bɛwie a yɛɛ ɔkɛli ye edwɛkɛ a.
44012005	Yemɔti Pita lale efiade ne, na diedima ne noko anye bolole yɛle nzɛlɛlɛ ɛsesebɛ kpalɛ manle ye.
44012006	Nɔe ne mɔɔ ɛnee aleɛ kye a Hɛlɔdo kɛye Pita kɛmaa menli ne la, ɛnee Pita la sogyama nwiɔ mɔɔ ɛlɛsinza ye la avinli, na bɛva nwɔnzɔnwɔnzɔ nwiɔ bɛgua ye, na bɛva bɛsosɔ sogyama nwiɔ ne, yɛɛ eza sogyama bie mɔ noko gyigyi anlenkɛ ne anloa ɛlɛsinza.
44012007	Arɛlevilɛ nu ala Nyamenle soanvolɛ rale ɛkɛ na wienyi kpole bie dale efiade ne. Nyamenle soanvolɛ ne bɔle Pita abati dunwuele ye na ɔzele ye kɛ, “Maa ɔyɛ ndɛ dwazo!” Na ɛkɛ ne ala nwɔnzɔnwɔnzɔ ne vi ɔ sa wɔlɔle guale.
44012008	Na Nyamenle soanvolɛ ne zele ye kɛ, “Fa wɔ tɛladeɛ ne nee wɔ mgbɔlaboa ne wula.” Pita yɛle ye zɔhane na Nyamenle soanvolɛ ne eza zele ye kɛ, “Akee fa wɔ tabule ne kye na toa me.”
44012009	Pita lile ɔ nzi na bɛvi efiade ne bɛvindele. Noko akee ɛnee ɔnnwu ye kpalɛ saa mɔɔ Nyamenle soanvolɛ ne ɛlɛyɛ la le amgba o; ɔdwenlenle kɛ ɛlalɛ ɔ.
44012010	Bɛdɛlale sinzavolɛma ekpunli ne mɔɔ lumua nee mɔɔ tɔ zolɛ nwiɔ, na bɛdwule mbulalɛ anlenkɛ ne mɔɔ bɛfa nu bɛfinde suakpole ne azo la anwo la, anlenkɛ ne angome bukele manle bɛ, na bɛvindele. Bɛhɔle ekyii la, Nyamenle soanvolɛ ne gyakyile Pita na ɔhɔle.
44012011	Pita anye zo tetele ye la ɔzele kɛ, “Akee bɔ zo mɔɔ menwu kɛ debie biala mɔɔ ɛlɛkɔ zolɛ la le nɔhalɛ a. Awulae ɛzoa ɛmaa bɛraye me bɛvi Hɛlɔdo asa anu, nee ninyɛne mɔɔ Dwuuma anye la kɛ bɛkɛyɛ me la amuala anu.”
44012012	Mɔɔ ɔnwunle ye zɛhae la, Pita luale zolɛ hɔle Dwɔn Maake ɔ nli Mɛle sua nu, ɛnee menli dɔɔnwo ɛyia ɛkɛ na bɛlɛyɛ nzɛlɛlɛ.
44012013	Pita bɔle anuhɔlɛ lɔ anlenkɛ ne anu, na sonvolɛ bɛlɛra bie mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye Wuloda la rale kɛ ɔbanlea ahenle holɛ.
44012014	Mɔɔ ɔdele Pita ane kɛ yemɔ a ɔlɛfɛlɛ la, fɛlɛko ngome ti, kɛ ɔkɛdukue anlenkɛ ne la, ɔziale ɔhɔbɔle amaneɛ kɛ Pita ɛra na ɔgyi anlenkɛ ne anzi lɔ.
44012015	Bɛzele ye kɛ, “Debie ɛlɛyɛ wɔ.” Na ɔtinlinle zolɛ ɔhanle ye anyebololɛ nu kɛ ɔle nɔhalɛ, yemɔti bɛhanle kɛ, “Ɛnee noko ye nwomenle ɔ.”
44012016	Pita bɔle anlenkɛ ne anu ndinlizo; nzinlii bɛrabukele ye, na bɛnwunle ye la, ɔyɛle bɛ azibɛnwo.
44012017	Ɔmanle ɔ sa zo kɛ bɛyɛ koonwu, na ɔhanle kɛ Awulae zile yele ye wɔ efiade ne la ɔhilele bɛ. Ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Bɛha bɛhile Gyemise nee mediema mɔɔ ɛha la amuala,” na ɔvindele ɔhɔle.
44012018	Mɔɔ aleɛ hyenle la, sinzavolɛma ne adwenle zɛkyele kpalɛ, ɔluakɛ ɛnee bɛngola bɛnnwu mɔɔ ɛzi Pita anwo zo a.
44012019	Hɛlɔdo manle bɛkpondɛle ye biala, na bɛannwu ye. Yemɔti ɔmanle bɛhyele sinzavolɛma ne nuokɛ na ɔzele kɛ bɛhu bɛ bɛdua. Ɛhye anzi, Hɛlɔdo vi Dwudiya hɔle Sizalia hɔlile mekɛ ekyi wɔ ɛkɛ.
44012020	Hɛlɔdo vale menli mɔɔ wɔ Taya nee Saedɛn la anwo ɛya, ɛhye ati bɛdule menli kɛ bɛhɔnwu ye. Bɛlumuale bɛ sa hanle Belasetɛse mɔɔ nea belemgbunli suakunlu ɛkɛ ne la moalɛ, na akee bɛhɔle Hɛlɔdo anyunlu bɛhɔkpɔdale ye. Ɔluakɛ bɛ aleɛ mɔɔ bɛnyia ye la amuala vi belemgbunli ne maanle nu.
44012021	Kenle mɔɔ bɛhilele la dwule la, Hɛlɔdo wulale ye belemgbunli tɛladeɛ ne na ɔhɔdɛnlanle ye ebia nu na ɔdendɛle ɔhilele menli ne mɔ.
44012022	Menli ne mɔ bɔle ɔse zele kɛ, “Ɛhye, yemɔ nyamenle bie ane ɔ, na tɛ sonla ne ɔ.”
44012023	Na arɛlevilɛ nu ala Awulae soanvolɛ rabɔle Hɛlɔdo dole aze manle ɔ nwo dole ye, ɔlɔle azonlɛ na ɔwule, ɔluakɛ yeanva anyunlunyia yeammaa Nyamenle.
44012024	Nyamenle edwɛkɛ ne hɔle zolɛ dɛlɛle.
44012025	Baanabase nee Sɔɔlo wiele bɛ gyima ne di la, bɛvi Gyɛlusalɛm bɛhɔle, na bɛvale Dwɔn Maake bɛbokale bɛ nwo.
44013001	Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛma nee kilehilevolɛma wɔ Anteɔko asɔne ne anu, bɛmɛ a le Baanabase, Semɛyɔn (mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye Bile), Luseɛse (mɔɔ vi Saelin), Maneeyen (mɔɔ bɛtetele ye nee Amɛnlado Hɛlɔdo), yɛɛ Sɔɔlo.
44013002	Mɔɔ ɛnee bɛlɛyɛ nzɛlɛlɛ na bɛlɛkye ɛhɔne la, Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne zele bɛ kɛ, “Bɛdu Baanabase nee Sɔɔlo bɛzie ahane bɛmaa me na memaa bɛhɔyɛ gyima mɔɔ yemɔti menvɛlɛle bɛ la.”
44013003	Bɛhyele ɛhɔne bɛyɛle nzɛlɛlɛ, bɛvale bɛ sa bɛguale bɛ ti zo na bɛguale bɛ adenle.
44013004	Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne vale Baanabase nee Sɔɔlo hɔle Sɛlusea na bɛvale ɛlɛne bɛhɔle bɔra ne mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye Saepelɛse la azo.
44013005	Mɔɔ bɛdwule Salamese la, bɛhanle Nyamenle edwɛkɛ ne wɔ Dwuuma nyianu sua ne anu. Bɛ nee Dwɔn Maake a hɔle a na ɔboale bɛ wɔ gyima ne ɛyɛlɛ nu.
44013006	Bɛkpɔsale bɔra ne azo na bɛrale Peefɔso bɛradole Dwuunli bie mɔɔ ye ngonyia la. Bɛfɛlɛ ye Baa-Gyisɛse, yɛɛ ɔdaye mumua ne ɔfɛlɛ ɔ nwo Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛ.
44013007	Ɔle bɔra ne azo amɛnlado ne mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye Sɛgyeɛse Pɔɔlɛse la agɔnwo. Amɛnlado ɛhye ze nrɛlɛbɛ yɛɛ ɔ nye ɛde. Ɔzoanle ɔmanle bɛhɔvɛlɛle Baanabase nee Sɔɔlo kɛ bɛrɛla na ɔkulo kɛ ɔtie Nyamenle edwɛkɛ ne.
44013008	Na Ɛlemase (Ngonyianli ne duma wɔ Giliki nu ɛne) ammaa bɛ adenle, na ɔyɛle kɛ ɔkakyi Amɛnlado ne adwenle, amaa yeanlie ɛzonlenlɛ fofolɛ ɛhye yeanli.
44013009	Na Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne rawolole Sɔɔlo, mɔɔ ɛnee akee bɛfɛlɛ ye Pɔɔlo la, ɔnleanle Ɛlemase koonwu
44013010	na ɔzele ye kɛ, “Wɔmɔ Abɔnsam ara, ɛle debie kpalɛ biala kpɔvolɛ. Amumuyɛ ɛyi wɔ tɛkɛɛ, yɛɛ dahuu ɛbɔ adalɛ wɔ Awulae adenle kpalɛ ne anwo.
44013011	Awulae ɛdua wɔ kakɛ, ɔmaa ɛ nye ɛzi ɔhɔkpula mekɛ ekyi bie mɔɔ ɛnnwu debie biala a.” Na ɛkɛ ne ala awozinli vale Ɛlemase manle ɔlile nvuovua na ɔzɛlɛle kɛ awie ɛzɔ ɔ sa ɛhile ye adenle.
44013012	Mɔɔ Amɛnlado ne nwunle mɔɔ ɛzi la, ɔliele ɔlile na Awulae anwo ngilehilelɛ ne yɛle ye azibɛnwo kpole.
