44013013	Pɔɔlo nee ɔ gɔnwo mɔ vi Peefɔso la bɛvale ɛlɛne bɛrale Pɛga, wɔ Pamefelea maanzinli nu, na Dwɔn Maake gyakyile bɛ ɛkɛ ne ziale hɔle Gyɛlusalɛm.
44013014	Bɛvi Pɛga la bɛbɔle hwii bɛhɔle Anteɔko mɔɔ wɔ Paesedea la. Ɛnwomenlelielɛ Kenle ne dwule la, bɛhɔle nyianu sua ne anu na bɛhɔdɛnlanle aze.
44013015	Bɛwiele Mosisi mɛla ne nee Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛma edwɛkɛ ne kenga la, nyianu sua ne mgbanyima ne dole ɛsalɛ vɛlɛle bɛ kɛ, “Mediema, saa bɛlɛ edwɛkɛ fɛlɛko bie mɔɔ maa anwosesebɛ la a ɛnee bɛha bɛmaa menli ne ɛdie bie.”
44013016	Pɔɔlo dwazole manle ɔ sa zo na ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Ayi mɔ Yizilayɛma nee bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnle Dwuuma mɔɔ bɛwɔ ɛke na bɛsulo Nyamenle la, bɛdie me!
44013017	Yizilayɛ Nyamenle ne kpale nu yele yɛ nlenya mɔ na ɔyɛle bɛ ɛlɔne kpole wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ ɛnee bɛle nyɛvolɛ bɔbɔ wɔ Yigyibiti azɛlɛ zo la. Nyamenle vale ye tumi kpole ne yele bɛ vile Yigyibiti azɛlɛ zo,
44013018	na ɔnyianle bɛ nwo abotane ɔnleanle bɛ gyɛlɛɛnye wɔ ɛsɛlɛ ne azo ɛvolɛ abulanla.
44013019	Wɔ Keena noko, Nyamenle zɛkyele maanle maanle nsuu na ɔvale bɛ azɛlɛ ne ɔmanle ye menli ne mɔ.
44013020	“Ɛvolɛ asɛɛ ɛya nna abulanla anzi, ɔmanle bɛ ndɛnebuavolɛma toonwo ɔradwule Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛ Samoɛle anwo zo.
44013021	Akee bɛbizale kɛ Nyamenle ɛmaa bɛ belemgbunli, yemɔti Nyamenle manle bɛvale Sɔɔlo mɔɔ le Kehye ara nrenya ne mɔɔ vi Bɛngyaman abusua nu la bɛyɛle bɛ belemgbunli ɛvolɛ abulanla.
44013022	Mɔɔ Nyamenle yele ye ɛkɛ ne la, ɔyɛle Devidi bɛ belemgbunli. Na Nyamenle hanle ɔ nwo edwɛkɛ kɛ, ‘Menwu Gyɛsi ara Devidi kɛ yemɔ a ɔle sonla mɔɔ sɔ me nye a, na yemɔ a ɔbali gyima mɔɔ mekpondɛ la amuala a.’
44013023	Devidi ɛhye alɔnra a le Gyisɛse mɔɔ Nyamenle ɛyɛ ye Yizilayɛma Ngoanedievolɛ, kɛmɔ ye ɛwɔkɛ ne se la.
44013024	Gyisɛse babɔ ye gyimalilɛ ne abo la, Dwɔn lumuale rabɔle nolo zele Yizilayɛma kɛ bɛnlu bɛ nwo wɔ bɛ ɛtane ne mɔ anwo na bɛmaa bɛzɔne bɛ.
44013025	Na mɔɔ Dwɔn bawie ye gyima ne la, ɔbizale menli ne kɛ, ‘Bɛdwenle kɛ mame a le nwane? Tɛ mɔɔ bɛlɛkendɛ ye la a le me. Na nea, ɔli me nzi ɔlɛba, na ye mgbɔlaboa bɔbɔ menfɛta kɛ menwɔyeye.’
44013026	“Me mediema, Ebileham nlɔnra nee bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnle Dwuuma na bɛsulo Nyamenle mɔɔ bɛwɔ ɛke la amuala, yɛmɛ yɛ ti yɛɛ bɛvale ngoanelielɛ nwo Edwɛkpa ɛhye bɛzoanle a!
44013027	Menli mɔɔ wɔ Gyɛlusalɛm nee bɛ mgbanyima ne mɔ annwu kɛ yemɔ a ɔle Ngoanedievolɛ ne a, yɛɛ bɛande Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛma edwɛkɛ ne mɔɔ bɛkenga ye dahuu wɔ Ɛnwomenlelielɛ Kenle ne la abo. Noko bɛbule Gyisɛse ewule fɔlɛ bɛmanle Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛma edwɛkɛ ne mɔɔ hanle la yɛle nɔhalɛ.
44013028	Bɛannyia kpɔkɛ biala bɛangyinla zolɛ bɛambua ye ewule fɔlɛ, noko bɛzele Paelɛte kɛ ɔmaa bɛhu ye.
44013029	Bɛwiele debie biala mɔɔ Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne kile ye wɔ ɔ nwo la amuala yɛ la, bɛyele ye wɔ meanubaka ne azo na bɛziele ye.
44013030	Na Nyamenle dwazole ye vile mɔwuamra anu,
44013031	na ɔyele ɔ nwo ɔhilele bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛ nee ye vi Galeli rale Gyɛlusalɛm la, na ɔmanle bɛnwunle ye fane dɔɔnwo. Na bɛmɛ yɛɛ kɛkala bɛdi ɔ nwo daselɛ bɛkile Yizilayɛma a.
44013032	-
44013033	Na yɛdayɛ noko yɛra ɛke kɛ yɛfa Edwɛkpa ne yɛarɛlɛ bɛ kɛ, Nyamenle ɛwɔkɛ ne mɔɔ ɔbɔle yɛ nlenya mɔ la, yelua Gyisɛse mɔɔ yedwazo ye yera ngoane nu la anwo zo yeyɛ yemaa yɛmɛ mɔɔ yɛle bɛ nlɔnra la. Edwɛndolɛ ne mɔɔ tɔ zolɛ nwiɔ la se, ‘Wɔmɔ, ɛle me ra; ɛnɛ merayɛ ɛ ze.’
44013034	Mɔɔ fane ye mɔwuamra anu ɛdwazolɛ mɔɔ kile kɛ ɔnrɛkpɔlɔ ɛlɛ la, kɛ Nyamenle se la ɛne, ‘Mebava me nyilalɛ ne mɔɔ sonle bolɛ mɔɔ menvale membɔle Devidi ɛwɔkɛ la meamaa wɔ.’
44013035	Eza yeha ye wɔ ɛleka fofolɛ kɛ, ‘Ɛnrɛmaa wɔ sonvolɛ ne mɔɔ ɛdu ɔ nwo ɛmaa wɔ la ɛnrɛkpɔlɔ.’
44013036	Devidi zonlenle ye Nyamenle wɔ ye mekɛ zo na ɔwule, bɛziele ye wɔ ɔ nlenya mɔ avinli, na ɔkpɔlɔle.
44013037	Na sonla ne mɔɔ Nyamenle dwazole ye vile mɔwuamra anu la amkpɔlɔ.
44013038	-
44013039	Zɔhane ati mediema, bɛ muala bɛnwu ye kɛ ɔlua Gyisɛse anwo zo yɛɛ bɛlɛka ɛtanefakyɛ nwo edwɛkɛ bɛahile bɛ a; awie biala mɔɔ kɛlie ye kɛli la bɛbalie ye bɛavi ye ɛtane ne mɔ mɔɔ Mosisi mɛla ne angola anye ye anvi nu la anu.
44013040	Ɛhye ati, bɛnlea boɛ na mɔɔ Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛma hanle la anzi bɛ nwo zo. Ɔse,
44013041	‘Bɛnlea, bɛmɛ agolobɛnwoma! Akpule ku bɛ agua bɛ lɔ! Ɔluakɛ, gyima mɔɔ melɛdi wɔ bɛ mekɛ zo la ɛnle debie mɔɔ awie kile nu kile bɛ bɔbɔ a bɛkɛlie bɛkɛli a!’ ”
44013042	Mɔɔ Pɔɔlo nee Baanabase vi nyianu sua ne anu finde ahɔ la menli ne zɛlɛle bɛ kɛ Ɛnwomenlelielɛ Kenle bieko bɛbɔ mɔdenle bɛraha edwɛkɛ ne kpalɛ bɛhile bɛ.
44013043	Nzinlii mɔɔ bɛkpɔnenle la, Dwuuma nee bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnle Dwuuma mɔɔ boka Dwuuma Nyamenlezonlenlɛ ne anwo la dɔɔnwo doale Pɔɔlo nee Baanabase, na ɛzoanvolɛma ne zile bɛ ahonle kɛ bɛzɔ Nyamenle ɛlolɛ ne anu kpundii.
44013044	Ɛnwomenlelielɛ Kenle bieko dwule la, asɛɛ suakpole ne azo amra amuala dule rale kɛ bɛbadie Awulae edwɛkɛ ne.
44013045	Mɔɔ Dwuuma ne nwunle menli dɔɔnwo ne la, anyebolo dɔle bɛ nwo; bɛdendɛle bɛtiale mɔɔ Pɔɔlo ɛlɛka la, na bɛbɔle bɛ aholoba.
44013046	Noko Pɔɔlo nee Baanabase dendɛle akɛnrasesebɛ zo zele bɛ kɛ, “Anrɛɛ ɔhyia kɛ bɛkɛlumua bɛkɛha Nyamenle edwɛkɛ ne bɛkɛhile bɛmɛ Dwuuma. Na saa bɛnyia bɛkpo kɛ bɛnrɛdie na bɛhile kɛ bɛ nwo ɛnfɛta ngoane mɔɔ ɛnlɛ awieleɛ la a, ɛnee ɔwɔ kɛ yɛgyakyi bɛ na yɛkɔka edwɛkɛ ne yɛkile bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnle Dwuuma la.
44013047	Ɔluakɛ Awulae zele yɛ kɛ, ‘Meyɛ bɛ kɛ kɛnlaneɛ memaa bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnle Dwuuma la, amaa aleɛabo amra amuala anyia ngoane.’ ”
44013048	Mɔɔ bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnle Dwuuma la dele ɛhye la, bɛlile fɛlɛko na bɛyeyɛle Nyamenle wɔ ye edwɛkɛ ne anwo, na bɛ nuhua mɔɔ ɔwɔ kɛ Nyamenle maa bɛ ngoane mɔɔ ɛnlɛ awieleɛ la liele lile.
44013049	Awulae edwɛkɛ ne dɛlɛle hɔle maanzinli ne anu amuala.
44013050	Na Dwuuma ne lile mgbanyima mɔɔ wɔ suakpole ne azo nee mraalɛ mgbanyinli mɔɔ gyi boɛ na bɛsulo Nyamenle na bɛnle Dwuuma la anzo. Bɛmanle bɛbɔle ɔ bo bɛyɛle Pɔɔlo nee Baanabase kpɔdekpɔde toonwo bɛdule bɛ maanzinli ne anu.
44013051	Ɛzoanvolɛma ne kpɔlɔkpɔlale bɛ gyakɛ abo munlutu guale sua ne azo amra ati zo na bɛzile nu bɛhɔle Ayekoneɛm.
44013052	Na diedima mɔɔ wɔ Anteɔko la lile fɛlɛko kpole na Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne yile bɛ tɛkɛɛ.
44014001	Wɔ Ayekoneɛm noko, edwɛkɛ ko ne ala bie zile. Pɔɔlo nee Baanabase hɔle Dwuuma nyianu sua ne anu hɔdendɛle manle Dwuuma nee Gilikima dɔɔnwo liele lile.
44014002	Na Dwuuma bie mɔ mɔɔ anlie anli la lile wulale bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnle Dwuuma la bie mɔ manle bɛvale diedima ne mɔ ɛkpɔlɛ.
44014003	Noko ɛzoanvolɛma ne dɛnlanle ɛkɛ hyɛle, bɛhanle Awulae anwo edwɛkɛ ne akɛnrasesebɛ zo na Awulae hilele nɔhalɛ mɔɔ wɔ ye ɛlolɛ nwo nolo ne mɔɔ bɛlɛbɔ la anu na ɔmanle bɛ tumi ɔmanle bɛyɛle sɛkɛlɛneɛ nee nwanwane ninyɛne dɔɔnwo.
44014004	Na menli mɔɔ wɔ suakpole ne azo la anloa anzɛ bɛ nwo; foa ko hɔle Dwuuma anzi, yɛɛ foa ko hɔle ɛzoanvolɛma ne anzi.
44014005	Nzinlii bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnle Dwuuma la bie mɔ nee Dwuuma bɔle nu bɛ nee bɛ mgbanyima yɛle adwenle kɛ bɛkɔ ɛzoanvolɛma ne mɔ anwo zo bɛahɔzi bɛ awolɛ.
44014006	Mɔɔ ɛzoanvolɛma ne dele la, bɛyele bɛ nwo zo na bɛhɔle Lesetela nee Dɛbi mɔɔ wɔ Laekewonea maanzinli nu la nee namunamu mɔɔ zuozua ɛkɛ ne la azo
44014007	bɛhɔhanle Edwɛkpa ne wɔ ɛkɛ.
44014008	Nrenya bie wɔ Lesetela, bɛwole ye abubura, yemɔti ɔtɛtiale ɛlɛ.
44014009	Ɛnee nrenya ɛhye ɛlɛtie Pɔɔlo kpalɛ. Na Pɔɔlo nwunle kɛ nrenya ne ɛnyia diedi mɔɔ kola yɛ ye ayile la, ɔnleanle ye koonwu
44014010	na ɔdeanle nu ɔzele ye kɛ, “Dwazo gyinla!” Nrenya ne wulule gyinlanle na ɔbɔle ɔ bo kɛ ɔtia.
44014011	Mɔɔ menli ne mɔ nwunle mɔɔ Pɔɔlo ɛyɛ la, bɛdeɛdeanle nu wɔ Laekewonea aneɛ ne anu kɛ, “Awozonle ne mɔ ɛhakyi bɛ nwo menli ɛra yɛ avinli!”
44014012	Na bɛvɛlɛle Baanabase, Ziyɛse, na bɛvɛlɛle Pɔɔlo, Hɛmɛse, ɔluakɛ bɛse Pɔɔlo a tendɛ maa bɛ a.
44014013	Na kɔmenle ne mɔɔ tendɛ Ziyɛse anloa azo, na ye amonle sua ne gyi sua ne kandiba ɛkɛ ne ala la vale nlankɛ nee ndotolo kɔtɔlɔba rale suakpole ne bane ne anlenkɛ kpole ne anloa kɛ ɔ nee menli ne mɔ bɛbabɔ azu bɛamaa ɛzoanvolɛma ne.
44014014	Mɔɔ Baanabase nee Pɔɔlo dele mɔɔ menli ne mɔ kpondɛ ayɛ la, ɔyɛle bɛ azibɛnwo. Yemɔti bɛsuosuanle bɛ adɛladeɛ ne mɔ anu na bɛnriandile bɛhɔle menli ne avinli na bɛzele bɛ kɛ,
44014015	“Ayi mɔ, duzu ati a bɛlɛyɛ ɛhye mɔ ɛ? Yɛdayɛ noko yɛle menli kɛ bɛdabɛ la. Yɛrale kɛ yɛbabɔ Edwɛkpa ne nolo yeahile bɛ, amaa bɛahwe bɛ nwo bɛavi ninyɛne mgbane mgbane ɛhye mɔ mɔɔ anwo ɛnlɛ nvasoɛ la anwo, na bɛazonle tease Nyamenle ne mɔɔ bɔle anwuma, azɛlɛ, nyevile nee mɔɔ wɔ nuhua la amuala la.
44014016	Mɔmoane ɔmanle menli muala adenle ɔmanle bɛyɛle mɔɔ bɛdabɛ bɛkulo la.
44014017	Noko dahuu ɔdua ye ninyɛne kpalɛ mɔɔ ɔyɛ la azo ɔkile ɔ nwo ɔkile bɛ: ɔmaa bɛ ezule, yɛɛ ɛbuhenle ne dwu a ɔmaa bɛ aleɛ na ɔmaa bɛ nye die.”
44014018	Noko ɛhye mɔ amuala anzi, ɔhale kyɛkyɛ mɔɔ ɛnee bɛngola bɛnzi menli ne mɔ aze wɔ bɛ azu ɛbɔlɛ ne anwo a.
44014019	Nzinlii Dwuuma bie vi Anteɔko mɔɔ wɔ Paesedea maanzinli nu nee Ayekoneɛm la rale, bɛralile menli ne anzo bɛhɔle bɛ afoa na bɛzile Pɔɔlo awolɛ bɛmanle ɔ nye zo bulule; bɛhwenle ye bɛhɔdole sua ne kandiba, ɛnee bɛdwenle kɛ yewu.
44014020	Na mɔɔ diedima ne rabɔle yiale ye la, ɔ nye rale zolɛ na ɔdwazole ɔ nee bɛ hɔle sua nu. Aleɛ hyenle la ɔ nee Baanabase bɛhɔle Dɛbi.
44014021	Pɔɔlo nee Baanabase hanle Edwɛkpa ne wɔ Dɛbi la, bɛnyianle ɛdoavolɛma gyɛlɛɛnye. Bɛvi ɛkɛ ne bɛziale bɛhɔle Lesetela nee Ayekoneɛm, yɛɛ Anteɔko mɔɔ wɔ Paesedea maanzinli nu la.
44014022	Bɛmanle diedima ne mɔ anwosesebɛ na bɛzele bɛ kɛ bɛzɔ diedi ne anu kpundii. Bɛhilehilele bɛ kɛ ɔwɔ kɛ yɛnwu amaneɛ dɔɔnwo na yɛanwu Nyamenle Belemgbunlililɛ ne.
44014023	Bɛzieziele mgbanyima bɛmanle bɛ, na bɛvale ɛhɔnehyelɛ nee nzɛlɛlɛ bɛdule bɛ bɛwulale Awulae ne mɔɔ bɛva bɛ rɛle bɛwule ye nu la asa anu.
44014024	Akee bɛhɔkpɔsale Paesedea maanzinli ne anu na bɛrale Pamefelea maanzinli nu.
44014025	Bɛhanle Edwɛkpa ne wɔ Pɛga na bɛhɔle Ateelea.
44014026	Bɛvi ɛkɛ ne la bɛvale ɛlɛne bɛziale bɛrale Anteɔko. Ɛke a bɛdule bɛ bɛwulale Nyamenle ɛlolɛ ne abo kolaa na bɛabɔ bɛ gyima ɛhye mɔɔ bɛwie ye di la abo a.
44014027	Mɔɔ bɛradwule Anteɔko la, bɛyiale asɔnema ne amuala na bɛhanle mɔɔ Nyamenle ɛva bɛ ɛyɛ la amuala bɛhilele bɛ, nee kɛ yezi yebuke diedi adenle yemaa bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnle Dwuuma la.
44014028	Na bɛ nee diedima ne dɛnlanle ɛkɛ ne hyɛle dɔɔnwo.
44015001	Menli bie vi Dwudiya rale Anteɔko na bɛbɔle ɔ bo kɛ bɛkilehile diedima ne kɛ, “Saa bɛanyɛ bɛ mrenyanu nzonlɛ, kɛmɔ Mosisi mɛla ne kile la a bɛnrɛnyia ngoane.”
44015002	Pɔɔlo nee Baanabase nee bɛ zule ɛhye anwo kpolera kpole kpalɛ. Zɔhane ati bɛdule menli kɛ bɛboka Pɔɔlo nee Baanabase anwo bɛhɔ Gyɛlusalɛm bɛhɔnwu ɛzoanvolɛma ne nee mgbanyima ne mɔ wɔ nwolɛ.
44015003	Asɔnema ne guale bɛ adenle, na bɛkɔ la bɛvale Fonehyea nee Samɛlea, na bɛhanle kɛ bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnle Dwuuma la ɛzi ɛhakyi, na bɛlie Nyamenle bɛli la anwo edwɛkɛ bɛhilele bɛ. Na diedima ne lile nwolɛ fɛlɛko somaa.
44015004	Mɔɔ bɛdwule Gyɛlusalɛm la, bɛvale mɔɔ Nyamenle ɛva bɛ ɛyɛ la amuala bɛbɔle amaneɛ bɛhilele bɛ, na asɔnema ne, ɛzoanvolɛma ne, yɛɛ mgbanyima ne mɔ liele bɛ gyɛlɛɛnye.
44015005	Na diedima ne bie mɔ mɔɔ boka Falasii fane ne anwo la dwazole na bɛhanle kɛ, “Ɔwɔ kɛ bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnle Dwuuma la yɛ bɛ mrenyanu nzonlɛ na eza bɛdi Mosisi mɛla ne azo.”
44015006	Ɛdoavolɛma ne nee mgbanyima ne mɔ yiale nu vale edwɛkɛ ɛhye anwo adwenle.
44015007	Na bɛhehanle nwolɛ bie dedee la, Pita dwazole na ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Ayi mɔ, bɛze kɛ mekɛ bie mɔɔ ɛraze ɛhɔ la, Nyamenle yele me bɛ avinli manle mengɔmbɔle Edwɛkpa ne nolo mengilele bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnle Dwuuma la, amaa bɛdabɛ noko bɛade edwɛkɛ ne na bɛalie bɛali.
44015008	Na Nyamenle mɔɔ ze sonla ahonle nu la hilele kɛ yelie bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnle Dwuuma la noko, na ɔmanle bɛ Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne bie, kɛmɔ ɔvale ɔmanle yɛdayɛ ala la.
44015009	Yeangile kɛ asolo yɛmɛ nee bɛmɛ. Ɔluale bɛ diedi zo yɛɛ ɔvale bɛ ɛtane ɔhyɛle bɛ a.
44015010	Duzu ati yɛɛ akee bɛkɛzɔ Nyamenle bɛkɛnlea, na bɛkɛva kpomgbolo kpole bɛkɛgyela diedima ne akɔme, wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ yɛ nee yɛ nlenya mɔ yɛangola ye soa la ɛ?
44015011	Kyɛkyɛ! Kɛmɔ yɛdie yɛdi na ɔlua Awulae Gyisɛse ɛlolɛ zo bɛbalie yɛ ngoane la, zɔhane ala yɛɛ bɛdabɛ noko bɛ ɛdeɛ ne de a.”
44015012	Ɔhanle ɛhye la bɛ muala bɛyɛle koonwu na akee bɛdiele Baanabase nee Pɔɔlo kolakola ne, nee sɛkɛlɛneɛ nee nwanwane gyima mɔɔ Nyamenle ɛlua bɛ nwo zo ɛyɛ wɔ bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnle Dwuuma la avinli la amuala.
44015013	Mɔɔ bɛ nloa penle la, Gyemise dendɛle na ɔzele kɛ, “Mediema, bɛdie me.
44015014	Saemɔn ɛha ɛhile nu kɛkala kɛ ɔzile ɔyɛle mɔɔ Nyamenle anye hɔle bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnle Dwuuma la anwo zo na ɔyele menli wɔ bɛ avinli ɔrayɛle ye ɛdeɛ bɔkɔɔ la.
44015015	Ɛhye nee Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛma edwɛkɛ ne le ko. Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne se,
44015016	‘Awulae se, ɛhye anzi mebazia meara, na meamaa Devidi belemgbunlililɛ ne mɔɔ dɔle aze la zo. Mebayɛ ye fofolɛ na meamaa ye zo meazie ɔ gyakɛ anu,
44015017	amaa ewiade amra mɔɔ ɛha la ara me ɛkɛ, na bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnle Dwuuma na mevɛlɛ bɛ la arayɛ me ɛdeɛ.
44015018	Awulae a vale ɛhye dole gua dɛbadɛba ne a.’ ”
44015019	Gyemise hɔle zolɛ zele kɛ, “Me adwenle a le kɛ, ɔnle kɛ yɛta bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnle Dwuuma na bɛhakyi bɛlɛba Nyamenle ɛkɛ ne la anye zo.
44015020	Bɛmaa yɛhɛlɛ kɛlata yehɔmaa bɛ kɛ bɛhwe bɛ nwo bɛvi ninyɛne mɔɔ anwo ɛnde, mɔɔ le kɛ aleɛ mɔɔ bɛva bɛkpa munzule anzɛɛ bɛva bɛzɔ amonle la anwo, nee ninyɛne mɔɔ le kɛ adwɔmane ɛbɔlɛ nee nane mɔɔ bɛlofo ye bɛhu ye na bɛampɛ ɔ kɔme la ɛlilɛ nee mogya nwo.
44015021	Ɔluakɛ Mosisi mɛla ne, bɛkenga ye Ɛnwomenlelielɛ Kenle biala wɔ nyianu azua ne mɔ anu, yɛɛ ɔ nloa edwɛkɛ noko bɛbɔ ye nolo wɔ sua biala azo.”
44015022	Ɛzoanvolɛma ne nee mgbanyima ne mɔ, nee asɔnema ne mɔ amuala akee bɔle kpɔkɛ kɛ bɛsoa menli bɛamaa bɛ nee Pɔɔlo nee Baanabase ahɔ Anteɔko. Bɛdule menli nwiɔ mɔɔ bɛbu bɛ kpalɛ la bɛmanle bɛ nee bɛ hɔle. Bɛmɛ a le Dwudase mɔɔ eza bɛfɛlɛ ye Baasabase la, yɛɛ Saelase.
44015023	Na bɛvale kɛlata ɛhye bɛmanle bɛ kɛ bɛva bɛhɔ: “Yɛdayɛ bɛ mediema ɛzoanvolɛma nee asɔne mgbanyima, yɛlɛ mediema ɛhulolɛ yɛbiza mediema mɔɔ ɛnle Dwuuma mɔɔ wɔ Anteɔko, Selesea, yɛɛ Selea la amuala ahye.
44015024	Yɛde kɛ yɛ bie mɔ mɔɔ yɛanzoa bɛ la ɛra bagyegye bɛ aha edwɛkɛ azɛkye bɛ adwenle.
44015025	-
44015026	Zɔhane ati yɛyia nu yɛbɔ kpɔkɛ na yɛdu menli kɛ bɛ nee Pɔɔlo nee Baanabase, mɔɔ ɛva bɛ ngoane ɛdo nzeleba wɔ yɛ Awulae Gyisɛse ɛzonlenlɛ ti la ɛrɛla.
44015027	Bɛmɛ a le Dwudase nee Saelase, bɛ nloa edwɛkɛ bamoa mɔɔ yɛhɛlɛ ye wɔ kɛlata ye anu la azo.
44015028	Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne nee yɛdayɛ yɛdie yɛto nu kɛ yɛnrɛva kpomgbolo kpole biala yɛnrɛkpolo bɛ kɔme kɛ ngyehyɛlɛ ɛhye mɔ mɔɔ hyia la ala.
44015029	Bɛmmadi aleɛ mɔɔ bɛva bɛkpa munzule anzɛɛ bɛva bɛzɔ amonle la; bɛmmadi mogya; bɛmmadi nane mɔɔ bɛlofo ye na bɛampɛ ɔ kɔme la, na bɛhwe bɛ nwo bɛvi adwɔmane ɛbɔlɛ nwo. Saa bɛtwe bɛ nwo bɛfi ɛhye mɔ anwo a ɛnee bɛlua adenle fɔɔnwo ne anu. Yɛbiza bɛ ahye.”
44015030	Menli mɔɔ bɛzoanle bɛ la hɔdwule Anteɔko la, bɛboɔboale diedima ne kɔsɔɔti anloa na bɛyele kɛlata ne bɛmanle bɛ.
44015031	Mɔɔ diedima ne gengale kɛlata ne la, bɛlile fɛlɛko kpole wɔ akɛnrazilɛ mɔɔ kɛlata ne ɛva ɛrɛlɛ bɛ la anwo.
44015032	Dwudase nee Saelase, mɔɔ bɛdabɛ mumua ne bɛle Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛma la dendɛle dɔɔnwo hilele bɛ manle bɛnyianle anwosesebɛ.
44015033	Bɛlile kenle ekyi wɔ ɛkɛ ne la, diedima ne akee gyakyile bɛ adenle kɛ bɛzia bɛhɔ menli mɔɔ zoanle bɛ la anwo lɔ. [
44015034	Na Saelase ɛdeɛ, ɔhulole kɛ ɔkɛdɛnla ɛkɛ ne.]
44015035	Pɔɔlo nee Baanabase dɛnlanle Anteɔko hyɛle ekyii; bɛ nee diedima ne bie mɔ hilehilele na bɛbɔle Awulae edwɛkɛ ne nolo.
44015036	Mekɛ guale nu la Pɔɔlo zele Baanabase kɛ, “Maa yɛzia yɛhɔkpɔla azua mɔɔ yɛha Awulae edwɛkɛ ne wɔ zo la, na yɛhɔnlea kɛ mediema ne mɔ si kɔ la.”
44015037	Baanabase hulole kɛ bɛkɛva Dwɔn Maake bɛkɛboka bɛ nwo,
44015038	noko Pɔɔlo adwenle a le kɛ suzuamgba ala mɔɔ Maake kpole bɛ wɔ Pamefelea, ɔgyakyile bɛ ɛkɛ ne na ɔ nee bɛ anyɛ gyima ne anwie la, ɔngyia kɛ bɛ nee ye kɛhɔ.
44015039	Ɛhye anwo kpolerazulɛ yɛle kyengye kpalɛ manle bɛ mu nwiɔ bɛ avinli tetele. Baanabase vale Maake na ɔ nee ye pɛle azule hɔle Saepelɛse.
44015040	Pɔɔlo noko vale Saelɛse hɔle, na mediema ne mɔ vale Pɔɔlo wulale Awulae ɛlolɛ ne abo.
44015041	Ɔhɔle Selea nee Selesea ɔhɔmanle diedima mɔɔ wɔ asɔne ne mɔ anu la anwosesebɛ.
44016001	Pɔɔlo eza rale Dɛbi nee Lesetela noko. Ɛdoavolɛ bie wɔ ɛkɛ, bɛfɛlɛ ye Temɔte. Ɔ nli le Dwuunli mɔɔ ɛlie Edwɛkpa ne ɛli a, yɛɛ ɔ ze le Gilikinli.
44016002	Mediema mɔɔ wɔ Lesetela nee Ayekoneɛm la kanvo Temɔte kpole kpalɛ.
44016003	Ɔlua zolɛ Pɔɔlo hulole kɛ ɔkɛva Temɔte ɔkɛhɔ. Ɛhye ati ɔmanle bɛyɛle ye mrenyanu nzonlɛ. Pɔɔlo yɛle ɛhye, ɔboalekɛ Dwuuma mɔɔ wɔ sua ne azo la amuala ze kɛ Temɔte ɔ ze le Gilikinli.
44016004	Wɔ bɛ akpɔsa ne anu, sua biala mɔɔ bɛkɛdwu zo la bɛye ɛzoanvolɛma nee mgbanyima mɔɔ wɔ Gyɛlusalɛm la ngyehyɛlɛ ne bɛto diedima ne anyunlu, na bɛse bɛ kɛ bɛli zolɛ.
44016005	Ɛhye manle asɔne ne mɔ anwo yɛle se wɔ diedi nu na menli dɔɔnwo rabokale bɛ nwo dahuu.
44016006	Bɛhɔle Felegyea nee Galeehyea maanzinli ne mɔ anu, ɔluakɛ Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne ammaa adenle ammaa bɛanga Edwɛkpa ne wɔ Ehyea maanzinli ne anu.
44016007	Mɔɔ bɛdwule Mesea maanzinli ne ɛweɛne zo la bɛbɔle mɔdenle kɛ bɛkɛhɔ Baetenea maanzinli nu, na Gyisɛse Sunsum ne ammaa bɛ adenle.
44016008	Ɛhye ati bɛpɛle nu bɛhɔluale Mesea maanzinli nu na bɛhɔle Tulowase.
44016009	Nɔe ne Pɔɔlo nwunle ɛnyelɛzodeɛnwunlɛ kɛ nrenya bie vi Masidonea ɛragyinla ɔ nyunlu ɛkɛ ne na ɔlɛkpa ye kyɛlɛ kɛ, “Bɛla Masidonea maanzinli nu na baboa yɛ!”
44016010	Mɔɔ Pɔɔlo nwunle zɛhae debie la, yɛbɔle kpɔkɛ kɛ Nyamenle yɛɛ ɛvɛlɛ yɛ kɛ yɛhɔbɔ Edwɛkpa ne nolo yɛhile menli mɔɔ wɔ ɛkɛ ne la a, ɛhye ati yɛhuohuanle yɛ nwo na yɛhɔle Masidonea maanzinli nu.
44016011	Yɛvale ɛlɛne yɛvile Tulowase yɛdole ye zo yɛhɔle Samotelase, ye alehyenlɛ nu ɛnee yɛwɔ Niapɔlese.
44016012	Yɛvi ɛkɛ ne la yɛhɔle Felepae, mɔɔ le suakpole wɔ Masidonea maanzinli nu la. Suakpole ɛhye Wulomu Maanle Maanle belemgbunli ne a bɔle ye nzeseɛ a. Yɛlile kenle dɔɔnwo wɔ sua ne azo.
44016013	Ɛnwomenlelielɛ Kenle ne dwule la, yɛhɔle bɛ azule ne anloa wɔ suakpole ne kandiba. Yɛ adwenle a le kɛ kabezɛ ɛkɛ ne a Dwuuma ɔyɛ a yia yɛ nzɛlɛlɛ a.
44016014	Mraalɛ mɔɔ diele yɛ edwɛkɛ ne la ko a le Ledea mɔɔ vi Tayataela na ɔtɔnedɔne arelemgbunli ndanlɛ la. Ɔle raalɛ mɔɔ Nyamenlezonlenlɛ wɔ ye nu a. Na Awulae bukele ye adwenle nu manle ɔdiele mɔɔ Pɔɔlo ɛlɛka la kpalɛ.
44016015	Na ɔmanle bɛzɔnenle ye nee ye sua nu amra amuala, na ɔzele yɛ kɛ, “Saa bɛbu me kɛ melɛ diedi wɔ Awulae anu a, ɛnee bɛ nee me ɛradɛnla me sua nu.” Ɔtinlinle zolɛ na ɔ nee yɛ hɔle.
44016016	Kenle ko yɛlɛkɔ ɛleka mɔɔ bɛyɛ nzɛlɛlɛ la, yɛyiale kanranli bɛlɛra bie mɔɔ di ahɔne na ɔlua ye munzule ɛbɔlɛ zo ɔ menle mɔ ɛnyia bɛ nwo ninyɛne nee ezukoa la.
44016017	Ɔdoale yɛ nee Pɔɔlo na ɔlile yɛ nzi ɔdeɛdeanle nu kɛ, “Anwuma Anwuma Nyamenle ne sonvolɛma, mɔɔ bɔ ngoanelielɛ adenle ne anwo nolo la ɛne!”
44016018	Ɔyɛle ɛhye alehyenlɛ dɔɔnwo ɔmanle akee ɔyɛle Pɔɔlo abodelɛ, na ɔhakyile ɔ nye ɔzele sunsum ɛtane ne mɔɔ wɔ bɛlɛra ne anwo la kɛ, “Ɔlua Gyisɛse Kelaese duma nu, mese wɔ kɛ, ɛvi ɔ nwo tu!” Na sunsum ɛtane ne vi bɛlɛra ne anwo dule ɛkɛ ne ala.
44016019	Mɔɔ kakula raalɛ ne amenle mɔ nwunle kɛ bɛ ezukoa ɛnyialɛ adenle ne ɛdua la, bɛhɔhyele Pɔɔlo nee Saelase bɛhwenlenle bɛ aze bɛ nee bɛ hɔle mgbanyinli nyunlu wɔ bɛ gua ne anu.
44016020	Bɛdoanle bɛ bɛhilele Wulomu arane mgbanyima ne mɔ kɛ, “Menli ɛhye mɔ le Dwuuma bie mɔɔ ɛva ngyegyelɛ ɛra suakpole ye azo a.
44016021	Bɛlɛfa amaamuo mɔɔ nee yɛ ɛdeɛ ne ɛnle ko la bɛarahilehile yɛ. Yɛmɛ yɛle Wulomuma mɔɔ yɛdie bɛ ngilehilelɛ ne yɛto nu a ɔnyɛ boɛ a.”
44016022	Na menli ne mɔ amuala bokale menli mɔɔ hɔdoanle ɛzoanvolɛma ne la anwo. Na edwɛkɛdivolɛma ne tetele Pɔɔlo nee Saelase adɛladeɛ mɔɔ bɛwula la na bɛmanle bɛbilale bɛ empele.
44016023	Mɔɔ bɛbole bɛ bɛwiele la, bɛguale bɛ efiade, na bɛzele mɔɔ nea efiade ne azo la kɛ ɔzɔ bɛ nu boɛ.
44016024	Ɔlua zo ɔvale bɛ ɔhɔle efiade ne akunlu lɔ na ɔbɔle bɛ kpanwu.
44016025	Nɔe ne, kɛyɛ alevinli mu nwiɔ avinli, ɛnee Pɔɔlo nee Saelase ɛlɛyɛ nzɛlɛlɛ na bɛlɛto edwɛne bɛaye Nyamenle ayɛlɛ, na menli mɔɔ bɛdabɛ noko bɛgua efiade ne bie la ɛlɛtie bɛ.
44016026	Arɛlevilɛ nu ala azɛlɛ kpusule kpole bie na efiade ne adiabo ne kpusule. Na ɛkɛ ne ala efiade ne nlenkɛ ne mɔ amuala bukebukele na nwɔnzɔnwɔnzɔ mɔɔ dedɛ bɛ la amuala kpolokpolole guale.
44016027	Mɔɔ pilizama sinzavolɛ ne vi nafelɛ nu dunwuele na ɔnwunle kɛ efiade ne nlenkɛ ne mɔ deda nwolɛ la, ɔdwenlenle kɛ menli mɔɔ bɛguale bɛ efiade ne la ɛwie nriandi kɔ, ɛhye ati ɔhwenle ye dadeɛ ne kɛ ɔku ɔ nwo.
44016028	Na Pɔɔlo deanle nu kɛ, “Mmaku ɛ nwo! Yɛ muala yɛwɔ ɛke!”
44016029	Pilizama sinzavolɛ ne manle bɛvale kɛnlaneɛ bɛrale, na ɔvale sulosulo ɔhɔdule ɔdɔle Pɔɔlo nee Saelase agyakɛ anu.
44016030	Ɔvale bɛ ɔvindele na ɔbizale bɛ kɛ, “Yɛmenle mɔ, duzu yɛɛ menyɛ na meanyia ngoane a?”
44016031	Bɛzele ye kɛ, “Die Awulae Gyisɛse di, na ɛdawɔ nee wɔ sua nu amra kɛnyia ngoane.”
44016032	Akee bɛhanle Awulae anwo Edwɛkpa ne bɛhilele ye nee bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛwɔ ye sua nu ɛkɛ ne la amuala.
44016033	Dɔnehwele ne anu ala, pilizama sinzavolɛ ne miemianle bɛ nganlɛ ne mɔ, na ɔvale nwole ɔtotole nu, na ɔmanle bɛzɔnenle ye nee ye sua nu amra amuala.
44016034	Akee ɔvale bɛ ɔhɔle sua nu na ɔmanle bɛ debie bɛlile, na ɔ nee ye sua nu amra lile fɛlɛko kɛ bɛnyia diedi wɔ Nyamenle anu a.
44016035	Aleɛ hyenle la, Wulomu arane mgbanyima ne mɔ zoanle kpolisi mgbanyinli manle bɛhɔzele pilizama sinzavolɛ ne kɛ, “Gyakyi menli ne mɔ maa bɛhɔ.”
44016036	Pilizama sinzavolɛ ne hanle hilele Pɔɔlo kɛ, “Mgbanyima ne mɔ ɛzoa kɛ bɛgyakyi ɛdawɔ nee Saelase. Yemɔti bɛhɔ anzonudwolɛ nu.”
44016037	Na Pɔɔlo zele kpolisi mgbanyinli mɔɔ rale la kɛ, “Bɛdabɛ, mgbane gyɛne ne ala, bɛbo yɛ bagua nu, wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ yɛle Wulomuma la, bɛgua yɛ efiade na akee bɛkpondɛ kɛ bɛye yɛ ahane nyaa bɛmaa yɛkɔ? Yɛnrɛhɔ! Maa Wulomu mgbanyima ne mɔ bɛdabɛ bɛraye yɛ.”
44016038	Kpolisi mgbanyinli ne mɔ hɔhanle edwɛkɛ ɛhye hilele Wulomu mgbanyima ne mɔ. Na mɔɔ bɛdele kɛ Pɔɔlo nee Saelase le Wulomuma la, bɛ ahonle dule.
44016039	Ɛhye ati bɛrale bɛrakpale bɛ kyɛlɛ; bɛyele bɛ efiade ne na bɛzele bɛ kɛ bɛvi suakpole ne azo bɛhɔ.
44016040	Pɔɔlo nee Saelase vi efiade ɛkɛ ne la, bɛhɔle Ledea sua nu. Bɛhɔdole mediema ne bie mɔ wɔ ɛkɛ, bɛdendɛle bɛhilele bɛ, bɛzile bɛ ahonle, na akee bɛhɔle.
44017001	Pɔɔlo nee Saelase kpɔsale hɔle Amfepɔlese nee Apɔlonea na bɛrale Tɛsalonaeka. Dwuuma lɛ nyianu sua wɔ ɛkɛ.
44017002	Kɛmɔ Pɔɔlo yɛ ye ala la, ɔhɔle nyianu sua ne anu na ɔ nee bɛ lile Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne anwo adwelie Ɛnwomenlelielɛ Kenle fane nsa.
44017003	Ɔhilehilele nu ɔmanle bɛnwunle kɛ ɔwɔ kɛ Mɛzaya ne nwu amaneɛ na bɛdwazo ye bɛfi ewule nu, na ɔvale ɔzɔle zolɛ kɛ, “Gyisɛse ɛhye mɔɔ melɛka ɔ nwo edwɛkɛ meahile bɛ la, yemɔ a le Mɛzaya ne.”
44017004	Bɛ nuhua bie mɔ liele lile na bɛhakyile bɛdoale Pɔɔlo nee Saelase; zɔhane ala yɛɛ Gilikima mɔɔ sonle Nyamenle nee mraalɛ mgbanyinli dɔɔnwo ne ala yɛle a.
44017005	Ɛhye anwo akpule hunle Dwuuma ne mɔ. Yemɔti bɛsesale kpamgbanvolɛma bie bɛboɔboale bɛ nloa. Bɛmanle bɛdole nzaka wɔ suakpole ne azo toonwo bɛrale Gyeesen sua nu ɛkɛ kɛ bɛbakpondɛ Pɔɔlo nee Saelase bɛahwe bɛ bɛavinde bagua nu.
44017006	Bɛannwu bɛ la, bɛhwenlenle Gyeesen nee mediema ne bie mɔ bɛvale bɛ bɛhɔmanle mgbanyima ne mɔ kɛ, “Menli ɛhye mɔ mɔɔ ɛbutu ewiade amuala anye aze la ɛra yɛ sua ye azo noko,
44017007	na Gyeesen ɛlie bɛ azie. Bɛ muala bɛlɛbulu Maanle Maanle belemgbunli ne mɛla zo, na bɛkile kɛ belemgbunli bieko eza wɔ ɛkɛ, bɛfɛlɛ ye Gyisɛse.”
44017008	Bɛvale edwɛkɛ ɛhye bɛmanle menli ne nyakanle bɛmanle ɔhanle mgbanyima ne mɔ noko.
44017009	Na nzinlii mgbanyima ne mɔ manle Gyeesen nee mediema ne mɔ duale ezukoa lile bɛ nwo agyinlanu, na bɛgyakyile bɛ bɛmanle bɛhɔle.
44017010	Mɔɔ maanle nu muanle la, mediema ne mɔ manle Pɔɔlo nee Saelase hɔle Bɛlia. Bɛhɔdwule la, bɛhɔle Dwuuma nyianu sua ne anu.
44017011	Dwuuma mɔɔ wɔ ɛkɛ ne la adwenle nu ɛbuke ɛdɛla bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛwɔ Tɛsalonaeka la. Zɔhane ati bɛliele Edwɛkpa ne na dahuu bɛnleɛnleanle Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne anu kpalɛ kɛ saa mɔɔ Pɔɔlo ɛlɛka la le nɔhalɛ a.
44017012	Bɛ dɔɔnwo ne ala liele lile, yɛɛ Giliki mraalɛ nee mrenya dɔɔnwo mɔɔ lɛ duma la noko liele lile.
44017013	Na mɔɔ Dwuuma mɔɔ wɔ Tɛsalonaeka la dele kɛ Pɔɔlo ɛhɔha Nyamenle edwɛkɛ ne wɔ Bɛlia la, bɛrale ɛkɛ ne na bɛrafutule menli ne mɔ ahonle.
44017014	Na ndɛndɛ ne ala mediema ne mɔ manle Pɔɔlo adenle bɛmanle ɔhɔle; na Saelase nee Temɔte hale Bɛlia.
44017015	Menli mɔɔ hɔle Pɔɔlo ɛzɔhonlɛ la vale ye toonwo bɛ nee ye hɔdwule Atɛnse na bɛazia. Na Pɔɔlo vale nrɛlaleɛ manle bɛhɔmanle Saelase nee Temɔte kɛ bɛrɛla waa bɛraboa ye.
44017016	Mɔɔ Pɔɔlo ɛlɛkendɛ Saelase nee Temɔte wɔ Atɛnse la, ɔnwunle kɛ awozonle ɛzonlenlɛ ɛva sua ne, yemɔti ɔlile nyane dɔɔnwo.
44017017	Zɔhane ati ɔhɔle nyianu sua ne anu ɔ nee Dwuuma nee bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnle Dwuuma na bɛsulo Nyamenle la hɔdendɛle. Dahuu ɔkɔgyinla mgbata ne mɔ azo na ɔ nee menli mɔɔ se la tendɛ nwolɛ.
44017018	Eku nwiɔ bie mɔɔ Ɛpekulɛse nee Zɛno a dele la anu kilehilevolɛma rale na bɛ nee Pɔɔlo razule kpolera na bɛzele kɛ, “Na sonlamgbane ɛhye, duzu edwɛkɛ yɛɛ ɔkpondɛ yeaha a?” Bie mɔ noko se, “Ɔzɔho kɛ ɔlɛbɔ ɛzonlenlɛ fofolɛ bie anwo nolo.” Bɛhanle ɛhye, ɔluakɛ Pɔɔlo hanle Gyisɛse nee ewudwazo nwo edwɛkɛ.
44017019	Yemɔti bɛvale Pɔɔlo bɛrale Alɛyɔpagɛse azo bagua ne anu na bɛzele ye kɛ, “Yɛkulo kɛ ɛmaa yɛnwu ngilehilelɛ fofolɛ ɛhye mɔɔ ɛlɛka nwolɛ edwɛkɛ la anu kpalɛ.
44017020	Wɔ edwɛkɛ ne bie mɔ yɛ yɛ nzo nu ngakyile, na yɛkulo kɛ yɛte ɔ bo.”
44017021	(Ɔluakɛ menli mɔɔ wɔ Atɛnse nee nyɛvolɛ mɔɔ wɔ sua ne azo la le menli bie mɔɔ dahuu kulo kɛ bɛnyia mekɛ bɛtie anzɛɛ bɛka debie fofolɛ biala anwo edwɛkɛ a.)
44017022	Pɔɔlo dwazole gyinlanle ayiama ne anyunlu na ɔhanle kɛ, “Atɛnsema, menwu kɛ adenle biala anu, bɛkulo nyamenlezonlenlɛ kpalɛ.
44017023	Mekpɔsa suakpole ye azo dɔɔnwo, na mɔɔ menwu ye la a le kɛ ɛleka biala mɔɔ bɛsonle la ɛdɛneyelɛ ninyɛne wɔ ɛkɛ ne, yɛɛ eza bɛlɛ azubɔlɛ mokyea ko mɔɔ bɛhɛlɛ nwolɛ ‘Ɛhye le Nyamenle ne mɔɔ yɛnze ye la ɛdeɛ’ la wɔ ɛkɛ. Na mɔɔ bɛsonle ye, noko bɛnze ye la, yemɔ yɛɛ mebaha ɔ nwo edwɛkɛ meahile bɛ kɛkala la.
44017024	Nyamenle ne, mɔɔ bɔle ewiade nee mɔɔ wɔ nuhua la amuala la le anwuma nee aze Awulae, na ɔndɛnla sua mɔɔ menli ɛva bɛ sa ɛzi la anu.
44017025	Eza ɔngyia debie biala anwo na sonla ava ɔ sa anloa gyima akpondɛ debie amaa ye, ɔluakɛ ɔdaye a ɔmaa sonla biala ngoane nee ɛnwomenle nee debie biala a.
44017026	Nyamenle bɔle sonla na ɔluale ɔ nwo zo ɔmanle menli ngakyile kɔsɔɔti mɔɔ wɔ aleɛabo la amuala rale. Ɔdaye yɛɛ ɔhyehyɛle ɛleka mɔɔ ɔwɔ kɛ bɛtɛnla nee maanle biala ɛkpazilɛ nee ye azedɔlɛ a.
44017027	Ɔyɛle ɛhye amaa bɛakpondɛ ye kɛ bɛ sa kɛha ye na bɛanwu ye. Noko Nyamenle nee yɛ nuhua biala avinli ande biala,
44017028	ɔluakɛ, ‘Ye nuhua yɛɛ yɛde na yɛkɔ, yɛba, na yɛnyia ngoane a.’ Ɔle kɛ mɔɔ bɛdabɛ bɛ edwɛkɛdwɛndolɛma bie mɔ hanle la. ‘Yɛdayɛ noko yɛle ɔ mra.’
44017029	Saa yɛle ɔ mra a, ɛnee ɔnle kɛ yɛdwenle kɛ Nyamenle le abɔdeɛ bie mɔɔ le kɛ ezukoa nvutuke anzɛɛ dwɛtɛ fufule anzɛɛ bolɛ ananze bie mɔɔ sonla ɔdaye yeva ye adwenle yehyehyɛ na yeyɛ la.
44017030	Nyamenle bule ɔ nye guale zo wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ ɛnee menli ɛnze la. Kɛkala, ɔlɛka yeahile menli kɔsɔɔti mɔɔ wɔ ɛleka biala la kɛ bɛnlu bɛ nwo wɔ bɛ ninyɛndane nwo.
44017031	Ɔluakɛ yehile kenle mɔɔ ɔbalua sonla ne mɔɔ yedu ye yezie ɛkɛ ne la anwo zo yeabua aleɛabo amra kɔsɔɔti ndɛne a. Ɔdwazole sonla zɔhane ɔvile ewule nu ɔvale ɔzile edwɛkɛ ɛhye dawua ɔmanle awie biala.”
44017032	Mɔɔ bɛdele kɛ Pɔɔlo ɛlɛka ewudwazo nwo edwɛkɛ la, bie mɔ golole ɔ nwo, yɛɛ bie mɔ noko zele kɛ, “Yɛkulo kɛ ɛsi edwɛkɛ ɛhye azo na ɛka ye bieko ɛkile yɛ wɔ kenle fofolɛ.”
44017033	Na Pɔɔlo vi ayiama ne anyunlu hɔle.
44017034	Noko menli ne bie mɔ liele lile na bɛhɔbokale ɔ nwo. Bie mɔ a le Dayoneseɛse, mɔɔ boka Alɛyɔpagɛse ayiama ne anwo, nee raalɛ bie mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye Damalese la, yɛɛ bie mɔ dɔɔnwo.
44018001	Ɛhye anzi, Pɔɔlo vile Atɛnse hɔle Kɔlente.
44018002	Ɔhɔdole Dwuunli bie mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye Akoyela na bɛwole ye wɔ Pɔntɛse maanzinli nu la kɛ bɔ zo mɔɔ ɔ nee ɔ ye Pelesela bɛvi Yetale bɛra a, ɔluakɛ ɛnee Belemgbunli Kolɔdeɛse ɛha kɛ Dwuuma mɔɔ wɔ Wulomu la amuala vi maanle ne anu ɛdu. Pɔɔlo hɔle bɛ nwo,
44018003	na kɛmɔ bɛ muala bɛ gyima mɔɔ bɛyɛ bɛdi aleɛ la a le ɛdanlɛ sua ɛyɛlɛ la ati, ɔ nee ye dɛnlanle na ɔ nee bɛ yɛle gyima.
44018004	Ɛnwomenlelielɛ Kenle biala ɔkɔ nyianu sua ne anu ɔ nee bɛ kɔtendɛ, kɛ ɔbɔ mɔdenle yeali Dwuuma nee Gilikima ne mɔ adwenle.
44018005	Mɔɔ Saelase nee Temɔte vi Masidonea rale la ɛnee Pɔɔlo ɛva ye mekɛ muala ɛlɛka Edwɛkpa ne ali daselɛ ahile Dwuuma ne kɛ, Mɛzaya ne a le Gyisɛse.
44018006	Nzinlii mɔɔ bɛtiale mɔɔ ɔlɛka la, bɛhehanle ɛtane dɔɔnwo bɛhilele ye. Ɛhye ati Pɔɔlo kpokpole ye tɛladeɛ ne anu munlutu guale na ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Saa bɛminli a, nwolɛ ɛzonle ɛnzo me. Bɛdabɛ bɛ ɛminlinlɛ nwo ɛzonle zo bɛ! Ɔvi ɛnɛ mɔɔ kɔ la mebahɔ bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnle Dwuuma la anu meahɔha Edwɛkpa ne.”
44018007	Na Pɔɔlo vi ɛleka mɔɔ ɔde la dule na ɔhɔle nrenya bie mɔɔ ɛnle Dwuunli, na ɔsonle Nyamenle la sua nu. Nrenya ne bɛfɛlɛ ye Taeteɛse Gyɛsetɛse; ye sua nu bikye Dwuuma nyianu sua ne.
44018008	Kelesepɛse mɔɔ nea nyianu sua ne azo la nee ye sua nu amra liele Awulae lile, yɛɛ Kɔlentema dɔɔnwo mɔɔ dele Edwɛkpa ne la liele lile na bɛmanle bɛzɔnenle bɛ.
44018009	Kenle ko nɔɔzo Pɔɔlo nwunle Awulae wɔ ɛlalɛ nu kɛ ɔlɛka yeahile ye kɛ, “Pɔɔlo, mmasulo; kɔ zolɛ ka Edwɛkpa ne, mmagyakyi
44018010	na mezua ɛ nzi. Awie biala ɛnrɛhola wɔ ɛhwee yɛ, ɔluakɛ menli dɔɔnwo wɔ sua ye azo mɔɔ bɛle me ɛdeɛ a.”
44018011	Na Pɔɔlo dɛnlanle ɛkɛ ne toonwo ɛvolɛ ko nee foa, ɔhanle Nyamenle edwɛkɛ ne ɔhilele menli ne mɔ.
44018012	Na mɔɔ bɛvale Galeyo bɛyɛle Wulomu amɛnlado mɔɔ nea Giliki maanzinli ne azo la, Dwuuma ne mɔ yɛle ko na bɛhwenle Pɔɔlo bɛhɔle kɛ ɔli ye edwɛkɛ.
44018013	Bɛ ɛzonle mɔɔ bɛdonle ye la a le kɛ, “Sonla ɛhye ɛlɛbɔ mɔdenle yeamaa menli azonle Nyamenle wɔ adenle bie mɔɔ tia yɛ Dwuuma mɛla ne la azo.”
44018014	Pɔɔlo yɛle kɛ ɔsa ɔ ne la, Galeyo zele Dwuuma ne mɔ kɛ, “Saa edwɛkɛ ɛhye yɛle debie mɔɔ tia mɛla anzɛɛ fane nyɛleɛ ɛtane bie anwo a anrɛɛ menwɔdie.
44018015	Na kɛmɔ yehɔyɛ edwɛkɛ nu ngilehilelɛ nee duma yɛɛ bɛdabɛ Dwuuma bɛ mɛla nwo edwɛkɛ la, ɛnee bɛdabɛ bɛhɔnlea na bɛziezie. Edwɛkɛ zɛhae mɔ menrɛdɛnla menrɛli.”
44018016	Na ɔyele bɛ ali wɔ kɔɔto ɛkɛ ne.
44018017	Bɛvindele la, bɛhɔle Sɔsotɛnize mɔɔ nea nyianu sua ne azo la anwo zo na bɛbole ye dwɛɛ wɔ kɔɔto sua ne anyunlu ɛkɛ ne, noko ɛhye anvane Galeyo anwo nretee zɛhae bɔbɔ.
44018018	Pɔɔlo lile mekɛ ekyi wɔ diedima ne mɔ anwo ɛkɛ ne la, nzinlii ɔ nee Pelesela nee Akoyela bɛvile ɛkɛ bɛvale azule nye kɛ bɛkɔ Selea. Bɛdwule Sɛnkilia la Pɔɔlo bɔle ɛwɔkɛ manle Nyamenle, yemɔti ɔmanle bɛkpale ɔ ti.
44018019	Bɛdwule Ɛfɛsɛse la, Pɔɔlo gyakyile Pelesela nee Akoyela. Ɔhɔle Dwuuma nyianu sua ne anu ɔ nee bɛ hɔdendɛle.
44018020	Menli mɔɔ liele lile la bodole ye kɛ ɔ nee bɛ ɛdɛnla ɛhyɛ, na yeamkponle.
44018021	Ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Saa ɔyɛ Nyamenle ɛhulolɛ a mebazia meara.” Na ɔvi Ɛfɛsɛse ɔvale ɛlɛne ɔhɔle.
44018022	Ɔradwule Sizalia la ɔbɔle hwii ɔhɔle Gyɛlusalɛm ɔhɔkpɔlale asɔnema ne mɔ na ɔpɛle nu ɔhɔle Anteɔko.
44018023	Ɔlile mekɛ ekyi wɔ ɛkɛ ne la, ɔvile ɛkɛ ne na ɔhɔkpɔsale Galeehyea nee Felegyea maanzinli ne mɔ anu ɔmanle diedima ne mɔ anwosesebɛ.
44018024	Dwuunli bie mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye Apɔlɔso, mɔɔ bɛwole ye Alɛzandelea, na ɔ nloa ɛde, eza ɔze Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne kpalɛ la rale Ɛfɛsɛse.
44018025	Bɛtete ye wɔ Awulae Adenle ne anu, yemɔti ɔkola ɔka Gyisɛse anwo edwɛkɛ ne fɔɔnwo kpalɛ. Noko Dwɔn ɛzɔnenlɛ ɛdeɛ ne ala a ɔze a.
44018026	Ɔdendɛle akɛnrasesebɛ zo kpalɛ wɔ Dwuuma nyianu sua ne anu. Pelesela nee Akoyela nwunle ye la, bɛvɛlɛle ye bɛ sua nu na bɛhilehilele ye Awulae Adenle ne anwo edwɛkɛ fɔɔnwo.
44018027	Apɔlɔso yɛle ye adwenle kɛ ɔkaluolua Akaya (Giliki maanle nu) yeaha Nyamenle edwɛkɛ ne, zɔhane ati mediema ne mɔ boale ye na bɛhɛlɛle kɛlata bɛmanle ɔhɔmanle mediema mɔɔ wɔ nehane la, kɛ bɛlie ye kɛnlɛma gyɛlɛɛnye. Ɔhɔdwule la ɔyɛle moalɛ kpole ɔmanle bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛlua Nyamenle ɛlolɛ zo bɛrayɛ diedima la.
44018028	Ɔluakɛ ɔka Dwuuma ne mɔ ɔgua mekɛ biala mɔɔ bɛkɛyia kɛ bɛyɛ ngilehilelɛ la na ɔfa Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne ɔkilehile nu wienyi kɛ Mɛzaya ne a le Gyisɛse.
44019001	Mɔɔ Apɔlɔso wɔ Kɔlente la, Pɔɔlo hɔle maanzinli ne anu akpɔsa toonwo ɔravindele Ɛfɛsɛse, na ɔranwunle ɛdoavolɛma bie wɔ ɛkɛ.
44019002	Ɔbizale bɛ kɛ, “Bɛliele bɛlile la, bɛnyianle Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne ɔ?” Bɛzele ye kɛ, “Yɛtɛtele bɔbɔ kɛ Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza bie wɔ ɛkɛ.”
44019003	Ɔbizale bɛ kɛ, “Ɛnee ɛzɔnenlɛ ne boni a bɛnyianle a?” Bɛbuale kɛ, “Dwɔn ɛzɔnenlɛ ne ɔ.”
44019004	Na Pɔɔlo zele bɛ kɛ, “Dwɔn zɔnenle menli mɔɔ nlunle bɛ nwo wɔ bɛ ɛtane nwo la; na ɔzele Yizilayɛma kɛ bɛva bɛ rɛle bɛwula mɔɔ ɔli ɔ nzi ɛlɛba la anu. Na sonla zɔhane a le Gyisɛse.”
44019005	Bɛdele ɛhye la, bɛmanle bɛzɔnenle bɛ wɔ Awulae Gyisɛse duma nu.
44019006	Pɔɔlo vale ɔ sa guale bɛ nwo zo, bɛnyianle Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne na bɛhanle ɛdendɛlɛ ngakyile bɛhanle Nyamenle nrɛlaleɛ ne.
44019007	Bɛ muala bɛkɛyɛ bulu nee nwiɔ.
44019008	Pɔɔlo hɔle nyianu sua ne anu na ɔdendɛle akɛnrasesebɛ zo ɔhilele Dwuuma ne mɔ toonwo siane nsa kɛ ɔmaa bɛanwu Nyamenle Belemgbunlililɛ ne.
44019009	Na kɛmɔ bie mɔ ahonle ɛsolo la ati, bɛ muala bɛanlie bɛanli. Bie mɔ dendɛle ɛtane tiale Awulae Adenle ne wɔ menli somaa ne anyunlu. Zɔhane ati Pɔɔlo gyakyile bɛ na ɔ nee diedima ne mɔ akee kɔtendɛ na ɔkilehile bɛ wɔ Taelanɛse sukulu sua ne anu alehyenlɛ biala.
44019010	Ɛhye hɔle zolɛ ɛvolɛ nwiɔ. Yemɔti ɔmanle bɛdabɛ mɔɔ ɛnee bɛwɔ Ehyea maanzinli ne anu la, Dwuuma nee bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnle Dwuuma la, amuala dele Awulae anwo Edwɛkpa ne.
44019011	Nyamenle luale Pɔɔlo anwo zo yɛle nwanwane ninyɛne mɔɔ yɛ ɛzulolɛ a.
44019012	Saa bɛfa ye hameteduku anzɛɛ ahedazo bɛkɔgua awuleravolɛ nwo zo a, bɛte kpɔkɛ, na sunsum ɛtane ne mɔ fi bɛ nwo nriandi.
44019013	Dwuuma bie mɔ noko mɔɔ bɛdabɛ bɛluolua nu bɛtu sunsum ɛtane la yɛle kɛ bɛfa Awulae Gyisɛse duma bɛayɛ bie. Bɛzele sunsum ɛtane ko kɛ, “Melua Gyisɛse ne mɔɔ Pɔɔlo bɔ ɔ nwo nolo la duma nu mese wɔ kɛ ɛvi ɔ nwo tu.”
44019014	Debie zɛhae, Dwuunli sɛlɛvolɛ kpanyinli bie mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye Siva la amra mrenya nsuu a yɛle a.
44019015	Na sunsum ɛtane ne zele bɛ kɛ, “Meze Gyisɛse, yɛɛ meze Pɔɔlo, na bɛmɛ noko ɛ?”
44019016	Na sonla ne mɔɔ sunsum ɛtane ne gyi ɔ nwo la dele dɔle bɛ nwo zo na ɔhanle bɛ senle dwɛɛ ɔmanle bɛlɛle bɛ nwo zɔhane bɛnriandile bɛvile sua ne anu bɛhɔle, bɛbodɛboda zɛhae ala.
44019017	Dwuuma nee bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnle Dwuuma, mɔɔ wɔ Ɛfɛsɛse la amuala dele mɔɔ zile la; bɛ muala bɛzulole, na ɔmanle bɛlile Awulae Gyisɛse duma ne eni kpole kpalɛ.
44019018	Na menli somaa ne ala mɔɔ liele lile la rale bagua nu rahanle ɛtane mɔɔ bɛyɛ bɛvea la amuala.
44019019	Ngonyiama dɔɔnwo ne ala vale bɛ mbuluku mɔɔ bɛfa bɛyɛ bɛ gyima la rale manle bɛyelale bɛ wɔ bagua nu. Bɛsesenle mbuluku ne mɔ awolɛ la, bɛ muala bɛ nloa dole dwɛtɛ fufule apenle ngoko abulanlu.
44019020	Na ɔlua zɛhae adenle zo Awulae edwɛkɛ ne dɛlɛle na ɔlile konim dɔɔnwo.
44019021	Ɛhye anzi, akee Pɔɔlo yɛle ye adwenle kɛ ɔkɔ Masidonea nee Akaya (Giliki maanle nu) na yeava lɔ yeahɔ Gyɛlusalɛm, na ɔhanle ɔzɔle zolɛ kɛ, “Saa mevi ɛkɛ a mebahɔ Wulomu noko.”
44019022	Zɔhane ati ɔmanle ye boavolɛma ne mɔ nwiɔ, Temɔte nee Yilasetɛse lumuale Masidonea, na yemɔ ɔdɛnlanle Ehyea maanzinli ne anu ekyii.
44019023	Mekɛ ɛhye anu ala Awulae Adenle ne ngilehilelɛ ne ati nzaka zile Ɛfɛsɛse.
44019024	Dwɛtɛ dwinvolɛ bie wɔ ɛkɛ, bɛfɛlɛ ye Dimiteleɛse. Ɔfa dwɛtɛ fufule ɔyɛ bozonle raalɛ Aatɛmese ananze ɔtɔne ye. Zɛhae gyima maa dwinvolɛma nyia ezukoa kpalɛ.
44019025	Kenle ko Dimiteleɛse vɛlɛle ɔ gɔnwo dwinvolɛma manle bɛyiale na ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Ayi mɔ, bɛdabɛ bɛze kɛ yɛ ɛkpazilɛ gyi yɛ gyima ye azo.
44019026	Na bɛdabɛ bɛnwu ye yɛɛ eza bɛde nyɛleɛ mɔɔ Pɔɔlo ye ɛlɛyɛ la; asɛɛ yehakyi bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛwɔ Ɛfɛsɛse ɛke, nee Ehyea maanzinli ye anu la amuala adwenle kɛ ananze mɔɔ sonla ɛva ɔ sa ɛyɛ la ɛnle nyamenle fee.
44019027	Ɛhye kile kɛ yɛ gyima bazɛkye na bozonle raalɛ kpole Aatɛmese ɛzonlenlɛ sua kpole ne adɔ mgbane, mɔɔ ɔnrɛhyɛ biala na ye ɛzonlenlɛ wɔ Ehyea maanzinli ye anu nee ewiade amuala abɔ aze a.”
44019028	Mɔɔ dwinvolɛma ne mɔ dele Dimiteleɛse edwɛkɛ ne la, bɛ muala bɛvale ɛya na bɛdeɛdeanle nuhua kɛ, “Aatɛmese, Ɛfɛsɛsema bozonle raalɛ ne le kpole!”
44019029	He-e-e ko mɔɔ bɛyɛle la pɛle sua bɔdenle ne. Na nzakama ne mɔ dule twi kokye la ɛnee bɛwɔ Masidoneama nwiɔ, Gayɛse nee Alesetaakɛse mɔɔ nee Pɔɔlo a lua la anwo zo nwee. Bɛhwenle bɛ bɛ nee bɛ hɔle ɛleka mɔɔ ɔyɛ a bɛyia la.
44019030	Pɔɔlo yɛle kɛ ɔkɔ bagua ne anu yeahɔdendɛ yeahile bɛ, na diedima ne mɔ amkponle ye.
44019031	Maanzinli ne anu mgbanyima ne bie mɔ, mɔɔ le Pɔɔlo agɔnwo mɔ la noko zoanle manle bɛhɔzele ye kɛ ɔmmaye ɔ nyunlu wɔ ɛlɔne ne anu.
44019032	Mekɛ ne anu ɛnee ɛwudolɛ ala a ɛlɔne ne ɛlɛwudo a. Bie mɔ ɛlɛka edwɛkɛ ko la, ɛnee bie mɔ noko ɛlɛka edwɛkɛ fofolɛ, na ayia sua ne anu yɛle wadawada zɛhae ala, ɔluakɛ bie mɔ dɔɔnwo mɔɔ rale ɛkɛ ne la ɛngola ɛnnwu deɛ holɛ ko mɔɔ ɔlua zolɛ bɛrayia la.
44019033	Bɛ nuhua bie mɔ dwenlenle kɛ Alɛzanda a di nzakadolɛ ne anwo ɛzonle a, ɔluakɛ Dwuuma bie mɔ mɔɔ wɔ ɛkɛ ne la ɛzuhuzuhu ye dedee bɛmaa yeragyinla ɛlɔne ne anyunlu. Alɛzanda bobole bɛ kɛ bɛyɛ koonwu, na ɔyɛle kɛ ɔtendɛ yeahile bɛ.
44019034	Na mɔɔ bɛnwunle kɛ ɔle Dwuunli la, bɛ muala bɛdeɛdeanle nuhua bɛwudole dedee asɛɛ dɔnehwele nwiɔ bɛhanle kɛ, “Aatɛmese, Ɛfɛsɛsema bozonle raalɛ ne le kpole!”
44019035	Nzinlii, maanle abɔlɔba ne nleanle manle ɛlɔne ne yɛle koonwu na ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Ɛfɛsɛsema, awie biala ze kɛ suakpole Ɛfɛsɛse a nea bozonle raalɛ kpole Aatɛmese amonle sua ne nee ye dehelɛ bolɛ ne mɔɔ vi anwuma radɔle aze la azo a.
44019036	Awie biala ɛnzu ɛhye anwo kpolera kɛ yemɔ ɔnze. Yemɔti, bɛha bɛ ahonle bɛgua azule nu, na bɛmmayɛ bɛsɛkye debie.
44019037	Bɛva menli ɛhye mɔ bɛra ɛke wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ bɛtɛwuale bozonle debie yɛɛ bɛtɛkanle munzule edwɛkɛ biala bɛtɛtiale yɛ bozonle raalɛ ne la.
44019038	Saa Dimiteleɛse nee ɔ gɔnwo mɔ lɛ edwɛkɛ bie tia awie a, kɔɔto wɔ ɛkɛ yɛɛ edwɛkɛdivolɛma ne noko wɔ ɛkɛ mekɛ biala. Bɛkola bɛ nee bɛ kɔ lɔ.
44019039	Na saa bɛnea na debie gyɛne bieko wɔ nu mɔɔ yemɔti ɔwɔ kɛ bɛdi ye baguafutu a, ɛnee ɔwɔ kɛ bɛyɛ ye kɛmɔ ngyehyɛlɛ ne kile la.
44019040	Ɔluakɛ saa yɛannea boɛ a yɛbali ɛzonle wɔ nzakadolɛ ɛhye mɔɔ ɛra ɛnɛ la anwo, ɔboalekɛ mɔɔ bɛlɛyɛ la ɛnlɛ ngilenu biala.”
44019041	Ɔhanle ɛhye la ɔmanle bɛzandele.
44020001	Nzinlii mɔɔ nzakadolɛ ne guale la, Pɔɔlo vɛlɛle ɛdoavolɛma ne na ɔmanle bɛ akɛnrazilɛ, ɔ nee bɛ lile nrɛlaleɛ na ɔhɔle Masidonea.
44020002	Ɔvale maanzinli ne mɔ anu na ɔhɔdendɛle ɔzile ɛdoavolɛma ne mɔ ahonle na akee ɔrale Akaya.
44020003	Ɔlile siane nsa wɔ Akaya. Na mɔɔ ɔhuohuanle ɔ nwo kɛ ɔkɔ Selea la, ɔnwunle kɛ Dwuuma ne ɛhɔ ɔ ti akpamo. Yemɔti ɛkɛ ne ala ɔyɛle ye adwenle kɛ ɔpe aze yealua Masidonea yeazia.
44020004	Na Sosepatɛ, mɔɔ le Pelɛse ara nrenya ne mɔɔ vi Bɛlia, yɛɛ Alesetaakɛse nee Sɛkɛndɛse, mɔɔ vi Tɛsalonaeka, Gayɛse mɔɔ vi Dɛbi, yɛɛ Temɔte, akee Tekekɛse nee Tulofemɛse mɔɔ vi Ehyea maanzinli nu la nee ye a hɔle a.
44020005	Menli ɛhye mɔ lumuale yɛ nyunlu hɔhendɛle yɛ wɔ Tulowase.
44020006	Na mɔɔ Angye Ɛvoyia ne pɛle nu la, yɛvale ɛlɛne yɛvile Felepae; ye kenle nnu ne azo yɛhɔdole bɛ wɔ Tulowase na yɛlile dapɛne ko wɔ ɛkɛ.
44020007	Dapɛne ne anu kenle ne mɔɔ lumua la nɔsolɛ nu, yɛyiale nu yɛlile Awulae aleɛ ne, na Pɔɔlo dendɛle hilele diedima ne mɔ, ɔluakɛ ɛnee ye alehyenlɛ nu ɔbahɔ, na ɔhɔle zolɛ ɔdendɛle dedee alevinli mu nwiɔ avinli.
44020008	Ahɛnlaneɛ dɔɔnwo wɔ esanwu ne ekpumgbunli ne mɔɔ yɛwɔ nu la anu.
44020009	Na kpavolɛ bie mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye Yutekɛse, mɔɔ ɛnee de nvɛnzɛlɛ ne mɔ ko azo la bɔle ngɔsɔkɛ, na nzinlii ɔlafele kpole na ɔvi esanwu nzɛzo nsa ne azo ɔdɔle aze. Bɛhɔmanle ye zo la, ɛnee yewu bɔkɔɔ.
44020010	Pɔɔlo dwule aze hɔbutule ɔ nwo zo, ɔbɛlale ye na ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Bɛgyakyi mɔɔ bɛlɛyɛ la na ɔtɛwule.”
44020011	Pɔɔlo ziale hɔle esanwu ne azo bieko na ɔhɔlile debie. Nzinlii eza Pɔɔlo dendɛle hilele menli ne toonwo alehyenlɛ, akee ɔhɛlale bɛ na ɔhɔle.
44020012	Na bɛ nee kpavolɛ ne hɔle sua nu arɛlekyekyelɛ nu mɔɔ ɛnee ɔte kpɔkɛ bɔkɔɔ a.
44020013	Na yɛmɛ yɛvale ɛlɛne yɛlumuale Asɔso kɛ yɛkava Pɔɔlo wɔ ɛkɛ; ɔluakɛ ɛnee ɔ nee yɛ ɛhyehyɛ kɛ ɔpe aze yealumua lɔ.
44020014	Mɔɔ ɔ nee yɛ yiale Asɔso la, ɔravole ɛlɛne ne anu na yɛtelele zolɛ yɛhɔle Metelin.
44020015	Yɛvi ɛkɛ ne la ye alehyenlɛ nu yɛradwule Kayɔso. Aleɛ hyenle bieko la yɛrale Seemɔso, ye alehyenlɛ nu ɛnee yɛwɔ Maelitɛse.
44020016	Pɔɔlo yɛle ye adwenle kɛ ɔnrɛgyinla Ɛfɛsɛse na ɔpɛ nu yeahɔ, amaa yeanzɛkye mekɛ dɔɔnwo wɔ Ehyea maanle ne anu na ɔ nwo ayɛ ndɛ, amaa saa ɔyɛ na ɔkɛyɛ boɛ a, yeadwu Gyɛlusalɛm wɔ Pɛntekɔso kenle ne.
44020017	Pɔɔlo dole Ɛfɛsɛse asɔne mgbanyima ne mɔ nrɛlaleɛ kɛ bɛyia ye wɔ Maelitɛse.
44020018	Bɛrale la ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Bɛdabɛ bɛnwu kɛ mezi mebɔ me ɛbɛla, ɔvi kenle mɔɔ membandwule Ehyea maanle ye anu toonwo mɔɔ ɛradwu ɛnɛ la.
44020019	Wɔ Dwuuma akpamo ne mɔ mɔɔ bɛvale wɔ me ti la amuala anu, mendole me nwo aze menvale monle nee amaneɛnwunlɛ menyɛle me gyima kɛ Awulae akɛlɛ.
44020020	Bɛze kɛ meanva debie biala mɔɔ kɛyɛ moalɛ kɛmaa bɛ la meanvea bɛ, na menzile me ahonle mengilehilele bɛ wɔ bagua nu nee bɛ azua nu.
44020021	Mengakyele Dwuuma nee bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnle Dwuuma la amuala kɛ bɛnlu bɛ nwo wɔ bɛ ɛtane ne mɔ mɔɔ bɛyɛ bɛtia Nyamenle la anwo na bɛlie yɛ Awulae Gyisɛse bɛli.
44020022	Kɛkala melɛkɔ Gyɛlusalɛm, kɛmɔ Sunsum ne ɛhile la. Menze mɔɔ bazi me nwo zo wɔ ɛkɛ ne a,
44020023	mɔɔ meze la a le kɛ Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne ɛhakye me wɔ sua biala azo kɛ efiadedolɛ nee esiane yɛɛ ɛlɛkendɛ me a.
44020024	Noko me ngoane ɛdeɛ, mendwenle nwolɛ, amaa meahola meawie Awulae Gyisɛse gyima ne mɔɔ yeva yemaa me kɛ membɔ Edwɛkpa ne mɔɔ fane Nyamenle ɛlolɛ ne anwo la nolo.
44020025	“Mekpɔsa bɛ nwo zo meha Nyamenle Belemgbunlililɛ ne anwo edwɛkɛ mehile bɛ. Kɛkala, bɛ biala ɛnrɛnwu me nyunlu bieko.
44020026	Ɛhye ati memaa bɛade ɔ bo wienyi ɛnɛ kenle ye kɛ saa bɛ nuhua biala minli a, menli nwolɛ ɛzonle.
44020027	Ɔluakɛ meanva debie biala mɔɔ fane Nyamenle ngyehyɛlɛ ne anwo la meanvea bɛ.
44020028	Bɛnlea bɛ nwo boɛ na bɛnlea mboane ne mɔ mɔɔ Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne ɛva bɛ ɛwula bɛ sa nu la boɛ. Bɛnlea Nyamenle asɔne ne mɔɔ yeva ɔ Ra ne mogya a yekpondɛ la azo boɛ.
44020029	Meze kɛ saa mekɔ a, bɛdi anwo ɛzulolɛ baragua mboane ne mɔ avinli, na bɛnrɛze bɛ anwunvɔne fee.
44020030	Mekɛ bara mɔɔ menli vi bɛ avinli badwazo araha edwɛkɛ adalɛ ahwe diedima ne bie mɔ ahɔli bɛ nzi a.
44020031	Yemɔti bɛnlea boɛ, na bɛhakye kɛ mendwinle monle ɛvolɛ nsa a mengilehilele bɛ wɔ nɔɔzo nee ewiazo a.
44020032	“Kɛkala mefa bɛ mewula Nyamenle nee ye edwɛkɛ ne mɔɔ ɛlolɛ wɔ nu la asa anu. Ɔdo bɛ ngoane nu na ɔva ye nyilalɛ ne mɔɔ yeva yezie ye menli ne ɛkɛ ne la ɔmaa bɛ.
44020033	Me nye ambolo awie biala ezukoa nvutuke, dwɛtɛ fufule anzɛɛ ndanlɛ.
44020034	Bɛdabɛ bɛze kɛ medame me sa anloa gyima mɔɔ meyɛ la yɛɛ meva menlea me nwo nee me gɔnwo mɔ a.
44020035	Mehilehile bɛ wɔ debie biala anu kɛ ɔlua gyima ɛsesebɛ ɛyɛlɛ zo yɛɛ bɛkɛhola bɛkɛboa menli mɔɔ ɛnlɛ anwosesebɛ la a. Bɛhakye Awulae Gyisɛse edwɛkɛ ne mɔɔ ɔhanle la. Ɔse, ‘Nyilalɛ dɔɔnwo wɔ ɛmanlɛ nu tɛla ɛlielɛ.’ ”
44020036	Mɔɔ Pɔɔlo wiele la, ɔ nee bɛ bɛ muala bɛhotole na bɛyɛle nzɛlɛlɛ.
44020037	Mɔɔ bɛlɛfua ye, bɛlɛfo ɔ nvoka anwo bɛayɛ ye tia boɛ la, ɛnee biala ɛlɛsu.
44020038	Debie mɔɔ manle bɛ nwo bubule bɛ kpalɛ bɔbɔ la a le ye edwɛkɛ kpɔkɛ ne mɔɔ ɔhanle kɛ bɛnrɛnwu ye bieko la. Na bɛhɔzɔhonle ye wɔ ɛlɛne ne anwo.
44021001	Yɛ nee bɛ lile nrɛlaleɛ wiele la yɛvi ɛkɛ ne yɛdule yɛluale zo yɛhɔle Kɔɔso; aleɛ hyenle la ɛnee yɛ nyunlu a le Wulodise. Yɛvi ɛkɛ ne la yɛhɔle Patala.
44021002	Ɛkɛ ne yɛɛ yɛvale ɛlɛne mɔɔ ɛlɛkɔ Fonehyea la yɛhɔle a.
44021003	Yɛradwule ɛleka bie mɔɔ ɛnee yɛ nye dua Saepelɛse la yɛwɔnenle yɛ ti nyiakɛ yɛpɛle yɛdɔle Selea. Yɛradwule Taya, na kɛmɔ ɛkɛ ne yɛɛ ɛlɛne ne tu ye ninyɛne ne agua la ati, yɛdwule aze yɛhɔle sua zo.
44021004	Yɛnwunle diedima ne bie mɔ wɔ ɛkɛ, na yɛ nee bɛ hɔdɛnlanle dapɛne ko. Na bɛluale Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne anwo zo bɛzele Pɔɔlo kɛ ɔmmakɔ Gyɛlusalɛm.
44021005	Noko yɛ mekɛ mɔɔ yɛdi ye bɛ nwo ɛkɛ ne la wiele la, yɛvile ɛkɛ ne na yɛzɔle yɛ adendulɛ ne azo. Bɛ muala bɛ nee bɛ ye mɔ nee bɛ mra bɛhɔzɔhonle yɛ wɔ suakpole ne kandiba, na yɛ muala yɛhotole ɛnwea ne azo yɛyɛle nzɛlɛlɛ.
44021006	Akee yɛlile nrɛlaleɛ na yɛhɔvole ɛlɛne ne anu, na bɛdabɛ noko bɛziale bɛhɔle sua nu.
44021007	Yɛzɔle yɛ adendulɛ ne azo, yɛvi Taya yɛhɔle Tɔlɛmeeyese, yɛhɔkpɔlale diedima mɔɔ wɔ ɛkɛ ne la na yɛlale ɛkɛ ne.
44021008	Ye alehyenlɛ nu yɛvi ɛkɛ ne yɛrale Sizalia. Yɛhɔzokoɛle Felepe mɔɔ kpɔsa bɔ Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne nolo la sua nu na yɛ nee ye dɛnlanle. Felepe boka menli nsuu ne mɔɔ bɛkpale nu bɛyele bɛ wɔ Gyɛlusalɛm la anwo.
44021009	Ɔlɛ mralɛ mraalɛ nna mɔɔ ɛtɛkɔle agyalɛ ɛlɛ la wɔ ɛkɛ, bɛle Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛma.
44021010	Yɛlile kenle ekyi ɛkɛ ne la, Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛ bie mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye Agabɛse la vi Dwudiya rale.
44021011	Ɔrale yɛ nwo ɛkɛ ne na ɔvale Pɔɔlo akyeso ne ɔkyekyele ɔdaye ɔ ngome ɔ sa nee ɔ gyakɛ na ɔhanle kɛ, “Kɛ Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne se la ɛne: Sonla ne mɔɔ lɛ akyeso ɛhye la, Dwuuma bakyekye ye zɛhae wɔ Gyɛlusalɛm, na bɛava ye bɛawula bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnle Dwuuma la asa anu.”
44021012	Yɛdele ɛhye la, yɛ nee menli mɔɔ wɔ ɛkɛ ne la amuala yɛkpale Pɔɔlo kyɛlɛ kɛ ɔmmakɔ Gyɛlusalɛm.
44021013	Na ɔbizale yɛ kɛ, “Na ɛzunlɛ ye abo ɛ? Duzu ati a bɛyɛ bɛabɔ me rɛle ɛ? Meziezie me nwo kɛ tɛ ɛkyekyelɛ mɔɔ bɛkyekye me la angome, na kɛ menwɔwu wɔ Gyɛlusalɛm wɔ Awulae Gyisɛse duma ne ati.”
44021014	Yɛyɛle biala, na yeamkponle, yemɔti yɛgyakyile ye na yɛzele kɛ, “Awulae ɛhulolɛdeɛ ɛyɛ ɛkɛ.”
44021015	Yɛlile mekɛ ekyi wɔ ɛkɛ ne la, yɛhuohuanle yɛ nwo na yɛhɔle Gyɛlusalɛm.
44021016	Na ɛdoavolɛma bie mɔɔ wɔ Sizalia la nee yɛ hɔle, na yɛhɔzokoɛle diedinli Meneesen mɔɔ vi Saepelɛse mɔɔ mɔlebɛbo ne ala ɔliele Gyisɛse ɔlile la sua nu.
44021017	Yɛradwule Gyɛlusalɛm la, mediema diedima ne mɔ liele yɛ anyelielɛ nu.
44021018	Aleɛ hyenle la Pɔɔlo nee yɛ hɔle Gyemise ɛkɛ ne kɛ yɛ nee ye kadendɛ; yɛhɔle la ɛnee asɔne mgbanyima ne mɔ amuala wɔ ɛkɛ.
44021019	Pɔɔlo bizale ahye na ɔhanle gyima mɔɔ Nyamenle ɛlua ɔ nwo zo ɛli wɔ bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnle Dwuuma la avinli la amuala ɔhilele bɛ.
44021020	Mɔɔ bɛdiele ye bɛwiele la, bɛyɛle Nyamenle mo na bɛzele Pɔɔlo kɛ, “Adiema Pɔɔlo, tie yɛ ɛ! Yɛlɛ Dwuuma apenle apenle mɔɔ ɛlie Edwɛkpa ne ɛli, noko bɛli Mosisi mɛla ne anzi kpalɛ kpalɛ a.
44021021	Bɛha bɛhile bɛ kɛ ɛlɛkilehile Dwuuma mɔɔ wɔ maanle zo la kɛ bɛgyakyi Mosisi mɛla ne anzi ɛlilɛ, na wɔze bɛ kɛ bɛmmayɛ bɛ mrenyanu nzonlɛ anzɛɛ bɛmmadi Dwuuma maamɛla ne mɔ azo.
44021022	Kɛ ɔkɛyɛ biala la bɛbade kɛ wɔra. Zɔhane ati ɛnee kɛ yɛkɛyɛ ye ɛ?
44021023	Mɔɔ yɛkpondɛ kɛ ɛyɛ la ɛne. Yɛlɛ mgbavolɛ nna mɔɔ ɛbɔ ɛwɔkɛ wɔ Nyamenle anyunlu la wɔ ɛke.
44021024	Ɛ nee bɛ ɛhɔ maa bɛhɔkpa bɛ ti, bɛdu bɛ nwo evinli na tua bɛ ti kakɛ biala maa bɛ. Ɛhye a kɛmaa awie biala kɛnwu kɛ edwɛkɛ mɔɔ bɛhanle wɔ ɛ nwo la amuala ɛnle nɔhalɛ a, na ɛdawɔ mumua ne, ɛdi Dwuu maamɛla ne nee Mosisi mɛla ne mɔ azo.
44021025	Mɔɔ fane bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnle Dwuuma, na bɛlie bɛli la anwo, yɛhɛlɛ kɛlata yɛhɔmaa bɛ kɛ bɛmmadi debie biala mɔɔ bɛva bɛkpa munzule bɛmaa bozonle nee nane mɔɔ bɛlofo ye bɛhu ye la; eza bɛmmadi mogya, na bɛhwe bɛ nwo bɛvi adwɔmane ɛbɔlɛ nwo.”
44021026	Yemɔti Pɔɔlo vale menli ne, na aleɛ hyenle la ɔ nee bɛ hɔle bɛhɔnluanle bɛ nwo. Akee ɔhɔle Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne anu ɔhɔhilele kenle mɔɔ evinli ɛdulɛ ne kɛwie na bɛabɔ awie ko biala ati azu ne la.
44021027	Mɔɔ ɔka ekyii na kenle nsuu ne adwu la, Dwuuma bie mɔɔ vi Ehyea maanle nu rale la nwunle Pɔɔlo wɔ Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne anu. Bɛzɛkyele menli dɔɔnwo adwenle wɔ Pɔɔlo anwo na bɛmanle bɛhɔnwinwinle ye wɔ Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne anu,
44021028	bɛdeɛdeanle nu kɛ, “Yizilayɛma e, bɛrɛla o na sonla ne mɔɔ luolua nuhua ɛlɛkilehile menli atia Yizilayɛma nee Mosisi mɛla ne nee Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ye la, yemɔ ɛne! Eza noko yehɔva menli bie mɔɔ ɛnle Dwuuma la yera Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ye anu yemaa evinli ɛha ɛleka nwuanzanwuanza ɛhye.”
44021029	(Bɛhanle ɛhye, ɔluakɛ ɛnee bɛnwu ye dɛba kɛ Tulofemɛse mɔɔ vi Ɛfɛsɛse la nee Pɔɔlo lua nwo wɔ sua ne azo. Yemɔti ɛnee bɛdwenle kɛ Pɔɔlo nee ye a hɔle Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne anu a.)
44021030	Suakpole ne azo fonyianle, na menli ne mɔ razɔle Pɔɔlo hwenle ye vile Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne anu vindele, na ɛkɛ ne ala bɛtotole Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne nlenkɛ ne mɔ amuala anu.
44021031	Menli ne mɔ akee nyianle adwenle kɛ bɛku Pɔɔlo. Na nrɛlaleɛ hɔdole Wulomu sogyama kpanyinli ne kɛ nzaka ɛzi Gyɛlusalɛm.
44021032	Yemɔti sogyama kpanyinli ne vale ye sogya mgbanyinli ne bie mɔ nee sogyama hanle bɛ nwo waa hɔle ɛlɔne ne anu. Mɔɔ menli ne mɔ nwunle sogyama kpanyinli ne nee sogyama mɔɔ doa ye la, bɛgyakyile Pɔɔlo ɛbolɛ.
44021033	Sogyama kpanyinli ne hɔzɔle Pɔɔlo, na ɔmanle bɛvale nwɔnzɔnwɔnzɔ nwiɔ bɛguale ye. Akee ɔbizale kɛ, “Na nwane a le ɛhye, yɛɛ duzu ɛtane a yeyɛ a?”
44021034	Na menli ne mɔ annwu mɔɔ bɛka a. Bie mɔ ɛlɛka edwɛkɛ ɛhye la, ɛnee bie mɔ noko ɛlɛka edwɛkɛ ngakyile. Yemɔti ɛnee sogyama kpanyinli ne ɛngola ɛnnwu edwɛkɛ kpɔkɛ mɔɔ ɛmaa ɛhye ɛzi la. Yemɔti ɔzele bɛ kɛ bɛva Pɔɔlo bɛhɔ aranemgbole ne anu lɔ.
44021035	Bɛ nee ye hɔle hɔdwule aranemgbole ne kpolike ne anloa la, ɛnee akee ɔwɔ kɛ sogyama ne soa ye bɛ kɔme zo na bɛava ye bɛahɔ, ɔluakɛ ɛnee akee menli ne mɔ anye ɛbolo kpalɛ.
44021036	Bɛ muala bɛdoale bɛ ndinlizo na bɛdeɛdeanle nuhua kɛ, “Bɛhu ye bɛye ye ɛkɛ ne!”
44021037	Bɛ nee Pɔɔlo kɔ ahɔwolo aranemgbole ne anu la, ɔzele sogyama kpanyinli ne kɛ, “Maa me adenle maa menga edwɛkɛ mengile wɔ.” Na sogyama kpanyinli ne zele kɛ, “Hwio, ɛdawɔ mumua ne ɛka Giliki.
44021038	Ɛnee noko tɛ wɔmɔ a ɛle Yigyibitinli ne mɔɔ mekɛ bie mɔɔ ɛze ɛhɔ la vale ngyegyelɛ rale, na ɔvale menli maamɔvo apenle nna ɔhɔle fienemgbole ne azo lɔ la?”
44021039	Pɔɔlo buale ye kɛ, “Mele Dwuunli. Bɛwole me wɔ Taasɛse mɔɔ wɔ Selesea la. Mevi suakpole kpalɛ zo. Mekpa wɔ kyɛlɛ, maa mendendɛ ekyii mengile menli ne mɔ.”
44021040	Na sogyama kpanyinli ne manle ye adenle kɛ ɔdendɛ. Na Pɔɔlo gyinlanle kpolike ne azo, ɔmanle ɔ sa zo ɔbobole menli ne. Mɔɔ bɛ muala bɛyɛle koonwu kpalɛ la, Pɔɔlo dendɛle Hibulu aneɛ nu hilele bɛ zele kɛ,
44022001	“Ayi mɔ, mediema nee egya mɔ, bɛyɛ ɛnzonlɛ bɛdie me bɛmaa menza me ne mengile bɛ!”
44022002	Mɔɔ bɛdele kɛ ɔlɛtendɛ yeahile bɛ wɔ Hibulu aneɛ nu la, bɛ muala akee bɛyɛle koonwu. Na Pɔɔlo hɔle zolɛ hanle kɛ,
44022003	“Mele Dwuunli, bɛwole me wɔ Taasɛse mɔɔ wɔ Selesea maanle nu la. Bɛtetele me wɔ Gyɛlusalɛm ɛke wɔ nwomanli Gameeleɛle sukulu ne anu. Menzukoale yɛ nlenya mɔ mɛla ne nee amaamuo ne kpalɛ, na mendule me nwo memanle Nyamenle, kɛmɔ kɛkala bɛde la.
44022004	Mengyele menli mɔɔ lua Adenle ɛhye azo la dɔɔnwo, mraalɛ nee mrenya, memanle bɛguale bɛ efiade na bɛhunle bɛ.
44022005	Sɛlɛvolɛ Kpanyinli ne nee ayia mgbanyima ne mɔ amuala di daselɛ kɛ mɔɔ melɛka la le nɔhalɛ. Menliele ngɛlata wɔ bɛ lɔ kɛ melɛ mekamaa mediema Dwuuma mɔɔ wɔ Dɛmasekɛse la. Na menzile nu kɛ mekahye menli ɛhye mɔ meagua bɛ anga na meava bɛ meara Gyɛlusalɛm, amaa bɛadea bɛ, kɛmɔ ɔfɛta la.
44022006	“Mɔɔ melua adenle zo melɛkɔ na ɔka ekyii medwu Dɛmasekɛse la, kɛyɛ sɛnzɛngyinla mekɛ nu, arɛlevilɛ nu ala wienyi kpole bie vi anwuma dale bɛnrale yiale me.
44022007	Mempɛle menfinle na mendele kɛ ɛnelɛ bie se, ‘Sɔɔlo, Sɔɔlo! Duzu ati a ɛyɛ me kpɔdekpɔde zɛhae ɛ?’
44022008	Na membizale kɛ, ‘Awulae, ɛdawɔ nwane ɔ?’ Na ɔzele me kɛ, ‘Medame a mele Gyisɛse mɔɔ vi Nazalɛte, mɔɔ wɔdu ɛ nye wɔzie me nyunlu ɛlɛyɛ me kpɔdekpɔde la.’
44022009	Menli mɔɔ nee me lua la nwunle wienyi ne, na bɛande ɛnelɛ ne mɔɔ dendɛle hilele me la.
44022010	Na membizale kɛ, ‘Awulae, duzu a menyɛ a?’ Na Awulae zele me kɛ, ‘Dwazo na kɔ Dɛmasekɛse, na ɛkɛ ne yɛɛ bɛbaha debie mɔɔ Nyamenle ɛhyehyɛ kɛ ɔmaa wɔayɛ la bɛahile wɔ a.’
44022011	Wienyi ne kɛ zile dale la manle me nye zinle. Ɛhye ati me gɔnwo mɔ mɔɔ nee me lua la sosɔle me sa vale me hɔle Dɛmasekɛse.
44022012	“Nrenya bie wɔ Dɛmasekɛse ɛkɛ, bɛfɛlɛ ye Ananayase, ɔdi mɛla ne azo kpalɛ, yɛɛ Dwuuma mɔɔ wɔ Dɛmasekɛse la amuala bu ye.
44022013	Ɔrale ɛleka mɔɔ mewɔ la, ɔragyinlanle me nwo ɛkɛ na ɔzele me kɛ, ‘Adiema Sɔɔlo, nwu debie bieko.’ Na ɛkɛ ne ala me nye zo dele na menwunle debie bieko na meneanle ɔ nyunlu.
44022014	Na ɔhanle kɛ, ‘Yɛ nlenya mɔ Nyamenle ne ɛye wɔ ɛzie ɛkɛ kɛ ɛnwu ye ɛhulolɛdeɛ na ɛnwu ye Fɔɔnwonli sonvolɛ ko ne, na ɛde ɔ ne.
44022015	Ɔluakɛ ɛbali ɔ nwo daselɛ wɔaha mɔɔ wɔde nee mɔɔ wɔnwu ye la wɔahile ewiade amra amuala.
44022016	Na duzu ati a akee ɛlɛkendɛ bieko ɛ? Dwazo na sɛlɛ maa bɛzɔne wɔ bɛnrinzi wɔ ɛtane ne mɔ bɛgua.’
44022017	“Menziale mengɔle Gyɛlusalɛm na mɔɔ mewɔ Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne anu melɛyɛ nzɛlɛlɛ la, me nye hɔle dɔɔnwo,
44022018	na menwunle Awulae kɛ ɔlɛtendɛ yeaze me kɛ, ‘Maa ɛ nwo ɛyɛ ndɛ fi Gyɛlusalɛm. Ɔluakɛ menli mɔɔ wɔ ɛke la ɛnrɛdie daselɛ ne mɔɔ ɛlɛdi ye me nwo la.’
44022019	Na menganle kɛ, ‘Awulae, bɛdabɛ bɛze ye wienyi kɛ medame a anrɛɛ ɛnee mekye menli mɔɔ die wɔ di la, mebo bɛ, metwenle bɛ aze wɔ nyianu azua ne mɔ anu a.
44022020	Mekɛ mɔɔ bɛku wɔ dasevolɛ Sitivin la, ɛnee medame mewɔ ɛkɛ, me kunlu dwole ye ɛhunlɛ nwo na menliele menli mɔɔ hunle ye la ndanlɛ menlɛle bɛ.’
44022021	Na Awulae zele me kɛ, ‘Kɔ, mesoa wɔ wɔ maanle zo moa moa wɔ menli mɔɔ ɛnle Dwuuma la avinli.’ ”
44022022	Menli ne mɔ diele Pɔɔlo toonwo na mɔɔ ɔhanle edwɛkɛ kpɔkɛ ɛhye la bɛ muala bɛ ahonle futule na bɛdeɛdeanle nu kɛ, “Bɛye ye wɔ ɛkɛ ne! Bɛhu ye! Ɔle musuofoɔ!”
44022023	Bɛtea la ɛnee bɛlɛfuandivuandi bɛ ndanlɛ anwuma, na bɛfula anwea bɛsande ye anwomanyunlu, kɛ bɛndie edwɛkɛ biala.
44022024	Zɔhane ati Wulomu sogyama kpanyinli ne zele ye menli ne mɔ kɛ bɛva Pɔɔlo bɛwolo aranemgbole ne anu, na bɛbila ye empele bɛmaa ɔha deɛ holɛ ko mɔɔ ɔlua zo a Dwuuma doa ye ɛlɛwudo la.
44022025	Na mɔɔ bɛkyekyele ye kɛ bɛbila ye empele ne la, Pɔɔlo bizale sogya kpanyinli ko mɔɔ gyi ɔ nwo ɛkɛ ne la kɛ, “Asoo ɔfa mɛla adenle zo kɛ bɛkɛbo Wulomunli mgbane wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ bɛtɛdile ye edwɛkɛ bɛtɛbuale ye fɔlɛ kɛ yedo mɛla la ɔ?”
44022026	Sogya kpanyinli ne dele ɛhye la, ɔhɔle sogyama kpanyinli ne ɛkɛ ne na ɔhɔbizale ye kɛ, “Duzu debie a ɛlɛyɛ la? Nea, sonla ne le Wulomunli.”
44022027	Na sogyama kpanyinli ne rale Pɔɔlo anwo ɛkɛ rabizale ye kɛ, “Na ɛle Wulomunli ɔ?” Pɔɔlo buale ye kɛ, “Ɛhɛe.”
44022028	Na sogyama kpanyinli ne zele ye kɛ, “Mame, menduale ezukoa kpole kpalɛ yɛɛ menyianle zɔhane gyinlabelɛ a.” Pɔɔlo buale ye kɛ, “Mame, bɛwole me Wulomunli.”
44022029	Na ɛkɛ ne ala menli mɔɔ rale kɛ bɛbabizebiza Pɔɔlo edwɛkɛ la vi ɔ nwo ɛkɛ hwenle bɛ nwo. Mɔɔ sogyama kpanyinli ne nwunle kɛ Pɔɔlo le Wulomunli na yegua ye nwɔnzɔnwɔnzɔ la ye ahonle dule.
44022030	Ɛnee sogyama kpanyinli ne kpondɛ kɛ ɔnwu deɛ holɛ ko mɔɔ yemɔti Dwuuma ne ɛlɛto Pɔɔlo ɛzonle la ati, aleɛ hyenle la ɔmanle bɛyele Pɔɔlo nwɔnzɔnwɔnzɔ ne na ɔmanle sɛlɛvolɛ mgbanyinli ne nee ayiama ne mɔ amuala yiale na ɔvale Pɔɔlo ɔragyinlanle bɛ nyunlu ɛkɛ.
44023001	Pɔɔlo nleanle bagua ne na ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Mediema Yizilayɛma, me adwenle ɛmbu me fɔlɛ wɔ me ɛbɛlabɔlɛ nu wɔ Nyamenle anyunlu toonwo a yeradwu ɛnɛ a.”
44023002	Sɛlɛvolɛ Kpanyinli Ananayase dele ɛhye la ɔhanle kɛ bɛbɔ ɔ nloa ne azo.
44023003	Pɔɔlo zele ye kɛ, “Ɛ kunlu le bile, Nyamenle babɔ wɔ bie adua, kɛ ɛde ɛkɛ ne kɛ ɛfa mɛla wɔali me edwɛkɛ, noko wɔbulu mɛla ne azo ɛse bɛbɔ me la.”
44023004	Menli mɔɔ gyi Pɔɔlo anwo ɛkɛ ne la zele ye kɛ, “Hɛe, ɛyɛ Nyamenle Sɛlɛvolɛ Kpanyinli ne aholoba ɔ?”
44023005	Pɔɔlo buale bɛ kɛ, “Mediema Yizilayɛma, menze kɛ ɔle Sɛlɛvolɛ Kpanyinli. Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne se, ‘Mmaka wɔ kpanyinli mɔɔ nea wɔ menli nwo zo la anwo edwɛkɛ ɛtane.’ ”
44023006	Mɔɔ Pɔɔlo nwunle kɛ menli mɔɔ ɛrayia la bie mɔ boka Sadusiima fane ne anwo na foa ko dɔɔnwo noko boka Falasiima fane ne anwo la, ɔdeanle nu ɔzele kɛ, “Mediema Yizilayɛma! Mele Falasiinli, yɛɛ Falasiinli a wole me a. Bɛ nee me ɛra ɛke kɛ bɛbali me edwɛkɛ, ɔboalekɛ melɛ anyelazo kɛ bɛbadwazo mɔwuamra bɛara ngoane nu bieko.”
44023007	Ɔhanle ɛhye ala la, Falasiima ne nee Sadusiima ne mɔ bɔle ɔ bo kɛ bɛdi butule, na ɛlɔne ne lile abunwiɔ.
44023008	(Ɔluakɛ Sadusiima se bɛnrɛdwazo mɔwuamra bɛnrɛvi ewule nu yɛɛ, eza Nyamenle soanvolɛ anzɛɛ sunsum biala ɛnle ɛkɛ. Noko Falasiima, bɛmɛ bɛdie edwɛkɛ nsa ɛhye mɔ bɛto nu.)
44023009	Bɛdeanle kpalɛ, na mɛla kilehilevolɛma bie mɔ mɔɔ boka Falasiima fane ne anwo la dwazole hanle kɛ, “Yɛnnwu ɛtane biala wɔ sonla ne anwo! Ɔkɛyɛ zɔhane kɛ Nyamenle soanvolɛ bie anzɛɛ sunsum bie ɛdendɛ ɛhile ye amgba.”
44023010	Nzinlii akee ɛdeanlɛ ne bole zolɛ na sogyama kpanyinli ne zulole kɛ bɛkɛhu Pɔɔlo la ati, ɔmanle sogyama ne mɔ dwule aze hɔle bagua ne anu hɔyele Pɔɔlo wɔ ayiama ne avinli bɛ nee ye hɔle aranemgbole ne anu bieko.
44023011	Kenle ko ne nɔe ne, Awulae ragyinlanle Pɔɔlo anwo ɛkɛ ne na ɔzele ye kɛ, “Gyinla kpundii! Wɔli me nwo daselɛ bɔkɔɔ wɔ Gyɛlusalɛm ɛke, na ɔwɔ kɛ ɛyɛ ye zɔhane noko wɔ Wulomu.”
44023012	Aleɛ hyenle la, Dwuuma bie yɛle ko vale adwenle na bɛlile amonle kɛ saa bɛtɛkunle Pɔɔlo a bɛnrɛli aleɛ yɛɛ bɛnrɛnlo nzule.
44023013	Bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛvale adwenle ɛhye la bo abulanla.
44023014	Na bɛhɔle Sɛlɛvolɛ Kpanyinli ne nee mgbanyima ne mɔ ɛkɛ, na bɛzele bɛ kɛ, “Yɛli amonle kɛ yɛnrɛli aleɛ yɛɛ yɛnrɛnlo nzule kyesɛ yɛku Pɔɔlo kolaa.
44023015	Yemɔti, bɛ nee ayiama ne ɛbɔ nu na bɛzoa bɛmaa bɛhɔze Wulomu sogyama kpanyinli ne kɛ ɔmaa bɛva Pɔɔlo bɛrɛla na bɛkpondɛ kɛ bɛbizebiza ye edwɛkɛ ne anu kpalɛ. Na kɛ ɔkɛyɛ biala la toonwo mɔɔ ɔkadwu ɛke la ɛnee yɛhu ye.”
44023016	Pɔɔlo awozoa nrenya ne dele ɛhye anwo bie. Zɔhane ati ɔhɔle aranemgbole ne anu ɔhɔfetele zolɛ ɔhilele Pɔɔlo.
44023017	Na Pɔɔlo vɛlɛle sogya kpanyinli ko na ɔzele ye kɛ, “Fa kpavolɛ ye kɔ sogyama kpanyinli ne ɛkɛ na ɔlɛ edwɛkɛ ɔka yeahile ye.”
44023018	Sogya ne vale kpavolɛ ne hɔle bɛ kpanyinli ne ɛkɛ ne na ɔzele kɛ, “Pilizanli Pɔɔlo vɛlɛle me na ɔzele me kɛ menva kpavolɛ ye membɛlɛ wɔ na ɔlɛ edwɛkɛ ɔka yeahile wɔ.”
44023019	Na sogyama kpanyinli ne zɔle kpavolɛ ne asa, ɔvale ye ɔhɔle ahane, na ɔbizale ye kɛ, “Duzu edwɛkɛ a ɛ nee ye rale a?”
44023020	Kpavolɛ ne zele ye kɛ, “Dwuu mgbanyima ne ɛli bɛ nloa kɛ ɛhyema bɛbaraha bɛahile wɔ kɛ ɛva Pɔɔlo ɛrɛla bagua ne anyunlu ɛmaa bɛdie ye edwɛkɛ ne kpalɛ.
44023021	Na bɛba a mmatɛne bɛ zo, ɔluakɛ bɛ nuhua mɔɔ bo abulanla la barazia adenle nu. Menli ɛhye mɔ ɛli amonle kɛ saa bɛtɛkunle Pɔɔlo a bɛnrɛli aleɛ yɛɛ bɛnrɛnlo nzule. Yemɔti kɛkala bɛwie bɛ nwo boɔboa, wɔmɔ ala a bɛlɛkendɛ kɛ ɛkɛkponle zolɛ a.”
44023022	Na sogyama kpanyinli ne zele ye kɛ, “Mede. Mmabɔ zolɛ ɛkile awie biala kɛ wɔraha ɛhye wɔhile me.” Na ɔmanle ɔhɔle.
44023023	Sogyama kpanyinli ne vɛlɛle sogya mgbanyinli nwiɔ na ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Bɛmaa ɔyɛ ndɛ bɛhɔva sogyama mɔɔ dua aze la ɛya nwiɔ yɛɛ atwɛdolɛ sogyama ɛya nwiɔ na bɛ nee sogyama mɔɔ tɛnla ɛkpɔnwɔ zo la abulasuu bɛhɔ toonwo bɛhɔdwu Sizalia. Bɛha bɛ nwo na bɛdu bɛ bo ɛke ɛnɛ nɔsolɛ dɔne ngɔnla.
44023024	Bɛziezie ɛkpɔnwɔ ko noko bɛmaa Pɔɔlo ɛdɛnla zolɛ na bɛva ye gyɛlɛɛnye bɛhɔmaa amɛnlado Filekese.”
44023025	Na sogyama kpanyinli ne hɛlɛle kɛlata ɛhye manle bɛhɔle:
44023026	“Medame Kolɔdeɛse Lesease a melɛkɛlɛ kɛlata ɛhye mearɛlɛ Amɛnlado Filekese a, mebiza wɔ ahye.
44023027	Dwuuma zɔle nrenya ɛhye nu mɔɔ anrɛɛ bɛku ye a. Na mendele kɛ ɔle Wulomunli la ati menvale sogyama mengɔnliele ye.
44023028	Memkpondɛle kɛ menwɔnwu ye nvoleɛ, yemɔti menvale ye mengɔle bɛ ayia ne anyunlu kɛ mekadie nu kpalɛ.
44023029	Na menwunle kɛ ɔtɛyɛle debie mɔɔ fɛta ɛhunlɛ anzɛɛ efiade ɛdolɛ bɔbɔ a. Bɛ ɛzonledonlɛ ne fane bɛdabɛ bɛ mɛla nwo.
44023030	Eza mede kɛ bɛvua kɛ bɛnyia ye a bɛkɛhu ye, yemɔti meyɛ kɛ bɛva ye bɛrɛlɛ wɔ. Meze menli mɔɔ donle ye ɛzonle la noko kɛ bɛva bɛ edwɛkɛ ne bɛrado ɛ nyunlu.”
44023031	Sogyama ne yɛle bɛ gyima ne kɛmɔ bɛhilele bɛ la na nɔe ne ala bɛvale Pɔɔlo bɛ nee ye hɔle toonwo bɛhɔdwule Antepatelese.
44023032	Aleɛ hyenle la sogyama ne mɔɔ dua aze la ziale rale aranemgbole ne anu na sogyama ne mɔɔ tɛnla ɛkpɔnwɔ zo la vale Pɔɔlo hɔle.
44023033	Bɛ nee ye hɔdwule Sizalia la bɛyele kɛlata ne bɛmanle amɛnlado ne na bɛvale Pɔɔlo noko bɛwulale ɔ sa nu.
44023034	Amɛnlado ne gengale kɛlata ne wiele la, ɔbizale Pɔɔlo maanzinli mɔɔ ɔvi nu la. Mɔɔ ɔdele kɛ ɔvi Selesea la
44023035	ɔzele ye kɛ, “Saa menli mɔɔ ɛdo wɔ ɛzonle la ba a mebanlea wɔ edwɛkɛ ne anu.” Na ɔzele kɛ bɛva Pɔɔlo bɛhɔzie Hɛlɔdo aranemgbole ne anu ɛleka mɔɔ ɔdaye amɛnlado ye gyima ne abo wɔ la na bɛzinza ye.
44024001	Ɛhye anzi kenle nnu Sɛlɛvolɛ Kpanyinli Ananayase nee mgbanyima ne bie mɔ yɛɛ bɛ kamaavolɛ ko mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye Tɛtɛlɛse la rale Sizalia. Bɛvale ɛzonle mɔɔ bɛvale bɛdole Pɔɔlo anwo zo la bɛradole amɛnlado ne anyunlu.
44024002	Bɛvale Pɔɔlo bɛragyinlanle ɛkɛ, na Tɛtɛlɛse bɔle Pɔɔlo ɛzonledonlɛ ne abo zɛhae. “Nana, ɛle kpanyinli nrɛlɛbɛvolɛ la ati, yɛ nzo nu ɛdwo yɛ toonwo yeradwu ɛnɛ. Na ɔlua zolɛ maanzinli ye ɛnyia anyunluhɔlɛ.
44024003	Yɛ nye sɔ mɔɔ wɔyɛ la amuala, yɛyɛ wɔ mo somaa.
44024004	Mengulo kɛ mesɛkye wɔ mekɛ biala, yemɔti mesɛlɛ wɔ, tie yɛ edwɛkɛ sikalɛ ɛhye.
44024005	Yɛnwu kɛ sonla ɛhye le agyegyeamra kpalɛ, ɔlɛtwehwe manzonle yeado Dwuuma mɔɔ wɔ aleɛabo la amuala avinli. Ɔli fane ne mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye Nazalin la ati.
44024006	Eza noko ɔbɔle mɔdenle kɛ ɔfa evinli yeaha yɛ Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne yɛɛ yɛhyele ye a. [Na anrɛɛ yɛkpondɛ kɛ yɛdua yɛdayɛ yɛ mɛla ne azo yɛdi ye edwɛkɛ.
44024007	Na sogyama kpanyinli Lesease vale ɛlɔnema razale yɛ liele ye yɛ sa nu,
44024008	na ɔhanle kɛ saa yɛlɛ edwɛkɛ bie a ɛnee yɛrɛla ɛ nyunlu.] Saa ɛdawɔ ɛbizebiza sonla ye edwɛkɛ ne anu a ɛkɛnwu kɛ mɔɔ yɛlɛka la le nɔhalɛ.”
44024009	Dwuuma ne mɔ amuala nee ye yɛle adwenle na bɛhanle kɛ mɔɔ yeha la amuala le nɔhalɛ.
44024010	Amɛnlado ne yɛle kɛ Pɔɔlo ɛdendɛ, na Pɔɔlo hanle kɛ, “Meze kɛ ɛvale edwɛkɛlilɛ wɔ maanle ɛhye anu la ɛhyɛ, yemɔti menzulo kɛ menwɔha me edwɛkɛ menwɔhile wɔ.
44024011	Kɛmɔ ɛdawɔ ɛkola ɛnwu ye la, kenle bulu nee nwiɔ ɛne yɛɛ mengɔle Gyɛlusalɛm kɛ mekayɛ nzɛlɛlɛ a.
44024012	Dwuuma ye annwu me wɔ Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne anu kɛ me nee awie ɛlɛdi butule, anzɛɛ melɛkilehile menli debie ɛtane wɔ bɛ nyianu sua ne anu, anzɛɛ ɛleka biala wɔ suakpole ne azo.
44024013	Bɛngola bɛnzi bɛ ɛzonledonlɛ ne pi bɔbɔ.
44024014	Ko mɔɔ medie meto nu la a le kɛ melua Awulae Adenle ye mɔɔ bɛmɛ bɛse ɔnle nɔhalɛ la azo yɛɛ mesonle yɛ nlenya mɔ Nyamenle ne a. Noko eza medie mɔɔ bɛhɛlɛ ye wɔ Mosisi mɛla ne anu, nee Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛma mbuluku ne mɔ anu la medi.
44024015	Me anyelazo mɔɔ melɛ wɔ Nyamenle anu la le kɛ mɔɔ bɛdabɛ bɛlɛ ye ala la, kɛ menli kɔsɔɔti, ɛtanevolɛma nee kpalɛyɛlɛma badwazo ara ngoane nu.
44024016	Ɛhye ati yɛɛ mebɔ mɔdenle kɛ menwɔnyia adwenle mɔɔ nuhua te la wɔ Nyamenle nee menli nyunlu a.
44024017	“Kɛmɔ menvile Gyɛlusalɛm la ɛvolɛ dɔɔnwo ɛze la ati, mengɔle ɛkɛ ne kɛ melɛ ezukoa nee azubɔlɛ ninyɛne mekamaa me menli ne mɔ.
44024018	Mɔɔ mewɔ ɛhye azo la yɛɛ bɛnwunle me wɔ Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne anu a, mekɛ ne anu ɛnee melɛtu me nwo evinli. Menli dɔɔnwo biala ɛnle ɛkɛ yɛɛ basabasa biala anzi.
44024019	Na Dwuuma bie mɔ bɔbɔ mɔɔ vi Ehyea maanle nu na bɛwɔ ɛkɛ ne bie la, bɛmɛ yɛɛ saa bɛlɛ edwɛkɛ bɛka bɛtia me a ɛnee ɔwɔ kɛ bɛba ɛ nyunlu na bɛbaka bɛ edwɛkɛ mɔɔ bɛ nee me lɛ ye la a.
44024020	Anzɛɛ maa bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛwɔ ɛke kɛkala la bie ɛha ɛtane holɛ ko mɔɔ bɛnwunle ye me nwo wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ megyi bagua ne anyunlu la.
44024021	Bɛannwu ɛhwee kɛ edwɛkɛ kpɔkɛ ko ne ala mɔɔ menganle wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ megyi bɛ nyunlu wɔ bagua ne anu la kɛ, ‘Bɛva me bɛra bɛ nyunlu ɛke, ɔluakɛ medie medi kɛ bɛbadwazo mɔwuamra bɛara ngoane nu bieko.’ ”
44024022	Filekese ze Awulae Adenle ɛhye anwo bie kpalɛ, yemɔti ɔdule edwɛkɛ ne ɔziele na ɔzele kɛ, “Saa sogyama kpanyinli Lesease ba a mebanwu mɔɔ meka ye wɔ bɛ edwɛkɛ ne anwo a ɔkɛyɛ boɛ la.”
44024023	Akee ɔzele sogya kpanyinli ne mɔɔ Pɔɔlo wɔ ɔ sa nu la kɛ ɔnlea ye boɛ, na ɔmaa ɔnyia adenle ɔkpundi ɔ nwo, na ɔmaa ɔ gɔnwo mɔ adenle ɔmaa bɛva ninyɛne mɔɔ ɔhyia nwo la bɛrɛlɛ ye.
44024024	Kenle ekyi guale nu la Filekese nee ɔ ye Dulusela mɔɔ le Dwuunli la rale. Ɔzoanle ɔmanle bɛhɔvale Pɔɔlo na ɔmanle ɔhanle diedi wɔ Gyisɛse Kelaese anu anwo edwɛkɛ ɔmanle ɔdiele bie.
44024025	Pɔɔlo noko hɔle zolɛ, na mɔɔ ɔka boɛlilɛ, bɛ nwo zo ɛhomonlɛ, yɛɛ Ndɛnebualɛ Kenle ne mɔɔ bara la anwo edwɛkɛ la, Filekese ahonle dule na ɔzele kɛ, “Yeyɛ boɛ, kɔ. Saa menyia alagye a mebazoa meamaa bɛarava wɔ bieko.”
44024026	Na ɛnee eza ye adwenle ko noko a le kɛ Pɔɔlo kɛmaa ye ezukoa. Ɛhye ati ɔmanle bɛhɔle ye ɛvalɛ wazowazo ɔ nee ye dendɛle.
44024027	Mɔɔ ɛvolɛ nwiɔ pɛle nu la, Pɔseɛse Fɛsetɛse ralile amɛnlado Filekese agyakɛ anu. Na kɛmɔ ɛnee Filekese kulo kɛ ɔnyia ɔ nyunlu wɔ Dwuuma anyunlu la ati, ɔmanle Pɔɔlo hale efiade ne.
44025001	Mɔɔ Fɛsetɛse radwule maanzinli ne anu la, ye kenle nsa yɛɛ eza ɔvi Sizalia ɔhɔle Gyɛlusalɛm a.
44025002	Sɛlɛvolɛ mgbanyinli ne mɔ nee Dwuu mgbanyima ne mɔ radonle Pɔɔlo ɛzonle bieko wɔ ɛkɛ ne. Bɛkpale Fɛsetɛse kyɛlɛ kɛ
44025003	ɔli ɔboa bɛ na ɔva Pɔɔlo ɔrɛla Gyɛlusalɛm, ɔluakɛ ɛnee bɛlɛ adwenle kɛ bɛtɛ ye wɔ adenle nu bɛahu ye.
44025004	Na Fɛsetɛse buale bɛ kɛ, “Pɔɔlo la efiade wɔ Sizalia, yɛɛ medame mumua ne ɔnrɛhyɛ na meazia meahɔ ɛkɛ.
44025005	Yemɔti saa bɛnea na yeyɛ bɛ ɛtane bie a ɛnee bɛmaa bɛ menli mɔɔ li bɛ ti la nee me ɛhɔ Sizalia na bɛhɔha bɛ edwɛkɛ ne.”
44025006	Fɛsetɛse lile kenle kɛyɛ mɔtwɛ mɔɔ kɔ bulu la wɔ Gyɛlusalɛm kolaa na yeazia yeahɔ Sizalia. Aleɛ hyenle ala la ɔhɔdɛnlanle ye ebia nu kɛ bɛva Pɔɔlo bɛrɛla ɔ nyunlu.
44025007	Mɔɔ Pɔɔlo rale la, Dwuuma mɔɔ vi Gyɛlusalɛm rale la radonle ye ɛzonle mgbole bie mɔɔ akee bɛdabɛ bɔbɔ bɛngola bɛngilehile nu a.
44025008	Pɔɔlo zale ɔ ne kɛ, “Metɛyɛle ɛtane biala metɛtiale Dwuuma mɛla ne anzɛɛ Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne na yeayɛ Wulomu Maanle Maanle belemgbunli ne.”
44025009	Na kɛmɔ Fɛsetɛse kpondɛ ɔ nyunlu wɔ Dwuuma anyunlu la ati, ɔbizale Pɔɔlo kɛ, “Ɛkɛhulo kɛ ɛkɛhɔ Gyɛlusalɛm na ɛkɔhɔye ɛzonledonlɛ ɛhye mɔ anloa wɔ me nyunlu ɔ?”
44025010	Pɔɔlo buale ye kɛ, “Megyi Wulomu Maanle Maanle belemgbunli ɔdaye ye ndɛnebualɛ ebia nyunlu, yɛɛ ɛke a ɔwɔ kɛ bɛdi me edwɛkɛ a. Metɛyɛle Dwuuma ɛtane biala, kɛmɔ ɛdawɔ wɔnwu ye la.
44025011	Saa medo mɛla bie mɔɔ maa mefɛta ewule a menzulo kɛ bɛkɛhu me. Na saa nɔhalɛ biala ɛnle bɛ ɛzonledonlɛ ne anu ɛdeɛ a, ɛnee noko ɔnle kɛ awie biala ye me maa bɛ. Zɔhane ati medo me edwɛkɛ ne memaa Maanle Maanle belemgbunli ne.”
44025012	Fɛsetɛse nee ye mgbanyima ne mɔ hanle bɛ ti kpulale nwolɛ, na Fɛsetɛse buale Pɔɔlo kɛ, “Saa wɔdo wɔ edwɛkɛ ne wɔmaa Maanle Maanle belemgbunli ne a ɛnee ɛkɛ ne ala a ɛkɛhɔ a.”
44025013	Mekɛ guale nu la Belemgbunli Agelepa mɔɔ tɔ zo nwiɔ la nee ɔ ye Bɛnaesi rale Sizalia kɛ bɛbakpɔla Fɛsetɛse bɛayɛ ye akoaba.
44025014	Na nzinlii mɔɔ bɛlile kenle ekyi wɔ ɛkɛ ne la Fɛsetɛse hanle Pɔɔlo edwɛkɛ ne hilele belemgbunli ne kɛ, “Filekese gyakyile awie bie wɔ efiade ɛkɛ.
44025015	Na mekɛ mɔɔ mengɔle Gyɛlusalɛm la, Dwuuma sɛlɛvolɛ mgbanyinli nee Dwuu mgbanyima ne mɔ radonle ye ɛzonle hilele me kɛ menli ye edwɛkɛ membua ye ewule fɔlɛ.
44025016	Na menzele bɛ kɛ ɔnle Wulomu mɛla kɛ bɛkɛye awie biala mɔɔ bɛkɛdo ye ɛzonle kɛ yedo mɛla la bɛkɛmaa kyesɛ ɔ nee menli mɔɔ donle ye ɛzonle ne la yia nu bɛka bɛmaa ɔdaye ɔnyia adenle ɔsa ɔ ne wɔ nwolɛ.
44025017	Yemɔti bɛ muala bɛrale ɛke, na meanva meando aze. Ye alehyenlɛ nu ala yɛɛ mendɛnlanle aze kɛ medi edwɛkɛ ne a.
44025018	Menli ne mɔ dwazole la, bɛangola bɛanga edwɛkɛ kpaziwɔkɛ biala bɛando ɔ nwo zo kɛ yedo mɛla kpole bie, kɛmɔ mendwenlenle la.
44025019	Mɔɔ bɛyɛle ala la a le bɛ nyamenlezonlenlɛ nwo kpolerazulɛ yɛɛ awie bie mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye Gyisɛse, mɔɔ ɛwu, na Pɔɔlo kile kɛ ɔde aze la anwo kpolerazulɛ.
44025020	Kɛmɔ ɛnee mengola mennwu adenle mɔɔ mefa zolɛ a menwɔnwu edwɛkɛ ɛhye anu kpalɛ la, membizale Pɔɔlo saa ɔkɛhulo kɛ ɔkɛhɔ Gyɛlusalɛm na bɛahɔli edwɛkɛ ɛhye wɔ ɛkɛ a.
44025021	Na Pɔɔlo buale kɛ memaa bɛva edwɛkɛ ne bɛhɔ Maanle Maanle belemgbunli ne ɔdaye ɔ nyunlu. Yemɔti memaa bɛva ye bɛzie kɔkpula mekɛ mɔɔ bɛ nee ye kɛhɔ la.”
44025022	Na Belemgbunli Agelepa zele Fɛsetɛse kɛ, “Mekulo kɛ metie sonla ɛhye edwɛkɛ ne bie.” Fɛsetɛse buale kɛ, “Ɛhyema ɛkɛdie ye.”
44025023	Yemɔti aleɛ hyenle la Agelepa nee Bɛnaesi zieziele bɛ nwo kpalɛ na bɛ nee sogya mgbanyinli nee suakpole ne azo adile adile hɔle ɛleka mɔɔ bɛdi edwɛkɛ la, na Fɛsetɛse manle bɛhɔvale Pɔɔlo bɛrale.
44025024	Fɛsetɛse zele kɛ, “Belemgbunli Agelepa, nee bɛdabɛ mgbanyima mɔɔ bɛ nee yɛ wɔ ɛke la amuala, nrenya ɛhye, Dwuuma amuala mɔɔ wɔ Gyɛlusalɛm nee ɛke la ɛrado ye ɛzonle ɛhile me, na bɛkile kɛ ɔnle kɛ ɔtɛnla ngoane nu bieko.
44025025	Me afoa nu ɛdeɛ, menleɛnlea edwɛkɛ ne anu la menwu kɛ ɔtɛyɛle debie mɔɔ maa ɔfɛta ewule a. Na kɛmɔ ɔdaye mumua ne ɔse ɔfa ye edwɛkɛ ne yeahɔ Maanle Maanle belemgbunli ne anyunlu la, meyɛ kɛ memaa bɛava ye bɛahɔ.
44025026	Noko mennwu edwɛkɛ kpaziwɔkɛ mɔɔ megyinla zolɛ meahɛlɛ meahɔmaa Maanle Maanle belemgbunli ne a. Yemɔti me nee ye ɛra bɛ nyunlu ɛke, bɔbɔ wɔmɔ Belemgbunli Agelepa, amaa wɔanleɛnlea ye edwɛkɛ ne anu boɛ, na meanyia edwɛkɛ kpalɛ meahɛlɛ meahɔ.
44025027	Ɔluakɛ menea a ɔnwie nrɛlɛbɛ yɛ kɛ melɛ pilizanli melɛkɔ na menlɛ ɔ nwo ɛzonledonlɛ kpalɛ biala a.”
44026001	Belemgbunli Agelepa zele Pɔɔlo kɛ, “Ɛlɛ adenle ɛsa ɛ ne.” Na Pɔɔlo manle ɔ sa zo na ɔzale ɔ ne kɛ:
44026002	“Belemgbunli Agelepa, ɔyɛ me fɛ kpole kɛ mesa me ne wɔ ɛ nyunlu ɛnɛ wɔ ɛzonle mɔɔ Dwuuma ɛva ɛdo me nwo zo la anwo a.
44026003	Ɔluakɛ wɔmɔ, ɛze Dwuuma maamɛla ne kpalɛ. Yemɔti, mesɛlɛ wɔ, nyia abotane na tie me.
44026004	“Ɔvi me ngakula nu, Dwuuma amuala ze kɛ mezi mebɔ me ɛbɛla la. Bɛze kɛ membɔle me ɛbɛla bo wɔ me maanle ye anu, nee Gyɛlusalɛm.
44026005	Bɛze, yɛɛ saa bɛdi nɔhalɛ a, anrɛɛ bɛkola bɛdi daselɛ kɛ mɔlebɛbo ne amuala ɛnee meboka ɛzonlenlɛ fane ɛsesebɛ ne mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye Falasii la anwo.
44026006	Kɛkala megyi ɛke kɛ bɛdi me edwɛkɛ, ɔluakɛ melɛ anyelazo wɔ Nyamenle ɛwɔkɛ ne mɔɔ ɔbɔle yɛ nlenya mɔ la anu.
44026007	Ɛwɔkɛ ne ati yɛɛ yɛ mbusua ekpunli bulu nee nwiɔ ye gua ɛzonlenlɛ zo alehyenlɛ nee aledwolɛ, kɛ saa bɛkɛnyia ye a. Na anyelazo ɛhye ala ati, Nana, yɛɛ Dwuuma ɛlɛto me ɛzonle zɛhae a.
44026008	Na duzu ati yɛɛ bɛmɛ Dwuuma bɛnlie bɛnli kɛ Nyamenle badwazo mɔwuamra ɛ?
44026009	“Medame, ɛnee medwenle kɛ ɔle me gyima kɛ ɔwɔ kɛ mebɔ mɔdenle meyɛ debie biala metia Gyisɛse ɛhye mɔɔ vi Nazalɛte la duma ne,
44026010	yɛɛ mɔɔ menyɛle ye wɔ Gyɛlusalɛm la ɛne. Menliele tumi wɔ sɛlɛvolɛ mgbanyinli ne mɔ ɛkɛ ne na menguale Nyamenle menli ne dɔɔnwo efiade. Eza saa bɛbua bɛ ewule fɔlɛ a, meto me ɛma mefua zolɛ.
44026011	Mekɛ dɔɔnwo ne ala memanle bɛdeanle bɛ wɔ nyianu azua ne mɔ anu, na membɔle mɔdenle kɛ memaa bɛ ngome bɛaha ɛtane bɛatia bɛ ɛzonlenlɛ ne. Me nye bolole bɛ nwo kpalɛ manle ɔrale kɛ akee mekɔ azuamgbole zo wɔ maanle maanle zo yɛɛ mekɔkye bɛ meba a.
44026012	“Ɛhye ala anwo bie yɛɛ sɛlɛvolɛ mgbanyinli ne mɔ manle me tumi kɛlata manle mengɔle Dɛmasekɛse a.
44026013	Na wɔ adevinli ne, kɛyɛ sɛnzɛngyinla, Nana, yɛɛ menwunle kɛ wienyi mɔɔ ta tɛla sɛnzɛne la, vi anwuma ɛrabɛnra ɛyia me nee menli mɔɔ me nee bɛ lua la a.
44026014	Yɛ muala yɛpɛle yɛfinle, na mendele ɛnelɛ bie kɛ ɔlɛtendɛ yeahile me wɔ Hibulu aneɛ nu kɛ, ‘Sɔɔlo, Sɔɔlo! Duzu ati a ɛlɛyɛ me kpɔdekpɔde ɛ? Ɛto ɛ gyakɛ ɛwɔ evileni bowule a, ɛboda ɛ nwo o!’
44026015	Na membizale ye kɛ, ‘Awulae, na ɛdawɔ nwane ɔ?’ Na Awulae zele kɛ, ‘Mame a mele Gyisɛse mɔɔ ɛlɛyɛ me kpɔdekpɔde la.
44026016	Na dwazo gyinla ɛ gyakɛ anu. Meye me nwo mehile wɔ, amaa meayɛ wɔ me sonvolɛ na wɔali me nwo daselɛ wɔ mɔɔ wɔnwu ye ɛnɛ, nee mɔɔ nzinlii mebaye meahile wɔ la amuala anwo.
44026017	Mebalie wɔ meavi Dwuuma nee bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnle Dwuuma mɔɔ mebazoa wɔ bɛ avinli la asa anu.
44026018	Mesoa wɔ, amaa wɔahɔbuke bɛ nye na wɔahwe bɛ wɔavi awozinli nu nee Seetan tumi ne abo wɔara wienyi nu nee Nyamenle ɛkɛ, amaa ɔlua bɛ diedi mɔɔ wɔ me nu la azo bɛanyia ɛtanefakyɛ na bɛanyia ɛleka wɔ Nyamenle menli ne mɔɔ yekpa nu yeye bɛ la avinli.’
44026019	“Ɛhye ati, Belemgbunli Agelepa, meanyɛ anzosesebɛ wɔ anwuma ɛnyelɛzodeɛnwunlɛ ɛhye anwo.
44026020	Na menlumuale menganle ye wɔ Dɛmasekɛse nee Gyɛlusalɛm yɛɛ Dwudiya maanle ne mɔ amuala anu, nee maanle maanle mɔɔ ɛmboka Dwuuma anwo la anu, kɛ bɛnlu bɛ nwo na bɛzia bɛrɛla Nyamenle ɛkɛ, na bɛbɔ ɛbɛla mɔɔ kile kɛ bɛnlu bɛ nwo la.
44026021	Na ɔlua ɛhye ala ati yɛɛ Dwuuma rahyele me wɔ Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne anu mɔɔ anrɛɛ bɛku me a.
44026022	Noko Nyamenle moalɛ ti, ɛnɛ megyi ɛke metɛdi daselɛ metɛkile bɛ mgbanyinli nee bɛ ngakula muala. Mɔɔ Mosisi nee Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛma hanle dole ɛkɛ ne kɛ ɔbazi la, yemɔ ala a le mɔɔ melɛka la.
44026023	Ɔwɔ kɛ Mɛzaya ne nwu amaneɛ na ɔyɛ sonla mɔɔ lumua mɔɔ badwazo avi mɔwuamra anu, na yeabɔ wienyi nwo nolo yeahile Dwuuma nee bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnle Dwuuma la amuala.”
44026024	Mɔɔ Pɔɔlo anloa wɔ zolɛ ɔlɛka edwɛkɛ ne la, Fɛsetɛse deanle ye nu zele kɛ, “Pɔɔlo, wɔzɛ! Ɛdoa nwomazukoalɛ dedee ɛlɛbɔ ɛlane.”
44026025	Pɔɔlo buale ye kɛ, “Nana Fɛsetɛse, metɛsɛle. Nɔhalɛ komii ne a melɛka la.
44026026	Belemgbunli Agelepa, mekpa edwɛkɛ ne anwo ɛdanlɛ mɔɔ menzulo ɔ nzi a, ɔluakɛ ɛdawɔ ɛze ɛhye mɔ amuala. Meze noko kɛ ɛyɛle bɛ nzonlɛ kpalɛ kpalɛ, ɔluakɛ ɛhye mɔ biala anzi fealera nu.
44026027	Belemgbunli Agelepa, asoo ɛdie Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛma edwɛkɛ ne ɛdi? Meze kɛ ɛdie ɛdi somaa!”
44026028	Agelepa bizale Pɔɔlo kɛ, “Ɛnee ɛdwenle kɛ mekɛ ekyi ɛhye ala anu ɛmaa meayɛ Keleseɛnenli ɔ?”
44026029	Pɔɔlo buale ye kɛ, “Saa mekɛ ekyi nu o, saa mekɛ tendenle nu o, me nzɛlɛlɛ a le kɛ anrɛɛ Nyamenle amaa ɛdawɔ nee bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛlɛtie me ɛnɛ la amuala ayɛ ye sonvolɛma kɛ medame la, mɔɔ nwɔnzɔnwɔnzɔ ye ɛmboka nwolɛ a.”
44026030	Na belemgbunli ne, amɛnlado ne, yɛɛ Bɛnaesi nee bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛha la amuala dwazole.
44026031	Bɛvindele la, bɛhanle bɛhilele bɛ nwo kɛ, “Sonla ɛhye ɛtɛyɛle debie mɔɔ fɛta kɛ bɛku ye anzɛɛ bɛto ye efiade bɔbɔ a.”
44026032	Na Agelepa zele Fɛsetɛse kɛ, “Saa sonla ye ambɔ ye edwɛkɛ ne atua ammaa Maanle Maanle belemgbunli ne a anrɛɛ ɔwɔ kɛ bɛgyakyi ye bɛmaa ɔkɔ.”
44027001	Nzinlii mɔɔ bɛyɛle adwenle kɛ akee ɔwɔ kɛ yɛkɔ Yetale la, bɛvale Pɔɔlo nee pilizama bie mɔ mɔɔ boka nwolɛ la bɛwulale Dwuleɛse mɔɔ le sogya kpanyinli wɔ Wulomu Maanle Maanle belemgbunli ne sogyama ne anu la asa anu.
44027002	Yɛhɔvole ɛlɛne bie mɔɔ vi Adelameteɛm, mɔɔ ɛlɛkɔ Ehyea maanzinli nu la anu na yɛdule. Alesetaakɛse, mɔɔ le Masidoneanli na ɔvi Tɛsalonaeka la boka yɛ nwo.
44027003	Aleɛ hyenle la yɛradwule Saedɛn. Dwuleɛse hilele ye ahunlunyele wɔ Pɔɔlo anwo. Ɔmanle ye adenle ɔmanle ɔhɔle ɔ gɔnwo mɔ anwo kɛ ɔhɔkpondɛ ninyɛne mɔɔ ɔbahyia nwolɛ la.
44027004	Yɛvi Saedɛn yɛdule la ɛnee anwoma ne ɛlɛbɔ atia yɛ. Yemɔti yɛwɔle yɛ ti aze yɛsianenle Saepelɛse aze.
44027005	Yɛluale Selesea nee Pamefelea anwuma yɛrale Maela mɔɔ wɔ Lesea maanzinli nu la.
44027006	Ɛkɛ yɛɛ sogya kpanyinli ne nyianle ɛlɛne bie mɔɔ vi Alɛzandelea ɛlɛkɔ Yetale la, na ɔvale yɛ ɔhɔvole nuhua.
44027007	Yɛdule la ɛnee yɛngola kɔ kpalɛ biala, yemɔti yɛlile kenle dɔɔnwo wɔ adenle nu. Yɛ nwo hyelele yɛ kpalɛ na yɛaradwu Kenaedɛse. Kɛmɔ ɛnee anwoma ne tɛtu tɛtia yɛ la ati, yɛdɛlale bɔra ne mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye Salemoni ala la yɛɛ yɛsianenle Kiliti bɔra ne aze a.
44027008	Yɛsianenle aze kpalɛ kpalɛ, yɛvɛle dedee na yɛrale ɛleka bie mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye “Ahonle Kɛnlɛmazo” mɔɔ ɔ nee Lasia sua zo anwa biala la.
44027009	Yɛhyɛle ɛkɛ kpalɛ na ɔrale kɛ akee yɛkɔ a ɔngɔ, ɔluakɛ mekɛ ne anu ɛnee azule nye ɛvalɛ akee ɛyɛ ɛzulolɛ na eza Buada Ɛvoyia ne ɛpɛ nu. Ɛhye ati, Pɔɔlo dule folɛ ɛhye:
44027010	“Yɛmenle mɔ, menwu kɛ yɛ adendulɛ ye ɛlɛba arayɛ ɛzulolɛ amaa yɛ. Yɛbaminli ninyɛne dɔɔnwo. Ɛlɛne ye bazɛkye, yɛ ninyɛne bahɔ, yɛɛ yɛdayɛ noko yɛbawu.”
44027011	Na sogya kpanyinli ne adwenle hɔle ɛlɛne menle ne nee mɔɔ nea zo la ɛdeɛ ne mɔɔ bɛhanle la anu, na ɔgyakyile mɔɔ Pɔɔlo hanle la.
44027012	Eza ahonle ne azo bɔbɔ ɛnle kpalɛ biala mɔɔ bɛdi fɔsɛlɛ ɛkɛ ne a ɔyɛ boɛ a. Ɛhye ati bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛwɔ ɛlɛne ne anu la anu somaa ne ala hulole kɛ bɛkɛdu bɛkɛdɔ azule nye bieko na bɛkɛbɔ mɔdenle bɛkɛdwu Fonekese mɔɔ lɛ ahonle kpalɛ wɔ Kiliti na ɔ nye wɔ nyiakɛ adɔleɛ nee ɛbɔ nu adɔleɛ la, na bɛkɔdi fɔsɛlɛ ne wɔ ɛkɛ.
44027013	Nyiakɛ anwoma bɛtɛɛ bie vɛlɛle, na menli ne dwenlenle kɛ akee ɔwɔ kɛ bɛyɛ, kɛmɔ bɛzuzule ala la. Bɛdule sɛkɛ na bɛsianenle Kiliti bɔra ne aze kpalɛ kpalɛ.
44027014	Noko bɛandwu ɛleka biala yɛɛ anwoma ɛsesebɛ bie mɔɔ vi ɛbɔ nu la dwazole a.
44027015	Ɔkpale yɛ ɛlɛne ne kpalɛ, na kɛmɔ ɛnee yɛyɛ nwolɛ biala a ɔnyɛ boɛ la, yɛgyakyile nu yɛmanle ye kɛ ɔkpa yɛ ɔhɔ ɛleka biala mɔɔ ɔbɔ yɛ yeahɔ la.
44027016	Ɔkpale yɛ ɔhɔluale bɔra ekyi bie mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye Kɔda la aze, na yɛbɔle mɔdenle yɛziele ɛlɛne ekyi ne mɔɔ wɔ ɛlɛnemgbole ne anu la boɛ.
44027017	Bɛkpogyale ye na bɛsosɔle ye nyɛma. Bɛzulole kɛ bɛkɛhɔnwe Lebea ese ne azo la ati, bɛdwulale avela ne mɔ na bɛgyakyile nu kɛ anwoma ne ɛkpa ye ɛhɔ ɛleka biala mɔɔ ɔkulo la.
44027018	Aleɛ hyenle la ɛnee kɛ maanle nu ɛzi ɛmunla, na ahumu ne tɛsa la ati, bɛbɔle ɔ bo kɛ bɛyeye ɛlɛne ne anu ninyɛne ne bie bɛagua nyevile nu.
44027019	Ye kenle nsa ne azo bɛvuandinle ɛlɛne ne anwo ninyɛne ne bie noko bɛguale nyevile nu.
44027020	Kenle dɔɔnwo pɛle nu mɔɔ ɛnee yɛ nye ɛnnwu sɛnzɛne na yeayɛ ɛwɔlɔra a, yɛɛ kɛ ahumu ne noko gyi zo ala ɛne. Yemɔti yɛ nwo vɔle bɔkɔɔ kɛ yeannyia yɛanyɛ boɛ, yɛbawu.
44027021	Menli ne anloa nu dole, yemɔti mekɛ dɔɔnwo ne ala ɛnee bɛnli debie. Na kenle ko Pɔɔlo dwazole gyinlanle bɛ avinli na ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Ebiamɔ, anrɛɛ bɛvale mɔɔ menganle la, na yɛvi Kiliti yɛandu; anrɛɛ munzule kpole ɛhye kpale yɛ ti na yɛamminli ninyɛne dɔɔnwo ɛhye mɔ.
44027022	Noko kɛkala, mesɛlɛ bɛ, bɛzi ahonle na awie biala ɛnrɛminli ye ngoane; ɛlɛne ye ala a bazɛkye a.
44027023	Nɔe, Nyamenle ne mɔɔ mele ye ɛdeɛ na mesonle ye la soanvolɛ rale me nwo ɛke,
44027024	na ɔzele me kɛ, ‘Pɔɔlo, mmasulo, na ɔwɔ kɛ ɛgyinla Maanle Maanle belemgbunli ne anyunlu. Ɔlua zo Nyamenle ɛva bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛ nee wɔ lua nyevile ye anye la amuala ngoane ɛhyɛ wɔ.’
44027025	Ɛhye ati ayi mɔ, bɛzi ahonle. Medie Nyamenle medi kɛ mɔɔ bɛha bɛhile me la bayɛ zɔhane.
44027026	Noko akee ahumu ne bakpa yɛ ahɔnwe bɔra bie ɛnweanloa.”
44027027	Asɛɛ kenle bulu nee nna ɛnee ahumu ne tɛkpa yɛ wɔ Mɛdetɛlenia nyevile nye.
44027028	Kenle ko ne nɔe ne, kɛyɛ alevinli mu nwiɔ avinli, gyimayɛvoma mɔɔ wɔ ɛlɛne ne anu la nwunle kɛ yɛbikye bɔra bie anwo.
44027029	Bɛzulole kɛ yɛ ɛlɛne ne kɛhɔfofo bolɛ bie azo la ati, bɛdwulale sɛkɛ nna azule nu na yɛzɛlɛle alehyenlɛ.
44027030	Ɛnee gyimayɛvoma ne kpondɛ avi ɛlɛne ne anu anriandi la ati, bɛdwulale ɛlɛne ekyi ne na bɛyɛle kɛ asɛɛ bɛkado sɛkɛ ne bie wɔ ɛlɛnemgbole ne anyunlu lɔ la.
44027031	Pɔɔlo hanle hilele sogya kpanyinli ne kɛ, “Saa gyimayɛvoma ne mɔ andɛnla ɛlɛne ye anu a yɛ nuhua ko bɔbɔ ɛnrɛha.”
44027032	Zɔhane ati sogyama ne pɛle nyɛma ne mɔɔ lɛ ɛlɛne ekyi ne la anu na bɛmanle ɔhɔle.
44027033	Aleɛbahye ne, Pɔɔlo bodole bɛ kɛ bɛ muala bɛli debie. Ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Ɛnɛ le kenle bulu nee nna ɛne, ahunlundetelɛ ɛmaa bɛlɛ bɛ ko mgbane.
44027034	Yemɔti mesɛlɛ bɛ, bɛli debie ekyi bɛmaa bɛ nwo ɛgyinla bɛ, na bɛ biala ati enrinli ko bɔbɔ ɛnrɛminli.”
44027035	Pɔɔlo hanle ɛhye la, ɔvale kpanwo, ɔyɛle nzɛlɛlɛ, ɔyɛle Nyamenle mo na ɔbɔle ɔ bo kɛ ɔbubu yeali wɔ bɛ nyunlu ɛkɛ.
44027036	Bɛ muala akee bɛzile ahonle, na awie biala lile debie.
44027037	Yɛdayɛ mɔɔ ɛnee yɛwɔ ɛlɛne ne anu la yɛlua ɛya nwiɔ abulasuu nee nsia.
44027038	Akee mɔɔ awie biala ako yile la bɛdule abɛlɛ mɔɔ wɔ ɛlɛne ne anu la bie bɛguale nyevile nu, amaa ɛlɛne ne ayɛ felafela.
44027039	Mɔɔ aleɛ hyenle la ɛnee bɛnnwu azɛlɛ holɛ ko mɔɔ bɛra zolɛ la ɛdeɛ, noko bɛnwunle ɛnwea wɔ ye ebolo bie anu, na bɛyɛle kɛ bɛbɔ mɔdenle bɛahɔnwe ɛlɛne ne wɔ ɛkɛ.
44027040	Yemɔti bɛpɛle sɛkɛ ne mɔ amuala anu na bɛzianyinle nyɛma ne mɔɔ lɛ ɛlɛne ne kotogyampa ne anu la. Bɛvolale avela ne mɔɔ wɔ ɛlɛne ne ati la bɛmanle anwoma ne vale ye hɔle aze.
44027041	Na ɛlɛne ne hɔdɔle ɛsa nu; ɔ ti ne minle ɛnwea ne anu mɔɔ bɛtu ye a ɔnyɛ boɛ fee a, na nyevile azɛlɛkye ne bule zile ɔ bo ne bubule ye.
44027042	Sogyama ne yɛle kɛ bɛku pilizama mɔɔ wɔ ɛlɛne ne anu la amuala, amaa bie anweɛ anvo file zo na yeanriandi.
44027043	Na kɛmɔ ɛnee sogya kpanyinli ne kulo kɛ ɔdie Pɔɔlo ngoane la ati, yeamkponle zolɛ. Ɔzele bɛ kɛ bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛze weɛ la ɛweɛ ɛhɔ file zo.
44027044	Menli noko mɔɔ hale la bie mɔ sesale ndaboa mɔɔ wɔ ɛlɛne ne anu, mɔɔ ɛlɛtudu ahɔ la bie, bie mɔ noko sosɔle ɛlɛne ne abɛta abɛta ne mɔɔ ɛdudu la anu bɛvole bɛbutubutule zolɛ. Ɛnee kɛ yɛyɛle mɔɔ yɛ muala yɛholale aze dwu la ɛne.
44028001	Mɔɔ yɛradwule aze la yɛdele kɛ bɔra ne mɔɔ yɛra zo la bɛfɛlɛ ye Mɔleta.
44028002	Bɔra ne azo amra lɛ ahunlunyele kpalɛ. Ɛnee ezule ne ɛlɛtɔ na ɛyɛlɛ wɔ nu la ati, bɛhuanle senle bɛmanle yɛ muala yɛdɛnlanle nwolɛ.
44028003	Pɔɔlo sesale ngeleka bie guale senle ne anu. Na senle ne wuluwulu ne hanle ɛyɛne ne la, ɛwɔlɛ bɔna vi nu vindele na ɔbebale Pɔɔlo asa.
44028004	Mɔɔ bɔra ne azo amra nwunle kɛ ɛwɔlɛ ne beba Pɔɔlo asa la, bɛdule bɛ nwo azukue kɛ, “Sonla ɛhye kɛyɛ kɔdiawu. Yemɔti yevi nyevile ye anu kɔlɔnwo bɔbɔ ɛdeɛ, noko ɔyɛ biala a ɔbawu.”
44028005	Na Pɔɔlo kpondenle ɛwɔlɛ ne guale senle ne anu na ɛhwee anyɛ ɔdaye mumua ne.
