44028006	Mɔɔ ɔyɛle zɔhane la ɛnee menli ne mɔ anye la kɛ Pɔɔlo asa banwu anzɛɛ ɔbapɛ yeafi yeawu. Na bɛnleanle dedee mɔɔ ɛhwee anyɛ ye la, bɛhakyile bɛ adwenle na bɛhanle kɛ, “Ɔle bozonle!”
44028007	Bɔra ne azo kpanyinli ne mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye Pɛbeleɛse la ɛleka mɔɔ de la nee ɛleka mɔɔ yɛwɔ la anwa. Ɔ nee yɛ hɔle ye sua nu na ɔliele yɛ kɛnlɛma gyɛlɛɛnye, ɔlieliele yɛ nye kenle nsa.
44028008	Mekɛ ne anu ɛnee ebunlu ɛhye Pɛbeleɛse ɔ ze na eza ɔkɔ baka zo, yemɔti ɔla sua nu. Pɔɔlo hɔle ɔ nwo ɛkɛ, ɔzɛlɛle ɔmanle ye na ɔvale ɔ sa ɔguale ɔ nwo zo ɔmanle ɔdele kpɔkɛ.
44028009	Mɔɔ ɛhye zile la, awuleravolɛ mɔɔ wɔ bɔra ne azo la amuala rale manle ɔyɛle bɛ ayile.
44028010	Bɛlile yɛ eni dɔɔnwo, yɛɛ kenle mɔɔ yɛbahɔ la, bɛvale ninyɛne mɔɔ yɛbahyia nwolɛ wɔ yɛ adendulɛ ne anu la bɛhɔguale ɛlɛne ne anu bɛmanle yɛ.
44028011	Siane nsa pɛle nu la yɛvale ɛlɛne bie mɔɔ vi Alɛzandelea mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye “Bozonle Ndalɛ,” mɔɔ ralile fɔsɛlɛ ne wɔ bɔra ne azo la yɛzɔle yɛ adendulɛ ne azo.
44028012	Yɛradwule aze wɔ Saelekusu na yɛlile kenle nsa wɔ ɛkɛ.
44028013	Yɛvi ɛkɛ ne la yɛrale Riligeɛm. Aleɛ hyenle la nyevile nu anwoma ne dwazole. Yemɔti yɛlile kenle nwiɔ yɛɛ yɛdwule Putiyɔle sua zo a.
44028014	Yɛnwunle diedima ne bie mɔ wɔ ɛkɛ, na bɛzɛlɛle yɛ bɛmanle yɛlile dapɛne wɔ bɛ nwo ɛkɛ. Nzinlii yɛradwule Wulomu.
44028015	Ɛnee diedima mɔɔ wɔ Wulomu la ɛde yɛ nganeɛ dɛbadɛba, yemɔti bɛvi ɛkɛ ne toonwo bɛrayiale yɛ wɔ Apeɛse Gua nu nee “Dabelɛ Nsa.” Mɔɔ Pɔɔlo nwunle bɛ la, ye ahonle gyinlanle na ɔyɛle Nyamenle mo.
44028016	Mɔɔ yɛdwule Wulomu la, bɛmanle Pɔɔlo adenle kɛ ɔdaye ɔ ngome ɔhɔdɛnla, na bɛyele sogyanli ko kɛ ɔ nee ye ɛhɔdɛnla na ɔzinza ye.
44028017	Ɔlile kenle nsa la Pɔɔlo vɛlɛle Dwuu mgbanyima mɔɔ wɔ sua ne azo la, ɔ nee bɛ yiale nu na ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Me mediema Yizilayɛma, meanyɛ ɛtane biala meantia me menli anzɛɛ yɛ amaamuo ne mɔɔ yɛnyianle yɛvile yɛ nlenya mɔ lɔ la, noko bɛhyele me piliza bɛyele me bɛmanle Wulomuma wɔ Gyɛlusalɛm.
44028018	Bɛnleɛnleanle me edwɛkɛ ne anu la ɛnee bɛnnwu debie biala mɔɔ meyɛ mɔɔ fɛta ɛhunlɛ a.
44028019	Na kɛmɔ Dwuuma amkponle la ati, ɛnee ɔhyia kɛ mebɔ me edwɛkɛ ne atua memaa Maanle Maanle belemgbunli ne. Menlɛ bɛ nwo adwenle ɛtane biala, yɛɛ meamba kɛ mebadoa bɛ.
44028020	Ɛhye ati yɛɛ mevɛlɛ bɛ kɛ me nee bɛ badendɛ a. Ɔluakɛ, ɔlua sonla ne mɔɔ Yizilayɛma lɛ anyelazo wɔ ye nu la ati yɛɛ bɛgua me nwɔnzɔnwɔnzɔ a.”
44028021	Bɛzele ye kɛ, “Yɛmɛ yɛtɛnyianle ɛ nwo kɛlata biala vi Dwudiya, yɛɛ mediema ne mɔ biala ɛtɛbale ɛtɛbabɔle yɛ nehane amaneɛ biala mɔɔ le ɛtane wɔ ɛ nwo a.
44028022	Na yɛkulo kɛ yɛtie wɔ adwenle. Mɔɔ yɛze ye ɛke la a le kɛ, zɛhae fane ye mɔɔ ɛwɔ nu la, awie biala tendɛ tia ye.”
44028023	Na bɛ nee Pɔɔlo hilele kenle. Kenle ne dwule la, menli dɔɔnwo rayiale ɛleka mɔɔ Pɔɔlo de la. Na ɔhanle Nyamenle Belemgbunlililɛ ne anwo edwɛkɛ ɔhilehilele nu ɔhilele bɛ, na ɔbɔle mɔdenle kɛ ɔmaa bɛalie Gyisɛse anwo edwɛkɛ ne mɔɔ Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛma nee Mosisi mɛla ne ka la bɛali. Ɔdendɛle ɛhye anwo ɔvi nwonlomɔ mangyee ne toonwo aledwolɛ.
44028024	Bie mɔ liele lile, na bie mɔ anlie anli.
44028025	Na bɛ adwenle anzɛ yɛɛ bɛzandele a. Na mɔɔ bɛbahɔ la Pɔɔlo hanle edwɛkɛ ko ɛhye kɛ, “Mɔɔ Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne luale Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛ Ayezaya anwo zo hanle hilele yɛ nlenya mɔ la le nɔhalɛ somaa!
44028026	Ɔluakɛ ɔzele kɛ, ‘Kɔze menli ɛhye mɔ kɛ, bɛbadie, bɛadie, na bɛnrɛde ɔ bo; bɛbanlea, bɛanlea, na bɛnrɛnwu debie,
44028027	ɔboalekɛ Nyamenle se, menli ɛhye mɔ ɛsolo, bɛduodua bɛ nzo yɛɛ bɛmuomua bɛ nye. Anrɛɛ bɛ nye kɛnwu debie, bɛ nzo kɛde edwɛkɛ, bɛkɛnyia ndelebɛbo, na bɛkɛzia bɛkɛra me ɛkɛ, na meayɛ bɛ ayile.’ ”
44028028	Akee Pɔɔlo dwulale ye edwɛkɛ ne zɛhae, “Yemɔti bɛnwu ye kɛ bɛlɛ Nyamenle ngoanelielɛ nwo nrɛlaleɛ ne bɛkamaa bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnle Dwuuma la, na bɛbadie!” [
44028029	Mɔɔ Pɔɔlo hanle ɛhye la, Dwuuma ne vale kpolerazulɛ kpole kpalɛ dwazole hɔle.]
44028030	Na Pɔɔlo dɛnlanle sua mɔɔ ɔde nu na ɔdaye a ɔtua ye kakɛ la anu toonwo ɛvolɛ nwiɔ. Ɔliele menli mɔɔ rale ɔ nwo ɛkɛ ne la amuala.
44028031	Ɔhanle Nyamenle Belemgbunlililɛ ne anwo edwɛkɛ na ɔhilehilele menli ninyɛne mɔɔ fane Awulae Gyisɛse Kelaese anwo la, na awie biala andenda ɔ gyakɛ anu.
45001001	Medame Pɔɔlo, mɔɔ mele Kelaese Gyisɛse akɛlɛ, na Nyamenle ɛvɛlɛ me kɛ membanyɛ ɛzoanvolɛ na yeze me kɛ membɔ ye Edwɛkpa ne nolo la a melɛkɛlɛ kɛlata ɛhye a.
45001002	Nyamenle luale ye kpɔmanvolɛma anwo zo vale Edwɛkpa ɛhye bɔle ɛwɔkɛ wɔ mɔmoane kpalɛ ne, kɛmɔ bɛhɛlɛ ye wɔ Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ Nwuanzanwuanza ne mɔ anu la.
45001003	Edwɛkpa ɛhye fane ɔ Ra ne, mɔɔ le yɛ Awulae Gyisɛse Kelaese, mɔɔ saa nwonane nu a ɔle Devidi anlɔnra,
45001004	noko wɔ Nyamenle nu nwuanzanwuanzayɛlɛ nu a, bɛva tumi kpole bɛdwazo ye bɛvi ewule nu bɛhile kɛ ɔle Nyamenle Ara la anwo.
45001005	Ɔ nwo zo yɛɛ ɔlua mɔɔ Nyamenle ɛlo yɛ ɛmaa merayɛ ɛzoanvolɛ a, amaa menli kɔsɔɔti alie ye duma ne ali na bɛadie ye.
45001006	Bɛdabɛ noko mɔɔ bɛwɔ Wulomu la boka ɛhye anwo, ɔluakɛ Nyamenle ɛvɛlɛ bɛ kɛ bɛrayɛ Gyisɛse Kelaese ɛdeɛ.
45001007	Zɔhane ati melɛkɛlɛ kɛlata ɛhye mearɛlɛ bɛdabɛ mɔɔ Nyamenle kulo bɛ na yevɛlɛ bɛ kɛ bɛrayɛ ye menli na bɛwɔ Wulomu la amuala. Yɛ Ze Nyamenle ne nee Awulae Gyisɛse Kelaese ɛlo bɛ na ɔmaa bɛ anzonudwolɛ.
45001008	Medumua mealua Gyisɛse Kelaese anwo zo meayɛ Nyamenle mo wɔ bɛ kɔsɔɔti bɛ ti, ɔluakɛ bɛ diedi nganeɛ ɛdwu ewiade amra amuala anzo nu.
45001009	Nyamenle ne mɔɔ medua ɔ Ra ne anwo Edwɛkɛ Kpalɛ ne nolobɔlɛ zo mefa me ahonle muala mesonle ye la di me daselɛ kɛ mɔɔ melɛka la le nɔhalɛ. Nyamenle ze kɛ dahuu mekakye bɛ
45001010	wɔ me nzɛlɛlɛ nu. Mesɛlɛ kɛ ɔlua ɔdaye Nyamenle ye ɛhulolɛ zo ɔmaa adenle ɔmaa membamkpɔla bɛ.
45001011	Ɔluakɛ mekulo kɛ mebakpɔla bɛ, amaa yɛanyia Nyamenle Sunsum nu ahyɛlɛdeɛ ne na bɛ nwo ayɛ se.
45001012	Mɔɔ mekpondɛ meaha la a le kɛ, saa yɛ muala yɛyia nu a bɛ diedi bamaa me anwosesebɛ, yɛɛ me diedi bamaa bɛ diedi anyi.
45001013	Me mediema, mekpondɛ kɛ bɛnwu kɛ mekɛ dɔɔnwo anu mehyehyɛ kɛ anrɛɛ menwɔrakpɔla bɛ, amaa meahola meahakyi bɛ bie mɔ dɔɔnwo, kɛmɔ meyɛ ye wɔ maanle maanle dɔɔnwo zo la, noko ɔyɛ a ɛnee debie fofolɛ ɛzi me aze.
45001014	Ɔluakɛ ɛzonlelilɛ la me nwo zo kɛ ɔwɔ kɛ mebɔ edwɛkɛ ne nolo mekile menli ngakyile kɔsɔɔti, bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛ nye ɛde nee bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛ nye ɛtɛtele, mɔɔ ze bie nee mɔɔ ɛnze bie la amuala.
45001015	Ɛhye ati yɛɛ mekulo kɛ meka Edwɛkpa ne mekile bɛdabɛ noko mɔɔ bɛwɔ Wulomu la a.
45001016	Menze Edwɛkpa ne anwo nyiane. Ɔle Nyamenle tumi mɔɔ ɔfa ɔdie bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛdie bɛdi la amuala a, mɔɔ lumua la a le bɛdabɛ Dwuuma yɛɛ akee bɛdabɛ noko mɔɔ bɛnle Dwuuma la.
45001017	Ɔluakɛ ɔvi mɔlebɛbo ne kɔdwu awieleɛ ne amuala, Nyamenle dua diedi zo a maa menli sɔ ɔ nye a. Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne se, “Mɔɔ bɛkɛlua ye diedi zo bɛkɛmaa ɔkɛzɔ Nyamenle anye la banyia ngoane.”
45001018	Bɛhile bɛmaa yɛnwu kɛ Nyamenle ɛya ne vi anwuma bara bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛmbu Nyamenle na bɛfa bɛ ngunziyɛlɛ bɛkeda nɔhalɛ ne azo la anwo zo.
45001019	Nyamenle badea bɛ, ɔluakɛ bɛze mɔɔ ɔwɔ kɛ sonla nwu ye wɔ Nyamenle anwo la. Nyamenle ɔdaye a ɔyele ɔhilele bɛ a.
45001020	Sumunli kɛ Nyamenle bɔle ewiade la yɛɛ ɔbɔle ɔ bo kɛ ɔye ye su kpalɛ ne mɔɔ yɛ nye ɛnnwu ye la wienyi yeahile sonla a. Ninyɛne ɛhye mɔ a le ye damɛnlangoate tumi ne nee ye nyamenleyɛlɛ ne. Menli nwu ɛhye wɔ ninyɛne mɔɔ Nyamenle ɛbɔ la anu. Yemɔti bɛnlɛ nyelebɛnloa fee!
45001021	Bɛze Nyamenle, noko bɛnva enililɛ mɔɔ fɛta la bɛmmaa ye kɛ ɔle Nyamenle, yɛɛ bɛnva moyɛlɛ bɛmmaa ye. Adwenle mgbane mgbane yɛɛ bɛfa a, yɛɛ awozinli ɛyi bɛ adwenle ne mɔ mɔɔ nrɛlɛbɛ ɛnle nu la tetɛkɛɛ.
45001022	Bɛse bɛze nrɛlɛbɛ, noko bɛle ahɔnwɔne;
45001023	kɛ bɛkɛzonle damɛnlangoate Nyamenle ne la, bɛsonle ninyɛne mɔɔ bɛdabɛ bɛnwo, mɔɔ le kɛ sonla, nloma, nane anzɛɛ nwɔlɛ la.
45001024	Kɛmɔ menli ɛyɛ bɛ nwo ahɔnwɔne zɛhae la ati, Nyamenle ɛye bɛ ɛmaa bɛdabɛ bɛ atiakunluwɔzo mgbane mgbane ne mɔ, na ɔlua zolɛ mraalɛ fa mraalɛ na mrenya fa mrenya.
45001025	Bɛgyakyile kɛ bɛkɛlie nɔhalɛ ne mɔɔ fane Nyamenle anwo la bɛkɛli. Zɔhane ati bɛdie adalɛ ne bɛdi na bɛsonle ninyɛne mɔɔ Nyamenle ɛbɔ bɛ la, na bɛgyakyi Bɔvolɛ Nyamenle mumua ne, yemɔ yɛɛ ayɛlɛyelɛ ɛha ye dahuu a. Amen.
45001026	Kɛmɔ menli yɛ nyɛleɛ ɛhye mɔ la ati, Nyamenle ɛgyakyi bɛ ɛmaa bɛ anyiemgba ɛbɛla ne. Bɔbɔ mraalɛ fa bɛ nwo gyakyi mrenya.
45001027	Zɔhane ala yɛɛ mrenya noko gyakyi mraalɛ na bɛmaa bɛ ti akunlu ba bɛ gɔnwo mɔ mrenya nwo zo na bɛfa bɛ a. Nzinlii bɛnyia bɛ ninyɛndane ɛhye mɔ anwo ndeanlɛ, bɛte ye bɛ nwonane nu kpalɛ kpalɛ kɛmɔ ɔfɛta la.
45001028	Kɛmɔ menli kpole kɛ bɛnrɛnwu Nyamenle la ati, ɔgyakyile bɛ ɔmanle bɛ adwenle ne mɔ mɔɔ ɛkpɔlɔ la, amaa ɔlua zolɛ bɛyɛle ninyɛne mɔɔ ɔnle kɛ bɛyɛ la.
45001029	Ninyɛne mɔɔ le kɛ amumuyɛ, asiayɛ, anyebolo, ngunzi, nungule, kɔdiawu, konle, adalɛ nee nwondomgbɔ la ɛyi bɛ tɛkɛɛ. Bɛye ndɛne,
45001030	bɛka bɛ gɔnwo mɔ anwo edwɛkɛ ɛtane ɛtane, bɛkyi Nyamenle, bɛtu bɛ nwo, bɛyɛ mgbanyizonle, bɛkile bɛ nwo, bɛboɔboa bɛdwenle ɛtane nwo bɛyɛ, yɛɛ bɛndie bɛ awovolɛma;
45001031	bɛle ahɔnwɔne, bɛnlɛ diedi, bɛnze ahunlunyele yɛɛ bɛ ti yɛ se kpalɛ kpalɛ.
45001032	Bɛze noko kɛ Nyamenle mɛla ne kile kɛ bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛbɔ ɛbɛla zɛhae mɔ la fɛta ewule, noko bɛyɛ, yɛɛ bɛsi awie mɔ adua bɛmaa bɛyɛ bie.
45002001	Zɔhane ati ayi, wɔmɔ a ɛle nwane bɔbɔ a, ɛnlɛ adenle ɛmbua awie mɔ ndɛne hweledede. Saa ɛbua awie ndɛne wɔ ye nyɛleɛ nwo a, ɛnee ɛlɛbua ɛ nwo fɔlɛ, ɔboalekɛ ɛdawɔ mumua ne mɔɔ ɛlɛbua ndɛne ne la ɛyɛ nyɛleɛ ko ne ala mɔɔ ahenle mɔɔ ɛlɛbua ye ndɛne la yɛ la bie.
45002002	Yɛze kɛ saa Nyamenle tea bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛbɔ zezɛhae ɛbɛla la a ɛnee ɔfɛta.
45002003	Na ayi, ɛdawɔ mumua ne ɛyɛ nyɛleɛ mɔɔ ɛbua awie mɔ nwolɛ fɔlɛ la bie. Ɛnee ɛdwenle kɛ ɛkɛvi nu wɔ Nyamenle ndɛnebualɛ ne anu ɔ?
45002004	Anzɛɛ ɛmbu ye kpalɛyɛlɛ totohyia ne nee ye abotane ne bie ɔ? Ɛnze kɛ Nyamenle atiakunlukɛnlɛmayɛlɛ ne wɔ ɛkɛ ne, ɔlɛkile wɔ yeamaa wɔanlu ɛ nwo ɔ?
45002005	Noko bɛmɛ bɛ nzo yɛ se kpalɛ, yɛɛ bɛsolo. Zɔhane ati bɛlɛmaa bɛ ndeanlɛ ayɛ kpole wɔ Kenle ne mɔɔ Nyamenle ɛya ne nee ye ndɛnebualɛ fɔɔnwo ne kɛdwu la.
45002006	Ɔluakɛ Nyamenle badua awie biala kakɛ, kɛmɔ ye gyima de la.
45002007	Menli bie wɔ ɛkɛ mɔɔ bɛmɛ, abotane nee kpalɛyɛlɛ ala a bɛli ɔ nzi a, na bɛkpondɛ anyunlunyia, enililɛ nee ngoane mɔɔ ɛnlɛ awieleɛ la. Na bɛmɛ noko ala yɛɛ Nyamenle bamaa bɛ ngoane mɔɔ ɛnlɛ awieleɛ a.
45002008	Bie mɔ noko le angomedi, bɛkpo mɔɔ le nɔhalɛ la na bɛdi ɛtane nzi. Bɛ nwo zo yɛɛ Nyamenle bawola ye ɛya kpole ne agua a.
45002009	Bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛyɛ amumuyɛ la amuala banwu amaneɛ nee abodelɛ, Dwuuma lumua yɛɛ bɛdabɛ noko mɔɔ bɛnle Dwuuma la doa bɛ.
45002010	Nyamenle bava anyunlunyia, enililɛ nee anzonudwolɛ amaa bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛdi boɛ la, Dwuuma lumua yɛɛ bɛdabɛ noko mɔɔ bɛnle Dwuuma la doa bɛ.
45002011	Ɔluakɛ Nyamenle bua menli kɔsɔɔti ndɛne wɔ adenle ko ne ala azo.
45002012	Bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnle Dwuuma la ɛnlɛ Mosisi mɛla ne; yemɔti bɛyɛ ɛtane a bɛminli bɔbɔ ɛdeɛ, noko tɛ mɛla ne abo ɔ. Dwuuma a lɛ mɛla ne a, yemɔti bɛyɛ ɛtane a bɛnea mɛla ne azo a bɛbua bɛ ndɛne a.
45002013	Ɔluakɛ tɛ mɛla ne ɛdielɛ a maa sonla sɔ Nyamenle anye a, kyesɛ ɔyɛ mɔɔ mɛla ne se la.
45002014	Bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnle Dwuuma la ɛnlɛ Mosisi mɛla ne suzuamgba ɛdeɛ, noko kenle biala mɔɔ bɛkɛyɛ mɔɔ mɛla ne se la bie la, ɛnee bɛyɛ Mosisi mɛla ne bɛmaa bɛ nwo.
45002015	Bɛ nyɛleɛ ne kile kɛ mɔɔ Mosisi mɛla ne kpondɛ la, bɛhɛlɛ ye wɔ bɛ ahonle nu, yɛɛ bɛ adwenle die to nu kɛ ɔle nɔhalɛ, ɔluakɛ ɔyɛ a bɛ adwenle nu yɛ bɛ kesee kɛ bɛbali fɔlɛ anzɛɛ bɛbali benle wɔ Kenle ne anu,
45002016	kɛmɔ Edwɛkpa ne mɔɔ mebɔ ye nolo la kile la. Na yemɔ a le kɛ, Nyamenle dua Gyisɛse Kelaese anwo zo bua menli kɔsɔɔti ndɛne wɔ adwenle biala mɔɔ bɛfa ye fealera nu la anwo.
45002017	Na saa ɛfɛlɛ ɛ nwo Dwuunli, ɛgyi Mosisi mɛla ne azo, ɛfa Nyamenle ɛtu ɛ nwo,
45002018	ɛze mɔɔ Nyamenle kpondɛ kɛ ɛyɛ la, yɛɛ wɔzukoa mɛla ne la ati, ɛze mɔɔ le kpalɛ mɔɔ ɔwɔ kɛ ɛyɛ la,
45002019	ɛze ye wienyi kɛ wɔmɔ a ɛle anyenzinliravolɛma adekilevolɛ a, ɛle kɛnlaneɛ ɛmaa menli mɔɔ lua awozinli nu la,
45002020	ɛle fotuvo ɛmaa mɔɔ ɛnze nrɛlɛbɛ la, ɛle ngakula kilehilevolɛ, ɛze ye wienyi kɛ mɛla ne ɛbuke wɔ adwenle nu ɛmaa wɔnwu nɔhalɛ ne,
45002021	ɛkilehile ɛ gɔnwo mɔ a, ɛnee duzu ati a ɛngilehile ɛ nwo ɛ? Ɛka kɛ, “Bɛmmawua”, na asoo ɛnle awule?
45002022	Ɛse, “Bɛmmato awuvolɛvalɛ mɛla ne”, na asoo ɛnva awuvolɛ? Ɛkyi amonle anzɛɛ bozonle, na asoo ɛngɔ amonle nu anzɛɛ bozonle zo ɛngɔnwua?
45002023	Ɛtu ɛ nwo kɛ ɛlɛ mɛla ne, na asoo ɛntietia zolɛ, ɛngua Nyamenle anyunlu aze?
45002024	Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne se, “Bɛmɛ Dwuuma bɛ ti, bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnle Dwuuma la tendɛ tia Nyamenle.”
45002025	Saa bɛdi mɛla ne azo a, ɛnee bɛ mrenyanu nzonlɛyɛlɛ ne le nvasoɛ, na saa bɛnli mɛla ne azo a, ɛnee noko anrɛɛ bɛanyɛ bɛ mrenyanu nzonlɛ bɔbɔ.
45002026	Na saa awie mɔɔ ɛnle Dwuunli, mɔɔ ɛtɛyɛle ye mrenyanu nzonlɛ la yɛ mɔɔ mɛla ne kpondɛ la a, ɛnee ɛnea a asoo Nyamenle ɛnrɛva sonla zɔhane kɛ asɛɛ yeyɛ ye mrenyanu nzonlɛ?
45002027	Zɔhane ati menli mɔɔ nwonane nu bɛtɛyɛle bɛ mrenyanu nzonlɛ, noko bɛdi mɛla ne azo la babua bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛyɛ bɛ mrenyanu nzonlɛ na bɛlɛ mɛla ne bɛ sa nu, na bɛtietia zolɛ la ndɛne.
45002028	Nwane a le Dwuunli kpalɛ ne mɔɔ ɛyɛ ye mrenyanu nzonlɛ la a? Dwuunli kpalɛ ne, tɛ yemɔ a le sonla ne mɔɔ nwonane nu yeyɛ ye mrenyanu nzonlɛ la, yɛɛ mrenyanu nzonlɛyɛlɛ kpalɛ ɛnle nwonane nu debie.
45002029	Dwuunli kpalɛ ne a le sonla ne mɔɔ sunsum nu yeyɛ ye ahonle nu mrenyanu nzonlɛ na ɔnyɛ ye nwonane nu debie la. Sonla ɛhye nyia ye nganvolɛ fi Nyamenle ɛkɛ, ɔnnyia ye ɔnvi menli lɔ.
45003001	Asoo Dwuuma gyi boɛ tɛla bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnle Dwuuma la? Anzɛɛ nvasoɛ bie wɔ mrenyanu nzonlɛyɛlɛ zo ɔ?
45003002	Nɔhalɛ bɔkɔɔ, wɔ adenle biala azo! Ɔboalekɛ alumua ne, bɛmɛ yɛɛ Nyamenle vale ye ngilehilelɛ ne wulale bɛ sa nu a.
45003003	Na saa yera kɛ menli ne bie mɔ anli nɔhalɛ a, ɛnee ɔkile kɛ Nyamenle ɔdaye ɔnrɛli nɔhalɛ ɔ?
45003004	Kyɛkyɛ, ɔnle zɔhane fee. Saa menli ɛnli nɔhalɛ bɔbɔ a Nyamenle bahɔ zolɛ ali nɔhalɛ dahuu. Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne se, “Ɔwɔ kɛ bɛkile wɔ bɛmaa ɛka nɔhalɛ; na bɛdi wɔ edwɛkɛ a wɔali benle.”
45003005	Saa yɛ nyɛleɛ ɛtane ɛtane ne mɔ maa yɛnwu Nyamenle pɛlepɛlelilɛ ne wienyi a, ɛnee kɛ yɛse ɛ? Saa yɛyɛ ɛtane na Nyamenle tea yɛ a, ɛnee Nyamenle ɔdaye yeyɛ ɛtane ɔ? (Melɛtendɛ kɛ sonla ala la.)
45003006	Ɔnle nɔhalɛ! Saa Nyamenle ɛnli pɛlepɛle a, ɛnee kɛ ɔkɛzi ɔkɛbua ewiade ndɛne ɛ?
45003007	Saa me adalɛ mɔɔ mele la kile maa Nyamenle anyunlunyia ne nee ye nɔhalɛ ne da ali wienyi a, ɛnee duzu ati yɛɛ bɛbua me fɔlɛ kɛ mele ɛtanenli ɛ?
45003008	Duzu ati yɛɛ bɛnga kɛ, “Bɛmaa yɛli ɛtane amaa kpalɛ ara ɛ?” Nɔhalɛ, ɛzonle mɔɔ menli ne bie mɔ ɛva ɛdo yɛ nwo zo la ɛne. Na bɛdabɛ bɛ munzule doa bɛ!
45003009	Saa ye zɛhae a, ɛnee yɛdayɛ Dwuuma yɛgyi boɛ yɛtɛla bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnle Dwuuma la ɔ? Kyɛkyɛ, ɔnle zɔhane fee. Mehile nuhua dɛba kɛ Dwuuma nee bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnle Dwuuma la amuala zo ɛtane.
45003010	Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne se, “Awie biala ɛnle ɛkɛ mɔɔ le tenlenenli a, Kyɛkyɛ ko bɔbɔ ɛnle ɛkɛ.
45003011	Biala ɛnlɛ ndelebɛbo, biala ɛmkpondɛ Nyamenle abo zo.
45003012	Menli kɔsɔɔti ɛde Nyamenle anwo atua; biala ɛvo, yɛɛ biala ɛnli boɛ, kyɛkyɛ, ko bɔbɔ ɛnle ɛkɛ.
45003013	Bɛ nloa deda nwolɛ kɛ sɛka mɔɔ ɛbubu, adalɛ yɛɛ vi bɛ nloa anu finde a. Bɛ nloa edwɛkɛ yɛ nla tɛla ɛwɔlɛ gye.
45003014	Amowa nee nzɛnvunli wɔ bɛ nloa anu.
45003015	Bɛle ahɔdiawu,
45003016	ɛleka biala mɔɔ bɛkɛhɔ la bɛtwehwe amaneɛnwunlɛ nee nyanelilɛ bɛmaa.
45003017	Bɛnze anzonudwolɛ adenle ne
45003018	yɛɛ Nyamenle ɛzulolɛ biala ɛnle bɛ nu.”
45003019	Mɔɔ yɛnwu ye la a le kɛ, debie biala mɔɔ wɔ mɛla ne anu la wɔ ɛkɛ ne maa bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛwɔ mɛla ne abo la, amaa menli muala aha bɛ nloa ado nuhua kɛ bɛdi fɔlɛ wɔ Nyamenle ndɛnebualɛ ne anu.
45003020	Ɔluakɛ awie biala mɔɔ di Mosisi mɛla ne azo la ɛngola ɛnzɔ Nyamenle anye. Mɛla ne gyima a le kɛ, ɔmaa sonla nwu ye ɛtane mɔɔ yeyɛ la.
45003021	Kɛkala, adenle mɔɔ Nyamenle dua zo maa menli sɔ ɔ nye la ɛrala ɛkɛ wienyi, yɛɛ ɔnvane mɛla ne anwo hweledede. Mɛla mumua ne nee Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛma di ɛhye anwo daselɛ.
45003022	Nyamenle dua menli diedi mɔɔ lɛ ye wɔ Gyisɛse Kelaese anu la azo a maa bɛsɔ ɔ nye a. Nyamenle yɛ ɛhye maa bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛdie Kelaese bɛdi la amuala, ɔboalekɛ ngakyile fee ɛnle nuhua;
45003023	menli kɔsɔɔti ɛyɛ ɛtane na bɛnfɛta Nyamenle anyunlunyia ne.
45003024	Ɔlua mgbɔdalɛ mɔɔ Gyisɛse Kelaese ɛva ɔ nwo ɛli la azo, Nyamenle ɛlolɛ ne mɔɔ ɔfa ɔkyɛ mgbane la maa menli muala sɔ ɔ nye.
45003025	Nyamenle ɔdaye ɔvale Gyisɛse ɔmanle, amaa ɔlua ye ewule ne azo yeayɛ menli ɛtane nwo mgbɔdalɛ boane, wɔ bɛ diedi mɔɔ bɛkɛnyia ye wɔ ye nu la azo. Nyamenle yɛle ɛhye vale hilele ye tenleneyɛlɛ ne. Mɔmoane, ɔzile abotane na ɔbule ɔ nye ɔguale menli ɛtane zo;
45003026	na kɛkala ɔ nee menli di wɔ bɛ ɛtane nwo, ɔfa ɔkile ye tenleneyɛlɛ ne. Nyamenle dua adenle ɛhye azo kile kɛ ɔle tenlenenli na ɔmaa awie biala mɔɔ die Gyisɛse di la sɔ ɔ nye.
45003027	Ɛnee akee duzu a yɛfa yɛtu yɛ nwo a? Yɛnlɛ ɛhwee! Na ɛnee akee duzu ati ɔ? Ɛnee yɛ gyima kpalɛ nwo anzɛɛ? Kyɛkyɛ. Na yɛdie yɛdi la ati ɔ.
45003028	Ɔluakɛ yɛnwu kɛ sonla mɔɔ die Nyamenle di la yɛɛ Nyamenle maa ɔsɔ ɔ nye a, na tɛ mɔɔ di mɛla ne azo la ɔ.
45003029	Na Nyamenle le Dwuuma angome Nyamenle ɔ? Anzɛɛ ɔnle bɛdabɛ noko mɔɔ bɛnle Dwuuma la Nyamenle ɔ? Kɛmɔti ɛ, ɔle bɛdabɛ noko bɛ Nyamenle!
45003030	Nyamenle le kokye yɛɛ ɔbalua diedi zo a yeamaa Dwuuma azɔ ɔ nye a; zɔhane ala yɛɛ ɔbalua bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnle Dwuuma la noko diedi zo yeamaa bɛazɔ ɔ nye a.
45003031	Na ɛnee ɛhye kile kɛ yɛdua diedi zo yɛavuandi mɛla ne yɛagua ɔ? Kyɛkyɛ! Ɔnle zɔhane fee. Yɛdua yɛ diedi zo yɛkpogya mɛla ne zo.
45004001	Ɛnee akee Ebileham, mɔɔ le azɛlɛ ye azo yɛ nlenya la, duzu a yɛka ye wɔ ɔ nwo a? Ye ɛbɛla ɛbɔlɛ ne a le boni?
45004002	Saa ye nyɛleɛ a manle ɔzɔle Nyamenle anye a, anrɛɛ ɛnee ɔlɛ debie ɔfa ɔtu ɔ nwo wɔ nwolɛ. Noko ɔngola ɔndu ɔ nwo wɔ Nyamenle anyunlu.
45004003	Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne se, “Ebileham liele Nyamenle lile, na ye diedi ne ati Nyamenle liele ye dole nu kɛ ɔle tenlenenli.”
45004004	Sonla mɔɔ yɛ gyima la bɛtua ye nwolɛ kakɛ, ye ahatualɛ ne ɛnle ahyɛlɛdeɛ, ɔle debie mɔɔ yehwi ɔ ti anwo a yenyia ye a.
45004005	Na mɔɔ ɛnyɛ gyima na ɔdie Nyamenle ne mɔɔ bua ɛtanevolɛma benle la di la, ye diedi zo yɛɛ Nyamenle nea na ɔmaa ɔsɔ ɔ nye a.
45004006	Zɔhane ala yɛɛ Belemgbunli Devidi ka ye wɔ sonla ne mɔɔ saa ɛye ye gyimayɛlɛ ɛsie ahane a ɛnee Nyamenle die ye to nu kɛ ɔle tenlenenli la anwo a. Ɔse:
45004007	“Nyilalɛ ɛha bɛdabɛ mɔɔ Nyamenle ɛva bɛ ɛtane ɛhyɛ bɛ na yeheda bɛ ɛtane ne mɔ azo la!
45004008	Nyilalɛ ɛha sonla ne mɔɔ Awulae ɛmbu ye ɛtane nwo mgbonda la!”
45004009	Anzɛɛ nyilalɛ ɛhye mɔɔ Devidi ka nwolɛ edwɛkɛ la wɔ ɛkɛ maa bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛyɛ bɛ mrenyanu nzonlɛ la angome ɔ? Kyɛkyɛ. Ɔwɔ ɛkɛ ɔmaa bɛdabɛ noko mɔɔ bɛtɛyɛle bɛ mrenyanu nzonlɛ la. Ɔluakɛ Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne se, “Ebileham liele Nyamenle lile, na ye diedi ti, Nyamenle liele ye dole nu kɛ ɔle tenlenenli.”
45004010	Mekɛ boni anu a ɛhye zile a? Ɔzile na Ebileham ayɛ ye mrenyanu nzonlɛ anzɛɛ ɔyɛle ye mrenyanu nzonlɛ kolaa na yeazi? Ɔzile kolaa na yeayɛ.
45004011	Nzinlii a Ebileham manle bɛyɛle ye mrenyanu nzonlɛ, ɔvale ɔyɛle sɛkɛlɛneɛ anzɛɛ nzonlɛ mɔɔ kile kɛ Nyamenle ɛlua ye diedi zo ɛmaa yezɔ ɔ nye a. Yemɔti Sunsum nu a, ɛnee Ebileham le bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛdie Nyamenle bɛdi na yelie bɛ kɛ bɛsɔ ɔ nye, noko bɛtɛyɛle bɛ mrenyanu nzonlɛ la bɛ ze.
45004012	Eza ɔle bɛdabɛ noko mɔɔ bɛyɛ bɛ mrenyanu nzonlɛ, na tɛ kɛ asɛɛ bɛyɛ bɛ mrenyanu nzonlɛ la ati ɔ, na bɛva ɔ gyakɛ na bɛ diedi le kɛ ɔdaye Ebileham ɛdeɛ ne kolaa na yeayɛ ye mrenyanu nzonlɛ la bɛ ze.
45004013	Nyamenle bɔle Ebileham ɛwɔkɛ kɛ azɛlɛ ne bayɛ ye nee ɔ bo zo amra ɛdeɛ. Nyamenle bɔle ɛwɔkɛ ɛhye, tɛ kɛ Ebileham lile mɛla ne azo la ati ɔ, na ɔliele Nyamenle ɔlile, na ɔlua zolɛ Nyamenle manle ɔzɔle ɔ nye.
45004014	Ɔluakɛ saa Nyamenle ɛwɔkɛ ne mɔɔ fane agyalilɛ nwo la wɔ ɛkɛ maa bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛdi Mosisi mɛla ne azo la angome a, ɛnee noko sonla diedi mɔɔ wɔ Nyamenle anu la le mgbane, yɛɛ nvasoɛ biala ɛnle Nyamenle ɛwɔkɛ ne azo.
45004015	Mɛla ne azo ɛlilɛ bɔbɔ, yɛka Nyamenle ɛya; na ɛleka noko mɔɔ mɛla ɛnle la, menli ɛndo mɛla.
45004016	Ɛwɔkɛ ne gyi diedi zo, amaa yɛanyɛ Nyamenle ɛlolɛ ahyɛlɛdeɛ yeammaa bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛdi Mosisi mɛla ne azo la angome, na yeayɛ ɛlolɛ mɔɔ ka Ebileham abo zo amra amuala mɔɔ lɛ diedi kɛ ɔdaye Ebileham la. Ɔluakɛ Ebileham le yɛ muala yɛ ze wɔ sunsum nu.
45004017	Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne se, “Meyɛ wɔ maanle maanle dɔɔnwo bɛ ze.” Nyamenle ɛhye mɔɔ Ebileham liele ye lile la a bɔle Ebileham ɛwɔkɛ ne a. Nyamenle ɛhye a maa mɔɔ ɛwu la dwazo ba ngoane nu na ɔ nloa edwɛkɛ maa mɔɔ ɛnle ɛkɛ la ba a.
45004018	Ebileham liele Nyamenle ɛwɔkɛ ne lile na ɔmanle ɔ nye lale zo ɛsesebɛ, wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ ɛnee anyelazo ɛwie la, kɛ ɔbayɛ “maanle maanle bɛ ze.”
45004019	Ɛnee yeli ɛvolɛ asɛɛ ɛya, noko ye diedi andɔ sinli, kɛmɔ ɔnea a ɛnee asɛɛ yewu, na ɔ ye Sɛla le mota la.
45004020	Ye diedi ne anga aze wɔ Nyamenle ɛwɔkɛ ne anwo, na ye diedi ne manle ye anwosesebɛ na ɔyele Nyamenle ayɛlɛ.
45004021	Ɔliele ɔlile bɔkɔɔ kɛ Nyamenle kola yɛ mɔɔ yeha la maa ɔbo zolɛ.
45004022	Ɛhye ati yɛɛ Nyamenle luale ye diedi ne azo “liele ye kɛ ɔle tenlenenli” a.
45004023	Edwɛkɛ agbɔkɛ “bɛliele ye kɛ ɔle tenlenenli” ne, bɛangɛlɛ bɛammaa ɔ ngome kye.
45004024	Bɛhɛlɛle bɛmanle yɛdayɛ noko mɔɔ yɛdie mɔɔ dwazole yɛ Awulae Gyisɛse vile ewule nu la yɛdi la.
45004025	Bɛyele Gyisɛse bɛmanle ɔwule wɔ yɛ ɛtane ti na bɛdwazole ye bɛrale ngoane nu, amaa bɛalie yɛ kɛ yɛsɔ Nyamenle anye.
45005001	Kɛmɔ ɔlua diedi zo yɛzɔ Nyamenle anye la, yɛlua Awulae Gyisɛse Kelaese anwo zo yɛnyia yɛ ti wɔ Nyamenle ɛkɛ.
45005002	Gyisɛse lua yɛ diedi zo ɛva yɛ ɛra Nyamenle ɛlolɛ ne mɔɔ ɛnɛ yɛde nu la abo. Yemɔti yɛdi fɛlɛko anyelazo nu kɛ yɛbanyia Nyamenle anyunlunyia ne.
45005003	Bɔbɔ wɔ amaneɛnwunlɛ nu yɛbali fɛlɛko, ɔboalekɛ yɛze kɛ nyanelilɛ maa sonla nyia abotane,
45005004	abotanezilɛ wɔ amaneɛnwunlɛ nu maa sonla nyia subane kpalɛ mɔɔ gyi kpundii, yɛɛ subane kpalɛ zɛhae maa ye anyelazo.
45005005	Anyelazo ɛhye ɛnye yɛ anrinli ɛndo yɛ sa nu, ɔluakɛ Nyamenle ɛlua Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne, mɔɔ le Nyamenle ahyɛlɛdeɛ ne azo ɛva ye ɛhulolɛ ɛyi yɛ ahonle ne mɔ tɛkɛɛ.
45005006	Mekɛ mɔɔ ɛnee moalɛ ɛwie bɔkɔɔ la, Kelaese wule manle bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnze Nyamenle la wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ Nyamenle ɔdaye ɔhyehyɛle la anu.
45005007	Ɔyɛ se kɛ awie kɛwu kɛmaa tenlenenli. Ɔyɛ a bie kɛhulo kɛ ɔkɛwu ɔkɛmaa sonlakpalɛ bɔbɔ ɛdeɛ,
45005008	noko Nyamenle ɛhile kɛ ɔsi ɔkulo yɛ la, na yemɔ a le kɛ, mɔɔ ɛnee yɛtɛda nwo yɛtɛde ɛtaneyɛlɛma la, Kelaese wule manle yɛ!
45005009	Nyamenle ɛlua Kelaese ewule zo ɛmaa yɛzɔ ɔ nye; fane nyɛ yɛɛ akee ɔnrɛlua Kelaese anwo zo ɔnrɛlie yɛ ɔnrɛvi ye ɛya ne anu ɛ?
45005010	Mɔɔ ɛnee yɛle Nyamenle kpɔvolɛma la, yelua ɔ Ra ne ewule zo ɔ nee yɛ ɛli ngamɔnu na yeyɛ yɛ ɔ gɔnwo mɔ a, ɛnee fane nyɛ yɛɛ akee ɔnrɛlua tease Kelaese ne ati ɔnrɛlie yɛ ngoane ɛ?
45005011	Noko tɛ ɔ muala ɛ. Yɛdua Awulae Gyisɛse Kelaese anwo zo yɛdi fɛlɛko wɔ Nyamenle anu, ɔluakɛ yeyɛ yɛ Nyamenle agɔnwo mɔ.
45005012	Yemɔti kɛmɔ ɛtane luale sonla ko anwo zo a rale ewiade, na sonla ko ne ɛtane ne vale ewule rale la, yɛɛ ewule dele kpondenle aleɛabo amra anwo zo a, ɔluakɛ menli kɔsɔɔti ɛyɛ ɛtane.
45005013	Ɛtane rale ewiade kolaa na bɛava mɛla ne bɛamaa, yɛɛ mɔɔ ɛnee mɛla ɛnle ɛkɛ la, bɛmbu ɛtane nwo mgbonda bɛntia awie biala.
45005014	Noko ɔvi Adam anwo zo toonwo mɔɔ radwule Mosisi anwo zo la, ewule nyianle sonla nwo zo tumi, bɔbɔ menli mɔɔ bɛ ɛtane ne mɔ ɛnle kɛ Adam mɛladonlɛ ɛdeɛ ne la. Adam le sonla ko ne mɔɔ ɔwɔ kɛ ɔba la sɔhovolɛ.
45005015	Noko bɛ mu nwiɔ bɛnle ko, ɔluakɛ Nyamenle ɛlolɛ ahyɛlɛdeɛ ne ɛnle kɛ Adam ɛtane ne la. Ɔle nɔhalɛ kɛ sonla ko ne ɛtane ti menli dɔɔnwo wule ɛdeɛ, noko Nyamenle ɛlolɛ ahyɛlɛdeɛ ne mɔɔ ɔlua sonla ko ne, mɔɔ le Gyisɛse Kelaese ɛlolɛ zo ɔfa ɔkyɛ mgbane la wɔ ɛkɛ maa menli somaa.
45005016	Ngakyile wɔ Nyamenle ahyɛlɛdeɛ ne nee mɔɔ sonla ko ne ɛtane ne kola yɛ la anu. Ɔluakɛ sonla ko ne ɛtane ti yɛɛ Nyamenle buale sonla fɔlɛ a; na ɛtaneyɛlɛ somaa ne anzi, ye ɛlolɛ ahyɛlɛdeɛ ne ɛbua yɛ benle.
45005017	Sonla ko ne, Adam ɛtane ti yɛɛ ɛtane luale ranyianle sonla nwo zo tumi a. Zɔhane ala yɛɛ bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛbalua sonla ko ne, Gyisɛse Kelaese anwo zo bɛanyia ɛlolɛ ne molozo nee pɛlepɛlelilɛ ahyɛlɛdeɛ ne mɔɔ bɛfa bɛmaa mgbane la anwo bazo kpalɛ, na bɛalua ɔ nwo zo bɛali arelemgbunli wɔ bɛ ɛbɛlabɔlɛ nu a.
45005018	Zɔhane ati, kɛmɔ sonla ko mɛladonlɛ hwenle menli kɔsɔɔti hɔle ewule nu la, zɔhane ala yɛɛ sonla ko tenleneyɛlɛ babua menli kɔsɔɔti benle na yeamaa bɛ ngoane a.
45005019	Kɛmɔ sonla ko anzosesebɛ ti menli muala yɛle ɛtanevolɛma la, zɔhane ala yɛɛ ɔlua sonla ko anzomɛlɛkɛ zo menli somaa bazɔ Nyamenle anye a.
45005020	Bɛvale mɛla ne bɛrale ala la yɛɛ mɛladonlɛ liele ebia a; noko ɛleka mɔɔ ɛtaneyɛlɛ ne zonle la, Nyamenle ɛlolɛ ne yɛle dɔɔnwo bole zolɛ.
45005021	Zɔhane ati, kɛmɔ ɛtane vale ewule a lile belemgbunli la, zɔhane ala yɛɛ Nyamenle ɛlolɛ ne fa kpalɛyɛlɛ di belemgbunli na ɔfa yɛ ɔdua Gyisɛse Kelaese, yɛ Awulae ne anwo zo ɔkɔ ngoane mɔɔ ɛnlɛ awieleɛ la anu a.
45006001	Ɛnee akee kɛ yɛha yɛze ɛ? Yɛhɔ zo yɛyɛ ɛtane amaa Nyamenle ɛlolɛ ne azo ɔ?
45006002	Kyɛkyɛ! Saa ɛtane maa yɛwu a, ɛnee kɛ yɛsi yɛtɛnla ɛtane nu bieko ɛ?
45006003	Bɛdabɛ bɛze kɛ mɔɔ bɛzɔnenle yɛ bɛmanle Kelaese Gyisɛse la, ɛnee bɛzɔne yɛ bɛmaa ye ewule ne.
45006004	Zɔhane ati yɛlua ɛzɔnenlɛ ne azo bɛziele yɛ bɛbokale ɔ nwo wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ ɔwule la, amaa kɛmɔ Selɛ ne vale anyunlunyia tumi ne dwazole ye vile ewule nu la, yɛdayɛ noko yɛabɔ yɛ ɛbɛla ne fofolɛ.
45006005	Ɔluakɛ saa yɛ nee Kelaese a hɔle ewule nu a, ɛnee bɛbadwazo yɛdayɛ noko bɛavi ewule nu bɛara ngoane nu, kɛmɔ bɛdwazole ye la.
45006006	Yɛze kɛ yɛ su dɛba ne bɛhunle ye bɛbokale Kelaese anwo wɔ meanubaka ne azo, amaa bɛazɛkye yɛ su ɛtane ne tumi ne na yɛanyɛ ɛtane ngɛkɛlɛ bieko.
45006007	Ɔluakɛ sonla wu a, ɛnee ɔnle ɛtane tumi bo bieko.
45006008	Saa yɛ nee Kelaese ɛwu a, ɛnee yɛdie yɛdi kɛ yɛ nee ye badɛnla ngoane nu.
45006009	Yɛze kɛ bɛdwazo Kelaese bɛvi ewule nu na ɔnrɛwu bieko; ewule ɛnlɛ ɔ nwo zo tumi bieko.
45006010	Ye ewule ne mɔɔ ɔwule la, ɔwule kokye ala ɔyele ɔ nwo wɔ ɛtane asa anu, na ngoane nu mɔɔ kɛkala ɔde la, ɔde ɔmaa Nyamenle.
45006011	Zɔhane ala yɛɛ ɔwɔ kɛ bɛdabɛ noko bɛdwenle bɛmaa bɛ nwo kɛ bɛwu bɛvi ɛtane tumi ne abo, na ɔlua Kelaese Gyisɛse ati bɛde aze bɛmaa Nyamenle.
45006012	Zɔhane ati ɔnle kɛ ɛtane nyia bɛ nwo zo tumi bieko na ɔmaa bɛdi ye atiakunluwɔzo nzi.
45006013	Eza ɔnle kɛ bɛtu bɛ sonlabaka ne ɛleka biala bɛmaa ɛtane kɛ bɛva bɛyɛ ninyɛndane biala. Bɛva bɛ nwo bɛmaa Nyamenle kɛ menli mɔɔ bɛye bɛ bɛvi ewule nu bɛra ngoane nu, na bɛdu bɛ nwo ɛleka biala bɛmaa Nyamenle kɛ ɔva ɔyɛ gyima mɔɔ sɔ ɔ nye la.
45006014	Ɔluakɛ ɔnle kɛ ɛtane yɛ bɛ menle bieko; bɛnle mɛla ne abo, bɛwɔ Nyamenle ɛlolɛ ne abo.
45006015	Duzu bieko? Ɛnee kɛmɔ yɛwɔ Nyamenle ɛlolɛ ne abo na yɛnle mɛla ne abo la ati, ɔwɔ kɛ yɛkɔ zolɛ yɛyɛ ɛtane ɔ? Kyɛkyɛ, ɔnle zɔhane!
45006016	Bɛdabɛ bɛze ye wienyi kɛ saa bɛbu bɛ nwo bɛmaa awie kɛ bɛsonle ye kɛ bɛle ahanra a, ɛnee bɛle ahanra bɛmaa ahenle ne mɔɔ bɛsonle ye la. Saa ɛtane a le bɛ menle a, bɛbanyia nwolɛ ewule, saa bɛtie Nyamenle noko a, bɛbalie bɛ bɛamaa bɛazɔ Nyamenle anye.
45006017	Yɛyɛ Nyamenle mo, ɔluakɛ mekɛ bie, ɛnee bɛle ahanra bɛmaa ɛtane, na kɛmɔ bɛvale bɛ ahonle muala bɛyɛle tieyɛ bɛmanle nɔhalɛ ne mɔɔ bɛnwunle ye wɔ ngilehilelɛ mɔɔ bɛnyianle ye la anu la ati
45006018	bɛliele bɛ bɛvile ɛtane nu na bɛrayɛle ahanra bɛmanle tenleneyɛlɛ.
45006019	Bɛmaa menga edwɛkɛ ne sikalɛ mɔɔ bɛ adwenle so nu la. Kɛmɔ mekɛ bie bɛyɛle bɛ nwo ahanra bɛmanle ɛtane nee amumuyɛ na bɛyɛle ninyɛndane la, zɔhane ala yɛɛ kɛkala ɔwɔ kɛ bɛyɛ bɛ nwo ahanra bɔkɔɔ bɛmaa tenleneyɛlɛ a, amaa bɛ nwo ade nwuanzaanwu.
45006020	Mekɛ mɔɔ bɛle ɛtane ahanra la, ɛnee bɛnle tenlenema.
45006021	Na duzu nvasoɛ yɛɛ bɛnyianle ye wɔ ninyɛne mɔɔ bɛyɛle na ɛnɛ bɛse nwolɛ nyiane la anwo a? Nyɛleɛ ɛhendeɛ ne mɔ awieleɛ a le ewule!
45006022	Na kɛkala, bɛye bɛ bɛvi ɛtane nu na bɛrayɛ Nyamenle ahanra, bɛ nvasoɛ a le bɛ ɛbɛla mɔɔ bɛte nwolɛ na bɛadu bɛ nwo bɔkɔɔ bɛamaa ye, na ɔlua zo bɛanyia ngoane mɔɔ ɛnlɛ awieleɛ la.
45006023	Ɔluakɛ ɛtane ahatualɛ a le ewule, na Nyamenle ahyɛlɛdeɛ ne mɔɔ ɔfa ɔmaa mgbane la a le ngoane mɔɔ ɛnlɛ awieleɛ wɔ yɛ Awulae Kelaese Gyisɛse ati.
45007001	Me mediema, melɛtendɛ meahile bɛ kɛ bɛle menli mɔɔ ze mɛla deɛ holɛ a. Se bɛze kɛ mɛla kyekye sonla wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ ɔde aze la?
45007002	Bɛnlea kɛ, raalɛ mɔɔ wɔ agyalɛ la, mɛla kyekye ye beta ɔ hu anwo wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ ɔ hu de ngoane nu la; na saa ɔ hu wu a, mɛla ɛnkyekye ye bieko.
45007003	Mekɛ mɔɔ ɔ hu de aze la saa ɔkɔ nrenya gyɛne nwo a, ɛnee yedo awuvolɛvalɛ mɛla ne; noko saa ɔ hu wu a, zɔhane mɛla ne ɛnkyekye ye bieko, yemɔti saa ɔkɔ agyalɛ fofolɛ a ɔndo awuvolɛvalɛ mɛla ne.
45007004	Mediema, kɛ bɛ edwɛkɛ ne de la ɛne. Kɛmɔ ɔlua Kelaese anwo zo yɛwu la, Mosisi mɛla ne ɛnlɛ yɛ nwo zo tumi bieko, na yɛle Kelaese mɔɔ bɛdwazo ye bɛvi ewule nu la ɛdeɛ, amaa yɛ nwo ara nvasoɛ amaa Nyamenle.
45007005	Ɔluakɛ mɔɔ ɛnee yɛde yɛmaa yɛ nwo la, yɛ atiakunluwɔzo ɛtane ne mɔ manle mɛla ne dwazole yɛle gyima wɔ yɛ nu, na ɔlua zolɛ yɛ nwo rale nvasoɛ manle ewule.
45007006	Na kɛkala mɔɔ yɛnle mɛla ne tumi bo, na yɛwu yɛvi mɔɔ bɔle yɛ kpanwu la asa anu la, yɛnzonle kɛmɔ ɛnee yɛwɔ mɛla ne abo la. Yɛsonle wɔ adenle fofolɛ ne mɔɔ Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne kile la anu.
45007007	Ɛnee kɛ yɛha yɛze ɛ? Kɛ mɛla ne le ɛtane ɔ? Kyɛkyɛ, ɔnle zɔhane. Mɛla ne a manle menwunle kɛ ɛtane si de la a. Saa mɛla ne anga kɛ “Mmayɛ anyebolo” a, anrɛɛ menze kɛ bɛsi bɛyɛ anyebolo la.
45007008	Ɛtane nyianle adenle wɔ mɛla ne anu na ɔvale anyebolo ngakyile muala ɔluale ndenle ngakyile nu ɔwulale me nu. Ɛtane mumua ne, saa ɛye mɛla ne ɛsie ahane a, ɔle debie wulera.
45007009	Mekɛ bie mɔɔ ɛnee menze mɛla deɛ holɛ la ɛnee melɛ ngoane, na mɔɔ mɛla rale la, ɛtane dwazole gyinlanle,
45007010	na menwule. Na mɛla ko ne ala mɔɔ anrɛɛ ɔwɔ kɛ bɛlɛ me ngoane la, rayɛle ewule manle me.
45007011	Ɛtane nyianle adenle vale mɛla bɛlɛbɛlale me, na ɔluale zolɛ ɔhunle me.
45007012	Zɔhane ati, Mosisi mɛla mumua ne le nwuanzanwuanza, yɛɛ ngyehyɛlɛ ne le nwuanzanwuanza, ɔle kpalɛ, ɔtenrɛ.
45007013	Na ɛnee ɛhye kile kɛ debie kpalɛ a hunle me la ɔ? Kyɛkyɛ! Ɛtane a hunle me a. Ɔvale kpalɛ ɔlile ɔ nyunlu ɔhunle me, amaa ye su dɛba ne avinde kɛ ɔle ɛtane. Yemɔti, bɛlua mɛla ne azo bɛhile kɛ ɛtane le kakadane kpalɛ kpalɛ.
45007014	Yɛze kɛ mɛla ne le sunsum nu debie; mame, mele nwonane nu debie mɔɔ bɛdɔne me kɛ kanranli bɛmaa ɛtane a.
45007015	Debie mɔɔ meyɛ la mende ɔ bo, ɔluakɛ mɔɔ mekpondɛ kɛ meyɛ la, mengola menyɛ, na meyɛ deɛ ko ne ala mɔɔ mengulo kɛ meyɛ la.
45007016	Na saa meyɛ mɔɔ ɔnle kɛ meyɛ la a, ɛnee ɔkile kɛ medie meto nu kɛ mɛla ne le kpalɛ.
45007017	Yemɔti tɛ me nye fuu yɛɛ meyɛ a, na ɛtane ne mɔɔ de me nu la a maa meyɛ a.
45007018	Meze kɛ kpalɛ biala ɛnle me sonlabaka ye anu. Ɔluakɛ me kunlu a anrɛɛ meyɛ kpalɛ, noko mengola menyɛ.
45007019	Mengola menyɛ kpalɛ ne mɔɔ mekulo kɛ meyɛ la, na ɛtane ne mɔɔ mengulo kɛ meyɛ la yɛɛ meyɛ a.
45007020	Na saa meyɛ mɔɔ mengulo kɛ meyɛ la a, ɛnee ɔkile kɛ tɛ me nye fuu ɔ, na ɛtane ne mɔɔ de me nu la ɔ.
45007021	Yemɔti ɛnee menwu kɛ mɛla ɛhye ɛlɛyɛ gyima wɔ me nu. Mɔɔ mekulo kɛ meyɛ kpalɛ la, ɛnee ɛtane ala a gyi me nye zo a.
45007022	Wɔ me nuhua a ɛnee me nye die Nyamenle mɛla ne anwo kpalɛ.
45007023	Na menwu mɛla fofolɛ bie wɔ me sonlabaka ye nvɛyeba ne mɔ amuala anu. Mɛla ɛhye ko tia mɔɔ me adwenle kulo kɛ ɔyɛ la, na ɔmaa meyɛ kanranli memaa ɛtane mɛla ne mɔɔ ɛlɛdi gyima wɔ me sonlabaka ne anu la.
45007024	Me nwo yɛ anwunvɔne kpole! Na nwane a kɛlie me kɛvi nwonane ɛhye asa nu, mɔɔ ɔ nee me ɛlɛkɔ ewule nu a?
45007025	Melua yɛ Awulae Gyisɛse Kelaese anwo zo meyɛ Nyamenle mo. Ɛhye yɛɛ megyi nwo a; mefa me adwenle muala medi Nyamenle mɛla ne azo mesonle ye, na me sonlabaka ye anu a, ɛnee meli ɛtane mɛla nzi.
45008001	Zɔhane ati bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛ nee Kelaese Gyisɛse le ko la ɛnlɛ ndeanlɛ biala.
45008002	Ɔluakɛ Sunsum ne mɛla ne mɔɔ Kelaese Gyisɛse ati ɔmaa yɛ ngoane la ɛye me ɛvi ɛtane nee ewule mɛla ne abo.
45008003	Mɔɔ nwonane ne bɛtɛɛyɛlɛ ti mɛla ne angola anyɛ la, Nyamenle ɛyɛ. Yemɔ a le kɛ, ɔzoanle ɔdaye ɔ Ra ne ɔmanle ɔvale sonla nwonane ɛtane ɛhye bie ɔrale na ɔradeanle ɛtane ne mɔɔ de sonla nu la.
45008004	Nyamenle yɛle ɛhye, amaa yɛdayɛ mɔɔ yɛde Nyamenle Sunsum ne anu na yɛnde nwonane nu la, mɛla ne ngyehyɛlɛ fɔɔnwo ne ali munli wɔ yɛ nu.
45008005	Bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛde nwonane nu la adwenle wɔ nwonane nu ninyɛne ɛyɛlɛ zo. Bɛdabɛ noko mɔɔ bɛtɛnla kɛmɔ Sunsum ne kile bɛ la adwenle wɔ Sunsum nu nyɛleɛ zo.
45008006	Saa ɛmaa nwonane nu adwenleadwenle keda ɛ nwo zo a, ɔwie ewule; yɛɛ saa ɛmaa Sunsum nu adwenleadwenle keda ɛ nwo zo a, ɔwie ngoane nee anzonudwolɛ.
45008007	Yemɔti mɔɔ maa nwonane nu adwenleadwenle keda ɔ nwo zo la le Nyamenle kpɔvolɛ; ɔluakɛ ɔnli Nyamenle mɛla ne azo, yɛɛ ɔdi zo bɔbɔ a ɔnrɛyɛ boɛ;
45008008	ɔboalekɛ bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛdi bɛ sonlabaka ne atiakunluwɔzo nzi la ɛngola ɛnzɔ Nyamenle anye.
45008009	Na bɛmɛ, bɛnde bɛmmaa bɛ sonlabaka ne, na saa Nyamenle Sunsum ne wɔ bɛ nu a, ɛnee noko bɛde bɛmaa Sunsum ne. Mɔɔ ɛnlɛ Kelaese Sunsum ne bie wɔ ye nu la ɛnle Kelaese ɛdeɛ.
45008010	Na saa Kelaese de bɛ nu a, ɛnee saa ɛtane ti bɛwu nwonane nu bɔbɔ a, Sunsum ne anu bɛlɛ ngoane, ɔboalekɛ bɛlie bɛ bɛmaa bɛzɔ Nyamenle anye.
45008011	Na saa Nyamenle Sunsum ne, mɔɔ dwazole Gyisɛse vile ewule nu la de bɛ nu a, ɛnee noko mɔɔ dwazole Gyisɛse vile ewule nu la bamaa bɛdabɛ noko bɛ sonlabaka ye mɔɔ wu la ngoane wɔ ye Sunsum ne mɔɔ wɔ bɛ nu la ati.
45008012	Zɔhane ati, me mediema, ɛzonle la yɛ nwo zo kɛ ɔnle kɛ yɛtɛnla yɛmaa yɛ sonlabaka ne.
45008013	Ɔluakɛ saa bɛtɛnla bɛmaa bɛ sonlabaka ne a, bɛbawu; na saa bɛtɛnla bɛmaa Sunsum ne a, bɛbahu nyɛleɛ ɛtane ne mɔɔ wɔ bɛ nu la, na bɛanyia ngoane.
45008014	Bɛdabɛ mɔɔ Nyamenle Sunsum ne yɛ bɛ tataa la le Nyamenle amra.
45008015	Ɔluakɛ Sunsum ne mɔɔ Nyamenle ɛva ɛmaa bɛ la ɛnyɛ bɛ ahanra, na ɔmmaa bɛnyɛ avoanvoanle. Sunsum ne maa bɛyɛ Nyamenle amra, na ɔlua Sunsum ne tumi zo yɛkola yɛfɛlɛ Nyamenle kɛ, “Egya! Me Papa.”
45008016	Nyamenle Sunsum ne nee yɛ ɛdeɛ ne bɔ nu maa yɛkola yɛka kɛ yɛle Nyamenle amra.
45008017	Na saa yɛle ɔ mra a, ɛnee yɛdi agya, yɛɛ ye ɛlolɛ ne mɔɔ yeva yezie ɛkɛ yemaa ɔ mra la yɛbanyia bie, na yɛ nee Kelaese ava mɔɔ Nyamenle ɛva ɛzie ɛkɛ ɛmaa ye la, ɔluakɛ saa yɛ nee Kelaese di nyane a yɛ nee ye kɛnyia ye anyunlunyia ne.
45008018	Menea a amaneɛ mɔɔ yɛlɛnwu ye ɛke la kpole ɛnrɛdo kenlebie anyunlunyia mɔɔ yɛbanyia ye la.
45008019	Abɔdeɛ muala ɛlɛkendɛ anwolɔlɛ kpole nu kɛ Nyamenle kɛye ɔ mra kɛhile.
45008020	Ɔluakɛ abɔdeɛ muala mgbane mɔɔ ɛyɛ la, tɛ ɔdaye ye ɛhulolɛ zo ɔ, na Nyamenle ngyehyɛlɛ ɔ. Noko anyelazo ɛhye wɔ ɛkɛ ne kɛ
45008021	kenle ko dedee bɛbaye abɔdeɛ muala bɛavi ɛkpɔlɔlɛ akɛlɛzonlenlɛ nu na yeanyia anyunlunyia fanwodi ne mɔɔ Nyamenle amra lɛ ye la.
45008022	Ɔluakɛ yɛze kɛ toonwo mɔɔ yeradwu ɛnɛ la abɔdeɛ muala ɛlɛte nyane kɛ asɛɛ yevo awolɛ zo.
45008023	Na tɛ abɔdeɛ ngome; yɛdayɛ noko mɔɔ yɛnyia Sunsum ne kɛ Nyamenle ahyɛlɛdeɛ mɔɔ lumua la, yɛte nyane wɔ yɛ nu, wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ yɛlɛkendɛ Nyamenle kɛ ɔkɛyɛ yɛ ɔ mra na ɔkɛlie yɛ sonlabaka ne la.
45008024	Anyelazo ɛhye azo yɛɛ ɔlua mɔɔ bɛlie yɛ ngoane a. Na yemɔ a le kɛ, awie ɛmmaa ɔ nye ɛnla debie mɔɔ ɔ nye gyi nwolɛ la azo. Na nwane bɔbɔ yɛɛ kɛmaa ɔ nye kɛla debie mɔɔ ɔ nye gyi nwolɛ la azo a?
45008025	Saa yɛmaa yɛ nye da debie mɔɔ yɛ nye ɛngyi nwolɛ la azo a, yɛɛ yɛfa abotane yɛkendɛ ye ɛnyianlɛ a.
45008026	Zɔhane ala yɛɛ kɛmɔ yɛnlɛ anwosesebɛ la, Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne baboa yɛ a. Ɔluakɛ yɛnze nzɛlɛlɛ yɛ, kɛmɔ ɔwɔ kɛ yɛyɛ la. Sunsum ne ɔdaye a ɔsɛlɛ Nyamenle ɔmaa yɛ wɔ nyanedelɛ nee ɛkponlenlɛ mɔɔ ɛnloanlɛ ɛnrɛhola ye ka la anu a.
45008027	Nyamenle mɔɔ neɛnlea menli kɔsɔɔti ahonle nu la ze sunsum nu adwenleadwenle biala kɛ si de la, ɔluakɛ Sunsum ne kpa ye menli ti kyɛlɛ, ɔsɛlɛ, kɛmɔ Nyamenle ɛhulolɛdeɛ ne de la.
45008028	Yɛze kɛ wɔ debie biala anu, Nyamenle maa debie biala yɛ kpalɛ maa bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛkulo ye la, meka bɛdabɛ mɔɔ yevɛlɛ bɛ, kɛmɔ ye ngyehyɛlɛ ne de la.
45008029	Bɛdabɛ mɔɔ Nyamenle ɛkpa nu ɛye bɛ la, yeva bɛ yezie ahane kɛ bɛbayɛ kɛ ɔ Ra ne la, amaa Ralɛ ne ayɛ mediema dɔɔnwo adiema kpanyinli.
45008030	Yemɔti bɛdabɛ mɔɔ Nyamenle ɛkpa nu ɛye bɛ la yɛɛ ɔfɛlɛ bɛ na ɔdielie bɛ ɔmaa bɛsɔ ɔ nye, na ɔ nee bɛ tɛnla anyunlunyia nu a.
45008031	Saa ɔle zɛhae ɛdeɛ a, ɛnee akee kɛ yɛzi yɛha ye ɛ? Saa Nyamenle gyi yɛ nzi a nwane a kɛhola yɛ a?
45008032	Nea, yeanva ɔ Ra ne yeanyɛ yɛ abokɛ na yeva ye yebɔ azu wɔ yɛ muala yɛ ti! Na saa yeva ɔ Ra ne yemaa wɔ yɛ ti a, ɛnee fane nyɛ yɛɛ akee ɔnrɛva ninyɛne muala ɔnrɛboka ɔ Ra ne anwo ɔnrɛmaa yɛ a?
45008033	Nwane a kɛhola kɛdo Nyamenle menli ne mɔɔ yekpa nu yeye bɛ la ɛzonle a? Nyamenle ɔdaye yebua bɛ benle!
45008034	Nwane a kɛhola kɛbua bɛ fɔlɛ a? Asoo Kelaese Gyisɛse, mɔɔ wule, na bɛdwazole ye bɛrale ngoane nu, na ɔde Nyamenle asa fema zo ɛlɛsɛlɛ Nyamenle amaa yɛ la ɔ?
45008035	Nwane a kɛhola kɛhwe yɛ kɛvi Kelaese ɛhulolɛ ne anwo a? Amaneɛnwunlɛ anzɛɛ anwongyelelɛ, kpɔdekpɔdeyɛlɛ anzɛɛ ɛhɔne, ehyia, anwubɛnyunlu anzɛɛ ewule?
45008036	Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne se, “Bɛdabɛ bɛ ti yɛgyi ewule avinli alehyenlɛ muala; na bɛyɛ yɛ kɛ mboane mɔɔ bɛ nee bɛ ɛlɛkɔ ahunleɛ.”
45008037	Kyɛkyɛ, wɔ ninyɛne ɛhye mɔ kɔsɔɔti anu, yɛlua mɔɔ hulole yɛ la anwo zo yɛdi konim!
45008038	Ɔluakɛ meze ye wienyi kɛ debie biala ɛnrɛhola ɛnrɛkpɔkye yɛ ɛnrɛvi Kelaese ɛhulolɛ ne anwo; ewule o, ngoane o, Nyamenle soanvolɛma o, anzɛɛ awozinli nu tumivolɛma biala, wɔ ɛnɛ edwɛkɛ mɔɔ bazi anzɛɛ kenlebie ɛdeɛ mɔɔ bara la anu,
45008039	yɛɛ tumi anzɛɛ debie biala ɛnle ewiade ye anu, anwuma anzɛɛ azɛlɛ ti anu, anzɛɛ ewiade ye anu debie biala ɛnle ɛkɛ mɔɔ kɛhola kɛkpɔkye yɛ kɛvi Nyamenle ɛhulolɛ ne mɔɔ ɔlua yɛ Awulae Kelaese Gyisɛse anwo zo yɛnyia ye la anwo.
45009001	Kelaese ati nɔhalɛ kpalɛ a melɛka meahile bɛ la, membɔ adalɛ. Me adwenle nu wienyi, Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne ɔdaye ɔze kɛ membɔ adalɛ,
45009002	yɛɛ ɔze nyane mɔɔ melɛdi wɔ me ahonle nu
45009003	meamaa medame me mbusuafo Dwuuma la. Bɛ ti me kunlu a anrɛɛ Nyamenle ɛdua me kakɛ na yekpɔkye me yevi Kelaese anwo.
45009004	Bɛle Yizilayɛma mɔɔ le Nyamenle ɔdaye ye menli mɔɔ yeyɛ bɛ ɔ mra, yeye ye anyunlunyia yehile bɛ, ɔ nee bɛ ɛyɛ ngyekyeleɛ, na yeva ye mɛla yemaa bɛ a; bɛlɛ nɔhalɛ ɛzonlenlɛ kpalɛ ne; bɛnyia Nyamenle ɛwɔkɛ ne.
45009005	Bɛ bo vi Hibulu abusua mgbole ne mɔ anu, yɛɛ Kelaese ne bayɛ sonla la, ɔvi bɛ nu. Ayɛlɛyelɛ ɛha Nyamenle mɔɔ di ɔ muala azo belemgbunli la dahuu. Amen.
45009006	Na menga kɛ Nyamenle ɛwɔkɛ ne ɛkpo aze, ɔboalekɛ tɛ Yizilayɛma amuala a Nyamenle kpale nu yele bɛ kɛ bɛle ye menli a;
45009007	yɛɛ tɛ bɛmɛ mɔɔ bɛle Ebileham nlɔnra la amuala a le Nyamenle amra a. Nyamenle zele Ebileham kɛ, “Ɔlua Ayezeke anwo zo a ɛbanyia nlɔnra dɔɔnwo a.”
45009008	Ɛhye kile kɛ tɛ ngakula mɔɔ bɛwo bɛ wɔ nwonane nu ngyehyɛlɛ zo la amuala a le Nyamenle amra a, na ngakula mɔɔ ɔlua Nyamenle ɛwɔkɛ ne ati bɛwole bɛ la a le bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛfa bɛ kɛ bɛle nlɔnra kpalɛ kpalɛ ne a.
45009009	Ɔluakɛ Nyamenle ɛwɔkɛ ne kɛ ɔbɔle ye la ɛne, “Saa mekɛ ne dwu a mebazia meara na Sɛla bawo ralɛ nrenya.”
45009010	Tɛ ɔ muala noko ɛne. Ɔluakɛ Relebɛka amra mrenya nwiɔ ne bɛ ze a le yɛ nlenya Ayezeke.
45009011	-
45009012	Na amaa bɛ nuhua ko ɛvɛlɛlɛ ɛdeɛ ne ali munli, kɛmɔ Nyamenle hyehyɛle la, Nyamenle zele Relebɛka kɛ, “Kpanyinli ne bazonle kakula ne.” Ɔhanle ɛhye kolaa na bɛawo bɛ, na bɛanwu kpalɛ anzɛɛ ɛtane; ɛhye kile kɛ Nyamenle ɛvɛlɛlɛ ne gyi ye ɛhulolɛdeɛ zo na tɛ nyɛleɛ biala mɔɔ bɛyɛle la ati ɔ.
45009013	Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne se, “Mengulole Gyekɔbo, na memkpɔle Yisɔ.”
45009014	Ɛnee kɛ yɛka yɛse ɛ? Yɛha ye kɛ ɛhye ati, ɛnee Nyamenle le amile ɔ? Kyɛkyɛ, ɔnle zɔhane fee.
45009015	Ɔluakɛ ɔhanle ɔhilele Mosisi kɛ, “Mɔɔ mekulo kɛ mese ye anwunvɔne la yɛɛ mebaze ye anwunvɔne a, yɛɛ mɔɔ mekulo kɛ medi ɔ nwo nyane la, mebali ɔ nwo nyane.”
45009016	Yemɔti, Nyamenle anwunvɔnezelɛ ne ɛngyi mɔɔ sonla kpondɛ la, anzɛɛ mɔɔ ɔkɛyele ɔ nwo kɛ ɔyɛ la azo.
45009017	Ɔluakɛ Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne zele Yigyibiti belemgbunli kɛ, “Menyɛle wɔ belemgbunli kɛ mefa wɔ meahile me tumi mɔɔ melɛ ye, na meamaa me duma adɛlɛ azɛlɛ ye azo amuala.”
45009018	Yemɔti, Nyamenle ɔdaye ye ɛhulolɛdeɛ zo ɔse bie anwunvɔne yɛɛ ɔmaa bie noko yɛ anzosesebɛ.
45009019	Bie babiza me kɛ, “Saa ɔle zɛhae a, ɛnee kɛ ɔyɛ mɔɔ Nyamenle tɛnwu nvonleɛ wɔ sonla nwo ɛ? Nwane yɛɛ kɛhola kɛzi Nyamenle ɛhulolɛdeɛ ne aze a?”
45009020	Na ayi, ɛdawɔ bɔbɔ a le nwane na wɔayeye Nyamenle anloa azo? Buakɛ ɛngola ɛmbiza mɔɔ nwonle ye la kɛ, “Duzu ati a ɛnwonle me zɛhae ɛ?”
45009021	Mɔɔ nwo buakɛ la lɛ adenle fa ndɛtɛlɛ ne yɛ debie biala mɔɔ ɔdaye ɔkulo la, ɔkola ɔfa ndɛtɛlɛ ɛdɔkɛ ko ne ala ɔnwo mbuakɛ nwiɔ, ɔfa ko ɔyɛ ye debie mɔɔ le kɛnlɛma na ɔhyia ye la, na ɔfa ko ne noko ɔyɛ debie mɔɔ ɛnle kɛnlɛma na ɔ nwo ɛngyia kpalɛ biala la.
45009022	Zɔhane ala yɛɛ Nyamenle ɛyɛ a. Ɔkpondɛ kɛ ye ɛya ne nee ye tumi ne da ali wienyi. Yemɔti ɔsi abotane kpole kpalɛ ɔnea bɛdabɛ mɔɔ ye ɛya ne wɔ bɛ nwo zo na ɔbazɛkye bɛ la.
45009023	Eza noko ɔkulo kɛ ye anyunlunyia ne da ɛkɛ, na ɔwola ɔgua yɛdayɛ mɔɔ ɔwɔ kɛ ɔnwu yɛ anwunvɔne, na yeziezie yɛ kɛ yɛnyia ye anyunlunyia ne la anwo zo.
45009024	Ɔluakɛ yɛmɛ yɛɛ yevɛlɛ yɛ yevi Dwuuma nee bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnle Dwuuma la avinli a.
45009025	Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne mɔɔ bɛhɛlɛ ye wɔ Hozia buluku ne anu la se: “Menli ne mɔɔ anrɛɛ ɛnle me menli la, mebavɛlɛ bɛ ‘Me menli’. Maanle ne mɔɔ meangulo ye la mebavɛlɛ ye ‘Me ɛhulolɛ maanle’.
45009026	Na ɛleka mɔɔ bɛwɔ a bɛzele bɛ kɛ, ‘Bɛnle me menli’ la, ɛkɛ ne ko ne ala yɛɛ bɛbavɛlɛ bɛ tease Nyamenle ne amra a.”
45009027	Ayezaya hanle ye wɔ Yizilayɛma anwo kɛ, “Saa Yizilayɛma zonle kɛ ɛnweazo anwea bɔbɔ a, ekyi bie yɛɛ bɛbalie bɛ ngoane a,
45009028	ɔluakɛ Awulae babu ɔdaye nee ewiade ye bɛ avinli mgbonda ne fenlefenle ndɛndɛ.”
45009029	Ayezaya hanle dole ɛkɛ ne bieko kɛ, “Saa Tumivolɛ Awulae angyakyi menli wɔ yɛ nzi a, yɛbayɛ kɛ Sodɔm nee Gomɔla la.”
45009030	Ɛnee akee kɛ yɛha yɛze ɛ? Yɛka ɛhye, kɛ bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnle Dwuuma, na bɛandwenle nwolɛ ɛlɛ kɛ bɛkɛzɔ Nyamenle anye la, ɛlua diedi zo ɛzɔ ɔ nye.
45009031	Na Yizilayɛma mɔɔ ɛlɛkpondɛ mɛla mɔɔ kɛva bɛ kɛbikye Nyamenle la, annwu ye wɔ mɛla ne azolilɛ nu.
45009032	Duzu ati ɔ? Ɔboalekɛ mɔɔ bɛyɛle la ɛngyi diedi zo, bɛyɛle ye kɛ asɛɛ ɔgyi nyɛleɛ zo la. Ɛhye ati bɛdu koti.
45009033	Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne se, “Nea, melɛfa bolɛ meado Zayɔn mɔɔ bamaa menli akpulokpula a, ɔbayɛ bodane mɔɔ bamaa bɛadu bɛagua a. Na mɔɔ kɛlie ye kɛli la arɛle ɛnrɛbɔ.”
45010001	Me mediema, me kunlu a anrɛɛ bɛlie me menli ne kɔsɔɔti ngoane. Na ɛhye ati mefa me ahonle muala mesɛlɛ Nyamenle wɔ nwolɛ dahuu.
45010002	Mekola medi daselɛ kɛ me menli ne lɛ Nyamenle anwo ɛhulolɛ kpole kpalɛ; noko bɛ ɛhulolɛ mɔɔ bɛlɛ ye wɔ Nyamenle anwo la ɛngyi nɔhalɛ ndelebɛbo kpalɛ zo.
45010003	Ɔluakɛ bɛgyakyi fɔɔnwoyɛlɛ adenle ne mɔɔ Nyamenle dua zolɛ maa menli sɔ ɔ nye la, na bɛpele bɛva bɛ ngome bɛ fɔɔnwoyɛlɛ adenle ɛdeɛ zo; bɛanva nɔhalɛ fɔɔnwoyɛlɛ adenle ne mɔɔ Nyamenle dua zolɛ maa menli sɔ ɔ nye la azo.
45010004	Ɔluakɛ Kelaese rale la yɛɛ mɛla ne tumi bɔle aze a, amaa mɔɔ kɛlie kɛli la azɔ Nyamenle anye.
45010005	Wɔ mɛla ne azolilɛ nu, Mosisi hanle kɛ sonla mɔɔ kɛyɛ mɔɔ mɛla ne kpondɛ la balua zolɛ anyia ngoane.
45010006	Na bɛdabɛ mɔɔ ɔlua diedi zo bɛsɔ Nyamenle anye la, kɛ Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne se la ɛne, “Ɔnle kɛ ɛka ɛkile ɛ nwo kɛ, ‘Nwane bɔbɔ a kɛhɔ nyamenlezo a?’ ” (Kɛ ɔkava Kelaese yeadwu aze.)
45010007	“Anzɛɛ ɔnle kɛ ɛbiza kɛ, ‘Nwane a kɛdwu kɛhɔ ɛbolɔ maanle nu a?’ ” (Kɛ ɔkava Kelaese yeavi mɔwuamra anu yeara.)
45010008	Mɔɔ ɔka la a le ɛhye, “Nyamenle edwɛkɛ ne ɛbikye bɛ, ɔla bɛ nloa na ɔwɔ bɛ ahonle nu,” na yemɔ a le diedi nwo edwɛkɛ ne mɔɔ yɛbɔ ye nolo yɛkile bɛ la.
45010009	Ɔboalekɛ, saa bɛdie bɛto nu na bɛka ye bɛ nloa kɛ, “Gyisɛse le Awulae” na bɛdie bɛdi wɔ bɛ ahonle nu kɛ Nyamenle dwazole ye vile mɔwuamra anu a, bɛbanyia ngoane.
45010010	Ɔluakɛ saa sonla fa ye ahonle die di a yɛɛ ɔka ye diedi ne ɔ nloa na ɔnyia ngoane a.
45010011	Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne se, “Awie biala mɔɔ kɛlie ye kɛli la anyunlu ɛnrɛgua aze.”
45010012	Awie biala boka ɛhye anwo, ɔboalekɛ ngakyile biala ɛnle Dwuuma nee bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnle Dwuuma la avinli. Nyamenle le bɛ kɔsɔɔti bɛ Awulae ko ne ala, na ɔyila bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛsu bɛfɛlɛ ye la.
45010013	Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne se, “Awie biala mɔɔ kɛbɔ Awulae duma kɛzu kɛvɛlɛ ye la kɛnyia ngoane.”
45010014	Na kɛ menli kɛyɛ na bɛazu bɛavɛlɛ ye wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ bɛnlie ye bɛnli la ɛ? Na kɛ ɔkɛyɛ na bɛalie mɔɔ bɛtɛtele ɔ nwo edwɛkɛ ɛlɛ la bɛali ɛ? Saa bɛannyia mɔɔ ka maa bɛtie noko la a, kɛ ɔkɛyɛ na bɛade ɛ?
45010015	Na kɛ ɔkɛyɛ na bɛabɔ nolo ne wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ bɛtɛsoanle menli kɛ bɛhɔbɔ nolo la ɛ? Mɔɔ Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne ka ye wɔ nwolɛ la ɛne, “Soanvolɛma ne mɔɔ fa edwɛkɛ kpalɛ ne ara la ɛralɛ nu le kɛnlɛma na ɔyɛ nwanwane!”
45010016	Noko tɛ bɛ muala a bɛlie Edwɛkpa ne bɛli a, ɔluakɛ Ayezaya hanle ye bɛ nwo kɛ, “Awulae, edwɛkɛ ne mɔɔ bɛdele bɛvile yɛ ɛkɛ ne la, nwane a liele lile a?”
45010017	Yemɔti, saa yɛte edwɛkɛ ne a yɛɛ yɛnyia diedi a, yɛɛ edwɛkɛ ne a le Kelaese ne anwo Edwɛkpa ne nolobɔlɛ ne.
45010018	Na mebiza kɛ, asoo ɔle nɔhalɛ kɛ bɛtɛtele Edwɛkpa ne? Bɛde ye bɔkɔɔ, ɔluakɛ Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne se, “Bɛ ne ɛdwu ewiade muleɛ muala azo; bɛ edwɛkɛ ɛdwu azɛlɛ ye kodoka biala anu.”
45010019	Eza mebiza bieko kɛ, ɛnee Yizilayɛma ande ɔ bo ɔ? Dumua tie mɔɔ Mosisi hanle la; ɔse, “Mebamaa bɛ nye abolo menli bie mɔɔ ɛnfɛta maanle bɔbɔ la; na mebalua kɔnwɔnema bie maanle zo meamaa bɛava ɛya.”
45010020	Ayezaya noko si ɔ kɛnra ka kɛ, “Menli mɔɔ ɛnee ɛmkpondɛ me la ɛnwu me; meye me nwo mehile menli mɔɔ ɛmbiza me bo zo la.”
45010021	Noko mɔɔ fane Yizilayɛma anwo la Ayezaya hanle kɛ, “Mendenrɛle me sa alehyenlɛ muala kɛ medie menli ne mɔɔ ɛde atua na bɛ nzo yɛ se la, na ɔyɛle mgbane.”
45011001	Ɛnee akee mebiza kɛ, se ɛnee Nyamenle ɛkpo ye menli ne o? Ɔnle zɔhane fee! Medame, mele Yizilayɛnli, Ebileham anlɔnra mɔɔ vi Bɛngyaman abusua nu.
45011002	Nyamenle ɛtɛkpole ye menli ne mɔɔ mɔlebɛbo ne amuala ɔkpale nu ɔyele bɛ la. Se bɛze Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne ɛleka mɔɔ kile kɛ ɛnee Yelaegya ɛlɛsɛlɛ Nyamenle atia Yizilayɛma la?
45011003	Ɔse, “Awulae, bɛhu wɔ kpɔmanvolɛma ne mɔ amuala, na bɛbubu wɔ azukponle ne mɔ amuala; me ngomekye ala yɛɛ meha a, yɛɛ bɛ nye ɛbolo noko kɛ bɛkpondɛ me bɛahu me.”
45011004	Duzu mualɛ a Nyamenle vale manle ye a? Ɔse, “Meva menli apenle nsuu mɔɔ ɛtɛbule ndwɛlɛ wɔ bozonle Beeyale anyunlu ɛlɛ la mezie ɛkɛ memaa me nwo.”
45011005	Zɔhane ala yɛɛ kɛkala noko ɔde a; ye ɛlolɛ ne ati, Nyamenle ɛkpa nu ɛye menli ekyi bie ɛzie ɛkɛ.
45011006	Saa ɛlolɛ zo ala yɛɛ ɔlua a, ɛnee tɛ nyɛleɛ ti ɔ. Ɔluakɛ saa Nyamenle kpa nu aye sonla amaa ɔ nwo wɔ ahenle ne mɔdenlebɔ ti a, ɛnee Nyamenle ɛlolɛ ne ɛnle ɛlolɛ.
45011007	Duzu bieko? Yizilayɛma annyia mɔɔ bɛkpondɛ la. Menli ekyi bie mɔɔ Nyamenle kpale nu yele bɛ la a nyianle ye a. Mɔɔ hale la yɛle anzosesebɛ.
45011008	Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne se, “Nyamenle manle bɛsolole ɔmanle ɛnɛ nee ɛnɛ ala bɛ nye ɛnnwu debie, yɛɛ bɛ nzo ɛnde edwɛkɛ.”
45011009	Devidi noko hanle kɛ, “Bɛ ɛkponledolɛ kɛbɔ bɛ ti tɔɔ, ɔkɛyɛ kuma nee ndeanlɛ ɔkɛmaa bɛ.
45011010	Bɛ nye kɛzi amaa bɛannwu debie, bɛkɛnwu bɛ nyunlu dahuu.”
45011011	Ɛnee akee mebiza kɛ, mɔɔ Dwuuma dule koti la, se ɛnee bɛminli bɔkɔɔ? Ɔnle zɔ. Ɔlua bɛ ɛtane ti, ngoanelielɛ vi bɛ ɛkɛ ɛhɔ bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnle Dwuuma la ɛkɛ, amaa Dwuuma anye abolo bɛ.
45011012	Dwuuma ɛtane mɔɔ ɛyɛ la ɛva nyilalɛ dɔɔnwo ɛra ewiade, na bɛ sunsum nu ehyia ɛlilɛ ɛva nyilalɛ ɛrɛlɛ bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnle Dwuuma la. Yemɔti saa Dwuuma amuala baraboka nwo a anrɛɛ nyilalɛ ne bayɛ kpole kpalɛ!
45011013	Akee metendɛ meahile bɛmɛ mɔɔ bɛnle Dwuuma la, kɛ suzuamgba ala mɔɔ mele ɛzoanvolɛ memaa bɛ la, me nye die me gyima nwo kpalɛ,
45011014	amaa meawula me gɔnwo mɔ Dwuuma anyebolo, na ɔlua zo bɛalie bie mɔ ngoane.
45011015	Ɔluakɛ bɛkpole bɛ la ati dasanli rayɛle Nyamenle agɔnwo, na saa akee bɛdie bɛ bɛto nu a bɛ fɛlɛkolilɛ bayɛ kɛ asɛɛ bɛvi ewule nu bɛdwazo bɛra ngoane nu la.
45011016	Saa bɛfa alumua kpanwo ebule ekyi ne bɛmaa Nyamenle a, ɛnee noko kpanwo kunguma ko ne amuala le ye ɛdeɛ; yɛɛ saa baka bie ndinli anwo te na bɛfa bɛbɔ azu bɛmaa Nyamenle a ɔyɛ boɛ a, ɛnee ye ngane ne mɔ amuala noko anwo te.
45011017	Kɛkala ɛdeɛ Dwuuma le kɛ baka belɛ mɔɔ bɛpepɛ ye ngane ne mɔ bie bɛgua na bɛva bɛmɛ mɔɔ bɛle kɛ baka nyinli la ngane bɛrasisa zolɛ, kɛ bɛnyia nyilalɛ ne mɔɔ vi baka ne anu ba la bie.
45011018	Yemɔti, ɔnle kɛ bɛtu bɛ nwo bɛkile bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛpɛ bɛ bɛgua kɛ baka ngane la. Duzu ati a bɛmemaa bɛ nwo zo ɛ? Bɛle ngane ala; tɛ bɛmɛ a bɛsɔ ndinli ne a, ndinli ne a sɔ bɛ a.
45011019	Ɛbaha kɛ, “Ɛhɛe, noko bɛpepɛle ngane zɔhane mɔ bɛguale na bɛvale yɛ bɛsisiale zolɛ.”
45011020	Ɔle nɔhalɛ bɔkɔɔ. Bɛpepɛle bɛ bɛguale, ɔluakɛ bɛanlie bɛanli, na bɛmɛ bɛlie bɛli yemɔti bɛgyi ye kpundii. Noko akee bɛmmafa bɛtu bɛ nwo; anrɛɛ bɛzulo Nyamenle.
45011021	Ɔluakɛ saa Nyamenle anvavi Dwuuma ne mɔɔ le kɛ baka ne ɔdaye ye ngane ne mɔ la a, ɛnee ɔnrɛvavi bɛdabɛ noko.
45011022	Ɛhye maa yɛnwu kɛ Nyamenle si se anwunvɔne na eza ɔ sa yɛ ɛnlomboɛ la. Ɔ sa yɛ ɛnlomboɛ maa bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛkpo aze la, noko saa bɛtɛnla ye kpalɛyɛlɛ ne abo dahuu a, anrɛɛ ɔkɛze bɛ anwunvɔne. Na saa bɛanyɛ ye zɔhane a ɔbakpanekpane bɛdabɛ noko yeagua.
45011023	Saa Dwuuma gyakyi bɛ anzosesebɛyɛlɛ ne, na bɛdie bɛdi a bɛbava bɛ bɛazia bɛarazie bɛ bo zo ne, ɔluakɛ Nyamenle lɛ tumi, ɔkola ɔyɛ ye zɔhane bieko.
45011024	Bɛmɛ mɔɔ bɛnle Dwuuma la, bɛle kɛ ɛhoayelɛ nu baka nyinli ngane mɔɔ bɛpepɛ bɛ na bɛva bɛ bɛsisia egyinli nu baka belɛ zo la. Dwuuma le kɛ egyinli nu baka belɛ; yemɔti ɔnyɛ se ɔmmaa Nyamenle kɛ ɔkɛva ngane ne mɔ mɔɔ yepepɛ yevi ɛkɛ ne la ɔkɛziezie bɛ bo zo ne mɔ.
45011025	Me mediema, nɔhalɛ bie vea ɛkɛ mɔɔ mekulo kɛ bɛnwu ye a, amaa bɛagyakyi kɛ bɛkɛdwenle kɛ asɛɛ bɛze nrɛlɛbɛ somaa. Yemɔ a le kɛ Yizilayɛma anzosesebɛ ne ɛnrɛhɔ zolɛ dahuu; saa bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnle Dwuuma la dodo mɔɔ ba Nyamenle ɛkɛ ne la nyia ba a, anzosesebɛ ne babɔ aze.
45011026	Na ɛhye bamaa Yizilayɛma amuala anyia ngoane, kɛmɔ Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne se la. Ɔse, “Ngoanedievolɛ ne vi Zayɔn bara, na yearaye amumuyɛ muala yeavi Gyekɔbo nlɔnra ne mɔ anu.
45011027	Ngyekyeleɛ ɛhye a saa mefa bɛ ɛtane ne mɔ mekyɛ bɛ a me nee bɛ bayɛ a.”
45011028	Dwuuma kpole Edwɛkpa ne la ati, Nyamenle ɛyɛ kpɔvolɛ wɔ bɛmɛ mɔɔ bɛnle Dwuuma la ati. Noko kɛmɔ Nyamenle ɛkpa nu ɛye bɛ la ati, bɛle ɔ gɔnwo mɔ wɔ bɛ nlenya mɔ ati.
45011029	Ɔluakɛ Nyamenle ɛngakyi ye adwenle ɛlɛ wɔ menli mɔɔ yekpa nu yeye bɛ na yeyila bɛ la anwo.
45011030	Bɛmɛ mɔɔ bɛnle Dwuuma la, bɛkpole Nyamenle wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ ɛze ɛhɔ la, na ɛnɛ bɛnyia Nyamenle ɛlolɛ ne, ɔluakɛ Dwuuma ɛyɛ anzosesebɛ.
45011031	Zɔhane ala yɛɛ Dwuuma ɛyɛ Nyamenle anwo anzosesebɛ, amaa ɔlua bɛmɛ mɔɔ bɛnle Dwuuma la anwunvɔne mɔɔ Nyamenle ɛze bɛ la azo, yeaze bɛdabɛ Dwuuma anwunvɔne ne bie.
45011032	Ɔluakɛ Nyamenle ɛva ye kɛ menli kɔsɔɔti ɛyɛ anzosesebɛ, amaa yeanwu bɛ muala anwunvɔne.
45011033	Nyamenle anwonyia le kpole. Ye nrɛlɛbɛ nee ye adwenle le kpole bo zolɛ. Nwane a kɛhola kɛde ye kpɔkɛ mɔɔ ɔkɛbɔ la abo a?
45011034	Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne se, “Nwane a ze Awulae adwenle a? Nwane a kɛhola kɛdu ye folɛ a?
45011035	Nwane a ɛhola ɛhyɛ ye debie mɔɔ ɔwɔ kɛ ɔsie ɔ bo zo a?”
45011036	Ɔdaye a ɔbɔle ninyɛne kɔsɔɔti a, debie biala lua ɔ nwo zo, yɛɛ bɛwɔ ɛkɛ ne bɛmaa ye. Anyunlunyia ɛha Nyamenle dahuu! Amen.
45012001	Zɔhane ati me mediema, Nyamenle anwunvɔnezelɛ bebelebe ne mɔɔ ɔse yɛ la ati, mesɛlɛ bɛ, bɛva bɛ sonlabaka ne mɔ bɛbɔ azu mɔɔ anwo te na ɔsɔ ɛnyelɛ la bɛmaa Nyamenle. Ɛhye a le sunsum nu ɛzonlenlɛ kpalɛ mɔɔ ɔwɔ kɛ bɛfa bɛsonle ye a.
45012002	Bɛmmamaa ewiade amaamuo di bɛ adwenle. Bɛmaa Nyamenle ɛhakyi bɛ adwenle bɔkɔɔ, na bɛahola bɛanwu Nyamenle ɛhulolɛdeɛ kpalɛ ne mɔɔ le kpalɛ, ɔsɔ ɛnyelɛ, na ɔdi munli la.
45012003	Melua Nyamenle ɛlolɛ ahyɛlɛdeɛ ne mɔɔ yeva yemaa me la azo mese bɛ muala kɛ bɛmmamemaa bɛ nwo zo. Bɛdwenle kpalɛ na bɛbua bɛ nwo ndɛne ngoko wɔ diedi dodo mɔɔ Nyamenle ɛva ɛmaa bɛ la anu.
45012004	Kɛmɔ sonlabaka lɛ ye nvɛyeba dɔɔnwo na nvɛyeba ko biala lɛ ye gyima mɔɔ ɔdi la,
45012005	zɔhane ala yɛɛ saa yɛzonle bɔbɔ a yɛ muala yɛbɔ nu a yɛle sonlabaka ko wɔ Kelaese anu, na yɛsosɔ yɛ nwo ngoko kɛ sonlabaka nvɛyeba ne mɔ sosɔ bɛ nwo la a.
45012006	Ɛhye ati ɔwɔ kɛ yɛfa yɛ ahyɛlɛdeɛ ngakyile ne mɔ mɔɔ Nyamenle ɛlolɛ zo yɛnyia bɛ la yɛyɛ gyima. Saa yɛ bie mɔ ahyɛlɛdeɛ a le Nyamenle anloa azo ɛdendɛlɛ a, ɔwɔ kɛ yɛyɛ ye zɔhane, kɛmɔ yɛ diedi ne de la.
45012007	Saa ɛzonlenlɛ nu noko a, ɔwɔ kɛ yɛsonle. Saa ngilehilelɛ nu a, ɔwɔ kɛ yɛkilehile.
45012008	Mɔɔ lɛ folɛdulɛ ahyɛlɛdeɛ la ɛva ɛdu ɔ gɔnwo mɔ folɛ. Mɔɔ ɔwɔ kɛ asa dwu awie mɔ anwo zo la, ɛyeye ɔ kunlu ɛyɛ. Mɔɔ yɛ ahunlunyele gyima la, ɔwɔ kɛ yɛ ye anyelielɛ nu; yɛɛ mɔɔ lɛ moalɛ la ɛva fɛlɛkolilɛ ɛboa.
45012009	Bɛmaa bɛ ɛhulolɛ ɛyɛ nɔhalɛ ɛhulolɛ; bɛhyi mɔɔ le ɛtane la na bɛzɔ mɔɔ le kpalɛ la anu.
45012010	Bɛva mediema ɛhulolɛ bɛhulo bɛ nwo ngoko kɛ bɛle Kelaese ɛdoavolɛma, na bɛbɔ mɔdenle bɛpele bɛbu bɛ gɔnwo mɔ kpalɛ kpalɛ.
45012011	Bɛyɛ gyima ɛsesebɛ, bɛmmayɛ mgbovonle, na bɛva bɛ ahonle muala bɛzonle Nyamenle.
45012012	Bɛmaa bɛ anyelazo ɛmaa bɛ nye ɛlie, bɛzi abotane wɔ bɛ amaneɛnwunlɛ nu, na bɛyɛ nzɛlɛlɛ dahuu.
45012013	Bɛmaa bɛ sa ɛdwu mediema Kelaese ɛdoavolɛma mɔɔ ɛhyia la anwo zo, na bɛlie nyɛvolɛ wɔ bɛ azua nu.
45012014	Bɛzɛlɛ Nyamenle nyilalɛ bɛmaa menli mɔɔ yɛ bɛ kpɔdekpɔde la; ɛhɛe, bɛzɛlɛ nyilalɛ bɛmaa bɛ, bɛmmasɛlɛ ndeanlɛ.
45012015	Bɛ nee mɔɔ di fɛlɛko la ɛli fɛlɛko na bɛ nee mɔ su la ɛzu.
45012016	Bɛmaa bɛ muala bɛ adwenle ɛyɛ ko. Bɛmmayɛ mgbanyizonle, bɛ nee ahoahweabane ɛdu. Bɛmmabu bɛ nwo kɛ bɛle nrɛlɛbɛvolɛma.
45012017	Saa awie yɛ bɛ ɛtane a, bɛmmadi ye nzenralɛ. Bɛbɔ mɔdenle bɛyɛ mɔɔ awie biala nea a ɛnee nwolɛ te la.
45012018	Bɛbɔ mɔdenle kɛ bɛ nee menli kɔsɔɔti kɛdɛnla anzonudwolɛ nu.
45012019	Ayi mɔ, bɛmmafa ɛtane bɛtua ɛtane kakɛ ɛlɛ, bɛgyakyi debie biala anu bɛmaa Nyamenle ɛya ne. Ɔluakɛ Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne se, “Nzenralɛ le me ɛdeɛ, mebadua ɛtane kakɛ, Awulae a se a.”
45012020	Yemɔti, kɛmɔ Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne se la, “Saa ɛhɔne ɛlɛku wɔ kpɔvolɛ a, maa ye aleɛ ɔli; saa nzuhɔne ɛlɛku ye a, maa ye nzule ɔnlo; ɔluakɛ saa ɛyɛ ye zɔhane a, ɛnee ɛlɛkuohua senle samɛnlakɛ ɔ ti zo.”
45012021	Bɛmmamaa ɛtane fo bɛ nwo zo; bɛva kpalɛyɛlɛ bɛli ɛtane nwo zo konim.
45013001	Ɔwɔ kɛ awie biala bu mgbanyima mɔɔ ɛlɛbu maanle ne la, ɔboalekɛ tumi biala ɛnle ɛkɛ mɔɔ Nyamenle ɛnze nu a, yɛɛ mgbanyima mɔɔ wɔ zo kɛkala la, Nyamenle a ɛva bɛ ɛzie ɛkɛ a.
45013002	Zɔhane ati mɔɔ kɛtia mgbanyima mɔɔ wɔ zo la, ɛtia menli mɔɔ Nyamenle ɔdaye yeye bɛ kɛ bɛbu maanle ne la, na mɔɔ kɛyɛ ye zɔ noko la twe ndeanlɛ maa ɔ nwo.
45013003	Ɔluakɛ ɔnle kɛ awie biala mɔɔ di boɛ la sulo menli mɔɔ maanlebulɛ ne wɔ bɛ sa nu la kyesɛ menli mɔɔ di ɛtane la ala. Bɛmkpondɛ kɛ bɛsulo sonla mɔɔ tumi wɔ ɔ sa nu la ɔ? Ɛnee bɛbɔ ɛbɛla kpalɛ, na ɔkɛhanvo bɛ.
45013004	Ɔluakɛ ɔle Nyamenle sonvolɛ mɔɔ ɛlɛyɛ ye gyima wɔ bɛ kpalɛ ti a. Noko saa ɛdi ɛtane ɛdeɛ a, ɛnee sulo ye, ɔluakɛ ɔlɛ tumi, yɛɛ kɛmɔ ɔle sonvolɛ mɔɔ ɛlɛyɛ ye Nyamenle gyima la, ɔkola ɔtea menli mɔɔ di ɛtane la.
45013005	Ɛhye ati ɔwɔ kɛ bɛtie na bɛyɛ mɔɔ menli mɔɔ tumi anzɛɛ maanlebulɛ ne wɔ bɛ sa nu la kɛze bɛ la, tɛ kɛ Nyamenle kɛdea bɛ la ati ɔ, na bɛ adwenle nu te wienyi la ati ɔ.
45013006	Zɔhane ati yɛɛ ɔwɔ kɛ bɛtua bɛ maanle adwule noko a, ɔluakɛ saa mgbanyima ne mɔ mɔɔ di zɛhae gyima la yɛ bɛ gyima ne adenle kpalɛ zo a, ɛnee bɛlɛyɛ bɛ Nyamenle gyima.
45013007	Yemɔti, mɔɔ ɔwɔ kɛ bɛtua la, bɛdua; bɛdua bɛ maanle adwule ngakyile ne mɔ amuala, bɛbu mgbanyima ne mɔ na bɛli bɛ muala eni.
45013008	Bɛmmadi awie biala anwo ɛzonle, ɛzonle mɔɔ yɛdi la a le kɛ yɛkɛhulo yɛ nwo ngoko ngoko. Mɔɔ kulo ɔ gɔnwo dasanli la ɛli Mosisi mɛla ne azo ɛwie.
45013009	Mɛla ne mɔɔ se, “Mmafa awuvolɛ, mmayɛ kɔdiawu, mmawua, mmayɛ anyebolo” nee mɔɔ ɛha la amuala, bɛbɔ ye kpɔkɛ ko kɛ, “Kulo ɛ gɔnwo kɛ ɛdawɔ ɛ nwo la.”
45013010	Saa ɛlɛ ɛhulolɛ a, ɛnrɛyɛ ɛ gɔnwo ɛtane. Yemɔti ɛhulolɛ a sɔ Mosisi mɛla ne amuala anloa a.
45013011	Ɛhye mɔ amuala anzi, ɔwɔ kɛ bɛnwu kɛ mekɛ ɛdwu mɔɔ ɔwɔ kɛ bɛfi nafelɛ nu bɛdwazo a. Ɔluakɛ ngoanelielɛ mekɛ ne ɛbikye ɛdɛla kɛmɔ yɛzuzule ye wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ yɛlumuale yɛnyianle diedi ne la.
45013012	Aledwolɛ ne asɛɛ ɛze, alehyenlɛ ɛbikye; zɔhane ati bɛmaa yɛgyakyi awozinli nu nyɛleɛ ne mɔ, na yɛva wienyi nu konle tɛladeɛ mɔɔ bamaa yɛahola ko la yɛwula.
45013013	Bɛmaa yɛli yɛ nwo eni, na yɛbɔ yɛ ɛbɛla kpalɛ kɛ menli mɔɔ wɔ alehyenlɛ nu la, mɔɔ anwondɛlɛ mgbane mgbane, nzabolɛ, adwɔmanebɔlɛ, anzɛɛ huhunli ɛbɛla ɛbɔlɛ, konle anzɛɛ nungule ɛhwenlɛ biala ɛnle nu a.
45013014	Na bɛva Awulae Kelaese bɛyɛ konle tɛladeɛ bɛwula, na bɛzi nwonane nu adwenle ɛvalɛ nee ye atiakunluwɔzo aze.
45014001	Mɔɔ ye diedi le ekyi la, bɛlie ye wɔ bɛ avinli, noko bɛ nee ye mmasu ye adwenle nu nzuzulɛ biala anwo kpolera.
45014002	Bie diedi maa ɔdi debie biala, na mɔɔ ye diedi le ekyi la di nya nya nee mbakama ala.
45014003	Mɔɔ di debie biala la mmakpo mɔɔ ɛnli debie biala la, yɛɛ mɔɔ di nya nya nee mbakama ala la mmabua mɔɔ di debie biala la ndɛne, ɔluakɛ Nyamenle ɛlie ye ɛdo nu.
45014004	Na ɛdawɔ a le nwane mɔɔ ɛbua awie akɛlɛ ndɛne a? Saa ɔyɛ ye boɛ o, ɔnyɛ ye boɛ o, ɔ menle ala a kola ka a, yɛɛ ɔbayɛ boɛ yeamaa ye noko, ɔboalekɛ Awulae kola maa ɔyɛ boɛ ɔmaa ye.
45014005	Sonla ne bie adwenle a le kɛ kenle ne bie hyia tɛla kenle mɔɔ ɛha la amuala. Bie noko dwenle nwolɛ kɛ kenle ne amuala sɛ. Ɔwɔ kɛ biala dwenle nwolɛ kpalɛ na ɔmaa ye adwenle si pi wɔ nwolɛ.
45014006	Mɔɔ dwenle nwolɛ sie kenle ko kɛ ɔhyia ɔtɛla kenle mɔɔ ɛha la yɛ ye zɔhane wɔ Awulae anyunlunyia ti; mɔɔ di debie biala la yɛ ye zɔhane wɔ Awulae anyunlunyia ti, ɔboalekɛ ɔyɛ Nyamenle mo wɔ aleɛ biala mɔɔ ɔbali la anwo. Mɔɔ kpo kɛ ɔnrɛli debie biala la yɛ ye zɔhane wɔ Awulae anyunlunyia ti, ɔluakɛ ɔdaye noko ɔyɛ Nyamenle mo wɔ nwolɛ.
45014007	Yɛ nuhua ko biala ɛnde aze ɛmmaa ɔ nwo, yɛɛ yɛ biala ɛnwu ɛmmaa ɔ nwo.
45014008	Saa yɛde aze a, yɛde yɛmaa Awulae, yɛɛ saa yɛwu a, yɛwu yɛmaa Awulae. Yemɔti saa yɛde aze o, yɛwu o, yɛle Awulae ɛdeɛ.
45014009	Ɔluakɛ ɛhye ati a Kelaese wule na bɛdwazole ye bɛrale ngoane nu a, amaa yeayɛ anyewɔzo amra nee mɔwuamra Awulae.
45014010	Saa ye zɔhane a ɛnee wɔmɔ, duzu ati a ɛkɛbua ɛ gɔnwo ndɛne a? Ɛdawɔ noko, duzu ati a ɛkɛtoto ɛ gɔnwo anwo nyɛlɛ ɛ? Yɛ muala yɛbagyinla Nyamenle ndɛnebualɛ ebia ne anyunlu.
45014011	Ɔluakɛ Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne se, “Awulae se, suzuamgba ala mɔɔ mame a mele tease Nyamenle ne la, awie biala babu ndwɛlɛ wɔ me nyunlu, yɛɛ menli muala bayeyɛ me kɛ mele Nyamenle.”
45014012	Zɔhane ati yɛ nuhua ko biala babu ye mgbonda ahile Nyamenle.
45014013	Zɔhane ati, bɛmaa yɛgyakyi yɛ gɔnwo mɔ ndɛne ɛbualɛ, na yɛbɔ kpɔkɛ kɛ yɛnrɛyɛ debie biala mɔɔ kɛmaa adiema bie kɛhɔ ɛtane nu anzɛɛ kɛkpo aze a.
45014014	Sumunli kɛ me nee Awulae Gyisɛse lile ngamɔnu la menwu ye kɔsɔɔ kɛ aleɛ biala ɛnle ɛkɛ mɔɔ anwo ɛnde a. Na saa awie dwenle kɛ bie anwo ɛnde a, ɛnee nwolɛ ɛnde ɛmmaa ɔdaye ɔ ngome,
45014015	yɛɛ saa ɛmaa aleɛ mɔɔ ɛdi la amaa ɛ gɔnwo ali nyane a ɛnee ɛngulo ye. Mmamaa wɔ aleɛ mɔɔ ɛdi la sɛkye sonla mɔɔ Kelaese ɛwu ɛlie ye ngoane la.
45014016	Mmamaa debie mɔɔ ɛdwenle kɛ ɔle kpalɛ ɔmaa wɔ la nyia duma ɛtane.
45014017	Ɔluakɛ Nyamenle Belemgbunlililɛ ne, tɛ yemɔ a le nlidi nlidi anzɛɛ nono nono, na yemɔ a le pɛlepɛlelilɛ, anzonudwolɛ nee anyelielɛ ne mɔɔ Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne fa maa la.
45014018	Awie biala mɔɔ sonle Kelaese wɔ zɛhae adenle zo la yɛɛ Nyamenle anye die ɔ nwo na ɔsɔ menli nye a.
45014019	Zɔhane ati, ɔwɔ kɛ kenle biala yɛyɛ ninyɛne mɔɔ fa anzonudwolɛ ba na ɔboa yɛ nee yɛ gɔnwo mɔ na ɔmaa yɛ anwosesebɛ la.
45014020	Bɛmmatoa aleɛlilɛ bɛsɛkye Nyamenle gyima ne. Debie biala anwo te, noko ɔle ɛtane kɛ ɛkɛli debie mɔɔ kɛmaa ɛ gɔnwo kɛhɔ ɛtane nu la.
45014021	Debie kpalɛ mɔɔ ɔwɔ kɛ bɛyɛ la a le kɛ bɛkɛgyakyi nane ɛlilɛ, nza ɛnlonlɛ, anzɛɛ debie mɔɔ bɛyɛ a ɔkɛmaa bɛ gɔnwo kɛkpo aze la ɛyɛlɛ.
45014022	Diedi biala mɔɔ ɛlɛ ye wɔ ɛhye anwo la, maa ɔli ɛdawɔ nee wɔ Nyamenle bɛ avinli. Nyilalɛ ɛha sonla ne mɔɔ kɛyɛ debie mɔɔ ɔnea a ye adenle zo ɔ na nzinlii ɔnrɛli nwolɛ nyane la.
45014023	Na saa wɔ adwenle yɛ wɔ kesee wɔ debie mɔɔ ɛdi la anwo na ɛdi a, ɛbali fɔlɛ kɛ ɛlile a, ɔluakɛ wɔanlua diedi zo a ɛlile a. Debie biala mɔɔ ye ɛyɛlɛ ɛngyi diedi zo la le ɛtaneyɛlɛ.
45015001	Ɔwɔ kɛ yɛdayɛ mɔɔ yɛ diedi nu yɛ se la yɛboa bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛ diedi nu ɛnyɛ se la wɔ bɛ debie biala anu. Ɔnle kɛ yɛmaa yɛ nye die yɛ ngome yɛ nwo ala.
45015002	Mɔɔ ɔwɔ kɛ yɛyɛ la a le kɛ yɛkɛmaa yɛ gɔnwo mɔ anye kɛlie bɛ nwo wɔ bɛ boɛlilɛ ti, amaa bɛ diedi anyi.
45015003	Ɔluakɛ Kelaese andwenle ɔdaye mumua ne ɔ nwo. Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne se, “Aholoba mɔɔ menli bɔle wɔ la ɛragua me nwo zo.”
45015004	Debie biala mɔɔ bɛhɛlɛ ye wɔ Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne anu la wɔ ɛkɛ ne kilehile yɛ, amaa yɛagyinla kpundii, yɛazi yɛ ahonle yɛalua mɔɔ Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne fa maa yɛ la azo yɛanyia anyelazo.
45015005	Nyamenle mɔɔ maa yɛgyinla kpundii na ɔmaa yɛ akɛnrazilɛ la, ɛboa bɛ ɛmaa bɛ muala bɛdɛnla anloanzɛlɛ nu, na bɛva Kelaese Gyisɛse agyakɛ,
45015006	amaa bɛ muala kɔsɔɔti bɛava ɛnelɛ ko bɛaye yɛ Awulae Gyisɛse Kelaese ɔ ze Nyamenle ne ayɛlɛ.
45015007	Zɔhane ati bɛlie bɛ nwo ngoko ngoko wɔ Nyamenle anyunlunyia ti, kɛmɔ Kelaese liele bɛ la.
45015008	Ɔluakɛ meka meahile bɛ kɛ Kelaese yɛle ɔ nwo sonvolɛ wɔ Dwuuma ati, vale hilele kɛ Nyamenle di nɔhalɛ, kɛ ɔkɛmaa ye ɛwɔkɛ ne mɔɔ ɔbɔle yɛ nlenya mɔ la kɛyɛ zɔhane,
45015009	na yeamaa bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnle Dwuuma la aye Nyamenle ayɛlɛ wɔ ye anwunvɔnezelɛ ne ati. Ɔluakɛ Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne se, “Zɔhane ati mebaye wɔ ayɛlɛ wɔ menli mɔɔ ɛnle Dwuuma la avinli. Mebado ayɛlɛyelɛ edwɛne meayeyɛ wɔ”
45015010	Bieko, ɔse, “Maanle maanlema mɔɔ ɛnle Dwuuma la, bɛ nee Nyamenle menli ne mɔɔ yekpa nu yeye bɛ la ɛli fɛlɛko.”
45015011	Eza ɔse, “Bɛmɛ mɔɔ bɛnle Dwuuma la, bɛye Awulae ayɛlɛ; menli kɔsɔɔti, bɛye ye ayɛlɛ.”
45015012	Ayezaya noko se, “Gyɛsi anlɔnra bie bavinde; ɔbara yearazie maanle maanle mɔɔ ɛnle Dwuuma la kɔsɔɔti, na bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnle Dwuuma la bava bɛ rɛle awula ye nu.”
45015013	Nyamenle mɔɔ le yɛ nzuzuguazo la ɛmaa bɛ anyelielɛ nee anzonudwolɛ wɔ bɛ diedi mɔɔ wɔ ye nu la ati, amaa bɛalua Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne tumi zo bɛ anyelazo anyi.
45015014	Me mediema, medame mumua ne medie meto nu kɛ kpalɛyɛlɛ ɛyi bɛ tɛkɛɛ, yɛɛ bɛlɛ adwenle ne na bɛkola bɛkilehile bɛ nwo ngoko ngoko.
45015015	Noko wɔ kɛlata ɛhye anu, mezi me kɛnra meha ninyɛne bie anwo edwɛkɛ mehakye bɛ adwenle wɔ nwolɛ. Menyɛle ye zɔhane, ɔlua gyinlabelɛ mɔɔ Nyamenle ɛva me ɛzie la ati,
45015016	kɛ mele Kelaese Gyisɛse akɛlɛ mɔɔ ɔwɔ kɛ yɛ gyima wɔ menli mɔɔ ɛnle Dwuuma la avinli. Mesonle kɛ sɛlɛvolɛ mɔɔ ɔwɔ kɛ mebɔ Edwɛkpa ne mɔɔ vi Nyamenle ɛkɛ ne la nolo, amaa bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnle Dwuuma la ayɛ azubɔdeɛ mɔɔ Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne a ɛde nwolɛ na ɔsɔ Nyamenle anye la.
45015017	Zɔhane ati, Kelaese Gyisɛse ati, mekola mefa gyima mɔɔ meyɛ memaa me Nyamenle la metu me nwo.
45015018	Ɔluakɛ menrɛha edwɛkɛ ngakyile biala kɛ ninyɛne mɔɔ Kelaese ɛlua me nwo zo ɛyɛ la ala, amaa mealie bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnle Dwuuma la meamaa bɛayɛ tieyɛ bɛamaa Nyamenle. Mebaha mɔɔ Kelaese yɛle la wɔ ɛdendɛlɛ nee nyɛleɛ nu,
45015019	ye nwanwane gyima mɔɔ ɔyɛle, nee mɔɔ ɔvale Nyamenle Sunsum ne tumi ɔyɛle la. Yemɔti wɔ me adendulɛ nu, ɔvi Gyɛlusalɛm mɔɔ badwu Yelelekɛm, meha na meva Kelaese anwo Edwɛkpa ne amuala medo gua.
45015020	Ɛhye ati mɔɔ mekpondɛ la a le kɛ menwɔva Edwɛkpa ne menwɔdo gua wɔ ɛleka mɔɔ bɛtɛtele Kelaese nganeɛ ɛlɛ la, amaa meangɔnzɔ mɔɔ awie gyɛne ɛbɔ ɔ bo la azo.
45015021	Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne se, “Bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛanga ɔ nwo edwɛkɛ bɛangile bɛ la banwu ye, yɛɛ bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛtɛtele ɔ nwo edwɛkɛ ɛlɛ la banyia ndelebɛbo.”
45015022	Ɛhye ati a mekɛ dɔɔnwo mɔɔ ɛze ɛhɔ la meannyia adenle meambamkpɔla bɛ la.
45015023	Na kɛkala mɔɔ akee mewie me gyima di wɔ maanzinli ɛhye mɔ anu, na eza ɛvolɛ dɔɔnwo mɔɔ ɛraze ɛhɔ la mehulo kɛ menwɔra bɛ nwo lɔ la ati,
45015024	me nye la kɛ akee mebara. Saa mese meahɔ Sepeen a mebava bɛ nwo ɛkɛ ne, amaa medi mekɛ ekyi wɔ bɛ nwo ɛkɛ a, bɛaboa me bɛamaa meazɔ me adendulɛ ne azo.
45015025	Kɛkala, melɛ nwanle bie mekamaa Nyamenle menli ne mɔɔ wɔ Gyɛlusalɛm la.
45015026	Ɔluakɛ asɔnema mɔɔ wɔ Masidonea nee Akaya (Giliki maanle nu) la ɛdwenle nwo ɛbɔ kpɔkɛ kɛ bɛkeha bɛ sa aze bɛahɔboa ehyianvolɛma mɔɔ wɔ Nyamenle menli ne anu, wɔ Gyɛlusalɛm la.
45015027	Ɔle bɛdabɛ bɛ ti anwo adwenle mɔɔ bɛvale ɛdeɛ, noko nɔhalɛ nu, bɛdi ɛzonle kɛ ɔwɔ kɛ bɛyɛ ye zɔhane na bɛboa bɛ. Kɛmɔ Dwuuma ɛmaa bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnle Dwuuma la sunsum nu nyilalɛ ne bie la, ɔwɔ kɛ bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnle Dwuuma la noko fa bɛ ɛbɛla nu nyilalɛ ne bie boa Dwuuma.
45015028	Saa mewie gyima ɛhye di na mefa mɔɔ bɛnyia ye la mekɔmaa bɛ mewie a, mebaraze meahɔ Sepeen, na mebava bɛ nwo ɛkɛ ne mearakpɔla bɛ.
45015029	Meze kɛ saa menyia mebadwu bɛ nwo lɔ a, Edwɛkpa ne nolobɔlɛ ne bava Kelaese anu nyilalɛ dɔɔnwo arɛlɛ bɛ.
45015030	Mediema, mesɛlɛ bɛ, ɔlua yɛ Awulae Gyisɛse Kelaese ati, ɔ nee ɛhulolɛ ne mɔɔ le Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ahyɛlɛdeɛ ne la ati, bɛboa me wɔ me gyima ye ɛyɛlɛ nu na bɛzɛlɛ Nyamenle bɛmaa me.
45015031	Bɛzɛlɛ kɛ Nyamenle kɛlie me kɛvi Dwudiyama ne mɔɔ ɛnlɛ diedi la asa anu, na eza me gyima mɔɔ mekali ye wɔ Gyɛlusalɛm la kɛzɔ Nyamenle menli ne mɔɔ wɔ ɛkɛ ne la anye,
45015032	amaa saa ɔyɛ Nyamenle ɛhulolɛ a, meava anyelielɛ mearakpɔla bɛ. Medie medi kɛ meba a me nye balie.
45015033	Nyamenle mɔɔ maa anzonudwolɛ la nee bɛ muala ɛdɛnla. Amen.
45016001	Mekanvo adiema Fobi, mɔɔ le sonvolɛ raalɛ wɔ Sɛnkilia asɔne ne anu la meahile bɛ.
45016002	Bɛlie ye wɔ Awulae duma nu, kɛ bɛkɛlie Nyamenle menli ne mɔ bie ala la, na bɛmaa ye moalɛ biala mɔɔ ɔkɛhyia nwolɛ la, ɔluakɛ ɔle sonla mɔɔ yeboa menli dɔɔnwo nee medame noko a.
45016003	Mebiza Pelesela nee Akoyela mɔɔ le me mediema gyimayɛvoma wɔ Kelaese Gyisɛse ɛzonlenlɛ ye anu la ahye.
45016004	Bɛvale bɛ ngoane bɛdole me ti nzeleba na bɛnwunle amaneɛ dɔɔnwo. Meyɛ bɛ mo somaa; na tɛ me ngome bɔbɔ o, menli mɔɔ ɛnle Dwuuma la asɔne ne mɔ amuala yɛ bɛ mo somaa.
45016005	Mebiza asɔnema mɔɔ dahuu yia nu wɔ bɛ sua nu ɛkɛ yɛ nzɛlɛlɛ la noko ahye. Mebiza me gɔnwo kpalɛ Ɛpaenɛtɛse mɔɔ yemɔ a le sonla mɔɔ lumuale liele Kelaese lile wɔ Ehyea maanle ne anu la ahye.
45016006	Mebiza Mɛle mɔɔ ɔdaye noko yeyɛ gyima kpole kpalɛ wɔ bɛ nu wɔ lɔ la ahye.
45016007	Me gɔnwo mɔ Dwuuma nwiɔ ne mɔɔ bɛguale yɛ muala efiade, mɔɔ le Andulonaekɛse nee Dwuniase, mebiza bɛ ahye, ɛzoanvolɛma ne mɔ ze bɛ kpalɛ kpalɛ, yɛɛ bɛdoale Kelaese abo zo kolaa na meahakyi mearayɛ Kelaese ɛdoavolɛ.
45016008	Mebiza Ampeleatɛse ahye. Ɔle me gɔnwo kpalɛ wɔ Awulae ɛzonlenlɛ ye anu.
45016009	Mebiza Ɛbeenɛse mɔɔ yɛ muala a yɛyɛ Kelaese gyima ye la, nee Setakese mɔɔ ɔdaye ɔle me gɔnwo la ahye.
45016010	Mebiza Apɛlizi. Ye nɔhalɛlilɛ sɔ Kelaese anye. Mebiza bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛwɔ Alesetobulɛse abusua nu la amuala ahye.
45016011	Mebiza me busuanli Dwuunli Hilodeɔn nee mediema mɔɔ doa Kelaese abo zo na bɛwɔ Naasesɛse abusua nu la amuala ahye.
45016012	Mebiza Telaefina nee Telaefosa mɔɔ boka Awulae gyima ye anwo la, yɛɛ me gɔnwo kpalɛ Pɛsese ahye. Pɛsese ɛbɔ mɔdenle kpalɛ wɔ Awulae gyima ne anwo.
45016013	Mebiza Wulufɛse ahye. Ɔle sonla mɔɔ anwo ɛnla aze wɔ Awulae gyima ye anu a. Mebiza ɔ nli noko; ɔyɛle me kɛ ɔ ra la.
45016014	Mebiza Asenkeletɛse, Felɛgɔn, Hɛmɛse, Patulobase, Hɛmase, yɛɛ mediema Kelaese ɛdoavolɛma mɔɔ nee bɛ de la amuala ahye.
45016015	Mebiza Felɔlɔgɛse nee Dwulia, Niliyuso nee ɔ diema raalɛ ne, Ɔlempase yɛɛ Nyamenle menli mɔɔ wɔ bɛ nwo ɛkɛ ne la amuala ahye.
45016016	Bɛva mediema ɛhulolɛ bɛyɛ bɛ nwo atuu dahuu. Kelaese asɔnema ne amuala biza bɛ ahye somaa.
45016017	Mesɛlɛ bɛ, me mediema, bɛnlea bɛ nwo boɛ wɔ amaantoma mɔɔ sɛkye awie mɔ diedi na bɛtia ngilehilelɛ mɔɔ bɛmɛ bɛnyia ye la asa anu. Bɛhwe bɛ nwo bɛvi menli zɔhane mɔ anwo.
45016018	Ɔluakɛ menli mɔɔ di zɛhae gyima la ɛnzonle yɛ Awulae Kelaese. Bɛsonle bɛdabɛ bɛ ngome bɛ atiakunluwɔzo ala. Bɛfa bɛ nloa anu fɛlɛko nee ɛsoabɔlɛ bɛsɛkye menli mɔɔ ɛnze nwolɛ bie la adwenle.
45016019	Awie biala ɛde bɛ nganeɛ wɔ bɛ nɔhalɛlilɛ wɔ Edwɛkpa ne anwo, yemɔti me nye die bɛ nwo kpole kpalɛ. Mekpondɛ kɛ bɛnwu nrɛlɛbɛ wɔ mɔɔ le kpalɛ la anwo na bɛkpɔlɔkpɔla bɛ sa anwo bɔkɔɔ bɛfi ɛtane nwo.
45016020	Na Nyamenle, anzonudwolɛ maavolɛ ne, ɛnrɛhyɛ biala na yeabɛtɛ Seetan wɔ bɛdabɛ bɛ gyakɛ abo. [Yɛ Awulae ɛlolɛ ne nee bɛ ɛdɛnla.]
45016021	Me gɔnwo gyimayɛvolɛ Temɔte biza bɛ muala ahye. Luseɛse, Gyeesen, yɛɛ Sosepatɛ mɔɔ bɛdabɛ noko bɛle Dwuuma la se bɛbiza bɛ ahye.
45016022	Medame Tɛhyeɛse, mɔɔ hɛlɛle kɛlata ɛhye la, melua Awulae duma nu mebiza bɛ ahye.
45016023	Me sokoɛvolɛ Gayɛse mɔɔ ye sua nu a yɛyia yɛyɛ nzɛlɛlɛ la biza bɛ ahye. Yilasetɛse, maanle gyaneavolɛ ne nee yɛ diema Koatɛse biza bɛ ahye. [
45016024	Awulae Gyisɛse Kelaese ɛlo bɛ na ɔ nee bɛ muala ɛdɛnla. Amen.]
45016025	-
45016027	Bɛmaa yɛlua Gyisɛse Kelaese anwo zo yɛva anyunlunyia yɛmaa Nyamenle mɔɔ ɔ ngomekye ala a ɔze nrɛlɛbɛ na ɔkola ɔmaa bɛgyinla kpundii wɔ diedi nu, kɛmɔ ye Edwɛkpa ne mɔɔ fane Awulae Gyisɛse Kelaese anwo, mɔɔ mebɔ ye nolo la kile la. Edwɛkpa ɛhye mɔɔ anrɛɛ vea, na bɛhedale zolɛ wɔ mekɛ dɔɔnwo mɔɔ ɛraze ɛhɔ la akee ɛvinde wienyi. Ɛdɛnkɛma Nyamenle ne ɛmaa bɛbɔ ye nolo bɛhile maanle maanle kɔsɔɔti, amaa bɛalie bɛali na bɛali zolɛ, kɛmɔ Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛma ɛha ye wɔ Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne anu la. Anyunlunyia ɛha Nyamenle dahuu! Amen.
46001001	Pɔɔlo, mɔɔ Nyamenle ɛlua ɔdaye ye ɛhulolɛdeɛ zo ɛvɛlɛ ye kɛ ɔrayɛ Kelaese Gyisɛse ɛzoanvolɛ, nee yɛ diema Sɔsetinɛse a
46001002	ɛlɛkɛlɛ kɛlata ɛhye a. Yɛlɛ yɛkamaa Nyamenle menli ne mɔɔ wɔ Kɔlente, mɔɔ Kelaese Gyisɛse ati bɛdu bɛ bɛzie ɛkɛ ne, na bɛvɛlɛ bɛ nee bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛwɔ ɛleka muala, mɔɔ bɛbɔ yɛ Awulae Gyisɛse Kelaese duma la, kɛ bɛrayɛ Nyamenle menli la.
46001003	Yɛ Ze Nyamenle nee Awulae Gyisɛse Kelaese ɛlo bɛ na ɔmaa bɛ anzonudwolɛ!
46001004	Dahuu meyɛ me Nyamenle ne mo memaa bɛ kɛ yelua Kelaese Gyisɛse anwo zo yelo bɛ a.
46001005	Ɔluakɛ Kelaese ati bɛnyia bɛ nwo wɔ ninyɛne kɔsɔɔti anu, bɔbɔ wɔ edwɛkɛ ɛhanlɛ nee adwenle nu amuala.
46001006	Kelaese anwo edwɛkɛ ne ɛwie nyi wɔ bɛ nu dɛba,
46001007	yemɔti bɛngyia ɛlolɛ ahyɛlɛdeɛ biala anwo, wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ bɛlɛkendɛ yɛ Awulae Gyisɛse Kelaese ɛralɛ bieko mɔɔ ɔbara la.
46001008	Kelaese ɔdaye ɔbamaa bɛagyinla kpundii bɛahɔ awieleɛ, amaa bɛanli fɔlɛ wɔ debie biala anu wɔ yɛ Awulae Gyisɛse Kelaese Kenle ne.
46001009	Bɛkola bɛfa bɛ rɛle bɛwula Nyamenle ne mɔɔ vɛlɛle bɛ kɛ bɛ nee ɔ Ra Gyisɛse Kelaese, yɛ Awulae ɛradila agɔnwolɛ la anu.
46001010	Mediema, melɛ yɛ Awulae Gyisɛse Kelaese duma ne mesɛlɛ bɛ kɛ bɛmaa bɛ muala bɛ nloa ɛzɛ bɛ nwo; bɛmmamaa mgbakyemgbakye biala bada bɛ avinli. Bɛhye bɛ nwo file wɔ adwenle nu nee bɛ kpɔkɛbɔlɛ nu.
46001011	Melɛka ɛhye, ɔluakɛ me mediema Kuloyi sua nu amra bie mɔ ɛraha ɛhile me kɛ bɛdabɛ bɛ ngome bɛpɛ bɛ nwo bɛdi butule.
46001012	Mɔɔ mekpondɛ meaha la a le kɛ asolo bɛ nuhua ko biala nee ye edwɛkɛ. Mɔɔ ko se “Mewɔ Pɔɔlo afoa la”, ɛnee bie se, “Mewɔ Apɔlɔso afoa.” Bie se, “Mewɔ Pita afoa,” ɛnee bie noko se, “Mewɔ Kelaese afoa.”
46001013	Bɛhyɛ Kelaese anu ekpunli ekpunli ɔ? Na mebiza bɛ kɛ, Pɔɔlo a bɛbɔle ye meanubaka nu bɛmanle bɛ ɔ? Anzɛɛ bɛzɔnenle bɛ kɛ bɛle Pɔɔlo ɛdoavolɛma ɔ?
46001014	Meyɛ Nyamenle mo kɛ meanzɔne bɛ nuhua biala kyesɛ Kelesepɛse nee Gayɛse ala.
46001015	Yemɔti awie biala ɛnga kɛ bɛzɔnenle ye kɛ ɔle me ɛdoavolɛ.
46001016	Mekakye noko kɛ medame a menzɔnenle Setɛfanase nee ye sua nu amra a, na mengola mengakye kɛ menzɔnenle awie bieko.
46001017	Kelaese anzoa me kɛ membanzɔne menli. Ɔzoanle me kɛ memambɔ Edwɛkpa ne nolo, na memmafa sonla nrɛlɛbɛ meka, anrɛɛ tumi ne mɔɔ wɔ Kelaese meanubaka ne anwo edwɛkɛ ne anu la kɛyɛ mgbane.
46001018	Ɔluakɛ Kelaese meanubaka ne azo ewule ne anwo edwɛkɛ le debie funli maa bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛlɛminli la; noko ɔle Nyamenle tumi ɔmaa yɛdayɛ mɔɔ Nyamenle ɛlɛdie yɛ ngoane la.
46001019	Ɔluakɛ Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne se, “Mebaminliminli nrɛlɛbɛvolɛma nrɛlɛbɛ ne abo zo, na meamaa adwenlema ndelebɛbo ayɛ mgbane.”
46001020	Ɛnee akee nrɛlɛbɛvolɛma hale nienwu? Nienwu a mɛla kilehilevolɛma ne hale a? Anzɛɛ mekɛ ɛhye anu kpolerazulɛ benlerama ne mɔ hale nienwu? Asoo Nyamenle ɛtɛkilele kɛ ewiade anu nrɛlɛbɛ le debie mgbane?
46001021	Ɔluakɛ Nyamenle luale ye nrɛlɛbɛ zo zile menli adenle, yeammaa bɛanlua bɛdabɛ bɛ nrɛlɛbɛ zo bɛannwu ye. Mɔɔ ɔyɛle la a le kɛ, Nyamenle luale mɔɔ bɛmɛ bɛse ɔle “koasea” edwɛkɛ yɛɛ yɛlɛbɔ ye nolo la azo bɔle kpɔkɛ kɛ ɔdie bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛdie bɛdi la ngoane.
46001022	Dwuuma kpondɛ sɛkɛlɛneɛ mɔɔ si edwɛkɛ ne dawua la, yɛɛ Gilikima kpondɛ nrɛlɛbɛ.
46001023	Na yɛmɛ, yɛbɔ Kelaese meanubaka ne azo ewule ne mɔɔ maa Dwuuma tu koti na ɔle ɛzɛlɛ edwɛkɛ ɔmaa bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnle Dwuuma la nolo;
46001024	na bɛdabɛ mɔɔ Nyamenle ɛvɛlɛ bɛ la, Dwuuma o, bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnle Dwuuma la o, Kelaese a le Nyamenle tumi ne yɛɛ ɔdaye ko ne ala a ɔle Nyamenle nrɛlɛbɛ ne a.
46001025	Ɔluakɛ Nyamenle nu koasea edwɛkɛ tɛla menli nrɛlɛbɛ, yɛɛ Nyamenle nu bɛtɛɛ ɛyɛlɛ yɛ se tɛla sonla anwosesebɛ.
46001026	Mediema, akee bɛhakye kɛ anrɛɛ bɛsi bɛde mɔɔ Nyamenle vɛlɛle bɛ la. Saa sonla afoa nu a anrɛɛ bɛ nuhua ekyi bie ala a ze nrɛlɛbɛ, lɛ tumi anzɛɛ le mandimase a.
46001027	Nyamenle anye la nwo yɛɛ ɔkpale nu ɔyele deɛ mɔɔ ewiade bu ye ɛzɛlɛ debie la kɛ ɔfa yeamaa nrɛlɛbɛvolɛma anyunlu agua aze a, yɛɛ ɔkpale nu ɔyele deɛ mɔɔ ewiade bu ye kɛ ɔle bɛtɛɛ na bɛmbu ye bie la kɛ ɔfa yeagua bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛlɛ tumi la anyunlu aze a.
46001028	Nyamenle kpale nu yele deɛ mɔɔ ewiade nea a ɔmbu ye bie na ɔfa ye kɛ ɔnle debie biala la kɛ ɔfa yeazɛkye deɛ mɔɔ ewiade dwenle kɛ ɔ nwo hyia la.
46001029	Nyamenle yɛle ɛhye amaa dasanli biala angola ammemaa ɔ nwo zo wɔ ɔ nyunlu.
46001030	Nyamenle ɛva bɛ nee Kelaese Gyisɛse ɛbɔ nu, na yemaa Kelaese ɛrayɛ yɛ nrɛlɛbɛ. Ɔ nwo zo yɛɛ yɛlua a yɛsɔ Nyamenle anye, yɛ nwo te na yɛyɛ alehelɛ a.
46001031	Ɛhye ati, kɛmɔ Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne se la, “Awie biala mɔɔ kpondɛ kɛ ɔmemaa ɔ nwo zo la ɛva mɔɔ Awulae ɛyɛ la ɛmemaa ɔ nwo zo.”
46002001	Me mediema, mekɛ mɔɔ membale bɛ nwo lɔ kɛ mebabɔ Nyamenle nɔhalɛ edwɛkɛ ne mɔɔ vea la nolo meahile bɛ la, meanga ye kɛ mele sonla mɔɔ me nloa ɛde na meze nrɛlɛbɛ kpole la.
46002002	Ɔluakɛ membɔle me ti anu kpɔkɛ kɛ me rɛle kɛvi debie biala wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ me nee bɛ de la na ɔkɛha Gyisɛse Kelaese angome nee ye meanubaka ne azo ewule ne ala,
46002003	Yemɔti menvale bɛtɛɛyɛlɛ, ɛzulolɛ nee anwowozolɛ kpalɛ a me nee bɛ dɛnlanle a;
46002004	yɛɛ meanva sonla nrɛlɛbɛ nee anloanu kolokolo a mengilehilele bɛ, membɔle edwɛkɛ ne nolo a; menluale Nyamenle Sunsum ne tumi zo,
46002005	amaa bɛ diedi ne agyinla Nyamenle tumi ne azo na yeangyinla sonla nrɛlɛbɛ zo.
46002006	Ɔle nɔhalɛ kɛ yɛbɔ nrɛlɛbɛ nwo nolo yɛkile bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnyi sunsum nu la. Tɛ ewiade ɛhye anu nrɛlɛbɛ ɛdeɛ ne anwo nolo ɔ, yɛɛ tɛ ewiade tumivolɛma mɔɔ bɛ tumililɛ ne ɛnrɛhyɛ na yeavi bɛ sa la nrɛlɛbɛ ɛdeɛ ne anwo nolo ɔ.
46002007	Nrɛlɛbɛ ne mɔɔ yɛbɔ ye nolo la le Nyamenle nrɛlɛbɛ mɔɔ vea na menli ɛnze a. Nyamenle vale ziele yɛ ɛkɛ dɛba kolaa na yeabɔ ewiade ye kɛ ɔbava yeade yɛ nyunlu.
46002008	Nrɛlɛbɛ ɛhye, bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛsie ewiade la annwu ye, ɔluakɛ saa bɛnwunle ye a, anrɛɛ bɛambɔ anyunlunyia Awulae ne meanubaka nu.
46002009	Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne se, “Debie mɔɔ sonla ɛtɛnwunle ye anzɛɛ ɛtɛtele ɛlɛ, debie mɔɔ sonla andwenle kɛ ɔkɛzi ɛlɛ la, yemɔ a le deɛ ne mɔɔ Nyamenle ɛziezie ɛdo ɛkɛ ne ɛmaa bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛkulo ye la a.”
46002010	Yɛmɛ yɛɛ Nyamenle ɛlua ye Sunsum ne azo ɛye fealeranu debie zɛhae ɛhile yɛ a, ɔluakɛ Sunsum ne fedevede ninyɛne kɔsɔɔti anu, bɔbɔ kɛ Nyamenle ngyehyɛlɛ ne kuma ne kuloonwu si de la.
46002011	Awie biala ɛnze sonla adwenle kyesɛ ɔdaye mumua ne ye sunsum ne mɔɔ wɔ ye nu la. Zɔhane ala yɛɛ Nyamenle Sunsum ne angome ala a ze Nyamenle adwenle nu a.
46002012	Tɛ ewiade ɛhye anu sunsum a yɛnyia ye a. Sunsum ne mɔɔ vi Nyamenle ɛkɛ ne la a yɛnyia ye a, amaa yɛanwu ninyɛne mɔɔ Nyamenle ɛva ɛlo yɛ la amuala.
46002013	Zɔhane ati, mɔɔ yɛka la ɛnle edwɛkɛ mɔɔ sonla nrɛlɛbɛ a kilehile yɛ a. Nyamenle Sunsum ne kilehile yɛ wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ yɛkɛha kɛ yɛkilehile sunsum nu nɔhalɛ ne yɛahile bɛdabɛ mɔɔ Nyamenle Sunsum ne wɔ bɛ nu la.
46002014	Sonla mɔɔ Nyamenle Sunsum ne ɛnle ye nu la ɛngola ɛnnyia Nyamenle Sunsum nu ahyɛlɛdeɛ ne mɔ. Sonla zɛhae ɛnde ninyɛne ɛhye mɔ abo; bɛle ɔ nye zo ɛzɛlɛ edwɛkɛ, ɔboalekɛ kyesɛ sunsum nu ala na bɛade ɔ bo.
46002015	Sonla mɔɔ Nyamenle Sunsum ne wɔ ye nu la kola neɛnlea debie biala anu, na yemɔ awie biala ɛngola ɛnneɛnlea ye nu.
46002016	Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne se, “Nwane a ze Nyamenle ati anu a? Nwane a kola tu ye folɛ a?” Noko yɛmɛ, yɛlɛ Kelaese adwenle ne bie.
46003001	Mediema, edwɛkɛ nɔhalɛ, meangola meandendɛ meangile bɛ kɛ menli mɔɔ ɛnyia Nyamenle Sunsum ne la; mendendɛle mengilele bɛ kɛ ewiade ɛhye anu amra, kɛ bɛle mbɛda wɔ Kelaese diedi ne anu.
46003002	Menvale nyɛfonzule a menlile bɛ adane a, ɔboalekɛ ɛnee bɛtɛdwule mɔɔ bɛkposa aleɛ a; yɛɛ kɛkala bɔbɔ bɛtɛdwule,
46003003	ɔluakɛ bɛtɛgua zolɛ bɛtɛbɔ bɛ ɛbɛla kɛ ewiade ɛhye anu amra la. Asoo mɔɔ nungule ɛhwenlɛ nee butulelilɛ ɛnzea bɛ adenle la, ɛnee ɛhye ɛngile kɛ bɛ nee ewiade ɛhye anu amra bɔ bɛ ɛbɛla ko?
46003004	Mekɛ mɔɔ bɛ nuhua ko ɛlɛka kɛ, “Mewɔ Pɔɔlo afoa,” na bie noko se, “Mewɔ Apɔlɔso afoa” la, ɛnee bɛmbɔ bɛ ɛbɛla kɛ ewiade amra la ɔ?
46003005	Na Apɔlɔso bɔbɔ a le nwane? Pɔɔlo noko a le nwane? Yɛle Nyamenle sonvolɛma ala mɔɔ bɛluale yɛ nwo zo bɛliele Edwɛkpa ne bɛlile a. Yɛ nuhua ko biala yɛ ye gyima mɔɔ Awulae vale manle ye kɛ ɔyɛ la.
46003006	Menluale ma ne yɛɛ Apɔlɔso guguale zolɛ nzule, na Nyamenle a manle ɔnyinle a.
46003007	Mɔɔ dua nee mɔɔ gugua zolɛ nzule la anwo ɛngyia dɔɔnwo. Nyamenle a anwo hyia a, ɔluakɛ yemɔ a ɔmaa baka ne nyi a.
46003008	Ngakyile ɛnle mɔɔ dua nee mɔɔ gugua zolɛ nzule la avinli. Nyamenle badua ko biala kakɛ wɔ ye gyima mɔɔ yeyɛ la anwo kɛmɔ ɔfɛta la.
46003009	Ɔluakɛ yɛ mu nwiɔ yɛle Nyamenle egyinli nu gyimayɛvoma yɛɛ bɛmɛ a bɛle egyinli ne a. Eza bɛle Nyamenle sua.
46003010	Menvale ahyɛlɛdeɛ ne mɔɔ Nyamenle ɛva ɛlo me la mendole sua ne abo kɛ suasivolɛ kpalɛ, yɛɛ awie ɛlɛto zolɛ a. Na ɔwɔ kɛ awie biala nea kɛ ɔsi ɔto zolɛ la boɛ.
46003011	Sua bo ɛwulalɛ fofolɛ bieko ɛnle ɛkɛ, ɔluakɛ Nyamenle ɛva Gyisɛse Kelaese ɛyɛ sua ne adiabo ɛwie.
46003012	Bie mɔ bava ezukoa nvutuke anzɛɛ dwɛtɛ fufule anzɛɛ ezukoa awolɛ mɔɔ sonle bolɛ la azɔ sua ne azo; bie mɔ noko bava ndaboa anzɛɛ ɛhonle anzɛɛ manra.
46003013	Na kɛ awie biala gyima si de la bala ali wienyi wɔ Kenle ne mɔɔ Kelaese bara la. Kenle zɔhane senle ne bamaa awie biala gyima ala ali; senle ne bazɔ awie biala gyima mɔɔ yeyɛ la anlea na yeaye ye kɛ ɔde la yeahile.
46003014	Na saa senle ne angola sua ne mɔɔ awie dole ye wɔ sua ne adiabo ne azo la yela a, mɔɔ zile la kɛnyia nwolɛ ahyɛlɛdeɛ.
46003015	Na saa senle ne yela sua ne a, ɛnee ahenle mɔɔ zile la ɛminli debie, noko Nyamenle balie ɔdaye mumua ne ngoane kɛ sonla mɔɔ bɛlie ye bɛvi senle nu la.
46003016	Bɛnze kɛ bɛle Nyamenle Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua na Nyamenle Sunsum ne de bɛ nu ɔ?
46003017	Saa awie sɛkye Nyamenle Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne a, Nyamenle bazɛkye ɔdaye noko, ɔluakɛ Nyamenle Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne anwo te, na sua zɔhane, yemɔ a le ɛdawɔ.
46003018	Awie biala mmabɛlɛbɛla ɔ nwo. Saa bɛ nuhua bie dwenle kɛ ɔle ewiade ɛhye anu nrɛlɛbɛvolɛ a, ɛnee ɔyɛ ɔ nwo kɔnwɔne na yeanwu nrɛlɛbɛ kpalɛ.
46003019	Ɔluakɛ ewiade ye anu nrɛlɛbɛ le ɛzɛlɛ debie wɔ Nyamenle anyunlu. Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne se, “Nyamenle dua nrɛlɛbɛvolɛma agyibadolɛ zo kye bɛ;”
46003020	yɛɛ Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne bieko ka kɛ, “Awulae ze kɛ nrɛlɛbɛvolɛma adwenle ɛvalɛ biala le mgbane.”
46003021	Ɛhye ati ɔnle kɛ awie biala fa ye adwenle sɔ sonla. Ɔluakɛ debie biala le bɛ ɛdeɛ;
46003022	Pɔɔlo o, Apɔlɔso o, Sifase o, ewiade ye o, ngoane o, ewule o, ɛnɛ mekɛ ye o, kenlebie o, ɔ muala le bɛ ɛdeɛ,
46003023	yɛɛ bɛle Kelaese ɛdeɛ, yɛɛ Kelaese le Nyamenle ɛdeɛ.
46004001	Ɔwɔ kɛ bɛbu yɛ kɛ Kelaese sonvolɛma mɔɔ nea Nyamenle gyima ne mɔɔ vea la azo a.
46004002	Debie ko mɔɔ ɔwɔ kɛ sonvolɛ zɛhae yɛ la a le kɛ ɔkɛli nɔhalɛ ɔkɛmaa ɔ menle ne.
46004003	Mame, ɔnvane me nwo kɛ saa bɛmɛ o, anzɛɛ awie biala kɛbua me ndɛne. Medame bɔbɔ membua me nwo ndɛne.
46004004	Me ti anu wienyi; debie biala ɛntia me, noko ɛhye ɛngile kɛ amgba medi benle. Awulae angome a bua me ndɛne a.
46004005	Yemɔti bɛmmabua awie biala ndɛne kɔkpula Kenle ne mɔɔ Awulae kɛra bieko la. Awieleɛ ndɛnebualɛ ne wɔ Awulae asa anu, yemɔ yɛɛ ɔbaraye ninyɛne mɔɔ vea awozinli nu nee ahonle nu nzuzulɛ muala yeavinde wienyi nu a. Zɔhane mekɛ ne awie biala asa baha ye moyɛlɛ mɔɔ fɛta la avi Nyamenle ɛkɛ.
46004006	Me mediema, ɔlua bɛ ti yɛɛ meva Apɔlɔso nee medame mumua ne medo edwɛkɛ nwo meha a, amaa bɛazukoa yɛ na bɛanyɛ bɛammaa yeandɛla mɔɔ bɛhɛlɛ bɛdo ɛkɛ ne la. Bɛ nuhua biala mmafa awie ko pɛ ɔ gɔnwo anye zo.
46004007	Nwane a zele bɛ kɛ bɛle kpalɛ bɛtɛla bɛ gɔnwo mɔ a? Tɛ Nyamenle a manle bɛ mɔɔ bɛlɛ la amuala ɔ? Saa ɔle zɔhane a, ɛnee duzu ati a bie kɛmemaa ɔ nwo zo kɛ asɛɛ mɔɔ ɔlɛ la ɛnle Nyamenle ahyɛlɛdeɛ ɛ?
46004008	Bɛ sa ɛdɔ bɛ kunlu! Bɛnyia bɛ nwo bɛwie! Bɛhoane yɛ nwo bɛyɛ arelemgbunli! Me kunlu bɔbɔ a anrɛɛ bɛle arelemgbunli amgba, amaa yɛ nee bɛ ali bɛ mbia ne mɔ.
