46004009	Ɔluakɛ ɔyɛ me kɛ Nyamenle ɛva yɛmɛ ɛzoanvolɛma ɛzie ɛkɛ, kɛ menli mɔɔ bɛbu bɛ ewule fɔlɛ na nzinlii bɛbahu bɛ bagua nu bɛahile ɛtane ewiade ye, anwuma soanvolɛma nee menli muala la.
46004010	Kelaese ati yɛyɛ ahɔnwɔne; na bɛmɛ, bɛle nrɛlɛbɛvolɛma. Yɛle bɛtɛɛ na bɛmɛ, bɛ nwo yɛ se. Menli ɛmbu yɛ, noko bɛdi bɛmɛ eni.
46004011	Ɛnɛ nee ɛnɛ ala ɛhɔne nee nzuhɔne tɛku yɛ; yɛ adɛladeɛ ɛtete yɛ nwo, bɛbila yɛ mbaka, yɛnlɛ awuke, mgbɔsa mgbɔsa a ɛdɔ yɛ nwo a;
46004012	yɛyɛ gyima ɛsesebɛ, yɛɛ yɛpe na yɛali. Bɛwa yɛ amonle a, yɛyila bɛ; bɛyɛ yɛ kpɔdekpɔde a, yɛkponle zolɛ.
46004013	Bɛyɛ yɛ aholoba a, yɛtendɛ kpalɛ yɛkile bɛ. Yɛyɛ ewula wɔ ewiade ye anu; ɛnɛ nee ɛnɛ ala yɛle ewiade amra fovolɛ.
46004014	Mengɛlɛ ɛhye kɛ megua bɛ nyunlu aze; mefa meadu bɛ folɛ kɛ bɛle me mra mɔɔ mekulo bɛ edwɛkɛ a.
46004015	Saa Kelaese ati bɛlɛ adanedivolɛma apenle bulu bɔbɔ a, bɛnwu ye kɛ bɛ ze kokye. Ɔlua Edwɛkpa ne mɔɔ menvale membɛlɛle bɛ la ati, merayɛ bɛ ze wɔ Kelaese ati.
46004016	Yemɔti mesɛlɛ bɛ, bɛva me gyakɛ.
46004017	Ɛhye ala ati a melɛsoa Temɔte, mɔɔ le me ra mɔɔ mekulo ye, na Awulae ati ɔdi nɔhalɛ la wɔ bɛ nwo lɔ a. Ɔbahakyehakye bɛ ɛbɛla ɛbɔlɛ fofolɛ ndenle ne mɔ mɔɔ Kelaese ati melua nu melɛkilehile asɔne ne mɔ mɔɔ wɔ ɛleka biala la.
46004018	Bɛ nuhua bie mɔ ɛlɛtu bɛ nloa anu na bɛdwenle kɛ menrɛra lɔ bieko.
46004019	Saa ɔyɛ Nyamenle ɛhulolɛ a ɔnrɛhyɛ, mebara bɛ nwo lɔ na mearavedevede nu meanlea tumi mɔɔ bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛlɛtu bɛ nloa anu la lɛ la, na tɛ mɔɔ bɛlɛkeha la ɔ.
46004020	Ɔluakɛ Nyamenle Belemgbunlililɛ ne ɛngyi ɛdendɛlɛ zo, ɔgyi tumi zo.
46004021	Boni a bɛkulo a? Saa melɛba a menva empele membɛla anzɛɛ menva sunsum nu ɛhulolɛ nee bɛtɛɛyɛlɛ membɛla?
46005001	Kɛkala menli ɛraha kɛ bɛlɛbɔ adwɔmane ɛbɛla bie mɔɔ bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnzonle Nyamenle bɔbɔ la ɛnrɛbɔ a. Mede kɛ kpavolɛ bie ɛva ɔ ze aye.
46005002	Ɛhye ɛnyɛ bɛ nyiane bɔbɔ? Bɛli nwolɛ nyane na bɛye sonla zɔhane mɔɔ ɛbɔ munzule ɛbɛla ɛhye la wɔ bɛ avinli.
46005003	Saa menle bɛ nwo lɔ wɔ nwonane nu bɔbɔ a, me nee bɛ wɔ lɔ wɔ sunsum nu, na melua Awulae Gyisɛse duma nu mebua sonla zɔhane mɔɔ ɛbɔ munzule ɛbɛla ɛhye la ndɛne kɛ asɛɛ me nee bɛ a wɔ lɔ la.
46005004	Saa me sunsum ne nee bɛ di ayia a, bɛlua Awulae Gyisɛse tumi ne mɔɔ boka yɛ nwo la azo
46005005	bɛye sonla ɛhye bɛwula Seetan asa anu amaa ye nwonane ne azɛkye na ye ɛkɛla anyia ngoane wɔ Awulae Kenle ne.
46005006	Bɛ adubɛnwo ye ka bie! Bɛnze kɛ, “Fɛlɛ ko dɔ sonlɛ na ɔla fɛlɛ dɔɔnwo avinli a ɔsɛkye bɛ muala.”
46005007	Bɛye fɛlɛ ne mɔɔ ɛlɔ azonlɛ la wɔ bɛ avinli na bɛ nwo ade saanwu, amaa bɛayɛ menli fofolɛ mɔɔ evinli biala ɛnle bɛ nwo a, kɛmɔ meze ye wienyi kɛ amgba bɛde la. Ɔluakɛ kɛkala mɔɔ bɛhu Kelaese, yɛ Akpabɛnwo boaneralɛ ne bɛbɔ azu la,
46005008	bɛmmamaa yɛfa yɛ ɛtane nee yɛ amumuyɛ subane nvinli ne yɛdi Akpabɛnwo Ɛvoyia ne, na yɛva atiakunlu wienyi nee nɔhalɛlilɛ yɛli.
46005009	Menganle ye wɔ me kɛlata ne anu kɛ bɛ nee menli mɔɔ bɔ ɛbɛla mgbane mgbane la mmatu.
46005010	Meanga meammaa bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnze Nyamenle na bɛbɔ ɛbɛla mgbane mgbane mɔɔ le kɛ anyebolo anzɛɛ awule na eza bɛsonle awozonle la; ɔluakɛ mɔɔ bɛkahola bɛade bɛ nwo bɛavi ewiade amra ɛhye mɔ anwo bɔkɔɔ la ɛnee kyesɛ bɛfi ewiade ye anu bɔkɔɔ.
46005011	Na mɔɔ mekpondɛ meaha la a le kɛ, bɛ nee awie biala mɔɔ fɛlɛ ɔ nwo Keleseɛnenli na ɔbɔ ɛbɛla mgbane mgbane, ɔle anyebolo, ɔsonle awozonle, ɔ nloa ɛdendɛlɛ ɛnyɛ fɛ, ɔle nzanli anzɛɛ ɔle awule la mmatu. Bɛ nee sonla zɛhae mmatɛnla ɛkponle nwo bɔbɔ di debie.
46005012	-
46005013	Ɔnle me gyima kɛ menwɔbua bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnle yɛ ekpunli ye anu la ndɛne. Nyamenle ɔdaye ɔbabua bɛ ndɛne. Na tɛ bɛmɛ mɔɔ bɛwɔ asɔne ne anu la a ɔwɔ kɛ bɛbua bɛ asɔnema ne mɔ ndɛne ɔ? Bɛye amumuyɛ sonla ɛhye bɛvi bɛ avinli.
46006001	Duzu ati bɔbɔ yɛɛ saa bɛ nuhua bie nee ɔ diema nyia edwɛkɛ a ɛnee ɔkɛva ye ɔkɛhɔ kɔɔto ɔkɛhɔmaa ewiade ndɛnebuavolɛma, na ɔmmaa Nyamenle menli ne ɛnziezie ɛ?
46006002	Bɛnze kɛ Nyamenle menli ye ala a babua ewiade amra ndɛne a? Na saa bɛmɛ a bɛbabua ewiade amra ndɛne a, ɛnee duzu ati a bɛngola edwɛkɛ ngyikyi ɛhye mɔ siezie ɛ?
46006003	Asoo bɛnze kɛ yɛmɛ a yɛbabua anwuma soanvolɛma bɔbɔ ndɛne a? Na kɛ ɔyɛ mɔɔ akee azɛlɛ ye azo edwɛkɛ yɛngola yɛnli a?
46006004	Saa ɔle zɛhae a ɛnee edwɛkɛ ɛhye mɔ bie si a, duzu ati a bɛfa bɛkɔmaa menli mɔɔ asɔne ye ɛmbu bɛ bie la siezie ɛ?
46006005	Bɛbɔ anyiemgba bɔbɔ! Asoo amgba ala nrɛlɛbɛvolɛ ko bɔbɔ ɛnle bɛ asɔne ne anu, mɔɔ kola siezie mediema avinli,
46006006	mɔɔ yemɔti adiema fa adiema kɔ kɔɔto kɔmaa bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnlie Edwɛkpa ne bɛnli la bua bɛ ndɛne a?
46006007	Saa bɛ nee bɛ gɔnwo mɔ twe manzonle bɔbɔ a ɛnee noko bɛha aze. Duzu ati a bɛngulo kɛ awie kɛvo bɛ ɛ? Duzu ati a bɛngulo kɛ awie kɛsisi bɛ ekyii ɛ?
46006008	Na akee bɛmɛ bɛdabɛ bɛsisi bɛ nwo, bɛdi bɛ nwo amile, bɛyɛ ɛhye dedee bɛfa bɛyɛ bɛ mediema Keleseɛnema bɔbɔ!
46006009	Nɔhalɛ, bɛze kɛ amumuyɛma ɛnrɛnyia Nyamenle Belemgbunlililɛ ne. Bɛmmabɛlɛbɛla bɛ nwo; menli mɔɔ bɔ ɛbɛla mgbane mgbane, bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛsonle awozonle, bɛfa nwuvolɛ, mrenya mɔɔ fa bɛ gɔnwo mɔ mrenya nee mraalɛ mɔɔ fa mraalɛ,
46006010	bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛle nwule, bɛle anyebolo, bɛdabɛ mɔɔ nza ɛgya bɛ, bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛ nloa ɛdendɛlɛ ɛnyɛ fɛ nee bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛle ahɔdiawu la, biala ɛnrɛnyia Nyamenle Belemgbunlililɛ ne.
46006011	Kɛ ɛnee bɛ bie mɔ de la ɛne. Na Awulae Gyisɛse Kelaese duma ne ati nee Nyamenle Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne ati, bɛbia bɛ; bɛde bɛ nwo bɛvi ɛtane nwo, na bɛmaa bɛzɔ Nyamenle anye.
46006012	Wɔannea a awie baha kɛ, “Melɛ adenle meyɛ debie biala.” Ɔle zɔhane, noko tɛ nyɛleɛ ne amuala a le kpalɛ a. Mekola meka kɛ, “Melɛ adenle meyɛ debie biala,” noko menrɛmaa debie biala adenle menrɛmaa ɔnrɛva me ɔnrɛyɛ ye akɛlɛ.
46006013	Awie noko bahola aha kɛ, “Bɛbɔle aleɛ bɛmanle ɛkolɛ, yɛɛ bɛbɔle ɛkolɛ bɛmanle aleɛ.” Ɔle zɔhane, noko Nyamenle bazɛkye bɛ mu nwiɔ. Bɛmmafa bɛ sonlabaka ne bɛbɔ ɛbɛla mgbane mgbane biala; bɛva bɛzonle Awulae. Awulae a maa sonlabaka ne mɔɔ ɔhyia nwo la a.
46006014	Nyamenle a dwazole Awulae vile ewule nu a, na ɔlua ye tumi ne azo ɔbadwazo yɛdayɛ noko yeavi ewule nu.
46006015	Bɛnze kɛ bɛ sonlabaka ne mɔ le Kelaese ɛdeɛ ne nvɛyeba nvɛyeba mɔɔ bɔ nu yɛ Awulae sonlabaka ne la ɔ? Asoo menva Kelaese sonlabaka ne nvɛyeba membɔ tuutuu ɛbɛla? Nyamenle ɛkpa ɛgua!
46006016	Anzɛɛ bɛnze kɛ awie mɔɔ kɛva ɔ nwo kɛha tuutuunli la nee ye bɛ mu nwiɔ bɛyɛ nwonane ko ɔ? Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne kpakye nu ka ye wienyi kɛ, “Bɛ mu nwiɔ bɛkɛyɛ nwonane ko.”
46006017	Mɔɔ fa ɔ nwo beta Awulae la nee ye yɛ ko wɔ Sunsum nu.
46006018	Bɛgyakyi ɛbɛla mgbane mgbane ɛbɔlɛ. Ɛtane biala mɔɔ sonla yɛ la ɛnga ye sonlabaka ne; na awie biala mɔɔ kɛbɔ adwɔmane ɛbɛla la yɛ ɛtane tia ɔdaye ye sonlabaka ne.
46006019	Asoo bɛnze kɛ bɛ sonlabaka ne le Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne mɔɔ Nyamenle ɛva ɛmaa bɛ na ɔde bɛ nu la ɛzonlenlɛ sua? Bɛdabɛ bɛnlɛ bɛ nwo; bɛle Nyamenle ɛdeɛ.
46006020	Ɔdɔle bɛ bolɛ ɛsesebɛ. Yemɔti, bɛva bɛ sonlabaka ne bɛde Nyamenle anyunlu.
46007001	Akee mɔɔ fane edwɛkɛ ne mɔ mɔɔ bɛhɛlɛle me nwolɛ la, ɔle kpalɛ kɛ anrɛɛ nrenya ɛnrɛva ɔ sa ɛnrɛha raalɛ bɔbɔ.
46007002	Na sɔnea mɔɔ maa sonla bɔ adwɔmane ɛbɛla la zonle la ati, ɔhyia kɛ nrenya biala nyia ɔ ti anwo ɔ ye, na raalɛ biala nyia ɔ ti anwo ɔ hu.
46007003	Wɔ nla nu, ɔwɔ kɛ nrenya biala yɛ mɔɔ fɛta kɛ kunli yɛ la maa ɔ ye, na yelɛ noko yɛ zɔhane ala maa ɔ hu. Ɔwɔ kɛ bɛ mu nwiɔ bɛsosɔ bɛ nwo.
46007004	Yelɛ ɛnlɛ tumi wɔ ɔdaye ye nwonane ne azo, ɔ hu a lɛ nwolɛ tumi a; yɛɛ kunli ɛnlɛ tumi wɔ ɔdaye ye nwonane ne azo, ɔ ye a lɛ zolɛ tumi a.
46007005	Bɛmmabɔ bɛ nwo abolɛ, kyesɛ bɛ mu nwiɔ bɛdumua bɛkponle zolɛ kɛ bɛyɛ ye zɔhane na bɛanyia alagye bɛazɛlɛ; nzinlii bɛzia bɛyia nu bieko, amaa yeamba ye kɛ bɛangola bɛ nwo sɔ la ati Seetan azɔ bɛ anlea.
46007006	Menga ɛhye kɛ ɔle mɛla; ɔle adenle ɛhilelɛ ala.
46007007	Me kunlu a anrɛɛ bɛ muala bɛle kɛ mɔɔ mede la; noko Nyamenle ɛmaa awie biala ɔ ti anwo ahyɛlɛdeɛ, asolo biala ɛdeɛ.
46007008	Akee bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛngya bie nee bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛle ahunlanvolɛ la, meka meahile bɛ kɛ ɔle kpalɛ ɔmaa bɛ kɛ bɛ ngome bɛkɛhɔ zo bɛkɛdɛnla, kɛmɔ meyɛ ye la.
46007009	Na saa bɛnea na bɛnrɛhola bɛ nwo sɔ a, ɛnee bɛgya bie; ɔle kpalɛ kɛ bɛkɛgya bie tɛla kɛ bɛ nwo kɛhyele bɛ na bɛnrɛhola bɛ nwo sɔ a.
46007010	Melɛ ɛhye, kɛ ɔle mɛla mɔɔ vi Awulae ɛkɛ memaa bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛle nwuvolɛ la kɛ yelɛ mmagyakyi ɔ hu;
46007011	yɛɛ saa ɔgyakyi ye a ɔmmakɔ agyalɛ fofolɛ; anzɛɛ ɔzia ɔ nee ɔ hu dɛba ne ɛhɔbɔ nu. Kunli biala noko mmabɔ ɔ ye ewole.
46007012	Akee mɔɔ medame noko (tɛ Awulae o,) meka meahile bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛha la a le ɛhye: saa Kelaese ɛdoavolɛ nrenya bie aye ɛnle diedinli na yelɛ ne kponle zolɛ kɛ ɔ nee ye kɛdɛnla a, ɔmmabɔ ye ewole.
46007013	Zɔhane ala yɛɛ saa Kelaese ɛdoavolɛ raalɛ bie ɔ hu ɛnle diedinli na kunli ne kponle zolɛ kɛ ɔ nee ye kɛdɛnla a, ɔmmabɔ ewole a.
46007014	Ɔluakɛ diedinli yelɛ ne te kunli ne mɔɔ ɛnlɛ diedi la anwo maa ɔsɔ Nyamenle anye, yɛɛ diedinli nrenya ne te ɔ ye ne mɔɔ ɛnlɛ diedi la anwo maa ɔsɔ Nyamenle anye. Saa yeamba ye zɔhane a bɛ mra ne mɔ anwo ɛnrɛde, na ɔnle zɔ, bɛ nwo te.
46007015	Na saa awie mɔɔ ɛnle diedinli la kulo kɛ ɔbɔ ewole a, bɛmaa ye adenle. Saa ɔba ye zɔhane a, Kelaese ɛdoavolɛ nrenya ne anzɛɛ raalɛ ne lɛ adenle kɛ ɔbɔ ewole ne. Ɔluakɛ Nyamenle ɛvɛlɛ bɛ kɛ bɛdɛnla anzonudwolɛ nu.
46007016	Kelaese ɛdoavolɛ raalɛ, saa wɔmɔ a ɛbalie ɛ hu ngoane a, asoo ɛze? Kelaese ɛdoavolɛ nrenya, saa wɔmɔ a ɛbalie ɛ ye ngoane a, asoo ɛze?
46007017	Awie biala ɛlua ahyɛlɛdeɛ mɔɔ Nyamenle ɛva ɛlo ye la azo ɛdɛnla kɛmɔ ɛnee ɔde mɔɔ Nyamenle vɛlɛle ye la. Ɛhye yɛɛ mehyehyɛ memaa asɔne ne mɔ amuala a.
46007018	Saa Nyamenle fɛlɛ awie la ɛnee yeyɛ ye mrenyanu nzonlɛ a, ɔmmapele kɛ ɔminliminli nzonlɛ ne abo zo; saa ɔfɛlɛ ye la ɛnee bɛtɛyɛle ye mrenyanu nzonlɛ a, ɔmmayɛ.
46007019	Ɔluakɛ bɛyɛ wɔ mrenyanu nzonlɛ o, bɛanyɛ o, ɔngyia. Debie mɔɔ hyia la a le Nyamenle mɛla ne mɔ azo ɛlilɛ.
46007020	Awie biala ɛdɛnla, kɛmɔ ɛnee ɔde mɔɔ Nyamenle vɛlɛle ye la.
46007021	Nyamenle vɛlɛle wɔ la ɛnee ɛle akɛlɛ ɔ? Ɔnle debie, mmadwenle nwolɛ; noko saa adenle bie azo ɛkɛhola ɛkɛkpɔne ɛ nwo a, yɛ ye zɔhane.
46007022	Ɔluakɛ akɛlɛ mɔɔ Awulae ɛvɛlɛ ye la ɛyɛ dehelɛ wɔ Awulae anu; zɔhane ala yɛɛ mɔɔ le dehelɛ na bɛvɛlɛ ye la, le akɛlɛ maa Kelaese a.
46007023	Nyamenle dɔle bɛ bolɛ ɛsesebɛ; zɔhane ati bɛmmayɛ bɛ nwo ngɛkɛlɛ bɛmaa menli.
46007024	Mediema, bɛ nuhua ko biala nee Nyamenle ɛlua, kɛmɔ ɔde mɔɔ Nyamenle vɛlɛle ye la.
46007025	Mɔɔ le edwɛkɛ mɔɔ fane bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛngya bie la anwo la, menlɛ Awulae ɛkɛ ne mɛla biala memmaa bɛ, medame me adwenle a meka a, kɛ sonla mɔɔ Awulae ɛnwu ye anwunvɔne na menli kola die ye di la.
46007026	Saa menea kɛkala mekɛ ye anu anwongyelelɛ mɔɔ ɛra la a, ɛnee medwenle kɛ ɔle kpalɛ kɛ sonla biala kɛdɛnla, kɛmɔ ɔde ye ala la.
46007027	Ɛgya raalɛ ɔ? Ɛnee mmabɔ ye ewole. Ɛngya bie ɔ? Ɛnee mmadwenle bie ɛgyalɛ nwo.
46007028	Na saa ɛgya bie noko a, ɛnee ɛtɛyɛle ɛtane, yɛɛ saa raalɛ mɔɔ bɛtɛgyale ye la kɔ agyalɛ a, ɛnee ɔtɛyɛle ɛtane. Ewiade ye anu edwɛkɛ dɔɔnwo maa nwuvolɛ nwo kyele bɛ kpalɛ, na ɛhye yɛɛ mekulo kɛ ɔkpa bɛ ti a.
46007029	Mediema, mɔɔ mekpondɛ meaha la a le ɛhye: mekɛ ne ɛwie, na ɔvi ɛnɛ mɔɔ kɔ la, kunlima ɛdɛnla kɛ bɛngya mraalɛ;
46007030	bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛsu la ɛyɛ bɛ nwo kɛ bɛnli nyane; bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛ nye ɛlie la ɛyɛ bɛ nwo kɛ bɛnli fɛlɛko; bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛtɔ ninyɛne la ɛyɛ bɛ nwo kɛ mɔɔ bɛtɔ la ɛnle bɛ ɛdeɛ;
46007031	na bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛli ewiade ninyɛne nzi la ɛyɛ kɛ asɛɛ bɛngyia ninyɛne ne mɔ anwo la. Ɔluakɛ ewiade ɛhye, kɛ ɔde ye kɛkala la, ɔnrɛhyɛ na yeapɛ nu.
46007032	Mekpondɛ kɛ bɛye adwenleadwenle muala bɛfi ɛkɛ. Nrenya mɔɔ ɛngya raalɛ la dwenle Awulae gyima ne anwo, ɔluakɛ ɔbɔ mɔdenle kɛ ɔkɛzɔ Awulae anye;
46007033	na nrenya mɔɔ gya raalɛ la dwenledwenle ewiade ninyɛne nwo, ɔluakɛ ɔkpondɛ kɛ ɔmaa ɔ ye anye die.
46007034	Zɔhane ati ye adwenle ne ɛhyɛ nwiɔ. Raalɛ mɔɔ bɛtɛgyale ye la dwenledwenle Awulae gyima ne anwo, ɔluakɛ ɔkpondɛ kɛ ɔtu ye sonlabaka ne nee ye ɛkɛla ne ɔmaa Nyamenle; na awuvolɛ raalɛ dwenledwenle ewiade ninyɛne nwo, ɔluakɛ ɔkpondɛ kɛ ɔmaa ɔ hu anye die.
46007035	Melɛka ɛhye wɔ bɛ kpalɛyɛlɛ ti. Mensisi bɛ nwo zo. Mekpondɛ kɛ bɛyɛ mɔɔ le kpalɛ na ɔfa adenle nu la, na bɛfa bɛ nwo amuala bɛsonle Awulae wɔ adenle biala anu.
46007036	Saa nrenya bie yia bɛlɛra bie na bɛ mu nwiɔ bɛyɛ bɛ adwenle kɛ bɛnrɛgya bɛ nwo, na nzinlii nrenya ne nwu kɛ debie mɔɔ ɔlɛyɛ bɛlɛra ne la ɛnle kpalɛ, na ɔdaye mumua ne ɔngola ɔ nwo sɔ na ɔnwu kɛ ɔwɔ kɛ bɛgya bɛ nwo a, bɛgya bɛ nwo, kɛmɔ bɛkpondɛ la. Ɔnle ɛtane.
46007037	Na saa nrenya mɔɔ debie biala ɛnkyekye ye kɛ ɔwɔ kɛ ɔyɛ debie zɛhae, na yezi ye ahonle kɛ ɔnrɛgya raalɛ ne mɔɔ yeyia ye la, na ɔkola ɔsɔ ɔ nwo, na yeyɛ ye adwenle kɛ ɔkɛnlea raalɛ ne mɔɔ yeyia ye la a, ɔle kpalɛ kɛ ɔkɛyɛ ye zɔhane.
46007038	Yemɔti, mɔɔ gya raalɛ ne mɔɔ yeyia ye la, yɛ ye boɛ; noko mɔɔ ɛngya bie la yɛ ye boɛ kpalɛ.
46007039	Ɔnle kɛ raalɛ te ɔ nwo fi ɔ hu anwo wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ ɔ hu de ngoane nu la. Na saa ɔ hu wu a, ɔlɛ adenle kɛ ɔgya nrenya biala mɔɔ ɔkulo la, noko ɔwɔ kɛ nrenya ne yɛ Keleseɛnenli.
46007040	Saa raalɛ ne kɛdɛnla mɔɔ ɔngɔ agyalɛ a anrɛɛ mese ɔ nye balie. Kɛ me adwenle se me la ɛne, yɛɛ medie medi kɛ medame noko Nyamenle Sunsum ne wɔ me nu.
46008001	Akee meka aleɛ mɔɔ bɛva bɛzɔ amonle la anwo edwɛkɛ. “Yɛ muala yɛlɛ adwenle, yɛze deɛ,” ɔle nɔhalɛ kɛmɔ bɛka la; noko akee bɛ deɛnwunlɛ zɛhae sɛkye bɛ; ɛhulolɛ a maa ngɔzo a.
46008002	Sonla mɔɔ dwenle kɛ ɔze deɛ la, ɛnze mɔɔ ɔwɔ kɛ ɔnwu ye la.
46008003	Awie mɔɔ kulo Nyamenle la, Nyamenle ze ye.
46008004	Zɔhane ati, mɔɔ fane aleɛ mɔɔ bɛva bɛzɔ amonle la ɛlilɛ nwo, yɛze kɛ amonle ɛnle debie biala, yɛɛ nyamenle biala ɛnle ɛkɛ ne kɛ Nyamenle kokye ne ala.
46008005	Na saa bɔbɔ nyamenle bie mɔ wɔ anwuma anzɛɛ azɛlɛ ye azo, kɛmɔ nɔhalɛ “nyamenle nee awulae mɔ” bie dɔɔnwo wɔ ɛkɛ ne la,
46008006	yɛmɛ yɛze Nyamenle kokye ne ala, yemɔ a le Selɛ ne mɔɔ bɔle ninyɛne kɔsɔɔti na yɛde aze yɛmaa ye la; yɛɛ Awulae ko, Gyisɛse Kelaese, mɔɔ ɔlua ɔ nwo zo a bɛbɔle ninyɛne kɔsɔɔti na ɔlua ɔ nwo zo yɛde aze la.
46008007	Noko tɛ menli ne amuala a lɛ nɔhalɛ deɛnwunlɛ ɛhye a. Amonlezɔlɛ ɛli menli bie mɔ adwenle ɛmaa ɛnɛ nee ɛnɛ ala saa bɛdi aleɛ zɛhae mɔ bie a ɛnee bɛdwenle nwolɛ kɛ asɛɛ amgba ɔle aleɛ mɔɔ bɛva bɛzɔ “nɔhalɛ” amonle a. Ɔba ye zɛhae a ɛnee kɛmɔ bɛ adwenle ɛtɛtinle la ati, bɛfa ye kɛ aleɛ ne gua bɛ nwo evinli.
46008008	Nɔhalɛ, aleɛ ɛnrɛva yɛ ɛnrɛdwu Nyamenle anyunlu. Yemɔti saa yɛanli a yɛnrɛminli debie biala, yɛɛ saa yɛdi noko a yɛnrɛnyia nvasoɛ biala.
46008009	Noko bɛnlea boɛ na bɛ fanwodi nyɛleɛ ɛhye ammaa bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛ diedi ɛtɛtinle la andu koti.
46008010	Ɔluakɛ saa awie mɔɔ ye adwenle ɛtɛtinle wɔ edwɛkɛ ɛhye mɔ anu la nwu wɔmɔ mɔɔ ɛze deɛ la kɛ ɛlɛdi aleɛ wɔ amonle sua bo a, asoo ɛhye ɛnrɛzuhu ɔ kɔme anzi ɛnrɛmaa ɔnrɛli aleɛ mɔɔ bɛva bɛzɔ amonle la?
46008011	Saa ɔba ye zɛhae a ɛnee wɔ “deɛnwunlɛ” ne bamaa sonla ɛhye mɔɔ le ɛ diema mɔɔ yemɔti Kelaese wule la aminli.
46008012	Nwu ye kɛ mɔɔ ɛlɛyɛ ɛtane zɛhae wɔatia ɛ mediema ne mɔ, na ɛlɛsɛkye bɛ adwenle la, ɛnee ɛlɛyɛ ɛtane wɔatia Kelaese.
46008013	Yemɔti, saa aleɛ zɛhae kɛmaa me diema bie kɛkpo aze a, ɛnee menrɛli aleɛ zɔhane bieko na aloa abɔ, amaa me diema bie anyɛ ɛtane.
46009001	Menle dehelɛ ɔ? Menle ɛzoanvolɛ ɔ? Metɛnwunle yɛ Awulae Gyisɛse ɔ? Na tɛ bɛmɛ a Awulae ati bɛle me sa anloa gyima a?
46009002	Saa bɔbɔ awie mɔ ɛnlie me ɛndo nu kɛ mele ɛzoanvolɛ a ɛnee tɛ bɛmɛ ɔ! Bɛdabɛ mumua ne bɛ ɛbɛlabɔlɛ mɔɔ Awulae ati bɛbɔ la kile kɛ mele ɛzoanvolɛ.
46009003	Me ne mɔɔ mesa meahile bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛfedevede me ɛbɛlabɔlɛ nu la ɛne!
46009004	Yɛnlɛ adenle kɛ yɛdi na yɛno ɔ?
46009005	Yɛnlɛ adenle kɛ yɛgya Kelaese ɛdoavolɛ mraalɛ ne mɔ bie na yɛ nee ye tu adenle kɔyɛ gyima, kɛmɔ ɛzoanvolɛma ɛhendeɛ ne mɔ nee Awulae amediema ne mɔ nee Pita yɛ ye la ɔ?
46009006	Anzɛɛ me nee Banabase yɛ mu nwiɔ ala yɛɛ ɔwɔ kɛ yɛpele na yɛali a?
46009007	Sogyanli boni a wɔ konle nloa na ɔdaye ɔ ngome ɔdi ɔ nloa anu ndɔnie a? Nwane a ɛyɛ vanye egyinli na ɔnli vanye ma ne bie a? Nwane a nea nyɛmoa na ɔnno bɛ nyɛfonzule ne bie a?
46009008	Tɛ sonla tumi zo yɛɛ melua mɔɔ meka ɛhye mɔ a. Nyamenle mɛla ne ɔdaye ɔka edwɛkɛ ko ne ala.
46009009	Bɛhɛlɛ ye wɔ Mosisi mɛla ne anu kɛ, “Mmakyekye ɛnlankɛ ne mɔɔ wozo awule ne la anloa.” Asoo ɛnlankɛ nwo hyia Nyamenle tɛla yɛ la ati a ɔhanle ɛhye a?
46009010	Anzɛɛ tɛ yɛmɛ yɛ ti a ɔhanle ɛhye a? Nɔhalɛ, bɛhɛlɛ ɛhye wɔ sonla ti. Bɛmaa mɔɔ so ɛya nee mɔɔ fa nu aleɛ la ɛyɛ bɛ gyima ne anyelazo nu kɛ bɛbanyia bɛ afoa nu aleɛ ɛdeɛ.
46009011	Yɛlua sunsum nu ma wɔ bɛ nu, na saa yɛnyia nvasoɛ wɔ ninyɛne nu yɛfi bɛ ɛkɛ ne a, ɛnee ɔnle ɛtane.
46009012	Saa awie mɔ bɔbɔ lɛ adenle kɛ bɛdie ɛhye wɔ bɛ lɔ a, ɛnee akee yɛmɛ ɛ? Noko yɛtɛyɛle debie zɛhae mɔ bie. Yɛkponle ninyɛne muala azo, amaa yɛandua Kelaese anwo Edwɛkpa ne ɛhanlɛ adenle.
46009013	Nɔhalɛ, bɛze kɛ menli mɔɔ yɛ Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua nu gyima la nyia bɛ aleɛ fi Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne anu, yɛɛ bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛboa azubɔlɛ nu wɔ azukponle ne anyunlu la nyia ninyɛne ne mɔ mɔɔ bɛfa bɛbɔ azu ne la bie.
46009014	Zɔhane ala yɛɛ Awulae ɛhyehyɛ ɛdo ɛkɛ ne kɛ ɔwɔ kɛ bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛbɔ Edwɛkpa ne nolo la nyia bɛ aleɛ fi bɛ gyima nu a.
46009015	Noko metɛbizale debie biala metɛfile bɛ lɔ, yɛɛ mengɛlɛ ɛhye kɛ akee bɛyɛ ninyɛne ɛhye mɔ bɛmaa me. Menwɔhulo kɛ menwɔwu kɛdɛla kɛ awie kɛmaa me nloa anu mɔɔ metu kɛ menga Edwɛkpa ne menlie ahatualɛ la kɛyɛ mgbane.
46009016	Menlɛ adenle kɛ mememaa me nwo zo kɛ mebɔ Edwɛkpa ne nolo a, ɔluakɛ ɔle me gyima mɔɔ ɔwɔ kɛ meyɛ a. Saa meambɔ Edwɛkpa ne nolo a, me gyakɔ!
46009017	Saa melɛ medame me ɛhulolɛ yɛɛ melɛyɛ gyima ne a, anrɛɛ me nye bala ahatualɛ zo, na meyɛ ye kɛ ɔle ɛzonle ɔla me nwo zo, ɔboalekɛ Nyamenle a ɛva ɛwula me sa nu a.
46009018	Ɛnee akee duzu ahatualɛ a menyia ye a? Me ahatualɛ a le kɛ menwɔbɔ Edwɛkpa ne mɔɔ fane Kelaese anwo la nolo mɔɔ menlie ɛhwee, na eza menva adenle mɔɔ melɛ ye wɔ Edwɛkpa ne ɛhanlɛ nwo la menyɛ me nwo boɛ.
46009019	Mele dehelɛ, menle awie biala akɛlɛ; noko meyɛ me nwo akɛlɛ memaa awie biala, amaa me sa aha bɛ nuhua dɔɔnwo ne ala.
46009020	Wɔ Dwuuma anu, membɔle me ɛbɛla kɛ mele Dwuunli, amaa me sa aha bɛ; na saa medame Pɔɔlo menle Mosisi mɛla ne abo bɔbɔ a, membɔle me ɛbɛla kɛ mewɔ mɛla ne abo wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ me nee Dwuuma mɔɔ bɛmɛ bɛwɔ mɛla ne abo la de la, amaa me sa aha bɛ.
46009021	Zɔhane ala yɛɛ meyɛ ye wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ mewɔ bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnle Dwuuma la avinli a; meyɛ me nwo kɛ asɛɛ menle mɛla ne abo, amaa me sa aha bɛdabɛ noko. Ɛhye ɛngile kɛ menli Nyamenle mɛla ne azo; nɔhalɛ ne a le kɛ mewɔ Kelaese mɛla bo.
46009022	Saa mewɔ bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛ diedi ɛnli munli la anu noko a, meyɛ me nwo kɛ bɛ nuhua bie la, amaa me sa aha bɛ. Zɔhane ala yɛɛ me nee menli muala yɛ ko a, amaa adenle biala azo mealua mealie bie mɔ ngoane meamaa Nyamenle.
46009023	Meyɛ ɛhye mɔ amuala wɔ Edwɛkpa ne ati, amaa meanyia nwolɛ nyilalɛ ne bie.
46009024	Bɛze ye wienyi kɛ menli dɔɔnwo a su ɛnriandilɛ a, noko bɛ nuhua ko ala yɛɛ asa ka nwolɛ ahyɛlɛdeɛ ne a. Ɛhye ati bɛnriandi kpalɛ kɛ bɛkɛnyia nwolɛ ahyɛlɛdeɛ ne.
46009025	Awie biala mɔɔ kazu ɛnriandilɛ la siezie ɔ nwo kpalɛ wɔ adenle biala anu. Ɔyɛ ye zɔhane, amaa bɛabɔ ye nwolɛ abɔtile, abɔtile ɛhye bɔbɔ ɛngyɛ na yeazɛkye. Na yɛmɛ Keleseɛnema, yɛsu ɛnriandilɛ yɛdie abɔtile mɔɔ ɛnzɛkye ɛlɛ la.
46009026	Ɛhye ati, kɛmɔ me ɛnriandilɛ ne gyi kpɔkɛ zo la, dahuu menriandi fɔɔnwo; mele kɛ sonla mɔɔ ko la. Mentoto me abotokuma ne mɔ mgbane mgbane.
46009027	Mebɔ mɔdenle mesɔ me nwo na megyinla me ti koonwu medie abotokuma kpalɛ, amaa mame mɔɔ mebɔ edwɛkɛ ne nolo la meandɔ sinli wɔ sɔnea ne anu.
46010001	Mediema, mekpondɛ kɛ bɛkakye mɔɔ zile yɛ nlenya mɔ mɔɔ doale Mosisi la anwo zo la. Bɛ muala yɛɛ amungu ne wowale bɛ a, yɛɛ bɛ muala a bɛluale Nyevile Kɔkɔlɛ ne anu bɛpɛle a.
46010002	Bɛzɔnenle bɛ muala kɛ Mosisi ɛdoavolɛma wɔ amungu ne nee nyevile ne anu.
46010003	Bɛ muala bɛlile sunsum nu aleɛ ko ne ala bie,
46010004	bɛnlonle sunsum nu nzule ko ne ala. Ɔluakɛ bɛ muala bɛnlonle nzule ne mɔɔ vi sunsum nu bodane ne anu vindele zenle lile bɛ nzi la bie; bodane zɔhane a le Kelaese mumua ne.
46010005	Noko akee Nyamenle anye anlie bɛ muala bɛ nwo, yemɔti bɛ nuhua dɔɔnwo totɔle ɛsɛlɛ ne azo.
46010006	Ninyɛne ɛhye mɔ le kɔkɔbɔlɛ maa yɛ, na bɛbɔ yɛ kɔkɔ amaa yɛ ti akunlu amba ninyɛndane ɛyɛlɛ zo, kɛmɔ bɛ bie mɔ yɛle la,
46010007	anzɛɛ yɛanzonle awozonle, kɛmɔ bɛ bie mɔ yɛle la. Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne se, “Menli ne mɔ dɛnlanle aze lile na bɛnlonle na bɛdwazole bɛzile agole.”
46010008	Ɔnle kɛ yɛbɔ adwɔmane ɛbɛla biala kɛmɔ bɛ bie mɔ bɔle a bɛ nuhua apenle ngoko abulanwiɔ nee nsa dɔle kenle ko la.
46010009	Ɔnle kɛ yɛsɔ Awulae yɛnea, kɛmɔ bɛ bie mɔ yɛle a nwɔlɛ kekale bɛ hunle bɛ la.
46010010	Eza ɔnle kɛ yɛtendɛ yɛ nzo abo, kɛmɔ bɛ bie mɔ yɛle na Ewule soanvolɛ zɛkyele bɛ la.
46010011	Ninyɛne ɛhye mɔ sisile bɛ nwo zo, amaa yeayɛ kɔkɔbɔlɛ yeamaa awie mɔ, yɛɛ bɛhɛlɛle kɛ bɛfa bɛahilehile yɛ, ɔluakɛ ewiade ne awieleɛ mekɛ a yɛwɔ nu la.
46010012	Zɔhane ati bɛmaa mɔɔ dwenle kɛ ɔgyi boɛ la ɛnlea boɛ na yeandɔ aze.
46010013	Sɔnea biala mɔɔ ɛdo bɛ la le kɛ mɔɔ to awie biala la. Nyamenle le nɔhalɛ, bɛkola bɛfa bɛ rɛle bɛwula ye nu kɛ ɔnrɛmaa sɔnea mɔɔ bɛnrɛhola ɔ nloa gyinla la ɛnrɛdo bɛ ɛlɛ. Bɛ sɔnea mekɛ nu bɔbɔ, ɔbamaa bɛ anwosesebɛ yeamaa bɛagyinla ɔ nloa, na yeahile bɛ adenle yeamaa bɛavi nu.
46010014	Ɛhye ati ayi mɔ, bɛhwe bɛ nwo bɛvi awozonle ɛzonlenlɛ nwo.
46010015	Melɛtendɛ meahile bɛ kɛ bɛle nrɛlɛbɛvolɛma. Bɛdabɛ bɛdwenle mɔɔ melɛka la anwo.
46010016	Nyilalɛ dwora ne mɔɔ yɛyɛ Nyamenle mo wɔ nwolɛ la, Kelaese mogya ne a yɛkyɛ yɛno ye nu a, yɛɛ kpanwo ne mɔɔ yɛdie yɛdi la, Kelaese nwonane ne a yɛdi a.
46010017	Kɛmɔ kpanwo ne mɔɔ yɛbubu la le ko la, saa yɛle dɔɔnwo bɔbɔ a yɛle sonlabaka ko, ɔluakɛ yɛ muala yɛkyɛ kpanwo ko ne ala.
46010018	Bɛnlea mɔɔ Yizilayɛma yɛ la. Bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛdi azubɔlɛ aleɛ ne la a le menli mɔɔ yɛ gyima wɔ azukponle ne anwo la.
46010019	Duzu edwɛkɛ a mekpondɛ meaha a? Kɛ bozonle ɛzonlenlɛ anzɛɛ aleɛ mɔɔ bɛfa bɛmaa bozonle la amgba le debie ɔ?
46010020	Menga ye zɔhane. Mɔɔ melɛka la a le kɛ ewiade amra fa ninyɛne bɔ azu maa mbɔnsam, bɛmbɔ bɛmmaa Nyamenle. Memkpondɛ kɛ bɛ nee mbɔnsam nyia debie yɛ.
46010021	Ɔnle kɛ bɛno Awulae dwora ne anu na eza bɛanlo mbɔnsam dwora nu; yɛɛ ɔnle kɛ bɛtɛnla Awulae ɛkponle nwo na eza bɛahɔdɛnla mbɔnsam ɛkponle nwo.
46010022	Yɛkulo kɛ yɛka Nyamenle ɛya ɔ? Yɛdwenle kɛ yɛ nwo yɛ se tɛla ye ɔ?
46010023	Bɛte kɛ bɛka kɛ, “Yɛlɛ adenle yɛyɛ debie biala.” Ɔle zɔhane, noko tɛ ninyɛne ne amuala a boa a. “Yɛlɛ adenle yɛyɛ debie biala,” noko tɛ ninyɛne ne amuala a maa ngɔzo a.
46010024	Awie biala mmadwenle ɔ ngome ye boɛyɛlɛ nwo. Bɛdwenle bɛ gɔnwo mɔ ɛdeɛ nwo.
46010025	Bɛli nane biala mɔɔ bɛtɔne ye wɔ gua nu la, bɛmmadwenle nwolɛ bɛbizebiza nwolɛ edwɛkɛ,
46010026	ɔluakɛ Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne se, “Azɛlɛ ye nee zolɛ ninyɛne kɔsɔɔti le Nyamenle ɛdeɛ.”
46010027	Saa bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnlɛ diedi la bie to ɛsalɛ fɛlɛ bɛ wɔ ye ɛkponledolɛ bo na bɛkɔ a, bɛli debie biala mɔɔ bɛkɛva bɛkɛzie bɛ nyunlu la, na bɛmmadwenle nwolɛ bɛbizebiza nwolɛ edwɛkɛ.
46010028	Na saa awie se bɛ kɛ, “Ɛhye le aleɛ mɔɔ bɛva bɛzɔ amonle anzɛɛ bɛdo bɛmaa bozonle” a, ɛnee ahenle ne adwenle mɔɔ kɛzɛkye la ati, bɛmmadi;
46010029	tɛ kɛ bɛmɛ bɛ adwenle nu kɛyɛ bɛ kesee la ati ɔ, na ahenle ne ɛdeɛ ne ati, bɛmmadi. Awie kɛbiza kɛ, “Duzu ati a awie yemɔ ye adwenle mɔɔ kɛzɛkye la ati me ti anwo ɛlilɛ kɛbɔ me ɛ?
46010030	Saa meyɛ Nyamenle mo wɔ mɔɔ medi la anwo a, ɛnee kɛmɔti a awie kɛdendɛ me wɔ aleɛ mɔɔ meyɛ Nyamenle mo wɔ nwolɛ la anwo a?”
46010031	Bɛdie ɛ. Debie biala mɔɔ bɛyɛ la, saa aleɛ a bɛdi o, saa nzule a bɛno o, bɛyɛ bɛde Nyamenle anyunlu.
46010032	Bɛbɔ bɛ ɛbɛla ne mɔɔ bɛndenda Dwuuma anzɛɛ bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnle Dwuuma la nee Nyamenle menli ne agyakɛ anu a.
46010033	Bɛyɛ ye kɛmɔ meyɛ ye ala la. Mendwenle me ngome me kpalɛyɛlɛ nwo; mebɔ mɔdenle kɛ menwɔyɛ mɔɔ le kpalɛ maa awie biala la, amaa bɛalie bɛ ngoane.
46011001	Ɛhye ati, bɛva me gyakɛ, kɛmɔ meva Kelaese agyakɛ la.
46011002	Mekanvo bɛ, ɔluakɛ dahuu bɛkakye me na bɛdi me ngilehilelɛ zo.
46011003	Noko mekpondɛ kɛ bɛte ɔ bo kɛ nrenya biala amenle a le Kelaese, raalɛ biala amenle a le ɔ hu, yɛɛ Kelaese amenle a le Nyamenle.
46011004	Yemɔti nrenya biala mɔɔ ɛlɛyɛ nzɛlɛlɛ anzɛɛ ɛlɛka Nyamenle edwɛkɛ ne na ɔkɛheda ɔ ti zo la gua Kelaese anyunlu aze.
46011005	Raalɛ biala noko mɔɔ ɛlɛyɛ nzɛlɛlɛ anzɛɛ ɛlɛka Nyamenle edwɛkɛ na yeangeda ɔ ti zo la gua ɔ hu anyunlu aze; ngakyile biala ɛnle ye nee raalɛ mɔɔ bɛkpa ɔ ti la avinli.
46011006	Saa raalɛ ne ɛnrɛheda ɔ ti zo a, ɛnee ɔwɔ kɛ ɔpepɛ anzɛɛ ɔkpa ɔ ti enrinli ne. Na saa ɔyɛ ye zɔhane na ɔyɛ ye anyiemgba a, ɛnee noko ɔwɔ kɛ ɔkeda zo.
46011007	Ɔnle kɛ nrenya keda ɔ ti zo, ɔluakɛ nrenya da Nyamenle su ne nee ye anyunlunyia ne ali,
46011008	ɔluakɛ Nyamenle ambɔ nrenya anvi raalɛ nu. Ɔbɔle raalɛ ɔvile nrenya nu;
46011009	yɛɛ tɛ raalɛ ti a bɛbɔle nrenya a. Nrenya ti a bɛbɔle raalɛ a.
46011010	Zɔhane ati, ɔlua anwuma soanvolɛma ne mɔ ati, ɔwɔ kɛ raalɛ biala keda ɔ ti zo.
46011011	Noko akee, Awulae ati nrenya ɛngɔ ɛngyakyi raalɛ, yɛɛ raalɛ ɛngɔ ɛngyakyi nrenya.
46011012	Ɔluakɛ kɛmɔ bɛbɔle raalɛ bɛvile nrenya nu la, zɔhane ala yɛɛ raalɛ wo nrenya a, yɛɛ ninyɛne kɔsɔɔti vi Nyamenle.
46011013	Bɛdabɛ bɛbua: asoo ɔle kpalɛ kɛ raalɛ mɔɔ angeda ɔ ti zo la kɛzɛlɛ wɔ Nyamenle anyunlu?
46011014	Aloa bɔle la enrinli ndendenle gua nrenya nyunlu aze,
46011015	yɛɛ raalɛ fa ye ɛdeɛ ne bɔ abɔfo; ɔluakɛ bɛva enrinli ndendenle bɛmaa ye kɛ ɔva ɔheda ɔ ti zo.
46011016	Saa awie kulo kɛ ɔsu ɛhye anwo kpolera a, mɔɔ melɛ ye meka la a le kɛ yɛmɛ anzɛɛ Nyamenle asɔnema ne mɔ, yɛnlɛ amaamuo fofolɛ bieko wɔ ɛzonlenlɛ nu kɛ ɛhye ala.
46011017	Ɛhye mɔɔ melɛka la ɛnle bɛ ɛhanvolɛ, ɔluakɛ bɛ ɛzonlenlɛ nyianu ne mɔ ɛnwie kɛnlɛma yɛ.
46011018	Mɔɔ lumua, mede kɛ bɛyia nu a ɛnee bɛ avinli ɛkpakyekpakye. Na ɔyɛ medame noko kɛ ɛhye foa ko bie le nɔhalɛ.
46011019	(Kɛ ɔkɛyɛ biala la ɔwɔ kɛ mgbakyemgbakye ba bɛ nu, amaa bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛgyi pi la anwo ala ali kpalɛ.)
46011020	Saa bɛyia a, tɛ Awulae Aleɛ ne a bɛdi la,
46011021	ɔluakɛ saa bɛlɛdi a, bɛ nuhua biala di ye aleɛ mɔɔ ɔ nee ye kɛhɔ la, amaa ɔlua zo, mɔɔ ɛhɔne ɛlɛku bie mɔ la ɛnee bie mɔɔ ɛbo.
46011022	Duzu ati ɔ? Bɛnlɛ bɛ azua nu mɔɔ bɛdi na bɛno ɔ? Anzɛɛ bɛmbu Nyamenle menli ne bie na bɛkulo kɛ bɛgua ehyianvolɛma mɔɔ wɔ bɛ avinli la anyunlu aze ɔ? Duzu edwɛkɛ a menga mengile bɛ wɔ ɛhye anwo a? Menganvo bɛ ɔ? Kyɛkyɛ! Meyɛ ye zɔhane a ɔnrɛyɛ boɛ!
46011023	Ngilehilelɛ ne mɔɔ menyianle ye menvile Awulae lɔ la a menvale memanle bɛ a, yemɔ a le kɛ, nɔe ne mɔɔ bɛyele Awulae Gyisɛse bɛmanle la, ɔvale kpanwo,
46011024	ɔyɛle Nyamenle mo, ɔbule nu, na ɔzele kɛ, “Ɛhye a le me nwonane ne mɔɔ bɛva bɛmaa bɛ la. Bɛyɛ ɛhye bɛva bɛhakye me.”
46011025	Zɔhane ala yɛɛ mɔɔ bɛwiele aleɛ ne di la, ɔvale dwora ne, na ɔzele kɛ, “Dwora ɛhye a le Nyamenle Ngyekyeleɛ Fofolɛ ne mɔɔ bɛva me mogya ne bɛhye ɔ bo la. Kenle biala mɔɔ bɛlɛno nu la, bɛyɛ ye zɔhane bɛva bɛhakye me.”
46011026	Ɔluakɛ kenle biala mɔɔ bɛlɛdi kpanwo ɛhye, na bɛlɛno dwora ye anu la, bɛyɛ ye zɔhane bɛfa bɛbɔ Awulae ewule ne nolo kɔkpula mekɛ mɔɔ ɔkɛra bieko la.
46011027	Zɔhane ati awie biala mɔɔ kɛli Awulae kpanwo ne anzɛɛ kɛnlo ye dwora ne anu wɔ adenle mɔɔ ɛnfɛta la anu la kɛli Awulae nwonane ne nee ye mogya ne anwo fɔlɛ.
46011028	Yemɔti ɔwɔ kɛ awie biala dumua neɛnlea ye ahonle nu kpalɛ na yeali kpanwo ne, yeanlo dwora ne anu.
46011029	Ɔluakɛ saa awie ambu Awulae nwonane ne bie wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ ɔlɛdi kpanwo ne, na ɔlɛno dwora ne anu la a, ɔtwehwe ndeanlɛ ɔmaa ɔ nwo.
46011030	Ɛhye ati yɛɛ bɛ nuhua dɔɔnwo anwo ɛyɛ bɛ bɛtɛɛ, bɛ nwo ɛtoto bɛ, na bie mɔ ɛwu la.
46011031	Na saa yɛdumua yɛneɛnlea yɛ ahonle nu kpalɛ a Nyamenle ɛnrɛdea yɛ.
46011032	Na Awulae tea yɛ, ɔtwe yɛ nzo amaa bɛanva yɛ bɛamboka ewiade amra anwo bɛambua yɛ ewule fɔlɛ.
46011033	Zɔhane ati, me mediema, saa bɛyia nuhua kɛ bɛdi Awulae aleɛ ne a, anrɛɛ bɛhendɛ bɛ nwo.
46011034	Saa ɛhɔne ɛlɛku bie a, ɔlumua ɔli debie wɔ sua nu, amaa bɛbayia nu a Nyamenle andea bɛ. Mɔɔ fane edwɛkɛ ne mɔ mɔɔ ɛha la anwo, meba a mebaha nwolɛ bie.
46012001	Me mediema, mekpondɛ kɛ bɛnwu nɔhalɛ ne mɔɔ fane Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne ahyɛlɛdeɛ ne mɔ mɔɔ bɛhɛlɛle me nwolɛ la anwo.
46012002	Bɛze kɛ mekɛ mɔɔ ɛnee bɛnze Nyamenle la, awie mɔ vale adenle bie azo manle bɛzɔle mmonle mɔɔ ɛndendɛ la.
46012003	Zɔhane ati ɔwɔ kɛ bɛnwu ye wienyi kɛ awie biala mɔɔ Nyamenle Sunsum ne wɔ ye nu la ɛngola ɛnga kɛ “Munzule ɛha Gyisɛse!” Yɛɛ awie biala noko ɛngola ɛnga kɛ “Gyisɛse le Awulae”, kyesɛ Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne de ye nu.
46012004	Sunsum nu ahyɛlɛdeɛ ne mɔ le ngakyile dɔɔnwo, noko Nyamenle Sunsum ko ne ala a fa maa a.
46012005	Ɛzonlenlɛ ndenle ngakyile dɔɔnwo wɔ ɛkɛ, noko yɛsonle Awulae kokye ne ala.
46012006	Anwosesebɛ mɔɔ bɛfa bɛyɛ gyima ngakyile dɔɔnwo la wɔ ɛkɛ, noko Nyamenle ko ne ala a maa awie biala anwosesebɛ maa ɔfa ɔsonle a.
46012007	Nyamenle Sunsum ne da ɔ nwo ali wɔ adenle bie anu wɔ yɛ nuhua ko biala nu wɔ yɛ muala yɛ kpalɛ ti.
46012008	Nyamenle Sunsum ne maa bie ka nrɛlɛbɛ edwɛkɛ, yɛɛ ɔmaa bie adwenle nu buke.
46012009	Nyamenle Sunsum ko ne ala maa bie diedi nyi yɛɛ ɔmaa bie tumi ɔfa ɔyɛ ayile.
46012010	Nyamenle Sunsum ne maa bie tumi maa ɔyɛ nwanwane ninyɛne yɛɛ ɔmaa bie ahyɛlɛdeɛ mɔɔ ɔfa ɔbɔ Nyamenle edwɛkɛ ne nolo a; ɔmaa bie ɛnyelɛ mɔɔ ɔkola ɔfa ɔnwu ahyɛlɛdeɛ ne mɔ mɔɔ vi Nyamenle Sunsum ne ɛkɛ ne nee mɔɔ ɛnvi ye ɛkɛ ne la. Nyamenle Sunsum ne maa bie tendɛ aneɛ ngakyile, yɛɛ ɔmaa bie noko tumi mɔɔ ɔkola ɔkile mɔɔ bɛka la abo.
46012011	Nyamenle Sunsum ko ne ala a yɛ ɛhye mɔ amuala a; Sunsum ko ne ala a maa awie biala ahyɛlɛdeɛ, kɛmɔ ɔdaye (Sunsum ne) ɔkulo la a.
46012012	Kɛmɔ sonlabaka ne le ko na ye nvɛyeba ne mɔ zonle, na biala le ngakyile la, zɔhane ala yɛɛ Kelaese de a.
46012013	Zɔhane ala yɛɛ bɛlua Nyamenle Sunsum ne azo bɛzɔne yɛ muala, bɛyɛ yɛ sonlabaka ko, na bɛmaa yɛ muala, Dwuuma nee bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnle Dwuuma, ahanra nee alehelɛ, Nyamenle Sunsum ko ne ala a.
46012014	Sonlabaka ne nvɛyeba ne mɔ zonle. Ɔnle kokye.
46012015	Na saa egyakɛ ka kɛ, “Menle ɛsalɛ, yemɔti memboka sonlabaka ne anwo” a, ɛnee ɛhye ɛngile kɛ amgba ɔmboka sonlabaka ne anwo,
46012016	yɛɛ saa ɛnzolɛ ka kɛ, “Menle ɛnyelɛ, yemɔti memboka sonlabaka ne anwo” a, ɛnee ɛhye ɛngile kɛ amgba ɔmboka sonlabaka ne anwo.
46012017	Saa sonlabaka ne kpokpoti le ɛnyelɛ a, kɛ ɔkɛyɛ na yeade edwɛkɛ ɛ? Saa sonlabaka ne kpokpoti le ɛnzolɛ a, kɛ ɔkɛyɛ na yeade nvoanle ɛ?
46012018	Na kɛ ɔde la a le kɛ Nyamenle hulole yɛɛ ɔvale nvɛyeba ngakyile dɔɔnwo ɔbɔle sonla a.
46012019	Saa bɛ muala bɛle debie ko ala a, anrɛɛ bɛnvɛlɛ ye sonlabaka.
46012020	Na kɛ ɔde la a le kɛ sonlabaka ne lɛ nvɛyeba dɔɔnwo, noko ɔle sonlabaka kokye.
46012021	Ɛhye ati, ɛnyelɛ ɛngola ɛnga ɛngile ɛsalɛ kɛ, “Ɛ nwo ɛngyia me!” Anzɛɛ etile ɛngola ɛnga ɛngile egyakɛ kɛ, “Ɛ nwo ɛngyia me!”
46012022	Nɔhalɛ, saa yɛye sonlabaka nvɛyeba bɛtɛbɛtɛ ne mɔ nu a, yɛngola debie biala yɛ;
46012023	yɛɛ sonlabaka ne ɛleka mɔɔ yɛdwenle kɛ bɛ nwo ɛngyia biala la yɛɛ yɛnea bɛ boɛ kpalɛ a; nuhua ne mɔɔ ɛnle ngɛnlɛma la yɛɛ yɛdɛ alagye yɛyɛ bɛ kpalɛ a.
46012024	Ɔluakɛ nvɛyeba ngɛnlɛma ne mɔ ɛngyia kɛ bɛkɛziezie bɛ dɔɔnwo. Nyamenle ɔdaye a ɔvale nvɛyeba ne mɔ ɔbɔle nu ɔyɛle sonlabaka ne a, amaa bɛali mɔɔ anwo ɛngyia la eni kpalɛ.
46012025	Zɔhane ati mgbakyemgbakye biala ɛnle sonlabaka ne anu, yɛɛ nvɛyeba ngakyile ne mɔ amuala dwenle maa bɛ nwo ngoko ngoko.
46012026	Saa sonlabaka ne nvɛyeba ko nwu nyane a, ɔka mɔɔ ɛha la amuala; yɛɛ saa bɛye ko ayɛlɛ a, mɔɔ ɛha la amuala nee ye di fɛlɛko.
46012027	Kelaese sonlabaka ne a le bɛ muala, yɛɛ bɛ nuhua ko biala le ye nvɛyeba ne mɔ bie.
46012028	Nyamenle ɛhile awie biala gyinlabelɛ wɔ asɔne ne anu; mɔɔ lumua la a le ɛzoanvolɛma, mɔɔ tɔ zolɛ nwiɔ la a le Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛma, yɛɛ mɔɔ tɔ zolɛ nsa la a le kilehilevolɛma; akee bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛyɛ nwanwane ninyɛne, mɔɔ doa bɛ la a le bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛmaa bɛ tumi kɛ bɛyɛ ayile la; yɛɛ akee boavolɛma, amaamuoma, yɛɛ bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛtendɛ aneɛ ngakyile la.
46012029	Bɛ muala bɛnle ɛzoanvolɛma, anzɛɛ Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛma, anzɛɛ kilehilevolɛma. Bɛ muala bɛnlɛ tumi mɔɔ bɛfa bɛyɛ nwanwane ninyɛne a,
46012030	anzɛɛ bɛfa bɛyɛ ayile, anzɛɛ bɛfa bɛka aneɛ ngakyile, anzɛɛ bɛfa bɛkile aneɛ ngakyile ne mɔ mɔɔ bɛka la abo a.
46012031	Zɔhane ati bɛmaa bɛ nye ɛbolo bɛkpondɛ ahyɛlɛdeɛ kpalɛ ne mɔ mɔɔ sonle bolɛ na bɛ nwo hyia kpalɛ la. Akee bɛmaa mengile bɛ adenle kpalɛ kpalɛ ne mɔɔ hyia la.
46013001	Saa mekola menli nee anwuma soanvolɛma aneɛ ngakyile ne mɔ ka, na menlɛ ɛhulolɛ a, me ɛdendɛlɛ le kɛ ɛlawule anzɛɛ awa mɔɔ ɛlɛyɛ alɛra la.
46013002	Saa melɛ ahyɛlɛdeɛ mɔɔ mefa metendɛ Nyamenle anloa azo, na saa mebe nwoma nu kpole, mete fealeranu edwɛkɛ muala abo, na melɛ diedi mɔɔ maa mekola metudu awoka, na menlɛ ɛhulolɛ a, menzɔho sonla.
46013003	Saa mefa me nwo ninyɛne muala mekyɛ ehyianvolɛma na mefa me sonlabaka ye memaa kɛ bɛyela ye, na menlɛ ɛhulolɛ a, nvasoɛ biala ɛnle zolɛ.
46013004	Ɛhulolɛ lɛ abotane, ɔ ti akunlu le kɛnlɛma; ɛhulolɛ ɛnle anyebolo, ɔmbu ɔ nwo, yɛɛ ɔmmemaa ɔ nwo zo;
46013005	ɛhulolɛ ɛnyɛ ninyɛne mgbane mgbane, yɛɛ ɔndendɛ ɛtane ɔntia awie; ɔnle angomedi, ɔnva ɛya yɛɛ ɔmbu ɛtane nwo mgbonda;
46013006	ɛhulolɛ anye ɛnlie ninyɛndane nwo, ɔdi fɛlɛko wɔ mɔɔ le nɔhalɛ la anwo.
46013007	Ɛhulolɛ ɛmkpo aze ɛlɛ; ɔlɛ diedi wɔ debie biala anu, ɔlɛ debie biala anwo anyelazo yɛɛ ye abotane bo ɛndu ɛlɛ.
46013008	Ɛhulolɛ ɛmbɔ aze ɛlɛ. Nyamenle anloa azo ɛdendɛlɛ ɛdeɛ, ɔbakpa nwo. Ahyɛlɛdeɛ mɔɔ bɛfa bɛtendɛ aneɛ ngakyile ne mɔ la bazi aze, yɛɛ nwoma ɛnwunlɛ mgbole bapɛ nu aze.
46013009	Ɔluakɛ yɛ nwoma mɔɔ yɛze nee yɛ Nyamenle anloa azo ɛdendɛlɛ le afoa afoa.
46013010	Na saa nuhua ne mɔɔ di munli la ba a, ɔbaminliminli ninyɛne mɔɔ le afoa afoa la abo zo.
46013011	Mekɛ mɔɔ mele kakula la, mendendɛle kɛ kakula, mendwenlenle kɛ kakula, yɛɛ menzuzule edwɛkɛ nwo kɛ kakula. Kɛkala mɔɔ meyɛ kpanyinli la, megyakyi ngakula ninyɛne ne mɔ ɛyɛlɛ.
46013012	Kɛkala, mɔɔ yɛnwu ye la le kɛ nvoninli monzomonzo bie wɔ neanleɛ nu, na kenle bie yɛ nye bayia zo. Kɛkala, mɔɔ meze la ɛnli munli, na kenle bie ɔbali munli, kɛmɔ Nyamenle si ze me la.
46013013	Yemɔti, ninyɛne nsa ɛhye mɔ a wɔ ɛkɛ ne mɔɔ ɛmpɛ nu ɛnze yɛɛ ɛmkpa ɛlɛ a, bɛmɛ a le: diedi, anyelazo, yɛɛ ɛhulolɛ, na bɛ nuhua kpole kpalɛ mɔɔ sonle bolɛ la a le ɛhulolɛ.
46014001	Bɛkpondɛ ɛhulolɛ bo zo na bɛmaa bɛ nye ɛbolo bɛkpondɛ sunsum nu ahyɛlɛdeɛ ne mɔ, titile, Nyamenle edwɛkɛ ne nolobɔlɛ.
46014002	Awie mɔɔ ka aneɛ ngakyile la ɛndendɛ ɛngile menli; ɔtendɛ ɔkile Nyamenle, ɔluakɛ awie biala ɛnde mɔɔ ɔka la abo. Mɔɔ ɔyɛ la a le kɛ ɔdua Nyamenle Sunsum ne tumi zo ɔka fealeranu ninyɛne ne mɔ anwo edwɛkɛ.
46014003	Na mɔɔ bɔ Nyamenle edwɛkɛ ne nolo la tendɛ kile menli, ɔboa bɛ, ɔmaa bɛ akɛnrazilɛ na ɔkyekye bɛ rɛle.
46014004	Mɔɔ ka aneɛ ngakyile la boa ɔ ngomekye ɔ nwo na mɔɔ bɔ Nyamenle edwɛkɛ ne nolo la boa asɔnema amuala.
46014005	Mekulo kɛ anrɛɛ bɛ muala bɛkɛha aneɛ ngakyile ne mɔ bie, noko me kunlu a anrɛɛ eza bɛ muala bɛkola bɛbɔ Nyamenle edwɛkɛ ne nolo kpalɛ. Ɔluakɛ sonla mɔɔ bɔ Nyamenle edwɛkɛ ne nolo la anwo hyia kpalɛ tɛla sonla mɔɔ ka aneɛ ngakyile la, kyesɛ awie wɔ ɛkɛ ne mɔɔ kola kile mɔɔ ɔka la abo a, amaa yeayɛ moalɛ yeamaa asɔnema amuala.
46014006	Mediema, saa meba bɛ nwo lɔ na mebaka aneɛ ngakyile mekile bɛ a, duzu nvasoɛ a bɛkɛnyia ye bɛkɛvi me ɛkɛ ne a? Bɛnrɛnyia ɛhwee, kyesɛ melɛ yekile bie vi Nyamenle ɛkɛ anzɛɛ deɛnwunlɛ bie anzɛɛ nrɛlaleɛ bie vi Nyamenle lɔ, anzɛɛ ngilehilelɛ bie mebɛlɛ bɛ.
46014007	Saa bɛlɛbɔ ninyɛne bɔbɔ mɔɔ ɛnlɛ ngoane wɔ bɛ nu, mɔɔ le kɛ fulutu anzɛɛ getaa la na ɛnelɛ ne mɔ ɛnvinde kpalɛ a, kɛ ɔkɛyɛ na bɛanwu edwɛne holɛ ko mɔɔ bɛlɛbɔ la ɛ?
46014008	Saa bɛbɔ mangɛta na ɔ ne anvɛlɛ boɛ a, nwane a kɛboɔboa ɔ nwo kɛ ɔkɔ konle a?
46014009	Zɔhane ala yɛɛ bɛdabɛ noko bɛ ɛdeɛ ne de a. Saa bɛ bie ka aneɛ ngakyile mɔɔ awie ɛnde ɔ bo la a, kɛ ɔkɛyɛ na awie anwu mɔɔ bɛha la ɛ? Ɔba ye zɛhae a ɛnee ɔle kɛ bɛlɛtendɛ bɛahile anwoma la.
46014010	Aneɛ ngakyile dɔɔnwo wɔ ewiade ye anu, noko nuhua ko biala lɛ ndelebɛbo.
46014011	Na saa mende aneɛ ne a, ɛnee ahenle mɔɔ ɛlɛka la le me nye zo ɛyɛvolɛ, yɛɛ medame noko mele ɔ nye zo ɛyɛvolɛ.
46014012	Zɔhane ala yɛɛ kɛmɔ bɛ nye ɛbolo kɛ bɛkɛnyia Nyamenle Sunsum nu ahyɛlɛdeɛ ne mɔ bɛkɛdɛla debie biala la, bɛbɔ mɔdenle na bɛnyia ahyɛlɛdeɛ ne mɔ mɔɔ boa maa asɔne ne kɔ ɔ nyunlu la.
46014013	Zɔhane ati, awie mɔɔ ka aneɛ ngakyile la ɛzɛlɛ kɛ ɔkɛnyia ahyɛlɛdeɛ ne mɔɔ bɛfa bɛkile mɔɔ ɔka la abo la.
46014014	Ɔluakɛ saa mesɛlɛ adenle zɛhae anu a, ɛnee me sunsum amgba ɛlɛsɛlɛ, noko me adwenle ɛnle nu.
46014015	Ɛnee duzu a ɔwɔ kɛ meyɛ a? Mebava me sunsum meazɛlɛ, yɛɛ mebava me adwenle noko meazɛlɛ; mebava me sunsum meado ayɛlɛyelɛ edwɛne, yɛɛ mebava me adwenle noko meado ayɛlɛyelɛ edwɛne.
46014016	Na saa bɛyɛ Nyamenle mo wɔ sunsum nu ala a, ɛnee kɛ ɔkɛyɛ na awie gyɛne mɔɔ wɔ nyianu ne anu la alie bɛ moyɛlɛ nzɛlɛlɛ ne azo “Amen” ɛ? Ɔngola ɔnyɛ ye zɔhane, ɔluakɛ ɔnde mɔɔ bɛlɛka la abo.
46014017	Bɛ moyɛlɛ nzɛlɛlɛ ne le kpalɛ bɔbɔ ɛdeɛ, noko sonla zɔhane ɛnnyia moalɛ biala wɔ nwolɛ.
46014018	Meyɛ Nyamenle mo kɛ meka aneɛ ngakyile metɛla bɛ nuhua biala a.
46014019	Noko akee saa yɛyia nuhua kɛ yɛsonle a, menwɔhulo kɛ menwɔha edwɛkɛ agbɔkɛ nnu mɔɔ menli te ɔ bo la, amaa meava meahilehile awie mɔ, tɛla kɛ menwɔha edwɛkɛ agbɔkɛ apenle ngoko bulu wɔ aneɛ ngakyile nu mɔɔ awie ɛnrɛde ɔ bo la.
46014020	Mediema, bɛmmadwenle ngakula adwenle. Bɛyɛ bɛ nwo kɛ mbɔdɔma mɔɔ ɛnze ɛtaneyɛlɛ deɛ holɛ la, na bɛva mgbanyinli adwenle.
46014021	Bɛhɛlɛ ye wɔ Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne anu kɛ, “Awulae se, Mebalua menli bie mɔɔ ka aneɛ ngakyile nee nyɛvolɛ anloa ɛdendɛlɛ zo meadendɛ meahile menli ɛhye mɔ; noko bɛnrɛdie me edwɛkɛ bɔbɔ.”
46014022	Ɛhye ati, aneɛ ngakyile ɛhanlɛ ahyɛlɛdeɛ ne ɛnle sɛkɛlɛneɛ ɛmmaa diedima. Ɔle sɛkɛlɛneɛ ɔmaa bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnlie bɛnli la, yɛɛ Nyamenle edwɛkɛ ne nolobɔlɛ ahyɛlɛdeɛ ne le sɛkɛlɛneɛ maa diedima. Ɔnle sɛkɛlɛneɛ ɔmmaa bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnlie bɛnli la.
46014023	Yemɔti, saa asɔnema kɔsɔɔti yia nu na awie biala bɔ ɔ bo kɛ ɔka aneɛ ngakyile, na saa menli mɔɔ ɛnze Nyamenle anzɛɛ bɛnlie bɛnli la bie mɔ ba ayia ne abo a, asoo bɛnrɛha kɛ bɛ muala bɛbɔ ɛlane ɔ?
46014024	Na saa bɛ muala bɛbɔ Nyamenle edwɛkɛ ne nolo na awie mɔɔ ɛnlie ɛnli, anzɛɛ ɛnze Nyamenle la ba ayia ne bie a, edwɛkɛ mɔɔ ɔkɛde la kɛmaa ɔkɛnwu ye ɛtane, yɛɛ mɔɔ ɔbade la babua ye ndɛne
46014025	aye ɔ ti anu edwɛkɛ ahile ye, na yeamaa yeabɔ ɔ ti aze yeazonle Nyamenle, na yeaha yeado gua kɛ, “Amgba Nyamenle nee bɛ de!”
46014026	Me mediema, mɔɔ mekpondɛ meaha la a le kɛ, saa bɛyia nu kɛ bɛsɛlɛ a, mɔɔ lɛ edwɛne la ɛdo, mɔɔ lɛ ngilehilelɛ la ɛhilehile, mɔɔ Nyamenle ɛye debie ɛhile ye la ɛla ye ali, mɔɔ lɛ Nyamenle nrɛlaleɛ wɔ aneɛ ngakyile nu la ɛha, na mɔɔ lɛ ahyɛlɛdeɛ fa kile aneɛ ngakyile bo la ɛhile edwɛkɛ ne mɔɔ bɛha la abo. Bɛyɛ ɛhye mɔ amuala bɛva bɛboa asɔne ne anyunluhɔlɛ.
46014027	Mekɛ mɔɔ bɛkɛyia nu la saa awie mɔ baha aneɛ ngakyile a, bɛmaa menli nwiɔ anzɛɛ yebo zolɛ la, menli nsa ɛdendɛ. Bɛha ye ngoko ngoko, na sonla ko ɛhile mɔɔ bɛlɛka la abo.
46014028	Na saa awie ɛnle asɔne ne anu mɔɔ kɛhola kɛhile mɔɔ bɛlɛka la abo a ɛnee ahenle mɔɔ ka aneɛ ngakyile ne la ɛyɛ koonwu na ɔdendɛ ɔhile ɔ nwo nee Nyamenle.
46014029	Bɛmaa bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛlɛ Nyamenle nrɛlaleɛ la anu nwiɔ anzɛɛ nsa ɛdendɛ, na mɔɔ ɛha la ɛdie ɛvedevede mɔɔ bɛha la anu.
46014030	Saa awie mɔɔ wɔ ayia ne anu la kulo kɛ ɔda mɔɔ Nyamenle ɛye ɛhile ye la ali a, bɛmaa ahenle mɔɔ gyi gua nu ɛlɛtendɛ la ɛmua ɔ nloa.
46014031	Ɔluakɛ bɛ muala bɛlɛ adenle bɛtendɛ bɛbɔ Nyamenle edwɛkɛ ne nolo ngoko ngoko, amaa bɛ muala bɛazukoa na bɛ nwo ayɛ se.
46014032	Mɔɔ ka Nyamenle nrɛlaleɛ la ɛzɔ ɔ nwo,
46014033	ɔluakɛ Nyamenle ɛnle basabasa Nyamenle. Ɔle anzonudwolɛ Nyamenle. Kɛmɔ bɛyɛ ye wɔ Nyamenle asɔnema ne mɔ amuala anu la,
46014034	mraalɛ ɛmua bɛ nloa wɔ asɔne nyianu ne mɔ anu. Bɛnlɛ adenle kɛ bɛkɛdendɛ, kɛmɔ Dwuuma mɛla ne se la, ɔwɔ kɛ bɛboa mrenya ne mɔ abo.
46014035	Saa edwɛkɛ bie a, bɛbiza bɛ hu mɔ wɔ sua nu, ɔluakɛ ɔyɛ anyiemgba bɔbɔ kɛ raalɛ kɛdendɛ asɔne sua nu a.
46014036	Na duzu ati ɔ? Bɛ nuhua yɛɛ Nyamenle edwɛkɛ ne vi rale ɔ? Anzɛɛ bɛ ngome yɛɛ Nyamenle edwɛkɛ ɛra bɛ ɛkɛ a?
46014037	Saa bɛ nuhua bie bu ɔ nwo kɛ ɔle Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛ, anzɛɛ ɔlɛ sunsum nu ahyɛlɛdeɛ a ɛnee ɔlie ɔdo nu kɛ mɔɔ melɛkɛlɛ la vi Awulae ɛkɛ.
46014038	Na saa ɔnlie ɔndo nu a, bɛdabɛ noko bɛmmadie ye bɛto nu.
46014039	Zɔhane ati, me mediema, bɛmaa bɛ nye ɛbolo kɛ bɛkɛbɔ Nyamenle edwɛkɛ ne nolo, yɛɛ bɛmmatua aneɛ ngakyile ɛhanlɛ.
46014040	Bɛlua ndenle kpalɛ nee ngɛnlɛma zo bɛyɛ debie biala pɛpɛ.
46015001	Mediema, akee metwe bɛ adwenle meara Edwɛkpa ne mɔɔ membɔle ye nolo mengilele bɛ a bɛliele bɛdole nu na bɛ diedi gyi zo la azo.
46015002	Saa bɛsɔ nu ɛsesebɛ a bɛkɛnyia ngoane mɔɔ ɛnlɛ awieleɛ; kyesɛ bɛanlie bɛanli.
46015003	Edwɛkɛ ne mɔɔ menvale membɛlɛle bɛ la le edwɛkɛ mɔɔ hyia kpalɛ. Yɛ ɛtane ti yɛɛ Kelaese wule a, kɛmɔ Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne kile la.
46015004	Bɛziele ye na ye kenle nsa ne azo, Nyamenle dwazole ye rale ngoane nu, kɛmɔ Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne se la.
46015005	Ɔyele ɔ nwo ɔhilele Pita, na nzinlii ɔyele ɔ nwo ɔhilele ɛzoanvolɛma bulu nee nwiɔ ne.
46015006	Eza kenle ko bie ɔyele ɔ nwo ɔhilele ye ɛdoavolɛma mɔɔ bo ɛya nnu mɔɔ bɛ nuhua dɔɔnwo ne ala tɛte aze la, bie mɔ ɛwu bɔbɔ ɛdeɛ.
46015007	Akee ɔyele ɔ nwo ɔhilele Gyemise yɛɛ ɛzoanvolɛma ne mɔ amuala.
46015008	Awieleɛ ne, ɔyele ɔ nwo ɔhilele medame noko, medame zɛhae ala, mɔɔ mele kɛ kyɛkyɛ ralɛ la.
46015009	Ɔluakɛ medame a mele ɛzoanvolɛma ne mɔ anu ekyi kpalɛ kpalɛ, mɔɔ menfɛta kɛ bɛkɛvɛlɛ me ɛzoanvolɛ a, ɔboalekɛ menyɛle Nyamenle menli ne kpɔdekpɔde.
46015010	Noko ɔlua Nyamenle ɛlolɛ ne ati, merayɛ kɛmɔ mede la. Ye ɛlolɛ ne mɔɔ ɔvale ɔlole me la anyɛ gyɛne, ɔluakɛ meyɛ gyima kpalɛ medɛla ɛzoanvolɛma mɔɔ ɛha la amuala, noko tɛ medame me mɔdenlebɔ ɔ, Nyamenle ɛlolɛ ne mɔɔ wɔ me nwo zo la ɔ.
46015011	Ɛhye ati, saa mame o anzɛɛ bɛmɛ o, edwɛkɛ ko ne ala a yɛ muala yɛbɔ ye nolo a, yɛɛ yemɔ noko ala a bɛlie bɛli la.
46015012	Saa kɛkala yɛ nolobɔlɛ a le kɛ Nyamenle ɛdwazo Kelaese ɛvi ewule nu a, ɛnee kɛ ɔsi mɔɔ bɛ bie mɔ kola ka kɛ bɛnrɛdwazo mɔwuamra bɛnrɛra ngoane nu ɛ?
46015013	Na saa ɔle zɔhane kɛ ewudwazo ɛnle ɛkɛ ne a, ɛnee Nyamenle ɛtɛdwazole Kelaese;
46015014	yɛɛ saa Nyamenle ɛtɛdwazole Kelaese ɛtɛfile ewule nu a, ɛnee yɛ nolobɔlɛ ne le mgbane, yɛɛ bɛdabɛ noko bɛ diedi ne le mgbane.
46015015	Yeanga ye zɔ, saa ɔnle nɔhalɛ kɛ bɛdwazo mɔwuamra bɛba ngoane nu a, ɛnee yɛdo Nyamenle ɛzonle, ɔluakɛ yɛli daselɛ kɛ Nyamenle ɛdwazo Kelaese ɛvi ewule nu, wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ yeanyɛ ye zɔhane la.
46015016	Ɔluakɛ saa Nyamenle ɛndwazo mɔwuamra a, ɛnee ɔtɛdwazole Kelaese.
46015017	Na saa Nyamenle ɛtɛdwazole Kelaese a, ɛnee bɛ diedi ne le mgbane na bɛtɛte bɛ ɛtane ne mɔ anu;
46015018	yɛɛ bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛdie Kelaese bɛdi na bɛwu la ɛminli.
46015019	Saa ngoane ɛhye anu ala yɛɛ yɛlɛ anyelazo wɔ Kelaese anu a, ɛnee noko yɛyɛ anwunvɔne kpole kpalɛ yɛtɛla menli kɔsɔɔti.
46015020	Na nɔhalɛ ne a le kɛ Nyamenle ɛdwazo Kelaese ɛvi ewule nu, na ɛhye maa yɛsi pi kɛ Nyamenle badwazo bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛwu la amuala.
46015021	Ɔluakɛ kɛmɔ ewule luale sonla ko anwo zo a rale la, zɔhane ala yɛɛ ewudwazo ne lua sonla ko anwo zo ɛra a.
46015022	Kɛmɔ menli kɔsɔɔti dua Adam anwo zo wu la, zɔhane ala yɛɛ Nyamenle balua Kelaese anwo zo adwazo bɛ muala ara ngoane nu a.
46015023	Bɛdwazo awie biala wɔ ye mekɛ nloa: Kelaese a lumua a, na akee saa ɔdwu ye ɛralɛ bieko a bɛadwazo bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛle Kelaese ɛdeɛ la.
46015024	Akee awieleɛ mekɛ ne bara na Kelaese bali mgbolema, tumivolɛma nee arelemgbunli kɔsɔɔti anwo zo konim, na yeava Belemgbunlililɛ ne yeawula Nyamenle Selɛ ne asa anu.
46015025	Ɔluakɛ ɔwɔ kɛ Kelaese di belemgbunli kɔkpula kɛ Nyamenle kɛli ye agbɔvolɛ amuala anwo zo konim na ɔkɛva bɛ ɔkɛwula ɔ gyakɛ abo la.
46015026	Kpɔvolɛ mɔɔ li amozi mɔɔ bɛbazɛkye ye la a le ewule.
46015027	Ɔluakɛ Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne se, “Nyamenle ɛva ninyɛne kɔsɔɔti ɛwula ɔ gyakɛ abo.” Ɔle nɔhalɛ wienyi kɛ saa bɛka kɛ “bɛva ninyɛne kɔsɔɔti bɛwula ɔ gyakɛ abo” a, ɛnee ɔngile kɛ Nyamenle mɔɔ yemɔ a ɛva ninyɛne kɔsɔɔti ɛwula Kelaese agyakɛ abo la noko boka nwolɛ.
46015028	Saa bɛfa ninyɛne kɔsɔɔti bɛwula Kelaese belemgbunlililɛ ne abo a, akee ɔdaye Ralɛ mumua ne, ɔbava ɔ nwo yeawula Nyamenle mɔɔ vale ninyɛne kɔsɔɔti wulale ɔ bo la abo, amaa Nyamenle ali ninyɛne kɔsɔɔti azo belemgbunli.
46015029	Saa mɔɔ bɛka la le nɔhalɛ, kɛ bɛndwazo mɔwuamra bɛmba ngoane nu a, ɛnee bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛgyinla mɔwuamra agyakɛ anu bɛmaa bɛzɔne bɛ la, duzu a bɛ nye la zolɛ a?
46015030	Saa bɛndwazo mɔwuamra a, ɛnee duzu ati a menwɔva me ngoane menwɔdo nzeleba dɔnehwele biala ɛ?
46015031	Meka ko ɛhye, mediema! Yɛ Awulae Gyisɛse Kelaese ati, ewule sianle me dahuu wɔ me nwo mɔɔ metu ye wɔ bɛ nwo la anwo.
46015032	Saa mele sonla ala, mɔɔ menlɛ anyelazo biala wɔ ewule nzi, yɛɛ me nee “ɛhoayelɛ nu nanemgbole” honle wɔ Ɛfɛsɛse a, ɛnee duzu nvasoɛ a menyia ye a? Saa Nyamenle ɛndwazo mɔwuamra ɛmba ngoane nu a, ɛnee kɛmɔ ɔyɛ a bie mɔ ka la, “Bɛmaa yɛli na yɛnlo, ɔluakɛ ɛhyema ɛnee yɛwu.”
46015033	Bɛmmamaa bɛbɛlɛbɛla bɛ, “Agɔnwolɛ ɛtane sɛkye ɛbɛla kpalɛ.”
46015034	Bɛzia bɛ nzi bɛva adwenle kpalɛ na bɛgyakyi ɛtaneyɛlɛ. Ɔyɛ anyiemgba bɔbɔ kɛ menwɔha kɛ bɛ bie mɔ ɛnze Nyamenle a.
46015035	Awie babiza kɛ, “Kɛ Nyamenle si dwazo mɔwuamra ba ngoane nu ɛ? Na duzu nwonane a bɛbava bɛadwazo a?”
46015036	Kɔnwɔne! Ɛdua ma na ɔtɛkpɔlɔle a ɔnfifi.
46015037	Ma ne mɔɔ ɛkɛlua la, tɛ yemɔ a le baka mumua ne mɔɔ bafifi la. Ɔle ma ala, bie a ɛnee abɛlɛ ma anzɛɛ atoko ma anzɛɛ baka gyɛne bie ma ɔ.
46015038	Nyamenle a maa ma ne baka holɛ ko mɔɔ ɔkulo la a; ɔmaa ma ko biala ati anwo baka kpalɛ.
46015039	Nwonane kɔsɔɔti ɛnle ko. Asolo sonla nwonane, asolo nane nwonane, asolo nloma nwonane, yɛɛ asolo fɛlɛ nwonane.
46015040	Anwomanyunlu abɔdeɛ wɔ ɛkɛ yɛɛ azɛlɛ ye azo abɔdeɛ wɔ ɛkɛ. Asolo anwomanyunlu abɔdeɛ ne mɔ ngɛnlɛma yɛɛ asolo azɛlɛ ye azo abɔdeɛ ne mɔ ngɛnlɛma.
46015041	Asolo sɛnzɛne ne kɛnlɛma, asolo siane ne kɛnlɛma, yɛɛ asolo nwɔlɔra noko ngɛnlɛma; eza asolo ɛwɔlɔra ko biala bɔbɔ nee ye kɛnlɛma.
46015042	Saa bɛdwazo mɔwuamra bɛba ngoane nu a kɛ ɔbayɛ la ɛne. Mɔɔ bɛlua la kpɔlɔ, mɔɔ Nyamenle dwazo ye ba ngoane nu la ɛmkpɔlɔ.
46015043	Bɛdua ye anyiemgba nu; Nyamenle dwazo ye anyunlunyia nu. Bɛdua ye anwobɛlɛlɛ nu; Nyamenle dwazo ye tumi nu.
46015044	Bɛsie ye nwonane nu sonlabaka; Nyamenle dwazo ye sunsum nu sonlabaka. Saa nwonane nu sonlabaka wɔ ɛkɛ a, ɛnee sunsum nu sonlabaka wɔ ɛkɛ.
46015045	Ɔluakɛ Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne se, “Nyamenle bɔle sonla mɔɔ lumua, mɔɔ le Adam, manle ɔrayɛle ɛkɛla mɔɔ de aze a.” Na Adam ne mɔɔ li amozi la le Nyamenle Sunsum mɔɔ maa ngoane a.
46015046	Tɛ sunsum nu sonlabaka ne a dumua ba a. Nwonane nu sonlabaka ne dumua ba, na akee sunsum nu sonlabaka ne adoa ye.
46015047	Ndɛtɛlɛ a Nyamenle vale bɔle sonla ne mɔɔ lumua la a, na sonla ne mɔɔ tɔ zolɛ nwiɔ la vi anwuma a rale a.
46015048	Bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛle azɛlɛ ye azo amra la le kɛ sonla ne mɔɔ Nyamenle vale ndɛtɛlɛ bɔle ye la, yɛɛ bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛle anwuma amra la le kɛ sonla ne mɔɔ vi anwuma rale la.
46015049	Kɛmɔ yɛle kɛ sonla ne mɔɔ Nyamenle vale ndɛtɛlɛ bɔle ye la, zɔhane ala yɛɛ yɛbayɛ kɛ sonla ne mɔɔ vi anwuma rale la a.
46015050	Mediema, mɔɔ mekpondɛ meaha la a le kɛ, nwonane nee mogya ɛngola ɛnnyia Nyamenle Belemgbunlililɛ ne, yɛɛ debie mɔɔ kpɔlɔ la ɛngola ɛnnyia mɔɔ ɛmkpɔlɔ la.
46015051	-
46015052	Bɛdie fealeranu edwɛkɛ ɛhye: yɛ muala yɛnrɛwu. Saa bɛbɔ aweɛne tendenle ne mɔɔ li amozi la anu a, yɛ nye zo katete yɛ la ɛnee Nyamenle ɛhakyi yɛ ɛwie. Ɔluakɛ bɛbɔ aweɛne tendenle ne anu a, Nyamenle badwazo mɔwuamra, mɔɔ bɛnwu bieko ɛlɛ a, na bɛahakyi yɛ muala mɔɔ yɛha la.
46015053	Ɔluakɛ ɔwɔ kɛ sonla nwonane ɛhye mɔɔ kpɔlɔ la kakyi yɛ debie mɔɔ ɛmkpɔlɔ ɛlɛ a, yɛɛ ɔwɔ kɛ sonla nwonane ɛhye mɔɔ wu la kakyi yɛ debie mɔɔ ɛnwu ɛlɛ a.
46015054	Yemɔti saa nwonane mɔɔ kpɔlɔ la kakyi yɛ mɔɔ ɛmkpɔlɔ ɛlɛ la, na nwonane mɔɔ wu la kakyi yɛ mɔɔ ɛnwu ɛlɛ la a, ɛnee Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne bayɛ nɔhalɛ kɛ, “Bɛzɛkye ewule! Bɛli ɔ nwo zo konim bɔkɔɔ!
46015055	Ewule, wɔ konimlilɛ ne wɔ ni? O, Ewule, wɔ bɔlɔ ne wɔ ni?”
46015056	Ewule bɔlɔ a le ɛtane, yɛɛ ɛtane tumi ne vi mɛla ne anu.
46015057	Na yɛyɛ Nyamenle mo kɛ ɔdua yɛ Awulae Gyisɛse Kelaese anwo zo ɔmaa yɛdi konim a!
46015058	Zɔhane ati, me mediema kulovolɛma, bɛgyinla kpundii kpalɛ. Bɛmaa bɛ nye ɛbolo Awulae gyima ne ɛyɛlɛ nwo, na bɛnwu ye kɛ Awulae ati bɛ ɛvɛlɛ ɛnrɛyɛ gyɛne.
46016001	Mɔɔ fane ezukoa ne mɔɔ bɛwowɔ bɛahɔboa Nyamenle menli ne mɔ mɔɔ wɔ Dwudiya maanzinli nu la anwo la, bɛyɛ ye kɛ mɔɔ mengyehyɛle memanle asɔne ne mɔ mɔɔ wɔ Galeehyea maanzinli nu la.
46016002	Molɛ biala, bɛ nuhua ko biala ɛde ezukoa mɔɔ yenyia ye dapɛne ne anu la bie ɛdo ahane, na bɛva bɛzie, amaa saa meba a yeangyia kɛ bɛkɛwowɔ ezukoa.
46016003	Meba a mebahɛlɛ kɛlata meamaa bɛdabɛ bɛ menli mɔɔ bɛkɛdu bɛ la, na bɛava bɛ ahyɛlɛdeɛ ne bɛahɔ Gyɛlusalɛm.
46016004	Na saa ɔhyia kɛ mekɔ bie noko a ɛnee bɛ nee me ahɔ.
46016005	Saa mevi Masidonea a mebara bɛ nwo ɛkɛ, ɔluakɛ mekakpɔsa Masidonea maanzinli ne anu.
46016006	Wɔannea a mebali mekɛ ekyi anzɛɛ fɔsɛlɛ ne bɔbɔ wɔ bɛ nwo ɛkɛ, na akee bɛaboa me bɛamaa meazɔ me adendulɛ ne azo meahɔ ɛleka biala mɔɔ ɔwɔ kɛ mekɔ la.
46016007	Mengulo kɛ menwu bɛ ala a ɛnee me gyakɛ gyi nu. Saa Awulae maa adenle a, me nye la kɛ me nee bɛ badɛnla ahyɛ ekyii.
46016008	Mebadɛnla Ɛfɛsɛse ɛke kɔkpula Pɛntekɔso Ɛvoyia ne.
46016009	Agbɔvolɛ zonle ɛke bɔbɔ ɛdeɛ, noko gyima bedevinli bie mɔɔ anwo hyia la anye ɛrala ɛkɛ ne ɛmaa me kɛ ɔwɔ kɛ medi.
46016010	Saa Temɔte ba bɛ nwo lɔ a, bɛlie ye gyɛlɛɛnye bɛmaa ɔ nye ɛlie, ɔluakɛ ɔlɛyɛ Awulae gyima ne kɛmɔ melɛyɛ la.
46016011	Bɛmmamaa awie biala bu ye kɛ ɔle kakula na ye adwenle ɛtɛtinle, bɛboa ye bɛmaa ɔzɔ ye adendulɛ ne azo anzonudwolɛ nu, amaa yeanyia adenle yeazia yeara me nwo ɛke, ɔluakɛ me nye la ye nee mediema mɔɔ ɛha la ade.
46016012	Akee mɔɔ fane adiema Apɔlɔso anwo la, mekɛ dɔɔnwo ne ala mezuzu mehile ye kɛ ɔ nee mediema ɛhendeɛ ne mɔ bɛrakpɔla bɛ, noko ɔngulo kɛ ɔba kɛkala. Ɔnyia adenle a ɔbarakpɔla bɛ.
46016013	Bɛyɛ bɛ nye gyɛlɛmgbɛɛnye, bɛgyinla kpundii wɔ diedi ne anu, bɛnyia akɛnrasesebɛ, bɛmaa bɛ nwo ɛyɛ se.
46016014	Bɛva ɛhulolɛ bɛyɛ debie biala mɔɔ bɛyɛ la.
46016015	Mediema, bɛze kɛ Setɛfanase nee ye sua nu amra a lumuale liele Kelaese lile wɔ Akaya (Giliki maanle nu) a, yɛɛ bɛdu bɛ nwo bɛmaa kɛ bɛkɛzonle Nyamenle menli ne.
46016016	Me mediema, mebodo mesɛlɛ bɛ, bɛli menli mɔɔ le zɛhae, nee awie biala mɔɔ nee bɛ yɛ gyima nee bɛ sonle la ngilehilelɛ zo.
46016017	Me nye ɛlie Setɛfanase nee Fɔtunatɛse nee Akeeyaekɛse ɛralɛ ne anwo, ɔluakɛ bɛlɛdi gyima mɔɔ saa bɛdabɛ a bɛwɔ ɛke a anrɛɛ bɛkɛli la;
46016018	ɔluakɛ bɛmaa me nye ɛlie, kɛmɔ bɛ nye liele la. Menli mɔɔ le zɛhae la anwo hyia, anrɛɛ bɛnlea bɛ boɛ.
46016019	Asɔnema mɔɔ wɔ Ehyea maanle ye anu la biza bɛ ahye. Mediema Akoyela nee Pelesela, nee asɔnema mɔɔ yia bɛ sua nu ɛkɛ ne la lɛ Awulae duma ne biza bɛ ahye kpalɛ kpalɛ.
46016020	Mediema mɔɔ wɔ ɛke la biza bɛ ahye. Bɛva mediema ɛhulolɛ bɛyɛ bɛ nwo atuu.
46016021	Medame Pɔɔlo me sa anloa ɛne. Mebiza bɛ ahye.
46016022	Awie biala mɔɔ ɛngulo Awulae la, munzule ɛha ye. Yɛ Awulae, bɛla!
46016023	Awulae Gyisɛse ɛlolɛ ne nee bɛ ɛdɛnla.
46016024	Kelaese Gyisɛse ati me ɛhulolɛ nee bɛ muala ɛdɛnla.
47001001	Pɔɔlo, mɔɔ Nyamenle ɛhulo ɛyɛ ye Kelaese Gyisɛse ɛzoanvolɛ la, nee yɛ diema Temɔte a ɛlɛkɛlɛ kɛlata ɛhye ahɔmaa Nyamenle menli ne mɔɔ wɔ suakpole Kɔlente azo, nee Nyamenle menli ne amuala mɔɔ wɔ Akaya (Giliki) maanle ne kpokpoti anu la a.
47001002	Yɛsɛlɛ kɛ yɛ Ze Nyamenle ne nee Awulae Kelaese Gyisɛse ɛlo bɛ na ɔmaa bɛ anzonudwolɛ.
47001003	Bɛmaa yɛyɛ Nyamenle, yɛ Awulae Kelaese Gyisɛse ɔ Ze ne, anwunvɔnezelɛ Selɛ ne nee arɛlekyekyelɛ Nyamenle ne mo.
47001004	Ɔkyekye yɛ rɛle wɔ amaneɛnwunlɛ kɔsɔɔti anu na yɛdua ye arɛlekyekyelɛ ne azo yɛkyekye bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛ nwo ɛhyele bɛ wɔ ndenle ngakyile dɔɔnwo anu la arɛle.
47001005	Kɛmɔ yɛ nee Kelaese nwu ye amaneɛ ne mɔ la, zɔhane ala yɛɛ ɔlua ɔ nwo zo yɛ nee ye nyia ye arɛlekyekyelɛ ne mɔ a.
47001006	Saa yɛnwu amaneɛ a, ɛnee bɛ ngoanelielɛ nee bɛ arɛlekyekyelɛ ti ɔ; yɛɛ saa bɛkyekye yɛ rɛle a, ɛnee bɛkyekye bɛdabɛ noko bɛ rɛle, na bɛmaa bɛ anwosesebɛ, amaa bɛava abotane bɛagyinla amaneɛnwunlɛ ko ne ala mɔɔ yɛdayɛ yɛgyi bie anwo la anloa.
47001007	Yemɔti yɛ nye la bɛ nwo zo ɛsesebɛ; yɛze kɛ, kɛmɔ bɛ nee yɛ nwu yɛ amaneɛnwunlɛ ne mɔ la, zɔhane ala yɛɛ bɛ nee yɛ nyia yɛ arɛlekyekyelɛ ne mɔɔ yɛ sa ka ye noko la a.
47001008	Mediema, yɛkpondɛ kɛ bɛnwu kɛ yɛ nwo zile hyelele yɛ wɔ Ehyea maanzinli ne anu la. Yɛ nwo hyelele yɛ kpole manle ɔbole yɛ nwo zo mɔɔ ɔhale yɛ nee ewule ala.
47001009	Yɛvale ye kɛ bɛbua yɛ ewule fɔlɛ bɛwie ala ɛne. Ɛhye zile amaa yɛdayɛ yɛanzi yɛ kɛnra, na yɛava yɛ nwo amuala yɛado Nyamenle ne mɔɔ dwazo mɔwuamra la anwo zo.
47001010	Ewule ɛzulolɛ zɛhae anu yɛɛ ɔyele yɛ ɔvile a, yɛɛ ɔkɛye yɛ nu somaa; yɛɛ eza yɛ rɛle wɔ ye nu kɛ ɔkɛye yɛ nu bieko,
47001011	ɔlua bɛ nzɛlɛlɛ ti. Zɔhane ala yɛɛ menli dɔɔnwo bayɛ Nyamenle mo wɔ yɛ ti, kɛ ɔlua menli somaa nzɛlɛlɛ zo yelo yɛ ɛlolɛ kpole zɛhae a.
47001012	Mɔɔ yɛfa yɛtu yɛ nwo la a le ɛhye: yɛ ti kanrɛlɛ ne di daselɛ kɛ yɛlua Nyamenle nwuanzanwuanzayɛlɛ nee nɔhalɛlilɛ, nee Nyamenle ɛlolɛ ne tumi zo yɛɛ yɛfa yɛbɔ yɛ ɛbɛla wɔ ewiade ye anu a, bɔbɔ wɔ bɛ avinli, na tɛ ewiade nrɛlɛbɛ zo a yɛlua a.
47001013	-
47001014	Yɛlɛ edwɛkɛ mɔɔ bɛkola ye kenga na bɛte ɔ bo la a yɛlɛkɛlɛ bɛ a. Me nye la kɛ mɔɔ kɛkala bɛte ɔ bo afoa afoa la, akee bɛbade ɔ bo kpalɛ, amaa yɛ Awulae Gyisɛse ɛralɛ bieko Kenle ne, bɛahola bɛava yɛ bɛadu bɛ nwo kɛmɔ yɛkola yɛfa bɛ yɛtu yɛ nwo la.
47001015	Adwenle ɛhye a wɔ me ti anu ɛsesebɛ mɔɔ manle menlumuale mengyehyɛle kɛ mebarakpɔla bɛ, amaa bɛanyia nyilalɛ mɔnwo la.
47001016	Ɔluakɛ menyɛle kɛ saa mese meahɔ Masidonea a mebamakyi bɛ nwo ɛkɛ, yɛɛ eza saa mevi Masidonea mesia meara a meamakyi bɛ nwo ɛkɛ ne bieko, amaa bɛagua me adenle bɛamaa meahɔ Dwudiya.
47001017	Yemɔti ngyehyɛlɛ ɛhye mɔɔ menyɛle la kile kɛ mele sonla mɔɔ meka a menyɛ ɔ? Anzɛɛ meyɛ me ngyehyɛlɛ kɛ adalɛ sonla bie mɔɔ meka kɛ “ɛhɛe” a ɛnee mekile “kyɛkyɛ” ɔ?
47001018	Kɛmɔ Nyamenle le nɔhalɛ, na yɛkola yɛfa yɛ rɛle yɛwula ye nu la, me ɛwɔkɛ ne mɔɔ membɔle bɛ la ɛnle ɛwɔkɛ mɔɔ meka “ɛhɛe” a ɛnee mekile “kyɛkyɛ” a.
47001019	Ɔluakɛ Gyisɛse Kelaese mɔɔ le Nyamenle Ara ne, mɔɔ me nee Seleveenɛse nee Temɔte yɛbɔle ɔ nwo edwɛkɛ ne nolo yɛhilele bɛ la, ɛnle “Ɛhɛe” nee “Kyɛkyɛ” sonla. Ɔle Nyamenle nu “Ɛhɛe”;
47001020	ɔluakɛ yemɔ a ɔle Nyamenle ɛwɔkɛ ne mɔ anu “Ɛhɛe” ne a. Ɛhye ati a yɛdua Gyisɛse Kelaese anwo zo yɛka “Amen” ne yɛwula Nyamenle anyunlunyia a.
47001021	Nyamenle ɔdaye a ɔsi yɛ nee bɛdabɛ pi wɔ Kelaese ati a; Nyamenle ɔdaye mumua ne a yeye yɛ yezie ɛkɛ,
47001022	yeyɛ yɛ nzonlɛ yemaa ɔ nwo, na yeva ye Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne yewula yɛ ahonle nu kɛ ninyɛne mɔɔ kenle bie ɔbava yeamaa yɛ la amuala anwo awoba a.
47001023	Nyamenle di daselɛ, yɛɛ ɔze me ti anu! Memkpondɛ kɛ mebɔ bɛ rɛle la ati yɛɛ menyɛle me adwenle kɛ menrɛra Kɔlente a.
47001024	Tɛ kɛ asɛɛ yɛkile bɛ debie mɔɔ ɔwɔ kɛ bɛdie bɛdi la ɔ, ɔluakɛ bɛlɛ diedi ne anu kpundii. Yɛ nee bɛ a ɛlɛyɛ gyima ne a wɔ bɛ kpalɛyɛlɛ ti.
47002001	Yemɔti menyɛle me adwenle kɛ menrɛra bɛ nwo lɔ bieko na meabɔ bɛ rɛle.
47002002	Ɔluakɛ saa mebɔ bɛ rɛle a, nwane a kɛlielie me nye a? Kyesɛ menli ko ne ala mɔɔ membɔle bɛ rɛle la ala.
47002003	Ɛhye ati yɛɛ mengɛlɛle bɛ kɛlata ɛhendeɛ ne a, meangulo kɛ menwɔra na menli mɔɔ anrɛɛ kɛlielie me nye la abɔ me rɛle. Ɔluakɛ meze ye wienyi kɛ me nye die a, ɛnee bɛdabɛ noko bɛ nye ɛlie.
47002004	Menvale nyanelilɛ, arɛlebɔlɛ nee monle a mengɛlɛle bɛ a, amaa bɛanwu kɛ mesi mekulo bɛ la, na tɛ kɛ asɛɛ mekulo kɛ mebɔ bɛ rɛle la ati ɔ.
47002005	Saa awie ɛmaa arɛlebɔlɛ bie ɛra a, menwudu ye ɛdeɛ, noko tɛ me ngome a yebɔ me rɛle a, bɛ muala yɛɛ yebɔ bɛ rɛle a.
47002006	Ɔle kpalɛ bɔkɔɔ ɔmaa sonla zɔhane kɛ bɛ nuhua dɔɔnwo ne ala ɛhwi ɔ nyunlu a.
47002007	Zɔhane ati bɛva ɔ nwo edwɛkɛ bɛhyɛ ye na bɛkyekye ɔ rɛle, amaa yeanli nyane somasoma yeangyakyi diedi ne anu.
47002008	Mesɛlɛ bɛ, bɛmaa ɔnwu ye kɛ amgba bɛkulo ye.
47002009	Mengɛlɛle bɛ kɛlata ɛhendeɛ ne, amaa ɔlua zo meanwu kɛ bɛzile bɛgyinlanle sɔnea ne anloa la, na eza meanlea kɛ saa dahuu bɛdi me ngilehilelɛ ne mɔ azo a.
47002010	Saa bɛfa awie anwo edwɛkɛ bɛkyɛ ye a, ɛnee medame noko meva mehyɛ ye. Saa ɔhyia kɛ mefa awie anwo edwɛkɛ mekyɛ ye a, meyɛ ye zɔhane wɔ bɛ ti wɔ Kelaese anyunlu,
47002011	amaa Seetan anli yɛ nwo zo konim, ɔluakɛ yɛze ye ndenle ne mɔ amuala.
47002012	Mɔɔ mendwule Tulowase kɛ mekabɔ Kelaese anwo Edwɛkpa ne nolo la, menwunle kɛ Awulae ɛbuke adenle ɛmaa me kɛ menli gyima wɔ ɛkɛ.
47002013	Noko me nwo andɛ me kpalɛ biala, ɔluakɛ meannwu me diema Taetɛse wɔ ɛkɛ. Yemɔti me nee ɛkɛ ne amra lile nrɛlaleɛ na mendoale zolɛ mengɔle Masidonea.
47002014	Yɛyɛ Nyamenle mo kɛ dahuu ɔfa yɛ kɛ menli mɔɔ Kelaese ɛhye yɛ nuokɛ na ɔfa yɛ ɔto Kelaese konimlilɛ ɛlɔnwɔne, na ɔdua yɛ nwo zo ɔmaa Kelaese anwo edwɛkɛ kpalɛ ne wolowolo ɛleka biala kɛ debie evuanlɛ la.
47002015	Ɔluakɛ yɛle kɛ ɛyɛlɛ evuanlɛ mɔɔ Kelaese ɛva ɛbɔ azu ɛmaa Nyamenle, na ye evuanlɛ ne bɔ wolowolo bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛlɛdie bɛ ngoane nee bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛlɛminli la;
47002016	ɔbɔ evuanlɛ mɔɔ maa ngoane la ɔmaa bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛlɛdie bɛ ngoane la, yɛɛ ɔbɔ nvoanle mɔɔ maa ewule la ɔmaa bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛlɛminli la. Na nwane bɔbɔ a kɛhola gyima zɛhae yɛ a?
47002017	Yɛmɛ, yɛnle kɛ menli mɔɔ fa Nyamenle edwɛkɛ ne si kongo la, ɔboalekɛ Nyamenle a ɛzoa yɛ a, yɛɛ yɛgyinla ɔ nyunlu yɛtendɛ kɛ Kelaese sonvolɛma.
47003001	Asoo mɔɔ meha la eza kile kɛ yɛlɛtu yɛ nloa anu? Anzɛɛ ɔhyia kɛ yɛfa nganvolɛ kɛlata yɛbakile bɛ, anzɛɛ yɛdie bie wɔ bɛ ɛkɛ ne, kɛmɔ bie mɔ yɛ la ɔ?
47003002	Bɛmɛ a bɛle yɛ nganvolɛ kɛlata mɔɔ bɛhɛlɛ ye wɔ yɛ ahonle ne mɔ anu mɔɔ awie biala nwu ye na ɔkenga a.
47003003	Ɔla ali wienyi kɛ Kelaese ɔdaye yɛɛ ɔhɛlɛle kɛlata ɛhye na ɔvale ɔzoanle yɛ a. Yeanva “ɛnke” a ɔhɛlɛle a, yɛɛ yeangɛlɛ ye wɔ bolɛ zo, ɔhɛlɛle ye wɔ menli ahonle zo.
47003004	Yɛlɛka ɛhye, ɔluakɛ ɔlua Kelaese anwo zo yɛlɛ diedi wɔ Nyamenle anu.
47003005	Yɛnlɛ debie biala wɔ yɛ nu mɔɔ maa yɛka kɛ yɛkola yɛyɛ gyima ɛhye a. Yɛ munlililɛ vi Nyamenle ɛkɛ;
47003006	yemɔ yɛɛ yeyɛ yɛ Ngyekyeleɛ Fofolɛ ne sonvolɛma a. Ngyekyeleɛ Fofolɛ ɛhye ɛnle mɛla mɔɔ bɛhɛlɛle a, ɔle Nyamenle Sunsum. Mɛla ne mɔɔ bɛhɛlɛle la fa ewule ba, na Nyamenle Sunsum ne maa ngoane mɔɔ ɛnlɛ awieleɛ.
47003007	Nyamenle anyunlunyia ne lale ali wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ ɔlɛ mɛla ne mɔɔ bɛhɛlɛle ye bolɛ zo la ɔlɛmaa Mosisi la. Na saa ɛnee Mosisi anyunlu ne mɔɔ dale la ɛlɛnu bɔbɔ a, mekɛ ne anu ɔdale kpole kpalɛ mɔɔ ɛnee Yizilayɛma ɛngola ɔ nyunlu nea a. Na saa mɛla ne mɔɔ zolɛ ɛlilɛ fa ewule ba la luale anyunlunyia zɛhae anu a rale a,
47003008	ɛnee kɛ ɔkɛyɛ mɔɔ Nyamenle Sunsum ne ɛzonlenlɛ ɛnrɛnyia anyunlunyia kpole kpalɛ ɛnrɛdɛla ɛhye ɛ?
47003009	Saa ɛzonlenlɛ mɔɔ maa bɛbu menli ewule fɔlɛ la yɛle anyunlunyia a, ɛnee Nyamenle Sunsum ne ɛzonlenlɛ mɔɔ maa bɛbu menli benle la le anyunlunyia kpole kpalɛ mɔɔ bo zolɛ a!
47003010	Yɛkola yɛka kɛ kɛmɔ kɛkala anyunlunyia ne le kpole kpalɛ la ati, yeheda dɛba ne anyunlunyia ɛdeɛ ne azo.
47003011	Ɔluakɛ saa mɔɔ ɛngyɛ na yeanlu la lɛ anyunlunyia a, ɛnee mɔɔ wɔ ɛkɛ ne dahuu na ɔnnu ɛlɛ la anyunlunyia ɛdeɛ ne bo zolɛ.
47003012	Kɛmɔ yɛlɛ anyelazo ɛhye la ati, yɛtendɛ a yɛnzulo.
47003013	Yɛnle kɛ Mosisi mɔɔ vale ɛdanlɛ hedale ɔ nyunlu amaa Yizilayɛma annwu kɛ ɔ nyunlu ɛdalɛ ne ɛlɛnu la.
47003014	Bɛhedale bɛ adwenle zo amgba; ɔluakɛ ɛnɛ nee ɛnɛ ala, saa bɛlɛkenga Ngyekyeleɛ Dɛba ne a, ɔle kɛ asɛɛ ɛdanlɛ ko ne ala tɛkeda zolɛ, ɔboalekɛ ɔlua Kelaese angome anwo zo ala yɛɛ bɛkola bɛye ɛdanlɛ ne a.
47003015	Ɛhɛe, ɛnɛ bɔbɔ, saa bɛka kɛ bɛkenga Mosisi mɛla ne mɔ a, ɛnee ɔle kɛ ɛdanlɛ ne tɛkeda bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛlɛtie la adwenle zo.
47003016	Na saa sonla twe bikye Awulae a, bɛkɛye ɛdanlɛ ne ɔ ti zo.
47003017	Awulae ne a le Nyamenle Sunsum ne, yɛɛ ɛleka mɔɔ Awulae Sunsum ne wɔ la, fanwodi wɔ ɛkɛ.
47003018	Bɛye yɛ muala yɛ nyunlu ndanlɛ ne mɔ a Awulae anyunlunyia ne bada alielie yɛ nyunlu. Anyunlunyia ɛhye mɔɔ vi Awulae, mɔɔ le Nyamenle Sunsum ne ɛkɛ la ɛlɛkakyihakyi yɛ yeamaa yɛayɛ ye sɔhovolɛ wɔ anyunlunyia mɔɔ bo zolɛ la anu.
47004001	Nyamenle ɛlolɛ nu ala yɛɛ yeva gyima ɛhye yewula yɛ sa nu a, zɔhane ati yɛ rɛle ɛmbɔ.
47004002	Yɛkpo awozinli nu nee anyiemgba nyɛleɛ muala; yɛmbɔ alane ɛbɛla, yɛɛ yɛmbɔ adalɛ wɔ Nyamenle edwɛkɛ ne ɛhanlɛ nu yɛngakyi ye. Yɛlua nɔhalɛ wienyi ne anu yɛbɔ yɛ ɛbɛla wɔ Nyamenle anyunlu kɛ awie biala kɛnyia yɛ nwo adwenle kpalɛ.
47004003	Na saa edwɛkɛ ne mɔɔ yɛbɔ ye nolo la bɛheda zolɛ a, ɛnee bɛheda zolɛ bɛmaa bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛlɛminli la ala.
47004004	Bɛnlie bɛnli, ɔluakɛ ɛtane ewiade ɛhye nyamenle ne ɛzi bɛ adwenle ne anye. Ɔmmaa bɛnnwu wienyi ne mɔɔ ɛlɛta fi Edwɛkpa ne mɔɔ fane Kelaese, mɔɔ le Nyamenle sɔhovolɛ kpalɛ ne anyunlunyia ne anwo la.
47004005	Yɛmbɔ yɛdayɛ yɛ ngome yɛ nwo nolo; yɛbɔ Gyisɛse Kelaese anwo nolo kɛ ɔle Awulae, yɛɛ Gyisɛse ati yɛmɛ yɛle bɛmɛ bɛ sonvolɛma.
47004006	Nyamenle ne mɔɔ zele kɛ, “Wienyi vi awozinli nu ɛda” la a le Nyamenle ko ne ala mɔɔ manle ye wienyi ne dale yɛ ahonle nu la, amaa yɛanwu Nyamenle anyunlunyia ne mɔɔ ɛlɛta Kelaese anyunlu la.
47004007	Noko yɛmɛ mɔɔ yɛlɛ Sunsum nu anwonyia ɛhye la yɛle kɛ mbuakɛ ala, amaa yeala ali kɛ tumi bedevinli ne le Nyamenle ɛdeɛ, na ɔnle yɛ ɛdeɛ.
47004008	Ndenle dɔɔnwo anu bɛgyegye yɛ, na bɛngola bɛnzɛkye yɛ; bɛmaa yɛ adwenle nu yɛ kpomgbondee, noko yɛ agbɔkɛ nu ɛntuto;
47004009	bɛyɛ yɛ kpɔdekpɔde, noko yɛtɛkyianle agɔnwolɛ nwo ɛlɛ; yɛɛ ɔdwu mekɛ ne bie bɔbɔ a bɛbobɔ yɛ, noko yɛtɛwule.
47004010	Dahuu yɛte Gyisɛse ewule ne nyane wɔ yɛ sonlabaka ye anu, amaa menli anwu ye ngoane ne noko wɔ yɛ sonlabaka ye anu.
47004011	Yɛ ngoane mekɛ nu amuala ewule sianle yɛ wɔ Kelaese ati, amaa menli anwu ye ngoane ne wɔ yɛ sonlabaka ɛhye ala anu.
47004012	Ɛhye kile kɛ ewule di gyima wɔ yɛ nu, noko ngoane di gyima wɔ bɛmɛ bɛ nu.
47004013	Kɛmɔ yɛ diedi ne le kɛ Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne mɔɔ se, “Mendendɛle, ɔluakɛ menliele menlile” la, yɛdayɛ noko yɛtendɛ, ɔboalekɛ yɛdie yɛdi.
47004014	Yɛze kɛ Nyamenle mɔɔ dwazole Awulae Gyisɛse rale ngoane nu la badwazo yɛ aboka Gyisɛse anwo, na yeava yɛ nee bɛ yeahɔ ɔ nyunlu ɛkɛ.
47004015	Ɛhye mɔ amuala lua bɛmɛ bɛ ti, amaa mɔɔ Nyamenle ɛlolɛ ne ɛlɛtɛlɛ ahɔ menli dɔɔnwo anwo zo la, bɛava moyɛlɛ bɛawula Nyamenle anyunlunyia.
47004016	Ɔlua ɛhye ati yɛmkpo aze. Saa yɛ nwonane ɛlɛwie bɔbɔ a, Nyamenle kakyi yɛ sunsum nu nwonane ne alehyenlɛ biala.
47004017	Nyane sikalɛ ekyi ɛhye mɔɔ yɛlɛnwu ye la bava anyunlunyia mɔɔ ɛnlɛ awieleɛ na ɔle kpole kpalɛ ɔtɛla nyane ɛhye la arɛlɛ yɛ.
47004018	Ɛhye ati yɛ nye ɛnla ninyɛne mɔɔ ɛnyelɛ nwu bɛ la azo; yɛ nye la ninyɛne mɔɔ ɛnyelɛ ɛnnwu bɛ la azo. Ninyɛne mɔɔ ɛnyelɛ nwu bɛ la ɛngyɛ na apɛ nu aze, na mɔɔ ɛnyelɛ ɛnnwu bɛ la wɔ ɛkɛ ne dahuu.
47005001	Yɛze kɛ saa bɛgolo yɛ nwonane sua ye mɔɔ yɛde nu la bɛgua aze kɛ ndanlɛ sua wɔ ewiade ye anu a, Nyamenle bamaa yɛ sua mɔɔ bɛanva ɛsalɛ bɛanzi, na ɔwɔ ɛkɛ ne dahuu la wɔ anwuma.
47005002	Yɛsu yɛ kunlu, ɔluakɛ yɛkulo kɛ bɛfa yɛ anwuma nwonane sua ne bɛkpolo yɛ wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ yɛwɔ aze ɛke la,
47005003	amaa saa yɛfa yɛkpolo a bɛanwu kɛ yɛnlɛ yɛ nwo zɔ.
47005004	Mekɛ mɔɔ yɛde ndanlɛ sua ɛhye anu la, yɛsu yɛ kunlu kpalɛ wɔ anwongyelelɛ nu; tɛ kɛ asɛɛ bɛkpa yɛ azɛlɛ ye azo ndanlɛ sua bɛvi yɛ nwo ɔ, na yemɔ a le kɛ, yɛkpondɛ kɛ bɛfa anwuma ndanlɛ sua ɛdeɛ fofolɛ ne bɛkpolo yɛ, amaa ngoane aheda mɔɔ wu la azo.
47005005	Nyamenle a ɛziezie yɛ ɛmaa ngakyile ɛhye a, na yeva ye Sunsum ne yeli ninyɛne mɔɔ ɔbava yeamaa yɛ la anwo agyinlanu.
47005006	Zɔhane ati yɛlɛ akɛnrasesebɛ dahuu. Yɛze kɛ mekɛ mɔɔ yɛde nwonane sua ɛhye anu ala la, ɛnee yɛ nee Awulae yɛ avinli twe.
47005007	Ɔluakɛ yɛfa diedi a yɛbɔ yɛ ɛbɛla a, na tɛ deɛ mɔɔ ɛnyelɛ nwu ye la ɔ.
47005008	Yɛlɛ akɛnrasesebɛ na yɛkɛhulo ye kpalɛ kɛ yɛkɛvi nwonane sua ɛhye anu na yɛ nee Awulae kɛhɔdɛnla.
47005009	Debie mɔɔ hyia kpalɛ la a le kɛ, saa yɛwɔ yɛ sua nu ɛke o, anzɛɛ nehane o, yɛkɛzɔ ɔ nye.
47005010	Ɔluakɛ ɔwɔ kɛ yɛ muala yɛfinde Kelaese anyunlu na ɔbua yɛ ndɛne, amaa yɛ nuhua ko biala asa aha ahatualɛ mɔɔ ɔfɛta la, kpalɛ o, ɛtane o, kɛmɔ ye ɛbɛla mɔɔ ɔdaye ɔlua ye sonlabaka ye azo yebɔ la de la.
47005011	Kɛmɔ yɛze kɛ Nyamenlezulolɛ si de la ati, yɛbɔ mɔdenle kɛ yɛkɛmaa menli kɛzulo Nyamenle; na kɛ yɛmɛ yɛde la, Nyamenle ɔdaye ɔze, yɛɛ meze kɛ bɛdabɛ bɛze ye wɔ bɛ adwenle nu.
47005012	Tɛ kɛ asɛɛ yɛkulo kɛ yɛkanvo yɛ nwo yɛkile bɛ bieko ɔ, na yɛlɛbɔ mɔdenle kɛ bɛkɛva yɛ bɛkɛdu bɛ nwo, na bɛahola bɛanyia edwɛkɛ bɛaha bɛahile bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛfa menli gyinlabelɛ a bɛtu bɛ nloa anu na bɛnva bɛ subane a bɛtu bɛ nloa anu la.
47005013	Asoo yɛzɛ? Saa yɛzɛ a, ɛnee Nyamenle ati ɔ, yɛɛ saa yɛ adwenle la ɛkɛ ne a, ɛnee ɔla ɛkɛ ɔmaa bɛmɛ.
47005014	Ɔluakɛ Kelaese ɛhulolɛ ne a sie yɛ a, ɔboalekɛ yɛdie yɛto nu kɛ sonla ko wule manle menli kɔsɔɔti, na ye zɔhane ati menli kɔsɔɔti ɛwu.
47005015	Ɔwule ɔmanle menli muala, amaa bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛde ngoane nu la andɛnla ammaa bɛ ngome bɛ nwo, na bɛadɛnla bɛamaa sonla ne mɔɔ bɛ ti a ɔwule na bɛdwazole ye bɛrale ngoane nu la.
47005016	Ɛhye ati, ɔvi ɛnɛ mɔɔ kɔ la, yɛnnea awie biala anyunlu yɛmbua ndɛne. Saa mekɛ bie mɔɔ ɛze ɛhɔ la yɛbuale Kelaese ndɛne wɔ zɔhane adenle zo bɔbɔ a, ɛnɛ yɛnyɛ ye zɔhane bieko.
47005017	Zɔhane ati awie biala mɔɔ le Kelaese ɛdeɛ la le abɔdeɛ fofolɛ; dɛba ne ɛpɛ nu ɛhɔ, fofolɛ ɛra.
47005018	Nyamenle a ɛyɛ ɛhye amuala a, na yelua Kelaese anwo zo yeyɛ yɛ ɔ gɔnwo mɔ, yɛɛ yemaa yɛ gyima kɛ yɛdayɛ noko yɛhwe menli yɛrayɛ bɛ ɔ gɔnwo mɔ.
47005019	Yemɔ a le kɛ, Nyamenle lua Kelaese anwo zo ɛlɛtwe menli muala ayɛ bɛ ɔ gɔnwo mɔ. Nyamenle ambu bɛ ɛtane ne mɔ anwo mgbonda antia bɛ na yeva edwɛkɛ ne mɔɔ fane kɛ menli si yɛ ɔ gɔnwo mɔ la yewula yɛ sa nu.
47005020	Yɛle Kelaese agyakɛ anu gyinlavolɛma, na ɔlua yɛ nwo zo Nyamenle ɛlɛtu folɛ. Zɔhane ati yɛgyi Kelaese agyakɛ anu yɛbodo yɛsɛlɛ bɛ kɛ bɛmaa Nyamenle adenle bɛmaa ɔhakyi bɛ kɛ bɛnle agbɔvolɛ na bɛle ɔ gɔnwo mɔ.
47005021	Kelaese anyɛ ɛtane, noko ɔlua yɛmɛ yɛ ti Nyamenle vale ye yɛle ɛtane mumua ne, amaa ɔlua ɔ nwo zo yɛanyia Nyamenle kpalɛyɛlɛ ne.
47006001	Kɛmɔ yɛ nee Kelaese bɔ nu yɛ gyima la, yɛbodo yɛsɛlɛ bɛ kɛ bɛmmamaa Nyamenle ɛlolɛ ne mɔɔ bɛ sa ɛha ye la yɛ mgbane.
47006002	Bɛdie mɔɔ Nyamenle se la; ɔse, “Mekɛ ne dwule mɔɔ ɔwɔ kɛ mese bɛ anwunvɔne la, mendiele bɛ. Mekɛ ne dwule mɔɔ ɔwɔ kɛ medie bɛ ngoane la, memboale bɛ.” Bɛdie ɛ! Nyamenle ɛlolɛ mekɛ ne a le ɛnɛ. Ɛnɛ a le ngoanelielɛ kenle ne a.
47006003	Yɛmkpondɛ kɛ yɛtenda awie agyakɛ anu na awie anyia yɛ gyima ne anwo edwɛkɛ ɛtane aha.
47006004	Wɔ yɛ nyɛleɛ biala anu yɛfa abotane yɛgyinla ngyegyelɛ, anwongyelelɛ nee abodelɛ biala anloa, yɛkile kɛ yɛle Nyamenle sonvolɛma.
47006005	Bɛbila yɛ mbaka, bɛgua yɛ efiade na bɛwudo yɛ bagua nu; bɛmaa yɛyɛ gyima ɛsesebɛ, yɛsi epe, yɛɛ bɛkye yɛ ɛhɔne.
47006006	Noko ɔlua yɛ anwondelɛ, nrɛlɛbɛ, abotane, atiakunlukpalɛ nee Nyamenle Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne nee yɛ nɔhalɛ ɛhulolɛ,
47006007	yɛ nɔhalɛ nrɛlaleɛ ne, nee Nyamenle tumi ne azo yɛla yɛ nwo ali yɛhile kɛ yɛle Nyamenle sonvolɛma. Pɛlepɛlelilɛ a le yɛ konle dadeɛ mɔɔ yɛfa yɛko na yɛfa yɛpepɛ yɛdie yɛ nwo a.
47006008	Bɛdi yɛ eni yɛɛ bɛgua yɛ nyunlu aze; bɛbɔ yɛ aholoba yɛɛ bɛye yɛ ayɛlɛ. Bɛbu yɛ alanema, noko yɛdi nɔhalɛ;
47006009	bɛyɛ kɛ bɛnze yɛ, noko bɛ muala bɛze yɛ; bɛfa yɛ kɛ yɛwu bɔbɔ a, bɛnlea, yɛtɛte aze. Saa bɛtwi yɛ nyunlu a, bɛtɛkunle yɛ.
47006010	Saa bɛbɔ yɛ rɛle a, yɛ nye die yɛ nwo dahuu; ɔzɔho kɛ yɛle ehyianvolɛma, noko yɛyɛ menli dɔɔnwo sukoavolɛma; ɔzɔho kɛ yɛnlɛ bie, noko nɔhalɛ, yɛlɛ debie biala.
47006011	Me gɔnwo mɔ Kɔlentema! Yɛbuke yɛ munli nu a yɛlɛtendɛ yɛahile bɛ a.
47006012	Yɛnzi bɛ aze; saa azezilɛ bie wɔ ɛkɛ a ɛnee ɔvi bɛdabɛ bɛ atiakunluwɔzo.
47006013	Melɛtendɛ meahile bɛ kɛ metendɛ mekile me mra la. Yemɔti bɛbuke bɛ munli nu, kɛmɔ yɛyɛ yɛmaa bɛ la.
47006014	Bɛ nee bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnlie Kelaese bɛnli la mmatu. Kɛ ɔkɛyɛ na kpalɛ nee ɛtane adila agɔnwolɛ ɛ? Kɛ ɔkɛyɛ na wienyi nee awozinli abɔ nu adɛnla ɛ?
47006015	Kɛ ɔkɛyɛ na Kelaese nee Abɔnsam anloa azɛ bɛ nwo ɛ? Duzu a diedinli nee bozonle ɛzonlenlɛnli lɛ ye yɛ a?
47006016	Duzu ngitanwo a wɔ Nyamenle Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua nee awozonle ɛzonlenlɛ sua avinli a? Yɛle tease Nyamenle ne ɛzonlenlɛ sua! Kɛ ɔdaye Nyamenle mumua ne yeha la ɛne. Ɔse, “Mebabu me awuke wɔ me maanlema avinli na me nee bɛ adɛnla; Mebayɛ bɛ Nyamenle na bɛayɛ me menli.”
47006017	Yemɔti kɛ Awulae se la ɛne, “Bɛgyakyi bɛ na bɛhwe bɛ nwo bɛvi bɛ nwo. Bɛmmafa bɛ sa bɛka debie mɔɔ anwo ɛnde la, na menwɔlie bɛ.
47006018	Mebayɛ bɛ ze, na bɛayɛ me mra mrenya nee mraalɛ, kɛ Tumivolɛ Awulae se la ɛne!”
47007001	Ayi mɔ, ɛwɔkɛ mɔɔ Nyamenle ɛbɔ yɛ la ɛne. Yemɔti, bɛmaa yɛwowo debie biala mɔɔ wɔ yɛ nwo mɔɔ gua yɛ sonlabaka ye anzɛɛ yɛ ɛkɛla ne mɔ anwo evinli la yɛgua, yɛzulo Nyamenle, na yɛmaa yɛ ɛbɛlabɔlɛ nwo ɛde bɔkɔɔ.
47007002	Bɛbuke bɛ munli nu bɛmaa yɛ; yɛtɛyɛle awie biala ɛtane, yɛtɛsɛkyele awie biala, yɛɛ yɛtɛdile awie biala amile.
47007003	Menga ɛhye membu bɛ fɔlɛ, na kɛmɔ meha ye dɛba la, saa yɛde ngoane nu o, yɛwu o, yɛlɛ bɛ nwo ɛhulolɛ kpalɛ mɔɔ kile kɛ dahuu yɛle ko a.
47007004	Medie bɛ medi, mefa bɛ metu me nwo! Me nwo tɔ me, yɛɛ wɔ yɛ anwongyelelɛ muala anu medi fɛlɛko kpole.
47007005	Mɔɔ yɛrale Masidonea la, yɛ nwo andɔ yɛ kpalɛ biala, ɔluakɛ ɛnee ɛleka biala mɔɔ yɛkɛhɔ la yɛyia ngyegyelɛ; gua zo a, konle; sua nu a, ɛzulolɛ ngome.
47007006	Noko Nyamenle mɔɔ kyekye bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛ rɛle ɛbɔ la arɛle la, luale Taetɛse ɛralɛ ne azo kyekyele yɛ rɛle,
47007007	yɛɛ tɛ ye ɛralɛ ne angome, na ye amaneɛ bɔbɔ mɔɔ ɔrabɔle mɔɔ fane kɛ bɛzile bɛkyekyele ɔ rɛle, bɛ nwo mɔɔ dɔ me, me nwo nyane mɔɔ bɛlɛdi, nee bɛ nye mɔɔ ɛbolo kɛ bɛpepɛ bɛalie me la ɛmaa kɛkala me nye ɛlie kpole kpalɛ.
47007008	Na saa me kɛlata ne manle bɛ rɛle bɔle bɔbɔ a, menli nwolɛ nyane kɛ mengɛlɛle a. Noko akee menlile nyane wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ menwunle kɛ kɛlata ne ɛbɔ bɛ rɛle mekɛ ekyi bie la.
47007009	Kɛkala ɛdeɛ, medi fɛlɛko, tɛ kɛ membɔle bɛ rɛle la ati ɔ, na kɛ bɛ rɛle ɛbɔlɛ ne manle bɛnlunle bɛ nwo. Nyamenle luale bɛ rɛle ɛbɔlɛ ne azo lile gyima, yemɔti yɛanyɛ bɛ ɛtane.
47007010	Ɔluakɛ nyanelilɛ mɔɔ Nyamenle ze nuhua la maa sonla nu ɔ nwo na ɔnyia ngoane, ɔmmaa ɔnvu ɔ nwo; ewiade ye anu nyanelilɛ maa ewule.
47007011	Bɛnlea gyima mɔɔ Nyamenle vale bɛ rɛle ne mɔɔ bɔle la lile a: bɛ nye bolole edwɛkɛ ne anwo manle bɛhilele kɛ bɛ nwo ɛnle nu! Nea bɛ ɛya mɔɔ bɛvale, ɛzulolɛ mɔɔ bɛnyianle ye bɛ nu, bɛ nwo mɔɔ dɔ me kɛ bɛ kunlu a anrɛɛ mewɔ lɔ, bɛ nwo mɔɔ bɛyelele kɛ bɛkɛbɔ ɛbɛla kpalɛ, nee kɛ bɛzile bɛdeanle bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛlile ɛtane la. Adenle biala anu bɛyɛle bɛhilele kɛ bɛnli fɔlɛ fee wɔ edwɛkɛ ne anwo.
47007012	Yemɔti, saa mengɛlɛle bɛ kɛlata ne a, ɛnee tɛ ahenle mɔɔ yɛle ɛtane ne la ati ɔ, anzɛɛ ahenle mɔɔ bɛyɛle ye ɛtane ne la ati ɔ; mengɛlɛle, amaa bɛ ɛhulolɛ ne mɔɔ bɛlɛ ye wɔ me nwo la ala ali amaa bɛ wɔ Nyamenle anyunlu.
47007013	Zɔhane ati yɛ rɛle ɛkyekye. Tɛ yɛ rɛle mɔɔ ɛkyekye la angome, na yɛ nye liele kpole wɔ Taetɛse anyelielɛ mɔɔ ɔnyianle ye, nee ɔ rɛle mɔɔ bɛ muala bɛboale bɛkyekyele la anwo.
47007014	Saa mendule me nloa anu mengilele ye wɔ bɛ nwo a, bɛangua me nyunlu aze. Debie biala anu yɛka nɔhalɛ ne yɛkile bɛ, na ɛhye ati yɛɛ yɛ nloa anu mɔɔ yɛdule yɛhilele Taetɛse la ɛyɛ nɔhalɛ a.
47007015	Yemɔti ɔlɛ bɛ nwo ɛhulolɛ kpole, na ɔkakye bɛ muala bɛ tieyɛ nee kɛ bɛzile bɛvale ɛzulolɛ nee anwowozolɛ bɛyɛle ye akɔaba la.
47007016	Medi fɛlɛko kɛ mekola medie bɛ medi bɔkɔɔ a.
47008001	Mediema, yɛkpondɛ kɛ bɛnwu gyima mɔɔ Nyamenle ɛlolɛ ne ɛli wɔ asɔne ne mɔ mɔɔ wɔ Masidonea la anu la.
47008002	Bɛhɔle sɔnea nu kpole wɔ ndenle dɔɔnwo anu, noko bɛlile fɛlɛko kpole. Ɛnee bɛnlɛ bie suzuamgba ɛdeɛ, noko bɛluale bɛ amaneɛnwunlɛ ne anu bɛvale ninyɛne bɛhyɛle, bɛhilele bɛ atiakunlukɛnlɛma.
47008003	Medi daselɛ kɛ bɛmanle ahyɛlɛdeɛ, kɛmɔ bɛkɛhola ala la, na bɛboale bɔbɔ bɛmanle ɔbole zolɛ. Bɛvale ɛhulolɛ
47008004	bɛtinlinle zo bɛkpale yɛ kyɛlɛ kɛ yɛmaa bɛ adenle yɛmaa bɛboa Nyamenle menli ne mɔɔ wɔ ɛhyianlɛ nu la.
47008005	Yɛ nye anla fee. Bɛlumuale bɛvale bɛ nwo bɛmanle Awulae, na akee ɔlua Nyamenle ɛhulolɛ zo bɛava bɛ nwo bɛamaa yɛdayɛ noko.
47008006	Zɔhane ati yɛzɛlɛ Taetɛse mɔɔ lumuale bɔle gyima ɛhye abo la kɛ ɔrazɔ zolɛ wɔ bɛ nwo lɔ na ɔboa bɛ ɔmaa bɛwie ɛhulolɛ ɛzonlenlɛ ɛhye.
47008007	Kɛmɔ debie biala anu bɛdi munli, wɔ diedi nu, ɛdendɛlɛ nu, adwenlenubukelɛ nu, bɛ nye mɔɔ ɛkpota bɛ ti anwo kɛ bɛboa, nee ɛhulolɛ mɔɔ bɛlɛ ye wɔ yɛ nwo la, zɔhane ala yɛɛ yɛ nye la kɛ bɛkɛhile bɛ atiakunlukɛnlɛma noko wɔ ɛlolɛ ɛzonlenlɛ ɛhye anu bɛkɛmaa ɔkɛbo zolɛ a.
47008008	Mengyehyɛ mɛla memmaa bɛ. Melɛ moalɛ mɔɔ awie mɔ anye ɛbolo ɛlɛboa la menea kɛ bɛ ɛhulolɛ si to kɔ la.
47008009	Ɔluakɛ bɛze kɛ Awulae Gyisɛse Kelaese ɛlolɛ ne si de la; ɔle sukoavolɛ, noko ɔlua bɛ ti ɔyɛle ɔ nwo ehyianli, amaa yealua ye ehyia ne azo yeayɛ bɛ sukoavolɛma.
47008010	Me folɛ mɔɔ metu bɛ wɔ edwɛkɛ ɛhye anwo la a le kɛ, ɔle kpalɛ kɛ bɛkɛwie gyima mɔɔ ɛvolɛ ko mɔɔ ɛraze ɛhɔ la anu bɛhulole kɛ bɛkɛyɛ la yɛ kɛkala. Bɛmɛ a bɛlumuale bɛnyianle nwolɛ ɛhulolɛ kɛ bɛkɛyɛ a, yɛɛ bɛdabɛ noko a bɛlumuale bɛbɔle ɔ bo a.
47008011	Bɛhɔ zo bɛli gyima ne bɛhɔ awieleɛ, amaa mɔdenle mɔɔ bɛbɔle bɛhyehyɛle la awie kɛnlɛma kɛ bɛvale mɔɔ bɛlɛ ye la bɛwiele gyima ne.
47008012	Ɔluakɛ saa ɔwɔ bɛ nuhua kɛ bɛkɛmaa debie a, ɛnee mɔɔ bɛlɛ ye la azo a Nyamenle balua alie bɛ ahyɛlɛdeɛ ne a. Ɔnrɛnlea mɔɔ bɛnlɛ ye la azo ɔnrɛlie.
47008013	-
47008014	Menzoa bɛ adesoa kpole memmaa awie mɔ anwo ɛndɔ bɛ; na ɔle kpalɛ kɛ ɛnɛ mɔɔ bɛlɛ ye dɔɔnwo la, bɛkɛboa bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnlɛ bie la, amaa mekɛ mɔɔ bɛdabɛ noko bɛkɛhyia la menli mɔɔ lɛ bie dɔɔnwo la aboa bɛ. Ɔba ye zɛhae a ɛnee moalɛ ne ɛyɛ sɛsɛ.
47008015	Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne se, “Sonla mɔɔ sesale bɛ dɔɔnwo la annyia bɛ molozo, yɛɛ sonla mɔɔ sesale ekyi la angyia.”
47008016	Yɛyɛ Nyamenle mo somaa kɛ yemaa Taetɛse noko ɛnyia ɛhulolɛ kɛ yɛdayɛ la, kɛ ɔba yearaboa bɛ a.
47008017	Tɛ kɛ yekponle mɔɔ yɛbizale ye la azo angome ɔ, na ɔlɛba bɛ nwo lɔ kɛ sonla mɔɔ ɔdaye ɔlɛtu ɔ ti anwo adenle la.
47008018	Yɛlɛsoa ye nee adiema ne mɔɔ asɔne ne mɔ amuala di ye eni wɔ Edwɛkpa ne nolobɔlɛ nwo la.
47008019	Yeanga ye zɔhane, asɔnema ne ɛnlea nu ɛye ye na bɛyɛ ye kɛ ɔ nee yɛ ɛkpɔsa ɛyɛ ɛhulolɛ ɛzonlenlɛ gyima ɛhye, yɛva yɛde Awulae anyunlu, na yɛhile kɛ yɛkulo kɛ yɛboa.
47008020	Yɛlɛbɔ mɔdenle kɛ awie ɛnrɛnyia edwɛkɛ ɛtane biala ɛnrɛha wɔ kɛ yɛsi yɛnea ahyɛlɛdeɛ kɛnlɛma ye azo la.
47008021	Debie titile mɔɔ gyi yɛ nye zo la a le kɛ yɛkɛyɛ mɔɔ tenrɛ wɔ Nyamenle nee menli nyunlu la.
47008022	Yemɔti yɛlɛsoa bɛ nee yɛ muala yɛ diema ne mɔɔ mekɛ dɔɔnwo ne ala yɛzɔ ye yɛnlea na yɛnwu kɛ ɔkulo kɛ dahuu ɔboa la bɛ nwo lɔ. Kɛkala yelie bɛ yeli, yɛɛ yenyia ɛhulolɛ kpole kɛ ɔboa.
47008023	Taetɛse ɛdeɛ, ɔle me gɔnwo mɔɔ yɛbɔ nu yɛyɛ gyima yɛboa bɛ a; mediema mɔɔ nee ye ɛlɛba la gyigyi asɔne ne mɔ agyakɛ anu, yɛɛ bɛte Kelaese anyunlu.
47008024	Zɔhane ati bɛhile bɛ ɛhulolɛ, amaa asɔne ne mɔ ali nwolɛ daselɛ, na bɛanwu kɛ yɛanva bɛ yɛandu yɛ nwo mgbane.
47009001	Ɔngyia biala kɛ menwɔhɛlɛ bɛ wɔ moalɛ mɔɔ bɛlɛ bɛkamaa Nyamenle menli ne la anwo.
47009002	Meze kɛ bɛkulo kɛ bɛboa, yɛɛ meva bɛ medu me nloa anu mehile Masidoneama. Menganle kɛ, “Sumunli ɛkenle ɛvolɛ ne yɛɛ mediema mɔɔ wɔ Akaya (Giliki) maanzinli nu la boɔboale bɛ nwo kɛ bɛboa a.” Zɛhae mɔdenlebɔlɛ ne ɛmaa menli dɔɔnwo ne ala akee anye ɛbolo.
47009003	Kɛkala melɛsoa mediema ɛhye mɔ, amaa yɛ nloa anu mɔɔ yɛvale bɛ yɛdule wɔ edwɛkɛ ɛhye anwo la anyɛ mgbane, na kɛmɔ menganle la bɛaboɔboa bɛ nwo pɛneko.
47009004	Yeamba ye zɔ na saa Masidoneama bie mɔ nee me ba na bɛbanwu kɛ bɛtɛboɔboale bɛ nwo a, yɛ nee bɛ yɛ muala yɛ nyunlu bagua aze kpole kɛ yɛvale yɛ nye yɛdole bɛ nwo zo a.
47009005	Zɔhane ati medwenle nwolɛ kɛ ɔhyia kɛ metu mediema ɛhye mɔ kɛ bɛlumua me nyunlu wɔ bɛ nwo lɔ, na bɛaboɔboa ahyɛlɛdeɛ ne mɔ mɔɔ bɛvale bɛbɔle ɛwɔkɛ la anloa bɛado ɛkɛ, amaa saa meba a yeanyɛ kɛ asɛɛ awie yɛɛ ɛhye bɛ mialeranu kɛ bɛyɛ a, na bɛdabɛ bɛkulo kɛ bɛboa la ati ɔ.
47009006	Bɛhakye ɛhye: sonla mɔɔ dua ma ekyi la bu ekyi, yɛɛ mɔɔ dua dɔɔnwo la bu dɔɔnwo.
47009007	Awie biala ɛva mɔɔ yezuzu nwo wɔ ye ahonle nu la ɛmaa. Ɔmmatwenlehwenle ɔ bo aze anzɛɛ ɔyɛ ye kɛ asɛɛ yemia la ati ɔ, ɔluakɛ Nyamenle kulo sonla mɔɔ te ɔ nyunlu kyɛ debie la.
47009008	Nyamenle kola maa bɛ ninyɛne mɔɔ bɛhyia nwolɛ la maa ɔbo zolɛ, amaa dahuu bɛanyia mɔɔ sa bɛ la na bɛava bie bɛayɛ nyele.
47009009	Nyamenle edwɛkɛ ne se, “Ɔ sa dwu ehyianvolɛma anwo zo, ye atiakunlukpalɛ ne wɔ ɛkɛ dahuu.”
47009010	Nyamenle mɔɔ maa ɛyazonlɛnli ma maa ɔdua na ɔmaa ye aleɛ ɔdi la, kɛmaa bɛ ɛbɛlabɔlɛ nu ma mɔɔ bɛhyia nwolɛ la dɔɔnwo bɛkɛlua, na bɛ atiakunlukɛnlɛmayɛlɛ bɛyɔba ne azo dɔɔnwo.
47009011	Wɔ debie biala anu, Nyamenle bamaa bɛanyia bie, amaa bɛ ti akunlu ayɛ kɛnlɛma na menli dɔɔnwo ayɛ Nyamenle mo kɛ ɔlua yɛ nwo zo bɛnyia ahyɛlɛdeɛ bɛvi bɛ ɛkɛ ne a.
47009012	Ɔluakɛ bɛ ɛzonlenlɛ gyima ɛhye ɛmmaa Nyamenle menli ne ɛnnyia mɔɔ bɛkpondɛ la angome, na eza ɔmaa menli buke bɛ ahonle nu yɛ Nyamenle mo.
47009013	Bɛ ɛzonlenlɛ gyima ɛhye kile bɛ diedi mɔɔ bɛlɛ la. Ɔlua zo menli dɔɔnwo ye Nyamenle ayɛlɛ kɛ bɛdi Kelaese anwo Edwɛkpa ne mɔɔ bɛlie bɛdo bɛ nwo zo la azo, na bɛ nee awie biala kyɛ nyilalɛ mɔɔ bɛnyia ye la.
47009014	Zɔhane ati bɛbava anwolɔlɛ ɛhulolɛ kpalɛ bɛazɛlɛ bɛamaa bɛ wɔ ɛlolɛ molozo ne mɔɔ Nyamenle ɛva ɛlo bɛ la ati.
47009015	Bɛmaa yɛyɛ Nyamenle mo wɔ ye nwanwane ahyɛlɛdeɛ ne ati.
47010001	Medame Pɔɔlo, mesɛlɛ bɛ, bɛse mewɔ bɛ nwo lɔ a menle awie, na saa menle bɛ nwo lɔ a, ɛnee me nloa yɛ se wɔ bɛ nwo. Kelaese ati, melɛ bɛtɛɛyɛlɛ nee atiakunlukɛnlɛma mebodo bɛ,
47010002	bɛmmayɛ bɛmaa saa meba bɛ nwo lɔ a me nee bɛ bie badi ye ɛsesebɛ, ɔboalekɛ medie me nwo medi kɛ mekola mekile bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛse yɛfa ewiade adwenle a yɛbɔ yɛ ɛbɛla la kɛ meyɛ se.
47010003	Ɔle nɔhalɛ kɛ yɛde ewiade ye anu ɛdeɛ, noko tɛ ewiade ye konle a yɛlɛko a.
47010004	Tɛ ewiade konle ninyɛne a yɛfa yɛko a; Nyamenle konle ninyɛne mɔɔ tumi wɔ nu la a yɛfa yɛbubu aranemgbole ne mɔ a. Yɛsɛkye kpolerazulɛ mgbane mgbane;
47010005	yɛgologolo debie biala mɔɔ bɛkɛmaa ye zo adubɛnwo nu bɛkɛtia Nyamenle anwo adwenlenubukelɛ la, yɛɛ yɛkye adwenle biala nuokɛ yɛbele ye yɛmaa ɔtie Kelaese.
47010006	Na saa akee bɛkile kɛ bɛva bɛ nwo bɛmaa Kelaese bɔkɔɔ a, yɛadua awie biala mɔɔ anwo yɛ se la kakɛ wɔ ye nyɛleɛ nwo.
47010007	Anrɛɛ bɛnlea ye boɛ na bɛabua. Awie wɔ ɛkɛ ne mɔɔ ɔbu ɔ nwo kɛ ɔle Kelaese ɛdeɛ a, ɛnee bɛmaa ɔdwenle nwolɛ ɔhakye kɛ saa ɔle Kelaese ɛdeɛ a, ɛnee yɛdayɛ noko yɛle Kelaese ɛdeɛ.
47010008	Ɔnyɛ me nyiane kɛ metu me nwo somaa wɔ tumi ne mɔɔ Awulae ɛva ɛmaa yɛ la anwo a, ɔluakɛ Awulae anva ammaa yɛ kɛ yɛva yɛzɛkye bɛ, ɔse yɛva yɛnlea yɛmaa bɛkpazi.
47010009	Mengulo kɛ ɔyɛ kɛ asɛɛ mefa me ngɛlata ne mɔ meanwunlonwunla bɛ.
47010010	Ɔluakɛ bie baha kɛ, “Pɔɔlo yɛ se wɔ ngɛlata zo, na saa ɔwɔ ɛke a, ɔnle awie, yɛɛ ye edwɛkɛ ɛngyinla kpɔkɛ zo!”
47010011	Bɛmaa menli zɔhane mɔ ɛde ɔ bo kɛ mɔɔ yɛkɛlɛ ye wɔ ngɛlata ne mɔ anu, wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ yɛnle bɛ nwo lɔ la, yemɔ ala yɛɛ anrɛɛ yɛkɛha wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ yɛwɔ bɛ nwo lɔ la a.
47010012	Yɛnzi yɛ kɛnra yɛmbu yɛ nwo bie anzɛɛ yɛnva yɛ nwo yɛndo menli mɔɔ bɛdabɛ bɛ ngome bɛkanvo bɛ nwo la anwo. Bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛfa bɛ nwo bɛto awie mɔ anwo, na bɛnea awie mɔ bɛfa bɛ bɛto bɛ nwo la ɛnze nrɛlɛbɛ.
47010013	Na yɛmɛ, yɛnrɛmemaa yɛ nwo zo yɛnrɛmaa ɔnrɛbo zolɛ. Yɛmemaa yɛ nwo zo a, yɛmemaa ye wɔ gyima ne mɔɔ Nyamenle ɛva ɛzie yɛ nyunlu la anwo, kɛ yɛrali ye gyima wɔ bɛ nu.
47010014	Yɛdayɛ a yɛlumuale yɛvale Kelaese anwo Edwɛkpa ne yɛrɛlɛle bɛ a, yemɔti saa yɛfa bɛ yɛtu yɛ nwo a, ɛnee yɛtɛyɛle yɛtɛmanle ɔtɛbole zolɛ.
47010015	Yɛnva awie mɔ gyima mɔɔ bɛyɛ wɔ ɛleka mɔɔ Nyamenle anva ammaa yɛ la yɛndu yɛ nwo. Yɛ nye la kɛ saa bɛ diedi nyi a yɛɛ yɛ gyimayɛlɛ ne badɛlɛ kpole kpalɛ wɔ bɛ avinli a,
47010016	amaa yɛahola yɛahɔbɔ Edwɛkpa ne nolo wɔ maanle maanle fofolɛ zo na yɛanva awie gyima mɔɔ yeyɛ ye dɛba la yɛandu yɛ nwo.
47010017	Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne se, “Awie biala mɔɔ kpondɛ kɛ ɔmemaa ɔ nwo zo la ɛyɛ ye zɔ wɔ debie mɔɔ Awulae ɛyɛ la anwo.”
47010018	Ɔluakɛ tɛ sonla mɔɔ kanvo ɔ ngome ɔ nwo la a sɔ Nyamenle anye a, na sonla mɔɔ Awulae kanvo ye la a sɔ Nyamenle anye a.
47011001	Me kunlu a anrɛɛ saa mele kɔnwɔne bɔbɔ a, bɛkɛva me zɔ. Mebodo bɛ, bɛyɛ ye zɔhane.
47011002	Metwe bɛ nwo nungule, kɛmɔ Nyamenle yɛ ye ala la. Bɛle kɛ bɛlɛra mɔɔ ɛnze nrenya mɔɔ meyia ye kɛ megya ye meamaa nrenya kokye, Kelaese mumua ne.
47011003	Noko mesulo kɛ, kɛmɔ ɛwɔlɛ ne vale adalɛ nrɛlɛbɛ bɛlɛbɛlale Yivi la, zɔhane ala yɛɛ bɛbazɛkye bɛ adwenle a, amaa bɛahwe bɛ nwo bɛavi Kelaese ɛzonlenlɛ kpalɛ ne mɔɔ di munli la anwo.
47011004	Ɔluakɛ bɛ nye die awie biala mɔɔ ba bɛ nwo nehane na ɔbabɔ Gyisɛse fofolɛ bie, mɔɔ tɛ yemɔ a ɔle Gyisɛse ne mɔɔ yɛbɔle ye nolo yɛhilele bɛ la anwo edwɛkɛ la anwo. Eza bɛdie sunsum nee edwɛkpa bie mɔɔ asolo bɛ na tɛ Nyamenle Sunsum ne nee Kelaese anwo Edwɛkpa ne mɔɔ bɛnyianle ye bɛvile yɛ lɔ la bɛto nu.
47011005	Menlie menli kɛ bɛ “ɛzoanvolɛma kpalɛ” ne mɔ tɛla me.
47011006	Saa me nloa yɛɛ ɛtɛtele bɔbɔ a, tɛ nwoma nu ɔ; yɛɛ yɛla ɛhye ali wienyi yɛhile bɛ wɔ ndenle dɔɔnwo nee debie biala anu.
