47011007	Yemɔti kɛmɔ membɔle Nyamenle Edwɛkpa ne nolo mengilele bɛ mɔɔ meanlie bɛ ɛhwee, na menganle me nwo aze, amaa meamaa bɛ zo la, se ɛnee me ɛtane mɔɔ meyɛ la ɛne?
47011008	Mekɛ mɔɔ meyɛ gyima ne wɔ bɛ avinli la, ɛnee asɔne ne bie mɔ a nea me a, yɛɛ saa meka ye kpalɛ a, ɛnee melɛwua asɔne ne mɔ, amaa meaboa bɛmɛ.
47011009	Mekɛ mɔɔ me nee bɛ de la, saa mekyia a mengyegye bɛ kɛ bɛboa me; mediema mɔɔ vi Masidonea rale la a rɛlɛle me debie biala mɔɔ mengyianle nwolɛ la a. Na kɛmɔ meanyɛ ye dɛba la, zɔhane ala yɛɛ menrɛva kpomgbolo biala menrɛkpolo bɛ kɔme a.
47011010	Meka Kelaese anwo edwɛkɛ nɔhalɛ ne mɔɔ wɔ me nu la kɛ, me nwo ɛdulɛ ɛhye awie biala ɛnrɛhola ɛnrɛdua me wɔ ɛleka biala wɔ Akaya (Giliki) maanzinli ye anu!
47011011	Duzu ati a melɛka ɛhye a? Mengulo bɛ edwɛkɛ ɔ? Nyamenle ze kɛ mekulo bɛ.
47011012	Mebahɔ zolɛ meayɛ mɔɔ melɛyɛ ye kɛkala la, amaa ɛzoanvolɛma zɔhane mɔ annyia kpɔkɛ angyinla zolɛ andu bɛ nwo kɛ bɛyɛ bɛ gyima, kɛmɔ yɛyɛ ye la.
47011013	Menli zɔhane mɔ le ɛzoanvolɛma alane mɔɔ adalɛ gyima a bɛyɛ a; bɛhakyi bɛ nwo kɛ asɛɛ bɛle Kelaese ɛzoanvolɛma!
47011014	Na ɔnyɛ nwanwane. Seetan bɔbɔ kola kakyi ɔ nwo yɛ kɛ ɔle wienyi nu soanvolɛ.
47011015	Yemɔti ɔnyɛ ɛzulolɛ kɛ Seetan sonvolɛma kɛhakyi bɛ nwo kɛ bɛle Nyamenle sonvolɛma kpalɛ a. Bɛbanyia ninyɛne mɔɔ bɛyɛ la anwo ahatualɛ mɔɔ fɛta la wɔ awieleɛ ne.
47011016	Mesi zolɛ bieko: bɛ nuhua biala mmadwenle kɛ mele kɔnwɔne; na saa bɛbu me zɔhane bɔbɔ a, ɛnee eza noko bɛlie me kɛ kɔnwɔne, amaa meanyia bie meadu me nwo ekyii.
47011017	Mɔɔ melɛka ye kɛkala la ɛnle edwɛkɛ mɔɔ melua Awulae Tumi zo a melɛka a, ɔluakɛ melɛtendɛ adubɛnwo nu kɛ mele kɔnwɔne.
47011018	Kɛmɔ dɔɔnwo ne ala fa ewiade ye anu ninyɛne tu bɛ nwo la, medame noko metu me nwo bie.
47011019	Bɛmɛ bɛdabɛ, bɛ nrɛlɛbɛ somasoma ti, bɛ nye die kɔnwɔnema anwo.
47011020	Bɛ nye die awie biala mɔɔ yɛ bɛ kɛ ahanra, awie mɔɔ sisi bɛ, awie mɔɔ tu ɔ nloa anu na ɔkpakyekpakye bɛ nye zo la anwo.
47011021	Ɔyɛ me nyiane kɛ melɛka kɛ yɛyɛle foanvoanle na yɛangola ɛhye mɔ bie yɛ a. Na saa awie kola fa debie tu ɔ nwo a ɛnee kɛmɔ melɛtendɛ kɛ kɔnwɔne la, medame noko mekola bie yɛ.
47011022	Saa bɛle Hibuluma a, medame mele Hibulunli. Saa bɛle Yizilayɛma a, medame mele Yizilayɛnli. Saa bɛle Ebileham nlɔnra a, medame mele Ebileham anlɔnra.
47011023	Saa bɛle Kelaese sonvolɛma a, ɛnee ɔkɛyɛ kɛ mezɛ bɔbɔ ɛdeɛ, noko mele sonvolɛ kpalɛ metɛla bɛ. Meyɛ gyima ɛsesebɛ kpalɛ, mela efiade fane dɔɔnwo medɛla bɛ, bɛbila me empele fane kɛyɛ nyɛ, yɛɛ mekɛ dɔɔnwo ne ala, ɔhale me nee ewule.
47011024	Dwuuma ɛbila me mbaka abulasa nee ngɔnla ne fane nnu.
47011025	Wulomuma ɛbila me empele fane nsa; bɛzi me awolɛ ko, mebutu nyevile nu fane nsa, yɛɛ meminli nyevile nye ko dɔnehwele abulanwiɔ nee nna.
47011026	Wɔ me adendulɛ dɔɔnwo ne mɔ anu, meyia esiane dɔɔnwo mɔɔ le kɛ azuyilɛ, ahɔdiawu, yɛɛ medame me gɔnwo mɔ Dwuuma, nee bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnle Dwuuma la asa anu esiane; meyia azua mgbole zo esiane, esiane wɔ fienemgbole nu, yɛɛ meyia agɔnwolɛma adalɛ asa anu esiane.
47011027	Meli gyima nee mgbelera dɔɔnwo; aleɛ dwo a nafelɛ ɛngɔ me nye zo; ɛhɔne nee nzuhɔne ku me; mekye ɛhɔne, ɛyɛlɛ ku me yɛɛ melɛ me nwo zɔ ɛlɛ.
47011028	Yeanga ɛhye mɔ angome, asɔne asɔne ne mɔ anwo adwenleadwenle le adesoa kpole mɔɔ mezo ye dahuu a.
47011029	Saa awie yɛ bɛtɛɛ a, ɛnee medame me nwo ɛgolo me; yɛɛ saa bɛtwe awie bɛkɔ ɛtane nu a, ɛnee me kunlu yelɛyela me.
47011030	Saa ɔwɔ kɛ metu me nwo a, menwɔyɛ ye zɔhane wɔ ninyɛne mɔɔ kile kɛ mele bɛtɛɛ la anwo.
47011031	Nyamenle mɔɔ le Awulae Gyisɛse ɔ Ze ne, yemɔ yɛɛ nyilalɛ ɛha ye duma ne dahuu a, ɔluakɛ ɔze kɛ membɔ adalɛ.
47011032	Mekɛ mɔɔ mewɔ Dɛmasekɛse la, Belemgbunli Alɛtase amɛnlado ne vale sinzavolɛma gyinlegyinlanle suakpole ne nlenkɛ mgbole ne mɔ anloa kɛ bɛhye me.
47011033	Na bɛdɛnlanle me kɛndɛne nu bɛwulale me suakpole ne bane ne tokule ne mɔ bie anu bɛdwulale me aze, na menvile ɔ sa.
47012001	Ɔwɔ kɛ metu me nwo, saa nvasoɛ ɛnle zolɛ bɔbɔ a, ɔwɔ kɛ metu me nwo. Noko meka ninyɛne mɔɔ Awulae ɛlolɛ zo yemaa menwu bɛ nee mɔɔ yeye yehile me la.
47012002	Meze Kelaese ɛdoavolɛ bie mɔɔ ɛvolɛ bulu nee nna mɔɔ ɛraze ɛhɔ la, bɛvale ye bɛhɔle anwuma wɔ Nyamenle anwo lɔ la; (saa nwonane nu o, saa sunsum nu o, menze, Nyamenle a ze a.)
47012003	Mɔɔ meze la a le kɛ bɛvale nrenya ɛhye bɛhɔle Paladaese, (menze saa bɛvale ye nwonane nu o, saa sunsum nu o, Nyamenle a ze a)
47012004	na ɛkɛ ne yɛɛ ɔdele edwɛkɛ mɔɔ bɛka a ɔnga, yɛɛ dasanli biala ɛnlɛ nwolɛ adenle kɛ ɔkɛha a.
47012005	Sonla zɛhae ati yɛɛ metu me nwo a, na ɔhale medame me ngome a, anrɛɛ menrɛdu me nwo ɛlɛ, kyesɛ wɔ ninyɛne mɔɔ kile kɛ mele bɛtɛɛ la anwo.
47012006	Saa mekulo kɛ metu me nwo a anrɛɛ menle kɔnwɔne wɔ nwolɛ, ɔluakɛ menwɔha nɔhalɛ ne. Noko menrɛdu me nwo, ɔboalekɛ memkpondɛ kɛ awie bu me bie maa ɔtɛla mɔɔ yenwu kɛ meyɛ nee mɔɔ yede kɛ meka la, anwo.
47012007	Amaa me ti anu anyɛ me fɛ na meadu me nwo wɔ nwanwane ninyɛne dɔɔnwo ne mɔ mɔɔ Nyamenle ɛye ɛhile me la anwo la, bɛwulale debie me nwonane ye anu, Seetan soanvolɛ bie ɔ, ɔgyegye me na ɔbɛlɛ me aze, amaa meandu me nwo.
47012008	Ɛhye ati menzɛlɛle Nyamenle fane nsa wɔ ɛhye anwo kɛ ɔye zɔhane ewule ne me nwo.
47012009	Na ɔbuale me kɛ, “Me ɛlolɛ ne le kpalɛ maa wɔ, ɔluakɛ me tumi ne anu yɛ se maa wɔ kpalɛ kpalɛ wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ ɛkɛyɛ bɛtɛɛ la.” Yemɔti medi fɛlɛko kpole kpalɛ na metu me nwo wɔ me bɛtɛɛyɛlɛ nwo, amaa Kelaese tumi ne aheda me nwo zo.
47012010	Kelaese ati, me kunlu dwo me nwo wɔ me bɛtɛɛyɛlɛ, aholoba ɛbɔlɛ, ngyegyelɛ, kpɔdekpɔdeyɛlɛ, yɛɛ munzule nu, ɔluakɛ mɔɔ menwɔyɛ bɛtɛɛ la ɛnee me nwo ɛyɛ se kpalɛ.
47012011	Se bɛnwu kɛ meyɛ kɔnwɔne, noko bɛdabɛ a bɛmaa meyɛ a. Bɛmɛ a bɛle menli mɔɔ anrɛɛ ɔwɔ kɛ bɛdie me bɛto nuhua a, ɔluakɛ saa mendo awie biala bɔbɔ a, bɛ “ɛzoanvolɛma zɔhane mɔ” ɛndɛla me wɔ adenle biala anu.
47012012	Menvale abotane kpole a menyɛle ninyɛne mɔɔ kile kɛ mele ɛzoanvolɛ la wɔ bɛ nu a; bɛnwunle sɛkɛlɛneɛ nee nwanwane ninyɛne nee gyima mɔɔ kile Nyamenle tumi ne la amuala.
47012013	Saa ɛye kɛ meangakyi kpomgbolo meamkpolo bɛ kɔme la ɛsie ahane a, ɛnee duzu debie kpalɛ a bɛyɛle bɛmanle asɔne ne mɔ mɔɔ ɛha, mɔɔ bɛanyɛ bɛammaa bɛmɛ a? Saa mevo bɛ wɔ ɛhye anu a, ɛnee bɛva bɛhyɛ me.
47012014	Ye fane nsa mɔɔ meboɔboa me nwo kɛ mebakpɔla bɛ la ɛne; saa meba a menrɛrakpolo bɛ kɔme, ɔluakɛ bɛdabɛ mumua ne a mekpondɛ bɛ a, na tɛ mɔɔ bɛlɛ ye la ɔ. Tɛ mralɛ a kpondɛ sie awovolɛma a, awovolɛma a kpondɛ sie mralɛ a.
47012015	Ɔkɛyɛ me kɛnlɛma kɛ menwɔva mɔɔ melɛ la amuala, nee medame me sonlabaka ne menwɔboa bɛ. Na saa mekulo bɛ edwɛkɛ kpole zɛhae a, ɛnee kɛmɔti yɛɛ bɛmɛ bɛngulo me edwɛkɛ fee ɛ?
47012016	Bɛdabɛ bɛze kɛ meanyɛ kpomgbolo meamkpolo bɛ kɔme, noko bɛmɛ bɛse mele kɛdɛba, na menvale mɛlɛbɛla a mengyele bɛ a.
47012017	Asoo menluale menli mɔɔ menzoanle bɛ la bie anwo zo mensisile bɛ?
47012018	Menzɛlɛle Taetɛse, na menzoanle ye nee adiema nrenya ko wɔ bɛ nwo lɔ, na ɛnee Taetɛse a rasisile bɛ a? Asoo ɔ nee me yɛ adwenle anyɛ ko, yɛɛ yɛmbɔ yɛ ɛbɛla ko?
47012019	Wɔannea a bɛkɛdwenle kɛ yɛbɔ mɔdenle yɛaza yɛ ne wɔ bɛ nyunlu. Ɔnle zɔhane fee! Yɛtendɛ, kɛmɔ Kelaese kulo kɛ yɛtendɛ wɔ Nyamenle anyunlu la. Ayi mɔ, debie biala mɔɔ yɛyɛ la, bɛdabɛ bɛ kpalɛ ti ɔ.
47012020	Mesulo ɔ nzi kɛ meba a menwɔrado bɛ wɔ adenle bie anu mɔɔ menrɛhulo a, anzɛɛ bɛdabɛ noko bɛkɛnwu me wɔ adenle bie anu mɔɔ bɛnrɛhulo a. Mesulo kɛ mebarado bɛ nee butulelilɛ, nungule ɛhwenlɛ, ɛya mgbole ɛvalɛ, angomedi, aholoba ɛbɔlɛ, nzekuebɔlɛ, mgbanyizonle ɛyɛlɛ, yɛɛ basabasayɛlɛ nu.
47012021	Ɔyɛ me kɛ meba bieko a me Nyamenle ne baha me aze wɔ bɛ nyunlu, na meazu meagua bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛyɛle ɛtane na bɛtɛnunle bɛ nwo wɔ bɛ nyɛleɛ mgbane mgbane mɔɔ anwo ɛnde, nee adwɔmanebɔlɛ nwo la ati zo.
47013001	Ɛhye a tɔ zolɛ fane nsa mɔɔ melɛba mearakpɔla bɛ a. Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne se, “Ɔwɔ kɛ menli nwiɔ anzɛɛ nsa foa ɛzonle biala mɔɔ bɛkɛdo awie la azo di daselɛ.”
47013002	Mekakye bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛyɛ ɛtane dɛba, nee bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛha la amuala kɛ, meha ye dɛba wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ membamkpɔlale bɛ mɔɔ tɔ zolɛ nwiɔ la, yɛɛ melɛka ye bieko kɛkala mɔɔ menle bɛ nwo lɔ la kɛ, saa meba a bɛ nuhua biala mɔɔ ɛyɛ ɛtane la ɛnrɛva ɔ nwo dwɔɔ.
47013003	Bɛkɛnwu kɛ amgba Kelaese dua me nwo zo tendɛ. Ɔ nee bɛ bali ye ɛsesebɛ na bɛanwu kɛ ɔnle bɛtɛɛ na ɔlɛ tumi.
47013004	Na saa ɔyɛle bɛtɛɛ ɔwule meanubaka ne azo bɔbɔ a, ɔlua Nyamenle tumi zo ɔde ngoane nu. Yɛdayɛ noko yɛle bɛtɛɛ wɔ Kelaese ati, na ɔlua Nyamenle tumi ne azo yɛ nee ye badɛnla na yɛ nee bɛ ali.
47013005	Bɛnleɛnlea bɛ ahonle nu, na bɛnlea kɛ bɛtɛdɛ bɛ diedi ne anu. Bɛzɔ bɛ nwo bɛnlea; asoo bɛnnwu kɛ Kelaese Gyisɛse wɔ bɛ nu? Ɛnee kyesɛ bɛangola sɔnea ne anloa gyinla.
47013006	Me nye la kɛ bɛkɛnwu kɛ yɛnle menli mɔɔ ɛkpo aze a.
47013007	Yɛsɛlɛ Nyamenle kɛ bɛnrɛyɛ ɛtane, tɛ kɛ amaa bɛanwu kɛ yɛho yɛdɔ zolɛ ɔ, na amaa yɛmɛ, saa ɔzɔho kɛ yɛkpo aze bɔbɔ a, bɛmɛ bɛayɛ mɔɔ le fɔɔnwo la.
47013008	Yɛngola yɛnyɛ debie biala yɛntia nɔhalɛ ne. Mɔɔ yɛkola ye yɛ la, yɛyɛ yɛboa nɔhalɛ ne.
47013009	Yɛdi fɛlɛko kɛ bɛkɛyɛ se na yɛmɛ yɛkɛyɛ bɛtɛɛ. Yɛsɛlɛ kɛ bɛkɛli munli.
47013010	Ɛhye ati yɛɛ kɛmɔ menle bɛ nwo lɔ la, melɛkɛlɛ bɛ kɛlata ɛhye a, amaa saa meba a me nee bɛ anli ye ɛsesebɛ, kɛmɔ tumi ne mɔɔ Awulae ɛva ɛmaa me la de la. Bɛ boɛyɛlɛ ti yɛɛ bɛvale tumi ne bɛmanle me a, na tɛ bɛ ɛzɛkyelɛ ti ɔ.
47013011	Mediema, akee mewie, mebiza bɛ ahye. Bɛhakyi bɛ subane; bɛli me folɛdulɛ ne mɔ azo, bɛmaa bɛ nloa ɛzɛ bɛ nwo na bɛdɛnla anzonudwolɛ nu. Na ɛhulolɛ nee anzonudwolɛ Nyamenle ne nee bɛ badɛnla.
47013012	Bɛva mediema ɛhulolɛ bɛyɛ bɛ nwo atuu. Nyamenle menli ne kɔsɔɔti biza bɛ ahye.
47013013	Awulae Gyisɛse Kelaese ɛlolɛ ne, Nyamenle ɛhulolɛ ne, nee Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza agɔnwolɛyɛlɛ ne nee bɛ muala ɛdɛnla.
48001001	Medame Pɔɔlo, mɔɔ Gyisɛse Kelaese nee Nyamenle Selɛ ne mɔɔ dwazole ye vile mɔwuamra anu la ɛvɛlɛ me kɛ menyɛ ɛzoanvolɛ, na tɛ menli a ɛhyehyɛ ɛyɛ me bɛ ɛzoanvolɛ la a melɛkɛlɛ kɛlata ɛhye a.
48001002	Me nee mediema mɔɔ wɔ ɛke la amuala yɛbiza bɛdabɛ asɔnema mɔɔ bɛwɔ Galeehyea maanzinli nu la amuala ahye.
48001003	Nyamenle Selɛ ne nee Awulae Gyisɛse Kelaese ɛlo bɛ na ɔmaa bɛ anzonudwolɛ.
48001004	Gyisɛse Kelaese wule manle yɛ, ɔliele yɛ ɔvile yɛ ɛtane nu, amaa yeaye yɛ yeavi munzule mekɛ ɛhye anu; ɔyɛle ɛhye, ɔluakɛ mɔɔ yɛ Ze Nyamenle ne kpondɛ kɛ ɔyɛ la ɛne.
48001005	Anyunlunyia ɛha Nyamenle dahuu! Amen.
48001006	Ɔyɛ me azibɛnwo kɛ kɛkala angome bɛlɛnriandi bɛavi Nyamenle ne mɔɔ ɔlua Gyisɛse Kelaese ati yelo bɛ na yevɛlɛ bɛ la anwo bɛahɔli edwɛkpa fofolɛ nzi a.
48001007	Nɔhalɛ, Edwɛkpa fofolɛ bieko ɛnle ɛkɛ mɔɔ vi Nyamenle ɛkɛ, kɛ mɔɔ meha mehile bɛ la ala. Menwu kɛ awie mɔ ɛlɛgyegye bɛ azɛkye bɛ adwenle, na bɛahakyi Edwɛkpa ne mɔɔ fane Kelaese anwo la.
48001008	Noko awie biala, saa yɛdayɛ o anzɛɛ Nyamenle soanvolɛma o, mɔɔ bɔ edwɛkpa gyɛne bie nolo ahile bɛ atia mɔɔ yɛha yɛhile bɛ dɛba la, munzule ɛha ye.
48001009	Yɛha, na eza mesi zolɛ bieko kɛ awie biala mɔɔ kɛbɔ edwɛkpa gyɛne bie nolo kɛhile bɛ kɛtia mɔɔ bɛde na bɛlie bɛli la, munzule ɛha ye.
48001010	Ɛnee ɔyɛ bɛ kɛ kɛkala akee mekpondɛ menli nganvolɛ, anzɛɛ Nyamenle nganvolɛ ɔ? Anzɛɛ mekpondɛ me nyunlu wɔ menli nu ɔ? Kyɛkyɛ! Saa mekpondɛ me nyunlu wɔ menli nu a, ɛnee menle Kelaese akɛlɛ.
48001011	Ayi mɔ, mekakye bɛ adwenle kɛ Edwɛkpa ne mɔɔ mebɔ ye nolo la ɛnvi sonla ɛkɛ.
48001012	Meanlie meanvi awie lɔ, yɛɛ tɛ awie a hilehilele me a. Gyisɛse Kelaese ɔdaye mumua ne a yele hilele me a.
48001013	Bɛdabɛ bɛde mɔɔ menyɛle wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ ɛnee meli Dwuuma Nyamenlezonlenlɛ maamɛla ne anzi la. Menyɛle Nyamenle menli ne kpɔdekpɔde memanle ɔbole zolɛ na membɔle mɔdenle kɛ megu asɔne ne.
48001014	Wɔ me tipɛne ne mɔ anu, biala ɛnle ɛkɛ mɔɔ nee me sɛ wɔ Dwuuma maamɛla ne azo ɛlilɛ nu a, yɛɛ eza me nye bolo yɛ nlenya mɔ ngilehilelɛ ne mɔɔ bɛgyakyile yɛ la anwo ɛsesebɛ kpalɛ.
48001015	Na amuanrɛɛ wɔ ɛhye mɔ amuala anu, ɛnee Nyamenle ɛye me ɛzie ɛkɛ dɛba ɛmaa ɔ nwo, bɔbɔ kolaa na bɛawo me, yɛɛ akee yelua ye ɛlolɛ zo yevɛlɛ me kɛ mendoa ɔ bo zo na menyɛ ye gyima a. Yemɔti mɔɔ mekɛ ne dwule na ɔbɔle kpɔkɛ
48001016	ɔyele ɔ ra ne ɔhilele me kɛ akee menga Edwɛkpa ne mɔɔ fane Kelaese anwo mengile bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnle Dwuuma la amuala mɔɔ ɛtɛtele la, meangɔmbiza sonla biala adwenle,
48001017	yɛɛ meangɔ Gyɛlusalɛm bɔbɔ kɛ mekanwu bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛle Kelaese ɛzoanvolɛma mɔɔ bɛli me nyunlu la. Ɛleka mɔɔ mengɔle la a le Areleebea, yɛɛ nzinlii menziale membale Dɛmasekɛse a.
48001018	Ɛvolɛ nsa anzi yɛɛ akee mengɔle Gyɛlusalɛm mengɔnlile dapɛne nwiɔ mengɔmkpɔlale Pita a.
48001019	Meangɔnwu ɛzoanvolɛ gyɛne bieko kɛ Gyemise mɔɔ le Awulae adiema nrenya ne ala.
48001020	(Nyamenle anyunlu, mɔɔ melɛka la amuala, adalɛ fee ɛnle nu.)
48001021	Nzinlii mengɔle akpɔsa wɔ Selea nee Selesea maanzinli ne mɔ anu.
48001022	Mekɛ ne anu ɛnee asɔnema mɔɔ wɔ Dwudiya la biala ɛnze me.
48001023	Mɔɔ ɛnee bɛze la a le mɔɔ awie mɔ ɛha na bɛde wɔ me nwo la kɛ, “Sonla ne mɔɔ yɛle yɛ kpɔdekpɔde kɛ ɔsɛkye Keleseɛn ɛzonlenlɛ ne la a ɛnɛ ɛlɛbɔ diedi ko ne ala nolo yeahile maanlema kɛ bɛlie Gyisɛse bɛli la!”
48001024	Na ɔlua me ti bɛyele Nyamenle ayɛlɛ.
48002001	Ɛvolɛ bulu nee nna pɛle nu la me nee Banabase yɛhɔle Gyɛlusalɛm bieko. Menvale Taetɛse membokale yɛ nwo yɛhɔle.
48002002	Mengɔle, ɔluakɛ ɛnee Nyamenle ɛye ɛhile me kɛ ɔwɔ kɛ mekɔ. Mengɔndwule la me nee mgbanyima ne mɔ yiale nu ahane na mengilehilele Edwɛkpa ne mɔɔ mebɔ ye nolo mekile bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnle Dwuuma la anu mengilele bɛ, amaa gyima ɛhye mɔɔ melɛyɛ nee mɔɔ meyɛ ye dɛba la anyɛ gyɛne.
48002003	Na Taetɛse bɔbɔ mɔɔ le Gilikinli na ɔ nee yɛ a hɔle la, bɛanga kɛ ɔyɛ ye mrenyanu nzonlɛ.
48002004	Ɛnee adalɛma bie mɔɔ ɛyɛ bɛ nwo kɛ bɛdie Kelaese bɛdi la ɛpele ɛpe adenle bie azo ɛra ayia ne bie. Menli ɛhye mɔ rale kɛ bɛbanlea kɛ yɛmɛ mɔɔ yɛdie Kelaese Gyisɛse yɛdi la yɛ nwo ɛzi ɛdɔ yɛ la. Bɛ adwenle a le kɛ bɛmaa yɛazia yɛayɛ ahanra wɔ Dwuuma mɛla ne abo,
48002005	na yɛammaa bɛ adenle fee, amaa yɛazie nɔhalɛ ne mɔɔ fane Edwɛkpa ne anwo, kɛmɔ kɛkala ɔde la gyɛlɛɛnye yɛamaa bɛ.
48002006	Mengilehilele Edwɛkpa ne mɔɔ mebɔ ye nolo la anu menwiele la, menli zɛhae mɔ, mɔɔ bɛse bɛle mgbanyima la anga kɛ debie bieko wɔ ɛkɛ mɔɔ ɔwɔ kɛ meyɛ a. Bɛle duzu menli bɔbɔ a, ɔnvane me nwo, ɔboalekɛ menli kɔsɔɔti sɛ wɔ Nyamenle anyunlu.
48002007	Mɔɔ bɛnwunle ye la a le kɛ amgba Nyamenle ɛva ye Edwɛkpa ne ɛwula me nloa na yezoa me kɛ membɔ ye nolo mengile bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnle Dwuuma la, kɛmɔ yeva yewula Pita anloa kɛ ɔbɔ ye nolo ɔhile Dwuuma la.
48002008	Bɛnwunle ye wienyi kɛ Nyamenle ko ne ala mɔɔ manle Pita rayɛle ɛzoanvolɛ wɔ Dwuuma ati la, ye ko ne ala yɛɛ ɛyɛ me ye ɛzoanvolɛ ɛmaa bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnle Dwuuma la a.
48002009	Gyemise, Pita, yɛɛ Dwɔn mɔɔ diedima ne bu bɛ kɛ bɛle mgbanyima la liele dole nu kɛ, nɔhalɛ, mame a Nyamenle ɛva ɛlolɛ gyima ɛhye ɛwula me sa nu a. Yemɔti bɛzomanle me nee Banabase, bɛyɛle yɛ mo nee yɛ, bɛhilele kɛ bɛlie yɛ bɛdo nu. Akee yɛ muala yɛliele yɛdole nu kɛ yɛmɛ yɛhɔbɔ nolo ne wɔ bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnle Dwuuma la anu na bɛdabɛ noko bɛhɔ Dwuuma anu.
48002010	Mɔɔ bɛzele yɛ la a le kɛ anrɛɛ yɛhakye na yɛboa mediema mɔɔ le ehyianvolɛma la, na ɛhye a le debie titile mɔɔ me nye bolole nwolɛ kɛ meyɛ a.
48002011	Na mɔɔ Pita rale Anteɔko la, ɔmanle mendwile ɔ nyunlu, ɔluakɛ ɛnee mɔɔ ɔlɛyɛ la ɛnle kpalɛ.
48002012	Alumua ne mɔɔ ɛnee menli bie mɔɔ Gyemise zoanle bɛ la ɛtɛbale la, ɛnee Pita nee mediema mɔɔ ɛnle Dwuuma la a di debie a. Na mɔɔ menli ne mɔ dwule ala la yɛɛ Pita hwenle ɔ nwo a, kɛ akee ɔ nee bɛ ɛnrɛdo ɛsalɛ bieko, ɔboalekɛ ɔsulo bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛ adwenle a le kɛ ɔwɔ kɛ bɛyɛ bɛ mrenyanu nzonlɛ la.
48002013	Mediema Dwuuma mɔɔ ɔradole bɛ la, bɛdabɛ noko bɛyɛle bɛ nwo avoanvoanle kɛ Pita la, bɛmanle Banabase bɔbɔ ɔdaye ɔbɔle bɛ foanvoanle ɛbɛla ɛhye bie.
48002014	Na menwunle kɛ bɛnlua nɔhalɛ adenle ne azo, kɛmɔ Edwɛkpa ne kile la, menzele Pita wɔ bɛ kɔsɔɔti bɛ nyunlu ɛkɛ ne kɛ, “Ɛle Dwuunli, noko wɔ ɛbɛla ne ɛngile kɛ ɛle Dwuunli. Na duzu ati a akee ɛkpondɛ kɛ bɛmɛ mɔɔ bɛnle Dwuuma la bɛkakyi bɛyɛ Dwuuma mgbemgbene nu ɛ?”
48002015	Ɔle nɔhalɛ kɛ bɛwole yɛ Dwuuma, na yɛnle kɛ menli mɔɔ ɛnle Dwuuma mɔɔ ɛnze Nyamenle la.
48002016	Noko mɔɔ yɛnwu ye la a le kɛ, tɛ mɛla ne azo ɛlilɛ yɛɛ maa sonla sɔ Nyamenle anye a, kyesɛ yɛdie Gyisɛse Kelaese yɛdi kolaa na yɛazɔ Nyamenle anye. Yɛdayɛ bɔbɔ, yɛliele Kelaese Gyisɛse yɛlile kolaa na Nyamenle alua zolɛ yeamaa yɛazɔ ɔ nye, na tɛ mɛla ne mɔɔ yɛlile zolɛ la ati ɔ. Ɔluakɛ sonla biala mɔɔ di mɛla ne azo la ɛnrɛzɔ Nyamenle anye ɛlɛ.
48002017	Saa yɛdayɛ mɔɔ yɛdie Kelaese Gyisɛse yɛali na yɛazɔ Nyamenle anye la eza yɛdi fɔlɛ a, se ɛnee Kelaese a twehwe yɛ kɔ ɛtane nu a? Egya ɛkpa ɛgua!
48002018	Saa mekpo mɛla adenle ne na eza mesia me nzi kɛ akee medi mɛla ne azo a, ɛnee mehile kɛ medi fɔlɛ na medo mɛla ne.
48002019	Mame, mɛla ne anyunlu a, mewu; mɛla ne a hunle me a, amaa meadɛnla ngoane nu meamaa Nyamenle.
48002020	Me nee Kelaese a bɛhunle yɛ wɔ meanubaka ne azo a, yemɔti saa mede ngoane nu a ɛnee tɛ medame ɔ, na Kelaese mɔɔ de me nu la ɔ. Ngoane ɛhye mɔɔ mede nu la, mede ye kɛ medie Nyamenle Ara ne mɔɔ hulole me na ɔdole ye ngoane aze ɔmanle me la medi la ati ɔ.
48002021	Nyamenle ɛlo me kpole, yemɔti menrɛkpo ye amunli. Ɔluakɛ saa sonla di mɛla ne azo kolaa na yeazɔ Nyamenle anye a, ɛnee noko Kelaese wule ewule mgbane.
48003001	O Galeehyeama ahɔnwɔne! Nwane a ɛhye bɛ sili a? Asoo bɛngakye mɔɔ bɛhanle bɛhilele bɛ, mɔɔ fane kɛ ɔzile ɔyɛle mɔɔ bɛhunle Gyisɛse Kelaese wɔ meanubaka ne azo la?
48003002	Bɛha ko ɛhye bɛmaa mendie, asoo mɛla ne mɔɔ bɛlile zo la ati a Nyamenle vale ye Sunsum ne manle bɛ a, anzɛɛ bɛdiele Edwɛkpa ne na bɛliele bɛlile la ati ɔ?
48003003	Duzu ati a bɛde bɛ nwo bɛdo zɛhae ɛ? Bɛbɔle ɔ bo kɛnlɛma wɔ Nyamenle Sunsum ne anu, na kɛ ɔyɛle mɔɔ bɛlɛwie ye nwonane nu ɛ?
48003004	Anzɛɛ bɛkpondɛ kɛ mɔɔ bɛnwu ye nee mɔɔ bɛnyia ye la amuala yɛ mgbane ɔ? Ɔnle kɛ ɔba ye zɔhane fee!
48003005	Yemɔti bɛdwenle kɛ Nyamenle fa ye Sunsum ne amaa bɛ, yeava bɛ yeayɛ nwanwane ninyɛne yeahile kɛ bɛlile mɛla ne azo, anzɛɛ bɛdie Edwɛkpa ne na bɛlie bɛli la ati ɔ?
48003006	Bɛhɛlɛ ye wɔ Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne anu kɛ, “Ebileham liele Nyamenle lile, na ɔlua ye diedi ti ɔzɔle Nyamenle anye.”
48003007	Ɛhye ati bɛkola bɛnwu kɛ Ebileham nlɔnra kpalɛ ne a le bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛdie Nyamenle bɛdi la.
48003008	Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne se, “Nyamenle balua bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnle Dwuuma la diedi zo yeamaa bɛazɔ ɔ nye.” Ɛhye kile kɛ Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne lumuale nwunle ye, na ɔbɔle Edwɛkpa ne nolo ɔhilele Ebileham kɛ, “Ɛ nwo zo yɛɛ Nyamenle balua ayila maanle maanle kɔsɔɔti a.”
48003009	Ebileham liele lile na bɛyilale ye. Zɔhane ala yɛɛ bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛdie bɛdi la amuala nyia nyilalɛ a.
48003010	Bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛdwenle kɛ bɛdi mɛla ne azo na bɛazɔ Nyamenle anye la ɛnwu amaneɛ. Ɔluakɛ Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne se, “Awie biala mɔɔ anli mɛla ne ngyehyɛlɛ ne amuala azo, kɛmɔ bɛhɛlɛ ye wɔ Nyamenle Mɛla buluku ne anu la, munzule ɛha ye.”
48003011	Kɛkala, yɛnwu ye wienyi kɛ awie ko biala ɛnrɛhola ɛnrɛli mɛla ne amuala azo na yeazɔ Nyamenle anye, ɔluakɛ Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne se, “Sonla ne mɔɔ kɛlie Nyamenle kɛli na ɔkɛzɔ ɔ nye la a banyia ngoane a.”
48003012	Noko mɛla ne azo ɛlilɛ nee Nyamenle mɔɔ ɛdie ye wɔali la ɛnle ko. Ɔluakɛ, Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne se, “Awie mɔɔ di mɛla ne amuala azo la a banyia ngoane a.”
48003013	Kelaese ɛralie ndeanlɛ muala, na yelie yɛ yevi munzule mɔɔ anrɛɛ mɛla ne fa yɛ ahɔ nu la anu, ɔluakɛ Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne se, “Mɔɔ bɛkɛhenda ye wɔ baka zo la munzule ɛha ye.”
48003014	Bɛhendanle Kelaese wɔ baka zo wɔ yɛmɛ yɛ ti, amaa ɔlua ɔ nwo zo bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnle Dwuuma la bɛanyia nyilalɛ ne mɔɔ Nyamenle vale bɔle Ebileham ɛwɔkɛ la bie, na kɛmɔ yɛdie Kelaese yɛdi la ati yɛ muala yɛ sa aha ye Sunsum ne mɔɔ ɔvale ɔbɔle yɛ ɛwɔkɛ la.
48003015	Mediema, memaa bɛ ndonwo ko na bɛnlea: Saa menli nwiɔ kponle ngyehyɛlɛ bie azo na bɛkye ɔ bo a, awie ɛngola ɛnzɛkye ye anzɛɛ ɛnva bie ɛmboka nwolɛ.
48003016	Nyamenle bɔle ɛwɔkɛ ne manle Ebileham nee ye anlɔnra. Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne ɛnga kɛ “ye nlɔnra,” mɔɔ kile kɛ nlɔnra ne mɔ zonle a. Ɔse “ye anlɔnra,” mɔɔ kile anlɔnra kokye, na anlɔnra ɛhye, yemɔ a le Kelaese.
48003017	Mɔɔ meka la a le kɛ, Nyamenle nee Ebileham yɛle ngyehyɛlɛ ne na bɛhyele ɔ bo la, ɔ nzi ɛvolɛ ɛya nna abulasa yɛɛ bɛvale mɛla ne bɛmanle Dwuuma a. Ɛhye ati mɛla ne ɛngola ɛntulu ngyekyeleɛ ne na ɔnzɛkye Nyamenle ɛwɔkɛ ne.
48003018	Ɔluakɛ saa Nyamenle ahyɛlɛdeɛ ne gyi mɛla ne azo ɛlilɛ zo a ɛnee noko ɔnle ahyɛlɛdeɛ mɔɔ gyi ye ɛwɔkɛ ne azo a. Na ɔle nɔhalɛ kɛ ye ɛwɔkɛ ne mɔɔ ɔbɔle Ebileham la ati a Nyamenle ɛmaa ahyɛlɛdeɛ mɔɔ le zɛhae la a.
48003019	Saa ɔle zɛhae a ɛnee mɛla ne kpɔkɛ mɔɔ gyi zolɛ la a le boni? Nyamenle vale mɛla ne manle, amaa sonla anwu ɛtane deɛ holɛ. Mɛla ne hilehilele yɛ ekyii hɔdwule kɛ Ebileham anlɔnra ne mɔɔ yemɔti bɛbɔle ɛwɔkɛ ne la rale la. Nyamenle manle ye soanvolɛma a vale mɛla ne luale sonla nwo zo rale a.
48003020	Ɛwɔkɛ ne ɛdeɛ, ɔdaye Nyamenle mumua ne yɛɛ ɔbɔle a, yeanva yeanlua awie anwo zo.
48003021	Ɛnee ɛhye kile kɛ mɛla ne tia Nyamenle ɛwɔkɛ ne mɔ ɔ? Kyɛkyɛ, ɔnle zɔhane fee. Saa mɛla bie wɔ ɛkɛ mɔɔ zolɛ ɛlilɛ maa menli ngoane a, anrɛɛ awie mɔɔ kɛli zolɛ la kɛzɔ Nyamenle anye.
48003022	Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne se ɛtane gyale ewiade amuala; ɛhye ati bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛdie Gyisɛse Kelaese bɛdi la angome a Nyamenle bava ye ɛwɔkɛ ne mɔɔ ɔbɔle la yeamaa bɛ a.
48003023	Mɔɔ ɛnee bɛtɛbukele diedi adenle ne la, mɛla ne bɔle yɛ kpanwu hɔdwule kɛ bɛbukele diedi adenle ne la.
48003024	Mɛla ne dɛnlanle yɛ nwo zo kpalɛ hɔdwule mekɛ mɔɔ Kelaese rale la, amaa saa yɛdie ye yɛdi a, yɛazɔ Nyamenle anye.
48003025	Kɛkala mɔɔ diedi mekɛ ne ɛra la, saa yɛdie Kelaese yɛdi a mɛla ne ɛnrɛdɛnla yɛ nwo zo bieko.
48003026	Bɛhakye ɛhye: Bɛlie Gyisɛse bɛli la ati bɛ kɔsɔɔti bɛ nee Gyisɛse Kelaese ɛbɔ nu ɛyɛ Nyamenle amra.
48003027	Bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛzɔne bɛ wɔ Kelaese duma nu la ɛva Kelaese agyakɛ.
48003028	Zɔhane ati ngakyile biala ɛnle Dwuuma nee sonla mɔɔ ɛnle Dwuunli la avinli, akɛlɛ nee dehelɛ, anzɛɛ nrenya nee raalɛ avinli. Ɔluakɛ Kelaese ati bɛ muala bɛle menli ko.
48003029	Saa bɛle Kelaese ɛdeɛ a, ɛnee bɛle Ebileham nlɔnra mɔɔ asa baha Nyamenle ahyɛlɛdeɛ ne mɔɔ ɔvale ɔbɔle ɛwɔkɛ ne la a.
48004001	Na bɛmaa mengile ɛhye anu bieko; ɔle kɛ kakula mɔɔ ɛli agya la. Mekɛ mɔɔ ɔle kakula la, ɔde ye kɛ asɛɛ ɔle akɛlɛ la wɔ sua nu ɛkɛ, noko ɔdaye a ɔlɛ debie biala mɔɔ wɔ awuke ne anu la a.
48004002	Ye ngakula nu, ɔlɛ sonla mɔɔ nea ye nee ye ninyɛne ne mɔ azo a, kɔkpula mekɛ mɔɔ ɔ ze ne mɔɔ ɔlile ye agya la hilele la.
48004003	Zɔhane ala yɛɛ yɛdayɛ noko yɛde a; mɔɔ ɛnee yɛle ngakula wɔ sunsum nu la yɛyɛle ngakula yɛmanle ewiade ye anu tumi muala.
48004004	Na mɔɔ mekɛ ne dwule la, Nyamenle zoanle ɔ Ra ne manle ɔrale ewiade. Raalɛ a nrenzɛle Ralɛ ɛhye a, na ɔwole ye ɔdole Dwuuma maamɛla ne anu,
48004005	kɛ ɔralie bɛdabɛ mɔɔ mɛla ne ɛlɛbu bɛ kɔme la, amaa bɛarayɛ Nyamenle amra.
48004006	Kɛmɔ bɛle ɔ mra la, Nyamenle ɛzoa ɔ Ra ne Sunsum ne yemaa yerayi yɛ ahonle ne mɔ tɛkɛɛ, yemɔti yɛkola yɛka kɛ, “Egya! Me Papa!”
48004007	Ɛhye kile kɛ bɛnle ngɛkɛlɛ bieko, na bɛle Selɛ ne amra. Na saa bɛle ɔ mra a, ɛnee bɛdi agya.
48004008	Dɛba ne mɔɔ bɛnze Nyamenle la, ɛnee bɛle ngɛkɛlɛ bɛmaa ninyɛne mgbane mgbane mɔɔ ɔnle kɛ bɛsonle bɛ la.
48004009	Kɛkala mɔɔ bɛnwu Nyamenle la anzɛɛ bɛmaa menga kɛ, kɛkala mɔɔ Nyamenle ɛkpondɛ bɛ bo zo la, duzu ati a eza bɛkulo kɛ bɛsia bɛkɔsonle sunsum ɛtane ɛtane, anwo anwunvɔne ɛhye mɔ bieko ɛ? Duzu ati a eza bɛkulo kɛ bɛsia bɛyɛ bɛ nwo ngɛkɛlɛ bɛmaa bɛ ɛ?
48004010	Bɛsie kenle, siane, ɛlobɔ, yɛɛ ɛvolɛ mɔɔ ko biala ɛvoyia dwu a bɛdi na bɛkyi ɔ nloa a.
48004011	Ɔyɛ me kɛ bɛmaa mevɛ mgbane!
48004012	Me mediema, mesɛlɛ bɛ, bɛva me gyakɛ, ɔluakɛ mele kɛ bɛdabɛ la. Bɛtɛyɛle me ɛtane biala.
48004013	Bɛdabɛ bɛze kɛ me nwo mɔɔ dole me la ati a menyianle adenle membɔle Edwɛkpa ne nolo mengilele bɛ a.
48004014	Noko mekɛ ne anu bɔbɔ mɔɔ ɛnee me anwondolɛ ne kpondɛ ayɛ dwɛwɔlɛ amaa bɛ la, bɛamkpo me. Bɛliele me kɛmɔ bɛkɛlie Nyamenle soanvolɛ anzɛɛ Kelaese Gyisɛse ɔdaye mumua ne la.
48004015	Na kɛkala, bɛ atiakunlukɛnlɛma ne wɔ nienwu? Ɛnee medi daselɛ kɛ saa bɛyɛ na ɔkɛyɛ boɛ bɔbɔ a, anrɛɛ bɛdudule bɛ nye bɛmanle me.
48004016	Na kɛ ɔyɛ mɔɔ kɛkala angome bɛmaa meyɛ bɛ kpɔvolɛ kɛ meha nɔhalɛ ne mehile bɛ la ɛ?
48004017	Menli zɔhane mɔ yɛ kɛ asɛɛ bɛ nye die bɛ nwo, noko tɛ adenle kpalɛ zo a bɛ nee bɛ lua la! Mɔɔ menli zɔhane mɔ kpondɛ la a le kɛ bɛkɛhwe bɛ bɛkɛvi me nwo, amaa bɛdabɛ noko bɛ nye alie bɛmɛ bɛ nwo.
48004018	Ɔle kpalɛ kɛ menli kɛnyia bɛ nwo ɛhulolɛ, noko bɛmaa ɔyɛ zɔhane wɔ adenle kpalɛ nu, na bɛyɛ ye zɔhane dahuu, bɔbɔ wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ me nee bɛ ɛnde la.
48004019	O me mra ngakula, medi bɛ nwo nyane, na mete ye wɔ me nwonane nu kɛ raalɛ mɔɔ ɛvo awolɛ zo la, na ɔbahɔ zo zɔhane kɔkpula mekɛ mɔɔ bɛkɛnyia Kelaese su ne wɔ bɛ nu la.
48004020	Me kunlu a anrɛɛ me nee bɛ a wɔ lɔ a, na meanwu mɔɔ ɔwɔ kɛ meka la. Medwenle bɛ nwo somaa!
48004021	Bɛmaa membiza bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛkulo kɛ bɛboa mɛla ne abo la kɛ, asoo bɛnde mɔɔ mɛla mumua ne se la?
48004022	Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne se Ebileham wole mralɛ mrenya nwiɔ. Ko ɔ nli le akɛlɛ yɛɛ ko ɔ nli le dehelɛ.
48004023	Ebileham nee ɔ ye akɛlɛ ne bɛ ra ne, bɛwole ye kɛ bɛwo ralɛ biala la, na ɔ nee dehelɛ ne bɛ ra ne, yemɔ bɛluale Nyamenle ɛwɔkɛ zo a bɛwole ye a.
48004024	Debie zɛhae ka yɛ edwɛkɛ mɔɔ ndelebɛbo wɔ nu a: mraalɛ nwiɔ ne gyi ɛkɛ maa ngyekyeleɛ nwiɔ. Raalɛ ne mɔɔ wole ɔ mra ɛdeɛ ne wɔ akɛlɛ ɛzonlenlɛ nu la a le Heega; ɔgyi ɛkɛ ɔmaa ngyekyeleɛ ne mɔɔ bɛyɛle ye wɔ Boka Saenae azo la.
48004025	Yemɔti Heega gyi ɛkɛ maa Boka Saenae mɔɔ wɔ Areleebea la, na yemɔ a le ɛnɛ mekɛ ye suakpole Gyɛlusalɛm. Ɔ nee menli mɔɔ wɔ zolɛ la amuala wɔ akɛlɛ ɛzonlenlɛ bo.
48004026	Na suakpole Gyɛlusalɛm kpalɛ ne mɔɔ wɔ anwuma la ɛnle akɛlɛ ɛzonlenlɛ bo. Yemɔ ɔle dehelɛ, na ɔle yɛ sua zo kpalɛ nee yɛ nli.
48004027	Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne se, “Wɔmɔ raalɛ mɔɔ ɛtɛwole ɛlɛ a, wɔmɔ mɔɔ ɛtɛtele awolɛ nyane ɛlɛ a, di fɛlɛko, maa ɛ nye ɛlie, ɔluakɛ raalɛ ne mɔɔ bɛkpole ye la, lɛ mralɛ dɔɔnwo tɛla raalɛ ne mɔɔ lɛ agyalɛ mumua ne la.”
48004028	Mediema, ɛwɔkɛ ne mɔɔ Nyamenle bɔle Ebileham la ati, yɛle ɔdaye Nyamenle ɔ mra, kɛmɔ Ayezeke de la.
48004029	Mekɛ ne anu ralɛ ne mɔɔ bɛwole ye kɛ bɛwo ralɛ biala la yɛle mɔɔ bɛluale Nyamenle Sunsum ne tumi zo bɛwole ye la kpɔdekpɔde. Zɔhane ala noko yɛɛ kɛkala ɔde a.
48004030	Na Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne se duzu? Ɔse, “To akɛlɛ ne nee ɔ ra ne adenle zo, ɔluakɛ akɛlɛ ralɛ nee dehelɛ ralɛ ɛmbɔ nu ɛnli agya.”
48004031	Yemɔti, mediema, bɛnwu ye kɛ yɛnle akɛlɛ ne amra na yɛle dehelɛ ne amra.
48005001	Yɛlɛ fanwodi; Kelaese ɛraye yɛ kɔme kpomgbolo. Yemɔti, bɛgyinla kpundii kɛ bɛdi bɛ ti anwo, na bɛmmamaa adenle bɛmaa bɛyɛ bɛ ngɛkɛlɛ bieko.
48005002	Bɛdie! Medame Pɔɔlo yɛɛ melɛka meahile bɛ a. Saa bɛmaa adenle bɛmaa bɛyɛ bɛ mrenyanu nzonlɛ a, ɛnee bɛhile kɛ Kelaese anwo ɛnlɛ nvasoɛ ɛmmaa bɛ.
48005003	Mekakye bɛ bieko, mɔɔ kɛmaa adenle kɛmaa bɛkɛyɛ ye mrenyanu nzonlɛ la ɛmaa adenle kɛ mɛla ne ɛkyekye ye, na ɔwɔ kɛ ɔdi mɛla ne amuala azo.
48005004	Bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛdwenle kɛ bɛdi mɛla ne azo a bɛkɛzɔ Nyamenle anye la ɛhwe bɛ nwo ɛvi Kelaese anwo, na bɛnrɛnyia Nyamenle ɛlolɛ ne bie.
48005005	Yɛmɛ, ɔlua Nyamenle Sunsum ne azo, kɛmɔ yɛdie Kelaese Gyisɛse yɛdi la ati, yɛ nye la kɛ Nyamenle ɔdaye ɔbamaa yɛazɔ ɔ nye.
48005006	Ɔluakɛ saa yɛ nee Kelaese Gyisɛse yɛ ko a, yɛyɛ yɛ mrenyanu nzonlɛ o, yɛanyɛ o, ɔngyia. Mɔɔ hyia la a le kɛ yɛkɛnyia diedi mɔɔ fa ɛhulolɛ yɛ gyima la.
48005007	Alumua ne ɛnee bɛlɛbɔ mɔdenle kpalɛ! Na nwane a ɛze bɛ kɛ bɛmmadie nɔhalɛ ne bɛdi a?
48005008	Tɛ Nyamenle mɔɔ ɛvɛlɛ bɛ la a eza ɛze bɛ kɛ bɛyɛ ɛhye a.
48005009	Amgba, ɔle kɛ mɔɔ bɛka la, “Fɛlɛ ko dɔ sonlɛ na ɔla fɛlɛ dɔɔnwo avinli a, ɔsɛkye bɛ muala.”
48005010	Melɛ diedi wɔ Awulae anu kɛ bɛnrɛnyia adwenle fofolɛ biala kɛ me ɛdeɛ ne ala. Na ahenle holɛ ko mɔɔ ɔdaye ɔse ɔkɛgyegye bɛ la, Nyamenle badua ye kakɛ!
48005011	Na mediema, asoo medame, saa mrenyanu nzonlɛyɛlɛ yɛɛ mebɔ nwolɛ nolo a anrɛɛ ɛnee duzu ati a bɛlɛyɛ me kpɔdekpɔde ɛ? Anrɛɛ Kelaese meanubaka ne mɔɔ mebɔ nwolɛ nolo la ɛnyɛ ngyegyelɛ biala ɛmmaa awie biala.
48005012	Me kunlu a anrɛɛ menli mɔɔ ɛlɛgyegye bɛ la kɛhɔ zo zɛhae ala na bɛkɛza bɛ nwo bɔbɔ.
48005013	Na bɛmɛ me mediema, Nyamenle ɛvɛlɛ bɛ, ɛye bɛ kɔme kpomgbolo. Yemɔti bɛmmadi bɛ atiakunluwɔzo nzi na bɛfa bɛ fanwodi ne bɛyɛ mɔɔ bɛdabɛ bɛkulo la. Bɛva ɛhulolɛ bɛzonle bɛ nwo ngoko.
48005014	Ɔluakɛ mɛla ne amuala, bɛbɔ ye kpɔkɛ ko bɛmaa yɛ kɛ, “Kulo ɛ gɔnwo kɛ ɛdawɔ mumua ne ɛ nwo.”
48005015	Na saa bɛyɛ bɛ nwo kɛ ɛbɔ nu nane, bɛkeka bɛ nwo, na bɛyɛ bɛ nwo anwula a, ɛnee noko bɛnlea boɛ na bɛanguhu bɛ nwo.
48005016	Mɔɔ meka meahile bɛ la a le kɛ, bɛmaa Nyamenle Sunsum ne ɛhilehile bɛ adenle na bɛmmadi bɛ nwonane ne atiakunluwɔzo nzi.
48005017	Ɔluakɛ sonla atiakunluwɔzo ne ko tia Nyamenle Sunsum ne, yɛɛ Nyamenle Sunsum ne ɛhulolɛdeɛ ne ko tia sonla atiakunluwɔzo ne. Bɛ mu nwiɔ bɛnga fee, amaa bɛdabɛ noko bɛanyɛ mɔɔ bɛkulo kɛ bɛyɛ la.
48005018	Saa bɛmaa Nyamenle Sunsum ne kile bɛ adenle a, mɛla ne ɛngola ɛnkyekye bɛ bieko.
48005019	Sonla su ne gyima mɔɔ di la da ali wienyi. Bɛmɛ a le adwɔmane, ɛbɛla mgbane mgbane mɔɔ anwo ɛnde la ɛbɔlɛ,
48005020	bozonle ɛzonlenlɛ nee ayɛne ɛbɛla. Ɛkpɔlɛ, konle, nungule, ɛya, angomedi, ngyehyɛnu nee ngilehilenu,
48005021	anyebolo, kɔdiawuyɛlɛ, nza ɛbolɛ, anyelielɛ mgbane mgbane nee ninyɛne mɔɔ le zɛhae mɔ la. Meha mehile bɛ dɛba, na eza mekakye bɛ bieko kɛ bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛyɛ ninyɛne ɛhye mɔ la ɛnrɛnwu Nyamenle Belemgbunlililɛ ne.
48005022	Nyamenle Sunsum ne ma a le ɛhye mɔ: ɛhulolɛ, anyelielɛ, anzonudwolɛ, abotane, atiakunlukɛnlɛmayɛlɛ, kpalɛyɛlɛ, nɔhalɛlilɛ,
48005023	mɛlɛbɛnwoaze, yɛɛ bɛ nwo zo ɛhomolɛ. Ɛhye mɔ, mɛla biala ɛnle ɛkɛ mɔɔ tia bɛ a.
48005024	Bɛmɛ mɔɔ bɛle Kelaese Gyisɛse ɛdeɛ la, ɛbɔ bɛ su dɛba ne nee bɛ nwonane ne atiakunluwɔzo mgbane mgbane ne mɔ amuala meanubaka nu.
48005025	Saa Nyamenle Sunsum ne ɛmaa yɛ ngoane a, ɛnee bɛmaa Sunsum ne ɛli yɛ nyunlu wɔ yɛ ɛbɛlabɔlɛ nu.
48005026	Ɔnle kɛ yɛmemaa yɛ nwo zo, yɛka yɛ gɔnwo mɔ ɛya, na yɛ nye bolo bɛ.
48006001	Mediema, saa bɛnwu awie mɔɔ ɛlɛyɛ ɛtane a, bɛdabɛ mɔɔ Nyamenle Sunsum ne wɔ bɛ nu la ɛdenrɛ ye, noko anrɛɛ bɛyɛ ye bɛtɛɛ wɔ adenle kɛnlɛma nu. Bɛdabɛ noko bɛnlea bɛ nwo boɛ na bɛanyɛ mɔɔ ahenle yɛle la bie.
48006002	Bɛsosɔ bɛ nwo ngoko, na bɛyɛ ye zɔhane a ɛnee bɛlɛdi Kelaese mɛla ne azo.
48006003	Saa awie bu ɔ nwo noko ɔndo ɛhwee a, ɛnee ɔlɛbɛlɛbɛla ɔ nwo.
48006004	Awie biala ɔdaye ɔwɔ kɛ ɔbua ye nyɛleɛ nwo ndɛne, na saa ɔle kpalɛ a yeava mɔɔ yeyɛ la yeadu ɔ nwo; ɔmmafa awie ɛdeɛ mɔɔ ɛyɛ la ɔto ye ɛdeɛ ne anwo.
48006005	Ɔluakɛ awie biala ɔdaye ɔbazoa ye adesoa.
48006006	Bɛmaa awie mɔɔ bɛlɛmaa ye Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ nwo ngilehilelɛ la ɛmaa ye kilehilevolɛ ne debie kpalɛ biala mɔɔ ɔkɛnyia ye la bie.
48006007	Bɛmmabɛlɛbɛla bɛ nwo; bɛnzi Nyamenle amgbu, ɔluakɛ mɔɔ sonla kɛlua la yɛɛ ɔbu a;
48006008	ɔluakɛ, mɔɔ kɛli ye nwonane ne atiakunluwɔzo nzi la banyia ewule. Na mɔɔ di Nyamenle Sunsum ne anzi la balua Sunsum ne azo anyia ngoane mɔɔ ɛnlɛ awieleɛ.
48006009	Bɛmaa yɛhɔ zolɛ yɛyɛ kpalɛ; ɔluakɛ saa yɛangyakyi nyele ɛyɛlɛ a, kenle bie yɛbanwu ɔ bo aleɛ.
48006010	Zɔhane ati, kenle biala mɔɔ mekɛ kɛra kɛ ɔwɔ kɛ yɛyɛ nyele la, bɛmaa yɛyɛ yɛmaa awie biala, bɔbɔ bɛdabɛ mɔɔ yɛ nee bɛ yɛ muala yɛlɛ diedi ko la.
48006011	Bɛnlea kɛ mezi meva me sa anloa mgbole ye melɛkɛlɛ bɛ la.
48006012	Menli mɔɔ ɛlɛka ye ndinlizo kɛ bɛyɛ bɛ mrenyanu nzonlɛ la kulo kɛ bɛkile bɛ nwo ala kɛ bɛze amaamuo. Bɛyɛ bie zɔhane ala, amaa awie anyɛ bɛ kpɔdekpɔde kɛ bɛlɛka Kelaese ewule mɔɔ ɔwule meanubaka ne azo la anwo edwɛkɛ.
48006013	Bɛdabɛ mumua ne mɔɔ bɛ nye ɛbolo mrenyanu nzonlɛyɛlɛ nwo bɔbɔ la, bɛnli mɛla ne azo nretee zɛhae. Bɛkulo kɛ bɛmɛ Galeehyeama bɛyɛ bɛ mrenyanu nzonlɛ, amaa bɛanyia bie bɛadu bɛ nloa anu kɛ bɛmɛ a bɛmaa bɛlɛdi zɛhae mɛla ne azo a.
48006014	Na mame, ɔkɛbɔ me tɔ kɛ menwɔdu me nloa anu a kyesɛ debie ko anwo ala, yemɔ a le Awulae Kelaese Gyisɛse meanubaka ne. Ɔluakɛ ye meanubaka ne ati, ewiade le debie funli maa me, yɛɛ medame mumua ne mewu memaa ewiade.
48006015	Saa ɔwɔ kɛ awie yɛ ye mrenyanu nzonlɛ o, saa ɔnle kɛ ɔyɛ o, ɔle debie mɔɔ ɛngyia fee a. Mɔɔ hyia la a le kɛ yɛkɛyɛ menli fofolɛ bɔkɔɔ.
48006016	Bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛdi zɛhae ngyehyɛlɛ fofolɛ ne azo la, bɛmɛ nee Nyamenle menli kɔsɔɔti, yɛɛ yɛsɛlɛ kɛ ɔdaye Nyamenle ɔnwu bɛ anwunvɔne na ɔmaa bɛdɛnla anzonudwolɛ nu a.
48006017	Ɔvi ɛnɛ mɔɔ kɔ la awie biala mmagyegye me bieko, ɔboalekɛ ahapenle mɔɔ wɔ me nwo la kile kɛ mele Kelaese Gyisɛse akɛlɛ.
48006018	Me mediema, yɛ Awulae Gyisɛse Kelaese ɛlo bɛ na ɔ nee bɛ muala ɛdɛnla! Amen.
49001001	Pɔɔlo mɔɔ ɔlua Nyamenle ɛhulolɛ zo yeyɛ Kelaese Gyisɛse ɛzoanvolɛ la yɛɛ ɛlɛkɛlɛ kɛlata ɛhye a. Ɔlɛ ɔkamaa Nyamenle menli ne mɔɔ wɔ Ɛfɛsɛse mɔɔ Kelaese Gyisɛse ati bɛdi nɔhalɛ wɔ bɛ ɛbɛlabɔlɛ nu la.
49001002	Yɛ Ze Nyamenle nee Awulae Gyisɛse Kelaese ɛlo bɛ na ɔmaa bɛ anzonudwolɛ.
49001003	Yɛyɛ Nyamenle mɔɔ le yɛ Awulae Gyisɛse Kelaese ɔ Ze ne mo. Ɔluakɛ yelua yɛ koyɛlɛ ne mɔɔ yɛ nee Kelaese ɛyɛ la azo yeyila yɛ na yeva anwuma Sunsum nu ahyɛlɛdeɛ muala yemaa yɛ.
49001004	Nyamenle kpale nu yele yɛ ziele ɛkɛ manle Kelaese kolaa na yeabɔ ewiade, amaa yɛ nwo ade nwuanzaanwu mɔɔ fɔlɛlilɛ biala ɛnle yɛ nu wɔ ɔ nyunlu a. Ɔlua ye ɛhulolɛ ne ati
49001005	Nyamenle bɔle kpɔkɛ dɛba kɛ, ɔlua Gyisɛse Kelaese anwo zo, ɔbamaa yɛayɛ ɔ mra, kɛmɔ ye ɛhulolɛdeɛ ne mɔɔ gyi ɔ nyunlu la de la.
49001006	Bɛmaa yɛye Nyamenle ayɛlɛ wɔ ye nwanwane ɛlolɛ kpole nee ye ahyɛlɛdeɛ ne mɔɔ yelua ɔ Ra ne mɔɔ ɔkulo ye la anwo zo yeva yemaa yɛ la ati.
49001007	Ɔluakɛ Kelaese ewule ne ati bɛva yɛ ɛtane ne mɔ bɛhyɛ yɛ na yɛnyia yɛ ti. Nyamenle ɛlolɛ ne
49001008	mɔɔ ɔvale ɔmanle yɛ la le kpole mɔɔ bɛngola bɛnzuzu a! Ɔlua nrɛlɛbɛ nee adwenlenunwunlɛ zo
49001009	Nyamenle yɛle mɔɔ yehyehyɛ la, na yelua Kelaese anwo zo yemaa yɛnwu ye ngyehyɛlɛ ne mɔɔ yedwenle nwolɛ dɛba yedo ɛkɛ ne na ɔvea la.
49001010	Ngyehyɛlɛ ɛhye, mɔɔ ye mekɛ dwu a Nyamenle bamaa yeali munli la a le kɛ, ɔkuohua abɔdeɛ muala mɔɔ wɔ anwuma nee aze la anloa, na yeava Kelaese yeazie bɛ ti.
49001011	Debie biala mɔɔ Nyamenle yɛ la gyi ɔdaye ye ngyehyɛlɛ nee ye kpɔkɛ mɔɔ yebɔ la azo, na kɛmɔ mɔlebɛbo ne ɔdaye ɔhyehyɛle la, yelua yɛ nee Kelaese yɛ koyɛlɛ ne azo yekpa nu yeye yɛ kɛ yɛle ye ɛdeɛ.
49001012	Yemɔti bɛmaa yɛdayɛ mɔɔ yɛlumuale yɛnyianle anyelazo wɔ Kelaese anu la yɛye Nyamenle anyunlunyia ne ayɛlɛ.
49001013	Bɛdabɛ noko, kɛmɔ bɛdele nɔhalɛ edwɛkɛ ne, mɔɔ le Edwɛkpa ne mɔɔ vale ngoanelielɛ rɛlɛle bɛ, na bɛliele Kelaese bɛlile la ati, Nyamenle vale ye Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne, mɔɔ ɔvale ɔbɔle ɛwɔkɛ la ɔmanle bɛ, ɔvale ɔyɛle bɛ nzonlɛ kɛ bɛle ye menli.
49001014	Sunsum ne di agyinlanu kɛ yɛbanyia mɔɔ Nyamenle ɛva ɛbɔ ye menli ɛwɔkɛ la; eza ɔmaa yɛsi pi kɛ Nyamenle bamaa menli mɔɔ le ye ɛdeɛ la anyia bɛ ti bɔkɔɔ. Bɛmaa yɛye ye anyunlunyia ne ayɛlɛ!
49001015	Zɔhane ati sumunli kɛ mendele bɛ nganeɛ kɛ bɛlie Awulae Gyisɛse bɛli, nee bɛ ɛhulolɛ mɔɔ bɛlɛ ye wɔ Nyamenle menli muala anwo la,
49001016	dahuu meyɛ Nyamenle mo wɔ bɛ ti. Mekakye bɛ wɔ me nzɛlɛlɛ nu,
49001017	na mesɛlɛ yɛ Awulae Gyisɛse Kelaese Nyamenle ne mɔɔ le anyunlunyia Selɛ ne kɛ ɔmaa bɛ Sunsum nu nrɛlɛbɛ nee ndelebɛbo mɔɔ kɛmaa bɛkɛnwu ɔdaye Nyamenle kpalɛ la.
49001018	Mesɛlɛ kɛ bɛ adwenle nu kɛbuke, amaa bɛanwu anyelazo ne mɔɔ yevɛlɛ bɛ wɔ nu, ye nwanwane nyilalɛ ne mɔ mɔɔ ɔfa ɔbɔ ye menli ɛwɔkɛ la anu anwonyia ne
49001019	nee kɛ ye tumi ne kpole si de la. Tumi ɛhye mɔɔ ɛlɛdi gyima wɔ yɛmɛ mɔɔ yɛdie ye yɛdi la anu la, yemɔ ala a le anwosesebɛ bedevinli ne
49001020	mɔɔ Nyamenle vale dwazole Kelaese vile ewule nu, na ɔvale ye ɔdɛnlanle ɔ sa fema zo wɔ anwuma la.
49001021	Ɛkɛ ne yɛɛ Kelaese di belemgbunli wɔ arelemgbunli, tumivolɛma, mgbolema nee awulae mɔ anwo zo a. Ɔbo duma biala mɔɔ wɔ ewiade ɛhye nee ewiade fofolɛ ne mɔɔ bara la azo.
49001022	Nyamenle ɛva ninyɛne kɔsɔɔti ɛwula Kelaese agyakɛ abo, na yeva Kelaese yemaa asɔne ne kɛ ye Awulae mɔɔ bo ninyɛne kɔsɔɔti azo.
49001023	Asɔne ne a le Kelaese sonlabaka ne yɛɛ Kelaese a maa asɔne ne di munli kɛ ɔdaye Kelaese la a; ɔdaye ala a eza ɔmaa debie biala mɔɔ wɔ aleɛabo la di munli a.
49002001	Dɛba ne, bɛ mɛladonlɛ nee bɛ ɛtane ne mɔ manle bɛwule sunsum nu.
49002002	Mekɛ ne anu bɛlile ewiade ye ɛbɛla mgbane mgbane ne mɔ anzi; bɛdiele anwomanyunlu tumivolɛma mɔɔ kɛkala sie bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnzonle Nyamenle la edwɛkɛ.
49002003	Nɔhalɛ, ɛnee yɛdayɛ noko yɛle kɛ bɛdabɛ ala la; yɛbɔle ɛbɛla mɔɔ yɛdayɛ yɛkulo la, yɛyɛle mɔɔ yɛ nwonane ne atiakunluwɔzo nee yɛ adwenle zele yɛ la, na ɔlua zo yɛhanle Nyamenle ɛya kɛ awie biala la.
49002004	Noko Nyamenle anwunvɔnezelɛ ne zonle, yɛɛ ye ɛhulolɛ mɔɔ wɔ yɛ nwo zo la le kpole bo zolɛ,
49002005	yemɔti mekɛ mɔɔ ɛnee yɛwu sunsum nu wɔ yɛ mɛladonlɛ ti la, ɔvale yɛ nee Kelaese ɔrale ngoane nu. Ɔlua Nyamenle ɛlolɛ ti yɛɛ bɛlie bɛ ngoane a.
49002006	Yɛ nee Kelaese Gyisɛse ɛyɛ ko la ati, Nyamenle ɛdwazo yɛ nee Kelaese kɛ yɛ nee ye ɛhɔli belemgbunli wɔ anwuma.
49002007	Ɔyɛle ɛhye amuala ɔhilele ye ɛlolɛ totohyia ne mɔɔ bɛngola bɛnzuzu la nee atiakunlukɛnlɛma mɔɔ ɔlua Kelaese Gyisɛse ati dahuu ɔlɛ ye wɔ yɛ nwo la.
49002008	Ɔluakɛ Nyamenle ɛlolɛ zo yɛɛ bɛ diedi ti yelie bɛ ngoane a.
49002009	Tɛ bɛ nyɛleɛ nwo ɔ. Ɔle Nyamenle ahyɛlɛdeɛ ala, amaa awie biala andu ɔ nwo wɔ nwolɛ.
49002010	Yɛle Nyamenle asa anloa gyima, yɛɛ yelua yɛ nee Kelaese Gyisɛse yɛ koyɛlɛ ne azo yebɔ yɛ yemaa ɛbɛla kpalɛ ne mɔɔ ɔhyehyɛle ɔdole yɛ ɛkɛ ne dɛba kɛ yɛbɔ la.
49002011	Bɛmɛ mɔɔ bɛnle Dwuuma la, bɛhakye kɛ dɛba ne ɛnee Dwuuma fɛlɛ bɛ kɛ bɛle menli mɔɔ ɛnze Nyamenle a. Ɔluakɛ Dwuuma yɛ bɛ mrenyanu nzonlɛ na bɛmɛ mɔɔ bɛnle Dwuuma la bɛnyɛ bɛ mrenyanu nzonlɛ.
49002012	Bɛhakye kɛ mekɛ ne anu ɛnee bɛ nee Kelaese avinli twe, ɛnee bɛle nyɛvolɛ mɔɔ bɛmboka Yizilayɛ maanlema ne anwo a, ɛnee bɛnze ngyekyeleɛ ne mɔ mɔɔ ɔlua zo a Nyamenle bɔle ye menli ne ɛwɔkɛ la anwo bie. Bɛdɛnlanle ewiade ye anu kɛ menli mɔɔ ɛnlɛ anyelazo na bɛnze Nyamenle la.
49002013	Kɛkala, bɛ nee Kelaese Gyisɛse ɛyɛ ko, amaa ɔlua zo bɛmɛ mɔɔ anrɛɛ bɛwɔ moa moa la, bɛlua Kelaese mogya ne mɔɔ ɔhwinle ɔguale la azo bɛhwe bɛ bɛbikye Nyamenle.
49002014	Kelaese a le yɛ anzonudwolɛmaavolɛ a. Ɔluakɛ yeva Dwuuma nee bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnle Dwuuma la yebɔ nu yeyɛ bɛ menli ko, na yegologolo bane ne mɔɔ gya bɛ ɛweɛne mɔɔ maa bɛyɛ bɛ nwo agbɔvolɛ la yegua.
49002015	Ɔluale ye sonlabaka ne azo ɔpɛle Dwuuma mɛla ne nee nwolɛ ngyehyɛlɛ ne mɔ anu na ɔlua Kelaese ati ɔmanle menli ekpunli nwiɔ ɛhye yɛle menli fofolɛ ko na yɛnyianle anzonudwolɛ.
49002016	Kelaese luale ye ewule mɔɔ ɔwule meanubaka ne azo la yele ɛkpɔlɛ wɔ bɛ avinli na ɔhanle Dwuuma nee bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnle Dwuuma la ɔbɔle nu ɔmanle Nyamenle.
49002017	Yemɔti Kelaese rabɔle anzonudwolɛ nwo Edwɛkpa nolo ne hilele menli kɔsɔɔti; ɔbɔle ɔhilele bɛmɛ mɔɔ bɛnle Dwuuma, mɔɔ bɛwɔ moa moa la yɛɛ Dwuuma mɔɔ bikye ye la.
49002018	Ɔlua Gyisɛse anwo zo yɛɛ yɛ muala, Dwuuma nee bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnle Dwuuma la yɛkola yɛdua Sunsum ko ne ala azo yɛkɔ Selɛ ne anyunlu a.
49002019	Yemɔti, bɛmɛ mɔɔ bɛnle Dwuuma la bɛnle nyɛvolɛ anzɛɛ maanle zo amra bieko; kɛkala bɛle mandimase wɔ Nyamenle menli ne avinli na bɛbɔ Nyamenle abusua eku ne bie.
49002020	Bɛdabɛ noko a bɛle sua mɔɔ bɛlɛsi ye wɔ ɛzoanvolɛma nee Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛma adiabo ne mɔɔ bɛwula la azo a, na Kelaese ɔdaye mumua ne a ɔle sua ne mgbɛnezo sika ne mɔɔ hyia kpole kpalɛ la a.
49002021	Kelaese a sɔ sua mumua ne maa ɔgyinla ɔyɛ ɛzonlenlɛ sua nwuanzanwuanza ɔmaa Awulae a.
49002022	Kɛmɔ bɛ nee Kelaese ɛyɛ ko la, bɛdabɛ noko bɛlua Nyamenle Sunsum ne azo bɛlɛsi bɛ nee menli kɔsɔɔti kɛ sua la na Nyamenle adɛnla nu.
49003001	Ɔlua ɛhye ati medame Pɔɔlo, mɔɔ bɛmɛ mɔɔ bɛnle Dwuuma la ati bɛhye me nuokɛ bɛmaa Kelaese Gyisɛse la, mesɛlɛ dahuu memaa bɛ.
49003002	Medie medi kɛ bɛde kɛ Nyamenle ɛlolɛ zo ala yɛɛ yeva gyima ɛhye yemaa me kɛ menyɛ a, wɔ bɛ kpalɛ ti.
49003003	Nyamenle yele ye ngyehyɛlɛ ne mɔɔ vea la hilele me. (Mehɛlɛ ɛhye anwo edwɛkɛ sikalɛ,
49003004	na saa bɛkenga mɔɔ mehɛlɛ la a anrɛɛ bɛkɛnwu me ndelebɛbo ne mɔɔ fane Kelaese anwo edwɛkɛ ne mɔɔ vea la anu.)
49003005	Dɛba dɛba ne bɛanga edwɛkɛ ɛhye mɔ mɔɔ vea la bɛangile sonla biala, noko kɛkala, Nyamenle lua Sunsum ne azo ɛye ɛhile ye ɛzoanvolɛma nwuanzanwuanza ne nee Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛma.
49003006	Edwɛkɛ mɔɔ ɛnee vea ɛkɛ ne la a le kɛ, ɔlua Edwɛkpa ne azo, bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnle Dwuuma nee Dwuuma bɔ nu nyia Nyamenle nyilalɛ ne mɔ; bɛyɛ menli ko na bɛnyia Nyamenle ɛwɔkɛ ne mɔɔ Kelaese Gyisɛse ati ɔbɔle la.
49003007	Nyamenle ɛlua ye tumi ne gyimalilɛ zo ɛmaa me ahyɛlɛdeɛ mɔɔ sonle bolɛ, kɛ menyɛ Edwɛkpa ne anwo sonvolɛ.
49003008	Mele Nyamenle menli ne anu kakula bɔkɔɔ, noko Nyamenle ɛmaa me adenle ɛhye kɛ membɔ Edwɛkpa ne mɔɔ fane Kelaese anwonyia ne mɔɔ ɛnlɛ neɛnleanu la anwo nolo mengile bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnle Dwuuma la,
49003009	na memaa menli kɔsɔɔti ɛnwu kɛ nwanwane ngyehyɛlɛ ne mɔɔ vea la bazi ahɔ zolɛ la. Nyamenle mɔɔ yemɔ a ɔbɔle ninyɛne muala la vale ngyehyɛlɛ ɛhye veale mekɛ dɔɔnwo mɔɔ ɛraze ɛhɔ la,
49003010	amaa mekɛ ɛhye anu ala ɔlua Asɔne ne azo anwuma tumivolɛma nee mgbolema anwu Nyamenle nrɛlɛbɛ kpole ne.
49003011	Nyamenle yɛle ɛhye kɛmɔ ye damɛnlangoate ngyehyɛlɛ ne mɔɔ ɔlua Kelaese Gyisɛse yɛ Awulae ne anwo zo ɔmanle ɔlile munli la de la.
49003012	Yɛ nee Kelaese yɛ koyɛlɛ ne, nee diedi mɔɔ yɛlɛ ye wɔ ye nuhua la ati, yɛkola yɛbɔ kpɔkɛ na yɛsi yɛ kɛnra yɛfinde Nyamenle anyunlu.
49003013	Yemɔti, mesɛlɛ bɛ kɛ bɛmmamaa amaneɛ mɔɔ melɛnwu ye wɔ bɛ ti la bɔ bɛ rɛle; ɔle kpalɛ ɔmaa bɛ.
49003014	Kɛmɔ ɛnee melɛka la, ɛhye ala ati yɛɛ mekoto mesɛlɛ Selɛ ne
49003015	mɔɔ ye nehane a abusua biala mɔɔ wɔ anwuma nee aze la nyia ye nɔhalɛ duma la,
49003016	kɛ ye anyunlunyia ne kpole ti, ɔlua ye Sunsum ne azo ɔmaa bɛ anwosesebɛ ɔmaa bɛgyinla kpundii wɔ adwenle nu,
49003017	na ɔlua bɛ diedi zo ɔmaa Kelaese ɛdɛnla bɛ ahonle nu. Mesɛlɛ kɛ bɛkɛgyinla kpundii wɔ ɛhulolɛ nu,
49003018	amaa bɛahola bɛ nee Nyamenle menli ne anyia anwosesebɛ ade kɛ Kelaese ɛhulolɛ ne tɛtɛlɛ nee ye tendenle, ye anwumahɔlɛ nee ye kuma si de la abo.
49003019	Mesɛlɛ kɛ anrɛɛ bɛanwu ye ɛhulolɛ ne mɔɔ bo sonla adwenle zo la, na Nyamenle su ne mɔɔ maa sonla sɔ Nyamenle anye la ayi bɛ tɛkɛɛ.
49003020	-
49003021	Anyunlunyia ɛlua asɔne ne nee Kelaese Gyisɛse anwo zo ɛha Nyamenle mɔɔ dua tumi ne mɔɔ yɛ gyima yɛ nu la azo maa ɔbo mɔɔ yɛbiza nee mɔɔ yɛdwenle nwo la azo la, wɔ ɛnɛ nee mekɛ mɔɔ ɛnlɛ awieleɛ! Amen.
49004001	Zɔhane ati, mesɛlɛ bɛ, meze kɛ Awulae ɛzonlenlɛ ne ati mela efiade bɔbɔ ɛdeɛ, noko bɛbɔ ɛbɛla mɔɔ fɛta Nyamenle ɛvɛlɛlɛ ne mɔɔ yemɔti yevɛlɛ bɛ la.
49004002	Dahuu bɛbɛlɛ bɛ nwo aze, bɛyɛ bɛtɛɛ na bɛnyia abotane. Bɛde bɛmaa bɛ gɔnwo mɔ ngoko ngoko wɔ ɛhulolɛ nu.
49004003	Bɛbɔ mɔdenle kɛ bɛkɛdɛnla anzonudwolɛ nu na bɛmaa koyɛlɛ ne mɔɔ Sunsum ne ɛva ɛmaa bɛ la ɛwoa ɛkɛ ne dahuu.
49004004	Asɔne ko yɛɛ Sunsum ko a wɔ ɛkɛ a, yɛɛ anyelazo ko anu a Nyamenle ɛvɛlɛ bɛ a;
49004005	Awulae ko, diedi ko, yɛɛ ɛzɔnenlɛ kokye ala a wɔ ɛkɛ a.
49004006	Nyamenle kokye mɔɔ le menli kɔsɔɔti yɛ Ze na ɔle abɔdeɛ muala bɛ Awulae na ɔyɛ gyima wɔ bɛ muala bɛ nu la a de bɛ muala bɛ nu a.
49004007	Bɛmaa yɛ nuhua ko biala ahyɛlɛdeɛ mɔɔ sonle bolɛ na ɔla mɔɔ Kelaese ɛzuzu ɛva ɛmaa ye la anwo.
49004008	Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne se, “Mekɛ mɔɔ ɔvole ɔhɔle anwuma la, ɔhyele menli dɔɔnwo nuokɛ ɔ nee bɛ hɔle; na ɔvale ahyɛlɛdeɛ ɔmanle aleɛabo amra.”
49004009	Akee “ɔhɔle anwuma” ne abo a le duzu? Yemɔ a le kɛ saa ɔvole a ɛnee noko alumua ne ɔdwule ɔhɔle azɛlɛ ti anu.
49004010	Yemɔti ahenle mɔɔ dwule la ɔdaye ko ne ala a ɔhɔle anwuma wɔ anwumaneamra anzi lɔ a, amaa ewiade kpokpoti anwu ye.
49004011	Ye ahyɛlɛdeɛ a le kɛ ɔmaa bie mɔ yɛ ɛzoanvolɛma, bie mɔ yɛ Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛma, bie mɔ yɛ Edwɛkpa ne nolobɔlɛma, yɛɛ bie mɔ noko yɛ sɛlɛvolɛma nee kilehilevolɛma.
49004012	Ɔyɛle ɛhye ɔvale ɔzieziele Nyamenle menli kɔsɔɔti ɔmanle Keleseɛn ɛzonlenlɛ gyima ne, amaa bɛayɛ Kelaese asɔnema
49004013	kɔdwu kɛ awieleɛ ne, kɛmɔ yɛdie yɛdi na yɛze Nyamenle Ara ne la ati, yɛkɛbɔ nu yɛkɛyɛ ko na yɛayɛ kɛ menli mɔɔ bɛ adwenle ɛdi na bɛ nee Kelaese ɛzɛ atipɛne la.
49004014	Ɛnee akee yɛnle ngakula bieko mɔɔ adalɛma fa bɛ ngilehilelɛ nee agyiba ne mɔ mɔɔ bɛfa bɛtwe menli bɛkɔ ɛtane nu la bɔ yɛ kɔ ba kɛ selɛkye nee anwoma la.
49004015	Saa yɛfa ɛhulolɛ yɛka nɔhalɛ ne a, Kelaese ati yɛbanyi wɔ adenle biala anu. Kelaese a gyi yɛ ti
49004016	mɔɔ yɛ nwonane ye nvɛyeba ne mɔ amuala sosɔ ye na ɔmaa biala yɛ ye gyima kɛmɔ ɔfɛta la, na nwonane ne nyi ɛhulolɛ nu a.
49004017	Mekakye bɛ wɔ Awulae duma nu; bɛmmabɔ bɛ ɛbɛla kɛ awozonle ɛzonlenlɛma la bieko mɔɔ bɛndwenle adwenle kpalɛ a.
49004018	Menli zɔhane mɔ adwenle nu le awozinli, bɛnlɛ ndelebɛbo yɛɛ bɛmboka ngoane ne mɔɔ Nyamenle fa maa la anwo, ɔluakɛ bɛnze ɛhwee yɛɛ eza bɛ nzo yɛ se.
49004019	Nyiane ɛnle bɛ nye zo, bɛyɛ ninyɛndane yɛɛ bɛkulo ɛbɛla mgbane mgbane ɛbɔlɛ.
49004020	Na bɛmɛ, tɛ mɔɔ bɛzukoale ye wɔ Kelaese ɛkɛ ne la ɛne.
49004021	Nɔhalɛ, bɛde ɔ nwo edwɛkɛ yɛɛ bɛhilehile bɛ nɔhalɛ ne, kɛmɔ ɔwɔ Gyisɛse anu la.
49004022	Zɔhane ati, bɛdu bɛ su dɛba ne mɔɔ manle bɛbɔle ɛbɛla mɔɔ bɛdabɛ bɛkulo na ɔvale ye atiakunluwɔzo ɛtane ne ɔzɛkyele bɛ la bɛgua.
49004023	Bɛnyia subane fofolɛ.
49004024	Bɛva bɛ su fofolɛ ne mɔɔ Nyamenle ɛbɔ ye kɛ ɔdaye ye ɛsaso na ɔkile ɔ nwo wɔ nɔhalɛ ɛbɛla mɔɔ tenrɛ na ɔle nwuanzaanwu la anu la bɛwula.
49004025	Zɔhane ati, bɛmmabɔ adalɛ bieko; awie biala ɛha nɔhalɛ ɛhile ɔ gɔnwo, ɔboalekɛ yɛ muala yɛle menli ko.
49004026	Saa ɛfa ɛya a, mmamaa ɔfa wɔ ɔkɔ ɛtane nu; eza mmamaa sɛnzɛne ne tɔ wɔ ɛya zo.
49004027	Bɛmmamaa Abɔnsam adenle.
49004028	Mɔɔ le awule la ɛgyakyi ye awule ne na ɔyɛ gyima, amaa yeanyia bie yeanlea ɔ nwo na eza yeanyia bie yeaboa bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛhyia la.
49004029	Bɛmmamaa edwɛkɛ ɛtane fi bɛ nloa anu finde; bɛdendɛ kɛnlɛma mɔɔ maa sonla nyia ngɔzo na ɔnyia mɔɔ ɔkpondɛ la, amaa mɔɔ bɛkɛha la biala azo ara nvasoɛ amaa bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛtie la.
49004030	Bɛmmabɔ Nyamenle Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne arɛle, ɔluakɛ Sunsum ne a le Nyamenle nzonlɛ mɔɔ yeyɛ ye bɛ nwo mɔɔ kile kɛ bɛle ye ɛdeɛ a; sɛkɛlɛneɛ ɛhye kile kɛ Kenle ne dwu a Nyamenle bakpɔne bɛ.
49004031	Bɛye sipe nee ɛkpɔlɛ nee ɛya biala bɛgua. Bɛmmadi butule anzɛɛ bɛmmayɛ aholoba. Bɛye atiakunlu ɛtane biala bɛgua.
49004032	Bɛyɛ atiakunlukɛnlɛma na bɛze anwunvɔne, bɛva bɛ gɔnwo mɔ ɛtane bɛhyɛ bɛ, kɛmɔ Nyamenle ɛlua Kelaese anwo zo ɛva bɛ ɛtane ne mɔ ɛhyɛ bɛ la.
49005001	Bɛle Nyamenle amra mɔɔ ɔkulo bɛ a, yemɔti bɛbɔ mɔdenle kɛ bɛkɛyɛ kɛ ɔdaye ala la.
49005002	Bɛmaa ɛhulolɛ ɛvinde bɛ ɛbɛlabɔlɛ nu, kɛmɔ Kelaese hulole yɛ na ɔdole ye ngoane aze ɔmanle yɛ ɔvale ɔyɛle azubɔlɛ evuanlɛ mɔɔ sɔ Nyamenle anye la.
49005003	Bɛle Nyamenle menli, zɔhane ati bɛye adwɔmanebɔlɛ anzɛɛ nyɛleɛ ɛtane ɛtane anzɛɛ anyebolo wɔ bɛ nu bɔkɔɔ.
49005004	Bɛmmaka anyiemgba edwɛkɛ biala, bɛmmatendɛ ɛdendɛlɛ ɛtane yɛɛ bɛmmabɔ ngoayɛ mgbane mgbane. Mɔɔ ɔwɔ kɛ bɛyɛ la a le kɛ bɛkɛyɛ Nyamenle mo.
49005005	Bɛde ɛhye abo kpalɛ, awie biala mɔɔ bɔ adwɔmane anzɛɛ ye ɛbɛla nwo ɛnde anzɛɛ ɔle anyebolo (anyebolo le awozonlezonlenlɛ) la ɛnrɛnyia agyadeɛ wɔ Kelaese nee Nyamenle Belemgbunlililɛ ne anu.
49005006	Bɛmmamaa awie fa adubɛnloanu bɛlɛbɛla bɛ; ɔboalekɛ ɔlua ninyɛne zɛhae mɔ ati yɛɛ Nyamenle ɛya ne ba menli mɔɔ ɛndie ye edwɛkɛ la anwo zo a.
49005007	Yemɔti bɛ nee menli zɔhane mɔ mmatu wɔ adenle biala anu.
49005008	Dɛba ne ɛnee bɛwɔ awozinli nu, na ɛnɛ bɛyɛ Awulae menli; ɛhye ati bɛwɔ wienyi nu. Ɔwɔ kɛ bɛbɔ bɛ ɛbɛla kɛ menli mɔɔ wɔ wienyi nu la.
49005009	Ɔluakɛ wienyi nu yɛɛ kpalɛyɛlɛ, pɛlepɛlelilɛ nee nɔhalɛlilɛ dɔɔnwo vi ba a.
49005010	Bɛbɔ mɔdenle bɛzukoa mɔɔ bɛyɛ a ɔsɔ Awulae anye la.
49005011	Bɛmmayɛ awozinli nu nyɛleɛ mgbane mgbane ne mɔ mɔɔ menli yɛ na nvasoɛ ɛnle zolɛ la bie. Bɛnwu bie a anrɛɛ bɛha bɛdo gua.
49005012	Ɔyɛ nyiane kpole bɔbɔ kɛ bɛkɛha bɛ ninyɛndane mɔɔ bɛyɛ ye fealera nu la anwo edwɛkɛ a.
49005013	Na saa ninyɛne muala finde wienyi nu a, ɛnee bɛ nɔhalɛ ɛsaso ne ɛla ɛkɛ ne wienyi;
49005014	ɔluakɛ debie biala mɔɔ kɛla ali la, ɛnee yeyɛ wienyi. Yemɔti a bɛha ye kɛ, “Wɔmɔ mɔɔ wɔlafe a, tunwue na ɛvi mɔwuamra anu dwazo! Na Kelaese wienyi ne kɛda ɛ nwo.”
49005015	Zɔhane ati bɛnlea bɛ nwo boɛ wɔ bɛ ɛbɛlabɔlɛ nu. Bɛmmayɛ bɛ nwo kɛ menli mɔɔ ɛnze debie la; bɛbɔ bɛ ɛbɛla kɛ bɛle nrɛlɛbɛvolɛma.
49005016	Bɛbɔ ɛbɛla kpalɛ wɔ adenle biala anu, ɔboalekɛ mekɛ ye mɔɔ yɛwɔ nu la le ɛtanelilɛ mekɛ.
49005017	Zɔhane ati, bɛmmayɛ bɛ nwo ahɔnwɔne, na bɛbɔ mɔdenle kɛ bɛkɛnwu mɔɔ Awulae kpondɛ kɛ bɛyɛ la.
49005018	Bɛgyakyi nza ɛbolɛ na ɔsɛkye bɛ; bɛmaa Sunsum ne ɛyi bɛ tɛkɛɛ.
49005019	Bɛva ayɛlɛyelɛ edwɛne, anyelielɛ edwɛne nee sunsum nu edwɛne bɛli bɛ nwo adwelie; na bɛdo ayɛlɛyelɛ edwɛne wɔ bɛ ahonle nu bɛmaa Awulae.
49005020	Bɛlua yɛ Awulae Gyisɛse Kelaese duma nu bɛyɛ Nyamenle Selɛ ne mo dahuu wɔ debie biala anu.
49005021	Kɛmɔ bɛdi Kelaese eni la, bɛha bɛ nwo aze bɛmaa bɛ nwo ngoko ngoko.
49005022	Yelɛma, bɛha bɛ nwo aze bɛmaa bɛ hu mɔ, kɛmɔ bɛyɛ bɛmaa Awulae la.
49005023	Ɔluakɛ kunli ne a lɛ tumi wɔ ɔ ye anwo zo a, kɛmɔ Kelaese lɛ Asɔne ne azo tumi la; asɔne ne a le Kelaese sonlabaka ne yɛɛ Kelaese a le asɔne ne Ngoanedievolɛ a.
49005024	Zɔhane ati yelɛma ɛha bɛ nwo aze bɔkɔɔ ɛmaa bɛ hu mɔ, kɛmɔ asɔne ne yɛ maa Kelaese la.
49005025	Kunlima, bɛhulo bɛ ye mɔ kɛmɔ Kelaese hulole Asɔne ne na ɔdole ye ngoane aze wɔ ɔ ti la.
49005026	Ɔyɛle ɛhye na ɔvale ɔ nloa edwɛkɛ nee nzule ɔnrinzinle nwolɛ bɔkɔɔ na ɔdele nwolɛ;
49005027	amaa yeava asɔne ne kɛnlɛma gyɛlɛɛnye yeamaa ɔ nwo, mɔɔ nwolɛ ɛtɛkpɔdele, evinli biala ɛnle nwolɛ, yɛɛ nvonleɛ biala ɛnle nwolɛ na nwolɛ te nwuanzaanwu a.
49005028	Zɔhane ala yɛɛ ɔwɔ kɛ kunlima kulo bɛ ye mɔ kɛ bɛ nwo la. Nrenya mɔɔ kulo ɔ ye la kulo ɔdaye mumua ne ɔ nwo.
49005029	Awie ɛnrɛkpɔ ɔdaye ɔ nwo ɛlɛ; mɔɔ ɔyɛ la a le kɛ ɔdi ɔ nwo adane na ɔnea ye sonlabaka ne boɛ, kɛmɔ Kelaese noko yɛ Asɔne ne la,
49005030	ɔluakɛ yɛle ye sonlabaka ne nvɛyeba ne mɔ bie.
49005031	Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne se, “Ɛhye ati nrenya bagyakyi ɔ ze nee ɔ nli na yeava ɔ nwo yeabeta ɔ ye anwo, na bɛ mu nwiɔ bɛayɛ menli nwiɔ mɔɔ le nwonane ko a.”
49005032	Nɔhalɛ kpole bie mɔɔ vea la wɔ Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ɛhye anu, na mete ɔ bo kɛ ɔfane Kelaese nee asɔne ne anwo.
49005033	Noko ɔwɔ kɛ kunli biala kulo ɔ ye kɛ ɔdaye ɔ nwo, na yelɛ biala noko di ɔ hu eni.
49006001	Ngakula, bɛdie bɛ awovolɛma wɔ Awulae ati, ɔluakɛ ɛhye a le debie kpalɛ mɔɔ ɔwɔ kɛ bɛyɛ a.
49006002	“Di ɛ ze nee ɛ nli eni” a le Nyamenle mɛla mɔɔ lumua mɔɔ ɛwɔkɛ wɔ nwolɛ a.
49006003	Ɛwɔkɛ ne a le “amaa wɔayɛ kpalɛ na wɔahyɛ azɛlɛ ye azo.”
49006004	Selɛma, bɛmmaka bɛ mra ɛya; bɛtete bɛ na bɛhilehile bɛ, kɛmɔ Awulae kpondɛ la.
49006005	Ngɛkɛlɛ, bɛva ɛzulolɛ nee anwowozolɛ bɛdie bɛ menle mɔ mɔɔ wɔ ewiade ye anu la kɛ asɛɛ bɛlɛsonle Awulae la.
49006006	Tɛ ɛnyelɛ zo yɛkile nu ɔ, na bɛva ahonle kpalɛ bɛyɛ mɔɔ Nyamenle kpondɛ la; bɛyɛ ye kɛ bɛle Kelaese ngɛkɛlɛ,
49006007	na bɛva adwenle kpalɛ bɛzonle kɛ asɛɛ bɛyɛ bɛamaa Awulae na tɛ menli ɔ.
49006008	Bɛhakye kɛ gyima kpalɛ mɔɔ awie biala kɛyɛ la, saa akɛlɛ o, saa dehelɛ o, Awulae bamaa ye nwolɛ ahatualɛ.
49006009	Menlenlɛma, bɛdabɛ noko bɛyɛ zɔhane ala bɛmaa bɛ ngɛkɛlɛ ne mɔ, na bɛmmanwunlonwunla bɛ anzɛɛ bɛmmasisi bɛ. Bɛhakye kɛ bɛ nee bɛ ngɛkɛlɛ ne mɔ amuala wɔ Menlenlɛ ko ne ala mɔɔ wɔ anwuma la abo. Yemɔ, ɔnli mɔguazo wɔ ye ndɛnebualɛ nu.
49006010	Awieleɛ ne, bɛlua Awulae tumi bedevinli ne azo bɛmaa bɛ nwo ɛyɛ se.
49006011	Bɛwula Nyamenle konle tɛladeɛ ne mɔ amuala na bɛahola bɛagyinla Abɔnsam agyiba ne mɔ anloa.
49006012	Ɔluakɛ, tɛ menli a yɛ nee bɛ ɛlɛko a; sunsum nu tumivolɛma, ewiade arelemgbunli anzɛɛ maanlebuvoma, ewiade amra mɔɔ sie ɛnɛ mekɛ ye awozinli nu amra, yɛɛ sunsum nu anwuma ɛlɔnema amumuyɛ yɛɛ yɛ nee bɛ ɛlɛko a.
49006013	Zɔhane ati bɛwula Nyamenle konle tɛladeɛ ne amuala, amaa saa kenle ɛtane ne ba a, bɛahola bɛagyinla kpɔvolɛ ne anyunlu, amaa mɔɔ konle ne kawie la ɛnee bɛgyi bɛ gyakɛ anu kpundii.
49006014	Zɔhane ati bɛziezie bɛ nwo bɛzie, bɛva nɔhalɛ bɛyɛ akyeso bɛhye; bɛva pɛlepɛlelilɛ bɛyɛ bulalɛ enyinlike bɛbutu bɛ kɛnra azo
49006015	na bɛva anzonudwolɛ Edwɛkpa ne bɛyɛ mgbɔlaboa bɛwula.
49006016	Mekɛ biala bɛva diedi bɛyɛ bɛ sa nu enyinlike, ɔluakɛ yemɔ a bɛbava bɛalie Abɔnsam senle ɛda ne mɔɔ ɔkɛdo la amuala bɛanlua bɛ a.
49006017	Bɛva ngoanelielɛ ahyɛlɛdeɛ ne bɛyɛ bulalɛ kyɛlɛ bɛzoa na bɛva Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne kɛ konle dadeɛ mɔɔ Sunsum ne fa maa la.
49006018	Bɛva nzɛlɛlɛ bɛyɛ ɛhye mɔ amuala na bɛbiza Nyamenle moalɛ. Mekɛ biala bɛzɛlɛ kɛmɔ sunsum ne kile la. Zɔhane ati bɛmaa bɛ nye ɛbolo bɛbodo bɛzɛlɛ kpalɛ wɔ Sunsum ne anu dahuu. Bɛyɛ bɛ nye gyɛlɛmgbɛɛnye na bɛmmamaa bɛ sa kpa; bɛzɛlɛ dahuu bɛmaa Nyamenle menli ne noko,
49006019	na bɛzɛlɛ bɛmaa medame noko kɛ saa menyia nwo mebadendɛ a, Nyamenle kɛmaa me edwɛkɛ mɔɔ mebaha la, amaa meahola meadendɛ akɛnrasesebɛ zo meabɔ mɔɔ vea Edwɛkpa ne anu la nolo.
49006020	Edwɛkpa ne ati a mela efiade a, noko mele nwolɛ ɛbɔfoɔ. Bɛzɛlɛ kɛ menwɔva akɛnrasesebɛ menwɔha Edwɛkpa ne kɛmɔ ɔfɛta la.
49006021	Tekekɛse mɔɔ le adiema kulovolɛ nee sonvolɛ mɔɔ di nɔhalɛ maa Awulae gyima ne la bamaa bɛade me nwo edwɛkɛ muala, amaa bɛanwu kɛ me nwo si de la.
49006022	Yemɔti yɛɛ melɛsoa ye bɛ nwo lɔ a, amaa bɛanwu kɛ yɛ muala yɛ nwo si de la na eza yeamaa bɛ anwosesebɛ.
49006023	Nyamenle Selɛ ne, nee Awulae Gyisɛse Kelaese ɛmaa mediema ne mɔ amuala anzonudwolɛ nee diedi nu ɛhulolɛ.
49006024	Nyamenle ɛlolɛ ne nee bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛkulo yɛ Awulae Gyisɛse Kelaese ɛhulolɛ mɔɔ ɛmbɔ aze ɛlɛ la ɛdɛnla.
50001001	Medame Pɔɔlo nee Temɔte, mɔɔ yɛle Kelaese Gyisɛse ngɛkɛlɛ la, yɛɛ yɛlɛkɛlɛ kɛlata ɛhye yɛahɔmaa bɛdabɛ mɔɔ Kelaese Gyisɛse ati bɛyɛ Nyamenle menli nee asɔne neavolɛma nee asɔne boavolɛma mɔɔ wɔ Felepae suakpole ne azo la amuala a.
50001002	Yɛ Ze Nyamenle ne nee Awulae Gyisɛse Kelaese ɛlo bɛ na ɔmaa bɛ anzonudwolɛ.
50001003	Meyɛ Nyamenle mo kɛ dahuu mekakye bɛ a.
50001004	Eza kenle biala mefa fɛlɛkolilɛ mesɛlɛ memaa bɛ muala,
50001005	wɔ moalɛ mɔɔ bɛva bɛboa me wɔ Edwɛkpa ne anwo gyimalilɛ nu, ɔvi mɔlebɛbo ne amuala toonwo mɔɔ ɛradwu ɛnɛ la.
50001006	Zɔhane ati medie medi kɛ Nyamenle mɔɔ bɔle gyima kpalɛ ɛhye abo wɔ bɛ nu la kɛzɔ zolɛ kɛmaa ɔkɛli munli wɔ Kenle ne mɔɔ Kelaese Gyisɛse kɛra la.
50001007	Medwenle bɛ nwo somaa! Na ɔle kpalɛ noko kɛ melɛ bɛ nwo adwenle zɛhae a, ɔluakɛ wɔ me efiadenla nu nee Edwɛkpa ne nolobɔlɛ nee ye ɛgyinlalɛ nu, me nee bɛ yɛ muala a yɛnyia Nyamenle ɛlolɛ ne a.
50001008	Nyamenle di me daselɛ kɛ me nwo mɔɔ dɔ bɛ la amuala vi Gyisɛse Kelaese ɔdaye mumua ne ahonle nu.
50001009	Mesɛlɛ kɛ Nyamenle ɛdo bɛ ɛhulolɛ nu, ɔmaa bɛ nɔhalɛ adwenle nee ndelebɛbo mɔɔ di munli la,
50001010	amaa bɛnwu mɔɔ le kpalɛ la a bɛanwu ye, na bɛ nwo ade saanwu na bɛanli fɔlɛ wɔ Kenle ne mɔɔ Kelaese kɛra la.
50001011	Bɛzo nɔhalɛ ma kpalɛ ne mɔɔ Gyisɛse Kelaese ala a fa maa la na bɛmaa anyunlunyia nee ayɛlɛyelɛ ɛha Nyamenle.
50001012	Me mediema, mekulo kɛ bɛnwu kɛ, mɔɔ ɛzi me nwo zo biala la ɛboa ɛmaa Edwɛkpa ne ɛhɔ zo,
50001013	ɛmaa ɔlua zo suakunlu sinzavolɛma ne mɔ amuala nee bɛdabɛ mɔɔ ɛha la amuala ɛnwu ye kɛ Kelaese ati a mela efiade a.
50001014	Na me efiadenla ɛhye ɛmaa mediema ne mɔ dɔɔnwo ɛzi pi wɔ Awulae anu na bɛlɛbɔ Edwɛkpa ne nolo mɔɔ bɛnzulo ɛhwee a.
50001015	Ɔle nɔhalɛ kɛ bie mɔ fa akpule nee aholazilɛ a bɔ Kelaese anwo nolo ne a, yɛɛ bie mɔ noko lɛ adwenle kpalɛ.
50001016	Menli mɔɔ lɛ adwenle kpalɛ la fa ɛhulolɛ a bɔ nolo ne a, ɔluakɛ bɛze kɛ medame yɛɛ Nyamenle ɛva gyima ɛhye ɛmaa me kɛ mengyinla Edwɛkpa ne anzi na mengilehile nu a.
50001017	Bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛha la, bɛmbɔ Kelaese anwo nolo ne nɔhalɛ nu, bɛbɔ ye manzonlehwenlɛ nu, na bɛdwenle kɛ bɛyɛ ye zɔhane na bɛamaa me nwo ahyele me wɔ efiade ɛke.
50001018	Ɔnle debie! Medi nwolɛ fɛlɛko, ɔluakɛ saa bɛlɛ adwenle kpalɛ o, saa ɛtane o, Kelaese anwo nolo ala a bɛbɔ a. Ɛhɛe, yɛɛ eza mebahɔ zolɛ meali fɛlɛko,
50001019	ɔluakɛ meze kɛ ɔlua bɛmɛ bɛ nzɛlɛlɛ nee Gyisɛse Kelaese Sunsum ne moalɛ zo mebavi efiade ɛke.
50001020	Mɔɔ hyia me ɛsesebɛ na me nye la la a le kɛ menrɛze me gyima ne anwo nyiane ɛlɛ, na wɔ ewule nu o, ngoane nu o, menwɔnyia akɛnrasesebɛ menwɔva me nwo amuala menwɔli gyima menwɔwula Kelaese anyunlunyia.
50001021	Na mame, mese ngoane a le Kelaese, yɛɛ ewule le nvasoɛ.
50001022	Saa metɛnla ewiade ye anu a anrɛɛ mebali gyima kpalɛ bie. Noko mennwu mɔɔ memkpa nu menva a.
50001023	Megyi ninyɛne nwiɔ avinli. Me kunlu a anrɛɛ mevi ewiade ɛhye anu na me nee Kelaese ɛhɔdɛnla, ɛhye le debie kpalɛ totohyia.
50001024	Na bɛmɛ bɛ ti ɔhyia kpole kpalɛ kɛ menwɔdɛnla ewiade ye anu.
50001025	Mesi pi wɔ ɛhye anwo, na meze kɛ metɛnyianle metɛwule. Meze kɛ me nee bɛ yɛ muala yɛbadɛnla, na bɛanyia ngɔzo na bɛ nye alie wɔ diedi nu,
50001026	amaa saa meba bɛ nwo lɔ bieko a bɛanyia anwosesebɛ bɛava me bɛadu bɛ nwo wɔ bɛ ɛbɛla mɔɔ Kelaese ati bɛlɛbɔ la anwo.
50001027	Bɛmaa bɛ ɛbɛlabɔlɛ wɔ menli nu ɛfɛta mɔɔ Kelaese anwo Edwɛkpa ne kilehile la, amaa saa meba bɛ nwo lɔ o, menle lɔ o, meade kɛ bɛlɛ koyɛlɛ nee adwenle ko bɛgyi kpundii kɛ menli mɔɔ wɔ afoa na bɛlɛko kɛ menli kɛzɔ diedi ne anu.
50001028	Bɛmmasulo bɛ agbɔvolɛ ne mɔ; bɛnyia akɛnrasesebɛ, na ɛhye bahile amaa bɛanwu kɛ bɛmɛ bɛli konim na bɛ agbɔvolɛ ne mɔ ɛho ɛdɔ. Ɔluakɛ bɛ ngoane a le Nyamenle.
50001029	Nyamenle a ɛmaa adenle kɛ bɛlie Kelaese bɛli na bɛnwu amaneɛ wɔ ɔ ti a.
50001030	Kɛmɔ mekɛ bie bɛnwunle kɛ ɛnee melɛko wɔ diedi nu la, zɔhane ala yɛɛ kɛkala noko bɛte kɛ megua zolɛ a. Bɛhakye kɛ bɛdabɛ bɛrazɔ konle ko ne ala anu.
50002001	Bɛdie Kelaese bɛdi la ati bɛ nwo yɛ se. Ye ɛhulolɛ ne kyekye bɛ rɛle. Sunsum ne maa bɛdi ahua, ɔmaa bɛyɛ atiakunlukɛnlɛma bɛmaa bɛ nwo ngoko ngoko, na bɛse bɛ nwo anwunvɔne.
50002002	Akee mesɛlɛ bɛ kɛ bɛhye bɛ nwo file, bɛnyia adwenle ko, bɛhulo bɛ nwo ngoko ngoko na bɛmaa me fɛlɛkolilɛ ne ɛli munli.
50002003	Bɛmmayɛ debie biala angomedi nu anzɛɛ adubɛnwo nu; dahuu bɛva anwoazehanlɛ bɛbu bɛ gɔnwo mɔ bɛdɛla bɛ nwo bɔbɔ.
50002004	Awie biala mmadwenle ɔ ngomekye ye boɛyɛlɛ nwo, na ɔdwenle ɔ gɔnwo mɔ noko ɛdeɛ nwo.
50002005	Bɛmaa zɛhae subane ne mɔɔ ɛnee Kelaese Gyisɛse lɛ la ɛvinde bɛ ɛbɛla nu.
50002006	Yemɔ bɔbɔ mɔɔ ɔ nee Nyamenle bɛ su le ko la, yeandwenle nwo yeampele kɛ ɔ nee Nyamenle kɛzɛ.
50002007	Ɔkpɔlale ɔ kunlu ɔyɛle ɔ nwo akɛlɛ na bɛwole ye kɛ sonla biala la, Ɔrale kɛ ɔle sonla,
50002008	ɔbɛlɛle ɔ nwo aze ɔyɛle tieyɛ ɔhɔle ewule nu, na ɔwule meanubaka zo bɔbɔ.
50002009	Ɔlua zo Nyamenle ɛkpogya ye zo na yemaa ye duma fofolɛ mɔɔ tɛla aluma muala.
50002010	Ɛhye ati, anwuma nee aze nee ɛbolɔ amra amuala bahoto Gyisɛse na bɛali ye duma ne eni,
50002011	na awie biala aha ye baguase kɛ, Gyisɛse Kelaese le Awulae, bɛava bɛawula Nyamenle Selɛ ne anyunlunyia.
50002012	Zɔhane ati ayi mɔ, kɛmɔ bɛlile me edwɛkɛ zo wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ ɛnee me nee bɛ de la, ɔhyia ɛsesebɛ kɛ akee bɛkɛyɛ ye zɔhane kɛkala mɔɔ me nee bɛ ɛnde la. Bɛva ɛzulolɛ nee anwowozolɛ bɛli bɛ ngoanelielɛ ne anwo gyima bɛhɔ awieleɛ,
50002013	ɔluakɛ Nyamenle ɛlɛdi gyima wɔ bɛ nu dahuu, amaa bɛanyia ɛhulolɛ na bɛahola bɛayɛ mɔɔ ɔkpondɛ la.
50002014	Bɛmmatendɛ bɛ nzo abo na bɛsu kpolera wɔ bɛ debie biala ɛyɛlɛ nu,
50002015	amaa awie annwu nvonleɛ biala wɔ bɛ nwo anzɛɛ anzu bɛ nɔhalɛlilɛ nwo kpolera kɛ bɛle Nyamenle amra mɔɔ evinli fee ɛnle bɛ nwo, wɔ adalɛ nee ɛtane ewiade ye anu a. Saa bɛwɔ bɛ avinli a bɛda kɛ bɛmɛ a bɛle ewiade ahɛnlaneɛ a,
50002016	na bɛzɔ ngoane edwɛkɛ ne anu boɛ, amaa Kenle mɔɔ Kelaese kɛra la meanyia bie meadu me nwo kɛ meanzu ɛnriandilɛ ne mgbane anzɛɛ meanyɛ me gyima ne mgbane.
50002017	Saa bɔbɔ ɔba ye kɛ bɛfa me mogya bɛaye ɛdɛne bɛagua bɛ diedi azubɔlɛ zo bɛamaa Nyamenle a, anrɛɛ me nye die nwolɛ kpole na me nee bɛ di fɛlɛko.
50002018	Zɔhane ala yɛɛ ɔwɔ kɛ bɛdabɛ noko bɛ nye die na bɛ nee me di fɛlɛko a.
50002019	Me nye la kɛ saa ɔyɛ Awulae Gyisɛse ɛhulolɛ a ɔnrɛhyɛ biala na meazoa Temɔte wɔ bɛ nwo lɔ, amaa meade bɛ nganeɛ na me nye alie.
50002020	Menlɛ awie mɔɔ kɛdwenle bɛ nwo kpalɛ kɛ medame la, kyesɛ Temɔte ala, yɛɛ yemɔ noko ala a kɛdwenle bɛ nwo a.
50002021	Bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛha la biala ɛlɛbɔ ye ɛbɛla mɔɔ hyia ye la, na yegyakyi mɔɔ Gyisɛse Kelaese kpondɛ kɛ ɔyɛ la.
50002022	Bɛdabɛ bɛze Temɔte bolɛ mɔɔ sonle a. Bɛze gyima kpalɛ mɔɔ ɔyɛle ɔ nwo kɛ ralɛ na ɔ nee me yɛlile wɔ Edwɛkpa ne anwo a.
50002023	Yemɔ yɛɛ me nye la kɛ saa menyia menwu kɛ ninyɛne ɛlɛsi ahɔ ye wɔ ɛke la a ɛnee menwɔzoa ye wɔ bɛ nwo lɔ a.
50002024	Me rɛle wɔ Awulae anu kɛ ɔnrɛhyɛ biala na medame mumua ne meara bɛ nwo lɔ.
50002025	Medwenle nwo kɛ eza ɔwɔ kɛ mesoa adiema Ɛpafulodaetɛse noko wɔ bɛ nwo nehane, ɔ nee me a yɛdi gyima ye a, yɛɛ yegyinla me nzi yeho kpalɛ kɛ me gɔnwo sogyanli, eza yezonle na yeboa me kɛ ɔle bɛ soanvolɛ wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ mengɔle ɛhyianlɛ nu la.
50002026	Ɔ nwo ɛlɛdɔ bɛ muala, na ɔlɛdi nyane kɛ bɛdele ye anwonyane nganeɛ a.
50002027	Nɔhalɛ, ɔwule ɔwiele. Na Nyamenle a ɛnwu ye anwunvɔne a, na tɛ yemɔ a yenwu ye anwunvɔne a na mame bɔbɔ ɔ, anrɛɛ me nyanelilɛ ne kɛbo zolɛ.
50002028	Zɔhane ati, memaa yeazia yeara bɛ nwo lɔ bieko ndɛndɛ, amaa bɛnwu ye a bɛ nye alie na medame noko meapɛ me adwenleadwenle ne azo.
50002029	Bɛva fɛlɛkolilɛ bɛlie ye kɛ bɛ diema wɔ Awulae ati. Bɛli menli mɔɔ le kɛ ɔdaye la eni,
50002030	ɔboalekɛ Kelaese gyima ne yɛɛ bɛ moalɛ mɔɔ ɔlua me ti ɔliele kɛ ɔfa yearɛlɛ me la ati a ɔvale ye ngoane ɔdole nzeleba a.
50003001	Awieleɛ ne, mediema, bɛmaa bɛ nye ɛlie kɛ bɛra Awulae ɛkɛ a. Ɔnyɛ me ɛvɛlɛ kɛ mesi mɔɔ mehɛlɛ ye dɛba la azo wɔ bɛ kpalɛyɛlɛ ti a.
50003002	Bɛnlea boɛ wɔ nindavoma anwo; menli ɛhye mɔ ɛhakyi ahwea mɔɔ nganlɛ ala a bɛkulo kɛ bɛbɔ bɛ nwo a.
50003003	Yɛmɛ a yɛnyia nɔhalɛ mrenyanu nzonlɛyɛlɛ ne a, na tɛ bɛmɛ ɔ, ɔluakɛ yɛdua Nyamenle Sunsum ne azo a yɛsonle a, na yɛdi fɛlɛko kɛ yɛnyia Kelaese Gyisɛse wɔ yɛ ɛbɛla nu. Yɛnva yɛ rɛle yɛnwula ewiade amaamuo nu.
50003004	Saa mekulo a, mekola mefa me rɛle mewula ewiade ninyɛne ɛhye mɔ anu, yɛɛ saa awie dwenle kɛ ɔze ewiade amaamuo mɔɔ ɔkola ɔfa ɔ rɛle ɔwula nu a, anrɛɛ mame bɔbɔ yɛɛ melɛ ye kpole a.
50003005	Menlile dapɛne ko ala la yɛɛ bɛyɛle me mrenyanu nzonlɛ a. Bɛwole me Yizilayɛnli, mevi Bɛngyaman abusua nu yɛɛ mele Hibulunli tɛnyetɛnye, egya nee ɔmɔ le Hibuluma, yɛɛ ɔba mɛla ne anwo edwɛkɛ a, mele Falasiinli.
50003006	Mɔdenlebɔlɛ nu a menyɛle diedima ne kpɔdekpɔde, yɛɛ saa ɔhale kɛ sonla di mɛla ne azo na yeazɔ Nyamenle anye a, anrɛɛ menli fɔlɛ hweledede.
50003007	Noko ɔlua Kelaese ati, ninyɛne mɔɔ anrɛɛ anwo lɛ nvasoɛ maa me la ɛnɛ ɛnzɔ me nye bieko.
50003008	Tɛ ɛhye mɔ angome, na ɛnwunlɛ mumua ne mɔɔ menwu Awulae Gyisɛse Kelaese la sonle bolɛ maa me tɛla debie biala. Ɔlua ɔ ti mevuandi debie biala megua; mebu bɛ kɛ fovolɛ zo ewula la, amaa Kelaese ayɛ me ɛdeɛ,
50003009	na bɛanwu kɛ me nee ye lua. Medame mumua ne menlɛ tenleneyɛlɛ biala menyɛ kɛ medi mɛla ne azo la ati ɔ. Me tenleneyɛlɛ lua kɛ medie Kelaese medi la ati ɔ. Tenleneyɛlɛ ɛhye vi Nyamenle ɛkɛ na ɔdua yɛ diedi zo a ɔfa ɔmaa a.
50003010	Mɔɔ mekpondɛ la a le kɛ menwɔnwu Kelaese na menwɔde ye ewudwazo tumi ne me nu, na me nee ye yɛkɛnwu amaneɛ na menwɔyɛ kɛ ɔdaye wɔ ye ewule nu,
50003011	amaa me nye ala kɛ Nyamenle badwazo medame noko avi ewule nu ara ngoane mɔɔ ɛnlɛ awieleɛ la anu.
50003012	Menga kɛ meho medɔ zo anzɛɛ meli munli. Metɛbɔ mɔdenle kɛ me sa kɛha ahyɛlɛdeɛ ne mɔɔ yemɔti Kelaese Gyisɛse ɛva ɔ sa ɛdo me nwo zo la.
50003013	Mediema, nɔhalɛ, menva ye kɛ me sa ɛha ahyɛlɛdeɛ ne; debie ko yɛɛ meyɛ a, na yemɔ a le kɛ me rɛle kɛvi mɔɔ ɛze me nzi la na menwɔbɔ mɔdenle kɛ menwɔdwu mɔɔ wɔ me nyunlu la anwo.
50003014	Yemɔti memia me nwo kɛ menriandi meahɔ awieleɛ, amaa me sa aha ahyɛlɛdeɛ ne mɔɔ le anwuma ngoane ne mɔɔ Nyamenle lua Kelaese anwo zo ɛlɛfɛlɛ yɛ ahɔ nu la.
50003015	Bɛmaa yɛmɛ mɔɔ yɛnyi sunsum nu la yɛnyia subane zɛhae, na saa bɛ bie mɔ noko lɛ subane ngakyile bie a, Nyamenle ɔdaye ɔbahilehile bɛ yeamaa bɛade ɔ bo.
50003016	Noko kɛ ɔde biala la, bɛmaa yɛhɔ yɛ nyunlu yɛzɔ mɔɔ yɛlɛ la anu boɛ.
50003017	Me mediema, bɛ muala bɛva me gyakɛ. Yɛmaa bɛ ndonwo kpalɛ, yemɔti bɛnlea bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛdi zolɛ la boɛ.
50003018	Ɔluakɛ dahuu meka, yɛɛ ɛnɛ noko melɛ nyanelilɛ melɛsi zolɛ a: menli dɔɔnwo wɔ ɛkɛ mɔɔ bɛ ɛbɛlabɔlɛ ne ɛmaa bɛyɛ Kelaese meanubaka ne azo ewule ne anwo agbɔvolɛ a.
50003019	Menli ɛhye mɔ, bɛ awieleɛ a le kɛ Nyamenle bazɛkye bɛ, ɔluakɛ bɛ nyamenle a le bɛ ko. Mɔɔ ɔwɔ kɛ bɛse nwolɛ nyiane la bɛfa bɛtu bɛ nwo, yɛɛ bɛ adwenle muala gyi ewiade ninyɛne zo.
50003020	Yɛmɛ, yɛ nzi maanle wɔ anwuma. Ɛkɛ ne yɛɛ yɛ nye la kɛ yɛ Dievolɛ Awulae Gyisɛse Kelaese vi bara a.
50003021	Na ɔbalua tumi ne mɔɔ maa ɔkola ɔfa ninyɛne kɔsɔɔti ɔbawula ɔ bo la azo yeahakyi yɛ nwonane wulera ɛhye yeayɛ ye kɛ ye anyunlunyia nwonane ɛdeɛ ne la.
50004001	Zɔhane ati, me mediema kulovolɛma, mɔɔ me nwo dɔ bɛ a, me ahyɛlɛdeɛ mɔɔ me nye die bɛ nwo, na mefa bɛ metu me nwo a! Mediema kpalɛ, bɛgyinla kpundii kɛ bɛle Kelaese ɛdeɛ.
50004002	Mebodo mesɛlɛ Yiwodea nee Senteki kɛ bɛmaa bɛ nloa ɛzɛ bɛ nwo kɛ mediema mraalɛ mɔɔ nee Awulae a lua a.
50004003	Akee wɔmɔ noko, me boavolɛ kpalɛ, mekpondɛ kɛ ɛboa mraalɛ ɛhye mɔ; ɔluakɛ bɛ nee me nee Kelɛmɛnte nee me gɔnwo mɔ gyimayɛvoma mɔɔ ɛha la amuala, mɔɔ bɛ aluma wɔ Nyamenle ngoane buluku ne anu la a lile Edwɛkpa ne ɛkpondenlɛ nwo gyima a.
50004004	Bɛmaa bɛ nye ɛlie dahuu kɛ bɛle Awulae ɛdeɛ a; mesi zo bieko: bɛmaa bɛ nye ɛlie!
50004005	Bɛmaa awie biala ɛnwu kɛ bɛlɛ abotane molozo. Awulae ɛbikye.
50004006	Bɛmmadwenle debie biala anwo. Wɔ debie biala anu bɛyɛ moyɛlɛ nzɛlɛlɛ na bɛva mɔɔ bɛhyia nwolɛ la bɛdo Nyamenle anyunlu.
50004007	Na Nyamenle anzonudwolɛ ne mɔɔ bo sonla ndelebɛbo muala azo la bazie bɛ ahonle nee bɛ adwenle gyɛlɛɛnye wɔ Kelaese ati.
50004008	Me mediema, mɔɔ meka meadwula me edwɛkɛ ne la a le kɛ, bɛdwenle ninyɛne mɔɔ le nɔhalɛ, mɔɔ lɛ duma, ninyɛne mɔɔ le fɔɔnwo, mɔɔ anwo te, mɔɔ le kɛnlɛma, mɔɔ sɔ ɛnyelɛ, nee mɔɔ di munli na ayɛlɛyelɛ wɔ nwolɛ la anwo.
50004009	Bɛyɛ ninyɛne mɔɔ bɛzukoa na bɛlie bɛdo nu bɛvi me ɛdendɛlɛ nee me nyɛleɛ nu la, na Nyamenle ne mɔɔ maa yɛ anzonudwolɛ la nee bɛ badɛnla.
50004010	Medi fɛlɛko kpole wɔ Awulae ati kɛ mekɛ tendenle ye anzi, eza bɛnyia adenle bɛlɛkile kɛ bɛdwenle me nwo a. Menga kɛ bɛgyakyi me nwo ɛdwenlenlɛ, na ɛnee bɛnnyia adenle.
50004011	Mɔɔ melɛka la ɛngile kɛ me nwo ɛhyele me, ɔluakɛ mezukoa kɛ me kunlu kɛdwo me nwo mekɛ biala wɔ gyinlabelɛ biala mɔɔ mewɔ nu la anu.
50004012	Meze ehyia di, meze ezukoa di. Mezukoa ɛhye mɔ ɛyɛlɛ, amaa ɛleka biala nee mekɛ biala anu, saa menyia ye medi o, meannyia ye meanli o, saa melɛ bie o, menlɛ bie o, me kunlu adwo me nwo.
50004013	Ɔlua anwosesebɛ ne mɔɔ Kelaese fa maa me la ati, mekola megyinla ninyɛne muala anloa.
50004014	Noko bɛyɛle ye boɛ kɛ bɛboale me wɔ me anwongyelelɛ ne anu a.
50004015	Bɛmɛ Felepaema, bɛdabɛ bɛze ye wienyi kɛ mɔɔ medumua meabɔ Edwɛkpa ne nolo, mɔɔ menvile Masidonea la, bɛmɛ ala a bɛle asɔnema mɔɔ boale me, nleɛnleanle me nvasoɛ nee me kakɛ nu a.
50004016	Fane dɔɔnwo ne ala bɛnwanle me wɔ mekɛ biala mɔɔ me nwo kɛhyele me wɔ Tɛsalonaeka la.
50004017	Tɛ kɛ asɛɛ mekpondɛ nwanle la ati ɔ, na mekpondɛ kɛ mɔɔ bɛyɛ la anwo ba nvasoɛ dɔɔnwo.
50004018	Ahyɛlɛdeɛ biala mɔɔ bɛva bɛnwa me la me sa ɛha ye, ɔzonle somaa! Kɛkala mɔɔ me sa ɛha bɛ nwanle mɔɔ Ɛpafulodaetɛse ɛva ɛrɛlɛ me la, mengyia debie biala anwo bieko. Bɛ ahyɛlɛdeɛ ne le kɛ azubɔlɛ evuanlɛ mɔɔ Nyamenle kulo na ɔ nye sɔ ye la.
50004019	Me Nyamenle ne balua Kelaese Gyisɛse anyunlunyia nu anwonyia kpole ne azo ayɛ bɛ ɛhyianlɛdeɛ amaa bɛ.
50004020	Anyunlunyia ɛha yɛ Ze Nyamenle ne dahuu! Amen.
50004021	Yɛbiza Nyamenle menli ne mɔɔ le Kelaese Gyisɛse ɛdeɛ la kɔsɔɔti ahye. Mediema mɔɔ nee me wɔ ɛke la biza bɛ ahye.
50004022	Nyamenle menli ne mɔɔ wɔ ɛke la amuala, bɔbɔ Maanle Maanle belemgbunli ne suakunlu amra ne mɔ biza bɛ ahye.
50004023	Awulae Gyisɛse Kelaese ɛlo bɛ na ɔ nee bɛ muala ɛdɛnla.
51001001	Kɛlata ɛhye vi Pɔɔlo mɔɔ ɔlua Nyamenle ɛhulolɛ zo yeyɛ Kelaese Gyisɛse ɛzoanvolɛ la nee yɛ diema Temɔte ɛkɛ ne.
51001002	Yɛfa yɛahɔmaa Nyamenle menli ne mɔɔ wɔ Kɔlɔsae na bɛle yɛ mediema nɔhavoma kpalɛ mɔɔ die Kelaese di nɔhalɛ nu la. Yɛ Ze Nyamenle ɛlo bɛ na ɔmaa bɛ anzonudwolɛ.
51001003	Dahuu yɛsɛlɛ yɛmaa bɛ, yɛyɛ Gyisɛse Kelaese ɔ Ze Nyamenle ne mo.
51001004	Ɔluakɛ yɛde kɛ bɛliele Kelaese Gyisɛse bɛlile la, bɛnyia ɛhulolɛ wɔ Nyamenle menli ne anwo,
51001005	ɔboalekɛ bɛlɛ anyelazo bie mɔɔ bɛ sa baha ye wɔ anwuma a. Anyelazo ɛhye a bɛdele nwolɛ edwɛkɛ alumua ne, wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ bɛvale Edwɛkpa ne bɛrɛlɛle bɛ la.
51001006	Edwɛkpa ne ɛlɛso ma yɛɛ ɔlɛnyi wɔ ewiade ɛleka kɔsɔɔti, kɛmɔ ɔzile la pɛpɛ wɔ bɛ nuhua wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ bɛlumuale bɛdele Nyamenle ɛlolɛ ɛhye anwo edwɛkɛ ne na bɛdele ɔ bo bɛnwunle ye deɛ holɛ la.
51001007	Ɛpafelase a hilehilele bɛ Nyamenle ɛlolɛ ɛhye anwo edwɛkɛ a. Ɔle yɛ diema sonvolɛ kpalɛ kpalɛ mɔɔ sonle Kelaese nɔhalɛ nu a; ɔgyi yɛ gyakɛ anu wɔ lɔ.
51001008	Ɔdaye yɛɛ eza yeha ɛhulolɛ ne mɔɔ Sunsum ne ɛva ɛmaa bɛ la anwo edwɛkɛ yehile yɛ a.
51001009	Ɔlua ɛhye ati, sumunli kɛ yɛdele bɛ nganeɛ la, dahuu yɛsɛlɛ yɛmaa bɛ. Yɛsɛlɛ Nyamenle kɛ ɔva sunsum nu nrɛlɛbɛ nee ndelebɛbo muala ɔyi bɛ tɛkɛɛ, amaa bɛanyia Nyamenle ɛhulolɛdeɛ ne anwo ndelebɛbo,
51001010	bɛabɔ bɛ ɛbɛla ne bɛamaa yeafɛta Awulae, dahuu bɛayɛ mɔɔ ɔkulo la, na bɛ ɛbɛlabɔlɛ ne anwo ara nvasoɛ wɔ gyima kpalɛ biala mɔɔ bɛyɛ la anu, na bɛade Nyamenle edwɛkɛ ne abo kpalɛ.
51001011	Yɛsɛlɛ kɛ Nyamenle ɛva ye anyunlunyia tumi ne ɛwula bɛ anwosesebɛ, amaa bɛava abotane nee anyelielɛ bɛagyinla debie biala anloa,
51001012	na bɛava fɛlɛkolilɛ bɛayɛ Selɛ ne mɔɔ ɛmaa bɛfɛta kɛ bɛ nee ye menli ne kɛbɔ nu kɛdɛnla ye wienyi ne anu la mo.
51001013	Nyamenle ɛlie yɛ ɛvi awozinli nu tumi ne mɔ abo, yeva yɛ yera ɔ Ra kulovolɛ ne belemgbunlililɛ ne abo,
51001014	na yelua ɔ nwo zo yekpɔne yɛ, yeva yɛ ɛtane yehyɛ yɛ.
51001015	Kelaese le Nyamenle ne mɔɔ ɛnyelɛ ɛnnwu ye la sɔhovolɛ. Yemɔ a ɔle abɔdeɛ muala anu belamunli Ralɛ a.
51001016	Ɔ nwo zo a Nyamenle luale bɔle ninyɛne kɔsɔɔti a: mɔɔ wɔ anwuma o nee mɔɔ wɔ aze o, mɔɔ bɛnwu bɛ nee mɔɔ bɛnnwu bɛ la amuala, ewiade ye anu tumima nee arelemgbunli nee bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛsie ɛnɛ mekɛ ye anu awozinli ewiade ye nee sunsum nu ɛlɔnema; Nyamenle luale Kelaese anwo zo a bɔle ninyɛne kɔsɔɔti a, yɛɛ Kelaese ati a ɔbɔle bɛ a.
51001017	Kelaese wɔ ɛkɛ ne kolaa na ɛhye mɔ amuala ara, na yemɔ a ɔsɔ ewiade ye ɔmaa ɔyɛ ewiade a.
51001018	Yemɔ a ɔle ye sonlabaka ne, mɔɔ le Asɔne ne ati a, yemɔ a ɔle debie biala mɔlebɛbo a, yɛɛ yemɔ a ɔle bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛdwazole bɛ bɛvile ewule nu la kpanyinli a, amaa debie biala anu yealumua.
51001019	Ɔluakɛ Nyamenle ɔdaye ɔhulole yɛɛ ɔvale ye su ne amuala ɔwulale Ralɛ ne nu a.
51001020	Ɛhye ati, ɔlua Ralɛ ne anwo zo, Nyamenle ɛbɔ kpɔkɛ kɛ ɔdie aleɛabo ninyɛne kɔsɔɔti mɔɔ wɔ anwuma nee aze la yeamaa ɔ nwo na yealua ɔ Ra ne ewule mɔɔ ɔwule meanubaka ne azo la azo ɔ nee bɛ ayɛ ko.
51001021	Dɛba ne ɔlua bɛ ninyɛndane mɔɔ bɛyɛle nee bɛ adwenle ɛtane mɔɔ bɛlɛ ye la ati, ɛnee bɛ nee Nyamenle bɛ avinli twe, na bɛle ye agbɔvolɛ.
51001022	Na kɛkala, ɔlua Kelaese ewule ne azo bɛyɛ Nyamenle agɔnwo mɔ, amaa yeava bɛ yeara ɔ nyunlu kɛ bɛ nwo te nwuanzaanwu mɔɔ fɔlɛlilɛ biala ɛnle bɛ nu a.
51001023	Zɔhane ati, ɔwɔ kɛ bɛkɔ zolɛ bɛsɔ bɛ diedi ne anu ɛsesebɛ, bɛgyinla bɛ ti na bɛgyinla kpundii. Saa bɛyɛ ye zɔhane a yɛɛ awie ɛnrɛhola ɛnrɛzɛkye bɛ anyelazo ne mɔɔ bɛnyianle ye wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ bɛdele Edwɛkpa ne la a. Edwɛkpa ɛhye, bɛbɔ ye nolo bɛhile abɔdeɛ muala mɔɔ wɔ aleɛabo la, yɛɛ medame, Pɔɔlo a bɛyɛ me nwolɛ sonvolɛ a.
51001024	Kɛkala, bɛdabɛ bɛ ti ɔyɛ me fɛ kɛ melɛnwu amaneɛ a, ɔluakɛ melua me nwonane nu amaneɛnwunlɛ ye azo melɛboa meamaa Kelaese amaneɛnwunlɛ wɔ ye Asɔne ne ati ali munli.
51001025	Ɛhye ati yɛɛ Nyamenle ɛyɛ me asɔne ne sonvolɛ, na yeva gyima ɛhye yemaa me kɛ menyɛ wɔ bɛ ti a. Gyima ne a le Nyamenle edwɛkɛ ne nolobɔlɛ.
51001026	Ɔle fealera nu debie mɔɔ Nyamenle vale veale aleɛabo amra ɛvolɛ dɔɔnwo mɔɔ ɛraze ɛhɔ la, na kɛkala yeye yehile ye menli ne a.
51001027	Nyamenle ngyehyɛlɛ ne a le kɛ ɔkɛye ye fealera nu kpɔkɛ ne mɔɔ ɔbɔle, mɔɔ anyunlunyia nee anwonyia ɛyi ye tɛkɛɛ, na ɔwɔ ɛkɛ ɔmaa maanle maanle kɔsɔɔti la ɔkɛhile ye menli ne. Fealera nu kpɔkɛ ɛhye a le kɛ Kelaese ne de bɛ nu, na ɔbamaa bɛanyia anyelazo kɛ kenle bie bɛbanyia Nyamenle anyunlunyia ne bie.
51001028	Yemɔti yɛbɔ Kelaese ɛhye anwo nolo yɛkile awie biala, yɛkilehile bɛ na yɛbɔ bɛ kɔkɔ nrɛlɛbɛ nu, amaa yɛava ko biala yɛara Nyamenle anyunlu kɛ sonla mɔɔ di munli, na ɔ nee Kelaese a lua a.
51001029	Na ɛhye yɛɛ melɛ anwosesebɛ kpole ne mɔɔ Kelaese fa maa na ɔyɛ gyima ɛsesebɛ wɔ me nu la mepele meyɛ a.
51002001	Bɛmaa menga gyima ɛsesebɛ mɔɔ meyɛ memaa bɛ nee menli mɔɔ wɔ Lawɔdesia, nee bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛtɛnwunle me nyunlu ɛlɛ la mengile bɛ.
51002002	Meka ɛhye meamaa bɛ akɛnrazilɛ na bɛali ahua wɔ ɛhulolɛ nu, amaa bɛanyia diedi nu anwonyia ne mɔɔ ndelebɛbo kpalɛ fa maa la. Zɛhae adenle zo yɛɛ bɛlua a bɛkɛnwu deɛ ne mɔɔ Nyamenle ɛva ɛvea la a; deɛ ne mɔɔ Nyamenle ɛva ɛvea la a le Kelaese ɔdaye mumua ne.
51002003	Kelaese anu a Nyamenle nrɛlɛbɛ ne mɔɔ anwonyia ɛyi ye tɛkɛɛ nee adwenlenubukelɛ vea a.
51002004	Meka ɛhye meahile bɛ: bɛmmamaa awie fa ɔ nloa anu menlemenle yɛ bɛ koasea.
51002005	Ɔluakɛ menle bɛ nwo lɔ ɛdeɛ, noko me nee bɛ de wɔ sunsum nu, na ɔyɛ me fɛ kɛ menwu kɛ bɛsi bɛdi bɛ nwo eni nee kɛ bɛ diedi wɔ Kelaese anu si de kpundii la.
51002006	Kɛmɔ bɛlie Kelaese Gyisɛse bɛdo nu kɛ ɔle Awulae la, bɛ nee ye ɛdɛnla.
51002007	Bɛyɛ kɛ menli mɔɔ ɛsosɔ ndinli kpalɛ wɔ Kelaese anu la, bɛlua ɔ nwo zo bɛbɔ bɛ ɛbɛla, bɛmaa bɛ diedi ɛgyinla kpundii, kɛmɔ bɛhilehilele bɛ la, na bɛyɛ ye mo dahuu.
51002008	Bɛnlea boɛ na awie anva mɛlɛbɛla nee adalɛ nrɛlɛbɛ mɔɔ bɛlua ewiade amaamuo zo bɛhyehyɛ, nee mɔɔ vi awozinli ewiade ye sunsum nu tumima ɛkɛ ne na ɔnvi Kelaese ɛkɛ ne la anyɛ bɛ ngɛkɛlɛ.
51002009	Ɔluakɛ Nyamenle su ne de Kelaese sonlabaka ne nu,
51002010	na kɛmɔ yemɔ a ɔbo sunsum nu arelemgbunli nee tumivolɛma anwo zo la, bɛ nee ye ɛyɛ ko na bɛli munli.
51002011	Bɛ nee Kelaese yɛle ko ala la yɛɛ bɛyɛle bɛ mrenyanu nzonlɛ a, tɛ nwonane nu, kɛmɔ menli yɛ la ɔ, ɛhye le Kelaese ɔdaye ye nzonlɛyɛlɛ mɔɔ ɔyɛ yɛ ɔfi nwonane ɛtane ɛhye mɔ tumi ne abo a.
51002012	Ɔluakɛ mɔɔ bɛzɔnenle bɛ ala la, ɛnee bɛzie bɛ su ɛtane ne nee Kelaese. Eza wɔ ɛzɔnenlɛ ne anu ala bɛluale bɛ diedi mɔɔ wɔ Nyamenle tumi ne mɔɔ dwazole Kelaese vile ewule nu la azo bɛdwazole bɛdabɛ noko.
51002013	Mekɛ bie mɔɔ ɛraze ɛhɔ la ɛnee ɔlua bɛ ɛtane ti, nee kɛmɔ bɛnle Dwuuma na bɛnle Mosisi mɛla ne abo la ati, ɛnee bɛwu sunsum nu, na kɛkala Nyamenle ɛva bɛ nee Kelaese ɛra ngoane nu, na yeva yɛ ɛtane ne mɔ amuala yehyɛ yɛ.
51002014	Ɔpɛle yɛ ɛtane nwo kakɛ biala mɔɔ maa mɛla ne kyekye yɛ la anu, ɔyele ye ɛkɛ ne na ɔvale ɔbɔle meanubaka ne azo.
51002015	Kelaese liele ɔ nwo wɔ meanubaka ne azo wɔ awozinli ewiade ye sunsum nu tumima asa anu, ɔguale bɛ nyunlu aze wɔ bagua nu na ɔzinlanle bɛ nyɛma zo wɔ ye konimlilɛ ɛlɔnwɔnedolɛ ne anu.
51002016	Yemɔti bɛmmamaa awie bua bɛ ndɛne wɔ mɔɔ bɛdi nee mɔɔ bɛno, anzɛɛ ɛvoyialilɛ nwo, anzɛɛ Siane Fofolɛ nee Ɛnwomenlelielɛ Kenle nwo.
51002017	Ɛhye mɔ amuala le ninyɛne mɔɔ bara la ɛlawolɛ; bɛ kpalɛ kpalɛ ne a le Kelaese.
51002018	Menli bie wɔ ɛkɛ mɔɔ bɛdie bɛdabɛ bɛ ngome bɛ nwo bɛdi, bɛdwenle anwoazehanlɛ nee anwuma soanvolɛma ɛzonlenlɛ nwo, na bɛfa ye kɛ ɛnyelɛzodeɛnwunlɛ le debie mɔɔ hyia tɛla zolɛ; menli zɛhae mɔ fa bɛ ewiade adwenle ne tu bɛ nwo mɔɔ ndelebɛbo biala ɛnle nu a. Bɛmmamaa menli zɛhae mɔ adenle bɛmaa bɛsɛkye bɛ adwenle, kɛ asɛɛ mɔɔ bɛmɛ bɛlɛyɛ la bɛnyɛ ye boɛ.
51002019	Menli zɔhane mɔ ɛkpo kɛ bɛnrɛdoa Kelaese mɔɔ le Asɔne ne ati la. Kelaese a le Asɔne ne, mɔɔ le ye sonlabaka ne. Ɔdi ye adane, ɔkuohua ye ɔmaa ɔnyi, kɛmɔ Nyamenle kpondɛ ye ala la.
51002020	Saa bɛ nee Kelaese ɛwu na bɛnyia bɛ ti wɔ awozinli ewiade ye sunsum nu tumima ne mɔ asa anu a, ɛnee akee duzu ati a bɛbɔ bɛ ɛbɛla kɛ asɛɛ bɛde aze bɛmaa ewiade ɛ? Duzu ati a bɛdi mɛla anzɛɛ ngyehyɛlɛ mɔɔ le kɛ,
51002021	“Mmafa ɛ sa ɛka ɛhye”, “Mmafa ɛhendeɛ ne ɛka ɛ nloa”, “Mmasɔ ɛhendeɛ ne anu” azo ɛ?
51002022	Ngyehyɛlɛ ɛhye mɔ kɔsɔɔti fane ninyɛne mɔɔ saa ɛnyia bɛfa bɛyɛ debie ko a, bɛfa bɛyɛ debie bieko a ɔnyɛ boɛ la anwo. Bɛle menli ngilehilelɛ nee ngyehyɛlɛ.
51002023	Ngyehyɛlɛ zɛhae mɔ ɔyɛ a zɔho kɛ gyi nrɛlɛbɛ zo wɔ bɛ anwuma soanvolɛma ɛzonlenlɛ nu, bɛ adalɛ anyelielɛ ne mɔɔ bɛnyia ye wɔ bɛ ngome bɛ nwo, nee nwonane ne nyanehilelɛ nwo la anu; na ɔmboa sonla ɔmmaa ɔngomo ɔ nwo zo. Bɛ nwonane nu atiakunluwɔzo ne bɔbɔ akee yɛ kpole.
51003001	Bɛdwazo bɛ nee Kelaese bɛra ngoane nu. Yemɔti bɛmaa bɛ ahonle ɛdoa ninyɛne mɔɔ wɔ anwuma lɔ, ɛleka mɔɔ Kelaese de ye belemgbunli ebia nu wɔ Nyamenle asa fema zo la abo zo.
51003002	Bɛdwenle ninyɛne mɔɔ wɔ anwuma lɔ la anwo na bɛgyakyi mɔɔ wɔ azɛlɛ ye azo la.
51003003	Ɔluakɛ bɛwu na bɛva bɛ ngoane bɛboka Kelaese ɛdeɛ ne bɛvea Nyamenle anu.
51003004	Yɛ ngoane a le Kelaese, yemɔti mekɛ mɔɔ Kelaese kɛra la bɛdabɛ noko bɛ nee ye kɛra anyunlunyia nu.
51003005	Ɔwɔ kɛ bɛku nwonane nu atiakunluwɔzo ne mɔ mɔɔ wɔ bɛ nu, mɔɔ le kɛ adwɔmane, ɛbɛla mgbane mgbane ɛbɔlɛ, ɛhulolɛ ɛtane, atiakunluwɔzo ɛtane, yɛɛ anyebolo, ɔluakɛ ɛhye mɔ ɛyɛlɛ le awozonle ɛzonlenlɛ.
51003006	Ninyɛne ɛhye mɔ ati Nyamenle ɛya ne bara bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛandie ɔ ne la anwo zo.
51003007	Bɛdabɛ noko, mekɛ bie mɔɔ ɛraze ɛhɔ la ɛnee bɛ atiakunluwɔzo kɛ de la ɛne.
51003008	Na kɛkala ɔwɔ kɛ bɛgua ninyɛne ɛhye mɔ amuala lɔ: ninyɛne mɔɔ le kɛ ɛya ɛvalɛ, ahonle kpole, ɛkpɔlɛ, yɛɛ dumanzɛkyelɛ. Bɛmmamaa aholoba anzɛɛ edwɛkɛ ɛtane fi bɛ nloa anu finde.
51003009	Bɛmmabɔ adalɛ bɛkile bɛ nwo, ɔluakɛ bɛye bɛ su dɛba ne nee ye nyɛleɛ ne mɔ wɔ bɛ nu bɛgua.
51003010	Bɛva su fofolɛ ne, mɔɔ Nyamenle ne mɔɔ bɔle ye la nea ye ɛsaso zo kakyihakyi ye dahuu la bɛwula, amaa bɛanwu kɛ ɔdaye mumua ne ɔsi ɔde la.
51003011	Zɔhane ati, ansolo bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnle Dwuuma la nee Dwuuma, ansolo menli mɔɔ bɛyɛ bɛ mrenyanu nzonlɛ nee bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛtɛyɛle bɛ bie la, ansolo nyɛvolɛ, ansolo menli mɔɔ anye ɛtɛtele, ansolo ahanra, yɛɛ ansolo alehelɛ. Kelaese a le ninyɛne kpokpoti a. Kelaese wɔ ye kpokpoti anu.
51003012	Bɛle Nyamenle menli mɔɔ yehulo bɛ na yekpa nu yeye bɛ kɛ ɔdaye ye ɛdeɛ na bɛ nwo te a. Yemɔti bɛze anwunvɔne, bɛyɛ atiakunlukɛnlɛma, bɛbɛlɛ bɛ nwo aze, bɛyɛ bɛtɛɛ na bɛzi abotane wɔ debie biala anu.
51003013	Bɛsosɔ bɛ nwo ngoko ngoko, na saa bie lɛ ɔ gɔnwo anwo ɛya a ɔva ɔhyɛ ye. Bɛva ɛtane bɛhyɛ, kɛmɔ Awulae ɛva bɛ nwo edwɛkɛ ɛhyɛ bɛ la.
51003014	Na bɛva ɛhulolɛ bɛboka ɛhye mɔ anwo, na yemɔ yɛɛ kɛmaa bɛkɛli munli a.
51003015	Bɛmaa Kelaese anzonudwolɛ ne mɔɔ ɔmaa bɛ la ɛvinde bɛ kpɔkɛbɔlɛ nu, ɔluakɛ Nyamenle ɛvɛlɛ bɛ muala wɔ asɔne ye anu kɛ bɛdɛnla anzonudwolɛ nu. Bɛnwu nyele.
51003016	Bɛmaa Kelaese edwɛkɛ ne nee nwolɛ nvasoɛ muala ɛdɛnla bɛ nu kpalɛ. Bɛva nrɛlɛbɛ bɛhilehile bɛ nwo na bɛdu bɛ nwo folɛ. Bɛdo edwɛne, anyelielɛ edwɛne, na bɛdo sunsum nu edwɛne bɛboka moyɛlɛ mɔɔ vi ahonle nu la bɛmaa Nyamenle.
51003017	Debie biala mɔɔ bɛyɛ, edwɛkɛ biala mɔɔ bɛka, nyɛleɛ biala anu, bɛyɛ ye wɔ Awulae Gyisɛse duma nu, na bɛlua ɔ nwo zo bɛyɛ Nyamenle Selɛ ne mo.
51003018	Yelɛma, bɛha bɛ nwo aze bɛmaa bɛ hu mɔ, na mɔɔ Kelaese ɛdoavolɛ biala ɔwɔ kɛ yɛ la ɛne.
51003019	Kunlima, bɛhulo bɛ ye mɔ, bɛmmayɛ bɛ nwo zo kengɛndɛɛnye.
51003020	Ngakula, bɛdie bɛ awovolɛma edwɛkɛ wɔ debie biala anu, ɔboalekɛ yemɔ a Nyamenle anye die nwolɛ a.
51003021	Awovolɛma, bɛmmatu bɛ mra anwo mɔra, anrɛɛ bɛ rɛle kɛbɔ.
51003022	Ngɛkɛlɛ, bɛdie bɛ ewiade ye anu menlenlɛma edwɛkɛ wɔ debie biala anu, bɛmmayɛ ye wɔ ɛnyelɛ zo kɛ bɛyɛ bɛahile ala na bɛayɛ bɛ mo; bɛva Nyamenle ɛzulolɛ bɛyeye bɛ ahonle nu bɛyɛ.
51003023	Debie biala mɔɔ bɛyɛ la bɛva ahonle kpalɛ bɛyɛ, kɛ asɛɛ bɛyɛ bɛamaa Awulae, na bɛnyɛ bɛmmaa sonla.
51003024	Bɛhakye kɛ Awulae a bamaa bɛ nwolɛ ahatualɛ ne mɔɔ yeva yezie ɛkɛ yemaa ye menli la a. Ɔluakɛ Awulae Kelaese a le Menlenlɛ ne mɔɔ bɛsonle ye la.
51003025	Ɛtanevolɛ biala noko banyia ye ɛtane ne mɔ anwo ahatualɛ, Nyamenle bua sonla ko biala ndɛne, kɛmɔ ɔfɛta la, ɔnli mɔguazo. mɔguazo.
51004001	Menlenlɛma, bɛnlea bɛ ngɛkɛlɛ ne mɔ boɛ gyɛlɛɛnye. Bɛhakye kɛ bɛdabɛ noko bɛlɛ bɛ Menle wɔ anwuma.
51004002	Bɛyɛ nzɛlɛlɛ dahuu, bɛzie bɛ adwenle koonwu wɔ bɛ nzɛlɛlɛ nu, na bɛyɛ Nyamenle mo.
51004003	Eza bɛzɛlɛ bɛmaa yɛdayɛ noko kɛ Nyamenle ɛmaa yɛ mekɛ kpalɛ ɔmaa yɛbɔ fealera nu Edwɛkpa ne mɔɔ fane Kelaese anwo la nolo. Ɔluakɛ ɛhye ala ati yɛɛ kɛkala mela efiade a.
51004004	Yemɔti bɛzɛlɛ kɛ menwɔdendɛ menwɔhile nu wienyi, kɛmɔ ɔwɔ kɛ meyɛ ye ala la.
51004005	Bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnlɛ diedi la, bɛ nee bɛ ɛzia nrɛlɛbɛ nu, na bɛdendɛ bɛhile bɛ wɔ mekɛ biala mɔɔ bɛkɛnyia nuhua adenle la.
51004006	Bɛmaa bɛ nloa edwɛkɛ ɛyɛ fɛ na ɔyɛ anyelielɛ, na bɛnwu nyelebɛnloa kpalɛ mɔɔ ɔwɔ kɛ bɛfa bɛye awie biala edwɛkɛ nloa la.
51004007	Adiema kulovolɛ Tekekɛse, mɔɔ le nɔhalɛ gyimayɛvolɛ nee sonvolɛ wɔ Awulae gyima nu la babɔ me nwo edwɛkɛ ahile bɛ.
51004008	Ɛhye ati a melɛsoa ye wɔ bɛ nwo lɔ a, amaa yeaha kɛ yɛ agbɔkɛ nu si de la yeahile bɛ na bɛ nye alie.
51004009	Ɔ nee Onɛsemɛse mɔɔ le yɛ diema kulovolɛ nɔhalɛ ne, mɔɔ le bɛdabɛ bɛ nuhua bie la a bara a. Bɛbaha debie biala mɔɔ ɛlɛkɔ zolɛ wɔ ɛke la bɛahile bɛ.
51004010	Alesetaakɛse mɔɔ nee me a la efiade ye la yɛɛ Maake mɔɔ le Baanabase adiema ne biza bɛ ahye. (Memaa bɛde ye dɛba kɛ saa bɛnwu Maake a bɛlie ye gyɛlɛɛnye.)
