51004011	Gyisɛse ne mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye Gyɛsetɛse la biza bɛ ahye. Menli nsa ɛhye a le Dwuuma mɔɔ ɛlie ɛli na bɛ nee me yɛlɛdi Nyamenle Belemgbunlililɛ ne anwo gyima a, yɛɛ bɛboa me kpole kpalɛ.
51004012	Ɛpafelase, mɔɔ le bɛdabɛ bɛ bie, na eza ɔle Kelaese Gyisɛse sonvolɛ la biza bɛ ahye. Dahuu ɔkakye bɛ wɔ ye nzɛlɛlɛ nu, kɛ Nyamenle ɛmaa bɛgyinla kpundii, bɛyɛ Kelaese ɛdoavolɛma mɔɔ ati ɛdi, na bɛyɛ tieyɛ bɛmaa Nyamenle ɛhulolɛdeɛ ne.
51004013	Mekola medi daselɛ kɛ yeyɛ gyima kpole yemaa bɛ nee menli mɔɔ wɔ Lawɔdesia nee Hayɛleepɔlese la.
51004014	Luku mɔɔ le yɛ ninsinli kulovolɛ ne, nee Dimase biza bɛ ahye.
51004015	Yɛbiza mediema mɔɔ wɔ Lawɔdesia la ahye, eza yɛbiza Nemefa nee asɔnema ne mɔɔ yia nu wɔ ye sua nu ɛkɛ ne la ahye.
51004016	Saa bɛkenga kɛlata ɛhye bɛwie a, bɛnlea bɛmaa bɛgenga ye wɔ Lawɔdesiama asɔne ne anu noko. Eza anrɛɛ bɛgenga kɛlata mɔɔ vi Lawɔdesia kɛra la.
51004017	Na bɛha bɛhile Aakepɛse kɛ ɔnlea ɔmaa Awulae gyima ne mɔɔ yezɔ nu la ɛli munli.
51004018	Medame Pɔɔlo, me sa anloa ɛne: Mebiza bɛ ahye. Bɛmmamaa bɛ rɛle fi kɛ mela kpanwu nu! Nyamenle ɛlo bɛ na ɔ nee bɛ ɛdɛnla.
52001001	Kɛlata ɛhye vi Pɔɔlo, Saelase, yɛɛ Temɔte ɛkɛ. Yɛfa yɛahɔmaa Tɛsalonaeka asɔne ne anu amra mɔɔ le Nyamenle Selɛ ne nee Awulae Gyisɛse Kelaese ɛdeɛ la. Nyamenle ɛlo bɛ na ɔmaa bɛ anzonudwolɛ.
52001002	Dahuu yɛyɛ nzɛlɛlɛ a, yɛbɔ bɛ duma yɛyɛ Nyamenle mo wɔ bɛ muala bɛ ti.
52001003	Ɔluakɛ saa yɛkɔ yɛ Nyamenle ne nee yɛ Ze ne anyunlu a, yɛkakye kɛ bɛzile bɛhilele bɛ diedi na bɛ ɛhulolɛ manle bɛyɛle gyima ɛsesebɛ, nee kɛ bɛ anyelazo mɔɔ wɔ yɛ Awulae Gyisɛse Kelaese anu la si gyi kpundii la.
52001004	Mediema, yɛze kɛ Nyamenle lɛ bɛ nwo ɛhulolɛ na yekpa nu yeye bɛ yemaa ɔ nwo.
52001005	Ɔluakɛ yɛanva yɛ nloa mgbane a yɛvale Edwɛkpa ne yɛrɛlɛle bɛ a, yɛvale tumi nee Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne nee ye nɔhalɛ ne anwo adwenle mɔɔ si pi la a yɛrale a. Bɛdabɛ bɛze kɛ yɛzile yɛbɔle yɛ ɛbɛla wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ yɛ nee bɛ de la; yɛyɛle ɛhye wɔ bɛdabɛ bɛ kpalɛ ti.
52001006	Bɛzukoale yɛ nee Awulae; yemɔti bɛnwunle amaneɛ dɔɔnwo, na bɛvale anyelielɛ ne mɔɔ vi Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne anu ba la bɛliele nrɛlaleɛ ne.
52001007	Ɛhye ati bɛyɛle ndonwo kpalɛ bɛmanle diedima mɔɔ wɔ Masidonea nee Giliki (Akaya) maanzinli ne mɔ anu la.
52001008	Ɔluakɛ tɛ Awulae anwo nrɛlaleɛ ne angome yɛɛ vi bɛ ɛkɛ ne dwule Masidonea nee Akaya a, na eza bɛ diedi mɔɔ wɔ Nyamenle anu la noko ɛdwu menli mɔɔ wɔ ɛleka muala la anzo nu. Ɛhye ati, ɔngyia kɛ yɛkɛha nwolɛ edwɛkɛ bɔbɔ.
52001009	Menli zɔhane mɔ ka kɛ bɛzile bɛliele yɛ wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ yɛrale bɛ nwo lɔ la. Bɛka kɛ bɛzile bɛhwenle bɛ nwo bɛvile bɛ mmonle ngakyile ne mɔ anwo, bɛhɔle Nyamenle ɛkɛ na bɛzonlenle nɔhalɛ nee tease Nyamenle ne la.
52001010	Bɛkile kɛ kɛkala bɛlɛkendɛ ɔ Ra Gyisɛse kɛ ɔvi anwuma ɔbara. Yemɔ yɛɛ Nyamenle dwazole ye vile ewule nu, na ɔdie yɛ ɔfi Nyamenle ɛya kpole ne mɔɔ bara la anu a.
52002001	Mediema, bɛdabɛ bɛnwu kɛ yɛ ɛralɛ mɔɔ yɛrale bɛ nwo lɔ la anyɛ mgbane.
52002002	Bɛdabɛ bɛze amaneɛ mɔɔ yɛnwunle ye nee aholoba mɔɔ bɛbɔle yɛ wɔ Felepae kolaa na yɛara Tɛsalonaeka la. Noko yɛ Nyamenle ne manle yɛ akɛnrasesebɛ manle yɛhanle Edwɛkpa ne mɔɔ vi ye ɛkɛ ne la yɛhilele bɛ wɔ mekɛ bɔbɔ mɔɔ ɛnee menli dɔɔnwo tia yɛ la.
52002003	Ɔluakɛ mɔɔ yɛvale yɛdole bɛ nyunlu la ɛngyi nvonleɛ bie anzɛɛ adwenle ɛtane biala azo, yɛɛ yɛando awie biala abɛla.
52002004	Mɔɔ yɛyɛle la a le kɛ dahuu yɛtendɛ, kɛmɔ Nyamenle kpondɛ kɛ yɛtendɛ la, ɔboalekɛ yemaa yɛzɔ ɔ nye na yeva ye Edwɛkpa ne yewula yɛ sa nu. Ɛhye ati yɛmbɔ mɔdenle kɛ yɛsɔ menli nye. Nyamenle mɔɔ ze yɛ ahonle nu la yɛɛ yɛkulo kɛ yɛsɔ ɔ nye a.
52002005	Bɛdabɛ bɛze ye wienyi kɛ yɛanva huhudi ɛdendɛlɛ kɛnlɛma yɛangeda anyebolo zo, Nyamenle di yɛ daselɛ wɔ ɛhye anwo.
52002006	Yɛambɔ mɔdenle kɛ yɛkpondɛ menli nganvolɛ, saa ɔvi bɛ ɛkɛ ne anzɛɛ ɔvi awie mɔ lɔ o,
52002007	noko kɛmɔ yɛle Kelaese ɛzoanvolɛma la, anrɛɛ yɛkola yɛka kɛ bɛyɛ ye zɔhane. Noko yɛbɛlɛle yɛ nwo aze, wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ ɛnee yɛ nee bɛ de la, na yɛdɛfɛdɛfɛle bɛ kɛ ɛrɛladane mɔɔ ɛlɛdi ɔ mra adane la.
52002008	Ɔlua bɛ nwo ɛhulolɛ mɔɔ yɛlɛ la ati yɛanga Edwɛkpa ne mɔɔ vi Nyamenle ɛkɛ ne la angome ala yɛangile bɛ; yɛvale yɛ ɛbɛlabɔlɛ noko yɛbokale nwo. Bɛ nwo hyia yɛ somaa!
52002009	Nɔhalɛ, mediema, bɛkakye kɛ yɛzile yɛyɛle gyima yɛvɛle la. Yɛyɛle gyima nɔɔzo nee ewiazo, amaa yɛanyɛ kpomgbolo yɛamkpolo bɛ kɔme wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ yɛka Edwɛkpa ne mɔɔ vi Nyamenle ɛkɛ ne la yɛahile bɛ la.
52002010	Bɛ nee Nyamenle bɛdi yɛ daselɛ kɛ yɛ subane mɔɔ yɛhilele yɛhilele bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛliele bɛlile la le bɔkɔbɔkɔ, ɔle fɔɔnwo mɔɔ evinli biala ɛnle nwo a.
52002011	Bɛdabɛ bɛnwunle kɛ yɛyɛle bɛ nuhua ko biala kɛ selɛ kɛyɛ ɔ ra la.
52002012	Yɛzile yɛ ahonle, yɛkyekyele bɛ rɛle, na yɛhɔle zolɛ yɛmanle bɛ anwosesebɛ kɛ bɛbɔ ɛbɛla mɔɔ fɛta Nyamenle ne mɔɔ fɛlɛ bɛ kɛ bɛrɛla ye anyunlunyia Belemgbunlililɛ ne anu la.
52002013	Debie bieko mɔɔ yemɔti dahuu yɛyɛ Nyamenle mo la a le kɛ, mɔɔ yɛvale Nyamenle nrɛlaleɛ ne yɛrɛlɛle bɛ la, bɛdiele na bɛzɔle nu kɛ ɔnle edwɛkɛ mɔɔ vi sonla ɛkɛ a, na ɔvi Nyamenle ɛkɛ, yɛɛ ɔle zɔhane noko. Ɔluakɛ Nyamenle ɛlɛyɛ ye gyima wɔ bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛdie bɛdi la anu.
52002014	Ayi mɔ, mɔɔ zile asɔnema mɔɔ le Kelaese ɛdeɛ la anwo zo wɔ Dwudiya la, yemɔ ala a zile bɛdabɛ noko bɛ nwo zo a. Bɛnwunle amaneɛ wɔ bɛdabɛ bɛ menli asa anu, kɛmɔ Dwuuma yɛle ala la.
52002015	Dwuuma hunle Awulae Gyisɛse nee kpɔmanvolɛma ne mɔ, bɛyɛle yɛ kpɔdekpɔde bɛmanle yɛnriandile. Bɛha Nyamenle ɛya kpole! Bɛkyi awie biala.
52002016	Bɛbɔle mɔdenle kɛ bɛtua yɛ mɔɔ yɛnga Edwɛkpa ne yɛngile bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnle Dwuuma la, amaa bɛtie a bɛanyia ngoane. Bɛyɛle ɛhye bɛmanle bɛ ɛtane ne mɔ akee yɛle kpole. Na kɛkala, Nyamenle ɛya ne wɔ bɛ nwo zo.
52002017	Mediema, yɛmɛ, yɛvile bɛ nwo ɛkɛ ne mekɛ ekyi bie wɔ nwonane nu na tɛ sunsum nu ɔ, yemɔti yɛ nwo dɔ bɛ kpole, na yɛ kunlu a anrɛɛ yɛnwu bɛ nyunlu bieko.
52002018	Kɛmɔ yɛkpondɛ kɛ yɛsia yɛba bɛ nwo lɔ bieko la ati, medame Pɔɔlo, menyɛle biala kɛ anrɛɛ menwɔzia menwɔra, noko Seetan ammaa yɛ adenle.
52002019	Na ɛnee yɛ anyelazo, yɛ anyelielɛ anzɛɛ abɔtile mɔɔ yɛfa yɛtu yɛ nloa anu wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ yɛ Awulae kɛra la a le boni? Tɛ yemɔ a le bɛdabɛ ɔ?
52002020	Nɔhalɛ, bɛmɛ a bɛle yɛ anyunlunyia nee yɛ anyelielɛ a.
52003001	Nzinlii ɛnee akee yɛngola nu sɔ. Yemɔti yɛyɛle kɛ yɛmɛ yɛkɛha Atɛnse
52003002	na yɛazoa adiema Temɔte mɔɔ nee yɛ yɛ Nyamenle gyima ye, yɛka Edwɛkpa ne mɔɔ fane Kelaese anwo la. Yɛzoanle ye kɛ ɔramaa bɛ anwosesebɛ na ɔboa bɛ wɔ bɛ diedi nu,
52003003	amaa bɛ biala andoa nyane mɔɔ bɛlɛkile bɛ la ati yeamkpo aze. Bɛdabɛ bɛze ye wienyi kɛ ɔyɛ Nyamenle ɛhulolɛ kɛ bɛkɛhile yɛ abodelɛ ɛhye mɔ amuala.
52003004	Ɔluakɛ mɔɔ yɛwɔ bɛ nwo lɔ la yɛhanle yɛhilele bɛ kɛ bɛbahile yɛ nyane, yɛɛ mɔɔ ɛzi la ɛmaa bɛnwu mɔɔ yɛhanle la nɔhalɛ.
52003005	Ɛnee akee mengola ye me kunlu di bieko, ɛhye ati menzoanle Temɔte kɛ ɔranlea kɛ bɛ diedi ne si gyi la. Ɔnrɛyɛ nɔhalɛ kɛ Abɔnsam kɛhola kɛzɔ bɛ muala kɛnlea dedee kɛmaa yɛ gyima mɔɔ yɛyɛle la amuala kɛyɛ mgbane!
52003006	Kɛkala, Temɔte vi bɛ nwo lɔ ɛzia ɛra yɛ nwo ɛke, na yeva amaneɛ fɛlɛko mɔɔ fane bɛ diedi nee ɛhulolɛ nwo la yerabɔ yɛ. Yeha yehile yɛ kɛ dahuu bɛdwenle yɛ nwo adwenle kpalɛ, yɛɛ bɛ nwo dɔ yɛ, kɛmɔ yɛdayɛ yɛ nwo dɔ bɛ la.
52003007	Yemɔti, mediema, wɔ yɛ anwongyelelɛ nee amaneɛnwunlɛ ne mɔ anu, bɛmɛ a bɛzi yɛ ahonle a. Bɛ diedi yɛɛ ɛmaa yɛ anwosesebɛ a,
52003008	ɔboalekɛ saa bɛgyinla kpundii wɔ Awulae anu a, ɛnee yɛlɛ ngoane.
52003009	Kɛkala yɛkola yɛyɛ Nyamenle mo wɔ bɛ ti. Yɛyɛ Nyamenle mo wɔ anyelielɛ mɔɔ bɛmɛ bɛ ti yɛlɛ ye wɔ ɔ nyunlu la.
52003010	Alehyenlɛ nee aledwolɛ kɔsɔɔti yɛfa yɛ ahonle muala yɛsɛlɛ kɛ yɛkɛnwu bɛ nyunlu na mɔɔ bɛhyia nwo wɔ bɛ diedi nu la yɛayɛ yɛamaa bɛ.
52003011	Yɛsɛlɛ yɛ Nyamenle Selɛ mumua ne nee yɛ Awulae Gyisɛse kɛ ɔbuke adenle ɔmaa yɛnyia mekɛ yɛrɛla bɛ nwo lɔ.
52003012	Awulae ɛmaa bɛnyia bɛ nwo ɛhulolɛ ngoko na ɔmaa bɛ ɛhulolɛ mɔɔ bɛlɛ ye wɔ menli nwo la ɛnyi ɛyɛ kpole kpalɛ kɛ ɛhulolɛ mɔɔ yɛlɛ ye wɔ bɛ nwo la.
52003013	Zɛhae adenle zo yɛɛ ɔbamaa bɛ nwo ayɛ se, na bɛali munli, bɛ nwo ade wɔ yɛ Nyamenle Selɛ ne anyunlu, wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ yɛ Awulae Gyisɛse nee bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛle ye ɛdeɛ la kɛra la a. ɛra la a.
52004001	Awieleɛ ne, mediema, kɛmɔ bɛzukoale kɛ bɛkɛzi bɛkɛbɔ ɛbɛla kpalɛ mɔɔ sɔ Nyamenle anye la bɛvile yɛ ɛkɛ ne la, zɔhane ala yɛɛ bɛyɛ a. Na kɛkala yɛlua Awulae Gyisɛse duma nu yɛsɛlɛ bɛ kɛ bɛyɛ ye molozo.
52004002	Ɔluakɛ bɛdabɛ bɛze ngilehilelɛ mɔɔ ɔlua Awulae Gyisɛse tumi zo yɛvale yɛmanle bɛ la.
52004003	Nyamenle ɛhulolɛdeɛ a le kɛ bɛ nwo kɛde na bɛkɛhwe bɛ nwo bɛkɛvi adwɔmane ɛbɔlɛ nwo.
52004004	Bɛdabɛ mrenya mɔɔ bɛwɔ nu la ɔwɔ kɛ nwu raalɛ gya wɔ anwondelɛ nee enililɛ nu,
52004005	tɛ wɔ atiakunluwɔzo ɛtane nu, kɛmɔ menli mɔɔ ɛnze Nyamenle la yɛ ye la.
52004006	Wɔ ɛhye ɛyɛlɛ nu, ɔnle kɛ awie biala yɛ ɔ diema bie ɛtane anzɛɛ sisi ye. Yɛha ɛhye yɛhile bɛ ɛlɛ, yɛɛ yɛbɔ bɛ nwolɛ kɔkɔ, kɛ Nyamenle badea bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛyɛ zɔhane ɛtane ne la.
52004007	Nyamenle anvɛlɛ yɛ kɛ yɛrabɔ ɛbɛla mgbane mgbane, ɔvɛlɛle yɛ kɛ yɛrayɛ menli mɔɔ anwo te a.
52004008	Zɔhane ati, mɔɔ kɛkpo ngilehilelɛ ɛhye la ɛmkpo sonla, na yekpo Nyamenle ne mɔɔ ɛva ye Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne ɛmaa bɛ la.
52004009	Ɔngyia kɛ awie kɛhɛlɛ bɛ kɛ anrɛɛ bɛhulo bɛ gɔnwo mɔ diedima, ɔluakɛ Nyamenle ɔdaye yehilehile bɛ kɛ bɛzi bɛhulo bɛ nwo ngoko la.
52004010	Nɔhalɛ, zɛhae subane ne ala a bɛhile bɛmaa mediema mɔɔ wɔ Masidonea maanzinli nu la amuala a. Yemɔti yɛsɛlɛ bɛ, mediema, bɛyɛ ye zɔhane kpalɛ dahuu.
52004011	Bɛva bɛzie bɛ nyunlu kɛ bɛkɛbɔ ɛbɛla mɔɔ le bɛtɛɛ a, bɛdwenle bɛ nwo na bɛbɔ ɛbɛla mɔɔ kɛmaa bɛkɛhola bɛ nwo nea a, kɛmɔ yɛhanle yɛhilele bɛ la.
52004012	Saa bɛyɛ ye zɔhane na bɛanva bɛ rɛle bɛanzɔ awie a, bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛwɔ amozi na bɛnle diedima la kɛbu bɛ bie.
52004013	Mediema, yɛkulo kɛ bɛnwu nɔhalɛ ne mɔɔ fane bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛwu la anwo la, amaa bɛdabɛ noko bɛanli nyane kɛ menli mɔɔ ɛnlɛ anyelazo la.
52004014	Yɛdie yɛdi kɛ Gyisɛse wule na eza ɔdwazole ɔrale ngoane nu, zɔhane ala yɛɛ Nyamenle balua Gyisɛse anwo zo ava bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛdie ye bɛdi na bɛwu la azia ara ngoane nu a.
52004015	Wɔ ɛhye anwo, yɛka mɔɔ Awulae ɔdaye ye ngilehilelɛ ne se la: yɛdayɛ mɔɔ saa ɔdwu Awulae ɛralɛ ne a ɛnee yɛtɛte ngoane nu la ɛnrɛlumua bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛwu la anyunlu.
52004016	Yɛbade kɛ bɛha tumi edwɛkɛ ne wɔ anwuma lɔ, yɛbade Nyamenle soanvolɛ kpanyinli ne ane, bɛbabɔ Nyamenle aweɛne tendenle ne anu, na Awulae ɔdaye mumua ne ɔvi anwuma lɔ ɔbadwu aze. Bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛdie Kelaese bɛdi na bɛwu la balumua adwazo avi ewule nu;
52004017	na akee yɛdayɛ mɔɔ mekɛ ne anu yɛtɛte aze anzɛɛ yɛtɛwule la bɛakpogya yɛ zo anwuma na yɛ nee bɛ yɛ muala yɛahuohua yɛ nloa wɔ amungu ne anu, na yɛahɔyia Awulae wɔ anwomanyunlu. Na akee yɛ nee Awulae adɛnla dahuu.
52004018	Yemɔti, bɛva ɛhye mɔ bɛkyekye bɛ rɛle ng bɛkyekye bɛ rɛle ng
52005001	Mediema, ɔngyia kɛ yɛkɛhɛlɛ bɛ wɔ mekɛ nee ɛlobɔ holɛ ko mɔɔ ɛhye mɔ bazi la anwo.
52005002	Ɔluakɛ bɛdabɛ bɛze kɛ Awulae Kenle ne bara kɛ awule ba bawua nɔɔzo la.
52005003	Mekɛ mɔɔ menli kɛdwenle kɛ akee “Debie biala ɛla boɛ” la, mekɛ ne anu ala yɛɛ munzule ne bazi a. Biala ɛnrɛvi ɛsalɛ, ɔbayɛ arɛlevilɛ nu kɛ raalɛ mɔɔ ako ɛha ye la.
52005004	Noko ayi mɔ, bɛmɛ bɛnde awozinli nu na Kenle ne ali bɛ nvunu kɛ awule la.
52005005	Bɛ muala bɛle wienyi nu menli, mɔɔ kile kɛ bɛle alehyenlɛ nu menli.
52005006	Yemɔti, bɛmmamaa yɛdafe kɛ ebia mɔ la; ɔwɔ kɛ yɛmaa yɛ nye gyinla zolɛ na yɛyɛ yɛ nye gyɛlɛmgbɛɛnye.
52005007	Ɔluakɛ menli mɔɔ dafe la da nɔɔzo, yɛɛ bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛno nza bɛbo la tinda nɔɔzo.
52005008	Na yɛmɛ, yɛle alehyenlɛ nu amra, yemɔti bɛmaa yɛzie yɛ nye gyɛlɛmgbɛɛnye na yɛva diedi nee ɛhulolɛ yɛyɛ bulalɛ enyinlike yɛbutu yɛ kɛnra azo, na yɛva yɛ ngoane ɛnyianlɛ nwo anyelazo yɛhakyi bulalɛ kyɛlɛ yɛzoa.
52005009	Nyamenle angyehyɛ kɛ yɛranwu amaneɛ wɔ ye ɛya ne anu. Yevɛlɛ yɛ kɛ yɛralua yɛ Awulae Gyisɛse Kelaese anwo zo yɛnyia ngoane.
52005010	Gyisɛse wule manle yɛ amaa ɔba a, saa yɛwu o, yɛde ngoane nu o, yɛ nee ye adɛnla.
52005011	Zɔhane ati bɛboa bɛ nwo ngoko, kɛmɔ kɛkala bɛlɛyɛ ye la na bɛmaa bɛ nwo anwosesebɛ.
52005012	Mediema, yɛsɛlɛ bɛ kɛ bɛli menli mɔɔ bɛ nee bɛ sonle na bɛyɛ bɛ mgbanyinli mɔɔ tu bɛ folɛ, na bɛkilehile bɛ Awulae adenle ne la eni.
52005013	Bɛli bɛ eni kpole kpalɛ na bɛhulo bɛ wɔ bɛ gyima ne mɔɔ bɛyɛ la ati. Bɛmaa bɛ muala bɛ nloa ɛzɛ bɛ nwo.
52005014	Yɛkakye bɛ, bɛbɔ mɔɔ le mgbovonle la kɔkɔ, bɛzi mɔɔ le foanvoanle la ahonle, bɛboa mɔɔ ɛnlɛ anwosesebɛ la, na bɛnyia biala anwo abotane.
52005015	Bɛnlea kɛ awie ɛnrɛva ɛtane ɛnrɛdua ɛtane kakɛ. Dahuu bɛyɛ bɛ adwenle kɛ bɛkɛyɛ kpalɛ bɛkɛmaa bɛ nwo ngoko nee awie mɔ gyɛne.
52005016	Dahuu bɛmaa bɛ nye ɛlie,
52005017	bɛyɛ nzɛlɛlɛ dahuu,
52005018	na bɛyɛ Nyamenle mo wɔ gyinlabelɛ biala anu. Mɔɔ Nyamenle kpondɛ kɛ bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛ nee Kelaese Gyisɛse lua la yɛ la ɛne.
52005019	Bɛmmanua Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne,
52005020	bɛmmakpo Nyamenle nrɛlaleɛ kpalɛ biala.
52005021	Bɛzɔ ninyɛne kɔsɔɔti bɛnlea, bɛva mɔɔ le kpalɛ la bɛzie,
52005022	na bɛhyi ɛtane ngakyile biala.
52005023	Nyamenle ne mɔɔ maa anzonudwolɛ la ɛde bɛ nwo wɔ adenle biala anu, na ɔva bɛ sonla mumua ne ɔzie: bɛ ɛkɛla, bɛ sunsum, yɛɛ bɛ sonlabaka ne amuala, ɔye bɛ ɔvi nvonleɛ biala anu, ɔde bɛ nwo wɔ Kenle ne mɔɔ Awulae Gyisɛse Kelaese bara la.
52005024	Bɛkola bɛfa bɛ rɛle bɛwula Nyamenle ne mɔɔ fɛlɛ bɛ la anu, ɔluakɛ ɔkola ɔyɛ.
52005025	Mediema, anrɛɛ bɛzɛlɛ bɛmaa yɛ.
52005026	Bɛva atuu ɛyɛlɛ kpalɛ bɛbizebiza mediema ne mɔ ahye.
52005027	Mese bɛ wɔ Awulae duma nu kɛ bɛgenga kɛlata ɛhye bɛhile mediema ne mɔ amuala.
52005028	Yɛ Awulae Gyisɛse Kelaese ɛlo bɛ na ɔ nee bɛ ɛdɛnla.
53001001	Kɛlata ɛhye vi Pɔɔlo, Saelase, yɛɛ Temɔte ɛkɛ. Yɛfa yɛahɔmaa Tɛsalonaeka asɔnema mɔɔ le yɛ Ze Nyamenle ne nee Awulae Gyisɛse Kelaese ɛdeɛ la.
53001002	Yɛ Ze Nyamenle ne nee Awulae Gyisɛse Kelaese ɛlo bɛ na ɔmaa bɛ anzonudwolɛ.
53001003	Mediema, ɔwɔ kɛ yɛyɛ Nyamenle mo dahuu wɔ bɛ ti. Ɔle kpalɛ ɔmaa yɛ kɛ yɛkɛyɛ ye zɔhane, ɔboalekɛ bɛ diedi ɛlɛnyi, yɛɛ bɛ ɛhulolɛ mɔɔ bɛ nuhua ko biala lɛ ye wɔ ɔ gɔnwo mɔ diedima anwo la ɛlɛyɛ kpole.
53001004	Zɔhane ati yɛfa bɛ yɛpɛ Nyamenle menli mɔɔ ɛha la anye zo. Yɛfa bɛ diedi nu kpundii mɔɔ bɛgyi wɔ nyanenwunlɛ nee abodelɛ mɔɔ bɛlɛnwu ye la anu la yɛtu yɛ nloa anu kpole.
53001005	Ɛhye mɔ amuala kile kɛ Nyamenle ndɛnebualɛ ne le fɔɔnwo, amaa bɛafɛta Nyamenle Belemgbunlililɛ ne, mɔɔ yemɔti bɛlɛnwu amaneɛ la.
53001006	Ɛhye ati Nyamenle badua menli mɔɔ ɛlɛmaa bɛanwu nyane la amuala kakɛ,
53001007	yeaye nyane mɔɔ bɛlɛnwu ye la bɛ kɔme zo, na nwolɛ nyilalɛ ne bie aha yɛdayɛ noko. Ɔbayɛ ɛhye wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ Awulae Gyisɛse vi anwuma, ɔ nee ye soanvolɛma mɔɔ lɛ tumi la lua sendɔlɔra nu kɛra
53001008	kɛ ɔbadua bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnze Nyamenle, nee bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnli Edwɛkpa ne mɔɔ fane yɛ Awulae Gyisɛse anwo la azo la kakɛ la.
53001009	Bɛbadea menli zɔhane mɔ na bɛaye bɛ bɛavi Awulae anye zo nee ye anyunlunyia tumi ne abo, na bɛazɛkye bɛ ɛzɛkyelɛ mɔɔ ɛnlɛ awieleɛ la.
53001010	Ɛhye bazi mekɛ mɔɔ Kenle ne kɛdwu na Kelaese kɛra kɛ ɔbalie ye anyunlunyia nee enililɛ yeavi ye menli ne nee bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛdie ye bɛdi la ɛkɛ ne la. Bɛdabɛ noko bɛbaboka Nyamenle menli ne anwo, ɔboalekɛ bɛlie ye edwɛkɛ ne mɔɔ yɛhanle yɛhilele bɛ la bɛli.
53001011	Ɛhye ati dahuu yɛsɛlɛ yɛmaa bɛ, yɛbiza yɛ Nyamenle ne kɛ ɔmaa bɛ nwo ɛfɛta ye ɛvɛlɛlɛ ne. Yɛsɛlɛ kɛ ɔlua ye tumi ne azo ɔmaa bɛhola bɛyɛ kpalɛ biala mɔɔ bɛkpondɛ kɛ bɛyɛ la na ɔmaa bɛ diedi nu gyima muala ɛli munli,
53001012	amaa ɔlua zo bɛali yɛ Awulae Gyisɛse duma ne eni, na bɛdabɛ noko ɔlua yɛ Nyamenle ne nee Awulae Gyisɛse Kelaese ɛlolɛ zo bɛali bɛ eni.
53002001	Mediema, mɔɔ fane yɛ Awulae Gyisɛse Kelaese ɛralɛ ne nee yɛ nloa mɔɔ bɛbahuohua na yɛ nee ye ahɔyia la anwo, mesɛlɛ bɛ,
53002002	bɛmmamaa bɛ adwenle yɛ bɛ kpomgbondee anzɛɛ bɛmmadi nyane wɔ nwolɛ na bɛdwenle kɛ asɛɛ Awulae Kenle zɔhane ɛraze dɛbadɛba. Ɔkɛyɛ kɛ bekezɛ ɔvindele Sunsum nu edwɛkɛ bie anu anzɛɛ Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne nolobɔlɛ nu, anzɛɛ yɛhɛlɛ ye wɔ yɛ ngɛlata mɔɔ yɛva yɛrɛlɛ bɛ la bie anu.
53002003	Bɛmmamaa awie biala bɛlɛbɛla bɛ wɔ adenle biala anu. Ɔluakɛ Kenle ne ɛnrɛra kyesɛ “Atuadelɛ” ɛra zolɛ kpalɛ na mɛladonlɛ ɛhakyi ɔ nwo “Amumuyɛnli” ne mɔɔ bɛbabua ye ewule fɔlɛ la ɛra.
53002004	Saa ɔba a ɔbatia debie biala nee nyamenle biala mɔɔ menli sonle la. Ɔbavo yeagyinlegyinla bɛ bati, yeahɔdɛnla aze wɔ Nyamenle Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne anu na yeavɛlɛ ɔ nwo kɛ ɔdaye a ɔle Nyamenle a.
53002005	Bɛngakye ɔ? Mɔɔ mewɔ bɛ nwo lɔ la menganle ɛhye mengilele bɛ.
53002006	Debie ti yɛɛ kɛkala ɛhye ɛtɛsile a, yɛɛ bɛze deɛ holɛ ko ne noko. Saa mekɛ kpalɛ ne dwu a, Amumuyɛnli ne bara.
53002007	Kɛkala, menli somaa ɛlɛyɛ ninyɛndane atia mɔɔ Nyamenle ɛhyehyɛ la, noko mɔɔ bazi la ɛnrɛzi kɔkpula mekɛ mɔɔ bɛkɛye ahenle ne mɔɔ si ye aze la ɛkɛ ne la,
53002008	kolaa na akee Amumuyɛnli ne ara. Na saa Awulae Gyisɛse ba a, ɔbava ɔ nloa anu anwoma mgbane yeahu ye na yeava ɔ nyunlu ɛdalɛ wienyi kpole ne yeazɛkye ye bɔkɔɔ.
53002009	Amumuyɛnli ne bava Seetan tumi a ara a, na yearayɛ adalɛ nwanwane ninyɛne mgbole, yeaye ngonyia,
53002010	na yeava adalɛ nee amumuyɛ adenle zo yeahwe bɛdabɛ mɔɔ ɔwɔ kɛ bɛminli la. Menli ɛhye mɔ baminli, ɔluakɛ bɛangulo nɔhalɛ ne mɔɔ kɛlie bɛ ngoane la.
53002011	Ɔlua ɛhye ati, Nyamenle bazoa nvonleɛ tumi ne yeamaa yearayɛ gyima wɔ bɛ nu, amaa bɛalie mɔɔ le adalɛ la bɛali.
53002012	Ye awieleɛ a le kɛ, bɛbazɛkye bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛanlie nɔhalɛ ne bɛanli na bɛ nye die ɛtane nwo la amuala.
53002013	Nyamenle kulo bɛ, yemɔti mediema, ɔwɔ kɛ dahuu yɛyɛ Nyamenle mo wɔ bɛ ti. Ɔluakɛ mɔlebɛbo ne ala yɛɛ Nyamenle kpale nu yele bɛ kɛ bɛlie bɛ ngoane a, wɔ bɛ diedi mɔɔ wɔ nɔhalɛ ne anu nee Sunsum ne tumi ne mɔɔ ɛyɛ bɛ Nyamenle menli mɔɔ anwo te la ati.
53002014	Nyamenle luale Edwɛkpa ne mɔɔ yɛhanle yɛhilele bɛ la azo a vɛlɛle bɛ a, amaa bɛanyia Awulae Gyisɛse Kelaese anyunlunyia ne bie.
53002015	Yemɔti mediema, bɛgyinla kpundii na bɛzɔ nɔhalɛ ne mɔɔ yɛha nwolɛ edwɛkɛ wɔ yɛ nolobɔlɛ nu nee ngɛlata zo yɛhile bɛ la anu ɛsesebɛ.
53002016	Yɛ Awulae Gyisɛse Kelaese mumua ne nee yɛ Ze Nyamenle ne, mɔɔ hulole yɛ na ye ɛlolɛ ti yemaa yɛ anwosesebɛ mɔɔ ɛnlɛ awieleɛ nee anyelazo kpalɛ la,
53002017	ɛmaa bɛ akɛnrasesebɛ na ɔmaa bɛyɛ se, bɛyɛ nla, bɛha na bɛyɛ mɔɔ le kpalɛ la amuala. la amuala.
53003001	Mediema, edwɛkɛ mɔɔ li amozi la a le kɛ, bɛzɛlɛ bɛmaa yɛ kɛ Awulae edwɛkɛ ne kɛdɛlɛ ndɛndɛ na ɔkɛli konim, kɛmɔ ɔyɛle ye wɔ bɛ nu la.
53003002	Bɛzɛlɛ kɛ Nyamenle kɛlie yɛ kɛvi menli munzule atisesebɛma asa anu; ɔluakɛ tɛ menli ne amuala a die edwɛkɛ ne di a.
53003003	Bɛkola bɛfa bɛ rɛle bɛwula Awulae anu. Ɔbamaa bɛ nwo ayɛ se na yealie bɛ gyɛlɛɛnye yeavi Ɛtanenli ne asa anu.
53003004	Awulae ɛmaa yɛ adwenle ɛzi pi wɔ bɛ nwo, yemɔti yɛze kɛ bɛlɛyɛ mɔɔ yɛhanle yɛhilele bɛ la, na eza bɛbahɔ zolɛ bɛayɛ ye zɔhane dahuu.
53003005	Yɛsɛlɛ kɛ Awulae ɛha bɛ ahonle ɛmaa bɛnyia Nyamenle ɛhulolɛ ne anwo ndelebɛbo kpalɛ na bɛgyinla kpundii wɔ Kelaese anwo ngilehilelɛ ne anu.
53003006	Mediema, yɛlua Awulae Gyisɛse Kelaese duma nu, yɛka yɛahile bɛ kɛ bɛhwe bɛ nwo bɛvi mediema mɔɔ ɛlɛyɛ mgbovonle na bɛngulo kɛ bɛdi folɛ mɔɔ yɛdule bɛ la azo la anwo.
53003007	Bɛdabɛ bɛze kɛ ɔwɔ kɛ bɛyɛ kɛ mɔɔ yɛyɛle la. Yɛanyɛ mgbovonle wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ yɛ nee bɛ de la.
53003008	Yɛanli awie biala debie mɔɔ yɛandua a. Yɛyɛle gyima, yɛhwinle yɛ ti anwo alehyenlɛ nee aledwolɛ, amaa yɛanyɛ kpomgbolo yɛamkpolo awie biala akɔme.
53003009	Tɛ kɛ asɛɛ yɛnlɛ adenle kɛ yɛbiza awie debie ɔ, na yɛyɛle ye zɔhane amaa bɛdabɛ noko bɛanlea zolɛ bɛayɛ bie.
53003010	Mɔɔ yɛwɔ bɛ nwo lɔ la, ɛnee yɛta yɛka yɛkile bɛ kɛ, “Mɔɔ ɛngulo kɛ ɔyɛ gyima la, ɔnle kɛ ɔdi aleɛ.”
53003011	Yɛka ɛhye ɔboalekɛ yɛde kɛ bɛ bie mɔ ɛlɛbɔ mgbovonle ɛbɛla, mɔɔ bɛnyɛ ɛhwee kɛ awie mɔ edwɛkɛ nu yɛɛ bɛyɛ ye nwotonlonwotonlo a.
53003012	Yɛka yɛahile menli mɔɔ le zɛhae la kɛ yɛlua Awulae Gyisɛse Kelaese duma nu, yɛbɔ bɛ kɔkɔ anzɛɛ yɛkakye bɛ kɛ, bɛbɔ ɛbɛla mɔɔ maa anzonudwolɛ la na bɛyɛ gyima mɔɔ kɛmaa bɛ sa kɛhɔ bɛ nloa dahuu la.
53003013	Mediema, bɛmmagyakyi kpalɛyɛlɛ.
53003014	Saa awie wɔ ɛkɛ ne mɔɔ ɔnrɛli mɔɔ yɛhɛlɛ ye wɔ kɛlata ɛhye anu la azo a, bɛmɛ bɛyɛ ahenle zɔhane nzonlɛ, bɛmmayɛ ye ɛhwee, na ɔdaye ɔ ngome ɔ nyunlu bagua aze.
53003015	Bɛmmayɛ ye kɛ ɔle kpɔvolɛ; bɛbɔ ye kɔkɔ kɛ adiema.
53003016	Yɛsɛlɛ kɛ Awulae mumua ne, mɔɔ le anzonudwolɛ maavolɛ la ɛmaa bɛ nzo nu ɛdwo bɛ mekɛ biala nee adenle biala anu. Awulae nee bɛ ɛdɛnla.
53003017	Medame Pɔɔlo, me sa anloa ɛ. Mebiza bɛ ahye. Kɛ medwula me kɛlata biala mɔɔ menwɔhɛlɛ la ɛne; kɛ mekɛlɛ ye ala la ɛne.
53003018	Yɛ Awulae Gyisɛse Kelaese ɛlo bɛ na ɔ nee bɛ ɛdɛnla.
54001001	Medame Pɔɔlo, mɔɔ Nyamenle yɛ Ngoanedievolɛ ne nee Kelaese Gyisɛse yɛ anyelazo ne manle bɛyɛle me Kelaese ɛzoanvolɛ la a melɛkɛlɛ kɛlata ɛhye a.
54001002	Mefa meahɔmaa Temɔte, mɔɔ le me ra kpalɛ wɔ diedi ne anu la. Nyamenle Selɛ ne nee Kelaese Gyisɛse yɛ Awulae ne ɛlo wɔ, ɛnwu wɔ anwunvɔne na ɔmaa wɔ anzonudwolɛ.
54001003	Mekpondɛ kɛ ɛtɛnla Ɛfɛsɛse, kɛmɔ mesia meahɔ Masidonea mɔɔ menganle mengilele wɔ la. Menli bie wɔ ɛkɛ ne ɛlɛkilehile ngilehilelɛ mɔɔ ɛnle nɔhalɛ a, na tua bɛ.
54001004	Ka kile bɛ maa bɛgyakyi bɛ nla mɔ anwo nwɔra ɛdolɛ ne nee mbusua nu ɛhilehilelɛ somasoma ne. Ɛhye mɔ wie kpolerazulɛ ala, na ɔnvane Nyamenle ngyehyɛlɛ ne mɔɔ bɛdua diedi zo bɛnwu ye la anwo.
54001005	Bodane mɔɔ yɛ ngilehilelɛ ɛdeɛ ne gyi zolɛ la a le ɛhulolɛ mɔɔ vi ahonle mɔɔ ɛtane ɛnle nu, adwenle mɔɔ nuhua te wienyi, nee diedi mɔɔ di munli la.
54001006	Menli bie ɛhwe bɛ nwo ɛvi ngilehilelɛ ɛhye mɔ anwo na bɛhɔdoa ngoasea edwɛkɛ ngehanleɛ bo zo bɛminli.
54001007	Bɛkpondɛ kɛ bɛkilehile Nyamenle mɛla ne anu, noko bɛdabɛ mumua ne bɛ edwɛkɛ mɔɔ bɛka la bɛnde ɔ bo na bɛade ninyɛne mɔɔ bɛka nwolɛ mgbole la abo.
54001008	Yɛze kɛ Mɛla ne le kpalɛ, saa menli di zolɛ, kɛmɔ ɔfɛta la a.
54001009	Ɔwɔ kɛ yɛnwu kɛ tɛ menli mɔɔ di boɛ la ati a mɛla ne wɔ ɛkɛ a, mɛla ne wɔ ɛkɛ maa atuadelɛma, anzosesebɛma, bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnze Nyamenle nee ɛtanevolɛma, bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛ nwo ɛnde, menli mɔɔ ku bɛ ze mɔ anzɛɛ bɛ nli mɔ, ahɔdiawu,
54001010	menli mɔɔ bɔ ɛbɛla funli, mrenya mɔɔ fa mrenya anzɛɛ mraalɛ mɔɔ fa mraalɛ, bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛwua menli, adalɛma, bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛdi dasewia anzɛɛ menli mɔɔ ɛnli nɔhalɛ ngilehilelɛ ne azo la.
54001011	Ngilehilelɛ ɛhye mɔ wɔ Edwɛkpa ne mɔɔ anyunlunyia nee saleɛ Nyamenle ne ɛva ɛwula me sa nu kɛ membɔ ye nolo la anu.
54001012	Meyɛ yɛ Awulae Kelaese Gyisɛse mɔɔ ɛmaa me anwosesebɛ wɔ me gyima ne anwo la mo. Meyɛ ye mo kɛ yebu me bie na yeva me wɔ ye gyima nu a.
54001013	Mekɛ bie mɔɔ ɛraze ɛhɔ la menganle munzule edwɛkɛ mentiale ye, menyɛle ye kpɔdekpɔde na menguale ɔ nyunlu aze. Na Nyamenle nwunle me anwunvɔne, ɔluakɛ ɛnee menlɛ diedi, yemɔti ɛnee menze mɔɔ melɛyɛ la.
54001014	Awulae noko lole me totohyia, na ɔmanle me diedi nee ɛhulolɛ mɔɔ le yɛ ɛdeɛ la wɔ Kelaese Gyisɛse ati.
54001015	Ɛhye le nɔhalɛ edwɛkɛ bɔkɔɔ mɔɔ ɔwɔ kɛ bɛdie bɛto nu na bɛdie bɛdi a; Kelaese Gyisɛse rale ewiade ye anu kɛ ɔbalie ɛtanevolɛma, mɔɔ medame a mele bɛ nuhua kpanyinli la ngoane.
54001016	Ɔlua ɛhye ati yɛɛ Nyamenle nwunle me anwunvɔne a, amaa Kelaese Gyisɛse abotane kpole ne mɔɔ ɔnyianle ye wɔ medame, ɛtanevolɛma kpanyinli me nwo la, ala ali na yeayɛ ndonwo yeamaa bɛdabɛ mɔɔ nzinlii bɛbalie ye bɛali na bɛanyia ngoane mɔɔ ɛnlɛ awieleɛ la.
54001017	Na tete Belemgbunli ne, Damɛnlangoate Nyamenle kokye ne, mɔɔ ɛnyelɛ ɛnnwu ye la, yemɔ yɛɛ enililɛ nee anyunlunyia ɛha ye dahuu a. Amen
54001018	Me ra Temɔte, melɛ mɛla ɛhye, kɛmɔ Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛma edwɛkɛ ne mɔɔ bɛhanle ye wɔ ɛ nwo dɛbadɛba la se la, mewula ɛ sa nu. Maa edwɛkɛ ne ɛyɛ wɔ konle ninyɛne na fa ko konle kpalɛ ne,
54001019	na nyia diedi nee adwenle kpalɛ mɔɔ anu te la. Menli ne bie mɔ ɛminli bɛ diedi, ɔluakɛ bɛnlɛ adwenle kpalɛ mɔɔ anu te a.
54001020	Menli zɛhae bie mɔ a le Haemɛneeyɛse nee Alɛzanda, mɔɔ meva bɛ mewula Seetan tumi ne abo la, amaa bɛahile bɛ kɛ ɔwɔ kɛ bɛgyakyi Nyamenle anwo edwɛkɛ ɛtane ɛhanlɛ.
54002001	Zɔhane ati, edwɛkɛ mɔɔ lumua la a le kɛ, anrɛɛ bodo, sɛlɛ maa ɛ nwo nee awie mɔ na yɛ Nyamenle mo wɔ menli kɔsɔɔti ati.
54002002	Yɛ nzɛlɛlɛ ne bie maa arelemgbunli nee menli mɔɔ tumi wɔ bɛ sa nu la amuala, amaa yɛ nwo adɔ yɛ na yɛanyia anzonudwolɛ yɛabɔ yɛ ɛbɛla, na yɛanyia adenle yɛazonle yɛ Nyamenle ne, yɛali ye eni, kɛmɔ ɔfɛta la.
54002003	Zɛhae nzɛlɛlɛ le kpalɛ na ɔsɔ Nyamenle yɛ Ngoanedievolɛ ne anye.
54002004	Ɔluakɛ ɛkpondɛ kɛ menli kɔsɔɔti nwu nɔhalɛ ne na bɛnyia ngoane.
54002005	Nyamenle kokye a wɔ ɛkɛ a, yɛɛ pepɛdievolɛ kpɔdavolɛ ko a gyi Nyamenle nee sonla avinli a, yemɔ a le Kelaese Gyisɛse
54002006	mɔɔ vale ɔ nwo manle kɛ ɔkpɔne menli kɔsɔɔti yeavi bɛ ɛtane nu la. Mekɛ kpalɛ ne dwule la ɔhilele kɛ Nyamenle kpondɛ kɛ menli kɔsɔɔti nyia ngoane.
54002007	Ɛhye ati yɛɛ ɔyɛle me ɛzoanvolɛ kɛ menga na mengilehile bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnle Dwuuma la nɔhalɛ diedi ne a. Membɔ adalɛ, nɔhalɛ ne a melɛka la!
54002008	Saa bɛyia nuhua kɛ bɛsonle a, mekpondɛ kɛ mrenya ala a yɛ nzɛlɛlɛ a. Ɔwɔ kɛ mrenya zɛhae mɔ yɛ menli mɔɔ bɛdu bɛ nwo bɛmaa Nyamenle na bɛkola bɛmaa bɛ sa zo bɛsɛlɛ mɔɔ ɛya anzɛɛ kpolerazulɛ biala ɛnle nu a.
54002009	Eza mekpondɛ kɛ mraalɛ ne mɔ noko siezie bɛ nwo kɛnlɛma wɔ adenle mɔɔ kile kɛ bɛze deɛ na nyiane wɔ bɛ nye zo la azo; tɛ tileyɛlɛ mɔɔ bie ɛtɛbale ewiade ɛlɛ anzɛɛ avikpa nee mgbɔba mɔɔ bɛfa bɛayɛ bɛ nwo sɔɔnwo, bɛawula adɛladeɛ anzɛɛ bɛaheda ndanlɛ awolɛ ɛsesebɛ la yɛɛ melɛka a.
54002010	Meka ɛbɛla kpalɛ ɛbɔlɛ mɔɔ fɛta mraalɛ mɔɔ sonle Nyamenle la.
54002011	Mraalɛ ɛyɛ koonwu, ɛbɛlɛ bɛ nwo aze ɛzukoa.
54002012	Memmaa adenle kɛ mraalɛ ɛhilehile anzɛɛ ɛnyia mrenya nwo zo tumi; ɔwɔ kɛ bɛka bɛ nloa bɛto nu.
54002013	Ɔluakɛ bɛlumuale bɛbɔle Adam kolaa na bɛabɔ Yivi;
54002014	yɛɛ tɛ Adam a ɛwɔlɛ ne bɛlɛbɛlale ye a. Raalɛ ne a ɛwɔlɛ ne bɛlɛbɛlale ye mɔɔ ɔdonle Nyamenle mɛla ne a.
54002015	Noko saa raalɛ ka ɔ nwo aze, ɔbɔ mɔdenle ɔtɛnla diedi, ɛhulolɛ nee anwondelɛ nu a, ɔlua mralɛ ɛwolɛ ti bɛkɛlie ye ngoane.
54003001	Ɛhye le nɔhalɛ edwɛkɛ bɔkɔɔ: Saa awie anye bolo kɛ ɔyɛ asɔne kpanyinli a, ɛnee yeva gyima kpalɛ.
54003002	Ɔwɔ kɛ asɔne kpanyinli biala yɛ sonla mɔɔ ngehanleɛ biala ɛnle ɔ nwo, ɔ ye kokye, ɔ nye gyi ɔ ti anwo, ɔkola ɔsɔ ɔ nwo, ɔ nye ka aze, ɔdie nyɛvolɛ na ɔkola ɔkilehile;
54003003	ɔnle kɛ ɔyɛ nzanli anzɛɛ ɔdi mgbonde; ɔwɔ kɛ ɔyɛ sonla bɛtɛɛ mɔɔ kyi manzonle; ɔnle kɛ ɔ nye bolo ezukoa.
54003004	Ɔwɔ kɛ ɔyɛ sonla mɔɔ kola bu ɔdaye ye awuke ne kpalɛ na ɔ mra fa enililɛ tie ye edwɛkɛ a.
54003005	Awie mɔɔ ɛngola ɛmbu ɔdaye ye awuke la, kɛ ɔkɛyɛ na yeahola yeanlea Nyamenle asɔne ne azo ɛ?
54003006	Ɔnle kɛ ɔyɛ sonla mɔɔ rale asɔne ne anu la ɛtɛkyɛle a, anrɛɛ ɔkɛmemaa ɔ nwo zo ɔkɛmaa bɛkɛbua ye fɔlɛ kɛ bɛbua Abɔnsam la.
54003007	Ɔwɔ kɛ ɔyɛ sonla mɔɔ bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛngɔ asɔne la di ye eni, amaa yeangua ɔ nyunlu aze, yeangɔndɔ Abɔnsam ɛhane nu.
54003008	Zɔhane ala yɛɛ ɔwɔ kɛ asɔne nu boavolɛma yɛ menli mɔɔ lɛ subane kpalɛ na bɛdi nɔhalɛ a; ɔnle kɛ bɛyɛ nzama anzɛɛ bɛyɛ ezukoa nwo anyebolo.
54003009	Ɔwɔ kɛ bɛfa adwenle mɔɔ anu te la bɛsɔ diedi ne mɔɔ bɛye bɛhile bɛ la anu nɔhalɛ nu.
54003010	Bɛzɔ menli zɛhae mɔ bɛnlea kolaa na saa edwɛkɛ ɛnle bɛ nwo a, bɛazonle asɔne ne kɛ bɛle boavolɛma.
54003011	Zɔhane ala yɛɛ bɛ ye mɔ noko ɔwɔ kɛ yɛ mraalɛ mɔɔ bɛ nye gyi bɛ ti anwo na bɛdi nɔhalɛ wɔ debie biala anu a.
54003012	Sonla mɔɔ le asɔne nu boavolɛ la ɔwɔ kɛ gya raalɛ ko, na ɔkola ɔ mra nwo zo nee ye awuke zo nea kpalɛ.
54003013	Ɔluakɛ bɛdabɛ boavolɛma mɔɔ bɛkɛyɛ bɛ gyima kpalɛ la nyia bɛ nyunlu na bɛkola bɛka bɛ diedi mɔɔ wɔ Kelaese Gyisɛse anu la anwo edwɛkɛ mɔɔ bɛnzulo a.
54003014	Melɛkɛlɛ wɔ kɛlata ɛhye, noko me nye la kɛ ɔnrɛhyɛ biala na meara lɔ.
54003015	Na saa mekyɛ ɛralɛ nu a, kɛlata ɛhye bamaa wɔanwu kɛ ɔwɔ kɛ ɛsi ɛbɔ wɔ ɛbɛla wɔ Nyamenle sua nu la, meka tease Nyamenle ne asɔne ne mɔɔ le nɔhalɛ ne sika nee ye bodane la.
54003016	Yɛka yɛto gua kɛ nɔhalɛ, awozinli nu debie mɔɔ wɔ yɛ nyamenlezonlenlɛ ne anu la yɛ nwanwane: Ɔrale ewiade kɛ sonla, noko Sunsum nu a ɔle saanwu. Nyamenle soanvolɛma nwunle ye, bɛbɔle ɔ nwo nolo wɔ maanle maanle kɔsɔɔti anu. Ewiade amra amuala liele ye lile, na bɛvale ye bɛhɔle anwuma anyu
54004001	Nyamenle Sunsum ne ka ye wienyi kɛ menli ne bie mɔ bakpo bɛ diedi ne kenle bie; bɛbadie sunsum adalɛma edwɛkɛ na bɛali mbɔnsam ngilehilelɛ ne mɔ azo.
54004002	Menli alane bie mɔɔ bɛ adwenle ɛwu kɛ asɛɛ bɛva bulalɛ mɔɔ ɛdɔlɔ woonwu la bɛwula nu la a yɛ ngilehilelɛ ɛhye a.
54004003	Zɛhae menli ne kilehile kɛ ɔnle kpalɛ kɛ menli kɛgya bɛ nwo, yɛɛ ɔnle kɛ bɛdi aleɛ bie mɔ. Noko Nyamenle bɔle aleɛ kɛ bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛdie bɛdi na bɛnwu nɔhalɛ ne la ɛva moyɛlɛ nzɛlɛlɛ ɛli.
54004004	Debie biala mɔɔ Nyamenle ɛbɔ la le kpalɛ. Ɔnle kɛ yɛkpo biala. Ɔwɔ kɛ yɛfa moyɛlɛ yɛdie ɔ muala,
54004005	ɔluakɛ Nyamenle edwɛkɛ ne nee nzɛlɛlɛ ne te nwolɛ.
54004006	Saa ɛfa ngilehilelɛ ɛhye mɔ ɛkilehile mediema ne mɔ a, ɛbayɛ Kelaese Gyisɛse sonvolɛ kpalɛ, na diedi nu ngilehilelɛ ne nee ngilehilelɛ kpalɛ ne mɔɔ dahuu ɛli ɔ nzi la aboa amaa wɔanyi sunsum nu.
54004007	Twe ɛ nwo fi yɛ nlenya mɔ anwo koasea nwɔra mgbane mgbane ne mɔ mɔɔ ɛnle nyamenlezonlenlɛ la anwo, na mia ɛ nwo sonle Nyamenle kpalɛ.
54004008	Nwonane agbɔkɛ nu ɛkpundinlɛ hyia kpalɛ, noko sunsum nu ɛdeɛ ne hyia kpole kpalɛ, ɔluakɛ ɔmaa yɛ kɛkala nee kenle bie ngoane mɔɔ ɛnlɛ awieleɛ.
54004009	Ɛhye le nɔhalɛ edwɛkɛ mɔɔ ɔwɔ kɛ bɛdie bɛto nu bɔkɔɔ a.
54004010	Ɛhye ati yɛɛ yɛpele yɛyɛ gyima ɛsesebɛ a, ɔluakɛ yɛva yɛ nye yɛdo tease Nyamenle ne anwo zo. Yemɔ yɛɛ ɔle menli kɔsɔɔti bɛ Ngoanedievolɛ a, bɔbɔ bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛdie bɛdi la.
54004011	Fa ɛhye mɔ tu bɛ folɛ na kilehile bɛ.
54004012	Mmamaa awie bu wɔ kakula; maa wɔ ɛdendɛlɛ nee wɔ nyɛleɛ, wɔ ɛhulolɛ, wɔ diedi nee wɔ anwondelɛ ɛyɛ ndonwo ɛmaa diedima ne amuala.
54004013	Maa ɛ nye ɛbolo Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne ɛgengalɛ wɔ bagua nu, ye nolobɔlɛ nee ye ngilehilelɛ nwo kɔkpula kɛ menwɔra la.
54004014	Mmakpo sunsum nu ahyɛlɛdeɛ ne mɔɔ Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛma hanle a ɛ sa hanle ye wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ mgbanyima ne mɔ vale bɛ sa guale ɛ ti zo la.
54004015	Bɔ mɔdenle yɛ ɛhye mɔ na tu ɛ nwo maa bɔkɔɔ, amaa wɔ anyunluhɔlɛ ne ala ali wɔ menli kɔsɔɔti anyunlu.
54004016	Nea ɛ nwo boɛ na nea wɔ ngilehilelɛ ne boɛ. Kɔ zolɛ yɛ ɛhye mɔ, ɔluakɛ saa ɛyɛ ye zɔhane a, ɛkɛlie ɛ nwo nee bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛtie wɔ la ngoane.
54005001	Mmatwi kpanyinli biala anyunlu. Dielie bɛ kɛ ɛ ze mɔ la. Yɛ mgbavolɛ ne mɔ kɛ ɛ mediema mrenya;
54005002	mraalɛ mgbanyinli ne mɔ, tendɛ kile bɛ kɛ ɛ nli mɔ, yɛɛ mbɛlɛra ne mɔ noko, yɛ bɛ kɛ ɛ mediema mraalɛ, wɔ adenle mɔɔ nuhua te la anu.
54005003	Di ahunlanvolɛ mɔɔ ɛnlɛ neavolɛ la eni.
54005004	Na saa kunlanvolɛ bie wɔ ɛkɛ ne mɔɔ lɛ mralɛ anzɛɛ nlɔnra a, maa ngakula zɔhane mɔ ɛzukoa bɛ nyamenlezonlenlɛ gyima ne mɔɔ ɔwɔ kɛ bɛdi bɛmaa bɛ awovolɛ la, bɛva bɛdua bɛ awovolɛ kakɛ, ɔluakɛ ɛhye a sɔ Nyamenle anye a.
54005005	Kunlanvolɛ mɔɔ ɛnlɛ awie ɛnnea ye la, ɛva ɔ nye ɛdo Nyamenle anwo zo, na ɔhɔ zolɛ ɔbodo ɔzɛlɛ na ɔbiza moalɛ aledwolɛ nee alehyenlɛ.
54005006	Na kunlanvolɛ mɔɔ ɛlɛdi ɔ ti la, kanzɛ ɔde ngoane nu bɔbɔ a yewu dɛbadɛba.
54005007	Fa folɛdulɛ ɛhye maa bɛ, amaa awie annyia edwɛkɛ ɛtane biala anga wɔ bɛ nwo.
54005008	Saa awie ɛngola ye mbusua nea, bɔbɔ ɔngola ye awovolɛ boɛ nea a, ɛnee yekpo diedi ne na yezɛkye yedɛla sonla mɔɔ ɛnlɛ diedi la.
54005009	Mmakɛlɛ kunlanvolɛ biala duma ɛboka ahunlanvolɛ ne mɔ anwo kyesɛ yeli ɛvolɛ abulasia nee ɔ nzi, na eza ɔhɔle agyalɛ ko ala,
54005010	yɛɛ ye nyɛleɛ kpalɛ ti bɛbɔ ye duma kpalɛ kɛ ɔle raalɛ mɔɔ tetele ɔ mra kpalɛ, ɔliele nyɛvolɛ, ɔwowole anwondelɛma agyakɛ anwo, ɔboale bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛ nwo hyelele bɛ, na ɔdule ɔ nwo ɔmanle gyima kpalɛ biala ɛyɛlɛ la.
54005011	Mmafa kunlanvolɛ bɛlɛra biala ɛboka kunlanvolɛma aluma ne anwo, ɔluakɛ saa bɛ atiakunluwɔzo ne dwazo a, ɛnee bɛkulo kɛ bɛkɔ agyalɛ na bɛtwe bɛ nwo bɛfi Kelaese anwo,
54005012	na bɛdi bɛ ɛwɔkɛ ne mɔɔ bɛlumuale bɛbɔle la anwo fɔlɛ.
54005013	Eza bɛsɛkye mekɛ bɛduolua ye mgbovonle nu bɛwolowolo azua nu, yɛɛ tɛ ɛhye angome, bɛbɔ nzekue, bɛfa bɛ nloa bɛwulowula awie mɔ edwɛkɛ nu, na bɛkeha edwɛkɛ mɔɔ ɔnle kɛ bɛka la.
54005014	Zɔhane ati menwɔhulo kɛ ahunlanvolɛ mbɛlɛra ne mɔ kɛhɔ agyalɛ, bɛkɛwo mralɛ, na bɛkɛbu bɛ awuke, amaa yɛ kpɔvolɛma annyia adenle anga edwɛkɛ ɛtane antia yɛ.
54005015	Ɔluakɛ ahunlanvolɛ ne bie mɔ kɛkala angome ɛpɛ bɛ nwo ɛhɔ kali Seetan anzi.
54005016	Saa diedinli raalɛ bie lɛ ahunlanvolɛ wɔ ye abusua nu a, ɔboa bɛ, na ɔmmafa bɛ nwo ɛzonle ɔsoa asɔne ne, amaa asɔne ne ahola aboa ahunlanvolɛ mɔɔ ɛnlɛ bɛ awie mɔ la.
54005017	Nwu ye kɛ mgbanyinli mɔɔ yɛ gyima kpalɛ la fɛta ahatualɛ mɔnwo, titile, bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛbɔ Edwɛkpa ne nolo na eza bɛkilehile la;
54005018	ɔluakɛ Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne se, “Bɛmmakyekye ɛnlankɛ ne mɔɔ wozo awule la anloa,” yɛɛ “Sonla yɛ gyima die ahatualɛ.”
54005019	Saa awie toa asɔne kpanyinli bie kile wɔ a, mmadie ɛto nu ɛkɛ ne ala kyesɛ wɔde ye wɔ alasevolɛ nwiɔ anzɛɛ nsa anloa.
54005020	Twi bɛdabɛ mɔɔ ɛtane ala a bɛyɛ la anyunlu wɔ bagua nu, amaa menli mɔɔ ɛha la azulo.
54005021	Megyi Nyamenle nee Kelaese Gyisɛse nee anwuma soanvolɛma nwuanzanwuanza ne mɔ anyunlu meka meahile wɔ kɛ, di ngyehyɛlɛ ɛhye mɔ azo, na mmanea menli nyunlu anzɛɛ ɛdi mɔguazo wɔ debie biala anu.
54005022	Mmapele ndɛ ɛfa ɛ sa ɛgua awie biala ati zo kɛ ɔrayɛ Awulae gyima. Mmafa ɛ nwo ɛdielie awie mɔ nyɛleɛ ɛtane ɛtane nu; nea maa ɛ nwo ɛde.
54005023	Mmano nzule ngome ala, ɛ ko ne nee ɛ nwo ne mɔɔ toto wɔ wazowazo la ati, anrɛɛ no nwanye ekyi.
54005024	Menli ne bie mɔ ɛtane ne mɔ la ali wienyi, na ɔdi bɛ nyunlu ɔ nee bɛ kɔ ndɛnebualɛ nu, na bie mɔ ɛtane ɛdeɛ kyɛ na yeavinde.
54005025	Zɔhane ala yɛɛ nyɛleɛ kpalɛ biala la ali wienyi a, yɛɛ mɔɔ ɛnla ali bɔbɔ la, bɛngola bɛnvea zolɛ.
54006001	Maa bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛle ngɛkɛlɛ la ɛbu bɛ menle mɔ kɛ bɛfɛta enililɛ wɔ adenle biala anu, amaa awie biala annyia edwɛkɛ ɛtane anga wɔ Nyamenle duma ne nee yɛ ngilehilelɛ ne anwo.
54006002	Ahanra mɔɔ bɛ menle mɔ le diedima la mmakpo kɛ bɛnrɛli bɛ menle mɔ eni, kɛmɔ bɛle bɛ mediema la ati. Ɔwɔ kɛ bɛsonle bɛ kpalɛ, ɔboalekɛ bɛ gyimayɛlɛ nwo nvasoɛ ne kɔ diedima mɔɔ bɛkulo bɛ edwɛkɛ la lɔ. Kilehile na bɔ ninyɛne ɛhye mɔ nolo.
54006003	Awie biala mɔɔ kilehile ngilehilelɛ fofolɛ bie na ɔnlie yɛ Awulae Gyisɛse Kelaese nɔhalɛ edwɛkɛ ne nee yɛ nyamenlezonlenlɛ ngilehilelɛ ne ɔndo nu la
54006004	memaa ɔ nwo zo ala na ɔnze debie biala. Kpolerazulɛ nee edwɛkɛ kpɔkɛ nwo butulelilɛ ɛyɛ ye subane; na ɛhye noko nee nungunlehwenlɛ, manzonle, aholoba ɛbɔlɛ nee menli nwo adwenle ɛtane ɛvalɛ a lua a.
54006005	Eza bɛ nee menli mɔɔ bɛ adwenle ɛzɛkye na nɔhalɛ ne ɛvi bɛ sa la su kpolera dahuu. Bɛ adwenle a le kɛ bɛdua nyamenlezonlenlɛ zo bɛanyia bɛ nwo.
54006006	Saa sonla maa ɔ kunlu adwo mɔɔ ɔlɛ la anwo a, anrɛɛ nyamenlezonlenlɛ le anwonyia kpole.
54006007	Ɔluakɛ yɛanva ɛhwee yɛamba ewiade ye, yɛɛ yɛnrɛva bie yɛnrɛhɔ.
54006008	Ɛhye ati, saa yɛlɛ mɔɔ yɛdi nee mɔɔ yɛkeda la a, bɛmaa yɛ nye ɛzɔ yɛ nwo.
54006009	Bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛkpondɛ bɛ nwo bɛanyia la tɔ ngyegyelɛ nu, na munzule atiakunluwɔzo mgbane mgbane mɔɔ sɛkye menli, minli bɛ bo zo la kye bɛ wɔ ye ɛhane nu.
54006010	Ɔluakɛ ezukoa nwo anyebolo le munzule muala abo ndinli; bie mɔ anye ɛbolo ye ɛkpondɛlɛ somaa yemaa bɛvi diedi ne anwo mɔɔ akee nyane ala a bɛdi a.
54006011	Na wɔmɔ, Nyamenle sonla, twe ɛ nwo fi ninyɛne ɛhye mɔ anwo, na pele kpondɛ pɛlepɛlelilɛ, anwondelɛ, diedi, ɛhulolɛ, abotane yɛɛ bɛtɛɛyɛlɛ bo zo.
54006012	Bɔ mɔdenle ko diedi nu konle kpalɛ ne na ɛ sa aha ngoane mɔɔ ɛnlɛ awieleɛ la, ɔluakɛ ngoane ɛhye ati yɛɛ Nyamenle vɛlɛle wɔ wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ ɛlale wɔ diedi ne ali wɔ dasevolɛma dɔɔnwo ne anyunlu la a.
54006013	Megyi Nyamenle mɔɔ maa ninyɛne kɔsɔɔti ngoane, nee Kelaese Gyisɛse mɔɔ gyinlanle Pɔntɛse Paelɛte anyunlu lile ye diedi nwo daselɛ la anyunlu, meka meahile wɔ kɛ
54006014	di ngyehyɛlɛ ne azo na maa nwolɛ ɛde bɔkɔɔ ɔhɔkpula Kenle mɔɔ yɛ Awulae Gyisɛse Kelaese kɛra bieko la.
54006015	Ye ɛralɛ bieko mekɛ kpalɛ ne wɔ Nyamenle Tumivolɛ Saleɛnli Kokye ne mɔɔ le arelemgbunli Belemgbunli nee awulae mɔ Awulae la asa anu.
54006016	Ɔdaye ala a ɔle damɛnlangoate na ɔde wienyi ne mɔɔ awie ɛngola ɛmbikye ye la anu a. Awie biala ɛtɛnwunle ye ɛlɛ, yɛɛ awie ɛnrɛhola ɛnrɛnwu ye ɛlɛ. Enililɛ nee belemgbunlililɛ mɔɔ ɛmbɔ aze ɛlɛ la le ye ɛdeɛ dahuu! Amen.
54006017	Tendɛ kile bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛlɛ ngoane ɛhye anu anwonyia la kɛ bɛmmamemaa bɛ nwo zo, yɛɛ bɛmmafa bɛ nye bɛto ninyɛne mɔɔ pɛ nu se kɛ anwonyia la azo, bɛmaa bɛ nye ɛla Nyamenle mɔɔ maa yɛ debie biala molozo mɔɔ yɛfa yɛdie yɛ nye la anwo zo.
54006018	Ɔwɔ kɛ bɛyɛ nyele, bɛkɔ zolɛ bɛyɛ nyɛleɛ kpalɛ, bɛfa atiakunlukɛnlɛma nee ɛhulolɛ bɛkyɛ debie.
54006019	Ye zɛhae ɛnee bɛlɛkuohua bɛ agyadeɛ nloa mɔɔ bayɛ sua bo ɛdolɛ amaa bɛ wɔ kenle bie, amaa bɛ sa aha ngoane ne mɔɔ le nɔhalɛ ngoane ne la.
54006020	Temɔte, nea mɔɔ bɛva bɛwula ɛ sa nu la boɛ. Twe ɛ nwo fi munzule edwɛkɛ ɛhehanlɛ nee kpolerazulɛ mgbane mgbane ne mɔ mɔɔ bie mɔ fo fɛlɛ ye “Adwenlenubukelɛ” la anwo.
54006021	Ɔluakɛ bie mɔ ɛha kɛ bɛlɛ ɛhye na ɔlua ɔ ti bɛminli diedi adenle ne. Nyamenle ɛlo bɛ muala.
55001001	Medame Pɔɔlo, mɔɔ ɔlua Nyamenle ɛhulolɛ zo merayɛ Kelaese Gyisɛse ɛzoanvolɛ, na yezoa me kɛ membɔ ngoane ne mɔɔ Kelaese ati bɛvale bɛbɔle yɛ ɛwɔkɛ la nolo la, yɛɛ melɛkɛlɛ kɛlata ɛhye a.
55001002	Mefa meahɔmaa me ra Temɔte mɔɔ la me ahonle nwo la. Nyamenle Selɛ ne nee yɛ Awulae Kelaese Gyisɛse ɛlo wɔ, ɔnwu wɔ anwunvɔne na ɔmaa wɔ anzonudwolɛ.
55001003	Meyɛ Nyamenle ne mɔɔ mesonle ye nɔhalɛ nu, kɛmɔ me nlenya mɔ yɛle la mo kɛ mekakye wɔ wɔ me nzɛlɛlɛ nu alehyenlɛ nee aledwolɛ biala a.
55001004	Kɛmɔ mekakye monle mɔɔ ɛhwinle la ati, me nwo dɔ wɔ nɔɔzo nee ewiazo amuala, na me kunlu a anrɛɛ menwu wɔ, amaa me nye alie.
55001005	Mekakye nɔhalɛ diedi ne mɔɔ ɛlɛ ye, diedi ne mɔɔ ɛnee ɛ nla Loyese nee ɛ nli Yunaesi lɛ ye la bie, na medie medi kɛ ɛdawɔ noko ɛlɛ zɔhane diedi ne.
55001006	Zɔhane ati meka meahile wɔ kɛ fa ahyɛlɛdeɛ ne mɔɔ Nyamenle manle wɔ, wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ menvale me sa menguale ɛ ti zo la yɛ gyima.
55001007	Ɔluakɛ Nyamenle ammaa yɛ sunsum mɔɔ le foanvoanle a; Nyamenle manle yɛ Sunsum mɔɔ lɛ tumi nee ɛhulolɛ na ɔmaa yɛkola yɛkomo yɛ nwo zo la.
55001008	Mmamaa Awulae anwo daselɛlilɛ yɛ wɔ nyiane; yɛɛ mmamaa medame noko mɔɔ Kelaese ati mela efiade la me nwo yɛ wɔ nyiane. Ɛdawɔ dua anwosesebɛ ne mɔɔ Nyamenle ɛva ɛmaa wɔ la azo nwu Edwɛkpa ne anwo amaneɛ ne bie.
55001009	Ɔliele yɛ ngoane na ɔvɛlɛle yɛ kɛ yɛrayɛ ye menli, tɛ yɛ gyima mɔɔ yɛyɛ la ati ɔ, na ɔlua ɔdaye ye bodane nee ye ɛlolɛ ti. Ɔluale Kelaese Gyisɛse anwo zo ɔvale ɛlolɛ ɛhye ɔmanle yɛ ɔvi aloamɔleɛ,
55001010	yɛɛ ɛnɛ bɛlua yɛ ngoanedievolɛ Kelaese Gyisɛse ɛralɛ ne ati bɛla ye ali a. Ɔpɛle ewule tumi ne anu na ɔluale Edwɛkpa ne azo ɔlale ngoane mɔɔ ɛnlɛ awieleɛ la ali ɔhilele yɛ.
55001011	Edwɛkpa ɛhye yɛɛ Nyamenle ɛyɛ kɛ membɔ ye nolo, menyɛ ɛzoanvolɛ na mengilehile a.
55001012	Zɔhane ati yɛɛ menwu amaneɛ ɛhye mɔ a. Noko ɔnyɛ me nyiane, ɔluakɛ meze mɔɔ meva me rɛle mewula ye nu la, na medie medi kɛ ɔkɛhola ɔkɛzie mɔɔ meva mewula ɔ sa nu la gyɛlɛɛnye ɔkɛhɔkpula Awulae Kenle ne.
55001013	Sɔ nɔhalɛ ne mɔɔ ɛdele ɛvile me ɛkɛ ne la anu boɛ, fa yɛ ndonwo di zo, na tɛnla diedi nee ɛhulolɛ ne mɔɔ Kelaese Gyisɛse ati ɔle yɛ ɛdeɛ la anu.
55001014	Sɔ nɔhalɛ ne mɔɔ ɔlua Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne mɔɔ wɔ yɛ nu la tumi zo bɛva bɛwula ɛ sa nu la anu boɛ.
55001015	Ɛze kɛ awie biala mɔɔ wɔ Ehyea maanzinli ne anu la ɛnriandi me; Fegyɛlɛse nee Hɛmɔgyɛnize bɛdabɛ bɛboka bɛ.
55001016	Awulae ɛnwu Onɛsefɔlɛse awuke nu amra anwunvɔne, ɔboalekɛ ɔkyekyele me rɛle mekɛ dɔɔnwo ne ala. Yeanyɛ ye nyiane kɛ mela efiade a.
55001017	Ɔdwule Wulomu ala la yɛɛ ɔbɔle ɔ bo kɛ ɔkpondɛ me a, na ɔkpondɛle me toonwo ɔnwunle me.
55001018	Awulae ɛnwu ye anwunvɔne wɔ Awulae Kenle ne anu! Ɛdawɔ ɛze dɔɔnwo mɔɔ ɔyɛle ɔmanle me wɔ Ɛfɛsɛse a.
55002001	Me ra, wɔmɔ maa ɛ nwo ɛyɛ se wɔ ɛlolɛ ne mɔɔ Kelaese Gyisɛse ati ɔle yɛ ɛdeɛ la anu.
55002002	Fa ngilehilelɛ ne mɔɔ ɛdele ɛvile me ɛkɛ ne wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ ɛnee melɛkilehile menli dɔɔnwo la wula bɛdabɛ mɔɔ ɛdie bɛ ɛdi kɛ bɛkɛhola ye kilehile la asa anu.
55002003	Ɛdawɔ noko nwu wɔ afoa nu amaneɛ ɛdeɛ, kɛ ɛle Kelaese Gyisɛse sogyanli kpalɛ mɔɔ di nɔhalɛ a.
55002004	Sogyanli mɔɔ gyi konle nloa la kpondɛ kɛ ɔsɔ ye safohyenle ne anye. Yemɔti ɔnva ɔ nwo ɔnwulowula maanlema ɛbɛlabɔlɛ nu.
55002005	Awie biala mɔɔ su ɛnriandilɛ la ɛngola ɛnnyia ahyɛlɛdeɛ kyesɛ ɔdi nwolɛ mɛla ne mɔ azo.
55002006	Ɛyazonlɛnli ne mɔɔ ɛyɛ gyima ɛsesebɛ la yɛɛ ɔwɔ kɛ dumua di avule ne anu aleɛ ne bie a.
55002007	Dwenle mɔɔ melɛka la anwo, ɔluakɛ Awulae baboa wɔ yeamaa wɔade ɔ muala abo.
55002008	Kakye Gyisɛse Kelaese, kakye ye ewudwazo ne na kakye kɛ ɔle Devidi anlɔnra. Edwɛkpa ne mɔɔ mebɔ ye nolo la ɛne.
55002009	Na Edwɛkpa ɛhye ati yɛɛ melɛnwu amaneɛ na bɛgua me nwɔnzɔnwɔnzɔ kɛ asɛɛ medo mɛla bie la. Nyamenle edwɛkɛ ne ɛdeɛ bɛtɛguale ye nwɔnzɔnwɔnzɔ.
55002010	Ɛhye ati medi debie biala me kunlu wɔ Nyamenle menli ne mɔɔ yekpa nu yeye bɛ la ati, amaa bɛdabɛ noko Kelaese Gyisɛse ati bɛanyia ngoanelielɛ ne nee anyunlunyia ne mɔɔ ɛnlɛ awieleɛ la bie.
55002011	Edwɛkɛ ne le nɔhalɛ, ɔse: “Saa yɛ nee ye ɛwu a, ɛnee yɛ nee ye badɛnla ngoane nu.
55002012	Saa yɛgyinla kpundii a, yɛ nee ye bali belemgbunli. Saa yɛkpo ye a, ɔdaye ɔkɛkpo yɛ.
55002013	Saa yɛnli nɔhalɛ a, yemɔ, ɔdi nɔhalɛ dahuu. Ɔluakɛ ɔngola ɔmbɛlɛbɛla ɔ nwo.”
55002014	Kakyehakye wɔ menli ne mɔ wɔ ɛhye anwo, na bɔ bɛ kɔkɔ wɔ Nyamenle anyunlu kɛ bɛmmadi edwɛkɛ agbɔkɛ nwo butule. Ɔnle kpalɛ, yɛɛ ɔsɛkye menli mɔɔ tie la adwenle.
55002015	Bɔ mɔdenle ɛsesebɛ kɛ ɛkɛzɔ Nyamenle anye, kɛ gyimayɛvolɛ mɔɔ ɛnze ye gyima nwo nyiane na ɔkilehile Nyamenle nɔhalɛ edwɛkɛ ne kpalɛ la.
55002016	Twe ɛ nwo fi bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛsu zɛhae munzule nee koasea kpolera la anwo. Ɛhye te menli fi Nyamenle anwo.
55002017	Zɛhae ngilehilelɛ le kɛ hanlɛ mɔɔ ɛdidi nwonane ne abo la. Kilehilevolɛma zɛhae anu nwiɔ a le Haemɛneeyɛse nee Faelitɛse;
55002018	bɛgyakyi nɔhalɛ adenle ne na bɛlɛsɛkye diedima ne mɔ adwenle kɛ ewudwazo mekɛ ne ɛpɛ nu ɛze dɛbadɛba.
55002019	Noko adiabo ne mɔɔ Nyamenle ɛwula la gyi kpundii, na bɛhɛlɛ nwolɛ kɛ, “Awulae ze bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛle ye ɛdeɛ la,” yɛɛ “Ɔwɔ kɛ awie biala mɔɔ bɔ Awulae duma kɛ ɔle Awulae la twe ɔ nwo fi ɛtane nwo.”
55002020	Wɔ awuke kpole biala anu, nyɛba nee dwora ngakyile dɔɔnwo wɔ ɛkɛ: bie mɔ wɔ nu mɔɔ bɛvale ezukoa nvutuke anzɛɛ dwɛtɛ fufule a bɛyɛle a, yɛɛ bie mɔ noko bɛvale baka anzɛɛ ɛva a bɛyɛle a; bie mɔ anwo hyia kpalɛ yɛɛ bie mɔ noko anwo ɛngyia biala.
55002021	Saa awie twe ɔ nwo fi ninyɛne evinli nwo a, ɔkɛyɛ kɛ ɛyɛba mɔɔ anwo hyia na bɛde nwolɛ bɛmaa Nyamenle, na ɔ nwo ɛra nvasoɛ ɛmaa ɔ menle na bɛziezie ye kɛ bɛfa bɛayɛ gyima kpalɛ la.
55002022	Yemɔti kpo wɔ mgbavolɛ nu atiakunluwɔzo ne mɔ na ɛ nee bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛfa ahonle mɔɔ nuhua te bɛfɛlɛ Awulae la ɛpele ɛkpondɛ pɛlepɛlelilɛ, diedi, ɛhulolɛ, nee anzonudwolɛ bo zo.
55002023	Twe ɛ nwo fi koasea kpolerazulɛ mgbane mgbane ne mɔ anwo, ɔluakɛ ɛze kɛ bɛwie butulelilɛ.
55002024	Ɔnle kɛ Awulae sonvolɛ biala di butule. Ɔwɔ kɛ ɔyɛ atiakunlukɛnlɛma ɔmaa awie biala, na ɔyɛ kilehilevolɛ kpalɛ mɔɔ lɛ abotane a.
55002025	Ɔwɔ kɛ ɔto ɔ rɛle azule nu ɔkilehile bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛ nee ye ɛnga la, ɔluakɛ saa ɔyɛ Nyamenle ɛhulolɛ a ɔbamaa bɛ mekɛ kpalɛ yeamaa bɛanlu bɛ nwo na bɛaranwu nɔhalɛ ne.
55002026	Na saa bɛ nye zo tete bɛ a bɛanriandi bɛavi Abɔnsam mɔɔ hyele bɛ manle bɛkpole Nyamenle ɛhulolɛdeɛ ne la ɛhane ne anu.
55003001	Mekpondɛ kɛ ɛnwu ye kɛ, awieleɛ mekɛ ne anu, anwongyelelɛ dɔɔnwo bara.
55003002	Menli bayɛ angomedi nee ezukoa nwo anyebolo, bɛbamemaa bɛ nwo zo na bɛazua anyetele; bɛbabɔ aholoba, bɛnrɛdie bɛ awovolɛma, bɛbakpo amunli, bɛnrɛzonle Nyamenle;
55003003	bɛ ti bayɛ se, bɛnrɛze anwunvɔne, bɛbabɔ nzekue, bɛbali mgbonde, bɛbava ɛya mgbane mgbane na bɛahyi kpalɛ,
55003004	bɛbaye bɛ gɔnwo mɔ bɛamaa, bɛbayɛ mgbaha na bɛ ti anu ayɛ bɛ fɛ; bɛbahulo anyelielɛ bɛadɛla Nyamenle,
55003005	bɛbazɔ nyamenlezonlenlɛ nu, na bɛnrɛlie ye tumi kpalɛ ne bɛnrɛdo nu. Twe ɛ nwo fi menli zɛhae mɔ anwo.
55003006	Menli ɛhye bie mɔ luolua nu wolowolo azua di mraalɛ mɔɔ anwo ɛhyele bɛ na bɛ nwo yɛ anwunvɔne, na bɛ ɛtane nwo fɔlɛlilɛ ɛyɛ adesoa ɛlɛbu bɛ kɔme, na nwonane nu atiakunluwɔzo ngakyile ɛndie bɛ la anzo.
55003007	Mraalɛ zɛhae mɔ dahuu bɔ mɔdenle kɛ bɛkɛzukoa noko bɛngola bɛnnwu nɔhalɛ ne ɛlɛ.
55003008	Kɛmɔ Gyanize nee Gyambilize dwazole tiale Mosisi la, zɔhane ala yɛɛ menli ɛhye mɔ tia nɔhalɛ ne a. Bɛle menli mɔɔ bɛ adwenle ɛnli munli na bɛ diedi tɔ sinli a.
55003009	Na bɛnrɛdwu moa biala, ɔluakɛ awie biala banwu kɛ bɛle agbamgbanvolɛ. Gyanize nee Gyambilize kɛ hɔwiele ye la ɛne.
55003010	Na wɔmɔ, wɔli me ngilehilelɛ, me nyɛleɛ nee me ɛbɛlabɔlɛ nu bodane ne anzi; wɔnwu me diedi, me abotane, me ɛhulolɛ, nee me kpundii mɔɔ megyi,
55003011	me amaneɛnwunlɛ nee kpɔdekpɔde mɔɔ bɛyɛ me, ɛze mɔɔ zile me nwo zo wɔ Anteɔko, Ayekoneɛm yɛɛ Lesetela la amuala, ɛzulolɛ mɔɔ menwunle ye la le kpole. Noko Awulae yele me vile ɔ muala anu.
55003012	Nɔhalɛ, awie biala mɔɔ kpondɛ kɛ ɔbɔ ɛbɛla kpalɛ na ɔ nee Kelaese Gyisɛse dua la, bɛbayɛ ye kpɔdekpɔde.
55003013	Amumuyɛma nee adalɛma bahɔ zolɛ amaa bɛ ti ayɛ se kpalɛ, bɛbabɛlɛbɛla awie mɔ na bɛabɛlɛbɛla bɛdabɛ bɛ ngome bɛ nwo.
55003014	Na wɔmɔ, kɔ zolɛ sɔ nɔhalɛ ne mɔ mɔɔ bɛhilehile wɔ na ɛdie ɛdi ɛsesebɛ la anu. Ɛze wɔ kilehilevolɛma ne mɔ,
55003015	yɛɛ ɛkakye kɛ sumunli wɔ ngakula nu yɛɛ ɛzukoale Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne mɔɔ maa wɔ nrɛlɛbɛ mɔɔ saa ɛdie Kelaese Gyisɛse ɛdi a, ɔkola ɔmaa wɔ ngoanelielɛ la.
55003016	Bɛfa Nyamenle Sunsum a bɛkɛlɛ Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne a, na ɔle kpalɛ ɔmaa nɔhalɛ ne ɛhilehilelɛ, sonla nyunlu ɛhwilɛ, folɛdulɛ, yɛɛ menli ɛtetelɛ wɔ ɛbɛla kpalɛ ɛbɔlɛ nu,
55003017	amaa sonla ne mɔɔ sonle Nyamenle la ali munli na bɛaziezie ye bɛamaa yeayɛ gyima kpalɛ.
55004001	Megyi Nyamenle nee Kelaese Gyisɛse mɔɔ babua anyewɔzo amra nee mɔwuamra ndɛne la anyunlu, meka ye ɛralɛ bieko nee ye belemgbunlililɛ ne na mese wɔ kɛ:
55004002	Bɔ edwɛkɛ ne nolo na si zolɛ mɔɔ ɛndwenle mɔɔ kɛzi ɔ nzi a, kpalɛ o, ɛtane o! Di menli ne adwenle maa bɛlie Edwɛkpa ne bɛdo nu, twi bɛ nyunlu, tu bɛ folɛ na fa abotane kilehile bɛ.
55004003	Mekɛ bie bara mɔɔ menli ɛnrɛdie ngilehilelɛ kpalɛ a. Bɛbali bɛdabɛ bɛ atiakunluwɔzo nzi, na bɛaboɔboa kilehilevolɛma dɔɔnwo mɔɔ kɛha mɔɔ bɛkulo kɛ bɛte la anloa bɛamaa bɛ nwo.
55004004	Bɛbaduodua bɛ nzo wɔ nɔhalɛ ne anwo, na bɛadie nwɔra.
55004005	Na wɔmɔ, sie ɛ ti koonwu, mia ɛ nye te nyane, kpɔsa bɔ Edwɛkpa ne nolo, na yɛ Nyamenle gyima ne kɛ ɛle sonvolɛ.
55004006	Mame, mekɛ ne ɛdwu mɔɔ bɛfa me bɛabɔ azu a, mekɛ mɔɔ mefa meavi ewiade ɛhye anu la ɛbikye.
55004007	Meho konle kpalɛ ne, mewie ɛnriandilɛ ne su, meli me ɛwɔkɛ zo.
55004008	Na kɛkala konimlilɛ ahyɛlɛdeɛ ne, mɔɔ le fɔɔnwoma abɔtile ne, mɔɔ Awulae, Pɛlepɛle Ndɛnebuavolɛ ne bava amaa me wɔ Awulae Kenle ne la, wɔ ɛkɛ ne maa me, yɛɛ ɔnle ɛkɛ ɔmmaa me ngome, ɔwɔ ɛkɛ ne ɔmaa bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛlɛ ɛhulolɛ bɛlɛkendɛ ye ɛralɛ bieko la amuala.
55004009	Bɔ mɔdenle bakpɔla me ndɛndɛ.
55004010	Dimase ɛhulo kɛkala ewiade ye na yekpo me, yehɔ Tɛsalonaeka. Kelɛsɛnze ɛhɔ Galeehyea, yɛɛ Taetɛse ɛhɔ Dalemeehyea.
55004011	Yeha Luku angomekye ala wɔ me nwo ɛke. Nea kɛ ɛ sa kɛha Maake na ɛ nee ye bɛrɛla, ɔluakɛ ɔkɛhola ɔkɛboa me.
55004012	Mezoa Tekekɛse wɔ Ɛfɛsɛse.
55004013	Saa ɛba a fa me anwuma tɛladeɛ ne mɔɔ mengyakyile ye wɔ Kaapɛse anwo ɛkɛ ne wɔ Tulowase la bɛla; anrɛɛ fa mbuluku ne mɔ noko, bɔbɔ me nwoma mbuluku mralɛ ne mɔ mɔɔ mekɛlɛ nu la bɛla.
55004014	Alɛzanda mɔɔ le kɔbele dwinvolɛ ne ɛyɛ me ɛtane kpole, na Awulae badua ye nwolɛ kakɛ noko, kɛmɔ ɔfɛta la.
55004015	Anrɛɛ nea ɛ nwo boɛ wɔ ɔ nwo, ɔluakɛ ɔtia yɛ edwɛkɛ ne mɔɔ yɛzo yɛlua la kpole.
55004016	Awie biala angyinla me nzi wɔ alumua ne mɔɔ mekaza me ne wɔ edwɛkɛlilɛ ne anu la. Bɛ muala bɛkpole me. Mesɛlɛ kɛ Nyamenle ɛva ɛhyɛ bɛ.
55004017	Awulae gyinlanle me nzi, na ɔmanle me anwosesebɛ. Zɔhane ati mengolale membɔle Edwɛkpa ne nolo memanle bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnle Dwuuma la amuala dele bie; na Nyamenle yele me vile awenade ne anloa anu.
55004018	Na Awulae balie me gyɛlɛɛnye avi munzule muala anu na ɔ nee me ahɔ ye anwuma Belemgbunlililɛ ne abo. Anyunlunyia ɛha ye dahuu! Amen.
55004019	Mebiza Pelesela nee Akoyela, yɛɛ Onɛsefɔlɛse awuke nu amra ahye.
55004020	Yilasetɛse hale Kɔlente yɛɛ mengyakyile Tulofemɛse wɔ Maelitɛse, ɔluakɛ ɛnee ɔnde kpɔkɛ.
55004021	Bɔ mɔdenle bɛla na fɔsɛlɛ ne ara. Yubulɛse, Pudɛnse, Laenɛse, yɛɛ Kolɔdea nee mediema mɔɔ ɛha la amuala biza wɔ ahye.
55004022	Awulae nee wɔ sunsum ɛdɛnla. Nyamenle ɛlo bɛ muala.
56001001	Medame Pɔɔlo, mɔɔ mele Nyamenle sonvolɛ nee Gyisɛse Kelaese ɛzoanvolɛ la yɛɛ melɛkɛlɛ kɛlata ɛhye a. Bɛyele me na bɛzoanle me kɛ mengɔmboa Nyamenle menli ne mɔɔ yekpa nu yeye bɛ la wɔ bɛ diedi nu, na mengilehile bɛ memaa bɛnwu nɔhalɛ ne mɔɔ wɔ yɛ nyamenlezonlenlɛ ne anu la.
56001002	Yɛ nyamenlezonlenlɛ ne gyi anyelazo zo kɛ kenle bie yɛbanyia ngoane mɔɔ ɛnlɛ awieleɛ la. Nyamenle, mɔɔ ɔmbɔ adalɛ ɛlɛ la, vale ngoane ɛhye bɔle yɛ ɛwɔkɛ kolaa na yeabɔ ewiade.
56001003	Mekɛ ne dwule la ɔvale nrɛlaleɛ ne ɔdole gua, na ɛhye yɛɛ yɛ Ngoanedievolɛ Nyamenle ne, ɛva ɛwula me sa nu kɛ membɔ ye nolo a.
56001004	Melɛkɛlɛ wɔ, Taetɛse, mɔɔ ɛle me ra kpalɛ la wɔ diedi ne mɔɔ yɛlɛ nu la ati. Egya Nyamenle nee Kelaese Gyisɛse, yɛ Ngoanedievolɛ ne ɛlo wɔ na ɔmaa wɔ anzonudwolɛ.
56001005	Mengyakyile wɔ wɔ Kiliti kɛ ɛnlea ɛmaa debie biala mɔɔ tɔ sinli la ɛyɛ boɛ, na ɛye mgbanyima ɛmaa bɛnlea asɔne ne mɔ mɔɔ wɔ sua biala azo la azo, kɛmɔ mengilehilele wɔ la.
56001006	Ɔnle kɛ asɔne neavolɛ biala di ɛzonle; ɔwɔ kɛ ɔgya raalɛ ko ala; ɔwɔ kɛ ɔ mra nyia diedi yɛɛ ɔnle kɛ bɛdie duma kɛ bɛle wowawowa anzɛɛ anzosesebɛ.
56001007	Ɔluakɛ, kɛmɔ asɔne neavolɛ ne gyi Nyamenle gyima ne ati la, ɔnle kɛ ɔ nwo nyia ngehanleɛ, ɔnle kɛ ɔmemaa ɔ nwo zo anzɛɛ ɔnyia ahonle kpole. Ɔnle kɛ ɔyɛ nzanli anzɛɛ ɔ sa yɛ kpokpo, ɔnle kɛ ɔ nye bolo ezukoa.
56001008	Ɔwɔ kɛ awie biala kola wolo ye na ɔkulo kpalɛyɛlɛ, ɔwɔ kɛ ɔkola ɔsɔ ɔ nwo, ɔyɛ sonla mɔɔ ye subane le kpalɛ, ɔ nwo te na ɔdi ɔ nwo eni.
56001009	Ɔwɔ kɛ ɔsɔ Nyamenle edwɛkɛ ne mɔɔ bɛkola bɛfa bɛ rɛle bɛto zo na eza ɔ nee yɛ ngilehilelɛ ne kɔ zolɛ la anu kyengye. Adenle ɛhye azo yɛɛ ɔbamaa yeahola yeamaa menli anwosesebɛ na yeahilehile bɛ na eza yeamaa bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛtia ngilehilelɛ ne la anwu bɛ nvonleɛ a.
56001010	Menli mɔɔ anzo yɛ se la dɔɔnwo wɔ ɛkɛ mɔɔ ko tia ngilehilelɛ ɛhye a. Bɛ nuhua titile a le bɛdabɛ mɔɔ ɛnee bɛli Dwuuma nyamenlezonlenlɛ ne anzi na bɛhakyi bɛrayɛ Kelaese ɛdoavolɛma la. Bɛka mgbole na bɛbɛlɛbɛla awie mɔ.
56001011	Ɔwɔ kɛ ɛtua bɛ, ɔboalekɛ ɔlua ezukoakpondɛlɛ ti bɛlɛkilehile mɔɔ ɔnle kɛ bɛkilehile la, na bɛlɛsɛkye mbusua dɔɔnwo bɛabɔ bɛ awuke.
56001012	Kilitinli bie mɔɔ bɛdabɛ bɛse ɔle bɛ Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛ la ɛha kɛ, “Kilitima dahuu bɔ adalɛ, bɛle nane amumuyɛ, bɛle mgbovonle adidikpokuma.”
56001013	Na mɔɔ ɔhanle la le nɔhalɛ. Ɔlua ɛhye ati ɔwɔ kɛ ɛtwi bɛ nyunlu kpalɛ, amaa bɛanyia diedi mɔɔ yɛ nla la,
56001014	na bɛandoa Dwuuma amaamuo dɛba ne nee bɛ mɛla ne mɔ mɔɔ vi menli mɔɔ ɛkpo nɔhalɛ ne la ɛkɛ ne la abo zo.
56001015	Debie biala anwo te maa menli mɔɔ anwo te la, na ɛtanevolɛma nee menli mɔɔ ɛnlɛ diedi la, debie biala anwo ɛnde, ɔboalekɛ bɛ adwenle nee bɛ ti anu kɛkɛba ne ɛkpɔlɔ.
56001016	Bɛdabɛ bɛse bɛze Nyamenle, noko bɛ nyɛleɛ ɛngile zɔhane. Ɛkpɔlɛ nee anzosesebɛ ɛyi bɛ tɛkɛɛ, yɛɛ bɛnze debie kpalɛ biala yɛ.
56002001	Na wɔmɔ, ɔwɔ kɛ ɛkilehile diedi ne mɔɔ le saanwu la.
56002002	Kilehile mrenya mgbanyinli ne mɔ maa bɛyɛ bɛ nye gyɛlɛmgbɛɛnye, bɛdwenle, bɛzie bɛ nwo diinyi, bɛmaa bɛ diedi ɛyɛ nla, na bɛnyia ɛhulolɛ nee abotane.
56002003	Zɔhane ala noko yɛɛ maa mraalɛ mgbanyinli ne mɔ ɛnwu ye na bɛbɔ ɛbɛla mɔɔ kile kɛ bɛze Nyamenle la a. Bɛmmayɛ ngunzi anzɛɛ bɛmmayɛ bɛ nwo akɛlɛ bɛmaa nza. Ɔwɔ kɛ bɛkilehile mɔɔ le kpalɛ la,
56002004	amaa bɛahola bɛatete mbɛlɛra ne mɔ bɛamaa bɛahulo bɛ hu mɔ nee bɛ mra.
56002005	amaa bɛanwu nrɛlɛbɛ, bɛazie bɛ nwo diinyi, bɛayɛ atiakunlukɛnlɛma, bɛ nwo ade saanwu, na bɛayɛ yelɛma kpalɛ mɔɔ tie bɛ hu mɔ ane a, amaa awie anga Nyamenle edwɛkɛ ne anwo edwɛkɛ ɛtane.
56002006	Zɔhane ala yɛɛ ka kile mgbavolɛ ne mɔ maa bɛzɔ bɛ nwo a.
56002007	Wɔ ninyɛne muala anu, ɛdawɔ mumua ne pɛ kelemunli kpalɛ wɔ gyima kpalɛ ɛyɛlɛ nu to ɛkɛ. Maa ɛ nye ɛbolo wɔ ngilehilelɛ ne anwo na di nɔhalɛ.
56002008	Fa ɛdendɛlɛ kpalɛ mɔɔ menli ɛnrɛha nwolɛ edwɛkɛ la kilehile, amaa wɔ agbɔvolɛ asa aha bɛ gye nu, na bɛannyia edwɛkɛ ɛtane bɛanga wɔ yɛ nwo.
56002009	Kilehile bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛle ahanra la maa bɛdie bɛ menle mɔ edwɛkɛ na bɛmaa bɛ menle mɔ akunlu ɛdwo bɛ nwo wɔ ninyɛne muala anu. Saa bɛ menle mɔ tendɛ bɛ nyunlu a, bɛmmayeye bɛ nloa azo.
56002010	Bɛmmayɛ awule ndɛbandɛba biala. Ɔwɔ kɛ dahuu bɛkile kɛ bɛle kpalɛ, bɛdi nɔhalɛ, amaa ngilehilelɛ ne mɔɔ fane Nyamenle yɛ Ngoanedievolɛ ne anwo la ayɛ nvasoɛ wɔ debie biala mɔɔ bɛyɛ la anu.
56002011	Ɔluakɛ Nyamenle ɛye ye ɛlolɛ ne ɛhile wɔ menli kɔsɔɔti bɛ ngoanelielɛ ti.
56002012	Zɔhane ɛlolɛ ne kilehile yɛ kɛ yɛvuandi ɛbɛla mgbane mgbane nee ewiade atiakunluwɔzo ne mɔ yɛgua, na yɛyɛ yɛ nye gyɛlɛmgbɛɛnye, yɛnlea boɛ na yɛbɔ Nyamenlezulolɛ ɛbɛla fɔɔnwo ne wɔ ewiade ye anu,
56002013	yɛva yɛhendɛ saleɛ Kenle ne mɔɔ yɛ nye la ye adenle wɔ melɛ mɔɔ yɛ Nyamenle bedevinli ne nee Ngoanedievolɛ Gyisɛse Kelaese bɛ anyunlunyia ne kɛra la.
56002014	Gyisɛse Kelaese vale ɔ nwo manle wɔ yɛ ti kɛ ɔbaye yɛ yeavi amumuyɛ muala anu, na yeayɛ yɛ ye menli mɔɔ anwo te na yɛle ɔ ngomekye ye ɛdeɛ la, amaa yɛ nye abolo kɛ yɛkɛyɛ kpalɛ.
56002015	Kilehile ɛhye mɔ amuala na fa wɔ tumi ne kpokpoti wula wɔ ngilehilelɛ nee bɛ nyunlu ɛhwilɛ nu. Mmamaa awie biala fa ɛ nyunlu kyikyi aze.
56003001	Kakye wɔ menli ne kɛ bɛha bɛ nwo aze bɛmaa arelemgbunli nee bɛdabɛ mɔɔ tumi wɔ bɛ sa nu la, bɛdie bɛ edwɛkɛ na bɛbɔ ɛbɛla kpalɛ wɔ adenle biala anu.
56003002	Ka kile bɛ kɛ bɛmmaka awie anwo edwɛkɛ ɛtane anzɛɛ bɛmmadi butule, na bɛva anzonudwolɛ nee agɔnwolɛyɛlɛ bɛdɛnla na bɛli awie biala eni.
56003003	Ɔluakɛ ɛnee anrɛɛ yɛdayɛ noko yɛle ahɔnwɔne, tufoande, yɛɛ yɛminlinle. Yɛyɛle ngɛkɛlɛ yɛmanle nwonane nu atiakunluwɔzo nee anyelielɛ ngakyile kɔsɔɔti; yɛbɔle yɛ ɛbɛla ne atiakunlutane nee anyebolo nu; menli kpɔle yɛ yɛɛ yɛdayɛ noko yɛkpɔle yɛ nwo ngoko ngoko.
56003004	Na mɔɔ yɛ Ngoanelielɛ Nyamenle ne lale ye atiakunlukɛnlɛma nee ye ɛhulolɛ ne ali la,
56003005	ɔliele yɛ ngoane. Tɛ gyima kpalɛ mɔɔ yɛyɛle la ati ɔ, na ɔse anwunvɔne la ati ɔ. Ɔluale nzule awolɛ fofolɛ ne, mɔɔ le ɛbɛlabɔlɛ fofolɛ ne mɔɔ Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne fa maa la azo a ɔwole yɛ bieko a.
56003006	Ɔluakɛ Nyamenle luale yɛ Ngoanedievolɛ Gyisɛse Kelaese anwo zo wolale Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne guale yɛ nwo zo,
56003007	amaa ɔlua ye ɛlolɛ zo yɛazɔ Nyamenle anye na yɛanyia ngoane ne mɔɔ ɛnlɛ awieleɛ mɔɔ yɛ nye la zolɛ la.
56003008	Edwɛkɛ ɛhye le nɔhalɛ. Mekulo kɛ ɛka edwɛkɛ ɛhye mɔ na ɛsi zo ɛsesebɛ, amaa bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛdie Nyamenle bɛdi la anlea zolɛ abɔ ɛbɛla kpalɛ dahuu. Ɔluakɛ ɛhye mɔ le kpalɛ na eza ɔhyia ɔmaa sonla biala.
56003009	Tua ɛhye mɔ: kpolerazulɛ mɔɔ nrɛlɛbɛ ɛnle nu, yɛ nlenya mɔ aluma ngilehilenu, butulelilɛ nee mɛla nwo kpolerazulɛ. Ɛhye mɔ anwo ɛnlɛ nvasoɛ yɛɛ eza bɛle debie mgbane.
56003010	Sonla mɔɔ fa mgbakyemgbakye ara la, bɔ ye kɔkɔ fane kɛyɛ nwiɔ, na gyakyi ye maa ɔva ɔ nwo.
56003011	Ɛkola ɛnwu ye kɛ sonla zɛhae ɛzɛkye, na ye ɛtane ne bua ye fɔlɛ.
56003012	Saa mesoa Aatɛmase anzɛɛ Tekekɛse wɔ ɛ nwo lɔ a, bɔ mɔdenle kɛ ɛkɛra me nwo wɔ Nekɔpɔlese, ɔboalekɛ meyɛ me adwenle kɛ ɛkɛ ne a mekali fɔsɛlɛ ne a.
56003013	Bɔ mɔdenle kɛ ɛkɛmaa Zinase mɔɔ le lɔyanli ne nee Apolɔso kɛbɔ bɛ adendulɛ ne abo, na nea kɛ bɛnyia debie biala mɔɔ bɛhyia nwolɛ la.
56003014	Maa yɛ menli ne mɔ ɛzukoa ɛyɛ gyima kpalɛ, amaa saa edwɛkɛ bie mɔɔ hyia la si a bɛahola bɛaboa. Ɔnle kɛ bɛbɔ ɛbɛla mɔɔ nvasoɛ biala ɛnle zolɛ la.
56003015	Bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛ nee me wɔ ɛke la amuala biza wɔ ahye. Yɛbiza yɛ gɔnwo mɔ mɔɔ yɛ muala yɛlɛ diedi ko la ahye. Nyamenle ɛlo bɛ na ɔ nee bɛ ɛdɛnla.
57001001	Kɛlata ɛhye vi medame Pɔɔlo, mɔɔ ɔlua Kelaese Gyisɛse ati mela efiade nee adiema Temɔte ɛkɛ. Ɔdwu yɛ gɔnwo Faelimɔn, mɔɔ le yɛ diema gyimayɛvolɛ wɔ Nyamenle ɛzonlenlɛ ye anu la ɛkɛ;
57001002	ɔdwu asɔnema mɔɔ yia wɔ sua nu ɛkɛ ne, yɛɛ adiema raalɛ Afea nee Aakepɛse mɔɔ le yɛ gɔnwo sogyanli ne la ɛkɛ:
57001003	Egya Nyamenle nee yɛ Awulae Gyisɛse Kelaese ɛlo bɛ na ɔmaa bɛ anzonudwolɛ.
57001004	Adiema Faelimɔn, mekɛ biala mesɛlɛ a, mebɔ wɔ duma na meyɛ Nyamenle mo.
57001005	Ɔluakɛ mete wɔ ɛhulolɛ mɔɔ ɛlɛ ye wɔ Nyamenle menli ne anwo nee diedi mɔɔ ɛlɛ ye wɔ Awulae Gyisɛse anu la nganeɛ.
57001006	Me nzɛlɛlɛ a le kɛ, wɔ diedi nu mediemayɛlɛ ne kɛva ndelebɛbo mɔɔ nuhua pi wɔ debie kpalɛ biala mɔɔ Kelaese ati ɔle yɛ ɛdeɛ la kɛra.
57001007	Adiema kulovolɛ, medi fɛlɛko kpole wɔ wɔ ɛhulolɛ mɔɔ ɛlɛ ye la anwo, na yemaa me akɛnrazilɛ! Wɔmaa Nyamenle menli muala anye ɛlie.
57001008	Ɔlua ɛhye ati kɛmɔ Kelaese ati ɛle adiema la anrɛɛ mekola mese wɔ memaa ɛyɛ debie mɔɔ ɔwɔ kɛ ɛyɛ la,
57001009	na ɛ nwo ɛhulolɛ ti, mebazɛlɛ wɔ. Mame a mele Pɔɔlo mɔɔ megyi Kelaese Gyisɛse agyakɛ anu, na kɛkala ɔlua ɔ ti mela efiade la, noko akee mebiza ɛhye.
57001010	Mesɛlɛ wɔ meamaa me ra Onɛsemɛse. Ɔlua Kelaese ati, Onɛsemɛse ɛrayɛ me ra wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ mela efiade ye ala la.
57001011	Mekɛ bie mɔɔ ɛraze ɛhɔ la ɛnee ɔ nwo ɛnlɛ nvasoɛ ɛmmaa wɔ; na kɛkala, ɔ nwo lɛ nvasoɛ maa wɔ nee medame.
57001012	Melɛsiane ye meamaa yeara ɛ nwo lɔ bieko, na fa ye kɛ medame ɔ.
57001013	Anrɛɛ menwɔhulo kɛ ɔkɛdɛnla me nwo ɛke, na yeagyinla ɛ gyakɛ anu yeaboa me wɔ Edwɛkpa ne ɛkpondenlɛ nu, kɛmɔ mela efiade la.
57001014	Noko menrɛhulo kɛ menwɔyɛ debie mɔɔ ɛnze nu la wɔ ɛhye anwo, amaa yeanyɛ kɛ asɛɛ wɔ moalɛ ne ɛyɛ mialeranu debie; mekulo kɛ ɛdawɔ ɛfa wɔ ɛhulolɛ ɛyɛ.
57001015	Ɔkɛyɛ kɛ ɛhye ati a Onɛsemɛse vile ɛ nwo ɛkɛ ne mekɛ ekyi a, amaa saa ɔsia ɔba a yeaha ɛkɛ bɔkɔɔ,
57001016	tɛ kɛ ɔle wɔ kanranli angome ɔ, na kɛ Kelaese ati ɔle adiema kulovolɛ mɔɔ anwo hyia me kpole a. Na wɔ wɔ afoa nu, kɛmɔ ɔle kanranli nee adiema wɔ Kelaese ati la, wɔ ɛhulolɛ ɛdeɛ ne bo zolɛ.
57001017	Yemɔti saa ɛdie ɛto nu kɛ ɛ nee me a lua ɛdeɛ a, ɛnee die ye kɛ ɛkɛlie me ala la.
57001018	Saa yeyɛ ɛtane yetia wɔ anzɛɛ ɔtua wɔ kakɛ a, nea me ti na fa kyɛ ye.
57001019	Medame Pɔɔlo, me sa anloa a melɛ melɛkɛlɛ ɛhye a. MEDAME PƆƆLO, MEBADUA KAKƐ NE MEAMAA WƆ. Mengulo kɛ mekakye wɔ kɛ ɛdawɔ mumua ne ɛwɔ me sa nu.
57001020	Yemɔti, me diema, ɔlua Awulae ati, gyakyi ɛhye anu maa me, kɛmɔ Kelaese ati ɛle me diema la, na maa me nye ɛlie.
57001021	Melɛkɛlɛ kɛlata ɛhye, ɔluakɛ medie medi kɛ ɛkɛyɛ mɔɔ melɛbiza la. Nɔhalɛ, meze kɛ ɛkola ɛyɛ ɛmaa ɔbo zolɛ.
57001022	Eza kpondɛ dabelɛ sie me, ɔboalekɛ melɛ anyelazo kɛ Nyamenle badie bɛ muala bɛ nzɛlɛlɛ amaa meazia me nee bɛ aradɛnla.
57001023	Ɛpafelase mɔɔ nee me yɛla efiade ɛke wɔ Kelaese Gyisɛse ati la biza wɔ ahye.
57001024	Zɔhane ala yɛɛ me gɔnwo mɔ gyimayɛvoma Maake, Alesetaakɛse, Dimase, yɛɛ Luku bɛdabɛ bɛbiza wɔ ahye a.
57001025	Awulae Gyisɛse Kelaese ɛlo wɔ na ɔ nee wɔ ɛdɛnla.
58001001	Mɔmoane ne, Nyamenle vale ndenle dɔɔnwo azo luale ye kpɔmanvolɛma anwo zo dendɛle hilele yɛ nlenya mɔ wɔ mekɛ dɔɔnwo ne ala,
58001002	na kenle nsa ye ɛdeɛ, yelua ɔ Ra ne anwo zo a yedendɛ yehile yɛ a. Ɔ Ra ne anwo zo a ɔluale ɔbɔle ewiade a, na yemɔ yɛɛ Nyamenle ɛkpa nu ɛye ye kɛ awieleɛ ne debie biala le ye ɛdeɛ a.
58001003	Gyisɛse kile kɛ Nyamenle anyunlunyia ne wienyi kpole si de la. Ɔle Nyamenle ɛsaso bɔkɔɔ, yɛɛ ɔfa ye tumi edwɛkɛ ne a ɔsɔ ewiade a. Ɔliele ɛtanefakyɛ ɔmanle sonla na ɔwiele la, ɔhɔle anwuma ɔhɔdɛnlanle Tumivolɛ Nyamenle Bedevinli ne asa fema zo.
58001004	Nyamenle manle Ralɛ ne yɛle kpole dɛlale Nyamenle soanvolɛma amuala, yɛɛ duma mɔɔ ɔvale ɔmanle ye la tɛla bɛ ɛdeɛ ne amuala.
58001005	Ɔluakɛ Nyamenle anga angile ye soanvolɛma ne mɔ bie kɛ, “Ɛle Me Ra; ɛnɛ a mewo wɔ a.” Nyamenle anga wɔ ye soanvolɛma ne bie anwo kɛ, “Mebayɛ ɛ Ze, na wɔayɛ me Ra.”
58001006	Noko mɔɔ Nyamenle bazoa ye belamunli Ralɛ ne wɔ ewiade la, ɔhanle kɛ, “Ɔwɔ kɛ Nyamenle soanvolɛma amuala sonle ye.”
58001007	Wɔ ye soanvolɛma ne anwo, Nyamenle hanle kɛ, “Nyamenle yɛ ye soanvolɛma kɛ anwoma, na ɔyɛ ye sonvolɛma kɛ senle tafinlima.”
58001008	Wɔ Ralɛ ne anwo, Nyamenle hanle kɛ, “O Nyamenle, wɔ belemgbunlililɛ ɛnrɛbɔ aze ɛlɛ! Ɛfa nɔhalɛlilɛ a ɛsie wɔ menli mɔɔ ɛnea bɛ nwo zo la a.
58001009	Ɛkulo mɔɔ le fɔɔnwo la na ɛkyi mɔɔ ɛnli mɛla zo la. Ɛhye ati yɛɛ Nyamenle, wɔ Nyamenle ne, ɛkpa nu ɛye wɔ na yemaa wɔ nidi nu anyelielɛ kpole mɔɔ tɛla mɔɔ yeva yemaa ɛ gɔnwo mɔ amuala la a.”
58001010	Eza ɔhanle kɛ, “Awulae, wɔmɔ yɛɛ mɔlebɛbo ne ɛbɔle ewiade a, yɛɛ ɛ sa anloa gyima a le anwumaneamra.
58001011	Bɛ muala bɛbaminli, ɛnee wɔmɔ ɛwɔ ɛkɛ; bɛ muala bɛbatete kɛ ɛdanlɛ.
58001012	Ɛbanyenya bɛ kɛ ɛkpa, na wɔali bɛ kedayegua kɛ ɛdanlɛ. Na wɔmɔ dahuu kɛ ɛde ala la yɛɛ ɛde a, yɛɛ wɔ ngoane ɛnlɛ awieleɛ.”
58001013	Nyamenle anga angile ye soanvolɛma ne mɔ bie kɛ, “Tɛnla me sa fema zo ɛke kɔkpula kɛ menwɔva wɔ agbɔvolɛ menwɔwula ɛ gyakɛ abo.”
58001014	Ɛnee Nyamenle soanvolɛma a le nwane mɔ? Bɛmɛ a le sunsum bie mɔ mɔɔ sonle Nyamenle na ɔsoɔzoa bɛ ɔmaa bɛkɔboa bɛdabɛ mɔɔ ɔwɔ kɛ bɛnyia ngoane la.
58002001	Zɔhane ati ɔwɔ kɛ yɛsɔ nɔhalɛ edwɛkɛ ne mɔɔ yɛde la anu ɛsesebɛ, amaa yɛamminli.
58002002	Edwɛkɛ ne mɔɔ Nyamenle soanvolɛma vale rɛlɛle yɛ nlenya mɔ la ɛrayɛ nɔhalɛ, yemɔti mɔɔ anli zo la banyia nwolɛ ndeanlɛ mɔɔ ɔfɛta la.
58002003	Na saa yɛanzɔ ngoanelielɛ kpole mɔɔ le zɛhae la anu a, ɛnee kɛ ɔkɛyɛ na yɛavi ɛsalɛ ɛ? Awulae mumua ne lumuale bɔle ngoanelielɛ ɛhye anwo nolo, yɛɛ bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛdiele ye la ɛhile ɛmaa yɛnwu kɛ ɔle nɔhalɛ.
58002004	Mekɛ ko ne ala Nyamenle ɔdaye ɔlile daselɛ ɔvoale bɛ ɛdeɛ ne azo, na ɔvale Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza nu ahyɛlɛdeɛ ɔmanle bɛ, ɔmanle bɛyɛle nwanwane ninyɛne, kɛmɔ ye ɛhulolɛdeɛ ne de la.
58002005	Nyamenle ɛtɛfale ye soanvolɛma kɛ bɛzie ewiade fofolɛ ne mɔɔ yɛka nwolɛ edwɛkɛ kɛ ɔbara la.
58002006	Bɛha ye wɔ Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne anu ɛleka bie kɛ, “Sonla le duzu, mɔɔ ɛdwenle ɔ nwo zɛhae a? Anzɛɛ sonla ra mɔɔ ɛ nye wɔ ɔ nwo zo zɛhae a?
58002007	Ɛbɔle ye ɛmanle wɔ soanvolɛma dɛlale ye mekɛ ekyi bie ala anu, ɛwulale ye anyunlunyia na ɛmanle bɛlile ye eni,
58002008	na ɛvale ninyɛne kɔsɔɔti ɛwulale ɔ bo.” Saa ɔvale “ninyɛne kɔsɔɔti ɔwulale ɔ bo” a, ɛnee ɔkile kɛ debie biala boka nwolɛ. Noko mɔɔ kɛkala yɛnwu ye la a le kɛ sonla ɛnzie ninyɛne muala.
58002009	Na yɛnwu Gyisɛse mɔɔ mekɛ ekyi bie anu ɔdaye noko bɛyɛle ye ekyi bɛdɛlale Nyamenle soanvolɛma la, kɛ bɛwula ye anyunlunyia na bɛdi ye eni wɔ nyane ewule mɔɔ ɔwule la ati. Nyamenle luale ɔdaye ye ɛlolɛ zo yɛɛ ɔmanle ɔwule wɔ awie biala ati a.
58002010	Ɔle kpalɛ kɛ Nyamenle, mɔɔ ɔdaye yɛɛ ɔbɔle ninyɛne kɔsɔɔti na bɛle ye ɛdeɛ la, kɛmaa Gyisɛse kɛnwu amaneɛ kolaa na yeali munli, amaa yeahola yeava mralɛ somaa yeahɔ Nyamenle anyunlunyia ne anu.
58002011	Ɔte menli nwo ɔfi bɛ ɛtane nwo na ɔ nee bɛdabɛ mɔɔ yede bɛ nwo la nyia Selɛ ko. Ɛhye ati Gyisɛse ɛnze nyiane kɛ ɔkɛvɛlɛ bɛ ɔ mediema.
58002012	Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne se, “Mebabɔ wɔ duma meahile me mediema ne mɔ; mebado edwɛne meaye wɔ ayɛlɛ mekɛ biala mɔɔ yɛkɛyia la.”
58002013	Eza ɔse, “Mebava me rɛle meawula Nyamenle anu.” Eza ɔhanle ye bieko kɛ, “Me nee ngakula mɔɔ Nyamenle ɛva bɛ ɛmaa me la ɛra.”
58002014	Zɔhane ati kɛmɔ ngakula ne mɔ le nwonane nee mogya la, Gyisɛse ɔdaye ɔyɛle ɔ nwo kɛ bɛdabɛ la na ɔnyianle bɛ nwonane ne bie, amaa yealua ye ewule zo yeazɛkye Abɔnsam, mɔɔ ɛnee lɛ tumi wɔ ewule nwo zo la,
58002015	na yealie bɛdabɛ mɔɔ ɔlua kɛ bɛsulo ewule la ati bɛyɛle ahanra wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ bɛde ngoane nu la.
58002016	Ɔluakɛ ɔla ɛkɛ wienyi kɛ tɛ Nyamenle soanvolɛma yɛɛ ɔrale bɛ ɛboalɛ a na ɔrale ɔbaboa Ebileham abo zo amra.
58002017	Ɛhye kile kɛ ɔwɔ kɛ ɔyɛ kɛ ɔ mediema ne mɔ la wɔ adenle biala anu, amaa yeayɛ bɛ Sɛlɛvolɛ Kpanyinli mɔɔ di nɔhalɛ na ɔse anwunvɔne wɔ ye Nyamenle gyimayɛlɛ nu, na yeali bɛ ti mgbɔdalɛ, amaa bɛava menli ɛtane bɛahyɛ bɛ.
58002018	Kɛkala ɔkola ɔboa bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛwɔ sɔnea nu la, ɔboalekɛ bɛzɔ ɔdaye bɛnlea ɛlɛ, yɛɛ yenwu amaneɛ ɛlɛ.
58003001	Me mediema Keleseɛnema, mɔɔ bɛdabɛ noko Nyamenle ɛvɛlɛ bɛ a! Bɛdwenle Gyisɛse, mɔɔ Nyamenle ɛzoa ye kɛ ɔrayɛ Sɛlɛvolɛ Kpanyinli wɔ diedi ye mɔɔ yɛlɛ nu la anwo.
58003002	Ɔlile nɔhalɛ ɔmanle Nyamenle mɔɔ zoanle ye la, kɛmɔ Mosisi lile nɔhalɛ wɔ ye gyimayɛlɛ nu wɔ Nyamenle sua nu la.
58003003	Sonla mɔɔ si sua la lɛ ɔ nyunlu tɛla sua ne mɔɔ ɔkɛzi la. Zɔhane ala yɛɛ Gyisɛse lɛ ɔ nyunlu tɛla Mosisi a.
58003004	Sonla ala a si sua a, yɛɛ Nyamenle noko a ɛyɛ ninyɛne muala a.
58003005	Mosisi lile nɔhalɛ kɛ ɔle akɛlɛ wɔ Nyamenle sua nu, na ɔlile ninyɛne mɔɔ Nyamenle baha nwolɛ bie wɔ kenle bie la anwo daselɛ.
58003006	Na Kelaese ɛdeɛ ɔlile nɔhalɛ kɛ ɔle Ralɛ mɔɔ nea Nyamenle sua nu ɛkɛ a. Saa yɛgyinla akɛnrasesebɛ zo na yɛsi pi wɔ anyelazo nu a, yɛkɛnwu kɛ yɛle ye sua.
58003007	Yemɔti, kɛ Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne se la ɛne, “Saa ɛnɛ bɛte Nyamenle ane a,
58003008	bɛmmayɛ anzosesebɛ, kɛmɔ bɛ nlenya mɔ yɛle na bɛdele Nyamenle anwo atua, na mekɛ ne anu bɛzɔle ye bɛnleanle wɔ ɛsɛlɛ ne azo la.
58003009	Bɛ nlenya mɔ nwunle gyima kpalɛ mɔɔ menlile memanle bɛ ɛvolɛ abulanla anu la, noko bɛgyegyele me na bɛzɔle me bɛnleanle.
58003010	Ɛhye ati menvale menli zɔhane mɔ anwo ɛya na menganle kɛ, ‘Bɛle menli mɔɔ bɛsolo na bɛkpo kɛ bɛnrɛli me mɛla zo a.’
58003011	Menvale ɛya na menganle ndane kɛ, ‘Bɛ gyakɛ ba ɛnrɛtia ɛleka mɔɔ meyɛ kɛ memaa bɛaralie bɛ ɛnwomenle la!’ ”
58003012	Me mediema diedima, bɛnlea boɛ na bɛ bie mɔ ansolo, na bɛande bɛ nwo bɛanvi tease Nyamenle ne anwo.
58003013	Zɔhane ati, amaa ɛtane ambɛlɛbɛla bɛ biala na yeakpunli ye ahonle la, bɛboa bɛ nwo ngoko alehyenlɛ biala, kɛmɔ “Ɛnɛ” gyi ɛkɛ ne maa yɛ alehyenlɛ biala mɔɔ kɛhye yɛ nyunlu la.
58003014	Ɔluakɛ alumua diedi ne mɔɔ yɛnyianle la, saa yɛsɔ nu ɛsesebɛ yɛkɔ awieleɛ a yɛɛ yɛ nee Kelaese kɛli agya a.
58003015	Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne se, “Saa ɛnɛ bɛte Nyamenle ane a, bɛmmayɛ anzosesebɛ, kɛmɔ bɛ nlenya mɔ yɛle na bɛdele Nyamenle anwo atua la.”
58003016	Nwane mɔ a dele Nyamenle ane noko bɛdele atua la? Bɛdabɛ kɔsɔɔti mɔɔ Mosisi hɔyele bɛ vile Yigyibiti la ɔ.
58003017	Nwane mɔ a Nyamenle vale bɛ nwo ɛya ɛvolɛ abulanla la? Bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛyɛle ɛtane na bɛdɔle amolɛ nu wɔ ɛsɛlɛ ne azo la ɔ.
58003018	Mɔɔ Nyamenle ka ye ndane ne kɛ, “Bɛ gyakɛ ba ɛnrɛtia ɛleka mɔɔ meyɛ kɛ memaa bɛaralie bɛ ɛnwomenle la” ɛnee ɔ nee nwane mɔ? Ɔ nee menli mɔɔ dele atua la.
58003019	Ɛhye maa yɛnwu kɛ bɛandwu ɛleka ne, ɔboalekɛ bɛanlie bɛanli.
58004001	Kɛkala mɔɔ Nyamenle ɛwɔkɛ ne mɔɔ fane ɛnwomenlelielɛ nwo la tɛbɔ ɛkɛ ne la, bɛmaa yɛnlea boɛ na bɛanze yɛ bie mɔ kɛ bɛdɔ sinli na bɛnrɛdwu ɛnwomenlelielɛ ɛleka ne.
58004002	Ɔluakɛ yɛdayɛ noko yɛde Edwɛkpa ne, kɛmɔ bɛdele la. Bɛdele edwɛkɛ ne, na kɛmɔ bɛanlie bɛanli la ati, yeanyɛ nvasoɛ yeammaa bɛ.
58004003	Ɛhye ati yɛdayɛ mɔɔ yɛdie yɛdi la angome a banyia ɛnwomenlelielɛ ne mɔɔ Nyamenle ɛva ɛbɔ ɛwɔkɛ la a. Ɔle kɛmɔ ɔhanle la. Ɔse, “Menvale ɛya na menganle ndane kɛ, ‘Bɛ gyakɛ ba ɛnrɛtia ɛleka mɔɔ meyɛ kɛ memaa bɛaralie bɛ ɛnwomenle la.’ ” Ɔhanle ɛhye, noko ɛnee yewie ye gyima yɛ dɛba, ɔvi ewiade mɔlebɛbo ne amuala.
58004004	Wɔ Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne anu, bɛka ɛhye wɔ kenle ne mɔɔ tɔ zo nsuu la anwo kɛ, “Nyamenle liele ye ɛnwomenle wɔ ye gyima nwo wɔ kenle ne mɔɔ tɔ zolɛ nsuu la azo.”
58004005	Edwɛkɛ ɛhye ala noko a bɛha nwolɛ bie bieko kɛ, “Bɛ gyakɛ ba ɛnrɛtia ɛleka mɔɔ meyɛ kɛ memaa bɛaralie bɛ ɛnwomenle la.”
58004006	Kɛmɔ bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛlumuale bɛdele Edwɛkpa ne la bie mɔ yɛle anzosesebɛ la, bɛannyia Nyamenle ɛnwomenlelielɛ ne, ɔboalekɛ bɛanlie bɛanli. Ɛhye kile kɛ ɛnee bie mɔ wɔ ɛkɛ mɔɔ bɛbanyia ɛwɔkɛ ne a.
58004007	Ɛhye ati Nyamenle ɛzie kenle fofolɛ mɔɔ le “Ɛnɛ”. Ɛvolɛ dɔɔnwo pɛle nu la, ɔluale Devidi anwo zo ɔhanle, kɛmɔ Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne se la: “Saa ɛnɛ bɛte Nyamenle ane a, bɛmmayɛ anzosesebɛ.”
58004008	Ɔluakɛ saa Dwɔhyua holale manle menli ne liele bɛ ɛnwomenle a, anrɛɛ Nyamenle eza ɛnrɛha kenle fofolɛ nwo edwɛkɛ bieko.
58004009	Ɛhye ati Ɛnwomenlelielɛ Kenle tɛbɔ ɛkɛ ne tɛmaa Nyamenle menli ne, kɛmɔ Nyamenle liele ye ɛnwomenle wɔ kenle ne mɔɔ tɔ zolɛ nsuu la azo la.
58004010	Ɔluakɛ awie mɔɔ kɛnyia ɛnwomenlelielɛ ne mɔɔ Nyamenle ɛva ɛbɔ ɛwɔkɛ la die ye ɛnwomenle wɔ ɔdaye ye gyima nwo, kɛmɔ Nyamenle liele ye ɛnwomenle wɔ ye gyima nwo la.
58004011	Zɔhane ati, bɛmaa yɛbɔ mɔdenle kɛ yɛkɛnyia ɛnwomenlelielɛ ne, amaa yɛanlea boɛ na yɛ nuhua biala anyɛ anzosesebɛ, kɛmɔ yɛ nlenya mɔ yɛle la.
58004012	Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne gyi zo na ɔyɛ se, ɔyɛ nla ɔtɛla dadeɛ anye nwiɔ biala. Ɔpɛ to, ɔdua ɛkɛla nee sunsum ayia zo, ɔgya mbowule agbɔkɛ nee mbowule ɛnlome ɛweɛne na ɔfede adwenle nee ahonle nu ɔnwu bɛ nzuzulɛ muala.
58004013	Wɔ Nyamenle anyunlu, debie biala ɛnvea; debie biala mɔɔ wɔ aleɛabo la la ɔ nyunlu wienyi, na yemɔ yɛɛ yɛbabu yɛ mgbonda yɛahile ye a.
58004014	Yemɔti, bɛmaa yɛzɔ diedi ne mɔɔ yɛnyia ye la anu ɛsesebɛ. Ɔluakɛ yɛlɛ Sɛlɛvolɛ Kpanyinli Kpole Kpalɛ mɔɔ ɛhɔ toonwo ɛhɔdwu Nyamenle anyunlu a; yemɔ a le Gyisɛse, mɔɔ le Nyamenle Ara ne.
58004015	Yɛ Sɛlɛvolɛ Kpanyinli ɛhye le sonla mɔɔ se yɛ anwunvɔne wɔ yɛ sinlidɔlɛ nwo a. Yɛlɛ Sɛlɛvolɛ Kpanyinli mɔɔ bɛzɔle ye bɛnleanle kɛ yɛdayɛ la, noko yeanyɛ ɛtane biala.
58004016	Zɔhane ati bɛmaa yɛzi ahonle na yɛbikye Nyamenle belemgbunli ebia ne mɔɔ ɛlolɛ ɛyi ye tɛkɛɛ la anwo. Ɛkɛ ne yɛɛ bɛbanwu yɛ anwunvɔne na ye ɛlolɛ ti yɛanyia moalɛ wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ yɛkɛhyia la a.
58005001	Sɛlɛvolɛ Kpanyinli biala, bɛye ye bɛfi menli avinli na bɛtu ye kɛ ɔgyinla bɛ gyakɛ anu wɔ Nyamenle anyunlu na ɔva bɛ ahyɛlɛdeɛ ne mɔ ɔbɔ azu ɔzɛlɛ ɛtanefakyɛ ɔmaa bɛ.
58005002	Kɛmɔ ɔdaye mumua ne ɔtɔ sinli wɔ ndenle dɔɔnwo anu la ati, ɔmaa ɔ nee bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnze nwolɛ bie na bɛvo la di ye bɛtɛɛ.
58005003	Eza kɛmɔ ɔtɔ sinli la ati, saa ɔbɔ azu a ɔwɔ kɛ ɔdumua ɔbɔ ye ɛtane nwo azu kolaa na akee yeabɔ bie yeamaa menli kɔsɔɔti wɔ bɛ ɛtane nwo.
58005004	Awie ko ɔdaye ɔngola ɔnyɛ ɔ nwo sɛlɛvolɛ kpanyinli. Bɛdua Nyamenle ɛvɛlɛlɛ zo a bɛyɛ sonla sɛlɛvolɛ kpanyinli a, kɛmɔ bɛyɛle Aalɔn la.
58005005	Zɔhane ala yɛɛ Kelaese ɔdaye yeanyɛ ɔ nwo sɛlɛvolɛ kpanyinli a. Nyamenle ɔdaye mumua ne a ɔzele ye kɛ, “Ɛle me Ra; ɛnɛ merayɛ ɛ Ze.”
58005006	Eza yeha ye wɔ ɛleka gyɛne kɛ, “Ɛbayɛ sɛlɛvolɛ dahuu, kɛ Mɛlekezidɛke la.”
58005007	Mekɛ mɔɔ Gyisɛse wɔ ewiade ye anu la, ɔvale ɛzunlɛ nee nyane ɔdeɛdeanle nu ɔvale ye nzɛlɛlɛ ɔdole Nyamenle mɔɔ yemɔ ala a kɛhola kɛye ye kɛvi ewule nu la anyunlu. Kɛmɔ ɔhanle ɔ nwo aze na ɔvale ɔ nwo amuala ɔmanle la ati, Nyamenle diele ye.
58005008	Ɔle Nyamenle Ara bɔbɔ ɛdeɛ, noko ɔluale ye amaneɛnwunlɛ zo ɔzukoale ɔyɛle tieyɛ.
58005009	Mɔɔ bɛmanle ɔlile munli la, akee ɔrayɛle ngoanelielɛ mɔɔ ɛnlɛ awieleɛ la ɔmanle bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛtie ye la,
58005010	na Nyamenle yɛle ye Sɛlɛvolɛ Kpanyinli kɛ Mɛlekezidɛke la.
58005011	Yɛlɛ dɔɔnwo yɛka wɔ edwɛkɛ ɛhye anwo, noko nuhua ngilenu bayɛ se amaa bɛ, ɔboalekɛ bɛ ndelebɛbo le ekyi.
58005012	Ɔluakɛ mekɛ ɛdwu mɔɔ saa bɛle kilehilevolɛma bɔbɔ a anrɛɛ ɔmbɔ nzonle a, noko kɛkala bɛtɛkpondɛ awie mɔɔ bɔ ɔ bo yeahilehile bɛ Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne ɛzukoalɛdeɛ ne mɔ mɔɔ lumua la. Bɛngola aleɛ mɔɔ anu yɛ se la di. Ɛhye ati bɛkpondɛ nyɛfonzule bɛanlo.
58005013	Awie mɔɔ no nyɛfonzule la tɛde adɔma; ɔnlɛ adwenle biala wɔ ɛtane nee kpalɛ nwo.
58005014	Aleɛ mɔɔ anu yɛ ɛnlomboɛ la wɔ ɛkɛ maa mgbanyinli, ɔluakɛ bɛzukoa na bɛkola bɛnwu ngakyile mɔɔ wɔ kpalɛ nee ɛtane nu la.
58006001	Zɔhane ati, bɛmaa yɛhɔ zolɛ yɛzukoa yɛyɛ mgbanyinli na yɛgyakyi Kelaese ɛdoavolɛ nwo ɛzukoalɛdeɛ ne mɔ mɔɔ lumua la. Tɛ bɔ zo mɔɔ eza yɛbɔ ɔ bo yɛazukoa kɛ ɔwɔ kɛ yɛfi ninyɛndane nwo na yɛdie Nyamenle yɛdi ɔ, anzɛɛ ngilehilelɛ mɔɔ fane ɛzɔnenlɛ ngakyile nwo,
58006002	ɛsalɛ mɔɔ bɛfa bɛgua bɛ nwo zo, ewudwazo ne nee ndɛnebualɛ mɔɔ ɛnlɛ awieleɛ la anwo ɔ. Bɛmaa yɛzukoa yɛhɔ yɛ nyunlu,
58006003	na ɛhye yɛɛ saa Nyamenle maa adenle a ɔwɔ kɛ yɛyɛ a.
58006004	Ɔluakɛ ɔyɛ se ɔmaa bɛdabɛ mɔɔ anrɛɛ bɛlɛ diedi na bɛgyakyi nu la kɛ bɛkɛzia bɛkɛnlu bɛ nwo bieko. Ɛnee anrɛɛ bɛwɔ Nyamenle wienyi ne anu, bɛnyia Nyamenle nu ahyɛlɛdeɛ, na bɛnyia Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne bie;
58006005	bɛze ye bɔkɔɔ kɛ Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne le kpalɛ, yɛɛ bɛnwu kɛ tumi ne mɔɔ bara la ɛzulolɛ si de la, noko bɛgyakyi bɛ diedi ne anu.
58006006	Ɔyɛ se kɛ awie kɛhola kɛmaa bɛkɛnlu bɛ nwo bieko a, ɔboalekɛ bɛbɔ Nyamenle Ara ne meanubaka nu dahuu na bɛgua ɔ nyunlu aze wɔ menli nu.
58006007	Nyamenle yila azɛlɛ mɔɔ meme nzule mɔɔ kɛdɔ zo la na ɔmaa zolɛ aleɛ yɛ kpalɛ maa menli mɔɔ yɛ zolɛ egyinli la.
58006008	Na saa azɛlɛ zɛhae azo fifi mbowule nee ndile a, nvasoɛ biala ɛnle zo; ɔle kɛ asɛɛ Nyamenle ɛwa ye amonle ɛwie na bɛbava senle bɛazɛkye ye la.
58006009	Noko ayi mɔ, saa yɛtendɛ zɛhae bɔbɔ a, yɛ adwenle si pi wɔ bɛ nwo. Yɛze kɛ nyilalɛ kpalɛ bie wɔ ɛkɛ mɔɔ beta ngoanelielɛ nwo a.
58006010	Nyamenle ɛnli nzisi. Ɔ rɛle ɛnrɛvi gyima mɔɔ bɛyɛle nee ɛhulolɛ mɔɔ bɛhile wɔ ɔ nwo nee nyele mɔɔ kɛkala bɛtɛbɔ nwo bɛtɛkile bɛtɛmaa bɛ mediema mɔɔ doa Kelaese abo zo la.
58006011	Yɛ kunlu a anrɛɛ bɛ nuhua ko biala bagyinla kpundii ahɔ awieleɛ, amaa mɔɔ bɛ nye la zolɛ la bɛ sa aha ye.
58006012	Yɛngulo kɛ bɛkɛyɛ mgbovonle. Yɛkulo kɛ bɛsukoa menli mɔɔ bɛlua bɛ diedi nee abotane zo bɛnyia mɔɔ Nyamenle ɛva ɛbɔ ɛwɔkɛ la.
58006013	Mekɛ mɔɔ Nyamenle bɔle Ebileham ɛwɔkɛ ne la, ɔvuale ɔhilele ye kɛ ɔbali ɛwɔkɛ ne azo. Kɛmɔ awie biala ɛnle ɛkɛ mɔɔ le kpole tɛla ye la ati, Nyamenle vale ɔdaye ɔ ngome ye duma a vuale a.
58006014	Ɔse, “Mebɔ wɔ ɛwɔkɛ kɛ mebayila wɔ na meamaa ɛ bo zo amra ayɛ dɔɔnwo.”
58006015	Ebileham zile abotane, na ɔnyianle ɛwɔkɛ ne mɔɔ Nyamenle bɔle ye la.
58006016	Saa sonla ka ndane a, ɔfa awie mɔɔ tɛla ye la duma a ɔka ndane ne a, yɛɛ ndane ne pɛ kpolerazulɛ biala azo.
58006017	Nyamenle kpondɛ kɛ bɛdabɛ mɔɔ ɔwɔ kɛ bɛnyia ɛwɔkɛ ne bie la nwu kɛ ɔnrɛhakyi ye adwenle ɛlɛ; ɛhye ati ɔvale ndane ɔbokale ye ɛwɔkɛ ne anwo.
58006018	Ɛhye ati, ninyɛne nwiɔ ɛhye mɔ a wɔ ɛkɛ mɔɔ ɛngakyi na ɔkile kɛ Nyamenle ɛnrɛbɔ adalɛ ɛlɛ a, amaa yɛdayɛ mɔɔ yɛnriandi yɛahɔvea ye nu la yɛanyia akɛnrasesebɛ yɛazɔ anyelazo ɛhye mɔɔ bɛva bɛzie yɛ nyunlu la anu kpalɛ.
58006019	Anyelazo ɛhye le kɛ sɛkɛ maa yɛ ɛkɛla. Ɔgyi pi, na ɔgyi ye kpundii ɔkɔpe anwuma lɔ ɛzonlenlɛ sua ne mgbɛnu ɛdanlɛ ne anu na ɔkɔdua ɔ nwo wɔ ɛleka nwuanzanwuanza ne.
58006020	Ɛleka ɛhye yɛɛ Gyisɛse, ɔlua yɛdayɛ yɛ ti, yelumua lɔ, yehɔyɛ Sɛlɛvolɛ Kpanyinli, kɛmɔ Mɛlekezidɛke la a.
58007001	Mɛlekezidɛke ɛhye, anrɛɛ ɔle belemgbunli wɔ Salɛm, eza ɔle Anwuma Anwuma Nyamenle ne Sɛlɛvolɛ. Mɔɔ Ebileham vi konle ne mɔɔ ɔlile arelemgbunli nna bie anwo zo konim la anloa ɛlɛba la, Mɛlekezidɛke yiale ye na ɔyilale ye,
58007002	na Ebileham hyɛle mɔɔ ɔnyianle ye wɔ konle ne anu la amuala anu bulu na ɔdule ɛkpɔ ko ɔmanle ye. (Mɛlekezidɛke duma ne abo ngilenu mɔɔ lumua la a le “Pɛlepɛlelilɛ Belemgbunli” yɛɛ kɛmɔ ɛnee ɔle belemgbunli wɔ Salɛm la, ye duma ne abo eza kile “Anzonudwolɛ Belemgbunli.”)
58007003	Mɛlekezidɛke ɛhye, debie biala ɛnle ɛkɛ mɔɔ kile yɛ ɔ ze anzɛɛ ɔ nli a, na yeayɛ ye abusua. Zɔhane ala yɛɛ debie ɛnle ɛkɛ mɔɔ kile yɛ ye awolɛ kenle anzɛɛ ye ewule kenle a. Ɔle kɛ Nyamenle Ara ne ala la; ɔle Sɛlɛvolɛ dahuu.
58007004	Bɛdabɛ bɛkola bɛnwu kɛ ɛnee ɔle sonlakpole kpalɛ. Ebileham, yɛ nlenya kpanyinli ne, hyɛle ye ninyɛne mɔɔ ɔnyianle bɛ konle nu la anu bulu na ɔdule ɛkpɔ ko ɔmanle ye.
58007005	Livae abo zo amra noko mɔɔ le sɛlɛvolɛma la, mɛla ne kile kɛ Yizilayɛma ɛhyɛ mɔɔ bɛkɛnyia ye biala la anu bulu na bɛdu ɛkpɔ ko bɛmaa bɛ. Ɛhye kile kɛ ɔwɔ kɛ sɛlɛvolɛma ne die zɛhae debie fi bɛdabɛ bɛ maanle nu amra lɔ, wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ bɛ muala bɛle Ebileham abo zo amra la.
58007006	Mɛlekezidɛke ɛnle Livae anlɔnra, noko ɔliele Ebileham, mɔɔ Nyamenle ɛbɔ ye ɛwɔkɛ la ninyɛne ne mɔɔ ɔhyɛle nu bulu na ɔdule ko ɔmanle ye la na ɔyilale ye.
58007007	Kpolerazulɛ biala ɛnle nwo kɛ mɔɔ maa nyilalɛ la le kpole tɛla mɔɔ die nyilalɛ ne la.
58007008	Ewiade ye anu, bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛdie ngyɛnu bulu ne anu ɛkpɔ ko la le menli mɔɔ wu a, na anwuma lɔ, sonla mɔɔ die ngyɛnu bulu ne anu ɛkpɔ ko ne la de aze dahuu.
58007009	Eza saa yɛka ye kpalɛ a, yɛkɛze kɛ mekɛ mɔɔ Ebileham duale ye ngyɛnu bulu ne anu ɛkpɔ ko ne la, ɛnee ɔkile kɛ Livae, (mɔɔ ɔ bo zo amra a die zɛhae ngyɛnu bulu ye anu ɛkpɔ ko ne la) ɔdaye yedua.
58007010	Ɔluakɛ saa bɔbɔ bɛtɛwole Livae a, ɛnee ɔwɔ ɔ nlenya Ebileham akunlu wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ Mɛlekezidɛke yiale ye la.
58007011	Ɔlua Livae abusua ne sɛlɛvolɛlilɛ gyima ngyehyɛlɛ ne azo yɛɛ bɛvale mɛla ne bɛrɛlɛle Yizilayɛma a. Na saa Livae abusua ne sɛlɛvolɛlilɛ gyima ne lile munli a, anrɛɛ Aalɔn yɛɛ ɔwɔ kɛ bɛsie ɔ gyakɛ anu a, na ɔnrɛhyia kɛ eza bɛkɛva sɛlɛvolɛ ngakyile bie bɛkɛzie Mɛlekezidɛke agyakɛ anu.
58007012	Ɔluakɛ saa bɛkakyi sɛlɛvolɛlilɛ ne a, ɛnee ɔwɔ kɛ eza bɛkakyi mɛla ne noko.
58007013	Yɛ Awulae ne mɔɔ ɔ nwo edwɛkɛ a bɛka la, vi abusua gyɛne nu; ye busuanli bie ɛtɛdile sɛlɛvolɛ ɛlɛ.
58007014	Yɛze kɛ bɛwole ye wɔ Dwuda abusua nu, yɛɛ Mosisi noko ambɔ abusua ɛhye duma wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ ɔyɛ sɛlɛvolɛma ngyehyɛlɛ ne la.
58007015	Edwɛkɛ ne anye la ɛkɛ ne wienyi, kɛ sɛlɛvolɛ fofolɛ mɔɔ le kɛ Mɛlekezidɛke la ɛvinde.
58007016	Tɛ sonla ngyehyɛlɛ nee amaamuo zo a ɔlua mɔɔ bɛyɛle Mɛlekezidɛke sɛlɛvolɛ a, na ɔlua tumi mɔɔ ngoane mɔɔ ɛnlɛ awieleɛ la lɛ ye la azo a bɛwulale ye sɛlɛvolɛ a.
58007017	Ɔluakɛ Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne se, “Ɛle sɛlɛvolɛ dahuu kɛ Mɛlekezidɛke la.”
58007018	Ɛhye kile kɛ ɛnee bɛzie ngyehyɛlɛ dɛba ne ahane, ɔboalekɛ ɔnli munli yɛɛ nvasoɛ biala ɛnle zolɛ.
58007019	Ɔluakɛ Mosisi Mɛla ne angola ammaa ɛhwee anli munli. Na kɛkala, bɛva anyelazo kpalɛ bie bɛra, mɔɔ yɛlua zo a yɛbikye Nyamenle a.
58007020	Bieko, Nyamenle ndane ne wɔ ɛkɛ. Ndane zɛhae, ɛnee bie ɛnle ɛkɛ ɛmmaa menli mɔɔ bɛlumuale bɛwulale bɛ sɛlɛvolɛ la.
58007021	Na Gyisɛse sɛlɛvolɛlilɛ ɛdeɛ ne ndane wɔ nwolɛ. Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne se, “Awulae ɛha ndane na ɔnrɛhakyi ye adwenle ɛlɛ: ‘Ɛle sɛlɛvolɛ dahuu.’ ”
58007022	Ngakyile ɛhye maa Gyisɛse yɛ ngyekyeleɛ kpalɛ bie agyinlanudivolɛ.
58007023	Ngakyile bieko wɔ ɛkɛ: sɛlɛvolɛ ɛhendeɛ ne mɔ zonle, ɔluakɛ bɛwule na bɛangola bɛanyɛ bɛ gyima ne.
58007024	Noko Gyisɛse de aze dahuu, yɛɛ ye sɛlɛvolɛ gyima ne ɛngakyi ɛngɔ awie lɔ.
58007025	Ɛhye ati ɔkola kɛkala nee mekɛ biala ɔdie bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛdua ɔ nwo zo bɛba Nyamenle ɛkɛ ne la ngoane, ɔluakɛ ɔde aze na ɔdi bɛ ti mgbɔdalɛ wɔ Nyamenle ɛkɛ ne dahuu.
58007026	Sɛlɛvolɛ Kpanyinli mɔɔ le zɛhae la yɛɛ kola sɔ yɛ wɔ yɛ ɛhyianlɛ biala anu a, ɔluakɛ ɔle nwuanzanwuanza; ɛtane biala ɛnle ɔ nwo anzɛɛ ye nu. Bɛye ye bɛzie ahane bɛvi ɛtanevolɛma anu na bɛmaa ye zo bɛhɔ anwuma.
58007027	Ɔnle kɛ sɛlɛvolɛ mgbanyinli ɛhendeɛ ne mɔ, mɔɔ ɔwɔ kɛ kɔ azukponle nwo kenle biala, kɛ bɛkabɔ bɛ ɛtane nwo azu na bɛabɔ bie bɛamaa awie mɔ la. Ɔvale ɔ nwo ɔbɔle azu ne kokye ala.
58007028	Mosisi Mɛla ne maa adenle maa bɛyɛ menli mɔɔ ɛndenrɛ la sɛlɛvolɛ mgbanyinli. Na Nyamenle ɛwɔkɛ ne mɔɔ ndane ne wɔ nu, na ɔrale nzinlii la, yɛɛ ɛye Ralɛ ne mɔɔ di munli dahuu la kɛ ɔyɛ Sɛlɛvolɛ Kpanyinli a.
58008001	Mɔɔ yɛlɛka la amuala, saa yɛbɔ ye kpɔkɛ ko a, yemɔ a le ɛhye: yɛlɛ Sɛlɛvolɛ Kpanyinli zɛhae, mɔɔ de Nyamenle Bedevinli ne Belemgbunli Ebia ne fema zo wɔ anwuma.
58008002	Ɔyɛ ye Sɛlɛvolɛ Kpanyinli gyima ne wɔ anwuma lɔ Nwuanzanwuanza Ɛleka ne, wɔ ndanlɛ sua ne mɔɔ tɛ sonla a zile na Nyamenle ɔdaye a yezi la anu.
58008003	Sɛlɛvolɛ Kpanyinli biala mɔɔ bɛkɛye ye la fa ahyɛlɛ ninyɛne nee nane bɔ azu maa Nyamenle. Zɔhane ati ɔwɔ kɛ yɛ Sɛlɛvolɛ Kpanyinli ne ɔdaye ɔnyia debie ɔbɔ azu.
58008004	Saa ɔwɔ ewiade ye anu a anrɛɛ ɔnrɛyɛ sɛlɛvolɛ ɛlɛ, ɔluakɛ sɛlɛvolɛma mɔɔ dua Mosisi mɛla ne azo fa ninyɛne bɔ azu la zonle.
58008005	Na mɔɔ bɛyɛ la le gyima mɔɔ bɛyɛ ye wɔ anwuma lɔ la sɔhovolɛ. Ɔluakɛ mɔɔ Mosisi bazi ndanlɛ sua ne la, Nyamenle zele ye kɛ, “Bɔ mɔdenle kɛ ɛkɛyɛ debie biala ɛkɛmaa ɔkɛzɔho mɔɔ bɛvale bɛhilele wɔ wɔ boka ne azo lɔ la.”
58008006	Na kɛ ɔde la a le kɛ bɛmaa Gyisɛse sɛlɛvolɛ gyima mɔɔ sonle bolɛ kpole tɛla dɛba ne la. Ɔboalekɛ ɔgyi ninyɛne kpalɛ nwo ɛwɔkɛ zo.
58008007	Saa alumua ngyekyeleɛ ne lile munli a, anrɛɛ yeangyia kɛ eza bɛkɛkyekye fofolɛ.
58008008	Ɔluakɛ Nyamenle nwu nvonleɛ dɔɔnwo wɔ ye menli nwo, yemɔti ɔse, “Medame Awulae mese, mekɛ bara mɔɔ me nee Yizilayɛma nee Dwuda abusua ekpunli ne bakyekye ngyekyeleɛ fofolɛ a.
58008009	Ɔnrɛyɛ kɛ ngyekyeleɛ ne mɔɔ me nee bɛ nlenya mɔ kyekyele wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ menyele bɛ menvile Yigyibiti azɛlɛ zo la. Bɛanli nɔhalɛ wɔ zɔhane ngyekyeleɛ ne mɔɔ me nee bɛ kyekyele la anwo, yemɔti meandɛne bɛ zo, Medame Awulae a mese a.
58008010	Akee ngyekyeleɛ fofolɛ mɔɔ me nee Yizilayɛma bakyekye wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ bara la ɛne: Mebava me mɛla meawula bɛ adwenle nu, na meahɛlɛ ye bɛ ahonle zo. Mebayɛ bɛ Nyamenle, na bɛayɛ me menli.
58008011	Ɔnrɛhyia kɛ bɛ nuhua biala kɛhilehile ɔ gɔnwo, anzɛɛ kɛze ɔ diema kɛ ‘Nwu Awulae.’ Ɔluakɛ ngakula nee mgbanyinli banwu me.
58008012	Mebava bɛ ɛtane meahyɛ bɛ na menrɛhakye bɛ nvonleɛ ne mɔ bieko.”
58008013	Saa Nyamenle ɛlɛka ngyekyeleɛ fofolɛ nwo edwɛkɛ a, ɛnee ɔkile kɛ yemaa alumua ngyekyeleɛ ne ɛyɛ mgbane. Debie biala mɔɔ kɛkpa nwolɛ la ɛngyɛ biala na yeaminli.
58009001	Ɛnee alumua ngyekyeleɛ ne lɛ ɛzonlenlɛ nwo ngyehyɛlɛ yɛɛ ɛleka mɔɔ bɛhyehyɛ kɛ ɔle nwuanzanwuanza na ɔwɔ kɛ bɛsonle ɛkɛ ne la.
58009002	Bɛzile ndanlɛ sua ko, ye findezo mgbɛnu ne bɛfɛlɛ ye Ɛleka Nwuanzanwuanza. Ɛkɛ a kɛnlaneɛ baka ne, ɛkponle ne nee kpanwo ne mɔɔ bɛfa bɛbɔ azu bɛmaa Nyamenle la wɔ a.
