58009003	Wɔ mgbɛnu ne mɔɔ tɔ zolɛ nwiɔ la anzi, ndanlɛ sua ko noko wɔ ɛkɛ; bɛfɛlɛ ɛkɛ ne Nwuanzanwuanza nu Nwuanzaanwu Ɛleka.
58009004	Ɛke yɛɛ ezukoa azukponle ne mɔɔ bɛkpu ɛyɛlɛ zo yɛɛ Ngyekyeleɛ Ɛlɛka ne mɔɔ bɛva ezukoa nvutuke bɛyɛ ye sɔɔnwo la wɔ a. Ezukoa dwora ne mɔɔ mana wɔ nu la gyi Ɛlɛka ne anu. Aalɔn baka ne mɔɔ kpakyele nya, nee awolɛ ndɛbandɛba nwiɔ ne mɔɔ bɛhɛlɛ mɛla ne zolɛ la wɔ Ɛlɛka ne anu.
58009005	Akee anyunlunyia abɔdeɛ mɔɔ lɛ ndɛbalɛ la zinze Ɛlɛka ne azo anwuma na bɛdɛlɛdɛlɛ bɛ ndɛba anu wɔ anwunvɔnezelɛ ebia ne azo, bɛlɛkile kɛ Nyamenle wɔ ɛkɛ. Na kɛkala, mekɛ ɛtɛdwule mɔɔ yɛkilehile debie biala mɔɔ wɔ ɛkɛ ne la anu ngoko ngoko a.
58009006	Kɛ bɛhyehyɛ ninyɛne mɔɔ wɔ ɛkɛ ne la ɛne. Alehyenlɛ biala sɛlɛvolɛma kɔ ndanlɛ sua ne findezo mgbɛnu ne anu kɔyɛ bɛ gyima;
58009007	noko Sɛlɛvolɛ Kpanyinli ne ala yɛɛ kɔ ndanlɛ sua ne mɔɔ wɔ sua ne mgbɛnu ne mɔɔ tɔ zolɛ nwiɔ la anzi la anu a, yɛɛ ɔkɔ ɛkɛ ne ɛvolɛ ɛvolɛ. Ɔlɛkɔ ɛkɛ a ɔfa mogya ɔkɔbɔ azu ɔmaa Nyamenle wɔ ɔdaye Sɛlɛvolɛ Kpanyinli ne nee menli kɔsɔɔti bɛ ɛtane mɔɔ bɛyɛ la ati.
58009008	Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne ngilehilelɛ mɔɔ wɔ ngyekyeleɛ ɛhye anwo la kile kɛ suzuamgba ala mɔɔ findezo ndanlɛ sua ne ɛtɛyele ɛkɛ ne la, adenle biala ɛnle ɛkɛ mɔɔ bɛfa nu bɛkɔ Nwuanzanwuanza nu Nwuanzaanwu Ɛleka ne a.
58009009	Ɛhye le ɛzukoalɛdeɛ maa yɛ ɛnɛ mekɛ ye. Ɔkile kɛ ahyɛlɛdeɛ nee nane azubɔlɛ ne mɔɔ bɛbɔ bɛmaa Nyamenle la ɛngola ɛmmaa sonvolɛma ahonle nu ɛnde.
58009010	Aleɛ nee nza nee bɛ nwo ɛnluanlɛ ngakyile nwo nyɛleɛ yɛɛ bɛyɛ a. Na ɛhye noko le ɛnyelɛ zo debie mɔɔ wɔ ɛkɛ a, kɔkpula mekɛ mɔɔ Nyamenle kɛhakyi ninyɛne kɔsɔɔti fofolɛ la.
58009011	Na Kelaese ɛra kɛ ninyɛne kpalɛ kɔsɔɔti anwo Sɛlɛvolɛ Kpanyinli. Ndanlɛ sua ne mɔɔ ɔyɛ gyima nu la le kpole, ɔdi munli ɔtɛla biala; tɛ sonla a zile a, yɛɛ ɔmboka ewiade ɛhye anwo a bɛbɔle a.
58009012	Mɔɔ Kelaese wolole ndanlɛ sua ɛhye anu kokye ne ala na ɔhɔle Nwuanzanwuanza nu Nwuanzaanwu Ɛleka ne la, yeanva mbɔnkye nee nlankɛ mogya a ɔbɔle azu ne a; ɔvale ɔdaye mumua ne ye mogya a ɔbɔle azu ɔvale ngoanelielɛ mɔɔ ɛnlɛ awieleɛ la ɔrɛlɛle yɛ a.
58009013	Bɛkponde nlankɛ nee mbɔnkye mogya nee ɛnlankɛ ralɛ mɔɔ bɛkɛyela ye la nzonle wɔ menli nwo na bɛfa ye kɛ ɔkola ɔnrinzi bɛ nwo evinli muala.
58009014	Kɛmɔ ɛhye le nɔhalɛ la, ɛnee ɛnea a ɛkɛnwu kɛ Kelaese mogya ne kola di gyima kpole maa ɔbo zolɛ. Yelua Sunsum ne mɔɔ ɛnwu ɛlɛ la azo yeva ɔ nwo yebɔ azu mɔɔ di munli la yemaa Nyamenle. Ye mogya ne bade yɛ adwenle nu avi nyɛleɛ mgbane mgbane mɔɔ fa yɛ kɔ ewule nu la anwo na yɛazonle tease Nyamenle ne.
58009015	Ɛhye ati Kelaese a le sonla mɔɔ de ngyekyeleɛ fofolɛ ne abo a, amaa bɛdabɛ mɔɔ Nyamenle ɛvɛlɛ bɛ la anyia ye nyilalɛ ne mɔɔ ɛnlɛ awieleɛ mɔɔ ɔvale ɔbɔle ɛwɔkɛ la bie. Ɛhye kola yɛ zɔhane, ɔboalekɛ bɛha mogya bɛgua, bɛva bɛye menli kɔsɔɔti bɛvi bɛ ɛtane mɔɔ bɛyɛle wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ bɛwɔ alumua ngyekyeleɛ ne abo la anu.
58009016	Saa awie yɛ “wele” na saa ɔwɔ kɛ bɛtulu nu a, kyesɛ bɛkile kɛ ahenle mɔɔ yɛle zɔhane kɛlata ne la ɛwu.
58009017	Ɔluakɛ saa ahenle mɔɔ yɛle “wele” ne la de aze a, nvasoɛ biala ɛnle mɔɔ yeyɛ la azo; saa ɔwu a yɛɛ ɛnee nvasoɛ ɛra zolɛ a.
58009018	Ɛhye ati alumua ngyekyeleɛ ne bɛvale mogya a bɛhyele ɔ bo a.
58009019	Mɔɔ Mosisi gengale mɛla ne amuala hilele menli ne na ɔwiele la, akee ɔvale ɛnlankɛ nee abɔnkye mogya ɔkpotole nzule nu, ɔvale nyinlanyinla nee boane kɔkɔlɛ ndɛkɛ ɔkyekyele na ɔvale ɔbɔle mogya ne anu ɔkpondenle Mɛla Buluku ne nee menli ne amuala anwo,
58009020	na ɔhanle kɛ, “Ɛhye a le mogya ne mɔɔ sɔ ngyekyeleɛ ne mɔɔ Nyamenle ɛyɛ kɛ bɛli zolɛ la anloa a”.
58009021	Zɔhane ala yɛɛ Mosisi eza kpondenle mogya ne wɔ Ndanlɛ Sua ne nee ninyɛne mɔɔ bɛfa bɛyɛ ɛzonlenlɛ la anwo a.
58009022	Nɔhalɛ, mɛla ne kile kɛ mogya ala a bɛfa bɛte debie biala anwo a, yɛɛ ɔwɔ kɛ bɛtwi mogya na bɛava bɛali ɛtane nwo mgbɔdalɛ.
58009023	Ninyɛne zɛhae mɔ, mɔɔ le anwuma lɔ ɛdeɛ kpalɛ ne sɔhovolɛ la, yɛɛ bɛte nwolɛ wɔ adenle zɛhae anu a. Anwuma lɔ ninyɛne ɛdeɛ kpalɛ ne hyia azubɔlɛ kpalɛ mɔɔ tɛla ɛhye a.
58009024	Ɔluakɛ Kelaese angɔ Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua mɔɔ menli a ɛzi na ɔle anwuma lɔ ɛdeɛ ne sɔhovolɛ la anu. Yehɔ anwuma lɔ, na ɛkɛ ne yɛɛ ɔfinde Nyamenle anyunlu dahuu ɔkpa yɛ ti kyɛlɛ a.
58009025	Dwuuma Sɛlɛvolɛ Kpanyinli ne fa mogya kɔ Nwuanzanwuanza nu Nwuanzaanwu Ɛleka ne ɛvolɛ ɛvolɛ. Na Kelaese ɛdeɛ yeangɔ fane dɔɔnwo kɛ ɔfa ɔ nwo yeahɔbɔ azu ne,
58009026	ɔluakɛ saa ɔle zɔhane a, anrɛɛ ɔkile kɛ ɔwɔ kɛ Kelaese nwu amaneɛ fane dɔɔnwo, ɔvi ewiade mɔlebɛbo ne. Noko ɔrale kokye wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ ninyɛne kɔsɔɔti ɛlɛkɔ awieleɛ la, na ɔvale ye mogya ɔbɔle azu ne ɔnununle ɛtane muala.
58009027	Bɛhyehyɛ bɛmaa sonla biala kɛ ɔwu kokye, na ewule ne anzi Nyamenle abua ye ndɛne.
58009028	Zɔhane ala yɛɛ bɛvale Kelaese ɔdaye noko bɛbɔle azu kokye ala kɛ ɔranunu menli dɔɔnwo ɛtane ne mɔ a. Ɔbara bieko, na tɛ kɛ ɔ nee ɛtane bali ɔ, na ɔbalie menli ne mɔɔ ɛlɛkendɛ ye la ngoane.
58010001	Dwuuma mɛla ne ɛnle ninyɛne fɔɔnwo ne mɔɔ wɔ ɛkɛ ne la nɔhalɛ sɔhovolɛ. Ɔle ninyɛne kpalɛ mɔɔ bara la sɔhovolɛ ekyi bie. Azu ko ne ala yɛɛ ɛvolɛ biala bɛbɔ a. Ɛhye ati bɛnrɛhola bɛnrɛlua mɛla ne azo bɛnrɛmaa menli mɔɔ kpondɛ Nyamenle la ɛnrɛlua dahuu azubɔlɛ ko ne ala azo ɛnrɛzɔ Nyamenle anye.
58010002	Saa azubɔlɛ ne te menli mɔɔ sonle Nyamenle la anwo bɔkɔɔ a, anrɛɛ bɛ adwenle ɛnyɛ bɛ kesee kɛ bɛnli ɛtane nwo fɔlɛ bieko, yɛɛ eza anrɛɛ bɛgyakyi azu ne ɛbɔlɛ.
58010003	Na kɛ ɔde la a le kɛ, ɛvolɛ biala azubɔlɛ ne kakye bɛ ɛtane mɔɔ mekɛ biala bɛyɛ la.
58010004	Ɔluakɛ ɔyɛ se kɛ mbɔnkye nee nlankɛ mogya kɛhola kɛnunu ɛtane mɔɔ mekɛ biala bɛyɛ la abo zo.
58010005	Ɔlua ɛhye ati mɔɔ Kelaese bara ewiade la, ɔzele Nyamenle kɛ, “Ɛmkpondɛ azubɔlɛ nee azubɔdeɛ noko wɔmaa me nwolɛ nwonane.
58010006	Ɛ nye ɛnlie nane mumua ɛyelalɛ anzɛɛ ɛtanefakyɛ azubɔlɛ nwo.
58010007	Ɛhye ati menganle kɛ, ‘O Nyamenle, mera kɛ mebayɛ mɔɔ ɛkpondɛ la, kɛmɔ bɛhɛlɛ ye wɔ me nwo wɔ mɛla buluku ne anu la.’ ”
58010008	Alumua ne ɔhanle kɛ, “Ɛmkpondɛ, yɛɛ ɛ nye ɛnlie azubɔdeɛ anzɛɛ nane ɛyelalɛ nee ɛtanefakyɛ azubɔlɛ nwo.” Ɔhanle ɛhye, noko mɛla ne maa adenle maa bɛbɔ azu mɔɔ le kɛ ɛhye mɔ la amuala.
58010009	Eza ɔhanle kɛ, “O Nyamenle, mera kɛ mebayɛ mɔɔ ɛkpondɛ la.” Yemɔti Nyamenle kpole dɛba ne azubɔlɛ ne na ɔvale Kelaese azubɔlɛ ɛdeɛ ne ɔziele ɔ bo zo.
58010010	Ɔlua ɛhye ati, kɛmɔ Gyisɛse Kelaese yɛle mɔɔ Nyamenle kpondɛ la, ye azu ne mɔɔ ɔvale ɔ nwo ɔyɛle azubɔdeɛ ɔbɔle ye kokye ne ala la ɛde yɛ nwo bɔkɔɔ ɛvi ɛtane nwo.
58010011	Dwuuma sɛlɛvolɛ biala bɔ azu dahuu yɛɛ ɔbɔ zɔhane azu ne ala wɔ mekɛ dɔɔnwo, noko azubɔlɛ ɛhye mɔ ɛngola ɛnye yɛ ɛnvi yɛ ɛtane ne mɔ anu.
58010012	Kelaese bɔle ɛtanefakyɛ nwo azu kpalɛ ne mɔɔ yɛ nla la kokye, na ɔhɔdɛnlanle Nyamenle asa fema zo.
58010013	Ɛkɛ ne yɛɛ ɔlɛkendɛ kɔkpula mekɛ mɔɔ Nyamenle kɛva ye kpɔvolɛma kɛwula ɔ gyakɛ abo la.
58010014	Ɔluakɛ yeva azubɔlɛ kokye yemaa bɛdabɛ mɔɔ yede bɛ nwo la ɛli munli dahuu.
58010015	Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne di daselɛ kile yɛ, ɔluakɛ alumua ne ɔhanle kɛ,
58010016	“Awulae se, Saa kenle zɔhane pɛ nu a ngyekyeleɛ mɔɔ me nee bɛ bakyekye la ɛne: Mebava me mɛla meawula bɛ ahonle nu, na meahɛlɛ ye wɔ bɛ adwenle nu.”
58010017	Akee ɔvale ɔzɔle zolɛ kɛ, “Menrɛhakye bɛ ɛtane ne nee bɛ amumuyɛ ne mɔ bieko.”
58010018	Ɔluakɛ ɛleka mɔɔ fakyɛ wɔ la, ɛtanefakyɛ nwo azubɔlɛ ɛngyia bieko.
58010019	Zɔhane ati, mediema, yɛlɛ adenle bɔkɔɔ kɛ yɛdua Gyisɛse ewule ne azo yɛfa mgbɛnu ɛdanlɛ ne anu yɛkɔ Nwuanzanwuanza nu Nwuanzaanwu Ɛleka ne.
58010020	Gyisɛse ɛlua mgbɛnu ɛdanlɛ ne, mɔɔ le ɔdaye ye nwonane ne anu ɛkpakye ngoane adenle fofolɛ ɛmaa yɛ.
58010021	Kɛmɔ yɛlɛ sɛlɛvolɛ kpole mɔɔ nea Nyamenle sua ne azo la,
58010022	bɛmaa yɛva ahonle kpalɛ nee diedi mɔɔ si pi, ahonle mɔɔ bɛde nwolɛ bɛvi adwenle nu fɔlɛlilɛ nwo, nee sonlabaka mɔɔ bɛva nzule anye komikomi bɛbia ye la yɛhwe yɛbikye Nyamenle.
58010023	Bɛmaa yɛzɔ anyelazo ne mɔɔ yɛlɛ ye la anu kpalɛ, ɔboalekɛ Nyamenle ne mɔɔ bɔle yɛ ɛwɔkɛ ne la le nɔhalɛ.
58010024	Bɛmaa yɛdwenle yɛkpondɛ adenle mɔɔ yɛdua zolɛ a yɛkɛhulo yɛ nwo ngoko ngoko, na yɛkɛyɛ gyima kpalɛ la.
58010025	Bɛmmamaa yɛgyakyi kɛ yɛkɛhɔ yɛ nyianu ne, kɛmɔ bie mɔ yɛ la. Bɛdabɛ bɛkola bɛnwu kɛ Awulae Kenle ne ɛbikye, yemɔti bɛmaa yɛsosɔ yɛ nwo ngoko ngoko.
58010026	Ɔluakɛ kɛkala mɔɔ yɛnwu nɔhalɛ ne la, saa yɛ nye fuu yɛkɔ zolɛ yɛyɛ ɛtane a, azubɔlɛ bieko ɛnle ɛkɛ mɔɔ kɛhola kɛye yɛ ɛtane ne mɔ a.
58010027	Ɛnee mɔɔ ɛha la a le kɛ yɛkɛva anwowozolɛ yɛkɛhendɛ Nyamenle Ndɛnebualɛ ne nee ye ɛya ne mɔɔ sɔ hulenyi kɛ senle mɔɔ bazɛkye bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛtia Nyamenle la.
58010028	Awie mɔɔ kɛdo Mosisi Mɛla ne la, saa bɛnyia alasevolɛ nwiɔ anzɛɛ nsa di daselɛ tia ye na ɔdi fɔlɛ a, bɛku ye mɔɔ anwunvɔnezelɛ biala ɛnle nu a.
58010029	Ɛnee ɛdawɔ fa ɛ nye to na nea sonla mɔɔ kɛkpo Nyamenle Ara ne, na yeambu mogya ne mɔɔ bɛlua zo a bɛ nwo te na Nyamenle vale zɔle ngyekyeleɛ ne anloa, na ɔkɛva Nyamenle ɛlolɛ Sunsum ne anyunlu ɔkɛkyikyi aze la ɛ? Ye ndeanlɛ mɔɔ ɔbanyia ye la le kpole kpalɛ.
58010030	Ɔluakɛ yɛze ahenle mɔɔ hanle kɛ, “Nzenralɛlilɛ le me ɛdeɛ, mebadua ɛtane kakɛ” la; yɛɛ eza yɛze Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne mɔɔ se, “Nyamenle babua ye menli ndɛne” la.
58010031	Ɔkɛyɛ ɛzulolɛ ɛdeɛ, kɛ ɛkɛdɔ tease Nyamenle ne ɛhane nu a!
58010032	Bɛhakye mɔɔ zile bɛ nwo zo wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ Nyamenle wienyi ne dale bɛ nwo zo la. Bɛnwunle amaneɛ dɔɔnwo, noko abodelɛ ne ambo bɛ nwo zo ɛlɛ.
58010033	Ɔdwule mekɛ ne bie la, bɛguale bɛ nyunlu aze wɔ bagua nu, bɛhilele bɛ nyane, yɛɛ ɔdwule mekɛ ne bie noko la, ɛnee akee bɛ nuhua ko biala bɔbɔ kpondɛ kɛ ɔdaye ɔnwu amaneɛ ne bie.
58010034	Bɛ nee menli mɔɔ bɛguale bɛ efiade la lile nyane, yɛɛ mɔɔ bɛzale bɛ bɛliele bɛ nwo ninyɛne bɔbɔ la, yeanvane bɛ nwo fee, ɔboalekɛ ɛnee bɛze kɛ bɛlɛ ninyɛne kpalɛ mɔɔ ɛnzɛkye ɛlɛ la wɔ ɛkɛ.
58010035	Zɔhane ati bɛmmakpo aze fee, ɔluakɛ ɛhye mɔ amuala, ahatualɛ kpole bie li ɔ nzi.
58010036	Ɔwɔ kɛ bɛnyia abotane, amaa bɛahola bɛayɛ Nyamenle ɛhulolɛdeɛ na bɛanyia ye ɛwɔkɛ ne.
58010037	Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne se, “Ɔnrɛhyɛ biala na sonla ne mɔɔ ba la ara, ɔnrɛzi aze fee.
58010038	Diedi zo yɛɛ sonla ne mɔɔ sɔ me nye la balua anyia ngoane a. Saa ɔsia ɔ nzi a, me nye ɛnrɛlie ɔ nwo.”
58010039	Yɛnle menli mɔɔ yɛsia yɛ nzi na yɛminli a. Yɛlɛ diedi, yemɔti yɛlɛ ngoane.
58011001	Diedi a le kɛ yɛkɛzi pi wɔ ninyɛne mɔɔ yɛ nye la zolɛ la anwo, na yɛkɛlie ninyɛne mɔɔ ɛnyelɛ ɛnnwu bɛ la yɛkɛdo nu kɛ bɛwɔ ɛkɛ.
58011002	Ɔluakɛ bɛ diedi ti yɛɛ mɔmoane amra dɔɔnwo mɔɔ ɛhɔ la zɔle Nyamenle anye a.
58011003	Ɔlua diedi zo yɛɛ yɛnyia ndelebɛbo kɛ Nyamenle vale ɔ nloa edwɛkɛ ala a bɔle ewiade a, na mɔɔ ɛnɛ yɛnwu ye la vi mɔɔ yɛnnwu ye la anu a rale a.
58011004	Diedi yɛɛ manle Ebulu bɔle azu kpalɛ mɔɔ sɔ ɛnyelɛ la manle Nyamenle dɛlale Keen a. Ɔlua ye diedi ti Ebulu zɔle Nyamenle anye kɛ ɔle sonla tenlene, ɔluakɛ ye ahyɛlɛdeɛ ne zɔle ɔ nye. Ebulu ɛwu bɔbɔ ɛdeɛ, noko kɛkala ɔlua ye diedi zo ɔtendɛ ɔkile yɛ.
58011005	Ɔlua ye diedi ti Yinɔko anwu; bɛvale ye anyewɔzo bɛhɔle anwuma wɔ Nyamenle anwo lɔ. Awie kpondɛle ye a, yeannwu ye, ɔluakɛ Nyamenle ɛva ye ɛhɔ anwuma lɔ. Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne kile kɛ Yinɔko zɔle Nyamenle anye kolaa na bɛava ye bɛahɔ.
58011006	Ɔyɛ se kɛ awie mɔɔ ɛnlɛ diedi la kɛhola kɛzɔ Nyamenle anye. Ɔluakɛ ɔwɔ kɛ awie mɔɔ ba Nyamenle ɛkɛ ne la die di kɛ Nyamenle wɔ ɛkɛ na ɔyila bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛkpondɛ ɔ bo zo la.
58011007	Diedi zo yɛɛ Nowa luale mɔɔ ɔdele Nyamenle kɔkɔbɔlɛ ne mɔɔ fane ninyɛne mɔɔ kenle bie bazi la anwo a. Ɔdiele Nyamenle ane na ɔbobɔle ɛlɛnemgbole ɔvale ɔliele ɔ nwo nee ye sua nu amra ngoane. Ɔluale zɛhae adenle zo ɔbule ewiade ye kɛ ɔle debie mgbane, na ɔ sa hanle Nyamenle nu fɔɔnwoyɛlɛ ne mɔɔ bɛdua diedi zo bɛ sa ka ye la.
58011008	Diedi zo yɛɛ ɔlua mɔɔ Ebileham diele Nyamenle ɛvɛlɛlɛ ne na ɔdule ɔhɔle maanle mɔɔ Nyamenle hilele ye kɛ ɔle ye ɛdeɛ la anu a. Ɔvi ye maanle ne anu ɔdule la, ɛnee ɔdaye mumua ne ɔnze ɛleka mɔɔ ɔlɛkɔ la.
58011009	Ye diedi ti, ɔdɛnlanle maanle ne mɔɔ Nyamenle vale bɔle ye ɛwɔkɛ la anu kɛ ɛyɛvolɛ. Ɔdɛnlanle ndanlɛ sua nu, kɛmɔ Ayezeke nee Gyekɔbo, mɔɔ bɛdabɛ noko bɛboka nwo a Nyamenle bɔle bɛ ɛwɔkɛ ne la yɛle la.
58011010	Ɔluakɛ ɛnee Ebileham ɛlɛkendɛ Nyamenle ɔdaye ye Suakpole ne mɔɔ yehyehyɛ, yewula ye aze na yekyekye la.
58011011	Ɔlua diedi zo yɛɛ Sɛla, mɔɔ ɛnee yeyɛ ɛrelera na yebo awolɛ zo bɔbɔ la, nrenzɛle wole a, ɔluakɛ ɔliele ɔlile kɛ Nyamenle mɔɔ bɔle ɛwɔkɛ ne la le nɔhalɛ na ɔkola ɔyɛ.
58011012	Yemɔti ɔlua sonla ko mɔɔ le Ebileham, mɔɔ ɛnee ɔle kɛ asɛɛ yewu, noko ɔtɛwole ralɛ ɛlɛ la anwo zo yɛɛ ɛnɛ nlɔnra dɔɔnwo mɔɔ le kɛ anwuma nwɔlɔra nee ɛnweazo anwea la ɛra a.
58011013	Diedi nu yɛɛ menli ɛhye mɔ amuala wule a. Bɛ sa anga ɛwɔkɛ ne mɔ mɔɔ Nyamenle bɔle bɛ la, noko bɛnwunle ye bɛ adwenle nu wɔ moa moa na bɛliele bɛdole nu kɛ bɛle nyɛvolɛ mɔɔ ɛra nlɔnu wɔ azɛlɛ ɛhye azo a.
58011014	Menli mɔɔ ka zɛhae edwɛkɛ la kile kɛ bɛlɛkpondɛ bɛ sua zo kpalɛ ne.
58011015	Bɛandwenle maanle ne mɔɔ ɛnee bɛlɛgyakyi ye bɛ nzi bɛahɔ la anwo. Saa bɛdwenlenle nwolɛ a, anrɛɛ bɛziale bɛrale.
58011016	Ɛleka mɔɔ ɛnee bɛ nwo ɛlɛdɔ ye la a le anwuma maanle kpalɛ ne. Yemɔti noko yeanyɛ Nyamenle nyiane kɛ bɛkɛvɛlɛ ye bɛ Nyamenle, ɔboalekɛ yekyekye suakpole yezie ɛkɛ ne yemaa bɛ.
58011017	Diedi a manle Ebileham, mɔɔ ɛnee Nyamenle ɛbɔ ye ɛwɔkɛ la, vale ɔ ra nrenya kokye Ayezeke kɛ ɔfa yeabɔ azu yeamaa Nyamenle wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ Nyamenle zɔle ye nleanle la.
58011018	Ɛnee Nyamenle ɛha ɛhile Ebileham kɛ, “Ɔlua Ayezeke anwo zo a ɛbanyia wɔ nlɔnra dɔɔnwo ne, kɛmɔ menvale membɔle wɔ ɛwɔkɛ la a.”
58011019	Ebileham nyianle adwenle kɛ Nyamenle kola dwazo mɔwuamra fi ewule nu, na amgba noko, Ebileham asa hanle Ayezeke vile ewule nu.
58011020	Diedi zo yɛɛ ɔlua mɔɔ Ayezeke yileyilale Gyekɔbo nee Yisɔ a.
58011021	Diedi zo yɛɛ ɔlua mɔɔ Ayezeke yileyilale Dwosefi amra ne mɔ kolaa na yeawu a. Mekɛ ne anu ɛnee yeyɛ ɛrelera kondokondo na ɔlɛ kpɔma nu yɛɛ ɔzɛlɛle Nyamenle a.
58011022	Diedi yɛɛ manle Dwosefi, mekɛ mɔɔ ɛnee ɔla ewule ɛkpa zo la, hanle kɛ Nyamenle baye Yizilayɛma avi Yigyibiti, na ɔhilele kɛ bɛzi bɛyɛ ye mbowule ne mɔ la a.
58011023	Diedi zo yɛɛ ɔlua, mɔɔ mekɛ mɔɔ bɛwole Mosisi la, ye awovolɛ vale ye veale toonwo siane nsa a. Bɛnwunle kɛ ɔ nwo yɛ fɛ, ɛhye ati bɛanzulo na bɛbulule belemgbunli ne mɛla ne azo.
58011024	Diedi zo yɛɛ ɔlua mɔɔ Mosisi dule zo la, ɔkpole kɛ bɛkɛvɛlɛ ye Yigyibiti belemgbunli ne ara raalɛ ne ara a.
58011025	Ɔhulole kɛ ɔ nee Nyamenle menli ne kɛli nyane tɛla kɛ ɔ nye kɛlie ɛtane nwo mekɛ ekyi bie a.
58011026	Ɔdwenlenle nwo kɛ saa sonla doa Kelaese ne abo zo na ɔnwu amaneɛ a, ɔle kpalɛ ɔtɛla kɛ ɔkɛnyia Yigyibiti anwonyia kɔsɔɔti a, ɔluakɛ ɛnee ɔ nye la ahyɛlɛdeɛ mɔɔ kenle bie Nyamenle bava amaa ye la azo.
58011027	Diedi zo yɛɛ ɔlua mɔɔ Mosisi anzulo belemgbunli ne ɛya mɔɔ ɔkɛva la na ɔdule ɔvile Yigyibiti a. Yeanzia ɔ nzi, ɔgyinlanle kpundii kɛ sonla mɔɔ ɛnwu Nyamenle ne mɔɔ bɛnnwu ye la.
58011028	Diedi zo yɛɛ ɔluale ɔhyehyɛle Akpabɛnwo ne na ɔmanle Yizilayɛma vale mogya kpondenle bɛ nlenkɛ nloa a, amaa saa Nyamenle Ewule Soanvolɛ ne ba a yeangu Yizilayɛma belamunli mralɛ ne mɔ.
58011029	Diedi zo yɛɛ Yizilayɛma luale mɔɔ bɛpɛle Ndɔ Nyevile ne kɛ asɛɛ bɛlua azɛlɛ resee zo la a; mɔɔ Yigyibitima yɛle kɛ bɛdabɛ noko bɛpɛ la, azule ne vale bɛ.
58011030	Diedi zo yɛɛ Yizilayɛma luale bɔle suakpole Gyɛleko bane ne mgbɔlɔka dedee kenle nsuu manle ɔgolole ɔguale a.
58011031	Diedi zo yɛɛ ɔlua mɔɔ bɛangu tuutuunli Releehabe kɛ menli anzosesebɛ ne mɔ mɔɔ kpole Nyamenle la a, ɔluakɛ ɔliele Yizilayɛma mɔɔ rale banleɛnlea maanle ne anu na bɛahɔha la azie, na ɔnleanle bɛ gyɛlɛɛnye.
58011032	Boni bieko a menga a? Ɔluakɛ saa meka kɛ mekɔ zolɛ meaha menli mɔɔ le kɛ Gedɛyɔn, Bɛlake, Samesɛn, Gyɛfeta, Devidi, Samoɛle, yɛɛ Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛma ne mɔ anwo edwɛkɛ a mekɛ kɛbɔ me. 1 Arl 2.11; 1 Sam 1.1--25.1
58011033	Bɛluale diedi zo bɛhonle na bɛlile maanle dɔɔnwo anwo zo konim. Bɛnleanle bɛmanle pɛlepɛlelilɛ yɛle gyima na bɛnyianle Nyamenle ɛwɔkɛ ne mɔ. Bɛluale diedi zo bɛhanle awenade nloa bɛdole nu,
58011034	bɛnluanle sendɔlɔra, yɛɛ bɛango bɛandɔ. Ɛnee bɛle bɛtɛɛ, noko bɛ nwo yɛle se; bɛ nwo yɛle ɛzulolɛ wɔ konle nu na bɛmanle nyɛvolɛ ɛlɔnema guale ndwɛlɛ aze.
58011035	Diedi zo yɛɛ ɔlua mɔɔ mraalɛ mɔɔ bɛ mra wule la bɛdwazole bɛ bɛrale ngoane nu a. Bie mɔ noko mɔɔ kpole ewiade ye anu fanwodi biala la, bɛyɛle bɛ asa na bɛwule, amaa Nyamenle adwazo bɛ ahɔ ngoane kpalɛ nu.
58011036	Bɛzile bie mɔ amgbu, bɛbole bɛ, yɛɛ bɛguale bie mɔ anga na bɛguale bɛ efiade.
58011037	Bɛzile bie mɔ awolɛ, bɛvale sɛlada bɛkpakyekpakyele bie mɔ anu nwiɔ nwiɔ, [bɛzɔle dɔɔnwo bɛnleanle,] bɛvale dadeɛ bɛpepɛle bie mɔ akɔme. Bɛhedale mboane nee mbɔnkye nwoma, bɛlile ehyia, bɛlile nyane, yɛɛ bɛyɛle bɛ amumuyɛ.
58011038	Ewiade anyɛ fɛ fee ammaa bɛ! Bɛluoluale nuhua kɛ nyɛvolɛ wɔ ɛsɛlɛ nee awoka zo na bɛdɛnlanle awolɛ mbɔne nee adokule nu wɔ azɛlɛ bo.
58011039	Nea duma mɔɔ menli zɛhae mɔ lua diedi zo ɛnyia ye a! Noko bɛannyia mɔɔ Nyamenle ɛva ɛbɔ ɛwɔkɛ la,
58011040	ɔboalekɛ Nyamenle ɛbɔ gyinlabelɛ kpalɛ mɔɔ ɔfa yeamaa yɛ la anwo kpɔkɛ. Ye ngyehyɛlɛ ne titile a le kɛ saa yɛboka bɛ nwo a yɛɛ bɛkɛli munli a.
58012001	Zɔhane ati, kɛmɔ yɛlɛ dasevolɛma pemgbenleamgbe ɛhye mɔ mɔɔ ɛbɔ yɛ nwo mgbɔlɔka ɛyia la, bɛmaa yɛye debie biala mɔɔ si yɛ aze, nee ɛtane mɔɔ ɛgya yɛ la ali, na yɛmia yɛ nwo kpalɛ yɛnlea ɛnriandilɛ ne mɔɔ gyi yɛ nyunlu la.
58012002	Bɛmaa yɛnlea Gyisɛse angome ala, yemɔ yɛɛ ɔli yɛ nyunlu wɔ diedi nu na ɔmaa yɛ diedi di munli a. Ɔlua anyelielɛ mɔɔ ɛnee la ɔ nyunlu la ati, yeandwenle anyiemgba ewule ne mɔɔ ɔbawu meanubaka ne azo la anwo, na kɛkala ɔde Nyamenle belemgbunli ebia ne fema zo.
58012003	Bɛdwenle ɛkpɔlɛ mɔɔ Gyisɛse nyianle ye, nee kɛ ɔzile ɔgyinlanle kpundii wɔ ɛkpɔlɛ bebelebe ne anloa, wɔ ɛtanevolɛma asa nu la anwo, na bɛmmamaa bɛ rɛle bɔ anzɛɛ bɛ gyakɛ anzi tuto.
58012004	Bɛ nee ɛtane bɛ konle ye anu, bɛtɛdwule ye kpɔmgbɔse ne mɔɔ ɛhunlɛ bɔbɔ finde nu a.
58012005	Anzɛɛ bɛ rɛle ɛvi akɛnrazilɛ edwɛkɛ ne mɔɔ Nyamenle ka kile bɛ kɛ bɛle ɔ mra la ɔ? Ɔse, “Me ra, saa Awulae tea wɔ a die ye fɛlɛko nu, yɛɛ saa ɔtwi ɛ nyunlu a mmamaa ɛ rɛle bɔ.
58012006	Ɔluakɛ Awulae tea mɔɔ ɔkulo ye la, na ɔtwi ɔ ra biala mɔɔ ɔdie ye la anyunlu.”
58012007	Bɛlie nyane biala mɔɔ kɛdo bɛ la kɛ ɔle Nyamenle Selɛ ne ndeanlɛ, na bɛ nyanenwunlɛ ne kile kɛ Nyamenle ɛlɛyɛ bɛ kɛ ɔkɛyɛ ɔ mra la. Asoo ralɛ bie wɔ ɛkɛ mɔɔ ɔ ze ɛnrɛdea ye kenle ko bɔbɔ ɛlɛ?
58012008	Saa bɛandea bɛ kɛ mralɛ ɛhendeɛ ne mɔ la a, ɛnee ɔkile kɛ bɛnle mralɛ kpalɛ, na bɛle arelazinli mralɛ.
58012009	Saa yɛ ze mɔ mɔɔ wole yɛ la tea yɛ a, yɛdi bɛ eni. Fane nyɛ yɛɛ akee yɛnrɛli yɛ sunsum nu Selɛ ne eni na yɛnrɛnyia ngoane a?
58012010	Yɛ ze mɔ mɔɔ wole yɛ la tea yɛ mekɛ ekyi bie ala, kɛmɔ bɛdabɛ bɛnea a ɔle kpalɛ la, na Nyamenle tea yɛ wɔ yɛdayɛ yɛ kpalɛ ti, amaa kenle bie yɛanyia ye nwuanzanwuanzayɛlɛ ne bie.
58012011	Kɛkala, ndeanlɛ biala ɛnyɛ fɛ, ɔyɛ nyane, noko nzinlii bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛkɛzɔ bɛ ndeanlɛ nu na bɛkɛva nu ma la sɔ ɛnyelɛ na bɛnyia anzonudwolɛ wɔ bɛ ɛbɛlabɔlɛ nu.
58012012	Zɔhane ati bɛ sa ne mɔ mɔɔ bɛyɛ bɛ dwɔlɔmgbɔɔnwo la, bɛmaa bɛ zo na bɛmiemia bɛ gyakɛ ne mɔ mɔɔ ɛtuto la anu!
58012013	Bɛlua ndenle kpalɛ nu, amaa bɛ agbɔkɛ ne mɔ mɔɔ ɛtuto la andwɔlɔdwɔlɔ, na bɛazianyizianyi.
58012014	Bɛbɔ mɔdenle kɛ bɛ nee menli kɔsɔɔti kɛdɛnla anzonudwolɛ nu na bɛmaa bɛ ɛbɛla nwo ɛde nwuanzaanwu, ɔboalekɛ mɔɔ anyɛ ye zɔhane la ɔyɛ se kɛ ɔkɛnwu Nyamenle.
58012015	Bɛnlea boɛ na bɛ bie ande anvi Nyamenle ɛlolɛ ne anwo. Bɛnlea boɛ na bɛ bie angakyi ɔ nwo “baka gyangoyi” ambɛkɛbɛka mbaka gyɛne nwo anguhu ɔ gɔnwo mɔ.
58012016	Bɛnlea boɛ na bɛ bie annyia subane ɛtane anzɛɛ anyɛ kɛ Yisɔ mɔɔ nyamenlezonlenlɛ ɛnle ye nu la ati, yeangola ɔ nwo sɔ na aleɛ ti ɔdɔnenle ye kpanyinli la.
58012017	Bɛdabɛ bɛze kɛ nzinlii, ɛnee akee ɔkpondɛ ɔ ze nyilalɛ, na ɔzunle ɔhwinle monle, noko ɔ sa anga ye, ɔluakɛ yeannwu adenle mɔɔ ɔfa zolɛ a mɔɔ yeyɛ la ɔkɛhola ɔkɛhakyi ye a.
58012018	Ɔluakɛ bɛtɛbadwule Boka Saenae azo, ɛleka mɔɔ Yizilayɛma dwule la, na bɛanwu sendɔlɔra ne, awozinli kabikabi ne nee ye kumɔɔnwo ne, nee ahumu ne,
58012019	na bɛade aweɛne tendenle ne ane yɛɛ ɛnelɛ totohyia ne, mɔɔ Yizilayɛma dele a bɛzele kɛ akee yebo zo, na bɛzɛlɛle kɛ edwɛkɛ ne ɛyɛ boɛ la.
58012020	Ɔboalekɛ ɛnee mɛla ne mɔɔ bɛvale bɛmanle bɛ kɛ, “Saa nane bɔbɔ agyakɛ tia boka ne anwo a, bɛzi ye awolɛ bɛhu ye” la, bɛngola nu sɔ.
58012021	Nɔhalɛ, ɛkɛ ne yɛle ɛzulolɛ kpalɛ, manle Mosisi bɔbɔ hanle kɛ, “Mesulo, megyinla a ɔngyinla!”
58012022	Na bɛmɛ bɛra Boka Zayɔn, wɔ tease Nyamenle ne suakpole ne mɔɔ le anwuma lɔ Gyɛlusalɛm ne, mɔɔ Nyamenle soanvolɛma apenle apenle mɔɔ bɛnze bɛ nloa la ɛyi ye tɛkɛɛ la azo.
58012023	Bɛra anyelielɛ ayia ne mɔɔ Nyamenle amra mgbanyinli ne mɔ mɔɔ bɛhɛlɛ bɛ aluma wɔ anwuma lɔ la a kɔ la bie. Bɛra Nyamenle mɔɔ le menli kɔsɔɔti ndɛnebuavolɛ la ɛkɛ, yɛɛ bɛra fɔɔnwoma mɔɔ bɛmaa bɛ sunsum ɛli munli la ɛkɛ.
58012024	Bɛra Gyisɛse, mɔɔ kyekyele Ngyekyeleɛ Fofolɛ ne abo, nee mogya ne mɔɔ bɛhwinle bɛguale na ɔtendɛ kpalɛ ɔkile yɛ ɔtɛla Ebulu ɛdeɛ ne la ɛkɛ.
58012025	Zɔhane ati, bɛnlea boɛ, na bɛamkpo kɛ bɛnrɛdie mɔɔ ɛlɛtendɛ la. Bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛkpole kɛ bɛnrɛdie mɔɔ hanle Nyamenle anloa edwɛkɛ ne hilele bɛ wɔ azɛlɛ ye azo la, anvi ɛsalɛ. Na saa akee yɛmɛ yɛkpo kɛ yɛnrɛdie mɔɔ tendɛ fi anwuma lɔ kile yɛ la a, kɛ ɔkɛyɛ na yɛavi ɛsalɛ ɛ?
58012026	Mekɛ ne anu ɔ ne manle azɛlɛ kpusule, na ɛnɛ noko yevua kɛ, “Eza mebakpusu ye bieko. Tɛ azɛlɛ ye angome, na mebakpusu anwuma noko.”
58012027	Edwɛkɛ kpɔkɛ ɛhye, “eza bieko” ne kile kɛ abɔdeɛ muala bakpusu na bɛadudu bɛ bɛavi ɛkɛ, na mɔɔ kɛhola kɛgyinla na ɔ bo andu la baha ɛkɛ.
58012028	Zɔhane ati, bɛmaa yɛyɛ Nyamenle mo kɛ yemaa yɛ belemgbunlililɛ kpalɛ mɔɔ abo ɛmkpusu ɛlɛ, na yɛva ɛzulolɛ, enililɛ yɛɛ moyɛlɛ yɛzonle ye yɛmaa ɔzɔ ɔ nye,
58012029	ɔluakɛ yɛ Nyamenle ne le sendɔlɔra.
58013001	Bɛhɔ zo bɛhulo bɛ nwo ngoko ngoko kɛ mediema mɔɔ nee Kelaese a lua la.
58013002	Bɛhakye kɛ bɛkɛlie nyɛvolɛ wɔ bɛ azua nu. Bie mɔ ɛyɛ bie zɔhane na bɛlie Nyamenle soanvolɛma wɔ bɛ azua nu mɔɔ bɛnze a.
58013003	Bɛhakye bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛgua bɛ efiade la, na bɛdwenle bɛ nwo kɛ asɛɛ bɛ nee bɛ a gua efiade ne a. Bɛhakye menli mɔɔ ɛlɛnwu amaneɛ la, na bɛdwenle bɛ nwo kɛ bɛdabɛ noko bɛlɛnwu nyane ne bie.
58013004	Ɔwɔ kɛ bɛbu agyalɛ bie kpalɛ kpalɛ, na kunli nee yelɛ di nɔhalɛ maa bɛ nwo. Nyamenle badea bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛle adwɔmane nee bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛkɛdo awuvolɛvalɛ mɛla ne la.
58013005	Bɛye ezukoa nwo anyebolo bɛvi bɛ ɛbɛla nu, na bɛmaa bɛ kunlu ɛdwo mɔɔ bɛlɛ ye la anwo. Ɔluakɛ Nyamenle ɛha ye kɛ, “Menrɛgyakyi bɛ ɛlɛ, yɛɛ me rɛle ɛnrɛvi bɛ fee.”
58013006	Zɔhane ati, yɛkola yɛsi yɛ kɛnra yɛka kɛ, “Awulae le me boavolɛ, menrɛzulo ɛhwee. Duzu yɛɛ sonla kola yɛ me a?”
58013007	Bɛhakye bɛ mgbanyima ne mɔ, mɔɔ hanle Nyamenle edwɛkɛ ne hilele bɛ la. Bɛdwenle bɛnwu kɛ bɛzile bɛbɔle bɛ ɛbɛla ne la, nee bɛ ewule nu, na bɛzukoa bɛ diedi ne mɔɔ ɛnee bɛlɛ la.
58013008	Kɛ Gyisɛse Kelaese si de anoma la, ɔle zɔhane ɛnɛ nee kenle biala.
58013009	Bɛmmamaa ngilehilelɛ ngakyile biala twe bɛ fi adenle kpalɛ ne mɔɔ bɛlua zo la azo. Ɔle kpalɛ kɛ yɛkɛmaa Nyamenle ɛlolɛ ne kɛmaa yɛ ɛkɛla nwo kɛyɛ se tɛla kɛ yɛkɛli aleɛ nwo ngyehyɛlɛ zo la, ɔluakɛ bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛlile ngyehyɛlɛ zɛhae mɔ anzi la, yeamboa bɛ.
58013010	Yɛlɛ azukponle mɔɔ bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛyɛ gyima wɔ ndanlɛ sua ne anu la ɛnlɛ adenle kɛ bɛkɛli zolɛ a.
58013011	Ɔluakɛ saa Sɛlɛvolɛ Kpanyinli ne fa nane ne mɔɔ bɛfa bɛabɔ ɛtanefakyɛ azu ne la mogya ba Nwuanzanwuanza nu Nwuanzaanwu Ɛleka ne baye ɛdɛne a, nane mumua ne, bɛyela ye wɔ nzeseɛ ne anzi lɔ.
58013012	Zɔhane ala yɛɛ Gyisɛse wule suakpole ne kandiba lɔ, amaa yeava ye mogya ne yeanrinzi menli ne ɛtane ne mɔ.
58013013	Zɔhane ati, bɛmaa yɛvinde yɛdoa ye wɔ kandiba lɔ, na ye nyiane ne ɛha yɛ muala.
58013014	Ɔluakɛ wɔ azɛlɛ ye azo, yɛnlɛ suakpole biala mɔɔ gyi ɛkɛ ne kpɔkpɔ a; yɛ nye la suakpole kpalɛ bie mɔɔ bara la ade.
58013015	Yemɔti, bɛmaa yɛva ayɛlɛyelɛ yɛlua Gyisɛse anwo zo yɛmaa Nyamenle. Ɛhye a le azubɔlɛ kpalɛ mɔɔ ɛnloanlɛ mɔɔ bɔ ye duma kɛ ɔle Awulae la kola bɔ a.
58013016	Bɛmmamaa bɛ rɛle fi kɛ bɛkɛyɛ kpalɛ na bɛkɛboa bɛ nwo ngoko ngoko, ɔboalekɛ ɛhye a le azubɔlɛ mɔɔ sɔ Nyamenle anye a.
58013017	Bɛdie bɛ mgbanyima ne mɔ na bɛli bɛ mɛla zo. Mgbanyima zɛhae mɔ a dahuu nea bɛ ɛkɛla zo a, ɔboalekɛ bɛbabu bɛ gyima nwo mgbonda bɛahile Nyamenle. Saa bɛtie bɛ nloa edwɛkɛ a, bɛdabɛ noko bɛbava fɛlɛkolilɛ bɛayɛ bɛ gyima. Saa tɛ ye zɔhane ɛdeɛ a, bɛbava nyanelilɛ a bɛayɛ a, na ɛhye noko ɛnrɛboa bɛ kpalɛ biala.
58013018	Bɛhɔ zolɛ bɛzɛlɛ bɛmaa yɛ. Yɛsi pi kɛ yɛ adwenle nu le wienyi, ɔboalekɛ yɛkpondɛ kɛ dahuu yɛyɛ mɔɔ le kpalɛ la.
58013019	Mesɛlɛ bɛ kɛ anrɛɛ bɛyɛ nzɛlɛlɛ kɛ Nyamenle kɛmaa menwɔzia menwɔra bɛ nwo lɔ bieko ndɛndɛ.
58013020	Anzonudwolɛ Nyamenle ne mɔɔ dwazole yɛ Awulae Gyisɛse, mɔɔ le Mboaneneavolɛ Kpole ne, mɔɔ luale ye ewule azubɔlɛ zo zɔle ngyekyeleɛ ne mɔɔ bɛntulu ye ɛlɛ la anloa la vile ewule nu la,
58013021	ɛmaa bɛ sa ɛha debie biala mɔɔ le kpalɛ la. Nyamenle ɛmaa bɛhola bɛyɛ mɔɔ ɔkulo la, na ɔlua Gyisɛse Kelaese anwo zo ɔva bɛ ɔyɛ gyima mɔɔ sɔ ɔ nye la. Anyunlunyia ɛha Kelaese dahuu! Amen.
58013022	Mebodo bɛ, me mediema, bɛzi abotane bɛdie akɛnrazilɛ nrɛlaleɛ ɛhye, ɔluakɛ kɛlata ɛhye mɔɔ mehɛlɛ bɛ la anwa biala.
58013023	Memaa bɛade kɛ bɛye adiema nrenya Temɔte bɛvi efiade. Saa ɔba ɛke ndɛndɛ a, me nee ye yɛbarakpɔla bɛ.
58013024	Yɛbiza bɛ mgbanyima ne nee Nyamenle menli ne mɔ amuala ahye. Mediema mɔɔ vi Yetale ɛra ɛke la se bɛbiza bɛ ahye.
58013025	Nyamenle ɛlo bɛ na ɔ nee bɛ muala ɛdɛnla! Amen.
59001001	Kɛlata ɛhye vi Gyemise, Nyamenle nee Awulae Gyisɛse Kelaese akɛlɛ ne ɛkɛ. Mebiza Nyamenle menli ne mɔɔ ɛde ɛkponde aleɛabo la amuala kɔsɔɔti ahye.
59001002	Me mediema, saa sɔnea ngakyile dɔɔnwo ba bɛ nwo zo a bɛli nwolɛ fɛlɛko;
59001003	ɔluakɛ bɛze kɛ saa bɛ diedi maa bɛkola sɔnea ɛhye mɔ anloa gyinla a ɛnee ɔkile kɛ bɛlɛ diedi nu anwosesebɛ.
59001004	Bɛzi pi wɔ anwosesebɛ ɛhye anu na bɛgyinla kpundii mɔɔ bɛmkpo aze ɛlɛ, amaa bɛali munli bɔkɔɔ mɔɔ bɛngyia debie biala anwo a.
59001005	Saa bɛ nuhua bie hyia nrɛlɛbɛ a, ɔzɛlɛ Nyamenle na ɔkɛva ɔkɛmaa ye; ɔboalekɛ Nyamenle ati akunlu le kɛnlɛma na ɔyila bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛbiza ye debie la.
59001006	Noko anrɛɛ bɛva diedi mɔɔ bɛ ti anu keseeyɛlɛ anzɛɛ kpolerazulɛ biala ɛnle nu la bɛbiza. Mɔɔ ye adwenle ɛngyinla la le kɛ nyevile sɛlɛkye mɔɔ anwoma bɔ ye kɔ ba la.
59001007	-
59001008	Sonla mɔɔ le zɛhae, mɔɔ ɛngola ɛnzi ye adwenle pi wɔ debie biala mɔɔ ɔyɛ la anwo la mmadwenle kɛ ɔkɛnyia debie ɔkɛvi Awulae ɛkɛ.
59001009	Keleseɛnenli biala mɔɔ anrɛɛ di ehyia na Nyamenle ɛmaa ye zo la ɛli fɛlɛko,
59001010	yɛɛ Keleseɛnenli biala mɔɔ le sukoavolɛ mɔɔ Nyamenle kɛha ye aze la ɛmaa ɔ nye ɛlie. Ɔluakɛ sukoavolɛma bakpolo agua kɛ ɛhoayelɛ nu ndotolo.
59001011	Sɛnzɛne ne tudu a ɔfi ye ewia wuluwulu ne ɔbɔ ndile ɔmaa ɔkyengye, ye ndotolo ne kpolo gua, na ɔminle ye kɛnlɛma ne. Zɔhane ala yɛɛ sukoavolɛ mɔɔ anye wɔ ye gyima nwo ala la baminli a.
59001012	Nyilalɛ ɛha sonla ne mɔɔ kɛgyinla kpundii wɔ sɔnea nu la, ɔboalekɛ saa ɔko ɔtɔ zolɛ a ye ahatualɛ a le ngoane ne mɔɔ Nyamenle ɛva ɛbɔ menli mɔɔ kulo ye la ɛwɔkɛ la.
59001013	Saa awie kɔ ngyegyelɛ nu a ɔmmaka kɛ, “Nyamenle ɛlɛsɔ me anlea.” Ɔluakɛ ɛtane ɛngola ɛnzɔ Nyamenle ɛnnea yɛɛ Nyamenle mumua ne ɛnzɔ awie biala ɛnnea.
59001014	Sonla ɔdaye ye atiakunluwɔzo ɛtane ne a sɔ ye nea na ɔtwe ye ɔfi Nyamenle anwo a.
59001015	Saa ye munzule atiakunluwɔzo ne nrenzɛ a ɔwo ɛtane, yɛɛ ɛtane wie nyi a ɔwie ewule.
59001016	Me mediema kulovolɛma, bɛmmamaa bɛbɛlɛbɛla bɛ!
59001017	Ɛlolɛdeɛ kpalɛ biala nee ahyɛlɛdeɛ biala mɔɔ di munli la vi anwuma; ɔvi Nyamenle Selɛ ne mɔɔ bɔle anwuma ahɛnlaneɛ ne mɔ la ɛkɛ a ɔba a. Nyamenle ɛnli ngakyile, anzɛɛ ɔmboa ɔngakyi wienyi awozinli.
59001018	Ɔdaye ye ɛhulolɛ zo yɛɛ ɔluale nɔhalɛ edwɛkɛ ne azo ɔwole yɛ a, amaa yɛayɛ ye abɔdeɛ nu alumuama.
59001019	Mediema kulovolɛma, bɛhakye ɛhye. Ɔwɔ kɛ awie biala tie ɔ nzo anwo, ɔmmatendɛ dɔɔnwo yɛɛ ɔmmafa ɛya.
59001020	Ɛyavalɛ ɛmmaa sonla ɛnzɔ Nyamenle anye.
59001021	Yemɔti bɛvuandi subane ɛtane nee nyɛleɛ ɛtane kɔsɔɔti bɛgua na bɛdo bɛ nwo aze bɛmaa Nyamenle, bɛlie edwɛkɛ ne mɔɔ yelua ye wɔ bɛ ahonle nu la bɛdo nu, na yemɔ yɛɛ ɔkola ɔdie bɛ ngoane a.
59001022	Bɛmmabɛlɛbɛla bɛ nwo bɛyɛ mɔɔ asɛɛ bɛtie ye edwɛkɛ ne ala a; bɛyɛ mɔɔ bɛkɛde la.
59001023	Mɔɔ kɛdie edwɛkɛ ne na yeanva yeambɔ ye ɛbɛla la le kɛ sonla mɔɔ nea ɔ nyunlu wɔ neanleɛ nu la.
59001024	Ɔnea ɔ nyunlu ɔwie na ɔkɔ a ɛkɛ ne ala ɔ rɛle fi ɔdaye ye sonla holɛ mɔɔ ɔzɔho ye la.
59001025	Na awie mɔɔ neɛnlea fanwodi mɛla ne mɔɔ di munli la anu, na ɔsɔ nu dwaa ɔfa ɔbɔ ye ɛbɛla, na ɔndie ye mgbane ala ɔmmaa ɔ rɛle ɛnvi, na ɔyɛ gyima mɔɔ ɔwɔ kɛ ɔyɛ la, yemɔ yɛɛ Nyamenle kɛyila ye wɔ ye ɛbɛlabɔlɛ nu a.
59001026	Saa awie dwenle kɛ ɔsonle Nyamenle na ɔmmua ɔ nloa azo a, ye Nyamenlezonlenlɛ ne le mgbane, na ɔbɛlɛbɛla ɔdaye ye ɛkɛla.
59001027	Nyamenlezonlenlɛ kpalɛ mɔɔ evinli biala ɛnle nwolɛ wɔ Nyamenle Selɛ ne anyunlu la a le kɛ ɛkɛkpɔla nrisa nee ahunlanvolɛ wɔ bɛ anwongyelelɛ nu, ɛkɛboa bɛ na ɛkɛzie ɛ nwo gyɛlɛɛnye mɔɔ ewiade amra ɛnnyia ɛ nwo ngehanleɛ biala la.
59002001	Me mediema, kɛmɔ bɛlɛ diedi wɔ yɛ Awulae Gyisɛse Kelaese, mɔɔ le anyunlunyia Awulae ne la anu la ati, bɛmmanea sonla nyunlu na bɛabu ye bie.
59002002	Saa ngyengyene nu bie sukoavolɛ mɔɔ ezukoa nvutuke mgbɔdelera gua ɔ sa na ɔheda ɛdakpa la ba bɛ nyianu ne bie, na ehyianli mɔɔ heda ɛdanlɛ mgbane bie la ɔdaye noko ɔba bie, na
59002003	saa bɛkile anyenzɔlɛ bɛmaa mɔɔ heda ɛdanlɛ kɛnlɛma ne la, na bɛse ye kɛ, “Mesɛlɛ wɔ, tɛnla ebia kpalɛ ɛhye azo.” na bɛse ehyianli ne kɛ, “Gyinla nehane, anzɛɛ tɛnla aze wɔ me gyakɛ abo ɛke” a,
59002004	ɛnee bɛdi ngilehilenu nwo fɔlɛ na bɛlua adwenle ɛtane zo bɛbua ndɛne mɔɔ ɛngɔ adenle nu a.
59002005	Me mediema kulovolɛma, bɛdie! Bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛle ehyianvolɛma wɔ aleɛabo la, bɛmɛ a Nyamenle ɛkpa nu ɛye bɛ, ɛyɛ bɛ diedi nu sukoavolɛma na bɛnyia Nyamenle belemgbunlililɛ ne, mɔɔ yeva yebɔ ɛwɔkɛ yemaa bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛkulo ye la a.
59002006	Na bɛmɛ bɛmbu ehyianvolɛma bie. Asoo tɛ sukoavolɛma a sisi bɛ na bɛtwili bɛ bɛkɔ ndɛnebuavolɛma anyunlu la?
59002007	Asoo tɛ sukoavolɛma a ka duma kpalɛ ne mɔɔ bɛfa bɛfɛlɛ bɛ la anwo edwɛkɛ ɛtane ɛtane la?
59002008	Saa bɛdi Belemgbunlililɛ ne anwo mɛla ne, mɔɔ Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne se la kɛ, “Kulo ɛ gɔnwo kɛ ɛdawɔ ɛ nwo” la azo a, ɛnee bɛlua nɔhalɛ adenle ne anu.
59002009	Na saa bɛnea sonla nyunlu na bɛabu ye bie a, ɛnee bɛyɛ ɛtane, na mɛla ne bu bɛ fɔlɛ.
59002010	Ɔluakɛ awie biala mɔɔ se ɔdi mɛla ne amuala azo na ɔkɛvo nuhua edwɛkɛ kpɔkɛ ko la ɛdo mɛla ne amuala.
59002011	Ɔluakɛ sonla ko ne ala mɔɔ hanle kɛ, “Mmafa awuvolɛ” la yɛɛ hanle kɛ, “Mmaku sonla” a. Yemɔti saa wɔanva awuvolɛ na ɛku sonla a ɛnee wɔdo mɛla.
59002012	Bɛdendɛ na bɛbɔ bɛ ɛbɛla kɛ menli mɔɔ bɛbava fanwodi mɛla ne bɛabua bɛ ndɛne la.
59002013	Sonla mɔɔ ɛnze anwunvɔne la, Nyamenle ɛnrɛze ye anwunvɔne wɔ ye ndɛnebualɛ nu; anwunvɔnezelɛ fo keda ndɛnebualɛ zo.
59002014	Me mediema, saa awie ka ye kɛ, “Melɛ diedi” na ye nyɛleɛ ɛngile zɔhane a, ɛnee duzu nvasoɛ yɛɛ ɔnyia a? Asoo ye diedi zɔhane kɛhola kɛlie ye ngoane?
59002015	Saa adiema nrenya bie anzɛɛ adiema raalɛ bie ɛnlɛ ɛdanlɛ ɛngeda yɛɛ ɔhyia aleɛ nwo,
59002016	na ɛse ye kɛ, “Nyamenle ɛyila wɔ. Ɛ nwo ɛyɛ wɔ wuluwulu na di aleɛ maa ɛ ko ɛyi” na saa wɔammaa ye ninyɛne mɔɔ hyia maa ngoane la a ɛnee duzu nvasoɛ a wɔ mɔɔ ɛka la azo a?
59002017	Zɔhane ati diedi mɔɔ gyimayɛlɛ ɛmboka nwo la le wulera.
59002018	Awie baze kɛ, “Sonla ne bie lɛ diedi yɛɛ ko noko kola yɛ gyima.” Me mualɛ a le kɛ, kile me kɛ sonla si nyia diedi mɔɔ gyimayɛlɛ ɛmboka nwo la, na medame noko menwɔva me gyimayɛlɛ menwɔhile wɔ me diedi.
59002019	Bɛdie bɛdi kɛ Nyamenle kokye a wɔ ɛkɛ a. Ɔdaye ne ala ɛne! Mbɔnsam noko die di, na ɛzulolɛ maa bɛ nwo wozo bɛ.
59002020	Kɔnwɔne! Ɛkulo kɛ bɛkile wɔ kɛ diedi mɔɔ gyimayɛlɛ ɛmboka nwo la ɛnzo ma ɔ?
59002021	Kɛ Ebileham zile zɔle Nyamenle anye ɛ? Ɔluale gyimayɛlɛ zo wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ ɔvale ɔ ra Ayezeke ɔhɔle kɛ ɔlɛ ye ɔkabɔ azu yeamaa Nyamenle la.
59002022	Ɛkola ɛnwu kɛ ye diedi nee ye gyimayɛlɛ bɔle nuhua yɛle gyima; ye gyimayɛlɛ ne manle ye diedi ne lile munli.
59002023	Ɛhye maa Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne yɛ nɔhalɛ kɛ, “Ebileham liele Nyamenle lile, na ɔlua ye diedi ti Nyamenle liele ye kɛ ɔle sonla tenlene.” Na ɔlua zolɛ bɛvɛlɛle Ebileham Nyamenle agɔnwo.
59002024	Yemɔti ɛkola ɛnwu ye kɛ sonla gyimayɛlɛ a maa ɔsɔ Nyamenle anye a, na tɛ ye diedi ngome ɔ.
59002025	Kɛ tuutuunli Releehabe ɔdaye ɔyɛle ala la ɛne. Ɔliele Dwuu soanvolɛma ne mɔɔ rale banleɛnlea maanle ne anu ahɔ la azie na ɔboale bɛ ɔmanle bɛluale adenle fofolɛ nu bɛhɔle. Ye gyima ɛhye manle ɔzɔle Nyamenle anye.
59002026	Yemɔti, kɛmɔ nwonane mɔɔ sunsum ɛnle nu la le funli la, zɔhane ala yɛɛ diedi mɔɔ gyimayɛlɛ ɛmboka nwolɛ la le wulera a.
59003001	Me mediema! Ɔnle kɛ bɛ nuhua dɔɔnwo yɛ kilehilevolɛma, ɔboalekɛ bɛze kɛ yɛmɛ kilehilevolɛma bɛbabua yɛ ndɛne fenlefenle bɛadɛla menli mɔɔ ɛha la.
59003002	Yɛ muala yɛfo wɔ ninyɛne dɔɔnwo anu. Sonla mɔɔ ɛnvo wɔ ye edwɛkɛ ɛhanlɛ nu la di munli na ɔkola ɔsɔ ɔ nwo.
59003003	Yɛfa bulalɛ yɛwula ɛkpɔnwɔ nloa anu, amaa yeadie yɛ ne, na yɛahola yɛamaa ɔ nee yɛ ahɔ ɛleka biala mɔɔ yɛkulo la.
59003004	Bɛnlea amɛle: ɔle kpole yɛɛ anwoma mɔɔ anu yɛ se la a pia ye a; noko bulalɛ ekyi bie a maa ahenle mɔɔ ka amɛle ne la kakyihakyi ɔ nye na ɔmaa ɔkɔ ɛleka biala mɔɔ ɔkulo la a.
59003005	Zɔhane ala yɛɛ ɛtafinlimalɛ de a: ɔle sonlabaka ne nvɛyeba ekyi bie, noko ɔkola ɔfa ninyɛne mgbole ɔtu ɔ nwo. Bɛdabɛ bɛnlea kɛ senle ekyi si yela, sɛkye ɛbɔ nu mbaka la.
59003006	Ɛtafinlimalɛ le senle. Ɔboa ɔle munzule ewiade ekyi kpalɛ wɔ yɛ sonlabaka ne nvɛyeba ne mɔ avinli na ɔfa ɛtane ɔsalo yɛ sonlabaka ne kpokpoti. Ɔle ɛbolɔ senle kpalɛ mɔɔ fa senle to yɛ ɛbɛlabɔlɛ nu a.
59003007	Sonla kola tete nyɛmoa mɔɔ le kɛ nane, nloma, nwɔlɛ yɛɛ nyevile nu fɛlɛ ɔmaa bɛtie ye.
59003008	Noko ɛtanfinlimalɛ ɛdeɛ sonla biala ɛngola ɛmbele ye. Ɔle munzule debie mɔɔ ewule bɔlɔ ɛyi ye tɛkɛɛ a.
59003009	Ɛtafinlimalɛ ye ala yɛɛ yɛfa yɛyɛ Awulae nee yɛ Ze Nyamenle ne mo a, yɛɛ ɔdaye ko ne ala a yɛfa yɛwa menli mɔɔ Nyamenle ɛbɔ bɛ kɛ ɔdaye ye ɛsaso la amonle a.
59003010	Ɛnloanlɛ ko ye ala anu yɛɛ nyilalɛ nee amowa vi ba a. Me mediema! Ɔnle kɛ ɔba ye zɔhane.
59003011	Nzule fɛlɛko nee nzule tondɔtondɔ ɛnvi nzubula ko anu ɛmba.
59003012	Me mediema! Feege baka ɛngola ɛnzo ɔlivi ma, yɛɛ vanye baka ɛnzo feege ma. Zɔhane ala yɛɛ nzule tondɔtondɔ ɛngola ɛngakyi nzukpa a.
59003013	Bɛ nuhua boni a ze nrɛlɛbɛ na ɔlɛ ndelebɛbo a? Bɛmaa ɔva ye ɛbɛlabɔlɛ kpalɛ ɔpɛ kilemunli ɔhile nyɛleɛ kpalɛ mɔɔ bɛfa mɛlɛbɛnwoaze nee nrɛlɛbɛ bɛyɛ la.
59003014	Na saa bɛ ahonle nu bɛle anyebolo, bɛle angomedi a, ɛnee bɛmmatu bɛ nloa anu kɛ bɛze nrɛlɛbɛ na bɛyɛ ɛtane bɛtia nɔhalɛ ne.
59003015	Nrɛlɛbɛ zɛhae ɛnvi anwuma lɔ a ba a; ɔle ewiade nrɛlɛbɛ yɛɛ Nyamenle Sunsum ɛnle sonla ne mɔɔ lɛ ye la nu; sonla zɔhane le abɔnsam.
59003016	Ɛleka mɔɔ anyebolo nee angomedi wɔ la, ɛkɛ ne yɛɛ mgbonde nee munzule ngakyile biala wɔ a.
59003017	Nrɛlɛbɛ ne mɔɔ vi anwuma lɔ la anwo te, mɔɔ lumua la ɛne. Eza ɔle anzonudwolɛ, ɔka ɔ nwo aze, ɔlɛ ndelebɛbo; anwunvɔnezelɛ ɛyi ye tɛkɛɛ yɛɛ ɔso nyɛleɛ kpalɛ biala ma. Ɔndwenle adwenle ɛtane, yɛɛ ɔmbɔ adalɛ.
59003018	Menli mɔɔ kpondɛ anzonudwolɛ na bɛdua anzonudwolɛ nu la bu tenleneyɛlɛ bɛyɔba.
59004001	Duzu a twehwe konle ba a, yɛɛ duzu a fa butule ba bɛ avinli a? Asoo tɛ bɛdabɛ bɛ angomedi atiakunluwɔzo ne mɔ a dahuu nee bɛ ko bɛ nuhua la?
59004002	Bɛkpondɛ ninyɛne bie, noko bɛnnyia bie, yemɔti bɛkuhu bɛ nwo; bɛ nye bolo ninyɛne nwo ɛsesebɛ kɛ bɛ kunlu a anrɛɛ, noko bɛnnyia bɛ ɛlɛ, yemɔti bɛdi butule na bɛko. Bɛ sa ɛnga deɛ ne mɔɔ bɛhyia nwo la, ɔluakɛ bɛmbiza Nyamenle.
59004003	Bɛbiza noko a bɛ sa ɛnga ye, ɔboalekɛ bɛnva adwenle kpalɛ bɛmbiza; bɛbiza ninyɛne mɔɔ kɛmaa bɛ ngome bɛ nye kɛlie la.
59004004	Boniayɛma! Bɛnze kɛ saa bɛ nee ewiade tila agɔnwolɛ a ɛnee bɛyɛ Nyamenle agbɔvolɛ ɔ? Sonla mɔɔ fa ewiade ye agɔnwolɛ la kile kɛ ɔle Nyamenle kpɔvolɛ.
59004005	Bɛmmadwenle kɛ mɔɔ Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne ka la le mgbane. Ɔse, “Nyamenle twe ye Sunsum ne mɔɔ yeva yewula yɛ nu la anwo nungule.”
59004006	Noko Nyamenle ɛlolɛ ne mɔɔ ɔfa ɔmaa la le kpole. Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne se, “Nyamenle bɛlɛ mɔɔ le mgbanyizonle la aze, na ɔmaa mɔɔ bɛlɛ ɔ nwo aze la zo.”
59004007	Yemɔti bɛdu bɛ nwo bɛmaa Nyamenle. Bɛmmamaa Abɔnsam adenle, na ɔvi bɛ nwo ɔbanriandi.
59004008	Bɛhwe bɛbikye Nyamenle, na ɔdaye noko ɔkɛbikye bɛ. Bɛmɛ ɛtanevolɛma, bɛhakyi bɛ subane! Bɛde bɛ ahonle nu, bɛmɛ nabalabama!
59004009	Bɛli nyane na bɛzu; bɛmaa bɛ ɛzelekɛ ɛyɛ ɛzunlɛ na bɛ fɛlɛkolilɛ ɛyɛ alɔbɔlɛ.
59004010	Bɛbɛlɛ bɛ nwo aze wɔ Awulae anyunlu, na ɔkɛmaa bɛ zo.
59004011	Mediema Keleseɛnema, bɛmmakeha bɛ gɔnwo mɔ anwo edwɛkɛ ɛtane ɛtane. Mɔɔ ka ɔ diema anwo edwɛkɛ ɛtane anzɛɛ bua ye ndɛne la tia mɛla ne na eza ɔbua mɛla ne ndɛne. Na saa ɛbua mɛla ne ndɛne a, ɛnee ɔkile kɛ ɛnli mɛla ne azo bieko, na ɛle ye ndɛnebuavolɛ.
59004012	Nyamenle angomekye a kola die ngoane na ɔkola ɔsɛkye ye a. Yemɔ ala a ɔmaa mɛla na ɔle ndɛnebuavolɛ a. Na wɔmɔ, ɛdawɔ a le nwane, mɔɔ ɛbua ɛ gɔnwo ndɛne a?
59004013	Bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛka kɛ, “Ɛnɛ anzɛɛ ɛhyema yɛbahɔ suakpole ɛhye anzɛɛ ɛhendeɛ ne azo, yeahɔli ɛvolɛ ko, yɛayɛ gyima yeakpondɛ ezukoa dɔɔnwo” la, bɛdie!
59004014	Bɛnze mɔɔ bazi bɛ nwo zo ɛhyema a. Bɛdabɛ mumua ne, bɛ ngoane tendenle le nyɛ? Bɛ ngoane le kɛ nwonlomɔ ɛbɔlɛ la, ɔngyɛ na yeawe na ɔ bo zo aminli.
59004015	Mɔɔ ɔwɔ kɛ bɛka la a le kɛ, “Saa ɔyɛ Awulae ɛhulolɛ na yɛde ngoane nu a, yɛbayɛ ɛhye anzɛɛ ɛhendeɛ ne.”
59004016	Na bɛmɛ, bɛmemaa bɛ nwo zo, bɛtu bɛ nloa anu; na adubɛnwo ɛhye mɔ amuala le ɛtaneyɛlɛ.
59004017	Yemɔti, sonla ne mɔɔ ze debie kpalɛ mɔɔ ɔwɔ kɛ ɔyɛ na yeanyɛ la, ɔle ɛtane ɔmaa ye.
59005001	Bɛmɛ sukoavolɛma, bɛdie! Bɛbɔ ɔ bo kɛkala bɛzu bɛye awolɛ wɔ munzule mɔɔ ɛlɛba bɛ nwo zo la ati.
59005002	Bɛ anwonyia ne ɛkpɔlɔ, yɛɛ nvɔlekɛ ɛli bɛ ndanlɛ ne mɔ.
59005003	Bɛ ezukoa nvutuke nee dwɛtɛ fufule muala ɛlɔ nrɛnlana, na bɛ nrɛnlana mɔɔ bɛlɔ la bayɛ daselɛ atia bɛ na yeali bɛ nwonane ne kɛ senle. Bɛboɔboa anwonyia nloa wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ ewiade ye ɛlɛba awieleɛ la.
59005004	Bɛtɛtuale bɛ gyimayɛvoma ne mɔ mɔɔ yɛ gyima wɔ bɛ ɛya ne mɔ anu la kakɛ. Bɛdie, bɛ ahatualɛ ne mɔɔ bɛ nye fuu bɛanva bɛammaa bɛ la ati, bɛlɛsu, yɛɛ menli mɔɔ boɔboale aleɛ nloa manle bɛ la ɛzunlɛ ne ɛdwu Tumivolɛ Awulae ne anzo nu.
59005005	Bɛ ɛbɛlabɔlɛ wɔ ewiade ye anu ɛyɛ anyelielɛ nee fɛlɛkolilɛ ngome; bɛli bɛ nwo adane, bɛyɛ mbelane kɛ nlankɛ mɔɔ bɛ mekɛ ɛdwu mɔɔ bɛ nee bɛ ɛlɛkɔ ahunleɛ la.
59005006	Bɛbua sonla mɔɔ ɛnli fɔlɛ la ewule fɔlɛ bɛku ye; noko ɔndɛ ɔ nloa anu!
59005007	Yemɔti, mediema, bɛzi abotane bɛhɔkpula Kenle ne mɔɔ Awulae kɛra la. Bɛnlea ɛyazonlɛnli ne, ɔkendɛ ɔmaa azɛlɛ ye maa ye nzoleɛ ngɛnlɛma, ɔsi abotane ɔkendɛ ɔmaa fɔsɛlɛ ne nee bokile ne tɔ zolɛ.
59005008	Bɛdabɛ noko ɔwɔ kɛ bɛsi abotane. Bɛmaa bɛ nye ɛla, ɔluakɛ Awulae ɛralɛ ne ɛbikye.
59005009	Mediema, bɛmmatendɛ bɛ gɔnwo mɔ bɛ nzo abo, amaa bɛambua bɛdabɛ noko bɛ ndɛne. Ndɛnebuavolɛ ne ɛbikye, ɔgyi bɛ nlenkɛ ne mɔ anloa.
59005010	Mediema, bɛhakye Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛma ne mɔ mɔɔ luale Awulae duma nu dendɛle la. Bɛva bɛ abotane ne mɔɔ bɛnyianle ye bɛgyinlanle kpundii wɔ nyane nu la bɛyɛ ndonwo.
59005011	Bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛgyinlanle kpundii, bɛvale abotane bɛzɔle nyane bɛhɔle awieleɛ la yɛɛ yɛka kɛ Nyamenle ɛyila bɛ a. Se bɛde Dwobu ɔdaye ye abotane ɛdeɛ ne mɔɔ ɔnyianle ɔvale ɔgyinlanle kpundii ɔzɔle ye nyane ne la anwo bie, yɛɛ eza bɛze kɛ awieleɛ ne Nyamenle zile lole ye la. Nyamenle se anwunvɔne yɛɛ ɔ kunlu yelɛyela ye.
59005012	Me mediema, mɔɔ hyia kpole kpalɛ la a le kɛ, bɛmmaka ndane hweledede; bɛmmaka anwuma anzɛɛ aze anzɛɛ debie gyɛne biala bɔbɔ. Bɛmaa bɛ “Ɛhɛe” ɛyɛ ɛhɛe, bɛ “Kyɛkyɛ” ɛyɛ kyɛkyɛ, amaa Nyamenle andea bɛ.
59005013	Bɛ nuhua bie wɔ ngyegyelɛ nu ɔ? Bɛmaa ɔzɛlɛ. Bie ɛlɛdi fɛlɛko ɔ? Bɛmaa ɔdo ayɛlɛyelɛ edwɛne.
59005014	Bɛ nuhua bie ɛnde kpɔkɛ ɔ? Bɛmaa ɔvɛlɛ asɔne mgbanyima ne mɔ na bɛzɛlɛ bɛmaa ye, na bɛkpokpa ye nwole wɔ Awulae duma nu.
59005015	Saa bɛfa diedi bɛyɛ nzɛlɛlɛ ɛhye a, wuleravolɛ ne anwo baza; Awulae badwazo ye, na saa yeyɛ ɛtane a yeava ye ɛtane yeahyɛ ye.
59005016	Yemɔti, bɛha bɛ ɛtane ne mɔ bɛhile bɛ nwo ngoko ngoko, na bɛzɛlɛ bɛmaa bɛ nwo ngoko ngoko, na bɛkɛde kpɔkɛ. Sonla tenlene biala nzɛlɛlɛ yɛ nla eza tumi wɔ nu.
59005017	Yilaegya le sonla kɛ yɛdayɛ ala la; noko ɔzɛlɛle kɛ ezule mmatɔ la, ezule andɔ azɛlɛ ye azo dedee ɛvolɛ nsa siane nsia.
59005018	Na eza ɔzɛlɛle bieko, na ezule dɔle kpole manle aleɛ bule.
59005019	Mediema, saa bɛ nuhua bie kpɔkye fi nɔhalɛ ne anwo na ɔlɛminli, na bɛ nuhua bie kɔfa ye ba a,
59005020	bɛmaa ɔhakye kɛ: sonla mɔɔ kɛlie ɛtanevolɛ kɛvi ye ɛtane nu la ɛlie ɛtanevolɛ ne ɛkɛla ɛvi ewule nu na yeheda ɛtane dɔɔnwo azo.
60001001	Kɛlata ɛhye vi medame Pita, mɔɔ mele Gyisɛse Kelaese ɛzoanvolɛ la ɛkɛ. Melɛ mekamaa Nyamenle menli ne mɔɔ yekpa nu yeye bɛ na bɛha maanɔne wɔ Pɔntɛse, Galeehyea, Kapɛdosea, Ehyea, yɛɛ Baetenea maanzinli ne mɔ anu la amuala.
60001002	Nyamenle Selɛ ne luale ye bodane ne azo kpale nu yele bɛ na ɔluale ye Sunsum ne azo ɔyɛle bɛ menli mɔɔ anwo te la, kɛ bɛyɛ tieyɛ bɛmaa Gyisɛse Kelaese na ye mogya ne ade bɛ nwo. Nyamenle ɛlo bɛ na ɔmaa bɛ anzonudwolɛ molozo.
60001003	Ayɛlɛyelɛ ɛha Nyamenle, yɛ Awulae Gyisɛse Kelaese ɔ Ze ne! Yelua ye ɛlolɛ kpole ne azo yedwazo Gyisɛse Kelaese yevi ewule nu na yemaa yɛnyia ngoane fofolɛ nwo anyelazo mɔɔ ɛnwu ɛlɛ a.
60001004	Ɔlua zolɛ yɛ nye la nyilalɛ bebelebe ne mɔɔ Nyamenle ɛva ɛzie ye menli ne la azo. Bɛmɛ bɛ ti, yeva nyilalɛ ɛhye mɔɔ ɛmkpɔlɔ, ɔnzɛkye, yɛɛ ɔndu anzɛɛ ɔmkpa la yezie anwuma lɔ yemaa bɛ.
60001005	Zɛhae nyilalɛ ne le bɛdabɛ mɔɔ ɔlua bɛ diedi ti Nyamenle tumi ne dielie bɛ gyɛlɛɛnye na bɛbaye ngoanelielɛ ne bɛahile bɛ wɔ mekɛ ne mɔɔ li amozi la ɛdeɛ.
60001006	Ɛhye ati saa yera kɛ ɔwɔ kɛ bɛdi nyane wɔ mekɛ ekyi ye anu wɔ sɔnea nee amaneɛnwunlɛ ngakyile nu a, ɔwɔ kɛ bɛdi fɛlɛko wɔ ɛhye anwo.
60001007	Ninyɛne ɛhye mɔ wɔ ɛkɛ kɛ bɛfa bɛazɔ bɛ diedi bɛanlea saa ɔgyi kpundii a. Ezukoa nvutuke bɔbɔ mɔɔ sɛkye la, bɛfa senle a bɛnea kɛ ɔle kpalɛ a; zɔhane ala yɛɛ ɔwɔ kɛ bɛ diedi ne mɔɔ hyia tɛla ezukoa nvutuke la bɛsɔ ye bɛnea a, amaa yeava ayɛlɛyelɛ, anyunlunyia, yɛɛ enililɛ yearɛlɛ bɛ wɔ Kenle ne mɔɔ Gyisɛse bara la.
60001008	Bɛtɛnwunle Gyisɛse ɛlɛ, noko bɛkulo ye. Kɛkala bɔbɔ bɛnnwu ye, noko bɛdie ye bɛdi, na ɔlua zo bɛ nye die na bɛdi fɛlɛko kpole mɔɔ ɛnloanlɛ ɛngola ɛnga a,
60001009	ɔboalekɛ bɛlua bɛ diedi mɔɔ wɔ ye nu la azo bɛlɛdie bɛ ɛkɛla ngoane.
60001010	Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛma mɔɔ hanle ɛlolɛ ɛhye mɔɔ le bɛ ɛdeɛ la anwo edwɛkɛ dole ɛkɛ ne la nleɛnleanle nu, na bɛkpondɛle ngoanelielɛ ɛhye mɔɔ Nyamenle bava amaa bɛ la anu.
60001011	Bɛbɔle mɔdenle kɛ bɛkɛnwu sonla holɛ ko ne mɔɔ bara nee mekɛ holɛ ko ne mɔɔ ɔbava yeara la. Ɛhye a le mɔɔ ɛnee Kelaese Sunsum ne mɔɔ wɔ bɛ nu la ɛlɛkilehile bɛ na ɔka nyane mɔɔ ɔwɔ kɛ Kelaese nwu ye nee anyunlunyia mɔɔ li ɔ nzi la anwo bie ɔkile bɛ a.
60001012	Nyamenle yele hilele ye kpɔmanvolɛma mɔɔ luale Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne mɔɔ bɛzoanle ye vi anwuma rale la azo bɔle Edwɛkpa ɛhye nolo hilele bɛ, kɛ tɛ bɛdabɛ kpɔmanvolɛma bɛ ti yɛɛ bɛyɛle zɔhane gyima ne a, na bɛmɛ Kelaese ɛdoavolɛma bɛ ti ɔ. Ɛhye mɔ le ninyɛne mɔɔ Nyamenle soanvolɛma akunlu a anrɛɛ bɛde ɔ bo a.
60001013	Zɔhane ati, bɛzie bɛ adwenle koonwu, bɛyɛ bɛ nye gyɛlɛmgbɛɛnye na bɛmaa bɛ nye ɛla nyilalɛ ne mɔɔ bɛbanyia ye wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ Gyisɛse Kelaese kɛra la azo.
60001014	Bɛyɛ tieyɛ bɛmaa Nyamenle na bɛmmamaa bɛ atiakunluwɔzo sie bɛ kɛ dɛba ne mɔɔ ɛnee bɛnze nwolɛ bie la.
60001015	Nyamenle ne mɔɔ ɛvɛlɛ bɛ la anwo te, yemɔti bɛmaa bɛ nwo ɛde wɔ nyɛleɛ biala anu.
60001016	Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne se, “Ɔwɔ kɛ bɛmaa bɛ nwo te, ɔboalekɛ mele nwuanzanwuanza.”
60001017	Bɛyɛ nzɛlɛlɛ a bɛfɛlɛ Nyamenle ne mɔɔ ɔnnea sonla nyunlu na ɔbua menli kɔsɔɔti ndɛne, kɛmɔ biala nyɛleɛ si de la bɛ Ze. Zɔhane ati, bɛva Nyamenlezulolɛ bɛbɔ bɛ ɛbɛla wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ bɛwɔ nlɔnu la.
60001018	Bɛdabɛ bɛze mɔɔ bɛduale ye wɔ bɛ ti na bɛahola bɛakpɔne bɛ bɛavi bɛ nlenya mɔ ɛbɛla mgbane mgbane ɛbɔlɛ ne anu la. Bɛanva debie mɔɔ ɛngyɛ na yeazɛkye, mɔɔ le kɛ ezukoa nvutuke anzɛɛ dwɛtɛ fufule,
60001019	bɛvale Gyisɛse, mɔɔ le boaneralɛ mɔɔ anwo ɛnlɛ dɛne biala la mogya ne mɔɔ sonle bolɛ la a bɛkpɔnenle bɛ a.
60001020	Nyamenle vale ye ziele ɛkɛ dɛba kolaa na bɛabɔ ewiade, yɛɛ bɛmɛ bɛ ti bɛye ye bɛhile wɔ mekɛ ye mɔɔ li amozi la anu a.
60001021	Ɔlua ɔ nwo zo yɛɛ bɛlie Nyamenle ne mɔɔ dwazole ye vile ewule nu na ɔmanle ye anyunlunyia la bɛli, na kɛkala bɛ diedi nee bɛ anyelazo ɛragyinla Nyamenle anwo zo a.
60001022	Kɛkala mɔɔ ɔlua bɛ tieyɛ wɔ nɔhalɛ ne anwo bɛde bɛ nwo bɛvi ninyɛndane nwo na bɛnyia ɛhulolɛ bɛmaa bɛ mediema diedima la, bɛmaa bɛ ɛhulolɛ ne ɛyɛ nɔhalɛ ɛhulolɛ mɔɔ vi bɛ ahonle nu a.
60001023	Ɔluakɛ bɛlua tease Ɛdɛnkɛma Nyamenle ne edwɛkɛ zo bɛwo bɛ fofolɛ kɛ bɛle mralɛ mɔɔ ɛnwu ɛlɛ la na bɛnle menli mɔɔ wu la amra.
60001024	Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne se, “Menli kɔsɔɔti le kɛ ndile, bɛ anyunlunyia le kɛ ndotolo. Ndile ne nwoso na ndotolo ne kpolo,
60001025	noko Awulae edwɛkɛ ne wɔ ɛkɛ ne dahuu.” Edwɛkɛ ɛhye a le Edwɛkpa ne mɔɔ bɛbɔle ye nolo bɛhilele bɛ la.
60002001	Zɔhane ati, bɛhwe bɛ nwo bɛvi ɛtane muala anwo; bɛmmabɔ adalɛ, bɛmmayɛ ngunzi, bɛmmatwe nungule, bɛmmayɛ aholoba.
60002002	Bɛyɛ bɛ nwo kɛ nlɔma mɔɔ sunsum nu nyɛfonzule ɛhɔne ɛlɛku bɛ la, amaa saa bɛnyia ye bɛno a bɛanyi na bɛanyia ngoane.
60002003	Ɔluakɛ Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne se, “Bɛdabɛ bɛhola bɛnwu kɛ Awulae atiakunlu le kɛnlɛma.”
60002004	Bɛrɛla Awulae ɛkɛ. Yemɔ a ɔle Tease Bolɛ ne mɔɔ ewiade amra kpole ye kɛ ɔle debie mgbane na Nyamenle noko ɛkpa nu ɛye ye kɛ ɔle bolɛ mɔɔ anwo hyia la a.
60002005	Bɛrɛla kɛ bɛle tease awolɛ na bɛmaa bɛva bɛ bɛzi sunsum nu ɛzonlenlɛ sua mɔɔ bɛsonle nu, kɛ bɛle sɛlɛvolɛma nwuanzanwuanza na bɛlua Gyisɛse Kelaese anwo zo bɛbɔ sunsum nu azu mɔɔ sɔ ɛnyelɛ la bɛmaa Nyamenle.
60002006	Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne se, “Mekpa nu meye bolɛ mɔɔ sonle bolɛ, kɛ mefa meayɛ bolɛ mɔɔ anwo hyia wɔ Zayɔn; mɔɔ kɛlie ye kɛli la anyunlu ɛnrɛgua aze ɛlɛ.”
60002007	Bolɛ ɛhye sonle bolɛ kpole kpalɛ maa bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛdie bɛdi la, na bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnlie bɛnli la, Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne se, “Bolɛ ko ne ala mɔɔ suatovoma ne kpole kɛ ɔle debie mgbane la, yemɔ ala a ɔrayɛle bolɛ mɔɔ anwo hyia kpalɛ la a.”
60002008	Eza Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne bie se, “Ɛhye le bolɛ mɔɔ bamaa menli adu koti a; ɔle bodane mɔɔ bamaa bɛadu bɛagua a.” Bɛtu koti, ɔboalekɛ bɛnlie edwɛkɛ ne bɛnli; Nyamenle ngyehyɛlɛ ne kɛ de la ɛne.
60002009	Bɛmɛ a bɛle menli mɔɔ Nyamenle ɛkpa nu ɛye bɛ a. Bɛle Belemgbunli ne sɛlɛvolɛma, maanle nwuanzanwuanza, Nyamenle ɔdaye ye menli mɔɔ yeboɔboa yekpondɛ bɛ bo zo na yevɛlɛ bɛ kɛ bɛvi awozinli nu bɛrɛla ye wienyi ne anu na bɛbɔ ye nwanwane gyima ne nolo a.
60002010	Mekɛ bie ɛnee bɛnzɔho menli bɔbɔ, na ɛnɛ bɛle Nyamenle menli. Mekɛ bie ɛnee bɛnze Nyamenle anwunvɔnezelɛ ne deɛ holɛ, na ɛnɛ bɛ sa ɛha ye anwunvɔnezelɛ ne.
60002011	Ayi mɔ, mesɛlɛ bɛ, bɛle nyɛvolɛ nee adendulɛma wɔ ewiade! Bɛmmadi nwonane atiakunluwɔzo ne mɔ mɔɔ dahuu nee bɛ ɛkɛla ko la anzi fee.
60002012	Ɔwɔ kɛ bɛmaa bɛ nyɛleɛ wɔ maanlema avinli yɛ kɛnlɛma, amaa saa bɛsi bɛ amgbu kɛ bɛnle kpalɛ bɔbɔ a, ɛnee kɛmɔ bɛnwu bɛ nyɛleɛ kpalɛ ne la ati bɛaye Nyamenle ayɛlɛ wɔ Kenle ne mɔɔ Awulae bara la.
60002013	Awulae ati bɛha bɛ nwo aze bɛmaa menli mɔɔ lɛ tumi wɔ bɛ sa nu mɔɔ le kɛ Maanle Maanle Belemgbunli ne, mɔɔ yemɔ a maanle ne anu tumi wɔ ɔ sa nu la,
60002014	nee amɛnladoma, mɔɔ le kɛ ɛzoanlɛ bie a bɛzoa bɛ kɛ bɛradea maamɔvoma, na bɛhanvo bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛdi boɛ la.
60002015	Ɔluakɛ Nyamenle ɛhulolɛ a le kɛ bɛkɛva bɛ nyɛleɛ kpalɛ ne mɔ bɛkɛmaa ahɔnwɔne kɛgyakyi mgbane mgbane ɛhehanlɛ.
60002016	Bɛdɛnla kɛ bɛdi bɛ ti anwo, noko bɛmmafa bɛ ti anwo ɛlilɛ ne bɛkedɛheda ɛtane zo. Bɛdɛnla kɛ bɛle Nyamenle ngɛkɛlɛ.
60002017	Bɛli menli kɔsɔɔti eni. Bɛhulo bɛ gɔnwo mɔ diedima. Bɛzulo Nyamenle na bɛli Maanle Maanle Belemgbunli ne eni.
60002018	Bɛmɛ ngɛkɛlɛ, bɛbɛlɛ bɛ nwo aze bɛmaa bɛ menle mɔ; bɛmmabu mɔɔ atiakunlu le kɛnlɛma la angome, na bɛbu mɔɔ ati yɛ se la noko.
60002019	Saa bɛfa Nyamenle ɛhulolɛ bɛsie bɛ nyunlu, na ɔlua yemɔti bɛnwu amaneɛ mɔɔ ɛnfɛta la, na bɛsi nwolɛ abotane a, ɔbayila bɛ.
60002020	Ɔluakɛ duzu nvasoɛ yɛɛ bɛkɛnyia ye kɛ bɛkɛyɛ ɛtane na bɛkɛnyia nwolɛ ndeanlɛ a? Na saa bɛdi boɛ la ati bɛnwu nwolɛ amaneɛ na bɛsi nwolɛ abotane a, Nyamenle bayila bɛ.
60002021	Bɛdabɛ bɛ ti Kelaese mumua ne nwunle amaneɛ vale yɛle ndonwo manle bɛ. Na ɛhye noko ala ati yɛɛ Nyamenle ɛvɛlɛ bɛ a, amaa bɛava ɔ gyakɛ.
60002022	Yeanyɛ ɛtane biala, yɛɛ yeambɔ adalɛ yeangile awie biala.
60002023	Noko mɔɔ bɛbɔ ye aholoba la, yeambɔ bɛ bie, bɛgolo ɔ nwo la, yeandɛ ɔ nloa anu; mɔɔ ɔnwu amaneɛ bɔbɔ la, yeanwunlonwunla awie, na ɔvale ye anyelazo kɔsɔɔti ɔdole Nyamenle anwo zo kɛ yemɔ a ɔle pɛlepɛle Ndɛnebuavolɛ ne a.
60002024	Kelaese ɔdaye mumua ne ɔliele yɛ ɛtane ne mɔ wɔ ye sonlabaka ne anu ɔhɔle meanubaka ne azo, amaa yɛawu yɛamaa ɛtane na yɛadɛnla yɛamaa pɛlepɛlelilɛ. Bɛlua ye ɛbodalɛ nganlɛ ne mɔ azo a bɛyɛ bɛ ayile a.
60002025	Ɛnee bɛle kɛ mboane mɔɔ ɛminli la, na kɛkala bɛva bɛ bɛzia bɛra kɛ bɛrali Mboaneneavolɛ ne nee bɛ ɛkɛla sinzavolɛ ne anzi.
60003001	Bɛmɛ nwuvolɛ mraalɛ, bɛbɛlɛ bɛ nwo aze bɛmaa bɛ hu mɔ, amaa nuhua mɔɔ ɔ hu ɛnlie Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne ɛnli la, bɛalua bɛ nyɛleɛ zo bɛahwe ye bɛarɛlɛ Nyamenle, mɔɔ ɔnrɛhyia kɛ bɛkɛha edwɛkɛ kpɔkɛ ko bɔbɔ a,
60003002	ɔboalekɛ bɛbanwu bɛ nwo enililɛ nee bɛ anwondelɛ wɔ bɛ nyɛleɛ nu.
60003003	Bɛmmafa ninyɛne mɔɔ le kɛ bɛ ti ɛyɛlɛ, mgbɔba, agudeɛ anzɛɛ ndanlɛ ngɛnlɛma ɛhedalɛ bɛsiezie bɛ nwo kɛ bɛfa bɛamaa bɛ nwo ayɛ fɛ.
60003004	Bɛmaa bɛ nyamenlezo anwofɛlɛko ne mɔɔ wɔ bɛ nu la ɛvinde. Nyamenlezo anwofɛlɛko ɛhye vea bɛ ahonle ne mɔ anu, na yemɔ a le bɛ bɛtɛɛyɛlɛ nee bɛ koonwuyɛlɛ subane ne. Ɛhye a le kɛnlɛma na ɔsɔ Nyamenle anye a.
60003005	Ɔluakɛ mraalɛ mɔɔ dule bɛ nwo manle Nyamenle wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ ɛze ɛhɔ na bɛnyianle anyelazo wɔ Nyamenle anu la adenle mɔɔ luale zolɛ zieziele bɛ nwo la a le kɛ bɛhanle bɛ nwo aze bɛmanle bɛ hu mɔ.
60003006	Ɛnee kɛ Sɛla de la ɛne; ɔyɛle tieyɛ ɔmanle ɔ hu Ebileham na ɔvɛlɛle ye ɔ menle. Kɛkala, saa bɛbɔ ɛbɛla kpalɛ na bɛammaa debie biala anwunlonwunla bɛ a, bɛle ɔ mra mraalɛ.
60003007	Zɔhane ala yɛɛ bɛmɛ mrenya noko, saa bɛ nee bɛ ye mɔ de a ɔwɔ kɛ bɛnwu ye kɛ bɛle mraalɛ na bɛnlɛ anwosesebɛ a. Yemɔti bɛli bɛ eni, ɔboalekɛ bɛ nee bɛ bɛ muala a bɛbanyia Nyamenle ngoane ɛlolɛ ahyɛlɛdeɛ ne a. Bɛyɛ ɛhye, amaa debie biala andenda bɛ gyakɛ anu wɔ bɛ nzɛlɛlɛ nu.
60003008	Awieleɛ ne, ɔwɔ kɛ bɛ muala bɛ adwenle yɛ ko; bɛde bɛ gɔnwo mɔ nyane bo na bɛhulo bɛ nwo ngoko ngoko kɛ bɛle mediema. Bɛnyia ahonle kpalɛ na bɛbɛlɛ bɛ nwo aze.
60003009	Bɛmmafa ɛtane bɛtua ɛtane kakɛ anzɛɛ bɛmmafa butule bɛyia butule. Bɛva nyilalɛ nee kosoɛ ɛyɛlɛ bɛdua ɛtane kakɛ, ɔluakɛ ɛhye ati yɛɛ Nyamenle vɛlɛle bɛ a, amaa bɛanyia nyilalɛ.
60003010	Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne se, “Awie mɔɔ kulo ngoane na ɔkpondɛ anyelielɛ la ɛgyakyi adalɛ ɛbɔlɛ nee munzule edwɛkɛ ɛhanlɛ.
60003011	Ɔwɔ kɛ ɔtwe ɔ nwo ɔfi ɛtane nwo na ɔyɛ kpalɛ; ɔwɔ kɛ ɔkpondɛ anzonudwolɛ bo zo na ɔdi ɔ nzi.
60003012	Ɔluakɛ Nyamenle anye wɔ pɛlepɛlelilɛma anwo zo, na ɔbuke ɔ nzo ɔtie bɛ nzɛlɛlɛ dahuu. Na bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛdi ɛtane la, Awulae kakyi ɔ nzi si bɛ.”
60003013	Saa bɛpele bɛdi boɛ a, nwane yɛɛ kɛhola kɛyɛ bɛ debie a?
60003014	Na saa bɛnwu amaneɛ wɔ bɛ pɛlepɛlelilɛ ti bɔbɔ a, bɛbanyia nyilalɛ. Bɛmmasulo awie biala, yɛɛ bɛmmamaa bɛ ahonle tu.
60003015	Bɛzulo Kelaese wɔ bɛ ahonle nu kɛ ɔle bɛ Awulae. Dahuu bɛziezie bɛ nwo, amaa saa awie biza bɛ bɛ anyelazo ne mɔɔ bɛlɛ ye la anwo edwɛkɛ a bɛahola bɛaye ɔ nloa,
60003016	noko anrɛɛ bɛva bɛtɛɛyɛlɛ amaa saa awie mɔ keha bɛ nwo edwɛkɛ ɛtane ɛtane a, bɛ subane kpalɛ ne, kɛmɔ bɛle Kelaese ɛdoavolɛma na bɛdi boɛ la agua menli zɔhane mɔ anyunlu aze.
60003017	Ɔluakɛ saa mɔɔ Nyamenle kpondɛ la a le kɛ yɛkɛli boɛ na yɛkɛnwu amaneɛ a, ɛnee ye zɔhane le kpalɛ, tɛla kɛ yɛkɛli ɛtane a.
60003018	Ɔluakɛ Kelaese mumua ne wule kokye wɔ awie biala ɛtane ti. Ɔle sonlakpalɛ, noko ɔwule ɔmanle ɛtanevolɛma, amaa yealie yɛ yeahɔmaa Nyamenle. Bɛhunle ye wɔ nwonane nu, noko bɛdwazole ye wɔ sunsum nu,
60003019	na wɔ sunsum ne anu yɛɛ ɔhɔle ɔhɔbɔle Edwɛkpa ne nolo ɔhilele sunsum nu amra mɔɔ bɛgua bɛ anga la a.
60003020	Sunsum ɛhye mɔ a le bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛyɛle Nyamenle anwo anzosesebɛ wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ ɛnee Nyamenle ɛlɛkendɛ abotane nu ala yeamaa Nowa abobɔ ɛlɛne ne la. Bɛdabɛ ekyi ne ala, bɛle mɔtwɛ, mɔɔ ɛnee bɛwɔ ɛlɛne ne anu wɔ azule ne anye la yɛɛ bɛliele bɛ ngoane a.
60003021	Ɛzɔnenlɛ le sɛkɛlɛneɛ mɔɔ gyi ɛkɛ maa nzule ne a. Ɔnle sonlabaka nwo evinli ɛnrinzinlɛ, ɔle Nyamenle nyunlu modolɛ kɛ ɔmaa bɛ adwenle mɔɔ anu la ɛkɛ ne wienyi la, amaa ɔlua Awulae Gyisɛse Kelaese ewudwazo ne azo bɛalie bɛ ngoane.
60003022	Yemɔ yɛɛ yehɔ anwuma na ɔde Nyamenle asa fema zo na Nyamenle soanvolɛma nee anwuma tumivolɛma nee mgbolema amuala sonle ye a.
60004001	Kɛmɔ bɛmɛ bɛ ti Kelaese nwunle amaneɛ wɔ nwonane nu la, ɔwɔ kɛ bɛdabɛ noko bɛnwu ye kɛ bɛbanwu amaneɛ; ɔboalekɛ mɔɔ kɛnwu amaneɛ wɔ nwonane nu la ɛnyɛ ɛtane bieko.
60004002	Na ɔvi mekɛ ne anu mɔɔ kɔ la, ɔmaa Nyamenle ɛhulolɛ ne dielie ye wɔ ye ɛbɛlabɔlɛ mɔɔ ɛha amozi la anu na ɔgyakyi ye atiakunluwɔzo nzi ɛlilɛ.
60004003	Bɛzɛkye bɛ mekɛ dɔɔnwo bɛyɛ mɔɔ menli mɔɔ ɛnzonle Nyamenle la yɛ la bie. Bɛbɔ adwɔmane ɛbɛla, bɛli bɛ atiakunluwɔzo mgbane mgbane nzi, nza ɛgya bɛ, bɛmaa bɛ nye die mgbane mgbane, bɛbɔ anyiemgba ɛbɛla, na bɛsonle awozonle.
60004004	Kɛkala ɔsi bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnzonle Nyamenle la anwo kɛ saa ɛnɛ bɛbɔ ɛbɛla mgbane mgbane ɛhye mɔ a bɛmɛ Kelaese ɛdoavolɛma ɛmbamboka bɛ nwo a, na ɔlua zo bɛkeha bɛ nwo edwɛkɛ ɛtane ɛtane.
60004005	Bɛdabɛ bɛ ngome bɛbabu bɛ nyɛleɛ nwo mgbonda bɛahile Nyamenle mɔɔ babua anyewɔzoamra nee mɔwuamra ndɛne la.
60004006	Ɛhye ati yɛɛ bɛbɔle Edwɛkpa ne nolo bɛhilele mɔwuamra a, amaa saa bɛlua bɛ nwonane ɛhye azo bɛbua bɛ ndɛne, kɛmɔ bɛbua awie biala la a, sunsum nu bɛadɛnla, kɛmɔ Nyamenle kpondɛ la.
60004007	Ninyɛne kɔsɔɔti awieleɛ ɛbikye. Ɛhye ati bɛzɔ bɛ nwo kpalɛ na bɛyɛ bɛ nye gyɛlɛmgbɛɛnye, na bɛahola bɛayɛ nzɛlɛlɛ.
60004008	Mɔɔ hyia kpalɛ la, bɛva bɛ ahonle muala bɛhulo bɛ nwo ngoko ngoko, ɔboalekɛ ɛhulolɛ maa bɛfa ɛtane dɔɔnwo bɛkyɛ.
60004009	Bɛmaa adenle bɛmaa bɛ mediema Kelaese ɛdoavolɛma ɛwolo bɛ mɔɔ adendɛbɛnzoabo biala ɛnle nu a.
60004010	Kɛmɔ bɛ muala bɛnea bɛ Nyamenle ahyɛlɛdeɛ ngakyile ne mɔ boɛ la, ko biala ɛva ye ɛdeɛ mɔɔ yenyia ye la ɛkpondɛ ɔ gɔnwo mɔ kpalɛ ɛyɛlɛ.
60004011	Sonla ne mɔɔ ka Nyamenle edwɛkɛ la ɛnlea ɛha Nyamenle edwɛkɛ ne; mɔɔ sonle noko la ɛva ye anwosesebɛ mɔɔ Nyamenle ɛva ɛmaa ye la amuala ɛzonle, amaa debie biala mɔɔ bɛyɛ la anu menli ava ayɛlɛyelɛ alua Gyisɛse Kelaese anwo zo amaa Nyamenle. Yemɔ yɛɛ anyunlunyia nee tumi le ye ɛdeɛ dahuu a. Amen.
60004012	Ayi mɔ, bɛmmamaa amaneɛnwunlɛ kpole mɔɔ bara bɛ nwo zo arazɔ bɛ anlea la yɛ bɛ azibɛnwo kɛ asɛɛ debie ɛzulolɛ bie ɛrado bɛ.
60004013	Bɛli fɛlɛko kɛ bɛ nee Kelaese ɛlɛnwu amaneɛ a, amaa saa bɛye ye bɛkile anyunlunyia nu a bɛali fɛlɛko kpole.
60004014	Saa Kelaese duma nu ti bɛkile bɛ nyane a, nyilalɛ ɛha bɛ, ɔluakɛ ɛhye kile kɛ anyunlunyia sunsum ne mɔɔ le Nyamenle Sunsum ne wɔ bɛ nwo zo.
60004015	Noko akee bɛmmamaa bɛ biala nwu amaneɛ kɛ ɔle kɔdiawu, awule anzɛɛ yedo mɛla anzɛɛ yeva ɔ nloa yedo awie edwɛkɛ nu.
60004016	Na saa awie le Kelaese ɛdoavolɛ la ati ɔnwu amaneɛ a, ɔmmamaa ɔyɛ ye nyiane, na ɔyɛ Nyamenle mo kɛ ɔlɛ Kelaese duma ne anu a.
60004017	Mekɛ ne ɛdwu mɔɔ ɔwɔ kɛ bɛbɔ ndɛnebualɛ ne abo a, na Nyamenle menli ne yɛɛ bɛbalumua bɛabua bɛ ndɛne a. Na saa ndɛnebualɛ ne bɔ ɔ bo wɔ yɛ nwo zo a, ɛnee kɛ ɔkɛzi ɔkɛwie ye wɔ menli mɔɔ ɛnlie Edwɛkpa ne mɔɔ vi Nyamenle ɛkɛ ne la ɛnli la anwo zo ɛ?
60004018	Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne se, “Saa ɔyɛ se ɔmaa kpalɛma kɛ bɛkɛvi ɛsalɛ a ɛnee kɛ ɛtanevolɛma mɔɔ ɛnzonle Nyamenle la kɛwie ye ɛ?”
60004019	Zɔhane ati ɔwɔ kɛ bɛdabɛ mɔɔ Nyamenle ɛhulolɛ ti bɛnwu amaneɛ la bɔ ɛbɛla kpalɛ na bɛfa bɛ nwo bɛto bɛ Bɔvolɛ ne anwo zo, ɔluakɛ ɔdi ye ɛwɔkɛ zo dahuu.
60005001	Medame, mele asɔne mgbanyima ne mɔ bie. Mele Kelaese amaneɛnwunlɛ ne anwo dasevolɛ, yɛɛ mebanyia anyunlunyia ne mɔɔ bara la bie. Yemɔti mesɛlɛ bɛdabɛ asɔne mgbanyima mɔɔ wɔ bɛ avinli la kɛ,
60005002	bɛnlea mboane ekpunli ne mɔɔ Nyamenle ɛva ɛwula bɛ sa nu la boɛ, bɛva ahunlundwolɛ bɛnlea bɛ, kɛmɔ Nyamenle kpondɛ la, na bɛmmatwenlehwenle bɛ bo aze. Bɛyɛ gyima kɛ bɛkulo kɛ bɛsonle la ati ɔ na tɛ kɛ asɛɛ bɛkpondɛ ɔ nzi ahatualɛ la ati ɔ.
60005003	Bɛmmapele kɛ bɛkile bɛ tumi wɔ menli mɔɔ bɛva bɛ bɛwula bɛ bo la anwo zo, na bɛpɛ kilemunli kpalɛ bɛmaa mboane ne ɛlua zo,
60005004	amaa saa Mboaneneavolɛ Kpanyinli ne ba a bɛanyia anyunlunyia abɔtile ne mɔɔ ye kɛnlɛma ɛmkpa anzɛɛ ɛndu ɛlɛ la.
60005005	Zɔhane ala yɛɛ ɔwɔ kɛ bɛdabɛ ngakula mɔɔ bɛwɔ asɔne ne anu la noko bu mgbanyima ne mɔ na bɛka bɛ nwo aze bɛmaa bɛ a. Bɛ muala bɛva fɛlɛko nee ɛzelekɛ bɛzonle bɛ nwo ngoko ngoko, ɔluakɛ “Nyamenle kyi mɔɔ memaa ɔ nwo zo la, na ɔyila mɔɔ bɛlɛ ɔ nwo aze la.”
60005006	Zɔhane ati, bɛbɛlɛ bɛ nwo aze wɔ Nyamenle tumi kpole ne abo, amaa saa ɔdaye ye mekɛ ne mɔɔ yehile la dwu a yeamaa bɛ zo.
60005007	Bɛva bɛ adwenleadwenle muala bɛgua ɔ nwo zo, ɔboalekɛ ɔdwenle bɛ nwo.
60005008	Bɛyɛ bɛ nye gyɛlɛmgbɛɛnye na bɛzinza! Na bɛ kpɔvolɛ ne, mɔɔ le Abɔnsam, lua nu ɛlɛkpo kɛ awenade, ɔlɛkpondɛ awie yeahye ye yeali.
60005009	Bɛzɔ bɛ diedi ne anu kpundii, bɛho bɛtia ye na bɛnwu kɛ bɛ mediema diedima mɔɔ wɔ ewiade ye anu ɛleka biala la ɛlɛnwu zɛhae amaneɛ ne bie.
60005010	Na saa bɛte nyane ne ekyii bɛwie a ɛlolɛ kɔsɔɔti Nyamenle ne, mɔɔ ɛvɛlɛ bɛ kɛ bɛ nee Kelaese ɛradɛnla ye anyunlunyia ne mɔɔ wɔ ɛkɛ ne dahuu la anu la, ɔdaye mumua ne ɔbaziezie bɛ yeamaa bɛ anwosesebɛ nee akɛnrasesebɛ, na yeamaa bɛagyinla kpundii.
60005011	Nyamenle ɛhye yɛɛ tumi ne le ye ɛdeɛ dahuu a! Amen.
60005012	Saelase (Selevanɛse) mɔɔ kɛkala Kelaese ati meva ye kɛ me diema kpalɛ kpalɛ la yɛɛ ɛboa ɛmaa mehɛlɛ bɛ kɛlata ezinraa ɛhye a. Mekulo kɛ mesi bɛ ahonle, na medi daselɛ kɛ ɛhye a le Nyamenle ɛlolɛ kpalɛ ne a. Bɛgyinla kpundii wɔ nuhua.
60005013	Bɛ mediema asɔnema mɔɔ wɔ Babelɔn, mɔɔ bɛdabɛ Nyamenle ɛkpa nu ɛye bɛ la biza bɛ ahye. Me ra Maake noko ɔdaye ɔbiza bɛ ahye.
60005014	Bɛva Kelaese ɛdoavolɛ ɛhulolɛ ne bɛyɛ bɛ nwo atuu, bɛbizebiza bɛ nwo ahye. Anzonudwolɛ ɛha bɛdabɛ kɔsɔɔti mɔɔ bɛle Kelaese ɛdeɛ la.
61001001	Kɛlata ɛhye vi medame Saemɔn Pita, mɔɔ mele Gyisɛse Kelaese akɛlɛ nee ye ɛzoanvolɛ la ɛkɛ. Melɛ mekamaa bɛdabɛ mɔɔ ɔlua Nyamenle nee Dievolɛ Gyisɛse Kelaese pɛlepɛlelilɛ ti bɛnyia diedi mɔɔ sonle bolɛ kɛ yɛdayɛ la.
61001002	Nyamenle ɛlo bɛ dɔɔnwo na ɔmaa bɛ nzo nu ɛdwo bɛ molozo kɛ bɛnwu ye nee yɛ Awulae Gyisɛse a.
61001003	Nyamenle tumi kpole ne ɛmaa yɛ debie biala mɔɔ yɛhyia nwo wɔ yɛ ɛbɛla kpalɛ ɛbɔlɛ nee yɛ nyamenlezonlenlɛ nu la, ɔluakɛ yɛze mɔɔ ɛvɛlɛ yɛ kɛ yɛ nee ye ɛradɛnla ye anyunlunyia ne nee ye kpalɛyɛlɛ ne anu la.
61001004	Ɔlua zo yebɔ yɛ ɛwɔkɛ mgbole dɔɔnwo mɔɔ sonle bolɛ, amaa ɔlua ɛwɔkɛ ɛhye mɔ azo bɛavi ɛtane nu wɔ ewiade ye anu, na bɛanyia ye Nyamenle su ne bie.
61001005	Ɔlua ɛhye ala ati ɔwɔ kɛ bɛbɔ mɔdenle bɛfa kpalɛyɛlɛ bɛboka bɛ diedi nwo na bɛfa deɛnwunlɛ bɛboka bɛ kpalɛyɛlɛ nwo.
61001006	Bɛva bɛ nwo zo ɛhomolɛ bɛboka bɛ deɛnwunlɛ nwo, bɛva kpundii ɛgyinlanlɛ bɛboka bɛ nwo zo ɛhomolɛ nwo, bɛva nyamenlezonlenlɛ bɛboka bɛ kpundii ɛgyinlanlɛ nwo,
61001007	bɛva mediema ɛyɛlɛ bɛboka bɛ nyamenlezonlenlɛ nwo na bɛva ɛhulolɛ bɛboka bɛ mediema ɛyɛlɛ nwo.
61001008	Ɔluakɛ saa bɛlɛ subane kpalɛ zɛhae molozo a, ɔmaa bɛ nwo kpundi bɛ na bɛyɛ nla wɔ yɛ Awulae Gyisɛse Kelaese anwo deɛnwunlɛ nu.
61001009	Ɔboalekɛ mɔɔ ɛnlɛ ɛhye mɔ la anye ɛyɛ na ɔngola ɔnnwu moa, na ɔ rɛle ɛvi kɛ bɛde ɔ nwo bɛvi ye ɛtane ne mɔ mɔɔ ɔyɛle bɛ dɛba la anwo.
61001010	Zɔhane ati, mediema, bɛbɔ mɔdenle kpalɛ kpalɛ kɛ bɛkɛmaa Nyamenle ɛvɛlɛlɛ mɔɔ yevɛlɛ bɛ nee ɛkpalɛ mɔɔ yekpa nu yeye bɛ la kɛgyinla bɛ nyunlu dahuu. Saa bɛyɛ ye zɔhane a bɛnrɛdɔ aze ɛlɛ.
61001011	Zɛhae nyɛleɛ zo ala yɛɛ bɛlua a bɛkɛnyia yɛ Awulae nee Dievolɛ Gyisɛse Kelaese belemgbunlililɛ ne mɔɔ ɛmbɔ aze ɛlɛ la a.
61001012	Zɔhane ati meyɛ me adwenle kɛ dahuu mebahakyehakye bɛ wɔ ninyɛne ɛhye mɔ anwo, noko meze kɛ bɛze bɛ dɛba na bɛ ti ɛmi nɔhalɛ ne mɔɔ bɛnyia ye la anu kpalɛ.
61001013	Menea a ɔle kpalɛ kɛ ɔwɔ kɛ mekakyehakye bɛ adwenle wɔ edwɛkɛ ɛhye mɔ anwo wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ mede ngoane ɛhye anu la.
61001014	Ɔluakɛ meze kɛ ɔnrɛhyɛ biala na meado nwonane ɛhye aze, kɛmɔ yɛ Awulae Gyisɛse Kelaese hanle hilele me la.
61001015	Zɔhane ati, mebabɔ mɔdenle meanlea kɛ adenle biala anu, saa mewu mekɔ bɔbɔ a bɛkɛhakye ninyɛne ɛhye mɔ.
61001016	Yɛangyinla ngehanleɛ zo anzɛɛ sonla adwenle nzuzulɛ zo a yɛkpale yɛ Awulae Gyisɛse Kelaese tumi ne nee ye ɛralɛ bieko nwo edwɛkɛ ne anwo ɛdanlɛ yɛhilele bɛ a. Yɛdayɛ yɛnwunle ye anyunlunyia kpole ne yɛ nye zo yɛɛ yɛdi nwolɛ daselɛ.
61001017	Yɛwɔ ɛkɛ ne yɛɛ Nyamenle Selɛ ne dele ɔ nyunlu, wulale ye anyunlunyia a. Yɛwɔ ɛkɛ ne yɛɛ ɛnelɛ ne vi Anyunlunyia Bedevinli ne ɛkɛ ne hanle kɛ, “Me Ra mɔɔ mekulo ye la ɛne, me nye die ɔ nwo kpole!”
61001018	Yɛdayɛ yɛdele ɛnelɛ ɛhye yɛ nzo nu kɛ ɔvi anwuma a ɔrale a, ɔluakɛ mekɛ ne anu ɛnee yɛ nee ye a wɔ boka nwuanzanwuanza ne azo a.
61001019	Ɛhye maa yɛ adwenle si pi kpalɛ wɔ edwɛkɛ mɔɔ Nyamenle Kpɔmanvolɛma hanle la anwo. Ɔhyia kɛ bɛkɛdie ye boɛ, ɔluakɛ ɔle kɛ kɛnlaneɛ mɔɔ ɛlɛta ɛleka mɔɔ le awozinli la, kɔkpula kɛ Alehyenlɛ ne kɛra na aleɛbahye edole ne kɛdu bɛ ahonle ne mɔ anu.
61001020	Mɔɔ lumua mɔɔ ɔwɔ kɛ bɛte ɔ bo la a le kɛ sonla ko biala ɛnrɛhola ɛnrɛva ɔdaye ɔ ngome ye adwenle ɛnrɛhilehile Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne mɔɔ Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛma ɛha ɛdo ɛkɛ ne la abo.
61001021	Ɔboalekɛ Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛma edwɛkɛ kpɔkɛ ko biala mɔɔ bɛhanle la ɛnvi sonla. Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne a wolole bɛ manle bɛhanle zɔhane edwɛkɛ ne mɔɔ vi Nyamenle ɛkɛ ne la a.
61002001	Mekɛ bie Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛma alane bie vindele menli ne avinli. Zɔhane ala yɛɛ kilehilevolɛma alane bavinde bɛdabɛ noko bɛ avinli a. Bɛbava adalɛ ngilehilelɛ nee awozinli nu ngehanleɛ mɔɔ sɛkye adwenle la bɛara. Yemɔti bɛbakpo Menlenlɛ ne mɔɔ liele bɛ ngoane la na bɛahwe arɛlevilɛ nu munzule bɛamaa bɛ nwo.
61002002	Menli dɔɔnwo badoa bɛ alua bɛ ɛbɛla mgbane mgbane adenle ɛhye anu, na ɔlua bɛ nyɛleɛ ti menli adendɛ ɛtane atia nɔhalɛ Adenle ne.
61002003	Bɛ anyebolo ti, kilehilevolɛma alane ɛhye mɔ bava adalɛ edwɛkɛ abɛlɛbɛla bɛ anyia bɛ nwo zo nvasoɛ. Bɛbua bɛ ndɛne dɛbadɛba, na ɔla ɛkɛ ɔlɛkendɛ bɛ. Ahenle mɔɔ bazɛkye bɛ la ɛtɛdafele.
61002004	Saa Nyamenle anvavi ye soanvolɛma ne mɔɔ vonle ye, na ɔvuandinle bɛ ɔguale hɛɛle, yemaa bɛgua bɛ nwɔnzɔnwɔnzɔ wɔ awozinli kabii ne anu, kɛ bɛhendɛ Ndɛnebualɛ Kenle ne;
61002005	saa Nyamenle anvavi ewiade dɛba ne na ɔvale azuyilɛ ɔzɛkyele ɛtane ewiade ne, na ɔgyakyile Nowa, mɔɔ bɔle Nyamenle pɛlepɛlelilɛ nwo nolo, nee menli nsuu bie;
61002006	saa Nyamenle anvavi na ɔdeanle azuamgbole Sodɔm nee Gomɔla, ɔvale senle ɔzɛkyele bɛ, ɔhilele kɛ kenle bie bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛngulo Nyamenle la kɛzi kɛwie ye la,
61002007	na ɔliele Lɔɔto mɔɔ le sonlakpalɛ na menli kpamgbanvolɛma ne vale bɛ adwɔmanebɔlɛ gyegyele ye la ɔvile nu a,
61002008	ɛnee nɔhalɛ, saa ɛnea mɔɔ sonlakpalɛ zɛhae nwunle ye na ɔdele wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ ɛnee ɔde menli zɔhane mɔ avinli, nee alehyenlɛ biala ye ɛbolɛ mɔɔ te wɔ bɛ ninyɛndane mɔɔ bɛyɛ la anwo a,
61002009	ɛnee Awulae ze kɛ ɔsi ɔdie menli kpalɛ ɔfi bɛ sɔnea nu na ɔsie amumuyɛma wɔ ndeanlɛ bo kɔkpula Ndɛnebualɛ Kenle ne a.
61002010	Bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛli bɛ atiakunluwɔzo ɛtane nzi na bɛkpo Nyamenle la kɛ bɛbawie ye la ɛne. Kilehilevolɛma alane ɛhye mɔ si bɛ kɛnra, bɛmemaa bɛ nwo zo kpalɛ, yɛɛ bɛmbu anyunlunyiama mɔɔ wɔ anwuma la na bɛtendɛ bɛtia bɛ.
61002011	Noko, Nyamenle soanvolɛma bɔbɔ, mɔɔ yɛ se, lɛ tumi tɛla kilehilevolɛma alane ɛhye mɔ la ɛnva ɛya ɛndoɔdoa bɛ ɛngile Awulae.
61002012	Menli ɛhye mɔ yɛ bɛ ninyɛne kɛ ɛbɔ nu nane mɔɔ bɛbɔle bɛ kɛ bɛhye bɛ bɛhu bɛ la. Bɛtendɛ ɛtane bɛtia debie biala mɔɔ bɛnze la, na bɛbazɛkye bɛ kɛ ɛbɔ nu nane.
61002013	Amumuyɛ mɔɔ bɛyɛ awie mɔ la, bɛbadua bɛ nwolɛ kakɛ. Bɛ anyelielɛ ala a le ewia henlema nza ɛbolɛ nee adwɔmanebɔlɛ mgbole; bɛ nwo yɛ nyiane yɛɛ ɔyɛ anyiemgba bɔbɔ kɛ bɛ nee bɛ kɛdu a. Mekɛ mɔɔ bɛ nee bɛ de ɛkponle ko anwo bɛlɛkpula bɛ sa la ɛnee bɛlɛbɛlɛbɛla bɛ.
61002014	Adwɔmanebɔlɛ ɛnzea bɛ adenle yɛɛ bɛnze ɛtane nwo nyiane nretee zɛhae. Bɛbɛlɛbɛla bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛtɛtinle sunsum nu la. Anyebolo ɛwie bɛ ku! Abule ɛbu bɛ!
61002015	Bɛgyakyi adenle kpalɛ ne na bɛminli nwɔnda; bɛva Biyɔ ara Beelam mɔɔ doale ezukoa anyebolo na ɔlile ɛtane
61002016	na bɛdeanle ye wɔ ɛtaneyɛlɛ nwo la agyakɛ. Asoaso bɔbɔ mɔɔ ɔde zolɛ la vale sonla ɛnelɛ dendɛle ye na ɔduale Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛ ne ɔmanle ɔgyakyile ye ɛzɛlɛ ninyɛne ne.
61002017	Menli ɛhye mɔ le kɛ nzubula mɔɔ ɛsesa la, bɛle kɛ nzulemungu mɔɔ ahumu ɛlɛbɔ ye ahɔ la. Nyamenle ɛzie bɛ ɛleka wɔ awozinli kabikabi ne anu.
61002018	Bɛtu bɛ nloa anu, bɛka edwɛkɛ mɔɔ nrɛlɛbɛ ɛnle nu la na bɛfa adwɔmanebɔlɛ atiakunluwɔzo bɛsɛkye bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɔ zo mɔɔ bɛlɛbɔ mɔdenle bɛanriandi bɛavi menli mɔɔ de ɛtane nu la avinli la.
61002019	Bɛfa fanwodi bɛbɔ ɛwɔkɛ, wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ bɛdabɛ mumua ne bɛle subane ɛtane nwo ahanra la. Sonla biala mɔɔ kɛmaa debie kɛvo ɔ nwo zo la le kanranli maa deɛ zɔhane.
61002020	Ɔluakɛ saa menli nwu yɛ Awulae nee Dievolɛ Kelaese Gyisɛse, na ɔlua ɔ ti bɛfi ewiade ninyɛndane nu na eza bɛsia bɛ nzi bɛmaa ninyɛne zɔhane mɔ fo bɛ nwo zo a, ɛnee noko bɛ gyakɔ; bɛbazɛkye kpalɛ wɔ awieleɛ ne bɛadɛla alumua ne.
61002021	Ɛnee noko bɔbɔ ɔle kpalɛ kɛ anrɛɛ bɛannwu pɛlepɛlelilɛ adenle ne fee, tɛla kɛ bɛkɛnwu ye na bɛkɛhakyi bɛ nzi bɛkɛzi mɛla nwuanzanwuanza ne mɔɔ bɛva bɛmaa bɛ la.
61002022	Mɔɔ si bɛ nwo zo la kile kɛ ɛrɛlɛ ne le nɔhalɛ bɔkɔɔ, “Twea fe a ɔsia ɔkɔdi”, yɛɛ “ɛbia kpolike a ɔsia ɔkɔboto ndɛtɛlɛ.”
61003001	Ayi mɔ, kɛlata mɔɔ tɔ zo nwiɔ mɔɔ melɛkɛlɛ mearɛlɛ bɛ la ɛne. Wɔ bɛ mu nwiɔ anu, mebɔ mɔdenle kɛ mekakyehakye bɛ adwenle,
61003002	amaa bɛadwenle edwɛkɛ mɔɔ Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛma nwuanzanwuanza ne mɔ ɛha ɛdo ɛkɛ ne nee Awulae Dievolɛ ne ngyehyɛlɛ mɔɔ ɛzoanvolɛma ne mɔ ɛva ɛmaa bɛ la anwo.
61003003	Mɔɔ lumua la a le kɛ, ɔwɔ kɛ bɛnyia ndelebɛbo kɛ mekɛ mɔɔ li awieleɛ la amgbuzilɛma bie mɔɔ di bɛ atiakunluwɔzo nzi la badwazo na bɛarazi bɛ amgbu. Bɛbagolo bɛ nwo,
61003004	na bɛabiza kɛ, “Se ɔbɔle ɛwɔkɛ kɛ ɔbara, na ɔwɔ nienwu? Sumunli mɔmoane mɔɔ yɛ nlenya mɔ wule la, kɛ debie biala de, ɔvi aloamɔleɛ la yɛɛ ɔde a.”
61003005	Menli zɛhae mɔ anye fuu yɛɛ bɛyɛ kɛ asɛɛ bɛnze kɛ aloa kabɔ la Nyamenle vale ɔ nloa edwɛkɛ ala a manle anwuma rale, na azɛlɛ resee ye noko yele ɔ nwo vile nzule nu rale dɛbadɛba ne, na nzule ɛbɔ ye ɛyia a,
61003006	yɛɛ eza noko nzule ye ala a yile zɛkyele ewiade dɛba ne la.
61003007	Nyamenle anloa edwɛkɛ ko ye ala azo a bɛlua bɛhua anwuma nee aze mɔɔ kɛkala wɔ ɛkɛ ne la anwo senle bɛzie ɛkɛ bɛlɛfa bɛahendɛ ndɛnebualɛ kenle ne nee menli mɔɔ ɛnze Nyamenle la ɛzɛkyelɛ a.
61003008	Na ayi mɔ, bɛmmamaa bɛ rɛle fi nɔhalɛ ko ɛhye. Awulae ɛdeɛ, kenle ko le ɔ nye zo ɛvolɛ apenle, yɛɛ ɛvolɛ apenle le ɔ nye zo kenle ko.
61003009	Tɛ kɛ Awulae ɛngola ye ɛwɔkɛ mɔɔ yebɔ la azo di, kɛmɔ bɛ bie mɔ dwenle kɛ ɔde la, na yemɔ a le kɛ Awulae lɛ bɛ nwo abotane, ɔluakɛ ɔngulo kɛ bɛsɛkye awie biala. Ɔkpondɛ kɛ awie biala nu ɔ nwo na ɔtwe ɔ nwo ɔfi ye ɛtane ne mɔ anwo.
61003010	Awulae Kenle ne bara kɛ awule la. Kenle ne, anwuma bava ɛnelɛ kpole bie aminliminli anwomanyunlu na anwumaneamra ayela aholo; na azɛlɛ ye nee debie biala mɔɔ wɔ zolɛ la bayela adɔ nzonle.
61003011	Na saa bɛbazɛkye ewiade ye amuala wɔ adenle zɛhae anu a, ɛnee bɛdabɛ bɛnea a duzu menli a ɔwɔ kɛ bɛyɛ a? Ɔwɔ kɛ bɛyɛ menli mɔɔ bɛ ɛbɛla nwo te saanwu na bɛtu bɛ nwo bɛmaa Nyamenle,
61003012	wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ bɛlɛkendɛ na bɛ nye la kɛ Nyamenle Kenle ne bara ndɛndɛ la. Kenle zɔhane anwuma bayela adɔ nzonle na ye wuluwulu ne aholo anwumaneamra amuala.
61003013	Na yɛmɛ, kɛmɔ Nyamenle ɛwɔkɛ ne kile la, yɛkendɛ anwuma fofolɛ ne nee ewiade fofolɛ ne mɔɔ pɛlepɛlelilɛ wɔ nu la.
61003014	Zɔhane ati, ayi mɔ, kɛmɔ bɛlɛkendɛ ɛhye mɔ la, bɛbɔ mɔdenle, amaa Awulae ba a yeanwu kɛ bɛ nwo te mɔɔ nvonleɛ biala ɛnle bɛ nu na bɛ nee ye bɛ nloa sɛ bɛ nwo a.
61003015	Bɛde ɔ bo kɛ yɛ Awulae abotane ne le ngoanelielɛ maa bɛ, kɛmɔ adiema Pɔɔlo ɛlua nrɛlɛbɛ mɔɔ Nyamenle ɛva ɛmaa ye la azo ɛhɛlɛ ɛrɛlɛ bɛ la.
61003016	Nɔhalɛ, ninyɛne ɛhye mɔ ala a ɔhɛlɛle bɛ nwo edwɛkɛ wɔ ye ngɛlata ne mɔ anu a. Ninyɛne bie noko mɔɔ bɛ bo ɛdelɛ ɛnla aze la wɔ ye ngɛlata ne mɔ anu. Bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛ adwenle ɛngyinla ɛleka ko na bɛnze ninyɛne ne mɔ anwo bie la kyibehyiba bɛ ɛtane ɛtane bie, kɛmɔ bɛva bɛyɛ Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne bie mɔ la. Bɛlua ɛhye azo bɛlɛsɛkye bɛ ngome bɛ nwo.
61003017	Na ayi mɔ, bɛmɛ bɛhakye bɛ ɛhye mɔ anwo bie dɛba. Yemɔti bɛnlea boɛ na kpamgbanvolɛma anva bɛ amumuyɛ andwe bɛ angɔ nvonleɛ nu, na bɛavi ɛleka kɛnlɛma ɛhye mɔɔ bɛgyi la bɛagua aze.
61003018	Bɛhɔ zolɛ bɛnyi wɔ yɛ Awulae nee Dievolɛ Gyisɛse Kelaese anwo nrɛlɛbɛ nee ɛlolɛ ne anu. Yemɔ yɛɛ anyunlunyia ɛha ye kɛkala nee mekɛ mɔɔ ɛnlɛ awieleɛ la a! Amen.
62001001	Yɛlɛkɛlɛ bɛ wɔ ngoane Edwɛkɛ ne mɔɔ mɔlebɛbo ne ɛnee ɔwɔ ɛkɛ ne na yɛde, yɛnwu ye yɛ nye zo, yɛnlea ye kpalɛ, na yɛva yɛ sa yɛha ye la anwo.
62001002	Ngoane Edwɛkɛ ɛhye lale ɔ nwo ali na yɛnwunle ye; zɔhane ati yɛdi nwolɛ daselɛ na yɛka ngoane ne mɔɔ ɛnlɛ awieleɛ mɔɔ nee Selɛ ne a wɔ ɛkɛ na ɔyele ɔhilele yɛ la anwo edwɛkɛ.
62001003	Mɔɔ yɛnwu ye nee mɔɔ yɛde la yɛɛ yɛka yɛahile bɛdabɛ noko a, amaa bɛ nee yɛ adila agɔnwolɛ. Yɛ nee Selɛ ne nee ɔ Ra Gyisɛse Kelaese a ɛdila agɔnwolɛ ɛhye a.
62001004	Yɛlɛkɛlɛ ɛhye mɔ amaa yɛ anyelielɛ ne ali munli.
62001005	Nrɛlaleɛ mɔɔ yɛde yɛvi ye ɛkɛ ne na yɛka yɛahile bɛ la a le ɛhye: Nyamenle le wienyi, awozinli fee ɛnle ye nu.
62001006	Yemɔti, saa yɛka kɛ yɛ nee Nyamenle le agɔnwolɛ, noko yɛbɔ awozinli nu ɛbɛla a, ɛnee yɛle adalɛ na yɛnli nɔhalɛ wɔ ɛdendɛlɛ nee nyɛleɛ nu.
62001007	Na saa yɛdua wienyi nu, kɛmɔ Nyamenle de wienyi nu la a, ɛnee yɛle agɔnwolɛma, na ɔ Ra Gyisɛse mogya ne mɔɔ ɔhwinle ɔguale la te yɛ nwo fi ɛtane biala anwo.
62001008	Saa yɛka kɛ yɛnyɛ ɛtane a, ɛnee yɛbɛlɛbɛla yɛ nwo, yɛɛ yɛnga nɔhalɛ.
62001009	Nyamenle di ye ɛwɔkɛ zo, ɔdi pɛlepɛle. Saa yɛka yɛ ɛtane ne mɔ yɛkile ye a, ɔkɛva ɔkɛhyɛ yɛ na ɔkɛde yɛ nwo ɔkɛvi nyɛleɛ mɔɔ ɛndenrɛ la amuala anwo.
62001010	Saa yɛka kɛ yɛtɛyɛle ɛtane a, ɛnee yɛmaa Nyamenle ɛbɔ adalɛ, yɛɛ ye edwɛkɛ ne ɛnle yɛ nu.
62002001	Me mra ngakula, melɛkɛlɛ bɛ kɛlata ɛhye, amaa bɛanyɛ ɛtane, na saa bɛ nuhua bie yɛ ɛtane a, yɛlɛ kamaavolɛ wɔ Selɛ ne anwo lɔ mɔɔ kpa yɛ ti kyɛlɛ a, yemɔ a le Gyisɛse Kelaese, mɔɔ le fɔɔnwonli ko ne.
62002002	Kelaese a le sonla mɔɔ yɛlua ɔ nwo zo mɔɔ bɛva yɛ ɛtane ne mɔ bɛhyɛ yɛ a, yɛɛ tɛ yɛ ngome, na menli mɔɔ wɔ ewiade la amuala boka nwolɛ.
62002003	Saa yɛdi ye mɛla ne mɔ azo a, ɛnee amgba yɛze ye.
62002004	Saa awie ka kɛ, “Meze Nyamenle” na ɔnli Nyamenle mɛla ne mɔ azo a, ɛnee ɔle adalɛ, yɛɛ nɔhalɛ biala ɛnle ye nu.
62002005	Sonla mɔɔ di Nyamenle edwɛkɛ ne azo la, yemɔ a le sonla ne mɔɔ Nyamenle ɛhulolɛ ne di munli wɔ ye nu la. Adenle ɛhye azo a yɛdua yɛnwu ye kpalɛ kɛ yɛ nee Nyamenle le agɔnwolɛ a.
62002006	Ɔwɔ kɛ awie biala mɔɔ nee Nyamenle le agɔnwolɛ la bɔ ye ɛbɛla kɛ Kelaese ɛdeɛ ne la.
62002007	Ayi mɔ, mengɛlɛ mɛla fofolɛ biala membɛlɛ bɛ; dɛba ko ne ala mɔɔ mɔlebɛbo ne bɛnyianle ye la a melɛ melɛbɛlɛ bɛ a. Mɛla dɛba ne a le nrɛlaleɛ ne mɔɔ bɛde ye dɛba la.
62002008	Noko akee melɛkɛlɛ mɛla fofolɛ mearɛlɛ bɛ mɔɔ le nɔhalɛ wɔ Kelaese nee bɛdabɛ noko bɛ nu a, ɔboalekɛ awozinli ne ɛlɛse, na nɔhalɛ wienyi ne ɛbɔ ɔ bo ɛlɛta.
62002009	Awie biala mɔɔ se ɔde wienyi ne anu, noko ɔkpɔ ɔ diema la, tɛte awozinli nu.
62002010	Awie biala mɔɔ kulo ɔ diema la de wienyi ne anu, yɛɛ debie biala ɛnle ye nu mɔɔ kɛmaa awie kɛdu koti a.
62002011	Awie biala mɔɔ kpɔ ɔ diema la de awozinli ne anu, na kɛmɔ ɔlua awozinli ne anu la ati, ɔnnwu ɛleka holɛ ko mɔɔ ɔlɛkɔ la, ɔluakɛ awozinli ne ɛzi ɔ nye.
62002012	Me mra ngakula, melɛkɛlɛ bɛ, ɔboalekɛ ɔlua Kelaese ati, Nyamenle ɛva bɛ ɛtane ne mɔ ɛhyɛ bɛ.
62002013	Egya mɔ, melɛkɛlɛ bɛ, ɔboalekɛ bɛze sonla ne mɔɔ mɔlebɛbo ne ɛnee ɔwɔ ɛkɛ ne la. Mgbavolɛ, melɛkɛlɛ bɛ, ɔboalekɛ bɛli Abɔnsam anwo zo konim. Me mra ngakula, melɛkɛlɛ bɛ, ɔboalekɛ bɛze Selɛ ne.
62002014	Egya mɔ, melɛkɛlɛ bɛ, ɔboalekɛ bɛze sonla ne mɔɔ mɔlebɛbo ne ɛnee ɔwɔ ɛkɛ ne la. Mgbavolɛ, melɛkɛlɛ bɛ, ɔboalekɛ bɛlɛ anwosesebɛ, yɛɛ Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne de bɛ nu, na bɛli Abɔnsam anwo zo konim.
62002015	Bɛmmakulo ewiade anzɛɛ ewiade debie biala. Awie biala mɔɔ kulo ewiade la ɛnlɛ Selɛ ne anwo ɛhulolɛ.
62002016	Ɔluakɛ ewiade ye anu debie biala mɔɔ le kɛ, nwonane nu atiakunluwɔzo, anyebolo, nee ɛbɛlabɔlɛ nu adubɛnwo la ɛnvi Selɛ ne ɛkɛ ne na ɔvi ewiade ye.
62002017	Ewiade nee nuhua atiakunluwɔzo ninyɛne ne mɔ amuala bapɛ nu aze, na sonla ne mɔɔ yɛ Nyamenle ɛhulolɛdeɛ la de aze dahuu.
62002018	Me mra ngakula, awieleɛ mekɛ ne ɛbikye! Bɛde ye dɛba kɛ Kelaese Kpɔvolɛ ne mɔɔ bayɛ ɔ nwo kɛ yemɔ a ɔle Kelaese ne la bara, na kɛkala bɔbɔ, Kelaese kpɔvolɛma dɔɔnwo ɛye bɛ nyunlu, yemɔti yɛnwu kɛ awieleɛ mekɛ ne ala ɛne.
62002019	Menli ɛhye mɔ vi yɛ nu a hɔle a, na bɛmboka yɛ nwo. Saa bɛboka yɛ nwo a, anrɛɛ bɛ nee yɛ dɛnlanle. Bɛgyakyile yɛ bɛhɔle, amaa yeala ali wienyi kɛ bɛ biala ɛmboka yɛ nwo.
62002020	Na bɛmɛ, Nwuanzanwuanza Ko ne ɛmaa bɛ ye Sunsum ne bie, bɛdabɛ bɛze debie biala.
62002021	Tɛ kɛ asɛɛ bɛnze nɔhalɛ ne la ati a melɛkɛlɛ bɛ a. Melɛkɛlɛ bɛ, ɔboalekɛ bɛze nɔhalɛ ne la ati ɔ, yɛɛ bɛze noko kɛ adalɛ biala vi nɔhalɛ ne anu ɛnvinde.
62002022	Nwane a le adalɛ ne a? Yemɔ a le sonla ne mɔɔ ka kɛ tɛ Kelaese a le Mɛzaya ne la. Sonla zɔhane a le Kelaese Kpɔvolɛ ne a. Ɔluakɛ yemɔ ɔnlie Selɛ ne nee Ralɛ ne ɔndo nu.
62002023	Awie biala mɔɔ ɛnlie Ralɛ ne ɛndo nu la ɛnlie Selɛ ne ɛndo nu, na awie biala mɔɔ die Ralɛ ne to nu la, ɛlie Selɛ ne noko ɛdo nu.
62002024	Zɔhane ati, bɛmaa mɔɔ mɔlebɛbo ne bɛdele la ɛdɛnla bɛ nu. Saa bɛmaa mɔɔ mɔlebɛbo ne bɛdele la tɛnla bɛ nu a, bɛ nee Ralɛ ne nee Selɛ ne kɛbɔ nu kɛdɛnla.
62002025	Mɔɔ Kelaese ɛva ɛbɔ yɛ ɛwɔkɛ la a le ngoane ne mɔɔ ɛnlɛ awieleɛ la.
62002026	Melɛkɛlɛ bɛ ɛhye wɔ bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛlɛbɔ mɔdenle bɛabɛlɛbɛla bɛ la anwo.
62002027	Bɛmɛ, Sunsum ne mɔɔ Kelaese ɛwola ɛgua bɛ nwo zo la tɛbɔ bɛ nwo, yemɔti bɛngyia kilehilevolɛ bieko, ɔluakɛ ye Sunsum ne bahilehile bɛ debie biala, yɛɛ ɔnle adalɛ, ɔka nɔhalɛ. Ngilehilelɛ mɔɔ yeva yemaa bɛ la bɛli zo na bɛ nee Kelaese ɛyɛ ko ɛdɛnla.
62002028	Akee me mra ngakula, bɛ nee Kelaese ɛyɛ ko ɛdɛnla, amaa saa Kenle ne dwu na ɔye ɔ nyunlu a yɛazi pi na yɛanva nyiane yɛangɔnwenwe ɛleka bie.
62002029	Bɛze kɛ Kelaese le tenlenenli, yemɔti bɛnwu ye kɛ awie biala mɔɔ yɛ debie mɔɔ tenrɛ la le ɔ ra.
62003001	Bɛnlea kɛ Selɛ ne ɛzi ɛhulo yɛ a! Ye ɛhulolɛ kpole ne ati, bɛfɛlɛ yɛ Nyamenle amra, yɛɛ nɔhalɛ nu, yɛle ɔ mra. Debie mɔɔ yemɔti ɛtane ewiade ye ɛnze yɛ la a le kɛ yeannwu Nyamenle.
62003002	Ayi mɔ, kɛkala yɛle Nyamenle amra, noko akee kɛ kenle bie yɛbazi yɛayɛ la ɛtɛdale ali. Noko yɛze kɛ mekɛ mɔɔ Kelaese bara bieko la, yɛbayɛ kɛ ɔdaye ala la, ɔluakɛ yɛbanwu ye kɛmɔ ɔde ala la.
62003003	Awie biala mɔɔ lɛ anyelazo ɛhye wɔ Kelaese anu kɛ yɛbayɛ kɛ Kelaese ala la maa ɔ nwo te kɛ Kelaese la.
62003004	Awie biala mɔɔ yɛ ɛtane la di fɔlɛ kɛ ɔto Nyamenle mɛla ne, ɔluakɛ ɛtane le mɛladonlɛ.
62003005	Bɛze kɛ Kelaese rale amaa yeaye ɛtane ne mɔ yeavi ɛkɛ. Yemɔ, ɛtane biala ɛnle ye nu.
62003006	Zɔhane ati awie mɔɔ nee Kelaese lua la ɛnyɛ ɛtane; awie biala mɔɔ yɛ ɛtane la ɛtɛnwunle Kelaese yɛɛ ɔnze ye.
62003007	Me mra ngakula, bɛmmamaa awie bɛlɛbɛla bɛ! Awie biala mɔɔ yɛ mɔɔ tenrɛ la le tenlenenli, kɛmɔ Kelaese le tenlenenli la.
62003008	Na awie biala mɔɔ yɛ ɛtane la le Abɔnsam ɛdeɛ, ɔluakɛ mɔlebɛbo ne Abɔnsam a lumuale yɛle ɛtane a. Deɛ mɔɔ yemɔti Nyamenle Ara ne rale la a le kɛ ɔbazɛkye Abɔnsam gyima biala mɔɔ yeli la.
62003009	Awie biala mɔɔ le Nyamenle ara la ɛnyɛ ɛtane, ɔluakɛ Nyamenle su ne wɔ ye nu, na kɛmɔ ɔ Ze a le Nyamenle la, ɔngola ɔnyɛ ɛtane.
62003010	Ngakyile mɔɔ wɔ bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛle Nyamenle amra nee bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛle Abɔnsam amra la avinli la ɛne: awie biala mɔɔ ɛmbɔ ɛbɛla kpalɛ anzɛɛ ɛngulo ɔ diema la ɛnle Nyamenle ara.
62003011	Nrɛlaleɛ mɔɔ mɔlebɛbo ne ala bɛdele la a le ɛhye: ɔwɔ kɛ yɛkulo yɛ nwo ngoko ngoko.
62003012	Ɔnle kɛ yɛyɛ kɛ Keen mɔɔ le Abɔnsam ara, mɔɔ hunle ɔ diema ne la. Na duzu ati a ɔhunle ye a? Ɔhunle ɔ diema ne, ɔluakɛ ɔdaye Keen ye nyɛleɛ ne mɔ ɛnle kpalɛ, na ɔ diema ne nyɛleɛ ne mɔ le fɔɔnwo.
62003013	Zɔhane ati me mediema, saa ɛtane ewiade ye ɛngulo bɛ edwɛkɛ a bɛmmamaa ɔyɛ bɛ ɛzulolɛ.
62003014	Yɛze kɛ yɛvi ewule nu yɛra ngoane nu; yɛze ɛhye, ɔluakɛ yɛkulo yɛ mediema ne mɔ. Awie biala mɔɔ ɛnlɛ ɛhulolɛ la de ewule nu.
62003015	Awie biala mɔɔ kpɔ ɔ diema la le kɔdiawu, yɛɛ bɛdabɛ noko bɛze kɛ kɔdiawu biala ɛnlɛ ngoane mɔɔ ɛnlɛ awieleɛ la wɔ ye nu.
62003016	Kɛ ɛhulolɛ de la ɛne: Kelaese dole ye ngoane aze manle yɛ, yemɔti ɔwɔ kɛ yɛdayɛ noko yɛto yɛ ngoane aze yɛmaa yɛ mediema.
62003017	Saa awie mɔɔ lɛ ewiade ye anu ninyɛne la nwu ɔ diema mɔɔ ɛhyia, na ɔye ɔ nye ɔto ɛbɔ nu a, ɛnee kɛ ɔsi ɔka kɛ ɔkulo Nyamenle ɛ?
62003018	Me mra ngakula, bɛmmamaa yɛfa edwɛkɛ ɛhanlɛ anzɛɛ yɛ nloa mgbane yɛkulo menli; ɔwɔ kɛ ɔyɛ nɔhalɛ ɛhulolɛ kpalɛ, na eza ɔfinde yɛ nyɛleɛ nu.
62003019	Ɛhye a kɛmaa yɛkɛnwu kɛ yɛlɛ nɔhalɛ ne wɔ yɛ nu, na yɛkɛzi pi wɔ Nyamenle anyunlu
62003020	mekɛ biala mɔɔ yɛ adwenle kɛbu yɛ fɔlɛ la a, ɔluakɛ Nyamenle le kpole tɛla yɛ adwenle, yɛɛ ɔze debie biala.
62003021	Ayi mɔ, saa yɛ adwenle ɛmbu yɛ fɔlɛ a, ɛnee yɛsi pi wɔ Nyamenle anyunlu.
62003022	Debie biala mɔɔ yɛkɛbiza ye la, yɛ sa ka ye, ɔluakɛ yɛdi ye mɛla ne mɔ azo na yɛyɛ mɔɔ sɔ ɔ nye la.
62003023	Ye mɛla ne a le kɛ yɛlie ɔ Ra Gyisɛse Kelaese yɛli na yɛhulo yɛ nwo ngoko ngoko, kɛmɔ Kelaese ɔdaye ɔzele yɛ la.
62003024	Awie biala mɔɔ di Nyamenle mɛla ne mɔ azo la nee Nyamenle a lua a yɛɛ Nyamenle nee ye lua. Mɔɔ maa yɛnwu kɛ Nyamenle nee yɛ lua la a le Nyamenle Sunsum ne mɔɔ Nyamenle ɛva ɛmaa yɛ la.
62004001	Ayi mɔ, bɛmmadie sunsum ne mɔ amuala bɛdi, bɛzɔ bɛ bɛnlea na bɛnwu sunsum ne mɔɔ vi Nyamenle ɛkɛ ne la. Ɔluakɛ Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛma adalɛ dɔɔnwo ɛdwazo ewiade ye anu.
62004002	Debie mɔɔ kɛmaa bɛkɛhola bɛkɛnwu kɛ sunsum ne vi Nyamenle ɛkɛ ne la a le ɛhye: sunsum biala mɔɔ ka to gua kɛ Gyisɛse Kelaese rale kɛ sonla la le Nyamenle Sunsum,
62004003	yɛɛ sunsum biala mɔɔ ɛnlie Gyisɛse ɛndo nu la ɛnle Nyamenle Sunsum. Sunsum ɛhye le Kelaese Kpɔvolɛ ne sunsum ne mɔɔ bɛdele kɛ ɔbara, na kɛkala ɔwɔ ewiade ye anu dɛbadɛba la.
62004004	Me mra ngakula, bɛmɛ bɛle Nyamenle ɛdeɛ, na bɛli Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛma adalɛ ɛhye mɔ anwo zo konim, ɔluakɛ sunsum ne mɔɔ wɔ bɛ nu la le kpole tɛla sunsum ne mɔɔ wɔ ɛtane ewiade ye amra anu la.
62004005	Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛma alane ɛhye mɔ le ɛtane ewiade ye ɛdeɛ, yemɔti bɛka ewiade ye edwɛkɛ, yɛɛ ɛtane ewiade ye tie bɛ.
62004006	Na yɛmɛ yɛle Nyamenle menli. Awie biala mɔɔ ze Nyamenle la tie yɛ, yɛɛ awie biala mɔɔ ɛnle Nyamenle ɛdeɛ la ɛndie yɛ. Ɛhye yɛɛ maa yɛnwu nɔhalɛ sunsum ne nee adalɛ sunsum ne a.
62004007	Ayi mɔ, bɛmaa yɛhulo yɛ nwo ngoko ngoko, ɔluakɛ ɛhulolɛ vi Nyamenle. Awie biala mɔɔ lɛ ɛhulolɛ la le Nyamenle ara na ɔze Nyamenle.
62004008	Awie biala mɔɔ ɛnlɛ ɛhulolɛ la ɛnze Nyamenle, ɔluakɛ Nyamenle le ɛhulolɛ.
62004009	Kɛ Nyamenle zile hilele kɛ ɔkulo yɛ la ɛne: ɔzoanle ɔ Ra kokye ne wɔ ewiade ye anu, amaa ɔlua ɔ nwo zo yɛanyia ngoane.
62004010	Ɛhulolɛ kɛ de la ɛne: tɛ yɛmɛ a yɛhulole Nyamenle a, yemɔ a ɔhulole yɛ na ɔzoanle ɔ Ra ne kɛ ɔrayɛ yɛ ɛtane ne mɔ anwo mgbɔdalɛdeɛ, amaa ɔlua ɔ nwo zo bɛava yɛ ɛtane ne mɔ bɛahyɛ yɛ.
62004011	Ayi mɔ, saa Nyamenle ɛhulo yɛ ɛhulolɛ zɛhae a, ɛnee ɔwɔ kɛ yɛdayɛ noko yɛkulo yɛ nwo ngoko ngoko.
62004012	Awie biala ɛtɛnwunle Nyamenle ɛlɛ, na saa yɛkulo yɛ nwo ngoko ngoko a, ɛnee Nyamenle de yɛ nu, na ye ɛhulolɛ ne ɛli munli wɔ yɛ nu.
62004013	Saa yɛyɛ ye zɔhane a yɛkɛnwu kɛ yɛde Nyamenle anu na ɔdaye noko ɔde yɛ nu, ɔboalekɛ yeva ɔdaye mumua ne ye Sunsum ne yemaa yɛ.
62004014	Yɛnwu ye yɛɛ yɛdi daselɛ kɛ Selɛ ne ɛzoa ɔ Ra ne kɛ yemɔ a ɔle ɛtane ewiade ye amra ngoanedievolɛ a.
62004015	Awie biala mɔɔ ka to gua kɛ Gyisɛse a le Nyamenle ara ne la, Nyamenle nee ye de, yɛɛ ɔdaye noko ɔ nee Nyamenle de.
62004016	Yɛdayɛ mumua ne yɛze, yɛɛ yɛdie yɛdi kɛ Nyamenle kulo yɛ. Nyamenle le ɛhulolɛ, yemɔti awie biala mɔɔ lɛ ɛhulolɛ la nee Nyamenle de, yɛɛ Nyamenle nee ye de.
62004017	Nyamenle maa ɛhulolɛ di munli wɔ yɛ nu, amaa yɛahola gyinla wɔ Ndɛnebualɛ Kenle ne, ɔboalekɛ kɛ Kelaese si de la, zɔhane ala yɛɛ yɛdayɛ noko yɛle wɔ ewiade ye anu a.
62004018	Ɛzulolɛ ɛnle ɛhulolɛ nu; ɛhulolɛ kpalɛ mɔɔ di munli la tu ɛzulolɛ kpokpoti. Ɔluakɛ awie biala mɔɔ lɛ ɛzulolɛ la ɛhulolɛ ɛnli munli, ɔboalekɛ ɛzulolɛ nee ndeanlɛ a lua a.
62004019	Yɛkulo Nyamenle, ɔboalekɛ ɔlumuale ɔhulole yɛ.
62004020	Saa awie ka kɛ, “Mekulo Nyamenle”, na ɔkpɔ ɔ diema a, ɛnee ɔle adalɛ, ɔluakɛ awie mɔɔ ɛngulo ɔ diema mɔɔ ɔ nye dua ye la ɛnrɛhola ɛnrɛhulo Nyamenle mɔɔ ɔtɛnwunle ye ɛlɛ la.
62004021	Mɛla ne mɔɔ Kelaese manle yɛ la kɛ se la ɛne: ɔwɔ kɛ sonla mɔɔ kulo Nyamenle la kulo ɔ diema noko.
62005001	Awie biala mɔɔ die di kɛ Gyisɛse a le Mɛzaya ne la le Nyamenle ara, yɛɛ mɔɔ kulo wovolɛ ne la kulo ɔ ra ne noko.
62005002	Saa yɛkulo Nyamenle na yɛdi ye mɛla zo a ɛnee yɛhile kɛ yɛkulo Nyamenle amra ne mɔ noko.
