62005003	Ɔluakɛ saa yɛdi Nyamenle mɛla ne mɔ azo a ɛnee yɛkulo Nyamenle, yɛɛ ye mɛla ne mɔ noko ɛnyɛ ɛnlomboɛ mɔɔ bu sonla kɔme a,
62005004	ɔluakɛ Nyamenle ara biala di ewiade anwo zo konim. Yɛ diedi mɔɔ yɛlɛ ye wɔ Nyamenle anu la azo yɛɛ yɛdua yɛdi ewiade anwo zo konim a.
62005005	Nwane a di ewiade ye anwo zo konim a? Yemɔ a le sonla ne mɔɔ die di kɛ Gyisɛse le Nyamenle Ara la.
62005006	Gyisɛse Kelaese a le mɔɔ luale ye ɛzɔnenlɛ nzule nee ye ewule mogya zo rale la. Tɛ nzule ngome a ɔluale zo a, ɔluale nzule nee mogya zo. Nyamenle Sunsum ne di daselɛ kɛ ɔle zɔhane, ɔboalekɛ Sunsum ne a le nɔhalɛ ne.
62005007	Alasevolɛ nsa a wɔ ɛkɛ a:
62005008	bɛmɛ a le Nyamenle Sunsum ne, nzule ne, nee mogya ne. Bɛmɛ nsa bɛdi daselɛ na bɛkile debie ko ne ala.
62005009	Saa yɛdie sonla daselɛ yɛto nu a, ɛnee Nyamenle daselɛlilɛ ɛdeɛ ne anu yɛ se kpalɛ, ɔluakɛ Nyamenle daselɛlilɛ ne fane ɔ Ra ne anwo.
62005010	Zɔhane ati awie biala mɔɔ die Nyamenle Ara ne di la lɛ daselɛlilɛ ne wɔ ye nu. Awie biala mɔɔ ɛnlie Nyamenle ɛnli la ɛmaa Nyamenle ɛbɔ adalɛ, ɔluakɛ yeanlie daselɛ ne mɔɔ Nyamenle ɛli ye wɔ ɔ Ra ne anwo la yeanli.
62005011	Daselɛlilɛ ne a le ɛhye: Nyamenle ɛlua ɔ Ra ne anwo zo ɛmaa yɛ ngoane mɔɔ ɛnlɛ awieleɛ la.
62005012	Awie biala mɔɔ kɛlie Ralɛ ne la lɛ ngoane, na awie biala mɔɔ anlie Nyamenle Ara ne la ɛnlɛ ngoane.
62005013	Melɛkɛlɛ ɛhye mearɛlɛ bɛ amaa bɛanwu kɛ bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛdie Nyamenle Ara ne bɛdi la bɛlɛ ngoane mɔɔ ɛnlɛ awieleɛ la.
62005014	Yɛsi pi wɔ Nyamenle anu, yɛɛ yɛdie yɛdi kɛ saa yɛdua ye ɛhulolɛ zo yɛbiza ye debie biala a ɔtie yɛ.
62005015	Na kɛmɔ yɛze kɛ yɛbiza ye debie a ɔtie yɛ la ati, eza yɛze kɛ yɛ sa ka mɔɔ yɛbiza yɛfi ye ɛkɛ ne la.
62005016	Saa awie nwu adiema bie kɛ ɔlɛyɛ ɛtane mɔɔ ɛndwe ye ɛngɔ ewule nu la a, ɔzɛlɛ ɔmaa ye na Nyamenle kɛmaa adiema ne ngoane. Noko ɛtane ne bie wɔ ɛkɛ mɔɔ wie ewule a. Menga ye kɛ awie ɛzɛlɛ ɛhye anwo.
62005017	Nyɛleɛ biala mɔɔ tɔ sinli la le ɛtane, na tɛ ɛtane ne mɔ amuala a wie ewule a.
62005018	Yɛze kɛ awie biala mɔɔ le Nyamenle ara la ɛnyɛ ɛtane, ɔluakɛ Nyamenle Ara ne fa ye sie gyɛlɛɛnye mɔɔ Abɔnsam ɛngola ɛnva ɔ sa ɛnga ye a.
62005019	Saa bɔbɔ Abɔnsam di ɛtane ewiade ye azo belemgbunli a, yɛze kɛ yɛmɛ yɛle Nyamenle menli.
62005020	Yɛze kɛ Nyamenle Ara ne ɛra na yeramaa yɛ ndelebɛbo mɔɔ yɛfa yɛnwu nɔhalɛ Nyamenle ne a. Yɛ nee nɔhalɛ Nyamenle ne nee ɔ Ra Gyisɛse Kelaese a lua a. Ɛhye a le nɔhalɛ Nyamenle ne a. Ɛhye a le ngoane ne mɔɔ ɛnlɛ awieleɛ la a.
62005021	Me mra ngakula, bɛhwe bɛ nwo bɛvi awozonle ɛzonlenlɛ nwo.
63001001	Kɛlata ɛhye vi medame Nrenya Kpanyinli ne ɛkɛ. Melɛ mekamaa Raalɛkpa ne nee ɔ mra ne mɔ. Mekulo bɛ nɔhalɛ nu kpole kpalɛ. Tɛ me ngome a mekulo bɛ a, awie biala mɔɔ ze nɔhalɛ ne la kulo bɛ,
63001002	ɔluakɛ nɔhalɛ ne de yɛ nu na ɔ nee yɛ badɛnla dahuu.
63001003	Nyamenle Selɛ ne nee Gyisɛse Kelaese, Selɛ ne Ara ne, ɛlo yɛ, ɛnwu yɛ anwunvɔne, na ɔmaa yɛ nzo nu ɛdwo yɛ dahuu wɔ nɔhalɛ nee ɛhulolɛ nu.
63001004	Ɔyɛle me fɛ kpole kɛ menwunle kɛ ɛ mra ne mɔ bie mɔ li nɔhalɛ ne anzi, kɛmɔ Nyamenle Selɛ ne zele yɛ la.
63001005	Yemɔti, Raalɛkpa, mesɛlɛ wɔ, mɔɔ meka meahile wɔ la a le kɛ bɛmaa yɛ muala yɛhulo yɛ nwo ngoko ngoko. Mengɛlɛ mɛla fofolɛ membɛlɛ bɛ, kɛ mɛla dɛba ne mɔɔ mɔlebɛbo ne yɛ sa hanle ye la ala.
63001006	Ɛhulolɛ ɛhye a le kɛ yɛkɛli Nyamenle mɛla ne mɔ azo. Mɛla ne, kɛmɔ mɔlebɛbo ne bɛ muala bɛdele la, yemɔ a le kɛ bɛkɛdɛnla ɛhulolɛ nu.
63001007	Adalɛma dɔɔnwo ɛdwazo ewiade ɛleka muala. Bɛmɛ a le menli ne mɔɔ ɛnlie ɛndo nu kɛ Gyisɛse Kelaese rale kɛ sonla ala la. Sonla zɛhae le mɛlɛbɛla na ɔle Kelaese Kpɔvolɛ.
63001008	Bɛnlea bɛ nwo boɛ na bɛamminli mɔɔ bɛvɛ nwolɛ bɛnyia ye la, amaa bɛanyia bɛ ahatualɛ ne amuala.
63001009	Awie biala mɔɔ ɛnli Kelaese ngilehilelɛ ne azo, na ɔbɔ ɛbɛla mɔɔ ɔkulo la ɛnze Nyamenle. Awie biala mɔɔ di Kelaese ngilehilelɛ zo la ɛnwu Selɛ ne nee Ralɛ ne.
63001010	Saa awie ba bɛ ɛkɛ ne na ɔngilehile mɔɔ Kelaese hilehilele la a, bɛmmadie ye bɛkɔ bɛ azua nu; bɛmmayɛ ye akoaba bɔbɔ.
63001011	Ɔluakɛ awie biala mɔɔ kɛlie ye la nee ye yɛ adwenle wɔ ye ninyɛndane ne mɔ ɛyɛlɛ nu.
63001012	Melɛ edwɛkɛ dɔɔnwo meka mekile bɛ, noko akee menrɛhulo kɛ menwɔva kɛlata nee ɛnke menwɔhɛlɛ; me nye la kɛ ɔnrɛhyɛ na meara bɛ nwo lɔ na yɛava edwɛkɛ ne mɔ yɛali adwelie, na yɛ fɛlɛkolilɛ ne ali munli.
63001013	Bɛ kulovolɛ adiema raalɛ ne amra ne mɔ biza bɛ ahye.
64001001	Kɛlata ɛhye vi medame “Nrenya Kpanyinli ne” ɛkɛ. Melɛkɛlɛ meahɔmaa me gɔnwo Gayɛse mɔɔ mekulo ye nɔhalɛ nu la.
64001002	Ayi, mesɛlɛ kɛ debie biala ɛhɔ zolɛ kpalɛ ɛmaa wɔ na ɛde kpɔkɛ kpalɛ; meze kɛ ɛte kpɔkɛ wɔ sunsum nu.
64001003	Me nye liele kpole wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ mediema ne bie mɔ rale ralile wɔ nɔhalɛlilɛ ne anwo daselɛ kɛ amgba ɛli nɔhalɛ ne anzi la. Kɛkala, ɛtɛdi nɔhalɛ ne anzi.
64001004	Debie biala ɛnyɛ me anyelielɛ ɛndɛla kɛ menwɔde kɛ me mra ne mɔ lua nɔhalɛ adenle ne anu a.
64001005	Ayi, nɔhalɛ gyima ne ala a ɛlɛdi wɔamaa mediema ne mɔ la, bɔbɔ bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛle nyɛvolɛ la.
64001006	Bɛhanvo ɛhulolɛ ne mɔɔ ɛlɛ ye la bɛhile asɔnema mɔɔ wɔ ɛke la. Mebodo wɔ, bɔ mɔdenle nea na gua bɛ adenle gyɛlɛɛnye, kɛmɔ ɛnea a ɔkɛzɔ Nyamenle anye la.
64001007	Ɔluakɛ sumunli kɛ bɛbɔle bɛ adendulɛ ne abo kɛ bɛbɔ Kelaese edwɛkɛ ne nolo la, bɛtɛdiele moalɛ biala bɛtɛfile bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnle Kelaese ɛdoavolɛma la ɛkɛ.
64001008	Ɛhye ati, ɔwɔ kɛ yɛmɛ mɔɔ yɛle Kelaese ɛdoavolɛma la yɛboa menli ɛhye mɔ, amaa yɛ nee bɛ ali nɔhalɛ ne anwo gyima ne mɔɔ bɛlɛdi la.
64001009	Mehɛlɛ asɔnema kɛlata ezinraa bie, na Dayɛtelɛfizi mɔɔ kpondɛ kɛ ɔdi bɛ kpanyinli la ɛmbu me bie.
64001010	Zɔhane ati, saa meba a menwɔye ye gyima mɔɔ yeli, yɛ nwo nzekue mɔɔ ɔbɔ nee adalɛ mɔɔ ɔbɔ ye yɛ nwo la menwɔdo gua. Yeanga ye zɔhane, saa mediema ne mɔ ba a, yemɔ a, ɔnrɛlie bɛ yɛɛ akee noko ɔndie bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛkulo kɛ bɛkɛlie bɛ la, na ɔbɔ mɔdenle kɛ ɔye zɛhae menli ne mɔ ali yeavi asɔne ne anu.
64001011	Ayi, mmasukoa ɛyɛ mɔɔ le ɛtane la, sukoa yɛ mɔɔ le kpalɛ la. Awie biala mɔɔ yɛ mɔɔ le kpalɛ la le Nyamenle ɛdeɛ, yɛɛ awie biala mɔɔ di ɛtane la ɛtɛnwunle Nyamenle.
64001012	Awie biala ka Dimiteleɛse anwo edwɛkɛ kpalɛ; nɔhalɛ ne ɔdaye ɔka ɔ nwo edwɛkɛ kpalɛ, na medame noko medi ɔ nwo daselɛ, yɛɛ ɛze noko kɛ mɔɔ meka la le nɔhalɛ.
64001013	Melɛ edwɛkɛ dɔɔnwo meka mekile wɔ, noko akee menrɛhulo kɛ menwɔva kɛlata nee ɛnke menwɔhɛlɛ.
64001014	Me nye la kɛ ɔnrɛhyɛ biala na meara ɛ nwo lɔ na yɛava edwɛkɛ ne mɔ yɛali adwelie.
64001015	Anzonudwolɛ ɛha wɔ. Agɔnwolɛma amuala biza wɔ ahye; yɛbiza yɛ gɔnwo mɔ amuala noko ahye.
65001001	Medame Dwuudu, mɔɔ mele Gyisɛse Kelaese sonvolɛ nee Gyemise adiema la yɛɛ melɛkɛlɛ kɛlata ɛhye a. Melɛ mekamaa bɛdabɛ mɔɔ Nyamenle ɛvɛlɛ bɛ, na bɛde Egya Nyamenle ne ɛhulolɛ nu na Gyisɛse Kelaese wowa bɛ la amuala.
65001002	Nyamenle ɛnwu bɛ anwunvɔne, ɔmaa bɛ anzonudwolɛ, na ɔva ɛhulolɛ ɔyi bɛ tɛkɛɛ.
65001003	Ayi mɔ, menzuzule kɛ mekɛlɛ bɛ wɔ ngoanelielɛ ne mɔɔ yɛnyia ye la anwo, na menwu kɛ ɔhyia kɛ mekɛlɛ bɛ na mesi bɛ ahonle kɛ bɛho bɛmaa diedi ne mɔɔ Nyamenle ɛva ɛmaa ye menli ne bɔkɔɔ la.
65001004	Ɔluakɛ menli bie mɔɔ ɛnze Nyamenle na bɛyɛ bɛ nzonlɛ bɛdo ɛkɛ dɛba kɛ bɛbazɛkye bɛ la ɛpe adenle bie azo ɛravea yɛ avinli. Menli ɛhye mɔ kakyi yɛ ɛlolɛ ne mɔɔ Nyamenle ɛva ɛlo yɛ mgbane la adwɔmanebɔlɛ, yɛɛ eza bɛkpo Gyisɛse Kelaese mɔɔ le yɛ Menle nee yɛ Awulae kokye la.
65001005	Bɛze ɛhye bɔkɔɔ, noko eza mekulo kɛ mekakye bɛ kɛ Awulae mɔɔ liele Yizilayɛma vile Yigyibiti azɛlɛ zo la eza nzinlii zɛkyele bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛanlie bɛanli la.
65001006	Bɛhakye kɛ Nyamenle soanvolɛma ne mɔ mɔɔ bɛangola bɛanzie bɛ ti ɛleka ko, na bɛkpole bɛ gyinlabelɛ kpalɛ ne la, Nyamenle ɛgua bɛ nwɔnzɔnwɔnzɔ mɔɔ bɛnzianyi bɛ ɛlɛ la wɔ awozinli kabikabi ne anu lɔ kɛ bɛhendɛ Ndɛnebualɛ Kenle kpole ne.
65001007	Bɛhakye Sodɔm nee Gomɔla, nee azua mɔɔ zuozua bɛ la, menli mɔɔ wɔ azua ɛhye mɔ azo la bɔle adwɔmane nee munzule ɛbɛla, na ɔlua zolɛ kɛkala bɛdea bɛ wɔ senle ne mɔɔ ɛnnu ɛlɛ la anu, amaa yeayɛ kɔkɔbɔlɛ yeamaa menli kɔsɔɔti.
65001008	Zɔhane ala yɛɛ menli ɛhye mɔ de a. Bɛyɛ bɛ nwo kɛ bɛnwu ɛnyelɛzodeɛnwunlɛ na bɛdua zo bɛsɛkye bɛ nwonane ne, bɛkpo Nyamenle tumi ne na bɛtendɛ bɛtia anyunlunyiama mɔɔ wɔ anwuma la.
65001009	Nyamenle soanvolɛ kpanyinli Maekeɛle bɔbɔ anyɛ ɛhye. Mekɛ mɔɔ kpolera dɔle ye nee Abɔnsam avinli wɔ Mosisi funli nwo la, Maekeɛle anga ɛtane angile Abɔnsam. Mɔɔ ɔzele ye la a le kɛ, “Awulae badua wɔ kakɛ.”
65001010	Menli ɛhye mɔ ka debie biala mɔɔ bɛnde ɔ bo la anwo edwɛkɛ ɛtane, yɛɛ ninyɛne mɔɔ bɛ nane adwenle ne maa bɛte ɔ bo la bɛmɛ a le ninyɛne mɔɔ sɛkye bɛ la.
65001011	Abule ɛbu bɛ! Bɛva Keen agyakɛ. Bɛdoa ezukoa fɛlɛko bɛvo kɛ Beelam la. Bɛde atua kɛ Kɔla dele la, na bɛminli bɛ bo zo.
65001012	Bɛle kɛ andɔma anzɛɛ atasonlɛ wɔ mediema ɛhulolɛ ɛkponledolɛ bo; bɛno nza bɛbo, bɛbɔ bɛ nwo anyiemgba. Bɛdwenle bɛ ngome bɛ nwo ala. Bɛle kɛ amungu mɔɔ nzule ɛnle nu la ati, anwoma maa ɔdi akɔneaba. Bɛle kɛ bokile mgbenleɛ mbaka mɔɔ anzo ma la. Bɛtudu bɛ bɛ bo nee bɛ ndinli ne mɔ amuala na bɛwu bɔkɔɔ.
65001013	Bɛle kɛ nyevile mɔɔ ɛzɛkye la azɛlɛkye, bɛ awubue da bɛ anyiemgba nyɛleɛ ne mɔ ali. Bɛle kɛ nwɔlɔra mɔɔ nwɔnla la. Nyamenle ɛva awozinli kabikabi ne mɔɔ ɛnde ɛlɛ la ɛzie ɛkɛ ɛmaa bɛ.
65001014	Yinɔko mɔɔ le Adam angabɛnzo mɔɔ tɔ zolɛ nsuu la hanle bɛ nwo edwɛkɛ dɛba kɛ, “Awulae nee ye soanvolɛma nwuanzanwuanza apenle apenle bara
65001015	arabua awie biala ndɛne, na yeadea bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnze Nyamenle la wɔ bɛ ninyɛndane mɔɔ bɛyɛ ye atisesebɛ nu nee amumuyɛ edwɛkɛ mɔɔ menli ɛhye mɔ mɔɔ ɛnze Nyamenle la ɛha ɛtia ye la anwo.”
65001016	Menli ɛhye mɔ tendɛ bɛ nzo abo dahuu, bɛ kunlu ɛndwo bɛ nwo ɛlɛ; bɛdi bɛ atiakunluwɔzo ɛtane ne mɔ anzi, bɛtu bɛ nloa anu na bɛbɛlɛbɛla menli wɔ bɛdabɛ bɛ ngome bɛ boɛyɛlɛ ti.
65001017	Na me mediema, bɛhakye mɔɔ yɛ Awulae Gyisɛse Kelaese ɛzoanvolɛma ne hanle hilele bɛ la.
65001018	Bɛzele bɛ kɛ, “Saa awieleɛ mekɛ ne ba a, menli mɔɔ ɛnze Nyamenle na bɛdi bɛ ngome bɛ atiakunluwɔzo nzi la bara, na bɛarazi bɛ amgbu.”
65001019	Menli ɛhye mɔ le ewiade ye anu amra mɔɔ fa mgbakyemgbakye ba a, yɛɛ bɛnlɛ Nyamenle Sunsum ne wɔ bɛ nu.
65001020	Ayi mɔ, bɛhɔ zolɛ bɛnyi na bɛgyinla kpundii wɔ bɛ diedi nwuanzanwuanza ne anu. Bɛzɛlɛ wɔ Sunsum Nwuanzanwuanza ne tumi ne anu,
65001021	bɛzie bɛ nwo wɔ Nyamenle ɛhulolɛ ne anu bɛhendɛ ngoane ne mɔɔ ɛnlɛ awieleɛ, mɔɔ anwunvɔnezelɛ nu ala Awulae Gyisɛse Kelaese bava amaa bɛ la.
65001022	Menli bie wɔ ɛkɛ mɔɔ bɛ adwenle ɛnzi pi a; bɛboa bɛ.
65001023	Bɛhwe bie mɔ bɛvi sendɔlɔra ne anu, bɛlie bɛ ngoane. Bɛva ɛzulolɛ bɛze bie mɔ anwunvɔne, na bɛhyi bɛ adɛladeɛ ne mɔ mɔɔ bɛ ɛtane atiakunluwɔzo ɛheha nu la.
65001024	Nyamenle mɔɔ kola sɔ bɛ mɔɔ bɛndɔ aze, na ɔfa bɛ kɔlɔnwo fɛlɛko nu ɔkɔ ɔdaye ye anyunlunyia ne anu,
65001025	Nyamenle kokye ne mɔɔ le yɛ Ngoanedievolɛ ne, yemɔ yɛɛ anyunlunyia, belemgbunlililɛ, kpoleyɛlɛ, nee tumi ɛlua yɛ Awulae Gyisɛse Kelaese anwo zo ɛyɛ ye ɛdeɛ wɔ ɛnɛ nee mekɛ mɔɔ ɛnlɛ awieleɛ la a! Amen.
66001001	Buluku ɛhye ka ninyɛne mɔɔ Gyisɛse Kelaese yele hilele la anwo edwɛkɛ. Nyamenle manle ɔyele ɔhilele amaa yeaye mɔɔ ɛnrɛhyɛ biala na yeazi la yeahile ye sonvolɛma. Kelaese manle ye soanvolɛ rayele ninyɛne ɛhye mɔ hilele ye sonvolɛ Dwɔn.
66001002	Dwɔn ɛha mɔɔ ɔnwunle ye la amuala. Ɔhanle nɔhalɛ ne, kɛmɔ Gyisɛse Kelaese yele hilele ye la nee nrɛlaleɛ mɔɔ ɔdele ɔvile Nyamenle ɛkɛ ne la amuala.
66001003	Nyilalɛ ɛha sonla ne mɔɔ kɛkpogya ɔ ne zo kɛgenga Nyamenle nrɛlaleɛ ɛhye kɛhile awie mɔ la, yɛɛ nyilalɛ ɛha bɛdabɛ noko mɔɔ bɛkɛdie na bɛkɛva mɔɔ wɔ nu la bɛkɛzie na bɛkɛli zolɛ la! Ɔluakɛ mekɛ mɔɔ ɛhye mɔ basisi la ɛbikye.
66001004	Medame Dwɔn a melɛkɛlɛ kɛlata ɛhye meahɔmaa asɔne nsuu ne mɔ mɔɔ wɔ Ehyea maanzinli nu la a: Tete Nyamenle ne mɔɔ ɛnee wɔ ɛkɛ ne, na ɔwɔ ɛkɛ ne kɛkala, na ɔbara la ɛlo bɛ na ɔmaa bɛ anzonudwolɛ. Sunsum nsuu ne mɔ mɔɔ wɔ Nyamenle Belemgbunli Ebia Kpole ne anyunlu la ɛlo bɛ na ɔmaa bɛ anzonudwolɛ.
66001005	Akee Gyisɛse Kelaese, nɔhalɛ dasevolɛ ne, mɔɔ le Ralɛ ne mɔɔ bɛlumua bɛdwazo ye bɛvi ewule nu na ɔsie azɛlɛ ye azo arelemgbunli kɔsɔɔti la ɛlo bɛ na ɔmaa bɛ anzonudwolɛ. Gyisɛse Kelaese kulo yɛ, yeva ye mogya yelie yɛ yevi yɛ ɛtane nu,
66001006	na yeyɛ yɛ arelemgbunli nee sɛlɛvolɛma kɛ yɛzonle ye Nyamenle Selɛ ne. Anyunlunyia nee tumi ɛyɛ ye ɛdeɛ dahuu! Amen.
66001007	Bɛnlea, ɔlua amungu ne mɔ anu ɔlɛba! Awie biala banwu ye, yɛɛ bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛwɔle ɔ nvenle foa atwɛ la banwu ye. Ɔdaye ɔ ti, menli ngakyile kɔsɔɔti mɔɔ wɔ ewiade la bazu aye awolɛ. Nɔhalɛ, ɔle zɔhane. Amen.
66001008	Kɛ tete Awulae Nyamenle Bedevinli ne mɔɔ ɛnee wɔ ɛkɛ, na ɔwɔ ɛkɛ ne kɛkala, na ɔbara la se la ɛne, “Medame a mele ‘Alefa’ ne nee ‘Omiga’ ne a.”
66001009	Mame a mele bɛ diema Dwɔn. Kelaese ati yɛ muala yɛle ko na yɛlɛ abotane yɛlɛnwu amaneɛ mɔɔ kile kɛ yɛ nwo fɛta ye Belemgbunlililɛ ne a. Bɛvale me bɛradole bɔra ye mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye Patemɔso la azo, ɔluakɛ membɔle Nyamenle edwɛkɛ ne nee nɔhalɛ ne mɔɔ Gyisɛse yele hilele la nolo.
66001010	Awulae kenle ne, Sunsum ne rale me nwo zo, na mendele ɛnelɛ kpole bie mɔɔ le kɛ aweɛne tendenle la kɛ ɔlɛtendɛ me nzi nehane.
66001011	Ɔse, “Kɛlɛ mɔɔ ɛkɛnwu ye la wɔ buluku nu na fa buluku ne kɔmaa asɔne nsuu ne mɔ mɔɔ wɔ azuamgbole ɛhye mɔ azo la: Ɛfɛsɛse, Semɛna, Pɛgamɛm, Tayataela, Saadese, Feladɛlefea, yɛɛ Lawɔdesia.”
66001012	Mengakyile me nwo kɛ menea ahenle mɔɔ ɛlɛtendɛ ahile me la, na menwunle ezukoa nvutuke kɛnlaneɛ mbaka nsuu.
66001013	Debie mɔɔ le kɛ sonla la gyi bɛ avinli, ɔwula tɛladeɛ tendenle mɔɔ dwu ye aze na yeva ezukoa nvutuke akyeso yehye ye avinli.
66001014	Ɔ ti enrinli le fufule nwohyee kɛ boane ndɛkɛ, nwohyee kɛ ezukɔtweaba, yɛɛ ɔ nye ma sɔ kɛ senle;
66001015	ɔ gyakɛ anwo ta kɛ ayera mɔɔ bɛdu nu na bɛhwi nwolɛ la, na ɔ ne dielie kɛ azule mɔɔ lua awolɛ zo la.
66001016	Ɔlɛ nwɔlɔra nsuu ɔ sa fema ne anu, yɛɛ dadeɛ anye nwiɔ mɔɔ yɛ nla kɛ wowole la zia ɔ nloa anu. Ɔ nyunlu maanle ne ta kɛ ewia henlema sɛnzɛne.
66001017	Menwunle ye la, mempɛle menfinle ɔ gyakɛ anu kɛ asɛɛ mewu la. Na ɔvale ɔ sa fema ne ɔdole me nwo zo na ɔzele me kɛ, “Mmasulo! Mame a mele alumua ne nee awieleɛ ne a.
66001018	Mame a mele teasenli ne a. Menwule, na kɛkala mede aze dahuu. Melɛ Ewule nee Ɛbolɔ sanvɛ ne.
66001019	Zɔhane ati, kɛlɛ ninyɛne mɔɔ wɔnwu bɛ la, ninyɛne mɔɔ wɔ ɛkɛ ne kɛkala nee mɔɔ li ɛhye mɔ anzi bara la amuala.
66001020	Nwɔlɔra nsuu ne mɔ mɔɔ ɛnwu bɛ me sa fema ye anu, nee ezukoa nvutuke kɛnlaneɛ mbaka nsuu ne abo a le ɛhye: nwɔlɔra nsuu ne a le asɔne nsuu ne Nyamenle soanvolɛma ne mɔ yɛɛ kɛnlaneɛ mbaka nsuu ne mɔ a le asɔne nsuu ne.
66002001	“Kɛlɛ ɛhye kɔmaa Ɛfɛsɛse asɔne ne Nyamenle soanvolɛ ne. “Nrɛlaleɛ ɛhye vi mɔɔ lɛ nwɔlɔra nsuu ne mɔ ɔ sa fema ne anu na ɔluolua ezukoa nvutuke kɛnlaneɛ mbaka nsuu ne mɔ avinli la ɛkɛ ne.
66002002	Menwu wɔ gyima ne mɔ mɔɔ wɔli la; meze wɔ ɛvɛlɛ nee wɔ abotane ne amuala. Meze kɛ ɛmkpondɛ amumuyɛma anyunlu ɛnnea yɛɛ wɔzɔ bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛse bɛle ɛzoanvolɛma la wɔnlea na wɔnwu kɛ bɛnle ɛzoanvolɛma, na bɛle alane.
66002003	Meze kɛ ɛlɛ abotane ɛlɛkomo ɛ nwo zo, ɛlɛsɔ amaneɛ sa wɔ me duma ne ati, yɛɛ ɔtɛyɛle wɔ ɛvɛlɛ.
66002004	Noko akee metia wɔ wɔ ɛhye anwo: ɛnɛ ɛnlɛ me nwo ɛhulolɛ kɛ alumua ne la.
66002005	Ɛdawɔ nea na nwu wɔ aze mɔɔ wɔdɔ la. Nu ɛ nwo na twe ɛ nwo fi wɔ ɛtane ne mɔ mɔɔ wɔyɛ la anwo, na yɛ mɔɔ alumua ne ɛyɛle la. Saa wɔannu ɛ nwo, wɔangyakyi ɛtane ɛyɛlɛ a mebara mearaye wɔ kɛnlaneɛ baka ne meavi ɔ bo zo ne.
66002006	Noko ɛlɛ ɛhye gyi ɛ nzi: ɛngulo mɔɔ Nekɔlɔsoma yɛ la. Medame noko mengulo mɔɔ bɛlɛyɛ la.
66002007	“Sonla ne mɔɔ lɛ ɛnzonlɛ la ɛdie mɔɔ Sunsum ne ka kile asɔnema amuala la. Mɔɔ kɛli konim la mebamaa ye adenle meamaa yeali ngoane baka ne mɔɔ gyi Nyamenle tola ne anu la ma ne bie.
66002008	“Kɛlɛ ɛhye kɔmaa Semɛna asɔne ne Nyamenle soanvolɛ ne. “Nrɛlaleɛ ɛhye vi alumua ne nee awieleɛ ne, mɔɔ wule na ɔziale ɔrale ngoane nu bieko la ɛkɛ.
66002009	Meze wɔ amaneɛnwunlɛ kpokpoti. Meze wɔ ɛhyianlɛ, noko ɛlɛ anwonyia! Meze munzule edwɛkɛ mɔɔ bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛse bɛle Dwuuma noko bɛnle Dwuuma la ɛlɛkeha atia wɔ la. Menli zɔhane mɔ le Seetan eku nu menli.
66002010	Mmasulo debie biala mɔɔ bɛbayɛ wɔ la. Tie, Abɔnsam ne bamaa bɛagua bɛ bie mɔ efiade, bɛazɔ bɛ bɛanlea, na bɛanwu amaneɛ dedee kenle bulu. Noko di nɔhalɛ maa me, bɔbɔ kɔdwu ewule nu, na mebabɔ wɔ ngoane abɔtile.
66002011	“Sonla ne mɔɔ lɛ ɛnzonlɛ la ɛdie mɔɔ Sunsum ne ka kile asɔnema amuala la. Mɔɔ kɛli konim la, ewule ne mɔɔ tɔ zolɛ nwiɔ la bakpa ɔ ti.
66002012	“Kɛlɛ ɛhye kɔmaa Pɛgamɛm asɔne ne Nyamenle soanvolɛ ne. “Nrɛlaleɛ ɛhye vi mɔɔ lɛ dadeɛ anye nwiɔ ne mɔɔ yɛ nla la ɛkɛ.
66002013	Meze kɛ ɛleka mɔɔ ɛde la, ɛkɛ ne a Seetan ebia ne gyi a. Noko ɛlɛ me duma ne anu ɛsesebɛ na ɛdi nɔhalɛ ɛmaa me, yɛɛ wɔ diedi amkpo aze, bɔbɔ wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ bɛhunle me nɔhalɛ dasevolɛ Antɛpase wɔ Seetan ebia ne abo la.
66002014	Noko melɛ edwɛkɛ ekyi bie metia wɔ. Ɛlɛ menli bie mɔɔ li Beelam ngilehilelɛ ne anzi a. Beelam hilehilele belemgbunli Beelake manle ɔdole Yizilayɛma agyiba, ɔmanle bɛlile aleɛ mɔɔ bɛva bɛzɔ amonle la na bɛbɔle adwɔmane ɛbɛla.
66002015	Eza ɛlɛ menli bie mɔɔ bɛdabɛ noko bɛli Nekɔlɔsoma ngilehilelɛ ne anzi a.
66002016	Yemɔti nu ɛ nwo! Saa wɔannu ɛ nwo a ɔnrɛhyɛ biala, mebara ɛ nwo lɔ, na meava dadeɛ ne mɔɔ zia me nloa anu la me nee menli zɔhane mɔ araho.
66002017	“Sonla ne mɔɔ lɛ ɛnzonlɛ la ɛdie mɔɔ Sunsum ne ka kile asɔnema amuala la. “Mɔɔ kɛli konim la mebamaa ye mana ne mɔɔ vea la bie. Mebamaa ko biala noko bolɛ fufule mɔɔ bɛhɛlɛ duma fofolɛ zolɛ la. Awie biala ɛnrɛhola ɛnrɛnwu duma ne kyesɛ ahenle ne mɔɔ bɛva bɛmaa ye la angomekye.
66002018	“Kɛlɛ ɛhye kɔmaa Tayataela asɔne ne Nyamenle soanvolɛ ne. “Nrɛlaleɛ ɛhye vi Nyamenle Ara ne mɔɔ lɛ ɛnyelɛ mɔɔ sɔ kɛ senle, na ɔ gyakɛ anwo ta kɛ ayera mɔɔ bɛhwi nwolɛ la ɛkɛ ne.
66002019	Meze wɔ gyima. Meze wɔ ɛhulolɛ mɔɔ ɛlɛ ye, wɔ nɔhalɛ mɔɔ ɛdi, wɔ ɛzonlenlɛ mɔɔ ɛsonle, nee wɔ abotane mɔɔ ɛlɛ la amuala. Meze kɛ kɛkala ɛlɛbɔ mɔdenle wɔadɛla alumua ne.
66002020	Noko melɛ edwɛkɛ ɛhye metia wɔ: ɛdie raalɛ Gyɛzɛbɛle mɔɔ ɛyɛ ɔ nwo Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛ la ɛto nu. Yeva ye ngilehilelɛ ne yezi me menli ne mɔ anye yemaa bɛlɛbɔ adwɔmane ɛbɛla na bɛdi aleɛ mɔɔ bɛva bɛzɔ amonle la.
66002021	Memanle ye mekɛ kɛ ɔva ɔnlu ɔ nwo, noko ɔngulo kɛ ɔkɛgyakyi ye adwɔmane ɛbɛla ne.
66002022	Ɛhye ati mebamaa anwonyane abɔ ye na meamaa bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛ nee ye donle awuvolɛvalɛ mɛla ne la anwu amaneɛ, kyesɛ bɛnu bɛ nwo wɔ amumuyɛ ne mɔɔ bɛ nee ye yɛle la anwo.
66002023	Eza menli mɔɔ li ɔ nzi la, mebahu bɛ muala na asɔnema ne amuala anwu kɛ medame a menwu sonla biala ati anu nee ye ahonle nu a. Me nee bɛ nuhua ko biala bali wɔ mɔɔ yeyɛ la anwo.
66002024	“Bɛdabɛ noko mɔɔ bɛha, mɔɔ bɛwɔ Tayataela, mɔɔ bɛanli ngilehilelɛ ɛtane zɛhae anzi, bɛanzukoa mɔɔ ɔyɛ a bie mɔ fɛlɛ ye ‘Seetan ngonyia’ la, bɛmɛ yɛɛ meka meahile bɛ kɛ, menrɛva ɛzonle kpole biala menrɛzoa bɛ.
66002025	Mɔɔ meka meahile bɛ ala la a le kɛ bɛzɔ mɔɔ bɛlɛ ye la anu kpalɛ kɔkpula mekɛ mɔɔ menwɔra la.
66002026	-
66002028	Mɔɔ kɛli konim, na ɔkɛyɛ mɔɔ mekpondɛ la nɔhalɛ nu kɛhɔ awieleɛ la, mebava tumi ne mɔɔ Egya vale manle me la meamaa ye. Mebamaa yeali maanle maanle dɔɔnwo anwo zo konim, yeava tumi yeazie bɛ, na yeabubu bɛ kɛ abua. Eza mebava nwonlomɔ ɛwɔlɔra ne meamaa ye.
66002029	“Sonla ne mɔɔ lɛ ɛnzonlɛ la ɛdie mɔɔ Sunsum ne ka kile asɔnema amuala la.
66003001	“Kɛlɛ, ɛhye kɔmaa Saadese asɔne ne Nyamenle soanvolɛ ne. “Nrɛlaleɛ ɛhye vi mɔɔ lɛ Nyamenle Sunsum nsuu ne nee nwɔlɔra nsuu ne la ɛkɛ ne. Meze mɔɔ ɛlɛyɛ la amuala; meze kɛ wɔlie duma kɛ ɛ nye gyi zo, noko wɔwu.
66003002	Tunwue, na miemia mɔɔ ɛlɛ ye la anu kolaa na ɔkɛzɛkye bɔkɔɔ a yeazɛkye. Ɔluakɛ mɔɔ wɔyɛ la amuala, menwu kɛ ɔnli munli nretee zɛhae wɔ me Nyamenle ne anye zo.
66003003	Zɔhane ati, kakye mɔɔ bɛhilehile wɔ nee mɔɔ ɛdele la, di zolɛ, na nu ɛ nwo. Saa wɔanyɛ ɛ nye gyɛlɛmgbɛɛnye a, mebara ɛ nwo zo kɛ awule, na ɛnrɛnwu mekɛ ko ne mɔɔ mebava meara la.
66003004	Noko menli ekyi bie wɔ Saadese ɛkɛ ne mɔɔ bɛli bɛ nwo eni a. Bɛtɛyɛle bɛ ndanlɛ ne mɔ evinli. Bɛbayɛ fufule, na bɛ nee me alua, ɔluakɛ bɛfɛta.
66003005	Sonla ne mɔɔ kɛli konim la bɛbayɛ ye fufule nwohyee, na menrɛye ye duma menrɛvi teasema buluku ne anu. Mebaha ye wienyi wɔ Egya nee Nyamenle soanvolɛma anyunlu ɛkɛ ne kɛ bɛle me ɛdeɛ.
66003006	“Sonla ne mɔɔ lɛ ɛnzonlɛ la ɛdie mɔɔ Sunsum ne ka kile asɔnema amuala la.
66003007	“Kɛlɛ ɛhye kɔmaa Feladɛlefea asɔne ne Nyamenle soanvolɛ ne. “Nrɛlaleɛ ɛhye vi Nwuanzanwuanzanli ne mɔɔ le nɔhalɛnli ne ɛkɛ. Yemɔ yɛɛ ɔlɛ Belemgbunli Devidi sanvɛ ne a. Ɔto nu a, awie ɛmbuke, yɛɛ ɔbuke a, awie ɛndo nu.
66003008	Meze mɔɔ ɛyɛ la; meze kɛ wɔ tumi le ekyi bie, noko wɔli me ngilehilelɛ zo na wɔli nɔhalɛ wɔmaa me.
66003009	Tie, menli ekpunli ekyi ne mɔɔ le Seetan ɛdeɛ, alanema ne mɔɔ kile kɛ bɛle Dwuuma noko bɛnle Dwuuma la, mebamaa bɛarabu ndwɛlɛ wɔ ɛ nyunlu, na bɛ muala bɛanwu kɛ mekulo wɔ.
66003010	Kɛmɔ wɔli me edwɛkɛ zo, wɔnyia abotane la, ngyegyelɛ kpole ne mɔɔ ɛlɛba ewiade arazɔ menli kɔsɔɔti mɔɔ wɔ azɛlɛ ye azo anlea la, mebaye wɔ meavi nu.
66003011	Ɔnrɛhyɛ na meara. Mɔɔ ɛlɛ la sɔ nu boɛ, amaa awie amkpodi wɔ konim ahyɛlɛdeɛ ne anvi ɛ sa nu.
66003012	Sonla mɔɔ kɛli konim la, mebayɛ ye me Nyamenle Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua nu sika, na yeadɛnla ɛkɛ ne dahuu. Mebahɛlɛ me Nyamenle ne duma nee me Nyamenle ne suakpole ne, mɔɔ le Gyɛlusalɛm fofolɛ ne, mɔɔ vi me Nyamenle ne ɛkɛ ne wɔ anwuma bara la duma wɔ ɔ nwo. Eza mebahɛlɛ me duma fofolɛ ne ɔ nwo.
66003013	“Sonla ne mɔɔ lɛ ɛnzonlɛ la ɛdie mɔɔ Sunsum ne ka kile asɔnema amuala la.
66003014	“Kɛlɛ ɛhye kɔmaa Lawɔdesia asɔne ne Nyamenle soanvolɛ ne. “Nrɛlaleɛ ɛhye vi Amen, nɔhalɛnli ne mɔɔ yɛkola yɛfa yɛ rɛle yɛto ɔ nwo zo, nɔhalɛ dasevolɛ ne, mɔɔ le ninyɛne mɔɔ Nyamenle ɛbɔ la amuala abobɔlɛ la ɛkɛ.
66003015	Meze mɔɔ wɔyɛ la; meze kɛ wɔmɔ, ɛnle yɔlɔkɔkɔ yɛɛ ɛnle wuluwulu. Me kunlu a anrɛɛ ɛnee ɛle wuluwulu anzɛɛ yɔlɔkɔkɔ.
66003016	Na kɛmɔ ɛle adodɔlera, na ɛnle wuluwulu anzɛɛ yɔlɔkɔkɔ la, mebakpulu wɔ meagua.
66003017	Wɔmɔ ɛse, ‘Mede boɛ, menyia me nwo. Mengyia ɛhwee.’ Ɛnze kɛ ɛyɛ anwunvɔne na ɛ nwo yɛ alɔbɔlɛ. Ɛnlɛ bie, ɛlɛ ɛ nwo zɔ, yɛɛ ɛ nye ɛzi.
66003018	Ɛhye ati metu wɔ folɛ kɛ badɔ ezukoa nvutuke kpalɛ mɔɔ bɛva senle bɛdu nuhua la fi me ɛkɛ, amaa wɔanyia ɛ nwo. Badɔ adɛladeɛ fufule wula keda wɔ amumuyɛ nee wɔ anyiemgba mɔɔ ɛla ali la azo. Badɔ ayile gua ɛ nye zo, amaa wɔanwu debie.
66003019	Bɛdabɛ mɔɔ mekulo bɛ la, metwi bɛ nyunlu na metea bɛ. Zɔhane ati bɔ mɔdenle nu ɛ nwo na yɛ gyima ɛsesebɛ.
66003020	Tie, megyi anlenkɛ ne anzi melɛbɔ nu; mɔɔ kɛde me ne na ɔkɛdukue me la, mebara ye ɛkɛ na me nee ye arado ɛsalɛ, na ɔdaye noko ɔ nee me ado ɛsalɛ.
66003021	Mɔɔ kɛli konim la, mebamaa ye adenle meamaa yearadɛnla me nwo ɛkɛ ne wɔ me belemgbunli ebia ne azo, kɛmɔ meli konim na mede Egya anwo ɛkɛ ne wɔ ye belemgbunli ebia ne azo la.
66003022	“Sonla ne mɔɔ lɛ ɛnzonlɛ la ɛdie mɔɔ Sunsum ne ka kile asɔnema amuala la.”
66004001	Ɛhye anzi, mendole me nye, na menwunle kɛ bɛbuke anlenkɛ bie wɔ anwuma lɔ. Na ɛnelɛ ne mɔɔ dielie kɛ aweɛne tendenle, mɔɔ lumuale dendɛle hilele me la zele me kɛ, “Fo bɛla anwuma ɛke maa mengile wɔ mɔɔ bazi ɛhye anzi la.”
66004002	Ɛkɛ ne ala Sunsum ne wolole me na menwunle kɛ awie de belemgbunli ebia kpole zo wɔ anwuma lɔ.
66004003	Ahenle ne mɔɔ de belemgbunli ebia kpole ne azo la anyunlu ta kɛ ezukoa awolɛ ne mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ bɛ “gyasepa” nee “kanɛlea” la, na nyangondonle kɛnlɛma mɔɔ zɔho ezukoa bolɛ ne mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye “ɛmelade” la ɛdo ɛbɛnra ɛyia belemgbunli ebia kpole ne.
66004004	Mgbanyima abulanwiɔ nee nna noko mɔɔ ɛyɛ fufule na bɛbobɔ ezukoa abɔtile la dede arelemgbunli mbia abulanwiɔ nee nna zo ɛbɔ belemgbunli ebia kpole ɛhye ɛyia.
66004005	Ɛsɛlɛmanye kpakye fi belemgbunli ebia kpole ne anwo finde, yɛɛ ɛnelɛ mgbole mɔɔ kulu kɛ bokile ezule la vi ebia kpole ne anwo finde. Tɛkɛ nsuu sɔ belemgbunli ebia kpole ne anwo, na bɛmɛ a le Nyamenle Sunsum nsuu ne.
66004006	Belemgbunli ebia kpole ɛhye anyunlu ɛkɛ ne, debie bie mɔɔ le kɛ nyevile anye kɔngyekɔngye kɛ neanleɛ la la ɛkɛ ne faanwo. Tease abɔdeɛ nna mɔɔ ɛnyelɛ duodua bɛ nyunlu nee bɛ nzi la gyigyi belemgbunli ebia ne anwo wɔ ye tɛbanu nee ye tɛbanu ne amuala.
66004007	Tease abɔdeɛ ne mɔɔ lumua la le kɛ awenade. Mɔɔ tɔ zolɛ nwiɔ la le kɛ ɛnlankɛ nyinli; mɔɔ tɔ zolɛ nsa la anyunlu zɔho sonla nyunlu, yɛɛ mɔ tɔ zolɛ nna la le kɛ kɔleɛ mɔɔ ɛdu faa la.
66004008	Tease abɔdeɛ nna ɛhye mɔ ko biala lɛ ndɛbalɛ nsia mɔɔ ɛnyelɛ duodua bɛ kunlu nee bɛ nzi amuala a. Na alehyenlɛ nee aledwolɛ muala bɛ ne la nu bɛto edwɛne bɛse kɛ, “Nwuanzaanwu, nwuanzaanwu, Awulae Nyamenle Tumivolɛ ne le nwuanzanwuanza. Yemɔ yɛɛ ɔvi tete, ɔwɔ ɛkɛ, na ɔwɔ ɛkɛ kɛkala, na ɔbara a.”
66004009	Saa tease abɔdeɛ nna ɛhye mɔ to bɛ anyunlunyia, enililɛ nee moyɛlɛ edwɛne ne maa mɔɔ de aze dahuu na ɔde belemgbunli ebia kpole ne azo la a,
66004010	ɛnee mgbanyima abulanwiɔ nee nna ne ɛdu ɛgua mɔɔ de belemgbunli ebia ne azo la anyunlu, na bɛsonle mɔɔ de aze dahuu la. Bɛtudu bɛ abɔtile ne mɔ bɛgua belemgbunli ebia ne abo na bɛka kɛ,
66004011	“Yɛ Awulae nee yɛ Nyamenle! Ɛfɛta anyunlunyia, enililɛ, nee tumi. Ɔluakɛ ɛdawɔ a ɛbɔle ninyɛne kɔsɔɔti a. Wɔ ɛhulolɛ zo yɛɛ ɛbɔle bɛ a. Wɔ ɛhulolɛ zo yɛɛ bɛwɔ ɛkɛ a.”
66005001	Menwunle kɛ ahenle mɔɔ de belemgbunli ebia kpole ne azo la lɛ nwoma ɔ sa fema ne anu; nwoma ne, bɛhɛlɛ ɔ kunlu nee ɔ nzi amuala na bɛva ɛyɛlɛ bɛzɔ ɔ nloa fane nsuu.
66005002	Na menwunle Nyamenle soanvolɛ mɔɔ anwo yɛ ɛzulolɛ la ko, na ɔhanle ye kpole kpalɛ kɛ, “Nwane a fɛta na ɔkɛhola ɔkɛwaye ɛyɛlɛ ne na ɔkɛbuke nwoma ne anu a?”
66005003	Na awie ɛnle anwuma lɔ anzɛɛ azɛlɛ ye azo anzɛɛ ɛbolɔ mɔɔ holale bukele nwoma ne na ɔnleanle nu a.
66005004	Na menzunle kpalɛ kɛ awie ɛnle ɛkɛ mɔɔ fɛta na ɔkola ɔbuke nwoma ne na ɔnea nu a.
66005005	Na mgbanyima ne mɔ ko zele me kɛ, “Mmasu. Nea! Dwuda abusua nu awenade ne, mɔɔ le Belemgbunli Devidi ati anwo anlɔnra kpole ne, ɛli konim, na ɔkola ɔwaye ɛyɛlɛ nsuu ne mɔ na ɔbuke nwoma ne anu.”
66005006	Na menwunle kɛ Boaneralɛ ne gyi belemgbunli ebia ne mɔɔ tease abɔdeɛ nna ne nee mgbanyima ne mɔ ɛbɔ ɛyia ye la anyunlu. Ɔzɔho Boaneralɛ ne mɔɔ bɛhu ye la. Ɔlɛ mɛne nsuu yɛɛ ɛnyelɛ nsuu, mɔɔ le Nyamenle Sunsum nsuu ne, mɔɔ bɛzoanle bɛ wɔ ewiade ye amuala anu la.
66005007	Boaneralɛ ne hɔliele nwoma ne vile ahenle mɔɔ de belemgbunli ebia kpole ne azo la asa fema ne anu.
66005008	Ɔyɛle ɛhye la, tease abɔdeɛ nna ne nee mgbanyima abulanwiɔ nee nna ne mɔ dule guale Boaneralɛ ne agyakɛ anu. Ko biala lɛ ɛto yɛɛ ezukoa nvutuke dwora mɔɔ ɛyɛlɛ evuanlɛ wɔ nu la. Ɛyɛlɛ ɛhye mɔ a le Nyamenle menli ne dahudahu nzɛlɛlɛ ne a.
66005009	Na bɛdole edwɛne fofolɛ bie kɛ, “Ɛfɛta kɛ ɛkɛlie nwoma ne, ɛkɛwaye ɛyɛlɛ ne, na ɛkɛbuke nwoma ne anu, ɔluakɛ bɛhunle wɔ na ɛvale wɔ mogya ne mɔɔ bɛhwinle bɛguale la ɛkpɔnenle menli. Ɛkpɔnenle bɛ ɛvile abusua ekpunli, aneɛ nee maanle ngakyile kɔsɔɔti anu ɛmanle Nyamenle.
66005010	Wɔmaa bɛyɛ arelemgbunli nee Nyamenle sɛlɛvolɛma na bɛbali arelemgbunli wɔ azɛlɛ ye azo.”
66005011	Mendole me nye bieko, na mendele Nyamenle soanvolɛma apenle apenle nee mgbe mgbe ane. Bɛbɔle bɛyiale belemgbunli ebia kpole ne, tease abɔdeɛ nna ne nee mgbanyima ne mɔ,
66005012	na bɛhanle ye kpole kɛ, “Boaneralɛ ne mɔɔ bɛhunle ye la, fɛta tumi, anwonyia, nrɛlɛbɛ nee anwosesebɛ, enililɛ, anyunlunyia nee ayɛlɛyelɛ!”
66005013	Na mendele kɛ abɔdeɛ biala mɔɔ wɔ anwuma nee aze, ɛbolɔ nee nyevile nu nee debie biala mɔɔ lɛ ngoane mɔɔ wɔ aleɛabo la amuala se, “Ayɛlɛyelɛ, enililɛ, anyunlunyia nee tumi ɛyɛ mɔɔ de belemgbunli ebia kpole ne azo la nee Boaneralɛ ne ɛdeɛ wɔ melɛ mɔɔ ɛnlɛ awieleɛ!”
66005014	Na tease abɔdeɛ nna ne liele zo, “Amen.” Na mgbanyima ne mɔ dule guale na bɛzonlenle.
66006001	Akee menwunle kɛ Boaneralɛ ne ɛwaye ɛyɛlɛ ne mɔɔ bɛva bɛsosɔ nwoma ne anloa fane nsuu la anu ko, na mendele kɛ tease abɔdeɛ nna ne anu ko lɛ ɛnelɛ mɔɔ ye kpole le kɛ ezule mɔɔ ɛlɛkulu la hanle kɛ, “Bɛla!”
66006002	Memanle me nye zo, na menwunle kɛ sonla de ɛkpɔnwɔ fufule zo na ɔlɛ ɛda ɔ sa nu ɔlɛba. Bɛbɔle ye abɔtile, na ɔvindele ɔhɔle kɛ katakyie mɔɔ ɛli konim dɔɔnwo na eza ɔlɛkɔ yeahɔho yeali konim bieko la.
66006003	Boaneralɛ ne eza wayele ɛyɛlɛ ne mɔɔ bɛva bɛsosɔ nwoma ne anloa la anu mɔɔ tɔ zolɛ nwiɔ la; na mendele kɛ tease abɔdeɛ nna ne anu mɔɔ tɔ zolɛ nwiɔ la se, “Bɛla!”
66006004	Na sonla ko mɔɔ bɛmaa ye konle dadeɛ kpole ko la de ɛkpɔnwɔ kɔkɔlɛ mɔɔ bolo kpalɛ la azo rale. Na bɛmanle ye adenle kɛ ɔye anzonudwolɛ ɔvi azɛlɛ ye azo, amaa menli ahu bɛ nwo.
66006005	Boaneralɛ ne akee wayele ɛyɛlɛ ne mɔɔ tɔ zolɛ nsa la, na mendele kɛ tease abɔdeɛ ne mɔɔ tɔ zolɛ nsa la se, “Bɛla!” Na menwunle kɛ sonla lɛ tone ɔ sa nu na ɔde ɛkpɔnwɔ bile bie azo ɔlɛba.
66006006	Akee mendele debie mɔɔ le kɛ ɛnelɛ la wɔ tease abɔdeɛ nna ne mɔ anwo lɔ, ɔse, “Bɛbadɔ hwiiti ‘litili’ ko etaku nna, yɛɛ bɛbadɔ baale ‘litili’ nsa etaku nna. Na anrɛɛ bɛmmasɛkye nwole nee nwanye!”
66006007	Boaneralɛ ne wayele ɛyɛlɛ ne mɔɔ tɔ zolɛ nna la; na mendele kɛ tease abɔdeɛ ne mɔɔ tɔ zolɛ nna la se, “Bɛla!”
66006008	Meneanle, na menwunle sonla bie mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye Ewule, kɛ ɔde ɛkpɔnwɔ nzonle bie azo ɔlɛba. Ɛbolɔ li ɔ nzi ɛkɛ ne ala. Bɛhyɛle azɛlɛ ye anu nna na bɛmanle bɛ tumi kɛ bɛva dadeɛ, ɛhɔne, anwonyane nee nanemgbole bɛhu menli mɔɔ wɔ ko azo la amuala.
66006009	Boaneralɛ ne eza wayele ɛyɛlɛ ne mɔɔ tɔ zolɛ nnu la. Na menwunle kɛ bɛdabɛ mɔɔ Nyamenle edwɛkɛ ne ati, nee bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛlile daselɛ nɔhalɛ nu la ati bɛhu bɛ la ɛkɛla ne mɔ dede azukponle ne abo.
66006010	Bɛdeanle nu kɛ, “O Tumivolɛ Awulae! Ɛle nwuanzanwuanza nee nɔhalɛnli. Na kenlenzu yɛɛ ɛkɛbua azɛlɛ ye azo amra ndɛne na wɔadea bɛ kɛ bɛhunle yɛ a?”
66006011	Na bɛmanle ko biala tɛladeɛ fufule, na bɛhanle bɛhilele bɛ kɛ bɛlie bɛ ɛnwomenle ekyii, kɔkpula kɛ bɛ gɔnwo mɔ sonvolɛma nee mediema mɔɔ bɛdabɛ noko bɛbahu bɛ kɛ bɛdabɛ la, bɛ muala bɛ nloa kɛdɔ nu la.
66006012	Eza menwunle kɛ Boaneralɛ ne ɛwaye ɛyɛlɛ ne mɔɔ tɔ zolɛ nsia la. Na nea, azɛlɛ kpusule kpole bie, na sɛnzɛne ne yɛle bile kɛ ɛdanlɛ dokyi anzɛɛ bilizi, na siane ne yɛle kɔkɔlɛ yɔɔnwo kɛ mogya.
66006013	Nwɔlɔra dudule vi anwomanyunlu raguale aze kɛ feege baka ma mɔɔ ahumu kpole bie ɛdu ɛkpolo bɛ ɛgua la.
66006014	Bɛnyenyanle anwomanyunlu kɛ ɛkpa la na ɔminliminlinle, na boka nee bɔra biala dudule vile bɛ bo zo ne mɔ.
66006015	Ewiade arelemgbunli, mgbanyima, sogya mgbanyinli, sukoavolɛma nee tumivolɛma amuala nee menli kɔsɔɔti, ahanra nee alehelɛ, nriandile veɛveale awolɛ mbɔne nu nee awolɛ mɔɔ wɔ awoka ne mɔ azo la abo.
66006016	Na bɛdeanle bɛvɛlɛle awoka nee awolɛ ne mɔ kɛ, “Bɛragua yɛ nwo zo na bɛva yɛ bɛvea bɛmaa yɛvi mɔɔ de belemgbunli ebia kpole ne azo la anye zo, na bɛye yɛ bɛvi Boaneralɛ ne ɛya ne anu!
66006017	Ɔluakɛ bɛ ɛya kenle kpole ne ɛra na nwane bɔbɔ a kɛhola kɛgyinla ɔ nloa a?”
66007001	Ɛhye anzi menwunle Nyamenle soanvolɛma nna kɛ bɛgyigyi azɛlɛ ye muleɛ nna ne mɔ azo na bɛdedɛ ewiade anwoma ngakyile nna ne anu, amaa anwoma biala ambɔ azɛlɛ ye azo, nyevile nye anzɛɛ baka nwo.
66007002	Na menwunle Nyamenle soanvolɛ ko kɛ ɔlɛ tease Nyamenle ne nzonlɛyɛlɛ sɛkɛlɛneɛ ne, ɔvi aduduleɛ ɔlɛba. Ɔdeanle nu ɔvɛlɛle Nyamenle soanvolɛma nna ne mɔɔ Nyamenle ɛmaa bɛ tumi kɛ bɛzɛkye azɛlɛ ye nee nyevile la,
66007003	na ɔzele bɛ kɛ, “Bɛmmafa bɛ sa bɛka azɛlɛ ye, nyevile, anzɛɛ mbaka biala bɛsɛkye bɛ, kɔkpula kɛ yɛkɛwie yɛ Nyamenle ne sonvolɛma ne mɔ amuala nzonlɛ yɛ wɔ bɛ nwoma zo la.”
66007004	Na mendele menli mɔɔ bɛvale Nyamenle sɛkɛlɛneɛ ne bɛyɛle bɛ nzonlɛ wɔ bɛ nwoma zo la dodo. Menli apenle ngoko ɛya ko, abulanla nee nna (144,000) a bɛyɛle bɛ nzonlɛ a. Bɛ muala bɛvi Yizilayɛ mbusua ekpunli ekpunli bulu nee nwiɔ ne anu.
66007005	-
66007008	Apenle ngoko bulu nee nwiɔ vi mbusua ekpunli ɛhye mɔ ko biala anu: Dwuda, Wulubɛn, Gaade, Ahya, Nafetalae, Manasɛ, Semɛyɔn, Livae, Yesakaa, Zɛbulɛn, Dwosefi, yɛɛ Bɛngyaman abusua nu.
66007009	Ɛhye anzi memanle me nye zo, na menwunle menli pemgbenleamgbe bie mɔɔ awie ɛngola bɛ tia la! Bɛvi mbusua, maanle, aneɛ nee menli ngakyile kɔsɔɔti anu. Bɛgyigyi belemgbunli ebia kpole ne nee Boaneralɛ ne anyunlu ɛkɛ ne, bɛwula adɛladeɛ fufule na bɛdedɛ mrɛlakɛ bɛ sa nu.
66007010	Bɛdeanle nu bɛzele kɛ, “Ngoanelielɛ vi yɛ Nyamenle ne mɔɔ de belemgbunli ebia kpole ne azo la nee Boaneralɛ ne.”
66007011	Nyamenle soanvolɛma ne mɔ amuala rabɔle yiale belemgbunli ebia kpole ne, mgbanyima ne mɔ nee tease abɔdeɛ nna ne. Bɛbutubutule bɛ nyunlu aze wɔ belemgbunli ebia kpole ne anyunlu na bɛzonlenle Nyamenle,
66007012	bɛzele kɛ, “Amen! Ayɛlɛyelɛ, anyunlunyia, nrɛlɛbɛ, moyɛlɛ, enililɛ, tumi nee anwosesebɛ kɔsɔɔti le yɛ Nyamenle ne ɛdeɛ wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ ɛnlɛ awieleɛ! Amen.”
66007013	Mgbanyima ne mɔ ko bizale me kɛ, “Na nwane mɔ a le menli ɛhye mɔ mɔɔ wula adɛladeɛ fufule la, yɛɛ bɛvi nienwu a bɛra a?”
66007014	Membuale ye kɛ, “Yɛmenle, ɛdawɔ yɛɛ ɛze a.” Na ɔzele me kɛ, “Menli ɛhye mɔ a le bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛho bɛdɔ zolɛ wɔ amaneɛnwunlɛ kpole ne anu la. Bɛkpole bɛ adɛladeɛ ne mɔ nwohyee wɔ Boaneralɛ ne mogya ne anu.
66007015	Ɛhye ati yɛɛ bɛgyigyi Nyamenle belemgbunli ebia kpole ne anwo na bɛsonle ye alehyenlɛ nee aledwolɛ wɔ ɔdaye ye Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne anu a. Mɔɔ de belemgbunli ebia kpole ne azo la banlea bɛ nwo zo.
66007016	Ɛhɔne nee nzuhɔne ɛnrɛhu bɛ bieko, ewia ɛnrɛbɔ bɛ, anzɛɛ wuluwulu kpole biala ɛnrɛhu bɛ bieko.
66007017	Ɔluakɛ Boaneralɛ ne mɔɔ de belemgbunli ebia kpole ne azo la bayɛ mboaneneavolɛ anlea bɛ, na ɔbayɛ bɛ tataa yeahɔ nzubula mɔɔ maa ngoane la anwo. Na Nyamenle bakyikyi bɛ nye anwo monle.”
66008001	Mɔɔ Boaneralɛ ne wayele ɛyɛlɛ ne mɔɔ tɔ zolɛ nsuu mɔɔ bɛvale bɛzɔle nwoma ne anloa la, anwuma lɔ amuala yɛle diinyi kɛyɛ dɔnehwele foa ko.
66008002	Akee menwunle Nyamenle soanvolɛma nsuu ne mɔɔ gyigyi Nyamenle anyunlu ɛkɛ ne la, na bɛvale aweɛne ndendenle nsuu bɛmanle bɛ.
66008003	Nyamenle soanvolɛ ko noko mɔɔ lɛ ezukoa nvutuke dwora mɔɔ bɛyela ɛyɛlɛ evuanlɛ nu la ragyinlanle azukponle ne anwo. Bɛmanle ye ɛyɛlɛ dɔɔnwo kɛ ɔva ɔboka Nyamenle menli ne nzɛlɛlɛ ne anwo na ɔkpu ye wɔ ezukoa nvutuke azukponle ne mɔɔ gyi belemgbunli ebia kpole ne anyunlu la azo.
66008004	Ɛyɛlɛ ne esike ne nee Nyamenle menli ne nzɛlɛlɛ ne vi Nyamenle soanvolɛ ne asa nu hɔle Nyamenle anyunlu wɔ anwuma.
66008005	Nyamenle soanvolɛ ne akee vale azu mokyea ne anu samɛnlankɛ ne bie guale ɛyɛlɛ dwora ne anu na ɔvuandinle dwora ne ɔdole azɛlɛ ye azo. Na maanle nu hulule mgbole bie, ɛsɛlɛmanye kpakyele, na azɛlɛ kpusule.
66008006	Akee Nyamenle soanvolɛma nsuu ne boɔboale bɛ nwo kɛ bɛbɔ bɛ aweɛne ndendenle nsuu ne mɔ anu.
66008007	Nyamenle soanvolɛ ne mɔɔ lumua la bɔle ye aweɛne tendenle ne anu. Na bɛwolale ezuawolɛ nee senle, mɔɔ bɛva mogya bɛfonla ye la bɛguale azɛlɛ ye azo. Azɛlɛ ye anu hyɛle nsa, na ko yelale bɔkɔɔ manle mbaka nee ndile mɔɔ wɔ zolɛ la dɔle nzonle.
66008008	-
66008009	Nyamenle soanvolɛ ne mɔɔ tɔ zolɛ nwiɔ la bɔle ye aweɛne tendenle ne anu. Na bɛvuandinle debie bie mɔɔ le kɛ boka kpole bie, mɔɔ senle la nu la bɛdole nyevile ne anu. Nyevile ne anu hyɛle nsa, na ko hakyile mogya manle nuhua ninyɛne wule, na nlɛne mɔɔ gua ɔ nye la zɛkyele bɔkɔɔ.
66008010	Nyamenle soanvolɛ ne mɔɔ tɔ zolɛ nsa la bɔle ye aweɛne tendenle ne anu. Na ɛwɔlɔra kpole bie, mɔɔ ɛlɛsɔ kɛ tɛkɛ la dule vi anwomanyunlu radɔle azudenle, nzubula nee tandane nu.
66008011	Ɛwɔlɔra ne duma a le “Subo.” Na azule, nzubula nee tandane mɔɔ wɔ ewiade la anu hyɛle nsa, na ko yɛle kɛ subo, na ye ɛnwonle manle menli dɔɔnwo mɔɔ nlonle bie la wule.
66008012	Akee Nyamenle soanvolɛ ne mɔɔ tɔ zolɛ nna la bɔle ye aweɛne tendenle ne. Sɛnzɛne ne anu hyɛle nsa, bɛbɔle ko, na ye ɛdalɛ ne nlunle; siane ne anu hyɛle nsa, yɛɛ nwɔlɔra ne mɔ anu hyɛle nsa na bɛ nuhua ngoko nlunle. Yemɔti alehyenlɛ nu hyɛle nsa mɔɔ sɛnzɛne ɛnvinde ko anu a, yɛɛ aledwolɛ noko anu hyɛle nsa mɔɔ siane nee nwɔlɔra ɛnda ko anu a.
66008013	Na memanle me ti zo la, mendele kɔleɛ kpole bie mɔɔ ɛdu faa la ane wɔ nyamenle ne ako abo nehane kɛ ɔlɛtea nu yeaha kɛ, “Bɛ gyakɔ! Bɛ gyakɔ! Bɛ gyakɔ! Saa Nyamenle soanvolɛma nsa ne mɔɔ ɛha la bɔ bɛ aweɛne ndendenle ne mɔ anu a, bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛde azɛlɛ ye azo la, bɛ gyakɔ!”
66009001	Akee Nyamenle soanvolɛ ne mɔɔ tɔ zolɛ nnu la bɔle ye aweɛne tendenle ne anu. Na menwunle kɛ ɛwɔlɔra bie vi anwuma ɛdu ɛradɔ azɛlɛ ye azo, na bɛva azɛlɛ kuma ne mɔɔ ɛnlɛ ɔ bo la sanvɛ ne bɛwula ɔ sa nu.
66009002	Ɛwɔlɔra ne bukele azɛlɛ kuma ne anlenkɛ ne, na esike mungumungu mɔɔ le kɛ sendɔlɔra esike la vi nu vindele; ɛhye hedale sɛnzɛne ne anye na maanle nu yɛle kisii.
66009003	Abɛbɛ dɔɔnwo vi esike ne anu dwule aze na bɛmanle bɛ bɔlɔ mɔɔ le kɛ nyamenleakɛlɛ ɛdeɛ ne la.
66009004	Bɛzele bɛ kɛ bɛmmasɛkye ndile anzɛɛ mbaka nee nya amolɛ biala, na bɛkeka menli mɔɔ ɛnlɛ Nyamenle nzonlɛ ne bie bɛ nwoma azo la.
66009005	Bɛzele abɛbɛ ne mɔ kɛ bɛmmaku menli ɛhye mɔ, na bɛkeka bɛ toonwo siane nnu. Saa bɛka a ye nyane le kɛ nyamenleakɛlɛ ɛbɔ sonla la.
66009006	Mekɛ zɔhane menli bakpondɛ ewule abo zo, na bɛnrɛnwu ye; bɛbahulo kɛ bɛkɛwu, na ewule banriandi bɛ.
66009007	Saa ɛnea abɛbɛ ne mɔ a bɛle kɛ mgbɔnwɔ mɔɔ bɛziezie bɛ kɛ bɛ nee bɛ kɔ konle la. Debie bie mɔɔ le kɛ ezukoa abɔtile la bobɔ bɛ ti, yɛɛ bɛ nyunlu maanle ne le kɛ sonla ɛdeɛ ne la.
66009008	Bɛ ti enrinli le kɛ raalɛ ti enrinli, yɛɛ bɛ gye le kɛ awenade gye.
66009009	Bɛ nwo abonle ne le kɛ asɛɛ bɛwula mbulalɛ adɛladeɛ la na saa bɛtu a bɛ ndɛba anu su kɛ mgbɔnwɔ mɔɔ ɛlɛtwili ehwili ahɔho la.
66009010	Bɛlɛ dualɛ kɛ nyamenleakɛlɛ, yɛɛ bɛbɔ. Bɛ dua ne mɔ a bɛfa bɛabɔ menli toonwo siane nnu a.
66009011	Bɛlɛ belemgbunli mɔɔ nea bɛ nwo zo a. Yemɔ a le azɛlɛ kuma ne mɔɔ ɛnlɛ ɔ bo la soanvolɛ ne. Ye duma wɔ Hibulu nu a le “Abadɔn.” Giliki nu noko a, bɛfɛlɛ ye “Apɔleɔn”
66009012	Alumua anwubɛnyunlu ne awieleɛ ɛne. Ɛhye anzi yeha anwubɛnyunlu ɛzulolɛ nwiɔ mɔɔ bara a.
66009013	Nyamenle soanvolɛ ne mɔɔ tɔ zolɛ nsia la bɔle ye aweɛne tendenle ne. Na mendele kɛ ɛnelɛ bie vi ezukoa azukponle ne mɔɔ wɔ Nyamenle anyunlu ɛkɛ ne la mgbɛnezo nna ne mɔ anu vindele.
66009014	Ɛnelɛ ne zele Nyamenle soanvolɛ ne mɔɔ lɛ aweɛne tendenle ne mɔɔ tɔ zolɛ nsia la kɛ, “Sianyizianyi Nyamenle soanvolɛma nna ne mɔɔ bɛkyekye bɛ wɔ azule kpole ‘Yufileti’ anloa la!”
66009015	Bɛzianyinle bɛ, ɔluakɛ bɛvale bɛ bɛziele ɛkɛ ne kɛ dɔnehwele ne ala anu, kenle ko ne ala, siane ne ala anu, wɔ ɛvolɛ ne ala anu, bɛhyɛ menli mɔɔ wɔ ewiade la anu nsa na bɛhu nuhua ko.
66009016	Mendele kɛ sogyama mɔɔ dede mgbɔnwɔ zo la angome le mgbe ngoko ɛya nwiɔ.
66009017	Wɔ yekile ne anu, menwunle sogyama ne mɔ kɛ bɛdede mgbɔnwɔ ne mɔ azo, na kɛ bɛde la ɛne: bɛwulowula mbulalɛ akɛnrazo enyinlike mɔɔ le woonwu kɛ senle, buluwu kɛ “safaya”, yɛɛ guanye kɛ sɔlefa la. Mgbɔnwɔ ne mɔ ati le kɛ awenade ti, na senle, esike, yɛɛ sɔlefa vi bɛ nloa anu finde.
66009018	Bɛvale senle ne, esike ne, yɛɛ sɔlefa ne mɔɔ vi mgbɔnwɔ ne mɔ anloa anu finde la bɛhyɛle aleɛabo amra anu nsa na bɛhunle nuhua ko.
66009019	Mgbɔnwɔ ne mɔ anwosesebɛ wɔ bɛ nloa anu nee bɛ dua ati. Bɛ dua ne mɔ le kɛ nwɔlɛ. Dualɛ ne mɔ dedɛ bɛ ti, na yemɔ yɛɛ bɛfa bɛkeka menli ne mɔ a.
66009020	Aleɛabo amra mɔɔ hale, mɔɔ ewule ɛhye angu bɛ la, annu bɛ nwo, angyakyi bɛ ɛbɛla ɛtane ne mɔ mɔɔ bɛbɔ la. Bɛangyakyi awozonle ɛzonlenlɛ nee mmonle mɔɔ bɛva ezukoa nvutuke, dwɛtɛ fufule, ayera, bolɛ, nee baka a bɛyɛ, mɔɔ bɛnnwu debie, bɛnde edwɛkɛ na bɛadia la ɛzɔlɛ.
66009021	Eza menli ne mɔ annu bɛ nwo wɔ bɛ kɔdiawu nyɛleɛ, ngonyia, awule, nee adwɔmane ɛbɛlabɔlɛ nwo.
66010001	Akee menwunle Nyamenle soanvolɛ anwo ɛzulolɛ bieko kɛ ɔvi anwuma ɔlɛba. Ɔvea amungu nu na nyangondonle ɛdo ɛbɛnra ɔ ti; ɔ nyunlu ta kɛ sɛnzɛne, na ye ɛnantuo ɛdɔlɔ woonwu kɛ sua sika kpole bie mɔɔ senle la nu la.
66010002	Ɔlɛ nwoma ekyi ko mɔɔ bɛdɛlɛ nu la ɔ sa nu. Ɔvale ɔ gyakɛ fema ne ɔziele nyevile ne azo na yeava bɛne ne yeazie azɛlɛ ye azo,
66010003	na ɔvale ɛnelɛ mɔɔ dielie kɛ awenade ne la ɔdeanle nu kpole bie. Ɔdeanle nu ala la, maanle nu hulule fane nsuu.
66010004	Mɔɔ maanle nu hulule fane nsuu la, menyɛle kɛ mekɛlɛ, na mendele kɛ ɛnelɛ vi anwuma, ɔse, “Mɔɔ ɛdele wɔ ɛhululɛ fane nsuu ne anu la maa ɔha ɛ ti anu, mmakɛlɛ!”
66010005	Na Nyamenle soanvolɛ ne mɔɔ menwunle kɛ ɔgyi nyevile nee azɛlɛ zo la manle ɔ sa fema ne zo anwuma
66010006	na ɔvuale ɔhilele tease Nyamenle ne mɔɔ bɔle anwuma nee nuhua debie biala, azɛlɛ nee zolɛ debie biala, nee nyevile nee nuhua ninyɛne muala la kɛ, “Aze ɛzilɛ bieko ɛnle ɛkɛ!
66010007	Saa Nyamenle soanvolɛ ne mɔɔ tɔ zolɛ nsuu la bɔ ye aweɛne tendenle ne anu a, Nyamenle ngyehyɛlɛ ne mɔɔ vea ɛkɛ ne la bara nuhua, kɛmɔ ɔhanle ɔhilele ye sonvolɛma kpɔmanvolɛma la.”
66010008	Akee ɛnelɛ ne mɔɔ mendele kɛ ɔvi anwuma ɔlɛtendɛ yeahile me la zele me bieko kɛ, “Kɔlie nwoma ne mɔɔ bɛdɛlɛ nu, mɔɔ Nyamenle soanvolɛ ne mɔɔ gyi nyevile ne nee azɛlɛ ye azo la lɛ ye ɔ sa nu la.”
66010009	Yemɔti mengɔle Nyamenle soanvolɛ ne anwo ɛkɛ na menzele ye kɛ ɔva nwoma ekyi ne ɔmaa me. Na ɔzele me kɛ, “Die na di. Ɔbayɛ ɛ nloa anu menlemenle kɛ dɔdɔ, na ɔdwu ɛ kunlu a ɔbayɛ ɛnwonle.”
66010010	Menliele nwoma ekyi ne wɔ Nyamenle soanvolɛ ne asa anu na menlile, na ɔyɛle me nloa anu menlemenle. Na mɔɔ ɔdwule me kunlu la ɔyɛle ɛnwonle.
66010011	Na bɛzele me kɛ, “Ɔwɔ kɛ ɛkɔbɔ Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne mɔɔ fane maanle maanle, aneɛ aneɛ, menli ngakyile, nee arelemgbunli nwo la nolo bieko.”
66011001	Akee bɛvale baka mɔɔ zɔho kpɔma na bɛfa bɛsuzu debie la bɛmanle me na bɛzele me kɛ, “Dwazo na suzu Nyamenle Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne nee azukponle ne, na tia menli mɔɔ ɛlɛsonle sua ne anu la.
66011002	Anrɛɛ mmasuzu alie nwo ɛkɛ ne ɛboka nwolɛ, ɔboalekɛ bɛva ɛkɛ ne bɛmaa bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnzonle Nyamenle la. Zɛhae menli barava Suakpole Nwuanzanwuanza ye siane abulanla nee nwiɔ na bɛazie menli mɔɔ wɔ zolɛ la.
66011003	Mebamaa me dasevolɛma nwiɔ aheda ɛrele arabɔ Nyamenle edwɛkɛ ne nolo kenle apenle ko ɛya nwiɔ abulasia (1260).”
66011004	Dasevolɛma nwiɔ ne a le “ɔlivi” mbaka nwiɔ ne nee kɛnlaneɛ mbaka nwiɔ ne mɔɔ gyigyi Awulae mɔɔ lɛ azɛlɛ ye la anyunlu ɛkɛ ne la.
66011005	Saa awie se kɛ ɔsɛkye bɛ a, senle vi bɛ nloa anu finde na ɔsɛkye bɛ kpɔvolɛma ne mɔ; saa awie bɔ kpɔkɛ kɛ ɔsɛkye bɛ a bɛbahu ye.
66011006	Bɛlɛ tumi bɛto anwuma nu mɔɔ ezule ɛndɔ mekɛ tendenle biala mɔɔ bɛlɛka Nyamenle nrɛlaleɛ ne la. Eza bɛlɛ azɛlɛ ye azo nzule biala anwo zo tumi, bɛkola bɛkakyi ye bɛmaa ɔyɛ mogya; yɛɛ bɛlɛ tumi bɛfa ewule ngakyile biala bɛbato azɛlɛ ye azo wɔ mekɛ biala mɔɔ bɛkulo la.
66011007	Saa bɛwie nrɛlaleɛ ne ka a, nane ne mɔɔ vi azɛlɛ kuma ne mɔɔ ɛnlɛ ɔ bo la anu la bavinde na ɔ nee bɛ araho. Ɔbali bɛ nwo zo konim na yeahu bɛ,
66011008	na bɛ avunli baha suakpole ne mɔɔ bɛbɔle bɛ Awulae ne meanubaka nu wɔ zolɛ la guabile ne azo. Suakpole zɔhane duma, bɛbavɛlɛ ye kɛ, sɛbe, Sodɔm anzɛɛ Yigyibiti.
66011009	Menli vi maanle maanle zo, aneɛ aneɛ nu, mbusua ekpunli ekpunli nee menli ngakyile kɔsɔɔti anu baranlea bɛ avunli ne kenle nsa nee foa, na bɛnrɛmaa adenle bɛnrɛmaa bɛnrɛzie bɛ.
66011010	Menli mɔɔ wɔ azɛlɛ ye azo la bali fɛlɛko kɛ menli nwiɔ zɔhane ɛwu a. Bɛbali fɛlɛko, bɛ nye balie, na bɛava ahyɛlɛ ninyɛne bɛamaa bɛ nwo ngoko, ɔboalekɛ Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛma nwiɔ zɔhane yɛle ngyegyelɛ kpalɛ manle aleɛabo amra amuala.
66011011	Na kenle nsa nee foa ne anzi, ngoane ɛnwomenle vi Nyamenle ɛkɛ rawolole bɛ nu, na bɛdwazole, na ɛzulolɛ kpole hanle bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnwunle bɛ la amuala.
66011012	Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛma nwiɔ ne dele kɛ ɛnelɛ kpole bie vi anwuma, ɔse, “Bɛrɛla anwuma ɛke!” Na mɔɔ bɛ kpɔvolɛma ne mɔ anye gyi bɛ nwo ala la, amungu ravale bɛ hɔle anwuma.
66011013	Mekɛ ne anu ala, azɛlɛ kpusule kpole bie; suakpole ne anu hyɛle bulu na ko zɛkyele bɔkɔɔ. Menli apenle nsuu wule azɛlɛkpusulɛ ne anu. Na menli mɔɔ hale la ahonle dule kpole na bɛyeyɛle Nyamenle mɔɔ wɔ anwuma la.
66011014	Anwubɛnyunlu ne mɔɔ tɔ zolɛ nwiɔ la awieleɛ ɛne. Akee anwubɛnyunlu ne mɔɔ tɔ zolɛ nsa la a ɛlɛba la.
66011015	Akee Nyamenle soanvolɛ ne mɔɔ tɔ zolɛ nsuu la bɔle ye aweɛne tendenle ne anu. Na ɛnelɛ mgbole dɔɔnwo bie vi anwuma hanle kɛ, “Azɛlɛ ye azo tumi muala ɛyɛ Awulae nee yɛ Mɛzaya ne ɛdeɛ; ɔbali belemgbunli ɛvolɛ mɔɔ ɛnlɛ awieleɛ!”
66011016	Mgbanyima abulanwiɔ nee nna ne mɔɔ dede bɛ arelemgbunli mbia zo wɔ Nyamenle anyunlu ɛkɛ ne la dule guale na bɛbutubutule bɛ nyunlu aze bɛzonlenle Nyamenle
66011017	bɛhanle kɛ, “Awulae Nyamenle Bedevinli mɔɔ ɛnee ɛwɔ ɛkɛ na ɛwɔ ɛkɛ kɛkala a! Yɛyɛ wɔ mo kɛ wɔmaa wɔ tumi ne zo na wɔbɔ ɔ bo kɛ ɛdi belemgbunli a!
66011018	Ɛya ɛwolo bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛnzonle Nyamenle la, noko wɔ ɛya kenle ne ɛdwu. Mekɛ ɛdwu mɔɔ ɛbua mɔwuamra ndɛne na ɛmaa wɔ sonvolɛma, kpɔmanvolɛma, nee wɔ menli kɔsɔɔti, ngakula nee mgbanyinli, mɔɔ sonle wɔ la ahatualɛ mɔɔ fɛta la a. Mekɛ ɛdwu mɔɔ akee ɔwɔ kɛ ɛsɛkye bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛsɛkye azɛlɛ ye la a.”
66011019	Na bɛbukele Nyamenle Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne mɔɔ wɔ anwuma lɔ la, na Ngyekyeleɛ Ɛlɛka ne anwo lale ɛkɛ ne wienyi. Na ɛsɛlɛmanye kpakyekpakyele, maanle nu hulule, azɛlɛ kpusule, na ezuawolɛ dɔle kpole bie.
66012001	Akee nwanwane sɛkɛlɛneɛ kpole bie vindele anwomanyunlu. Raalɛ bie mɔɔ ɛva sɛnzɛne ne ɛyɛ ɛdanlɛ ɛheda, ɔ gyakɛ gyigyi siane ne azo, na yeva nwɔlɔra bulu nee nwiɔ yeyɛ abɔtile yebɔ la
66012002	ɛvo awolɛ zo, na ye awolɛ nyane ne ɛmaa ɔlɛsu yeadeɛdea nu.
66012003	Nwanwane sɛkɛlɛneɛ ɛzulolɛ bieko vindele anwomanyunlu. Nane kɔkɔlɛ anwo ɛzulolɛ bie mɔɔ le kɛ ɛlɛnrɛne la lua anwomanyunlu lɔ. Ɔ ti le nsuu, ye mɛne bulu, yɛɛ etile ko biala bɔ abɔtile.
66012004	Ɔvale ɔ dua ɔhyɛle nwɔlɔra mɔɔ wɔ anwomanyunlu la anu ekpunli nsa na ɔpianle ko ɔguale aze. Akee ɔragyinlanle raalɛ ne mɔɔ ɛvo awolɛ zo la anyunlu ɛkɛ ne kɛ saa ɔwo a yeahye kakula ne yeali.
66012005	Raalɛ ne wole ralɛ nrenya, mɔɔ bava tumi kpole azie maanle maanle kɔsɔɔti a. Na bɛvale kakula ne bɛhɔmanle Nyamenle wɔ ye belemgbunli ebia kpole ne azo lɔ.
66012006	Raalɛ ne nriandile hɔle ɛsɛlɛ ne azo, ɛleka bie mɔɔ Nyamenle ɛsiezie ɛmaa ye la, ɛkɛ ne yɛɛ ɔbanlea ye gyɛlɛɛnye yeali ye adane kenle apenle ko, ɛya nwiɔ abulasia a(1260).
66012007	Akee konle zile anwuma lɔ. Nyamenle soanvolɛ kpanyinli Maekeɛle nee ɔ sa zo Nyamenle soanvolɛma nee nane anwo ɛzulolɛ ne nee ɔdaye ye soanvolɛma honle.
66012008	Maekeɛle nee ɔ sa zo lile nane ne anwo zo konim. Yemɔti bɛdule nane ne nee ye soanvolɛma ne amuala bɛvile anwuma lɔ.
66012009	Bɛvuandinle nane anwo ɛzulolɛ ne mɔɔ le kɛ ɛlɛnrɛne la bɛdole azɛlɛ ye azo. Yemɔ a le mɔmoane ɛwɔlɛ ne mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye Abɔnsam anzɛɛ Seetan, mɔɔ ɛbɛlɛbɛla ewiade amra amuala la. Bɛvuandinle ye soanvolɛma ne mɔ noko bɛguale azɛlɛ ye azo.
66012010	Akee mendele ɛnelɛ kpole bie vi anwuma, ɔse, “Bɔ zo mɔɔ Nyamenle ngoanelielɛ ne ɛra a! Akee Nyamenle ɛhile ye tumi ne kɛ ɔle Belemgbunli. Akee yehile ye Mɛzaya tumi ne! Ɔluakɛ bɛvuandi mɔɔ gyi Nyamenle anyunlu nɔɔzo nee ewiazo toɔdoa yɛ mediema ne mɔ la bɛde aze.
66012011	Yɛ mediema ne mɔ ɛlua Boaneralɛ ne mogya ne azo nee nɔhalɛ edwɛkɛ ne mɔɔ bɛlile nwolɛ daselɛ la azo ɛli ɔ nwo zo konim, ɔluakɛ bɛanzulo kɛ bɛkɛva bɛ ngoane bɛkɛdo aze.
66012012	Zɔhane ati bɛmɛ anwumaneamra, nee bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛwɔ zolɛ la amuala, bɛli fɛlɛko! Na bɛmɛ azɛlɛ nee nyevile, bɛ gyakɔ! Ɔluakɛ Abɔnsam ɛdwu ɛra bɛ nwo lɔ, na ɛya kpole wɔ ye nuhua, ɔboalekɛ ɔze kɛ ye mekɛ ɛha ekyi bie ala.”
66012013	Mɔɔ nane anwo ɛzulolɛ ne nwunle kɛ bɛvuandi ye bɛde azɛlɛ ye azo la, ɔbɔle ɔ bo kɛ ɔkpondɛ raalɛ ne mɔɔ wole ralɛ nrenya ne la yeahu ye.
66012014	Na bɛmanle raalɛ ne kɔleɛ ndɛbalɛ mgbole nwiɔ, amaa yeahola tu ɔvi ɛwɔlɛ ne anwo ɛkɛ yeahɔ ɛsɛlɛ zo lɔ, ɛleka mɔɔ bɛbanlea ye gyɛlɛɛnye ɛvolɛ nsa nee foa la, amaa nane ne angola ɔ nwo zo kɔ bieko.
66012015	Nane ne kpule nzule kɛ azule la kɛ ɔmaa yeava raalɛ ne.
66012016	Na azɛlɛ boale raalɛ ne. Ɔmemenle nzule ne mɔɔ nane anwo ɛzulolɛ ne kpule la.
66012017	Nane anwo ɛzulolɛ ne vale raalɛ ne anwo ɛya kpole na ɔhɔle kɛ ɔkadoa ɔ mra mɔɔ ɛha, mɔɔ di Nyamenle mɛla ne azo na bɛdie nɔhalɛ ne mɔɔ Gyisɛse ɛye ɛhile la bɛdi la ɔ nee bɛ ahɔho.
66012018	Na nane anwo ɛzulolɛ ɛhye ragyinlanle ɛnweakpane ne azo wɔ nyevile ne anloa ɛkɛ.
66013001	Akee menwunle kɛ nane bie vi nyevile ne anu ɛlɛfo ara file zo. Ɔlɛ mɛne bulu yɛɛ ɔ ti le nsuu. Bɛbɔ ye mɛne ne mɔ ko biala abɔtile na bɛhɛlɛ duma ɛtane bie mɔɔ tia Nyamenle la bɛgua nwolɛ.
66013002	Nane ɛhye anyunlu le kɛ sobolɛ nyunlu, ɔ gyakɛ le kɛ ezizile gyakɛ, yɛɛ ɔ nloa le kɛ awenade nloa. Na nane anwo ɛzulolɛ ne mɔɔ zɔho ɛlɛnrɛne la vale ye tumi ne, ye belemgbunli ebia ne, yɛɛ ye anwosesebɛ kpole ne manle ye.
66013003	Nane ne ati ne mɔ ko zɔho debie mɔɔ bɛbɔle ye hanlɛ kpole bie na hanlɛ ne ɛhɔ la. Ɔ nwo yɛle ewiade amra amuala ɛzulolɛ na bɛdule bɛdoale ye.
66013004	Menli zonlenle nane anwo ɛzulolɛ ne mɔɔ le kɛ ɛlɛnrɛne la, ɔluakɛ yemɔ a yeva tumi yemaa nane ɛhendeɛ ne a. Bɛzonlenle nane ne ɔdaye, na bɛhanle kɛ, “Nwane a nee nane ye sɛ a? Nwane a kɛhola kɛgyinla ɔ nyunlu a?”
66013005	Nane ne lile ɔ ti siane abulanla nee nwiɔ, na bɛmanle ye adenle bɛmanle ɔhehanle munzule edwɛkɛ ɛtane ɛtane ɔtietiale Nyamenle.
66013006	Ɔdendɛle ɛtane ɔtiale Nyamenle, ɔbɔle ye duma ɛtane, na ɔhanle munzule edwɛkɛ ɔtiale ɛleka mɔɔ ɔde, nee bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛwɔ anwuma lɔ la amuala.
66013007	Bɛmanle ye adenle kɛ ɔ nee Nyamenle menli ne ɛho na ɔli bɛ nwo zo konim, na bɛmanle ye tumi wɔ maanle biala, aneɛ biala, abusua ekpunli biala nee menli ngakyile kɔsɔɔti anwo zo.
66013008	Menli mɔɔ wɔ ewiade la amuala bazonle ye. Bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛangɛlɛ bɛ aluma wɔ Boaneralɛ ne mɔɔ bɛhunle ye la ngoane buluku ne anu kolaa na bɛabɔ ewiade la a bazonle ye a.
66013009	Zɔhane ati, ɛdawɔ mɔɔ ɛlɛ ɛnzonlɛ la, tie!
66013010	Awie mɔɔ ɔwɔ kɛ bɛkye ye nuokɛ la, bɛbahye ye nuokɛ; awie mɔɔ ɔwɔ kɛ wu dadeɛ nloa la, bawu dadeɛ nloa. Ɛhye kile kɛ ɔwɔ kɛ Nyamenle menli ne nyia abotane, gyinla bɛ nwo, si ahonle, na bɛnyia diedi.
66013011	Akee menwunle kɛ nane ko noko vi azɛlɛ bo ɛlɛfinde ara. Ɔlɛ mɛne nwiɔ kɛ boane ɛdeɛ ne la, noko ɔtendɛ a ɔ ne le kɛ nane anwo ɛzulolɛ ne mɔɔ le kɛ ɛlɛnrɛne la.
66013012	Tumi kpole ne mɔɔ alumua nane ne lɛ la yɛɛ ɔfa ɔyɛ gyima a. Na ɔmanle bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛde azɛlɛ ye azo la amuala zonlenle alumua nane ne mɔɔ bɛbɔle ye hanlɛ na hanlɛ ne ɛhɔ la.
66013013	Nane ɛhye mɔɔ tɔ zolɛ nwiɔ la yɛle nwanwane ninyɛne mgbole; ɔmanle senle bɔbɔ vi anwuma rale azɛlɛ ye azo manle menli kɔsɔɔti nwunle ye.
66013014	Ɔluale ngonyia ɛhye mɔ mɔɔ bɛmanle ye adenle bɛmanle ɔluale alumua nane ne anwo zo ɔyele la azo ɔbɛlɛbɛlale menli mɔɔ wɔ ewiade la amuala. Nane ɛhye mɔɔ tɔ zolɛ nwiɔ la zele menli kɔsɔɔti kɛ bɛyɛ ananze mɔɔ zɔho nane ne mɔɔ bɛbɔle ye hanlɛ kpole noko ɔtɛte ngoane nu la.
66013015	Bɛmanle adenle bɛmanle nane ɛhye mɔɔ tɔ zolɛ nwiɔ la liele ɛnwomenle guale alumua nane ne ananze ne azo, amaa ananze ne adendɛ. Eza bɛmanle ye adenle bɛmanle ɔhunle bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛanzonle alumua nane ne ananze ne la amuala.
66013016	Nane ne manle menli kɔsɔɔti, ngakula nee mgbanyinli, sukoavolɛma nee ehyianvolɛma, ahanra nee alehelɛ, nyianle nzonlɛ wɔ bɛ sa fema ne anwo anzɛɛ bɛ nwoma azo.
66013017	Ɛdawɔ mɔɔ ɛnlɛ nzonlɛ ne mɔɔ le nane ne duma anzɛɛ ye sɛkɛlɛneɛ ne bie la, ɛngola ɛnli gua.
66013018	Ɛhye hyia maa nrɛlɛbɛ. Mɔɔ lɛ ndelebɛbo la kola sese nwu nane ne nɔma ne abo, ɔboalekɛ nɔma ne le sonla duma. Nɔma ne a le ɛya nsia abulasia nee nsia (666)
66014001	Akee mekado me nye la ɛnee Boaneralɛ ne gyi Boka Zayɔn azo; ɔ nee menli apenle ngoko ɛya ko, abulanla nee nna (144,000) mɔɔ bɛhɛlɛ ɔdaye ye duma yɛɛ Selɛ ne duma wɔ bɛ nwoma azo la a gyi ɛkɛ a.
66014002	Na mendele ɛnelɛ bie vi anwuma mɔɔ dielie kɛ azule mɔɔ lua awolɛ zo ɛlɛsonyi agua na ɔlɛkulu kɛ bokile ezule la. Eza ɛnelɛ ne mɔɔ mendele la le kɛ menli dɔɔnwo ɛlɛbɔ getaa,
66014003	na bɛlɛto edwɛne fofolɛ bie wɔ belemgbunli ebia kpole ne anyunlu wɔ tease abɔdeɛ nna ne nee mgbanyima ne mɔ anwo ɛkɛ. Bɛdabɛ menli apenle ngoko ɛya ko abulanla nee nna ɛhye, mɔɔ bɛlie bɛ ngoane bɛvi azɛlɛ ye azo la ala a ɛhola ɛzukoa edwɛne ne a.
66014004	Bɛmɛ a bɛle menli mɔɔ bɛzie bɛ nwo bɔkɔbɔkɔ mɔɔ bɛanva bɛ nwo bɛanga raalɛ biala a; bɛle amunli bɔkɔɔ. Bɛmɛ yɛɛ ɛleka biala mɔɔ Boaneralɛ ne ɛlɛkɔ la bɛdoa ye a. Bɛmɛ a bɛlie bɛ ngoane bɛvi aleɛabo amra avinli kɛ bɛle menli mɔɔ bɛlumua bɛva bɛ bɛrɛlɛ Nyamenle nee Boaneralɛ ne a.
66014005	Bɛtɛbɔle adalɛ ɛlɛ, ɔluakɛ bɛ nwo te bɔkɔɔ.
66014006	Eza menwunle kɛ Nyamenle soanvolɛ ko ɛdu faa lua anwomanyunlu, na ɔlɛ damɛnlangoate nrɛlaleɛ ne, mɔɔ le Edwɛkpa ne ɔlɛba yearabɔ ye nolo yeahile menli ngakyile, mbusua ekpunli ekpunli, aneɛ ngakyile, nee maanle maanle kɔsɔɔti mɔɔ wɔ aleɛabo la.
66014007	Na ɔdeanle nu ɔhanle kɛ, “Bɛzulo Nyamenle, na bɛye ye ayɛlɛ. Ɔluakɛ mekɛ ne ɛdwu mɔɔ ɔbabua aleɛabo amra ndɛne a. Bɛzonle Nyamenle mɔɔ bɔle anwuma, azɛlɛ, nyevile, nee azule muala la.”
66014008	Nyamenle soanvolɛ ko noko ɔdaye ɔdoa ye na ɔse, “Yebɔ! Suakpole Babelɔn mɔɔ ɛlie duma la ɛbɔ bɔkɔɔ! Ɔmanle maanle maanle kɔsɔɔti anu amra zukoale ye na bɛvale adwɔmanebɔlɛ bɛhakyile nza bɛnlonle!”
66014009	Nyamenle soanvolɛ ne mɔɔ tɔ zolɛ nsa la ɔdaye ɔdoa alumua ɛdeɛ nwiɔ ne, na ɔlɛka ye kpole kpalɛ kɛ, “Mɔɔ kɛzonle nane ne nee ye ananze ne, na ɔkɛva ye sɛkɛlɛneɛ ne bie ɔkɛyɛ ɔ nwoma azo anzɛɛ ɔ sa anwo la
66014010	kɛnwu kɛ Nyamenle ɛya ne mɔɔ gyi ye ɛya dwora ne anu la ɛzulolɛ si de la. Bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛyɛ zɔhane deɛ ne la, bɛbahile bɛ nyane wɔ senle nee sɔlefa nu wɔ soanvolɛma nwuanzanwuanza nee Boaneralɛ ne anyunlu.
66014011	Senle ne mɔɔ yelɛyela bɛ la anu esike ne kɔ anwuma anwuma dahuu mɔɔ ɔ bo ɛmpɛ ɛlɛ a. Bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛsonle nane ne nee ye ananze ne, na bɛlɛ ye duma ne sɛkɛlɛneɛ ne bɛ nwo la anwo ɛnrɛdɔ bɛ ɛlɛ alehyenlɛ nee aledwolɛ muala.”
66014012	Ɛhye kile kɛ ɔwɔ kɛ Nyamenle menli ne mɔɔ di ye mɛla ne azo na bɛdi nɔhalɛ bɛmaa Gyisɛse la bɔ mɔdenle gyinla kpundii.
66014013	Akee mendele ɛnelɛ vi anwuma, ɔse, “Kɛlɛ ɛhye: Nyilalɛ ɛha bɛdabɛ mɔɔ ɔvi ɛnɛ mɔɔ kɔ la Awulae ɛzonlenlɛ ti bɛkɛwu la!” Na Sunsum ne liele zolɛ kɛ, “Nyilalɛ ɛha bɛ amgba! Bɛbalie bɛ ɛnwomenle wɔ bɛ gyima ɛsesebɛ ne mɔ mɔɔ bɛyɛ la anwo, ɔluakɛ bɛ gyima kpalɛ mɔɔ bɛdi la li bɛ nzi.”
66014014	Akee mendole me nye, na menwunle amungu fufule nwohyee bie, na debie bie mɔɔ le kɛ sonla la de zolɛ, ɔbɔ ezukoa abɔtile na ɔlɛ ɛdedadeɛ nlane bie ɔ sa nu.
66014015	Nyamenle soanvolɛ ko noko vi Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne anu vindele na ɔdeanle nu ɔzele mɔɔ de amungu ne azo la kɛ, “Fa wɔ ɛdedadeɛ ne te bɛyɔba ne; ɛbuhenle ne ɛdwu, ɔluakɛ azɛlɛ ye azo bɛyɔba ne ɛwie bolo.”
66014016	Na mɔɔ de amungu ne azo la denrɛle ɔ sa na ɔdele azɛlɛ ye azo bɛyɔba ne.
66014017	Menwunle kɛ Nyamenle soanvolɛ ko noko ɔdaye ɔvi anwuma lɔ Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne anu yevinde. Ɔdaye noko ɔlɛ ɛdedadeɛ nlane ko ɔ sa nu.
66014018	Akee Nyamenle soanvolɛ ko, mɔɔ yemɔ a ɔnea senle ne la vi azukponle ne abo vindele. Ɔdeanle nu ɔzele mɔɔ lɛ ɛdedadeɛ nlane ne la kɛ, “Ewiade vanye ma ne ɛbolo na fa wɔ dadeɛ ne te bɛ muala!”
66014019	Zɔhane ati Nyamenle soanvolɛ ne denrɛle ɔ sa wɔ azɛlɛ ye azo, ɔdele vanye ma ne mɔ amuala, na ɔvuandinle ɔguale Nyamenle ɛya kpole ne nwanye melahyinli ne anu.
66014020	Melahyinli ne hwihwinle vanye ma ne anu nzule guale suakpole ne kandiba lɔ, na mogya mɔɔ ye kuma kɛyɛ mita nwiɔ la denrɛle zenle kɛ azule mɔɔ ye tendenle kɛyɛ kilomita ɛya nsa (300) la.
66015001	Akee menwunle debie ɛzulolɛ bie wɔ anwomanyunlu, mɔɔ le kpole na eza ɔyɛ nwanwane a. Menwunle Nyamenle soanvolɛma nsuu kɛ bɛlɛ amaneɛnwunlɛ ngakyile nsuu, mɔɔ le amaneɛnwunlɛ mɔɔ li amozi a, ɔluakɛ saa bɛmɛ bɛwie a ɛnee Nyamenle ɛya kpole ne ɛdwo.
66015002	Eza menwunle debie bie mɔɔ le kɛ nyevile anye kɔngyekɔngye kɛ neanleɛ mɔɔ bɛva senle bɛkpoto nu la. Akee menwunle bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛlile nane ne nee ye ananze ne nee nane ne mɔɔ ye duma le nɔma la anwo zo konim la. Bɛdedɛ getaa mɔɔ Nyamenle a ɛva ɛmaa bɛ la bɛ sa nu, na bɛgyigyi nyevile anye kɔngyekɔngye kɛ neanleɛ la anwo.
66015003	Ɛnee bɛlɛto Nyamenle sonvolɛ Mosisi nee Boaneralɛ ne anwo edwɛne. Bɛse, “Awulae Nyamenle Bedevinli, wɔ nyɛleɛ yɛ ɛzulolɛ, ɔyɛ nwanwane! Damɛnlangoate Belemgbunli, wɔ ndenle le fɔɔnwo nee nɔhalɛ.
66015004	Awulae, nwane a ɛnrɛzulo wɔ a, nwane a kɛzu kpolera kɛ ɛnle kpole a? Ɛ ngomekye a ɛle nwuanzanwuanza a. Maanle maanle kɔsɔɔti badu agua ɛ nyunlu azonle wɔ, ɔboalekɛ awie biala ɛnwu kɛ ɛdi pɛlepɛle.”
66015005	Ɛhye anzi memanle me nye zo na menwunle kɛ bɛbuke Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne mɔɔ wɔ anwuma lɔ la, na Nyamenle daselɛlilɛ Ndanlɛ Sua ne wɔ nu.
66015006	Nyamenle soanvolɛma nsuu ne mɔɔ wula adɛladeɛ fufule nwohyee na bɛva ezukoa nvutuke akyeso bɛhye bɛ avinli la vi Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne anu vindele, bɛdedɛ amaneɛnwunlɛ ngakyile nsuu ne bɛ sa nu.
66015007	Tease abɔdeɛ nna ne anu ko vale ezukoa nvutuke dwora nsuu ne mɔɔ Damɛnlangoate Nyamenle ne mɔɔ wɔ ɛkɛ dahuu la ɛya ne wɔ nu la manle bɛ.
66015008	Nyamenle anyunlunyia ne nee ye tumi ne manle esike ngome yile sua ne, mɔɔ awie biala ɛngola nu wolo a, kyesɛ amaneɛnwunlɛ ngakyile nsuu ne mɔɔ li amozi, mɔɔ Nyamenle soanvolɛma nsuu ne lɛ la abo ɛdu.
66016001	Akee mendele ɛnelɛ kpole bie wɔ Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne anu kɛ ɔlɛka yeahile Nyamenle soanvolɛma nsuu ne kɛ, “Bɛhɔ, bɛhɔwola Nyamenle ɛya ne mɔɔ wɔ dwora ne mɔ anu la bɛgua azɛlɛ ne azo!”
66016002	Nyamenle soanvolɛ ne mɔɔ lumua la hɔle na ɔhɔwolale ye dwora ɛdeɛ ne anu ɛya ne ɔguale azɛlɛ ne azo. Na nganlɛ mgbole mɔɔ fofo na ɔbɔ la vindele bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛlɛ nane ne sɛkɛlɛneɛ ne wɔ bɛ nwo nee bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛzonlenle ye ananze ne la anwo.
66016003	Nyamenle soanvolɛ ne mɔɔ tɔ zolɛ nwiɔ la wolale ye ɛdeɛ ne guale nyevile nu. Nyevile ne hakyile kɛ sonla mɔɔ ɛwu la mogya, na debie biala mɔɔ lɛ ngoane mɔɔ wɔ nyevile nu la wule.
66016004	Nyamenle soanvolɛ ne mɔɔ tɔ zolɛ nsa la wolale ye dwora ɛdeɛ ne anu ɛya ne guale azule nee nzubula nu, na bɛhakyile mogya.
66016005	Mendele kɛ Nyamenle soanvolɛ ne mɔɔ nea nzule zo la se, “O Nwuanzanwuanzanli mɔɔ ɛnee ɛwɔ ɛkɛ na ɛwɔ ɛkɛ dahuu a, wɔli pɛlepɛle bɔkɔɔ wɔ wɔ ndɛnebualɛ nu.
66016006	Bɛhanle Nyamenle menli ne nee kpɔmanvolɛma mogya bɛguale, na ɛdawɔ noko wɔmaa bɛ mogya kɛ bɛnlo. Mɔɔ bɛnyia ye la fɛta bɛ!”
66016007	Na mendele ɛnelɛ bie vi azukponle ne anwo ɛkɛ, ɔse, “Awulae Nyamenle Bedevinli, wɔ ndɛnebualɛ le nɔhalɛ, ɔle fɔɔnwo amgba!”
66016008	Nyamenle soanvolɛ ne mɔɔ tɔ zolɛ nna la noko wolale ye ɛdeɛ ne guale sɛnzɛne ne azo manle ɔnyianle adenle ɔvale ye wuluwulu ne ɔyelɛyelale menli.
66016009	Menli nwo dwele bɛ kpalɛ, na bɛdendɛle ɛtane bɛtiale Nyamenle, mɔɔ lɛ tumi wɔ amaneɛnwunlɛ ngakyile ɛhye mɔ azo la duma ne. Na bɛangyakyi ɛtane ɛyɛlɛ, bɛanye Nyamenle ayɛlɛ kɛ ɔle bedevinli.
66016010	Nyamenle soanvolɛ ne mɔɔ tɔ zolɛ nnu la wolale ye dwora ne anu ɛya ne guale nane ne belemgbunli ebia ne azo. Awozinli rahedale nane ne belemgbunlililɛ zo, na menli vale abodelɛ kposale bɛ tafinlima.
66016011	Bɛbɔle anwuma Nyamenle ne sasa wɔ bɛ nganlɛ ne mɔ nee bɛ abodelɛ ne ati, noko bɛannu bɛ nwo bɛangyakyi ninyɛndane ɛyɛlɛ.
66016012	Nyamenle soanvolɛ ne mɔɔ tɔ zolɛ nsia la ɔdaye ɔwolale mɔɔ wɔ ye dwora ɛdeɛ ne anu la ɔguale azukpole “Yufileti” anu. Ɛkɛ ne ala azule ne sesanle, ɔwele resee, amaa arelemgbunli mɔɔ vi aduduleɛ la anyia adenle araze.
66016013	Na menwunle sunsum nsa bie mɔɔ anwo ɛnde na bɛle kɛ ahɛlɛne la kɛ bɛvi nane anwo ɛzulolɛ ne mɔɔ le kɛ ɛlɛnrɛne la anloa anu, nane ko ne noko anloa anu, yɛɛ kpɔmanvolɛ alane ne anloa anu bɛlɛfinde bɛara.
66016014	Bɛle sunsum ɛtane mɔɔ kola yɛ nwanwane ninyɛne a. Na bɛluolua nu bɛkpɔsa arelemgbunli mɔɔ wɔ ewiade la amuala anwo zo na bɛboɔboa bɛ nloa kɛ bɛbaho Nyamenle Bedevinli ne Kenle kpole ne anu.
66016015	“Bɛdie! Mebara bɛ nwo zo kɛ awule la! Na nyilalɛ ɛha sonla ne mɔɔ ɛnee ɔ nye gyi zolɛ na ɔnea ye ninyɛne boɛ la, amaa yeanlɛ ɔ nwo zɔ wɔ menli nu na ɔ nyunlu angua aze!”
66016016	Na sunsum nsa ɛhye mɔ mɔɔ anwo ɛnde la boɔboale arelemgbunli ne mɔ anloa wɔ ɛleka bie mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye Hibulu nu “Amagɛdɔn” la.
66016017	Akee Nyamenle soanvolɛ ne mɔɔ tɔ zolɛ nsuu la wolale ye ɛdeɛ ne guale anwoma ne anu. Na ɛnelɛ kpole bie vi belemgbunli ebia kpole ne mɔɔ gyi Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua ne anu la anwo zele kɛ, “Bɛyɛ bɛwie!”
66016018	Na ɛsɛlɛmanye kpakyekpakyele, maanle nu hulule, na azɛlɛ kpusule kpole bie. Sumunli kɛ bɛbɔle sonla la, azɛlɛ ɛtɛkpusule kpole zɛhae ɛlɛ; ɛhye le azɛlɛ ɛkpusulɛ mɔɔ bo ɔ muala azo a.
66016019	Suakpole ne anu hyɛle nsa, yɛɛ maanle maanle azuamgbole ne mɔ kɔsɔɔti bɔle tɔɔ. Nyamenle hakyele mɔɔ suakpole Babelɔn ɛyɛ la, na ɔkpokpole ye ɛya ne kɔsɔɔti ɔguale ɔ ti zo.
66016020	Mbɔra muala minlinle, na awoka kɔsɔɔti hanle aze fɛɛnye, bɛ bo zo minlinle.
66016021	Ezuawolɛ mgbole mɔɔ ko to tone nu tɔno ɛya la dɔle bilididi guale menli nwo zo. Yemɔti menli bɔle Nyamenle sasa, ɔboalekɛ nyane ɛhye bole zolɛ.
66017001	Nyamenle soanvolɛma nsuu ne mɔɔ dedɛ dwora ne mɔ la anu ko rale me nwo ɛkɛ na ɔzele me kɛ, “Bɛla maa mengile wɔ kɛ bɛsi bɛadea tuutuunli ne mɔɔ ɛlie duma la, meka suakpole ne mɔɔ ɛlie duma mɔɔ bɛhye ye wɔ azudenle ne mɔ anloa la.
66017002	Ewiade arelemgbunli zukoale ye, nee ye bɔle adwɔmane ɛbɛla, na menli mɔɔ wɔ ewiade la amuala ɛyɛ mgbane kɛ bɛ nee ye ɛbɔ ye adwɔmane ɛbɛla ne a.”
66017003	Sunsum ne rawolole me, na Nyamenle soanvolɛ ne vale me hɔle ɛsɛlɛ bie azo. Ɛkɛ ne, menwunle raalɛ bie kɛ ɔde nane kɔkɔlɛ bie azo. Nane ne bɛhɛlɛhɛlɛ aluma ɛtane ɛtane mɔɔ tia Nyamenle la wɔ ɔ nwo. Nane ne ati le nsuu yɛɛ ye mɛne le bulu.
66017004	Raalɛ ne mɔɔ de zolɛ la heda arelemgbunli ɛdanlɛ kɔkɔlɛ, buluwu nee akɔlɛ ɛnlome afonla na yeva ezukoa nvutuke anwoneɛ, mgbɔba, yɛɛ avikpa yeziezie ɔ nwo. Ɔlɛ ezukoa nvutuke dwora ɔ sa nu. Munzule ninyɛne mgbane mgbane mɔɔ le bɛkyi nee ye adwɔmanebɔlɛ nwo ninyɛndane ngome a wɔ nu a.
66017005	Bɛhɛlɛ duma bie mɔɔ ye ndelebɛbo vea la bɛgua ɔ nwoma azo. Yemɔ a le, “Babelɔn mɔɔ ɛlie duma, tuutuuma bɛ nli nee ewiade bɛkyi ninyɛndane.”
66017006	Na menwunle kɛ raalɛ ne ɛbo. Nyamenle menli ne nee bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛ nɔhalɛlilɛ mɔɔ wɔ Gyisɛse anu la ati bɛhunle bɛ la mogya mɔɔ ɔnlonle la a ɛmaa yebo zɔhane a. Menwunle ye la, ɔzinle me nwo.
66017007	Nyamenle soanvolɛ ne bizale me kɛ, “Duzu ati a ɛhye ɛzi ɛ nwo ɛ? Mebahile wɔ raalɛ ne, nee nane ati nsuu ne mɔɔ lɛ mɛne bulu ne mɔɔ ɔde zolɛ la abo.
66017008	Nane ne mɔɔ ɔde zolɛ la anrɛɛ de aze, na kɛkala yewu. Na ɔvi azɛlɛ kuma ne mɔɔ ɛnlɛ ɔ bo la anu ɔbavinde yeahɔ yeamaa bɛazɛkye ye. Bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛwɔ ewiade ye anu na bɛangɛlɛ bɛ aluma wɔ teasema buluku ne anu, kolaa na bɛabɔ ewiade la nwu nane ne a ɔbayɛ bɛ azibɛnwo kɛ mekɛ bie ɛnee nane ne de aze, na kɛkala yewu, na eza ɔbavinde yeara bieko a.
66017009	“Ɛhye hyia maa nrɛlɛbɛ nee ndelebɛbo. Adile nsuu ne le awoka nsuu mɔɔ raalɛ ne de zolɛ a. Eza bɛle arelemgbunli nsuu:
66017010	nuhua nnu ɛbɔ aze, ko tɛdi ye belemgbunli ne, yɛɛ ko ne mɔɔ ɛha la bɔ zo mɔɔ bara a. Saa ɔba a, ɔnrɛli agyinla biala.
66017011	Na nane ne mɔɔ mekɛ bie ɛnee de aze, na kɛkala yewu la a le belemgbunli ne mɔɔ tɔ zolɛ mɔtwɛ la; na ɔdaye noko ɔbara yeamaa bɛazɛkye ye kɛ arelemgbunli nsuu ne mɔ la.
66017012	“Mɛne bulu ne mɔɔ ɛnwunle bɛ la le arelemgbunli bulu mɔɔ ɛtɛbɔle bɛ belemgbunlililɛ bo a; bɛbamaa bɛ adenle bɛamaa bɛ nee nane ne ali belemgbunli dɔnehwele ko ala.
66017013	Bɛdabɛ bulu ne bɛ muala bɛlɛ adwenle ko, yɛɛ bɛfa bɛ tumi ne nee bɛ belemgbunlililɛ ne bɛmaa nane ne.
66017014	Bɛ nee Boaneralɛ ne baho; na Boaneralɛ ne bali bɛ nwo zo konim, ɔboalekɛ ɔle awulae mɔ Awulae yɛɛ ɔle arelemgbunli Belemgbunli. Menli mɔɔ li ɔ nzi la bɛkpa nu bɛye bɛ, yɛɛ bɛle menli mɔɔ di nɔhalɛ a.”
66017015	Nyamenle soanvolɛ ne eza zele me kɛ, “Azule ne mɔ mɔɔ ɛnwunle kɛ tuutuunli ne de ɔ nloa la le maanle maanle, menli, aneɛ ngakyile, yɛɛ mbusua kɔsɔɔti.
66017016	Mɛne bulu ne mɔɔ ɛnwunle bɛ la, nee nane ne bakpɔ tuutuunli ne; bɛbalie debie biala mɔɔ ɔlɛ la bɛamaa yealɛ ɔ nwo zɔ; bɛbali ye nwonane ne na bɛado ye senle nu bɛayela ye bɔkɔɔ.
66017017	Ɔluakɛ Nyamenle ɛva ye gyimayɛlɛ nwo adwenle ɛwula bɛ ahonle nu, amaa bɛabɔ nu bɛayɛ ko, wɔ bɛ nyɛleɛ nu na bɛava bɛ tumi ne bɛamaa nane ne ali belemgbunli ahɔkpula mekɛ mɔɔ Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ ne kɛyɛ zɔhane la.
66017018	“Raalɛ ne noko mɔɔ ɛnwunle ye la a le suakpole ne mɔɔ sie arelemgbunli mɔɔ wɔ azɛlɛ ye azo la amuala la.”
66018001	Ɛhye anzi menwunle kɛ Nyamenle soanvolɛ ko noko vi anwuma ɛlɛdwu aze. Ɔlɛ tumi kpole, na kɛ ɔ nwo si ta la manle ewiade ye amuala yɛle wienyi.
66018002	Ɔvale ɛnelɛ kpole ɔhanle kɛ, “Yebɔ! Suakpole Babelɔn ɛbɔ bɔkɔɔ! Yeyɛ suadu, ɛnɛ sunsum ɛtane nee mbɔnsam a wɔ zolɛ a, yɛɛ nloma ɛtane anwo kpokpɔtɔɔ a wɔ zolɛ a.
66018003	Ɔluakɛ ɔvale adwɔmanebɔlɛ anyebolo ɔhilehilele menli kɔsɔɔti, ɔmanle bɛzɛkyele. Ewiade arelemgbunli kɔsɔɔti nee ye bɔle adwɔmane, yɛɛ ewiade gualilɛma luale ye anyebolo zo nyianle bɛ nwo!”
66018004	Na mendele ɛnelɛ bieko vi anwuma, ɔse, “Bɛvinde, me menli, bɛvi zolɛ bɛye bɛ nwo, anrɛɛ bɛkɛyɛ ye ɛtane ne bie, bɛkɛmaa ye munzule ne bie kɛha bɛ.
66018005	Ɔluakɛ bɛhuohua ye ɛtane ne mɔ anloa bɛmaa yehɔ anwuma kpalɛ, na Nyamenle ɛhakye ye amumuyɛ ne mɔ.
66018006	Bɛva mɔɔ ɔvale ɔyɛle bɛ la bie bɛyɛ ɔdaye, bɛdua ye kakɛ fane nwiɔ wɔ ye nyɛleɛ nwo, bɛmaa ɔnwu amaneɛ fane nwiɔ ɔdɛla mɔɔ ɔvale ɔhilele bɛ la.
66018007	Bɛmaa ɔde nyane na ye amaneɛnwunlɛ ne ɛyɛ kpole kɛ ye anyunlunyia nvoanle ne mɔɔ ɔnyianle, nee ye anwoneɛ ne mɔ mɔɔ ɔvale ɔyɛle ɔ nwo la. Kɛmɔ ɔde a ɔka ɔkile ɔ nwo kɛ, ‘Mele belemgbunli raalɛ! Menle kunlanvolɛ raalɛ, menrɛnwu nyane deɛ holɛ’ la,
66018008	zɔhane ala yɛɛ bɛmaa anwubɛnyunlu ɛdo ye dahuu a, ɔnwu nyane, anwonyane ɛbɔ ye, na ɔli sane, na bɛdo ye senle nu bɛyela ye, ɔboalekɛ Awulae Nyamenle ne mɔɔ bua ye ndɛne la le bedevinli.”
66018009	Bɛdabɛ arelemgbunli mɔɔ bɛwɔ ewiade, mɔɔ bɛ nee ye bɔle adwɔmane ɛbɛla, bɛyɛle anyebolo la, saa bɛnwu kɛ sua ne ɛlɛsi ayela la a, bɛbazu bɛadedɛ bɛ nwo bonrane nu.
66018010	Bɛ ahonle badu wɔ ye amaneɛnwunlɛ ne ati na bɛagyinla amozi bɛaha kɛ, “Ɔyɛ ɛzulolɛ! Ɔyɛ nwanwane! Sua bɔdenle mɔɔ le kɛ Babelɔn! Bɛva dɔnehwele ko ala bɛdea wɔ, bɛbɔ wɔ tɔɔ!”
66018011	Ewiade ye anu gualilɛma noko bali nyane na bɛazu ye, ɔluakɛ bɛnrɛnyia awie ɛnrɛdɔ bɛ ninyɛne ne bieko;
66018012	awie ɛnrɛdɔ bɛ ezukoa nvutuke, dwɛtɛ fufule anwoneɛ, nee avikpa, lenen ndanlɛ, arelemgbunli ndanlɛ kɔkɔlɛ, selekye, yɛɛ ago; bɛ adwinli ngɛnlɛma mɔɔ bɛva mbaka ngakyile bɛze, nee ninyɛne mɔɔ bɛva ɛzɛlɛ, ayera, kɔbele, bulalɛ, yɛɛ bolɛ memeamemea bɛyɛ la;
66018013	bɛ ninyɛne evuanlɛ mɔɔ le kɛ kabɛlɛ, dazia, ɛyɛlɛ, alufuanlɛ, yɛɛ sakyeɛ; nwanye, nwole, esamo, yɛɛ hwiiti; nlankɛ nee mboane, mgbɔnwɔ nee konle ehwili, ahanra, yɛɛ menli bɔbɔ, bɛnrɛnwu bie.
66018014	Bɛbaha bɛahile ye kɛ, “Wɔ anyelazo ne amuala ɛminli, yɛɛ wɔ anwonyia nee wɔ anwofɛlɛko kɔsɔɔti ɛminli, na ɛnrɛnyia bɛ bieko ɛlɛ!”
66018015	Gualilɛma ɛhye mɔ mɔɔ luale ye nee bɛ gualilɛ zo nyianle bɛ nwo la bagyinla amozi amozi, ɔboalekɛ bɛ ahonle badu wɔ ye amaneɛnwunlɛ ne ati. Bɛbazu bɛali nyane,
66018016	na bɛaha kɛ, “Ɔyɛ ɛzulolɛ! Ɔbo suakpole ɛhye anwo zo! Anrɛɛ ɔheda lenen ɛdakpa, arelemgbunli ndanlɛ kɔkɔlɛ nee buluwu nee akɔlɛ ɛnlome afonla na ɔfa anwoneɛ mɔɔ le kɛ ezukoa nvutuke nee avikpa ɔsiezie ɔ nwo!
66018017	Yemɔ a dɔnehwele ko ala ye anwonyia ne amuala ɛminli la!” Menli mɔɔ ka meli nee bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛyɛ gyima wɔ nu nee adendulɛma nee bɛdabɛ mɔɔ nyevile nye a bɛdidi la amuala gyinlanle amozi moa moa,
66018018	na mɔɔ bɛnwunle kɛ sua ne ɛlɛsi azɔ la, bɛhanle kɛ, “Suakpole biala ɛnle ɛkɛ mɔɔ nee suakpole ɛhye sɛ a.”
66018019	Bɛvale bɛ sa bɛguale bɛ ti zo bɛzunle bɛweweɛle bɛ nwo aze bɛhanle kɛ, “Ɔyɛ ɛzulolɛ! Ɔyɛ nwanwane, ɔbo suakpole ne anwo zo! Yemɔ ala a ɔle suakpole mɔɔ nyevile nu amra kɔ zolɛ a bɛnyia anwonyia a! Dɔnehwele ko ala yeyɛ suadu.”
66018020	Anwuma amra, bɛli fɛlɛko kɛ yebɔ a! Nyamenle menli, bɛli fɛlɛko; ɛzoanvolɛma nee Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛma, bɛli fɛlɛko! Ɔboalekɛ bɛdabɛ bɛ ti Nyamenle ɛdea ye wɔ mɔɔ ɔyɛle bɛ la anwo.
66018021	Akee Nyamenle soanvolɛ anwo ɛzulolɛ ko manle bolɛ totohyia ko mɔɔ le kɛ ɛdibolɛ la zo na ɔvuandinle ɔdole nyevile ne anu, ɔse: “Kɛ bɛbavuandi suakpole Babelɔn bɛado la ɛne, na bɛnrɛnwu ye bieko.”
66018022	Bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛbɔ getaa, dono nee edwɛnedolɛma; bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛbɔ fulutu nee aweɛne ndendenle la amuala, bɛnrɛde bɛ ne wɔ ɛkɛ ne bieko. Bɛnrɛnwu dwinvolɛ biala wɔ ɛkɛ ne bieko; abɛlɛ melahyinli mgbole ne mɔ amuala bagyinla!
66018023	Bɛnrɛzɔ kɛnlaneɛ wɔ zolɛ bieko ɛlɛ, yɛɛ bɛnrɛde atɔfolɛ nee ɔ hu bɛ ne wɔ zolɛ. Wɔ gualilɛma a ɛnee le menli mgbole wɔ ewiade a, na ɔvale ngonyia ɔbɛlɛbɛlale menli mɔɔ wɔ ewiade la amuala.
66018024	Ɔluakɛ Babelɔn yɛɛ bɛnwunle Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛma nee Nyamenle menli ne mogya a, yɛɛ bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛhunle bɛ wɔ ewiade la amuala mogya wɔ zolɛ.
66019001	Ɛhye anzi mendele debie bie mɔɔ le kɛ menli dɔɔnwo ane wɔ anwuma, bɛse, “Bɛye yɛ Nyamenle ne ayɛlɛ! Ngoanelielɛ, anyunlunyia, nee tumi le yɛ Nyamenle ne ɛdeɛ!
66019002	Ɔluakɛ ye ndɛnebualɛ le nɔhalɛ, ɔle fɔɔnwo! Yebua tuutuunli ne mɔɔ ɛlie duma na yeva ye adwɔmanebɔlɛ yezɛkye ewiade la ewule fɔlɛ. Nyamenle ɛdea ye, ɔluakɛ yehu Nyamenle sonvolɛma ne mɔ amuala.”
66019003	Eza bɛdeanle nu kɛ, “Bɛye Nyamenle ayɛlɛ! Esike ne mɔɔ vi suakpole ne ɛyelalɛ nu finde la dwazo bolonwonwo mɔɔ ɔngua ɛlɛ a!”
66019004	Mgbanyima abulanwiɔ nee nna ne nee tease abɔdeɛ nna ne dule guale na bɛzonlenle Nyamenle wɔ ye belemgbunli ebia kpole ne abo, na bɛhanle kɛ, “Amen! Bɛye Nyamenle ayɛlɛ!”
66019005	Ɛnelɛ bie vi belemgbunli ebia kpole ne anwo hanle kɛ, “Bɛmaa menli muala, mgbole nee ngyikyi, nee sonvolɛma mɔɔ sonle yɛ Nyamenle ne la ɛye yɛ Nyamenle ne ayɛlɛ!”
66019006	Akee mendele debie bie mɔɔ le kɛ menli dɔɔnwo ane, kɛ azule kpole bie mɔɔ lua awolɛ zo ɛlɛsonyi gua, na ɔlɛkulu kɛ bokile ezule la, bɛse, “Bɛye Nyamenle ayɛlɛ! Ɔluakɛ Awulae, yɛ Nyamenle Bedevinli ne le Belemgbunli!
66019007	Bɛmaa yɛ nye ɛlie na yɛli fɛlɛko; bɛmaa yɛyeyɛ ye kɛ ɔle kpole! Ɔluakɛ Boaneralɛ ne atɔfolɛlielɛ mekɛ ne ɛdwu, na ye atɔfolɛ nrenya ne ɛziezie ɔ nwo ɛwie.
66019008	Bɛmaa ye lenen ɛdanlɛ kɛnlɛma anye nwohyee kɛ ɔheda.” (Ɛdanlɛ kɛnlɛma ne a le Nyamenle menli ne ɛbɛla kpalɛ mɔɔ bɛbɔle la.)
66019009	Na Nyamenle soanvolɛ ne zele me kɛ, “Kɛlɛ ɛhye: Nyilalɛ ɛha bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛdo ɛsalɛ bɛvɛlɛ bɛ kɛ bɛrɛla Boaneralɛ ne atɔfolɛlielɛ ne abo la.” Ɔzele medame noko kɛ, “Ɛhye le Nyamenle ɔdaye ɔ nloa edwɛkɛ fɔɔnwo.”
66019010	Ɛhye ati mendule mendɔle ɔ gyakɛ anu kɛ mesonle ye, na ɔzele me kɛ, “Mmayɛ! Medame mele sonvolɛ kɛ ɛdawɔ nee ɛ mediema mɔɔ zɔle nɔhalɛ ne mɔɔ Gyisɛse yele hilele bɛ la anu la. Sonle Nyamenle, mmasonle me!” Ɔluakɛ nɔhalɛ ne mɔɔ Gyisɛse yele hilele la a le Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛma anwosesebɛ ne a.
66019011	Akee menwunle kɛ anwuma ɛbuke, na nrenya bie de ɛkpɔnwɔ fufule zo gyi ɛkɛ. Nrenya ne mɔɔ de ɛkpɔnwɔ fufule ne azo la bɛfɛlɛ ye Diedinli nee Nɔhavo; ɔfa pɛlepɛle a ɔbua ndɛne, ɔko konle a.
66019012	Ɔ nye ma le kɛ senle tafinlima, na ɔbɔ abɔtile dɔɔnwo. Bɛhɛlɛ duma bie wɔ ɔ nwo, na awie biala ɛnze duma holɛ ko ne kɛ ɔdaye ɔ ngomekye ala.
66019013	Ye tɛladeɛ mɔɔ ɔwula la anu le mogya ngome. Duma mɔɔ bɛfa bɛfɛlɛ ye la a le “Nyamenle Edwɛkɛ.”
66019014	Anwuma ɛlɔnema li ɔ nzi, bɛdede mgbɔnwɔ fufule zo na bɛwulowula adɛladeɛ fufule nwohyee.
66019015	Dadeɛ nlane zia ɔ nloa anu, na yemɔ yɛɛ ɔbava yeali maanle maanle kɔsɔɔti anwo zo konim a. Ɔbava tumi kpole yeazie bɛ, na yeahwihwi Nyamenle Bedevinli ne ɛya kpole ne mɔɔ wɔ ye nwanye melahyinli ne anu la yeagua.
66019016	Wɔ ye tɛladeɛ ne anu nee ye ɛzɔlɛ nwo, bɛhɛlɛ duma ɛhye, “Arelemgbunli Belemgbunli yɛɛ awulae mɔ Awulae.”
66019017	Akee menwunle Nyamenle soanvolɛ ko noko kɛ ɔgyi sɛnzɛne ne azo. Ɔvale ɛnelɛ kpole ɔzele nloma mɔɔ luolua anwomanyunlu la amuala kɛ, “Bɛboɔboa bɛ nloa bɛrɛla Nyamenle ɛkponledolɛ kpole ne abo!
66019018	Bɛrɛla bɛrali arelemgbunli nwonane, safohyenlema, nee ɛlɔnema nwonane, mgbɔnwɔ nane nee menli mɔɔ dede zo la nwonane, menli ngakyile kɔsɔɔti, ahanra nee alehelɛ, mgbole nee ngyikyi muala nwonane!”
66019019	Na menwunle nane ne nee ewiade anu arelemgbunli kɔsɔɔti kɛ bɛ nee bɛ ɛlɔnema ɛboɔboa bɛ nloa kɛ bɛ nee mɔɔ de ɛkpɔnwɔ fufule ne azo la nee ye ɛlɔnema baho.
66019020	Bɛhyele nane ne, nee ye kpɔmanvolɛ alane ne mɔɔ ɛlua ngonyiayelɛ zo ɛbɛlɛbɛla bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛlɛ nane ne nzonlɛ wɔ bɛ nwo nee bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛsonle ye ananze ne la. Bɛvuandinle bɛ mu nwiɔ anyewɔzo bɛguale sendɔlɔra tandane ne mɔɔ lɛ sɔlefa ɛlɛsɔ la anu.
66019021	Na mɔɔ de ɛkpɔnwɔ fufule ne azo la vale dadeɛ ne mɔɔ zia ɔ nloa anu la hunle nane ne ɛlɔnema mɔɔ hale la amuala; na nloma ne mɔ amuala ralile bɛ nwonane ne manle bɛ ko yile.
66020001	Akee menwunle kɛ Nyamenle soanvolɛ ko vi anwuma ɛlɛdwu, na ɔlɛ azɛlɛ kuma ne mɔɔ ɛnlɛ ɔ bo la sanvɛ ne nee nwɔnzɔnwɔnzɔ kpole bie ɔ sa nu.
66020002	Ɔhyele nane anwo ɛzulolɛ ne mɔɔ le kɛ ɛlɛnrɛne la, ɛwɔlɛ dɛba ne, mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye Abɔnsam anzɛɛ Seetan la, na ɔguale ye anga mɔɔ kyesɛ ɛvolɛ apenle ko pɛ nu kolaa na bɛazianyi ye la.
66020003	Nyamenle soanvolɛ ne vuandinle ye dole azɛlɛ kuma ne mɔɔ ɛnlɛ ɔ bo la anu, ɔhanle kuma ne ɔnwinle nwolɛ, na ɔzɔle ɔ nloa, amaa yeangola finde na yeabɛlɛbɛla maanle maanle bieko kyesɛ ɛvolɛ apenle ko ne pɛ nuhua. Ɛhye anzi bɛbazianyi ye mekɛ ekyi bie anu bɛamaa yealuolua.
66020004	Eza menwunle arelemgbunli mbia, na bɛmanle bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛdede zolɛ la tumi kɛ bɛbua ndɛne. Menwunle bɛdabɛ noko mɔɔ ɔluakɛ bɛbɔle Nyamenle Edwɛkpa ne nee nɔhalɛ ne mɔɔ Gyisɛse yele hilele la nolo la ati bɛhunle bɛ la ɛkɛla ne mɔ. Bɛanzonle nane ne anzɛɛ ye ananze ne, yɛɛ bɛanyɛ bɛ nane ne nzonlɛ ne bie wɔ bɛ nwoma azo anzɛɛ bɛ sa anwo. Menli ɛhye mɔ ziale rale ngoane nu bieko na bɛ nee Kelaese lile belemgbunli ɛvolɛ apenle.
66020005	Mɔwuamra mɔɔ hale la anzia amba ngoane nu toonwo ɔhɔdwule ɛvolɛ apenle ko ne awieleɛ. Ewudwazo ne mɔɔ lumua la ɛne.
66020006	Nyilalɛ nee anyunlunyia ɛha bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛboka alumua ewudwazo ne anwo la. Ewule ne mɔɔ tɔ zolɛ nwiɔ la ɛnlɛ bɛ nwo zo tumi; bɛbayɛ Nyamenle nee Kelaese sɛlɛvolɛma na bɛ nee Kelaese ali belemgbunli ɛvolɛ apenle.
66020007	Ɛvolɛ apenle ne anzi, bɛbaye Seetan bɛavi efiade ne,
66020008	na ɔbahɔ yeahɔbɛlɛbɛla maanle maanle mɔɔ wɔ aleɛabo la amuala, meka Gɔgo nee Magɔgo, na ɔ nee bɛ ahɔ konle. Bɛ somaa bayɛ kɛ ɛnweazo anwea.
66020009	Bɛzile nu bɛhɔle azɛlɛ ye azo ɛleka biala na bɛbɔle bɛyiale ɛleka ne mɔ mɔɔ Nyamenle menli ne de nee suakpole ne mɔɔ Nyamenle anye die nwolɛ la. Na senle vi anwuma razɛkyele bɛ.
66020010	Na bɛvuandinle Abɔnsam ne mɔɔ rabɛlɛbɛlale bɛ la bɛdole sendɔlɔra nee sɔlefa tandane ne mɔɔ bɛguale nane ne nee ye kpɔmanvolɛ alane ne nu la anu; na bɛbahile bɛ nyane alehyenlɛ nee aledwolɛ mekɛ mɔɔ ɛnlɛ awieleɛ.
66020011	Akee menwunle Belemgbunli ne nee ye belemgbunli ebia fufule ne mɔɔ ɔde zolɛ la. Anwuma nee azɛlɛ minliminlinle ɔ nyunlu ɛkɛ ne na bɛannwu bɛ bieko.
66020012	Na menwunle mɔwuamra, mgbole nee ngyikyi kɔsɔɔti, kɛ bɛgyigyi belemgbunli ebia kpole ne anyunlu, na bɛbukebuke mbuluku nu wɔ ɛkɛ. Eza bɛbukele teasema buluku ne noko anu, na bɛbuale mɔwuamra ndɛne wɔ mɔɔ bɛyɛle na bɛhɛlɛ bɛ wɔ mbuluku ne mɔ anu la anwo.
66020013	Nyevile kpule menli mɔɔ yeva bɛ la. Ewule nee Ɛbolɔ yele bɛ ɛdeɛ mɔɔ bɛvale bɛziele la vindele, na bɛbuale bɛ muala ndɛne wɔ mɔɔ bɛyɛle la anwo.
66020014	Akee bɛvuandinle Ewule nee Ɛbolɔ bɛguale senle tandane ne anu. Senle ɛhye a le ewule ne mɔɔ tɔ zolɛ nwiɔ la.
66020015	Awie biala mɔɔ bɛangɛlɛ ye duma wɔ teasema buluku ne anu la, bɛvuandinle ye bɛdole senle tandane ne anu.
66021001	Akee menwunle anwuma fofolɛ nee azɛlɛ fofolɛ. Ɔluakɛ alumua anwuma ne nee alumua azɛlɛ ne ɛze ɛhɔ, na nyevile ne ɛnle ɛkɛ bieko.
66021002	Na menwunle Suakpole Nwuanzanwuanza ne, mɔɔ le Gyɛlusalɛm fofolɛ ne, kɛ ɔvi Nyamenle ɛkɛ ne wɔ anwuma na bɛlɛdwula ye aze, bɛziezie ye kɛ atɔfolɛ mɔɔ bɛyɛ ye hyeleenyi na ɔkayia ɔ hu adenle la.
66021003	Mendele ɛnelɛ kpole bie wɔ belemgbunli ebia kpole ne anwo, ɔse, “Kɛkala, akee Nyamenle sua nu a le ye menli avinli. Ɔ nee bɛ badɛnla na bɛayɛ ye menli. Nyamenle mumua ne nee bɛ badɛnla na yeayɛ bɛ Nyamenle.
66021004	Ɔbakyikyi bɛ nye anwo monle. Ewule ɛnle ɛkɛ bieko, monle ɛnle ɛkɛ, nyane ɛnle ɛkɛ, ɛzunlɛ ɛnle ɛkɛ ne bieko. Ɔluakɛ alumua ninyɛne ne mɔ ɛze ɛhɔ.”
66021005	Na mɔɔ de belemgbunli ebia kpole ne azo la hanle kɛ, “Kɛkala, meyɛ ninyɛne kɔsɔɔti fofolɛ!” Eza ɔzele me kɛ, “Kɛlɛ ɛhye, ɔluakɛ edwɛkɛ ɛhye mɔ le nɔhalɛ yɛɛ bɛfa bɛ rɛle bɛto zolɛ a ɔyɛ boɛ.”
66021006	Na ɔzele me kɛ, “Bɛwie debie biala yɛ! Mame a mele ‘Alefa’ nee ‘Omiga’ ne a, mɔlebɛbo ne nee awieleɛ ne. Awie mɔɔ nzuhɔne ɛlɛku ye la mebamaa ye nzubula ne mɔɔ maa ngoane la anu nzule ne bie yeanlo mɔɔ ɔndua ɛhwee a.
66021007	Mɔɔ kɛli konim la banyia agyadeɛ ɛhye avi me ɛkɛ: mebayɛ ye Nyamenle na yeayɛ me ra.
66021008	Na avoanvoanle, menli mɔɔ ɛnlɛ diedi, ngunzima, ahɔdiawu, adwɔmanema, nindavoma, awozonle ɛzonlenlɛma, nee adalɛma amuala, bɛ ɛleka a le tandane ne mɔɔ senle nee sɔlefa ɛlɛsɔ nu la anu. Senle tandane ɛhye a le ewule ne mɔɔ tɔ zolɛ nwiɔ la.”
66021009	Nyamenle soanvolɛma nsuu ne mɔɔ lɛ amaneɛnwunlɛ dwora nsuu ne la anu ko rale me nwo ɛkɛ na ɔzele me kɛ, “Bɛla maa mengile wɔ Atɔfolɛ ne, mɔɔ le Boaneralɛ ne aye ne.”
66021010	Sunsum ne wolole me, na Nyamenle soanvolɛ ne vale me hɔle boka tendenle bie azo. Ɔhilele me Suakpole Nwuanzanwuanza Gyɛlusalɛm, kɛ ɔvi Nyamenle anwo lɔ anwuma na bɛlɛdwula ye aze,
66021011	na ɔlɛta wɔ Nyamenle anyunlunyia nu. Sua bɔdenle ne ta memeamemea kɛ ezukoa bolɛ ne mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye “gyasepa” la, na ɔ nye le kɔngyekɔngye zɛhae.
66021012	Bɛlie nwolɛ bane mɔɔ ye anwumahɔlɛ le tendenle kpalɛ a, ɔlɛ anuhɔlɛ bulu nee nwiɔ, yɛɛ Nyamenle soanvolɛ gyi ko biala anloa. Wɔ anuhɔlɛ ne mɔ azo, bɛhɛlɛ Yizilayɛ mbusua ekpunli bulu nee nwiɔ ne aluma bɛgua zolɛ.
66021013	Anuhɔlɛ nsa a wɔ bɛ tɛbanu ko biala a: nsa wɔ adɔleɛ, nsa wɔ aduduleɛ, nsa wɔ nyevile nu, yɛɛ nsa wɔ ɛbɔ nu.
66021014	Suakpole ne bane ne, bɛhyele ye wɔ adiabo awolɛ bulu nee nwiɔ mɔɔ bɛhɛlɛ Boaneralɛ ne ɛzoanvolɛma bulu nee nwiɔ ne aluma wɔ nwolɛ la azo.
66021015	Nyamenle soanvolɛ ne mɔɔ dendɛle hilele me la lɛ ezukoa nvutuke baka ɛzuzudeɛ kɛ ɔfa yeazuzu suakpole ne, anuhɔlɛ ne mɔ, yɛɛ ye bane ne mɔ.
66021016	Suakpole ne le anianna, ye tɛbanu tɛbanu ne mɔ sɛ, ye tendenle nee ye tɛtɛlɛ sɛ. Nyamenle soanvolɛ ne vale ye baka ɛzuzudeɛ ne zuzule suakpole ne: ɔnyianle ye tendenle nu kilomita apenle nwiɔ, ɛya nna (2,400), yɛɛ ye tɛtɛlɛ nee ye anwumahɔlɛ noko le kɛ ye tendenle nu.
66021017	Nyamenle soanvolɛ ne eza zuzule suakpole ne bane ne, na ye ɛzamo le mita kɛyɛ abulasia (60), kɛmɔ bɛ ɛzuzudeɛ ne mɔɔ bɛlɛ la kile la.
66021018	Bɛvale “gyasepa” a bɛdole suakpole ne bane ne a, yɛɛ bɛvale ezukoa nvutuke kpalɛ mɔɔ anye le kɛ neanleɛ la a bɛkyekyele sua bɔdenle mumua ne a.
66021019	Suakpole ne adiabo ne, bɛvale ezukoa awolɛ ngɛnlɛma mɔɔ sonle bolɛ la a bɛwulale a. Mɔɔ lumua la a le “gyasepa”, mɔɔ tɔ zolɛ nwiɔ la le sanyia bolɛ, bɛfɛlɛ ye “safaya”, mɔɔ tɔ zolɛ nsa la le ezukoa nvutuke bolɛ, bɛfɛlɛ ye “agɛte”, mɔɔ tɔ zolɛ nna la le bolɛ ɛsesebɛ anye asuomenle, bɛfɛlɛ ye “ɛmelade”,
66021020	nnu ne le ezukoa bolɛ, bɛfɛlɛ ye “ɔnese”, nsia ne bɛfɛlɛ ye “kanɛlea”, nsuu ne le ezukoa bolɛ anye asuomenle, bɛfɛlɛ ye “kelesɔlaete”, mɔtwɛ ne le bolɛ ɛsesebɛ anye asuomenle, bɛfɛlɛ ye “bɛlele”, ngɔnla ne le ezukoa nee sanyia bolɛ, bɛfɛlɛ ye “topaze”, bulu ne le ezukoa bolɛ, bɛfɛlɛ ye “kelesɔpelase”, bulu nee ko ne le bolɛ ɛsesebɛ anye buluwu, bɛfɛlɛ ye “gyasente”, yɛɛ mɔɔ tɔ zolɛ bulu nee nwiɔ ne la le bolɛ ɛsesebɛ anye kɔkɔlɛ, bɛfɛlɛ ye “ametese”.
66021021	Bɛvale ezukoa awolɛ ngakyile bulu nee nwiɔ mɔɔ sonle bolɛ la a bɛyɛle suakpole ne anuhɔlɛ ɛbonle ne mɔ a; asolo ko biala ɛdeɛ. Suakpole ne awɔdenle ne mɔ noko bɛvale ezukoa nvutuke kpalɛ mɔɔ anye le kɔngyekɔngye kɛ neanleɛ la a bɛyɛle a.
66021022	Meannwu ɛzonlenlɛ sua wɔ suakpole ne azo, ɔboalekɛ ye Ɛzonlenlɛ Sua a le Awulae Nyamenle Bedevinli ne ɔdaye mumua ne nee Boaneralɛ ne.
66021023	Suakpole ne azo amra ɛngyia sɛnzɛne anzɛɛ siane nwo, ɔluakɛ Nyamenle anyunlunyia ne a le zolɛ wienyi ne a, yɛɛ Boaneralɛ ne a le ye kɛnlaneɛ a.
66021024	Maanle maanle kɔsɔɔti balua ye wienyi ne anu yɛɛ ewiade arelemgbunli bava bɛ anyunlunyia ne ara ɛkɛ.
66021025	Suakpole ne nlenkɛ ne mɔ badeda nwolɛ dahuu, bɛnrɛtoto nuhua ɛlɛ, ɔluakɛ aleɛ ɛndwo ɛkɛ ne ɛlɛ.
66021026	Maanle maanle kɔsɔɔti lɛ bɛ kpoleyɛlɛ nee bɛ anyunlunyia&&& bara suakpole ne azo.
66021027	Na debie biala mɔɔ anwo ɛnde la ɛnrɛhɔ suakpole ne azo. Zɔhane ala yɛɛ mɔɔ bɔ anyiemgba ɛbɛla na ɔbɔ adalɛ la ɛnrɛhɔ ɛkɛ a. Bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛhɛlɛ bɛ aluma wɔ Boaneralɛ ne teasema buluku ne anu la angome a bahɔ suakpole ne azo a.
66022001	Nyamenle soanvolɛ ne eza hilele me nzule ne mɔɔ maa ngoane la azudenle ne. Ɔ nye le kɔngyekɔngye kɛ neanleɛ, na ɔse ɔvi Nyamenle nee Boaneralɛ ne belemgbunli ebia kpole ne abo,
66022002	ɔdua suakpole ne awɔdenle ne mɔɔ la sua ne avinli la azo. Ngoane baka ne ɛfifi azudenle ne anloa nwiɔ ne, na bɛso ma ngakyile fane bulu nee nwiɔ ɛvolɛ ko biala; siane ko biala ɔso ko, na bɛ nya ne mɔ maa maanle maanle ne mɔ ngoane.
66022003	Debie biala mɔɔ Nyamenle anye ɛnlie nwolɛ la ɛnle suakpole ne azo. Nyamenle nee Boaneralɛ ne belemgbunli ebia kpole ne wɔ suakpole ne azo, na ye sonvolɛma sonle ye.
66022004	Bɛnwu ɔ nyunlu, yɛɛ ye duma wɔ bɛ nwoma azo.
66022005	Aleɛ ɛndwo ko wɔ ɛkɛ, yɛɛ bɛngyia kɛnlaneɛ anzɛɛ ewia nwo wɔ ɛkɛ, ɔluakɛ Awulae Nyamenle ne a le bɛ kɛnlaneɛ a, na bɛbali belemgbunli mekɛ mɔɔ ɛnlɛ awieleɛ.
66022006	Na Nyamenle soanvolɛ ne zele me kɛ, “Edwɛkɛ ɛhye mɔ le nɔhalɛ na bɛfa bɛ rɛle bɛwula nu a ɔyɛ boɛ. Awulae Nyamenle ne mɔɔ fa ye Sunsum ne wula ye kpɔmanvolɛma la yɛɛ ɛzoa ye soanvolɛma ne mɔ anu ko kɛ ɔraye mɔɔ ɛnrɛhyɛ biala na yeazi la ɔhile ye sonvolɛma ne mɔ a.”
66022007	Na Gyisɛse zele kɛ, “Bɛdie, ɔnrɛhyɛ biala na meara!” Nyilalɛ ɛha bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛkɛli Nyamenle edwɛkɛ ne mɔɔ wɔ buluku ɛhye anu la azo la.
66022008	Medame Dwɔn a mendele na menwunle ninyɛne ɛhye mɔ amuala a. Na mendiele na menwunle ninyɛne ɛhye mɔ menwiele la, mendule mendɔle Nyamenle soanvolɛ ne mɔɔ ɛhilehile me ninyɛne ɛhye mɔ la agyakɛ anu kɛ mesonle ye.
66022009	Na ɔzele me kɛ, “Mmayɛ! Medame mele sonvolɛ kɛ ɛdawɔ nee ɛ mediema Nyamenle kpɔmanvolɛma ne mɔ, nee bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛdi edwɛkɛ mɔɔ wɔ buluku ɛhye anu la azo la. Sonle Nyamenle na mmasonle me!”
66022010	Eza ɔzele me kɛ, “Mmafa Nyamenle edwɛkɛ ne mɔɔ wɔ buluku ɛhye anu la ɛfea, ɔluakɛ mekɛ mɔɔ ɛha na ɛhye azi la le ekyi.
66022011	Mɔɔ le musuɔfoɔ la ɛhɔ zo ɛyɛ ye munzule ninyɛne ne, mɔɔ yɛ ninyɛne ɛtane ɛtane la ɛhɔ zo ɛyɛ. Mɔɔ le kpalɛ noko la ɛhɔ zo ɛyɛ ye ahunlunyele gyima ne, yɛɛ mɔɔ anwo te nwuanzaanwu la ɛhɔ zo ɛyɛ nwuanzanwuanza.”
66022012	Gyisɛse zele kɛ, “Bɛdie! Ɔnrɛhyɛ biala na meara! Melɛ me sa nu ahatualɛ mebara na mearadua awie biala kakɛ wɔ gyima mɔɔ yeli la anwo.
66022013	Mame a mele ‘Alefa’ nee ‘Omiga’ ne a, mɔlebɛbo ne nee awieleɛ ne.”
66022014	Nyilalɛ ɛha bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛkpo bɛ ndanlɛ ne mɔ bɔkɔbɔkɔ na ɔlua zolɛ bɛnyia adenle bɛli ngoane baka ne ma ne bie, na bɛwolo bɛhɔ suakpole ne azo la.
66022015	Wɔ suakpole ne kandiba lɔ, amumuyɛma, ahɔdiawu, ngonyiayelɛma, adwɔmanema, awozonle ɛzonlenlɛma, yɛɛ adalɛma wɔ nyɛleɛ nee ɛdendɛlɛ nu la a wɔ ɛkɛ ne a.
66022016	“Medame Gyisɛse, yɛɛ mezoa me soanvolɛ kɛ ɔrabɔ ɛhye mɔ nolo ɔhile bɛ wɔ asɔne ne mɔ ati a. Mele Devidi anlɔnra; mame a mele nwonlomɔ ɛwɔlɔra ne mɔɔ ta kpole la a.”
66022017	Na Sunsum ne nee Atɔfolɛ ne se, “Bɛla!” Awie mɔɔ kɛde la ɔdaye ɔha kɛ, “Bɛla!” Bɛdabɛ mɔɔ nzuhɔne ɛlɛku bɛ la, bɛrɛla bɛralie nzule mɔɔ maa ngoane la bɛnlo. Ɔle ahyɛlɛdeɛ, bɛndɔ. Bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛkulo la, bɛranlo bie.
66022018	Medame Dwɔn, mekakye bɛdabɛ mɔɔ bɛkɛde Nyamenle nrɛlaleɛ ɛhye mɔɔ wɔ buluku ɛhye anu la ɛsesebɛ kɛ: saa awie fa bie boka nrɛlaleɛ ɛhye anwo a, Nyamenle bava amaneɛnwunlɛ ngakyile ne mɔ mɔɔ bɛha nwolɛ edwɛkɛ wɔ buluku ɛhye anu la bie aboka ye amaneɛnwunlɛ nwo.
66022019	Saa awie noko ye bie fi Nyamenle nrɛlaleɛ ne mɔɔ wɔ buluku ɛhye anu la anu a, Nyamenle baye ye afoa nu ngoane baka ne nee ye ɛleka ne mɔɔ wɔ suakpole nwuanzanwuanza ne azo, mɔɔ bɛha nwolɛ edwɛkɛ wɔ buluku ɛhye anu la avi ɛkɛ.
66022020	Sonla ne mɔɔ di ɛhye mɔ kɔsɔɔti anwo daselɛ la se, “Nɔhalɛ, ɔnrɛhyɛ biala na meara!” Amen! Awulae Gyisɛse, bɛla!
66022021	Awulae Gyisɛse ɛlo Nyamenle menli ne amuala na ɔ nee bɛ ɛdɛnla. Amen.
